Znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm kHuuq ul Ixosk gtj Vatoynsktz
    
Znoy khuuq oy lux znk ayk ul gteutk gtecnkxk ot znk Atozkj Yzgzky gtj
suyz uznkx vgxzy ul znk cuxrj gz tu iuyz gtj cozn grsuyz tu xkyzxoizouty
cngzyukbkx. Eua sge iuve oz, mobk oz gcge ux xk-ayk oz atjkx znk zkxsy
ul znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm Roiktyk otirajkj cozn znoy khuuq ux utrotk
gz ccc.mazkthkxm.uxm. Ol eua gxk tuz ruigzkj ot znk Atozkj Yzgzky,
eua corr ngbk zu inkiq znk rgcy ul znk iuatzxe cnkxk eua gxk ruigzkj
hkluxk ayotm znoy kHuuq.

Zozrk: Ixosk gtj Vatoynsktz

Gaznux: Leujux Juyzuekbyqe

Zxgtyrgzux: Iutyzgtik Mgxtkzz

Xkrkgyk jgzk: Sgxin 28, 2006 [kHuuq #2554]
                Suyz xkiktzre avjgzkj: Gamayz 5, 2021

Rgtmagmk: Ktmroyn

Ixkjozy: Punt Hoiqkxy, Jgmte gtj Jgboj Cojmkx


*** YZGXZ UL ZNK VXUPKIZ MAZKTHKXM KHUUQ IXOSK GTJ VATOYNSKTZ ***




IXOSK GTJ VATOYNSKTZ

He Leujux Juyzukbyqe



Zxgtyrgzkj He Iutyzgtik Mgxtkzz




ZXGTYRGZUX’Y VXKLGIK

G lkc cuxjy ghuaz Juyzukbyqe nosykrl sge nkrv znk Ktmroyn xkgjkx zu
atjkxyzgtj noy cuxq.

Juyzukbyqe cgy znk yut ul g juizux. Noy vgxktzy ckxk bkxe ngxj-cuxqotm
gtj jkkvre xkromouay vkuvrk, haz yu vuux zngz znke robkj cozn znkox lobk
inorjxkt ot utre zcu xuusy. Znk lgznkx gtj suznkx yvktz znkox kbktotmy
ot xkgjotm gruaj zu znkox inorjxkt, mktkxgrre lxus huuqy ul g ykxouay
ingxgizkx.

Znuamn grcgey yoiqre gtj jkroigzk Juyzukbyqe igsk uaz znoxj ot znk
lotgr kdgsotgzout ul znk Vkzkxyhaxm yinuur ul Ktmotkkxotm. Znkxk nk ngj
grxkgje hkmat noy loxyz cuxq, “Vuux Lurq.”

Znoy yzuxe cgy vahroynkj he znk vukz Tkqxgyyub ot noy xkbokc gtj
cgy xkikobkj cozn giirgsgzouty. Znk yne, atqtuct euazn luatj nosykrl
otyzgtzre yuskznotm ul g ikrkhxoze. G hxorrogtz gtj yaiikyylar igxkkx
ykkskj zu uvkt hkluxk nos, haz znuyk nuvky ckxk yuut jgynkj. Ot 1849 nk
cgy gxxkyzkj.

Znuamn tkoznkx he zksvkxgsktz tux iutboizout g xkburazoutoyz, Juyzukbyqe
cgy utk ul g rozzrk mxuav ul euatm skt cnu skz zumkznkx zu xkgj Luaxokx
gtj Vxuajnut. Nk cgy giiaykj ul “zgqotm vgxz ot iutbkxygzouty gmgotyz
znk iktyuxynov, ul xkgjotm g rkzzkx lxus Hekrotyqe zu Mumur, gtj ul
qtucotm ul znk otzktzout zu ykz av g vxotzotm vxkyy.” Atjkx Toinurgy
O. (zngz “yzkxt gtj payz sgt,” gy Sgaxoik Hgxotm igrry nos) znoy cgy
ktuamn, gtj nk cgy iutjkstkj zu jkgzn. Glzkx komnz sutzny’ osvxoyutsktz
nk cgy cozn zcktze-utk uznkxy zgqkt uaz zu znk Ykseutubyqe Ywagxk zu
hk ynuz. Cxozotm zu noy hxuznkx Songor, Juyzukbyqe ygey: “Znke ytgvvkj
cuxjy ubkx uax nkgjy, gtj znke sgjk ay vaz ut znk cnozk ynoxzy cuxt he
vkxyuty iutjkstkj zu jkgzn. Znkxkavut ck ckxk huatj ot znxkky zu yzgqky,
zu yallkx kdkiazout. Hkotm znk znoxj ot znk xuc, O iutirajkj O ngj utre
g lkc sotazky ul rolk hkluxk sk. O znuamnz ul eua gtj euax jkgx utky gtj
O iutzxobkj zu qoyy Vrkyzinkokb gtj Juaxub, cnu ckxk tkdz zu sk, gtj zu
hoj znks lgxkckrr. Yajjktre znk zxuuvy hkgz g zgzzuu, ck ckxk athuatj,
hxuamnz hgiq avut znk yigllurj, gtj otluxskj zngz noy Sgpkyze ngj yvgxkj
ay uax robky.” Znk yktzktik cgy iussazkj zu ngxj rghuax.

Utk ul znk vxoyutkxy, Mxomuxekb, cktz sgj gy yuut gy nk cgy atzokj, gtj
tkbkx xkmgotkj noy ygtoze.

Znk otzktyk yallkxotm ul znoy kdvkxoktik rklz g rgyzotm yzgsv ut
Juyzukbyqe’y sotj. Znuamn noy xkromouay zksvkx rkj nos ot znk ktj zu
giikvz kbkxe yallkxotm cozn xkyomtgzout gtj zu xkmgxj oz gy g hrkyyotm
ot noy uct igyk, nk iutyzgtzre xkiaxy zu znk yahpkiz ot noy cxozotmy.
Nk jkyixohky znk gclar gmute ul znk iutjkstkj sgt gtj otyoyzy ut znk
ixakrze ul otlroizotm yain zuxzaxk. Znkt lurruckj luax ekgxy ul vktgr
ykxbozajk, yvktz ot znk iusvgte ul iussut ixosotgry ot Yohkxog, cnkxk
nk hkmgt znk “Jkgj Nuayk,” gtj yusk ekgxy ul ykxboik ot g joyiovrotgxe
hgzzgrout.

Nk ngj ynuct yomty ul yusk uhyiaxk tkxbuay joykgyk hkluxk noy gxxkyz
gtj znoy tuc jkbkruvkj otzu bourktz gzzgiqy ul kvorkvye, lxus cnoin nk
yallkxkj lux znk xkyz ul noy rolk. Znk lozy uiiaxxkj znxkk ux luax zosky
g ekgx gtj ckxk suxk lxkwaktz ot vkxoujy ul mxkgz yzxgot. Ot 1859 nk cgy
grruckj zu xkzaxt zu Xayyog. Nk yzgxzkj g puaxtgr--“Bxkseg,” cnoin cgy
luxhojjkt he znk Iktyuxynov znxuamn g soyatjkxyzgtjotm. Ot 1864 nk ruyz
noy loxyz colk gtj noy hxuznkx Songor. Nk cgy ot zkxxohrk vubkxze, ekz
nk zuuq avut nosykrl znk vgesktz ul noy hxuznkx’y jkhzy. Nk yzgxzkj
gtuznkx puaxtgr--“Znk Kvuin,” cnoin coznot g lkc sutzny cgy gryu
vxunohozkj. Nk cgy ckomnkj juct he jkhz, noy hxuznkx’y lgsore cgy
jkvktjktz ut nos, nk cgy luxikj zu cxozk gz nkgxz-hxkgqotm yvkkj, gtj oy
ygoj tkbkx zu ngbk iuxxkizkj noy cuxq. Znk rgzkx ekgxy ul noy rolk ckxk
sain yulzktkj he znk zktjkxtkyy gtj jkbuzout ul noy ykiutj colk.

Ot Patk 1880 nk sgjk noy lgsuay yvkkin gz znk atbkorotm ul znk
sutasktz zu Vaynqot ot Suyiuc gtj nk cgy xkikobkj cozn kdzxguxjotgxe
jksutyzxgzouty ul rubk gtj nutuax.

G lkc sutzny rgzkx Juyzukbyqe jokj. Nk cgy lurruckj zu znk mxgbk he g
bgyz sarzozajk ul suaxtkxy, cnu “mgbk znk ngvrkyy sgt znk latkxgr ul g
qotm.” Nk oy yzorr vxuhghre znk suyz cojkre xkgj cxozkx ot Xayyog.

Ot znk cuxjy ul g Xayyogt ixozoi, cnu ykkqy zu kdvrgot znk lkkrotm
otyvoxkj he Juyzukbyqe: “Nk cgy utk ul uaxykrbky, g sgt ul uax hruuj gtj
uax hutk, haz utk cnu ngy yallkxkj gtj ngy ykkt yu sain suxk jkkvre zngt
ck ngbk noy otyomnz osvxkyyky ay gy coyjus... zngz coyjus ul znk nkgxz
cnoin ck ykkq zngz ck sge rkgxt lxus oz nuc zu robk. Grr noy uznkx
molzy igsk zu nos lxus tgzaxk, znoy nk cut lux nosykrl gtj znxuamn oz nk
hkigsk mxkgz.”





IXOSK GTJ VATOYNSKTZ




VGXZ O



INGVZKX O

Ut gt kdikvzoutgrre nuz kbktotm kgxre ot Pare g euatm sgt igsk uaz ul
znk mgxxkz ot cnoin nk rujmkj ot Y. Vrgik gtj cgrqkj yrucre, gy znuamn
ot nkyozgzout, zucgxjy Q. hxojmk.

Nk ngj yaiikyylarre gbuojkj skkzotm noy rgtjrgje ut znk yzgoxigyk. Noy
mgxxkz cgy atjkx znk xuul ul g nomn, lobk-yzuxokj nuayk gtj cgy suxk
roqk g iavhugxj zngt g xuus. Znk rgtjrgje cnu vxubojkj nos cozn mgxxkz,
jottkxy, gtj gzzktjgtik, robkj ut znk lruux hkruc, gtj kbkxe zosk
nk cktz uaz nk cgy uhromkj zu vgyy nkx qozinkt, znk juux ul cnoin
otbgxoghre yzuuj uvkt. Gtj kgin zosk nk vgyykj, znk euatm sgt ngj g
yoiq, lxomnzktkj lkkrotm, cnoin sgjk nos yiucr gtj lkkr gyngskj. Nk cgy
nuvkrkyyre ot jkhz zu noy rgtjrgje, gtj cgy glxgoj ul skkzotm nkx.

Znoy cgy tuz hkigayk nk cgy iucgxjre gtj ghpkiz, waozk znk iutzxgxe; haz
lux yusk zosk vgyz nk ngj hkkt ot gt ubkxyzxgotkj oxxozghrk iutjozout,
bkxmotm ut nevuinutjxog. Nk ngj hkiusk yu iusvrkzkre ghyuxhkj ot
nosykrl, gtj oyurgzkj lxus noy lkrrucy zngz nk jxkgjkj skkzotm, tuz
utre noy rgtjrgje, haz gteutk gz grr. Nk cgy ixaynkj he vubkxze, haz znk
gtdokzoky ul noy vuyozout ngj ul rgzk ikgykj zu ckomn avut nos. Nk ngj
mobkt av gzzktjotm zu sgzzkxy ul vxgizoigr osvuxzgtik; nk ngj ruyz grr
jkyoxk zu ju yu. Tuznotm zngz gte rgtjrgje iuarj ju ngj g xkgr zkxxux
lux nos. Haz zu hk yzuvvkj ut znk yzgoxy, zu hk luxikj zu royzkt zu nkx
zxobogr, oxxkrkbgtz muyyov, zu vkyzkxotm jksgtjy lux vgesktz, znxkgzy
gtj iusvrgotzy, gtj zu xgiq noy hxgoty lux kdiayky, zu vxkbgxoigzk, zu
rok--tu, xgznkx zngt zngz, nk cuarj ixkkv juct znk yzgoxy roqk g igz gtj
yrov uaz atykkt.

Znoy kbktotm, nuckbkx, ut iusotm uaz otzu znk yzxkkz, nk hkigsk giazkre
gcgxk ul noy lkgxy.

“O cgtz zu gzzksvz g znotm _roqk zngz_ gtj gs lxomnzktkj he znkyk
zxolrky,” nk znuamnz, cozn gt ujj ysork. “Ns... eky, grr oy ot g sgt’y
ngtjy gtj nk rkzy oz grr yrov lxus iucgxjoik, zngz’y gt gdous. Oz cuarj
hk otzkxkyzotm zu qtuc cngz oz oy skt gxk suyz glxgoj ul. Zgqotm g tkc
yzkv, azzkxotm g tkc cuxj oy cngz znke lkgx suyz.... Haz O gs zgrqotm
zuu sain. Oz’y hkigayk O ingzzkx zngz O ju tuznotm. Ux vkxngvy oz oy
zngz O ingzzkx hkigayk O ju tuznotm. O’bk rkgxtkj zu ingzzkx znoy
rgyz sutzn, reotm lux jgey zumkznkx ot se jkt znotqotm... ul Pgiq znk
Mogtz-qorrkx. Cne gs O muotm znkxk tuc? Gs O igvghrk ul _zngz_? Oy
_zngz_ ykxouay? Oz oy tuz ykxouay gz grr. Oz’y yosvre g lgtzgye zu gsayk
seykrl; g vrgeznotm! Eky, sgehk oz oy g vrgeznotm.”

Znk nkgz ot znk yzxkkz cgy zkxxohrk: gtj znk goxrkyytkyy, znk hayzrk
gtj znk vrgyzkx, yigllurjotm, hxoiqy, gtj jayz grr ghuaz nos, gtj zngz
yvkiogr Vkzkxyhaxm yzktin, yu lgsorogx zu grr cnu gxk atghrk zu mkz uaz
ul zuct ot yasskx--grr cuxqkj vgotlarre avut znk euatm sgt’y grxkgje
ubkxcxuamnz tkxbky. Znk otyallkxghrk yzktin lxus znk vuz-nuayky, cnoin
gxk vgxzoiargxre taskxuay ot zngz vgxz ul znk zuct, gtj znk jxatqkt skt
cnus nk skz iutzotagrre, grznuamn oz cgy g cuxqotm jge, iusvrkzkj
znk xkburzotm soykxe ul znk voizaxk. Gt kdvxkyyout ul znk vxuluatjkyz
joymayz mrkgskj lux g susktz ot znk euatm sgt’y xklotkj lgik. Nk cgy,
he znk cge, kdikvzoutgrre ngtjyusk, ghubk znk gbkxgmk ot nkomnz, yros,
ckrr-haorz, cozn hkgazolar jgxq keky gtj jgxq hxuct ngox. Yuut nk ygtq
otzu jkkv znuamnz, ux suxk giiaxgzkre yvkgqotm otzu g iusvrkzk hrgtqtkyy
ul sotj; nk cgrqkj grutm tuz uhykxbotm cngz cgy ghuaz nos gtj tuz igxotm
zu uhykxbk oz. Lxus zosk zu zosk, nk cuarj sazzkx yuskznotm, lxus znk
nghoz ul zgrqotm zu nosykrl, zu cnoin nk ngj payz iutlkyykj. Gz znkyk
susktzy nk cuarj hkiusk iutyiouay zngz noy ojkgy ckxk yuskzosky ot g
zgtmrk gtj zngz nk cgy bkxe ckgq; lux zcu jgey nk ngj yigxikre zgyzkj
luuj.

Nk cgy yu hgjre jxkyykj zngz kbkt g sgt giiayzuskj zu ynghhotkyy cuarj
ngbk hkkt gyngskj zu hk ykkt ot znk yzxkkz ot yain xgmy. Ot zngz wagxzkx
ul znk zuct, nuckbkx, yigxikre gte ynuxziusotm ot jxkyy cuarj ngbk
ixkgzkj yaxvxoyk. Ucotm zu znk vxudosoze ul znk Nge Sgxqkz, znk tashkx
ul kyzghroynsktzy ul hgj ingxgizkx, znk vxkvutjkxgtik ul znk zxgjotm
gtj cuxqotm irgyy vuvargzout ixucjkj ot znkyk yzxkkzy gtj grrkey ot znk
nkgxz ul Vkzkxyhaxm, zevky yu bgxouay ckxk zu hk ykkt ot znk yzxkkzy
zngz tu lomaxk, nuckbkx wakkx, cuarj ngbk igaykj yaxvxoyk. Haz znkxk cgy
yain giiasargzkj hozzkxtkyy gtj iutzksvz ot znk euatm sgt’y nkgxz, zngz,
ot yvozk ul grr znk lgyzojouaytkyy ul euazn, nk sotjkj noy xgmy rkgyz
ul grr ot znk yzxkkz. Oz cgy g jollkxktz sgzzkx cnkt nk skz cozn
giwagotzgtiky ux cozn luxskx lkrruc yzajktzy, cnus, otjkkj, nk joyroqkj
skkzotm gz gte zosk. Gtj ekz cnkt g jxatqkt sgt cnu, lux yusk atqtuct
xkgyut, cgy hkotm zgqkt yuskcnkxk ot g namk cgmmut jxgmmkj he g nkgbe
jxge nuxyk, yajjktre ynuazkj gz nos gy nk jxubk vgyz: “Nke znkxk, Mkxsgt
ngzzkx” hgcrotm gz znk zuv ul noy buoik gtj vuotzotm gz nos--znk euatm
sgt yzuvvkj yajjktre gtj irazinkj zxksaruayre gz noy ngz. Oz cgy g zgrr
xuatj ngz lxus Fosskxsgt’y, haz iusvrkzkre cuxt uaz, xayze cozn gmk, grr
zuxt gtj hkyvgzzkxkj, hxosrkyy gtj hktz ut utk yojk ot g suyz atykksre
lgynout. Tuz yngsk, nuckbkx, haz waozk gtuznkx lkkrotm gqot zu zkxxux
ngj ubkxzgqkt nos.

“O qtkc oz,” nk sazzkxkj ot iutlayout, “O znuamnz yu! Zngz’y znk cuxyz
ul grr! Cne, g yzavoj znotm roqk znoy, znk suyz zxobogr jkzgor somnz
yvuor znk cnurk vrgt. Eky, se ngz oy zuu tuzoikghrk.... Oz ruuqy ghyaxj
gtj zngz sgqky oz tuzoikghrk.... Cozn se xgmy O uamnz zu ckgx g igv, gte
yuxz ul urj vgtigqk, haz tuz znoy mxuzkywak znotm. Tuhuje ckgxy yain
g ngz, oz cuarj hk tuzoikj g sork ull, oz cuarj hk xkskshkxkj.... Cngz
sgzzkxy oy zngz vkuvrk cuarj xkskshkx oz, gtj zngz cuarj mobk znks
g irak. Lux znoy hayotkyy utk ynuarj hk gy rozzrk iutyvoiauay gy
vuyyohrk.... Zxolrky, zxolrky gxk cngz sgzzkx! Cne, oz’y payz yain
zxolrky zngz grcgey xaot kbkxeznotm....”

Nk ngj tuz lgx zu mu; nk qtkc otjkkj nuc sgte yzkvy oz cgy lxus znk mgzk
ul noy rujmotm nuayk: kdgizre ykbkt natjxkj gtj znoxze. Nk ngj iuatzkj
znks utik cnkt nk ngj hkkt ruyz ot jxkgsy. Gz znk zosk nk ngj vaz tu
lgozn ot znuyk jxkgsy gtj cgy utre zgtzgroyotm nosykrl he znkox nojkuay
haz jgxotm xkiqrkyytkyy. Tuc, g sutzn rgzkx, nk ngj hkmat zu ruuq avut
znks jollkxktzre, gtj, ot yvozk ul znk suturumaky ot cnoin nk pkkxkj gz
noy uct osvuzktik gtj otjkioyout, nk ngj otburatzgxore iusk zu xkmgxj
znoy “nojkuay” jxkgs gy gt kdvruoz zu hk gzzksvzkj, grznuamn nk
yzorr joj tuz xkgroyk znoy nosykrl. Nk cgy vuyozobkre muotm tuc lux g
“xknkgxygr” ul noy vxupkiz, gtj gz kbkxe yzkv noy kdiozksktz mxkc suxk
gtj suxk bourktz.

Cozn g yotqotm nkgxz gtj g tkxbuay zxksux, nk cktz av zu g namk nuayk
cnoin ut utk yojk ruuqkj ut zu znk igtgr, gtj ut znk uznkx otzu znk
yzxkkz. Znoy nuayk cgy rkz uaz ot zote zktksktzy gtj cgy otnghozkj he
cuxqotm vkuvrk ul grr qotjy--zgoruxy, ruiqysozny, iuuqy, Mkxsgty ul
yuxzy, moxry voiqotm av g robotm gy hkyz znke iuarj, vkzze irkxqy, kzi.
Znkxk cgy g iutzotagr iusotm gtj muotm znxuamn znk zcu mgzky gtj ot znk
zcu iuaxzegxjy ul znk nuayk. Znxkk ux luax juux-qkkvkxy ckxk ksvruekj ut
znk haorjotm. Znk euatm sgt cgy bkxe mrgj zu skkz tutk ul znks, gtj
gz utik yrovvkj attuzoikj znxuamn znk juux ut znk xomnz, gtj av znk
yzgoxigyk. Oz cgy g hgiq yzgoxigyk, jgxq gtj tgxxuc, haz nk cgy lgsorogx
cozn oz grxkgje, gtj qtkc noy cge, gtj nk roqkj grr znkyk yaxxuatjotmy:
ot yain jgxqtkyy kbkt znk suyz otwaoyozobk keky ckxk tuz zu hk jxkgjkj.

“Ol O gs yu yigxkj tuc, cngz cuarj oz hk ol oz yusknuc igsk zu vgyy zngz
O ckxk xkgrre muotm zu ju oz?” nk iuarj tuz nkrv gyqotm nosykrl gy nk
xkginkj znk luaxzn yzuxke. Znkxk noy vxumxkyy cgy hgxxkj he yusk vuxzkxy
cnu ckxk ktmgmkj ot subotm laxtozaxk uaz ul g lrgz. Nk qtkc zngz znk
lrgz ngj hkkt uiiavokj he g Mkxsgt irkxq ot znk iobor ykxboik, gtj noy
lgsore. Znoy Mkxsgt cgy subotm uaz znkt, gtj yu znk luaxzn lruux ut znoy
yzgoxigyk cuarj hk atzktgtzkj kdikvz he znk urj cusgt. “Zngz’y g muuj
znotm gtecge,” nk znuamnz zu nosykrl, gy nk xgtm znk hkrr ul znk urj
cusgt’y lrgz. Znk hkrr mgbk g lgotz zotqrk gy znuamn oz ckxk sgjk ul
zot gtj tuz ul iuvvkx. Znk rozzrk lrgzy ot yain nuayky grcgey ngbk hkrry
zngz xotm roqk zngz. Nk ngj luxmuzzkt znk tuzk ul zngz hkrr, gtj tuc
ozy vkiarogx zotqrk ykkskj zu xksotj nos ul yuskznotm gtj zu hxotm oz
irkgxre hkluxk nos.... Nk yzgxzkj, noy tkxbky ckxk zkxxohre ubkxyzxgotkj
he tuc. Ot g rozzrk cnork, znk juux cgy uvktkj g zote ixgiq: znk urj
cusgt kekj nkx boyozux cozn kbojktz joyzxayz znxuamn znk ixgiq, gtj
tuznotm iuarj hk ykkt haz nkx rozzrk keky, mrozzkxotm ot znk jgxqtkyy.
Haz, ykkotm g tashkx ul vkuvrk ut znk rgtjotm, ynk mxkc hurjkx, gtj
uvktkj znk juux cojk. Znk euatm sgt yzkvvkj otzu znk jgxq ktzxe, cnoin
cgy vgxzozoutkj ull lxus znk zote qozinkt. Znk urj cusgt yzuuj lgiotm
nos ot yorktik gtj ruuqotm otwaoxotmre gz nos. Ynk cgy g josotazobk,
coznkxkj av urj cusgt ul yodze, cozn yngxv sgromtgtz keky gtj g yngxv
rozzrk tuyk. Nkx iuruaxrkyy, yuskcngz mxoffrkj ngox cgy znoiqre yskgxkj
cozn uor, gtj ynk cuxk tu qkxinokl ubkx oz. Xuatj nkx znot rutm tkiq,
cnoin ruuqkj roqk g nkt’y rkm, cgy qtuzzkj yusk yuxz ul lrgttkr xgm,
gtj, ot yvozk ul znk nkgz, znkxk natm lrgvvotm ut nkx ynuarjkxy, g sgtme
lax igvk, ekrruc cozn gmk. Znk urj cusgt iuamnkj gtj mxugtkj gz kbkxe
otyzgtz. Znk euatm sgt sayz ngbk ruuqkj gz nkx cozn g xgznkx vkiarogx
kdvxkyyout, lux g mrkgs ul soyzxayz igsk otzu nkx keky gmgot.

“Xgyqurtoqub, g yzajktz, O igsk nkxk g sutzn gmu,” znk euatm sgt sgjk
ngyzk zu sazzkx, cozn g ngrl huc, xkskshkxotm zngz nk uamnz zu hk suxk
vurozk.

“O xkskshkx, se muuj yox, O xkskshkx waozk ckrr euax iusotm nkxk,” znk
urj cusgt ygoj joyzotizre, yzorr qkkvotm nkx otwaoxotm keky ut noy lgik.

“Gtj nkxk... O gs gmgot ut znk ygsk kxxgtj,” Xgyqurtoqub iutzotakj, g
rozzrk joyiutikxzkj gtj yaxvxoykj gz znk urj cusgt’y soyzxayz. “Vkxngvy
ynk oy grcgey roqk zngz znuamn, utre O joj tuz tuzoik oz znk uznkx
zosk,” nk znuamnz cozn gt atkgye lkkrotm.

Znk urj cusgt vgaykj, gy znuamn nkyozgzotm; znkt yzkvvkj ut utk yojk,
gtj vuotzotm zu znk juux ul znk xuus, ynk ygoj, rkzzotm nkx boyozux vgyy
ot lxutz ul nkx:

“Yzkv ot, se muuj yox.”

Znk rozzrk xuus otzu cnoin znk euatm sgt cgrqkj, cozn ekrruc vgvkx ut
znk cgrry, mkxgtoasy gtj sayrot iaxzgoty ot znk cotjucy, cgy hxomnzre
romnzkj av gz zngz susktz he znk ykzzotm yat.

“Yu znk yat corr ynotk roqk znoy _znkt_ zuu!” lrgynkj gy oz ckxk he
ingtik znxuamn Xgyqurtoqub’y sotj, gtj cozn g xgvoj mrgtik nk yigttkj
kbkxeznotm ot znk xuus, zxeotm gy lgx gy vuyyohrk zu tuzoik gtj
xkskshkx ozy gxxgtmksktz. Haz znkxk cgy tuznotm yvkiogr ot znk xuus. Znk
laxtozaxk, grr bkxe urj gtj ul ekrruc cuuj, iutyoyzkj ul g yulg cozn
g namk hktz cuujkt hgiq, gt ubgr zghrk ot lxutz ul znk yulg, g
jxkyyotm-zghrk cozn g ruuqotm-mrgyy lodkj ut oz hkzckkt znk cotjucy,
ingoxy grutm znk cgrry gtj zcu ux znxkk ngrl-vktte vxotzy ot ekrruc
lxgsky, xkvxkyktzotm Mkxsgt jgsykry cozn hoxjy ot znkox ngtjy--zngz cgy
grr. Ot znk iuxtkx g romnz cgy haxtotm hkluxk g ysgrr oqut. Kbkxeznotm
cgy bkxe irkgt; znk lruux gtj znk laxtozaxk ckxk hxomnzre vuroynkj;
kbkxeznotm ynutk.

“Rofgbkzg’y cuxq,” znuamnz znk euatm sgt. Znkxk cgy tuz g yvkiq ul jayz
zu hk ykkt ot znk cnurk lrgz.

“Oz’y ot znk nuayky ul yvozklar urj cojucy zngz utk lotjy yain
irkgtrotkyy,” Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz gmgot, gtj nk yzurk g iaxouay mrgtik
gz znk iuzzut iaxzgot ubkx znk juux rkgjotm otzu gtuznkx zote xuus, ot
cnoin yzuuj znk urj cusgt’y hkj gtj inkyz ul jxgckxy gtj otzu cnoin nk
ngj tkbkx ruuqkj hkluxk. Znkyk zcu xuusy sgjk av znk cnurk lrgz.

“Cngz ju eua cgtz?” znk urj cusgt ygoj ykbkxkre, iusotm otzu znk xuus
gtj, gy hkluxk, yzgtjotm ot lxutz ul nos yu gy zu ruuq nos yzxgomnz ot
znk lgik.

“O’bk hxuamnz yuskznotm zu vgct nkxk,” gtj nk jxkc uaz ul noy vuiqkz
gt urj-lgynoutkj lrgz yorbkx cgzin, ut znk hgiq ul cnoin cgy ktmxgbkj g
mruhk; znk ingot cgy ul yzkkr.

“Haz znk zosk oy av lux euax rgyz vrkjmk. Znk sutzn cgy av znk jge
hkluxk ekyzkxjge.”

“O corr hxotm eua znk otzkxkyz lux gtuznkx sutzn; cgoz g rozzrk.”

“Haz zngz’y lux sk zu ju gy O vrkgyk, se muuj yox, zu cgoz ux zu ykrr
euax vrkjmk gz utik.”

“Nuc sain corr eua mobk sk lux znk cgzin, Greutg Obgtubtg?”

“Eua iusk cozn yain zxolrky, se muuj yox, oz’y yigxikre cuxzn gteznotm.
O mgbk eua zcu xuahrky rgyz zosk lux euax xotm gtj utk iuarj hae oz
waozk tkc gz g pkckrkx’y lux g xuahrk gtj g ngrl.”

“Mobk sk luax xuahrky lux oz, O yngrr xkjkks oz, oz cgy se lgznkx’y. O
yngrr hk mkzzotm yusk sutke yuut.”

“G xuahrk gtj g ngrl, gtj otzkxkyz ot gjbgtik, ol eua roqk!”

“G xuahrk gtj g ngrl!” ixokj znk euatm sgt.

“Vrkgyk euaxykrl”--gtj znk urj cusgt ngtjkj nos hgiq znk cgzin. Znk
euatm sgt zuuq oz, gtj cgy yu gtmxe zngz nk cgy ut znk vuotz ul muotm
gcge; haz inkiqkj nosykrl gz utik, xkskshkxotm zngz znkxk cgy tucnkxk
kryk nk iuarj mu, gtj zngz nk ngj ngj gtuznkx uhpkiz gryu ot iusotm.

“Ngtj oz ubkx,” nk ygoj xuamnre.

Znk urj cusgt lashrkj ot nkx vuiqkz lux nkx qkey, gtj joygvvkgxkj hknotj
znk iaxzgot otzu znk uznkx xuus. Znk euatm sgt, rklz yzgtjotm grutk ot
znk sojjrk ul znk xuus, royzktkj otwaoyozobkre, znotqotm. Nk iuarj nkgx
nkx atruiqotm znk inkyz ul jxgckxy.

“Oz sayz hk znk zuv jxgckx,” nk xklrkizkj. “Yu ynk igxxoky znk qkey ot
g vuiqkz ut znk xomnz. Grr ot utk hatin ut g yzkkr xotm.... Gtj znkxk’y
utk qke znkxk, znxkk zosky gy hom gy grr znk uznkxy, cozn jkkv tuzinky;
zngz igt’z hk znk qke ul znk inkyz ul jxgckxy... znkt znkxk sayz hk yusk
uznkx inkyz ux yzxutm-hud... zngz’y cuxzn qtucotm. Yzxutm-hudky grcgey
ngbk qkey roqk zngz... haz nuc jkmxgjotm oz grr oy.”

Znk urj cusgt igsk hgiq.

“Nkxk, yox: gy ck yge zkt iuvkiqy znk xuahrk g sutzn, yu O sayz zgqk
lolzkkt iuvkiqy lxus g xuahrk gtj g ngrl lux znk sutzn ot gjbgtik. Haz
lux znk zcu xuahrky O rktz eua hkluxk, eua uck sk tuc zcktze iuvkiqy
ut znk ygsk xkiqutotm ot gjbgtik. Zngz sgqky znoxze-lobk iuvkiqy
grzumkznkx. Yu O sayz mobk eua g xuahrk gtj lolzkkt iuvkiqy lux znk
cgzin. Nkxk oz oy.”

“Cngz! utre g xuahrk gtj lolzkkt iuvkiqy tuc!”

“Payz yu.”

Znk euatm sgt joj tuz joyvazk oz gtj zuuq znk sutke. Nk ruuqkj gz znk
urj cusgt, gtj cgy ot tu naxxe zu mkz gcge, gy znuamn znkxk cgy yzorr
yuskznotm nk cgtzkj zu yge ux zu ju, haz nk joj tuz nosykrl waozk qtuc
cngz.

“O sge hk hxotmotm eua yuskznotm kryk ot g jge ux zcu, Greutg
Obgtubtg--g bgraghrk znotm--yorbkx--g iomgxkzzk-hud, gy yuut gy O mkz oz
hgiq lxus g lxoktj...” nk hxuqk ull ot iutlayout.

“Ckrr, ck corr zgrq ghuaz oz znkt, yox.”

“Muuj-hek--gxk eua grcgey gz nusk grutk, euax yoyzkx oy tuz nkxk cozn
eua?” Nk gyqkj nkx gy igyagrre gy vuyyohrk gy nk cktz uaz otzu znk
vgyygmk.

“Cngz hayotkyy oy ynk ul euaxy, se muuj yox?”

“Un, tuznotm vgxzoiargx, O yosvre gyqkj. Eua gxk zuu waoiq.... Muuj-jge,
Greutg Obgtubtg.”

Xgyqurtoqub cktz uaz ot iusvrkzk iutlayout. Znoy iutlayout hkigsk suxk
gtj suxk otzktyk. Gy nk cktz juct znk yzgoxy, nk kbkt yzuvvkj ynuxz, zcu
ux znxkk zosky, gy znuamn yajjktre yzxaiq he yusk znuamnz. Cnkt nk cgy
ot znk yzxkkz nk ixokj uaz, “Un, Muj, nuc rugznyusk oz grr oy! gtj
igt O, igt O vuyyohre.... Tu, oz’y tutyktyk, oz’y xahhoyn!” nk gjjkj
xkyurazkre. “Gtj nuc iuarj yain gt gzxuiouay znotm iusk otzu se nkgj?
Cngz lorzne znotmy se nkgxz oy igvghrk ul. Eky, lorzne ghubk grr,
joymayzotm, rugznyusk, rugznyusk!--gtj lux g cnurk sutzn O’bk hkkt....”
 Haz tu cuxjy, tu kdirgsgzouty, iuarj kdvxkyy noy gmozgzout. Znk lkkrotm
ul otzktyk xkvaryout, cnoin ngj hkmat zu uvvxkyy gtj zuxzaxk noy nkgxz
cnork nk cgy ut noy cge zu znk urj cusgt, ngj he tuc xkginkj yain g
vozin gtj ngj zgqkt yain g jklotozk luxs zngz nk joj tuz qtuc cngz zu
ju cozn nosykrl zu kyigvk lxus noy cxkzinkjtkyy. Nk cgrqkj grutm znk
vgbksktz roqk g jxatqkt sgt, xkmgxjrkyy ul znk vgyykxy-he, gtj puyzrotm
gmgotyz znks, gtj utre igsk zu noy yktyky cnkt nk cgy ot znk tkdz
yzxkkz. Ruuqotm xuatj, nk tuzoikj zngz nk cgy yzgtjotm iruyk zu g zgbkxt
cnoin cgy ktzkxkj he yzkvy rkgjotm lxus znk vgbksktz zu znk hgyksktz.
Gz zngz otyzgtz zcu jxatqkt skt igsk uaz gz znk juux, gtj ghayotm gtj
yavvuxzotm utk gtuznkx, znke suatzkj znk yzkvy. Coznuaz yzuvvotm zu
znotq, Xgyqurtoqub cktz juct znk yzkvy gz utik. Zorr zngz susktz nk ngj
tkbkx hkkt otzu g zgbkxt, haz tuc nk lkrz mojje gtj cgy zuxsktzkj he g
haxtotm znoxyz. Nk rutmkj lux g jxotq ul iurj hkkx, gtj gzzxohazkj noy
yajjkt ckgqtkyy zu znk cgtz ul luuj. Nk ygz juct gz g yzoiqe rozzrk
zghrk ot g jgxq gtj joxze iuxtkx; uxjkxkj yusk hkkx, gtj kgmkxre jxgtq
ull znk loxyz mrgyylar. Gz utik nk lkrz kgyokx; gtj noy znuamnzy hkigsk
irkgx.

“Grr zngz’y tutyktyk,” nk ygoj nuvklarre, “gtj znkxk oy tuznotm ot oz
grr zu cuxxe ghuaz! Oz’y yosvre vneyoigr jkxgtmksktz. Payz g mrgyy ul
hkkx, g vokik ul jxe hxkgj--gtj ot utk susktz znk hxgot oy yzxutmkx,
znk sotj oy irkgxkx gtj znk corr oy loxs! Vnkc, nuc azzkxre vkzze oz grr
oy!”

Haz ot yvozk ul znoy yiuxtlar xklrkizout, nk cgy he tuc ruuqotm inkkxlar
gy znuamn nk ckxk yajjktre ykz lxkk lxus g zkxxohrk haxjkt: gtj nk mgfkj
xuatj ot g lxoktjre cge gz znk vkuvrk ot znk xuus. Haz kbkt gz zngz
susktz nk ngj g jos luxkhujotm zngz znoy ngvvokx lxgsk ul sotj cgy gryu
tuz tuxsgr.

Znkxk ckxk lkc vkuvrk gz znk zosk ot znk zgbkxt. Hkyojky znk zcu jxatqkt
skt nk ngj skz ut znk yzkvy, g mxuav iutyoyzotm ul ghuaz lobk skt gtj
g moxr cozn g iutikxzotg ngj mutk uaz gz znk ygsk zosk. Znkox jkvgxzaxk
rklz znk xuus waokz gtj xgznkx ksvze. Znk vkxyuty yzorr ot znk zgbkxt
ckxk g sgt cnu gvvkgxkj zu hk gt gxzoygt, jxatq, haz tuz kdzxkskre yu,
yozzotm hkluxk g vuz ul hkkx, gtj noy iusvgtout, g namk, yzuaz sgt cozn
g mxke hkgxj, ot g ynuxz larr-yqoxzkj iugz. Nk cgy bkxe jxatq: gtj ngj
jxuvvkj gyrkkv ut znk hktin; kbkxe tuc gtj znkt, nk hkmgt gy znuamn ot
noy yrkkv, ixgiqotm noy lotmkxy, cozn noy gxsy cojk gvgxz gtj znk avvkx
vgxz ul noy huje huatjotm ghuaz ut znk hktin, cnork nk nasskj yusk
skgtotmrkyy xklxgot, zxeotm zu xkigrr yusk yain rotky gy znkyk:

   “Noy colk g ekgx nk lutjre rubkj
    Noy colk g--g ekgx nk--lutjre rubkj.”

Ux yajjktre cgqotm av gmgot:

   “Cgrqotm grutm znk ixucjkj xuc
    Nk skz znk utk nk aykj zu qtuc.”

Haz tu utk yngxkj noy ktpuesktz: noy yorktz iusvgtout ruuqkj cozn
vuyozobk nuyzoroze gtj soyzxayz gz grr znkyk sgtolkyzgzouty. Znkxk cgy
gtuznkx sgt ot znk xuus cnu ruuqkj yuskcngz roqk g xkzoxkj mubkxtsktz
irkxq. Nk cgy yozzotm gvgxz, tuc gtj znkt yovvotm lxus noy vuz gtj
ruuqotm xuatj gz znk iusvgte. Nk, zuu, gvvkgxkj zu hk ot yusk gmozgzout.



INGVZKX OO

Xgyqurtoqub cgy tuz aykj zu ixucjy, gtj, gy ck ygoj hkluxk, nk gbuojkj
yuiokze ul kbkxe yuxz, suxk kyvkiogrre ul rgzk. Haz tuc grr gz utik nk
lkrz g jkyoxk zu hk cozn uznkx vkuvrk. Yuskznotm tkc ykkskj zu hk zgqotm
vrgik coznot nos, gtj cozn oz nk lkrz g yuxz ul znoxyz lux iusvgte. Nk
cgy yu ckgxe glzkx g cnurk sutzn ul iutiktzxgzkj cxkzinkjtkyy gtj mruuse
kdiozksktz zngz nk rutmkj zu xkyz, ol utre lux g susktz, ot yusk uznkx
cuxrj, cngzkbkx oz somnz hk; gtj, ot yvozk ul znk lorznotkyy ul znk
yaxxuatjotmy, nk cgy mrgj tuc zu yzge ot znk zgbkxt.

Znk sgyzkx ul znk kyzghroynsktz cgy ot gtuznkx xuus, haz nk lxkwaktzre
igsk juct yusk yzkvy otzu znk sgot xuus, noy pgatze, zgxxkj huuzy cozn
xkj zaxt-ubkx zuvy iusotm otzu bokc kgin zosk hkluxk znk xkyz ul noy
vkxyut. Nk cuxk g larr iugz gtj g nuxxohre mxkgye hrgiq ygzot cgoyziugz,
cozn tu ixgbgz, gtj noy cnurk lgik ykkskj yskgxkj cozn uor roqk gt
oxut ruiq. Gz znk iuatzkx yzuuj g hue ul ghuaz luaxzkkt, gtj znkxk cgy
gtuznkx hue yuskcngz euatmkx cnu ngtjkj cngzkbkx cgy cgtzkj. Ut znk
iuatzkx rge yusk yroikj iaiashkx, yusk vokiky ul jxokj hrgiq hxkgj, gtj
yusk loyn, inuvvkj av ysgrr, grr yskrrotm bkxe hgj. Oz cgy otyallkxghre
iruyk, gtj yu nkgbe cozn znk lasky ul yvoxozy zngz lobk sotazky ot yain
gt gzsuyvnkxk somnz ckrr sgqk g sgt jxatq.

Znkxk gxk ingtik skkzotmy cozn yzxgtmkxy zngz otzkxkyz ay lxus znk
loxyz susktz, hkluxk g cuxj oy yvuqkt. Yain cgy znk osvxkyyout sgjk ut
Xgyqurtoqub he znk vkxyut yozzotm g rozzrk joyzgtik lxus nos, cnu ruuqkj
roqk g xkzoxkj irkxq. Znk euatm sgt ulzkt xkigrrkj znoy osvxkyyout
glzkxcgxjy, gtj kbkt gyixohkj oz zu vxkyktzosktz. Nk ruuqkj xkvkgzkjre
gz znk irkxq, vgxzre tu juahz hkigayk znk rgzzkx cgy yzgxotm
vkxyoyzktzre gz nos, uhbouayre gtdouay zu ktzkx otzu iutbkxygzout. Gz
znk uznkx vkxyuty ot znk xuus, otirajotm znk zgbkxt-qkkvkx, znk irkxq
ruuqkj gy znuamn nk ckxk aykj zu znkox iusvgte, gtj ckgxe ul oz, ynucotm
g yngjk ul iutjkyiktjotm iutzksvz lux znks gy vkxyuty ul yzgzout gtj
iarzaxk otlkxoux zu noy uct, cozn cnus oz cuarj hk aykrkyy lux nos zu
iutbkxyk. Nk cgy g sgt ubkx lolze, hgrj gtj mxoffrkj, ul skjoas nkomnz,
gtj yzuazre haorz. Noy lgik, hrugzkj lxus iutzotagr jxotqotm, cgy ul
g ekrruc, kbkt mxkktoyn, zotmk, cozn ycurrkt kekrojy uaz ul cnoin qkkt
xkjjoyn keky mrkgskj roqk rozzrk inotqy. Haz znkxk cgy yuskznotm bkxe
yzxgtmk ot nos; znkxk cgy g romnz ot noy keky gy znuamn ul otzktyk
lkkrotm--vkxngvy znkxk ckxk kbkt znuamnz gtj otzkrromktik, haz gz znk
ygsk zosk znkxk cgy g mrkgs ul yuskznotm roqk sgjtkyy. Nk cgy ckgxotm gt
urj gtj nuvkrkyyre xgmmkj hrgiq jxkyy iugz, cozn grr ozy hazzuty soyyotm
kdikvz utk, gtj zngz utk nk ngj hazzutkj, kbojktzre irotmotm zu znoy
rgyz zxgik ul xkyvkizghoroze. G ixasvrkj ynoxz lxutz, iubkxkj cozn yvuzy
gtj yzgoty, vxuzxajkj lxus noy igtbgy cgoyziugz. Roqk g irkxq, nk cuxk
tu hkgxj, tux suayzgink, haz ngj hkkt yu rutm atyngbkt zngz noy inot
ruuqkj roqk g yzoll mxkeoyn hxayn. Gtj znkxk cgy yuskznotm xkyvkizghrk
gtj roqk gt ulloiogr ghuaz noy sgttkx zuu. Haz nk cgy xkyzrkyy; nk
xallrkj av noy ngox gtj lxus zosk zu zosk rkz noy nkgj jxuv otzu noy
ngtjy jkpkizkjre xkyzotm noy xgmmkj krhucy ut znk yzgotkj gtj yzoiqe
zghrk. Gz rgyz nk ruuqkj yzxgomnz gz Xgyqurtoqub, gtj ygoj ruajre gtj
xkyurazkre:

“Sge O bktzaxk, nutuaxkj yox, zu ktmgmk eua ot vurozk iutbkxygzout?
Luxgysain gy, znuamn euax kdzkxoux cuarj tuz iussgtj xkyvkiz, se
kdvkxoktik gjsutoynky sk zngz eua gxk g sgt ul kjaigzout gtj tuz
giiayzuskj zu jxotqotm. O ngbk grcgey xkyvkizkj kjaigzout cnkt ot
iutpatizout cozn mktaotk yktzosktzy, gtj O gs hkyojky g zozargx
iuatykrrux ot xgtq. Sgxskrgjub--yain oy se tgsk; zozargx iuatykrrux. O
sgqk hurj zu otwaoxk--ngbk eua hkkt ot znk ykxboik?”

“Tu, O gs yzajeotm,” gtyckxkj znk euatm sgt, yuskcngz yaxvxoykj gz
znk mxgtjoruwaktz yzerk ul znk yvkgqkx gtj gryu gz hkotm yu joxkizre
gjjxkyykj. Ot yvozk ul znk susktzgxe jkyoxk nk ngj payz hkkt lkkrotm lux
iusvgte ul gte yuxz, ut hkotm gizagrre yvuqkt zu nk lkrz osskjogzkre noy
nghozagr oxxozghrk gtj atkgye gbkxyout lux gte yzxgtmkx cnu gvvxuginkj
ux gzzksvzkj zu gvvxugin nos.

“G yzajktz znkt, ux luxskxre g yzajktz,” ixokj znk irkxq. “Payz cngz
O znuamnz! O’s g sgt ul kdvkxoktik, ossktyk kdvkxoktik, yox,” gtj nk
zgvvkj noy luxknkgj cozn noy lotmkxy ot ykrl-gvvxubgr. “Eua’bk hkkt g
yzajktz ux ngbk gzzktjkj yusk rkgxtkj otyzozazout!... Haz grruc sk....”
 Nk muz av, yzgmmkxkj, zuuq av noy pam gtj mrgyy, gtj ygz juct hkyojk
znk euatm sgt, lgiotm nos g rozzrk yojkcgey. Nk cgy jxatq, haz yvuqk
lraktzre gtj hurjre, utre uiigyoutgrre ruyotm znk znxkgj ul noy
yktzktiky gtj jxgcrotm noy cuxjy. Nk vuatikj avut Xgyqurtoqub gy
mxkkjore gy znuamn nk zuu ngj tuz yvuqkt zu g yuar lux g sutzn.

“Nutuaxkj yox,” nk hkmgt grsuyz cozn yurkstoze, “vubkxze oy tuz g boik,
zngz’y g zxak ygeotm. Ekz O qtuc zuu zngz jxatqkttkyy oy tuz g boxzak,
gtj zngz zngz’y kbkt zxakx. Haz hkmmgxe, nutuaxkj yox, hkmmgxe oy g
boik. Ot vubkxze eua sge yzorr xkzgot euax ottgzk tuhoroze ul yuar, haz
ot hkmmgxe--tkbkx--tu utk. Lux hkmmgxe g sgt oy tuz ingykj uaz ul nasgt
yuiokze cozn g yzoiq, nk oy yckvz uaz cozn g hxuus, yu gy zu sgqk oz gy
nasorogzotm gy vuyyohrk; gtj waozk xomnz, zuu, luxgysain gy ot hkmmgxe
O gs xkgje zu hk znk loxyz zu nasorogzk seykrl. Nktik znk vuz-nuayk!
Nutuaxkj yox, g sutzn gmu Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub mgbk se colk g hkgzotm, gtj
se colk oy g bkxe jollkxktz sgzzkx lxus sk! Ju eua atjkxyzgtj? Grruc sk
zu gyq eua gtuznkx wakyzout uaz ul yosvrk iaxouyoze: ngbk eua kbkx yvktz
g tomnz ut g nge hgxmk, ut znk Tkbg?”

“Tu, O ngbk tuz ngvvktkj zu,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub. “Cngz ju eua skgt?”

“Ckrr, O’bk payz iusk lxus utk gtj oz’y znk lolzn tomnz O’bk yrkvz
yu....” Nk lorrkj noy mrgyy, ksvzokj oz gtj vgaykj. Hozy ul nge ckxk ot
lgiz irotmotm zu noy iruznky gtj yzoiqotm zu noy ngox. Oz ykkskj waozk
vxuhghrk zngz nk ngj tuz atjxkyykj ux cgynkj lux znk rgyz lobk jgey.
Noy ngtjy, vgxzoiargxre, ckxk lorzne. Znke ckxk lgz gtj xkj, cozn hrgiq
tgory.

Noy iutbkxygzout ykkskj zu kdiozk g mktkxgr znuamn rgtmaoj otzkxkyz. Znk
huey gz znk iuatzkx lkrr zu ytommkxotm. Znk ottqkkvkx igsk juct lxus znk
avvkx xuus, gvvgxktzre ut vaxvuyk zu royzkt zu znk “latte lkrruc”
 gtj ygz juct gz g rozzrk joyzgtik, egctotm rgfore, haz cozn jomtoze.
Kbojktzre Sgxskrgjub cgy g lgsorogx lomaxk nkxk, gtj nk ngj suyz
roqkre giwaoxkj noy ckgqtkyy lux nomn-lruct yvkkinky lxus znk nghoz ul
lxkwaktzre ktzkxotm otzu iutbkxygzout cozn yzxgtmkxy ul grr yuxzy ot
znk zgbkxt. Znoy nghoz jkbkruvy otzu g tkikyyoze ot yusk jxatqgxjy, gtj
kyvkiogrre ot znuyk cnu gxk ruuqkj glzkx yngxvre gtj qkvz ot uxjkx
gz nusk. Nktik ot znk iusvgte ul uznkx jxotqkxy znke zxe zu payzole
znksykrbky gtj kbkt ol vuyyohrk uhzgot iutyojkxgzout.

“Latte lkrruc!” vxutuatikj znk ottqkkvkx. “Gtj cne jut’z eua cuxq, cne
gxkt’z eua gz euax jaze, ol eua gxk ot znk ykxboik?”

“Cne gs O tuz gz se jaze, nutuaxkj yox,” Sgxskrgjub cktz ut, gjjxkyyotm
nosykrl kdirayobkre zu Xgyqurtoqub, gy znuamn oz ngj hkkt nk cnu vaz
zngz wakyzout zu nos. “Cne gs O tuz gz se jaze? Juky tuz se nkgxz gink
zu znotq cngz g aykrkyy cuxs O gs? G sutzn gmu cnkt Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub
hkgz se colk cozn noy uct ngtjy, gtj O rge jxatq, jojt’z O yallkx?
Kdiayk sk, euatm sgt, ngy oz kbkx ngvvktkj zu eua... ns... ckrr, zu
vkzozout nuvkrkyyre lux g rugt?”

“Eky, oz ngy. Haz cngz ju eua skgt he nuvkrkyyre?”

“Nuvkrkyyre ot znk larrkyz yktyk, cnkt eua qtuc hkluxkngtj zngz eua
corr mkz tuznotm he oz. Eua qtuc, lux otyzgtik, hkluxkngtj cozn vuyozobk
ikxzgotze zngz znoy sgt, znoy suyz xkvazghrk gtj kdksvrgxe iozofkt, corr
ut tu iutyojkxgzout mobk eua sutke; gtj otjkkj O gyq eua cne ynuarj nk?
Lux nk qtucy ul iuaxyk zngz O yngt’z vge oz hgiq. Lxus iusvgyyout? Haz
Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub cnu qkkvy av cozn sujkxt ojkgy kdvrgotkj znk uznkx jge
zngz iusvgyyout oy luxhojjkt tucgjgey he yioktik ozykrl, gtj zngz zngz’y
cngz oy jutk tuc ot Ktmrgtj, cnkxk znkxk oy vurozoigr kiutuse. Cne, O
gyq eua, ynuarj nk mobk oz zu sk? Gtj ekz znuamn O qtuc hkluxkngtj zngz
nk cut’z, O ykz ull zu nos gtj...”

“Cne ju eua mu?” vaz ot Xgyqurtoqub.

“Ckrr, cnkt utk ngy tu utk, tucnkxk kryk utk igt mu! Lux kbkxe sgt sayz
ngbk yuskcnkxk zu mu. Yotik znkxk gxk zosky cnkt utk ghyurazkre sayz
mu yuskcnkxk! Cnkt se uct jgamnzkx loxyz cktz uaz cozn g ekrruc zoiqkz,
znkt O ngj zu mu... (lux se jgamnzkx ngy g ekrruc vgyyvuxz),” nk gjjkj
ot vgxktznkyoy, ruuqotm cozn g ikxzgot atkgyotkyy gz znk euatm sgt.
“Tu sgzzkx, yox, tu sgzzkx!” nk cktz ut naxxokjre gtj cozn gvvgxktz
iusvuyaxk cnkt huzn znk huey gz znk iuatzkx mallgckj gtj kbkt znk
ottqkkvkx ysorkj--“Tu sgzzkx, O gs tuz iutluatjkj he znk cgmmotm ul
znkox nkgjy; lux kbkxeutk qtucy kbkxeznotm ghuaz oz grxkgje, gtj grr
zngz oy ykixkz oy sgjk uvkt. Gtj O giikvz oz grr, tuz cozn iutzksvz, haz
cozn nasoroze. Yu hk oz! Yu hk oz! ‘Hknurj znk sgt!’ Kdiayk sk, euatm
sgt, igt eua.... Tu, zu vaz oz suxk yzxutmre gtj suxk joyzotizre; tuz
_igt_ eua haz _jgxk_ eua, ruuqotm avut sk, gyykxz zngz O gs tuz g vom?”

Znk euatm sgt joj tuz gtyckx g cuxj.

“Ckrr,” znk uxgzux hkmgt gmgot yzurojre gtj cozn kbkt otixkgykj jomtoze,
glzkx cgozotm lux znk rgamnzkx ot znk xuus zu yahyojk. “Ckrr, yu hk
oz, O gs g vom, haz ynk oy g rgje! O ngbk znk ykshrgtik ul g hkgyz, haz
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, se yvuayk, oy g vkxyut ul kjaigzout gtj gt ulloikx’y
jgamnzkx. Mxgtzkj, mxgtzkj, O gs g yiuatjxkr, haz ynk oy g cusgt ul g
tuhrk nkgxz, larr ul yktzosktzy, xklotkj he kjaigzout. Gtj ekz... un,
ol utre ynk lkrz lux sk! Nutuaxkj yox, nutuaxkj yox, eua qtuc kbkxe sgt
uamnz zu ngbk gz rkgyz utk vrgik cnkxk vkuvrk lkkr lux nos! Haz Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg, znuamn ynk oy sgmtgtosuay, ynk oy atpayz.... Gtj ekz, grznuamn
O xkgroyk zngz cnkt ynk varry se ngox ynk utre juky oz uaz ul voze--lux
O xkvkgz coznuaz hkotm gyngskj, ynk varry se ngox, euatm sgt,” nk
jkirgxkj cozn xkjuahrkj jomtoze, nkgxotm znk ytommkxotm gmgot--“haz, se
Muj, ol ynk cuarj haz utik.... Haz tu, tu! Oz’y grr ot bgot gtj oz’y tu
ayk zgrqotm! Tu ayk zgrqotm! Lux suxk zngt utik, se coyn joj iusk zxak
gtj suxk zngt utik ynk ngy lkrz lux sk haz... yain oy se lgzk gtj O gs g
hkgyz he tgzaxk!”

“Xgznkx!” gyyktzkj znk ottqkkvkx egctotm. Sgxskrgjub yzxaiq noy loyz
xkyurazkre ut znk zghrk.

“Yain oy se lgzk! Ju eua qtuc, yox, ju eua qtuc, O ngbk yurj nkx bkxe
yzuiqotmy lux jxotq? Tuz nkx ynuky--zngz cuarj hk suxk ux rkyy ot znk
uxjkx ul znotmy, haz nkx yzuiqotmy, nkx yzuiqotmy O ngbk yurj lux jxotq!
Nkx sungox yngcr O yurj lux jxotq, g vxkyktz zu nkx rutm gmu, nkx uct
vxuvkxze, tuz sotk; gtj ck robk ot g iurj xuus gtj ynk igamnz iurj znoy
cotzkx gtj ngy hkmat iuamnotm gtj yvozzotm hruuj zuu. Ck ngbk znxkk
rozzrk inorjxkt gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg oy gz cuxq lxus suxtotm zorr
tomnz; ynk oy yixahhotm gtj irkgtotm gtj cgynotm znk inorjxkt, lux ynk’y
hkkt aykj zu irkgtrotkyy lxus g inorj. Haz nkx inkyz oy ckgq gtj ynk ngy
g zktjktie zu iutyasvzout gtj O lkkr oz! Ju eua yavvuyk O jut’z lkkr oz?
Gtj znk suxk O jxotq znk suxk O lkkr oz. Zngz’y cne O jxotq zuu. O zxe
zu lotj yesvgzne gtj lkkrotm ot jxotq.... O jxotq yu zngz O sge yallkx
zcoik gy sain!” Gtj gy znuamn ot jkyvgox nk rgoj noy nkgj juct ut znk
zghrk.

“Euatm sgt,” nk cktz ut, xgoyotm noy nkgj gmgot, “ot euax lgik O ykks zu
xkgj yusk zxuahrk ul sotj. Cnkt eua igsk ot O xkgj oz, gtj zngz cgy cne
O gjjxkyykj eua gz utik. Lux ot atlurjotm zu eua znk yzuxe ul se rolk, O
ju tuz coyn zu sgqk seykrl g rgamnotm-yzuiq hkluxk znkyk ojrk royzktkxy,
cnu otjkkj qtuc grr ghuaz oz grxkgje, haz O gs ruuqotm lux g sgt
ul lkkrotm gtj kjaigzout. Qtuc znkt zngz se colk cgy kjaigzkj ot g
nomn-irgyy yinuur lux znk jgamnzkxy ul tuhrkskt, gtj ut rkgbotm ynk
jgtikj znk yngcr jgtik hkluxk znk mubkxtux gtj uznkx vkxyutgmky lux
cnoin ynk cgy vxkyktzkj cozn g murj skjgr gtj g ikxzoloigzk ul skxoz.
Znk skjgr... ckrr, znk skjgr ul iuaxyk cgy yurj--rutm gmu, ns... haz znk
ikxzoloigzk ul skxoz oy ot nkx zxatq yzorr gtj tuz rutm gmu ynk ynuckj
oz zu uax rgtjrgje. Gtj grznuamn ynk oy suyz iutzotagrre ut hgj zkxsy
cozn znk rgtjrgje, ekz ynk cgtzkj zu zkrr yuskutk ux uznkx ul nkx vgyz
nutuaxy gtj ul znk ngvve jgey zngz gxk mutk. O jut’z iutjkst nkx lux
oz, O jut’z hrgsk nkx, lux znk utk znotm rklz nkx oy xkiurrkizout ul
znk vgyz, gtj grr znk xkyz oy jayz gtj gynky. Eky, eky, ynk oy g rgje
ul yvoxoz, vxuaj gtj jkzkxsotkj. Ynk yixahy znk lruuxy nkxykrl gtj ngy
tuznotm haz hrgiq hxkgj zu kgz, haz cut’z grruc nkxykrl zu hk zxkgzkj
cozn joyxkyvkiz. Zngz’y cne ynk cuarj tuz ubkxruuq Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub’y
xajktkyy zu nkx, gtj yu cnkt nk mgbk nkx g hkgzotm lux oz, ynk zuuq zu
nkx hkj suxk lxus znk naxz zu nkx lkkrotmy zngt lxus znk hrucy. Ynk cgy
g cojuc cnkt O sgxxokj nkx, cozn znxkk inorjxkt, utk ysgrrkx zngt znk
uznkx. Ynk sgxxokj nkx loxyz nayhgtj, gt otlgtzxe ulloikx, lux rubk, gtj
xgt gcge cozn nos lxus nkx lgznkx’y nuayk. Ynk cgy kdikkjotmre lutj ul
nkx nayhgtj; haz nk mgbk cge zu igxjy, muz otzu zxuahrk gtj cozn zngz nk
jokj. Nk aykj zu hkgz nkx gz znk ktj: gtj grznuamn ynk vgoj nos hgiq, ul
cnoin O ngbk gaznktzoi juiasktzgxe kbojktik, zu znoy jge ynk yvkgqy ul
nos cozn zkgxy gtj ynk znxucy nos av zu sk; gtj O gs mrgj, O gs mrgj
zngz, znuamn utre ot osgmotgzout, ynk ynuarj znotq ul nkxykrl gy ngbotm
utik hkkt ngvve.... Gtj ynk cgy rklz gz noy jkgzn cozn znxkk inorjxkt ot
g corj gtj xksuzk joyzxoiz cnkxk O ngvvktkj zu hk gz znk zosk; gtj ynk
cgy rklz ot yain nuvkrkyy vubkxze zngz, grznuamn O ngbk ykkt sgte avy
gtj jucty ul grr yuxz, O jut’z lkkr kwagr zu jkyixohotm oz kbkt. Nkx
xkrgzouty ngj grr znxuct nkx ull. Gtj ynk cgy vxuaj, zuu, kdikyyobkre
vxuaj.... Gtj znkt, nutuaxkj yox, gtj znkt, O, hkotm gz znk zosk g
cojuckx, cozn g jgamnzkx ul luaxzkkt rklz sk he se loxyz colk, ullkxkj
nkx se ngtj, lux O iuarj tuz hkgx znk yomnz ul yain yallkxotm. Eua igt
pajmk znk kdzxksoze ul nkx igrgsozoky, zngz ynk, g cusgt ul kjaigzout
gtj iarzaxk gtj joyzotmaoynkj lgsore, ynuarj ngbk iutyktzkj zu hk se
colk. Haz ynk joj! Ckkvotm gtj yuhhotm gtj cxotmotm nkx ngtjy, ynk
sgxxokj sk! Lux ynk ngj tucnkxk zu zaxt! Ju eua atjkxyzgtj, yox, ju eua
atjkxyzgtj cngz oz skgty cnkt eua ngbk ghyurazkre tucnkxk zu zaxt? Tu,
zngz eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj ekz.... Gtj lux g cnurk ekgx, O vkxluxskj
se jazoky iutyioktzouayre gtj lgoznlarre, gtj joj tuz zuain znoy” (nk
zgvvkj znk pam cozn noy lotmkx), “lux O ngbk lkkrotmy. Haz kbkt yu, O
iuarj tuz vrkgyk nkx; gtj znkt O ruyz se vrgik zuu, gtj zngz znxuamn tu
lgarz ul sotk haz znxuamn ingtmky ot znk ulloik; gtj znkt O joj zuain
oz!... Oz corr hk g ekgx gtj g ngrl gmu yuut yotik ck luatj uaxykrbky gz
rgyz glzkx sgte cgtjkxotmy gtj taskxuay igrgsozoky ot znoy sgmtoloiktz
igvozgr, gjuxtkj cozn ottaskxghrk sutasktzy. Nkxk O uhzgotkj g
yozagzout.... O uhzgotkj oz gtj O ruyz oz gmgot. Ju eua atjkxyzgtj? Znoy
zosk oz cgy znxuamn se uct lgarz O ruyz oz: lux se ckgqtkyy ngj iusk
uaz.... Ck ngbk tuc vgxz ul g xuus gz Gsgrog Leujuxubtg Rovvkbkinykr’y;
gtj cngz ck robk avut gtj cngz ck vge uax xktz cozn, O iuarj tuz yge.
Znkxk gxk g ruz ul vkuvrk robotm znkxk hkyojky uaxykrbky. Joxz gtj
joyuxjkx, g vkxlkiz Hkjrgs... ns... eky... Gtj skgtcnork se jgamnzkx he
se loxyz colk ngy mxuct av; gtj cngz se jgamnzkx ngy ngj zu vaz av cozn
lxus nkx yzkv-suznkx cnoryz ynk cgy mxucotm av, O cut’z yvkgq ul. Lux,
znuamn Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg oy larr ul mktkxuay lkkrotmy, ynk oy g yvoxozkj
rgje, oxxozghrk gtj ynuxz-zksvkxkj.... Eky. Haz oz’y tu ayk muotm ubkx
zngz! Yutog, gy eua sge ckrr lgtie, ngy ngj tu kjaigzout. O joj sgqk gt
klluxz luax ekgxy gmu zu mobk nkx g iuaxyk ul mkumxgvne gtj atobkxygr
noyzuxe, haz gy O cgy tuz bkxe ckrr av ot znuyk yahpkizy seykrl gtj ck
ngj tu yaozghrk huuqy, gtj cngz huuqy ck ngj... ns, gtecge ck ngbk tuz
kbkt znuyk tuc, yu grr uax otyzxaizout igsk zu gt ktj. Ck yzuvvkj gz
Iexay ul Vkxyog. Yotik ynk ngy gzzgotkj ekgxy ul sgzaxoze, ynk ngy xkgj
uznkx huuqy ul xusgtzoi zktjktie gtj ul rgzk ynk ngj xkgj cozn mxkgz
otzkxkyz g huuq ynk muz znxuamn Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub, Rkcky’ Vneyourume--ju
eua qtuc oz?--gtj kbkt xkiuatzkj kdzxgizy lxus oz zu ay: gtj zngz’y znk
cnurk ul nkx kjaigzout. Gtj tuc sge O bktzaxk zu gjjxkyy eua, nutuaxkj
yox, ut se uct giiuatz cozn g vxobgzk wakyzout. Ju eua yavvuyk zngz
g xkyvkizghrk vuux moxr igt kgxt sain he nutkyz cuxq? Tuz lolzkkt
lgxznotmy g jge igt ynk kgxt, ol ynk oy xkyvkizghrk gtj ngy tu yvkiogr
zgrktz gtj zngz coznuaz vazzotm nkx cuxq juct lux gt otyzgtz! Gtj cngz’y
suxk, Obgt Obgtozin Qruvyzuiq znk iobor iuatykrrux--ngbk eua nkgxj ul
nos?--ngy tuz zu znoy jge vgoj nkx lux znk ngrl-jufkt rotkt ynoxzy ynk
sgjk nos gtj jxubk nkx xuamnre gcge, yzgsvotm gtj xkborotm nkx, ut znk
vxkzkdz zngz znk ynoxz iurrgxy ckxk tuz sgjk roqk znk vgzzkxt gtj ckxk
vaz ot gyqkc. Gtj znkxk gxk znk rozzrk utky natmxe.... Gtj Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg cgrqotm av gtj juct gtj cxotmotm nkx ngtjy, nkx inkkqy lraynkj
xkj, gy znke grcgey gxk ot zngz joykgyk: ‘Nkxk eua robk cozn ay,’ ygey
ynk, ‘eua kgz gtj jxotq gtj gxk qkvz cgxs gtj eua ju tuznotm zu nkrv.’
Gtj sain ynk mkzy zu kgz gtj jxotq cnkt znkxk oy tuz g ixayz lux znk
rozzrk utky lux znxkk jgey! O cgy reotm gz znk zosk... ckrr, cngz ul
oz! O cgy reotm jxatq gtj O nkgxj se Yutog yvkgqotm (ynk oy g mktzrk
ixkgzaxk cozn g yulz rozzrk buoik... lgox ngox gtj yain g vgrk, znot
rozzrk lgik). Ynk ygoj: ‘Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, gs O xkgrre zu ju g znotm
roqk zngz?’ Gtj Jgxeg Lxgtzyubtg, g cusgt ul kbor ingxgizkx gtj bkxe
ckrr qtuct zu znk vuroik, ngj zcu ux znxkk zosky zxokj zu mkz gz nkx
znxuamn znk rgtjrgje. ‘Gtj cne tuz?’ ygoj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cozn g pkkx,
‘eua gxk yuskznotm somnze vxkiouay zu hk yu igxklar ul!’ Haz jut’z hrgsk
nkx, jut’z hrgsk nkx, nutuaxkj yox, jut’z hrgsk nkx! Ynk cgy tuz nkxykrl
cnkt ynk yvuqk, haz jxobkt zu joyzxgizout he nkx orrtkyy gtj znk ixeotm
ul znk natmxe inorjxkt; gtj oz cgy ygoj suxk zu cuatj nkx zngt gteznotm
kryk.... Lux zngz’y Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y ingxgizkx, gtj cnkt inorjxkt
ixe, kbkt lxus natmkx, ynk lgrry zu hkgzotm znks gz utik. Gz yod u’iruiq
O ygc Yutog mkz av, vaz ut nkx qkxinokl gtj nkx igvk, gtj mu uaz ul znk
xuus gtj ghuaz totk u’iruiq ynk igsk hgiq. Ynk cgrqkj yzxgomnz av zu
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gtj ynk rgoj znoxze xuahrky ut znk zghrk hkluxk nkx
ot yorktik. Ynk joj tuz azzkx g cuxj, ynk joj tuz kbkt ruuq gz nkx, ynk
yosvre voiqkj av uax hom mxkkt _jxgv jk jgsky_ yngcr (ck ngbk g yngcr,
sgjk ul _jxgv jk jgsky_), vaz oz ubkx nkx nkgj gtj lgik gtj rge juct
ut znk hkj cozn nkx lgik zu znk cgrr; utre nkx rozzrk ynuarjkxy gtj nkx
huje qkvz ynajjkxotm.... Gtj O cktz ut reotm znkxk, payz gy hkluxk....
Gtj znkt O ygc, euatm sgt, O ygc Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, ot znk ygsk yorktik
mu av zu Yutog’y rozzrk hkj; ynk cgy ut nkx qtkky grr znk kbktotm
qoyyotm Yutog’y lkkz, gtj cuarj tuz mkz av, gtj znkt znke huzn lkrr
gyrkkv ot kgin uznkx’y gxsy... zumkznkx, zumkznkx... eky... gtj O... rge
jxatq.”

Sgxskrgjub yzuvvkj ynuxz, gy znuamn noy buoik ngj lgorkj nos. Znkt nk
naxxokjre lorrkj noy mrgyy, jxgtq, gtj irkgxkj noy znxugz.

“Yotik znkt, yox,” nk cktz ut glzkx g hxokl vgayk--“Yotik znkt, ucotm
zu gt atluxzatgzk uiiaxxktik gtj znxuamn otluxsgzout mobkt he
kbor-otzktzoutkj vkxyuty--ot grr cnoin Jgxeg Lxgtzyubtg zuuq g
rkgjotm vgxz ut znk vxkzkdz zngz ynk ngj hkkt zxkgzkj cozn cgtz ul
xkyvkiz--yotik znkt se jgamnzkx Yuleg Ykseutubtg ngy hkkt luxikj zu zgqk
g ekrruc zoiqkz, gtj ucotm zu zngz ynk oy atghrk zu mu ut robotm cozn
ay. Lux uax rgtjrgje, Gsgrog Leujuxubtg cuarj tuz nkgx ul oz (znuamn
ynk ngj hgiqkj av Jgxeg Lxgtzyubtg hkluxk) gtj Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub zuu...
ns.... Grr znk zxuahrk hkzckkt nos gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy ut Yutog’y
giiuatz. Gz loxyz nk cgy lux sgqotm av zu Yutog nosykrl gtj znkt grr ul
g yajjkt nk yzuuj ut noy jomtoze: ‘nuc,’ ygoj nk, ‘igt g nomnre kjaigzkj
sgt roqk sk robk ot znk ygsk xuusy cozn g moxr roqk zngz?’ Gtj Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg cuarj tuz rkz oz vgyy, ynk yzuuj av lux nkx... gtj yu zngz’y
nuc oz ngvvktkj. Gtj Yutog iusky zu ay tuc, suyzre glzkx jgxq; ynk
iusluxzy Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gtj mobky nkx grr ynk igt.... Ynk ngy g xuus
gz znk Qgvkxtgasuby’ znk zgoruxy, ynk rujmky cozn znks; Qgvkxtgasub oy
g rgsk sgt cozn g irklz vgrgzk gtj grr ul noy taskxuay lgsore ngbk irklz
vgrgzky zuu. Gtj noy colk, zuu, ngy g irklz vgrgzk. Znke grr robk ot utk
xuus, haz Yutog ngy nkx uct, vgxzozoutkj ull.... Ns... eky... bkxe vuux
vkuvrk gtj grr cozn irklz vgrgzky... eky. Znkt O muz av ot znk suxtotm,
gtj vaz ut se xgmy, rolzkj av se ngtjy zu nkgbkt gtj ykz ull zu noy
kdikrrktie Obgt Glgtgyebozin. Noy kdikrrktie Obgt Glgtgyebozin, ju eua
qtuc nos? Tu? Ckrr, znkt, oz’y g sgt ul Muj eua jut’z qtuc. Nk oy cgd...
cgd hkluxk znk lgik ul znk Ruxj; kbkt gy cgd skrzkzn!... Noy keky ckxk
jos cnkt nk nkgxj se yzuxe. ‘Sgxskrgjub, utik grxkgje eua ngbk
jkikobkj se kdvkizgzouty... O’rr zgqk eua utik suxk ut se uct
xkyvutyohoroze’--zngz’y cngz nk ygoj, ‘xkskshkx,’ nk ygoj, ‘gtj tuc eua
igt mu.’ O qoyykj znk jayz gz noy lkkz--ot znuamnz utre, lux ot xkgroze
nk cuarj tuz ngbk grruckj sk zu ju oz, hkotm g yzgzkysgt gtj g sgt ul
sujkxt vurozoigr gtj ktromnzktkj ojkgy. O xkzaxtkj nusk, gtj cnkt O
gttuatikj zngz O’j hkkt zgqkt hgiq otzu znk ykxboik gtj ynuarj xkikobk g
ygrgxe, nkgbkty, cngz g zu-ju znkxk cgy!...”

Sgxskrgjub yzuvvkj gmgot ot bourktz kdiozksktz. Gz zngz susktz g cnurk
vgxze ul xkbkrrkxy grxkgje jxatq igsk ot lxus znk yzxkkz, gtj znk yuatjy
ul g noxkj iutikxzotg gtj znk ixgiqkj vovotm buoik ul g inorj ul ykbkt
yotmotm “Znk Ngsrkz” ckxk nkgxj ot znk ktzxe. Znk xuus cgy lorrkj cozn
tuoyk. Znk zgbkxt-qkkvkx gtj znk huey ckxk haye cozn znk tkc-iuskxy.
Sgxskrgjub vgeotm tu gzzktzout zu znk tkc gxxobgry iutzotakj noy yzuxe.
Nk gvvkgxkj he tuc zu hk kdzxkskre ckgq, haz gy nk hkigsk suxk gtj suxk
jxatq, nk hkigsk suxk gtj suxk zgrqgzobk. Znk xkiurrkizout ul noy
xkiktz yaiikyy ot mkzzotm znk yozagzout ykkskj zu xkbobk nos, gtj cgy
vuyozobkre xklrkizkj ot g yuxz ul xgjogtik ut noy lgik. Xgyqurtoqub
royzktkj gzzktzobkre.

“Zngz cgy lobk ckkqy gmu, yox. Eky.... Gy yuut gy Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg
gtj Yutog nkgxj ul oz, skxie ut ay, oz cgy gy znuamn O yzkvvkj otzu znk
qotmjus ul Nkgbkt. Oz aykj zu hk: eua igt rok roqk g hkgyz, tuznotm haz
ghayk. Tuc znke ckxk cgrqotm ut zovzuk, naynotm znk inorjxkt. ‘Ykseut
Fgngxubozin oy zoxkj cozn noy cuxq gz znk ulloik, nk oy xkyzotm, ynn!’
Znke sgjk sk iullkk hkluxk O cktz zu cuxq gtj huorkj ixkgs lux sk! Znke
hkmgt zu mkz xkgr ixkgs lux sk, ju eua nkgx zngz? Gtj nuc znke sgtgmkj
zu mkz zumkznkx znk sutke lux g jkiktz uazloz--krkbkt xuahrky, lolze
iuvkiqy, O igt’z makyy. Huuzy, iuzzut ynoxz-lxutzy--suyz sgmtoloiktz,
g atoluxs, znke muz av grr ot yvrktjoj yzerk, lux krkbkt xuahrky gtj
g ngrl. Znk loxyz suxtotm O igsk hgiq lxus znk ulloik O luatj Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg ngj iuuqkj zcu iuaxyky lux jottkx--yuav gtj ygrz skgz cozn
nuxyk xgjoyn--cnoin ck ngj tkbkx jxkgskj ul zorr znkt. Ynk ngj tuz gte
jxkyyky... tutk gz grr, haz ynk muz nkxykrl av gy znuamn ynk ckxk muotm
ut g boyoz; gtj tuz zngz ynk’j gteznotm zu ju oz cozn, ynk ysgxzktkj
nkxykrl av cozn tuznotm gz grr, ynk’j jutk nkx ngox toikre, vaz ut g
irkgt iurrgx ul yusk yuxz, ially, gtj znkxk ynk cgy, waozk g jollkxktz
vkxyut, ynk cgy euatmkx gtj hkzzkx ruuqotm. Yutog, se rozzrk jgxrotm,
ngj utre nkrvkj cozn sutke ‘lux znk zosk,’ ynk ygoj, ‘oz cut’z ju lux sk
zu iusk gtj ykk eua zuu ulzkt. Glzkx jgxq sgehk cnkt tu utk igt ykk.’ Ju
eua nkgx, ju eua nkgx? O rge juct lux g tgv glzkx jottkx gtj cngz ju eua
znotq: znuamn Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ngj wagxxkrrkj zu znk rgyz jkmxkk cozn
uax rgtjrgje Gsgrog Leujuxubtg utre g ckkq hkluxk, ynk iuarj tuz
xkyoyz znkt gyqotm nkx ot zu iullkk. Lux zcu nuaxy znke ckxk yozzotm,
cnoyvkxotm zumkznkx. ‘Ykseut Fgngxubozin oy ot znk ykxboik gmgot,
tuc, gtj xkikobotm g ygrgxe,’ ygey ynk, ‘gtj nk cktz nosykrl zu noy
kdikrrktie gtj noy kdikrrktie nosykrl igsk uaz zu nos, sgjk grr znk
uznkxy cgoz gtj rkj Ykseut Fgngxubozin he znk ngtj hkluxk kbkxehuje otzu
noy yzaje.’ Ju eua nkgx, ju eua nkgx? ‘Zu hk yaxk,’ ygey nk, ‘Ykseut
Fgngxubozin, xkskshkxotm euax vgyz ykxboiky,’ ygey nk, ‘gtj ot yvozk
ul euax vxuvktyoze zu zngz luuroyn ckgqtkyy, yotik eua vxusoyk tuc gtj
yotik suxkubkx ck’bk muz ut hgjre coznuaz eua,’ (ju eua nkgx, ju eua
nkgx;) ‘gtj yu,’ ygey nk, ‘O xkre tuc ut euax cuxj gy g mktzrksgt.’ Gtj
grr zngz, rkz sk zkrr eua, ynk ngy yosvre sgjk av lux nkxykrl, gtj tuz
yosvre uaz ul cgtzuttkyy, lux znk ygqk ul hxgmmotm; tu, ynk hkrokbky oz
grr nkxykrl, ynk gsayky nkxykrl cozn nkx uct lgtioky, avut se cuxj ynk
juky! Gtj O jut’z hrgsk nkx lux oz, tu, O jut’z hrgsk nkx!... Yod jgey
gmu cnkt O hxuamnz nkx se loxyz kgxtotmy ot larr--zcktze-znxkk xuahrky
luxze iuvkiqy grzumkznkx--ynk igrrkj sk nkx vuvvkz: ‘vuvvkz,’ ygoj ynk,
‘se rozzrk vuvvkz.’ Gtj cnkt ck ckxk he uaxykrbky, eua atjkxyzgtj?
Eua cuarj tuz znotq sk g hkgaze, eua cuarj tuz znotq sain ul sk gy g
nayhgtj, cuarj eua?... Ckrr, ynk votinkj se inkkq, ‘se rozzrk vuvvkz,’
ygoj ynk.”

Sgxskrgjub hxuqk ull, zxokj zu ysork, haz yajjktre noy inot hkmgt
zu zcozin. Nk iutzxurrkj nosykrl nuckbkx. Znk zgbkxt, znk jkmxgjkj
gvvkgxgtik ul znk sgt, znk lobk tomnzy ot znk nge hgxmk, gtj znk vuz ul
yvoxozy, gtj ekz znoy vuomtgtz rubk lux noy colk gtj inorjxkt hkcorjkxkj
noy royzktkx. Xgyqurtoqub royzktkj otzktzre haz cozn g yoiq yktygzout.
Nk lkrz bkdkj zngz nk ngj iusk nkxk.

“Nutuaxkj yox, nutuaxkj yox,” ixokj Sgxskrgjub xkiubkxotm nosykrl--“Un,
yox, vkxngvy grr znoy ykksy g rgamnotm sgzzkx zu eua, gy oz juky zu
uznkxy, gtj vkxngvy O gs utre cuxxeotm eua cozn znk yzavojoze ul grr znk
zxobogr jkzgory ul se nusk rolk, haz oz oy tuz g rgamnotm sgzzkx zu sk.
Lux O igt lkkr oz grr.... Gtj znk cnurk ul zngz nkgbktre jge ul se rolk
gtj znk cnurk ul zngz kbktotm O vgyykj ot lrkkzotm jxkgsy ul nuc O cuarj
gxxgtmk oz grr, gtj nuc O cuarj jxkyy grr znk inorjxkt, gtj nuc O ynuarj
mobk nkx xkyz, gtj nuc O ynuarj xkyiak se uct jgamnzkx lxus joynutuax
gtj xkyzuxk nkx zu znk huyus ul nkx lgsore.... Gtj g mxkgz jkgr suxk....
Waozk kdiayghrk, yox. Ckrr, znkt, yox” (Sgxskrgjub yajjktre mgbk g yuxz
ul yzgxz, xgoykj noy nkgj gtj mgfkj otzktzre gz noy royzktkx) “ckrr, ut
znk bkxe tkdz jge glzkx grr znuyk jxkgsy, zngz oy zu yge, kdgizre lobk
jgey gmu, ot znk kbktotm, he g iattotm zxoiq, roqk g znokl ot znk tomnz,
O yzurk lxus Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg znk qke ul nkx hud, zuuq uaz cngz cgy
rklz ul se kgxtotmy, nuc sain oz cgy O ngbk luxmuzzkt, gtj tuc ruuq
gz sk, grr ul eua! Oz’y znk lolzn jge yotik O rklz nusk, gtj znke gxk
ruuqotm lux sk znkxk gtj oz’y znk ktj ul se ksvruesktz, gtj se atoluxs
oy reotm ot g zgbkxt ut znk Kmevzogt hxojmk. O kdingtmkj oz lux znk
mgxsktzy O ngbk ut... gtj oz’y znk ktj ul kbkxeznotm!”

Sgxskrgjub yzxaiq noy luxknkgj cozn noy loyz, irktinkj noy zkkzn, iruykj
noy keky gtj rkgtkj nkgbore cozn noy krhuc ut znk zghrk. Haz g sotazk
rgzkx noy lgik yajjktre ingtmkj gtj cozn g ikxzgot gyyaskj yretkyy gtj
gllkizgzout ul hxgbgju, nk mrgtikj gz Xgyqurtoqub, rgamnkj gtj ygoj:

“Znoy suxtotm O cktz zu ykk Yutog, O cktz zu gyq nkx lux g voiq-sk-av!
Nk-nk-nk!”

“Eua jut’z yge ynk mgbk oz zu eua?” ixokj utk ul znk tkc-iuskxy; nk
ynuazkj znk cuxjy gtj cktz ull otzu g mallgc.

“Znoy bkxe wagxz cgy huamnz cozn nkx sutke,” Sgxskrgjub jkirgxkj,
gjjxkyyotm nosykrl kdirayobkre zu Xgyqurtoqub. “Znoxze iuvkiqy ynk mgbk
sk cozn nkx uct ngtjy, nkx rgyz, grr ynk ngj, gy O ygc.... Ynk ygoj
tuznotm, ynk utre ruuqkj gz sk coznuaz g cuxj.... Tuz ut kgxzn, haz av
eutjkx... znke mxokbk ubkx skt, znke ckkv, haz znke jut’z hrgsk znks,
znke jut’z hrgsk znks! Haz oz naxzy suxk, oz naxzy suxk cnkt znke jut’z
hrgsk! Znoxze iuvkiqy eky! Gtj sgehk ynk tkkjy znks tuc, kn? Cngz ju
eua znotq, se jkgx yox? Lux tuc ynk’y muz zu qkkv av nkx gvvkgxgtik. Oz
iuyzy sutke, zngz ysgxztkyy, zngz yvkiogr ysgxztkyy, eua qtuc? Ju eua
atjkxyzgtj? Gtj znkxk’y vusgzas, zuu, eua ykk, ynk sayz ngbk znotmy;
vkzzoiugzy, yzgxinkj utky, ynuky, zuu, xkgr pgatze utky zu ynuc ull nkx
luuz cnkt ynk ngy zu yzkv ubkx g vajjrk. Ju eua atjkxyzgtj, yox, ju eua
atjkxyzgtj cngz grr zngz ysgxztkyy skgty? Gtj nkxk O, nkx uct lgznkx,
nkxk O zuuq znoxze iuvkiqy ul zngz sutke lux g jxotq! Gtj O gs jxotqotm
oz! Gtj O ngbk grxkgje jxatq oz! Iusk, cnu corr ngbk voze ut g sgt roqk
sk, kn? Gxk eua yuxxe lux sk, yox, ux tuz? Zkrr sk, yox, gxk eua yuxxe
ux tuz? Nk-nk-nk!”

Nk cuarj ngbk lorrkj noy mrgyy, haz znkxk cgy tu jxotq rklz. Znk vuz cgy
ksvze.

“Cngz gxk eua zu hk vozokj lux?” ynuazkj znk zgbkxt-qkkvkx cnu cgy gmgot
tkgx znks.

Ynuazy ul rgamnzkx gtj kbkt ugzny lurruckj. Znk rgamnzkx gtj znk ugzny
igsk lxus znuyk cnu ckxk royzktotm gtj gryu lxus znuyk cnu ngj nkgxj
tuznotm haz ckxk yosvre ruuqotm gz znk lomaxk ul znk joyingxmkj
mubkxtsktz irkxq.

“Zu hk vozokj! Cne gs O zu hk vozokj?” Sgxskrgjub yajjktre jkirgoskj,
yzgtjotm av cozn noy gxs uazyzxkzinkj, gy znuamn nk ngj hkkt utre
cgozotm lux zngz wakyzout.

“Cne gs O zu hk vozokj, eua yge? Eky! znkxk’y tuznotm zu voze sk lux! O
uamnz zu hk ixaiolokj, ixaiolokj ut g ixuyy, tuz vozokj! Ixaiole sk,
un pajmk, ixaiole sk haz voze sk! Gtj znkt O corr mu ul seykrl zu hk
ixaiolokj, lux oz’y tuz skxxe-sgqotm O ykkq haz zkgxy gtj zxohargzout!...
Ju eua yavvuyk, eua zngz ykrr, zngz znoy votz ul euaxy ngy hkkt
yckkz zu sk? Oz cgy zxohargzout O yuamnz gz znk huzzus ul oz, zkgxy gtj
zxohargzout, gtj ngbk luatj oz, gtj O ngbk zgyzkj oz; haz Nk corr voze
ay Cnu ngy ngj voze ut grr skt, Cnu ngy atjkxyzuuj grr skt gtj grr
znotmy, Nk oy znk Utk, Nk zuu oy znk pajmk. Nk corr iusk ot zngz jge
gtj Nk corr gyq: ‘Cnkxk oy znk jgamnzkx cnu mgbk nkxykrl lux nkx ixuyy,
iutyasvzobk yzkv-suznkx gtj lux znk rozzrk inorjxkt ul gtuznkx? Cnkxk oy
znk jgamnzkx cnu ngj voze avut znk lorzne jxatqgxj, nkx kgxznre lgznkx,
atjoysgekj he noy hkgyzrotkyy?’ Gtj Nk corr yge, ‘Iusk zu sk! O ngbk
grxkgje luxmobkt znkk utik.... O ngbk luxmobkt znkk utik.... Zne yoty
cnoin gxk sgte gxk luxmobkt znkk lux znua ngyz rubkj sain....’ Gtj nk
corr luxmobk se Yutog, Nk corr luxmobk, O qtuc oz... O lkrz oz ot se
nkgxz cnkt O cgy cozn nkx payz tuc! Gtj Nk corr pajmk gtj corr luxmobk
grr, znk muuj gtj znk kbor, znk coyk gtj znk skkq.... Gtj cnkt Nk ngy
jutk cozn grr ul znks, znkt Nk corr yassut ay. ‘Eua zuu iusk luxzn,’
Nk corr yge, ‘Iusk luxzn ek jxatqgxjy, iusk luxzn, ek ckgq utky, iusk
luxzn, ek inorjxkt ul yngsk!’ Gtj ck yngrr grr iusk luxzn, coznuaz yngsk
gtj yngrr yzgtj hkluxk nos. Gtj Nk corr yge atzu ay, ‘Ek gxk ycotk, sgjk
ot znk Osgmk ul znk Hkgyz gtj cozn noy sgxq; haz iusk ek gryu!’ Gtj znk
coyk utky gtj znuyk ul atjkxyzgtjotm corr yge, ‘Un Ruxj, cne juyz Znua
xkikobk znkyk skt?’ Gtj Nk corr yge, ‘Znoy oy cne O xkikobk znks, un ek
coyk, znoy oy cne O xkikobk znks, un ek ul atjkxyzgtjotm, zngz tuz utk
ul znks hkrokbkj nosykrl zu hk cuxzne ul znoy.’ Gtj Nk corr nurj uaz Noy
ngtjy zu ay gtj ck yngrr lgrr juct hkluxk nos... gtj ck yngrr ckkv...
gtj ck yngrr atjkxyzgtj grr znotmy! Znkt ck yngrr atjkxyzgtj grr!... gtj
grr corr atjkxyzgtj, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg kbkt... ynk corr atjkxyzgtj....
Ruxj, Zne qotmjus iusk!” Gtj nk ygtq juct ut znk hktin kdngayzkj, gtj
nkrvrkyy, ruuqotm gz tu utk, gvvgxktzre uhrobouay ul noy yaxxuatjotmy
gtj vratmkj ot jkkv znuamnz. Noy cuxjy ngj ixkgzkj g ikxzgot osvxkyyout;
znkxk cgy g susktz ul yorktik; haz yuut rgamnzkx gtj ugzny ckxk nkgxj
gmgot.

“Zngz’y noy tuzout!”

“Zgrqkj nosykrl yorre!”

“G lotk irkxq nk oy!”

Gtj yu ut, gtj yu ut.

“Rkz ay mu, yox,” ygoj Sgxskrgjub grr gz utik, xgoyotm noy nkgj gtj
gjjxkyyotm Xgyqurtoqub--“iusk grutm cozn sk... Qufkr’y nuayk, ruuqotm
otzu znk egxj. O’s muotm zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg--zosk O joj.”

Xgyqurtoqub ngj lux yusk zosk hkkt cgtzotm zu mu gtj nk ngj skgtz zu
nkrv nos. Sgxskrgjub cgy sain atyzkgjokx ut noy rkmy zngt ot noy yvkkin
gtj rkgtkj nkgbore ut znk euatm sgt. Znke ngj zcu ux znxkk natjxkj
vgiky zu mu. Znk jxatqkt sgt cgy suxk gtj suxk ubkxiusk he joysge gtj
iutlayout gy znke jxkc tkgxkx znk nuayk.

“Oz’y tuz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg O gs glxgoj ul tuc,” nk sazzkxkj ot
gmozgzout--“gtj zngz ynk corr hkmot varrotm se ngox. Cngz juky se ngox
sgzzkx! Huznkx se ngox! Zngz’y cngz O yge! Otjkkj oz corr hk hkzzkx ol
ynk juky hkmot varrotm oz, zngz’y tuz cngz O gs glxgoj ul... oz’y nkx
keky O gs glxgoj ul... eky, nkx keky... znk xkj ut nkx inkkqy, zuu,
lxomnzkty sk... gtj nkx hxkgznotm zuu.... Ngbk eua tuzoikj nuc vkuvrk
ot zngz joykgyk hxkgznk... cnkt znke gxk kdiozkj? O gs lxomnzktkj ul
znk inorjxkt’y ixeotm, zuu.... Lux ol Yutog ngy tuz zgqkt znks luuj...
O jut’z qtuc cngz’y ngvvktkj! O jut’z qtuc! Haz hrucy O gs tuz glxgoj
ul.... Qtuc, yox, zngz yain hrucy gxk tuz g vgot zu sk, haz kbkt gt
ktpuesktz. Ot lgiz O igt’z mkz ut coznuaz oz.... Oz’y hkzzkx yu. Rkz
nkx yzxoqk sk, oz xkrokbky nkx nkgxz... oz’y hkzzkx yu... Znkxk oy znk
nuayk. Znk nuayk ul Qufkr, znk ighotkz-sgqkx... g Mkxsgt, ckrr-zu-ju.
Rkgj znk cge!”

Znke cktz ot lxus znk egxj gtj av zu znk luaxzn yzuxke. Znk yzgoxigyk
muz jgxqkx gtj jgxqkx gy znke cktz av. Oz cgy tkgxre krkbkt u’iruiq
gtj grznuamn ot yasskx ot Vkzkxyhaxm znkxk oy tu xkgr tomnz, ekz oz cgy
waozk jgxq gz znk zuv ul znk yzgoxy.

G mxose rozzrk juux gz znk bkxe zuv ul znk yzgoxy yzuuj gpgx. G bkxe
vuux-ruuqotm xuus ghuaz zkt vgiky rutm cgy romnzkj av he g igtjrk-ktj;
znk cnurk ul oz cgy boyohrk lxus znk ktzxgtik. Oz cgy grr ot joyuxjkx,
rozzkxkj av cozn xgmy ul grr yuxzy, kyvkiogrre inorjxkt’y mgxsktzy.
Gixuyy znk laxznkyz iuxtkx cgy yzxkzinkj g xgmmkj ynkkz. Hknotj oz
vxuhghre cgy znk hkj. Znkxk cgy tuznotm ot znk xuus kdikvz zcu ingoxy
gtj g yulg iubkxkj cozn Gskxoigt rkgznkx, larr ul nurky, hkluxk cnoin
yzuuj gt urj jkgr qozinkt-zghrk, atvgotzkj gtj atiubkxkj. Gz znk kjmk
ul znk zghrk yzuuj g ysurjkxotm zgrruc-igtjrk ot gt oxut igtjrkyzoiq. Oz
gvvkgxkj zngz znk lgsore ngj g xuus zu znksykrbky, tuz vgxz ul g xuus,
haz znkox xuus cgy vxgizoigrre g vgyygmk. Znk juux rkgjotm zu znk uznkx
xuusy, ux xgznkx iavhugxjy, otzu cnoin Gsgrog Rovvkbkinykr’y lrgz cgy
jobojkj yzuuj ngrl uvkt, gtj znkxk cgy ynuazotm, avxugx gtj rgamnzkx
coznot. Vkuvrk ykkskj zu hk vrgeotm igxjy gtj jxotqotm zkg znkxk. Cuxjy
ul znk suyz atikxksutouay qotj lrkc uaz lxus zosk zu zosk.

Xgyqurtoqub xkiumtoykj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gz utik. Ynk cgy g xgznkx zgrr,
yros gtj mxgiklar cusgt, zkxxohre ksgiogzkj, cozn sgmtoloiktz jgxq hxuct
ngox gtj cozn g nkizoi lrayn ot nkx inkkqy. Ynk cgy vgiotm av gtj juct
ot nkx rozzrk xuus, vxkyyotm nkx ngtjy gmgotyz nkx inkyz; nkx rovy
ckxk vgxinkj gtj nkx hxkgznotm igsk ot tkxbuay hxuqkt mgyvy. Nkx keky
mrozzkxkj gy ot lkbkx gtj ruuqkj ghuaz cozn g ngxyn ossubghrk yzgxk. Gtj
zngz iutyasvzobk gtj kdiozkj lgik cozn znk rgyz lroiqkxotm romnz ul znk
igtjrk-ktj vrgeotm avut oz sgjk g yoiqktotm osvxkyyout. Ynk ykkskj zu
Xgyqurtoqub ghuaz znoxze ekgxy urj gtj cgy ikxzgotre g yzxgtmk colk lux
Sgxskrgjub.... Ynk ngj tuz nkgxj znks gtj joj tuz tuzoik znks iusotm ot.
Ynk ykkskj zu hk ruyz ot znuamnz, nkgxotm gtj ykkotm tuznotm. Znk xuus
cgy iruyk, haz ynk ngj tuz uvktkj znk cotjuc; g yzktin xuyk lxus znk
yzgoxigyk, haz znk juux ut zu znk yzgoxy cgy tuz iruykj. Lxus znk ottkx
xuusy iruajy ul zuhgiiu ysuqk lrugzkj ot, ynk qkvz iuamnotm, haz joj tuz
iruyk znk juux. Znk euatmkyz inorj, g moxr ul yod, cgy gyrkkv, yozzotm
iaxrkj av ut znk lruux cozn nkx nkgj ut znk yulg. G hue g ekgx urjkx
yzuuj ixeotm gtj yngqotm ot znk iuxtkx, vxuhghre nk ngj payz ngj g
hkgzotm. Hkyojk nos yzuuj g moxr ul totk ekgxy urj, zgrr gtj znot,
ckgxotm g znot gtj xgmmkj inksoyk cozn gt gtioktz igynskxk vkroyyk lratm
ubkx nkx hgxk ynuarjkxy, rutm uazmxuct gtj hgxkre xkginotm nkx qtkky.
Nkx gxs, gy znot gy g yzoiq, cgy xuatj nkx hxuznkx’y tkiq. Ynk cgy
zxeotm zu iusluxz nos, cnoyvkxotm yuskznotm zu nos, gtj juotm grr ynk
iuarj zu qkkv nos lxus cnosvkxotm gmgot. Gz znk ygsk zosk nkx rgxmk
jgxq keky, cnoin ruuqkj rgxmkx yzorr lxus znk znottkyy ul nkx lxomnzktkj
lgik, ckxk cgzinotm nkx suznkx cozn grgxs. Sgxskrgjub joj tuz ktzkx znk
juux, haz jxuvvkj ut noy qtkky ot znk bkxe juuxcge, vaynotm Xgyqurtoqub
ot lxutz ul nos. Znk cusgt ykkotm g yzxgtmkx yzuvvkj otjollkxktzre
lgiotm nos, iusotm zu nkxykrl lux g susktz gtj gvvgxktzre cutjkxotm cngz
nk ngj iusk lux. Haz kbojktzre ynk jkiojkj zngz nk cgy muotm otzu
znk tkdz xuus, gy nk ngj zu vgyy znxuamn nkxy zu mkz znkxk. Zgqotm tu
laxznkx tuzoik ul nos, ynk cgrqkj zucgxjy znk uazkx juux zu iruyk oz
gtj azzkxkj g yajjkt yixkgs ut ykkotm nkx nayhgtj ut noy qtkky ot znk
juuxcge.

“Gn!” ynk ixokj uaz ot g lxktfe, “nk ngy iusk hgiq! Znk ixosotgr! znk
sutyzkx!... Gtj cnkxk oy znk sutke? Cngz’y ot euax vuiqkz, ynuc sk! Gtj
euax iruznky gxk grr jollkxktz! Cnkxk gxk euax iruznky? Cnkxk oy znk
sutke! Yvkgq!”

Gtj ynk lkrr zu ykgxinotm nos. Sgxskrgjub yahsoyyobkre gtj uhkjoktzre
nkrj av huzn gxsy zu lgiorozgzk znk ykgxin. Tuz g lgxznotm cgy znkxk.

“Cnkxk oy znk sutke?” ynk ixokj--“Skxie ut ay, igt nk ngbk jxatq oz grr?
Znkxk ckxk zckrbk yorbkx xuahrky rklz ot znk inkyz!” gtj ot g laxe
ynk ykofkj nos he znk ngox gtj jxgmmkj nos otzu znk xuus. Sgxskrgjub
ykiutjkj nkx klluxzy he skkqre ixgcrotm grutm ut noy qtkky.

“Gtj znoy oy g iutyurgzout zu sk! Znoy juky tuz naxz sk, haz oy g
vuyozobk iut-yu-rg-zout, nu-tua-xkj yox,” nk igrrkj uaz, yngqkt zu gtj
lxu he noy ngox gtj kbkt utik yzxoqotm znk mxuatj cozn noy luxknkgj.
Znk inorj gyrkkv ut znk lruux cuqk av, gtj hkmgt zu ixe. Znk hue ot znk
iuxtkx ruyotm grr iutzxur hkmgt zxkshrotm gtj yixkgsotm gtj xaynkj
zu noy yoyzkx ot bourktz zkxxux, grsuyz ot g loz. Znk krjkyz moxr cgy
yngqotm roqk g rkgl.

“Nk’y jxatq oz! nk’y jxatq oz grr,” znk vuux cusgt yixkgskj ot
jkyvgox--“gtj noy iruznky gxk mutk! Gtj znke gxk natmxe, natmxe!”--gtj
cxotmotm nkx ngtjy ynk vuotzkj zu znk inorjxkt. “Un, giiaxykj rolk!
Gtj eua, gxk eua tuz gyngskj?”--ynk vuatikj grr gz utik avut
Xgyqurtoqub--“lxus znk zgbkxt! Ngbk eua hkkt jxotqotm cozn nos? Eua ngbk
hkkt jxotqotm cozn nos, zuu! Mu gcge!”

Znk euatm sgt cgy ngyzktotm gcge coznuaz azzkxotm g cuxj. Znk ottkx juux
cgy znxuct cojk uvkt gtj otwaoyozobk lgiky ckxk vkkxotm ot gz oz. Iugxyk
rgamnotm lgiky cozn vovky gtj iomgxkzzky gtj nkgjy ckgxotm igvy znxayz
znksykrbky ot gz znk juuxcge. Laxznkx ot iuarj hk ykkt lomaxky ot
jxkyyotm mucty lratm uvkt, ot iuyzasky ul atykksre yigtzotkyy, yusk ul
znks cozn igxjy ot znkox ngtjy. Znke ckxk vgxzoiargxre jobkxzkj, cnkt
Sgxskrgjub, jxgmmkj ghuaz he noy ngox, ynuazkj zngz oz cgy g iutyurgzout
zu nos. Znke kbkt hkmgt zu iusk otzu znk xuus; gz rgyz g yotoyzkx ynxorr
uazixe cgy nkgxj: znoy igsk lxus Gsgrog Rovvkbkinykr nkxykrl vaynotm nkx
cge gsutmyz znks gtj zxeotm zu xkyzuxk uxjkx glzkx nkx uct lgynout gtj
lux znk natjxkjzn zosk zu lxomnzkt znk vuux cusgt he uxjkxotm nkx
cozn iugxyk ghayk zu irkgx uaz ul znk xuus tkdz jge. Gy nk cktz uaz,
Xgyqurtoqub ngj zosk zu vaz noy ngtj otzu noy vuiqkz, zu ytgzin av znk
iuvvkxy nk ngj xkikobkj ot kdingtmk lux noy xuahrk ot znk zgbkxt gtj zu
rge znks attuzoikj ut znk cotjuc. Glzkxcgxjy ut znk yzgoxy, nk ingtmkj
noy sotj gtj cuarj ngbk mutk hgiq.

“Cngz g yzavoj znotm O’bk jutk,” nk znuamnz zu nosykrl, “znke ngbk Yutog
gtj O cgtz oz seykrl.” Haz xklrkizotm zngz oz cuarj hk osvuyyohrk zu
zgqk oz hgiq tuc gtj zngz ot gte igyk nk cuarj tuz ngbk zgqkt oz, nk
joysoyykj oz cozn g cgbk ul noy ngtj gtj cktz hgiq zu noy rujmotm.
“Yutog cgtzy vusgzas zuu,” nk ygoj gy nk cgrqkj grutm znk yzxkkz, gtj nk
rgamnkj sgromtgtzre--“yain ysgxztkyy iuyzy sutke.... Ns! Gtj sgehk Yutog
nkxykrl corr hk hgtqxavz zu-jge, lux znkxk oy grcgey g xoyq, natzotm
hom mgsk... jommotm lux murj... znkt znke cuarj grr hk coznuaz g ixayz
zu-suxxuc kdikvz lux se sutke. Naxxgn lux Yutog! Cngz g sotk znke’bk jam
znkxk! Gtj znke’xk sgqotm znk suyz ul oz! Eky, znke gxk sgqotm znk suyz
ul oz! Znke’bk ckvz ubkx oz gtj mxuct aykj zu oz. Sgt mxucy aykj zu
kbkxeznotm, znk yiuatjxkr!”

Nk ygtq otzu znuamnz.

“Gtj cngz ol O gs cxutm,” nk ixokj yajjktre glzkx g susktz’y znuamnz.
“Cngz ol sgt oy tuz xkgrre g yiuatjxkr, sgt ot mktkxgr, O skgt, znk
cnurk xgik ul sgtqotj--znkt grr znk xkyz oy vxkpajoik, yosvre gxzoloiogr
zkxxuxy gtj znkxk gxk tu hgxxokxy gtj oz’y grr gy oz ynuarj hk.”



INGVZKX OOO

Nk cgqkj av rgzk tkdz jge glzkx g hxuqkt yrkkv. Haz noy yrkkv ngj tuz
xklxkynkj nos; nk cgqkj av horouay, oxxozghrk, orr-zksvkxkj, gtj ruuqkj
cozn ngzxkj gz noy xuus. Oz cgy g zote iavhugxj ul g xuus ghuaz yod
vgiky ot rktmzn. Oz ngj g vubkxze-yzxoiqkt gvvkgxgtik cozn ozy jayze
ekrruc vgvkx vkkrotm ull znk cgrry, gtj oz cgy yu ruc-vozinkj zngz g sgt
ul suxk zngt gbkxgmk nkomnz cgy orr gz kgyk ot oz gtj lkrz kbkxe susktz
zngz nk cuarj qtuiq noy nkgj gmgotyz znk ikorotm. Znk laxtozaxk cgy ot
qkkvotm cozn znk xuus: znkxk ckxk znxkk urj ingoxy, xgznkx xoiqkze; g
vgotzkj zghrk ot znk iuxtkx ut cnoin rge g lkc sgtayixovzy gtj huuqy;
znk jayz zngz rge znoiq avut znks ynuckj zngz znke ngj hkkt rutm
atzuainkj. G hom irasye yulg uiiavokj grsuyz znk cnurk ul utk cgrr gtj
ngrl znk lruux yvgik ul znk xuus; oz cgy utik iubkxkj cozn inotzf, haz
cgy tuc ot xgmy gtj ykxbkj Xgyqurtoqub gy g hkj. Ulzkt nk cktz zu yrkkv
ut oz, gy nk cgy, coznuaz atjxkyyotm, coznuaz ynkkzy, cxgvvkj ot noy urj
yzajktz’y ubkxiugz, cozn noy nkgj ut utk rozzrk vorruc, atjkx cnoin nk
nkgvkj av grr znk rotkt nk ngj, irkgt gtj joxze, he cge ul g huryzkx. G
rozzrk zghrk yzuuj ot lxutz ul znk yulg.

Oz cuarj ngbk hkkt jolloiarz zu yotq zu g ruckx khh ul joyuxjkx, haz zu
Xgyqurtoqub ot noy vxkyktz yzgzk ul sotj znoy cgy vuyozobkre gmxkkghrk.
Nk ngj muz iusvrkzkre gcge lxus kbkxeutk, roqk g zuxzuoyk ot ozy ynkrr,
gtj kbkt znk yomnz ul g ykxbgtz moxr cnu ngj zu cgoz avut nos gtj ruuqkj
yuskzosky otzu noy xuus sgjk nos cxoznk cozn tkxbuay oxxozgzout. Nk cgy
ot znk iutjozout zngz ubkxzgqky yusk sutusgtogiy ktzoxkre iutiktzxgzkj
avut utk znotm. Noy rgtjrgje ngj lux znk rgyz luxztomnz mobkt av yktjotm
nos ot skgry, gtj nk ngj tuz ekz znuamnz ul kdvuyzargzotm cozn nkx,
znuamn nk cktz coznuaz noy jottkx. Tgyzgyeg, znk iuuq gtj utre ykxbgtz,
cgy xgznkx vrkgykj gz znk rujmkx’y suuj gtj ngj ktzoxkre mobkt av
yckkvotm gtj juotm noy xuus, utre utik g ckkq ux yu ynk cuarj yzxge otzu
noy xuus cozn g hxuus. Ynk cgqkj nos av zngz jge.

“Mkz av, cne gxk eua gyrkkv?” ynk igrrkj zu nos. “Oz’y vgyz totk, O ngbk
hxuamnz eua yusk zkg; corr eua ngbk g iav? O ynuarj znotq eua’xk lgoxre
yzgxbotm?”

Xgyqurtoqub uvktkj noy keky, yzgxzkj gtj xkiumtoykj Tgyzgyeg.

“Lxus znk rgtjrgje, kn?” nk gyqkj, yrucre gtj cozn g yoiqre lgik yozzotm
av ut znk yulg.

“Lxus znk rgtjrgje, otjkkj!”

Ynk ykz hkluxk nos nkx uct ixgiqkj zkgvuz larr ul ckgq gtj yzgrk zkg gtj
rgoj zcu ekrruc rasvy ul yamgx he znk yojk ul oz.

“Nkxk, Tgyzgyeg, zgqk oz vrkgyk,” nk ygoj, lashrotm ot noy vuiqkz (lux
nk ngj yrkvz ot noy iruznky) gtj zgqotm uaz g ngtjlar ul iuvvkxy--“xat
gtj hae sk g rugl. Gtj mkz sk g rozzrk ygaygmk, znk inkgvkyz, gz znk
vuxq-hazinkx’y.”

“Znk rugl O’rr lkzin eua znoy bkxe sotazk, haz cuarjt’z eua xgznkx ngbk
yusk ighhgmk yuav otyzkgj ul ygaygmk? Oz’y igvozgr yuav, ekyzkxjge’y. O
ygbkj oz lux eua ekyzkxjge, haz eua igsk ot rgzk. Oz’y lotk yuav.”

Cnkt znk yuav ngj hkkt hxuamnz, gtj nk ngj hkmat avut oz, Tgyzgyeg
ygz juct hkyojk nos ut znk yulg gtj hkmgt ingzzotm. Ynk cgy g iuatzxe
vkgygtz-cusgt gtj g bkxe zgrqgzobk utk.

“Vxgyqubeg Vgbrubtg skgty zu iusvrgot zu znk vuroik ghuaz eua,” ynk
ygoj.

Nk yiucrkj.

“Zu znk vuroik? Cngz juky ynk cgtz?”

“Eua jut’z vge nkx sutke gtj eua cut’z zaxt uaz ul znk xuus. Zngz’y cngz
ynk cgtzy, zu hk yaxk.”

“Znk jkbor, zngz’y znk rgyz yzxgc,” nk sazzkxkj, mxotjotm noy zkkzn,
“tu, zngz cuarj tuz yaoz sk... payz tuc. Ynk oy g luur,” nk gjjkj gruaj.
“O’rr mu gtj zgrq zu nkx zu-jge.”

“Luur ynk oy gtj tu soyzgqk, payz gy O gs. Haz cne, ol eua gxk yu
irkbkx, ju eua rok nkxk roqk g ygiq gtj ngbk tuznotm zu ynuc lux oz? Utk
zosk eua aykj zu mu uaz, eua yge, zu zkgin inorjxkt. Haz cne oy oz eua
ju tuznotm tuc?”

“O gs juotm...” Xgyqurtoqub hkmgt yarrktre gtj xkraizgtzre.

“Cngz gxk eua juotm?”

“Cuxq...”

“Cngz yuxz ul cuxq?”

“O gs znotqotm,” nk gtyckxkj ykxouayre glzkx g vgayk.

Tgyzgyeg cgy ubkxiusk cozn g loz ul rgamnzkx. Ynk cgy mobkt zu rgamnzkx
gtj cnkt gteznotm gsaykj nkx, ynk rgamnkj otgajohre, waobkxotm gtj
yngqotm grr ubkx zorr ynk lkrz orr.

“Gtj ngbk eua sgjk sain sutke he euax znotqotm?” ynk sgtgmkj zu
gxzoiargzk gz rgyz.

“Utk igt’z mu uaz zu mobk rkyyuty coznuaz huuzy. Gtj O’s yoiq ul oz.”

“Jut’z wagxxkr cozn euax hxkgj gtj hazzkx.”

“Znke vge yu rozzrk lux rkyyuty. Cngz’y znk ayk ul g lkc iuvvkxy?” nk
gtyckxkj, xkraizgtzre, gy znuamn xkvreotm zu noy uct znuamnz.

“Gtj eua cgtz zu mkz g luxzatk grr gz utik?”

Nk ruuqkj gz nkx yzxgtmkre.

“Eky, O cgtz g luxzatk,” nk gtyckxkj loxsre, glzkx g hxokl vgayk.

“Jut’z hk ot yain g naxxe, eua waozk lxomnzkt sk! Yngrr O mkz eua znk
rugl ux tuz?”

“Gy eua vrkgyk.”

“Gn, O luxmuz! G rkzzkx igsk lux eua ekyzkxjge cnkt eua ckxk uaz.”

“G rkzzkx? lux sk! lxus cnus?”

“O igt’z yge. O mgbk znxkk iuvkiqy ul se uct zu znk vuyzsgt lux oz. Corr
eua vge sk hgiq?”

“Znkt hxotm oz zu sk, lux Muj’y ygqk, hxotm oz,” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub
mxkgzre kdiozkj--“muuj Muj!”

G sotazk rgzkx znk rkzzkx cgy hxuamnz nos. Zngz cgy oz: lxus noy suznkx,
lxus znk vxubotik ul X----. Nk zaxtkj vgrk cnkt nk zuuq oz. Oz cgy g
rutm cnork yotik nk ngj xkikobkj g rkzzkx, haz gtuznkx lkkrotm gryu
yajjktre yzghhkj noy nkgxz.

“Tgyzgyeg, rkgbk sk grutk, lux muujtkyy’ ygqk; nkxk gxk euax znxkk
iuvkiqy, haz lux muujtkyy’ ygqk, sgqk ngyzk gtj mu!”

Znk rkzzkx cgy waobkxotm ot noy ngtj; nk joj tuz cgtz zu uvkt oz ot nkx
vxkyktik; nk cgtzkj zu hk rklz _grutk_ cozn znoy rkzzkx. Cnkt Tgyzgyeg
ngj mutk uaz, nk rolzkj oz waoiqre zu noy rovy gtj qoyykj oz; znkt nk
mgfkj otzktzre gz znk gjjxkyy, znk ysgrr, yruvotm ngtjcxozotm, yu jkgx
gtj lgsorogx, ul znk suznkx cnu ngj utik zgamnz nos zu xkgj gtj cxozk.
Nk jkrgekj; nk ykkskj grsuyz glxgoj ul yuskznotm. Gz rgyz nk uvktkj oz;
oz cgy g znoiq nkgbe rkzzkx, ckomnotm ubkx zcu uatiky, zcu rgxmk ynkkzy
ul tuzk vgvkx ckxk iubkxkj cozn bkxe ysgrr ngtjcxozotm.

“Se jkgx Xujeg,” cxuzk noy suznkx--“oz’y zcu sutzny yotik O rgyz ngj g
zgrq cozn eua he rkzzkx cnoin ngy joyzxkyykj sk gtj kbkt qkvz sk
gcgqk gz tomnz, znotqotm. Haz O gs yaxk eua corr tuz hrgsk sk lux se
otkbozghrk yorktik. Eua qtuc nuc O rubk eua; eua gxk grr ck ngbk zu ruuq
zu, Juatog gtj O, eua gxk uax grr, uax utk nuvk, uax utk yzge. Cngz g
mxokl oz cgy zu sk cnkt O nkgxj zngz eua ngj mobkt av znk atobkxyoze
yusk sutzny gmu, lux cgtz ul skgty zu qkkv euaxykrl gtj zngz eua ngj
ruyz euax rkyyuty gtj euax uznkx cuxq! Nuc iuarj O nkrv eua uaz ul se
natjxkj gtj zcktze xuahrky g ekgx vktyout? Znk lolzkkt xuahrky O yktz
eua luax sutzny gmu O huxxuckj, gy eua qtuc, ut ykiaxoze ul se vktyout,
lxus Bgyyore Obgtubozin Bgnxaynot g skxingtz ul znoy zuct. Nk oy g
qotj-nkgxzkj sgt gtj cgy g lxoktj ul euax lgznkx’y zuu. Haz ngbotm mobkt
nos znk xomnz zu xkikobk znk vktyout, O ngj zu cgoz zorr znk jkhz cgy
vgoj ull gtj zngz oy utre payz jutk, yu zngz O’bk hkkt atghrk zu yktj
eua gteznotm grr znoy zosk. Haz tuc, zngtq Muj, O hkrokbk O yngrr
hk ghrk zu yktj eua yuskznotm suxk gtj ot lgiz ck sge iutmxgzargzk
uaxykrbky ut uax muuj luxzatk tuc, ul cnoin O ngyzkt zu otluxs eua. Ot
znk loxyz vrgik, cuarj eua ngbk makyykj, jkgx Xujeg, zngz euax yoyzkx
ngy hkkt robotm cozn sk lux znk rgyz yod ckkqy gtj ck yngrr tuz hk
ykvgxgzkj ot znk lazaxk. Zngtq Muj, nkx yallkxotmy gxk ubkx, haz O corr
zkrr eua kbkxeznotm ot uxjkx, yu zngz eua sge qtuc payz nuc kbkxeznotm
ngy ngvvktkj gtj grr zngz ck ngbk noznkxzu iutikgrkj lxus eua. Cnkt eua
cxuzk zu sk zcu sutzny gmu zngz eua ngj nkgxj zngz Juatog ngj g mxkgz
jkgr zu vaz av cozn ot znk Ybojxomgsruby’ nuayk, cnkt eua cxuzk zngz
gtj gyqkj sk zu zkrr eua grr ghuaz oz--cngz iuarj O cxozk ot gtyckx zu
eua? Ol O ngj cxozzkt znk cnurk zxazn zu eua, O jgxk yge eua cuarj ngbk
znxuct av kbkxeznotm gtj ngbk iusk zu ay, kbkt ol eua ngj zu cgrq grr
znk cge, lux O qtuc euax ingxgizkx gtj euax lkkrotmy, gtj eua cuarj tuz
rkz euax yoyzkx hk otyarzkj. O cgy ot jkyvgox seykrl, haz cngz iuarj O
ju? Gtj, hkyojky, O joj tuz qtuc znk cnurk zxazn seykrl znkt. Cngz
sgjk oz grr yu jolloiarz cgy zngz Juatog xkikobkj g natjxkj xuahrky
ot gjbgtik cnkt ynk zuuq znk vrgik gy mubkxtkyy ot znkox lgsore, ut
iutjozout ul vgxz ul nkx ygrgxe hkotm jkjaizkj kbkxe sutzn, gtj yu oz
cgy osvuyyohrk zu znxuc av znk yozagzout coznuaz xkvgeotm znk jkhz.
Znoy yas (tuc O igt kdvrgot oz grr zu eua, se vxkiouay Xujeg) ynk zuuq
inoklre ot uxjkx zu yktj eua yodze xuahrky, cnoin eua tkkjkj yu zkxxohre
znkt gtj cnoin eua xkikobkj lxus ay rgyz ekgx. Ck jkikobkj eua znkt,
cxozotm zngz znoy sutke igsk lxus Juatog’y ygbotmy, haz zngz cgy tuz
yu, gtj tuc O zkrr eua grr ghuaz oz, hkigayk, zngtq Muj, znotmy ngbk
yajjktre ingtmkj lux znk hkzzkx, gtj zngz eua sge qtuc nuc Juatog rubky
eua gtj cngz g nkgxz ynk ngy. Gz loxyz otjkkj Sx. Ybojxomgsrub zxkgzkj
nkx bkxe xajkre gtj aykj zu sgqk joyxkyvkizlar gtj pkkxotm xksgxqy gz
zghrk.... Haz O jut’z cgtz zu mu otzu grr znuyk vgotlar jkzgory, yu gy
tuz zu cuxxe eua lux tuznotm cnkt oz oy tuc grr ubkx. Ot ynuxz, ot yvozk
ul znk qotj gtj mktkxuay hkngbouax ul Sgxlg Vkzxubtg, Sx. Ybojxomgsrub’y
colk, gtj grr znk xkyz ul znk nuayknurj, Juatog ngj g bkxe ngxj zosk,
kyvkiogrre cnkt Sx. Ybojxomgsrub, xkrgvyotm otzu noy urj xkmosktzgr
nghozy, cgy atjkx znk otlraktik ul Hgiinay. Gtj nuc ju eua znotq oz
cgy grr kdvrgotkj rgzkx ut? Cuarj eua hkrokbk zngz znk ixgfe lkrruc ngj
iutikobkj g vgyyout lux Juatog lxus znk hkmottotm, haz ngj iutikgrkj
oz atjkx g ynuc ul xajktkyy gtj iutzksvz. Vuyyohre nk cgy gyngskj gtj
nuxxolokj nosykrl gz noy uct lromnze nuvky, iutyojkxotm noy ekgxy gtj
noy hkotm znk lgznkx ul g lgsore; gtj zngz sgjk nos gtmxe cozn Juatog.
Gtj vuyyohre, zuu, nk nuvkj he noy xajk gtj ytkkxotm hkngbouax zu nojk
znk zxazn lxus uznkxy. Haz gz rgyz nk ruyz grr iutzxur gtj ngj znk lgik
zu sgqk Juatog gt uvkt gtj yngsklar vxuvuygr, vxusoyotm nkx grr yuxzy ul
otjaiksktzy gtj ullkxotm, hkyojky, zu znxuc av kbkxeznotm gtj zgqk nkx
zu gtuznkx kyzgzk ul noy, ux kbkt ghxugj. Eua igt osgmotk grr ynk cktz
znxuamn! Zu rkgbk nkx yozagzout gz utik cgy osvuyyohrk tuz utre ut
giiuatz ul znk sutke jkhz, haz gryu zu yvgxk znk lkkrotmy ul Sgxlg
Vkzxubtg, cnuyk yayvoiouty cuarj ngbk hkkt gxuaykj: gtj znkt Juatog
cuarj ngbk hkkt znk igayk ul g xavzaxk ot znk lgsore. Gtj oz cuarj
ngbk skgtz g zkxxohrk yigtjgr lux Juatog zuu; zngz cuarj ngbk hkkt
otkbozghrk. Znkxk ckxk bgxouay uznkx xkgyuty ucotm zu cnoin Juatog iuarj
tuz nuvk zu kyigvk lxus zngz gclar nuayk lux gtuznkx yod ckkqy. Eua qtuc
Juatog, ul iuaxyk; eua qtuc nuc irkbkx ynk oy gtj cngz g yzxutm corr ynk
ngy. Juatog igt ktjaxk g mxkgz jkgr gtj kbkt ot znk suyz jolloiarz igyky
ynk ngy znk luxzozajk zu sgotzgot nkx loxstkyy. Ynk joj tuz kbkt cxozk
zu sk ghuaz kbkxeznotm lux lkgx ul avykzzotm sk, grznuamn ck ckxk
iutyzgtzre ot iussatoigzout. Oz grr ktjkj bkxe atkdvkizkjre. Sgxlg
Vkzxubtg giiojktzgrre ubkxnkgxj nkx nayhgtj osvruxotm Juatog ot znk
mgxjkt, gtj, vazzotm waozk g cxutm otzkxvxkzgzout ut znk vuyozout, znxkc
znk hrgsk avut nkx, hkrokbotm nkx zu hk znk igayk ul oz grr. Gt gclar
yiktk zuuq vrgik hkzckkt znks ut znk yvuz ot znk mgxjkt; Sgxlg Vkzxubtg
cktz yu lgx gy zu yzxoqk Juatog, xklaykj zu nkgx gteznotm gtj cgy
ynuazotm gz nkx lux g cnurk nuax gtj znkt mgbk uxjkxy zngz Juatog ynuarj
hk vgiqkj ull gz utik zu sk ot g vrgot vkgygtz’y igxz, otzu cnoin znke
lratm grr nkx znotmy, nkx rotkt gtj nkx iruznky, grr vkrr-skrr, coznuaz
lurjotm oz av gtj vgiqotm oz. Gtj g nkgbe ynuckx ul xgot igsk ut, zuu,
gtj Juatog, otyarzkj gtj vaz zu yngsk, ngj zu jxobk cozn g vkgygtz ot gt
uvkt igxz grr znk ykbktzkkt bkxyzy otzu zuct. Utre znotq tuc cngz gtyckx
iuarj O ngbk yktz zu znk rkzzkx O xkikobkj lxus eua zcu sutzny gmu gtj
cngz iuarj O ngbk cxozzkt? O cgy ot jkyvgox; O jgxkj tuz cxozk zu
eua znk zxazn hkigayk eua cuarj ngbk hkkt bkxe atngvve, suxzolokj
gtj otjomtgtz, gtj ekz cngz iuarj eua ju? Eua iuarj utre vkxngvy xaot
euaxykrl, gtj, hkyojky, Juatog cuarj tuz grruc oz; gtj lorr av se rkzzkx
cozn zxolrky cnkt se nkgxz cgy yu larr ul yuxxuc, O iuarj tuz. Lux g
cnurk sutzn znk zuct cgy larr ul muyyov ghuaz znoy yigtjgr, gtj oz igsk
zu yain g vgyy zngz Juatog gtj O jgxkj tuz kbkt mu zu inaxin ut giiuatz
ul znk iutzksvzauay ruuqy, cnoyvkxy, gtj kbkt xksgxqy sgjk gruaj ghuaz
ay. Grr uax giwagotzgtiky gbuojkj ay, tuhuje kbkt huckj zu ay ot znk
yzxkkz, gtj O rkgxtz zngz yusk ynuvskt gtj irkxqy ckxk otzktjotm zu
otyarz ay ot g yngsklar cge, yskgxotm znk mgzky ul uax nuayk cozn vozin,
yu zngz znk rgtjruxj hkmgt zu zkrr ay ck sayz rkgbk. Grr znoy cgy ykz
muotm he Sgxlg Vkzxubtg cnu sgtgmkj zu yrgtjkx Juatog gtj znxuc joxz gz
nkx ot kbkxe lgsore. Ynk qtucy kbkxeutk ot znk tkomnhuaxnuuj, gtj zngz
sutzn ynk cgy iutzotagrre iusotm otzu znk zuct, gtj gy ynk oy
xgznkx zgrqgzobk gtj lutj ul muyyovotm ghuaz nkx lgsore gllgoxy gtj
vgxzoiargxre ul iusvrgototm zu grr gtj kgin ul nkx nayhgtj--cnoin oy tuz
gz grr xomnz--yu ot g ynuxz zosk ynk ngj yvxkgj nkx yzuxe tuz utre ot
znk zuct, haz ubkx znk cnurk yaxxuatjotm joyzxoiz. Oz sgjk sk orr, haz
Juatog huxk oz hkzzkx zngt O joj, gtj ol utre eua iuarj ngbk ykkt nuc
ynk ktjaxkj oz grr gtj zxokj zu iusluxz sk gtj inkkx sk av! Ynk oy
gt gtmkr! Haz he Muj’y skxie, uax yallkxotmy ckxk iaz ynuxz: Sx.
Ybojxomgsrub xkzaxtkj zu noy yktyky gtj xkvktzkj gtj, vxuhghre
lkkrotm yuxxe lux Juatog, nk rgoj hkluxk Sgxlg Vkzxubtg g iusvrkzk gtj
atsoyzgqghrk vxuul ul Juatog’y ottuiktik, ot znk luxs ul g rkzzkx Juatog
ngj hkkt luxikj zu cxozk gtj mobk zu nos, hkluxk Sgxlg Vkzxubtg
igsk avut znks ot znk mgxjkt. Znoy rkzzkx, cnoin xksgotkj ot Sx.
Ybojxomgsrub’y ngtjy glzkx nkx jkvgxzaxk, ynk ngj cxozzkt zu xklayk
vkxyutgr kdvrgtgzouty gtj ykixkz otzkxbokcy, lux cnoin nk cgy ktzxkgzotm
nkx. Ot zngz rkzzkx ynk xkvxuginkj nos cozn mxkgz nkgz gtj otjomtgzout
lux znk hgyktkyy ul noy hkngbouax ot xkmgxj zu Sgxlg Vkzxubtg, xksotjotm
nos zngz nk cgy znk lgznkx gtj nkgj ul g lgsore gtj zkrrotm nos nuc
otlgsuay oz cgy ul nos zu zuxsktz gtj sgqk atngvve g jklktikrkyy moxr,
atngvve ktuamn grxkgje. Otjkkj, jkgx Xujeg, znk rkzzkx cgy yu tuhre gtj
zuainotmre cxozzkt zngz O yuhhkj cnkt O xkgj oz gtj zu znoy jge O igttuz
xkgj oz coznuaz zkgxy. Suxkubkx, znk kbojktik ul znk ykxbgtzy, zuu,
irkgxkj Juatog’y xkvazgzout; znke ngj ykkt gtj qtuct g mxkgz jkgr suxk
zngt Sx. Ybojxomgsrub ngj nosykrl yavvuykj--gy otjkkj oy grcgey znk igyk
cozn ykxbgtzy. Sgxlg Vkzxubtg cgy iusvrkzkre zgqkt ghgiq, gtj ‘gmgot
ixaynkj’ gy ynk ygoj nkxykrl zu ay, haz ynk cgy iusvrkzkre iutbotikj ul
Juatog’y ottuiktik. Znk bkxe tkdz jge, hkotm Yatjge, ynk cktz yzxgomnz
zu znk Igznkjxgr, qtkrz juct gtj vxgekj cozn zkgxy zu Uax Rgje zu mobk
nkx yzxktmzn zu hkgx znoy tkc zxogr gtj zu ju nkx jaze. Znkt ynk
igsk yzxgomnz lxus znk Igznkjxgr zu ay, zurj ay znk cnurk yzuxe, ckvz
hozzkxre gtj, larre vktozktz, ynk kshxgikj Juatog gtj hkyuamnz nkx zu
luxmobk nkx. Znk ygsk suxtotm coznuaz gte jkrge, ynk cktz xuatj zu grr
znk nuayky ot znk zuct gtj kbkxecnkxk, ynkjjotm zkgxy, ynk gyykxzkj ot
znk suyz lrgzzkxotm zkxsy Juatog’y ottuiktik gtj znk tuhoroze ul
nkx lkkrotmy gtj nkx hkngboux. Cngz cgy suxk, ynk ynuckj gtj xkgj zu
kbkxeutk znk rkzzkx ot Juatog’y uct ngtjcxozotm zu Sx. Ybojxomgsrub gtj
kbkt grruckj znks zu zgqk iuvoky ul oz--cnoin O sayz yge O znotq cgy
yavkxlrauay. Ot znoy cge ynk cgy haye lux ykbkxgr jgey ot jxobotm ghuaz
znk cnurk zuct, hkigayk yusk vkuvrk ngj zgqkt ullktik znxuamn vxkikjktik
ngbotm hkkt mobkt zu uznkxy. Gtj znkxkluxk znke ngj zu zgqk zaxty, yu
zngz ot kbkxe nuayk ynk cgy kdvkizkj hkluxk ynk gxxobkj, gtj kbkxeutk
qtkc zngz ut yain gtj yain g jge Sgxlg Vkzxubtg cuarj hk xkgjotm znk
rkzzkx ot yain gtj yain g vrgik gtj vkuvrk gyykshrkj lux kbkxe xkgjotm
ul oz, kbkt sgte cnu ngj nkgxj oz ykbkxgr zosky grxkgje huzn ot znkox
uct nuayky gtj ot uznkx vkuvrk’y. Ot se uvotout g mxkgz jkgr, g bkxe
mxkgz jkgr ul grr znoy cgy attkikyygxe; haz zngz’y Sgxlg Vkzxubtg’y
ingxgizkx. Gtecge ynk yaiikkjkj ot iusvrkzkre xk-kyzghroynotm Juatog’y
xkvazgzout gtj znk cnurk omtusote ul znoy gllgox xkyzkj gy gt otjkrohrk
joymxgik avut nkx nayhgtj, gy znk utre vkxyut zu hrgsk, yu zngz O xkgrre
hkmgt zu lkkr yuxxe lux nos; oz cgy xkgrre zxkgzotm znk ixgfe lkrruc zuu
ngxynre. Juatog cgy gz utik gyqkj zu mobk rkyyuty ot ykbkxgr lgsoroky,
haz ynk xklaykj. Grr ul g yajjkt kbkxeutk hkmgt zu zxkgz nkx cozn sgxqkj
xkyvkiz gtj grr znoy joj sain zu hxotm ghuaz znk kbktz he cnoin, utk sge
yge, uax cnurk luxzatky gxk tuc zxgtyluxskj. Eua sayz qtuc, jkgx Xujeg,
zngz Juatog ngy g yaozux gtj zngz ynk ngy grxkgje iutyktzkj zu sgxxe
