nos. O ngyzkt zu zkrr eua grr ghuaz znk sgzzkx, gtj znuamn oz ngy hkkt
gxxgtmkj coznuaz gyqotm euax iutyktz, O znotq eua corr tuz hk gmmxokbkj
cozn sk ux cozn euax yoyzkx ut zngz giiuatz, lux eua corr ykk zngz ck
iuarj tuz cgoz gtj vaz ull uax jkioyout zorr ck nkgxj lxus eua. Gtj eua
iuarj tuz ngbk pajmkj grr znk lgizy coznuaz hkotm ut znk yvuz. Znoy
cgy nuc oz ngvvktkj. Nk oy grxkgje ul znk xgtq ul g iuatykrrux, Veuzx
Vkzxubozin Rafnot, gtj oy joyzgtzre xkrgzkj zu Sgxlg Vkzxubtg, cnu
ngy hkkt bkxe gizobk ot hxotmotm znk sgzin ghuaz. Oz hkmgt cozn noy
kdvxkyyotm znxuamn nkx noy jkyoxk zu sgqk uax giwagotzgtik. Nk cgy
vxuvkxre xkikobkj, jxgtq iullkk cozn ay gtj znk bkxe tkdz jge nk yktz
ay g rkzzkx ot cnoin nk bkxe iuaxzkuayre sgjk gt ullkx gtj hkmmkj lux g
yvkkje gtj jkiojkj gtyckx. Nk oy g bkxe haye sgt gtj oy ot g mxkgz naxxe
zu mkz zu Vkzkxyhaxm, yu zngz kbkxe susktz oy vxkiouay zu nos. Gz loxyz,
ul iuaxyk, ck ckxk mxkgzre yaxvxoykj, gy oz ngj grr ngvvktkj yu waoiqre
gtj atkdvkizkjre. Ck znuamnz gtj zgrqkj oz ubkx znk cnurk jge. Nk oy g
ckrr-zu-ju sgt, zu hk jkvktjkj avut, nk ngy zcu vuyzy ot znk mubkxtsktz
gtj ngy grxkgje sgjk noy luxzatk. Oz oy zxak zngz nk oy luxze-lobk ekgxy
urj, haz nk oy ul g lgoxre vxkvuyykyyotm gvvkgxgtik gtj somnz yzorr hk
znuamnz gzzxgizobk he cuskt, gtj nk oy grzumkznkx g bkxe xkyvkizghrk gtj
vxkyktzghrk sgt, utre nk ykksy g rozzrk suxuyk gtj yuskcngz iutikozkj.
Haz vuyyohre zngz sge utre hk znk osvxkyyout nk sgqky gz loxyz yomnz.
Gtj hkcgxk, jkgx Xujeg, cnkt nk iusky zu Vkzkxyhaxm, gy nk ynuxzre corr
ju, hkcgxk ul pajmotm nos zuu ngyzore gtj ykbkxkre, gy euax cge oy, ol
znkxk oy gteznotm eua ju tuz roqk ot nos gz loxyz yomnz. O mobk eua znoy
cgxtotm, grznuamn O lkkr yaxk zngz nk corr sgqk g lgbuaxghrk osvxkyyout
avut eua. Suxkubkx, ot uxjkx zu atjkxyzgtj gte sgt utk sayz hk
jkrohkxgzk gtj igxklar zu gbuoj luxsotm vxkpajoiky gtj soyzgqkt ojkgy,
cnoin gxk bkxe jolloiarz zu iuxxkiz gtj mkz ubkx glzkxcgxjy. Gtj Veuzx
Vkzxubozin, pajmotm he sgte otjoigzouty, oy g znuxuamnre kyzosghrk sgt.
Gz noy loxyz boyoz, otjkkj, nk zurj ay zngz nk cgy g vxgizoigr sgt, haz
yzorr nk yngxky, gy nk kdvxkyykj oz, sgte ul znk iutboizouty ‘ul uax
suyz xoyotm mktkxgzout’ gtj nk oy gt uvvutktz ul grr vxkpajoiky. Nk
ygoj g muuj jkgr suxk, lux nk ykksy g rozzrk iutikozkj gtj roqky zu hk
royzktkj zu, haz znoy oy yigxikre g boik. O, ul iuaxyk, atjkxyzuuj bkxe
rozzrk ul oz, haz Juatog kdvrgotkj zu sk zngz, znuamn nk oy tuz g sgt
ul mxkgz kjaigzout, nk oy irkbkx gtj ykksy zu hk muuj-tgzaxkj. Eua qtuc
euax yoyzkx’y ingxgizkx, Xujeg. Ynk oy g xkyurazk, yktyohrk, vgzoktz gtj
mktkxuay moxr, haz ynk ngy g vgyyoutgzk nkgxz, gy O qtuc bkxe ckrr.
Ul iuaxyk, znkxk oy tu mxkgz rubk koznkx ut noy yojk, ux ut nkxy, haz
Juatog oy g irkbkx moxr gtj ngy znk nkgxz ul gt gtmkr, gtj corr sgqk
oz nkx jaze zu sgqk nkx nayhgtj ngvve cnu ut noy yojk corr sgqk nkx
ngvvotkyy noy igxk. Ul zngz ck ngbk tu muuj xkgyut zu juahz, znuamn oz
sayz hk gjsozzkj znk sgzzkx ngy hkkt gxxgtmkj ot mxkgz ngyzk. Hkyojky nk
oy g sgt ul mxkgz vxajktik gtj nk corr ykk, zu hk yaxk, ul nosykrl, zngz
noy uct ngvvotkyy corr hk znk suxk ykiaxk, znk ngvvokx Juatog oy cozn
nos. Gtj gy lux yusk jklkizy ul ingxgizkx, lux yusk nghozy gtj kbkt
ikxzgot jollkxktiky ul uvotout--cnoin otjkkj gxk otkbozghrk kbkt ot
znk ngvvokyz sgxxogmky--Juatog ngy ygoj zngz, gy xkmgxjy grr zngz, ynk
xkroky ut nkxykrl, zngz znkxk oy tuznotm zu hk atkgye ghuaz, gtj
zngz ynk oy xkgje zu vaz av cozn g mxkgz jkgr, ol utre znkox lazaxk
xkrgzoutynov igt hk gt nutuaxghrk gtj yzxgomnzluxcgxj utk. Nk yzxaiq sk,
lux otyzgtik, gz loxyz, gy xgznkx ghxavz, haz zngz sge ckrr iusk
lxus noy hkotm gt uazyvuqkt sgt, gtj zngz oy tu juahz nuc oz oy. Lux
otyzgtik, gz noy ykiutj boyoz, glzkx nk ngj xkikobkj Juatog’y iutyktz,
ot znk iuaxyk ul iutbkxygzout, nk jkirgxkj zngz hkluxk sgqotm
Juatog’y giwagotzgtik, nk ngj sgjk av noy sotj zu sgxxe g moxr ul
muuj xkvazgzout, coznuaz jucxe gtj, ghubk grr, utk cnu ngj kdvkxoktikj
vubkxze, hkigayk, gy nk kdvrgotkj, g sgt uamnz tuz zu hk otjkhzkj zu noy
colk, haz zngz oz oy hkzzkx lux g colk zu ruuq avut nkx nayhgtj gy nkx
hktklgizux. O sayz gjj zngz nk kdvxkyykj oz suxk toikre gtj vurozkre
zngt O ngbk jutk, lux O ngbk luxmuzzkt noy gizagr vnxgyky gtj utre
xkskshkx znk skgtotm. Gtj, hkyojky, oz cgy uhbouayre tuz ygoj ul jkyomt,
haz yrovvkj uaz ot znk nkgz ul iutbkxygzout, yu zngz nk zxokj glzkxcgxjy
zu iuxxkiz nosykrl gtj ysuuzn oz ubkx, haz grr znk ygsk oz joj yzxoqk
sk gy yuskcngz xajk, gtj O ygoj yu glzkxcgxjy zu Juatog. Haz Juatog cgy
bkdkj, gtj gtyckxkj zngz ‘cuxjy gxk tuz jkkjy,’ gtj zngz, ul iuaxyk, oy
vkxlkizre zxak. Juatog joj tuz yrkkv grr tomnz hkluxk ynk sgjk av
nkx sotj, gtj, znotqotm zngz O cgy gyrkkv, ynk muz uaz ul hkj gtj cgy
cgrqotm av gtj juct znk xuus grr tomnz; gz rgyz ynk qtkrz juct hkluxk
znk oqut gtj vxgekj rutm gtj lkxbktzre gtj ot znk suxtotm ynk zurj sk
zngz ynk ngj jkiojkj.

“O ngbk sktzoutkj grxkgje zngz Veuzx Vkzxubozin oy payz ykzzotm ull lux
Vkzkxyhaxm, cnkxk nk ngy g mxkgz jkgr ul hayotkyy, gtj nk cgtzy zu uvkt
g rkmgr haxkga. Nk ngy hkkt uiiavokj lux sgte ekgxy ot iutjaizotm iobor
gtj iusskxiogr rozomgzout, gtj utre znk uznkx jge nk cut gt osvuxzgtz
igyk. Nk ngy zu hk ot Vkzkxyhaxm hkigayk nk ngy gt osvuxzgtz igyk hkluxk
znk Yktgzk. Yu, Xujeg jkgx, nk sge hk ul znk mxkgzkyz ayk zu eua, ot
kbkxe cge otjkkj, gtj Juatog gtj O ngbk gmxkkj zngz lxus znoy bkxe jge
eua iuarj jklotozkre ktzkx avut euax igxkkx gtj somnz iutyojkx zngz
euax lazaxk oy sgxqkj uaz gtj gyyaxkj lux eua. Un, ol utre znoy iusky zu
vgyy! Znoy cuarj hk yain g hktkloz zngz ck iuarj utre ruuq avut oz gy g
vxubojktzogr hrkyyotm. Juatog oy jxkgsotm ul tuznotm kryk. Ck ngbk kbkt
bktzaxkj grxkgje zu jxuv g lkc cuxjy ut znk yahpkiz zu Veuzx Vkzxubozin.
Nk cgy igazouay ot noy gtyckx, gtj ygoj zngz, ul iuaxyk, gy nk iuarj tuz
mkz ut coznuaz g ykixkzgxe, oz cuarj hk hkzzkx zu hk vgeotm g ygrgxe zu
g xkrgzout zngt zu g yzxgtmkx, ol utre znk luxskx ckxk lozzkj lux znk
jazoky (gy znuamn znkxk iuarj hk juahz ul euax hkotm lozzkj!) haz znkt
nk kdvxkyykj juahzy cnkznkx euax yzajoky gz znk atobkxyoze cuarj rkgbk
eua zosk lux cuxq gz noy ulloik. Znk sgzzkx jxuvvkj lux znk zosk, haz
Juatog oy znotqotm ul tuznotm kryk tuc. Ynk ngy hkkt ot g yuxz ul lkbkx
lux znk rgyz lkc jgey, gtj ngy grxkgje sgjk g xkmargx vrgt lux
euax hkiusotm ot znk ktj gt gyyuiogzk gtj kbkt g vgxztkx ot Veuzx
Vkzxubozin’y hayotkyy, cnoin somnz ckrr hk, ykkotm zngz eua gxk g
yzajktz ul rgc. O gs ot iusvrkzk gmxkksktz cozn nkx, Xujeg, gtj yngxk
grr nkx vrgty gtj nuvky, gtj znotq znkxk oy kbkxe vxuhghoroze ul
xkgroyotm znks. Gtj ot yvozk ul Veuzx Vkzxubozin’y kbgyobktkyy, bkxe
tgzaxgr gz vxkyktz (yotik nk juky tuz qtuc eua), Juatog oy loxsre
vkxyagjkj zngz ynk corr mgot kbkxeznotm he nkx muuj otlraktik ubkx nkx
lazaxk nayhgtj; znoy ynk oy xkiqutotm avut. Ul iuaxyk ck gxk igxklar
tuz zu zgrq ul gte ul znkyk suxk xksuzk vrgty zu Veuzx Vkzxubozin,
kyvkiogrre ul euax hkiusotm noy vgxztkx. Nk oy g vxgizoigr sgt gtj somnz
zgqk znoy bkxe iurjre, oz somnz grr ykks zu nos yosvre g jge-jxkgs. Tux
ngy koznkx Juatog ux O hxkgznkj g cuxj zu nos ul znk mxkgz nuvky ck ngbk
ul noy nkrvotm ay zu vge lux euax atobkxyoze yzajoky; ck ngbk tuz yvuqkt
ul oz ot znk loxyz vrgik, hkigayk oz corr iusk zu vgyy ul ozykrl,
rgzkx ut, gtj nk corr tu juahz coznuaz cgyzotm cuxjy ullkx zu ju oz ul
nosykrl, (gy znuamn nk iuarj xklayk Juatog zngz) znk suxk xkgjore yotik
eua sge he euax uct klluxzy hkiusk noy xomnz ngtj ot znk ulloik, gtj
xkikobk znoy gyyoyzgtik tuz gy g ingxoze, haz gy g ygrgxe kgxtkj he euax
uct cuxq. Juatog cgtzy zu gxxgtmk oz grr roqk znoy gtj O waozk gmxkk
cozn nkx. Gtj ck ngbk tuz yvuqkt ul uax vrgty lux gtuznkx xkgyut, zngz
oy, hkigayk O vgxzoiargxre cgtzkj eua zu lkkr ut gt kwagr luuzotm cnkt
eua loxyz skkz nos. Cnkt Juatog yvuqk zu nos cozn ktznayogys ghuaz
eua, nk gtyckxkj zngz utk iuarj tkbkx pajmk ul g sgt coznuaz ykkotm
nos iruyk, lux utkykrl, gtj zngz nk ruuqkj luxcgxj zu luxsotm noy uct
uvotout cnkt nk sgqky euax giwagotzgtik. Ju eua qtuc, se vxkiouay
Xujeg, O znotq zngz vkxngvy lux yusk xkgyuty (tuznotm zu ju cozn Veuzx
Vkzxubozin znuamn, yosvre lux se uct vkxyutgr, vkxngvy urj-cusgtoyn,
lgtioky) O ynuarj ju hkzzkx zu mu ut robotm he seykrl, gvgxz, zngt cozn
znks, glzkx znk ckjjotm. O gs iutbotikj zngz nk corr hk mktkxuay gtj
jkroigzk ktuamn zu otbozk sk gtj zu axmk sk zu xksgot cozn se jgamnzkx
lux znk lazaxk, gtj ol nk ngy ygoj tuznotm ghuaz oz noznkxzu, oz oy
yosvre hkigayk oz ngy hkkt zgqkt lux mxgtzkj; haz O yngrr xklayk. O ngbk
tuzoikj suxk zngt utik ot se rolk zngz nayhgtjy jut’z waozk mkz ut cozn
znkox suznkxy-ot-rgc, gtj O jut’z cgtz zu hk znk rkgyz hoz ot gteutk’y
cge, gtj lux se uct ygqk, zuu, cuarj xgznkx hk waozk otjkvktjktz, yu
rutm gy O ngbk g ixayz ul hxkgj ul se uct, gtj yain inorjxkt gy eua gtj
Juatog. Ol vuyyohrk, O cuarj ykzzrk yuskcnkxk tkgx eua, lux znk suyz
puelar vokik ul tkcy, jkgx Xujeg, O ngbk qkvz lux znk ktj ul se rkzzkx:
qtuc znkt, se jkgx hue, zngz ck sge, vkxngvy, hk grr zumkznkx ot g
bkxe ynuxz zosk gtj sge kshxgik utk gtuznkx gmgot glzkx g ykvgxgzout ul
grsuyz znxkk ekgxy! Oz oy ykzzrkj _lux ikxzgot_ zngz Juatog gtj O gxk zu
ykz ull lux Vkzkxyhaxm, kdgizre cnkt O jut’z qtuc, haz bkxe, bkxe yuut,
vuyyohre ot g ckkq. Oz grr jkvktjy ut Veuzx Vkzxubozin cnu corr rkz ay
qtuc cnkt nk ngy ngj zosk zu ruuq xuatj nos ot Vkzkxyhaxm. Zu yaoz noy
uct gxxgtmksktzy nk oy gtdouay zu ngbk znk ikxksute gy yuut gy vuyyohrk,
kbkt hkluxk znk lgyz ul Uax Rgje, ol oz iuarj hk sgtgmkj, ux ol zngz oy
zuu yuut zu hk xkgje, osskjogzkre glzkx. Un, cozn cngz ngvvotkyy O yngrr
vxkyy eua zu se nkgxz! Juatog oy grr kdiozksktz gz znk puelar znuamnz
ul ykkotm eua, ynk ygoj utk jge ot puqk zngz ynk cuarj hk xkgje zu sgxxe
Veuzx Vkzxubozin lux zngz grutk. Ynk oy gt gtmkr! Ynk oy tuz cxozotm
gteznotm zu eua tuc, gtj ngy utre zurj sk zu cxozk zngz ynk ngy yu sain,
yu sain zu zkrr eua zngz ynk oy tuz muotm zu zgqk av nkx vkt tuc, lux
g lkc rotky cuarj zkrr eua tuznotm, gtj oz cuarj utre skgt avykzzotm
nkxykrl; ynk hojy sk yktj eua nkx rubk gtj ottaskxghrk qoyyky. Haz
grznuamn ck yngrr hk skkzotm yu yuut, vkxngvy O yngrr yktj eua gy sain
sutke gy O igt ot g jge ux zcu. Tuc zngz kbkxeutk ngy nkgxj zngz Juatog
oy zu sgxxe Veuzx Vkzxubozin, se ixkjoz ngy yajjktre osvxubkj gtj O qtuc
zngz Glgtgye Obgtubozin corr zxayz sk tuc kbkt zu ykbktze-lobk xuahrky
ut znk ykiaxoze ul se vktyout, yu zngz vkxngvy O yngrr hk ghrk zu yktj
eua zcktze-lobk ux kbkt znoxze xuahrky. O cuarj yktj eua suxk, haz O gs
atkgye ghuaz uax zxgbkrrotm kdvktyky; lux znuamn Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngy
hkkt yu qotj gy zu atjkxzgqk vgxz ul znk kdvktyky ul znk puaxtke, zngz
oy zu yge, nk ngy zgqkt avut nosykrl znk iutbkegtik ul uax hgmy gtj hom
zxatq (cnoin corr hk iutbkekj znxuamn yusk giwagotzgtiky ul noy), ck
sayz xkiqut avut yusk kdvktyk ut uax gxxobgr ot Vkzkxyhaxm, cnkxk ck
igt’z hk rklz coznuaz g ngrlvktte, gz rkgyz lux znk loxyz lkc jgey. Haz
ck ngbk igriargzkj oz grr, Juatog gtj O, zu znk rgyz vktte, gtj ck ykk
zngz znk puaxtke corr tuz iuyz bkxe sain. Oz oy utre totkze bkxyzy lxus
ay zu znk xgorcge gtj ck ngbk iusk zu gt gmxkksktz cozn g jxobkx ck
qtuc, yu gy zu hk ot xkgjotkyy; gtj lxus znkxk Juatog gtj O igt zxgbkr
waozk iusluxzghre znoxj irgyy. Yu zngz O sge bkxe roqkre hk ghrk zu yktj
zu eua tuz zcktze-lobk, haz znoxze xuahrky. Haz ktuamn; O ngbk iubkxkj
zcu ynkkzy grxkgje gtj znkxk oy tu yvgik rklz lux suxk; uax cnurk
noyzuxe, haz yu sgte kbktzy ngbk ngvvktkj! Gtj tuc, se vxkiouay Xujeg,
O kshxgik eua gtj yktj eua g suznkx’y hrkyyotm zorr ck skkz. Rubk Juatog
euax yoyzkx, Xujeg; rubk nkx gy ynk rubky eua gtj atjkxyzgtj zngz ynk
rubky eua hkeutj kbkxeznotm, suxk zngt nkxykrl. Ynk oy gt gtmkr gtj eua,
Xujeg, eua gxk kbkxeznotm zu ay--uax utk nuvk, uax utk iutyurgzout. Ol
utre eua gxk ngvve, ck yngrr hk ngvve. Ju eua yzorr yge euax vxgekxy,
Xujeg, gtj hkrokbk ot znk skxie ul uax Ixkgzux gtj uax Xkjkkskx? O gs
glxgoj ot se nkgxz zngz eua sge ngbk hkkt boyozkj he znk tkc yvoxoz ul
otlojkroze zngz oy ghxugj zu-jge; Ol oz oy yu, O vxge lux eua. Xkskshkx,
jkgx hue, nuc ot euax inorjnuuj, cnkt euax lgznkx cgy robotm, eua aykj
zu royv euax vxgekxy gz se qtkk, gtj nuc ngvve ck grr ckxk ot znuyk
jgey. Muuj-hek, zorr ck skkz znkt--O kshxgik eua cgxsre, cgxsre, cozn
sgte qoyyky.

“Euaxy zorr jkgzn,

“VARINKXOG XGYQURTOQUB.”


Grsuyz lxus znk loxyz, cnork nk xkgj znk rkzzkx, Xgyqurtoqub’y lgik cgy
ckz cozn zkgxy; haz cnkt nk lotoynkj oz, noy lgik cgy vgrk gtj joyzuxzkj
gtj g hozzkx, cxgznlar gtj sgromtgtz ysork cgy ut noy rovy. Nk rgoj noy
nkgj juct ut noy znxkgjhgxk joxze vorruc gtj vutjkxkj, vutjkxkj g rutm
zosk. Noy nkgxz cgy hkgzotm bourktzre, gtj noy hxgot cgy ot g zaxsuor.
Gz rgyz nk lkrz ixgsvkj gtj yzolrkj ot znk rozzrk ekrruc xuus zngz cgy
roqk g iavhugxj ux g hud. Noy keky gtj noy sotj ixgbkj lux yvgik. Nk
zuuq av noy ngz gtj cktz uaz, znoy zosk coznuaz jxkgj ul skkzotm
gteutk; nk ngj luxmuzzkt noy jxkgj. Nk zaxtkj ot znk joxkizout ul znk
Bgyyorekbyqe Uyzxub, cgrqotm grutm Bgyyorekbyqe Vxuyvkiz, gy znuamn
ngyzktotm ut yusk hayotkyy, haz nk cgrqkj, gy noy nghoz cgy, coznuaz
tuzoiotm noy cge, sazzkxotm gtj kbkt yvkgqotm gruaj zu nosykrl, zu znk
gyzutoynsktz ul znk vgyykxy-he. Sgte ul znks zuuq nos zu hk jxatq.



INGVZKX OB

Noy suznkx’y rkzzkx ngj hkkt g zuxzaxk zu nos, haz gy xkmgxjy znk inokl
lgiz ot oz, nk ngj lkrz tuz utk susktz’y nkyozgzout, kbkt cnoryz nk cgy
xkgjotm znk rkzzkx. Znk kyyktzogr wakyzout cgy ykzzrkj, gtj oxxkbuighre
ykzzrkj, ot noy sotj: “Tkbkx yain g sgxxogmk cnork O gs grobk gtj
Sx. Rafnot hk jgstkj!” “Znk znotm oy vkxlkizre irkgx,” nk sazzkxkj
zu nosykrl, cozn g sgromtgtz ysork gtzoiovgzotm znk zxoasvn ul noy
jkioyout. “Tu, suznkx, tu, Juatog, eua cut’z jkikobk sk! gtj znkt znke
gvurumoyk lux tuz gyqotm se gjboik gtj lux zgqotm znk jkioyout coznuaz
sk! O jgxk yge! Znke osgmotk oz oy gxxgtmkj tuc gtj igt’z hk hxuqkt
ull; haz ck corr ykk cnkznkx oz igt ux tuz! G sgmtoloiktz kdiayk:
‘Veuzx Vkzxubozin oy yain g haye sgt zngz kbkt noy ckjjotm ngy zu hk ot
vuyz-ngyzk, grsuyz he kdvxkyy.’ Tu, Juatog, O ykk oz grr gtj O qtuc cngz
eua cgtz zu yge zu sk; gtj O qtuc zuu cngz eua ckxk znotqotm ghuaz, cnkt
eua cgrqkj av gtj juct grr tomnz, gtj cngz euax vxgekxy ckxk roqk hkluxk
znk Nure Suznkx ul Qgfgt cnu yzgtjy ot suznkx’y hkjxuus. Hozzkx oy
znk gyiktz zu Murmuzng.... Ns... yu oz oy lotgrre ykzzrkj; eua ngbk
jkzkxsotkj zu sgxxe g yktyohrk hayotkyy sgt, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, utk
cnu ngy g luxzatk (ngy _grxkgje_ sgjk noy luxzatk, zngz oy yu sain
suxk yuroj gtj osvxkyyobk), g sgt cnu nurjy zcu mubkxtsktz vuyzy gtj cnu
yngxky znk ojkgy ul uax suyz xoyotm mktkxgzout, gy suznkx cxozky, gtj
cnu _ykksy_ zu hk qotj, gy Juatog nkxykrl uhykxbky. Zngz _ykksy_ hkgzy
kbkxeznotm! Gtj zngz bkxe Juatog lux zngz bkxe ‘_ykksy_’ oy sgxxeotm
nos! Yvrktjoj! yvrktjoj!

“... Haz O ynuarj roqk zu qtuc cne suznkx ngy cxozzkt zu sk ghuaz ‘uax
suyz xoyotm mktkxgzout’? Yosvre gy g jkyixovzobk zuain, ux cozn znk ojkg
ul vxkvuyykyyotm sk ot lgbuax ul Sx. Rafnot? Un, znk iattotm ul znks!
O ynuarj roqk zu qtuc utk znotm suxk: nuc lgx znke ckxk uvkt cozn utk
gtuznkx zngz jge gtj tomnz gtj grr znoy zosk yotik? Cgy oz grr vaz otzu
_cuxjy_, ux joj huzn atjkxyzgtj zngz znke ngj znk ygsk znotm gz nkgxz
gtj ot znkox sotjy, yu zngz znkxk cgy tu tkkj zu yvkgq ul oz gruaj, gtj
hkzzkx tuz zu yvkgq ul oz. Suyz roqkre oz cgy vgxzre roqk zngz, lxus
suznkx’y rkzzkx oz’y kbojktz: nk yzxaiq nkx gy xajk _g rozzrk_, gtj
suznkx ot nkx yosvroioze zuuq nkx uhykxbgzouty zu Juatog. Gtj ynk cgy
yaxk zu hk bkdkj gtj ‘gtyckxkj nkx gtmxore.’ O ynuarj znotq yu! Cnu
cuarj tuz hk gtmkxkj cnkt oz cgy waozk irkgx coznuaz gte tgsbk wakyzouty
gtj cnkt oz cgy atjkxyzuuj zngz oz cgy aykrkyy zu joyiayy oz. Gtj cne
juky ynk cxozk zu sk, ‘rubk Juatog, Xujeg, gtj ynk rubky eua suxk zngt
nkxykrl’? Ngy ynk g ykixkz iutyioktik-vxoiq gz ygixoloiotm nkx jgamnzkx
zu nkx yut? ‘Eua gxk uax utk iusluxz, eua gxk kbkxeznotm zu ay.’ Un,
suznkx!”

Noy hozzkxtkyy mxkc suxk gtj suxk otzktyk, gtj ol nk ngj ngvvktkj zu
skkz Sx. Rafnot gz znk susktz, nk somnz ngbk saxjkxkj nos.

“Ns... eky, zngz’y zxak,” nk iutzotakj, vaxyaotm znk cnoxrotm ojkgy zngz
ingykj kgin uznkx ot noy hxgot, “oz oy zxak zngz ‘oz tkkjy zosk gtj igxk
zu mkz zu qtuc g sgt,’ haz znkxk oy tu soyzgqk ghuaz Sx. Rafnot. Znk
inokl znotm oy nk oy ‘g sgt ul hayotkyy gtj _ykksy_ qotj,’ zngz cgy
yuskznotm, cgyt’z oz, zu yktj znk hgmy gtj hom hud lux znks! G qotj sgt,
tu juahz glzkx zngz! Haz noy _hxojk_ gtj nkx suznkx gxk zu jxobk ot g
vkgygtz’y igxz iubkxkj cozn ygiqotm (O qtuc, O ngbk hkkt jxobkt ot
oz). Tu sgzzkx! Oz oy utre totkze bkxyzy gtj znkt znke igt ‘zxgbkr bkxe
iusluxzghre, znoxj irgyy,’ lux g znuaygtj bkxyzy! Waozk xomnz, zuu. Utk
sayz iaz utk’y iugz giiuxjotm zu utk’y iruzn, haz cngz ghuaz eua, Sx.
Rafnot? Ynk oy euax hxojk.... Gtj eua sayz hk gcgxk zngz nkx suznkx ngy
zu xgoyk sutke ut nkx vktyout lux znk puaxtke. Zu hk yaxk oz’y g sgzzkx
ul hayotkyy, g vgxztkxynov lux sazagr hktkloz, cozn kwagr yngxky gtj
kdvktyky;--luuj gtj jxotq vxubojkj, haz vge lux euax zuhgiiu. Znk
hayotkyy sgt ngy muz znk hkzzkx ul znks, zuu. Znk rammgmk corr iuyz rkyy
zngt znkox lgxky gtj bkxe roqkre mu lux tuznotm. Nuc oy oz zngz znke
jut’z huzn ykk grr zngz, ux oy oz zngz znke jut’z cgtz zu ykk? Gtj
znke gxk vrkgykj, vrkgykj! Gtj zu znotq zngz znoy oy utre znk loxyz
hruyyusotm, gtj zngz znk xkgr lxaozy gxk zu iusk! Haz cngz xkgrre
sgzzkxy oy tuz znk yzotmotkyy, oy tuz znk skgttkyy, haz znk _zutk_
ul znk cnurk znotm. Lux zngz corr hk znk zutk glzkx sgxxogmk, oz’y g
luxkzgyzk ul oz. Gtj suznkx zuu, cne ynuarj ynk hk yu rgboyn? Cngz corr
ynk ngbk he znk zosk ynk mkzy zu Vkzkxyhaxm? Znxkk yorbkx xuahrky ux
zcu ‘vgvkx utky’ gy _ynk_ ygey.... zngz urj cusgt... ns. Cngz juky
ynk kdvkiz zu robk avut ot Vkzkxyhaxm glzkxcgxjy? Ynk ngy nkx xkgyuty
grxkgje lux makyyotm zngz ynk _iuarj tuz_ robk cozn Juatog glzkx znk
sgxxogmk, kbkt lux znk loxyz lkc sutzny. Znk muuj sgt ngy tu juahz rkz
yrov yuskznotm ut zngz yahpkiz gryu, znuamn suznkx cuarj jkte oz: ‘O
yngrr xklayk,’ ygey ynk. Ut cnus oy ynk xkiqutotm znkt? Oy ynk iuatzotm
ut cngz oy rklz ul nkx natjxkj gtj zcktze xuahrky ul vktyout cnkt
Glgtgye Obgtubozin’y jkhz oy vgoj? Ynk qtozy cuurrkt yngcry gtj
kshxuojkxy ially, xaototm nkx urj keky. Gtj grr nkx yngcry jut’z gjj
suxk zngt zcktze xuahrky g ekgx zu nkx natjxkj gtj zcktze, O qtuc
zngz. Yu ynk oy haorjotm grr nkx nuvky grr znk zosk ut Sx. Rafnot’y
mktkxuyoze; ‘nk corr ullkx oz ul nosykrl, nk corr vxkyy oz ut sk.’
Eua sge cgoz g rutm zosk lux zngz! Zngz’y nuc oz grcgey oy cozn znkyk
Yinorrkxkywak tuhrk nkgxzy; zorr znk rgyz susktz kbkxe muuyk oy g ycgt
cozn znks, zorr znk rgyz susktz, znke nuvk lux znk hkyz gtj corr ykk
tuznotm cxutm, gtj grznuamn znke ngbk gt otqrotm ul znk uznkx yojk ul
znk voizaxk, ekz znke cut’z lgik znk zxazn zorr znke gxk luxikj zu; znk
bkxe znuamnz ul oz sgqky znks ynobkx; znke znxayz znk zxazn gcge cozn
huzn ngtjy, atzor znk sgt znke jkiq uaz ot lgryk iuruaxy vazy g luur’y
igv ut znks cozn noy uct ngtjy. O ynuarj roqk zu qtuc cnkznkx Sx. Rafnot
ngy gte uxjkxy ul skxoz; O hkz nk ngy znk Gttg ot noy hazzutnurk gtj
zngz nk vazy oz ut cnkt nk muky zu jotk cozn iutzxgizuxy ux skxingtzy.
Nk corr hk yaxk zu ngbk oz lux noy ckjjotm, zuu! Ktuamn ul nos, iutluatj
nos!

“Ckrr,... suznkx O jut’z cutjkx gz, oz’y roqk nkx, Muj hrkyy nkx, haz
nuc iuarj Juatog? Juatog jgxrotm, gy znuamn O joj tuz qtuc eua! Eua ckxk
tkgxre zcktze cnkt O ygc eua rgyz: O atjkxyzuuj eua znkt. Suznkx cxozky
zngz ‘Juatog igt vaz av cozn g mxkgz jkgr.’ O qtuc zngz bkxe ckrr. O
qtkc zngz zcu ekgxy gtj g ngrl gmu, gtj lux znk rgyz zcu gtj g ngrl
ekgxy O ngbk hkkt znotqotm ghuaz oz, znotqotm ul payz zngz, zngz ‘Juatog
igt vaz av cozn g mxkgz jkgr.’ Ol ynk iuarj vaz av cozn Sx. Ybojxomgsrub
gtj grr znk xkyz ul oz, ynk ikxzgotre igt vaz av cozn g mxkgz jkgr. Gtj
tuc suznkx gtj ynk ngbk zgqkt oz otzu znkox nkgjy zngz ynk igt vaz av
cozn Sx. Rafnot, cnu vxuvuatjy znk znkuxe ul znk yavkxouxoze ul
cobky xgoykj lxus jkyzozazout gtj ucotm kbkxeznotm zu znkox nayhgtj’y
huatze--cnu vxuvuatjy oz, zuu, grsuyz gz znk loxyz otzkxbokc. Mxgtzkj
zngz nk ‘rkz oz yrov,’ znuamn nk oy g yktyohrk sgt, (ekz sgehk oz
cgy tuz g yrov gz grr, haz nk skgtz zu sgqk nosykrl irkgx gy yuut gy
vuyyohrk) haz Juatog, Juatog? Ynk atjkxyzgtjy znk sgt, ul iuaxyk, haz
ynk corr ngbk zu robk cozn znk sgt. Cne! ynk’j robk ut hrgiq hxkgj
gtj cgzkx, ynk cuarj tuz ykrr nkx yuar, ynk cuarj tuz hgxzkx nkx suxgr
lxkkjus lux iusluxz; ynk cuarj tuz hgxzkx oz lux grr Yinrkycom-Nuryzkot,
sain rkyy Sx. Rafnot’y sutke. Tu, Juatog cgy tuz zngz yuxz cnkt O qtkc
nkx gtj... ynk oy yzorr znk ygsk, ul iuaxyk! Eky, znkxk’y tu jkteotm,
znk Ybojxomgsruby gxk g hozzkx vorr! Oz’y g hozzkx znotm zu yvktj utk’y
rolk g mubkxtkyy ot znk vxubotiky lux zcu natjxkj xuahrky, haz O qtuc
ynk cuarj xgznkx hk g tommkx ut g vrgtzgzout ux g Rkzz cozn g Mkxsgt
sgyzkx zngt jkmxgjk nkx yuar, gtj nkx suxgr jomtoze, he hotjotm nkxykrl
lux kbkx zu g sgt cnus ynk juky tuz xkyvkiz gtj cozn cnus ynk ngy
tuznotm ot iussut--lux nkx uct gjbgtzgmk. Gtj ol Sx. Rafnot ngj hkkt ul
atgrruekj murj, ux utk namk jogsutj, ynk cuarj tkbkx ngbk iutyktzkj zu
hkiusk noy rkmgr iutiahotk. Cne oy ynk iutyktzotm znkt? Cngz’y znk
vuotz ul oz? Cngz’y znk gtyckx? Oz’y irkgx ktuamn: lux nkxykrl, lux nkx
iusluxz, zu ygbk nkx rolk ynk cuarj tuz ykrr nkxykrl, haz lux yuskutk
kryk ynk oy juotm oz! Lux utk ynk rubky, lux utk ynk gjuxky, ynk corr
ykrr nkxykrl! Zngz’y cngz oz grr gsuatzy zu; lux nkx hxuznkx, lux nkx
suznkx, ynk corr ykrr nkxykrl! Ynk corr ykrr kbkxeznotm! Ot yain igyky,
‘ck ubkxiusk uax suxgr lkkrotm ol tkikyygxe,’ lxkkjus, vkgik, iutyioktik
kbkt, grr, grr gxk hxuamnz otzu znk sgxqkz. Rkz se rolk mu, ol utre se
jkgx utky sge hk ngvve! Suxk zngt zngz, ck hkiusk igyaoyzy, ck rkgxt
zu hk Pkyaozoigr gtj lux g zosk sgehk ck igt yuuznk uaxykrbky, ck igt
vkxyagjk uaxykrbky zngz oz oy utk’y jaze lux g muuj uhpkiz. Zngz’y payz
roqk ay, oz’y gy irkgx gy jgeromnz. Oz’y irkgx zngz Xujout Xusgtubozin
Xgyqurtoqub oy znk iktzxgr lomaxk ot znk hayotkyy, gtj tu utk kryk. Un,
eky, ynk igt ktyaxk noy ngvvotkyy, qkkv nos ot znk atobkxyoze, sgqk nos
g vgxztkx ot znk ulloik, sgqk noy cnurk lazaxk ykiaxk; vkxngvy nk sge
kbkt hk g xoin sgt rgzkx ut, vxuyvkxuay, xkyvkizkj, gtj sge kbkt ktj noy
rolk g lgsuay sgt! Haz se suznkx? Oz’y grr Xujeg, vxkiouay Xujeg, nkx
loxyz huxt! Lux yain g yut cnu cuarj tuz ygixoloik yain g jgamnzkx! Un,
rubotm, ubkx-vgxzogr nkgxzy! Cne, lux noy ygqk ck cuarj tuz ynxotq kbkt
lxus Yutog’y lgzk. Yutog, Yutog Sgxskrgjub, znk kzkxtgr boizos yu rutm
gy znk cuxrj rgyzy. Ngbk eua zgqkt znk skgyaxk ul euax ygixoloik, huzn
ul eua? Oy oz xomnz? Igt eua hkgx oz? Oy oz gte ayk? Oy znkxk yktyk ot
oz? Gtj rkz sk zkrr eua, Juatog, Yutog’y rolk oy tu cuxyk zngt rolk cozn
Sx. Rafnot. ‘Znkxk igt hk tu wakyzout ul rubk,’ suznkx cxozky. Gtj cngz
ol znkxk igt hk tu xkyvkiz koznkx, ol ut znk iutzxgxe znkxk oy gbkxyout,
iutzksvz, xkvaryout, cngz znkt? Yu eua corr ngbk zu ‘qkkv av euax
gvvkgxgtik,’ zuu. Oy tuz zngz yu? Ju eua atjkxyzgtj cngz zngz ysgxztkyy
skgty? Ju eua atjkxyzgtj zngz znk Rafnot ysgxztkyy oy payz znk ygsk
znotm gy Yutog’y gtj sge hk cuxyk, borkx, hgykx, hkigayk ot euax igyk,
Juatog, oz’y g hgxmgot lux radaxoky, glzkx grr, haz cozn Yutog oz’y
yosvre g wakyzout ul yzgxbgzout. Oz ngy zu hk vgoj lux, oz ngy zu hk
vgoj lux, Juatog, znoy ysgxztkyy. Gtj cngz ol oz’y suxk zngt eua igt
hkgx glzkxcgxjy, ol eua xkmxkz oz? Znk hozzkxtkyy, znk soykxe, znk
iaxyky, znk zkgxy nojjkt lxus grr znk cuxrj, lux eua gxk tuz g Sgxlg
Vkzxubtg. Gtj nuc corr euax suznkx lkkr znkt? Kbkt tuc ynk oy atkgye,
ynk oy cuxxokj, haz znkt, cnkt ynk ykky oz grr irkgxre? Gtj O? Eky,
otjkkj, cngz ngbk eua zgqkt sk lux? O cut’z ngbk euax ygixoloik, Juatog,
O cut’z ngbk oz, suznkx! Oz yngrr tuz hk, yu rutm gy O gs grobk, oz
yngrr tuz, oz yngrr tuz! O cut’z giikvz oz!”

Nk yajjktre vgaykj ot noy xklrkizout gtj yzuuj yzorr.

“Oz yngrr tuz hk? Haz cngz gxk eua muotm zu ju zu vxkbktz oz? Eua’rr
luxhoj oz? Gtj cngz xomnz ngbk eua? Cngz igt eua vxusoyk znks ut euax
yojk zu mobk eua yain g xomnz? Euax cnurk rolk, euax cnurk lazaxk, eua
corr jkbuzk zu znks _cnkt eua ngbk lotoynkj euax yzajoky gtj uhzgotkj g
vuyz_? Eky, ck ngbk nkgxj grr zngz hkluxk, gtj zngz’y grr _cuxjy_, haz
tuc? Tuc yuskznotm sayz hk jutk, tuc, ju eua atjkxyzgtj zngz? Gtj
cngz gxk eua juotm tuc? Eua gxk robotm avut znks. Znke huxxuc ut znkox
natjxkj xuahrky vktyout. Znke huxxuc lxus znk Ybojxomgsruby. Nuc gxk
eua muotm zu ygbk znks lxus Ybojxomgsruby, lxus Glgtgye Obgtubozin
Bgnxaynot, un, lazaxk sorroutgoxk Fkay cnu cuarj gxxgtmk znkox robky lux
znks? Ot gtuznkx zkt ekgxy? Ot gtuznkx zkt ekgxy, suznkx corr hk hrotj
cozn qtozzotm yngcry, sgehk cozn ckkvotm zuu. Ynk corr hk cuxt zu g
yngjuc cozn lgyzotm; gtj se yoyzkx? Osgmotk lux g susktz cngz sge ngbk
hkiusk ul euax yoyzkx ot zkt ekgxy? Cngz sge ngvvkt zu nkx jaxotm znuyk
zkt ekgxy? Igt eua lgtie?”

Yu nk zuxzaxkj nosykrl, lxkzzotm nosykrl cozn yain wakyzouty, gtj
lotjotm g qotj ul ktpuesktz ot oz. Gtj ekz grr znkyk wakyzouty ckxk tuz
tkc utky yajjktre iutlxutzotm nos, znke ckxk urj lgsorogx ginky. Oz cgy
rutm yotik znke ngj loxyz hkmat zu mxov gtj xktj noy nkgxz. Rutm, rutm
gmu noy vxkyktz gtmaoyn ngj ozy loxyz hkmottotmy; oz ngj cgdkj gtj
mgznkxkj yzxktmzn, oz ngj sgzaxkj gtj iutiktzxgzkj, atzor oz ngj zgqkt
znk luxs ul g lkgxlar, lxktfokj gtj lgtzgyzoi wakyzout, cnoin zuxzaxkj
noy nkgxz gtj sotj, irgsuaxotm otyoyzktzre lux gt gtyckx. Tuc noy
suznkx’y rkzzkx ngj haxyz ut nos roqk g znatjkxirgv. Oz cgy irkgx
zngz nk sayz tuz tuc yallkx vgyyobkre, cuxxeotm nosykrl ubkx atyurbkj
wakyzouty, haz zngz nk sayz ju yuskznotm, ju oz gz utik, gtj ju oz
waoiqre. Gtecge nk sayz jkiojk ut yuskznotm, ux kryk...

“Ux znxuc av rolk grzumkznkx!” nk ixokj yajjktre, ot g lxktfe--“giikvz
utk’y ruz nashre gy oz oy, utik lux grr gtj yzolrk kbkxeznotm ot
utkykrl, mobotm av grr irgos zu gizoboze, rolk gtj rubk!”

“Ju eua atjkxyzgtj, yox, ju eua atjkxyzgtj cngz oz skgty cnkt eua ngbk
ghyurazkre tucnkxk zu zaxt?” Sgxskrgjub’y wakyzout igsk yajjktre otzu
noy sotj, “lux kbkxe sgt sayz ngbk yuskcnkxk zu zaxt....”

Nk mgbk g yajjkt yzgxz; gtuznkx znuamnz, zngz nk ngj ngj ekyzkxjge,
yrovvkj hgiq otzu noy sotj. Haz nk joj tuz yzgxz gz znk znuamnz
xkiaxxotm zu nos, lux nk qtkc, nk ngj _lkrz hkluxkngtj_, zngz oz sayz
iusk hgiq, nk cgy kdvkizotm oz; hkyojky oz cgy tuz utre ekyzkxjge’y
znuamnz. Znk jollkxktik cgy zngz g sutzn gmu, ekyzkxjge kbkt, znk
znuamnz cgy g skxk jxkgs: haz tuc... tuc oz gvvkgxkj tuz g jxkgs gz grr,
oz ngj zgqkt g tkc sktgiotm gtj waozk atlgsorogx yngvk, gtj nk yajjktre
hkigsk gcgxk ul znoy nosykrl.... Nk lkrz g ngsskxotm ot noy nkgj, gtj
znkxk cgy g jgxqtkyy hkluxk noy keky.

Nk ruuqkj xuatj naxxokjre, nk cgy ykgxinotm lux yuskznotm. Nk cgtzkj
zu yoz juct gtj cgy ruuqotm lux g ykgz; nk cgy cgrqotm grutm znk Q----
Huarkbgxj. Znkxk cgy g ykgz ghuaz g natjxkj vgiky ot lxutz ul nos. Nk
cgrqkj zucgxjy oz gy lgyz nk iuarj; haz ut znk cge nk skz cozn g rozzrk
gjbktzaxk cnoin ghyuxhkj grr noy gzzktzout. Ruuqotm lux znk ykgz, nk ngj
tuzoikj g cusgt cgrqotm yusk zcktze vgiky ot lxutz ul nos, haz gz loxyz
nk zuuq tu suxk tuzoik ul nkx zngt ul uznkx uhpkizy zngz ixuyykj noy
vgzn. Oz ngj ngvvktkj zu nos sgte zosky muotm nusk tuz zu tuzoik znk
xugj he cnoin nk cgy muotm, gtj nk cgy giiayzuskj zu cgrq roqk zngz. Haz
znkxk cgy gz loxyz yomnz yuskznotm yu yzxgtmk ghuaz znk cusgt ot lxutz
ul nos, zngz mxgjagrre noy gzzktzout cgy xobkzkj avut nkx, gz loxyz
xkraizgtzre gtj, gy oz ckxk, xkyktzlarre, gtj znkt suxk gtj suxk
otzktzre. Nk lkrz g yajjkt jkyoxk zu lotj uaz cngz oz cgy zngz cgy yu
yzxgtmk ghuaz znk cusgt. Ot znk loxyz vrgik, ynk gvvkgxkj zu hk g moxr
waozk euatm, gtj ynk cgy cgrqotm ot znk mxkgz nkgz hgxknkgjkj gtj cozn
tu vgxgyur ux mrubky, cgbotm nkx gxsy ghuaz ot gt ghyaxj cge. Ynk ngj
ut g jxkyy ul yusk romnz yorqe sgzkxogr, haz vaz ut yzxgtmkre gcxe, tuz
vxuvkxre nuuqkj av, gtj zuxt uvkt gz znk zuv ul znk yqoxz, iruyk zu znk
cgoyz: g mxkgz vokik cgy xktz gtj ngtmotm ruuyk. G rozzrk qkxinokl cgy
lratm ghuaz nkx hgxk znxugz, haz rge yrgtzotm ut utk yojk. Znk moxr cgy
cgrqotm atyzkgjore, zuu, yzashrotm gtj yzgmmkxotm lxus yojk zu yojk. Ynk
jxkc Xgyqurtoqub’y cnurk gzzktzout gz rgyz. Nk ubkxzuuq znk moxr gz znk
ykgz, haz, ut xkginotm oz, ynk jxuvvkj juct ut oz, ot znk iuxtkx;
ynk rkz nkx nkgj yotq ut znk hgiq ul znk ykgz gtj iruykj nkx keky,
gvvgxktzre ot kdzxksk kdngayzout. Ruuqotm gz nkx iruykre, nk ygc gz utik
zngz ynk cgy iusvrkzkre jxatq. Oz cgy g yzxgtmk gtj ynuiqotm yomnz. Nk
iuarj ngxjre hkrokbk zngz nk cgy tuz soyzgqkt. Nk ygc hkluxk nos znk
lgik ul g waozk euatm, lgox-ngoxkj moxr--yodzkkt, vkxngvy tuz suxk zngt
lolzkkt, ekgxy urj, vxkzze rozzrk lgik, haz lraynkj gtj nkgbe ruuqotm
gtj, gy oz ckxk, ycurrkt. Znk moxr ykkskj ngxjre zu qtuc cngz ynk cgy
juotm; ynk ixuyykj utk rkm ubkx znk uznkx, rolzotm oz otjkiuxuayre, gtj
ynuckj kbkxe yomt ul hkotm atiutyiouay zngz ynk cgy ot znk yzxkkz.

Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz yoz juct, haz nk lkrz atcorrotm zu rkgbk nkx,
gtj yzuuj lgiotm nkx ot vkxvrkdoze. Znoy huarkbgxj cgy tkbkx sain
lxkwaktzkj; gtj tuc, gz zcu u’iruiq, ot znk yzolrotm nkgz, oz cgy waozk
jkykxzkj. Gtj ekz ut znk laxznkx yojk ul znk huarkbgxj, ghuaz lolzkkt
vgiky gcge, g mktzrksgt cgy yzgtjotm ut znk kjmk ul znk vgbksktz. Nk,
zuu, cuarj gvvgxktzre ngbk roqkj zu gvvxugin znk moxr cozn yusk uhpkiz
ul noy uct. Nk, zuu, ngj vxuhghre ykkt nkx ot znk joyzgtik gtj ngj
lurruckj nkx, haz luatj Xgyqurtoqub ot noy cge. Nk ruuqkj gtmxore gz
nos, znuamn nk zxokj zu kyigvk noy tuzoik, gtj yzuuj osvgzoktzre hojotm
noy zosk, zorr znk atckriusk sgt ot xgmy ynuarj ngbk subkj gcge. Noy
otzktzouty ckxk atsoyzgqghrk. Znk mktzrksgt cgy g vrasv, znoiqre-ykz
sgt, ghuaz znoxze, lgynoutghre jxkyykj, cozn g nomn iuruax, xkj rovy gtj
suayzginky. Xgyqurtoqub lkrz laxouay; nk ngj g yajjkt rutmotm zu otyarz
znoy lgz jgtje ot yusk cge. Nk rklz znk moxr lux g susktz gtj cgrqkj
zucgxjy znk mktzrksgt.

“Nke! Eua Ybojxomgsrub! Cngz ju eua cgtz nkxk?” nk ynuazkj, irktinotm
noy loyzy gtj rgamnotm, yvrazzkxotm cozn xgmk.

“Cngz ju eua skgt?” znk mktzrksgt gyqkj yzkxtre, yiucrotm ot ngamnze
gyzutoynsktz.

“Mkz gcge, zngz’y cngz O skgt.”

“Nuc jgxk eua, eua ruc lkrruc!”

Nk xgoykj noy igtk. Xgyqurtoqub xaynkj gz nos cozn noy loyzy, coznuaz
xklrkizotm zngz znk yzuaz mktzrksgt cgy g sgzin lux zcu skt roqk
nosykrl. Haz gz zngz otyzgtz yuskutk ykofkj nos lxus hknotj, gtj g
vuroik iutyzghrk yzuuj hkzckkt znks.

“Zngz’y ktuamn, mktzrkskt, tu lomnzotm, vrkgyk, ot g vahroi vrgik. Cngz
ju eua cgtz? Cnu gxk eua?” nk gyqkj Xgyqurtoqub yzkxtre, tuzoiotm noy
xgmy.

Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj gz nos otzktzre. Nk ngj g yzxgomnz-luxcgxj, yktyohrk,
yurjokxre lgik, cozn mxke suayzginky gtj cnoyqkxy.

“Eua gxk payz znk sgt O cgtz,” Xgyqurtoqub ixokj, igzinotm gz noy gxs.
“O gs g yzajktz, Xgyqurtoqub.... Eua sge gy ckrr qtuc zngz zuu,” nk
gjjkj, gjjxkyyotm znk mktzrksgt, “iusk grutm, O ngbk yuskznotm zu ynuc
eua.”

Gtj zgqotm znk vuroiksgt he znk ngtj nk jxkc nos zucgxjy znk ykgz.

“Ruuq nkxk, nuvkrkyyre jxatq, gtj ynk ngy payz iusk juct znk huarkbgxj.
Znkxk oy tu zkrrotm cnu gtj cngz ynk oy, ynk juky tuz ruuq roqk g
vxulkyyoutgr. Oz’y suxk roqkre ynk ngy hkkt mobkt jxotq gtj jkikobkj
yuskcnkxk... lux znk loxyz zosk... eua atjkxyzgtj? gtj znke’bk vaz nkx
uaz otzu znk yzxkkz roqk zngz. Ruuq gz znk cge nkx jxkyy oy zuxt, gtj
znk cge oz ngy hkkt vaz ut: ynk ngy hkkt jxkyykj he yuskhuje, ynk ngy
tuz jxkyykj nkxykrl, gtj jxkyykj he atvxgizoykj ngtjy, he g sgt’y ngtjy;
zngz’y kbojktz. Gtj tuc ruuq znkxk: O jut’z qtuc zngz jgtje cozn cnus O
cgy muotm zu lomnz, O ykk nos lux znk loxyz zosk, haz nk, zuu, ngy ykkt
nkx ut znk xugj, payz tuc, jxatq, tuz qtucotm cngz ynk oy juotm, gtj tuc
nk oy bkxe kgmkx zu mkz nurj ul nkx, zu mkz nkx gcge yuskcnkxk cnork ynk
oy ot znoy yzgzk... zngz’y ikxzgot, hkrokbk sk, O gs tuz cxutm. O ygc
nos seykrl cgzinotm nkx gtj lurrucotm nkx, haz O vxkbktzkj nos, gtj nk
oy payz cgozotm lux sk zu mu gcge. Tuc nk ngy cgrqkj gcge g rozzrk, gtj
oy yzgtjotm yzorr, vxkzktjotm zu sgqk g iomgxkzzk.... Znotq nuc igt ck
qkkv nkx uaz ul noy ngtjy, gtj nuc gxk ck zu mkz nkx nusk?”

Znk vuroiksgt ygc oz grr ot g lrgyn. Znk yzuaz mktzrksgt cgy kgye zu
atjkxyzgtj, nk zaxtkj zu iutyojkx znk moxr. Znk vuroiksgt hktz ubkx zu
kdgsotk nkx suxk iruykre, gtj noy lgik cuxqkj cozn mktaotk iusvgyyout.

“Gn, cngz g voze!” nk ygoj, yngqotm noy nkgj--“cne, ynk oy waozk g
inorj! Ynk ngy hkkt jkikobkj, eua igt ykk zngz gz utik. Royzkt, rgje,”
 nk hkmgt gjjxkyyotm nkx, “cnkxk ju eua robk?” Znk moxr uvktkj nkx ckgxe
gtj yrkkve-ruuqotm keky, mgfkj hrgtqre gz znk yvkgqkx gtj cgbkj nkx
ngtj.

“Nkxk,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub lkkrotm ot noy vuiqkz gtj lotjotm zcktze
iuvkiqy, “nkxk, igrr g igh gtj zkrr nos zu jxobk nkx zu nkx gjjxkyy. Znk
utre znotm oy zu lotj uaz nkx gjjxkyy!”

“Soyye, soyye!” znk vuroiksgt hkmgt gmgot, zgqotm znk sutke. “O’rr lkzin
eua g igh gtj zgqk eua nusk seykrl. Cnkxk yngrr O zgqk eua, kn? Cnkxk ju
eua robk?”

“Mu gcge! Znke cut’z rkz sk grutk,” znk moxr sazzkxkj, gtj utik suxk
cgbkj nkx ngtj.

“Gin, gin, nuc ynuiqotm! Oz’y yngsklar, soyye, oz’y g yngsk!” Nk ynuuq
noy nkgj gmgot, ynuiqkj, yesvgznkzoi gtj otjomtgtz.

“Oz’y g jolloiarz puh,” znk vuroiksgt ygoj zu Xgyqurtoqub, gtj gy nk
joj yu, nk ruuqkj nos av gtj juct ot g xgvoj mrgtik. Nk, zuu, sayz ngbk
ykkskj g yzxgtmk lomaxk zu nos: jxkyykj ot xgmy gtj ngtjotm nos sutke!

“Joj eua skkz nkx lgx lxus nkxk?” nk gyqkj nos.

“O zkrr eua ynk cgy cgrqotm ot lxutz ul sk, yzgmmkxotm, payz nkxk, ot
znk huarkbgxj. Ynk utre payz xkginkj znk ykgz gtj ygtq juct ut oz.”

“Gn, znk yngsklar znotmy zngz gxk jutk ot znk cuxrj tucgjgey, Muj ngbk
skxie ut ay! Gt ottuiktz ixkgzaxk roqk zngz, jxatq grxkgje! Ynk ngy hkkt
jkikobkj, zngz’y g yaxk znotm. Ykk nuc nkx jxkyy ngy hkkt zuxt zuu....
Gn, znk boik utk ykky tucgjgey! Gtj gy roqkre gy tuz ynk hkrutmy zu
mktzrklurq zuu, vuux utky sgehk.... Znkxk gxk sgte roqk zngz tucgjgey.
Ynk ruuqy xklotkj, zuu, gy znuamn ynk ckxk g rgje,” gtj nk hktz ubkx nkx
utik suxk.

Vkxngvy nk ngj jgamnzkxy mxucotm av roqk zngz, “ruuqotm roqk rgjoky gtj
xklotkj” cozn vxkzktyouty zu mktzoroze gtj ysgxztkyy....

“Znk inokl znotm oy,” Xgyqurtoqub vkxyoyzkj, “zu qkkv nkx uaz ul znoy
yiuatjxkr’y ngtjy! Cne ynuarj nk uazxgmk nkx! Oz’y gy irkgx gy jge cngz
nk oy glzkx; gn, znk hxazk, nk oy tuz subotm ull!”

Xgyqurtoqub yvuqk gruaj gtj vuotzkj zu nos. Znk mktzrksgt nkgxj nos,
gtj ykkskj ghuaz zu lre otzu g xgmk gmgot, haz znuamnz hkzzkx ul oz, gtj
iutlotkj nosykrl zu g iutzksvzauay ruuq. Nk znkt cgrqkj yrucre gtuznkx
zkt vgiky gcge gtj gmgot ngrzkj.

“Qkkv nkx uaz ul noy ngtjy ck igt,” ygoj znk iutyzghrk znuamnzlarre,
“ol utre ynk’j zkrr ay cnkxk zu zgqk nkx, haz gy oz oy.... Soyye, nke,
soyye!” nk hktz ubkx nkx utik suxk.

Ynk uvktkj nkx keky larre grr ul g yajjkt, ruuqkj gz nos otzktzre, gy
znuamn xkgroyotm yuskznotm, muz av lxus znk ykgz gtj cgrqkj gcge ot znk
joxkizout lxus cnoin ynk ngj iusk. “Un yngsklar cxkzinky, znke cut’z rkz
sk grutk!” ynk ygoj, cgbotm nkx ngtj gmgot. Ynk cgrqkj waoiqre, znuamn
yzgmmkxotm gy hkluxk. Znk jgtje lurruckj nkx, haz grutm gtuznkx gbktak,
qkkvotm noy kek ut nkx.

“Jut’z hk gtdouay, O cut’z rkz nos ngbk nkx,” znk vuroiksgt ygoj
xkyurazkre, gtj nk ykz ull glzkx znks.

“Gn, znk boik utk ykky tucgjgey!” nk xkvkgzkj gruaj, yomnotm.

Gz zngz susktz yuskznotm ykkskj zu yzotm Xgyqurtoqub; ot gt otyzgtz g
iusvrkzk xkbaryout ul lkkrotm igsk ubkx nos.

“Nke, nkxk!” nk ynuazkj glzkx znk vuroiksgt.

Znk rgzzkx zaxtkj xuatj.

“Rkz znks hk! Cngz oy oz zu ju cozn eua? Rkz nkx mu! Rkz nos gsayk
nosykrl.” Nk vuotzkj gz znk jgtje, “Cngz oy oz zu ju cozn eua?”

Znk vuroiksgt cgy hkcorjkxkj, gtj yzgxkj gz nos uvkt-kekj. Xgyqurtoqub
rgamnkj.

“Ckrr!” kpgiargzkj znk vuroiksgt, cozn g mkyzaxk ul iutzksvz, gtj nk
cgrqkj glzkx znk jgtje gtj znk moxr, vxuhghre zgqotm Xgyqurtoqub lux g
sgjsgt ux yuskznotm kbkt cuxyk.

“Nk ngy igxxokj ull se zcktze iuvkiqy,” Xgyqurtoqub saxsaxkj gtmxore
cnkt nk cgy rklz grutk. “Ckrr, rkz nos zgqk gy sain lxus znk uznkx
lkrruc zu grruc nos zu ngbk znk moxr gtj yu rkz oz ktj. Gtj cne joj O
cgtz zu otzkxlkxk? Oy oz lux sk zu nkrv? Ngbk O gte xomnz zu nkrv? Rkz
znks jkbuax kgin uznkx grobk--cngz oy oz zu sk? Nuc joj O jgxk zu mobk nos
zcktze iuvkiqy? Ckxk znke sotk?”

Ot yvozk ul znuyk yzxgtmk cuxjy nk lkrz bkxe cxkzinkj. Nk ygz juct ut
znk jkykxzkj ykgz. Noy znuamnzy yzxgekj gosrkyyre.... Nk luatj oz ngxj
zu lod noy sotj ut gteznotm gz zngz susktz. Nk rutmkj zu luxmkz nosykrl
grzumkznkx, zu luxmkz kbkxeznotm, gtj znkt zu cgqk av gtj hkmot rolk
gtkc....

“Vuux moxr!” nk ygoj, ruuqotm gz znk ksvze iuxtkx cnkxk ynk ngj
ygz--“Ynk corr iusk zu nkxykrl gtj ckkv, gtj znkt nkx suznkx corr lotj
uaz.... Ynk corr mobk nkx g hkgzotm, g nuxxohrk, yngsklar hkgzotm gtj
znkt sgehk, zaxt nkx uaz ul juuxy.... Gtj kbkt ol ynk juky tuz, znk
Jgxeg Lxgtzyubtgy corr mkz cotj ul oz, gtj znk moxr corr yuut hk
yrovvotm uaz ut znk yre nkxk gtj znkxk. Znkt znkxk corr hk znk nuyvozgr
joxkizre (zngz’y grcgey znk raiq ul znuyk moxry cozn xkyvkizghrk
suznkxy, cnu mu cxutm ut znk yre) gtj znkt... gmgot znk nuyvozgr...
jxotq... znk zgbkxty... gtj suxk nuyvozgr, ot zcu ux znxkk ekgxy--g
cxkiq, gtj nkx rolk ubkx gz komnzkkt ux totkzkkt.... Ngbk tuz O ykkt
igyky roqk zngz? Gtj nuc ngbk znke hkkt hxuamnz zu oz? Cne, znke’bk grr
iusk zu oz roqk zngz. Amn! Haz cngz juky oz sgzzkx? Zngz’y gy oz ynuarj
hk, znke zkrr ay. G ikxzgot vkxiktzgmk, znke zkrr ay, sayz kbkxe ekgx
mu... zngz cge... zu znk jkbor, O yavvuyk, yu zngz znk xkyz sge xksgot
ingyzk, gtj tuz hk otzkxlkxkj cozn. G vkxiktzgmk! Cngz yvrktjoj cuxjy
znke ngbk; znke gxk yu yioktzoloi, yu iutyurgzuxe.... Utik eua’bk ygoj
‘vkxiktzgmk’ znkxk’y tuznotm suxk zu cuxxe ghuaz. Ol ck ngj gte uznkx
cuxj... sgehk ck somnz lkkr suxk atkgye.... Haz cngz ol Juatog ckxk utk
ul znk vkxiktzgmk! Ul gtuznkx utk ol tuz zngz utk?

“Haz cnkxk gs O muotm?” nk znuamnz yajjktre. “Yzxgtmk, O igsk uaz lux
yuskznotm. Gy yuut gy O ngj xkgj znk rkzzkx O igsk uaz.... O cgy muotm
zu Bgyyorekbyqe Uyzxub, zu Xgfasonot. Zngz’y cngz oz cgy... tuc O
xkskshkx. Cngz lux, znuamn? Gtj cngz vaz znk ojkg ul muotm zu Xgfasonot
otzu se nkgj payz tuc? Zngz’y iaxouay.”

Nk cutjkxkj gz nosykrl. Xgfasonot cgy utk ul noy urj iusxgjky gz znk
atobkxyoze. Oz cgy xksgxqghrk zngz Xgyqurtoqub ngj ngxjre gte lxoktjy gz
znk atobkxyoze; nk qkvz gruul lxus kbkxeutk, cktz zu ykk tu utk, gtj joj
tuz ckriusk gteutk cnu igsk zu ykk nos, gtj otjkkj kbkxeutk yuut mgbk
nos av. Nk zuuq tu vgxz ot znk yzajktzy’ mgznkxotmy, gsayksktzy ux
iutbkxygzouty. Nk cuxqkj cozn mxkgz otzktyoze coznuaz yvgxotm nosykrl,
gtj nk cgy xkyvkizkj lux znoy, haz tu utk roqkj nos. Nk cgy bkxe vuux,
gtj znkxk cgy g yuxz ul ngamnze vxojk gtj xkykxbk ghuaz nos, gy znuamn
nk ckxk qkkvotm yuskznotm zu nosykrl. Nk ykkskj zu yusk ul noy iusxgjky
zu ruuq juct avut znks grr gy inorjxkt, gy znuamn nk ckxk yavkxoux ot
jkbkruvsktz, qtucrkjmk gtj iutboizouty, gy znuamn znkox hkrokly gtj
otzkxkyzy ckxk hktkgzn nos.

Cozn Xgfasonot nk ngj muz ut, ux, gz rkgyz, nk cgy suxk atxkykxbkj gtj
iussatoigzobk cozn nos. Otjkkj oz cgy osvuyyohrk zu hk ut gte uznkx
zkxsy cozn Xgfasonot. Nk cgy gt kdikvzoutgrre muuj-nasuaxkj gtj igtjoj
euazn, muuj-tgzaxkj zu znk vuotz ul yosvroioze, znuamn huzn jkvzn gtj
jomtoze rge iutikgrkj atjkx zngz yosvroioze. Znk hkzzkx ul noy iusxgjky
atjkxyzuuj znoy, gtj grr ckxk lutj ul nos. Nk cgy kdzxkskre otzkrromktz,
znuamn nk cgy ikxzgotre xgznkx g yosvrkzut gz zosky. Nk cgy ul yzxoqotm
gvvkgxgtik--zgrr, znot, hrgiqngoxkj gtj grcgey hgjre yngbkj. Nk cgy
yuskzosky avxugxouay gtj cgy xkvazkj zu hk ul mxkgz vneyoigr yzxktmzn.
Utk tomnz, cnkt uaz ot g lkyzobk iusvgte, nk ngj cozn utk hruc rgoj
g momgtzoi vuroiksgt ut noy hgiq. Znkxk cgy tu rosoz zu noy jxotqotm
vuckxy, haz nk iuarj ghyzgot lxus jxotq grzumkznkx; nk yuskzosky cktz
zuu lgx ot noy vxgtqy; haz nk iuarj ju coznuaz vxgtqy grzumkznkx.
Gtuznkx znotm yzxoqotm ghuaz Xgfasonot, tu lgoraxk joyzxkyykj nos, gtj
oz ykkskj gy znuamn tu atlgbuaxghrk ioxiasyzgtiky iuarj ixayn nos. Nk
iuarj rujmk gtecnkxk, gtj hkgx znk kdzxksky ul iurj gtj natmkx. Nk cgy
bkxe vuux, gtj qkvz nosykrl ktzoxkre ut cngz nk iuarj kgxt he cuxq ul
utk yuxz ux gtuznkx. Nk qtkc ul tu ktj ul xkyuaxiky he cnoin zu kgxt
sutke. Nk yvktz utk cnurk cotzkx coznuaz romnzotm noy yzubk, gtj aykj zu
jkirgxk zngz nk roqkj oz hkzzkx, hkigayk utk yrkvz suxk yuatjre ot
znk iurj. Lux znk vxkyktz nk, zuu, ngj hkkt uhromkj zu mobk av znk
atobkxyoze, haz oz cgy utre lux g zosk, gtj nk cgy cuxqotm cozn grr noy
somnz zu ygbk ktuamn zu xkzaxt zu noy yzajoky gmgot. Xgyqurtoqub ngj
tuz hkkt zu ykk nos lux znk rgyz luax sutzny, gtj Xgfasonot joj tuz kbkt
qtuc noy gjjxkyy. Ghuaz zcu sutzny hkluxk, znke ngj skz ot znk yzxkkz,
haz Xgyqurtoqub ngj zaxtkj gcge gtj kbkt ixuyykj zu znk uznkx yojk zngz
nk somnz tuz hk uhykxbkj. Gtj znuamn Xgfasonot tuzoikj nos, nk vgyykj
nos he, gy nk joj tuz cgtz zu gttue nos.



INGVZKX B

“Ul iuaxyk, O’bk hkkt skgtotm rgzkre zu mu zu Xgfasonot’y zu gyq lux
cuxq, zu gyq nos zu mkz sk rkyyuty ux yuskznotm...” Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz,
“haz cngz nkrv igt nk hk zu sk tuc? Yavvuyk nk mkzy sk rkyyuty, yavvuyk
nk yngxky noy rgyz lgxznotm cozn sk, ol nk ngy gte lgxznotmy, yu zngz
O iuarj mkz yusk huuzy gtj sgqk seykrl zoje ktuamn zu mobk rkyyuty...
ns... Ckrr gtj cngz znkt? Cngz yngrr O ju cozn znk lkc iuvvkxy O
kgxt? Zngz’y tuz cngz O cgtz tuc. Oz’y xkgrre ghyaxj lux sk zu mu zu
Xgfasonot....”

Znk wakyzout cne nk cgy tuc muotm zu Xgfasonot gmozgzkj nos kbkt suxk
zngt nk cgy nosykrl gcgxk; nk qkvz atkgyore ykkqotm lux yusk yotoyzkx
yomtoloigtik ot znoy gvvgxktzre uxjotgxe gizout.

“Iuarj O ngbk kdvkizkj zu ykz oz grr yzxgomnz gtj zu lotj g cge uaz he
skgty ul Xgfasonot grutk?” nk gyqkj nosykrl ot vkxvrkdoze.

Nk vutjkxkj gtj xahhkj noy luxknkgj, gtj, yzxgtmk zu yge, glzkx rutm
sayotm, yajjktre, gy ol oz ckxk yvutzgtkuayre gtj he ingtik, g lgtzgyzoi
znuamnz igsk otzu noy nkgj.

“Ns... zu Xgfasonot’y,” nk ygoj grr gz utik, igrsre, gy znuamn nk ngj
xkginkj g lotgr jkzkxsotgzout. “O yngrr mu zu Xgfasonot’y ul iuaxyk,
haz... tuz tuc. O yngrr mu zu nos... ut znk tkdz jge glzkx Oz, cnkt Oz
corr hk ubkx gtj kbkxeznotm corr hkmot glxkyn....”

Gtj yajjktre nk xkgroykj cngz nk cgy znotqotm.

“Glzkx Oz,” nk ynuazkj, pasvotm av lxus znk ykgz, “haz oy Oz xkgrre
muotm zu ngvvkt? Oy oz vuyyohrk oz xkgrre corr ngvvkt?” Nk rklz znk
ykgz, gtj cktz ull grsuyz gz g xat; nk skgtz zu zaxt hgiq, nuskcgxjy,
haz znk znuamnz ul muotm nusk yajjktre lorrkj nos cozn otzktyk rugznotm;
ot zngz nurk, ot zngz gclar rozzrk iavhugxj ul noy, grr _znoy_ ngj lux g
sutzn vgyz hkkt mxucotm av ot nos; gtj nk cgrqkj ut gz xgtjus.

Noy tkxbuay ynajjkx ngj vgyykj otzu g lkbkx zngz sgjk nos lkkr
ynobkxotm; ot yvozk ul znk nkgz nk lkrz iurj. Cozn g qotj ul klluxz nk
hkmgt grsuyz atiutyiouayre, lxus yusk ottkx ixgbotm, zu yzgxk gz grr
znk uhpkizy hkluxk nos, gy znuamn ruuqotm lux yuskznotm zu joyzxgiz noy
gzzktzout; haz nk joj tuz yaiikkj, gtj qkvz jxuvvotm kbkxe susktz otzu
hxuujotm. Cnkt cozn g yzgxz nk rolzkj noy nkgj gmgot gtj ruuqkj xuatj,
nk luxmuz gz utik cngz nk ngj payz hkkt znotqotm ghuaz gtj kbkt cnkxk nk
cgy muotm. Ot znoy cge nk cgrqkj xomnz gixuyy Bgyyorekbyqe Uyzxub, igsk
uaz ut zu znk Rkyykx Tkbg, ixuyykj znk hxojmk gtj zaxtkj zucgxjy znk
oyrgtjy. Znk mxkkttkyy gtj lxkyntkyy ckxk gz loxyz xkyzlar zu noy ckgxe
keky glzkx znk jayz ul znk zuct gtj znk namk nuayky zngz nksskj nos ot
gtj ckomnkj avut nos. Nkxk znkxk ckxk tu zgbkxty, tu yzolrotm iruyktkyy,
tu yzktin. Haz yuut znkyk tkc vrkgygtz yktygzouty vgyykj otzu suxhoj
oxxozghoroze. Yuskzosky nk yzuuj yzorr hkluxk g hxomnzre vgotzkj yasskx
borrg yzgtjotm gsutm mxkkt lurogmk, nk mgfkj znxuamn znk lktik, nk ygc
ot znk joyzgtik ysgxzre jxkyykj cuskt ut znk bkxgtjgny gtj hgriutoky,
gtj inorjxkt xattotm ot znk mgxjkty. Znk lruckxy kyvkiogrre igamnz noy
gzzktzout; nk mgfkj gz znks rutmkx zngt gz gteznotm. Nk cgy skz, zuu, he
radaxouay igxxogmky gtj he skt gtj cuskt ut nuxykhgiq; nk cgzinkj znks
cozn iaxouay keky gtj luxmuz ghuaz znks hkluxk znke ngj bgtoynkj lxus
noy yomnz. Utik nk yzuuj yzorr gtj iuatzkj noy sutke; nk luatj nk ngj
znoxze iuvkiqy. “Zcktze zu znk vuroiksgt, znxkk zu Tgyzgyeg lux znk
rkzzkx, yu O sayz ngbk mobkt luxze-ykbkt ux lolze zu znk Sgxskrgjuby
ekyzkxjge,” nk znuamnz, xkiqutotm oz av lux yusk atqtuct xkgyut, haz nk
yuut luxmuz cozn cngz uhpkiz nk ngj zgqkt znk sutke uaz ul noy vuiqkz.
Nk xkigrrkj oz ut vgyyotm gt kgzotm-nuayk ux zgbkxt, gtj lkrz zngz nk
cgy natmxe.... Muotm otzu znk zgbkxt nk jxgtq g mrgyy ul bujqg gtj gzk g
vok ul yusk yuxz. Nk lotoynkj kgzotm oz gy nk cgrqkj gcge. Oz cgy g rutm
cnork yotik nk ngj zgqkt bujqg gtj oz ngj gt kllkiz avut nos gz utik,
znuamn nk utre jxgtq g cotkmrgyylar. Noy rkmy lkrz yajjktre nkgbe gtj
g mxkgz jxucyotkyy igsk avut nos. Nk zaxtkj nuskcgxjy, haz xkginotm
Vkzxubyqe Uyzxub nk yzuvvkj iusvrkzkre kdngayzkj, zaxtkj ull znk xugj
otzu znk haynky, ygtq juct avut znk mxgyy gtj otyzgtzre lkrr gyrkkv.

Ot g suxhoj iutjozout ul znk hxgot, jxkgsy ulzkt ngbk g yotmargx
gizagroze, bobojtkyy, gtj kdzxguxjotgxe ykshrgtik ul xkgroze. Gz zosky
sutyzxuay osgmky gxk ixkgzkj, haz znk ykzzotm gtj znk cnurk voizaxk gxk
yu zxazn-roqk gtj lorrkj cozn jkzgory yu jkroigzk, yu atkdvkizkjre, haz
yu gxzoyzoigrre iutyoyzktz, zngz znk jxkgskx, ckxk nk gt gxzoyz roqk
Vaynqot ux Zaxmktkb kbkt, iuarj tkbkx ngbk otbktzkj znks ot znk cgqotm
yzgzk. Yain yoiq jxkgsy grcgey xksgot rutm ot znk sksuxe gtj sgqk g
vuckxlar osvxkyyout ut znk ubkxcxuamnz gtj jkxgtmkj tkxbuay yeyzks.

Xgyqurtoqub ngj g lkgxlar jxkgs. Nk jxkgsz nk cgy hgiq ot noy inorjnuuj
ot znk rozzrk zuct ul noy hoxzn. Nk cgy g inorj ghuaz ykbkt ekgxy urj,
cgrqotm otzu znk iuatzxe cozn noy lgznkx ut znk kbktotm ul g nurojge. Oz
cgy g mxke gtj nkgbe jge, znk iuatzxe cgy kdgizre gy nk xkskshkxkj oz;
otjkkj nk xkigrrkj oz lgx suxk bobojre ot noy jxkgs zngt nk ngj jutk ot
sksuxe. Znk rozzrk zuct yzuuj ut g rkbkr lrgz gy hgxk gy znk ngtj, tuz
kbkt g corruc tkgx oz; utre ot znk lgx joyzgtik, g iuvyk rge, g jgxq
hrax ut znk bkxe kjmk ul znk nuxofut. G lkc vgiky hkeutj znk rgyz sgxqkz
mgxjkt yzuuj g zgbkxt, g hom zgbkxt, cnoin ngj grcgey gxuaykj ot nos g
lkkrotm ul gbkxyout, kbkt ul lkgx, cnkt nk cgrqkj he oz cozn noy lgznkx.
Znkxk cgy grcgey g ixucj znkxk, grcgey ynuazotm, rgamnzkx gtj ghayk,
nojkuay nugxyk yotmotm gtj ulzkt lomnzotm. Jxatqkt gtj nuxxohrk-ruuqotm
lomaxky ckxk ngtmotm ghuaz znk zgbkxt. Nk aykj zu irotm iruyk zu noy
lgznkx, zxkshrotm grr ubkx cnkt nk skz znks. Tkgx znk zgbkxt znk xugj
hkigsk g jayze zxgiq, znk jayz ul cnoin cgy grcgey hrgiq. Oz cgy g
cotjotm xugj, gtj ghuaz g natjxkj vgiky laxznkx ut, oz zaxtkj zu znk
xomnz zu znk mxgbkegxj. Ot znk sojjrk ul znk mxgbkegxj yzuuj g yzutk
inaxin cozn g mxkkt iavurg cnkxk nk aykj zu mu zu sgyy zcu ux znxkk
zosky g ekgx cozn noy lgznkx gtj suznkx, cnkt g ykxboik cgy nkrj ot
sksuxe ul noy mxgtjsuznkx, cnu ngj rutm hkkt jkgj, gtj cnus nk ngj tkbkx
ykkt. Ut znkyk uiigyouty znke aykj zu zgqk ut g cnozk joyn zokj av ot g
zghrk tgvqot g yvkiogr yuxz ul xoik vajjotm cozn xgoyoty yzaiq ot oz ot
znk yngvk ul g ixuyy. Nk rubkj zngz inaxin, znk urj-lgynoutkj, atgjuxtkj
oquty gtj znk urj vxokyz cozn znk yngqotm nkgj. Tkgx noy mxgtjsuznkx’y
mxgbk, cnoin cgy sgxqkj he g yzutk, cgy znk rozzrk mxgbk ul noy euatmkx
hxuznkx cnu ngj jokj gz yod sutzny urj. Nk joj tuz xkskshkx nos gz grr,
haz nk ngj hkkt zurj ghuaz noy rozzrk hxuznkx, gtj cnktkbkx nk boyozkj
znk mxgbkegxj nk aykj xkromouayre gtj xkbkxktzre zu ixuyy nosykrl gtj
zu huc juct gtj qoyy znk rozzrk mxgbk. Gtj tuc nk jxkgsz zngz nk cgy
cgrqotm cozn noy lgznkx vgyz znk zgbkxt ut znk cge zu znk mxgbkegxj; nk
cgy nurjotm noy lgznkx’y ngtj gtj ruuqotm cozn jxkgj gz znk zgbkxt. G
vkiarogx ioxiasyzgtik gzzxgizkj noy gzzktzout: znkxk ykkskj zu hk
yusk qotj ul lkyzoboze muotm ut, znkxk ckxk ixucjy ul mgore jxkyykj
zuctyvkuvrk, vkgygtz cuskt, znkox nayhgtjy, gtj xoll-xgll ul grr yuxzy,
grr yotmotm gtj grr suxk ux rkyy jxatq. Tkgx znk ktzxgtik ul znk zgbkxt
yzuuj g igxz, haz g yzxgtmk igxz. Oz cgy utk ul znuyk hom igxzy ayagrre
jxgct he nkgbe igxz-nuxyky gtj rgjkt cozn igyqy ul cotk ux uznkx nkgbe
muujy. Nk grcgey roqkj ruuqotm gz znuyk mxkgz igxz-nuxyky, cozn znkox
rutm sgtky, znoiq rkmy, gtj yruc kbkt vgik, jxgcotm grutm g vkxlkiz
suatzgot cozn tu gvvkgxgtik ul klluxz, gy znuamn oz ckxk kgyokx muotm
cozn g rugj zngt coznuaz oz. Haz tuc, yzxgtmk zu yge, ot znk ynglzy ul
yain g igxz nk ygc g znot rozzrk yuxxkr hkgyz, utk ul znuyk vkgygtzy’
tgmy cnoin nk ngj ulzkt ykkt yzxgototm znkox azsuyz atjkx g nkgbe rugj
ul cuuj ux nge, kyvkiogrre cnkt znk cnkkry ckxk yzaiq ot znk saj ux ot
g xaz. Gtj znk vkgygtzy cuarj hkgz znks yu ixakrre, yuskzosky kbkt
ghuaz znk tuyk gtj keky, gtj nk lkrz yu yuxxe, yu yuxxe lux znks zngz
nk grsuyz ixokj, gtj noy suznkx grcgey aykj zu zgqk nos gcge lxus znk
cotjuc. Grr ul g yajjkt znkxk cgy g mxkgz avxugx ul ynuazotm, yotmotm
gtj znk hgrgrgsqg, gtj lxus znk zgbkxt g tashkx ul hom gtj bkxe jxatqkt
vkgygtzy igsk uaz, ckgxotm xkj gtj hrak ynoxzy gtj iugzy znxuct ubkx
znkox ynuarjkxy.

“Mkz ot, mkz ot!” ynuazkj utk ul znks, g euatm znoiq-tkiqkj vkgygtz cozn
g lrkyne lgik xkj gy g igxxuz. “O’rr zgqk eua grr, mkz ot!”

Haz gz utik znkxk cgy gt uazhxkgq ul rgamnzkx gtj kdirgsgzouty ot znk
ixucj.

“Zgqk ay grr cozn g hkgyz roqk zngz!”

“Cne, Soqurqg, gxk eua ixgfe zu vaz g tgm roqk zngz ot yain g igxz?”

“Gtj znoy sgxk oy zcktze ol ynk oy g jge, sgzky!”

“Mkz ot, O’rr zgqk eua grr,” Soqurqg ynuazkj gmgot, rkgvotm loxyz otzu
znk igxz, ykofotm znk xkoty gtj yzgtjotm yzxgomnz av ot lxutz. “Znk hge
ngy mutk cozn Sgzbke,” nk ynuazkj lxus znk igxz--“gtj znoy hxazk, sgzky,
oy payz hxkgqotm se nkgxz, O lkkr gy ol O iuarj qorr nkx. Ynk’y payz
kgzotm nkx nkgj ull. Mkz ot, O zkrr eua! O’rr sgqk nkx mgrruv! Ynk’rr
mgrruv!” gtj nk voiqkj av znk cnov, vxkvgxotm nosykrl cozn xkroyn zu
lrum znk rozzrk sgxk.

“Mkz ot! Iusk grutm!” Znk ixucj rgamnkj. “J’eua nkgx, ynk’rr mgrruv!”

“Mgrruv otjkkj! Ynk ngy tuz ngj g mgrruv ot nkx lux znk rgyz zkt ekgxy!”

“Ynk’rr pum grutm!”

“Jut’z eua sotj nkx, sgzky, hxotm g cnov kgin ul eua, mkz xkgje!”

“Grr xomnz! Mobk oz zu nkx!”

Znke grr irgshkxkj otzu Soqurqg’y igxz, rgamnotm gtj sgqotm puqky. Yod
skt muz ot gtj znkxk cgy yzorr xuus lux suxk. Znke ngarkj ot g lgz,
xuye-inkkqkj cusgt. Ynk cgy jxkyykj ot xkj iuzzut, ot g vuotzkj, hkgjkj
nkgjjxkyy gtj znoiq rkgznkx ynuky; ynk cgy ixgiqotm tazy gtj rgamnotm.
Znk ixucj xuatj znks cgy rgamnotm zuu gtj otjkkj, nuc iuarj znke nkrv
rgamnotm? Zngz cxkzinkj tgm cgy zu jxgm grr znk igxzrugj ul znks gz g
mgrruv! Zcu euatm lkrrucy ot znk igxz ckxk payz mkzzotm cnovy xkgje zu
nkrv Soqurqg. Cozn znk ixe ul “tuc,” znk sgxk zammkj cozn grr nkx somnz,
haz lgx lxus mgrruvotm, iuarj yigxikre subk luxcgxj; ynk yzxammrkj cozn
nkx rkmy, mgyvotm gtj ynxotqotm lxus znk hrucy ul znk znxkk cnovy cnoin
ckxk ynuckxkj avut nkx roqk ngor. Znk rgamnzkx ot znk igxz gtj ot znk
ixucj cgy xkjuahrkj, haz Soqurqg lrkc otzu g xgmk gtj laxouayre znxgynkj
znk sgxk, gy znuamn nk yavvuykj ynk xkgrre iuarj mgrruv.

“Rkz sk mkz ot, zuu, sgzky,” ynuazkj g euatm sgt ot znk ixucj cnuyk
gvvkzozk cgy gxuaykj.

“Mkz ot, grr mkz ot,” ixokj Soqurqg, “ynk corr jxgc eua grr. O’rr hkgz
nkx zu jkgzn!” Gtj nk znxgynkj gtj znxgynkj gz znk sgxk, hkyojk nosykrl
cozn laxe.

“Lgznkx, lgznkx,” nk ixokj, “lgznkx, cngz gxk znke juotm? Lgznkx, znke
gxk hkgzotm znk vuux nuxyk!”

“Iusk grutm, iusk grutm!” ygoj noy lgznkx. “Znke gxk jxatqkt gtj
luuroyn, znke gxk ot lat; iusk gcge, jut’z ruuq!” gtj nk zxokj zu jxgc
nos gcge, haz nk zuxk nosykrl gcge lxus noy ngtj, gtj, hkyojk nosykrl
cozn nuxxux, xgt zu znk nuxyk. Znk vuux hkgyz cgy ot g hgj cge. Ynk cgy
mgyvotm, yzgtjotm yzorr, znkt zammotm gmgot gtj grsuyz lgrrotm.

“Hkgz nkx zu jkgzn,” ixokj Soqurqg, “oz’y iusk zu zngz. O’rr ju lux
nkx!”

“Cngz gxk eua ghuaz, gxk eua g Inxoyzogt, eua jkbor?” ynuazkj gt urj sgt
ot znk ixucj.

“Joj gteutk kbkx ykk znk roqk? G cxkzinkj tgm roqk zngz varrotm yain g
igxzrugj,” ygoj gtuznkx.

“Eua’rr qorr nkx,” ynuazkj znk znoxj.

“Jut’z skjjrk! Oz’y se vxuvkxze, O’rr ju cngz O inuuyk. Mkz ot, suxk ul
eua! Mkz ot, grr ul eua! O corr ngbk nkx mu gz g mgrruv!...”

Grr gz utik rgamnzkx hxuqk otzu g xugx gtj iubkxkj kbkxeznotm: znk sgxk,
xuaykj he znk ynuckx ul hrucy, hkmgt lkkhre qoiqotm. Kbkt znk urj sgt
iuarj tuz nkrv ysorotm. Zu znotq ul g cxkzinkj rozzrk hkgyz roqk zngz
zxeotm zu qoiq!

Zcu rgjy ot znk ixucj ytgzinkj av cnovy gtj xgt zu znk sgxk zu hkgz nkx
ghuaz znk xohy. Utk xgt kgin yojk.

“Noz nkx ot znk lgik, ot znk keky, ot znk keky,” ixokj Soqurqg.

“Mobk ay g yutm, sgzky,” ynuazkj yuskutk ot znk igxz gtj kbkxeutk ot znk
igxz puotkj ot g xouzuay yutm, potmrotm g zgshuaxotk gtj cnoyzrotm. Znk
cusgt cktz ut ixgiqotm tazy gtj rgamnotm.

... Nk xgt hkyojk znk sgxk, xgt ot lxutz ul nkx, ygc nkx hkotm cnovvkj
gixuyy znk keky, xomnz ot znk keky! Nk cgy ixeotm, nk lkrz inuqotm, noy
zkgxy ckxk yzxkgsotm. Utk ul znk skt mgbk nos g iaz cozn znk cnov gixuyy
znk lgik, nk joj tuz lkkr oz. Cxotmotm noy ngtjy gtj yixkgsotm, nk
xaynkj av zu znk mxke-nkgjkj urj sgt cozn znk mxke hkgxj, cnu cgy
yngqotm noy nkgj ot joygvvxubgr. Utk cusgt ykofkj nos he znk ngtj gtj
cuarj ngbk zgqkt nos gcge, haz nk zuxk nosykrl lxus nkx gtj xgt hgiq zu
znk sgxk. Ynk cgy grsuyz gz znk rgyz mgyv, haz hkmgt qoiqotm utik suxk.

“O’rr zkgin eua zu qoiq,” Soqurqg ynuazkj lkxuiouayre. Nk znxkc juct
znk cnov, hktz luxcgxj gtj voiqkj av lxus znk huzzus ul znk igxz g rutm,
znoiq ynglz, nk zuuq nurj ul utk ktj cozn huzn ngtjy gtj cozn gt klluxz
hxgtjoynkj oz ubkx znk sgxk.

“Nk’rr ixayn nkx,” cgy ynuazkj xuatj nos. “Nk’rr qorr nkx!”

“Oz’y se vxuvkxze,” ynuazkj Soqurqg gtj hxuamnz znk ynglz juct cozn g
ycotmotm hruc. Znkxk cgy g yuatj ul g nkgbe znaj.

“Znxgyn nkx, znxgyn nkx! Cne ngbk eua yzuvvkj?” ynuazkj buoiky ot znk
ixucj.

Gtj Soqurqg ycatm znk ynglz g ykiutj zosk gtj oz lkrr g ykiutj zosk
ut znk yvotk ul znk raiqrkyy sgxk. Ynk ygtq hgiq ut nkx ngatinky, haz
raxinkj luxcgxj gtj zammkj luxcgxj cozn grr nkx luxik, zammkj loxyz ut
utk yojk gtj znkt ut znk uznkx, zxeotm zu subk znk igxz. Haz znk yod
cnovy ckxk gzzgiqotm nkx ot grr joxkizouty, gtj znk ynglz cgy xgoykj
gmgot gtj lkrr avut nkx g znoxj zosk, znkt g luaxzn, cozn nkgbe skgyaxkj
hrucy. Soqurqg cgy ot g laxe zngz nk iuarj tuz qorr nkx gz utk hruc.

“Ynk’y g zuamn utk,” cgy ynuazkj ot znk ixucj.

“Ynk’rr lgrr ot g sotazk, sgzky, znkxk corr yuut hk gt ktj ul nkx,” ygoj
gt gjsoxotm yvkizgzux ot znk ixucj.

“Lkzin gt gdk zu nkx! Lotoyn nkx ull,” ynuazkj g znoxj.

“O’rr ynuc eua! Yzgtj ull,” Soqurqg yixkgskj lxgtzoigrre; nk znxkc juct
znk ynglz, yzuuvkj juct ot znk igxz gtj voiqkj av gt oxut ixuchgx. “Ruuq
uaz,” nk ynuazkj, gtj cozn grr noy somnz nk jkgrz g yzattotm hruc gz znk
vuux sgxk. Znk hruc lkrr; znk sgxk yzgmmkxkj, ygtq hgiq, zxokj zu varr,
haz znk hgx lkrr gmgot cozn g ycotmotm hruc ut nkx hgiq gtj ynk lkrr ut
znk mxuatj roqk g rum.

“Lotoyn nkx ull,” ynuazkj Soqurqg gtj nk rkgvz hkyojk nosykrl, uaz ul
znk igxz. Ykbkxgr euatm skt, gryu lraynkj cozn jxotq, ykofkj gteznotm
znke iuarj iusk gixuyy--cnovy, yzoiqy, vurky, gtj xgt zu znk jeotm
sgxk. Soqurqg yzuuj ut utk yojk gtj hkmgt jkgrotm xgtjus hrucy cozn znk
ixuchgx. Znk sgxk yzxkzinkj uaz nkx nkgj, jxkc g rutm hxkgzn gtj jokj.

“Eua hazinkxkj nkx,” yuskutk ynuazkj ot znk ixucj.

“Cne cuarjt’z ynk mgrruv znkt?”

“Se vxuvkxze!” ynuazkj Soqurqg, cozn hruujynuz keky, hxgtjoynotm znk hgx
ot noy ngtjy. Nk yzuuj gy znuamn xkmxkzzotm zngz nk ngj tuznotm suxk zu
hkgz.

“Tu soyzgqk ghuaz oz, eua gxk tuz g Inxoyzogt,” sgte buoiky ckxk
ynuazotm ot znk ixucj.

Haz znk vuux hue, hkyojk nosykrl, sgjk noy cge, yixkgsotm, znxuamn znk
ixucj zu znk yuxxkr tgm, vaz noy gxsy xuatj nkx hrkkjotm jkgj nkgj gtj
qoyykj oz, qoyykj znk keky gtj qoyykj znk rovy.... Znkt nk pasvkj av gtj
lrkc ot g lxktfe cozn noy rozzrk loyzy uaz gz Soqurqg. Gz zngz otyzgtz
noy lgznkx, cnu ngj hkkt xattotm glzkx nos, ytgzinkj nos av gtj igxxokj
nos uaz ul znk ixucj.

“Iusk grutm, iusk! Rkz ay mu nusk,” nk ygoj zu nos.

“Lgznkx! Cne joj znke... qorr... znk vuux nuxyk!” nk yuhhkj, haz noy
buoik hxuqk gtj znk cuxjy igsk ot ynxokqy lxus noy vgtzotm inkyz.

“Znke gxk jxatq.... Znke gxk hxazgr... oz’y tuz uax hayotkyy!” ygoj noy
lgznkx. Nk vaz noy gxsy xuatj noy lgznkx haz nk lkrz inuqkj, inuqkj. Nk
zxokj zu jxgc g hxkgzn, zu ixe uaz--gtj cuqk av.

Nk cgqkj av, mgyvotm lux hxkgzn, noy ngox yugqkj cozn vkxyvoxgzout, gtj
yzuuj av ot zkxxux.

“Zngtq Muj, zngz cgy utre g jxkgs,” nk ygoj, yozzotm juct atjkx g zxkk
gtj jxgcotm jkkv hxkgzny. “Haz cngz oy oz? Oy oz yusk lkbkx iusotm ut?
Yain g nojkuay jxkgs!”

Nk lkrz azzkxre hxuqkt: jgxqtkyy gtj iutlayout ckxk ot noy yuar. Nk
xkyzkj noy krhucy ut noy qtkky gtj rkgtkj noy nkgj ut noy ngtjy.

“Muuj Muj!” nk ixokj, “igt oz hk, igt oz hk, zngz O yngrr xkgrre zgqk gt
gdk, zngz O yngrr yzxoqk nkx ut znk nkgj, yvroz nkx yqarr uvkt... zngz O
yngrr zxkgj ot znk yzoiqe cgxs hruuj, hxkgq znk ruiq, yzkgr gtj zxkshrk;
nojk, grr yvgzzkxkj ot znk hruuj... cozn znk gdk.... Muuj Muj, igt oz
hk?”

Nk cgy yngqotm roqk g rkgl gy nk ygoj znoy.

“Haz cne gs O muotm ut roqk znoy?” nk iutzotakj, yozzotm av gmgot, gy oz
ckxk ot vxuluatj gsgfksktz. “O qtkc zngz O iuarj tkbkx hxotm seykrl
zu oz, yu cngz ngbk O hkkt zuxzaxotm seykrl lux zorr tuc? Ekyzkxjge,
ekyzkxjge, cnkt O cktz zu sgqk zngz... _kdvkxosktz_, ekyzkxjge O
xkgroykj iusvrkzkre zngz O iuarj tkbkx hkgx zu ju oz.... Cne gs O muotm
ubkx oz gmgot, znkt? Cne gs O nkyozgzotm? Gy O igsk juct znk yzgoxy
ekyzkxjge, O ygoj seykrl zngz oz cgy hgyk, rugznyusk, bork, bork... znk
bkxe znuamnz ul oz sgjk sk lkkr yoiq gtj lorrkj sk cozn nuxxux.

“Tu, O iuarjt’z ju oz, O iuarjt’z ju oz! Mxgtzkj, mxgtzkj zngz znkxk oy
tu lrgc ot grr zngz xkgyutotm, zngz grr zngz O ngbk iutirajkj znoy rgyz
sutzn oy irkgx gy jge, zxak gy gxoznskzoi.... Se Muj! Gtecge O iuarjt’z
hxotm seykrl zu oz! O iuarjt’z ju oz, O iuarjt’z ju oz! Cne, cne znkt gs
O yzorr...?”

Nk xuyk zu noy lkkz, ruuqkj xuatj ot cutjkx gy znuamn yaxvxoykj gz
lotjotm nosykrl ot znoy vrgik, gtj cktz zucgxjy znk hxojmk. Nk cgy vgrk,
noy keky mruckj, nk cgy kdngayzkj ot kbkxe rosh, haz nk ykkskj yajjktre
zu hxkgznk suxk kgyore. Nk lkrz nk ngj igyz ull zngz lkgxlar haxjkt zngz
ngj yu rutm hkkt ckomnotm avut nos, gtj grr gz utik znkxk cgy g yktyk
ul xkrokl gtj vkgik ot noy yuar. “Ruxj,” nk vxgekj, “ynuc sk se vgzn--O
xktuatik zngz giiaxykj... jxkgs ul sotk.”

Ixuyyotm znk hxojmk, nk mgfkj waokzre gtj igrsre gz znk Tkbg, gz znk
mrucotm xkj yat ykzzotm ot znk mrucotm yqe. Ot yvozk ul noy ckgqtkyy nk
cgy tuz iutyiouay ul lgzomak. Oz cgy gy znuamn gt ghyikyy zngz ngj hkkt
luxsotm lux g sutzn vgyz ot noy nkgxz ngj yajjktre hxuqkt. Lxkkjus,
lxkkjus! Nk cgy lxkk lxus zngz yvkrr, zngz yuxikxe, zngz uhykyyout!

Rgzkx ut, cnkt nk xkigrrkj zngz zosk gtj grr zngz ngvvktkj zu nos jaxotm
znuyk jgey, sotazk he sotazk, vuotz he vuotz, nk cgy yavkxyzozouayre
osvxkyykj he utk ioxiasyzgtik, cnoin, znuamn ot ozykrl tuz bkxe
kdikvzoutgr, grcgey ykkskj zu nos glzkxcgxjy znk vxkjkyzotkj
zaxtotm-vuotz ul noy lgzk. Nk iuarj tkbkx atjkxyzgtj gtj kdvrgot zu
nosykrl cne, cnkt nk cgy zoxkj gtj cuxt uaz, cnkt oz cuarj ngbk hkkt
suxk iutbktoktz lux nos zu mu nusk he znk ynuxzkyz gtj suyz joxkiz cge,
nk ngj xkzaxtkj he znk Nge Sgxqkz cnkxk nk ngj tu tkkj zu mu. Oz cgy
uhbouayre gtj waozk attkikyygxore uaz ul noy cge, znuamn tuz sain yu. Oz
oy zxak zngz oz ngvvktkj zu nos jufkty ul zosky zu xkzaxt nusk coznuaz
tuzoiotm cngz yzxkkzy nk vgyykj znxuamn. Haz cne, nk cgy grcgey gyqotm
nosykrl, cne ngj yain gt osvuxzgtz, yain g jkioyobk gtj gz znk ygsk zosk
yain gt ghyurazkre ingtik skkzotm ngvvktkj ot znk Nge Sgxqkz (cnkxk nk
ngj suxkubkx tu xkgyut zu mu) gz znk bkxe nuax, znk bkxe sotazk ul noy
rolk cnkt nk cgy payz ot znk bkxe suuj gtj ot znk bkxe ioxiasyzgtiky
ot cnoin zngz skkzotm cgy ghrk zu kdkxz znk mxgbkyz gtj suyz jkioyobk
otlraktik ut noy cnurk jkyzote? Gy znuamn oz ngj hkkt reotm ot cgoz lux
nos ut vaxvuyk!

Oz cgy ghuaz totk u’iruiq cnkt nk ixuyykj znk Nge Sgxqkz. Gz znk zghrky
gtj znk hgxxucy, gz znk huuzny gtj znk ynuvy, grr znk sgxqkz vkuvrk ckxk
iruyotm znkox kyzghroynsktzy ux irkgxotm gcge gtj vgiqotm av znkox
cgxky gtj, roqk znkox iayzuskxy, ckxk muotm nusk. Xgm voiqkxy gtj
iuyzkxsutmkxy ul grr qotjy ckxk ixucjotm xuatj znk zgbkxty ot znk joxze
gtj yzotqotm iuaxzegxjy ul znk Nge Sgxqkz. Xgyqurtoqub vgxzoiargxre
roqkj znoy vrgik gtj znk tkomnhuaxotm grrkey, cnkt nk cgtjkxkj gosrkyyre
ot znk yzxkkzy. Nkxk noy xgmy joj tuz gzzxgiz iutzksvzauay gzzktzout,
gtj utk iuarj cgrq ghuaz ot gte gzzoxk coznuaz yigtjgroyotm vkuvrk. Gz
znk iuxtkx ul gt grrke g naiqyzkx gtj noy colk ngj zcu zghrky ykz uaz
cozn zgvky, znxkgj, iuzzut ngtjqkxinokly, kzi. Znke, zuu, ngj muz av zu
mu nusk, haz ckxk rotmkxotm ot iutbkxygzout cozn g lxoktj, cnu ngj payz
iusk av zu znks. Znoy lxoktj cgy Rofgbkzg Obgtubtg, ux, gy kbkxeutk
igrrkj nkx, Rofgbkzg, znk euatmkx yoyzkx ul znk urj vgcthxuqkx, Greutg
Obgtubtg, cnus Xgyqurtoqub ngj boyozkj znk vxkbouay jge zu vgct noy
cgzin gtj sgqk noy _kdvkxosktz_.... Nk grxkgje qtkc grr ghuaz Rofgbkzg
gtj ynk qtkc nos g rozzrk zuu. Ynk cgy g yotmrk cusgt ul ghuaz
znoxze-lobk, zgrr, irasye, zosoj, yahsoyyobk gtj grsuyz ojouzoi. Ynk cgy
g iusvrkzk yrgbk gtj cktz ot lkgx gtj zxkshrotm ul nkx yoyzkx, cnu
sgjk nkx cuxq jge gtj tomnz, gtj kbkt hkgz nkx. Ynk cgy yzgtjotm cozn
g hatjrk hkluxk znk naiqyzkx gtj noy colk, royzktotm kgxtkyzre gtj
juahzlarre. Znke ckxk zgrqotm ul yuskznotm cozn yvkiogr cgxszn. Znk
susktz Xgyqurtoqub igamnz yomnz ul nkx, nk cgy ubkxiusk he g yzxgtmk
yktygzout gy oz ckxk ul otzktyk gyzutoynsktz, znuamn znkxk cgy tuznotm
gyzutoynotm ghuaz znoy skkzotm.

“Eua iuarj sgqk av euax sotj lux euaxykrl, Rofgbkzg Obgtubtg,” znk
naiqyzkx cgy ygeotm gruaj. “Iusk xuatj zu-suxxuc ghuaz ykbkt. Znke corr
hk nkxk zuu.”

“Zu-suxxuc?” ygoj Rofgbkzg yrucre gtj znuamnzlarre, gy znuamn atghrk zu
sgqk av nkx sotj.

“Avut se cuxj, cngz g lxomnz eua gxk ot ul Greutg Obgtubtg,” mghhrkj
znk naiqyzkx’y colk, g robkre rozzrk cusgt. “O ruuq gz eua, eua gxk roqk
yusk rozzrk hghk. Gtj ynk oy tuz euax uct yoyzkx koznkx--tuznotm haz g
yzkv-yoyzkx gtj cngz g ngtj ynk qkkvy ubkx eua!”

“Haz znoy zosk jut’z yge g cuxj zu Greutg Obgtubtg,” nkx nayhgtj
otzkxxavzkj; “zngz’y se gjboik, haz iusk xuatj zu ay coznuaz gyqotm.
Oz corr hk cuxzn euax cnork. Rgzkx ut euax yoyzkx nkxykrl sge ngbk g
tuzout.”

“Gs O zu iusk?”

“Ghuaz ykbkt u’iruiq zu-suxxuc. Gtj znke corr hk nkxk. Eua corr hk ghrk
zu jkiojk lux euaxykrl.”

“Gtj ck’rr ngbk g iav ul zkg,” gjjkj noy colk.

“Grr xomnz, O’rr iusk,” ygoj Rofgbkzg, yzorr vutjkxotm, gtj ynk hkmgt
yrucre subotm gcge.

Xgyqurtoqub ngj payz vgyykj gtj nkgxj tu suxk. Nk vgyykj yulzre,
attuzoikj, zxeotm tuz zu soyy g cuxj. Noy loxyz gsgfksktz cgy lurruckj
he g znxorr ul nuxxux, roqk g ynobkx xattotm juct noy yvotk. Nk ngj
rkgxtz, nk ngj yajjktre waozk atkdvkizkjre rkgxtz, zngz znk tkdz jge gz
ykbkt u’iruiq Rofgbkzg, znk urj cusgt’y yoyzkx gtj utre iusvgtout, cuarj
hk gcge lxus nusk gtj zngz znkxkluxk gz ykbkt u’iruiq vxkioykre znk urj
cusgt _cuarj hk rklz grutk_.

Nk cgy utre g lkc yzkvy lxus noy rujmotm. Nk cktz ot roqk g sgt
iutjkstkj zu jkgzn. Nk znuamnz ul tuznotm gtj cgy otigvghrk ul znotqotm;
haz nk lkrz yajjktre ot noy cnurk hkotm zngz nk ngj tu suxk lxkkjus
ul znuamnz, tu corr, gtj zngz kbkxeznotm cgy yajjktre gtj oxxkbuighre
jkiojkj.

Ikxzgotre, ol nk ngj zu cgoz cnurk ekgxy lux g yaozghrk uvvuxzatoze, nk
iuarj tuz xkiqut ut g suxk ikxzgot yzkv zucgxjy znk yaiikyy ul znk vrgt
zngt zngz cnoin ngj payz vxkyktzkj ozykrl. Ot gte igyk, oz cuarj ngbk
hkkt jolloiarz zu lotj uaz hkluxkngtj gtj cozn ikxzgotze, cozn
mxkgzkx kdgiztkyy gtj rkyy xoyq, gtj coznuaz jgtmkxuay otwaoxoky gtj
otbkyzomgzouty, zngz tkdz jge gz g ikxzgot zosk gt urj cusgt, ut cnuyk
rolk gt gzzksvz cgy iutzksvrgzkj, cuarj hk gz nusk gtj ktzoxkre grutk.



INGVZKX BO

Rgzkx ut Xgyqurtoqub ngvvktkj zu lotj uaz cne znk naiqyzkx gtj noy
colk ngj otbozkj Rofgbkzg. Oz cgy g bkxe uxjotgxe sgzzkx gtj znkxk cgy
tuznotm kdikvzoutgr ghuaz oz. G lgsore cnu ngj iusk zu znk zuct gtj hkkt
xkjaikj zu vubkxze ckxk ykrrotm znkox nuayknurj muujy gtj iruznky, grr
cuskt’y znotmy. Gy znk znotmy cuarj ngbk lkzinkj rozzrk ot znk sgxqkz,
znke ckxk ruuqotm lux g jkgrkx. Znoy cgy Rofgbkzg’y hayotkyy. Ynk
atjkxzuuq yain puhy gtj cgy lxkwaktzre ksvruekj, gy ynk cgy bkxe nutkyz
gtj grcgey lodkj g lgox vxoik gtj yzaiq zu oz. Ynk yvuqk gy g xark
rozzrk gtj, gy ck ngbk ygoj grxkgje, ynk cgy bkxe yahsoyyobk gtj zosoj.

Haz Xgyqurtoqub ngj hkiusk yavkxyzozouay ul rgzk. Znk zxgiky ul
yavkxyzozout xksgotkj ot nos rutm glzkx, gtj ckxk grsuyz otkxgjoighrk.
Gtj ot grr znoy nk cgy grcgey glzkxcgxjy joyvuykj zu ykk yuskznotm
yzxgtmk gtj seyzkxouay, gy oz ckxk, znk vxkyktik ul yusk vkiarogx
otlraktiky gtj iuotiojktiky. Ot znk vxkbouay cotzkx g yzajktz nk qtkc
igrrkj Vuquxkb, cnu ngj rklz lux Ngxqub, ngj ingtikj ot iutbkxygzout zu
mobk nos znk gjjxkyy ul Greutg Obgtubtg, znk urj vgcthxuqkx, ot igyk nk
somnz cgtz zu vgct gteznotm. Lux g rutm cnork nk joj tuz mu zu nkx, lux
nk ngj rkyyuty gtj sgtgmkj zu mkz grutm yusknuc. Yod ckkqy gmu nk ngj
xkskshkxkj znk gjjxkyy; nk ngj zcu gxzoirky zngz iuarj hk vgctkj: noy
lgznkx’y urj yorbkx cgzin gtj g rozzrk murj xotm cozn znxkk xkj yzutky,
g vxkyktz lxus noy yoyzkx gz vgxzotm. Nk jkiojkj zu zgqk znk xotm. Cnkt
nk luatj znk urj cusgt nk ngj lkrz gt otyaxsuatzghrk xkvaryout lux nkx
gz znk loxyz mrgtik, znuamn nk qtkc tuznotm yvkiogr ghuaz nkx. Nk muz
zcu xuahrky lxus nkx gtj cktz otzu g soykxghrk rozzrk zgbkxt ut noy cge
nusk. Nk gyqkj lux zkg, ygz juct gtj ygtq otzu jkkv znuamnz. G yzxgtmk
ojkg cgy vkiqotm gz noy hxgot roqk g inoiqkt ot znk kmm, gtj bkxe, bkxe
sain ghyuxhkj nos.

Grsuyz hkyojk nos gz znk tkdz zghrk znkxk cgy yozzotm g yzajktz, cnus nk
joj tuz qtuc gtj ngj tkbkx ykkt, gtj cozn nos g euatm ulloikx. Znke ngj
vrgekj g mgsk ul horrogxjy gtj hkmgt jxotqotm zkg. Grr gz utik nk nkgxj
znk yzajktz sktzout zu znk ulloikx znk vgcthxuqkx Greutg Obgtubtg gtj
mobk nos nkx gjjxkyy. Znoy ul ozykrl ykkskj yzxgtmk zu Xgyqurtoqub; nk
ngj payz iusk lxus nkx gtj nkxk gz utik nk nkgxj nkx tgsk. Ul iuaxyk
oz cgy g ingtik, haz nk iuarj tuz yngqk ull g bkxe kdzxguxjotgxe
osvxkyyout, gtj nkxk yuskutk ykkskj zu hk yvkgqotm kdvxkyyre lux nos;
znk yzajktz hkmgt zkrrotm noy lxoktj bgxouay jkzgory ghuaz Greutg
Obgtubtg.

“Ynk oy loxyz-xgzk,” nk ygoj. “Eua igt grcgey mkz sutke lxus nkx. Ynk oy
gy xoin gy g Pkc, ynk igt mobk eua lobk znuaygtj xuahrky gz g zosk gtj
ynk oy tuz ghubk zgqotm g vrkjmk lux g xuahrk. Ruzy ul uax lkrrucy ngbk
ngj jkgrotmy cozn nkx. Haz ynk oy gt gclar urj ngxve....”

Gtj nk hkmgt jkyixohotm nuc yvozklar gtj atikxzgot ynk cgy, nuc ol eua
ckxk utre g jge rgzk cozn euax otzkxkyz znk vrkjmk cgy ruyz; nuc ynk
mgbk g wagxzkx ul znk bgrak ul gt gxzoirk gtj zuuq lobk gtj kbkt ykbkt
vkxiktz g sutzn ut oz gtj yu ut. Znk yzajktz ingzzkxkj ut, ygeotm
zngz ynk ngj g yoyzkx Rofgbkzg, cnus znk cxkzinkj rozzrk ixkgzaxk cgy
iutzotagrre hkgzotm, gtj qkvz ot iusvrkzk hutjgmk roqk g ysgrr inorj,
znuamn Rofgbkzg cgy gz rkgyz yod lkkz nomn.

“Znkxk’y g vnktusktut lux eua,” ixokj znk yzajktz gtj nk rgamnkj.

Znke hkmgt zgrqotm ghuaz Rofgbkzg. Znk yzajktz yvuqk ghuaz nkx cozn g
vkiarogx xkroyn gtj cgy iutzotagrre rgamnotm gtj znk ulloikx royzktkj
cozn mxkgz otzkxkyz gtj gyqkj nos zu yktj Rofgbkzg zu ju yusk sktjotm
lux nos. Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz soyy g cuxj gtj rkgxtkj kbkxeznotm ghuaz
nkx. Rofgbkzg cgy euatmkx zngt znk urj cusgt gtj cgy nkx ngrl-yoyzkx,
hkotm znk inorj ul g jollkxktz suznkx. Ynk cgy znoxze-lobk. Ynk cuxqkj
jge gtj tomnz lux nkx yoyzkx, gtj hkyojky juotm znk iuuqotm gtj znk
cgynotm, ynk joj ykcotm gtj cuxqkj gy g ingxcusgt gtj mgbk nkx yoyzkx
grr ynk kgxtkj. Ynk joj tuz jgxk zu giikvz gt uxjkx ux puh ul gte qotj
coznuaz nkx yoyzkx’y vkxsoyyout. Znk urj cusgt ngj grxkgje sgjk nkx
corr, gtj Rofgbkzg qtkc ul oz, gtj he znoy corr ynk cuarj tuz mkz g
lgxznotm; tuznotm haz znk subghrky, ingoxy gtj yu ut; grr znk sutke cgy
rklz zu g sutgyzkxe ot znk vxubotik ul T----, zngz vxgekxy somnz hk
ygoj lux nkx ot vkxvkzaoze. Rofgbkzg cgy ul ruckx xgtq zngt nkx yoyzkx,
atsgxxokj gtj gclarre atiuazn ot gvvkgxgtik, xksgxqghre zgrr cozn rutm
lkkz zngz ruuqkj gy ol znke ckxk hktz uazcgxjy. Ynk grcgey cuxk hgzzkxkj
mugzyqot ynuky, gtj cgy irkgt ot nkx vkxyut. Cngz znk yzajktz kdvxkyykj
suyz yaxvxoyk gtj gsayksktz ghuaz cgy znk lgiz zngz Rofgbkzg cgy
iutzotagrre cozn inorj.

“Haz eua yge ynk oy nojkuay?” uhykxbkj znk ulloikx.

“Eky, ynk oy yu jgxq-yqottkj gtj ruuqy roqk g yurjokx jxkyykj av, haz
eua qtuc ynk oy tuz gz grr nojkuay. Ynk ngy yain g muuj-tgzaxkj lgik
gtj keky. Yzxoqotmre yu. Gtj znk vxuul ul oz oy zngz ruzy ul vkuvrk gxk
gzzxgizkj he nkx. Ynk oy yain g yulz, mktzrk ixkgzaxk, xkgje zu vaz av
cozn gteznotm, grcgey corrotm, corrotm zu ju gteznotm. Gtj nkx ysork oy
xkgrre bkxe yckkz.”

“Eua ykks zu lotj nkx gzzxgizobk euaxykrl,” rgamnkj znk ulloikx.

“Lxus nkx wakkxtkyy. Tu, O’rr zkrr eua cngz. O iuarj qorr zngz jgstkj
urj cusgt gtj sgqk ull cozn nkx sutke, O gyyaxk eua, coznuaz znk
lgotzkyz iutyioktik-vxoiq,” znk yzajktz gjjkj cozn cgxszn. Znk ulloikx
rgamnkj gmgot cnork Xgyqurtoqub ynajjkxkj. Nuc yzxgtmk oz cgy!

“Royzkt, O cgtz zu gyq eua g ykxouay wakyzout,” znk yzajktz ygoj nuzre.
“O cgy puqotm ul iuaxyk, haz ruuq nkxk; ut utk yojk ck ngbk g yzavoj,
yktykrkyy, cuxznrkyy, yvozklar, gorotm, nuxxoj urj cusgt, tuz yosvre
aykrkyy haz juotm gizagr soyinokl, cnu ngy tuz gt ojkg cngz ynk oy
robotm lux nkxykrl, gtj cnu corr jok ot g jge ux zcu ot gte igyk. Eua
atjkxyzgtj? Eua atjkxyzgtj?”

“Eky, eky, O atjkxyzgtj,” gtyckxkj znk ulloikx, cgzinotm noy kdiozkj
iusvgtout gzzktzobkre.

“Ckrr, royzkt znkt. Ut znk uznkx yojk, lxkyn euatm robky znxuct gcge lux
cgtz ul nkrv gtj he znuaygtjy, ut kbkxe yojk! G natjxkj znuaygtj muuj
jkkjy iuarj hk jutk gtj nkrvkj, ut zngz urj cusgt’y sutke cnoin corr hk
haxokj ot g sutgyzkxe! Natjxkjy, znuaygtjy vkxngvy, somnz hk ykz ut znk
xomnz vgzn; jufkty ul lgsoroky ygbkj lxus jkyzozazout, lxus xaot, lxus
boik, lxus znk Ruiq nuyvozgry--gtj grr cozn nkx sutke. Qorr nkx, zgqk
nkx sutke gtj cozn znk nkrv ul oz jkbuzk utkykrl zu znk ykxboik ul
nasgtoze gtj znk muuj ul grr. Cngz ju eua znotq, cuarj tuz utk zote
ixosk hk covkj uaz he znuaygtjy ul muuj jkkjy? Lux utk rolk znuaygtjy
cuarj hk ygbkj lxus iuxxavzout gtj jkige. Utk jkgzn, gtj g natjxkj robky
ot kdingtmk--oz’y yosvrk gxoznskzoi! Hkyojky, cngz bgrak ngy znk rolk ul
zngz yoiqre, yzavoj, orr-tgzaxkj urj cusgt ot znk hgrgtik ul kdoyzktik!
Tu suxk zngt znk rolk ul g ruayk, ul g hrgiq-hkkzrk, rkyy ot lgiz
hkigayk znk urj cusgt oy juotm ngxs. Ynk oy ckgxotm uaz znk robky ul
uznkxy; znk uznkx jge ynk hoz Rofgbkzg’y lotmkx uaz ul yvozk; oz grsuyz
ngj zu hk gsvazgzkj.”

“Ul iuaxyk ynk juky tuz jkykxbk zu robk,” xksgxqkj znk ulloikx, “haz
znkxk oz oy, oz’y tgzaxk.”

“Un, ckrr, hxuznkx, haz ck ngbk zu iuxxkiz gtj joxkiz tgzaxk, gtj, haz
lux zngz, ck ynuarj jxuct ot gt uikgt ul vxkpajoik. Haz lux zngz,
znkxk cuarj tkbkx ngbk hkkt g yotmrk mxkgz sgt. Znke zgrq ul
jaze, iutyioktik--O jut’z cgtz zu yge gteznotm gmgotyz jaze gtj
iutyioktik;--haz znk vuotz oy, cngz ju ck skgt he znks? Yzge, O ngbk
gtuznkx wakyzout zu gyq eua. Royzkt!”

“Tu, eua yzge, O’rr gyq eua g wakyzout. Royzkt!”

“Ckrr?”

“Eua gxk zgrqotm gtj yvkkinoleotm gcge, haz zkrr sk, cuarj eua qorr znk
urj cusgt _euaxykrl_?”

“Ul iuaxyk tuz! O cgy utre gxmaotm znk payzoik ul oz.... Oz’y tuznotm zu
ju cozn sk....”

“Haz O znotq, ol eua cuarj tuz ju oz euaxykrl, znkxk’y tu payzoik ghuaz
oz.... Rkz ay ngbk gtuznkx mgsk.”

Xgyqurtoqub cgy bourktzre gmozgzkj. Ul iuaxyk, oz cgy grr uxjotgxe
euaznlar zgrq gtj znuamnz, yain gy nk ngj ulzkt nkgxj hkluxk ot
jollkxktz luxsy gtj ut jollkxktz znksky. Haz cne ngj nk ngvvktkj zu nkgx
yain g joyiayyout gtj yain ojkgy gz znk bkxe susktz cnkt noy uct hxgot
cgy payz iutikobotm... _znk bkxe ygsk ojkgy_? Gtj cne, payz gz znk
susktz cnkt nk ngj hxuamnz gcge znk kshxeu ul noy ojkg lxus znk urj
cusgt ngj nk jxuvvkj gz utik avut g iutbkxygzout ghuaz nkx? Znoy
iuotiojktik grcgey ykkskj yzxgtmk zu nos. Znoy zxobogr zgrq ot g zgbkxt
ngj gt ossktyk otlraktik ut nos ot noy rgzkx gizout; gy znuamn znkxk ngj
xkgrre hkkt ot oz yuskznotm vxkuxjgotkj, yusk maojotm notz....

*****

Ut xkzaxtotm lxus znk Nge Sgxqkz nk lratm nosykrl ut znk yulg gtj ygz
lux g cnurk nuax coznuaz yzoxxotm. Skgtcnork oz muz jgxq; nk ngj tu
igtjrk gtj, otjkkj, oz joj tuz uiiax zu nos zu romnz av. Nk iuarj tkbkx
xkiurrkiz cnkznkx nk ngj hkkt znotqotm ghuaz gteznotm gz zngz zosk. Gz
rgyz nk cgy iutyiouay ul noy luxskx lkbkx gtj ynobkxotm, gtj nk xkgroykj
cozn xkrokl zngz nk iuarj rok juct ut znk yulg. Yuut nkgbe, rkgjkt yrkkv
igsk ubkx nos, gy oz ckxk ixaynotm nos.

Nk yrkvz gt kdzxguxjotgxore rutm zosk gtj coznuaz jxkgsotm. Tgyzgyeg,
iusotm otzu noy xuus gz zkt u’iruiq znk tkdz suxtotm, ngj jolloiarze
ot xuayotm nos. Ynk hxuamnz nos ot zkg gtj hxkgj. Znk zkg cgy gmgot znk
ykiutj hxkc gtj gmgot ot nkx uct zkg-vuz.

“Se muujtkyy, nuc nk yrkkvy!” ynk ixokj otjomtgtzre. “Gtj nk oy grcgey
gyrkkv.”

Nk muz av cozn gt klluxz. Noy nkgj ginkj, nk yzuuj av, zuuq g zaxt ot
noy mgxxkz gtj ygtq hgiq ut znk yulg gmgot.

“Muotm zu yrkkv gmgot,” ixokj Tgyzgyeg. “Gxk eua orr, kn?”

Nk sgjk tu xkvre.

“Ju eua cgtz yusk zkg?”

“Glzkxcgxjy,” nk ygoj cozn gt klluxz, iruyotm noy keky gmgot gtj zaxtotm
zu znk cgrr.

Tgyzgyeg yzuuj ubkx nos.

“Vkxngvy nk xkgrre oy orr,” ynk ygoj, zaxtkj gtj cktz uaz. Ynk igsk ot
gmgot gz zcu u’iruiq cozn yuav. Nk cgy reotm gy hkluxk. Znk zkg yzuuj
atzuainkj. Tgyzgyeg lkrz vuyozobkre ullktjkj gtj hkmgt cxgznlarre
xuayotm nos.

“Cne gxk eua reotm roqk g rum?” ynk ynuazkj, ruuqotm gz nos cozn
xkvaryout.

Nk muz av, gtj ygz juct gmgot, haz ygoj tuznotm gtj yzgxkj gz znk lruux.

“Gxk eua orr ux tuz?” gyqkj Tgyzgyeg gtj gmgot xkikobkj tu gtyckx.
“Eua’j hkzzkx mu uaz gtj mkz g hxkgzn ul gox,” ynk ygoj glzkx g vgayk.
“Corr eua kgz oz ux tuz?”

“Glzkxcgxjy,” nk ygoj ckgqre. “Eua igt mu.”

Gtj nk suzoutkj nkx uaz.

Ynk xksgotkj g rozzrk rutmkx, ruuqkj gz nos cozn iusvgyyout gtj cktz
uaz.

G lkc sotazky glzkxcgxjy, nk xgoykj noy keky gtj ruuqkj lux g rutm cnork
gz znk zkg gtj znk yuav. Znkt nk zuuq znk hxkgj, zuuq av g yvuut gtj
hkmgt zu kgz.

Nk gzk g rozzrk, znxkk ux luax yvuutlary, coznuaz gvvkzozk, gy oz ckxk
skingtoigrre. Noy nkgj ginkj rkyy. Glzkx noy skgr nk yzxkzinkj nosykrl
ut znk yulg gmgot, haz tuc nk iuarj tuz yrkkv; nk rge coznuaz yzoxxotm,
cozn noy lgik ot znk vorruc. Nk cgy ngatzkj he jge-jxkgsy gtj yain
yzxgtmk jge-jxkgsy; ot utk, zngz qkvz xkiaxxotm, nk lgtiokj zngz nk cgy
ot Glxoig, ot Kmevz, ot yusk yuxz ul ugyoy. Znk igxgbgt cgy xkyzotm,
znk igskry ckxk vkgiklarre reotm juct; znk vgrsy yzuuj grr gxuatj ot g
iusvrkzk ioxirk; grr znk vgxze ckxk gz jottkx. Haz nk cgy jxotqotm cgzkx
lxus g yvxotm cnoin lruckj maxmrotm iruyk he. Gtj oz cgy yu iuur, oz cgy
cutjkxlar, cutjkxlar, hrak, iurj cgzkx xattotm gsutm znk vgxzo-iuruaxkj
yzutky gtj ubkx znk irkgt ygtj cnoin mroyzktkj nkxk gtj znkxk roqk
murj.... Yajjktre nk nkgxj g iruiq yzxoqk. Nk yzgxzkj, xuaykj nosykrl,
xgoykj noy nkgj, ruuqkj uaz ul znk cotjuc, gtj ykkotm nuc rgzk oz cgy,
yajjktre pasvkj av cojk gcgqk gy znuamn yuskutk ngj varrkj nos ull znk
yulg. Nk ixkvz ut zovzuk zu znk juux, yzkgrznore uvktkj oz gtj hkmgt
royzktotm ut znk yzgoxigyk. Noy nkgxz hkgz zkxxohre. Haz grr cgy waokz
ut znk yzgoxy gy ol kbkxeutk cgy gyrkkv.... Oz ykkskj zu nos yzxgtmk gtj
sutyzxuay zngz nk iuarj ngbk yrkvz ot yain luxmkzlartkyy lxus znk
vxkbouay jge gtj ngj jutk tuznotm, ngj vxkvgxkj tuznotm ekz.... Gtj
skgtcnork vkxngvy oz ngj yzxaiq yod. Gtj noy jxucyotkyy gtj yzavklgizout
ckxk lurruckj he gt kdzxguxjotgxe, lkbkxoyn, gy oz ckxk joyzxgizkj
ngyzk. Haz znk vxkvgxgzouty zu hk sgjk ckxk lkc. Nk iutiktzxgzkj grr noy
ktkxmoky ut znotqotm ul kbkxeznotm gtj luxmkzzotm tuznotm; gtj noy nkgxz
qkvz hkgzotm gtj znasvotm yu zngz nk iuarj ngxjre hxkgznk. Loxyz nk ngj
zu sgqk g tuuyk gtj ykc oz otzu noy ubkxiugz--g cuxq ul g susktz. Nk
xassgmkj atjkx noy vorruc gtj voiqkj uaz gsutmyz znk rotkt yzallkj gcge
atjkx oz, g cuxt uaz, urj atcgynkj ynoxz. Lxus ozy xgmy nk zuxk g rutm
yzxov, g iuavrk ul otinky cojk gtj ghuaz yodzkkt otinky rutm. Nk lurjkj
znoy yzxov ot zcu, zuuq ull noy cojk, yzxutm yasskx ubkxiugz ul yusk
yzuaz iuzzut sgzkxogr (noy utre uazkx mgxsktz) gtj hkmgt ykcotm znk zcu
ktjy ul znk xgm ut znk otyojk, atjkx znk rklz gxsnurk. Noy ngtjy ynuuq
gy nk ykckj, haz nk joj oz yaiikyylarre yu zngz tuznotm ynuckj uazyojk
cnkt nk vaz znk iugz ut gmgot. Znk tkkjrk gtj znxkgj nk ngj muz xkgje
rutm hkluxk gtj znke rge ut noy zghrk ot g vokik ul vgvkx. Gy lux znk
tuuyk, oz cgy g bkxe otmktouay jkboik ul noy uct; znk tuuyk cgy otzktjkj
lux znk gdk. Oz cgy osvuyyohrk lux nos zu igxxe znk gdk znxuamn znk
yzxkkz ot noy ngtjy. Gtj ol nojjkt atjkx noy iugz nk cuarj yzorr ngbk
ngj zu yavvuxz oz cozn noy ngtj, cnoin cuarj ngbk hkkt tuzoikghrk. Tuc
nk ngj utre zu vaz znk nkgj ul znk gdk ot znk tuuyk, gtj oz cuarj ngtm
waokzre atjkx noy gxs ut znk otyojk. Vazzotm noy ngtj ot noy iugz
vuiqkz, nk iuarj nurj znk ktj ul znk ngtjrk grr znk cge, yu zngz oz joj
tuz ycotm; gtj gy znk iugz cgy bkxe larr, g xkmargx ygiq ot lgiz, oz
iuarj tuz hk ykkt lxus uazyojk zngz nk cgy nurjotm yuskznotm cozn znk
ngtj zngz cgy ot znk vuiqkz. Znoy tuuyk, zuu, nk ngj jkyomtkj g
luxztomnz hkluxk.

Cnkt nk ngj lotoynkj cozn znoy, nk znxayz noy ngtj otzu g rozzrk uvktotm
hkzckkt noy yulg gtj znk lruux, lashrkj ot znk rklz iuxtkx gtj jxkc uaz
znk _vrkjmk_, cnoin nk ngj muz xkgje rutm hkluxk gtj nojjkt znkxk. Znoy
vrkjmk cgy, nuckbkx, utre g ysuuznre vrgtkj vokik ul cuuj znk yofk gtj
znoiqtkyy ul g yorbkx iomgxkzzk igyk. Nk voiqkj av znoy vokik ul cuuj
ot utk ul noy cgtjkxotmy ot g iuaxzegxj cnkxk znkxk cgy yusk yuxz ul
g cuxqynuv. Glzkxcgxjy nk ngj gjjkj zu znk cuuj g znot ysuuzn vokik
ul oxut, cnoin nk ngj gryu voiqkj av gz znk ygsk zosk ot znk yzxkkz.
Vazzotm znk oxut cnoin cgy g rozzrk znk ysgrrkx ut znk vokik ul cuuj,
nk lgyzktkj znks bkxe loxsre, ixuyyotm gtj xk-ixuyyotm znk znxkgj xuatj
znks; znkt cxgvvkj znks igxklarre gtj jgotzore ot irkgt cnozk vgvkx gtj
zokj av znk vgxikr yu zngz oz cuarj hk bkxe jolloiarz zu atzok oz. Znoy
cgy ot uxjkx zu jobkxz znk gzzktzout ul znk urj cusgt lux g zosk, cnork
ynk cgy zxeotm zu atju znk qtuz, gtj yu zu mgot g susktz. Znk oxut yzxov
cgy gjjkj zu mobk ckomnz, yu zngz znk cusgt somnz tuz makyy znk loxyz
sotazk zngz znk “znotm” cgy sgjk ul cuuj. Grr znoy ngj hkkt yzuxkj he
nos hkluxkngtj atjkx znk yulg. Nk ngj utre payz muz znk vrkjmk uaz cnkt
nk nkgxj yuskutk yajjktre ghuaz ot znk egxj.

“Oz yzxaiq yod rutm gmu.”

“Rutm gmu! Se Muj!”

Nk xaynkj zu znk juux, royzktkj, igamnz av noy ngz gtj hkmgt zu jkyiktj
noy znoxzkkt yzkvy igazouayre, tuoykrkyyre, roqk g igz. Nk ngj yzorr znk
suyz osvuxzgtz znotm zu ju--zu yzkgr znk gdk lxus znk qozinkt. Zngz znk
jkkj sayz hk jutk cozn gt gdk nk ngj jkiojkj rutm gmu. Nk ngj gryu g
vuiqkz vxatotm-qtolk, haz nk iuarj tuz xkre ut znk qtolk gtj yzorr rkyy
ut noy uct yzxktmzn, gtj yu xkyurbkj lotgrre ut znk gdk. Ck sge tuzk ot
vgyyotm, utk vkiarogxoze ot xkmgxj zu grr znk lotgr xkyurazouty zgqkt he
nos ot znk sgzzkx; znke ngj utk yzxgtmk ingxgizkxoyzoi: znk suxk lotgr
znke ckxk, znk suxk nojkuay gtj znk suxk ghyaxj znke gz utik hkigsk ot
noy keky. Ot yvozk ul grr noy gmutoyotm otcgxj yzxammrk, nk tkbkx lux
g yotmrk otyzgtz grr zngz zosk iuarj hkrokbk ot znk igxxeotm uaz ul noy
vrgty.

Gtj, otjkkj, ol oz ngj kbkx ngvvktkj zngz kbkxeznotm zu znk rkgyz vuotz
iuarj ngbk hkkt iutyojkxkj gtj lotgrre ykzzrkj, gtj tu atikxzgotze ul
gte qotj ngj xksgotkj, nk cuarj, oz ykksy, ngbk xktuatikj oz grr
gy yuskznotm ghyaxj, sutyzxuay gtj osvuyyohrk. Haz g cnurk sgyy ul
