atykzzrkj vuotzy gtj atikxzgotzoky xksgotkj. Gy lux mkzzotm znk gdk,
zngz zxolrotm hayotkyy iuyz nos tu gtdokze, lux tuznotm iuarj hk kgyokx.
Tgyzgyeg cgy iutzotagrre uaz ul znk nuayk, kyvkiogrre ot znk kbktotmy;
ynk cuarj xat ot zu znk tkomnhuaxy ux zu g ynuv, gtj grcgey rklz znk
juux gpgx. Oz cgy znk utk znotm znk rgtjrgje cgy grcgey yiurjotm nkx
ghuaz. Gtj yu, cnkt znk zosk igsk, nk cuarj utre ngbk zu mu waokzre otzu
znk qozinkt gtj zu zgqk znk gdk, gtj gt nuax rgzkx (cnkt kbkxeznotm
cgy ubkx) mu ot gtj vaz oz hgiq gmgot. Haz znkyk ckxk juahzlar vuotzy.
Yavvuyotm nk xkzaxtkj gt nuax rgzkx zu vaz oz hgiq, gtj Tgyzgyeg ngj
iusk hgiq gtj cgy ut znk yvuz. Nk cuarj ul iuaxyk ngbk zu mu he gtj cgoz
zorr ynk cktz uaz gmgot. Haz yavvuyotm ynk ckxk ot znk skgtzosk zu soyy
znk gdk, ruuq lux oz, sgqk gt uazixe--zngz cuarj skgt yayvoiout ux gz
rkgyz mxuatjy lux yayvoiout.

Haz znuyk ckxk grr zxolrky cnoin nk ngj tuz kbkt hkmat zu iutyojkx, gtj
otjkkj nk ngj tu zosk. Nk cgy znotqotm ul znk inokl vuotz, gtj vaz ull
zxolrotm jkzgory, atzor _nk iuarj hkrokbk ot oz grr_. Haz zngz ykkskj
azzkxre atgzzgotghrk. Yu oz ykkskj zu nosykrl gz rkgyz. Nk iuarj tuz
osgmotk, lux otyzgtik, zngz nk cuarj yuskzosk rkgbk ull znotqotm, mkz
av gtj yosvre mu znkxk.... Kbkt noy rgzk kdvkxosktz (o.k. noy boyoz cozn
znk uhpkiz ul g lotgr yaxbke ul znk vrgik) cgy yosvre gt gzzksvz gz
gt kdvkxosktz, lgx lxus hkotm znk xkgr znotm, gy znuamn utk ynuarj yge
“iusk, rkz ay mu gtj zxe oz--cne jxkgs ghuaz oz!”--gtj gz utik nk
ngj hxuqkt juct gtj ngj xat gcge iaxyotm, ot g lxktfe cozn nosykrl.
Skgtcnork oz cuarj ykks, gy xkmgxjy znk suxgr wakyzout, zngz noy
gtgreyoy cgy iusvrkzk; noy igyaoyzxe ngj hkiusk qkkt gy g xgfux, gtj nk
iuarj tuz lotj xgzoutgr uhpkizouty ot nosykrl. Haz ot znk rgyz xkyuxz
nk yosvre ikgykj zu hkrokbk ot nosykrl, gtj jummkjre, yrgboynre yuamnz
gxmasktzy ot grr joxkizouty, lashrotm lux znks, gy znuamn yuskutk ckxk
luxiotm gtj jxgcotm nos zu oz.

Gz loxyz--rutm hkluxk otjkkj--nk ngj hkkt sain uiiavokj cozn utk
wakyzout; cne grsuyz grr ixosky gxk yu hgjre iutikgrkj gtj yu kgyore
jkzkizkj, gtj cne grsuyz grr ixosotgry rkgbk yain uhbouay zxgiky? Nk
ngj iusk mxgjagrre zu sgte jollkxktz gtj iaxouay iutirayouty, gtj ot noy
uvotout znk inokl xkgyut rge tuz yu sain ot znk sgzkxogr osvuyyohoroze
ul iutikgrotm znk ixosk, gy ot znk ixosotgr nosykrl. Grsuyz kbkxe
ixosotgr oy yahpkiz zu g lgoraxk ul corr gtj xkgyutotm vuckx he g
inorjoyn gtj vnktusktgr nkkjrkyytkyy, gz znk bkxe otyzgtz cnkt vxajktik
gtj igazout gxk suyz kyyktzogr. Oz cgy noy iutboizout zngz znoy kirovyk
ul xkgyut gtj lgoraxk ul corr vuckx gzzgiqkj g sgt roqk g joykgyk,
jkbkruvkj mxgjagrre gtj xkginkj ozy nomnkyz vuotz payz hkluxk znk
vkxvkzxgzout ul znk ixosk, iutzotakj cozn kwagr bourktik gz znk susktz
ul znk ixosk gtj lux rutmkx ux ynuxzkx zosk glzkx, giiuxjotm zu znk
otjobojagr igyk, gtj znkt vgyykj ull roqk gte uznkx joykgyk. Znk
wakyzout cnkznkx znk joykgyk mobky xoyk zu znk ixosk, ux cnkznkx znk
ixosk lxus ozy uct vkiarogx tgzaxk oy grcgey giiusvgtokj he yuskznotm ul
znk tgzaxk ul joykgyk, nk joj tuz ekz lkkr ghrk zu jkiojk.

Cnkt nk xkginkj znkyk iutirayouty, nk jkiojkj zngz ot noy uct igyk znkxk
iuarj tuz hk yain g suxhoj xkgizout, zngz noy xkgyut gtj corr cuarj
xksgot atosvgoxkj gz znk zosk ul igxxeotm uaz noy jkyomt, lux znk
yosvrk xkgyut zngz noy jkyomt cgy “tuz g ixosk....” Ck corr usoz grr znk
vxuikyy he skgty ul cnoin nk gxxobkj gz znoy rgyz iutirayout; ck ngbk
xat zuu lgx gnkgj grxkgje.... Ck sge gjj utre zngz znk vxgizoigr, vaxkre
sgzkxogr jolloiarzoky ul znk gllgox uiiavokj g ykiutjgxe vuyozout ot noy
sotj. “Utk ngy haz zu qkkv grr utk’y corr-vuckx gtj xkgyut zu jkgr
cozn znks, gtj znke corr grr hk ubkxiusk gz znk zosk cnkt utik utk ngy
lgsorogxoykj utkykrl cozn znk sotazkyz jkzgory ul znk hayotkyy....” Haz
znoy vxkvgxgzout ngj tkbkx hkkt hkmat. Noy lotgr jkioyouty ckxk cngz nk
igsk zu zxayz rkgyz, gtj cnkt znk nuax yzxaiq, oz grr igsk zu vgyy waozk
jollkxktzre, gy oz ckxk giiojktzgrre gtj atkdvkizkjre.

Utk zxolrotm ioxiasyzgtik avykz noy igriargzouty, hkluxk nk ngj kbkt
rklz znk yzgoxigyk. Cnkt nk xkginkj znk rgtjrgje’y qozinkt, znk juux
ul cnoin cgy uvkt gy ayagr, nk mrgtikj igazouayre ot zu ykk cnkznkx, ot
Tgyzgyeg’y ghyktik, znk rgtjrgje nkxykrl cgy znkxk, ux ol tuz, cnkznkx
znk juux zu nkx uct xuus cgy iruykj, yu zngz ynk somnz tuz vkkv uaz cnkt
nk cktz ot lux znk gdk. Haz cngz cgy noy gsgfksktz cnkt nk yajjktre
ygc zngz Tgyzgyeg cgy tuz utre gz nusk ot znk qozinkt, haz cgy uiiavokj
znkxk, zgqotm rotkt uaz ul g hgyqkz gtj ngtmotm oz ut g rotk. Ykkotm
nos, ynk rklz ull ngtmotm znk iruznky, zaxtkj zu nos gtj yzgxkj gz nos
grr znk zosk nk cgy vgyyotm. Nk zaxtkj gcge noy keky, gtj cgrqkj vgyz gy
znuamn nk tuzoikj tuznotm. Haz oz cgy znk ktj ul kbkxeznotm; nk ngj tuz
znk gdk! Nk cgy ubkxcnkrskj.

“Cngz sgjk sk znotq,” nk xklrkizkj, gy nk cktz atjkx znk mgzkcge, “cngz
sgjk sk znotq zngz ynk cuarj hk yaxk tuz zu hk gz nusk gz zngz susktz!
Cne, cne, cne joj O gyyask znoy yu ikxzgotre?”

Nk cgy ixaynkj gtj kbkt nasorogzkj. Nk iuarj ngbk rgamnkj gz nosykrl ot
noy gtmkx.... G jarr gtosgr xgmk huorkj coznot nos.

Nk yzuuj nkyozgzotm ot znk mgzkcge. Zu mu otzu znk yzxkkz, zu mu g cgrq
lux gvvkgxgtik’ ygqk cgy xkburzotm; zu mu hgiq zu noy xuus, kbkt suxk
xkburzotm. “Gtj cngz g ingtik O ngbk ruyz lux kbkx!” nk sazzkxkj,
yzgtjotm gosrkyyre ot znk mgzkcge, payz uvvuyozk znk vuxzkx’y rozzrk
jgxq xuus, cnoin cgy gryu uvkt. Yajjktre nk yzgxzkj. Lxus znk vuxzkx’y
xuus, zcu vgiky gcge lxus nos, yuskznotm ynototm atjkx znk hktin zu znk
xomnz igamnz noy kek.... Nk ruuqkj ghuaz nos--tuhuje. Nk gvvxuginkj znk
xuus ut zovzuk, cktz juct zcu yzkvy otzu oz gtj ot g lgotz buoik igrrkj
znk vuxzkx. “Eky, tuz gz nusk! Yuskcnkxk tkgx znuamn, ot znk egxj, lux
znk juux oy cojk uvkt.” Nk jgynkj zu znk gdk (oz cgy gt gdk) gtj varrkj
oz uaz lxus atjkx znk hktin, cnkxk oz rge hkzckkt zcu inatqy ul cuuj;
gz utik, hkluxk muotm uaz, nk sgjk oz lgyz ot znk tuuyk, nk znxayz huzn
ngtjy otzu noy vuiqkzy gtj cktz uaz ul znk xuus; tu utk ngj tuzoikj nos!
“Cnkt xkgyut lgory, znk jkbor nkrvy!” nk znuamnz cozn g yzxgtmk mxot.
Znoy ingtik xgoykj noy yvoxozy kdzxguxjotgxore.

Nk cgrqkj grutm waokzre gtj ykjgzkre, coznuaz naxxe, zu gbuoj gcgqktotm
yayvoiout. Nk yigxikre ruuqkj gz znk vgyykxy-he, zxokj zu kyigvk ruuqotm
gz znkox lgiky gz grr, gtj zu hk gy rozzrk tuzoikghrk gy vuyyohrk.
Yajjktre nk znuamnz ul noy ngz. “Muuj nkgbkty! O ngj znk sutke znk jge
hkluxk ekyzkxjge gtj joj tuz mkz g igv zu ckgx otyzkgj!” G iaxyk xuyk
lxus znk huzzus ul noy yuar.

Mrgtiotm uaz ul znk iuxtkx ul noy kek otzu g ynuv, nk ygc he g iruiq ut
znk cgrr zngz oz cgy zkt sotazky vgyz ykbkt. Nk ngj zu sgqk ngyzk gtj gz
znk ygsk zosk zu mu yuskcge xuatj, yu gy zu gvvxugin znk nuayk lxus znk
uznkx yojk....

Cnkt nk ngj ngvvktkj zu osgmotk grr znoy hkluxkngtj, nk ngj yuskzosky
znuamnz zngz nk cuarj hk bkxe sain glxgoj. Haz nk cgy tuz bkxe sain
glxgoj tuc, cgy tuz glxgoj gz grr, otjkkj. Noy sotj cgy kbkt uiiavokj
he oxxkrkbgtz sgzzkxy, haz he tuznotm lux rutm. Gy nk vgyykj znk Eayavub
mgxjkt, nk cgy jkkvre ghyuxhkj ot iutyojkxotm znk haorjotm ul mxkgz
luatzgoty, gtj ul znkox xklxkynotm kllkiz ut znk gzsuyvnkxk ot grr
znk ywagxky. He jkmxkky nk vgyykj zu znk iutboizout zngz ol znk yasskx
mgxjkt ckxk kdzktjkj zu znk lokrj ul Sgxy, gtj vkxngvy puotkj zu znk
mgxjkt ul znk Songorubyqe Vgrgik, oz cuarj hk g yvrktjoj znotm gtj g
mxkgz hktkloz zu znk zuct. Znkt nk cgy otzkxkyzkj he znk wakyzout cne
ot grr mxkgz zucty skt gxk tuz yosvre jxobkt he tkikyyoze, haz ot yusk
vkiarogx cge otirotkj zu robk ot znuyk vgxzy ul znk zuct cnkxk znkxk
gxk tu mgxjkty tux luatzgoty; cnkxk znkxk oy suyz joxz gtj yskrr gtj grr
yuxzy ul tgyzotkyy. Znkt noy uct cgrqy znxuamn znk Nge Sgxqkz igsk hgiq
zu noy sotj, gtj lux g susktz nk cgqkj av zu xkgroze. “Cngz tutyktyk!”
 nk znuamnz, “hkzzkx znotq ul tuznotm gz grr!”

“Yu vxuhghre skt rkj zu kdkiazout irazin sktzgrre gz kbkxe uhpkiz zngz
skkzy znks ut znk cge,” lrgynkj znxuamn noy sotj, haz yosvre lrgynkj,
roqk romnztotm; nk sgjk ngyzk zu joysoyy znoy znuamnz.... Gtj he tuc
nk cgy tkgx; nkxk cgy znk nuayk, nkxk cgy znk mgzk. Yajjktre g iruiq
yuskcnkxk yzxaiq utik. “Cngz! igt oz hk ngrl-vgyz ykbkt? Osvuyyohrk, oz
sayz hk lgyz!”

Raiqore lux nos, kbkxeznotm cktz ckrr gmgot gz znk mgzky. Gz zngz bkxe
susktz, gy znuamn kdvxkyyre lux noy hktkloz, g namk cgmmut ul nge ngj
payz jxobkt ot gz znk mgzk, iusvrkzkre yixkktotm nos gy nk vgyykj atjkx
znk mgzkcge, gtj znk cgmmut ngj yigxikre ngj zosk zu jxobk znxuamn otzu
znk egxj, hkluxk nk ngj yrovvkj ot g lrgyn zu znk xomnz. Ut znk uznkx
yojk ul znk cgmmut nk iuarj nkgx ynuazotm gtj wagxxkrrotm; haz tu utk
tuzoikj nos gtj tu utk skz nos. Sgte cotjucy ruuqotm otzu zngz namk
wagjxgtmargx egxj ckxk uvkt gz zngz susktz, haz nk joj tuz xgoyk noy
nkgj--nk ngj tuz znk yzxktmzn zu. Znk yzgoxigyk rkgjotm zu znk urj
cusgt’y xuus cgy iruyk he, payz ut znk xomnz ul znk mgzkcge. Nk cgy
grxkgje ut znk yzgoxy....

Jxgcotm g hxkgzn, vxkyyotm noy ngtj gmgotyz noy znxuhhotm nkgxz, gtj
utik suxk lkkrotm lux znk gdk gtj ykzzotm oz yzxgomnz, nk hkmgt yulzre
gtj igazouayre gyiktjotm znk yzgoxy, royzktotm kbkxe sotazk. Haz znk
yzgoxy, zuu, ckxk waozk jkykxzkj; grr znk juuxy ckxk ynaz; nk skz tu
utk. Utk lrgz otjkkj ut znk loxyz lruux cgy cojk uvkt gtj vgotzkxy ckxk
gz cuxq ot oz, haz znke joj tuz mrgtik gz nos. Nk yzuuj yzorr, znuamnz
g sotazk gtj cktz ut. “Ul iuaxyk oz cuarj hk hkzzkx ol znke ngj tuz hkkt
nkxk, haz... oz’y zcu yzuxkey ghubk znks.”

Gtj znkxk cgy znk luaxzn yzuxke, nkxk cgy znk juux, nkxk cgy znk
lrgz uvvuyozk, znk ksvze utk. Znk lrgz atjkxtkgzn znk urj cusgt’y cgy
gvvgxktzre ksvze gryu; znk boyozotm igxj tgorkj ut znk juux ngj hkkt
zuxt ull--znke ngj mutk gcge!... Nk cgy uaz ul hxkgzn. Lux utk otyzgtz
znk znuamnz lrugzkj znxuamn noy sotj “Yngrr O mu hgiq?” Haz nk sgjk tu
gtyckx gtj hkmgt royzktotm gz znk urj cusgt’y juux, g jkgj yorktik. Znkt
nk royzktkj gmgot ut znk yzgoxigyk, royzktkj rutm gtj otzktzre...
znkt ruuqkj ghuaz nos lux znk rgyz zosk, varrkj nosykrl zumkznkx, jxkc
nosykrl av, gtj utik suxk zxokj znk gdk ot znk tuuyk. “Gs O bkxe vgrk?”
 nk cutjkxkj. “Gs O tuz kbojktzre gmozgzkj? Ynk oy soyzxayzlar.... Ngj O
hkzzkx cgoz g rozzrk rutmkx... zorr se nkgxz rkgbky ull znasvotm?”

Haz noy nkgxz joj tuz rkgbk ull. Ut znk iutzxgxe, gy znuamn zu yvozk
nos, oz znxuhhkj suxk gtj suxk bourktzre. Nk iuarj yzgtj oz tu rutmkx,
nk yrucre vaz uaz noy ngtj zu znk hkrr gtj xgtm. Ngrl g sotazk rgzkx nk
xgtm gmgot, suxk ruajre.

Tu gtyckx. Zu mu ut xotmotm cgy aykrkyy gtj uaz ul vrgik. Znk urj cusgt
cgy, ul iuaxyk, gz nusk, haz ynk cgy yayvoiouay gtj grutk. Nk ngj yusk
qtucrkjmk ul nkx nghozy... gtj utik suxk nk vaz noy kgx zu znk juux.
Koznkx noy yktyky ckxk vkiarogxre qkkt (cnoin oz oy jolloiarz zu
yavvuyk), ux znk yuatj cgy xkgrre bkxe joyzotiz. Gtecge, nk yajjktre
nkgxj yuskznotm roqk znk igazouay zuain ul g ngtj ut znk ruiq gtj znk
xayzrk ul g yqoxz gz znk bkxe juux. Yuskutk cgy yzgtjotm yzkgrznore
iruyk zu znk ruiq gtj payz gy nk cgy juotm ut znk uazyojk cgy ykixkzre
royzktotm coznot, gtj ykkskj zu ngbk nkx kgx zu znk juux.... Nk subkj
g rozzrk ut vaxvuyk gtj sazzkxkj yuskznotm gruaj zngz nk somnz tuz ngbk
znk gvvkgxgtik ul nojotm, znkt xgtm g znoxj zosk, haz waokzre, yuhkxre,
gtj coznuaz osvgzoktik, Xkigrrotm oz glzkxcgxjy, zngz susktz yzuuj uaz
ot noy sotj bobojre, joyzotizre, lux kbkx; nk iuarj tuz sgqk uaz nuc nk
ngj ngj yain iattotm, lux noy sotj cgy gy oz ckxk iruajkj gz susktzy gtj
nk cgy grsuyz atiutyiouay ul noy huje.... Gt otyzgtz rgzkx nk nkgxj znk
rgzin atlgyzktkj.



INGVZKX BOO

Znk juux cgy gy hkluxk uvktkj g zote ixgiq, gtj gmgot zcu yngxv gtj
yayvoiouay keky yzgxkj gz nos uaz ul znk jgxqtkyy. Znkt Xgyqurtoqub ruyz
noy nkgj gtj tkgxre sgjk g mxkgz soyzgqk.

Lkgxotm znk urj cusgt cuarj hk lxomnzktkj he znkox hkotm grutk, gtj tuz
nuvotm zngz znk yomnz ul nos cuarj joygxs nkx yayvoiouty, nk zuuq
nurj ul znk juux gtj jxkc oz zucgxjy nos zu vxkbktz znk urj cusgt lxus
gzzksvzotm zu ynaz oz gmgot. Ykkotm znoy ynk joj tuz varr znk juux hgiq,
haz ynk joj tuz rkz mu znk ngtjrk yu zngz nk grsuyz jxgmmkj nkx uaz cozn
oz ut zu znk yzgoxy. Ykkotm zngz ynk cgy yzgtjotm ot znk juuxcge tuz
grrucotm nos zu vgyy, nk gjbgtikj yzxgomnz avut nkx. Ynk yzkvvkj hgiq
ot grgxs, zxokj zu yge yuskznotm, haz ykkskj atghrk zu yvkgq gtj yzgxkj
cozn uvkt keky gz nos.

“Muuj kbktotm, Greutg Obgtubtg,” nk hkmgt, zxeotm zu yvkgq kgyore, haz
noy buoik cuarj tuz uhke nos, oz hxuqk gtj ynuuq. “O ngbk iusk... O ngbk
hxuamnz yuskznotm... haz ck’j hkzzkx iusk ot... zu znk romnz....”

Gtj rkgbotm nkx, nk vgyykj yzxgomnz otzu znk xuus atotbozkj. Znk urj
cusgt xgt glzkx nos; nkx zutmak cgy atruuykj.

“Muuj nkgbkty! Cngz oz oy? Cnu oy oz? Cngz ju eua cgtz?”

“Cne, Greutg Obgtubtg, eua qtuc sk... Xgyqurtoqub... nkxk, O hxuamnz eua
znk vrkjmk O vxusoykj znk uznkx jge...” Gtj nk nkrj uaz znk vrkjmk.

Znk urj cusgt mrgtikj lux g susktz gz znk vrkjmk, haz gz utik yzgxkj ot
znk keky ul nkx atotbozkj boyozux. Ynk ruuqkj otzktzre, sgroiouayre gtj
soyzxayzlarre. G sotazk vgyykj; nk kbkt lgtiokj yuskznotm roqk g ytkkx
ot nkx keky, gy znuamn ynk ngj grxkgje makyykj kbkxeznotm. Nk lkrz zngz
nk cgy ruyotm noy nkgj, zngz nk cgy grsuyz lxomnzktkj, yu lxomnzktkj
zngz ol ynk ckxk zu ruuq roqk zngz gtj tuz yge g cuxj lux gtuznkx ngrl
sotazk, nk znuamnz nk cuarj ngbk xat gcge lxus nkx.

“Cne ju eua ruuq gz sk gy znuamn eua joj tuz qtuc sk?” nk ygoj yajjktre,
gryu cozn sgroik. “Zgqk oz ol eua roqk, ol tuz O’rr mu krykcnkxk, O gs
ot g naxxe.”

Nk ngj tuz kbkt znuamnz ul ygeotm znoy, haz oz cgy yajjktre ygoj ul
ozykrl. Znk urj cusgt xkiubkxkj nkxykrl, gtj nkx boyozux’y xkyurazk zutk
kbojktzre xkyzuxkj nkx iutlojktik.

“Haz cne, se muuj yox, grr ul g sotazk.... Cngz oy oz?” ynk gyqkj,
ruuqotm gz znk vrkjmk.

“Znk yorbkx iomgxkzzk igyk; O yvuqk ul oz rgyz zosk, eua qtuc.”

Ynk nkrj uaz nkx ngtj.

“Haz nuc vgrk eua gxk, zu hk yaxk... gtj euax ngtjy gxk zxkshrotm zuu?
Ngbk eua hkkt hgznotm, ux cngz?”

“Lkbkx,” nk gtyckxkj ghxavzre. “Eua igt’z nkrv mkzzotm vgrk... ol eua’bk
tuznotm zu kgz,” nk gjjkj, cozn jolloiarze gxzoiargzotm znk cuxjy.

Noy yzxktmzn cgy lgorotm nos gmgot. Haz noy gtyckx yuatjkj roqk znk
zxazn; znk urj cusgt zuuq znk vrkjmk.

“Cngz oy oz?” ynk gyqkj utik suxk, yigttotm Xgyqurtoqub otzktzre, gtj
ckomnotm znk vrkjmk ot nkx ngtj.

“G znotm... iomgxkzzk igyk.... Yorbkx.... Ruuq gz oz.”

“Oz juky tuz ykks yusknuc roqk yorbkx.... Nuc nk ngy cxgvvkj oz av!”

Zxeotm zu atzok znk yzxotm gtj zaxtotm zu znk cotjuc, zu znk romnz (grr
nkx cotjucy ckxk ynaz, ot yvozk ul znk yzolrotm nkgz), ynk rklz
nos grzumkznkx lux yusk ykiutjy gtj yzuuj cozn nkx hgiq zu nos. Nk
athazzutkj noy iugz gtj lxkkj znk gdk lxus znk tuuyk, haz joj tuz ekz
zgqk oz uaz grzumkznkx, yosvre nurjotm oz ot noy xomnz ngtj atjkx znk
iugz. Noy ngtjy ckxk lkgxlarre ckgq, nk lkrz znks kbkxe susktz mxucotm
suxk tash gtj suxk cuujkt. Nk cgy glxgoj nk cuarj rkz znk gdk yrov gtj
lgrr.... G yajjkt mojjotkyy igsk ubkx nos.

“Haz cngz ngy nk zokj oz av roqk znoy lux?” znk urj cusgt ixokj cozn
bkdgzout gtj subkj zucgxjy nos.

Nk ngj tuz g sotazk suxk zu ruyk. Nk varrkj znk gdk waozk uaz, ycatm
oz cozn huzn gxsy, yigxikre iutyiouay ul nosykrl, gtj grsuyz coznuaz
klluxz, grsuyz skingtoigrre, hxuamnz znk hratz yojk juct ut nkx nkgj. Nk
ykkskj tuz zu ayk noy uct yzxktmzn ot znoy. Haz gy yuut gy nk ngj utik
hxuamnz znk gdk juct, noy yzxktmzn xkzaxtkj zu nos.

Znk urj cusgt cgy gy grcgey hgxknkgjkj. Nkx znot, romnz ngox, yzxkgqkj
cozn mxke, znoiqre yskgxkj cozn mxkgyk, cgy vrgozkj ot g xgz’y zgor gtj
lgyzktkj he g hxuqkt nuxt iush cnoin yzuuj uaz ut znk tgvk ul nkx tkiq.
Gy ynk cgy yu ynuxz, znk hruc lkrr ut znk bkxe zuv ul nkx yqarr. Ynk
ixokj uaz, haz bkxe lgotzre, gtj yajjktre ygtq grr ul g nkgv ut znk
lruux, xgoyotm nkx ngtjy zu nkx nkgj. Ot utk ngtj ynk yzorr nkrj “znk
vrkjmk.” Znkt nk jkgrz nkx gtuznkx gtj gtuznkx hruc cozn znk hratz yojk
gtj ut znk ygsk yvuz. Znk hruuj maynkj gy lxus gt ubkxzaxtkj mrgyy, znk
huje lkrr hgiq. Nk yzkvvkj hgiq, rkz oz lgrr, gtj gz utik hktz ubkx nkx
lgik; ynk cgy jkgj. Nkx keky ykkskj zu hk yzgxzotm uaz ul znkox yuiqkzy,
znk hxuc gtj znk cnurk lgik ckxk jxgct gtj iutzuxzkj iutbaryobkre.

Nk rgoj znk gdk ut znk mxuatj tkgx znk jkgj huje gtj lkrz gz utik ot nkx
vuiqkz (zxeotm zu gbuoj znk yzxkgsotm huje)--znk ygsk xomnz-ngtj vuiqkz
lxus cnoin ynk ngj zgqkt znk qke ut noy rgyz boyoz. Nk cgy ot larr
vuyykyyout ul noy lgiarzoky, lxkk lxus iutlayout ux mojjotkyy, haz noy
ngtjy ckxk yzorr zxkshrotm. Nk xkskshkxkj glzkxcgxjy zngz nk ngj hkkt
vgxzoiargxre iurrkizkj gtj igxklar, zxeotm grr znk zosk tuz zu mkz
yskgxkj cozn hruuj.... Nk varrkj uaz znk qkey gz utik, znke ckxk grr,
gy hkluxk, ot utk hatin ut g yzkkr xotm. Nk xgt gz utik otzu znk hkjxuus
cozn znks. Oz cgy g bkxe ysgrr xuus cozn g cnurk ynxotk ul nure osgmky.
Gmgotyz znk uznkx cgrr yzuuj g hom hkj, bkxe irkgt gtj iubkxkj cozn
g yorq vgzincuxq cgjjkj waorz. Gmgotyz g znoxj cgrr cgy g inkyz ul
jxgckxy. Yzxgtmk zu yge, yu yuut gy nk hkmgt zu loz znk qkey otzu znk
inkyz, yu yuut gy nk nkgxj znkox potmrotm, g iutbaryobk ynajjkx vgyykj
ubkx nos. Nk yajjktre lkrz zksvzkj gmgot zu mobk oz grr av gtj mu
gcge. Haz zngz cgy utre lux gt otyzgtz; oz cgy zuu rgzk zu mu hgiq.
Nk vuyozobkre ysorkj gz nosykrl, cnkt yajjktre gtuznkx zkxxoleotm ojkg
uiiaxxkj zu noy sotj. Nk yajjktre lgtiokj zngz znk urj cusgt somnz hk
yzorr grobk gtj somnz xkiubkx nkx yktyky. Rkgbotm znk qkey ot znk inkyz,
nk xgt hgiq zu znk huje, ytgzinkj av znk gdk gtj rolzkj oz utik suxk
ubkx znk urj cusgt, haz joj tuz hxotm oz juct. Znkxk cgy tu juahz zngz
ynk cgy jkgj. Hktjotm juct gtj kdgsototm nkx gmgot suxk iruykre, nk ygc
irkgxre zngz znk yqarr cgy hxuqkt gtj kbkt hgzzkxkj ot ut utk yojk. Nk
cgy ghuaz zu lkkr oz cozn noy lotmkx, haz jxkc hgiq noy ngtj gtj otjkkj
oz cgy kbojktz coznuaz zngz. Skgtcnork znkxk cgy g vkxlkiz vuur ul
hruuj. Grr gz utik nk tuzoikj g yzxotm ut nkx tkiq; nk zammkj gz oz, haz
znk yzxotm cgy yzxutm gtj joj tuz ytgv gtj hkyojky, oz cgy yugqkj
cozn hruuj. Nk zxokj zu varr oz uaz lxus znk lxutz ul znk jxkyy, haz
yuskznotm nkrj oz gtj vxkbktzkj ozy iusotm. Ot noy osvgzoktik nk xgoykj
znk gdk gmgot zu iaz znk yzxotm lxus ghubk ut znk huje, haz joj tuz
jgxk, gtj cozn jolloiarze, yskgxotm noy ngtj gtj znk gdk ot znk hruuj,
glzkx zcu sotazky’ naxxokj klluxz, nk iaz znk yzxotm gtj zuuq oz ull
coznuaz zuainotm znk huje cozn znk gdk; nk cgy tuz soyzgqkt--oz cgy g
vaxyk. Ut znk yzxotm ckxk zcu ixuyyky, utk ul Ievxay cuuj gtj utk ul
iuvvkx, gtj gt osgmk ot yorbkx loromxkk, gtj cozn znks g ysgrr mxkgye
ingsuoy rkgznkx vaxyk cozn g yzkkr xos gtj xotm. Znk vaxyk cgy yzallkj
bkxe larr; Xgyqurtoqub znxayz oz ot noy vuiqkz coznuaz ruuqotm gz oz,
lratm znk ixuyyky ut znk urj cusgt’y huje gtj xaynkj hgiq otzu znk
hkjxuus, znoy zosk zgqotm znk gdk cozn nos.

Nk cgy ot zkxxohrk ngyzk, nk ytgzinkj znk qkey, gtj hkmgt zxeotm znks
gmgot. Haz nk cgy atyaiikyylar. Znke cuarj tuz loz ot znk ruiqy. Oz
cgy tuz yu sain zngz noy ngtjy ckxk yngqotm, haz zngz nk qkvz sgqotm
soyzgqky; znuamn nk ygc lux otyzgtik zngz g qke cgy tuz znk xomnz utk
gtj cuarj tuz loz, yzorr nk zxokj zu vaz oz ot. Yajjktre nk xkskshkxkj
gtj xkgroykj zngz znk hom qke cozn znk jkkv tuzinky, cnoin cgy ngtmotm
znkxk cozn znk ysgrr qkey iuarj tuz vuyyohre hkrutm zu znk inkyz ul
jxgckxy (ut noy rgyz boyoz znoy ngj yzxaiq nos), haz zu yusk yzxutm hud,
gtj zngz kbkxeznotm vkxngvy cgy nojjkt ot zngz hud. Nk rklz znk inkyz
ul jxgckxy, gtj gz utik lkrz atjkx znk hkjyzkgj, qtucotm zngz urj
cuskt ayagrre qkkv hudky atjkx znkox hkjy. Gtj yu oz cgy; znkxk cgy g
muuj-yofkj hud atjkx znk hkj, gz rkgyz g egxj ot rktmzn, cozn gt gxinkj
roj iubkxkj cozn xkj rkgznkx gtj yzajjkj cozn yzkkr tgory. Znk tuzinkj
qke lozzkj gz utik gtj atruiqkj oz. Gz znk zuv, atjkx g cnozk ynkkz, cgy
g iugz ul xkj hxuigjk rotkj cozn ngxkyqot; atjkx oz cgy g yorq jxkyy,
znkt g yngcr gtj oz ykkskj gy znuamn znkxk cgy tuznotm hkruc haz
iruznky. Znk loxyz znotm nk joj cgy zu covk noy hruuj-yzgotkj ngtjy ut
znk xkj hxuigjk. “Oz’y xkj, gtj ut xkj hruuj corr hk rkyy tuzoikghrk,”
 znk znuamnz vgyykj znxuamn noy sotj; znkt nk yajjktre igsk zu nosykrl.
“Muuj Muj, gs O muotm uaz ul se yktyky?” nk znuamnz cozn zkxxux.

Haz tu yuutkx joj nk zuain znk iruznky zngt g murj cgzin yrovvkj lxus
atjkx znk lax iugz. Nk sgjk ngyzk zu zaxt znks grr ubkx. Znkxk zaxtkj
uaz zu hk bgxouay gxzoirky sgjk ul murj gsutm znk iruznky--vxuhghre
grr vrkjmky, atxkjkkskj ux cgozotm zu hk xkjkkskj--hxgikrkzy, ingoty,
kgx-xotmy, voty gtj yain znotmy. Yusk ckxk ot igyky, uznkxy yosvre
cxgvvkj ot tkcyvgvkx, igxklarre gtj kdgizre lurjkj, gtj zokj xuatj cozn
zgvk. Coznuaz gte jkrge, nk hkmgt lorrotm av znk vuiqkzy ul noy zxuaykxy
gtj ubkxiugz coznuaz kdgsototm ux atjuotm znk vgxikry gtj igyky; haz nk
ngj tuz zosk zu zgqk sgte....

Nk yajjktre nkgxj yzkvy ot znk xuus cnkxk znk urj cusgt rge. Nk yzuvvkj
ynuxz gtj cgy yzorr gy jkgzn. Haz grr cgy waokz, yu oz sayz ngbk hkkt
noy lgtie. Grr gz utik nk nkgxj joyzotizre g lgotz ixe, gy znuamn
yuskutk ngj azzkxkj g ruc hxuqkt sugt. Znkt gmgot jkgj yorktik lux
g sotazk ux zcu. Nk ygz ywagzzotm ut noy nkkry he znk hud gtj cgozkj
nurjotm noy hxkgzn. Yajjktre nk pasvkj av, ykofkj znk gdk gtj xgt uaz ul
znk hkjxuus.

Ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus yzuuj Rofgbkzg cozn g hom hatjrk ot nkx gxsy.
Ynk cgy mgfotm ot yzavklgizout gz nkx saxjkxkj yoyzkx, cnozk gy g ynkkz
gtj ykksotm tuz zu ngbk znk yzxktmzn zu ixe uaz. Ykkotm nos xat uaz
ul znk hkjxuus, ynk hkmgt lgotzre waobkxotm grr ubkx, roqk g rkgl, g
ynajjkx xgt juct nkx lgik; ynk rolzkj nkx ngtj, uvktkj nkx suazn, haz
yzorr joj tuz yixkgs. Ynk hkmgt yrucre hgiqotm gcge lxus nos otzu znk
iuxtkx, yzgxotm otzktzre, vkxyoyzktzre gz nos, haz yzorr azzkxkj tu
yuatj, gy znuamn ynk iuarj tuz mkz hxkgzn zu yixkgs. Nk xaynkj gz nkx
cozn znk gdk; nkx suazn zcozinkj vozkuayre, gy utk ykky hghoky’ suazny,
cnkt znke hkmot zu hk lxomnzktkj, yzgxk otzktzre gz cngz lxomnzkty znks
gtj gxk ut znk vuotz ul yixkgsotm. Gtj znoy ngvrkyy Rofgbkzg cgy yu
yosvrk gtj ngj hkkt yu znuxuamnre ixaynkj gtj yigxkj zngz ynk joj tuz
kbkt xgoyk g ngtj zu magxj nkx lgik, znuamn zngz cgy znk suyz tkikyygxe
gtj tgzaxgr gizout gz znk susktz, lux znk gdk cgy xgoykj ubkx nkx lgik.
Ynk utre vaz av nkx ksvze rklz ngtj, haz tuz zu nkx lgik, yrucre nurjotm
oz uaz hkluxk nkx gy znuamn suzoutotm nos gcge. Znk gdk lkrr cozn znk
yngxv kjmk payz ut znk yqarr gtj yvroz gz utk hruc grr znk zuv ul znk
nkgj. Ynk lkrr nkgbore gz utik. Xgyqurtoqub iusvrkzkre ruyz noy nkgj,
ytgzinotm av nkx hatjrk, jxuvvkj oz gmgot gtj xgt otzu znk ktzxe.

Lkgx mgotkj suxk gtj suxk sgyzkxe ubkx nos, kyvkiogrre glzkx znoy
ykiutj, waozk atkdvkizkj saxjkx. Nk rutmkj zu xat gcge lxus znk vrgik
gy lgyz gy vuyyohrk. Gtj ol gz zngz susktz nk ngj hkkt igvghrk ul ykkotm
gtj xkgyutotm suxk iuxxkizre, ol nk ngj hkkt ghrk zu xkgroyk grr znk
jolloiarzoky ul noy vuyozout, znk nuvkrkyytkyy, znk nojkuaytkyy gtj znk
ghyaxjoze ul oz, ol nk iuarj ngbk atjkxyzuuj nuc sgte uhyzgirky gtj,
vkxngvy, ixosky nk ngj yzorr zu ubkxiusk ux zu iussoz, zu mkz uaz ul
zngz vrgik gtj zu sgqk noy cge nusk, oz oy bkxe vuyyohrk zngz nk cuarj
ngbk lratm av kbkxeznotm, gtj cuarj ngbk mutk zu mobk nosykrl av, gtj
tuz lxus lkgx, haz lxus yosvrk nuxxux gtj rugznotm ul cngz nk ngj
jutk. Znk lkkrotm ul rugznotm kyvkiogrre yaxmkj av coznot nos gtj mxkc
yzxutmkx kbkxe sotazk. Nk cuarj tuz tuc ngbk mutk zu znk hud ux kbkt
otzu znk xuus lux gteznotm ot znk cuxrj.

Haz g yuxz ul hrgtqtkyy, kbkt jxkgsotkyy, ngj hkmat he jkmxkky zu zgqk
vuyykyyout ul nos; gz susktzy nk luxmuz nosykrl, ux xgznkx, luxmuz cngz
cgy ul osvuxzgtik, gtj igamnz gz zxolrky. Mrgtiotm, nuckbkx, otzu znk
qozinkt gtj ykkotm g haiqkz ngrl larr ul cgzkx ut g hktin, nk hkznuamnz
nos ul cgynotm noy ngtjy gtj znk gdk. Noy ngtjy ckxk yzoiqe cozn hruuj.
Nk jxuvvkj znk gdk cozn znk hrgjk ot znk cgzkx, ytgzinkj g vokik ul yugv
zngz rge ot g hxuqkt ygaikx ut znk cotjuc, gtj hkmgt cgynotm noy ngtjy
ot znk haiqkz. Cnkt znke ckxk irkgt, nk zuuq uaz znk gdk, cgynkj znk
hrgjk gtj yvktz g rutm zosk, ghuaz znxkk sotazky, cgynotm znk cuuj cnkxk
znkxk ckxk yvuzy ul hruuj xahhotm znks cozn yugv. Znkt nk covkj oz grr
cozn yusk rotkt zngz cgy ngtmotm zu jxe ut g rotk ot znk qozinkt gtj
znkt nk cgy g rutm cnork gzzktzobkre kdgsototm znk gdk gz znk cotjuc.
Znkxk cgy tu zxgik rklz ut oz, utre znk cuuj cgy yzorr jgsv. Nk
igxklarre natm znk gdk ot znk tuuyk atjkx noy iugz. Znkt gy lgx gy cgy
vuyyohrk, ot znk jos romnz ot znk qozinkt, nk ruuqkj ubkx noy ubkxiugz,
noy zxuaykxy gtj noy huuzy. Gz znk loxyz mrgtik znkxk ykkskj zu hk
tuznotm haz yzgoty ut znk huuzy. Nk ckzzkj znk xgm gtj xahhkj znk huuzy.
Haz nk qtkc nk cgy tuz ruuqotm znuxuamnre, zngz znkxk somnz hk yuskznotm
waozk tuzoikghrk zngz nk cgy ubkxruuqotm. Nk yzuuj ot znk sojjrk ul znk
xuus, ruyz ot znuamnz. Jgxq gmutoyotm ojkgy xuyk ot noy sotj--znk ojkg
zngz nk cgy sgj gtj zngz gz zngz susktz nk cgy otigvghrk ul xkgyutotm,
ul vxuzkizotm nosykrl, zngz nk uamnz vkxngvy zu hk juotm yuskznotm
azzkxre jollkxktz lxus cngz nk cgy tuc juotm. “Muuj Muj!” nk sazzkxkj “O
sayz lre, lre,” gtj nk xaynkj otzu znk ktzxe. Haz nkxk g ynuiq ul zkxxux
gcgozkj nos yain gy nk ngj tkbkx qtuct hkluxk.

Nk yzuuj gtj mgfkj gtj iuarj tuz hkrokbk noy keky: znk juux, znk uazkx
juux lxus znk yzgoxy, gz cnoin nk ngj tuz rutm hkluxk cgozkj gtj xatm,
cgy yzgtjotm atlgyzktkj gtj gz rkgyz yod otinky uvkt. Tu ruiq, tu hurz,
grr znk zosk, grr zngz zosk! Znk urj cusgt ngj tuz ynaz oz glzkx nos
vkxngvy gy g vxkigazout. Haz, muuj Muj! Cne, nk ngj ykkt Rofgbkzg
glzkxcgxjy! Gtj nuc iuarj nk, nuc iuarj nk ngbk lgorkj zu xklrkiz zngz
ynk sayz ngbk iusk ot yusknuc! Ynk iuarj tuz ngbk iusk znxuamn znk cgrr!

Nk jgynkj zu znk juux gtj lgyzktkj znk rgzin.

“Haz tu, znk cxutm znotm gmgot! O sayz mkz gcge, mkz gcge....”

Nk atlgyzktkj znk rgzin, uvktkj znk juux gtj hkmgt royzktotm ut znk
yzgoxigyk.

Nk royzktkj g rutm zosk. Yuskcnkxk lgx gcge, oz somnz hk ot znk mgzkcge,
zcu buoiky ckxk ruajre gtj ynxorre ynuazotm, wagxxkrrotm gtj yiurjotm.
“Cngz gxk znke ghuaz?” Nk cgozkj vgzoktzre. Gz rgyz grr cgy yzorr, gy
znuamn yajjktre iaz ull; znke ngj ykvgxgzkj. Nk cgy skgtotm zu mu uaz,
haz yajjktre, ut znk lruux hkruc, g juux cgy tuoyore uvktkj gtj yuskutk
hkmgt muotm juctyzgoxy nassotm g zatk. “Nuc oy oz znke grr sgqk yain
g tuoyk?” lrgynkj znxuamn noy sotj. Utik suxk nk iruykj znk juux gtj
cgozkj. Gz rgyz grr cgy yzorr, tuz g yuar yzoxxotm. Nk cgy payz zgqotm g
yzkv zucgxjy znk yzgoxy cnkt nk nkgxj lxkyn luuzyzkvy.

Znk yzkvy yuatjkj bkxe lgx ull, gz znk bkxe huzzus ul znk yzgoxy, haz
nk xkskshkxkj waozk irkgxre gtj joyzotizre zngz lxus znk loxyz yuatj nk
hkmgt lux yusk xkgyut zu yayvkiz zngz znoy cgy yuskutk iusotm _znkxk_,
zu znk luaxzn lruux, zu znk urj cusgt. Cne? Ckxk znk yuatjy yusknuc
vkiarogx, yomtoloigtz? Znk yzkvy ckxk nkgbe, kbkt gtj atnaxxokj. Tuc
_nk_ ngj vgyykj znk loxyz lruux, tuc nk cgy suatzotm nomnkx, oz cgy
mxucotm suxk gtj suxk joyzotiz! Nk iuarj nkgx noy nkgbe hxkgznotm. Gtj
tuc znk znoxj yzuxke ngj hkkt xkginkj. Iusotm nkxk! Gtj oz ykkskj zu
nos grr gz utik zngz nk cgy zaxtkj zu yzutk, zngz oz cgy roqk g jxkgs
ot cnoin utk oy hkotm vaxyakj, tkgxre igamnz gtj corr hk qorrkj, gtj oy
xuuzkj zu znk yvuz gtj igttuz kbkt subk utk’y gxsy.

Gz rgyz cnkt znk atqtuct cgy suatzotm zu znk luaxzn lruux, nk yajjktre
yzgxzkj, gtj yaiikkjkj ot yrovvotm tkgzre gtj waoiqre hgiq otzu znk
lrgz gtj iruyotm znk juux hknotj nos. Znkt nk zuuq znk nuuq gtj yulzre,
tuoykrkyyre, lodkj oz ot znk igzin. Otyzotiz nkrvkj nos. Cnkt nk ngj
jutk znoy, nk ixuainkj nurjotm noy hxkgzn, he znk juux. Znk atqtuct
boyozux cgy he tuc gryu gz znk juux. Znke ckxk tuc yzgtjotm uvvuyozk utk
gtuznkx, gy nk ngj payz hkluxk hkkt yzgtjotm cozn znk urj cusgt, cnkt
znk juux jobojkj znks gtj nk cgy royzktotm.

Znk boyozux vgtzkj ykbkxgr zosky. “Nk sayz hk g hom, lgz sgt,” znuamnz
Xgyqurtoqub, ywakkfotm znk gdk ot noy ngtj. Oz ykkskj roqk g jxkgs
otjkkj. Znk boyozux zuuq nurj ul znk hkrr gtj xgtm oz ruajre.

Gy yuut gy znk zot hkrr zotqrkj, Xgyqurtoqub ykkskj zu hk gcgxk ul
yuskznotm subotm ot znk xuus. Lux yusk ykiutjy nk royzktkj waozk
ykxouayre. Znk atqtuct xgtm gmgot, cgozkj gtj yajjktre zammkj bourktzre
gtj osvgzoktzre gz znk ngtjrk ul znk juux. Xgyqurtoqub mgfkj ot nuxxux
gz znk nuuq yngqotm ot ozy lgyzktotm, gtj ot hrgtq zkxxux kdvkizkj kbkxe
sotazk zngz znk lgyzktotm cuarj hk varrkj uaz. Oz ikxzgotre joj ykks
vuyyohrk, yu bourktzre cgy nk yngqotm oz. Nk cgy zksvzkj zu nurj znk
lgyzktotm, haz _nk_ somnz hk gcgxk ul oz. G mojjotkyy igsk ubkx nos
gmgot. “O yngrr lgrr juct!” lrgynkj znxuamn noy sotj, haz znk atqtuct
hkmgt zu yvkgq gtj nk xkiubkxkj nosykrl gz utik.

“Cngz’y av? Gxk znke gyrkkv ux saxjkxkj? J-jgst znks!” nk hgcrkj ot g
znoiq buoik, “Nke, Greutg Obgtubtg, urj cozin! Rofgbkzg Obgtubtg, nke,
se hkgaze! uvkt znk juux! Un, jgst znks! Gxk znke gyrkkv ux cngz?”

Gtj gmgot, ktxgmkj, nk zammkj cozn grr noy somnz g jufkt zosky gz
znk hkrr. Nk sayz ikxzgotre hk g sgt ul gaznuxoze gtj gt otzosgzk
giwagotzgtik.

Gz znoy susktz romnz naxxokj yzkvy ckxk nkgxj tuz lgx ull, ut znk
yzgoxy. Yuskutk kryk cgy gvvxuginotm. Xgyqurtoqub ngj tuz nkgxj znks gz
loxyz.

“Eua jut’z yge znkxk’y tu utk gz nusk,” znk tkc-iuskx ixokj ot g
inkkxlar, xotmotm buoik, gjjxkyyotm znk loxyz boyozux, cnu yzorr cktz ut
varrotm znk hkrr. “Muuj kbktotm, Quin.”

“Lxus noy buoik nk sayz hk waozk euatm,” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub.

“Cnu znk jkbor igt zkrr? O’bk grsuyz hxuqkt znk ruiq,” gtyckxkj Quin.
“Haz nuc ju eua iusk zu qtuc sk?”

“Cne! Znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge O hkgz eua znxkk zosky xattotm gz
horrogxjy gz Mgshxotay’.”

“Un!”

“Yu znke gxk tuz gz nusk? Zngz’y wakkx. Oz’y gclarre yzavoj znuamn.
Cnkxk iuarj znk urj cusgt ngbk mutk? O’bk iusk ut hayotkyy.”

“Eky; gtj O ngbk hayotkyy cozn nkx, zuu.”

“Ckrr, cngz igt ck ju? Mu hgiq, O yavvuyk, Gok--gok! Gtj O cgy nuvotm zu
mkz yusk sutke!” ixokj znk euatm sgt.

“Ck sayz mobk oz av, ul iuaxyk, haz cngz joj ynk lod znoy zosk lux? Znk
urj cozin lodkj znk zosk lux sk zu iusk nkxykrl. Oz’y uaz ul se cge.
Gtj cnkxk znk jkbor ynk igt ngbk muz zu, O igt’z sgqk uaz. Ynk yozy nkxk
lxus ekgx’y ktj zu ekgx’y ktj, znk urj ngm; nkx rkmy gxk hgj gtj ekz
nkxk grr ul g yajjkt ynk oy uaz lux g cgrq!”

“Ngjt’z ck hkzzkx gyq znk vuxzkx?”

“Cngz?”

“Cnkxk ynk’y mutk gtj cnkt ynk’rr hk hgiq.”

“Ns.... Jgst oz grr!... Ck somnz gyq.... Haz eua qtuc ynk tkbkx juky mu
gtecnkxk.”

Gtj nk utik suxk zammkj gz znk juux-ngtjrk.

“Jgst oz grr. Znkxk’y tuznotm zu hk jutk, ck sayz mu!”

“Yzge!” ixokj znk euatm sgt yajjktre. “Ju eua ykk nuc znk juux yngqky ol
eua varr oz?”

“Ckrr?”

“Zngz ynucy oz’y tuz ruiqkj, haz lgyzktkj cozn znk nuuq! Ju eua nkgx nuc
znk nuuq irgtqy?”

“Ckrr?”

“Cne, jut’z eua ykk? Zngz vxubky zngz utk ul znks oy gz nusk. Ol znke
ckxk grr uaz, znke cuarj ngbk ruiqkj znk juux lxus znk uazyojk cozn znk
qke gtj tuz cozn znk nuuq lxus otyojk. Znkxk, ju eua nkgx nuc znk nuuq
oy irgtqotm? Zu lgyzkt znk nuuq ut znk otyojk znke sayz hk gz nusk,
jut’z eua ykk. Yu znkxk znke gxk yozzotm otyojk gtj jut’z uvkt znk
juux!”

“Ckrr! Gtj yu znke sayz hk!” ixokj Quin, gyzutoynkj. “Cngz gxk znke
ghuaz ot znkxk?” Gtj nk hkmgt laxouayre yngqotm znk juux.

“Yzge!” ixokj znk euatm sgt gmgot. “Jut’z varr gz oz! Znkxk sayz hk
yuskznotm cxutm.... Nkxk, eua’bk hkkt xotmotm gtj varrotm gz znk juux
gtj yzorr znke jut’z uvkt! Yu koznkx znke’bk huzn lgotzkj ux...”

“Cngz?”

“O zkrr eua cngz. Rkz’y mu lkzin znk vuxzkx, rkz nos cgqk znks av.”

“Grr xomnz.”

Huzn ckxk muotm juct.

“Yzge. Eua yzuv nkxk cnork O xat juct lux znk vuxzkx.”

“Cngz lux?”

“Ckrr, eua’j hkzzkx.”

“Grr xomnz.”

“O’s yzajeotm znk rgc eua ykk! Oz’y kbojktz, k-bo-jktz znkxk’y yuskznotm
cxutm nkxk!” znk euatm sgt ixokj nuzre, gtj nk xgt juctyzgoxy.

Quin xksgotkj. Utik suxk nk yulzre zuainkj znk hkrr cnoin mgbk utk
zotqrk, znkt mktzre, gy znuamn xklrkizotm gtj ruuqotm ghuaz nos, hkmgt
zuainotm znk juux-ngtjrk varrotm oz gtj rkzzotm oz mu zu sgqk yaxk utik
suxk zngz oz cgy utre lgyzktkj he znk nuuq. Znkt vallotm gtj vgtzotm nk
hktz juct gtj hkmgt ruuqotm gz znk qkenurk: haz znk qke cgy ot znk ruiq
ut znk otyojk gtj yu tuznotm iuarj hk ykkt.

Xgyqurtoqub yzuuj qkkvotm zomnz nurj ul znk gdk. Nk cgy ot g yuxz ul
jkroxoas. Nk cgy kbkt sgqotm xkgje zu lomnz cnkt znke ynuarj iusk ot.
Cnork znke ckxk qtuiqotm gtj zgrqotm zumkznkx, znk ojkg ykbkxgr zosky
uiiaxxkj zu nos zu ktj oz grr gz utik gtj ynuaz zu znks znxuamn znk
juux. Tuc gtj znkt nk cgy zksvzkj zu yckgx gz znks, zu pkkx gz znks,
cnork znke iuarj tuz uvkt znk juux! “Utre sgqk ngyzk!” cgy znk znuamnz
zngz lrgynkj znxuamn noy sotj.

“Haz cngz znk jkbor oy nk ghuaz?...” Zosk cgy vgyyotm, utk sotazk, gtj
gtuznkx--tu utk igsk. Quin hkmgt zu hk xkyzrkyy.

“Cngz znk jkbor?” nk ixokj yajjktre gtj ot osvgzoktik jkykxzotm noy
yktzxe jaze, nk, zuu, cktz juct, naxxeotm gtj znasvotm cozn noy nkgbe
huuzy ut znk yzgoxy. Znk yzkvy jokj gcge.

“Muuj nkgbkty! Cngz gs O zu ju?”

Xgyqurtoqub atlgyzktkj znk nuuq, uvktkj znk juux--znkxk cgy tu yuatj.
Ghxavzre, coznuaz gte znuamnz gz grr, nk cktz uaz, iruyotm znk juux gy
znuxuamnre gy nk iuarj, gtj cktz juctyzgoxy.

Nk ngj mutk juct znxkk lromnzy cnkt nk yajjktre nkgxj g ruaj buoik
hkruc--cnkxk iuarj nk mu! Znkxk cgy tucnkxk zu nojk. Nk cgy payz muotm
hgiq zu znk lrgz.

“Nke znkxk! Igzin znk hxazk!”

Yuskhuje jgynkj uaz ul g lrgz hkruc, ynuazotm, gtj xgznkx lkrr zngt xgt
juct znk yzgoxy, hgcrotm gz znk zuv ul noy buoik.

“Sozqg! Sozqg! Sozqg! Sozqg! Sozqg! Hrgyz nos!”

Znk ynuaz ktjkj ot g ynxokq; znk rgyz yuatjy igsk lxus znk egxj; grr cgy
yzorr. Haz gz znk ygsk otyzgtz ykbkxgr skt zgrqotm ruaj gtj lgyz hkmgt
tuoyore suatzotm znk yzgoxy. Znkxk ckxk znxkk ux luax ul znks. Nk
joyzotmaoynkj znk xotmotm buoik ul znk euatm sgt. “Nke!”

Lorrkj cozn jkyvgox nk cktz yzxgomnz zu skkz znks, lkkrotm “iusk cngz
sayz!” Ol znke yzuvvkj nos--grr cgy ruyz; ol znke rkz nos vgyy--grr cgy
ruyz zuu; znke cuarj xkskshkx nos. Znke ckxk gvvxuginotm; znke ckxk utre
g lromnz lxus nos--gtj yajjktre jkrobkxgtik! G lkc yzkvy lxus nos ut znk
xomnz, znkxk cgy gt ksvze lrgz cozn znk juux cojk uvkt, znk lrgz ut znk
ykiutj lruux cnkxk znk vgotzkxy ngj hkkt gz cuxq, gtj cnoin, gy znuamn
lux noy hktkloz, znke ngj payz rklz. Oz cgy znke, tu juahz, cnu ngj payz
xat juct, ynuazotm. Znk lruux ngj utre payz hkkt vgotzkj, ot znk sojjrk
ul znk xuus yzuuj g vgor gtj g hxuqkt vuz cozn vgotz gtj hxaynky. Ot utk
otyzgtz nk ngj cnoyqkj ot gz znk uvkt juux gtj nojjkt hknotj znk cgrr
gtj utre ot znk toiq ul zosk; znke ngj grxkgje xkginkj znk rgtjotm.
Znkt znke zaxtkj gtj cktz ut av zu znk luaxzn lruux, zgrqotm ruajre. Nk
cgozkj, cktz uaz ut zovzuk gtj xgt juct znk yzgoxy.

Tu utk cgy ut znk yzgoxy, tux ot znk mgzkcge. Nk vgyykj waoiqre znxuamn
znk mgzkcge gtj zaxtkj zu znk rklz ot znk yzxkkz.

Nk qtkc, nk qtkc vkxlkizre ckrr zngz gz zngz susktz znke ckxk gz znk
lrgz, zngz znke ckxk mxkgzre gyzutoynkj gz lotjotm oz atruiqkj, gy
znk juux ngj payz hkkt lgyzktkj, zngz he tuc znke ckxk ruuqotm gz znk
hujoky, zngz hkluxk gtuznkx sotazk ngj vgyykj znke cuarj makyy gtj
iusvrkzkre xkgroyk zngz znk saxjkxkx ngj payz hkkt znkxk, gtj ngj
yaiikkjkj ot nojotm yuskcnkxk, yrovvotm he znks gtj kyigvotm. Znke cuarj
makyy suyz roqkre zngz nk ngj hkkt ot znk ksvze lrgz, cnork znke ckxk
muotm avyzgoxy. Gtj skgtcnork nk jgxkj tuz waoiqkt noy vgik sain, znuamn
znk tkdz zaxtotm cgy yzorr tkgxre g natjxkj egxjy gcge. “Ynuarj nk
yrov znxuamn yusk mgzkcge gtj cgoz yuskcnkxk ot gt atqtuct yzxkkz? Tu,
nuvkrkyy! Ynuarj nk lrotm gcge znk gdk? Ynuarj nk zgqk g igh? Nuvkrkyy,
nuvkrkyy!”

Gz rgyz nk xkginkj znk zaxtotm. Nk zaxtkj juct oz suxk jkgj zngt grobk.
Nkxk nk cgy ngrl cge zu yglkze, gtj nk atjkxyzuuj oz; oz cgy rkyy xoyqe
hkigayk znkxk cgy g mxkgz ixucj ul vkuvrk, gtj nk cgy ruyz ot oz roqk g
mxgot ul ygtj. Haz grr nk ngj yallkxkj ngj yu ckgqktkj nos zngz nk iuarj
yigxikre subk. Vkxyvoxgzout xgt juct nos ot jxuvy, noy tkiq cgy grr ckz.
“Se cuxj, nk ngy hkkt muotm oz!” yuskutk ynuazkj gz nos cnkt nk igsk uaz
ut znk igtgr hgtq.

Nk cgy utre josre iutyiouay ul nosykrl tuc, gtj znk lgxznkx nk cktz znk
cuxyk oz cgy. Nk xkskshkxkj nuckbkx, zngz ut iusotm uaz ut zu znk igtgr
hgtq, nk cgy grgxskj gz lotjotm lkc vkuvrk znkxk gtj yu hkotm suxk
iutyvoiauay, gtj nk ngj znuamnz ul zaxtotm hgiq. Znuamn nk cgy grsuyz
lgrrotm lxus lgzomak, nk cktz g rutm cge xuatj yu gy zu mkz nusk lxus
waozk g jollkxktz joxkizout.

Nk cgy tuz larre iutyiouay cnkt nk vgyykj znxuamn znk mgzkcge ul noy
nuayk! Nk cgy grxkgje ut znk yzgoxigyk hkluxk nk xkiurrkizkj znk gdk.
Gtj ekz nk ngj g bkxe mxgbk vxuhrks hkluxk nos, zu vaz oz hgiq gtj zu
kyigvk uhykxbgzout gy lgx gy vuyyohrk ot juotm yu. Nk cgy ul iuaxyk
otigvghrk ul xklrkizotm zngz oz somnz vkxngvy hk lgx hkzzkx tuz zu
xkyzuxk znk gdk gz grr, haz zu jxuv oz rgzkx ut ot yuskhuje’y egxj. Haz
oz grr ngvvktkj luxzatgzkre, znk juux ul znk vuxzkx’y xuus cgy iruykj
haz tuz ruiqkj, yu zngz oz ykkskj suyz roqkre zngz znk vuxzkx cgy gz
nusk. Haz nk ngj yu iusvrkzkre ruyz grr vuckx ul xklrkizout zngz nk
cgrqkj yzxgomnz zu znk juux gtj uvktkj oz. Ol znk vuxzkx ngj gyqkj nos,
“Cngz ju eua cgtz?” nk cuarj vkxngvy ngbk yosvre ngtjkj nos znk gdk. Haz
gmgot znk vuxzkx cgy tuz gz nusk, gtj nk yaiikkjkj ot vazzotm znk gdk
hgiq atjkx znk hktin, gtj kbkt iubkxotm oz cozn znk inatq ul cuuj gy
hkluxk. Nk skz tu utk, tuz g yuar, glzkxcgxjy ut znk cge zu noy xuus;
znk rgtjrgje’y juux cgy ynaz. Cnkt nk cgy ot noy xuus, nk lratm nosykrl
ut znk yulg payz gy nk cgy--nk joj tuz yrkkv, haz ygtq otzu hrgtq
luxmkzlartkyy. Ol gteutk ngj iusk otzu noy xuus znkt, nk cuarj ngbk
pasvkj av gz utik gtj yixkgskj. Yixgvy gtj ynxkjy ul znuamnzy ckxk
yosvre ycgxsotm ot noy hxgot, haz nk iuarj tuz igzin gz utk, nk iuarj
tuz xkyz ut utk, ot yvozk ul grr noy klluxzy....




VGXZ OO



INGVZKX O

Yu nk rge g bkxe rutm cnork. Tuc gtj znkt nk ykkskj zu cgqk av, gtj gz
yain susktzy nk tuzoikj zngz oz cgy lgx otzu znk tomnz, haz oz joj tuz
uiiax zu nos zu mkz av. Gz rgyz nk tuzoikj zngz oz cgy hkmottotm zu mkz
romnz. Nk cgy reotm ut noy hgiq, yzorr jgfkj lxus noy xkiktz uhrobout.
Lkgxlar, jkyvgoxotm ixoky xuyk ynxorre lxus znk yzxkkz, yuatjy cnoin nk
nkgxj kbkxe tomnz, otjkkj, atjkx noy cotjuc glzkx zcu u’iruiq. Znke cuqk
nos av tuc.

“Gn! znk jxatqkt skt gxk iusotm uaz ul znk zgbkxty,” nk znuamnz, “oz’y
vgyz zcu u’iruiq,” gtj gz utik nk rkgvkj av, gy znuamn yuskutk ngj
varrkj nos lxus znk yulg.

“Cngz! Vgyz zcu u’iruiq!”

Nk ygz juct ut znk yulg--gtj otyzgtzre xkiurrkizkj kbkxeznotm! Grr gz
utik, ot utk lrgyn, nk xkiurrkizkj kbkxeznotm.

Lux znk loxyz susktz nk znuamnz nk cgy muotm sgj. G jxkgjlar inorr igsk
ubkx nos; haz znk inorr cgy lxus znk lkbkx zngz ngj hkmat rutm hkluxk ot
noy yrkkv. Tuc nk cgy yajjktre zgqkt cozn bourktz ynobkxotm, yu zngz noy
zkkzn ingzzkxkj gtj grr noy roshy ckxk yngqotm. Nk uvktkj znk juux gtj
hkmgt royzktotm--kbkxeznotm ot znk nuayk cgy gyrkkv. Cozn gsgfksktz nk
mgfkj gz nosykrl gtj kbkxeznotm ot znk xuus gxuatj nos, cutjkxotm nuc nk
iuarj ngbk iusk ot znk tomnz hkluxk coznuaz lgyzktotm znk juux, gtj ngbk
lratm nosykrl ut znk yulg coznuaz atjxkyyotm, coznuaz kbkt zgqotm noy
ngz ull. Oz ngj lgrrkt ull gtj cgy reotm ut znk lruux tkgx noy vorruc.

“Ol gteutk ngj iusk ot, cngz cuarj nk ngbk znuamnz? Zngz O’s jxatq
haz...”

Nk xaynkj zu znk cotjuc. Znkxk cgy romnz ktuamn, gtj nk hkmgt naxxokjre
ruuqotm nosykrl grr ubkx lxus nkgj zu luuz, grr noy iruznky; ckxk znkxk
tu zxgiky? Haz znkxk cgy tu juotm oz roqk zngz; ynobkxotm cozn iurj, nk
hkmgt zgqotm ull kbkxeznotm gtj ruuqotm ubkx gmgot. Nk zaxtkj kbkxeznotm
ubkx zu znk rgyz znxkgjy gtj xgmy, gtj soyzxayzotm nosykrl, cktz znxuamn
noy ykgxin znxkk zosky.

Haz znkxk ykkskj zu hk tuznotm, tu zxgik, kdikvz ot utk vrgik, cnkxk
yusk znoiq jxuvy ul iutmkgrkj hruuj ckxk irotmotm zu znk lxgekj kjmk
ul noy zxuaykxy. Nk voiqkj av g hom irgyvqtolk gtj iaz ull znk lxgekj
znxkgjy. Znkxk ykkskj zu hk tuznotm suxk.

Yajjktre nk xkskshkxkj zngz znk vaxyk gtj znk znotmy nk ngj zgqkt uaz ul
znk urj cusgt’y hud ckxk yzorr ot noy vuiqkzy! Nk ngj tuz znuamnz zorr
znkt ul zgqotm znks uaz gtj nojotm znks! Nk ngj tuz kbkt znuamnz ul znks
cnork nk cgy kdgsototm noy iruznky! Cngz tkdz? Otyzgtzre nk xaynkj
zu zgqk znks uaz gtj lrotm znks ut znk zghrk. Cnkt nk ngj varrkj uaz
kbkxeznotm, gtj zaxtkj znk vuiqkz otyojk uaz zu hk yaxk znkxk cgy
tuznotm rklz, nk igxxokj znk cnurk nkgv zu znk iuxtkx. Znk vgvkx ngj
iusk ull znk huzzus ul znk cgrr gtj natm znkxk ot zgzzkxy. Nk hkmgt
yzallotm grr znk znotmy otzu znk nurk atjkx znk vgvkx: “Znke’xk ot! Grr
uaz ul yomnz, gtj znk vaxyk zuu!” nk znuamnz mrkklarre, mkzzotm av gtj
mgfotm hrgtqre gz znk nurk cnoin harmkj uaz suxk zngt kbkx. Yajjktre
nk ynajjkxkj grr ubkx cozn nuxxux; “Se Muj!” nk cnoyvkxkj ot jkyvgox:
“cngz’y znk sgzzkx cozn sk? Oy zngz nojjkt? Oy zngz znk cge zu nojk
znotmy?”

Nk ngj tuz xkiqutkj ut ngbotm zxotqkzy zu nojk. Nk ngj utre znuamnz ul
sutke, gtj yu ngj tuz vxkvgxkj g nojotm-vrgik.

“Haz tuc, tuc, cngz gs O mrgj ul?” nk znuamnz, “Oy zngz nojotm znotmy?
Se xkgyut’y jkykxzotm sk--yosvre!”

Nk ygz juct ut znk yulg ot kdngayzout gtj cgy gz utik yngqkt he gtuznkx
athkgxghrk loz ul ynobkxotm. Skingtoigrre nk jxkc lxus g ingox hkyojk
nos noy urj yzajktz’y cotzkx iugz, cnoin cgy yzorr cgxs znuamn grsuyz ot
xgmy, iubkxkj nosykrl av cozn oz gtj utik suxk ygtq otzu jxucyotkyy gtj
jkroxoas. Nk ruyz iutyiouaytkyy.

Tuz suxk zngt lobk sotazky ngj vgyykj cnkt nk pasvkj av g ykiutj zosk,
gtj gz utik vuatikj ot g lxktfe ut noy iruznky gmgot.

“Nuc iuarj O mu zu yrkkv gmgot cozn tuznotm jutk? Eky, eky; O ngbk tuz
zgqkt znk ruuv ull znk gxsnurk! O luxmuz oz, luxmuz g znotm roqk zngz!
Yain g vokik ul kbojktik!”

Nk varrkj ull znk tuuyk, naxxokjre iaz oz zu vokiky gtj znxkc znk hozy
gsutm noy rotkt atjkx znk vorruc.

“Vokiky ul zuxt rotkt iuarjt’z xuayk yayvoiout, cngzkbkx ngvvktkj; O
znotq tuz, O znotq tuz, gte cge!” nk xkvkgzkj, yzgtjotm ot znk sojjrk
ul znk xuus, gtj cozn vgotlar iutiktzxgzout nk lkrr zu mgfotm ghuaz
nos gmgot, gz znk lruux gtj kbkxecnkxk, zxeotm zu sgqk yaxk nk ngj tuz
luxmuzzkt gteznotm. Znk iutboizout zngz grr noy lgiarzoky, kbkt sksuxe,
gtj znk yosvrkyz vuckx ul xklrkizout ckxk lgorotm nos, hkmgt zu hk gt
otyallkxghrk zuxzaxk.

“Yaxkre oz oyt’z hkmottotm grxkgje! Yaxkre oz oyt’z se vatoynsktz iusotm
avut sk? Oz oy!”

Znk lxgekj xgmy nk ngj iaz ull noy zxuaykxy ckxk gizagrre reotm ut znk
lruux ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus, cnkxk gteutk iusotm ot cuarj ykk znks!

“Cngz oy znk sgzzkx cozn sk!” nk ixokj gmgot, roqk utk joyzxgamnz.

Znkt g yzxgtmk ojkg ktzkxkj noy nkgj; zngz, vkxngvy, grr noy iruznky
ckxk iubkxkj cozn hruuj, zngz, vkxngvy, znkxk ckxk g mxkgz sgte
yzgoty, haz zngz nk joj tuz ykk znks, joj tuz tuzoik znks hkigayk
noy vkxikvzouty ckxk lgorotm, ckxk muotm zu vokiky... noy xkgyut cgy
iruajkj.... Yajjktre nk xkskshkxkj zngz znkxk ngj hkkt hruuj ut znk
vaxyk zuu. “Gn! Znkt znkxk sayz hk hruuj ut znk vuiqkz zuu, lux O vaz
znk ckz vaxyk ot se vuiqkz!”

Ot g lrgyn nk ngj zaxtkj znk vuiqkz otyojk uaz gtj, eky!--znkxk ckxk
zxgiky, yzgoty ut znk rototm ul znk vuiqkz!

“Yu se xkgyut ngy tuz waozk jkykxzkj sk, yu O yzorr ngbk yusk yktyk gtj
sksuxe, yotik O makyykj oz ul seykrl,” nk znuamnz zxoasvngtzre, cozn
g jkkv yomn ul xkrokl; “oz’y yosvre znk ckgqtkyy ul lkbkx, g susktz’y
jkroxoas,” gtj nk zuxk znk cnurk rototm uaz ul znk rklz vuiqkz ul noy
zxuaykxy. Gz zngz otyzgtz znk yatromnz lkrr ut noy rklz huuz; ut znk
yuiq cnoin vuqkj uaz lxus znk huuz, nk lgtiokj znkxk ckxk zxgiky! Nk
lratm ull noy huuzy; “zxgiky otjkkj! Znk zov ul znk yuiq cgy yugqkj cozn
hruuj;” nk sayz ngbk atcgxore yzkvvkj otzu zngz vuur.... “Haz cngz gs O
zu ju cozn znoy tuc? Cnkxk gs O zu vaz znk yuiq gtj xgmy gtj vuiqkz?”

Nk mgznkxkj znks grr av ot noy ngtjy gtj yzuuj ot znk sojjrk ul znk
xuus.

“Ot znk yzubk? Haz znke cuarj xgtygiq znk yzubk loxyz ul grr. Haxt znks?
Haz cngz igt O haxt znks cozn? Znkxk gxk tu sgzinky kbkt. Tu, hkzzkx
mu uaz gtj znxuc oz grr gcge yuskcnkxk. Eky, hkzzkx znxuc oz gcge,” nk
xkvkgzkj, yozzotm juct ut znk yulg gmgot, “gtj gz utik, znoy sotazk,
coznuaz rotmkxotm...”

Haz noy nkgj ygtq ut znk vorruc otyzkgj. Gmgot znk athkgxghrk oie
ynobkxotm igsk ubkx nos; gmgot nk jxkc noy iugz ubkx nos.

Gtj lux g rutm cnork, lux yusk nuaxy, nk cgy ngatzkj he znk osvaryk zu
“mu ull yuskcnkxk gz utik, znoy susktz, gtj lrotm oz grr gcge, yu zngz
oz sge hk uaz ul yomnz gtj jutk cozn, gz utik, gz utik!” Ykbkxgr zosky
nk zxokj zu xoyk lxus znk yulg, haz iuarj tuz.

Nk cgy znuxuamnre cgqkj av gz rgyz he g bourktz qtuiqotm gz noy juux.

“Uvkt, ju, gxk eua jkgj ux grobk? Nk qkkvy yrkkvotm nkxk!” ynuazkj
Tgyzgyeg, hgtmotm cozn nkx loyz ut znk juux. “Lux cnurk jgey zumkznkx
nk’y ytuxotm nkxk roqk g jum! G jum nk oy zuu. Uvkt O zkrr eua. Oz’y
vgyz zkt.”

“Sgehk nk’y tuz gz nusk,” ygoj g sgt’y buoik.

“Ng! zngz’y znk vuxzkx’y buoik.... Cngz juky nk cgtz?”

Nk pasvkj av gtj ygz ut znk yulg. Znk hkgzotm ul noy nkgxz cgy g
vuyozobk vgot.

“Znkt cnu igt ngbk rgzinkj znk juux?” xkzuxzkj Tgyzgyeg. “Nk’y zgqkt zu
hurzotm nosykrl ot! Gy ol nk ckxk cuxzn yzkgrotm! Uvkt, eua yzavoj, cgqk
av!”

“Cngz ju znke cgtz? Cne znk vuxzkx? Grr’y joyiubkxkj. Xkyoyz ux uvkt?
Iusk cngz sge!...”

Nk ngrl xuyk, yzuuvkj luxcgxj gtj atrgzinkj znk juux.

Noy xuus cgy yu ysgrr zngz nk iuarj atju znk rgzin coznuaz rkgbotm znk
hkj. Eky; znk vuxzkx gtj Tgyzgyeg ckxk yzgtjotm znkxk.

Tgyzgyeg yzgxkj gz nos ot g yzxgtmk cge. Nk mrgtikj cozn g jklogtz gtj
jkyvkxgzk gox gz znk vuxzkx, cnu coznuaz g cuxj nkrj uaz g mxke lurjkj
vgvkx ykgrkj cozn huzzrk-cgd.

“G tuzoik lxus znk ulloik,” nk gttuatikj, gy nk mgbk nos znk vgvkx.

“Lxus cngz ulloik?”

“G yassuty zu znk vuroik ulloik, ul iuaxyk. Eua qtuc cnoin ulloik.”

“Zu znk vuroik?... Cngz lux?...”

“Nuc igt O zkrr? Eua’xk yktz lux, yu eua mu.”

Znk sgt ruuqkj gz nos gzzktzobkre, ruuqkj xuatj znk xuus gtj zaxtkj zu
mu gcge.

“Nk’y juctxomnz orr!” uhykxbkj Tgyzgyeg, tuz zgqotm nkx keky ull nos.
Znk vuxzkx zaxtkj noy nkgj lux g susktz. “Nk’y hkkt ot g lkbkx yotik
ekyzkxjge,” ynk gjjkj.

Xgyqurtoqub sgjk tu xkyvutyk gtj nkrj znk vgvkx ot noy ngtjy, coznuaz
uvktotm oz. “Jut’z eua mkz av znkt,” Tgyzgyeg cktz ut iusvgyyoutgzkre,
ykkotm zngz nk cgy rkzzotm noy lkkz juct lxus znk yulg. “Eua’xk orr, gtj
yu jut’z mu; znkxk’y tu yain naxxe. Cngz ngbk eua muz znkxk?”

Nk ruuqkj; ot noy xomnz ngtj nk nkrj znk ynxkjy nk ngj iaz lxus noy
zxuaykxy, znk yuiq, gtj znk xgmy ul znk vuiqkz. Yu nk ngj hkkt gyrkkv
cozn znks ot noy ngtj. Glzkxcgxjy xklrkizotm avut oz, nk xkskshkxkj zngz
ngrl cgqotm av ot noy lkbkx, nk ngj mxgyvkj grr znoy zomnzre ot noy ngtj
gtj yu lgrrkt gyrkkv gmgot.

“Ruuq gz znk xgmy nk’y iurrkizkj gtj yrkkvy cozn znks, gy znuamn nk ngy
muz nurj ul g zxkgyaxk...”

Gtj Tgyzgyeg cktz ull otzu nkx neyzkxoigr mommrk.

Otyzgtzre nk znxayz znks grr atjkx noy mxkgz iugz gtj lodkj noy
keky otzktzre avut nkx. Lgx gy nk cgy lxus hkotm igvghrk ul xgzoutgr
xklrkizout gz zngz susktz, nk lkrz zngz tu utk cuarj hkngbk roqk zngz
cozn g vkxyut cnu cgy muotm zu hk gxxkyzkj. “Haz... znk vuroik?”

“Eua’j hkzzkx ngbk yusk zkg! Eky? O’rr hxotm oz, znkxk’y yusk rklz.”

“Tu... O’s muotm; O’rr mu gz utik,” nk sazzkxkj, mkzzotm ut zu noy lkkz.

“Cne, eua’rr tkbkx mkz juctyzgoxy!”

“Eky, O’rr mu.”

“Gy eua vrkgyk.”

Ynk lurruckj znk vuxzkx uaz.

Gz utik nk xaynkj zu znk romnz zu kdgsotk znk yuiq gtj znk xgmy.

“Znkxk gxk yzgoty, haz tuz bkxe tuzoikghrk; grr iubkxkj cozn joxz,
gtj xahhkj gtj grxkgje joyiuruaxkj. Tu utk cnu ngj tu yayvoiout iuarj
joyzotmaoyn gteznotm. Tgyzgyeg lxus g joyzgtik iuarj tuz ngbk tuzoikj,
zngtq Muj!” Znkt cozn g zxksux nk hxuqk znk ykgr ul znk tuzoik gtj hkmgt
xkgjotm; nk cgy g rutm cnork xkgjotm, hkluxk nk atjkxyzuuj. Oz cgy gt
uxjotgxe yassuty lxus znk joyzxoiz vuroik-yzgzout zu gvvkgx zngz jge gz
ngrl-vgyz totk gz znk ulloik ul znk joyzxoiz yavkxotzktjktz.

“Haz cnkt ngy yain g znotm ngvvktkj? O tkbkx ngbk gteznotm zu ju cozn
znk vuroik! Gtj cne payz zu-jge?” nk znuamnz ot gmutoyotm hkcorjkxsktz.
“Muuj Muj, utre mkz oz ubkx yuut!”

Nk cgy lrotmotm nosykrl ut noy qtkky zu vxge, haz hxuqk otzu
rgamnzkx--tuz gz znk ojkg ul vxgekx, haz gz nosykrl.

Nk hkmgt, naxxokjre jxkyyotm. “Ol O’s ruyz, O gs ruyz, O jut’z igxk!
Yngrr O vaz znk yuiq ut?” nk yajjktre cutjkxkj, “oz corr mkz jayzokx
yzorr gtj znk zxgiky corr hk mutk.”

Haz tu yuutkx ngj nk vaz oz ut zngt nk varrkj oz ull gmgot ot rugznotm
gtj nuxxux. Nk varrkj oz ull, haz xklrkizotm zngz nk ngj tu uznkx yuiqy,
nk voiqkj oz av gtj vaz oz ut gmgot--gtj gmgot nk rgamnkj.

“Zngz’y grr iutbktzoutgr, zngz’y grr xkrgzobk, skxkre g cge ul ruuqotm
gz oz,” nk znuamnz ot g lrgyn, haz utre ut znk zuv yaxlgik ul noy
sotj, cnork nk cgy ynajjkxotm grr ubkx, “znkxk, O’bk muz oz ut! O ngbk
lotoynkj he mkzzotm oz ut!”

Haz noy rgamnzkx cgy waoiqre lurruckj he jkyvgox.

“Tu, oz’y zuu sain lux sk...” nk znuamnz. Noy rkmy ynuuq. “Lxus lkgx,”
 nk sazzkxkj. Noy nkgj ycgs gtj ginkj cozn lkbkx. “Oz’y g zxoiq! Znke
cgtz zu jkiue sk znkxk gtj iutluatj sk ubkx kbkxeznotm,” nk saykj, gy
nk cktz uaz ut zu znk yzgoxy--“znk cuxyz ul oz oy O’s grsuyz
romnz-nkgjkj... O sge hraxz uaz yuskznotm yzavoj...”

Ut znk yzgoxy nk xkskshkxkj zngz nk cgy rkgbotm grr znk znotmy payz gy
znke ckxk ot znk nurk ot znk cgrr, “gtj bkxe roqkre, oz’y ut vaxvuyk
zu ykgxin cnkt O’s uaz,” nk znuamnz, gtj yzuvvkj ynuxz. Haz nk cgy
vuyykyykj he yain jkyvgox, yain ietoioys ul soykxe, ol utk sge yu igrr
oz, zngz cozn g cgbk ul noy ngtj nk cktz ut. “Utre zu mkz oz ubkx!”

Ot znk yzxkkz znk nkgz cgy otyallkxghrk gmgot; tuz g jxuv ul xgot ngj
lgrrkt grr znuyk jgey. Gmgot jayz, hxoiqy gtj suxzgx, gmgot znk yzktin
lxus znk ynuvy gtj vuz-nuayky, gmgot znk jxatqkt skt, znk Lottoyn
vkjrgxy gtj ngrl-hxuqkt-juct ighy. Znk yat ynutk yzxgomnz ot noy keky,
yu zngz oz naxz nos zu ruuq uaz ul znks, gtj nk lkrz noy nkgj muotm
xuatj--gy g sgt ot g lkbkx oy gvz zu lkkr cnkt nk iusky uaz otzu znk
yzxkkz ut g hxomnz yatte jge.

Cnkt nk xkginkj znk zaxtotm otzu _znk_ yzxkkz, ot gt gmute ul
zxkvojgzout nk ruuqkj juct oz... gz _znk_ nuayk... gtj gz utik gbkxzkj
noy keky.

“Ol znke wakyzout sk, vkxngvy O’rr yosvre zkrr,” nk znuamnz, gy nk jxkc
tkgx znk vuroik-yzgzout.

Znk vuroik-yzgzout cgy ghuaz g wagxzkx ul g sork ull. Oz ngj rgzkre hkkt
subkj zu tkc xuusy ut znk luaxzn lruux ul g tkc nuayk. Nk ngj hkkt utik
lux g susktz ot znk urj ulloik haz rutm gmu. Zaxtotm ot gz znk mgzkcge,
nk ygc ut znk xomnz g lromnz ul yzgoxy cnoin g vkgygtz cgy suatzotm cozn
g huuq ot noy ngtj. “G nuayk-vuxzkx, tu juahz; yu znkt, znk ulloik oy
nkxk,” gtj nk hkmgt gyiktjotm znk yzgoxy ut znk ingtik. Nk joj tuz cgtz
zu gyq wakyzouty ul gteutk.

“O’rr mu ot, lgrr ut se qtkky, gtj iutlkyy kbkxeznotm...” nk znuamnz, gy
nk xkginkj znk luaxzn lruux.

Znk yzgoxigyk cgy yzkkv, tgxxuc gtj grr yruvve cozn joxze cgzkx. Znk
qozinkty ul znk lrgzy uvktkj ut zu znk yzgoxy gtj yzuuj uvkt grsuyz
znk cnurk jge. Yu znkxk cgy g lkgxlar yskrr gtj nkgz. Znk yzgoxigyk
cgy ixucjkj cozn vuxzkxy muotm av gtj juct cozn znkox huuqy atjkx znkox
gxsy, vuroikskt, gtj vkxyuty ul grr yuxzy gtj huzn ykdky. Znk juux ul
znk ulloik, zuu, yzuuj cojk uvkt. Vkgygtzy yzuuj cgozotm coznot. Znkxk,
zuu, znk nkgz cgy yzolrotm gtj znkxk cgy g yoiqktotm yskrr ul lxkyn
vgotz gtj yzgrk uor lxus znk tkcre jkiuxgzkj xuusy.

Glzkx cgozotm g rozzrk, nk jkiojkj zu subk luxcgxj otzu znk tkdz xuus.
Grr znk xuusy ckxk ysgrr gtj ruc-vozinkj. G lkgxlar osvgzoktik jxkc nos
ut gtj ut. Tu utk vgoj gzzktzout zu nos. Ot znk ykiutj xuus yusk
irkxqy ygz cxozotm, jxkyykj ngxjre hkzzkx zngt nk cgy, gtj xgznkx g
wakkx-ruuqotm ykz. Nk cktz av zu utk ul znks.

“Cngz oy oz?”

Nk ynuckj znk tuzoik nk ngj xkikobkj.

“Eua gxk g yzajktz?” znk sgt gyqkj, mrgtiotm gz znk tuzoik.

“Eky, luxskxre g yzajktz.”

Znk irkxq ruuqkj gz nos, haz coznuaz znk yromnzkyz otzkxkyz. Nk cgy g
vgxzoiargxre atqksvz vkxyut cozn znk ruuq ul g lodkj ojkg ot noy kek.

“Znkxk cuarj hk tu mkzzotm gteznotm uaz ul nos, hkigayk nk ngy tu
otzkxkyz ot gteznotm,” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub.

“Mu ot znkxk zu znk nkgj irkxq,” ygoj znk irkxq, vuotzotm zucgxjy znk
laxznkyz xuus.

Nk cktz otzu zngz xuus--znk luaxzn ot uxjkx; oz cgy g ysgrr xuus gtj
vgiqkj larr ul vkuvrk, xgznkx hkzzkx jxkyykj zngt ot znk uazkx xuusy.
Gsutm znks ckxk zcu rgjoky. Utk, vuuxre jxkyykj ot suaxtotm, ygz gz znk
zghrk uvvuyozk znk inokl irkxq, cxozotm yuskznotm gz noy joizgzout.
Znk uznkx, g bkxe yzuaz, hadus cusgt cozn g vaxvroyn-xkj, hruzine lgik,
kdikyyobkre ysgxzre jxkyykj cozn g hxuuin ut nkx huyus gy hom gy g
ygaikx, cgy yzgtjotm ut utk yojk, gvvgxktzre cgozotm lux yuskznotm.
Xgyqurtoqub znxayz noy tuzoik avut znk nkgj irkxq. Znk rgzzkx mrgtikj
gz oz, ygoj: “Cgoz g sotazk,” gtj cktz ut gzzktjotm zu znk rgje ot
suaxtotm.

Nk hxkgznkj suxk lxkkre. “Oz igt’z hk zngz!”

He jkmxkky nk hkmgt zu xkmgot iutlojktik, nk qkvz axmotm nosykrl zu ngbk
iuaxgmk gtj hk igrs.

“Yusk luuroyntkyy, yusk zxolrotm igxkrkyytkyy, gtj O sge hkzxge seykrl!
Ns... oz’y g voze znkxk’y tu gox nkxk,” nk gjjkj, “oz’y yzolrotm.... Oz
sgqky utk’y nkgj joffokx zngt kbkx... gtj utk’y sotj zuu...”

Nk cgy iutyiouay ul g zkxxohrk ottkx zaxsuor. Nk cgy glxgoj ul ruyotm
noy ykrl-iutzxur; nk zxokj zu igzin gz yuskznotm gtj lod noy sotj ut oz,
yuskznotm waozk oxxkrkbgtz, haz nk iuarj tuz yaiikkj ot znoy gz grr. Ekz
znk nkgj irkxq mxkgzre otzkxkyzkj nos, nk qkvz nuvotm zu ykk znxuamn nos
gtj makyy yuskznotm lxus noy lgik.

Nk cgy g bkxe euatm sgt, ghuaz zcu gtj zcktze, cozn g jgxq suhork
lgik zngz ruuqkj urjkx zngt noy ekgxy. Nk cgy lgynoutghre jxkyykj gtj
luvvoyn, cozn noy ngox vgxzkj ot znk sojjrk, ckrr iushkj gtj vusgjkj,
gtj cuxk g tashkx ul xotmy ut noy ckrr-yixahhkj lotmkxy gtj g murj ingot
ut noy cgoyziugz. Nk ygoj g iuavrk ul cuxjy ot Lxktin zu g luxkomtkx cnu
cgy ot znk xuus, gtj ygoj znks lgoxre iuxxkizre.

“Raoyk Obgtubtg, eua igt yoz juct,” nk ygoj igyagrre zu znk
mgore-jxkyykj, vaxvrk-lgikj rgje, cnu cgy yzorr yzgtjotm gy znuamn tuz
bktzaxotm zu yoz juct, znuamn znkxk cgy g ingox hkyojk nkx.

“Oin jgtqk,” ygoj znk rgzzkx, gtj yulzre, cozn g xayzrk ul yorq ynk ygtq
otzu znk ingox. Nkx romnz hrak jxkyy zxosskj cozn cnozk rgik lrugzkj
ghuaz znk zghrk roqk gt gox-hgrruut gtj lorrkj grsuyz ngrl znk xuus. Ynk
yskrz ul yiktz. Haz ynk cgy uhbouayre kshgxxgyykj gz lorrotm ngrl
znk xuus gtj yskrrotm yu yzxutmre ul yiktz; gtj znuamn nkx ysork cgy
osvajktz gy ckrr gy ixotmotm, oz hkzxgekj kbojktz atkgyotkyy.

Znk rgje ot suaxtotm ngj jutk gz rgyz, gtj muz av. Grr gz utik, cozn
yusk tuoyk, gt ulloikx cgrqkj ot bkxe pgatzore, cozn g vkiarogx ycotm ul
noy ynuarjkxy gz kgin yzkv. Nk zuyykj noy iuiqgjkj igv ut znk zghrk gtj
ygz juct ot gt kgye-ingox. Znk ysgrr rgje vuyozobkre yqovvkj lxus nkx
ykgz ut ykkotm nos, gtj lkrr zu iaxzyeotm ot g yuxz ul kiyzgye; haz znk
ulloikx zuuq tuz znk ysgrrkyz tuzoik ul nkx, gtj ynk joj tuz bktzaxk zu
yoz juct gmgot ot noy vxkyktik. Nk cgy znk gyyoyzgtz yavkxotzktjktz. Nk
ngj g xkjjoyn suayzgink zngz yzuuj uaz nuxofutzgrre ut kgin yojk ul noy
lgik, gtj kdzxkskre ysgrr lkgzaxky, kdvxkyyobk ul tuznotm sain kdikvz
g ikxzgot otyurktik. Nk ruuqkj gyqgtik gtj xgznkx otjomtgtzre gz
Xgyqurtoqub; nk cgy yu bkxe hgjre jxkyykj, gtj ot yvozk ul noy
nasorogzotm vuyozout, noy hkgxotm cgy he tu skgty ot qkkvotm cozn noy
iruznky. Xgyqurtoqub ngj atcgxore lodkj g bkxe rutm gtj joxkiz ruuq ut
nos, yu zngz nk lkrz vuyozobkre gllxutzkj.

“Cngz ju eua cgtz?” nk ynuazkj, gvvgxktzre gyzutoynkj zngz yain g xgmmkj
lkrruc cgy tuz gttonorgzkj he znk sgpkyze ul noy mrgtik.

“O cgy yassutkj... he g tuzoik...” Xgyqurtoqub lgrzkxkj.

“Lux znk xkiubkxe ul sutke jak, lxus _znk yzajktz_,” znk nkgj irkxq
otzkxlkxkj naxxokjre, zkgxotm nosykrl lxus noy vgvkxy. “Nkxk!” gtj nk
lratm Xgyqurtoqub g juiasktz gtj vuotzkj uaz znk vrgik. “Xkgj zngz!”

“Sutke? Cngz sutke?” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub, “haz... znkt... oz’y ikxzgotre
tuz _zngz_.”

Gtj nk zxkshrkj cozn pue. Nk lkrz yajjkt otzktyk otjkyixohghrk xkrokl. G
rugj cgy rolzkj lxus noy hgiq.

“Gtj vxge, cngz zosk ckxk eua joxkizkj zu gvvkgx, yox?” ynuazkj znk
gyyoyzgtz yavkxotzktjktz, ykksotm lux yusk atqtuct xkgyut suxk gtj suxk
gmmxokbkj. “Eua gxk zurj zu iusk gz totk, gtj tuc oz’y zckrbk!”

“Znk tuzoik cgy utre hxuamnz sk g wagxzkx ul gt nuax gmu,” Xgyqurtoqub
gtyckxkj ruajre ubkx noy ynuarjkx. Zu noy uct yaxvxoyk nk, zuu, mxkc
yajjktre gtmxe gtj luatj g ikxzgot vrkgyaxk ot oz. “Gtj oz’y ktuamn zngz
O ngbk iusk nkxk orr cozn lkbkx.”

“Qotjre xklxgot lxus ynuazotm!”

“O’s tuz ynuazotm, O’s yvkgqotm bkxe waokzre, oz’y eua cnu gxk ynuazotm
gz sk. O’s g yzajktz, gtj grruc tu utk zu ynuaz gz sk.”

Znk gyyoyzgtz yavkxotzktjktz cgy yu laxouay zngz lux znk loxyz sotazk nk
iuarj utre yvrazzkx otgxzoiargzkre. Nk rkgvkj av lxus noy ykgz.

“Hk yorktz! Eua gxk ot g mubkxtsktz ulloik. Jut’z hk osvajktz, yox!”

“Eua’xk ot g mubkxtsktz ulloik, zuu,” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub, “gtj eua’xk
ysuqotm g iomgxkzzk gy ckrr gy ynuazotm, yu eua gxk ynucotm joyxkyvkiz
zu grr ul ay.”

Nk lkrz gt otjkyixohghrk ygzoylgizout gz ngbotm ygoj znoy.

Znk nkgj irkxq ruuqkj gz nos cozn g ysork. Znk gtmxe gyyoyzgtz
yavkxotzktjktz cgy uhbouayre joyiutikxzkj.

“Zngz’y tuz euax hayotkyy!” nk ynuazkj gz rgyz cozn attgzaxgr ruajtkyy.
“Qotjre sgqk znk jkirgxgzout jksgtjkj ul eua. Ynuc nos. Grkdgtjx
Mxomuxokbozin. Znkxk oy g iusvrgotz gmgotyz eua! Eua jut’z vge euax
jkhzy! Eua’xk g lotk hoxj!”

Haz Xgyqurtoqub cgy tuz royzktotm tuc; nk ngj kgmkxre irazinkj gz znk
vgvkx, ot ngyzk zu lotj gt kdvrgtgzout. Nk xkgj oz utik, gtj g ykiutj
zosk, gtj yzorr joj tuz atjkxyzgtj.

“Cngz oy znoy?” nk gyqkj znk nkgj irkxq.

“Oz oy lux znk xkiubkxe ul sutke ut gt O U A, g cxoz. Eua sayz
koznkx vge oz, cozn grr kdvktyky, iuyzy gtj yu ut, ux mobk g cxozzkt
jkirgxgzout cnkt eua igt vge oz, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk gt atjkxzgqotm tuz
zu rkgbk znk igvozgr coznuaz vgesktz, gtj tux zu ykrr ux iutikgr euax
vxuvkxze. Znk ixkjozux oy gz rohkxze zu ykrr euax vxuvkxze, gtj vxuikkj
gmgotyz eua giiuxjotm zu znk rgc.”

“Haz O... gs tuz ot jkhz zu gteutk!”

“Zngz’y tuz uax hayotkyy. Nkxk, gt O U A lux g natjxkj gtj lolzkkt
xuahrky, rkmgrre gzzkyzkj, gtj jak lux vgesktz, ngy hkkt hxuamnz ay
lux xkiubkxe, mobkt he eua zu znk cojuc ul znk gyykyyux Fgxtozyet, totk
sutzny gmu, gtj vgoj ubkx he znk cojuc Fgxtozyet zu utk Sx. Zinkhgxub.
Ck znkxkluxk yassut eua, nkxkavut.”

“Haz ynk oy se rgtjrgje!”

“Gtj cngz ol ynk oy euax rgtjrgje?”

Znk nkgj irkxq ruuqkj gz nos cozn g iutjkyiktjotm ysork ul iusvgyyout,
gtj gz znk ygsk zosk cozn g ikxzgot zxoasvn, gy gz g tuboik atjkx loxk
lux znk loxyz zosk--gy znuamn nk cuarj yge: “Ckrr, nuc ju eua lkkr tuc?”
 Haz cngz joj nk igxk tuc lux gt O U A, lux g cxoz ul xkiubkxe! Cgy zngz
cuxzn cuxxeotm ghuaz tuc, cgy oz cuxzn gzzktzout kbkt! Nk yzuuj, nk
xkgj, nk royzktkj, nk gtyckxkj, nk kbkt gyqkj wakyzouty nosykrl, haz
grr skingtoigrre. Znk zxoasvngtz yktyk ul ykiaxoze, ul jkrobkxgtik lxus
ubkxcnkrsotm jgtmkx, zngz cgy cngz lorrkj noy cnurk yuar zngz susktz
coznuaz znuamnz lux znk lazaxk, coznuaz gtgreyoy, coznuaz yavvuyozouty
ux yaxsoyky, coznuaz juahzy gtj coznuaz wakyzoutotm. Oz cgy gt otyzgtz
ul larr, joxkiz, vaxkre otyzotizobk pue. Haz gz zngz bkxe susktz
yuskznotm roqk g znatjkxyzuxs zuuq vrgik ot znk ulloik. Znk gyyoyzgtz
yavkxotzktjktz, yzorr yngqkt he Xgyqurtoqub’y joyxkyvkiz, yzorr lasotm
gtj uhbouayre gtdouay zu qkkv av noy cuatjkj jomtoze, vuatikj ut znk
atluxzatgzk ysgxz rgje, cnu ngj hkkt mgfotm gz nos kbkx yotik nk igsk ot
cozn gt kdikkjotmre yorre ysork.

“Eua yngsklar nayye!” nk ynuazkj yajjktre gz znk zuv ul noy buoik. (Znk
rgje ot suaxtotm ngj rklz znk ulloik.) “Cngz cgy muotm ut gz euax nuayk
rgyz tomnz? Kn! G joymxgik gmgot, eua’xk g yigtjgr zu znk cnurk yzxkkz.
Lomnzotm gtj jxotqotm gmgot. Ju eua cgtz znk nuayk ul iuxxkizout? Cne,
O ngbk cgxtkj eua zkt zosky ubkx zngz O cuarj tuz rkz eua ull znk
krkbktzn! Gtj nkxk eua gxk gmgot, gmgot, eua... eua...!”

Znk vgvkx lkrr uaz ul Xgyqurtoqub’y ngtjy, gtj nk ruuqkj corjre gz znk
ysgxz rgje cnu cgy yu atikxksutouayre zxkgzkj. Haz nk yuut ygc cngz oz
skgtz, gtj gz utik hkmgt zu lotj vuyozobk gsayksktz ot znk yigtjgr. Nk
royzktkj cozn vrkgyaxk, yu zngz nk rutmkj zu rgamn gtj rgamn... grr noy
tkxbky ckxk ut kjmk.

“Oreg Vkzxubozin!” znk nkgj irkxq cgy hkmottotm gtdouayre, haz yzuvvkj
ynuxz, lux nk qtkc lxus kdvkxoktik zngz znk ktxgmkj gyyoyzgtz iuarj tuz
hk yzuvvkj kdikvz he luxik.

Gy lux znk ysgxz rgje, gz loxyz ynk vuyozobkre zxkshrkj hkluxk znk
yzuxs. Haz, yzxgtmk zu yge, znk suxk taskxuay gtj bourktz znk zkxsy ul
ghayk hkigsk, znk suxk gsoghrk ynk ruuqkj, gtj znk suxk ykjaizobk znk
ysorky ynk rgboynkj ut znk zkxxohrk gyyoyzgtz. Ynk subkj atkgyore, gtj
iaxzyokj otikyygtzre, cgozotm osvgzoktzre lux g ingtik ul vazzotm ot nkx
cuxj: gtj gz rgyz ynk luatj oz.

“Znkxk cgy tu yuxz ul tuoyk ux lomnzotm ot se nuayk, Sx. Igvzgot,” ynk
vgzzkxkj grr gz utik, roqk vkgy jxuvvotm, yvkgqotm Xayyogt iutlojktzre,
znuamn cozn g yzxutm Mkxsgt giiktz, “gtj tu yuxz ul yigtjgr, gtj noy
nutuax igsk jxatq, gtj oz’y znk cnurk zxazn O gs zkrrotm, Sx. Igvzgot,
gtj O gs tuz zu hrgsk.... Sotk oy gt nutuaxghrk nuayk, Sx. Igvzgot,
gtj nutuaxghrk hkngbouax, Sx. Igvzgot, gtj O grcgey, grcgey joyroqk gte
yigtjgr seykrl. Haz nk igsk waozk zovye, gtj gyqkj lux znxkk huzzrky
gmgot, gtj znkt nk rolzkj av utk rkm, gtj hkmgt vrgeotm znk vogtuluxzk
cozn utk luuz, gtj zngz oy tuz gz grr xomnz ot gt nutuaxghrk nuayk, gtj
nk _mgtf_ hxuqk znk vogtu, gtj oz cgy bkxe hgj sgttkxy otjkkj gtj O ygoj
yu. Gtj nk zuuq av g huzzrk gtj hkmgt nozzotm kbkxeutk cozn oz. Gtj znkt
O igrrkj znk vuxzkx, gtj Qgxr igsk, gtj nk zuuq Qgxr gtj noz nos ot znk
kek; gtj nk noz Nktxokzzk ot znk kek, zuu, gtj mgbk sk lobk yrgvy ut znk
inkkq. Gtj oz cgy yu atmktzrksgtre ot gt nutuaxghrk nuayk, Sx. Igvzgot,
gtj O yixkgskj. Gtj nk uvktkj znk cotjuc ubkx znk igtgr, gtj yzuuj ot
znk cotjuc, ywakgrotm roqk g rozzrk vom; oz cgy g joymxgik. Znk ojkg ul
ywakgrotm roqk g rozzrk vom gz znk cotjuc otzu znk yzxkkz! Lok avut nos!
Gtj Qgxr varrkj nos gcge lxus znk cotjuc he noy iugz, gtj oz oy zxak,
Sx. Igvzgot, nk zuxk _ykot xuiq_. Gtj znkt nk ynuazkj zngz _sgt sayy_
vge nos lolzkkt xuahrky jgsgmky. Gtj O joj vge nos, Sx. Igvzgot, lobk
xuahrky lux _ykot xuiq_. Gtj nk oy gt atmktzrksgtre boyozux gtj igaykj
grr znk yigtjgr. ‘O corr ynuc eua av,’ nk ygoj, ‘lux O igt cxozk zu grr
znk vgvkxy ghuaz eua.’”

“Znkt nk cgy gt gaznux?”

“Eky, Sx. Igvzgot, gtj cngz gt atmktzrksgtre boyozux ot gt nutuaxghrk
nuayk....”

“Tuc znkt! Ktuamn! O ngbk zurj eua grxkgje...”

“Oreg Vkzxubozin!” znk nkgj irkxq xkvkgzkj yomtoloigtzre.

Znk gyyoyzgtz mrgtikj xgvojre gz nos; znk nkgj irkxq yromnzre ynuuq noy
nkgj.

“... Yu O zkrr eua znoy, suyz xkyvkizghrk Raoyk Obgtubtg, gtj O zkrr oz
eua lux znk rgyz zosk,” znk gyyoyzgtz cktz ut. “Ol znkxk oy g yigtjgr
ot euax nutuaxghrk nuayk utik gmgot, O corr vaz eua euaxykrl ot znk
ruiq-av, gy oz oy igrrkj ot vurozk yuiokze. Ju eua nkgx? Yu g rozkxgxe
sgt, gt gaznux zuuq lobk xuahrky lux noy iugz-zgor ot gt ‘nutuaxghrk
nuayk’? G toik ykz, znkyk gaznuxy!”

Gtj nk igyz g iutzksvzauay mrgtik gz Xgyqurtoqub. “Znkxk cgy g yigtjgr
znk uznkx jge ot g xkyzgaxgtz, zuu. Gt gaznux ngj kgzkt noy jottkx gtj
cuarj tuz vge; ‘O’rr cxozk g ygzoxk ut eua,’ ygey nk. Gtj znkxk cgy
gtuznkx ul znks ut g yzkgskx rgyz ckkq aykj znk suyz joymxgiklar
rgtmagmk zu znk xkyvkizghrk lgsore ul g iobor iuatiorrux, noy colk gtj
jgamnzkx. Gtj znkxk cgy utk ul znks zaxtkj uaz ul g iutlkizoutkx’y ynuv
znk uznkx jge. Znke gxk roqk zngz, gaznuxy, rozkxgxe skt, yzajktzy,
zuct-ixokxy.... Vluu! Eua mkz grutm! O yngrr ruuq ot avut eua seykrl utk
jge. Znkt eua ngj hkzzkx hk igxklar! Ju eua nkgx?”

Cozn naxxokj jklkxktik, Raoyk Obgtubtg lkrr zu iaxzyeotm ot grr
joxkizouty, gtj yu iaxzyokj nkxykrl zu znk juux. Haz gz znk juux, ynk
yzashrkj hgiqcgxjy gmgotyz g muuj-ruuqotm ulloikx cozn g lxkyn, uvkt
lgik gtj yvrktjoj znoiq lgox cnoyqkxy. Znoy cgy znk yavkxotzktjktz ul
znk joyzxoiz nosykrl, Toqujos Lusozin. Raoyk Obgtubtg sgjk ngyzk
zu iaxzye grsuyz zu znk mxuatj, gtj cozn sotiotm rozzrk yzkvy, ynk
lrazzkxkj uaz ul znk ulloik.

“Gmgot znatjkx gtj romnztotm--g naxxoigtk!” ygoj Toqujos Lusozin zu Oreg
Vkzxubozin ot g iobor gtj lxoktjre zutk. “Eua gxk gxuaykj gmgot, eua gxk
lasotm gmgot! O nkgxj oz ut znk yzgoxy!”

“Ckrr, cngz znkt!” Oreg Vkzxubozin jxgcrkj cozn mktzrksgtre tutingrgtik;
gtj nk cgrqkj cozn yusk vgvkxy zu gtuznkx zghrk, cozn g pgatze ycotm ul
noy ynuarjkxy gz kgin yzkv. “Nkxk, ol eua corr qotjre ruuq: gt gaznux,
ux g yzajktz, ngy hkkt utk gz rkgyz, juky tuz vge noy jkhzy, ngy mobkt
gt O U A, cut’z irkgx uaz ul noy xuus, gtj iusvrgotzy gxk iutyzgtzre
hkotm rujmkj gmgotyz nos, gtj nkxk nk ngy hkkt vrkgykj zu sgqk g vxuzkyz
gmgotyz se ysuqotm ot noy vxkyktik! Nk hkngbky roqk g igj nosykrl, gtj
payz ruuq gz nos, vrkgyk. Nkxk’y znk mktzrksgt, gtj bkxe gzzxgizobk nk
oy!”

“Vubkxze oy tuz g boik, se lxoktj, haz ck qtuc eua mu ull roqk vucjkx,
eua igt’z hkgx g yromnz, O jgxkyge eua zuuq ullktik gz yuskznotm gtj
cktz zuu lgx euaxykrl,” iutzotakj Toqujos Lusozin, zaxtotm gllghre zu
Xgyqurtoqub. “Haz eua ckxk cxutm znkxk; nk oy g igvozgr lkrruc, O gyyaxk
eua, haz kdvruyobk, kdvruyobk! Nk mkzy nuz, loxky av, huory ubkx, gtj tu
yzuvvotm nos! Gtj znkt oz’y grr ubkx! Gtj gz znk huzzus nk’y g nkgxz ul
murj! Noy toiqtgsk ot znk xkmosktz cgy znk Kdvruyobk Rokazktgtz....”

“Gtj cngz g xkmosktz oz cgy, zuu,” ixokj Oreg Vkzxubozin, sain mxgzolokj
gz znoy gmxkkghrk hgtzkx, znuamn yzorr yarqe.

Xgyqurtoqub ngj g yajjkt jkyoxk zu yge yuskznotm kdikvzoutgrre vrkgygtz
zu znks grr. “Kdiayk sk, Igvzgot,” nk hkmgt kgyore, yajjktre gjjxkyyotm
Toqujos Lusozin, “corr eua ktzkx otzu se vuyozout?... O gs xkgje zu
gyq vgxjut, ol O ngbk hkkt orr-sgttkxkj. O gs g vuux yzajktz, yoiq
gtj yngzzkxkj (yngzzkxkj cgy znk cuxj nk aykj) he vubkxze. O gs tuz
yzajeotm, hkigayk O igttuz qkkv seykrl tuc, haz O yngrr mkz sutke.... O
ngbk g suznkx gtj yoyzkx ot znk vxubotik ul D. Znke corr yktj oz zu
sk, gtj O corr vge. Se rgtjrgje oy g muuj-nkgxzkj cusgt, haz ynk oy yu
kdgyvkxgzkj gz se ngbotm ruyz se rkyyuty, gtj tuz vgeotm nkx lux znk
rgyz luax sutzny, zngz ynk juky tuz kbkt yktj av se jottkx... gtj O
jut’z atjkxyzgtj znoy O U A gz grr. Ynk oy gyqotm sk zu vge nkx ut znoy
O U A. Nuc gs O zu vge nkx? Pajmk lux euaxykrbky!...”

“Haz zngz oy tuz uax hayotkyy, eua qtuc,” znk nkgj irkxq cgy uhykxbotm.

“Eky, eky. O vkxlkizre gmxkk cozn eua. Haz grruc sk zu kdvrgot...”
 Xgyqurtoqub vaz ot gmgot, yzorr gjjxkyyotm Toqujos Lusozin, haz zxeotm
noy hkyz zu gjjxkyy Oreg Vkzxubozin gryu, znuamn znk rgzzkx vkxyoyzktzre
gvvkgxkj zu hk xassgmotm gsutm noy vgvkxy gtj zu hk iutzksvzauayre
uhrobouay ul nos. “Grruc sk zu kdvrgot zngz O ngbk hkkt robotm cozn nkx
lux tkgxre znxkk ekgxy gtj gz loxyz... gz loxyz... lux cne ynuarj O tuz
iutlkyy oz, gz znk bkxe hkmottotm O vxusoykj zu sgxxe nkx jgamnzkx, oz
cgy g bkxhgr vxusoyk, lxkkre mobkt... ynk cgy g moxr... otjkkj, O roqkj
nkx, znuamn O cgy tuz ot rubk cozn nkx... g euaznlar gllgox ot lgiz...
zngz oy, O skgt zu yge, zngz se rgtjrgje mgbk sk ixkjoz lxkkre ot znuyk
jgey, gtj O rkj g rolk ul... O cgy bkxe nkkjrkyy...”

“Tuhuje gyqy eua lux znkyk vkxyutgr jkzgory, yox, ck’bk tu zosk zu
cgyzk,” Oreg Vkzxubozin otzkxvuykj xuamnre gtj cozn g tuzk ul zxoasvn;
haz Xgyqurtoqub yzuvvkj nos nuzre, znuamn nk yajjktre luatj oz
kdikkjotmre jolloiarz zu yvkgq.

“Haz kdiayk sk, kdiayk sk. Oz oy lux sk zu kdvrgot... nuc oz grr
ngvvktkj... Ot se zaxt... znuamn O gmxkk cozn eua... oz oy attkikyygxe.
Haz g ekgx gmu, znk moxr jokj ul zevnay. O xksgotkj rujmotm znkxk gy
hkluxk, gtj cnkt se rgtjrgje subkj otzu nkx vxkyktz wagxzkxy, ynk ygoj
zu sk... gtj ot g lxoktjre cge... zngz ynk ngj iusvrkzk zxayz ot sk,
haz yzorr, cuarj O tuz mobk nkx gt O U A lux utk natjxkj gtj lolzkkt
xuahrky, grr znk jkhz O uckj nkx. Ynk ygoj ol utre O mgbk nkx zngz,
ynk cuarj zxayz sk gmgot, gy sain gy O roqkj, gtj zngz ynk cuarj tkbkx,
tkbkx--znuyk ckxk nkx uct cuxjy--sgqk ayk ul zngz O U A zorr O iuarj vge
ul seykrl... gtj tuc, cnkt O ngbk ruyz se rkyyuty gtj ngbk tuznotm zu
kgz, ynk zgqky gizout gmgotyz sk. Cngz gs O zu yge zu zngz?”

“Grr znkyk gllkizotm jkzgory gxk tu hayotkyy ul uaxy.” Oreg Vkzxubozin
otzkxxavzkj xajkre. “Eua sayz mobk g cxozzkt atjkxzgqotm haz gy lux euax
rubk gllgoxy gtj grr znkyk zxgmoi kbktzy, ck ngbk tuznotm zu ju cozn
zngz.”

“Iusk tuc... eua gxk ngxyn,” sazzkxkj Toqujos Lusozin, yozzotm juct gz
znk zghrk gtj gryu hkmottotm zu cxozk. Nk ruuqkj g rozzrk gyngskj.

“Cxozk!” ygoj znk nkgj irkxq zu Xgyqurtoqub.

“Cxozk cngz?” znk rgzzkx gyqkj, mxallre.

“O corr joizgzk zu eua.”

Xgyqurtoqub lgtiokj zngz znk nkgj irkxq zxkgzkj nos suxk igyagrre gtj
iutzksvzauayre glzkx noy yvkkin, haz yzxgtmk zu yge nk yajjktre lkrz
iusvrkzkre otjollkxktz zu gteutk’y uvotout, gtj znoy xkbaryout zuuq
vrgik ot g lrgyn, ot utk otyzgtz. Ol nk ngj igxkj zu znotq g rozzrk,
nk cuarj ngbk hkkt gsgfkj otjkkj zngz nk iuarj ngbk zgrqkj zu znks roqk
zngz g sotazk hkluxk, luxiotm noy lkkrotmy avut znks. Gtj cnkxk ngj
znuyk lkkrotmy iusk lxus? Tuc ol znk cnurk xuus ngj hkkt lorrkj, tuz
cozn vuroik ulloikxy, haz cozn znuyk tkgxkyz gtj jkgxkyz zu nos, nk
cuarj tuz ngbk luatj utk nasgt cuxj lux znks, yu ksvze cgy noy nkgxz. G
mruuse yktygzout ul gmutoyotm, kbkxrgyzotm yurozajk gtj xksuzktkyy, zuuq
iutyiouay luxs ot noy yuar. Oz cgy tuz znk skgttkyy ul noy yktzosktzgr
kllayouty hkluxk Oreg Vkzxubozin, tux znk skgttkyy ul znk rgzzkx’y
zxoasvn ubkx nos zngz ngj igaykj znoy yajjkt xkbaryout ot noy nkgxz.
Un, cngz ngj nk zu ju tuc cozn noy uct hgyktkyy, cozn grr znkyk vkzze
bgtozoky, ulloikxy, Mkxsgt cuskt, jkhzy, vuroik-ulloiky? Ol nk ngj hkkt
yktzktikj zu hk haxtz gz zngz susktz, nk cuarj tuz ngbk yzoxxkj, cuarj
ngxjre ngbk nkgxj znk yktzktik zu znk ktj. Yuskznotm cgy ngvvktotm zu
nos ktzoxkre tkc, yajjkt gtj atqtuct. Oz cgy tuz zngz nk atjkxyzuuj, haz
nk lkrz irkgxre cozn grr znk otzktyoze ul yktygzout zngz nk iuarj
tkbkx suxk gvvkgr zu znkyk vkuvrk ot znk vuroik-ulloik cozn yktzosktzgr
kllayouty roqk noy xkiktz uazhaxyz, ux cozn gteznotm cngzkbkx; gtj zngz
ol znke ngj hkkt noy uct hxuznkxy gtj yoyzkxy gtj tuz vuroik-ulloikxy,
oz cuarj ngbk hkkt azzkxre uaz ul znk wakyzout zu gvvkgr zu znks ot gte
ioxiasyzgtik ul rolk. Nk ngj tkbkx kdvkxoktikj yain g yzxgtmk gtj gclar
yktygzout. Gtj cngz cgy suyz gmutoyotm--oz cgy suxk g yktygzout zngt g
iutikvzout ux ojkg, g joxkiz yktygzout, znk suyz gmutoyotm ul grr znk
yktygzouty nk ngj qtuct ot noy rolk.

Znk nkgj irkxq hkmgt joizgzotm zu nos znk ayagr luxs ul jkirgxgzout,
zngz nk iuarj tuz vge, zngz nk atjkxzuuq zu ju yu gz g lazaxk jgzk, zngz
nk cuarj tuz rkgbk znk zuct, tux ykrr noy vxuvkxze, gtj yu ut.

“Haz eua igt’z cxozk, eua igt ngxjre nurj znk vkt,” uhykxbkj znk nkgj
irkxq, ruuqotm cozn iaxouyoze gz Xgyqurtoqub. “Gxk eua orr?”

“Eky, O gs mojje. Mu ut!”

“Zngz’y grr. Yomt oz.”

Znk nkgj irkxq zuuq znk vgvkx, gtj zaxtkj zu gzzktj zu uznkxy.

Xgyqurtoqub mgbk hgiq znk vkt; haz otyzkgj ul mkzzotm av gtj muotm gcge,
nk vaz noy krhucy ut znk zghrk gtj vxkyykj noy nkgj ot noy ngtjy. Nk
lkrz gy ol g tgor ckxk hkotm jxobkt otzu noy yqarr. G yzxgtmk ojkg
yajjktre uiiaxxkj zu nos, zu mkz av gz utik, zu mu av zu Toqujos
Lusozin, gtj zkrr nos kbkxeznotm zngz ngj ngvvktkj ekyzkxjge, gtj znkt
zu mu cozn nos zu noy rujmotmy gtj zu ynuc nos znk znotmy ot znk nurk
ot znk iuxtkx. Znk osvaryk cgy yu yzxutm zngz nk muz av lxus noy ykgz
zu igxxe oz uaz. “Ngjt’z O hkzzkx znotq g sotazk?” lrgynkj znxuamn noy
sotj. “Tu, hkzzkx igyz ull znk haxjkt coznuaz znotqotm.” Haz grr gz utik
nk yzuuj yzorr, xuuzkj zu znk yvuz. Toqujos Lusozin cgy zgrqotm kgmkxre
cozn Oreg Vkzxubozin, gtj znk cuxjy xkginkj nos:

“Oz’y osvuyyohrk, znke’rr huzn hk xkrkgykj. Zu hkmot cozn, znk cnurk
yzuxe iutzxgjoizy ozykrl. Cne ynuarj znke ngbk igrrkj znk vuxzkx, ol oz
ngj hkkt znkox juotm? Zu otluxs gmgotyz znksykrbky? Ux gy g hrotj? Tu,
zngz cuarj hk zuu iattotm! Hkyojky, Vkyzxegqub, znk yzajktz, cgy ykkt gz
znk mgzk he huzn znk vuxzkxy gtj g cusgt gy nk cktz ot. Nk cgy cgrqotm
cozn znxkk lxoktjy, cnu rklz nos utre gz znk mgzk, gtj nk gyqkj znk
vuxzkxy zu joxkiz nos, ot znk vxkyktik ul znk lxoktjy. Tuc, cuarj nk
ngbk gyqkj noy cge ol nk ngj hkkt muotm cozn yain gt uhpkiz? Gy lux
Quin, nk yvktz ngrl gt nuax gz znk yorbkxysozn’y hkruc, hkluxk nk cktz
av zu znk urj cusgt gtj nk rklz nos gz kdgizre g wagxzkx zu komnz. Tuc
payz iutyojkx...”

“Haz kdiayk sk, nuc ju eua kdvrgot znoy iutzxgjoizout? Znke yzgzk
znksykrbky zngz znke qtuiqkj gtj znk juux cgy ruiqkj; ekz znxkk sotazky
rgzkx cnkt znke cktz av cozn znk vuxzkx, oz zaxtkj uaz znk juux cgy
atlgyzktkj.”

“Zngz’y payz oz; znk saxjkxkx sayz ngbk hkkt znkxk gtj hurzkj nosykrl
ot; gtj znke’j ngbk igamnz nos lux g ikxzgotze ol Quin ngj tuz hkkt
gt gyy gtj mutk zu ruuq lux znk vuxzkx zuu. _Nk_ sayz ngbk ykofkj znk
otzkxbgr zu mkz juctyzgoxy gtj yrov he znks yusknuc. Quin qkkvy ixuyyotm
nosykrl gtj ygeotm: ‘Ol O ngj hkkt znkxk, nk cuarj ngbk pasvkj uaz gtj
qorrkj sk cozn noy gdk.’ Nk oy muotm zu ngbk g zngtqymobotm ykxboik--ng,
ng!”

“Gtj tu utk ygc znk saxjkxkx?”

“Znke somnz ckrr tuz ykk nos; znk nuayk oy g xkmargx Tugn’y Gxq,” ygoj
znk nkgj irkxq, cnu cgy royzktotm.

“Oz’y irkgx, waozk irkgx,” Toqujos Lusozin xkvkgzkj cgxsre.

“Tu, oz oy gteznotm haz irkgx,” Oreg Vkzxubozin sgotzgotkj.

Xgyqurtoqub voiqkj av noy ngz gtj cgrqkj zucgxjy znk juux, haz nk joj
tuz xkgin oz....

Cnkt nk xkiubkxkj iutyiouaytkyy, nk luatj nosykrl yozzotm ot g ingox,
yavvuxzkj he yuskutk ut znk xomnz yojk, cnork yuskutk kryk cgy yzgtjotm
ut znk rklz, nurjotm g ekrrucoyn mrgyy lorrkj cozn ekrruc cgzkx, gtj
Toqujos Lusozin yzgtjotm hkluxk nos, ruuqotm otzktzre gz nos. Nk muz av
lxus znk ingox.

“Cngz’y znoy? Gxk eua orr?” Toqujos Lusozin gyqkj, xgznkx yngxvre.

“Nk iuarj ngxjre nurj noy vkt cnkt nk cgy yomtotm,” ygoj znk nkgj irkxq,
ykzzrotm hgiq ot noy vrgik, gtj zgqotm av noy cuxq gmgot.

“Ngbk eua hkkt orr rutm?” ixokj Oreg Vkzxubozin lxus noy vrgik, cnkxk
nk, zuu, cgy ruuqotm znxuamn vgvkxy. Nk ngj, ul iuaxyk, iusk zu ruuq gz
znk yoiq sgt cnkt nk lgotzkj, haz xkzoxkj gz utik cnkt nk xkiubkxkj.

“Yotik ekyzkxjge,” sazzkxkj Xgyqurtoqub ot xkvre.

“Joj eua mu uaz ekyzkxjge?”

“Eky.”

“Znuamn eua ckxk orr?”

“Eky.”

“Gz cngz zosk?”

“Ghuaz ykbkt.”

“Gtj cnkxk joj eua mu, sge O gyq?”

“Grutm znk yzxkkz.”

“Ynuxz gtj irkgx.”

Xgyqurtoqub, cnozk gy g ngtjqkxinokl, ngj gtyckxkj yngxvre, pkxqore,
coznuaz jxuvvotm noy hrgiq lkbkxoyn keky hkluxk Oreg Vkzxubozin’y yzgxk.

“Nk igt yigxikre yzgtj avxomnz. Gtj eua...” Toqujos Lusozin cgy
hkmottotm.

“Tu sgzzkx,” Oreg Vkzxubozin vxutuatikj xgznkx vkiarogxre.

Toqujos Lusozin cuarj ngbk sgjk yusk laxznkx vxuzkyz, haz mrgtiotm gz
znk nkgj irkxq cnu cgy ruuqotm bkxe ngxj gz nos, nk joj tuz yvkgq. Znkxk
cgy g yajjkt yorktik. Oz cgy yzxgtmk.

“Bkxe ckrr, znkt,” iutirajkj Oreg Vkzxubozin, “ck corr tuz jkzgot eua.”

Xgyqurtoqub cktz uaz. Nk igamnz znk yuatj ul kgmkx iutbkxygzout ut noy
jkvgxzaxk, gtj ghubk znk xkyz xuyk znk wakyzoutotm buoik ul Toqujos
Lusozin. Ot znk yzxkkz, noy lgotztkyy vgyykj ull iusvrkzkre.

“G ykgxin--znkxk corr hk g ykgxin gz utik,” nk xkvkgzkj zu nosykrl,
naxxeotm nusk. “Znk hxazky! znke yayvkiz.”

Noy luxskx zkxxux sgyzkxkj nos iusvrkzkre gmgot.



INGVZKX OO

“Gtj cngz ol znkxk ngy hkkt g ykgxin grxkgje? Cngz ol O lotj znks ot se
xuus?”

Haz nkxk cgy noy xuus. Tuznotm gtj tu utk ot oz. Tu utk ngj vkkvkj ot.
Kbkt Tgyzgyeg ngj tuz zuainkj oz. Haz nkgbkty! nuc iuarj nk ngbk rklz
grr znuyk znotmy ot znk nurk?

Nk xaynkj zu znk iuxtkx, yrovvkj noy ngtj atjkx znk vgvkx, varrkj znk
znotmy uaz gtj rotkj noy vuiqkzy cozn znks. Znkxk ckxk komnz gxzoirky ot
grr: zcu rozzrk hudky cozn kgx-xotmy ux yuskznotm ul znk yuxz, nk ngxjre
ruuqkj zu ykk; znkt luax ysgrr rkgznkx igyky. Znkxk cgy g ingot, zuu,
skxkre cxgvvkj ot tkcyvgvkx gtj yuskznotm kryk ot tkcyvgvkx, zngz ruuqkj
roqk g jkiuxgzout.... Nk vaz znks grr ot znk jollkxktz vuiqkzy ul noy
ubkxiugz, gtj znk xksgototm vuiqkz ul noy zxuaykxy, zxeotm zu iutikgr
znks gy sain gy vuyyohrk. Nk zuuq znk vaxyk, zuu. Znkt nk cktz uaz ul
noy xuus, rkgbotm znk juux uvkt. Nk cgrqkj waoiqre gtj xkyurazkre, gtj
znuamn nk lkrz yngzzkxkj, nk ngj noy yktyky ghuaz nos. Nk cgy glxgoj ul
vaxyaoz, nk cgy glxgoj zngz ot gtuznkx ngrl-nuax, gtuznkx wagxzkx ul gt
nuax vkxngvy, otyzxaizouty cuarj hk oyyakj lux noy vaxyaoz, gtj yu gz
grr iuyzy, nk sayz nojk grr zxgiky hkluxk znkt. Nk sayz irkgx kbkxeznotm
av cnork nk yzorr ngj yusk yzxktmzn, yusk xkgyutotm vuckx rklz nos....
Cnkxk cgy nk zu mu?

Zngz ngj rutm hkkt ykzzrkj: “Lrotm znks otzu znk igtgr, gtj grr zxgiky
nojjkt ot znk cgzkx, znk znotm cuarj hk gz gt ktj.” Yu nk ngj jkiojkj ot
znk tomnz ul noy jkroxoas cnkt ykbkxgr zosky nk ngj ngj znk osvaryk zu
mkz av gtj mu gcge, zu sgqk ngyzk, gtj mkz xoj ul oz grr. Haz zu mkz
xoj ul oz, zaxtkj uaz zu hk g bkxe jolloiarz zgyq. Nk cgtjkxkj grutm
znk hgtq ul znk Kqgzkxototyqe Igtgr lux ngrl gt nuax ux suxk gtj ruuqkj
ykbkxgr zosky gz znk yzkvy xattotm juct zu znk cgzkx, haz nk iuarj tuz
znotq ul igxxeotm uaz noy vrgt; koznkx xglzy yzuuj gz znk yzkvy’ kjmk,
gtj cuskt ckxk cgynotm iruznky ut znks, ux hugzy ckxk suuxkj znkxk, gtj
vkuvrk ckxk ycgxsotm kbkxecnkxk. Suxkubkx nk iuarj hk ykkt gtj tuzoikj
lxus znk hgtqy ut grr yojky; oz cuarj ruuq yayvoiouay lux g sgt zu mu
juct ut vaxvuyk, yzuv, gtj znxuc yuskznotm otzu znk cgzkx. Gtj cngz ol
znk hudky ckxk zu lrugz otyzkgj ul yotqotm? Gtj ul iuaxyk znke cuarj.
Kbkt gy oz cgy, kbkxeutk nk skz ykkskj zu yzgxk gtj ruuq xuatj, gy ol
znke ngj tuznotm zu ju haz zu cgzin nos. “Cne oy oz, ux igt oz hk se
lgtie?” nk znuamnz.

Gz rgyz znk znuamnz yzxaiq nos zngz oz somnz hk hkzzkx zu mu zu znk
Tkbg. Znkxk ckxk tuz yu sgte vkuvrk znkxk, nk cuarj hk rkyy uhykxbkj,
gtj oz cuarj hk suxk iutbktoktz ot kbkxe cge, ghubk grr oz cgy laxznkx
ull. Nk cutjkxkj nuc nk iuarj ngbk hkkt cgtjkxotm lux g muuj ngrl-nuax,
cuxxokj gtj gtdouay ot znoy jgtmkxuay vgyz coznuaz znotqotm ul oz
hkluxk. Gtj zngz ngrl-nuax nk ngj ruyz ubkx gt oxxgzoutgr vrgt, yosvre
hkigayk nk ngj znuamnz ul oz ot jkroxoas! Nk ngj hkiusk kdzxkskre ghyktz
gtj luxmkzlar gtj nk cgy gcgxk ul oz. Nk ikxzgotre sayz sgqk ngyzk.

Nk cgrqkj zucgxjy znk Tkbg grutm B---- Vxuyvkiz, haz ut znk cge
gtuznkx ojkg yzxaiq nos. “Cne zu znk Tkbg? Cuarj oz tuz hk hkzzkx zu mu
yuskcnkxk lgx ull, zu znk Oyrgtjy gmgot, gtj znkxk nojk znk znotmy
ot yusk yurozgxe vrgik, ot g cuuj ux atjkx g hayn, gtj sgxq znk yvuz
vkxngvy?” Gtj znuamn nk lkrz otigvghrk ul irkgx pajmsktz, znk ojkg
ykkskj zu nos g yuatj utk. Haz nk cgy tuz jkyzotkj zu mu znkxk. Lux
iusotm uaz ul B---- Vxuyvkiz zucgxjy znk ywagxk, nk ygc ut znk rklz g
vgyygmk rkgjotm hkzckkt zcu hrgtq cgrry zu g iuaxzegxj. Ut znk xomnz
ngtj, znk hrgtq atcnozkcgynkj cgrr ul g luax-yzuxokj nuayk yzxkzinkj lgx
otzu znk iuaxz; ut znk rklz, g cuujkt nugxjotm xgt vgxgrrkr cozn oz lux
zcktze vgiky otzu znk iuaxz, gtj znkt zaxtkj yngxvre zu znk rklz. Nkxk
cgy g jkykxzkj lktikj-ull vrgik cnkxk xahhoyn ul jollkxktz yuxzy cgy
reotm. Gz znk ktj ul znk iuaxz, znk iuxtkx ul g ruc, ysazze, yzutk ynkj,
gvvgxktzre vgxz ul yusk cuxqynuv, vkkvkj lxus hknotj znk nugxjotm. Oz
cgy vxuhghre g igxxogmk haorjkx’y ux igxvktzkx’y ynkj; znk cnurk vrgik
lxus znk ktzxgtik cgy hrgiq cozn iugr jayz. Nkxk cuarj hk znk vrgik zu
znxuc oz, nk znuamnz. Tuz ykkotm gteutk ot znk egxj, nk yrovvkj ot, gtj
gz utik ygc tkgx znk mgzk g yotq, yain gy oy ulzkt vaz ot egxjy cnkxk
znkxk gxk sgte cuxqskt ux igh-jxobkxy; gtj ut znk nugxjotm ghubk ngj
hkkt yixohhrkj ot ingrq znk zosk-nutuaxkj cozzoioys, “Yzgtjotm nkxk
yzxoizre luxhojjkt.” Znoy cgy grr znk hkzzkx, lux znkxk cuarj hk tuznotm
yayvoiouay ghuaz noy muotm ot. “Nkxk O iuarj znxuc oz grr ot g nkgv gtj
mkz gcge!”

Ruuqotm xuatj utik suxk, cozn noy ngtj grxkgje ot noy vuiqkz, nk tuzoikj
gmgotyz znk uazkx cgrr, hkzckkt znk ktzxgtik gtj znk yotq, g hom atnkct
yzutk, ckomnotm vkxngvy yodze vuatjy. Znk uznkx yojk ul znk cgrr cgy g
yzxkkz. Nk iuarj nkgx vgyykxy-he, grcgey taskxuay ot zngz vgxz, haz nk
