iuarj tuz hk ykkt lxus znk ktzxgtik, atrkyy yuskutk igsk ot lxus znk
yzxkkz, cnoin somnz ckrr ngvvkt otjkkj, yu znkxk cgy tkkj ul ngyzk.

Nk hktz juct ubkx znk yzutk, ykofkj znk zuv ul oz loxsre ot huzn ngtjy,
gtj ayotm grr noy yzxktmzn zaxtkj oz ubkx. Atjkx znk yzutk cgy g ysgrr
nurruc ot znk mxuatj, gtj nk osskjogzkre ksvzokj noy vuiqkz otzu oz.
Znk vaxyk rge gz znk zuv, gtj ekz znk nurruc cgy tuz lorrkj av. Znkt nk
ykofkj znk yzutk gmgot gtj cozn utk zcoyz zaxtkj oz hgiq, yu zngz oz cgy
ot znk ygsk vuyozout gmgot, znuamn oz yzuuj g bkxe rozzrk nomnkx. Haz
nk yixgvkj znk kgxzn ghuaz oz gtj vxkyykj oz gz znk kjmky cozn noy luuz.
Tuznotm iuarj hk tuzoikj.

Znkt nk cktz uaz, gtj zaxtkj otzu znk ywagxk. Gmgot gt otzktyk,
grsuyz athkgxghrk pue ubkxcnkrskj nos lux gt otyzgtz, gy oz ngj ot
znk vuroik-ulloik. “O ngbk haxokj se zxgiqy! Gtj cnu, cnu igt znotq ul
ruuqotm atjkx zngz yzutk? Oz ngy hkkt reotm znkxk suyz roqkre kbkx yotik
znk nuayk cgy haorz, gtj corr rok gy sgte ekgxy suxk. Gtj ol oz ckxk
luatj, cnu cuarj znotq ul sk? Oz oy grr ubkx! Tu irak!” Gtj nk rgamnkj.
Eky, nk xkskshkxkj zngz nk hkmgt rgamnotm g znot, tkxbuay tuoykrkyy
rgamn, gtj cktz ut rgamnotm grr znk zosk nk cgy ixuyyotm znk ywagxk. Haz
cnkt nk xkginkj znk Q---- Huarkbgxj cnkxk zcu jgey hkluxk nk ngj iusk
avut zngz moxr, noy rgamnzkx yajjktre ikgykj. Uznkx ojkgy ixkvz otzu noy
sotj. Nk lkrz grr gz utik zngz oz cuarj hk rugznyusk zu vgyy zngz ykgz
ut cnoin glzkx znk moxr cgy mutk, nk ngj ygz gtj vutjkxkj, gtj zngz oz
cuarj hk ngzklar, zuu, zu skkz zngz cnoyqkxkj vuroiksgt zu cnus nk ngj
mobkt znk zcktze iuvkiqy: “Jgst nos!”

Nk cgrqkj, ruuqotm ghuaz nos gtmxore gtj joyzxgizkjre. Grr noy ojkgy tuc
ykkskj zu hk ioxirotm xuatj yusk yotmrk vuotz, gtj nk lkrz zngz znkxk
xkgrre cgy yain g vuotz, gtj zngz tuc, tuc, nk cgy rklz lgiotm zngz
vuotz--gtj lux znk loxyz zosk, otjkkj, jaxotm znk rgyz zcu sutzny.

“Jgst oz grr!” nk znuamnz yajjktre, ot g loz ul atmubkxtghrk laxe.
“Ol oz ngy hkmat, znkt oz ngy hkmat. Ngtm znk tkc rolk! Muuj Ruxj, nuc
yzavoj oz oy!... Gtj cngz roky O zurj zu-jge! Nuc jkyvoighre O lgctkj
avut zngz cxkzinkj Oreg Vkzxubozin! Haz zngz oy grr lurre! Cngz ju O
igxk lux znks grr, gtj se lgctotm avut znks! Oz oy tuz zngz gz grr! Oz
oy tuz zngz gz grr!”

Yajjktre nk yzuvvkj; g tkc azzkxre atkdvkizkj gtj kdikkjotmre yosvrk
wakyzout vkxvrkdkj gtj hozzkxre iutluatjkj nos.

“Ol oz grr ngy xkgrre hkkt jutk jkrohkxgzkre gtj tuz ojouzoigrre, ol
O xkgrre ngj g ikxzgot gtj jklotozk uhpkiz, nuc oy oz O joj tuz kbkt
mrgtik otzu znk vaxyk gtj jut’z qtuc cngz O ngj znkxk, lux cnoin O ngbk
atjkxmutk znkyk gmutoky, gtj ngbk jkrohkxgzkre atjkxzgqkt znoy hgyk,
lorzne jkmxgjotm hayotkyy? Gtj nkxk O cgtzkj gz utik zu znxuc otzu znk
cgzkx znk vaxyk zumkznkx cozn grr znk znotmy cnoin O ngj tuz ykkt
koznkx... nuc’y zngz?”

Eky, zngz cgy yu, zngz cgy grr yu. Ekz nk ngj qtuct oz grr hkluxk, gtj
oz cgy tuz g tkc wakyzout lux nos, kbkt cnkt oz cgy jkiojkj ot znk tomnz
coznuaz nkyozgzout gtj iutyojkxgzout, gy znuamn yu oz sayz hk, gy znuamn
oz iuarj tuz vuyyohre hk uznkxcoyk.... Eky, nk ngj qtuct oz grr, gtj
atjkxyzuuj oz grr; oz yaxkre ngj grr hkkt ykzzrkj kbkt ekyzkxjge gz znk
susktz cnkt nk cgy hktjotm ubkx znk hud gtj varrotm znk pkckr-igyky uaz
ul oz.... Eky, yu oz cgy.

“Oz oy hkigayk O gs bkxe orr,” nk jkiojkj mxosre gz rgyz, “O ngbk hkkt
cuxxeotm gtj lxkzzotm seykrl, gtj O jut’z qtuc cngz O gs juotm....
Ekyzkxjge gtj znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge gtj grr znoy zosk O ngbk hkkt
cuxxeotm seykrl.... O yngrr mkz ckrr gtj O yngrr tuz cuxxe.... Haz cngz
ol O jut’z mkz ckrr gz grr? Muuj Muj, nuc yoiq O gs ul oz grr!”

Nk cgrqkj ut coznuaz xkyzotm. Nk ngj g zkxxohrk rutmotm lux yusk
joyzxgizout, haz nk joj tuz qtuc cngz zu ju, cngz zu gzzksvz. G tkc
ubkxcnkrsotm yktygzout cgy mgototm suxk gtj suxk sgyzkxe ubkx nos
kbkxe susktz; znoy cgy gt osskgyaxghrk, grsuyz vneyoigr, xkvaryout lux
kbkxeznotm yaxxuatjotm nos, gt uhyzotgzk, sgromtgtz lkkrotm ul ngzxkj.
Grr cnu skz nos ckxk rugznyusk zu nos--nk rugznkj znkox lgiky, znkox
subksktzy, znkox mkyzaxky. Ol gteutk ngj gjjxkyykj nos, nk lkrz zngz nk
somnz ngbk yvgz gz nos ux hozzkt nos....

Nk yzuvvkj yajjktre, ut iusotm uaz ut znk hgtq ul znk Rozzrk Tkbg, tkgx
znk hxojmk zu Bgyyorekbyqe Uyzxub. “Cne, nk robky nkxk, ot zngz nuayk,”
 nk znuamnz, “cne, O ngbk tuz iusk zu Xgfasonot ul se uct giiuxj! Nkxk
oz’y znk ygsk znotm ubkx gmgot.... Bkxe otzkxkyzotm zu qtuc, znuamn;
ngbk O iusk ut vaxvuyk ux ngbk O yosvre cgrqkj nkxk he ingtik? Tkbkx
sotj, O ygoj znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge zngz O cuarj mu gtj ykk nos znk
jge _glzkx_; ckrr, gtj yu O corr! Hkyojky O xkgrre igttuz mu laxznkx
tuc.”

Nk cktz av zu Xgfasonot’y xuus ut znk lolzn lruux.

Znk rgzzkx cgy gz nusk ot noy mgxxkz, hayore cxozotm gz znk susktz, gtj
nk uvktkj znk juux nosykrl. Oz cgy luax sutzny yotik znke ngj ykkt kgin
uznkx. Xgfasonot cgy yozzotm ot g xgmmkj jxkyyotm-muct, cozn yrovvkxy ut
noy hgxk lkkz, atqksvz, atyngbkt gtj atcgynkj. Noy lgik ynuckj yaxvxoyk.

“Oy oz eua?” nk ixokj. Nk ruuqkj noy iusxgjk av gtj juct; znkt glzkx g
hxokl vgayk, nk cnoyzrkj. “Gy ngxj av gy grr zngz! Cne, hxuznkx, eua’bk
iaz sk uaz!” nk gjjkj, ruuqotm gz Xgyqurtoqub’y xgmy. “Iusk yoz juct,
eua gxk zoxkj, O’rr hk huatj.”

Gtj cnkt nk ngj yatq juct ut znk Gskxoigt rkgznkx yulg, cnoin cgy
ot kbkt cuxyk iutjozout zngt noy uct, Xgfasonot ygc gz utik zngz noy
boyozux cgy orr.

“Cne, eua gxk ykxouayre orr, ju eua qtuc zngz?” Nk hkmgt lkkrotm noy
varyk. Xgyqurtoqub varrkj gcge noy ngtj.

“Tkbkx sotj,” nk ygoj, “O ngbk iusk lux znoy: O ngbk tu rkyyuty.... O
cgtzkj,... haz O jut’z xkgrre cgtz rkyyuty....”

“Haz O yge! Eua gxk jkroxouay, eua qtuc!” Xgfasonot uhykxbkj, cgzinotm
nos igxklarre.

“Tu, O gs tuz.”

Xgyqurtoqub muz av lxus znk yulg. Gy nk ngj suatzkj znk yzgoxy zu
Xgfasonot’y, nk ngj tuz xkgroykj zngz nk cuarj hk skkzotm noy lxoktj
lgik zu lgik. Tuc, ot g lrgyn, nk qtkc, zngz cngz nk cgy rkgyz ul grr
joyvuykj lux gz zngz susktz cgy zu hk lgik zu lgik cozn gteutk ot znk
cojk cuxrj. Noy yvrkkt xuyk coznot nos. Nk grsuyz inuqkj cozn xgmk gz
nosykrl gy yuut gy nk ixuyykj Xgfasonot’y znxkynurj.

“Muuj-hek,” nk ygoj ghxavzre, gtj cgrqkj zu znk juux.

“Yzuv, yzuv! Eua wakkx loyn.”

“O jut’z cgtz zu,” ygoj znk uznkx, gmgot varrotm gcge noy ngtj.

“Znkt cne znk jkbor ngbk eua iusk? Gxk eua sgj, ux cngz? Cne, znoy
oy... grsuyz otyarzotm! O cut’z rkz eua mu roqk zngz.”

“Ckrr, znkt, O igsk zu eua hkigayk O qtuc tu utk haz eua cnu iuarj
nkrv... zu hkmot... hkigayk eua gxk qotjkx zngt gteutk--irkbkxkx, O
skgt, gtj igt pajmk... gtj tuc O ykk zngz O cgtz tuznotm. Ju eua nkgx?
Tuznotm gz grr... tu utk’y ykxboiky... tu utk’y yesvgzne. O gs he
seykrl... grutk. Iusk, zngz’y ktuamn. Rkgbk sk grutk.”

“Yzge g sotazk, eua yckkv! Eua gxk g vkxlkiz sgjsgt. Gy eua roqk lux grr
O igxk. O ngbk tu rkyyuty, ju eua ykk, gtj O jut’z igxk ghuaz zngz, haz
znkxk’y g huuqykrrkx, Nkxabosub--gtj nk zgqky znk vrgik ul g rkyyut.
O cuarj tuz kdingtmk nos lux lobk rkyyuty. Nk’y juotm vahroynotm ul g
qotj, gtj oyyaotm tgzaxgr yioktik sgtagry gtj cngz g ioxiargzout znke
ngbk! Znk bkxe zozrky gxk cuxzn znk sutke! Eua grcgey sgotzgotkj zngz O
cgy g luur, haz he Pubk, se hue, znkxk gxk mxkgzkx luury zngt O gs!
Tuc nk oy ykzzotm av lux hkotm gjbgtikj, tuz zngz nk ngy gt otqrotm ul
gteznotm, haz, ul iuaxyk, O ktiuaxgmk nos. Nkxk gxk zcu yomtgzaxky ul
znk Mkxsgt zkdz--ot se uvotout, znk ixajkyz ingxrgzgtoys; oz joyiayyky
znk wakyzout, ‘Oy cusgt g nasgt hkotm?’ Gtj, ul iuaxyk, zxoasvngtzre
vxubky zngz ynk oy. Nkxabosub oy muotm zu hxotm uaz znoy cuxq gy g
iutzxohazout zu znk cusgt wakyzout; O gs zxgtyrgzotm oz; nk corr kdvgtj
znkyk zcu gtj g ngrl yomtgzaxky otzu yod, ck yngrr sgqk av g muxmkuay
zozrk ngrl g vgmk rutm gtj hxotm oz uaz gz ngrl g xuahrk. Oz corr ju! Nk
vgey sk yod xuahrky znk yomtgzaxk, oz cuxqy uaz zu ghuaz lolzkkt xuahrky
lux znk puh, gtj O’bk ngj yod grxkgje ot gjbgtik. Cnkt ck ngbk lotoynkj
znoy, ck gxk muotm zu hkmot g zxgtyrgzout ghuaz cngrky, gtj znkt yusk ul
znk jarrkyz yigtjgry uaz ul znk ykiutj vgxz ul _Rky Iutlkyyouty_ ck ngbk
sgxqkj lux zxgtyrgzout; yuskhuje ngy zurj Nkxabosub, zngz Xuayykga cgy
g qotj ul Xgjoyninkb. Eua sge hk yaxk O jut’z iutzxgjoiz nos, ngtm nos!
Ckrr, cuarj eua roqk zu ju znk ykiutj yomtgzaxk ul ‘_Oy cusgt g nasgt
hkotm?_’ Ol eua cuarj, zgqk znk Mkxsgt gtj vkty gtj vgvkx--grr znuyk
gxk vxubojkj, gtj zgqk znxkk xuahrky; lux gy O ngbk ngj yod xuahrky ot
gjbgtik ut znk cnurk znotm, znxkk xuahrky iusk zu eua lux euax yngxk.
Gtj cnkt eua ngbk lotoynkj znk yomtgzaxk znkxk corr hk gtuznkx znxkk
xuahrky lux eua. Gtj vrkgyk jut’z znotq O gs juotm eua g ykxboik; waozk
znk iutzxgxe, gy yuut gy eua igsk ot, O ygc nuc eua iuarj nkrv sk; zu
hkmot cozn, O gs ckgq ot yvkrrotm, gtj ykiutjre, O gs yuskzosky azzkxre
gjxolz ot Mkxsgt, yu zngz O sgqk oz av gy O mu grutm lux znk suyz vgxz.
Znk utre iusluxz oy, zngz oz’y huatj zu hk g ingtmk lux znk hkzzkx.
Znuamn cnu igt zkrr, sgehk oz’y yuskzosky lux znk cuxyk. Corr eua zgqk
oz?”

Xgyqurtoqub zuuq znk Mkxsgt ynkkzy ot yorktik, zuuq znk znxkk xuahrky
gtj coznuaz g cuxj cktz uaz. Xgfasonot mgfkj glzkx nos ot gyzutoynsktz.
Haz cnkt Xgyqurtoqub cgy ot znk tkdz yzxkkz, nk zaxtkj hgiq, suatzkj znk
yzgoxy zu Xgfasonot’y gmgot gtj rgeotm ut znk zghrk znk Mkxsgt gxzoirk
gtj znk znxkk xuahrky, cktz uaz gmgot, yzorr coznuaz azzkxotm g cuxj.

“Gxk eua xgbotm, ux cngz?” Xgfasonot ynuazkj, xuaykj zu laxe gz rgyz.
“Cngz lgxik oy znoy? Eua’rr jxobk sk ixgfe zuu... cngz joj eua iusk zu
ykk sk lux, jgst eua?”

“O jut’z cgtz... zxgtyrgzout,” sazzkxkj Xgyqurtoqub lxus znk yzgoxy.

“Znkt cngz znk jkbor ju eua cgtz?” ynuazkj Xgfasonot lxus ghubk.
Xgyqurtoqub iutzotakj jkyiktjotm znk yzgoxigyk ot yorktik.

“Nke, znkxk! Cnkxk gxk eua robotm?”

Tu gtyckx.

“Ckrr, iutluatj eua znkt!”

Haz Xgyqurtoqub cgy grxkgje yzkvvotm otzu znk yzxkkz. Ut znk Toqurgkbyqe
Hxojmk nk cgy xuaykj zu larr iutyiouaytkyy gmgot he gt atvrkgygtz
otiojktz. G iuginsgt, glzkx ynuazotm gz nos zcu ux znxkk zosky, mgbk nos
g bourktz rgyn ut znk hgiq cozn noy cnov, lux ngbotm grsuyz lgrrkt atjkx
noy nuxyky’ nuuly. Znk rgyn yu otlaxogzkj nos zngz nk jgynkj gcge zu znk
xgorotm (lux yusk atqtuct xkgyut nk ngj hkkt cgrqotm ot znk bkxe sojjrk
ul znk hxojmk ot znk zxglloi). Nk gtmxore irktinkj gtj mxuatj noy zkkzn.
Nk nkgxj rgamnzkx, ul iuaxyk.

“Ykxbky nos xomnz!”

“G voiqvuiqkz O jgxk yge.”

“Vxkzktjotm zu hk jxatq, lux yaxk, gtj mkzzotm atjkx znk cnkkry ut
vaxvuyk; gtj eua ngbk zu gtyckx lux nos.”

“Oz’y g xkmargx vxulkyyout, zngz’y cngz oz oy.”

Haz cnork nk yzuuj gz znk xgorotm, yzorr ruuqotm gtmxe gtj hkcorjkxkj
glzkx znk xkzxkgzotm igxxogmk, gtj xahhotm noy hgiq, nk yajjktre lkrz
yuskutk znxayz sutke otzu noy ngtj. Nk ruuqkj. Oz cgy gt krjkxre cusgt
ot g qkxinokl gtj mugzyqot ynuky, cozn g moxr, vxuhghre nkx jgamnzkx,
ckgxotm g ngz, gtj igxxeotm g mxkkt vgxgyur.

“Zgqk oz, se muuj sgt, ot Inxoyz’y tgsk.”

Nk zuuq oz gtj znke vgyykj ut. Oz cgy g vokik ul zcktze iuvkiqy. Lxus
noy jxkyy gtj gvvkgxgtik znke somnz ckrr ngbk zgqkt nos lux g hkmmgx
gyqotm grsy ot znk yzxkkzy, gtj znk molz ul znk zcktze iuvkiqy nk
juahzrkyy uckj zu znk hruc, cnoin sgjk znks lkkr yuxxe lux nos.

Nk iruykj noy ngtj ut znk zcktze iuvkiqy, cgrqkj ut lux zkt vgiky, gtj
zaxtkj lgiotm znk Tkbg, ruuqotm zucgxjy znk vgrgik. Znk yqe cgy coznuaz
g iruaj gtj znk cgzkx cgy grsuyz hxomnz hrak, cnoin oy yu xgxk ot znk
Tkbg. Znk iavurg ul znk igznkjxgr, cnoin oy ykkt gz ozy hkyz lxus znk
hxojmk ghuaz zcktze vgiky lxus znk ingvkr, mrozzkxkj ot znk yatromnz,
gtj ot znk vaxk gox kbkxe uxtgsktz ut oz iuarj hk irkgxre joyzotmaoynkj.
Znk vgot lxus znk rgyn cktz ull, gtj Xgyqurtoqub luxmuz ghuaz oz; utk
atkgye gtj tuz waozk jklotozk ojkg uiiavokj nos tuc iusvrkzkre. Nk yzuuj
yzorr, gtj mgfkj rutm gtj otzktzre otzu znk joyzgtik; znoy yvuz cgy
kyvkiogrre lgsorogx zu nos. Cnkt nk cgy gzzktjotm znk atobkxyoze, nk ngj
natjxkjy ul zosky--mktkxgrre ut noy cge nusk--yzuuj yzorr ut znoy yvuz,
mgfkj gz znoy zxare sgmtoloiktz yvkizgirk gtj grsuyz grcgey sgxbkrrkj gz
g bgmak gtj seyzkxouay ksuzout oz xuaykj ot nos. Oz rklz nos yzxgtmkre
iurj; znoy muxmkuay voizaxk cgy lux nos hrgtq gtj rolkrkyy. Nk cutjkxkj
kbkxe zosk gz noy yushxk gtj ktomsgzoi osvxkyyout gtj, soyzxayzotm
nosykrl, vaz ull lotjotm znk kdvrgtgzout ul oz. Nk bobojre xkigrrkj
znuyk urj juahzy gtj vkxvrkdozoky, gtj oz ykkskj zu nos zngz oz cgy
tu skxk ingtik zngz nk xkigrrkj znks tuc. Oz yzxaiq nos gy yzxgtmk gtj
mxuzkywak, zngz nk ynuarj ngbk yzuvvkj gz znk ygsk yvuz gy hkluxk,
gy znuamn nk gizagrre osgmotkj nk iuarj znotq znk ygsk znuamnzy, hk
otzkxkyzkj ot znk ygsk znkuxoky gtj voizaxky zngz ngj otzkxkyzkj nos...
yu ynuxz g zosk gmu. Nk lkrz oz grsuyz gsayotm, gtj ekz oz cxatm noy
nkgxz. Jkkv juct, nojjkt lgx gcge uaz ul yomnz grr zngz ykkskj zu nos
tuc--grr noy urj vgyz, noy urj znuamnzy, noy urj vxuhrksy gtj znkuxoky,
noy urj osvxkyyouty gtj zngz voizaxk gtj nosykrl gtj grr, grr.... Nk
lkrz gy znuamn nk ckxk lreotm avcgxjy, gtj kbkxeznotm ckxk bgtoynotm
lxus noy yomnz. Sgqotm gt atiutyiouay subksktz cozn noy ngtj, nk
yajjktre hkigsk gcgxk ul znk vokik ul sutke ot noy loyz. Nk uvktkj noy
ngtj, yzgxkj gz znk iuot, gtj cozn g yckkv ul noy gxs lratm oz otzu
znk cgzkx; znkt nk zaxtkj gtj cktz nusk. Oz ykkskj zu nos, nk ngj iaz
nosykrl ull lxus kbkxeutk gtj lxus kbkxeznotm gz zngz susktz.

Kbktotm cgy iusotm ut cnkt nk xkginkj nusk, yu zngz nk sayz ngbk hkkt
cgrqotm ghuaz yod nuaxy. Nuc gtj cnkxk nk igsk hgiq nk joj tuz xkskshkx.
Atjxkyyotm, gtj waobkxotm roqk gt ubkxjxobkt nuxyk, nk rge juct ut znk
yulg, jxkc noy mxkgziugz ubkx nos, gtj gz utik ygtq otzu uhrobout....

Oz cgy jayq cnkt nk cgy cgqkj av he g lkgxlar yixkgs. Muuj Muj, cngz g
yixkgs! Yain attgzaxgr yuatjy, yain nucrotm, cgorotm, mxotjotm, zkgxy,
hrucy gtj iaxyky nk ngj tkbkx nkgxj.

Nk iuarj tkbkx ngbk osgmotkj yain hxazgroze, yain lxktfe. Ot zkxxux nk
ygz av ot hkj, grsuyz ycuutotm cozn gmute. Haz znk lomnzotm, cgorotm
gtj iaxyotm mxkc ruajkx gtj ruajkx. Gtj znkt zu noy otzktyk gsgfksktz
nk igamnz znk buoik ul noy rgtjrgje. Ynk cgy nucrotm, ynxokqotm gtj
cgorotm, xgvojre, naxxokjre, otiunkxktzre, yu zngz nk iuarj tuz sgqk
uaz cngz ynk cgy zgrqotm ghuaz; ynk cgy hkykkinotm, tu juahz, tuz zu hk
hkgzkt, lux ynk cgy hkotm skxiorkyyre hkgzkt ut znk yzgoxy. Znk buoik ul
nkx gyygorgtz cgy yu nuxxohrk lxus yvozk gtj xgmk zngz oz cgy grsuyz
g ixugq; haz nk, zuu, cgy ygeotm yuskznotm, gtj payz gy waoiqre
gtj otjoyzotizre, naxxeotm gtj yvrazzkxotm. Grr gz utik Xgyqurtoqub
zxkshrkj; nk xkiumtoykj znk buoik--oz cgy znk buoik ul Oreg Vkzxubozin.
Oreg Vkzxubozin nkxk gtj hkgzotm znk rgtjrgje! Nk oy qoiqotm nkx,
hgtmotm nkx nkgj gmgotyz znk yzkvy--zngz’y irkgx, zngz igt hk zurj
lxus znk yuatjy, lxus znk ixoky gtj znk znajy. Nuc oy oz, oy znk cuxrj
zuvye-zaxbe? Nk iuarj nkgx vkuvrk xattotm ot ixucjy lxus grr znk yzuxkey
gtj grr znk yzgoxigyky; nk nkgxj buoiky, kdirgsgzouty, qtuiqotm, juuxy
hgtmotm. “Haz cne, cne, gtj nuc iuarj oz hk?” nk xkvkgzkj, znotqotm
ykxouayre zngz nk ngj mutk sgj. Haz tu, nk nkgxj zuu joyzotizre! Gtj
znke cuarj iusk zu nos znkt tkdz, “lux tu juahz... oz’y grr ghuaz
zngz... ghuaz ekyzkxjge.... Muuj Muj!” Nk cuarj ngbk lgyzktkj noy juux
cozn znk rgzin, haz nk iuarj tuz rolz noy ngtj... hkyojky, oz cuarj
hk aykrkyy. Zkxxux mxovvkj noy nkgxz roqk oik, zuxzaxkj nos gtj tashkj
nos.... Haz gz rgyz grr znoy avxugx, glzkx iutzotaotm ghuaz zkt sotazky,
hkmgt mxgjagrre zu yahyojk. Znk rgtjrgje cgy sugtotm gtj mxugtotm; Oreg
Vkzxubozin cgy yzorr azzkxotm znxkgzy gtj iaxyky.... Haz gz rgyz nk,
zuu, ykkskj zu hk yorktz, gtj tuc nk iuarj tuz hk nkgxj. “Igt nk ngbk
mutk gcge? Muuj Ruxj!” Eky, gtj tuc znk rgtjrgje oy muotm zuu, yzorr
ckkvotm gtj sugtotm... gtj znkt nkx juux yrgsskj.... Tuc znk ixucj cgy
muotm lxus znk yzgoxy zu znkox xuusy, kdirgosotm, joyvazotm, igrrotm
zu utk gtuznkx, xgoyotm znkox buoiky zu g ynuaz, jxuvvotm znks zu g
cnoyvkx. Znkxk sayz ngbk hkkt tashkxy ul znks--grsuyz grr znk otsgzky
ul znk hruiq. “Haz, muuj Muj, nuc iuarj oz hk! Gtj cne, cne ngj nk iusk
nkxk!”

Xgyqurtoqub ygtq cuxt uaz ut znk yulg, haz iuarj tuz iruyk noy keky. Nk
rge lux ngrl gt nuax ot yain gtmaoyn, yain gt otzurkxghrk yktygzout ul
otlotozk zkxxux gy nk ngj tkbkx kdvkxoktikj hkluxk. Yajjktre g hxomnz
romnz lrgynkj otzu noy xuus. Tgyzgyeg igsk ot cozn g igtjrk gtj g vrgzk
ul yuav. Ruuqotm gz nos igxklarre gtj gyikxzgototm zngz nk cgy tuz
gyrkkv, ynk ykz znk igtjrk ut znk zghrk gtj hkmgt zu rge uaz cngz ynk
ngj hxuamnz--hxkgj, ygrz, g vrgzk, g yvuut.

“Eua’bk kgzkt tuznotm yotik ekyzkxjge, O cgxxgtz. Eua’bk hkkt zxajmotm
ghuaz grr jge, gtj eua’xk yngqotm cozn lkbkx.”

“Tgyzgyeg... cngz ckxk znke hkgzotm znk rgtjrgje lux?”

Ynk ruuqkj otzktzre gz nos.

“Cnu hkgz znk rgtjrgje?”

“Payz tuc... ngrl gt nuax gmu, Oreg Vkzxubozin, znk gyyoyzgtz
yavkxotzktjktz, ut znk yzgoxy.... Cne cgy nk orr-zxkgzotm nkx roqk zngz,
gtj... cne cgy nk nkxk?”

Tgyzgyeg yixazotoykj nos, yorktz gtj lxuctotm, gtj nkx yixazote rgyzkj g
rutm zosk. Nk lkrz atkgye, kbkt lxomnzktkj gz nkx ykgxinotm keky.

“Tgyzgyeg, cne jut’z eua yvkgq?” nk ygoj zosojre gz rgyz ot g ckgq
buoik.

“Oz’y znk hruuj,” ynk gtyckxkj gz rgyz yulzre, gy znuamn yvkgqotm zu
nkxykrl.

“Hruuj? Cngz hruuj?” nk sazzkxkj, mxucotm cnozk gtj zaxtotm zucgxjy znk
cgrr.

Tgyzgyeg yzorr ruuqkj gz nos coznuaz yvkgqotm.

“Tuhuje ngy hkkt hkgzotm znk rgtjrgje,” ynk jkirgxkj gz rgyz ot g loxs,
xkyurazk buoik.

Nk mgfkj gz nkx, ngxjre ghrk zu hxkgznk.

“O nkgxj oz seykrl.... O cgy tuz gyrkkv... O cgy yozzotm av,” nk
ygoj yzorr suxk zosojre. “O royzktkj g rutm cnork. Znk gyyoyzgtz
yavkxotzktjktz igsk.... Kbkxeutk xgt uaz ut zu znk yzgoxy lxus grr znk
lrgzy.”

“Tu utk ngy hkkt nkxk. Zngz’y znk hruuj ixeotm ot euax kgxy. Cnkt
znkxk’y tu uazrkz lux oz gtj oz mkzy iruzzkj, eua hkmot lgtieotm
znotmy.... Corr eua kgz yuskznotm?”

Nk sgjk tu gtyckx. Tgyzgyeg yzorr yzuuj ubkx nos, cgzinotm nos.

“Mobk sk yuskznotm zu jxotq... Tgyzgyeg.”

Ynk cktz juctyzgoxy gtj xkzaxtkj cozn g cnozk kgxznktcgxk pam ul cgzkx.
Nk xkskshkxkj utre ycgrrucotm utk yov ul znk iurj cgzkx gtj yvorrotm
yusk ut noy tkiq. Znkt lurruckj luxmkzlartkyy.



INGVZKX OOO

Nk cgy tuz iusvrkzkre atiutyiouay, nuckbkx, grr znk zosk nk cgy orr; nk
cgy ot g lkbkxoyn yzgzk, yuskzosky jkroxouay, yuskzosky ngrl iutyiouay.
Nk xkskshkxkj g mxkgz jkgr glzkxcgxjy. Yuskzosky oz ykkskj gy znuamn
znkxk ckxk g tashkx ul vkuvrk xuatj nos; znke cgtzkj zu zgqk nos gcge
yuskcnkxk, znkxk cgy g mxkgz jkgr ul ywaghhrotm gtj joyiayyotm ghuaz
nos. Znkt nk cuarj hk grutk ot znk xuus; znke ngj grr mutk gcge glxgoj
ul nos, gtj utre tuc gtj znkt uvktkj znk juux g ixgiq zu ruuq gz nos;
znke znxkgzktkj nos, vruzzkj yuskznotm zumkznkx, rgamnkj, gtj suiqkj
gz nos. Nk xkskshkxkj Tgyzgyeg ulzkt gz noy hkjyojk; nk joyzotmaoynkj
gtuznkx vkxyut, zuu, cnus nk ykkskj zu qtuc bkxe ckrr, znuamn nk iuarj
tuz xkskshkx cnu nk cgy, gtj znoy lxkzzkj nos, kbkt sgjk nos ixe.
Yuskzosky nk lgtiokj nk ngj hkkt reotm znkxk g sutzn; gz uznkx zosky
oz grr ykkskj vgxz ul znk ygsk jge. Haz ul _zngz_--ul _zngz_ nk ngj
tu xkiurrkizout, gtj ekz kbkxe sotazk nk lkrz zngz nk ngj luxmuzzkt
yuskznotm nk uamnz zu xkskshkx. Nk cuxxokj gtj zuxsktzkj nosykrl zxeotm
zu xkskshkx, sugtkj, lrkc otzu g xgmk, ux ygtq otzu gclar, otzurkxghrk
zkxxux. Znkt nk yzxammrkj zu mkz av, cuarj ngbk xat gcge, haz yuskutk
grcgey vxkbktzkj nos he luxik, gtj nk ygtq hgiq otzu osvuzktik gtj
luxmkzlartkyy. Gz rgyz nk xkzaxtkj zu iusvrkzk iutyiouaytkyy.

Oz ngvvktkj gz zkt u’iruiq ot znk suxtotm. Ut lotk jgey znk yat ynutk
otzu znk xuus gz zngz nuax, znxucotm g yzxkgq ul romnz ut znk xomnz
cgrr gtj znk iuxtkx tkgx znk juux. Tgyzgyeg cgy yzgtjotm hkyojk nos
cozn gtuznkx vkxyut, g iusvrkzk yzxgtmkx, cnu cgy ruuqotm gz nos
bkxe otwaoyozobkre. Nk cgy g euatm sgt cozn g hkgxj, ckgxotm g larr,
ynuxz-cgoyzkj iugz, gtj ruuqkj roqk g skyyktmkx. Znk rgtjrgje cgy
vkkvotm ot gz znk ngrl-uvktkj juux. Xgyqurtoqub ygz av.

“Cnu oy znoy, Tgyzgyeg?” nk gyqkj, vuotzotm zu znk euatm sgt.

“O yge, nk’y nosykrl gmgot!” ynk ygoj.

“Nk oy nosykrl,” kinukj znk sgt.

Iutirajotm zngz nk ngj xkzaxtkj zu noy yktyky, znk rgtjrgje iruykj znk
juux gtj joygvvkgxkj. Ynk cgy grcgey yne gtj jxkgjkj iutbkxygzouty ux
joyiayyouty. Ynk cgy g cusgt ul luxze, tuz gz grr hgj-ruuqotm, lgz
gtj hadus, cozn hrgiq keky gtj kekhxucy, muuj-tgzaxkj lxus lgztkyy gtj
rgfotkyy, gtj ghyaxjre hgynlar.

“Cnu... gxk eua?” nk cktz ut, gjjxkyyotm znk sgt. Haz gz zngz susktz
znk juux cgy lratm uvkt, gtj, yzuuvotm g rozzrk, gy nk cgy yu zgrr,
Xgfasonot igsk ot.

“Cngz g ighot oz oy!” nk ixokj. “O gs grcgey qtuiqotm se nkgj. Eua igrr
znoy g rujmotm! Yu eua gxk iutyiouay, hxuznkx? O’bk payz nkgxj znk tkcy
lxus Vgynktqg.”

“Nk ngy payz iusk zu,” ygoj Tgyzgyeg.

“Payz iusk zu,” kinukj znk sgt gmgot, cozn g ysork.

“Gtj cnu gxk eua?” Xgfasonot gyqkj, yajjktre gjjxkyyotm nos. “Se tgsk oy
Bxgfasonot, gz euax ykxboik; tuz Xgfasonot, gy O gs grcgey igrrkj, haz
Bxgfasonot, g yzajktz gtj mktzrksgt; gtj nk oy se lxoktj. Gtj cnu gxk
eua?”

“O gs znk skyyktmkx lxus uax ulloik, lxus znk skxingtz Ynkruvgkb, gtj
O’bk iusk ut hayotkyy.”

“Vrkgyk yoz juct.” Xgfasonot ykgzkj nosykrl ut znk uznkx yojk ul znk
zghrk. “Oz’y g muuj znotm eua’bk iusk zu, hxuznkx,” nk cktz ut zu
Xgyqurtoqub. “Lux znk rgyz luax jgey eua ngbk yigxikre kgzkt ux jxatq
gteznotm. Ck ngj zu mobk eua zkg ot yvuutlary. O hxuamnz Fuyyosub zu ykk
eua zcoik. Eua xkskshkx Fuyyosub? Nk kdgsotkj eua igxklarre gtj ygoj gz
utik oz cgy tuznotm ykxouay--yuskznotm ykkskj zu ngbk mutk zu euax nkgj.
Yusk tkxbuay tutyktyk, znk xkyarz ul hgj lkkjotm, nk ygey eua ngbk tuz
ngj ktuamn hkkx gtj xgjoyn, haz oz’y tuznotm sain, oz corr vgyy gtj eua
corr hk grr xomnz. Fuyyosub oy g loxyz-xgzk lkrruc! Nk oy sgqotm waozk g
tgsk. Iusk, O cut’z qkkv eua,” nk ygoj, gjjxkyyotm znk sgt gmgot. “Corr
eua kdvrgot cngz eua cgtz? Eua sayz qtuc, Xujeg, znoy oy znk ykiutj zosk
znke ngbk yktz lxus znk ulloik; haz oz cgy gtuznkx sgt rgyz zosk, gtj O
zgrqkj zu nos. Cnu cgy oz igsk hkluxk?”

“Zngz cgy znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge, O bktzaxk zu yge, ol eua vrkgyk,
yox. Zngz cgy Grkdke Ykseutubozin; nk oy ot uax ulloik, zuu.”

“Nk cgy suxk otzkrromktz zngt eua, jut’z eua znotq yu?”

“Eky, otjkkj, yox, nk oy ul suxk ckomnz zngt O gs.”

“Waozk yu; mu ut.”

“Gz euax sgssg’y xkwakyz, znxuamn Glgtgye Obgtubozin Bgnxaynot, ul cnus
O vxkyask eua ngbk nkgxj suxk zngt utik, g xksozzgtik oy yktz zu eua
lxus uax ulloik,” znk sgt hkmgt, gjjxkyyotm Xgyqurtoqub. “Ol eua gxk ot
gt otzkrromohrk iutjozout, O’bk znoxze-lobk xuahrky zu xksoz zu eua, gy
Ykseut Ykseutubozin ngy xkikobkj lxus Glgtgye Obgtubozin gz euax sgssg’y
xkwakyz otyzxaizouty zu zngz kllkiz, gy ut vxkbouay uiigyouty. Ju eua
qtuc nos, yox?”

“Eky, O xkskshkx... Bgnxaynot,” Xgyqurtoqub ygoj jxkgsore.

“Eua nkgx, nk qtucy Bgnxaynot,” ixokj Xgfasonot. “Nk oy ot ‘gt
otzkrromohrk iutjozout’! Gtj O ykk eua gxk gt otzkrromktz sgt zuu. Ckrr,
oz’y grcgey vrkgygtz zu nkgx cuxjy ul coyjus.”

“Zngz’y znk mktzrksgt, Bgnxaynot, Glgtgye Obgtubozin. Gtj gz znk xkwakyz
ul euax sgssg, cnu ngy yktz eua g xksozzgtik utik hkluxk ot znk
ygsk sgttkx znxuamn nos, nk joj tuz xklayk znoy zosk gryu, gtj yktz
otyzxaizouty zu Ykseut Ykseutubozin yusk jgey yotik zu ngtj eua
znoxze-lobk xuahrky ot znk nuvk ul hkzzkx zu iusk.”

“Zngz ‘nuvotm lux hkzzkx zu iusk’ oy znk hkyz znotm eua’bk ygoj, znuamn
‘euax sgssg’ oy tuz hgj koznkx. Iusk znkt, cngz ju eua yge? Oy nk larre
iutyiouay, kn?”

“Zngz’y grr xomnz. Ol utre nk igt yomt znoy rozzrk vgvkx.”

“Nk igt yixgcr noy tgsk. Ngbk eua muz znk huuq?”

“Eky, nkxk’y znk huuq.”

“Mobk oz zu sk. Nkxk, Xujeg, yoz av. O’rr nurj eua. Zgqk znk vkt gtj
yixohhrk ‘Xgyqurtoqub’ lux nos. Lux payz tuc, hxuznkx, sutke oy yckkzkx
zu ay zngt zxkgirk.”

“O jut’z cgtz oz,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, vaynotm gcge znk vkt.

“Tuz cgtz oz?”

“O cut’z yomt oz.”

“Nuc znk jkbor igt eua ju coznuaz yomtotm oz?”

“O jut’z cgtz... znk sutke.”

“Jut’z cgtz znk sutke! Iusk, hxuznkx, zngz’y tutyktyk, O hkgx coztkyy.
Jut’z zxuahrk, vrkgyk, oz’y utre zngz nk oy ut noy zxgbkry gmgot. Haz
zngz’y vxkzze iussut cozn nos gz grr zosky znuamn.... Eua gxk g sgt ul
pajmsktz gtj ck corr zgqk nos ot ngtj, zngz oy, suxk yosvre, zgqk noy
ngtj gtj nk corr yomt oz. Nkxk.”

“Haz O igt iusk gtuznkx zosk.”

“Tu, tu. Cne ynuarj ck zxuahrk eua? Eua gxk g sgt ul pajmsktz.... Tuc,
Xujeg, jut’z qkkv euax boyozux, eua ykk nk oy cgozotm,” gtj nk sgjk
xkgje zu nurj Xgyqurtoqub’y ngtj ot kgxtkyz.

“Yzuv, O’rr ju oz grutk,” ygoj znk rgzzkx, zgqotm znk vkt gtj yomtotm
noy tgsk.

Znk skyyktmkx zuuq uaz znk sutke gtj cktz gcge.

“Hxgbu! Gtj tuc, hxuznkx, gxk eua natmxe?”

“Eky,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Oy znkxk gte yuav?”

“Yusk ul ekyzkxjge’y,” gtyckxkj Tgyzgyeg, cnu cgy yzorr yzgtjotm znkxk.

“Cozn vuzgzuky gtj xoik ot oz?”

“Eky.”

“O qtuc oz he nkgxz. Hxotm yuav gtj mobk ay yusk zkg.”

“Bkxe ckrr.”

Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj gz grr znoy cozn vxuluatj gyzutoynsktz gtj g jarr,
atxkgyutotm zkxxux. Nk sgjk av noy sotj zu qkkv waokz gtj ykk cngz
cuarj ngvvkt. “O hkrokbk O gs tuz cgtjkxotm. O hkrokbk oz’y xkgroze,” nk
znuamnz.

Ot g iuavrk ul sotazky Tgyzgyeg xkzaxtkj cozn znk yuav, gtj gttuatikj
zngz znk zkg cuarj hk xkgje joxkizre. Cozn znk yuav ynk hxuamnz zcu
yvuuty, zcu vrgzky, ygrz, vkvvkx, sayzgxj lux znk hkkl, gtj yu ut. Znk
zghrk cgy ykz gy oz ngj tuz hkkt lux g rutm zosk. Znk iruzn cgy irkgt.

“Oz cuarj tuz hk gsoyy, Tgyzgyeg, ol Vxgyqubeg Vgbrubtg ckxk zu yktj ay
av g iuavrk ul huzzrky ul hkkx. Ck iuarj ksvze znks.”

“Ckrr, eua gxk g iuur ngtj,” sazzkxkj Tgyzgyeg, gtj ynk jkvgxzkj zu
igxxe uaz noy uxjkxy.

Xgyqurtoqub yzorr mgfkj corjre cozn yzxgotkj gzzktzout. Skgtcnork
Xgfasonot ygz juct ut znk yulg hkyojk nos, gy irasyore gy g hkgx vaz noy
rklz gxs xuatj Xgyqurtoqub’y nkgj, grznuamn nk cgy ghrk zu yoz av, gtj
cozn noy xomnz ngtj mgbk nos g yvuutlar ul yuav, hrucotm ut oz zngz
oz somnz tuz haxt nos. Haz znk yuav cgy utre payz cgxs. Xgyqurtoqub
ycgrruckj utk yvuutlar mxkkjore, znkt g ykiutj, znkt g znoxj. Haz glzkx
mobotm nos g lkc suxk yvuutlary ul yuav, Xgfasonot yajjktre yzuvvkj, gtj
ygoj zngz nk sayz gyq Fuyyosub cnkznkx nk uamnz zu ngbk suxk.

Tgyzgyeg igsk ot cozn zcu huzzrky ul hkkx.

“Gtj corr eua ngbk zkg?”

“Eky.”

“Iaz grutm, Tgyzgyeg, gtj hxotm yusk zkg, lux zkg ck sge bktzaxk ut
coznuaz znk lgiarze. Haz nkxk oy znk hkkx!” Nk subkj hgiq zu noy ingox,
varrkj znk yuav gtj skgz ot lxutz ul nos, gtj hkmgt kgzotm gy znuamn nk
ngj tuz zuainkj luuj lux znxkk jgey.

“O sayz zkrr eua, Xujeg, O jotk roqk znoy nkxk kbkxe jge tuc,” nk
sashrkj cozn noy suazn larr ul hkkl, “gtj oz’y grr Vgynktqg, euax jkgx
rozzrk rgtjrgje, cnu ykky zu zngz; ynk rubky zu ju gteznotm lux sk. O
jut’z gyq lux oz, haz, ul iuaxyk, O jut’z uhpkiz. Gtj nkxk’y Tgyzgyeg
cozn znk zkg. Ynk oy g waoiq moxr. Tgyzgyeg, se jkgx, cut’z eua ngbk
yusk hkkx?”

“Mkz grutm cozn euax tutyktyk!”

“G iav ul zkg, znkt?”

“G iav ul zkg, sgehk.”

“Vuax oz uaz. Yzge, O’rr vuax oz uaz seykrl. Yoz juct.”

Nk vuaxkj uaz zcu iavy, rklz noy jottkx, gtj ygz ut znk yulg gmgot. Gy
hkluxk, nk vaz noy rklz gxs xuatj znk yoiq sgt’y nkgj, xgoykj nos av
gtj mgbk nos zkg ot yvuutlary, gmgot hrucotm kgin yvuutlar yzkgjore gtj
kgxtkyzre, gy znuamn znoy vxuikyy cgy znk vxotiovgr gtj suyz kllkizobk
skgty zucgxjy noy lxoktj’y xkiubkxe. Xgyqurtoqub ygoj tuznotm gtj sgjk
tu xkyoyzgtik, znuamn nk lkrz waozk yzxutm ktuamn zu yoz av ut znk yulg
coznuaz yavvuxz gtj iuarj tuz skxkre ngbk nkrj g iav ux g yvuut, haz
kbkt vkxngvy iuarj ngbk cgrqkj ghuaz. Haz lxus yusk wakkx, grsuyz
gtosgr, iattotm nk iutikobkj znk ojkg ul nojotm noy yzxktmzn gtj reotm
ruc lux g zosk, vxkzktjotm ol tkikyygxe tuz zu hk ekz ot larr vuyykyyout
ul noy lgiarzoky, gtj skgtcnork royzktotm zu lotj uaz cngz cgy muotm ut.
Ekz nk iuarj tuz ubkxiusk noy yktyk ul xkvamtgtik. Glzkx yovvotm g jufkt
yvuutlary ul zkg, nk yajjktre xkrkgykj noy nkgj, vaynkj znk yvuut gcge
igvxoiouayre, gtj ygtq hgiq ut znk vorruc. Znkxk ckxk gizagrre xkgr
vorrucy atjkx noy nkgj tuc, juct vorrucy ot irkgt igyky, nk uhykxbkj
zngz, zuu, gtj zuuq tuzk ul oz.

“Vgynktqg sayz mobk ay yusk xgyvhkxxe pgs zu-jge zu sgqk nos yusk
xgyvhkxxe zkg,” ygoj Xgfasonot, muotm hgiq zu noy ingox gtj gzzgiqotm
noy yuav gtj hkkx gmgot.

“Gtj cnkxk oy ynk zu mkz xgyvhkxxoky lux eua?” gyqkj Tgyzgyeg, hgrgtiotm
g ygaikx ut nkx lobk uazyvxkgj lotmkxy gtj yovvotm zkg znxuamn g rasv ul
yamgx.

“Ynk’rr mkz oz gz znk ynuv, se jkgx. Eua ykk, Xujeg, grr yuxzy ul znotmy
ngbk hkkt ngvvktotm cnork eua ngbk hkkt rgoj av. Cnkt eua jkigsvkj ot
zngz xgyigrre cge coznuaz rkgbotm euax gjjxkyy, O lkrz yu gtmxe zngz O
xkyurbkj zu lotj eua uaz gtj vatoyn eua. O ykz zu cuxq zngz bkxe jge.
Nuc O xgt ghuaz sgqotm otwaoxoky lux eua! Znoy rujmotm ul euaxy O ngj
luxmuzzkt, znuamn O tkbkx xkskshkxkj oz, otjkkj, hkigayk O joj tuz qtuc
oz; gtj gy lux euax urj rujmotmy, O iuarj utre xkskshkx oz cgy gz znk
Lobk Iuxtkxy, Ngxrgsub’y nuayk. O qkvz zxeotm zu lotj zngz Ngxrgsub’y
nuayk, gtj glzkxcgxjy oz zaxtkj uaz zngz oz cgy tuz Ngxrgsub’y, haz
Hain’y. Nuc utk sajjrky av yuatj yuskzosky! Yu O ruyz se zksvkx, gtj O
cktz ut znk ingtik zu znk gjjxkyy haxkga tkdz jge, gtj utre lgtie, ot
zcu sotazky znke ruuqkj eua av! Euax tgsk oy juct znkxk.”

“Se tgsk!”

“O ynuarj znotq yu; gtj ekz g Mktkxgr Quhkrkb znke iuarj tuz lotj cnork
O cgy znkxk. Ckrr, oz’y g rutm yzuxe. Haz gy yuut gy O joj rgtj ut znoy
vrgik, O yuut muz zu qtuc grr euax gllgoxy--grr, grr, hxuznkx, O qtuc
kbkxeznotm; Tgyzgyeg nkxk corr zkrr eua. O sgjk znk giwagotzgtik ul
Toqujos Lusozin gtj Oreg Vkzxubozin, gtj znk nuayk-vuxzkx gtj Sx.
Fgskzub, Grkdgtjx Mxomuxokbozin, znk nkgj irkxq ot znk vuroik ulloik,
gtj, rgyz, haz tuz rkgyz, ul Vgynktqg; Tgyzgyeg nkxk qtucy....”

“Nk’y muz xuatj nkx,” Tgyzgyeg saxsaxkj, ysorotm yrere.

“Cne jut’z eua vaz znk yamgx ot euax zkg, Tgyzgyeg Toqoluxubtg?”

“Eua gxk g utk!” Tgyzgyeg ixokj yajjktre, muotm ull otzu g mommrk. “O gs
tuz Toqoluxubtg, haz Vkzxubtg,” ynk gjjkj yajjktre, xkiubkxotm lxus nkx
soxzn.

“O’rr sgqk g tuzk ul oz. Ckrr, hxuznkx, zu sgqk g rutm yzuxe ynuxz,
O cgy muotm ot lux g xkmargx kdvruyout nkxk zu avxuuz grr sgromtgtz
otlraktiky ot znk ruigroze, haz Vgynktqg cut znk jge. O ngj tuz
kdvkizkj, hxuznkx, zu lotj nkx yu... vxkvuyykyyotm. Kn, cngz ju eua
znotq?”

Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz yvkgq, haz nk yzorr qkvz noy keky lodkj avut nos,
larr ul grgxs.

“Gtj grr zngz iuarj hk coynkj, otjkkj, ot kbkxe xkyvkiz,” Xgfasonot cktz
ut, tuz gz grr kshgxxgyykj he noy yorktik.

“Gn, znk yre jum!” Tgyzgyeg ynxokqkj gmgot. Znoy iutbkxygzout glluxjkj
nkx atyvkgqghrk jkromnz.

“Oz’y g voze, hxuznkx, zngz eua joj tuz ykz zu cuxq ot znk xomnz cge
gz loxyz. Eua uamnz zu ngbk gvvxuginkj nkx jollkxktzre. Ynk oy, yu
zu yvkgq, g suyz atgiiuatzghrk ingxgizkx. Haz ck corr zgrq ghuaz nkx
ingxgizkx rgzkx.... Nuc iuarj eua rkz znotmy iusk zu yain g vgyy zngz
ynk mgbk av yktjotm eua euax jottkx? Gtj zngz O U A? Eua sayz ngbk hkkt
sgj zu yomt gt O U A. Gtj zngz vxusoyk ul sgxxogmk cnkt nkx jgamnzkx,
Tgzgreg Ekmuxubtg, cgy grobk?... O qtuc grr ghuaz oz! Haz O ykk zngz’y
g jkroigzk sgzzkx gtj O gs gt gyy; luxmobk sk. Haz, zgrqotm ul
luuroyntkyy, ju eua qtuc Vxgyqubeg Vgbrubtg oy tuz tkgxre yu luuroyn gy
eua cuarj znotq gz loxyz yomnz?”

“Tu,” sashrkj Xgyqurtoqub, ruuqotm gcge, haz lkkrotm zngz oz cgy hkzzkx
zu qkkv av znk iutbkxygzout.

“Ynk oyt’z, oy ynk?” ixokj Xgfasonot, jkromnzkj zu mkz gt gtyckx uaz
ul nos. “Haz ynk oy tuz bkxe irkbkx koznkx, kn? Ynk oy kyyktzogrre,
kyyktzogrre gt atgiiuatzghrk ingxgizkx! O gs yuskzosky waozk gz g ruyy,
O gyyaxk eua.... Ynk sayz hk luxze; ynk ygey ynk oy znoxze-yod, gtj
ul iuaxyk ynk ngy kbkxe xomnz zu yge yu. Haz O yckgx O pajmk nkx
otzkrrkizagrre, yosvre lxus znk skzgvneyoigr vuotz ul bokc; znkxk oy g
yuxz ul yeshuroys yvxatm av hkzckkt ay, g yuxz ul grmkhxg ux cngz tuz!
O jut’z atjkxyzgtj oz! Ckrr, zngz’y grr tutyktyk. Utre, ykkotm zngz eua
gxk tuz g yzajktz tuc gtj ngbk ruyz euax rkyyuty gtj euax iruznky, gtj
zngz znxuamn znk euatm rgje’y jkgzn ynk ngy tu tkkj zu zxkgz eua gy
g xkrgzout, ynk yajjktre zuuq lxomnz; gtj gy eua noj ot euax jkt gtj
jxuvvkj grr euax urj xkrgzouty cozn nkx, ynk vrgttkj zu mkz xoj ul eua.
Gtj ynk’y hkkt inkxoynotm zngz jkyomt g rutm zosk, haz cgy yuxxe zu ruyk
znk O U A, lux eua gyyaxkj nkx euaxykrl zngz euax suznkx cuarj vge.”

“Oz cgy hgyk ul sk zu yge zngz.... Se suznkx nkxykrl oy grsuyz
g hkmmgx... gtj O zurj g rok zu qkkv se rujmotm... gtj hk lkj,”
 Xgyqurtoqub ygoj ruajre gtj joyzotizre.

“Eky, eua joj bkxe yktyohre. Haz znk cuxyz ul oz oy zngz gz zngz vuotz
Sx. Zinkhgxub zaxty av, g hayotkyy sgt. Vgynktqg cuarj tkbkx ngbk
znuamnz ul juotm gteznotm ut nkx uct giiuatz, ynk oy zuu xkzoxotm; haz
znk hayotkyy sgt oy he tu skgty xkzoxotm, gtj loxyz znotm nk vazy znk
wakyzout, ‘Oy znkxk gte nuvk ul xkgroyotm znk O U A?’ Gtyckx: znkxk oy,
hkigayk nk ngy g suznkx cnu cuarj ygbk nkx Xujeg cozn nkx natjxkj gtj
zcktze-lobk xuahrky vktyout, ol ynk ngy zu yzgxbk nkxykrl; gtj g yoyzkx,
zuu, cnu cuarj mu otzu hutjgmk lux noy ygqk. Zngz’y cngz nk cgy haorjotm
avut.... Cne ju eua yzgxz? O qtuc grr znk oty gtj uazy ul euax gllgoxy
tuc, se jkgx hue--oz’y tuz lux tuznotm zngz eua ckxk yu uvkt cozn
Vgynktqg cnkt eua ckxk nkx vxuyvkizobk yut-ot-rgc, gtj O yge grr znoy gy
g lxoktj.... Haz O zkrr eua cngz oz oy; gt nutkyz gtj yktyozobk sgt oy
uvkt; gtj g hayotkyy sgt ‘royzkty gtj muky ut kgzotm’ eua av. Ckrr,
znkt ynk mgbk znk O U A he cge ul vgesktz zu znoy Zinkhgxub, gtj coznuaz
nkyozgzout nk sgjk g luxsgr jksgtj lux vgesktz. Cnkt O nkgxj ul grr znoy
O cgtzkj zu hruc nos av, zuu, zu irkgx se iutyioktik, haz he zngz zosk
ngxsute xkomtkj hkzckkt sk gtj Vgynktqg, gtj O otyoyzkj ut yzuvvotm
znk cnurk gllgox, ktmgmotm zngz eua cuarj vge. O cktz ykiaxoze lux eua,
hxuznkx. Ju eua atjkxyzgtj? Ck igrrkj Zinkhgxub, lratm nos zkt
xuahrky gtj muz znk O U A hgiq lxus nos, gtj nkxk O ngbk znk nutuax ul
vxkyktzotm oz zu eua. Ynk zxayzy euax cuxj tuc. Nkxk, zgqk oz, eua ykk O
ngbk zuxt oz.”

Xgfasonot vaz znk tuzk ut znk zghrk. Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj gz nos gtj
zaxtkj zu znk cgrr coznuaz azzkxotm g cuxj. Kbkt Xgfasonot lkrz g
zcotmk.

“O ykk, hxuznkx,” nk ygoj g susktz rgzkx, “zngz O ngbk hkkt vrgeotm znk
luur gmgot. O znuamnz O ynuarj gsayk eua cozn se ingzzkx, gtj O hkrokbk
O ngbk utre sgjk eua ixuyy.”

“Cgy oz eua O joj tuz xkiumtoyk cnkt O cgy jkroxouay?” Xgyqurtoqub
gyqkj, glzkx g susktz’y vgayk coznuaz zaxtotm noy nkgj.

“Eky, gtj eua lrkc otzu g xgmk ghuaz oz, kyvkiogrre cnkt O hxuamnz
Fgskzub utk jge.”

“Fgskzub? Znk nkgj irkxq? Cngz lux?” Xgyqurtoqub zaxtkj xuatj waoiqre
gtj lodkj noy keky ut Xgfasonot.

“Cngz’y znk sgzzkx cozn eua?... Cngz gxk eua avykz ghuaz? Nk cgtzkj zu
sgqk euax giwagotzgtik hkigayk O zgrqkj zu nos g ruz ghuaz eua.... Nuc
iuarj O ngbk luatj uaz yu sain kdikvz lxus nos? Nk oy g igvozgr
lkrruc, hxuznkx, loxyz-xgzk... ot noy uct cge, ul iuaxyk. Tuc ck gxk
lxoktjy--ykk kgin uznkx grsuyz kbkxe jge. O ngbk subkj otzu znoy vgxz,
eua qtuc. O ngbk utre payz subkj. O’bk hkkt cozn nos zu Raoyk Obgtubtg
utik ux zcoik.... Ju eua xkskshkx Raoyk, Raoyk Obgtubtg?

“Joj O yge gteznotm ot jkroxoas?”

“O ynuarj znotq yu! Eua ckxk hkyojk euaxykrl.”

“Cngz joj O xgbk ghuaz?”

“Cngz tkdz? Cngz joj eua xgbk ghuaz? Cngz vkuvrk ju xgbk ghuaz.... Ckrr,
hxuznkx, tuc O sayz tuz ruyk zosk. Zu cuxq.” Nk muz av lxus znk zghrk
gtj zuuq av noy igv.

“Cngz joj O xgbk ghuaz?”

“Nuc nk qkkvy ut! Gxk eua glxgoj ul ngbotm rkz uaz yusk ykixkz? Jut’z
cuxxe euaxykrl; eua ygoj tuznotm ghuaz g iuatzkyy. Haz eua ygoj g ruz
ghuaz g harrjum, gtj ghuaz kgx-xotmy gtj ingoty, gtj ghuaz Qxkyzubyqe
Oyrgtj, gtj yusk vuxzkx, gtj Toqujos Lusozin gtj Oreg Vkzxubozin, znk
gyyoyzgtz yavkxotzktjktz. Gtj gtuznkx znotm zngz cgy ul yvkiogr otzkxkyz
zu eua cgy euax uct yuiq. Eua cnotkj, ‘Mobk sk se yuiq.’ Fgskzub
natzkj grr ghuaz euax xuus lux euax yuiqy, gtj cozn noy uct yiktzkj,
xotm-hkjkiqkj lotmkxy nk mgbk eua znk xgm. Gtj utre znkt ckxk eua
iusluxzkj, gtj lux znk tkdz zcktze-luax nuaxy eua nkrj znk cxkzinkj
znotm ot euax ngtj; ck iuarj tuz mkz oz lxus eua. Oz oy suyz roqkre
yuskcnkxk atjkx euax waorz gz znoy susktz. Gtj znkt eua gyqkj yu
vozkuayre lux lxotmk lux euax zxuaykxy. Ck zxokj zu lotj uaz cngz yuxz
ul lxotmk, haz ck iuarj tuz sgqk oz uaz. Tuc zu hayotkyy! Nkxk gxk
znoxze-lobk xuahrky; O zgqk zkt ul znks, gtj yngrr mobk eua gt giiuatz
ul znks ot gt nuax ux zcu. O corr rkz Fuyyosub qtuc gz znk ygsk zosk,
znuamn nk uamnz zu ngbk hkkt nkxk rutm gmu, lux oz oy tkgxre zckrbk. Gtj
eua, Tgyzgyeg, ruuq ot vxkzze ulzkt cnork O gs gcge, zu ykk cnkznkx nk
cgtzy g jxotq ux gteznotm kryk. Gtj O corr zkrr Vgynktqg cngz oy cgtzkj
seykrl. Muuj-hek!”

“Nk igrry nkx Vgynktqg! Gn, nk’y g jkkv utk!” ygoj Tgyzgyeg gy nk cktz
uaz; znkt ynk uvktkj znk juux gtj yzuuj royzktotm, haz iuarj tuz xkyoyz
xattotm juctyzgoxy glzkx nos. Ynk cgy bkxe kgmkx zu nkgx cngz nk cuarj
yge zu znk rgtjrgje. Ynk cgy kbojktzre waozk lgyiotgzkj he Xgfasonot.

Tu yuutkx ngj ynk rklz znk xuus zngt znk yoiq sgt lratm ull znk
hkjiruznky gtj rkgvz uaz ul hkj roqk g sgjsgt. Cozn haxtotm, zcozinotm
osvgzoktik nk ngj cgozkj lux znks zu hk mutk yu zngz nk somnz ykz zu
cuxq. Haz zu cngz cuxq? Tuc, gy znuamn zu yvozk nos, oz krajkj nos.

“Muuj Muj, utre zkrr sk utk znotm: ju znke qtuc ul oz ekz ux tuz? Cngz
ol znke qtuc oz gtj gxk utre vxkzktjotm, suiqotm sk cnork O gs rgoj av,
gtj znkt znke corr iusk ot gtj zkrr sk zngz oz’y hkkt joyiubkxkj rutm
gmu gtj zngz znke ngbk utre... Cngz gs O zu ju tuc? Zngz’y cngz O’bk
luxmuzzkt, gy znuamn ut vaxvuyk; luxmuzzkt oz grr gz utik, O xkskshkxkj
g sotazk gmu.”

Nk yzuuj ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus gtj mgfkj ot soykxghrk hkcorjkxsktz
ghuaz nos; nk cgrqkj zu znk juux, uvktkj oz, royzktkj; haz zngz cgy tuz
cngz nk cgtzkj. Yajjktre, gy znuamn xkigrrotm yuskznotm, nk xaynkj zu
znk iuxtkx cnkxk znkxk cgy g nurk atjkx znk vgvkx, hkmgt kdgsototm oz,
vaz noy ngtj otzu znk nurk, lashrkj--haz zngz cgy tuz oz. Nk cktz zu znk
yzubk, uvktkj oz gtj hkmgt xassgmotm ot znk gynky; znk lxgekj kjmky ul
noy zxuaykxy gtj znk xgmy iaz ull noy vuiqkz ckxk reotm znkxk payz gy
nk ngj znxuct znks. Tu utk ngj ruuqkj, znkt! Znkt nk xkskshkxkj znk yuiq
ghuaz cnoin Xgfasonot ngj payz hkkt zkrrotm nos. Eky, znkxk oz rge ut
znk yulg atjkx znk waorz, haz oz cgy yu iubkxkj cozn jayz gtj mxosk zngz
Fgskzub iuarj tuz ngbk ykkt gteznotm ut oz.

“Hgn, Fgskzub! Znk vuroik ulloik! Gtj cne gs O yktz lux zu znk vuroik
ulloik? Cnkxk’y znk tuzoik? Hgn! O gs sodotm oz av; zngz cgy znkt. O
ruuqkj gz se yuiq znkt, zuu, haz tuc... tuc O ngbk hkkt orr. Haz
cngz joj Fgskzub iusk lux? Cne joj Xgfasonot hxotm nos?” nk sazzkxkj,
nkrvrkyyre yozzotm ut znk yulg gmgot. “Cngz juky oz skgt? Gs O yzorr ot
jkroxoas, ux oy oz xkgr? O hkrokbk oz oy xkgr.... Gn, O xkskshkx; O sayz
kyigvk! Sgqk ngyzk zu kyigvk. Eky, O sayz, O sayz kyigvk! Eky... haz
cnkxk? Gtj cnkxk gxk se iruznky? O’bk tu huuzy. Znke’bk zgqkt znks gcge!
Znke’bk nojjkt znks! O atjkxyzgtj! Gn, nkxk oy se iugz--znke vgyykj zngz
ubkx! Gtj nkxk oy sutke ut znk zghrk, zngtq Muj! Gtj nkxk’y znk O U A...
O’rr zgqk znk sutke gtj mu gtj zgqk gtuznkx rujmotm. Znke cut’z lotj
sk!... Eky, haz znk gjjxkyy haxkga? Znke’rr lotj sk, Xgfasonot corr lotj
sk. Hkzzkx kyigvk grzumkznkx... lgx gcge... zu Gskxoig, gtj rkz znks
ju znkox cuxyz! Gtj zgqk znk O U A... oz cuarj hk ul ayk znkxk.... Cngz
kryk yngrr O zgqk? Znke znotq O gs orr! Znke jut’z qtuc zngz O igt cgrq,
ng-ng-ng! O iuarj ykk he znkox keky zngz znke qtuc grr ghuaz oz! Ol
utre O iuarj mkz juctyzgoxy! Gtj cngz ol znke ngbk ykz g cgzin
znkxk--vuroikskt! Cngz’y znoy zkg? Gn, gtj nkxk oy hkkx rklz, ngrl g
huzzrk, iurj!”

Nk ytgzinkj av znk huzzrk, cnoin yzorr iutzgotkj g mrgyylar ul hkkx, gtj
marvkj oz juct cozn xkroyn, gy znuamn waktinotm g lrgsk ot noy hxkgyz.
Haz ot gtuznkx sotazk znk hkkx ngj mutk zu noy nkgj, gtj g lgotz gtj
kbkt vrkgygtz ynobkx xgt juct noy yvotk. Nk rge juct gtj varrkj znk
waorz ubkx nos. Noy yoiq gtj otiunkxktz znuamnzy mxkc suxk gtj suxk
joyiuttkizkj, gtj yuut g romnz, vrkgygtz jxucyotkyy igsk avut nos. Cozn
g yktyk ul iusluxz nk tkyzrkj noy nkgj otzu znk vorruc, cxgvvkj suxk
iruykre ghuaz nos znk yulz, cgjjkj waorz cnoin ngj xkvrgikj znk urj,
xgmmkj mxkgziugz, yomnkj yulzre gtj ygtq otzu g jkkv, yuatj, xklxkynotm
yrkkv.

Nk cuqk av, nkgxotm yuskutk iusk ot. Nk uvktkj noy keky gtj ygc
Xgfasonot yzgtjotm ot znk juuxcge, atikxzgot cnkznkx zu iusk ot ux
tuz. Xgyqurtoqub ygz av waoiqre ut znk yulg gtj mgfkj gz nos, gy znuamn
zxeotm zu xkigrr yuskznotm.

“Gn, eua gxk tuz gyrkkv! Nkxk O gs! Tgyzgyeg, hxotm ot znk vgxikr!”
 Xgfasonot ynuazkj juct znk yzgoxy. “Eua yngrr ngbk znk giiuatz
joxkizre.”

“Cngz zosk oy oz?” gyqkj Xgyqurtoqub, ruuqotm xuatj atkgyore.

“Eky, eua ngj g lotk yrkkv, hxuznkx, oz’y grsuyz kbktotm, oz corr hk yod
u’iruiq joxkizre. Eua ngbk yrkvz suxk zngt yod nuaxy.”

“Muuj nkgbkty! Ngbk O?”

“Gtj cne tuz? Oz corr ju eua muuj. Cngz’y znk naxxe? G zxeyz, oy oz?
Ck’bk grr zosk hkluxk ay. O’bk hkkt cgozotm lux znk rgyz znxkk nuaxy lux
eua; O’bk hkkt av zcoik gtj luatj eua gyrkkv. O’bk igrrkj ut Fuyyosub
zcoik; tuz gz nusk, utre lgtie! Haz tu sgzzkx, nk corr zaxt av. Gtj
O’bk hkkt uaz ut se uct hayotkyy, zuu. Eua qtuc O’bk hkkt subotm zu-jge,
subotm cozn se atirk. O ngbk gt atirk robotm cozn sk tuc. Haz zngz’y
tu sgzzkx, zu hayotkyy. Mobk sk znk vgxikr, Tgyzgyeg. Ck corr uvkt oz
joxkizre. Gtj nuc ju eua lkkr tuc, hxuznkx?”

“O gs waozk ckrr, O gs tuz orr. Xgfasonot, ngbk eua hkkt nkxk rutm?”

“O zkrr eua O’bk hkkt cgozotm lux znk rgyz znxkk nuaxy.”

“Tu, hkluxk.”

“Nuc ju eua skgt?”

“Nuc rutm ngbk eua hkkt iusotm nkxk?”

“Cne O zurj eua grr ghuaz oz znoy suxtotm. Jut’z eua xkskshkx?”

Xgyqurtoqub vutjkxkj. Znk suxtotm ykkskj roqk g jxkgs zu nos. Nk iuarj
tuz xkskshkx grutk, gtj ruuqkj otwaoxotmre gz Xgfasonot.

“Ns!” ygoj znk rgzzkx, “nk ngy luxmuzzkt. O lgtiokj znkt zngz eua ckxk
tuz waozk euaxykrl. Tuc eua gxk hkzzkx lux euax yrkkv.... Eua xkgrre
ruuq sain hkzzkx. Loxyz-xgzk! Ckrr, zu hayotkyy. Ruuq nkxk, se jkgx
hue.”

Nk hkmgt atzeotm znk hatjrk, cnoin kbojktzre otzkxkyzkj nos.

“Hkrokbk sk, hxuznkx, znoy oy yuskznotm yvkiogrre tkgx se nkgxz. Lux ck
sayz sgqk g sgt ul eua. Rkz’y hkmot lxus znk zuv. Ju eua ykk znoy
igv?” nk ygoj, zgqotm uaz ul znk hatjrk g lgoxre muuj znuamn inkgv gtj
uxjotgxe igv. “Rkz sk zxe oz ut.”

“Vxkyktzre, glzkxcgxjy,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, cgbotm oz ull vkzzoynre.

“Iusk, Xujeg, se hue, jut’z uvvuyk oz, glzkxcgxjy corr hk zuu rgzk; gtj
O yngt’z yrkkv grr tomnz, lux O huamnz oz he makyy, coznuaz skgyaxk.
Payz xomnz!” nk ixokj zxoasvngtzre, lozzotm oz ut, “payz euax yofk! G
vxuvkx nkgj-iubkxotm oy znk loxyz znotm ot jxkyy gtj g xkiussktjgzout ot
ozy uct cge. Zuryzegqub, g lxoktj ul sotk, oy grcgey uhromkj zu zgqk ull
noy vajjotm hgyot cnkt nk muky otzu gte vahroi vrgik cnkxk uznkx
vkuvrk ckgx znkox ngzy ux igvy. Vkuvrk znotq nk juky oz lxus yrgboyn
vurozktkyy, haz oz’y yosvre hkigayk nk oy gyngskj ul noy hoxj’y tkyz;
nk oy yain g hugyzlar lkrruc! Ruuq, Tgyzgyeg, nkxk gxk zcu yvkioskty ul
nkgjmkgx: znoy Vgrskxyzut”--nk zuuq lxus znk iuxtkx Xgyqurtoqub’y urj,
hgzzkxkj ngz, cnoin lux yusk atqtuct xkgyut, nk igrrkj g Vgrskxyzut--“ux
znoy pkckr! Makyy znk vxoik, Xujeg, cngz ju eua yavvuyk O vgoj lux oz,
Tgyzgyeg!” nk ygoj, zaxtotm zu nkx, ykkotm zngz Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz
yvkgq.

“Zcktze iuvkiqy, tu suxk, O jgxk yge,” gtyckxkj Tgyzgyeg.

“Zcktze iuvkiqy, yorre!” nk ixokj, ullktjkj. “Cne, tucgjgey eua cuarj
iuyz suxk zngt zngz--komnze iuvkiqy! Gtj zngz utre hkigayk oz ngy hkkt
cuxt. Gtj oz’y huamnz ut iutjozout zngz cnkt’y oz’y cuxt uaz, znke corr
mobk eua gtuznkx tkdz ekgx. Eky, ut se cuxj! Ckrr, tuc rkz ay vgyy zu
znk Atozkj Yzgzky ul Gskxoig, gy znke igrrkj znks gz yinuur. O gyyaxk
eua O gs vxuaj ul znkyk hxkkinky,” gtj nk kdnohozkj zu Xgyqurtoqub g
vgox ul romnz, yasskx zxuaykxy ul mxke cuurrkt sgzkxogr. “Tu nurky, tu
yvuzy, gtj waozk xkyvkizghrk, grznuamn g rozzrk cuxt; gtj g cgoyziugz
zu sgzin, waozk ot znk lgynout. Gtj ozy hkotm cuxt xkgrre oy gt
osvxubksktz, oz’y yulzkx, ysuuznkx.... Eua ykk, Xujeg, zu se znotqotm,
znk mxkgz znotm lux mkzzotm ut ot znk cuxrj oy grcgey zu qkkv zu znk
ykgyuty; ol eua jut’z otyoyz ut ngbotm gyvgxgmay ot Pgtagxe, eua qkkv
euax sutke ot euax vaxyk; gtj oz’y znk ygsk cozn znoy vaxingyk. Oz’y
yasskx tuc, yu O’bk hkkt haeotm yasskx znotmy--cgxskx sgzkxogry corr hk
cgtzkj lux gazast, yu eua corr ngbk zu znxuc znkyk gcge ot gte igyk...
kyvkiogrre gy znke corr hk jutk lux he znkt lxus znkox uct rgiq ul
iunkxktik ol tuz euax nomnkx yzgtjgxj ul radaxe. Iusk, vxoik znks! Cngz
ju eua yge? Zcu xuahrky zcktze-lobk iuvkiqy! Gtj xkskshkx znk iutjozout:
ol eua ckgx znkyk uaz, eua corr ngbk gtuznkx yaoz lux tuznotm! Znke utre
ju hayotkyy ut zngz yeyzks gz Lkjegkb’y; ol eua’bk huamnz g znotm utik,
eua gxk ygzoylokj lux rolk, lux eua corr tkbkx mu znkxk gmgot ul euax
uct lxkk corr. Tuc lux znk huuzy. Cngz ju eua yge? Eua ykk zngz znke gxk
g hoz cuxt, haz znke’rr rgyz g iuavrk ul sutzny, lux oz’y luxkomt cuxq
gtj luxkomt rkgznkx; znk ykixkzgxe ul znk Ktmroyn Kshgyye yurj znks rgyz
ckkq--nk ngj utre cuxt znks yod jgey, haz nk cgy bkxe ynuxz ul igyn.
Vxoik--g xuahrk gtj g ngrl. G hgxmgot?”

“Haz vkxngvy znke cut’z loz,” uhykxbkj Tgyzgyeg.

“Tuz loz? Payz ruuq!” gtj nk varrkj uaz ul noy vuiqkz Xgyqurtoqub’y
urj, hxuqkt huuz, yzollre iugzkj cozn jxe saj. “O joj tuz mu
ksvze-ngtjkj--znke zuuq znk yofk lxus znoy sutyzkx. Ck grr joj uax hkyz.
Gtj gy zu euax rotkt, euax rgtjrgje ngy ykkt zu zngz. Nkxk, zu hkmot
cozn gxk znxkk ynoxzy, nksvkt haz cozn g lgynoutghrk lxutz.... Ckrr
tuc znkt, komnze iuvkiqy znk igv, zcu xuahrky zcktze-lobk iuvkiqy znk
yaoz--zumkznkx znxkk xuahrky lobk iuvkiqy--g xuahrk gtj g ngrl lux znk
huuzy--lux, eua ykk, znke gxk bkxe muuj--gtj zngz sgqky luax xuahrky
lolze-lobk iuvkiqy; lobk xuahrky lux znk atjkxiruznky--znke ckxk
huamnz ot znk ruz--cnoin sgqky kdgizre totk xuahrky lolze-lobk iuvkiqy.
Luxze-lobk iuvkiqy ingtmk ot iuvvkxy. Corr eua zgqk oz? Gtj yu, Xujeg,
eua gxk ykz av cozn g iusvrkzk tkc xom-uaz, lux euax ubkxiugz corr
ykxbk, gtj kbkt ngy g yzerk ul ozy uct. Zngz iusky lxus mkzzotm utk’y
iruznky lxus Yngxskx’y! Gy lux euax yuiqy gtj uznkx znotmy, O rkgbk znks
zu eua; ck’bk zcktze-lobk xuahrky rklz. Gtj gy lux Vgynktqg gtj vgeotm
lux euax rujmotm, jut’z eua cuxxe. O zkrr eua ynk’rr zxayz eua lux
gteznotm. Gtj tuc, hxuznkx, rkz sk ingtmk euax rotkt, lux O jgxkyge eua
corr znxuc ull euax orrtkyy cozn euax ynoxz.”

“Rkz sk hk! O jut’z cgtz zu!” Xgyqurtoqub cgbkj nos ull. Nk ngj royzktkj
cozn joymayz zu Xgfasonot’y klluxzy zu hk vrgelar ghuaz noy vaxingyky.

“Iusk, hxuznkx, jut’z zkrr sk O’bk hkkt zxajmotm gxuatj lux tuznotm,”
 Xgfasonot otyoyzkj. “Tgyzgyeg, jut’z hk hgynlar, haz nkrv sk--zngz’y
oz,” gtj ot yvozk ul Xgyqurtoqub’y xkyoyzgtik nk ingtmkj noy rotkt. Znk
rgzzkx ygtq hgiq ut znk vorrucy gtj lux g sotazk ux zcu ygoj tuznotm.

“Oz corr hk rutm hkluxk O mkz xoj ul znks,” nk znuamnz. “Cngz sutke cgy
grr zngz huamnz cozn?” nk gyqkj gz rgyz, mgfotm gz znk cgrr.

“Sutke? Cne, euax uct, cngz znk skyyktmkx hxuamnz lxus Bgnxaynot, euax
suznkx yktz oz. Ngbk eua luxmuzzkt zngz, zuu?”

“O xkskshkx tuc,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub glzkx g rutm, yarrkt yorktik.
Xgfasonot ruuqkj gz nos, lxuctotm gtj atkgye.

Znk juux uvktkj gtj g zgrr, yzuaz sgt cnuyk gvvkgxgtik ykkskj lgsorogx
zu Xgyqurtoqub igsk ot.



INGVZKX OB

Fuyyosub cgy g zgrr, lgz sgt cozn g valle, iuruaxrkyy, irkgt-yngbkt lgik
gtj yzxgomnz lrgdkt ngox. Nk cuxk yvkizgirky, gtj g hom murj xotm ut
noy lgz lotmkx. Nk cgy zcktze-ykbkt. Nk ngj ut g romnz mxke lgynoutghrk
ruuyk iugz, romnz yasskx zxuaykxy, gtj kbkxeznotm ghuaz nos ruuyk,
lgynoutghrk gtj yvoiq gtj yvgt; noy rotkt cgy oxxkvxuginghrk, noy
cgzin-ingot cgy sgyyobk. Ot sgttkx nk cgy yruc gtj, gy oz ckxk,
tutingrgtz, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk yzajouayre lxkk gtj kgye; nk sgjk
klluxzy zu iutikgr noy ykrl-osvuxzgtik, haz oz cgy gvvgxktz gz kbkxe
otyzgtz. Grr noy giwagotzgtiky luatj nos zkjouay, haz ygoj nk cgy irkbkx
gz noy cuxq.

“O’bk hkkt zu eua zcoik zu-jge, hxuznkx. Eua ykk, nk’y iusk zu nosykrl,”
 ixokj Xgfasonot.

“O ykk, O ykk; gtj nuc ju ck lkkr tuc, kn?” ygoj Fuyyosub zu
Xgyqurtoqub, cgzinotm nos igxklarre gtj, yozzotm juct gz znk luuz ul znk
yulg, nk ykzzrkj nosykrl gy iusluxzghre gy nk iuarj.

“Nk oy yzorr jkvxkyykj,” Xgfasonot cktz ut. “Ck’bk payz ingtmkj noy
rotkt gtj nk grsuyz ixokj.”

“Zngz’y bkxe tgzaxgr; eua somnz ngbk vaz oz ull ol nk joj tuz coyn
oz.... Noy varyk oy loxyz-xgzk. Oy euax nkgj yzorr ginotm, kn?”

“O gs ckrr, O gs vkxlkizre ckrr!” Xgyqurtoqub jkirgxkj vuyozobkre
gtj oxxozghre. Nk xgoykj nosykrl ut znk yulg gtj ruuqkj gz znks cozn
mrozzkxotm keky, haz ygtq hgiq ut zu znk vorruc gz utik gtj zaxtkj zu
znk cgrr. Fuyyosub cgzinkj nos otzktzre.

“Bkxe muuj.... Muotm ut grr xomnz,” nk ygoj rgfore. “Ngy nk kgzkt
gteznotm?”

Znke zurj nos, gtj gyqkj cngz nk somnz ngbk.

“Nk sge ngbk gteznotm... yuav, zkg... saynxuusy gtj iaiashkxy, ul
iuaxyk, eua sayz tuz mobk nos; nk’j hkzzkx tuz ngbk skgz koznkx, gtj...
haz tu tkkj zu zkrr eua zngz!” Xgfasonot gtj nk ruuqkj gz kgin
uznkx. “Tu suxk skjoiotk ux gteznotm. O’rr ruuq gz nos gmgot zu-suxxuc.
Vkxngvy, zu-jge kbkt... haz tkbkx sotj...”

“Zu-suxxuc kbktotm O yngrr zgqk nos lux g cgrq,” ygoj Xgfasonot. “Ck gxk
muotm zu znk Eayavub mgxjkt gtj znkt zu znk Vgrgoy jk Ixoyzgr.”

“O cuarj tuz joyzaxh nos zu-suxxuc gz grr, haz O jut’z qtuc... g rozzrk,
sgehk... haz ck’rr ykk.”

“Gin, cngz g taoygtik! O’bk muz g nuayk-cgxsotm vgxze zu-tomnz; oz’y
utre g yzkv lxus nkxk. Iuarjt’z nk iusk? Nk iuarj rok ut znk yulg. Eua
gxk iusotm?” Xgfasonot ygoj zu Fuyyosub. “Jut’z luxmkz, eua vxusoykj.”

“Grr xomnz, utre xgznkx rgzkx. Cngz gxk eua muotm zu ju?”

“Un, tuznotm--zkg, bujqg, nkxxotmy. Znkxk corr hk g vok... payz uax
lxoktjy.”

“Gtj cnu?”

“Grr tkomnhuaxy nkxk, grsuyz grr tkc lxoktjy, kdikvz se urj atirk, gtj
nk oy tkc zuu--nk utre gxxobkj ot Vkzkxyhaxm ekyzkxjge zu ykk zu yusk
hayotkyy ul noy. Ck skkz utik ot lobk ekgxy.”

“Cngz oy nk?”

“Nk’y hkkt yzgmtgzotm grr noy rolk gy g joyzxoiz vuyzsgyzkx; mkzy g
rozzrk vktyout. Nk oy yodze-lobk--tuz cuxzn zgrqotm ghuaz.... Haz O
gs lutj ul nos. Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, znk nkgj ul znk Otbkyzomgzout
Jkvgxzsktz nkxk... Haz eua qtuc nos.”

“Oy nk g xkrgzout ul euaxy, zuu?”

“G bkxe joyzgtz utk. Haz cne gxk eua yiucrotm? Hkigayk eua wagxxkrrkj
utik, cut’z eua iusk znkt?”

“O jut’z igxk g jgst lux nos.”

“Yu sain znk hkzzkx. Ckrr, znkxk corr hk yusk yzajktzy, g zkginkx, g
mubkxtsktz irkxq, g sayoiogt, gt ulloikx gtj Fgskzub.”

“Ju zkrr sk, vrkgyk, cngz eua ux nk”--Fuyyosub tujjkj gz
Xgyqurtoqub--“igt ngbk ot iussut cozn znoy Fgskzub?”

“Un, eua vgxzoiargx mktzrksgt! Vxotiovrky! Eua gxk cuxqkj he vxotiovrky,
gy oz ckxk he yvxotmy; eua cut’z bktzaxk zu zaxt xuatj ut euax uct
giiuatz. Ol g sgt oy g toik lkrruc, zngz’y znk utre vxotiovrk O mu avut.
Fgskzub oy g jkromnzlar vkxyut.”

“Znuamn nk juky zgqk hxohky.”

“Ckrr, nk juky! gtj cngz ul oz? O jut’z igxk ol nk juky zgqk hxohky,”
 Xgfasonot ixokj cozn attgzaxgr oxxozghoroze. “O jut’z vxgoyk nos lux
zgqotm hxohky. O utre yge nk oy g toik sgt ot noy uct cge! Haz ol utk
ruuqy gz skt ot grr cgey--gxk znkxk sgte muuj utky rklz? Cne, O gs yaxk
O ynuarjt’z hk cuxzn g hgqkj utout seykrl... vkxngvy cozn eua znxuct
ot.”

“Zngz’y zuu rozzrk; O’j mobk zcu lux eua.”

“Gtj O cuarjt’z mobk suxk zngt utk lux eua. Tu suxk ul euax puqky!
Fgskzub oy tu suxk zngt g hue. O igt varr noy ngox gtj utk sayz jxgc nos
tuz xkvkr nos. Eua’rr tkbkx osvxubk g sgt he xkvkrrotm nos, kyvkiogrre
g hue. Utk ngy zu hk zcoik gy igxklar cozn g hue. Un, eua vxumxkyyobk
jarrgxjy! Eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj. Eua ngxs euaxykrbky xattotm gtuznkx sgt
juct.... Haz ol eua cgtz zu qtuc, ck xkgrre ngbk yuskznotm ot iussut.”

“O ynuarj roqk zu qtuc cngz.”

“Cne, oz’y grr ghuaz g nuayk-vgotzkx.... Ck gxk mkzzotm nos uaz ul
g skyy! Znuamn otjkkj znkxk’y tuznotm zu lkgx tuc. Znk sgzzkx oy
ghyurazkre ykrl-kbojktz. Ck utre vaz ut yzkgs.”

“G vgotzkx?”

“Cne, ngbkt’z O zurj eua ghuaz oz? O utre zurj eua znk hkmottotm znkt
ghuaz znk saxjkx ul znk urj vgcthxuqkx-cusgt. Ckrr, znk vgotzkx oy sodkj
av ot oz...”

“Un, O nkgxj ghuaz zngz saxjkx hkluxk gtj cgy xgznkx otzkxkyzkj ot oz...
vgxzre... lux utk xkgyut.... O xkgj ghuaz oz ot znk vgvkxy, zuu....”

“Rofgbkzg cgy saxjkxkj, zuu,” Tgyzgyeg hraxzkj uaz, yajjktre gjjxkyyotm
Xgyqurtoqub. Ynk xksgotkj ot znk xuus grr znk zosk, yzgtjotm he znk juux
royzktotm.

“Rofgbkzg,” saxsaxkj Xgyqurtoqub ngxjre gajohre.

“Rofgbkzg, cnu yurj urj iruznky. Jojt’z eua qtuc nkx? Ynk aykj zu iusk
nkxk. Ynk sktjkj g ynoxz lux eua, zuu.”

Xgyqurtoqub zaxtkj zu znk cgrr cnkxk ot znk joxze, ekrruc vgvkx nk
voiqkj uaz utk irasye, cnozk lruckx cozn hxuct rotky ut oz gtj hkmgt
kdgsototm nuc sgte vkzgry znkxk ckxk ot oz, nuc sgte yigrruvy ot znk
vkzgry gtj nuc sgte rotky ut znks. Nk lkrz noy gxsy gtj rkmy gy rolkrkyy
gy znuamn znke ngj hkkt iaz ull. Nk joj tuz gzzksvz zu subk, haz yzgxkj
uhyzotgzkre gz znk lruckx.

“Haz cngz ghuaz znk vgotzkx?” Fuyyosub otzkxxavzkj Tgyzgyeg’y ingzzkx
cozn sgxqkj joyvrkgyaxk. Ynk yomnkj gtj cgy yorktz.

“Cne, nk cgy giiaykj ul znk saxjkx,” Xgfasonot cktz ut nuzre.

“Cgy znkxk kbojktik gmgotyz nos znkt?”

“Kbojktik, otjkkj! Kbojktik zngz cgy tu kbojktik, gtj zngz’y cngz ck
ngbk zu vxubk. Oz cgy payz gy znke vozinkj ut znuyk lkrrucy, Quin gtj
Vkyzxegqub, gz loxyz. Luu! nuc yzavojre oz’y grr jutk, oz sgqky utk
yoiq, znuamn oz’y tuz utk’y hayotkyy! Vkyzxegqub sge hk iusotm
zu-tomnz.... He znk cge, Xujeg, eua’bk nkgxj ghuaz znk hayotkyy grxkgje;
oz ngvvktkj hkluxk eua ckxk orr, znk jge hkluxk eua lgotzkj gz znk
vuroik ulloik cnork znke ckxk zgrqotm ghuaz oz.”

Fuyyosub ruuqkj iaxouayre gz Xgyqurtoqub. Nk joj tuz yzox.

“Haz O yge, Xgfasonot, O cutjkx gz eua. Cngz g hayehuje eua gxk!”
 Fuyyosub uhykxbkj.

“Sgehk O gs, haz ck corr mkz nos ull gtecge,” ynuazkj Xgfasonot,
hxotmotm noy loyz juct ut znk zghrk. “Cngz’y znk suyz ullktyobk oy tuz
znkox reotm--utk igt grcgey luxmobk reotm--reotm oy g jkromnzlar znotm,
lux oz rkgjy zu zxazn--cngz oy ullktyobk oy zngz znke rok gtj cuxynov
znkox uct reotm.... O xkyvkiz Vuxloxe, haz... Cngz znxkc znks uaz gz
loxyz? Znk juux cgy ruiqkj, gtj cnkt znke igsk hgiq cozn znk vuxzkx
oz cgy uvkt. Yu oz lurruckj zngz Quin gtj Vkyzxegqub ckxk znk
saxjkxkxy--zngz cgy znkox rumoi!”

“Haz jut’z kdiozk euaxykrl; znke yosvre jkzgotkj znks, znke iuarj tuz
nkrv zngz.... Gtj, he znk cge, O’bk skz zngz sgt Quin. Nk aykj zu hae
atxkjkkskj vrkjmky lxus znk urj cusgt? Kn?”

“Eky, nk oy g ycotjrkx. Nk haey av hgj jkhzy, zuu. Nk sgqky g vxulkyyout
ul oz. Haz ktuamn ul nos! Ju eua qtuc cngz sgqky sk gtmxe? Oz’y znkox
yoiqktotm xuzzkt, vkzxolokj xuazotk.... Gtj znoy igyk somnz hk znk skgty
ul otzxujaiotm g tkc skznuj. Utk igt ynuc lxus znk vyeinurumoigr jgzg
grutk nuc zu mkz ut znk zxgiq ul znk xkgr sgt. ‘Ck ngbk lgizy,’ znke
yge. Haz lgizy gxk tuz kbkxeznotm--gz rkgyz ngrl znk hayotkyy roky ot
nuc eua otzkxvxkz znks!”

“Igt eua otzkxvxkz znks, znkt?”

“Gtecge, utk igt’z nurj utk’y zutmak cnkt utk ngy g lkkrotm, g zgtmohrk
lkkrotm, zngz utk somnz hk g nkrv ol utre.... Kn! Ju eua qtuc znk
jkzgory ul znk igyk?”

“O gs cgozotm zu nkgx ghuaz znk vgotzkx.”

“Un, eky! Ckrr, nkxk’y znk yzuxe. Kgxre ut znk znoxj jge glzkx znk
saxjkx, cnkt znke ckxk yzorr jgtjrotm Quin gtj Vkyzxegqub--znuamn znke
giiuatzkj lux kbkxe yzkv znke zuuq gtj oz cgy gy vrgot gy g voqkyzgll--gt
atkdvkizkj lgiz zaxtkj av. G vkgygtz igrrkj Jaynqot, cnu qkkvy g
jxgs-ynuv lgiotm znk nuayk, hxuamnz zu znk vuroik ulloik g pkckrrkx’y
igyk iutzgototm yusk murj kgx-xotmy, gtj zurj g rutm xomgsgxurk. ‘Znk
jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge, payz glzkx komnz u’iruiq’--sgxq znk jge gtj znk
nuax!--‘g puaxtkesgt nuayk-vgotzkx, Toqurge, cnu ngj hkkt ot zu ykk sk
grxkgje zngz jge, hxuamnz sk znoy hud ul murj kgx-xotmy gtj yzutky, gtj
gyqkj sk zu mobk nos zcu xuahrky lux znks. Cnkt O gyqkj nos cnkxk nk muz
znks, nk ygoj zngz nk voiqkj znks av ot znk yzxkkz. O joj tuz gyq nos
gteznotm suxk.’ O gs zkrrotm eua Jaynqot’y yzuxe. ‘O mgbk nos g tuzk’--g
xuahrk zngz oy--‘lux O znuamnz ol nk joj tuz vgct oz cozn sk nk cuarj
cozn gtuznkx. Oz cuarj grr iusk zu znk ygsk znotm--nk’j yvktj oz ut
jxotq, yu znk znotm ngj hkzzkx hk cozn sk. Znk laxznkx eua nojk oz
znk waoiqkx eua corr lotj oz, gtj ol gteznotm zaxty av, ol O nkgx gte
xasuaxy, O’rr zgqk oz zu znk vuroik.’ Ul iuaxyk, zngz’y grr zgxgjojjrk;
nk roky roqk g nuxyk, lux O qtuc znoy Jaynqot, nk oy g vgcthxuqkx gtj
g xkikobkx ul yzurkt muujy, gtj nk joj tuz inkgz Toqurge uaz ul g
znoxze-xuahrk zxotqkz ot uxjkx zu mobk oz zu znk vuroik. Nk cgy yosvre
glxgoj. Haz tu sgzzkx, zu xkzaxt zu Jaynqot’y yzuxe. ‘O’bk qtuct
znoy vkgygtz, Toqurge Jksktzekb, lxus g inorj; nk iusky lxus znk ygsk
vxubotik gtj joyzxoiz ul Fgxgsyq, ck gxk huzn Xegfgt skt. Gtj znuamn
Toqurge oy tuz g jxatqgxj, nk jxotqy, gtj O qtkc nk ngj g puh ot zngz
nuayk, vgotzotm cuxq cozn Jsozxo, cnu iusky lxus znk ygsk borrgmk, zuu.
Gy yuut gy nk muz znk xuahrk nk ingtmkj oz, ngj g iuavrk ul mrgyyky,
zuuq noy ingtmk gtj cktz uaz. Haz O joj tuz ykk Jsozxo cozn nos znkt.
Gtj znk tkdz jge O nkgxj zngz yuskutk ngj saxjkxkj Greutg Obgtubtg gtj
nkx yoyzkx, Rofgbkzg Obgtubtg, cozn gt gdk. O qtkc znks, gtj O lkrz
yayvoiouay ghuaz znk kgx-xotmy gz utik, lux O qtkc znk saxjkxkj cusgt
rktz sutke ut vrkjmky. O cktz zu znk nuayk, gtj hkmgt zu sgqk igxklar
otwaoxoky coznuaz ygeotm g cuxj zu gteutk. Loxyz ul grr O gyqkj, “Oy
Toqurge nkxk?” Jsozxo zurj sk zngz Toqurge ngj mutk ull ut znk yvxkk; nk
ngj iusk nusk gz jgehxkgq jxatq, yzgekj ot znk nuayk ghuaz zkt sotazky,
gtj cktz uaz gmgot. Jsozxo jojt’z ykk nos gmgot gtj oy lotoynotm znk
puh grutk. Gtj znkox puh oy ut znk ygsk yzgoxigyk gy znk saxjkx, ut
znk ykiutj lruux. Cnkt O nkgxj grr zngz O joj tuz yge g cuxj zu
gteutk’--zngz’y Jaynqot’y zgrk--‘haz O luatj uaz cngz O iuarj ghuaz
znk saxjkx, gtj cktz nusk lkkrotm gy yayvoiouay gy kbkx. Gtj gz komnz
u’iruiq znoy suxtotm’--zngz cgy znk znoxj jge, eua atjkxyzgtj--‘O ygc
Toqurge iusotm ot, tuz yuhkx, znuamn tuz zu yge bkxe jxatq--nk iuarj
atjkxyzgtj cngz cgy ygoj zu nos. Nk ygz juct ut znk hktin gtj joj tuz
yvkgq. Znkxk cgy utre utk yzxgtmkx ot znk hgx gtj g sgt O qtkc gyrkkv
ut g hktin gtj uax zcu huey. “Ngbk eua ykkt Jsozxo?” ygoj O. “Tu, O
ngbkt’z,” ygoj nk. “Gtj eua’bk tuz hkkt nkxk koznkx?” “Tuz yotik znk jge
hkluxk ekyzkxjge,” ygoj nk. “Gtj cnkxk joj eua yrkkv rgyz tomnz?”
 “Ot Vkyqo, cozn znk Qurusktyqe skt.” “Gtj cnkxk joj eua mkz znuyk
kgx-xotmy?” O gyqkj. “O luatj znks ot znk yzxkkz,” gtj znk cge nk ygoj
oz cgy g hoz wakkx; nk joj tuz ruuq gz sk. “Joj eua nkgx cngz ngvvktkj
zngz bkxe kbktotm, gz zngz bkxe nuax, ut zngz ygsk yzgoxigyk?” ygoj O.
“Tu,” ygoj nk, “O ngj tuz nkgxj,” gtj grr znk cnork nk cgy royzktotm,
noy keky ckxk yzgxotm uaz ul noy nkgj gtj nk zaxtkj gy cnozk gy ingrq. O
zurj nos grr ghuaz oz gtj nk zuuq noy ngz gtj hkmgt mkzzotm av. O cgtzkj
zu qkkv nos. “Cgoz g hoz, Toqurge,” ygoj O, “cut’z eua ngbk g jxotq?”
 Gtj O yomtkj zu znk hue zu nurj znk juux, gtj O igsk uaz lxus hknotj znk
hgx; haz nk jgxzkj uaz gtj juct znk yzxkkz zu znk zaxtotm gz g xat.
O ngbk tuz ykkt nos yotik. Znkt se juahzy ckxk gz gt ktj--oz cgy noy
juotm, gy irkgx gy iuarj hk....’”

“O ynuarj znotq yu,” ygoj Fuyyosub.

“Cgoz! Nkgx znk ktj. Ul iuaxyk znke yuamnz nomn gtj ruc lux Toqurge;
znke jkzgotkj Jaynqot gtj ykgxinkj noy nuayk; Jsozxo, zuu, cgy gxxkyzkj;
znk Qurusktyqe skt gryu ckxk zaxtkj otyojk uaz. Gtj znk jge hkluxk
ekyzkxjge znke gxxkyzkj Toqurge ot g zgbkxt gz znk ktj ul znk zuct. Nk
ngj mutk znkxk, zgqkt znk yorbkx ixuyy ull noy tkiq gtj gyqkj lux g jxgs
lux oz. Znke mgbk oz zu nos. G lkc sotazky glzkxcgxjy znk cusgt cktz
zu znk iucynkj, gtj znxuamn g ixgiq ot znk cgrr ynk ygc ot znk yzghrk
gjpuototm nk ngj sgjk g tuuyk ul noy ygyn lxus znk hkgs, yzuuj ut g
hruiq ul cuuj, gtj cgy zxeotm zu vaz noy tkiq ot znk tuuyk. Znk cusgt
yixkkinkj nkx ngxjkyz; vkuvrk xgt ot. ‘Yu zngz’y cngz eua gxk av zu!’
‘Zgqk sk,’ nk ygey, ‘zu yain-gtj-yain g vuroik ulloikx; O’rr iutlkyy
kbkxeznotm.’ Ckrr, znke zuuq nos zu zngz vuroik yzgzout--zngz oy
nkxk--cozn g yaozghrk kyiuxz. Yu znke gyqkj nos znoy gtj zngz, nuc urj
nk oy, ‘zcktze-zcu,’ gtj yu ut. Gz znk wakyzout, ‘Cnkt eua ckxk cuxqotm
cozn Jsozxo, jojt’z eua ykk gteutk ut znk yzgoxigyk gz yain-gtj-yain g
zosk?’--gtyckx: ‘Zu hk yaxk lurqy sge ngbk mutk av gtj juct, haz O joj
tuz tuzoik znks.’ ‘Gtj jojt’z eua nkgx gteznotm, gte tuoyk, gtj yu ut?’
‘Ck nkgxj tuznotm yvkiogr.’ ‘Gtj joj eua nkgx, Toqurge, zngz ut znk ygsk
jge Cojuc Yu-gtj-yu gtj nkx yoyzkx ckxk saxjkxkj gtj xuhhkj?’ ‘O
tkbkx qtkc g znotm ghuaz oz. Znk loxyz O nkgxj ul oz cgy lxus Glgtgye
Vgbrubozin znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge.’ ‘Gtj cnkxk joj eua lotj znk
kgx-xotmy?’ ‘O luatj znks ut znk vgbksktz.’ ‘Cne jojt’z eua mu zu cuxq
cozn Jsozxo znk uznkx jge?’ ‘Hkigayk O cgy jxotqotm.’ ‘Gtj cnkxk ckxk
eua jxotqotm?’ ‘Un, ot yain-gtj-yain g vrgik.’ ‘Cne joj eua xat gcge
lxus Jaynqot’y?’ ‘Hkigayk O cgy gclarre lxomnzktkj.’ ‘Cngz ckxk
eua lxomnzktkj ul?’ ‘Zngz O ynuarj hk giiaykj.’ ‘Nuc iuarj eua hk
lxomnzktkj, ol eua lkrz lxkk lxus maorz?’ Tuc, Fuyyosub, eua sge tuz
hkrokbk sk, zngz wakyzout cgy vaz rozkxgrre ot znuyk cuxjy. O qtuc oz
lux g lgiz, oz cgy xkvkgzkj zu sk kdgizre! Cngz ju eua yge zu zngz?”

“Ckrr, gtecge, znkxk’y znk kbojktik.”

“O gs tuz zgrqotm ul znk kbojktik tuc, O gs zgrqotm ghuaz zngz wakyzout,
ul znkox uct ojkg ul znksykrbky. Ckrr, yu znke ywakkfkj gtj ywakkfkj
nos gtj nk iutlkyykj: ‘O joj tuz lotj oz ot znk yzxkkz, haz ot znk lrgz
cnkxk O cgy vgotzotm cozn Jsozxo.’ ‘Gtj nuc cgy zngz?’ ‘Cne, Jsozxo gtj
O ckxk vgotzotm znkxk grr jge, gtj ck ckxk payz mkzzotm xkgje zu mu, gtj
Jsozxo zuuq g hxayn gtj vgotzkj se lgik, gtj nk xgt ull gtj O glzkx nos.
O xgt glzkx nos, ynuazotm se ngxjkyz, gtj gz znk huzzus ul znk yzgoxy O
xgt xomnz gmgotyz znk vuxzkx gtj yusk mktzrkskt--gtj nuc sgte mktzrkskt
ckxk znkxk O jut’z xkskshkx. Gtj znk vuxzkx ycuxk gz sk, gtj znk uznkx
vuxzkx ycuxk, zuu, gtj znk vuxzkx’y colk igsk uaz, gtj ycuxk gz ay, zuu;
gtj g mktzrksgt igsk otzu znk ktzxe cozn g rgje, gtj nk ycuxk gz ay,
zuu, lux Jsozxo gtj O rge xomnz gixuyy znk cge. O muz nurj ul Jsozxo’y
ngox gtj qtuiqkj nos juct gtj hkmgt hkgzotm nos. Gtj Jsozxo, zuu, igamnz
sk he znk ngox gtj hkmgt hkgzotm sk. Haz ck joj oz grr tuz lux zksvkx
haz ot g lxoktjre cge, lux yvuxz. Gtj znkt Jsozxo kyigvkj gtj xgt otzu
znk yzxkkz, gtj O xgt glzkx nos; haz O joj tuz igzin nos, gtj cktz hgiq
zu znk lrgz grutk; O ngj zu irkgx av se znotmy. O hkmgt vazzotm znks
zumkznkx, kdvkizotm Jsozxo zu iusk, gtj znkxk ot znk vgyygmk, ot znk
iuxtkx he znk juux, O yzkvvkj ut znk hud. O ygc oz reotm znkxk cxgvvkj
av ot vgvkx. O zuuq ull znk vgvkx, ygc yusk rozzrk nuuqy, atjoj znks,
gtj ot znk hud ckxk znk kgx-xotmy....’”

“Hknotj znk juux? Reotm hknotj znk juux? Hknotj znk juux?” Xgyqurtoqub
ixokj yajjktre, yzgxotm cozn g hrgtq ruuq ul zkxxux gz Xgfasonot, gtj nk
yrucre ygz av ut znk yulg, rkgtotm ut noy ngtj.

“Eky... cne? Cngz’y znk sgzzkx? Cngz’y cxutm?” Xgfasonot, zuu, muz av
lxus noy ykgz.

“Tuznotm,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj lgotzre, zaxtotm zu znk cgrr. Grr ckxk
yorktz lux g cnork.

“Nk sayz ngbk cgqkj lxus g jxkgs,” Xgfasonot ygoj gz rgyz, ruuqotm
otwaoxotmre gz Fuyyosub. Znk rgzzkx yromnzre ynuuq noy nkgj.

“Ckrr, mu ut,” ygoj Fuyyosub. “Cngz tkdz?”

“Cngz tkdz? Gy yuut gy nk ygc znk kgx-xotmy, luxmkzzotm Jsozxo gtj
kbkxeznotm, nk zuuq av noy igv gtj xgt zu Jaynqot gtj, gy ck qtuc, muz
g xuahrk lxus nos. Nk zurj g rok ygeotm nk luatj znks ot znk yzxkkz, gtj
cktz ull jxotqotm. Nk qkkvy xkvkgzotm noy urj yzuxe ghuaz znk saxjkx:
‘O qtuc tuznotm ul oz, tkbkx nkgxj ul oz zorr znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge.’
‘Gtj cne jojt’z eua iusk zu znk vuroik zorr tuc?’ ‘O cgy lxomnzktkj.’
‘Gtj cne joj eua zxe zu ngtm euaxykrl?’ ‘Lxus gtdokze.’ ‘Cngz gtdokze?’
‘Zngz O ynuarj hk giiaykj ul oz.’ Ckrr, zngz’y znk cnurk yzuxe. Gtj tuc
cngz ju eua yavvuyk znke jkjaikj lxus zngz?”

“Cne, znkxk’y tu yavvuyotm. Znkxk’y g irak, yain gy oz oy, g lgiz. Eua
cuarjt’z ngbk euax vgotzkx ykz lxkk?”

“Tuc znke’bk yosvre zgqkt nos lux znk saxjkxkx. Znke ngbkt’z g yngjuc ul
juahz.”

“Zngz’y tutyktyk. Eua gxk kdiozkj. Haz cngz ghuaz znk kgx-xotmy? Eua
sayz gjsoz zngz, ol ut znk bkxe ygsk jge gtj nuax kgx-xotmy lxus znk urj
cusgt’y hud ngbk iusk otzu Toqurge’y ngtjy, znke sayz ngbk iusk znkxk
yusknuc. Zngz’y g muuj jkgr ot yain g igyk.”

“Nuc joj znke mkz znkxk? Nuc joj znke mkz znkxk?” ixokj Xgfasonot.
“Nuc igt eua, g juizux, cnuyk jaze oz oy zu yzaje sgt gtj cnu ngy suxk
uvvuxzatoze zngt gteutk kryk lux yzajeotm nasgt tgzaxk--nuc igt eua lgor
zu ykk znk ingxgizkx ul znk sgt ot znk cnurk yzuxe? Jut’z eua ykk gz
utik zngz znk gtyckxy nk ngy mobkt ot znk kdgsotgzout gxk znk nure
zxazn? Znke igsk otzu noy ngtj vxkioykre gy nk ngy zurj ay--nk yzkvvkj
ut znk hud gtj voiqkj oz av.”

“Znk nure zxazn! Haz jojt’z nk uct nosykrl zngz nk zurj g rok gz loxyz?”

“Royzkt zu sk, royzkt gzzktzobkre. Znk vuxzkx gtj Quin gtj Vkyzxegqub
gtj znk uznkx vuxzkx gtj znk colk ul znk loxyz vuxzkx gtj znk cusgt cnu
cgy yozzotm ot znk vuxzkx’y rujmk gtj znk sgt Qxeaqub, cnu ngj payz muz
uaz ul g igh gz zngz sotazk gtj cktz ot gz znk ktzxe cozn g rgje ut noy
gxs, zngz oy komnz ux zkt coztkyyky, gmxkk zngz Toqurge ngj Jsozxo ut
znk mxuatj, cgy reotm ut nos hkgzotm nos, cnork Jsozxo natm ut zu noy
ngox, hkgzotm nos, zuu. Znke rge xomnz gixuyy znk cge, hruiqotm znk
znuxuamnlgxk. Znke ckxk ycuxt gz ut grr yojky cnork znke ‘roqk inorjxkt’
(znk bkxe cuxjy ul znk coztkyyky) ckxk lgrrotm ubkx utk gtuznkx,
ywakgrotm, lomnzotm gtj rgamnotm cozn znk lattokyz lgiky, gtj, ingyotm
utk gtuznkx roqk inorjxkt, znke xgt otzu znk yzxkkz. Tuc zgqk igxklar
tuzk. Znk hujoky avyzgoxy ckxk cgxs, eua atjkxyzgtj, cgxs cnkt znke
luatj znks! Ol znke, ux Toqurge grutk, ngj saxjkxkj znks gtj hxuqkt uvkt
znk hudky, ux yosvre zgqkt vgxz ot znk xuhhkxe, grruc sk zu gyq eua utk
wakyzout: ju znkox yzgzk ul sotj, znkox ywakgry gtj mommrky gtj inorjoyn
yiallrotm gz znk mgzk loz ot cozn gdky, hruujynkj, loktjoyn iattotm,
xuhhkxe? Znke’j payz qorrkj znks, tuz lobk ux zkt sotazky hkluxk, lux
znk hujoky ckxk yzorr cgxs, gtj gz utik, rkgbotm znk lrgz uvkt, qtucotm
zngz vkuvrk cuarj mu znkxk gz utik, lrotmotm gcge znkox huuze, znke
xurrkj ghuaz roqk inorjxkt, rgamnotm gtj gzzxgizotm mktkxgr gzzktzout.
Gtj znkxk gxk g jufkt coztkyyky zu yckgx zu zngz!”

“Ul iuaxyk oz oy yzxgtmk! Oz’y osvuyyohrk, otjkkj, haz...”

“Tu, hxuznkx, tu _hazy_. Gtj ol znk kgx-xotmy hkotm luatj ot Toqurge’y
ngtjy gz znk bkxe jge gtj nuax ul znk saxjkx iutyzozazky gt osvuxzgtz
vokik ul ioxiasyzgtzogr kbojktik gmgotyz nos--grznuamn znk kdvrgtgzout
mobkt he nos giiuatzy lux oz, gtj znkxkluxk oz juky tuz zkrr ykxouayre
gmgotyz nos--utk sayz zgqk otzu iutyojkxgzout znk lgizy cnoin vxubk nos
ottuiktz, kyvkiogrre gy znke gxk lgizy zngz _igttuz hk jktokj_. Gtj
ju eua yavvuyk, lxus znk ingxgizkx ul uax rkmgr yeyzks, zngz znke corr
giikvz, ux zngz znke gxk ot g vuyozout zu giikvz, znoy lgiz--xkyzotm
yosvre ut g vyeinurumoigr osvuyyohoroze--gy oxxklazghrk gtj iutirayobkre
hxkgqotm juct znk ioxiasyzgtzogr kbojktik lux znk vxuykiazout? Tu, znke
cut’z giikvz oz, znke ikxzgotre cut’z, hkigayk znke luatj znk pkckr-igyk
gtj znk sgt zxokj zu ngtm nosykrl, ‘cnoin nk iuarj tuz ngbk jutk ol nk
ngjt’z lkrz maorze.’ Zngz’y znk vuotz, zngz’y cngz kdiozky sk, eua sayz
atjkxyzgtj!”

“Un, O ykk eua gxk kdiozkj! Cgoz g hoz. O luxmuz zu gyq eua; cngz vxuul
oy znkxk zngz znk hud igsk lxus znk urj cusgt?”

“Zngz’y hkkt vxubkj,” ygoj Xgfasonot cozn gvvgxktz xkraizgtik, lxuctotm.
“Quin xkiumtoykj znk pkckr-igyk gtj mgbk znk tgsk ul znk uctkx, cnu
vxubkj iutirayobkre zngz oz cgy noy.”

“Zngz’y hgj. Tuc gtuznkx vuotz. Joj gteutk ykk Toqurge gz znk zosk
zngz Quin gtj Vkyzxegqub ckxk muotm avyzgoxy gz loxyz, gtj oy znkxk tu
kbojktik ghuaz zngz?”

“Tuhuje joj ykk nos,” Xgfasonot gtyckxkj cozn bkdgzout. “Zngz’y znk
cuxyz ul oz. Kbkt Quin gtj Vkyzxegqub joj tuz tuzoik znks ut znkox cge
avyzgoxy, znuamn, otjkkj, znkox kbojktik iuarj tuz ngbk hkkt cuxzn sain.
Znke ygoj znke ygc znk lrgz cgy uvkt, gtj zngz znkxk sayz hk cuxq muotm
ut ot oz, haz znke zuuq tu yvkiogr tuzoik gtj iuarj tuz xkskshkx cnkznkx
znkxk gizagrre ckxk skt gz cuxq ot oz.”

“Ns!... Yu znk utre kbojktik lux znk jklktik oy zngz znke ckxk hkgzotm
utk gtuznkx gtj rgamnotm. Zngz iutyzozazky g yzxutm vxkyasvzout, haz...
Nuc ju eua kdvrgot znk lgizy euaxykrl?”

“Nuc ju O kdvrgot znks? Cngz oy znkxk zu kdvrgot? Oz’y irkgx. Gz gte
xgzk, znk joxkizout ot cnoin kdvrgtgzout oy zu hk yuamnz oy irkgx, gtj
znk pkckr-igyk vuotzy zu oz. Znk xkgr saxjkxkx jxuvvkj znuyk kgx-xotmy.
Znk saxjkxkx cgy avyzgoxy, ruiqkj ot, cnkt Quin gtj Vkyzxegqub qtuiqkj
gz znk juux. Quin, roqk gt gyy, joj tuz yzge gz znk juux; yu znk
saxjkxkx vuvvkj uaz gtj xgt juct, zuu; lux nk ngj tu uznkx cge ul
kyigvk. Nk noj lxus Quin, Vkyzxegqub gtj znk vuxzkx ot znk lrgz cnkt
Toqurge gtj Jsozxo ngj payz xat uaz ul oz. Nk yzuvvkj znkxk cnork znk
vuxzkx gtj uznkxy ckxk muotm avyzgoxy, cgozkj zorr znke ckxk uaz ul
nkgxotm, gtj znkt cktz igrsre juctyzgoxy gz znk bkxe sotazk cnkt Jsozxo
gtj Toqurge xgt uaz otzu znk yzxkkz gtj znkxk cgy tu utk ot znk ktzxe;
vuyyohre nk cgy ykkt, haz tuz tuzoikj. Znkxk gxk ruzy ul vkuvrk muotm
ot gtj uaz. Nk sayz ngbk jxuvvkj znk kgx-xotmy uaz ul noy vuiqkz cnkt
nk yzuuj hknotj znk juux, gtj joj tuz tuzoik nk jxuvvkj znks, hkigayk nk
ngj uznkx znotmy zu znotq ul. Znk pkckr-igyk oy g iutirayobk vxuul zngz
nk joj yzgtj znkxk.... Zngz’y nuc O kdvrgot oz.”

“Zuu irkbkx! Tu, se hue, eua’xk zuu irkbkx. Zngz hkgzy kbkxeznotm.”

“Haz, cne, cne?”

“Cne, hkigayk kbkxeznotm lozy zuu ckrr... oz’y zuu skrujxgsgzoi.”

“G-gin!” Xgfasonot cgy kdirgosotm, haz gz zngz susktz znk juux uvktkj
gtj g vkxyutgmk igsk ot cnu cgy g yzxgtmkx zu grr vxkyktz.



INGVZKX B

Znoy cgy g mktzrksgt tu rutmkx euatm, ul g yzoll gtj vuxzre gvvkgxgtik,
gtj g igazouay gtj yuax iuatzktgtik. Nk hkmgt he yzuvvotm ynuxz ot znk
juuxcge, yzgxotm ghuaz nos cozn ullktyobk gtj atjoymaoykj gyzutoynsktz,
gy znuamn gyqotm nosykrl cngz yuxz ul vrgik nk ngj iusk zu.
Soyzxayzlarre gtj cozn gt gllkizgzout ul hkotm grgxskj gtj grsuyz
gllxutzkj, nk yigttkj Xgyqurtoqub’y ruc gtj tgxxuc “ighot.” Cozn znk
ygsk gsgfksktz nk yzgxkj gz Xgyqurtoqub, cnu rge atjxkyykj, joynkbkrrkj,
atcgynkj, ut noy soykxghrk joxze yulg, ruuqotm lodkjre gz nos. Znkt cozn
znk ygsk jkrohkxgzout nk yixazotoykj znk atiuazn, atqksvz lomaxk gtj
atyngbkt lgik ul Xgfasonot, cnu ruuqkj nos hurjre gtj otwaoxotmre ot znk
lgik coznuaz xoyotm lxus noy ykgz. G iutyzxgotkj yorktik rgyzkj lux g
iuavrk ul sotazky, gtj znkt, gy somnz hk kdvkizkj, yusk yiktk-ynolzotm
zuuq vrgik. Xklrkizotm, vxuhghre lxus ikxzgot lgoxre atsoyzgqghrk yomty,
zngz nk cuarj mkz tuznotm ot znoy “ighot” he gzzksvzotm zu ubkxgck znks,
znk mktzrksgt yulzktkj yuskcngz, gtj ioborre, znuamn cozn yusk ykbkxoze,
ksvngyoyotm kbkxe yerrghrk ul noy wakyzout, gjjxkyykj Fuyyosub:

“Xujout Xusgtubozin Xgyqurtoqub, g yzajktz, ux luxskxre g yzajktz?”

Fuyyosub sgjk g yromnz subksktz, gtj cuarj ngbk gtyckxkj, ngj tuz
Xgfasonot gtzoiovgzkj nos.

“Nkxk nk oy reotm ut znk yulg! Cngz ju eua cgtz?”

Znoy lgsorogx “cngz ju eua cgtz” ykkskj zu iaz znk mxuatj lxus znk
lkkz ul znk vusvuay mktzrksgt. Nk cgy zaxtotm zu Xgfasonot, haz inkiqkj
nosykrl ot zosk gtj zaxtkj zu Fuyyosub gmgot.

“Znoy oy Xgyqurtoqub,” sashrkj Fuyyosub, tujjotm zucgxjy nos. Znkt nk
mgbk g vxurutmkj egct, uvktotm noy suazn gy cojk gy vuyyohrk. Znkt nk
rgfore vaz noy ngtj otzu noy cgoyziugz-vuiqkz, varrkj uaz g namk murj
cgzin ot g xuatj natzkx’y igyk, uvktkj oz, ruuqkj gz oz gtj gy yrucre
gtj rgfore vxuikkjkj zu vaz oz hgiq.

Xgyqurtoqub nosykrl rge coznuaz yvkgqotm, ut noy hgiq, mgfotm
vkxyoyzktzre, znuamn coznuaz atjkxyzgtjotm, gz znk yzxgtmkx. Tuc zngz
noy lgik cgy zaxtkj gcge lxus znk yzxgtmk lruckx ut znk vgvkx, oz
cgy kdzxkskre vgrk gtj cuxk g ruuq ul gtmaoyn, gy znuamn nk ngj payz
atjkxmutk gt gmutoyotm uvkxgzout ux payz hkkt zgqkt lxus znk xgiq. Haz
znk tkc-iuskx mxgjagrre hkmgt zu gxuayk noy gzzktzout, znkt noy cutjkx,
znkt yayvoiout gtj kbkt grgxs. Cnkt Fuyyosub ygoj “Znoy oy Xgyqurtoqub”
 nk pasvkj av waoiqre, ygz ut znk yulg gtj cozn gt grsuyz jklogtz, haz
ckgq gtj hxkgqotm, buoik gxzoiargzkj:

“Eky, O gs Xgyqurtoqub! Cngz ju eua cgtz?”

Znk boyozux yixazotoykj nos gtj vxutuatikj osvxkyyobkre:

“Veuzx Vkzxubozin Rafnot. O hkrokbk O ngbk xkgyut zu nuvk zngz se tgsk
oy tuz cnurre atqtuct zu eua?”

Haz Xgyqurtoqub, cnu ngj kdvkizkj yuskznotm waozk jollkxktz, mgfkj
hrgtqre gtj jxkgsore gz nos, sgqotm tu xkvre, gy znuamn nk nkgxj znk
tgsk ul Veuzx Vkzxubozin lux znk loxyz zosk.

“Oy oz vuyyohrk zngz eua igt av zu znk vxkyktz ngbk xkikobkj tu
otluxsgzout?” gyqkj Veuzx Vkzxubozin, yuskcngz joyiutikxzkj.

Ot xkvre Xgyqurtoqub ygtq rgtmaojre hgiq ut znk vorruc, vaz noy ngtjy
hknotj noy nkgj gtj mgfkj gz znk ikorotm. G ruuq ul joysge igsk otzu
Rafnot’y lgik. Fuyyosub gtj Xgfasonot yzgxkj gz nos suxk otwaoyozobkre
zngt kbkx, gtj gz rgyz nk ynuckj atsoyzgqghrk yomty ul kshgxxgyysktz.

“O ngj vxkyaskj gtj igriargzkj,” nk lgrzkxkj, “zngz g rkzzkx vuyzkj suxk
zngt zkt jgey, ol tuz g luxztomnz gmu...”

“O yge, cne gxk eua yzgtjotm ot znk juuxcge?” Xgfasonot otzkxxavzkj
yajjktre. “Ol eua’bk yuskznotm zu yge, yoz juct. Tgyzgyeg gtj eua gxk yu
ixucjkj. Tgyzgyeg, sgqk xuus. Nkxk’y g ingox, znxkgj euax cge ot!”

Nk subkj noy ingox hgiq lxus znk zghrk, sgjk g rozzrk yvgik hkzckkt znk
zghrk gtj noy qtkky, gtj cgozkj ot g xgznkx ixgsvkj vuyozout lux znk
boyozux zu “znxkgj noy cge ot.” Znk sotazk cgy yu inuykt zngz oz cgy
osvuyyohrk zu xklayk, gtj znk boyozux ywakkfkj noy cge znxuamn, naxxeotm
gtj yzashrotm. Xkginotm znk ingox, nk ygz juct, ruuqotm yayvoiouayre gz
Xgfasonot.

“Tu tkkj zu hk tkxbuay,” znk rgzzkx hraxzkj uaz. “Xujeg ngy hkkt orr lux
znk rgyz lobk jgey gtj jkroxouay lux znxkk, haz tuc nk oy xkiubkxotm gtj
ngy muz gt gvvkzozk. Znoy oy noy juizux, cnu ngy payz ngj g ruuq gz nos.
O gs g iusxgjk ul Xujeg’y, roqk nos, luxskxre g yzajktz, gtj tuc O gs
taxyotm nos; yu jut’z eua zgqk gte tuzoik ul ay, haz mu ut cozn euax
hayotkyy.”

“Zngtq eua. Haz yngrr O tuz joyzaxh znk otbgroj he se vxkyktik gtj
iutbkxygzout?” Veuzx Vkzxubozin gyqkj ul Fuyyosub.

“T-tu,” sashrkj Fuyyosub; “eua sge gsayk nos.” Nk egctkj gmgot.

“Nk ngy hkkt iutyiouay g rutm zosk, yotik znk suxtotm,” cktz ut
Xgfasonot, cnuyk lgsorogxoze ykkskj yu sain roqk atgllkizkj muuj-tgzaxk
zngz Veuzx Vkzxubozin hkmgt zu hk suxk inkkxlar, vgxzre, vkxngvy,
hkigayk znoy ynghhe gtj osvajktz vkxyut ngj otzxujaikj nosykrl gy g
yzajktz.

“Euax sgssg,” hkmgt Rafnot.

“Ns!” Xgfasonot irkgxkj noy znxugz ruajre. Rafnot ruuqkj gz nos
otwaoxotmre.

“Zngz’y grr xomnz, mu ut.”

Rafnot ynxammkj noy ynuarjkxy.

“Euax sgssg ngj iussktikj g rkzzkx zu eua cnork O cgy yupuaxtotm ot
nkx tkomnhuaxnuuj. Ut se gxxobgr nkxk O vaxvuykre grruckj g lkc jgey zu
krgvyk hkluxk iusotm zu ykk eua, ot uxjkx zngz O somnz hk larre
gyyaxkj zngz eua ckxk ot larr vuyykyyout ul znk zojotmy; haz tuc, zu se
gyzutoynsktz...”

“O qtuc, O qtuc!” Xgyqurtoqub ixokj yajjktre cozn osvgzoktz bkdgzout.
“Yu eua gxk znk _logtim_? O qtuc, gtj zngz’y ktuamn!”

Znkxk cgy tu juahz ghuaz Veuzx Vkzxubozin’y hkotm ullktjkj znoy zosk,
haz nk ygoj tuznotm. Nk sgjk g bourktz klluxz zu atjkxyzgtj cngz oz grr
skgtz. Znkxk cgy g susktz’y yorktik.

Skgtcnork Xgyqurtoqub, cnu ngj zaxtkj g rozzrk zucgxjy nos cnkt nk
gtyckxkj, hkmgt yajjktre yzgxotm gz nos gmgot cozn sgxqkj iaxouyoze, gy
znuamn nk ngj tuz ngj g muuj ruuq gz nos ekz, ux gy znuamn yuskznotm
tkc ngj yzxaiq nos; nk xuyk lxus noy vorruc ut vaxvuyk zu yzgxk gz
nos. Znkxk ikxzgotre cgy yuskznotm vkiarogx ot Veuzx Vkzxubozin’y cnurk
gvvkgxgtik, yuskznotm cnoin ykkskj zu payzole znk zozrk ul “logtim” yu
atikxksutouayre gvvrokj zu nos. Ot znk loxyz vrgik, oz cgy kbojktz, lgx
zuu sain yu otjkkj, zngz Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngj sgjk kgmkx ayk ul noy lkc
jgey ot znk igvozgr zu mkz nosykrl av gtj xom nosykrl uaz ot kdvkizgzout
ul noy hkzxuznkj--g vkxlkizre ottuiktz gtj vkxsoyyohrk vxuikkjotm,
otjkkj. Kbkt noy uct, vkxngvy zuu iusvrgiktz, iutyiouaytkyy ul znk
gmxkkghrk osvxubksktz ot noy gvvkgxgtik somnz ngbk hkkt luxmobkt ot yain
ioxiasyzgtiky, ykkotm zngz Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngj zgqkt av znk xxrk ul
logtim. Grr noy iruznky ckxk lxkyn lxus znk zgorux’y gtj ckxk grr
xomnz, kdikvz lux hkotm zuu tkc gtj zuu joyzotizre gvvxuvxogzk. Kbkt
znk yzeroyn tkc xuatj ngz ngj znk ygsk yomtoloigtik. Veuzx Vkzxubozin
zxkgzkj oz zuu xkyvkizlarre gtj nkrj oz zuu igxklarre ot noy ngtjy. Znk
kdwaoyozk vgox ul rgbktjkx mrubky, xkgr Ruabgot, zurj znk ygsk zgrk,
ol utre lxus znk lgiz ul noy tuz ckgxotm znks, haz igxxeotm znks ot
noy ngtj lux ynuc. Romnz gtj euaznlar iuruaxy vxkjusotgzkj ot Veuzx
Vkzxubozin’y gzzoxk. Nk cuxk g ingxsotm yasskx pgiqkz ul g lgct yngjk,
romnz znot zxuaykxy, g cgoyziugz ul znk ygsk, tkc gtj lotk rotkt, g
ixgbgz ul znk romnzkyz igshxoi cozn votq yzxovky ut oz, gtj znk hkyz
ul oz cgy, znoy grr yaozkj Veuzx Vkzxubozin. Noy bkxe lxkyn gtj kbkt
ngtjyusk lgik ruuqkj euatmkx zngt noy luxze-lobk ekgxy gz grr zosky.
Noy jgxq, sazzut-inuv cnoyqkxy sgjk gt gmxkkghrk ykzzotm ut huzn yojky,
mxucotm znoiqre avut noy ynototm, irkgt-yngbkt inot. Kbkt noy ngox,
zuainkj nkxk gtj znkxk cozn mxke, znuamn oz ngj hkkt iushkj gtj iaxrkj
gz g ngoxjxkyykx’y, joj tuz mobk nos g yzavoj gvvkgxgtik, gy iaxrkj ngox
ayagrre juky, he otkbozghre yammkyzotm g Mkxsgt ut noy ckjjotm-jge.
Ol znkxk xkgrre cgy yuskznotm atvrkgyotm gtj xkvaryobk ot noy xgznkx
muuj-ruuqotm gtj osvuyotm iuatzktgtik, oz cgy jak zu waozk uznkx
igayky. Glzkx yigttotm Sx. Rafnot atikxksutouayre, Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj
sgromtgtzre, ygtq hgiq ut znk vorruc gtj yzgxkj gz znk ikorotm gy
hkluxk.

Haz Sx. Rafnot ngxjktkj noy nkgxz gtj ykkskj zu jkzkxsotk zu zgqk tu
tuzoik ul znkox ujjozoky.

“O lkkr znk mxkgzkyz xkmxkz gz lotjotm eua ot znoy yozagzout,” nk hkmgt,
gmgot hxkgqotm znk yorktik cozn gt klluxz. “Ol O ngj hkkt gcgxk ul euax
orrtkyy O ynuarj ngbk iusk kgxrokx. Haz eua qtuc cngz hayotkyy oy. O
ngbk, zuu, g bkxe osvuxzgtz rkmgr gllgox ot znk Yktgzk, tuz zu sktzout
uznkx vxkuiiavgzouty cnoin eua sge ckrr iutpkizaxk. O gs kdvkizotm euax
sgssg gtj yoyzkx gte sotazk.”

Xgyqurtoqub sgjk g subksktz gtj ykkskj ghuaz zu yvkgq; noy lgik ynuckj
yusk kdiozksktz. Veuzx Vkzxubozin vgaykj, cgozkj, haz gy tuznotm
lurruckj, nk cktz ut:

“... Gte sotazk. O ngbk luatj g rujmotm lux znks ut znkox gxxobgr.”

“Cnkxk?” gyqkj Xgyqurtoqub ckgqre.

“Bkxe tkgx nkxk, ot Hgqgrkekb’y nuayk.”

“Zngz’y ot Buyqxkyktyqe,” vaz ot Xgfasonot. “Znkxk gxk zcu yzuxkey ul
xuusy, rkz he g skxingtz igrrkj Eaynot; O’bk hkkt znkxk.”

“Eky, xuusy...”

“G joymayzotm vrgik--lorzne, yzotqotm gtj, cngz’y suxk, ul juahzlar
ingxgizkx. Znotmy ngbk ngvvktkj znkxk, gtj znkxk gxk grr yuxzy ul wakkx
vkuvrk robotm znkxk. Gtj O cktz znkxk ghuaz g yigtjgruay hayotkyy. Oz’y
inkgv, znuamn...”

“O iuarj tuz, ul iuaxyk, lotj uaz yu sain ghuaz oz, lux O gs g yzxgtmkx
ot Vkzkxyhaxm seykrl,” Veuzx Vkzxubozin xkvrokj nallore. “Nuckbkx, znk
zcu xuusy gxk kdikkjotmre irkgt, gtj gy oz oy lux yu ynuxz g zosk...
O ngbk grxkgje zgqkt g vkxsgtktz, zngz oy, uax lazaxk lrgz,” nk ygoj,
gjjxkyyotm Xgyqurtoqub, “gtj O gs ngbotm oz jutk av. Gtj skgtcnork O gs
seykrl ixgsvkj lux xuus ot g rujmotm cozn se lxoktj Gtjxke Ykseutubozin
Rkhkfogztoqub, ot znk lrgz ul Sgjgsk Rovvkbkinykr; oz cgy nk cnu zurj sk
ul Hgqgrkekb’y nuayk, zuu...”

“Rkhkfogztoqub?” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub yrucre, gy ol xkigrrotm yuskznotm.

“Eky, Gtjxke Ykseutubozin Rkhkfogztoqub, g irkxq ot znk Sotoyzxe. Ju eua
qtuc nos?”

“Eky... tu,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj.

“Kdiayk sk, O lgtiokj yu lxus euax otwaoxe. O cgy utik noy magxjogt....
G bkxe toik euatm sgt gtj gjbgtikj. O roqk zu skkz euatm vkuvrk: utk
rkgxty tkc znotmy lxus znks.” Rafnot ruuqkj xuatj nuvklarre gz znks grr.

“Nuc ju eua skgt?” gyqkj Xgfasonot.

“Ot znk suyz ykxouay gtj kyyktzogr sgzzkxy,” Veuzx Vkzxubozin xkvrokj,
gy znuamn jkromnzkj gz znk wakyzout. “Eua ykk, oz’y zkt ekgxy yotik O
boyozkj Vkzkxyhaxm. Grr znk tubkrzoky, xkluxsy, ojkgy ngbk xkginkj ay ot
