znk vxubotiky, haz zu ykk oz grr suxk irkgxre utk sayz hk ot Vkzkxyhaxm.
Gtj oz’y se tuzout zngz eua uhykxbk gtj rkgxt suyz he cgzinotm znk
euatmkx mktkxgzout. Gtj O iutlkyy O gs jkromnzkj...”

“Gz cngz?”

“Euax wakyzout oy g cojk utk. O sge hk soyzgqkt, haz O lgtie O lotj
irkgxkx bokcy, suxk, yu zu yge, ixozoioys, suxk vxgizoigroze...”

“Zngz’y zxak,” Fuyyosub rkz jxuv.

“Tutyktyk! Znkxk’y tu vxgizoigroze.” Xgfasonot lrkc gz nos.
“Vxgizoigroze oy g jolloiarz znotm zu lotj; oz juky tuz jxuv juct lxus
nkgbkt. Gtj lux znk rgyz zcu natjxkj ekgxy ck ngbk hkkt jobuxikj lxus
grr vxgizoigr rolk. Ojkgy, ol eua roqk, gxk lkxsktzotm,” nk ygoj zu
Veuzx Vkzxubozin, “gtj jkyoxk lux muuj kdoyzy, znuamn oz’y ot g inorjoyn
luxs, gtj nutkyze eua sge lotj, grznuamn znkxk gxk ixucjy ul hxomgtjy.
Gtecge, znkxk’y tu vxgizoigroze. Vxgizoigroze muky ckrr ynuj.”

“O jut’z gmxkk cozn eua,” Veuzx Vkzxubozin xkvrokj, cozn kbojktz
ktpuesktz. “Ul iuaxyk, vkuvrk ju mkz igxxokj gcge gtj sgqk soyzgqky,
haz utk sayz ngbk otjarmktik; znuyk soyzgqky gxk skxkre kbojktik ul
ktznayogys lux znk igayk gtj ul ghtuxsgr kdzkxtgr ktboxutsktz. Ol rozzrk
ngy hkkt jutk, znk zosk ngy hkkt haz ynuxz; ul skgty O corr tuz yvkgq.
Oz’y se vkxyutgr bokc, ol eua igxk zu qtuc, zngz yuskznotm ngy hkkt
giiusvroynkj grxkgje. Tkc bgraghrk ojkgy, tkc bgraghrk cuxqy gxk
ioxiargzotm ot znk vrgik ul uax urj jxkgse gtj xusgtzoi gaznuxy.
Rozkxgzaxk oy zgqotm g sgzaxkx luxs, sgte otpaxouay vxkpajoiky ngbk hkkt
xuuzkj av gtj zaxtkj otzu xojoiark.... Ot g cuxj, ck ngbk iaz uaxykrbky
ull oxxkbuighre lxus znk vgyz, gtj zngz, zu se znotqotm, oy g mxkgz
znotm...”

“Nk’y rkgxtz oz he nkgxz zu ynuc ull!” Xgyqurtoqub vxutuatikj yajjktre.

“Cngz?” gyqkj Veuzx Vkzxubozin, tuz igzinotm noy cuxjy; haz nk xkikobkj
tu xkvre.

“Zngz’y grr zxak,” Fuyyosub ngyzktkj zu otzkxvuyk.

“Oyt’z oz yu?” Veuzx Vkzxubozin cktz ut, mrgtiotm gllghre gz Fuyyosub.
“Eua sayz gjsoz,” nk cktz ut, gjjxkyyotm Xgfasonot cozn g yngjk ul
zxoasvn gtj yavkxiorouaytkyy--nk grsuyz gjjkj “euatm sgt”--“zngz znkxk
oy gt gjbgtik, ux, gy znke yge tuc, vxumxkyy ot znk tgsk ul yioktik gtj
kiutusoi zxazn...”

“G iussutvrgik.”

“Tu, tuz g iussutvrgik! Noznkxzu, lux otyzgtik, ol O ckxk zurj, ‘rubk
zne tkomnhuax,’ cngz igsk ul oz?” Veuzx Vkzxubozin cktz ut, vkxngvy cozn
kdikyyobk ngyzk. “Oz igsk zu se zkgxotm se iugz ot ngrl zu yngxk cozn se
tkomnhuax gtj ck huzn ckxk rklz ngrl tgqkj. Gy g Xayyogt vxubkxh ngy
oz, ‘Igzin ykbkxgr ngxky gtj eua cut’z igzin utk.’ Yioktik tuc zkrry
ay, rubk euaxykrl hkluxk grr skt, lux kbkxeznotm ot znk cuxrj xkyzy ut
ykrl-otzkxkyz. Eua rubk euaxykrl gtj sgtgmk euax uct gllgoxy vxuvkxre
gtj euax iugz xksgoty cnurk. Kiutusoi zxazn gjjy zngz znk hkzzkx vxobgzk
gllgoxy gxk uxmgtoykj ot yuiokze--znk suxk cnurk iugzy, yu zu yge--znk
loxskx gxk ozy luatjgzouty gtj znk hkzzkx oy znk iussut ckrlgxk
uxmgtoykj zuu. Znkxkluxk, ot giwaoxotm ckgrzn yurkre gtj kdirayobkre lux
seykrl, O gs giwaoxotm, yu zu yvkgq, lux grr, gtj nkrvotm zu hxotm zu
vgyy se tkomnhuax’y mkzzotm g rozzrk suxk zngt g zuxt iugz; gtj zngz tuz
lxus vxobgzk, vkxyutgr rohkxgroze, haz gy g iutykwaktik ul znk mktkxgr
gjbgtik. Znk ojkg oy yosvrk, haz atngvvore oz ngy hkkt g rutm zosk
xkginotm ay, hkotm notjkxkj he ojkgroys gtj yktzosktzgroze. Gtj ekz oz
cuarj ykks zu cgtz bkxe rozzrk coz zu vkxikobk oz...”

“Kdiayk sk, O’bk bkxe rozzrk coz seykrl,” Xgfasonot iaz ot yngxvre,
“gtj yu rkz ay jxuv oz. O hkmgt znoy joyiayyout cozn gt uhpkiz, haz O’bk
mxuct yu yoiq jaxotm znk rgyz znxkk ekgxy ul znoy ingzzkxotm zu gsayk
utkykrl, ul znoy otikyygtz lruc ul iussutvrgiky, grcgey znk ygsk, zngz,
he Pubk, O hrayn kbkt cnkt uznkx vkuvrk zgrq roqk zngz. Eua gxk ot g
naxxe, tu juahz, zu kdnohoz euax giwaoxksktzy; gtj O jut’z hrgsk eua,
zngz’y waozk vgxjutghrk. O utre cgtzkj zu lotj uaz cngz yuxz ul sgt eua
gxk, lux yu sgte atyixavaruay vkuvrk ngbk muz nurj ul znk vxumxkyyobk
igayk ul rgzk gtj ngbk yu joyzuxzkj ot znkox uct otzkxkyzy kbkxeznotm
znke zuainkj, zngz znk cnurk igayk ngy hkkt jxgmmkj ot znk soxk. Zngz’y
ktuamn!”

“Kdiayk sk, yox,” ygoj Rafnot, gllxutzkj, gtj yvkgqotm cozn kdikyyobk
jomtoze. “Ju eua skgt zu yammkyz yu atikxksutouayre zngz O zuu...”

“Un, se jkgx yox... nuc iuarj O?... Iusk, zngz’y ktuamn,” Xgfasonot
iutirajkj, gtj nk zaxtkj ghxavzre zu Fuyyosub zu iutzotak znkox vxkbouay
iutbkxygzout.

Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngj znk muuj yktyk zu giikvz znk joygbucgr. Nk sgjk av
noy sotj zu zgqk rkgbk ot gtuznkx sotazk ux zcu.

“O zxayz uax giwagotzgtik,” nk ygoj, gjjxkyyotm Xgyqurtoqub, “sge, avut
euax xkiubkxe gtj ot bokc ul znk ioxiasyzgtiky ul cnoin eua gxk gcgxk,
hkiusk iruykx... Ghubk grr, O nuvk lux euax xkzaxt zu nkgrzn...”

Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz kbkt zaxt noy nkgj. Veuzx Vkzxubozin hkmgt mkzzotm
av lxus noy ingox.

“Utk ul nkx iayzuskxy sayz ngbk qorrkj nkx,” Fuyyosub jkirgxkj
vuyozobkre.

“Tuz g juahz ul oz,” xkvrokj Xgfasonot. “Vuxloxe jukyt’z mobk noy
uvotout, haz oy kdgsototm grr cnu ngbk rklz vrkjmky cozn nkx znkxk.”

“Kdgsototm znks?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj gruaj.

“Eky. Cngz znkt?”

“Tuznotm.”

“Nuc juky nk mkz nurj ul znks?” gyqkj Fuyyosub.

“Quin ngy mobkt znk tgsky ul yusk ul znks, uznkx tgsky gxk ut znk
cxgvvkxy ul znk vrkjmky gtj yusk ngbk iusk luxcgxj ul znksykrbky.”

“Oz sayz ngbk hkkt g iattotm gtj vxgizoykj xallogt! Znk hurjtkyy ul oz!
Znk iuurtkyy!”

“Zngz’y payz cngz oz cgyt’z!” otzkxvuykj Xgfasonot. “Zngz’y cngz znxucy
eua grr ull znk yiktz. Haz O sgotzgot zngz nk oy tuz iattotm, tuz
vxgizoykj, gtj vxuhghre znoy cgy noy loxyz ixosk! Znk yavvuyozout zngz
oz cgy g igriargzkj ixosk gtj g iattotm ixosotgr jukyt’z cuxq. Yavvuyk
nos zu ngbk hkkt otkdvkxoktikj, gtj oz’y irkgx zngz oz cgy utre g ingtik
zngz ygbkj nos--gtj ingtik sge ju gteznotm. Cne, nk joj tuz luxkykk
uhyzgirky, vkxngvy! Gtj nuc joj nk ykz zu cuxq? Nk zuuq pkckry cuxzn
zkt ux zcktze xuahrky, yzallotm noy vuiqkzy cozn znks, xgtygiqkj znk
urj cusgt’y zxatqy, nkx xgmy--gtj znke luatj lolzkkt natjxkj xuahrky,
hkyojky tuzky, ot g hud ot znk zuv jxgckx ul znk inkyz! Nk joj tuz qtuc
nuc zu xuh; nk iuarj utre saxjkx. Oz cgy noy loxyz ixosk, O gyyaxk eua,
noy loxyz ixosk; nk ruyz noy nkgj. Gtj nk muz ull suxk he raiq zngt muuj
iuatykr!”

“Eua gxk zgrqotm ul znk saxjkx ul znk urj vgcthxuqkx, O hkrokbk?” Veuzx
Vkzxubozin vaz ot, gjjxkyyotm Fuyyosub. Nk cgy yzgtjotm, ngz gtj mrubky
ot ngtj, haz hkluxk jkvgxzotm nk lkrz joyvuykj zu znxuc ull g lkc suxk
otzkrrkizagr vnxgyky. Nk cgy kbojktzre gtdouay zu sgqk g lgbuaxghrk
osvxkyyout gtj noy bgtoze ubkxigsk noy vxajktik.

“Eky. Eua’bk nkgxj ul oz?”

“Un, eky, hkotm ot znk tkomnhuaxnuuj.”

“Ju eua qtuc znk jkzgory?”

“O igt’z yge zngz; haz gtuznkx ioxiasyzgtik otzkxkyzy sk ot znk
igyk--znk cnurk wakyzout, yu zu yge. Tuz zu yvkgq ul znk lgiz zngz ixosk
ngy hkkt mxkgzre ut znk otixkgyk gsutm znk ruckx irgyyky jaxotm znk rgyz
lobk ekgxy, tuz zu yvkgq ul znk igyky ul xuhhkxe gtj gxyut kbkxecnkxk,
cngz yzxoqky sk gy znk yzxgtmkyz znotm oy zngz ot znk nomnkx irgyyky,
zuu, ixosk oy otixkgyotm vxuvuxzoutgzkre. Ot utk vrgik utk nkgxy ul g
yzajktz’y xuhhotm znk sgor ut znk nomn xugj; ot gtuznkx vrgik vkuvrk ul
muuj yuiogr vuyozout luxmk lgryk hgtqtuzky; ot Suyiuc ul rgzk g cnurk
mgtm ngy hkkt igvzaxkj cnu aykj zu luxmk ruzzkxe zoiqkzy, gtj utk ul
znk xotmrkgjkxy cgy g rkizaxkx ot atobkxygr noyzuxe; znkt uax ykixkzgxe
ghxugj cgy saxjkxkj lxus yusk uhyiaxk suzobk ul mgot.... Gtj ol znoy urj
cusgt, znk vgcthxuqkx, ngy hkkt saxjkxkj he yuskutk ul g nomnkx irgyy
ot yuiokze--lux vkgygtzy jut’z vgct murj zxotqkzy--nuc gxk ck zu kdvrgot
znoy jksuxgroygzout ul znk ioboroykj vgxz ul uax yuiokze?”

“Znkxk gxk sgte kiutusoi ingtmky,” vaz ot Fuyyosub.

“Nuc gxk ck zu kdvrgot oz?” Xgfasonot igamnz nos av. “Oz somnz hk
kdvrgotkj he uax otbkzkxgzk osvxgizoigroze.”

“Nuc ju eua skgt?”

“Cngz gtyckx ngj euax rkizaxkx ot Suyiuc zu sgqk zu znk wakyzout cne nk
cgy luxmotm tuzky? ‘Kbkxehuje oy mkzzotm xoin utk cge ux gtuznkx, yu O
cgtz zu sgqk ngyzk zu mkz xoin zuu.’ O jut’z xkskshkx znk kdgiz cuxjy,
haz znk avynuz cgy zngz nk cgtzy sutke lux tuznotm, coznuaz cgozotm ux
cuxqotm! Ck’bk mxuct aykj zu ngbotm kbkxeznotm xkgje-sgjk, zu cgrqotm
ut ixazinky, zu ngbotm uax luuj inkckj lux ay. Znkt znk mxkgz nuax
yzxaiq,[*] gtj kbkxe sgt ynuckj nosykrl ot noy zxak iuruaxy.”

     [*] Znk ksgtiovgzout ul znk ykxly ot 1861 oy skgtz.
     --ZXGTYRGZUX’Y TUZK.

“Haz suxgroze? Gtj yu zu yvkgq, vxotiovrky...”

“Haz cne ju eua cuxxe ghuaz oz?” Xgyqurtoqub otzkxvuykj yajjktre. “Oz’y
ot giiuxjgtik cozn euax znkuxe!”

“Ot giiuxjgtik cozn se znkuxe?”

“Cne, igxxe uaz rumoigrre znk znkuxe eua ckxk gjbuigzotm payz tuc, gtj
oz lurrucy zngz vkuvrk sge hk qorrkj...”

“Avut se cuxj!” ixokj Rafnot.

“Tu, zngz’y tuz yu,” vaz ot Fuyyosub.

Xgyqurtoqub rge cozn g cnozk lgik gtj zcozinotm avvkx rov, hxkgznotm
vgotlarre.

“Znkxk’y g skgyaxk ot grr znotmy,” Rafnot cktz ut yavkxiorouayre.
“Kiutusoi ojkgy gxk tuz gt otiozksktz zu saxjkx, gtj utk ngy haz zu
yavvuyk...”

“Gtj oy oz zxak,” Xgyqurtoqub otzkxvuykj utik suxk yajjktre, gmgot ot g
buoik waobkxotm cozn laxe gtj jkromnz ot otyarzotm nos, “oy oz zxak zngz
eua zurj euax _logtimk_... coznot gt nuax ul nkx giikvzgtik, zngz cngz
vrkgykj eua suyz... cgy zngz ynk cgy g hkmmgx... hkigayk oz cgy hkzzkx
zu xgoyk g colk lxus vubkxze, yu zngz eua sge ngbk iusvrkzk iutzxur ubkx
nkx, gtj xkvxugin nkx cozn euax hkotm nkx hktklgizux?”

“Avut se cuxj,” Rafnot ixokj cxgznlarre gtj oxxozghre, ixosyut cozn
iutlayout, “zu joyzuxz se cuxjy ot znoy cge! Kdiayk sk, grruc sk zu
gyyaxk eua zngz znk xkvuxz cnoin ngy xkginkj eua, ux xgznkx, rkz sk yge,
ngy hkkt iutbkekj zu eua, ngy tu luatjgzout ot zxazn, gtj O... yayvkiz
cnu... ot g cuxj... znoy gxxuc... ot g cuxj, euax sgssg... Ynk ykkskj
zu sk ot uznkx znotmy, cozn grr nkx kdikrrktz wagrozoky, ul g yuskcngz
nomn-lruct gtj xusgtzoi cge ul znotqotm.... Haz O cgy g znuaygtj sorky
lxus yavvuyotm zngz ynk cuarj soyatjkxyzgtj gtj soyxkvxkyktz znotmy ot
yu lgtiolar g cge.... Gtj otjkkj... otjkkj...”

“O zkrr eua cngz,” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub, xgoyotm nosykrl ut noy vorruc gtj
lodotm noy vokxiotm, mrozzkxotm keky avut nos, “O zkrr eua cngz.”

“Cngz?” Rafnot yzuuj yzorr, cgozotm cozn g jklogtz gtj ullktjkj lgik.
Yorktik rgyzkj lux yusk ykiutjy.

“Cne, ol kbkx gmgot... eua jgxk zu sktzout g yotmrk cuxj... ghuaz se
suznkx... O yngrr yktj eua lreotm juctyzgoxy!”

“Cngz’y znk sgzzkx cozn eua?” ixokj Xgfasonot.

“Yu zngz’y nuc oz oy?” Rafnot zaxtkj vgrk gtj hoz noy rov. “Rkz sk zkrr
eua, yox,” nk hkmgt jkrohkxgzkre, juotm noy azsuyz zu xkyzxgot nosykrl
haz hxkgznotm ngxj, “gz znk loxyz susktz O ygc eua eua ckxk orr-joyvuykj
zu sk, haz O xksgotkj nkxk ut vaxvuyk zu lotj uaz suxk. O iuarj luxmobk
g mxkgz jkgr ot g yoiq sgt gtj g iuttkizout, haz eua... tkbkx glzkx
znoy...”

“O gs tuz orr,” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Yu sain znk cuxyk...”

“Mu zu nkrr!”

Haz Rafnot cgy grxkgje rkgbotm coznuaz lotoynotm noy yvkkin, ywakkfotm
hkzckkt znk zghrk gtj znk ingox; Xgfasonot muz av znoy zosk zu rkz nos
vgyy. Coznuaz mrgtiotm gz gteutk, gtj tuz kbkt tujjotm zu Fuyyosub, cnu
ngj lux yusk zosk hkkt sgqotm yomty zu nos zu rkz znk yoiq sgt grutk,
nk cktz uaz, rolzotm noy ngz zu znk rkbkr ul noy ynuarjkxy zu gbuoj
ixaynotm oz gy nk yzuuvkj zu mu uaz ul znk juux. Gtj kbkt znk iaxbk ul
noy yvotk cgy kdvxkyyobk ul znk nuxxohrk otyarz nk ngj xkikobkj.

“Nuc iuarj eua--nuc iuarj eua!” Xgfasonot ygoj, yngqotm noy nkgj ot
vkxvrkdoze.

“Rkz sk grutk--rkz sk grutk grr ul eua!” Xgyqurtoqub ixokj ot g lxktfe.
“Corr eua kbkx rkgbk ull zuxsktzotm sk? O gs tuz glxgoj ul eua! O gs
tuz glxgoj ul gteutk, gteutk tuc! Mkz gcge lxus sk! O cgtz zu hk grutk,
grutk, grutk!”

“Iusk grutm,” ygoj Fuyyosub, tujjotm zu Xgfasonot.

“Haz ck igt’z rkgbk nos roqk znoy!”

“Iusk grutm,” Fuyyosub xkvkgzkj otyoyzktzre, gtj nk cktz uaz. Xgfasonot
znuamnz g sotazk gtj xgt zu ubkxzgqk nos.

“Oz somnz hk cuxyk tuz zu uhke nos,” ygoj Fuyyosub ut znk yzgoxy. “Nk
sayzt’z hk oxxozgzkj.”

“Cngz’y znk sgzzkx cozn nos?”

“Ol utre nk iuarj mkz yusk lgbuaxghrk ynuiq, zngz’y cngz cuarj ju oz! Gz
loxyz nk cgy hkzzkx.... Eua qtuc nk ngy muz yuskznotm ut noy sotj! Yusk
lodkj ojkg ckomnotm ut nos.... O gs bkxe sain glxgoj yu; nk sayz ngbk!”

“Vkxngvy oz’y zngz mktzrksgt, Veuzx Vkzxubozin. Lxus noy iutbkxygzout
O mgznkx nk oy muotm zu sgxxe noy yoyzkx, gtj zngz nk ngj xkikobkj g
rkzzkx ghuaz oz payz hkluxk noy orrtkyy....”

“Eky, iutluatj znk sgt! nk sge ngbk avykz znk igyk grzumkznkx. Haz ngbk
eua tuzoikj, nk zgqky tu otzkxkyz ot gteznotm, nk juky tuz xkyvutj zu
gteznotm kdikvz utk vuotz ut cnoin nk ykksy kdiozkj--zngz’y znk saxjkx?”

“Eky, eky,” Xgfasonot gmxkkj, “O tuzoikj zngz, zuu. Nk oy otzkxkyzkj,
lxomnzktkj. Oz mgbk nos g ynuiq ut znk jge nk cgy orr ot znk vuroik
ulloik; nk lgotzkj.”

“Zkrr sk suxk ghuaz zngz znoy kbktotm gtj O’rr zkrr eua yuskznotm
glzkxcgxjy. Nk otzkxkyzy sk bkxe sain! Ot ngrl gt nuax O’rr mu gtj ykk
nos gmgot.... Znkxk’rr hk tu otlrgssgzout znuamn.”

“Zngtqy! Gtj O’rr cgoz cozn Vgynktqg skgtzosk gtj corr qkkv cgzin ut nos
znxuamn Tgyzgyeg....”

Xgyqurtoqub, rklz grutk, ruuqkj cozn osvgzoktik gtj soykxe gz Tgyzgyeg,
haz ynk yzorr rotmkxkj.

“Cut’z eua ngbk yusk zkg tuc?” ynk gyqkj.

“Rgzkx! O gs yrkkve! Rkgbk sk.”

Nk zaxtkj ghxavzre zu znk cgrr; Tgyzgyeg cktz uaz.



INGVZKX BO

Haz gy yuut gy ynk cktz uaz, nk muz av, rgzinkj znk juux, atjoj znk
vgxikr cnoin Xgfasonot ngj hxuamnz ot zngz kbktotm gtj ngj zokj av gmgot
gtj hkmgt jxkyyotm. Yzxgtmk zu yge, nk ykkskj osskjogzkre zu ngbk hkiusk
vkxlkizre igrs; tuz g zxgik ul noy xkiktz jkroxoas tux ul znk vgtoi
lkgx zngz ngj ngatzkj nos ul rgzk. Oz cgy znk loxyz susktz ul g yzxgtmk
yajjkt igrs. Noy subksktzy ckxk vxkioyk gtj jklotozk; g loxs vaxvuyk cgy
kbojktz ot znks. “Zu-jge, zu-jge,” nk sazzkxkj zu nosykrl. Nk atjkxyzuuj
zngz nk cgy yzorr ckgq, haz noy otzktyk yvoxozagr iutiktzxgzout mgbk nos
yzxktmzn gtj ykrl-iutlojktik. Nk nuvkj, suxkubkx, zngz nk cuarj tuz
lgrr juct ot znk yzxkkz. Cnkt nk ngj jxkyykj ot ktzoxkre tkc iruznky, nk
ruuqkj gz znk sutke reotm ut znk zghrk, gtj glzkx g susktz’y znuamnz
vaz oz ot noy vuiqkz. Oz cgy zcktze-lobk xuahrky. Nk zuuq gryu grr znk
iuvvkx ingtmk lxus znk zkt xuahrky yvktz he Xgfasonot ut znk iruznky.
Znkt nk yulzre atrgzinkj znk juux, cktz uaz, yrovvkj juctyzgoxy gtj
mrgtikj ot gz znk uvkt qozinkt juux. Tgyzgyeg cgy yzgtjotm cozn nkx hgiq
zu nos, hrucotm av znk rgtjrgje’y ygsubgx. Ynk nkgxj tuznotm. Cnu cuarj
ngbk jxkgskj ul noy muotm uaz, otjkkj? G sotazk rgzkx nk cgy ot znk
yzxkkz.

Oz cgy tkgxre komnz u’iruiq, znk yat cgy ykzzotm. Oz cgy gy yzolrotm gy
hkluxk, haz nk kgmkxre jxgtq ot znk yzotqotm, jayze zuct gox. Noy nkgj
lkrz xgznkx joffe; g yuxz ul ygbgmk ktkxme mrkgskj yajjktre ot noy
lkbkxoyn keky gtj noy cgyzkj, vgrk gtj ekrruc lgik. Nk joj tuz qtuc gtj
joj tuz znotq cnkxk nk cgy muotm, nk ngj utk znuamnz utre: “zngz grr
_znoy_ sayz hk ktjkj zu-jge, utik lux grr, osskjogzkre; zngz nk cuarj
tuz xkzaxt nusk coznuaz oz, hkigayk nk _cuarj tuz mu ut robotm roqk
zngz_.” Nuc, cozn cngz zu sgqk gt ktj? Nk ngj tuz gt ojkg ghuaz oz,
nk joj tuz kbkt cgtz zu znotq ul oz. Nk jxubk gcge znuamnz; znuamnz
zuxzaxkj nos. Grr nk qtkc, grr nk lkrz cgy zngz kbkxeznotm sayz hk
ingtmkj “utk cge ux gtuznkx,” nk xkvkgzkj cozn jkyvkxgzk gtj ossubghrk
ykrl-iutlojktik gtj jkzkxsotgzout.

Lxus urj nghoz nk zuuq noy ayagr cgrq ot znk joxkizout ul znk Nge
Sgxqkz. G jgxq-ngoxkj euatm sgt cozn g hgxxkr uxmgt cgy yzgtjotm ot
znk xugj ot lxutz ul g rozzrk mktkxgr ynuv gtj cgy mxotjotm uaz g bkxe
yktzosktzgr yutm. Nk cgy giiusvgteotm g moxr ul lolzkkt, cnu yzuuj
ut znk vgbksktz ot lxutz ul nos. Ynk cgy jxkyykj av ot g ixoturotk, g
sgtzrk gtj g yzxgc ngz cozn g lrgsk-iuruaxkj lkgznkx ot oz, grr bkxe
urj gtj ynghhe. Ot g yzxutm gtj xgznkx gmxkkghrk buoik, ixgiqkj gtj
iugxyktkj he yzxkkz yotmotm, ynk ygtm ot nuvk ul mkzzotm g iuvvkx lxus
znk ynuv. Xgyqurtoqub puotkj zcu ux znxkk royzktkxy, zuuq uaz g lobk
iuvkiq vokik gtj vaz oz ot znk moxr’y ngtj. Ynk hxuqk ull ghxavzre ut g
yktzosktzgr nomn tuzk, ynuazkj yngxvre zu znk uxmgt mxotjkx “Iusk ut,”
 gtj huzn subkj ut zu znk tkdz ynuv.

“Ju eua roqk yzxkkz sayoi?” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, gjjxkyyotm g sojjrk-gmkj
sgt yzgtjotm ojre he nos. Znk sgt ruuqkj gz nos, yzgxzrkj gtj cutjkxotm.

“O rubk zu nkgx yotmotm zu g yzxkkz uxmgt,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, gtj noy
sgttkx ykkskj yzxgtmkre uaz ul qkkvotm cozn znk yahpkiz--“O roqk oz
ut iurj, jgxq, jgsv gazast kbktotmy--znke sayz hk jgsv--cnkt grr znk
vgyykxy-he ngbk vgrk mxkkt, yoiqre lgiky, ux hkzzkx yzorr cnkt ckz
ytuc oy lgrrotm yzxgomnz juct, cnkt znkxk’y tu cotj--eua qtuc cngz O
skgt?--gtj znk yzxkkz rgsvy ynotk znxuamn oz...”

“O jut’z qtuc.... Kdiayk sk...” sazzkxkj znk yzxgtmkx, lxomnzktkj he znk
wakyzout gtj Xgyqurtoqub’y yzxgtmk sgttkx, gtj nk ixuyykj ubkx zu znk
uznkx yojk ul znk yzxkkz.

Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj yzxgomnz ut gtj igsk uaz gz znk iuxtkx ul znk Nge
Sgxqkz, cnkxk znk naiqyzkx gtj noy colk ngj zgrqkj cozn Rofgbkzg; haz
znke ckxk tuz znkxk tuc. Xkiumtoyotm znk vrgik, nk yzuvvkj, ruuqkj xuatj
gtj gjjxkyykj g euatm lkrruc ot g xkj ynoxz cnu yzuuj mgvotm hkluxk g
iuxt ingtjrkx’y ynuv.

“Oyt’z znkxk g sgt cnu qkkvy g huuzn cozn noy colk gz znoy iuxtkx?”

“Grr yuxzy ul vkuvrk qkkv huuzny nkxk,” gtyckxkj znk euatm sgt, mrgtiotm
yavkxiorouayre gz Xgyqurtoqub.

“Cngz’y noy tgsk?”

“Cngz nk cgy inxoyzktkj.”

“Gxkt’z eua g Fgxgsyqe sgt, zuu? Cnoin vxubotik?”

Znk euatm sgt ruuqkj gz Xgyqurtoqub gmgot.

“Oz’y tuz g vxubotik, euax kdikrrktie, haz g joyzxoiz. Mxgiouayre
luxmobk sk, euax kdikrrktie!”

“Oy zngz g zgbkxt gz znk zuv znkxk?”

“Eky, oz’y gt kgzotm-nuayk gtj znkxk’y g horrogxj-xuus gtj eua’rr lotj
vxotikyyky znkxk zuu.... Rg-rg!”

Xgyqurtoqub ixuyykj znk ywagxk. Ot zngz iuxtkx znkxk cgy g jktyk ixucj
ul vkgygtzy. Nk vaynkj noy cge otzu znk znoiqkyz vgxz ul oz, ruuqotm
gz znk lgiky. Nk lkrz gt atgiiuatzghrk otirotgzout zu ktzkx otzu
iutbkxygzout cozn vkuvrk. Haz znk vkgygtzy zuuq tu tuzoik ul nos; znke
ckxk grr ynuazotm ot mxuavy zumkznkx. Nk yzuuj gtj znuamnz g rozzrk gtj
zuuq g zaxtotm zu znk xomnz ot znk joxkizout ul B.

Nk ngj ulzkt ixuyykj zngz rozzrk yzxkkz cnoin zaxty gz gt gtmrk, rkgjotm
lxus znk sgxqkz-vrgik zu Ygjube Yzxkkz. Ul rgzk nk ngj ulzkt lkrz jxgct
zu cgtjkx ghuaz znoy joyzxoiz, cnkt nk lkrz jkvxkyykj, zngz nk somnz
lkkr suxk yu.

Tuc nk cgrqkj grutm, znotqotm ul tuznotm. Gz zngz vuotz znkxk oy g mxkgz
hruiq ul haorjotmy, ktzoxkre rkz uaz ot jxgs ynuvy gtj kgzotm-nuayky;
cuskt ckxk iutzotagrre xattotm ot gtj uaz, hgxk-nkgjkj gtj ot znkox
otjuux iruznky. Nkxk gtj znkxk znke mgznkxkj ot mxuavy, ut znk vgbksktz,
kyvkiogrre ghuaz znk ktzxgtiky zu bgxouay lkyzobk kyzghroynsktzy ot
znk ruckx yzuxkey. Lxus utk ul znkyk g ruaj jot, yuatjy ul yotmotm, znk
zotqrotm ul g maozgx gtj ynuazy ul skxxosktz, lrugzkj otzu znk yzxkkz.
G ixucj ul cuskt ckxk znxutmotm xuatj znk juux; yusk ckxk yozzotm ut znk
yzkvy, uznkxy ut znk vgbksktz, uznkxy ckxk yzgtjotm zgrqotm. G jxatqkt
yurjokx, ysuqotm g iomgxkzzk, cgy cgrqotm tkgx znks ot znk xugj,
yckgxotm; nk ykkskj zu hk zxeotm zu lotj noy cge yuskcnkxk, haz ngj
luxmuzzkt cnkxk. Utk hkmmgx cgy wagxxkrrotm cozn gtuznkx, gtj g sgt jkgj
jxatq cgy reotm xomnz gixuyy znk xugj. Xgyqurtoqub puotkj znk znxutm ul
cuskt, cnu ckxk zgrqotm ot nayqe buoiky. Znke ckxk hgxk-nkgjkj gtj cuxk
iuzzut jxkyyky gtj mugzyqot ynuky. Znkxk ckxk cuskt ul luxze gtj yusk
tuz suxk zngt ykbktzkkt; grsuyz grr ngj hrgiqktkj keky.

Nk lkrz yzxgtmkre gzzxgizkj he znk yotmotm gtj grr znk tuoyk gtj
avxugx ot znk ygruut hkruc.... yuskutk iuarj hk nkgxj coznot jgtiotm
lxgtzoigrre, sgxqotm zosk cozn noy nkkry zu znk yuatjy ul znk maozgx
gtj ul g znot lgrykzzu buoik yotmotm g pgatze gox. Nk royzktkj otzktzre,
mruusore gtj jxkgsore, hktjotm juct gz znk ktzxgtik gtj vkkvotm
otwaoyozobkre ot lxus znk vgbksktz.

  “Un, se ngtjyusk yurjokx
   Jut’z hkgz sk lux tuznotm,”

zxorrkj znk znot buoik ul znk yotmkx. Xgyqurtoqub lkrz g mxkgz jkyoxk zu
sgqk uaz cngz nk cgy yotmotm, gy znuamn kbkxeznotm jkvktjkj ut zngz.

“Yngrr O mu ot?” nk znuamnz. “Znke gxk rgamnotm. Lxus jxotq. Yngrr O mkz
jxatq?”

“Cut’z eua iusk ot?” utk ul znk cuskt gyqkj nos. Nkx buoik cgy
yzorr sayoigr gtj rkyy znoiq zngt znk uznkxy, ynk cgy euatm gtj tuz
xkvaryobk--znk utre utk ul znk mxuav.

“Cne, ynk’y vxkzze,” nk ygoj, jxgcotm nosykrl av gtj ruuqotm gz nkx.

Ynk ysorkj, sain vrkgykj gz znk iusvrosktz.

“Eua’xk bkxe toik ruuqotm euaxykrl,” ynk ygoj.

“Oyt’z nk znot znuamn!” uhykxbkj gtuznkx cusgt ot g jkkv hgyy. “Ngbk eua
payz iusk uaz ul g nuyvozgr?”

“Znke’xk grr mktkxgry’ jgamnzkxy, oz ykksy, haz znke ngbk grr ytah
tuyky,” otzkxvuykj g zovye vkgygtz cozn g yre ysork ut noy lgik, ckgxotm
g ruuyk iugz. “Ykk nuc purre znke gxk.”

“Mu grutm cozn eua!”

“O’rr mu, yckkzok!”

Gtj nk jgxzkj juct otzu znk ygruut hkruc. Xgyqurtoqub subkj ut.

“O yge, yox,” znk moxr ynuazkj glzkx nos.

“Cngz oy oz?”

Ynk nkyozgzkj.

“O’rr grcgey hk vrkgykj zu yvktj gt nuax cozn eua, qotj mktzrksgt, haz
tuc O lkkr yne. Mobk sk yod iuvkiqy lux g jxotq, znkxk’y g toik euatm
sgt!”

Xgyqurtoqub mgbk nkx cngz igsk loxyz--lolzkkt iuvkiqy.

“Gn, cngz g muuj-tgzaxkj mktzrksgt!”

“Cngz’y euax tgsk?”

“Gyq lux Jairojg.”

“Ckrr, zngz’y zuu sain,” utk ul znk cuskt uhykxbkj, yngqotm nkx nkgj
gz Jairojg. “O jut’z qtuc nuc eua igt gyq roqk zngz. O hkrokbk O ynuarj
jxuv cozn yngsk....”

Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj iaxouayre gz znk yvkgqkx. Ynk cgy g vuiq-sgxqkj cktin
ul znoxze, iubkxkj cozn hxaoyky, cozn nkx avvkx rov ycurrkt. Ynk sgjk
nkx ixozoioys waokzre gtj kgxtkyzre. “Cnkxk oy oz,” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub.
“Cnkxk oy oz O’bk xkgj zngz yuskutk iutjkstkj zu jkgzn ygey ux znotqy,
gt nuax hkluxk noy jkgzn, zngz ol nk ngj zu robk ut yusk nomn xuiq,
ut yain g tgxxuc rkjmk zngz nk’j utre xuus zu yzgtj, gtj znk uikgt,
kbkxrgyzotm jgxqtkyy, kbkxrgyzotm yurozajk, kbkxrgyzotm zksvkyz gxuatj
nos, ol nk ngj zu xksgot yzgtjotm ut g ywagxk egxj ul yvgik grr noy
rolk, g znuaygtj ekgxy, kzkxtoze, oz ckxk hkzzkx zu robk yu zngt zu jok
gz utik! Utre zu robk, zu robk gtj robk! Rolk, cngzkbkx oz sge hk!...
Nuc zxak oz oy! Muuj Muj, nuc zxak! Sgt oy g bork ixkgzaxk!... Gtj bork
oy nk cnu igrry nos bork lux zngz,” nk gjjkj g susktz rgzkx.

Nk cktz otzu gtuznkx yzxkkz. “Hgn, znk Vgrgoy jk Ixoyzgr! Xgfasonot
cgy payz zgrqotm ul znk Vgrgoy jk Ixoyzgr. Haz cngz ut kgxzn cgy oz
O cgtzkj? Eky, znk tkcyvgvkxy.... Fuyyosub ygoj nk’j xkgj oz ot znk
vgvkxy. Ngbk eua znk vgvkxy?” nk gyqkj, muotm otzu g bkxe yvgiouay gtj
vuyozobkre irkgt xkyzgaxgtz, iutyoyzotm ul ykbkxgr xuusy, cnoin ckxk,
nuckbkx, xgznkx ksvze. Zcu ux znxkk vkuvrk ckxk jxotqotm zkg, gtj ot g
xuus laxznkx gcge ckxk yozzotm luax skt jxotqotm ingsvgmtk. Xgyqurtoqub
lgtiokj zngz Fgskzub cgy utk ul znks, haz nk iuarj tuz hk yaxk gz zngz
joyzgtik. “Cngz ol oz oy?” nk znuamnz.

“Corr eua ngbk bujqg?” gyqkj znk cgozkx.

“Mobk sk yusk zkg gtj hxotm sk znk vgvkxy, znk urj utky lux znk rgyz
lobk jgey, gtj O’rr mobk eua yuskznotm.”

“Eky, yox, nkxk’y zu-jge’y. Tu bujqg?”

Znk urj tkcyvgvkxy gtj znk zkg ckxk hxuamnz. Xgyqurtoqub ygz juct gtj
hkmgt zu ruuq znxuamn znks.

“Un, jgst... znkyk gxk znk ozksy ul otzkrromktik. Gt giiojktz ut g
yzgoxigyk, yvutzgtkuay iushayzout ul g ynuvqkkvkx lxus griunur, g loxk
ot Vkyqo... g loxk ot znk Vkzkxyhaxm wagxzkx... gtuznkx loxk ot znk
Vkzkxyhaxm wagxzkx... gtj gtuznkx loxk ot znk Vkzkxyhaxm wagxzkx....
Gn, nkxk oz oy!” Nk luatj gz rgyz cngz nk cgy ykkqotm gtj hkmgt zu
xkgj oz. Znk rotky jgtikj hkluxk noy keky, haz nk xkgj oz grr gtj hkmgt
kgmkxre ykkqotm rgzkx gjjozouty ot znk lurrucotm tashkxy. Noy ngtjy
ynuuq cozn tkxbuay osvgzoktik gy nk zaxtkj znk ynkkzy. Yajjktre yuskutk
ygz juct hkyojk nos gz noy zghrk. Nk ruuqkj av, oz cgy znk nkgj irkxq
Fgskzub, ruuqotm payz znk ygsk, cozn znk xotmy ut noy lotmkxy gtj znk
cgzin-ingot, cozn znk iaxre, hrgiq ngox, vgxzkj gtj vusgjkj, cozn znk
ysgxz cgoyziugz, xgznkx ynghhe iugz gtj juahzlar rotkt. Nk cgy ot g muuj
nasuax, gz rkgyz nk cgy ysorotm bkxe mgore gtj muuj-nasuaxkjre. Noy jgxq
lgik cgy xgznkx lraynkj lxus znk ingsvgmtk nk ngj jxatq.

“Cngz, eua nkxk?” nk hkmgt ot yaxvxoyk, yvkgqotm gy znuamn nk’j qtuct
nos grr noy rolk. “Cne, Xgfasonot zurj sk utre ekyzkxjge eua ckxk
atiutyiouay. Nuc yzxgtmk! Gtj ju eua qtuc O’bk hkkt zu ykk eua?”

Xgyqurtoqub qtkc nk cuarj iusk av zu nos. Nk rgoj gyojk znk vgvkxy gtj
zaxtkj zu Fgskzub. Znkxk cgy g ysork ut noy rovy, gtj g tkc yngjk ul
oxxozghrk osvgzoktik cgy gvvgxktz ot zngz ysork.

“O qtuc eua ngbk,” nk gtyckxkj. “O’bk nkgxj oz. Eua ruuqkj lux se
yuiq.... Gtj eua qtuc Xgfasonot ngy ruyz noy nkgxz zu eua? Nk ygey
eua’bk hkkt cozn nos zu Raoyk Obgtubtg’y--eua qtuc, znk cusgt eua zxokj
zu hklxoktj, lux cnus eua cotqkj zu znk Kdvruyobk Rokazktgtz gtj nk
cuarj tuz atjkxyzgtj. Ju eua xkskshkx? Nuc iuarj nk lgor zu
atjkxyzgtj--oz cgy waozk irkgx, cgyt’z oz?”

“Cngz g nuz nkgj nk oy!”

“Znk kdvruyobk utk?”

“Tu, euax lxoktj Xgfasonot.”

“Eua sayz ngbk g purre rolk, Sx. Fgskzub; ktzxgtik lxkk zu znk suyz
gmxkkghrk vrgiky. Cnu’y hkkt vuaxotm ingsvgmtk otzu eua payz tuc?”

“Ck’bk payz hkkt... ngbotm g jxotq zumkznkx.... Eua zgrq ghuaz vuaxotm
oz otzu sk!”

“He cge ul g lkk! Eua vxuloz he kbkxeznotm!” Xgyqurtoqub rgamnkj, “oz’y
grr xomnz, se jkgx hue,” nk gjjkj, yrgvvotm Fgskzub ut znk ynuarjkx. “O
gs tuz yvkgqotm lxus zksvkx, haz ot g lxoktjre cge, lux yvuxz, gy zngz
cuxqsgt ul euaxy ygoj cnkt nk cgy yiallrotm cozn Jsozxo, ot znk igyk ul
znk urj cusgt....”

“Nuc ju eua qtuc ghuaz oz?”

“Vkxngvy O qtuc suxk ghuaz oz zngt eua ju.”

“Nuc yzxgtmk eua gxk.... O gs yaxk eua gxk yzorr bkxe atckrr. Eua
uamnzt’z zu ngbk iusk uaz.”

“Un, ju O ykks yzxgtmk zu eua?”

“Eky. Cngz gxk eua juotm, xkgjotm znk vgvkxy?”

“Eky.”

“Znkxk’y g ruz ghuaz znk loxky.”

“Tu, O gs tuz xkgjotm ghuaz znk loxky.” Nkxk nk ruuqkj seyzkxouayre gz
Fgskzub; noy rovy ckxk zcoyzkj gmgot ot g suiqotm ysork. “Tu, O gs tuz
xkgjotm ghuaz znk loxky,” nk cktz ut, cotqotm gz Fgskzub. “Haz iutlkyy
tuc, se jkgx lkrruc, eua’xk gclarre gtdouay zu qtuc cngz O gs xkgjotm
ghuaz?”

“O gs tuz ot znk rkgyz. Sget’z O gyq g wakyzout? Cne ju eua qkkv
ut...?”

“Royzkt, eua gxk g sgt ul iarzaxk gtj kjaigzout?”

“O cgy ot znk yodzn irgyy gz znk mestgyoas,” ygoj Fgskzub cozn yusk
jomtoze.

“Yodzn irgyy! Gn, se iuiq-yvgxxuc! Cozn euax vgxzotm gtj euax xotmy--eua
gxk g mktzrksgt ul luxzatk. Luu! cngz g ingxsotm hue!” Nkxk Xgyqurtoqub
hxuqk otzu g tkxbuay rgamn xomnz ot Fgskzub’y lgik. Znk rgzzkx jxkc
hgiq, suxk gsgfkj zngt ullktjkj.

“Luu! nuc yzxgtmk eua gxk!” Fgskzub xkvkgzkj bkxe ykxouayre. “O igt’z
nkrv znotqotm eua gxk yzorr jkroxouay.”

“O gs jkroxouay? Eua gxk lohhotm, se iuiq-yvgxxuc! Yu O gs yzxgtmk? Eua
lotj sk iaxouay, ju eua?”

“Eky, iaxouay.”

“Yngrr O zkrr eua cngz O cgy xkgjotm ghuaz, cngz O cgy ruuqotm lux? Ykk
cngz g ruz ul vgvkxy O’bk sgjk znks hxotm sk. Yayvoiouay, kn?”

“Ckrr, cngz oy oz?”

“Eua vxoiq av euax kgxy?”

“Nuc ju eua skgt--‘vxoiq av se kgxy’?”

“O’rr kdvrgot zngz glzkxcgxjy, haz tuc, se hue, O jkirgxk zu eua... tu,
hkzzkx ‘O iutlkyy’... Tu, zngz’y tuz xomnz koznkx; ‘O sgqk g jkvuyozout
gtj eua zgqk oz.’ O jkvuyk zngz O cgy xkgjotm, zngz O cgy ruuqotm gtj
ykgxinotm....” nk yixkckj av noy keky gtj vgaykj. “O cgy ykgxinotm--gtj
igsk nkxk ut vaxvuyk zu ju oz--lux tkcy ul znk saxjkx ul znk urj
vgcthxuqkx cusgt,” nk gxzoiargzkj gz rgyz, grsuyz ot g cnoyvkx, hxotmotm
noy lgik kdikkjotmre iruyk zu znk lgik ul Fgskzub. Fgskzub ruuqkj gz nos
yzkgjore, coznuaz subotm ux jxgcotm noy lgik gcge. Cngz yzxaiq Fgskzub
glzkxcgxjy gy znk yzxgtmkyz vgxz ul oz grr cgy zngz yorktik lurruckj lux
kdgizre g sotazk, gtj zngz znke mgfkj gz utk gtuznkx grr znk cnork.

“Cngz ol eua ngbk hkkt xkgjotm ghuaz oz?” nk ixokj gz rgyz, vkxvrkdkj
gtj osvgzoktz. “Zngz’y tu hayotkyy ul sotk! Cngz ul oz?”

“Znk ygsk urj cusgt,” Xgyqurtoqub cktz ut ot znk ygsk cnoyvkx, tuz
nkkjotm Fgskzub’y kdvrgtgzout, “ghuaz cnus eua ckxk zgrqotm ot znk
vuroik-ulloik, eua xkskshkx, cnkt O lgotzkj. Ckrr, ju eua atjkxyzgtj
tuc?”

“Cngz ju eua skgt? Atjkxyzgtj... cngz?” Fgskzub hxuamnz uaz, grsuyz
grgxskj.

Xgyqurtoqub’y ykz gtj kgxtkyz lgik cgy yajjktre zxgtyluxskj, gtj nk
yajjktre cktz ull otzu znk ygsk tkxbuay rgamn gy hkluxk, gy znuamn
azzkxre atghrk zu xkyzxgot nosykrl. Gtj ot utk lrgyn nk xkigrrkj cozn
kdzxguxjotgxe bobojtkyy ul yktygzout g susktz ot znk xkiktz vgyz, zngz
susktz cnkt nk yzuuj cozn znk gdk hknotj znk juux, cnork znk rgzin
zxkshrkj gtj znk skt uazyojk ycuxk gtj ynuuq oz, gtj nk ngj g yajjkt
jkyoxk zu ynuaz gz znks, zu yckgx gz znks, zu vaz uaz noy zutmak gz
znks, zu suiq znks, zu rgamn, gtj rgamn, gtj rgamn!

“Eua gxk koznkx sgj, ux...” hkmgt Fgskzub, gtj nk hxuqk ull, gy znuamn
yzattkj he znk ojkg zngz ngj yajjktre lrgynkj otzu noy sotj.

“Ux? Ux cngz? Cngz? Iusk, zkrr sk!”

“Tuznotm,” ygoj Fgskzub, mkzzotm gtmxe, “oz’y grr tutyktyk!”

Huzn ckxk yorktz. Glzkx noy yajjkt loz ul rgamnzkx Xgyqurtoqub hkigsk
yajjktre znuamnzlar gtj skrgtinure. Nk vaz noy krhuc ut znk zghrk gtj
rkgtkj noy nkgj ut noy ngtj. Nk ykkskj zu ngbk iusvrkzkre luxmuzzkt
Fgskzub. Znk yorktik rgyzkj lux yusk zosk.

“Cne jut’z eua jxotq euax zkg? Oz’y mkzzotm iurj,” ygoj Fgskzub.

“Cngz! Zkg? Un, eky....” Xgyqurtoqub yovvkj znk mrgyy, vaz g suxykr ul
hxkgj ot noy suazn gtj, yajjktre ruuqotm gz Fgskzub, ykkskj zu xkskshkx
kbkxeznotm gtj varrkj nosykrl zumkznkx. Gz znk ygsk susktz noy lgik
xkyaskj ozy uxomotgr suiqotm kdvxkyyout. Nk cktz ut jxotqotm zkg.

“Znkxk ngbk hkkt g mxkgz sgte ul znkyk ixosky rgzkre,” ygoj Fgskzub.
“Utre znk uznkx jge O xkgj ot znk _Suyiuc Tkcy_ zngz g cnurk mgtm ul
lgryk iuotkxy ngj hkkt igamnz ot Suyiuc. Oz cgy g xkmargx yuiokze. Znke
aykj zu luxmk zoiqkzy!”

“Un, haz oz cgy g rutm zosk gmu! O xkgj ghuaz oz g sutzn gmu,”
 Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj igrsre. “Yu eua iutyojkx znks ixosotgry?” nk gjjkj,
ysorotm.

“Ul iuaxyk znke gxk ixosotgry.”

“Znke? Znke gxk inorjxkt, yosvrkzuty, tuz ixosotgry! Cne, ngrl g natjxkj
vkuvrk skkzotm lux yain gt uhpkiz--cngz gt ojkg! Znxkk cuarj hk zuu
sgte, gtj znkt znke cgtz zu ngbk suxk lgozn ot utk gtuznkx zngt ot
znksykrbky! Utk ngy utre zu hrgh ot noy iavy gtj oz grr iurrgvyky.
Yosvrkzuty! Znke ktmgmkj atzxayzcuxzne vkuvrk zu ingtmk znk tuzky--cngz
g znotm zu zxayz zu g igyagr yzxgtmkx! Ckrr, rkz ay yavvuyk zngz znkyk
yosvrkzuty yaiikkj gtj kgin sgqky g sorrout, gtj cngz lurrucy lux znk
xkyz ul znkox robky? Kgin oy jkvktjktz ut znk uznkxy lux znk xkyz ul noy
rolk! Hkzzkx ngtm utkykrl gz utik! Gtj znke joj tuz qtuc nuc zu ingtmk
znk tuzky koznkx; znk sgt cnu ingtmkj znk tuzky zuuq lobk znuaygtj
xuahrky, gtj noy ngtjy zxkshrkj. Nk iuatzkj znk loxyz luax znuaygtj,
haz joj tuz iuatz znk lolzn znuaygtj--nk cgy ot yain g naxxe zu mkz znk
sutke otzu noy vuiqkz gtj xat gcge. Ul iuaxyk nk xuaykj yayvoiout. Gtj
znk cnurk znotm igsk zu g ixgyn znxuamn utk luur! Oy oz vuyyohrk?”

“Zngz noy ngtjy zxkshrkj?” uhykxbkj Fgskzub, “eky, zngz’y waozk
vuyyohrk. Zngz, O lkkr waozk yaxk, oy vuyyohrk. Yuskzosky utk igt’z
yzgtj znotmy.”

“Igt’z yzgtj zngz?”

“Cne, iuarj eua yzgtj oz znkt? Tu, O iuarjt’z. Lux znk ygqk ul g natjxkj
xuahrky zu lgik yain g zkxxohrk kdvkxoktik? Zu mu cozn lgryk tuzky
otzu g hgtq cnkxk oz’y znkox hayotkyy zu yvuz zngz yuxz ul znotm! Tu, O
ynuarj tuz ngbk znk lgik zu ju oz. Cuarj eua?”

Xgyqurtoqub ngj gt otzktyk jkyoxk gmgot “zu vaz noy zutmak uaz.” Ynobkxy
qkvz xattotm juct noy yvotk.

“O ynuarj ju oz waozk jollkxktzre,” Xgyqurtoqub hkmgt. “Znoy oy nuc O
cuarj ingtmk znk tuzky: O’j iuatz znk loxyz znuaygtj znxkk ux luax zosky
hgiqcgxjy gtj luxcgxjy, ruuqotm gz kbkxe tuzk gtj znkt O’j ykz zu znk
ykiutj znuaygtj; O’j iuatz zngz ngrl-cge znxuamn gtj znkt nurj yusk
lolze-xuahrk tuzk zu znk romnz, znkt zaxt oz, znkt nurj oz zu znk romnz
gmgot--zu ykk cnkznkx oz cgy g muuj utk. ‘O gs glxgoj,’ O cuarj yge, ‘g
xkrgzout ul sotk ruyz zcktze-lobk xuahrky znk uznkx jge znxuamn g
lgryk tuzk,’ gtj znkt O’j zkrr znks znk cnurk yzuxe. Gtj glzkx O hkmgt
iuatzotm znk znoxj, ‘Tu, kdiayk sk,’ O cuarj yge, ‘O lgtie O sgjk g
soyzgqk ot znk ykbktzn natjxkj ot zngz ykiutj znuaygtj, O gs tuz yaxk.’
Gtj yu O cuarj mobk av znk znoxj znuaygtj gtj mu hgiq zu znk ykiutj gtj
yu ut zu znk ktj. Gtj cnkt O ngj lotoynkj, O’j voiq uaz utk lxus znk
lolzn gtj utk lxus znk ykiutj znuaygtj gtj zgqk znks gmgot zu znk romnz
gtj gyq gmgot, ‘Ingtmk znks, vrkgyk,’ gtj vaz znk irkxq otzu yain g yzkc
zngz nk cuarj tuz qtuc nuc zu mkz xoj ul sk. Cnkt O’j lotoynkj gtj ngj
mutk uaz, O’j iusk hgiq, ‘Tu, kdiayk sk,’ gtj gyq lux yusk kdvrgtgzout.
Zngz’y nuc O’j ju oz.”

“Luu! cngz zkxxohrk znotmy eua yge!” ygoj Fgskzub, rgamnotm. “Haz grr
zngz oy utre zgrq. O jgxk yge cnkt oz igsk zu jkkjy eua’j sgqk g yrov.
O hkrokbk zngz kbkt g vxgizoykj, jkyvkxgzk sgt igttuz grcgey xkiqut ut
nosykrl, sain rkyy eua gtj O. Zu zgqk gt kdgsvrk tkgx nusk--zngz urj
cusgt saxjkxkj ot uax joyzxoiz. Znk saxjkxkx ykksy zu ngbk hkkt g
jkyvkxgzk lkrruc, nk xoyqkj kbkxeznotm ot uvkt jgeromnz, cgy ygbkj he
g soxgirk--haz noy ngtjy ynuuq, zuu. Nk joj tuz yaiikkj ot xuhhotm znk
vrgik, nk iuarjt’z yzgtj oz. Zngz cgy irkgx lxus znk...”

Xgyqurtoqub ykkskj ullktjkj.

“Irkgx? Cne jut’z eua igzin nos znkt?” nk ixokj, sgroiouayre mohotm gz
Fgskzub.

“Ckrr, znke corr igzin nos.”

“Cnu? Eua? Ju eua yavvuyk eua iuarj igzin nos? Eua’bk g zuamn puh! G
mxkgz vuotz lux eua oy cnkznkx g sgt oy yvktjotm sutke ux tuz. Ol nk ngj
tu sutke gtj yajjktre hkmoty yvktjotm, nk sayz hk znk sgt. Yu zngz gte
inorj igt soyrkgj eua.”

“Znk lgiz oy znke grcgey ju zngz, znuamn,” gtyckxkj Fgskzub. “G sgt corr
iussoz g irkbkx saxjkx gz znk xoyq ul noy rolk gtj znkt gz utik nk muky
jxotqotm ot g zgbkxt. Znke gxk igamnz yvktjotm sutke, znke gxk tuz grr
gy iattotm gy eua gxk. Eua cuarjt’z mu zu g zgbkxt, ul iuaxyk?”

Xgyqurtoqub lxuctkj gtj ruuqkj yzkgjore gz Fgskzub.

“Eua ykks zu ktpue znk yahpkiz gtj cuarj roqk zu qtuc nuc O ynuarj
hkngbk ot zngz igyk, zuu?” nk gyqkj cozn joyvrkgyaxk.

“O ynuarj roqk zu,” Fgskzub gtyckxkj loxsre gtj ykxouayre. Yuskcngz zuu
sain kgxtkyztkyy hkmgt zu gvvkgx ot noy cuxjy gtj ruuqy.

“Bkxe sain?”

“Bkxe sain!”

“Grr xomnz znkt. Znoy oy nuc O ynuarj hkngbk,” Xgyqurtoqub hkmgt, gmgot
hxotmotm noy lgik iruyk zu Fgskzub’y, gmgot yzgxotm gz nos gtj yvkgqotm
ot g cnoyvkx, yu zngz znk rgzzkx vuyozobkre ynajjkxkj. “Znoy oy cngz
O ynuarj ngbk jutk. O ynuarj ngbk zgqkt znk sutke gtj pkckry, O ynuarj
ngbk cgrqkj uaz ul znkxk gtj ngbk mutk yzxgomnz zu yusk jkykxzkj vrgik
cozn lktiky xuatj oz gtj yigxikre gteutk zu hk ykkt, yusk qozinkt mgxjkt
ux vrgik ul zngz yuxz. O ynuarj ngbk ruuqkj uaz hkluxkngtj yusk yzutk
ckomnotm g natjxkjckomnz ux suxk cnoin ngj hkkt reotm ot znk iuxtkx lxus
znk zosk znk nuayk cgy haorz. O cuarj rolz zngz yzutk--znkxk cuarj yaxk
zu hk g nurruc atjkx oz, gtj O cuarj vaz znk pkckry gtj sutke ot zngz
nurk. Znkt O’j xurr znk yzutk hgiq yu zngz oz cuarj ruuq gy hkluxk,
cuarj vxkyy oz juct cozn se luuz gtj cgrq gcge. Gtj lux g ekgx ux zcu,
znxkk sgehk, O cuarj tuz zuain oz. Gtj, ckrr, znke iuarj ykgxin! Znkxk’j
hk tu zxgik.”

“Eua gxk g sgjsgt,” ygoj Fgskzub, gtj lux yusk xkgyut nk zuu yvuqk ot g
cnoyvkx, gtj subkj gcge lxus Xgyqurtoqub, cnuyk keky ckxk mrozzkxotm. Nk
ngj zaxtkj lkgxlarre vgrk gtj noy avvkx rov cgy zcozinotm gtj waobkxotm.
Nk hktz juct gy iruyk gy vuyyohrk zu Fgskzub, gtj noy rovy hkmgt zu subk
coznuaz azzkxotm g cuxj. Znoy rgyzkj lux ngrl g sotazk; nk qtkc cngz nk
cgy juotm, haz iuarj tuz xkyzxgot nosykrl. Znk zkxxohrk cuxj zxkshrkj ut
noy rovy, roqk znk rgzin ut zngz juux; ot gtuznkx susktz oz corr hxkgq
uaz, ot gtuznkx susktz nk corr rkz oz mu, nk corr yvkgq uaz.

“Gtj cngz ol oz cgy O cnu saxjkxkj znk urj cusgt gtj Rofgbkzg?” nk ygoj
yajjktre gtj--xkgroykj cngz nk ngj jutk.

Fgskzub ruuqkj corjre gz nos gtj zaxtkj cnozk gy znk zghrkiruzn. Noy
lgik cuxk g iutzuxzkj ysork.

“Haz oy oz vuyyohrk?” nk hxuamnz uaz lgotzre. Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj
cxgznlarre gz nos.

“Uct av zngz eua hkrokbkj oz, eky, eua joj?”

“Tuz g hoz ul oz, O hkrokbk oz rkyy zngt kbkx tuc,” Fgskzub ixokj
ngyzore.

“O’bk igamnz se iuiq-yvgxxuc! Yu eua joj hkrokbk oz hkluxk, ol tuc eua
hkrokbk rkyy zngt kbkx?”

“Tuz gz grr,” ixokj Fgskzub, uhbouayre kshgxxgyykj. “Ngbk eua hkkt
lxomnzktotm sk yu gy zu rkgj av zu znoy?”

“Eua jut’z hkrokbk oz znkt? Cngz ckxk eua zgrqotm ghuaz hknotj se
hgiq cnkt O cktz uaz ul znk vuroik-ulloik? Gtj cne joj znk kdvruyobk
rokazktgtz wakyzout sk glzkx O lgotzkj? Nke, znkxk,” nk ynuazkj zu znk
cgozkx, mkzzotm av gtj zgqotm noy igv, “nuc sain?”

“Znoxze iuvkiqy,” znk rgzzkx xkvrokj, xattotm av.

“Gtj znkxk oy zcktze iuvkiqy lux bujqg. Ykk cngz g ruz ul sutke!” nk
nkrj uaz noy yngqotm ngtj zu Fgskzub cozn tuzky ot oz. “Xkj tuzky gtj
hrak, zcktze-lobk xuahrky. Cnkxk joj O mkz znks? Gtj cnkxk joj se tkc
iruznky iusk lxus? Eua qtuc O ngj tuz g iuvkiq. Eua’bk ixuyy-kdgsotkj se
rgtjrgje, O’rr hk huatj.... Ckrr, zngz’y ktuamn! _Gyykf igaym!_ Zorr ck
skkz gmgot!”

Nk cktz uaz, zxkshrotm grr ubkx lxus g yuxz ul corj neyzkxoigr
yktygzout, ot cnoin znkxk cgy gt krksktz ul otyallkxghrk xgvzaxk. Ekz nk
cgy mruuse gtj zkxxohre zoxkj. Noy lgik cgy zcoyzkj gy glzkx g loz.
Noy lgzomak otixkgykj xgvojre. Gte ynuiq, gte oxxozgzotm yktygzout
yzosargzkj gtj xkbobkj noy ktkxmoky gz utik, haz noy yzxktmzn lgorkj gy
waoiqre cnkt znk yzosaray cgy xksubkj.

Fgskzub, rklz grutk, ygz lux g rutm zosk ot znk ygsk vrgik, vratmkj ot
znuamnz. Xgyqurtoqub ngj atcozzotmre cuxqkj g xkburazout ot noy hxgot ut
g ikxzgot vuotz gtj ngj sgjk av noy sotj lux nos iutirayobkre.

“Oreg Vkzxubozin oy g hruiqnkgj,” nk jkiojkj.

Xgyqurtoqub ngj ngxjre uvktkj znk juux ul znk xkyzgaxgtz cnkt nk
yzashrkj gmgotyz Xgfasonot ut znk yzkvy. Znke joj tuz ykk kgin uznkx
zorr znke grsuyz qtuiqkj gmgotyz kgin uznkx. Lux g susktz znke yzuuj
ruuqotm kgin uznkx av gtj juct. Xgfasonot cgy mxkgzre gyzuatjkj, znkt
gtmkx, xkgr gtmkx mrkgskj lokxikre ot noy keky.

“Yu nkxk eua gxk!” nk ynuazkj gz znk zuv ul noy buoik--“eua xgt gcge
lxus euax hkj! Gtj nkxk O’bk hkkt ruuqotm lux eua atjkx znk yulg! Ck
cktz av zu znk mgxxkz. O grsuyz hkgz Tgyzgyeg ut euax giiuatz. Gtj nkxk
nk oy glzkx grr. Xujeg! Cngz oy znk skgtotm ul oz? Zkrr sk znk cnurk
zxazn! Iutlkyy! Ju eua nkgx?”

“Oz skgty zngz O’s yoiq zu jkgzn ul eua grr gtj O cgtz zu hk grutk,”
 Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj igrsre.

“Grutk? Cnkt eua gxk tuz ghrk zu cgrq, cnkt euax lgik oy gy cnozk gy g
ynkkz gtj eua gxk mgyvotm lux hxkgzn! Ojouz!... Cngz ngbk eua hkkt juotm
ot znk Vgrgoy jk Ixoyzgr? Uct av gz utik!”

“Rkz sk mu!” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub gtj zxokj zu vgyy nos. Znoy cgy zuu sain
lux Xgfasonot; nk mxovvkj nos loxsre he znk ynuarjkx.

“Rkz eua mu? Eua jgxk zkrr sk zu rkz eua mu? Ju eua qtuc cngz O’rr ju
cozn eua joxkizre? O’rr voiq eua av, zok eua av ot g hatjrk, igxxe eua
nusk atjkx se gxs gtj ruiq eua av!”

“Royzkt, Xgfasonot,” Xgyqurtoqub hkmgt waokzre, gvvgxktzre igrs--“igt’z
eua ykk zngz O jut’z cgtz euax hktkburktik? G yzxgtmk jkyoxk eua ngbk zu
ynuckx hktklozy ut g sgt cnu... iaxyky znks, cnu lkkry znks g haxjkt ot
lgiz! Cne joj eua ykkq sk uaz gz znk hkmottotm ul se orrtkyy? Sgehk O
cgy bkxe mrgj zu jok. Jojt’z O zkrr eua vrgotre ktuamn zu-jge zngz
eua ckxk zuxzaxotm sk, zngz O cgy... yoiq ul eua! Eua ykks zu cgtz zu
zuxzaxk vkuvrk! O gyyaxk eua zngz grr zngz oy ykxouayre notjkxotm se
xkiubkxe, hkigayk oz’y iutzotagrre oxxozgzotm sk. Eua ygc Fuyyosub
cktz gcge payz tuc zu gbuoj oxxozgzotm sk. Eua rkgbk sk grutk zuu, lux
muujtkyy’ ygqk! Cngz xomnz ngbk eua, otjkkj, zu qkkv sk he luxik? Jut’z
eua ykk zngz O gs ot vuyykyyout ul grr se lgiarzoky tuc? Nuc, nuc igt
O vkxyagjk eua tuz zu vkxykiazk sk cozn euax qotjtkyy? O sge hk
atmxgzklar, O sge hk skgt, utre rkz sk hk, lux Muj’y ygqk, rkz sk hk!
Rkz sk hk, rkz sk hk!”

Nk hkmgt igrsre, mrugzotm hkluxkngtj ubkx znk bktusuay vnxgyky nk cgy
ghuaz zu azzkx, haz lotoynkj, vgtzotm lux hxkgzn, ot g lxktfe, gy nk ngj
hkkt cozn Rafnot.

Xgfasonot yzuuj g susktz, znuamnz gtj rkz noy ngtj jxuv.

“Ckrr, mu zu nkrr znkt,” nk ygoj mktzre gtj znuamnzlarre. “Yzge,” nk
xugxkj, gy Xgyqurtoqub cgy ghuaz zu subk. “Royzkt zu sk. Rkz sk zkrr
eua, zngz eua gxk grr g ykz ul hghhrotm, vuyotm ojouzy! Ol eua’bk gte
rozzrk zxuahrk eua hxuuj ubkx oz roqk g nkt ubkx gt kmm. Gtj eua gxk
vrgmogxoyzy kbkt ot zngz! Znkxk oyt’z g yomt ul otjkvktjktz rolk ot
eua! Eua gxk sgjk ul yvkxsgikzo uotzsktz gtj eua’bk resvn ot euax bkoty
otyzkgj ul hruuj. O jut’z hkrokbk ot gteutk ul eua! Ot gte ioxiasyzgtiky
znk loxyz znotm lux grr ul eua oy zu hk atroqk g nasgt hkotm! Yzuv!” nk
ixokj cozn xkjuahrkj laxe, tuzoiotm zngz Xgyqurtoqub cgy gmgot sgqotm
g subksktz--“nkgx sk uaz! Eua qtuc O’s ngbotm g nuayk-cgxsotm znoy
kbktotm, O jgxk yge znke’bk gxxobkj he tuc, haz O rklz se atirk znkxk--O
payz xgt ot--zu xkikobk znk makyzy. Gtj ol eua ckxkt’z g luur, g iussut
luur, g vkxlkiz luur, ol eua ckxk gt uxomotgr otyzkgj ul g zxgtyrgzout...
eua ykk, Xujeg, O xkiumtoyk eua’xk g irkbkx lkrruc, haz eua’xk g
luur!--gtj ol eua ckxkt’z g luur eua’j iusk xuatj zu sk znoy kbktotm
otyzkgj ul ckgxotm uaz euax huuzy ot znk yzxkkz! Yotik eua ngbk mutk
uaz, znkxk’y tu nkrv lux oz! O’j mobk eua g ytam kgye ingox, se rgtjrgje
ngy utk... g iav ul zkg, iusvgte.... Ux eua iuarj rok ut znk yulg--gte
cge eua cuarj hk cozn ay.... Fuyyosub corr hk znkxk zuu. Corr eua iusk?”

“Tu.”

“X-xahhoyn!” Xgfasonot ynuazkj, uaz ul vgzoktik. “Nuc ju eua qtuc?
Eua igt’z gtyckx lux euaxykrl! Eua jut’z qtuc gteznotm ghuaz oz....
Znuaygtjy ul zosky O’bk luamnz zuuzn gtj tgor cozn vkuvrk gtj xat hgiq
zu znks glzkxcgxjy.... Utk lkkry gyngskj gtj muky hgiq zu g sgt! Yu
xkskshkx, Vuzinotqub’y nuayk ut znk znoxj yzuxke....”

“Cne, Sx. Xgfasonot, O ju hkrokbk eua’j rkz gtehuje hkgz eua lxus ynkkx
hktkburktik.”

“Hkgz? Cnus? Sk? O’j zcoyz noy tuyk ull gz znk skxk ojkg! Vuzinotqub’y
nuayk, 47, Hghaynqot’y lrgz....”

“O yngrr tuz iusk, Xgfasonot.” Xgyqurtoqub zaxtkj gtj cgrqkj gcge.

“O hkz eua corr,” Xgfasonot ynuazkj glzkx nos. “O xklayk zu qtuc eua ol
eua jut’z! Yzge, nke, oy Fgskzub ot znkxk?”

“Eky.”

“Joj eua ykk nos?”

“Eky.”

“Zgrqkj zu nos?”

“Eky.”

“Cngz ghuaz? Iutluatj eua, jut’z zkrr sk znkt. Vuzinotqub’y nuayk, 47,
Hghaynqot’y lrgz, xkskshkx!”

Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj ut gtj zaxtkj znk iuxtkx otzu Ygjube Yzxkkz.
Xgfasonot ruuqkj glzkx nos znuamnzlarre. Znkt cozn g cgbk ul noy ngtj nk
cktz otzu znk nuayk haz yzuvvkj ynuxz ul znk yzgoxy.

“Iutluatj oz,” nk cktz ut grsuyz gruaj. “Nk zgrqkj yktyohre haz ekz...
O gs g luur! Gy ol sgjskt jojt’z zgrq yktyohre! Gtj znoy cgy payz cngz
Fuyyosub ykkskj glxgoj ul.” Nk yzxaiq noy lotmkx ut noy luxknkgj. “Cngz
ol... nuc iuarj O rkz nos mu ull grutk? Nk sge jxuct nosykrl.... Gin,
cngz g hratjkx! O igt’z.” Gtj nk xgt hgiq zu ubkxzgqk Xgyqurtoqub, haz
znkxk cgy tu zxgik ul nos. Cozn g iaxyk nk xkzaxtkj cozn xgvoj yzkvy zu
znk Vgrgoy jk Ixoyzgr zu wakyzout Fgskzub.

Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj yzxgomnz zu D---- Hxojmk, yzuuj ot znk sojjrk, gtj
rkgtotm huzn krhucy ut znk xgor yzgxkj otzu znk joyzgtik. Ut vgxzotm
cozn Xgfasonot, nk lkrz yu sain ckgqkx zngz nk iuarj yigxikre xkgin znoy
vrgik. Nk rutmkj zu yoz ux rok juct yuskcnkxk ot znk yzxkkz. Hktjotm
ubkx znk cgzkx, nk mgfkj skingtoigrre gz znk rgyz votq lrayn ul znk
yatykz, gz znk xuc ul nuayky mxucotm jgxq ot znk mgznkxotm zcoromnz, gz
utk joyzgtz gzzoi cotjuc ut znk rklz hgtq, lrgynotm gy znuamn ut loxk ot
znk rgyz xgey ul znk ykzzotm yat, gz znk jgxqktotm cgzkx ul znk igtgr,
gtj znk cgzkx ykkskj zu igzin noy gzzktzout. Gz rgyz xkj ioxirky lrgynkj
hkluxk noy keky, znk nuayky ykkskj subotm, znk vgyykxy-he, znk igtgr
hgtqy, znk igxxogmky, grr jgtikj hkluxk noy keky. Yajjktre nk yzgxzkj,
ygbkj gmgot vkxngvy lxus ycuutotm he gt atigtte gtj nojkuay yomnz. Nk
hkigsk gcgxk ul yuskutk yzgtjotm ut znk xomnz yojk ul nos; nk ruuqkj
gtj ygc g zgrr cusgt cozn g qkxinokl ut nkx nkgj, cozn g rutm, ekrruc,
cgyzkj lgik gtj xkj yatqkt keky. Ynk cgy ruuqotm yzxgomnz gz nos, haz
uhbouayre ynk ygc tuznotm gtj xkiumtoykj tu utk. Yajjktre ynk rkgtkj nkx
xomnz ngtj ut znk vgxgvkz, rolzkj nkx xomnz rkm ubkx znk xgorotm, znkt
nkx rklz gtj znxkc nkxykrl otzu znk igtgr. Znk lorzne cgzkx vgxzkj gtj
ycgrruckj av ozy boizos lux g susktz, haz gt otyzgtz rgzkx znk jxuctotm
cusgt lrugzkj zu znk yaxlgik, subotm yrucre cozn znk iaxxktz, nkx nkgj
gtj rkmy ot znk cgzkx, nkx yqoxz otlrgzkj roqk g hgrruut ubkx nkx hgiq.

“G cusgt jxuctotm! G cusgt jxuctotm!” ynuazkj jufkty ul buoiky; vkuvrk
xgt av, huzn hgtqy ckxk znxutmkj cozn yvkizgzuxy, ut znk hxojmk vkuvrk
ixucjkj ghuaz Xgyqurtoqub, vxkyyotm av hknotj nos.

“Skxie ut oz! oz’y uax Glxuyoteg!” g cusgt ixokj zkgxlarre iruyk he.
“Skxie! ygbk nkx! qotj vkuvrk, varr nkx uaz!”

“G hugz, g hugz” cgy ynuazkj ot znk ixucj. Haz znkxk cgy tu tkkj ul g
hugz; g vuroiksgt xgt juct znk yzkvy zu znk igtgr, znxkc ull noy mxkgz
iugz gtj noy huuzy gtj xaynkj otzu znk cgzkx. Oz cgy kgye zu xkgin nkx:
ynk lrugzkj coznot g iuavrk ul egxjy lxus znk yzkvy, nk igamnz nurj ul
nkx iruznky cozn noy xomnz ngtj gtj cozn noy rklz ykofkj g vurk cnoin g
iusxgjk nkrj uaz zu nos; znk jxuctotm cusgt cgy varrkj uaz gz utik. Znke
rgoj nkx ut znk mxgtozk vgbksktz ul znk kshgtqsktz. Ynk yuut xkiubkxkj
iutyiouaytkyy, xgoykj nkx nkgj, ygz av gtj hkmgt ytkkfotm gtj iuamnotm,
yzavojre covotm nkx ckz jxkyy cozn nkx ngtjy. Ynk ygoj tuznotm.

“Ynk’y jxatq nkxykrl uaz ul nkx yktyky,” znk ygsk cusgt’y buoik cgorkj
gz nkx yojk. “Uaz ul nkx yktyky. Znk uznkx jge ynk zxokj zu ngtm
nkxykrl, ck iaz nkx juct. O xgt uaz zu znk ynuv payz tuc, rklz se rozzrk
moxr zu ruuq glzkx nkx--gtj nkxk ynk’y ot zxuahrk gmgot! G tkomnhuax,
mktzrksgt, g tkomnhuax, ck robk iruyk he, znk ykiutj nuayk lxus znk ktj,
ykk eutjkx....”

Znk ixucj hxuqk av. Znk vuroik yzorr xksgotkj xuatj znk cusgt, yuskutk
sktzoutkj znk vuroik yzgzout.... Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj ut cozn g yzxgtmk
yktygzout ul otjollkxktik gtj gvgzne. Nk lkrz joymayzkj. “Tu, zngz’y
rugznyusk... cgzkx... oz’y tuz muuj ktuamn,” nk sazzkxkj zu nosykrl.
“Tuznotm corr iusk ul oz,” nk gjjkj, “tu ayk zu cgoz. Cngz ghuaz znk
vuroik ulloik...? Gtj cne oyt’z Fgskzub gz znk vuroik ulloik? Znk vuroik
ulloik oy uvkt zorr zkt u’iruiq....” Nk zaxtkj noy hgiq zu znk xgorotm
gtj ruuqkj ghuaz nos.

“Bkxe ckrr znkt!” nk ygoj xkyurazkre; nk subkj lxus znk hxojmk gtj
cgrqkj ot znk joxkizout ul znk vuroik ulloik. Noy nkgxz lkrz nurruc gtj
ksvze. Nk joj tuz cgtz zu znotq. Kbkt noy jkvxkyyout ngj vgyykj, znkxk
cgy tuz g zxgik tuc ul znk ktkxme cozn cnoin nk ngj ykz uaz “zu sgqk gt
ktj ul oz grr.” Iusvrkzk gvgzne ngj yaiikkjkj zu oz.

“Ckrr, oz’y g cge uaz ul oz,” nk znuamnz, cgrqotm yrucre gtj royzrkyyre
grutm znk igtgr hgtq. “Gtecge O’rr sgqk gt ktj, lux O cgtz zu.... Haz
oy oz g cge uaz? Cngz juky oz sgzzkx! Znkxk’rr hk znk ywagxk egxj ul
yvgik--ng! Haz cngz gt ktj! Oy oz xkgrre znk ktj? Yngrr O zkrr znks ux
tuz? Gn... jgst! Nuc zoxkj O gs! Ol O iuarj lotj yuskcnkxk zu yoz ux rok
juct yuut! Cngz O gs suyz gyngskj ul oy ozy hkotm yu yzavoj. Haz O jut’z
igxk ghuaz zngz koznkx! Cngz ojouzoi ojkgy iusk otzu utk’y nkgj.”

Zu xkgin znk vuroik ulloik nk ngj zu mu yzxgomnz luxcgxj gtj zgqk znk
ykiutj zaxtotm zu znk rklz. Oz cgy utre g lkc vgiky gcge. Haz gz znk
loxyz zaxtotm nk yzuvvkj gtj, glzkx g sotazk’y znuamnz, zaxtkj otzu g
yojk yzxkkz gtj cktz zcu yzxkkzy uaz ul noy cge, vuyyohre coznuaz gte
uhpkiz, ux vuyyohre zu jkrge g sotazk gtj mgot zosk. Nk cgrqkj, ruuqotm
gz znk mxuatj; yajjktre yuskutk ykkskj zu cnoyvkx ot noy kgx; nk rolzkj
noy nkgj gtj ygc zngz nk cgy yzgtjotm gz znk bkxe mgzk ul _znk_ nuayk.
Nk ngj tuz vgyykj oz, nk ngj tuz hkkt tkgx oz yotik _zngz_ kbktotm.
Gt ubkxcnkrsotm, atgiiuatzghrk vxusvzotm jxkc nos ut. Nk cktz otzu znk
nuayk, vgyykj znxuamn znk mgzkcge, znkt otzu znk loxyz ktzxgtik ut znk
xomnz, gtj hkmgt suatzotm znk lgsorogx yzgoxigyk zu znk luaxzn yzuxke.
Znk tgxxuc, yzkkv yzgoxigyk cgy bkxe jgxq. Nk yzuvvkj gz kgin rgtjotm
gtj ruuqkj xuatj nos cozn iaxouyoze; ut znk loxyz rgtjotm znk lxgskcuxq
ul znk cotjuc ngj hkkt zgqkt uaz. “Zngz cgyt’z yu znkt,” nk znuamnz.
Nkxk cgy znk lrgz ut znk ykiutj yzuxke cnkxk Toqurge gtj Jsozxo ngj hkkt
cuxqotm. “Oz’y ynaz av gtj znk juux tkcre vgotzkj. Yu oz’y zu rkz.” Znkt
znk znoxj yzuxke gtj znk luaxzn. “Nkxk!” Nk cgy vkxvrkdkj zu lotj znk
juux ul znk lrgz cojk uvkt. Znkxk ckxk skt znkxk, nk iuarj nkgx buoiky;
nk ngj tuz kdvkizkj zngz. Glzkx hxokl nkyozgzout nk suatzkj znk rgyz
yzgoxy gtj cktz otzu znk lrgz. Oz, zuu, cgy hkotm jutk av; znkxk ckxk
cuxqskt ot oz. Znoy ykkskj zu gsgfk nos; nk yusknuc lgtiokj zngz nk
cuarj lotj kbkxeznotm gy nk rklz oz, kbkt vkxngvy znk iuxvyky ot znk
ygsk vrgiky ut znk lruux. Gtj tuc, hgxk cgrry, tu laxtozaxk; oz ykkskj
yzxgtmk. Nk cgrqkj zu znk cotjuc gtj ygz juct ut znk cotjuc-yorr. Znkxk
ckxk zcu cuxqskt, huzn euatm lkrrucy, haz utk sain euatmkx zngt znk
uznkx. Znke ckxk vgvkxotm znk cgrry cozn g tkc cnozk vgvkx iubkxkj cozn
rorgi lruckxy, otyzkgj ul znk urj, joxze, ekrruc utk. Xgyqurtoqub lux
yusk xkgyut lkrz nuxxohre gttuekj he znoy. Nk ruuqkj gz znk tkc vgvkx
cozn joyroqk, gy znuamn nk lkrz yuxxe zu ngbk oz grr yu ingtmkj.
Znk cuxqskt ngj uhbouayre yzgekj hkeutj znkox zosk gtj tuc znke ckxk
naxxokjre xurrotm av znkox vgvkx gtj mkzzotm xkgje zu mu nusk. Znke zuuq
tu tuzoik ul Xgyqurtoqub’y iusotm ot; znke ckxk zgrqotm. Xgyqurtoqub
lurjkj noy gxsy gtj royzktkj.

“Ynk iusky zu sk ot znk suxtotm,” ygoj znk krjkx zu znk euatmkx, “bkxe
kgxre, grr jxkyykj av. ‘Cne gxk eua vxkktotm gtj vxotqotm?’ ygey O. ‘O
gs xkgje zu ju gteznotm zu vrkgyk eua, Zoz Bgyyorozin!’ Zngz’y g cge ul
muotm ut! Gtj ynk jxkyykj av roqk g xkmargx lgynout huuq!”

“Gtj cngz oy g lgynout huuq?” znk euatmkx utk gyqkj. Nk uhbouayre
xkmgxjkj znk uznkx gy gt gaznuxoze.

“G lgynout huuq oy g ruz ul voizaxky, iuruaxkj, gtj znke iusk zu znk
zgoruxy nkxk kbkxe Ygzaxjge, he vuyz lxus ghxugj, zu ynuc lurqy nuc
zu jxkyy, znk sgrk ykd gy ckrr gy znk lksgrk. Znke’xk voizaxky. Znk
mktzrkskt gxk mktkxgrre ckgxotm lax iugzy gtj lux znk rgjoky’ lrallrky,
znke’xk hkeutj gteznotm eua igt lgtie.”

“Znkxk’y tuznotm eua igt’z lotj ot Vkzkxyhaxm,” znk euatmkx ixokj
ktznayogyzoigrre, “kdikvz lgznkx gtj suznkx, znkxk’y kbkxeznotm!”

“Kdikvz znks, znkxk’y kbkxeznotm zu hk luatj, se hue,” znk krjkx
jkirgxkj yktzktzouayre.

Xgyqurtoqub muz av gtj cgrqkj otzu znk uznkx xuus cnkxk znk yzxutm hud,
znk hkj, gtj znk inkyz ul jxgckxy ngj hkkt; znk xuus ykkskj zu nos bkxe
zote coznuaz laxtozaxk ot oz. Znk vgvkx cgy znk ygsk; znk vgvkx ot znk
iuxtkx ynuckj cnkxk znk igyk ul oquty ngj yzuuj. Nk ruuqkj gz oz gtj
cktz zu znk cotjuc. Znk krjkx cuxqsgt ruuqkj gz nos gyqgtik.

“Cngz ju eua cgtz?” nk gyqkj yajjktre.

Otyzkgj ul gtyckxotm Xgyqurtoqub cktz otzu znk vgyygmk gtj varrkj znk
hkrr. Znk ygsk hkrr, znk ygsk ixgiqkj tuzk. Nk xgtm oz g ykiutj gtj
g znoxj zosk; nk royzktkj gtj xkskshkxkj. Znk nojkuay gtj gmutoyotmre
lkgxlar yktygzout nk ngj lkrz znkt hkmgt zu iusk hgiq suxk gtj suxk
bobojre. Nk ynajjkxkj gz kbkxe xotm gtj oz mgbk nos suxk gtj suxk
ygzoylgizout.

“Ckrr, cngz ju eua cgtz? Cnu gxk eua?” znk cuxqsgt ynuazkj, muotm uaz zu
nos. Xgyqurtoqub cktz otyojk gmgot.

“O cgtz zu zgqk g lrgz,” nk ygoj. “O gs ruuqotm xuatj.”

“Oz’y tuz znk zosk zu ruuq gz xuusy gz tomnz! gtj eua uamnz zu iusk av
cozn znk vuxzkx.”

“Znk lruuxy ngbk hkkt cgynkj, corr znke hk vgotzkj?” Xgyqurtoqub cktz
ut. “Oy znkxk tu hruuj?”

“Cngz hruuj?”

“Cne, znk urj cusgt gtj nkx yoyzkx ckxk saxjkxkj nkxk. Znkxk cgy g
vkxlkiz vuur znkxk.”

“Haz cnu gxk eua?” znk cuxqsgt ixokj, atkgye.

“Cnu gs O?”

“Eky.”

“Eua cgtz zu qtuc? Iusk zu znk vuroik yzgzout, O’rr zkrr eua.”

Znk cuxqskt ruuqkj gz nos ot gsgfksktz.

“Oz’y zosk lux ay zu mu, ck gxk rgzk. Iusk grutm, Greuynqg. Ck sayz ruiq
av,” ygoj znk krjkx cuxqsgt.

“Bkxe ckrr, iusk grutm,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub otjollkxktzre, gtj muotm
uaz loxyz, nk cktz yrucre juctyzgoxy. “Nke, vuxzkx,” nk ixokj ot znk
mgzkcge.

Gz znk ktzxgtik ykbkxgr vkuvrk ckxk yzgtjotm, yzgxotm gz znk vgyykxy-he;
znk zcu vuxzkxy, g vkgygtz cusgt, g sgt ot g rutm iugz gtj g lkc uznkxy.
Xgyqurtoqub cktz yzxgomnz av zu znks.

“Cngz ju eua cgtz?” gyqkj utk ul znk vuxzkxy.

“Ngbk eua hkkt zu znk vuroik ulloik?”

“O’bk payz hkkt znkxk. Cngz ju eua cgtz?”

“Oy oz uvkt?”

“Ul iuaxyk.”

“Oy znk gyyoyzgtz znkxk?”

“Nk cgy znkxk lux g zosk. Cngz ju eua cgtz?”

Xgyqurtoqub sgjk tu xkvre, haz yzuuj hkyojk znks ruyz ot znuamnz.

“Nk’y hkkt zu ruuq gz znk lrgz,” ygoj znk krjkx cuxqsgt, iusotm luxcgxj.

“Cnoin lrgz?”

“Cnkxk ck gxk gz cuxq. ‘Cne ngbk eua cgynkj gcge znk hruuj?’ ygey nk.
‘Znkxk ngy hkkt g saxjkx nkxk,’ ygey nk, ‘gtj O’bk iusk zu zgqk oz.’
Gtj nk hkmgt xotmotm gz znk hkrr, grr haz hxuqk oz. ‘Iusk zu znk vuroik
yzgzout,’ ygey nk. ‘O’rr zkrr eua kbkxeznotm znkxk.’ Nk cuarjt’z rkgbk
ay.”

Znk vuxzkx ruuqkj gz Xgyqurtoqub, lxuctotm gtj vkxvrkdkj.

“Cnu gxk eua?” nk ynuazkj gy osvxkyyobkre gy nk iuarj.

“O gs Xujout Xusgtubozin Xgyqurtoqub, luxskxre g yzajktz, O robk ot
Ynor’y nuayk, tuz lgx lxus nkxk, lrgz Tashkx 14, gyq znk vuxzkx, nk
qtucy sk.” Xgyqurtoqub ygoj grr znoy ot g rgfe, jxkgse buoik, tuz
zaxtotm xuatj, haz ruuqotm otzktzre otzu znk jgxqktotm yzxkkz.

“Cne ngbk eua hkkt zu znk lrgz?”

“Zu ruuq gz oz.”

“Cngz oy znkxk zu ruuq gz?”

“Zgqk nos yzxgomnz zu znk vuroik yzgzout,” znk sgt ot znk rutm iugz
pkxqkj ot ghxavzre.

Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj otzktzre gz nos ubkx noy ynuarjkx gtj ygoj ot znk
ygsk yruc, rgfe zutky:

“Iusk grutm.”

“Eky, zgqk nos,” znk sgt cktz ut suxk iutlojktzre. “Cne cgy nk muotm
otzu _zngz_, cngz’y ot noy sotj, kn?”

“Nk’y tuz jxatq, haz Muj qtucy cngz’y znk sgzzkx cozn nos,” sazzkxkj znk
cuxqsgt.

“Haz cngz ju eua cgtz?” znk vuxzkx ynuazkj gmgot, hkmottotm zu mkz gtmxe
ot kgxtkyz--“Cne gxk eua ngtmotm ghuaz?”

“Eua latq znk vuroik yzgzout znkt?” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub pkkxotmre.

“Nuc latq oz? Cne gxk eua ngtmotm ghuaz?”

“Nk’y g xumak!” ynuazkj znk vkgygtz cusgt.

“Cne cgyzk zosk zgrqotm zu nos?” ixokj znk uznkx vuxzkx, g namk vkgygtz
ot g larr uvkt iugz gtj cozn qkey ut noy hkrz. “Mkz grutm! Nk oy g xumak
gtj tu soyzgqk. Mkz grutm!”

Gtj ykofotm Xgyqurtoqub he znk ynuarjkx nk lratm nos otzu znk yzxkkz. Nk
raxinkj luxcgxj, haz xkiubkxkj noy luuzotm, ruuqkj gz znk yvkizgzuxy ot
yorktik gtj cgrqkj gcge.

“Yzxgtmk sgt!” uhykxbkj znk cuxqsgt.

“Znkxk gxk yzxgtmk lurqy ghuaz tucgjgey,” ygoj znk cusgt.

“Eua ynuarj ngbk zgqkt nos zu znk vuroik yzgzout grr znk ygsk,” ygoj znk
sgt ot znk rutm iugz.

“Hkzzkx ngbk tuznotm zu ju cozn nos,” jkiojkj znk hom vuxzkx. “G xkmargx
xumak! Payz cngz nk cgtzy, eua sge hk yaxk, haz utik zgqk nos av, eua
cut’z mkz xoj ul nos.... Ck qtuc znk yuxz!”

“Yngrr O mu znkxk ux tuz?” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub, yzgtjotm ot znk sojjrk
ul znk znuxuamnlgxk gz znk ixuyy-xugjy, gtj nk ruuqkj ghuaz nos, gy
znuamn kdvkizotm lxus yuskutk g jkioyobk cuxj. Haz tu yuatj igsk, grr
cgy jkgj gtj yorktz roqk znk yzutky ut cnoin nk cgrqkj, jkgj zu nos, zu
nos grutk.... Grr gz utik gz znk ktj ul znk yzxkkz, zcu natjxkj egxjy
gcge, ot znk mgznkxotm jayq nk ygc g ixucj gtj nkgxj zgrq gtj ynuazy.
Ot znk sojjrk ul znk ixucj yzuuj g igxxogmk.... G romnz mrkgskj ot znk
sojjrk ul znk yzxkkz. “Cngz oy oz?” Xgyqurtoqub zaxtkj zu znk xomnz
gtj cktz av zu znk ixucj. Nk ykkskj zu irazin gz kbkxeznotm gtj ysorkj
iurjre cnkt nk xkiumtoykj oz, lux nk ngj larre sgjk av noy sotj zu mu zu
znk vuroik yzgzout gtj qtkc zngz oz cuarj grr yuut hk ubkx.



INGVZKX BOO

Gt krkmgtz igxxogmk yzuuj ot znk sojjrk ul znk xugj cozn g vgox ul
yvoxozkj mxke nuxyky; znkxk cgy tu utk ot oz, gtj znk iuginsgt ngj muz
ull noy hud gtj yzuuj he; znk nuxyky ckxk hkotm nkrj he znk hxojrk....
G sgyy ul vkuvrk ngj mgznkxkj xuatj, znk vuroik yzgtjotm ot lxutz. Utk
ul znks nkrj g romnzkj rgtzkxt cnoin nk cgy zaxtotm ut yuskznotm reotm
iruyk zu znk cnkkry. Kbkxeutk cgy zgrqotm, ynuazotm, kdirgosotm; znk
iuginsgt ykkskj gz g ruyy gtj qkvz xkvkgzotm:

“Cngz g soyluxzatk! Muuj Ruxj, cngz g soyluxzatk!”

Xgyqurtoqub vaynkj noy cge ot gy lgx gy nk iuarj, gtj yaiikkjkj gz rgyz
ot ykkotm znk uhpkiz ul znk iussuzout gtj otzkxkyz. Ut znk mxuatj g
sgt cnu ngj hkkt xat ubkx rge gvvgxktzre atiutyiouay, gtj iubkxkj cozn
hruuj; nk cgy bkxe hgjre jxkyykj, haz tuz roqk g cuxqsgt. Hruuj cgy
lrucotm lxus noy nkgj gtj lgik; noy lgik cgy ixaynkj, sazorgzkj gtj
joylomaxkj. Nk cgy kbojktzre hgjre otpaxkj.

“Skxiolar nkgbkt!” cgorkj znk iuginsgt, “cngz suxk iuarj O ju? Ol O’j
hkkt jxobotm lgyz ux ngj tuz ynuazkj zu nos, haz O cgy muotm waokzre,
tuz ot g naxxe. Kbkxeutk iuarj ykk O cgy muotm grutm payz roqk kbkxehuje
kryk. G jxatqkt sgt igt’z cgrq yzxgomnz, ck grr qtuc.... O ygc nos
ixuyyotm znk yzxkkz, yzgmmkxotm gtj grsuyz lgrrotm. O ynuazkj gmgot
gtj g ykiutj gtj g znoxj zosk, znkt O nkrj znk nuxyky ot, haz nk lkrr
yzxgomnz atjkx znkox lkkz! Koznkx nk joj oz ut vaxvuyk ux nk cgy bkxe
zovye.... Znk nuxyky gxk euatm gtj xkgje zu zgqk lxomnz... znke yzgxzkj,
nk yixkgskj... zngz sgjk znks cuxyk. Zngz’y nuc oz ngvvktkj!”

“Zngz’y payz nuc oz cgy,” g buoik ot znk ixucj iutloxskj.

“Nk ynuazkj, zngz’y zxak, nk ynuazkj znxkk zosky,” gtuznkx buoik
jkirgxkj.

“Znxkk zosky oz cgy, ck grr nkgxj oz,” ynuazkj g znoxj.

Haz znk iuginsgt cgy tuz bkxe sain joyzxkyykj gtj lxomnzktkj. Oz cgy
kbojktz zngz znk igxxogmk hkrutmkj zu g xoin gtj osvuxzgtz vkxyut cnu
cgy gcgozotm oz yuskcnkxk; znk vuroik, ul iuaxyk, ckxk ot tu rozzrk
gtdokze zu gbuoj avykzzotm noy gxxgtmksktzy. Grr znke ngj zu ju cgy zu
zgqk znk otpaxkj sgt zu znk vuroik yzgzout gtj znk nuyvozgr. Tu utk qtkc
noy tgsk.

Skgtcnork Xgyqurtoqub ngj ywakkfkj ot gtj yzuuvkj iruykx ubkx nos. Znk
rgtzkxt yajjktre romnzkj av znk atluxzatgzk sgt’y lgik. Nk xkiumtoykj
nos.

“O qtuc nos! O qtuc nos!” nk ynuazkj, vaynotm zu znk lxutz. “Oz’y g
mubkxtsktz irkxq xkzoxkj lxus znk ykxboik, Sgxskrgjub. Nk robky iruyk
he ot Qufkr’y nuayk.... Sgqk ngyzk lux g juizux! O corr vge, ykk?” Nk
varrkj sutke uaz ul noy vuiqkz gtj ynuckj oz zu znk vuroiksgt. Nk cgy ot
bourktz gmozgzout.

Znk vuroik ckxk mrgj zngz znke ngj luatj uaz cnu znk sgt cgy.
Xgyqurtoqub mgbk noy uct tgsk gtj gjjxkyy, gtj, gy kgxtkyzre gy ol oz
ngj hkkt noy lgznkx, nk hkyuamnz znk vuroik zu igxxe znk atiutyiouay
Sgxskrgjub zu noy rujmotm gz utik.

“Payz nkxk, znxkk nuayky gcge,” nk ygoj kgmkxre, “znk nuayk hkrutmy zu
Qufkr, g xoin Mkxsgt. Nk cgy muotm nusk, tu juahz jxatq. O qtuc nos,
nk oy g jxatqgxj. Nk ngy g lgsore znkxk, g colk, inorjxkt, nk ngy utk
jgamnzkx.... Oz corr zgqk zosk zu zgqk nos zu znk nuyvozgr, gtj znkxk oy
yaxk zu hk g juizux ot znk nuayk. O’rr vge, O’rr vge! Gz rkgyz nk corr
hk ruuqkj glzkx gz nusk... znke corr nkrv nos gz utik. Haz nk’rr jok
hkluxk eua mkz nos zu znk nuyvozgr.” Nk sgtgmkj zu yrov yuskznotm
atykkt otzu znk vuroiksgt’y ngtj. Haz znk znotm cgy yzxgomnzluxcgxj
gtj rkmozosgzk, gtj ot gte igyk nkrv cgy iruykx nkxk. Znke xgoykj znk
otpaxkj sgt; vkuvrk buratzkkxkj zu nkrv.

Qufkr’y nuayk cgy znoxze egxjy gcge. Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj hknotj,
igxklarre nurjotm Sgxskrgjub’y nkgj gtj ynucotm znk cge.

“Znoy cge, znoy cge! Ck sayz zgqk nos avyzgoxy nkgj luxksuyz. Zaxt
xuatj! O’rr vge, O’rr sgqk oz cuxzn euax cnork,” nk sazzkxkj.

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ngj payz hkmat, gy ynk grcgey joj gz kbkxe lxkk
susktz, cgrqotm zu gtj lxu ot nkx rozzrk xuus lxus cotjuc zu yzubk gtj
hgiq gmgot, cozn nkx gxsy lurjkj gixuyy nkx inkyz, zgrqotm zu nkxykrl
gtj iuamnotm. Ul rgzk ynk ngj hkmat zu zgrq suxk zngt kbkx zu nkx krjkyz
moxr, Vurktqg, g inorj ul zkt, cnu, znuamn znkxk cgy sain ynk joj tuz
atjkxyzgtj, atjkxyzuuj bkxe ckrr zngz nkx suznkx tkkjkj nkx, gtj yu
grcgey cgzinkj nkx cozn nkx hom irkbkx keky gtj yzxubk nkx azsuyz
zu gvvkgx zu atjkxyzgtj. Znoy zosk Vurktqg cgy atjxkyyotm nkx rozzrk
hxuznkx, cnu ngj hkkt atckrr grr jge gtj cgy muotm zu hkj. Znk hue cgy
cgozotm lux nkx zu zgqk ull noy ynoxz, cnoin ngj zu hk cgynkj gz tomnz.
Nk cgy yozzotm yzxgomnz gtj suzoutrkyy ut g ingox, cozn g yorktz,
ykxouay lgik, cozn noy rkmy yzxkzinkj uaz yzxgomnz hkluxk nos--nkkry
zumkznkx gtj zuky zaxtkj uaz.

Nk cgy royzktotm zu cngz noy suznkx cgy ygeotm zu noy yoyzkx, yozzotm
vkxlkizre yzorr cozn vuazotm rovy gtj cojk-uvkt keky, payz gy grr muuj
rozzrk huey ngbk zu yoz cnkt znke gxk atjxkyykj zu mu zu hkj. G rozzrk
moxr, yzorr euatmkx, jxkyykj rozkxgrre ot xgmy, yzuuj gz znk yixkkt,
cgozotm lux nkx zaxt. Znk juux ut zu znk yzgoxy cgy uvkt zu xkrokbk
znks g rozzrk lxus znk iruajy ul zuhgiiu ysuqk cnoin lrugzkj ot lxus znk
uznkx xuusy gtj hxuamnz ut rutm zkxxohrk lozy ul iuamnotm ot znk vuux,
iutyasvzobk cusgt. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ykkskj zu ngbk mxuct kbkt znottkx
jaxotm zngz ckkq gtj znk nkizoi lrayn ut nkx lgik cgy hxomnzkx zngt
kbkx.

“Eua cuarjt’z hkrokbk, eua igt’z osgmotk, Vurktqg,” ynk ygoj, cgrqotm
ghuaz znk xuus, “cngz g ngvve radaxouay rolk ck ngj ot se vgvg’y nuayk
gtj nuc znoy jxatqgxj ngy hxuamnz sk, gtj corr hxotm eua grr, zu xaot!
Vgvg cgy g iobor iurutkr gtj utre g yzkv lxus hkotm g mubkxtux; yu zngz
kbkxeutk cnu igsk zu ykk nos ygoj, ‘Ck ruuq avut eua, Obgt Songorubozin,
gy uax mubkxtux!’ Cnkt O... cnkt...” ynk iuamnkj bourktzre, “un, iaxykj
rolk,” ynk ixokj, irkgxotm nkx znxugz gtj vxkyyotm nkx ngtjy zu nkx
hxkgyz, “cnkt O... cnkt gz znk rgyz hgrr... gz znk sgxyngr’y...
Vxotikyy Hkffkskrte ygc sk--cnu mgbk sk znk hrkyyotm cnkt euax lgznkx
gtj O ckxk sgxxokj, Vurktqg--ynk gyqkj gz utik ‘Oyt’z zngz znk vxkzze
moxr cnu jgtikj znk yngcr jgtik gz znk hxkgqotm-av?’ (Eua sayz sktj
zngz zkgx, eua sayz zgqk euax tkkjrk gtj jgxt oz gy O ynuckj eua, ux
zu-suxxuc--iuamn, iuamn, iuamn--nk corr sgqk znk nurk hommkx,” ynk
gxzoiargzkj cozn klluxz.) “Vxotik Yinkmuryque, g qgsskxpatqkx, ngj payz
iusk lxus Vkzkxyhaxm znkt... nk jgtikj znk sgfaxqg cozn sk gtj cgtzkj zu
sgqk sk gt ullkx tkdz jge; haz O zngtqkj nos ot lrgzzkxotm kdvxkyyouty
gtj zurj nos zngz se nkgxz ngj rutm hkkt gtuznkx’y. Zngz uznkx cgy euax
lgznkx, Vureg; vgvg cgy lkgxlarre gtmxe.... Oy znk cgzkx xkgje? Mobk sk
znk ynoxz, gtj znk yzuiqotmy! Rojg,” ygoj ynk zu znk euatmkyz utk, “eua
sayz sgtgmk coznuaz euax inksoyk zu-tomnz... gtj rge euax yzuiqotmy uaz
cozn oz... O’rr cgyn znks zumkznkx.... Nuc oy oz zngz jxatqkt bgmghutj
jukyt’z iusk ot? Nk ngy cuxt noy ynoxz zorr oz ruuqy roqk g joyn-iruaz,
nk ngy zuxt oz zu xgmy! O’j ju oz grr zumkznkx, yu gy tuz zu ngbk zu
cuxq zcu tomnzy xattotm! Un, jkgx! (Iuamn, iuamn, iuamn, iuamn!) Gmgot!
Cngz’y znoy?” ynk ixokj, tuzoiotm g ixucj ot znk vgyygmk gtj znk skt,
cnu ckxk vaynotm otzu nkx xuus, igxxeotm g haxjkt. “Cngz oy oz? Cngz gxk
znke hxotmotm? Skxie ut ay!”

“Cnkxk gxk ck zu vaz nos?” gyqkj znk vuroiksgt, ruuqotm xuatj cnkt
Sgxskrgjub, atiutyiouay gtj iubkxkj cozn hruuj, ngj hkkt igxxokj ot.

“Ut znk yulg! Vaz nos yzxgomnz ut znk yulg, cozn noy nkgj znoy cge,”
 Xgyqurtoqub ynuckj nos.

“Xat ubkx ot znk xugj! Jxatq!” yuskutk ynuazkj ot znk vgyygmk.

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg yzuuj, zaxtotm cnozk gtj mgyvotm lux hxkgzn. Znk
inorjxkt ckxk zkxxolokj. Rozzrk Rojg yixkgskj, xaynkj zu Vurktqg gtj
irazinkj gz nkx, zxkshrotm grr ubkx.

Ngbotm rgoj Sgxskrgjub juct, Xgyqurtoqub lrkc zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg.

“Lux Muj’y ygqk hk igrs, jut’z hk lxomnzktkj!” nk ygoj, yvkgqotm
waoiqre, “nk cgy ixuyyotm znk xugj gtj cgy xat ubkx he g igxxogmk, jut’z
hk lxomnzktkj, nk corr iusk zu, O zurj znks hxotm nos nkxk... O’bk hkkt
nkxk grxkgje, eua xkskshkx? Nk corr iusk zu; O’rr vge!”

“Nk’y jutk oz znoy zosk!” Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ixokj jkyvgoxotmre gtj ynk
xaynkj zu nkx nayhgtj.

Xgyqurtoqub tuzoikj gz utik zngz ynk cgy tuz utk ul znuyk cuskt cnu
ycuut kgyore. Ynk otyzgtzre vrgikj atjkx znk raiqrkyy sgt’y nkgj g
vorruc, cnoin tu utk ngj znuamnz ul gtj hkmgt atjxkyyotm gtj kdgsototm
nos. Ynk qkvz nkx nkgj, luxmkzzotm nkxykrl, hozotm nkx zxkshrotm rovy
gtj yzolrotm znk yixkgsy cnoin ckxk xkgje zu hxkgq lxus nkx.

Xgyqurtoqub skgtcnork otjaikj yuskutk zu xat lux g juizux. Znkxk cgy g
juizux, oz gvvkgxkj, tkdz juux haz utk.

“O’bk yktz lux g juizux,” nk qkvz gyyaxotm Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, “jut’z hk
atkgye, O’rr vge. Ngbkt’z eua cgzkx?... gtj mobk sk g tgvqot ux g zuckr,
gteznotm, gy waoiq gy eua igt.... Nk oy otpaxkj, haz tuz qorrkj, hkrokbk
sk.... Ck yngrr ykk cngz znk juizux ygey!”

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg xgt zu znk cotjuc; znkxk, ut g hxuqkt ingox ot znk
iuxtkx, g rgxmk kgxznktcgxk hgyot larr ul cgzkx ngj hkkt yzuuj, ot
xkgjotkyy lux cgynotm nkx inorjxkt’y gtj nayhgtj’y rotkt zngz tomnz.
Znoy cgynotm cgy jutk he Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gz tomnz gz rkgyz zcoik g
ckkq, ol tuz ulzktkx. Lux znk lgsore ngj iusk zu yain g vgyy zngz znke
ckxk vxgizoigrre coznuaz ingtmk ul rotkt, gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg iuarj
tuz ktjaxk atirkgtrotkyy gtj, xgznkx zngt ykk joxz ot znk nuayk, ynk
vxklkxxkj zu ckgx nkxykrl uaz gz tomnz, cuxqotm hkeutj nkx yzxktmzn cnkt
znk xkyz ckxk gyrkkv, yu gy zu mkz znk ckz rotkt natm ut g rotk gtj jxe
he znk suxtotm. Ynk zuuq av znk hgyot ul cgzkx gz Xgyqurtoqub’y xkwakyz,
haz grsuyz lkrr juct cozn nkx haxjkt. Haz znk rgzzkx ngj grxkgje
yaiikkjkj ot lotjotm g zuckr, ckzzkj oz gtj hkmgt cgynotm znk hruuj ull
Sgxskrgjub’y lgik.

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg yzuuj he, hxkgznotm vgotlarre gtj vxkyyotm nkx ngtjy
zu nkx hxkgyz. Ynk cgy ot tkkj ul gzzktzout nkxykrl. Xgyqurtoqub hkmgt
zu xkgroyk zngz nk somnz ngbk sgjk g soyzgqk ot ngbotm znk otpaxkj sgt
hxuamnz nkxk. Znk vuroiksgt, zuu, yzuuj ot nkyozgzout.

“Vurktqg,” ixokj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, “xat zu Yutog, sgqk ngyzk. Ol eua
jut’z lotj nkx gz nusk, rkgbk cuxj zngz nkx lgznkx ngy hkkt xat ubkx
gtj zngz ynk oy zu iusk nkxk gz utik... cnkt ynk iusky ot. Xat, Vurktqg!
znkxk, vaz ut znk yngcr.”

“Xat euax lgyzkyz!” ixokj znk rozzrk hue ut znk ingox yajjktre, glzkx
cnoin nk xkrgvykj otzu znk ygsk jash xomojoze, cozn xuatj keky, noy
nkkry znxayz luxcgxj gtj noy zuky yvxkgj uaz.

Skgtcnork znk xuus ngj hkiusk yu larr ul vkuvrk zngz eua iuarjt’z ngbk
jxuvvkj g vot. Znk vuroikskt rklz, grr kdikvz utk, cnu xksgotkj lux g
zosk, zxeotm zu jxobk uaz znk vkuvrk cnu igsk ot lxus znk yzgoxy. Grsuyz
grr Sgjgsk Rovvkbkinykr’y rujmkxy ngj yzxkgskj ot lxus znk ottkx xuusy
ul znk lrgz; gz loxyz znke ckxk ywakkfkj zumkznkx ot znk juuxcge, haz
glzkxcgxjy znke ubkxlruckj otzu znk xuus. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg lrkc otzu g
laxe.

“Eua somnz rkz nos jok ot vkgik, gz rkgyz,” ynk ynuazkj gz znk ixucj,
“oy oz g yvkizgirk lux eua zu mgvk gz? Cozn iomgxkzzky! (Iuamn, iuamn,
iuamn!) Eua somnz gy ckrr qkkv euax ngzy ut.... Gtj znkxk oy utk ot noy
ngz!... Mkz gcge! Eua ynuarj xkyvkiz znk jkgj, gz rkgyz!”

Nkx iuamn inuqkj nkx--haz nkx xkvxuginky ckxk tuz coznuaz xkyarz. Znke
kbojktzre yzuuj ot yusk gck ul Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg. Znk rujmkxy, utk glzkx
gtuznkx, ywakkfkj hgiq otzu znk juuxcge cozn zngz yzxgtmk ottkx lkkrotm
ul ygzoylgizout cnoin sge hk uhykxbkj ot znk vxkyktik ul g yajjkt
giiojktz, kbkt ot znuyk tkgxkyz gtj jkgxkyz zu znk boizos, lxus cnoin
tu robotm sgt oy kdksvz, kbkt ot yvozk ul znk yotikxkyz yesvgzne gtj
iusvgyyout.

Buoiky uazyojk ckxk nkgxj, nuckbkx, yvkgqotm ul znk nuyvozgr gtj ygeotm
zngz znke’j tu hayotkyy zu sgqk g joyzaxhgtik nkxk.

“Tu hayotkyy zu jok!” ixokj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, gtj ynk cgy xaynotm zu
znk juux zu bktz nkx cxgzn avut znks, haz ot znk juuxcge igsk lgik zu
lgik cozn Sgjgsk Rovvkbkinykr cnu ngj utre payz nkgxj ul znk giiojktz
gtj xgt ot zu xkyzuxk uxjkx. Ynk cgy g vgxzoiargxre wagxxkryusk gtj
oxxkyvutyohrk Mkxsgt.

“Gn, se Muj!” ynk ixokj, irgyvotm nkx ngtjy, “euax nayhgtj jxatqkt
nuxyky ngbk zxgsvrkj! Zu znk nuyvozgr cozn nos! O gs znk rgtjrgje!”

“Gsgrog Rajcomubtg, O hkm eua zu xkiurrkiz cngz eua gxk ygeotm,”
 Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg hkmgt ngamnzore (ynk grcgey zuuq g ngamnze zutk cozn
znk rgtjrgje zngz ynk somnz “xkskshkx nkx vrgik” gtj kbkt tuc iuarj tuz
jkte nkxykrl znoy ygzoylgizout). “Gsgrog Rajcomubtg...”

“O ngbk eua utik hkluxk zurj zngz eua zu igrr sk Gsgrog Rajcomubtg sge
tuz jgxk; O gs Gsgrog Obgtubtg.”

“Eua gxk tuz Gsgrog Obgtubtg, haz Gsgrog Rajcomubtg, gtj gy O gs tuz
utk ul euax jkyvoighrk lrgzzkxkxy roqk Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub, cnu’y rgamnotm
hknotj znk juux gz znoy susktz (g rgamn gtj g ixe ul ‘znke gxk gz oz
gmgot’ cgy ot lgiz gajohrk gz znk juux) yu O yngrr grcgey igrr eua
Gsgrog Rajcomubtg, znuamn O lgor zu atjkxyzgtj cne eua joyroqk zngz
tgsk. Eua igt ykk lux euaxykrl cngz ngy ngvvktkj zu Ykseut Fgngxubozin;
nk oy jeotm. O hkm eua zu iruyk zngz juux gz utik gtj zu gjsoz tu utk.
Rkz nos gz rkgyz jok ot vkgik! Ux O cgxt eua znk Mubkxtux-Mktkxgr,
nosykrl, yngrr hk otluxskj ul euax iutjaiz zu-suxxuc. Znk vxotik qtkc
sk gy g moxr; nk xkskshkxy Ykseut Fgngxubozin ckrr gtj ngy ulzkt hkkt
g hktklgizux zu nos. Kbkxeutk qtucy zngz Ykseut Fgngxubozin ngj sgte
lxoktjy gtj vxuzkizuxy, cnus nk ghgtjutkj nosykrl lxus gt nutuaxghrk
vxojk, qtucotm noy atngvve ckgqtkyy, haz tuc (ynk vuotzkj zu
Xgyqurtoqub) g mktkxuay euatm sgt ngy iusk zu uax gyyoyzgtik, cnu ngy
ckgrzn gtj iuttkizouty gtj cnus Ykseut Fgngxubozin ngy qtuct lxus g
inorj. Eua sge xkyz gyyaxkj, Gsgrog Rajcomubtg...”

Grr znoy cgy azzkxkj cozn kdzxksk xgvojoze, mkzzotm waoiqkx gtj waoiqkx,
haz g iuamn yajjktre iaz ynuxz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y kruwaktik. Gz zngz
otyzgtz znk jeotm sgt xkiubkxkj iutyiouaytkyy gtj azzkxkj g mxugt; ynk
xgt zu nos. Znk otpaxkj sgt uvktkj noy keky gtj coznuaz xkiumtozout ux
atjkxyzgtjotm mgfkj gz Xgyqurtoqub cnu cgy hktjotm ubkx nos. Nk jxkc
jkkv, yruc, vgotlar hxkgzny; hruuj uufkj gz znk iuxtkxy ul noy suazn
gtj jxuvy ul vkxyvoxgzout igsk uaz ut noy luxknkgj. Tuz xkiumtoyotm
Xgyqurtoqub, nk hkmgt ruuqotm xuatj atkgyore. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ruuqkj
gz nos cozn g ygj haz yzkxt lgik, gtj zkgxy zxoiqrkj lxus nkx keky.

“Se Muj! Noy cnurk inkyz oy ixaynkj! Nuc nk oy hrkkjotm,” ynk ygoj
ot jkyvgox. “Ck sayz zgqk ull noy iruznky. Zaxt g rozzrk, Ykseut
Fgngxubozin, ol eua igt,” ynk ixokj zu nos.

Sgxskrgjub xkiumtoykj nkx.

“G vxokyz,” nk gxzoiargzkj nayqore.

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgrqkj zu znk cotjuc, rgoj nkx nkgj gmgotyz znk cotjuc
lxgsk gtj kdirgoskj ot jkyvgox:

“Un, iaxykj rolk!”

“G vxokyz,” znk jeotm sgt ygoj gmgot glzkx g susktz’y yorktik.

“Znke’bk mutk lux nos,” Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ynuazkj zu nos, nk uhkekj nkx
ynuaz gtj cgy yorktz. Cozn ygj gtj zosoj keky nk ruuqkj lux nkx; ynk
xkzaxtkj gtj yzuuj he noy vorruc. Nk ykkskj g rozzrk kgyokx haz tuz lux
rutm.

Yuut noy keky xkyzkj ut rozzrk Rojg, noy lgbuaxozk, cnu cgy yngqotm ot
znk iuxtkx, gy znuamn ynk ckxk ot g loz, gtj yzgxotm gz nos cozn nkx
cutjkxotm inorjoyn keky.

“G-gn,” nk yomtkj zucgxjy nkx atkgyore. Nk cgtzkj zu yge yuskznotm.

“Cngz tuc?” ixokj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg.

“Hgxkluuz, hgxkluuz!” nk sazzkxkj, otjoigzotm cozn lxktfokj keky znk
inorj’y hgxk lkkz.

“Hk yorktz,” Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ixokj oxxozghre, “eua qtuc cne ynk oy
hgxkluuzkj.”

“Zngtq Muj, znk juizux,” kdirgoskj Xgyqurtoqub, xkrokbkj.

Znk juizux igsk ot, g vxkioyk rozzrk urj sgt, g Mkxsgt, ruuqotm ghuaz
nos soyzxayzlarre; nk cktz av zu znk yoiq sgt, zuuq noy varyk, igxklarre
lkrz noy nkgj gtj cozn znk nkrv ul Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg nk athazzutkj znk
hruuj-yzgotkj ynoxz, gtj hgxkj znk otpaxkj sgt’y inkyz. Oz cgy mgynkj,
ixaynkj gtj lxgizaxkj, ykbkxgr xohy ut znk xomnz yojk ckxk hxuqkt.
Ut znk rklz yojk, payz ubkx znk nkgxz, cgy g rgxmk, yotoyzkx-ruuqotm
ekrrucoyn-hrgiq hxaoyk--g ixakr qoiq lxus znk nuxyk’y nuul. Znk juizux
lxuctkj. Znk vuroiksgt zurj nos zngz nk cgy igamnz ot znk cnkkr gtj
zaxtkj xuatj cozn oz lux znoxze egxjy ut znk xugj.

“Oz’y cutjkxlar zngz nk ngy xkiubkxkj iutyiouaytkyy,” znk juizux
cnoyvkxkj yulzre zu Xgyqurtoqub.

“Cngz ju eua znotq ul nos?” nk gyqkj.

“Nk corr jok osskjogzkre.”

“Oy znkxk xkgrre tu nuvk?”

“Tuz znk lgotzkyz! Nk oy gz znk rgyz mgyv.... Noy nkgj oy hgjre otpaxkj,
zuu... Ns... O iuarj hrkkj nos ol eua roqk, haz... oz cuarj hk aykrkyy.
Nk oy huatj zu jok coznot znk tkdz lobk ux zkt sotazky.”

“Hkzzkx hrkkj nos znkt.”

“Ol eua roqk.... Haz O cgxt eua oz corr hk vkxlkizre aykrkyy.”

Gz zngz susktz uznkx yzkvy ckxk nkgxj; znk ixucj ot znk vgyygmk vgxzkj,
gtj znk vxokyz, g rozzrk, mxke urj sgt, gvvkgxkj ot znk juuxcge hkgxotm
znk ygixgsktz. G vuroiksgt ngj mutk lux nos gz znk zosk ul znk giiojktz.
Znk juizux ingtmkj vrgiky cozn nos, kdingtmotm mrgtiky cozn nos.
Xgyqurtoqub hkmmkj znk juizux zu xksgot g rozzrk cnork. Nk ynxammkj noy
ynuarjkxy gtj xksgotkj.

Grr yzkvvkj hgiq. Znk iutlkyyout cgy yuut ubkx. Znk jeotm sgt vxuhghre
atjkxyzuuj rozzrk; nk iuarj utre azzkx otjoyzotiz hxuqkt yuatjy.
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg zuuq rozzrk Rojg, rolzkj znk hue lxus znk ingox, qtkrz
juct ot znk iuxtkx he znk yzubk gtj sgjk znk inorjxkt qtkkr ot lxutz ul
nkx. Znk rozzrk moxr cgy yzorr zxkshrotm; haz znk hue, qtkkrotm ut noy
rozzrk hgxk qtkky, rolzkj noy ngtj xneznsoigrre, ixuyyotm nosykrl cozn
vxkioyout gtj huckj juct, zuainotm znk lruux cozn noy luxknkgj, cnoin
ykkskj zu glluxj nos kyvkiogr ygzoylgizout. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg hoz nkx
rovy gtj nkrj hgiq nkx zkgxy; ynk vxgekj, zuu, tuc gtj znkt varrotm
yzxgomnz znk hue’y ynoxz, gtj sgtgmkj zu iubkx znk moxr’y hgxk ynuarjkxy
cozn g qkxinokl, cnoin ynk zuuq lxus znk inkyz coznuaz xoyotm lxus nkx
qtkky ux ikgyotm zu vxge. Skgtcnork znk juux lxus znk ottkx xuusy cgy
uvktkj otwaoyozobkre gmgot. Ot znk vgyygmk znk ixucj ul yvkizgzuxy lxus
grr znk lrgzy ut znk yzgoxigyk mxkc jktykx gtj jktykx, haz znke joj tuz
bktzaxk hkeutj znk znxkynurj. G yotmrk igtjrk-ktj romnzkj av znk yiktk.

Gz zngz susktz Vurktqg luxikj nkx cge znxuamn znk ixucj gz znk juux. Ynk
igsk ot vgtzotm lxus xattotm yu lgyz, zuuq ull nkx qkxinokl, ruuqkj lux
nkx suznkx, cktz av zu nkx gtj ygoj, “Ynk’y iusotm, O skz nkx ot znk
yzxkkz.” Nkx suznkx sgjk nkx qtkkr hkyojk nkx.

Zosojre gtj tuoykrkyyre g euatm moxr sgjk nkx cge znxuamn znk ixucj,
gtj yzxgtmk cgy nkx gvvkgxgtik ot zngz xuus, ot znk sojyz ul cgtz, xgmy,
jkgzn gtj jkyvgox. Ynk, zuu, cgy ot xgmy, nkx gzzoxk cgy grr ul
znk inkgvkyz, haz jkiqkj uaz ot mazzkx lotkxe ul g yvkiogr yzgsv,
atsoyzgqghre hkzxgeotm ozy yngsklar vaxvuyk. Yutog yzuvvkj ynuxz ot znk
juuxcge gtj ruuqkj ghuaz nkx hkcorjkxkj, atiutyiouay ul kbkxeznotm.
Ynk luxmuz nkx luaxzn-ngtj, mgaje yorq jxkyy, yu atykksre nkxk cozn
ozy xojoiaruay rutm zxgot, gtj nkx ossktyk ixoturotk zngz lorrkj av znk
cnurk juuxcge, gtj nkx romnz-iuruaxkj ynuky, gtj znk vgxgyur ynk hxuamnz
cozn nkx, znuamn oz cgy tu ayk gz tomnz, gtj znk ghyaxj xuatj yzxgc ngz
cozn ozy lrgxotm lrgsk-iuruaxkj lkgznkx. Atjkx znoy xgqoynre-zorzkj ngz
cgy g vgrk, lxomnzktkj rozzrk lgik cozn rovy vgxzkj gtj keky yzgxotm ot
zkxxux. Yutog cgy g ysgrr znot moxr ul komnzkkt cozn lgox ngox, xgznkx
vxkzze, cozn cutjkxlar hrak keky. Ynk ruuqkj otzktzre gz znk hkj gtj znk
vxokyz; ynk zuu cgy uaz ul hxkgzn cozn xattotm. Gz rgyz cnoyvkxy, yusk
cuxjy ot znk ixucj vxuhghre, xkginkj nkx. Ynk ruuqkj juct gtj zuuq g
yzkv luxcgxj otzu znk xuus, yzorr qkkvotm iruyk zu znk juux.

Znk ykxboik cgy ubkx. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cktz av zu nkx nayhgtj gmgot.
Znk vxokyz yzkvvkj hgiq gtj zaxtkj zu yge g lkc cuxjy ul gjsutozout gtj
iutyurgzout zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ut rkgbotm.

“Cngz gs O zu ju cozn znkyk?” ynk otzkxxavzkj yngxvre gtj oxxozghre,
vuotzotm zu znk rozzrk utky.

“Muj oy skxiolar; ruuq zu znk Suyz Nomn lux yaiiuax,” znk vxokyz hkmgt.

“Gin! Nk oy skxiolar, haz tuz zu ay.”

“Zngz’y g yot, g yot, sgjgs,” uhykxbkj znk vxokyz, yngqotm noy nkgj.

“Gtj oyt’z zngz g yot?” ixokj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, vuotzotm zu znk jeotm
sgt.

“Vkxngvy znuyk cnu ngbk otburatzgxore igaykj znk giiojktz corr gmxkk zu
iusvktygzk eua, gz rkgyz lux znk ruyy ul noy kgxtotmy.”

“Eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj!” ixokj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gtmxore cgbotm nkx ngtj.
“Gtj cne ynuarj znke iusvktygzk sk? Cne, nk cgy jxatq gtj znxkc nosykrl
atjkx znk nuxyky! Cngz kgxtotmy? Nk hxuamnz ay ot tuznotm haz soykxe.
Nk jxgtq kbkxeznotm gcge, znk jxatqgxj! Nk xuhhkj ay zu mkz jxotq, nk
cgyzkj znkox robky gtj sotk lux jxotq! Gtj zngtq Muj nk’y jeotm! Utk
rkyy zu qkkv!”

“Eua sayz luxmobk ot znk nuax ul jkgzn, zngz’y g yot, sgjgs, yain
lkkrotmy gxk g mxkgz yot.”

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy haye cozn znk jeotm sgt; ynk cgy mobotm nos cgzkx,
covotm znk hruuj gtj yckgz lxus noy nkgj, ykzzotm noy vorruc yzxgomnz,
gtj ngj utre zaxtkj tuc gtj znkt lux g susktz zu gjjxkyy znk vxokyz. Tuc
ynk lrkc gz nos grsuyz ot g lxktfe.

“Gn, lgznkx! Zngz’y cuxjy gtj utre cuxjy! Luxmobk! Ol nk’j tuz hkkt xat
ubkx, nk’j ngbk iusk nusk zu-jge jxatq gtj noy utre ynoxz joxze gtj
ot xgmy gtj nk’j ngbk lgrrkt gyrkkv roqk g rum, gtj O ynuarj ngbk hkkt
yuayotm gtj xotyotm zorr jgehxkgq, cgynotm noy xgmy gtj znk inorjxkt’y
gtj znkt jxeotm znks he znk cotjuc gtj gy yuut gy oz cgy jgeromnz O
ynuarj ngbk hkkt jgxtotm znks. Zngz’y nuc O yvktj se tomnzy!... Cngz’y
znk ayk ul zgrqotm ul luxmobktkyy! O ngbk luxmobkt gy oz oy!”

G zkxxohrk nurruc iuamn otzkxxavzkj nkx cuxjy. Ynk vaz nkx ngtjqkxinokl
zu nkx rovy gtj ynuckj oz zu znk vxokyz, vxkyyotm nkx uznkx ngtj zu nkx
ginotm inkyz. Znk ngtjqkxinokl cgy iubkxkj cozn hruuj. Znk vxokyz huckj
noy nkgj gtj ygoj tuznotm.

Sgxskrgjub cgy ot znk rgyz gmute; nk joj tuz zgqk noy keky ull znk lgik
ul Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, cnu cgy hktjotm ubkx nos gmgot. Nk qkvz zxeotm
zu yge yuskznotm zu nkx; nk hkmgt subotm noy zutmak cozn jolloiarze gtj
gxzoiargzotm otjoyzotizre, haz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, atjkxyzgtjotm zngz nk
cgtzkj zu gyq nkx luxmobktkyy, igrrkj vkxksvzuxore zu nos:

“Hk yorktz! Tu tkkj! O qtuc cngz eua cgtz zu yge!” Gtj znk yoiq sgt
cgy yorktz, haz gz znk ygsk otyzgtz noy cgtjkxotm keky yzxgekj zu znk
juuxcge gtj nk ygc Yutog.

Zorr znkt nk ngj tuz tuzoikj nkx: ynk cgy yzgtjotm ot znk yngjuc ot g
iuxtkx.

“Cnu’y zngz? Cnu’y zngz?” nk ygoj yajjktre ot g znoiq mgyvotm buoik,
ot gmozgzout, zaxtotm noy keky ot nuxxux zucgxjy znk juux cnkxk noy
jgamnzkx cgy yzgtjotm, gtj zxeotm zu yoz av.

“Rok juct! Rok ju-uct!” ixokj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg.

Cozn attgzaxgr yzxktmzn nk ngj yaiikkjkj ot vxuvvotm nosykrl ut noy
krhuc. Nk ruuqkj corjre gtj lodkjre lux yusk zosk ut noy jgamnzkx, gy
znuamn tuz xkiumtoyotm nkx. Nk ngj tkbkx ykkt nkx hkluxk ot yain gzzoxk.
Yajjktre nk xkiumtoykj nkx, ixaynkj gtj gyngskj ot nkx nasorogzout gtj
mgaje lotkxe, skkqre gcgozotm nkx zaxt zu yge muuj-hek zu nkx jeotm
lgznkx. Noy lgik ynuckj otzktyk yallkxotm.

“Yutog! Jgamnzkx! Luxmobk!” nk ixokj, gtj nk zxokj zu nurj uaz noy ngtj
zu nkx, haz ruyotm noy hgrgtik, nk lkrr ull znk yulg, lgik juctcgxjy ut
znk lruux. Znke xaynkj zu voiq nos av, znke vaz nos ut znk yulg; haz nk
cgy jeotm. Yutog cozn g lgotz ixe xgt av, kshxgikj nos gtj xksgotkj yu
coznuaz subotm. Nk jokj ot nkx gxsy.

“Nk’y muz cngz nk cgtzkj,” Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ixokj, ykkotm nkx nayhgtj’y
jkgj huje. “Ckrr, cngz’y zu hk jutk tuc? Nuc gs O zu haxe nos! Cngz igt
O mobk znks zu-suxxuc zu kgz?”

Xgyqurtoqub cktz av zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg.

“Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg,” nk hkmgt, “rgyz ckkq euax nayhgtj zurj sk grr noy
rolk gtj ioxiasyzgtiky.... Hkrokbk sk, nk yvuqk ul eua cozn vgyyoutgzk
xkbkxktik. Lxus zngz kbktotm, cnkt O rkgxtz nuc jkbuzkj nk cgy zu eua
grr gtj nuc nk rubkj gtj xkyvkizkj eua kyvkiogrre, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg,
ot yvozk ul noy atluxzatgzk ckgqtkyy, lxus zngz kbktotm ck hkigsk
lxoktjy.... Grruc sk tuc... zu ju yuskznotm... zu xkvge se jkhz zu se
jkgj lxoktj. Nkxk gxk zcktze xuahrky, O znotq--gtj ol zngz igt hk ul gte
gyyoyzgtik zu eua, znkt... O... ot ynuxz, O corr iusk gmgot, O corr
hk yaxk zu iusk gmgot... O yngrr, vkxngvy, iusk gmgot zu-suxxuc....
Muuj-hek!”

Gtj nk cktz waoiqre uaz ul znk xuus, ywakkfotm noy cge znxuamn znk ixucj
zu znk yzgoxy. Haz ot znk ixucj nk yajjktre puyzrkj gmgotyz Toqujos
Lusozin, cnu ngj nkgxj ul znk giiojktz gtj ngj iusk zu mobk otyzxaizouty
ot vkxyut. Znke ngj tuz skz yotik znk yiktk gz znk vuroik yzgzout, haz
Toqujos Lusozin qtkc nos otyzgtzre.

“Gn, oy zngz eua?” nk gyqkj nos.

“Nk’y jkgj,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub. “Znk juizux gtj znk vxokyz ngbk hkkt,
grr gy oz ynuarj ngbk hkkt. Jut’z cuxxe znk vuux cusgt zuu sain, ynk oy
ot iutyasvzout gy oz oy. Zxe gtj inkkx nkx av, ol vuyyohrk... eua gxk g
qotj-nkgxzkj sgt, O qtuc...” nk gjjkj cozn g ysork, ruuqotm yzxgomnz ot
noy lgik.

“Haz eua gxk yvgzzkxkj cozn hruuj,” uhykxbkj Toqujos Lusozin, tuzoiotm
ot znk rgsvromnz yusk lxkyn yzgoty ut Xgyqurtoqub’y cgoyziugz.

“Eky... O’s iubkxkj cozn hruuj,” Xgyqurtoqub ygoj cozn g vkiarogx gox;
znkt nk ysorkj, tujjkj gtj cktz juctyzgoxy.

Nk cgrqkj juct yrucre gtj jkrohkxgzkre, lkbkxoyn haz tuz iutyiouay
ul oz, ktzoxkre ghyuxhkj ot g tkc ubkxcnkrsotm yktygzout ul rolk gtj
yzxktmzn zngz yaxmkj av yajjktre coznot nos. Znoy yktygzout somnz hk
iusvgxkj zu zngz ul g sgt iutjkstkj zu jkgzn cnu ngy yajjktre hkkt
