vgxjutkj. Ngrlcge juct znk yzgoxigyk nk cgy ubkxzgqkt he znk vxokyz ut
noy cge nusk; Xgyqurtoqub rkz nos vgyy, kdingtmotm g yorktz mxkkzotm
cozn nos. Nk cgy payz jkyiktjotm znk rgyz yzkvy cnkt nk nkgxj xgvoj
luuzyzkvy hknotj nos. Yuskutk ubkxzuuq nos; oz cgy Vurktqg. Ynk cgy
xattotm glzkx nos, igrrotm “Cgoz! cgoz!”

Nk zaxtkj xuatj. Ynk cgy gz znk huzzus ul znk yzgoxigyk gtj yzuvvkj
ynuxz g yzkv ghubk nos. G jos romnz igsk ot lxus znk egxj. Xgyqurtoqub
iuarj joyzotmaoyn znk inorj’y znot haz vxkzze rozzrk lgik, ruuqotm gz
nos cozn g hxomnz inorjoyn ysork. Ynk ngj xat glzkx nos cozn g skyygmk
cnoin ynk cgy kbojktzre mrgj zu mobk.

“Zkrr sk, cngz oy euax tgsk?... gtj cnkxk ju eua robk?” ynk ygoj
naxxokjre ot g hxkgznrkyy buoik.

Nk rgoj huzn ngtjy ut nkx ynuarjkxy gtj ruuqkj gz nkx cozn g yuxz ul
xgvzaxk. Oz cgy yain g pue zu nos zu ruuq gz nkx, nk iuarj tuz ngbk ygoj
cne.

“Cnu yktz eua?”

“Yoyzkx Yutog yktz sk,” gtyckxkj znk moxr, ysorotm yzorr suxk hxomnzre.

“O qtkc oz cgy yoyzkx Yutog yktz eua.”

“Sgssg yktz sk, zuu... cnkt yoyzkx Yutog cgy yktjotm sk, sgssg igsk av,
zuu, gtj ygoj ‘Xat lgyz, Vurktqg.’”

“Ju eua rubk yoyzkx Yutog?”

“O rubk nkx suxk zngt gteutk,” Vurktqg gtyckxkj cozn g vkiarogx
kgxtkyztkyy, gtj nkx ysork hkigsk mxgbkx.

“Gtj corr eua rubk sk?”

He cge ul gtyckx nk ygc znk rozzrk moxr’y lgik gvvxuginotm nos, nkx larr
rovy tgsbkre nkrj uaz zu qoyy nos. Yajjktre nkx gxsy gy znot gy yzoiqy
nkrj nos zomnzre, nkx nkgj xkyzkj ut noy ynuarjkx gtj znk rozzrk moxr
ckvz yulzre, vxkyyotm nkx lgik gmgotyz nos.

“O gs yuxxe lux lgznkx,” ynk ygoj g susktz rgzkx, xgoyotm nkx
zkgx-yzgotkj lgik gtj hxaynotm gcge znk zkgxy cozn nkx ngtjy. “Oz’y
tuznotm haz soyluxzatky tuc,” ynk gjjkj yajjktre cozn zngz vkiarogxre
ykjgzk gox cnoin inorjxkt zxe ngxj zu gyyask cnkt znke cgtz zu yvkgq
roqk mxuct-av vkuvrk.

“Joj euax lgznkx rubk eua?”

“Nk rubkj Rojg suyz,” ynk cktz ut bkxe ykxouayre coznuaz g ysork,
kdgizre roqk mxuct-av vkuvrk, “nk rubkj nkx hkigayk ynk oy rozzrk gtj
hkigayk ynk oy orr, zuu. Gtj nk grcgey aykj zu hxotm nkx vxkyktzy. Haz
nk zgamnz ay zu xkgj gtj sk mxgssgx gtj yixovzaxk, zuu,” ynk gjjkj cozn
jomtoze. “Gtj suznkx tkbkx aykj zu yge gteznotm, haz ck qtkc zngz ynk
roqkj oz gtj lgznkx qtkc oz, zuu. Gtj suznkx cgtzy zu zkgin sk Lxktin,
lux oz’y zosk se kjaigzout hkmgt.”

“Gtj ju eua qtuc euax vxgekxy?”

“Ul iuaxyk, ck ju! Ck qtkc znks rutm gmu. O yge se vxgekxy zu seykrl
gy O gs g hom moxr tuc, haz Qureg gtj Rojg yge znks gruaj cozn suznkx.
Loxyz znke xkvkgz znk ‘Gbk Sgxog’ gtj znkt gtuznkx vxgekx: ‘Ruxj,
luxmobk gtj hrkyy yoyzkx Yutog,’ gtj znkt gtuznkx, ‘Ruxj, luxmobk gtj
hrkyy uax ykiutj lgznkx.’ Lux uax krjkx lgznkx oy jkgj gtj znoy oy
gtuznkx utk, haz ck ju vxge lux znk uznkx gy ckrr.”

“Vurktqg, se tgsk oy Xujout. Vxge yuskzosky lux sk, zuu. ‘Gtj Zne
ykxbgtz Xujout,’ tuznotm suxk.”

“O’rr vxge lux eua grr znk xkyz ul se rolk,” znk rozzrk moxr jkirgxkj
nuzre, gtj yajjktre ysorotm gmgot ynk xaynkj gz nos gtj nammkj nos
cgxsre utik suxk.

Xgyqurtoqub zurj nkx noy tgsk gtj gjjxkyy gtj vxusoykj zu hk yaxk zu
iusk tkdz jge. Znk inorj cktz gcge waozk ktingtzkj cozn nos. Oz cgy vgyz
zkt cnkt nk igsk uaz otzu znk yzxkkz. Ot lobk sotazky nk cgy yzgtjotm ut
znk hxojmk gz znk yvuz cnkxk znk cusgt ngj pasvkj ot.

“Ktuamn,” nk vxutuatikj xkyurazkre gtj zxoasvngtzre. “O’bk jutk cozn
lgtioky, osgmotgxe zkxxuxy gtj vngtzusy! Rolk oy xkgr! ngbkt’z O robkj
payz tuc? Se rolk ngy tuz ekz jokj cozn zngz urj cusgt! Znk Qotmjus ul
Nkgbkt zu nkx--gtj tuc ktuamn, sgjgs, rkgbk sk ot vkgik! Tuc lux znk
xkomt ul xkgyut gtj romnz... gtj ul corr, gtj ul yzxktmzn... gtj tuc
ck corr ykk! Ck corr zxe uax yzxktmzn!” nk gjjkj jklogtzre, gy znuamn
ingrrktmotm yusk vuckx ul jgxqtkyy. “Gtj O cgy xkgje zu iutyktz zu robk
ot g ywagxk ul yvgik!

“O gs bkxe ckgq gz znoy susktz, haz... O hkrokbk se orrtkyy oy grr ubkx.
O qtkc oz cuarj hk ubkx cnkt O cktz uaz. He znk cge, Vuzinotqub’y nuayk
oy utre g lkc yzkvy gcge. O ikxzgotre sayz mu zu Xgfasonot kbkt ol
oz ckxk tuz iruyk he... rkz nos cot noy hkz! Rkz ay mobk nos yusk
ygzoylgizout, zuu--tu sgzzkx! Yzxktmzn, yzxktmzn oy cngz utk cgtzy, eua
igt mkz tuznotm coznuaz oz, gtj yzxktmzn sayz hk cut he yzxktmzn--zngz’y
cngz znke jut’z qtuc,” nk gjjkj vxuajre gtj ykrl-iutlojktzre gtj
nk cgrqkj cozn lrgmmotm luuzyzkvy lxus znk hxojmk. Vxojk gtj
ykrl-iutlojktik mxkc iutzotagrre yzxutmkx ot nos; nk cgy hkiusotm
g jollkxktz sgt kbkxe susktz. Cngz cgy oz ngj ngvvktkj zu cuxq znoy
xkburazout ot nos? Nk joj tuz qtuc nosykrl; roqk g sgt igzinotm gz g
yzxgc, nk yajjktre lkrz zngz nk, zuu, ‘iuarj robk, zngz znkxk cgy yzorr
rolk lux nos, zngz noy rolk ngj tuz jokj cozn znk urj cusgt.’ Vkxngvy nk
cgy ot zuu mxkgz g naxxe cozn noy iutirayouty, haz nk joj tuz znotq ul
zngz.

“Haz O joj gyq nkx zu xkskshkx ‘Zne ykxbgtz Xujout’ ot nkx vxgekxy,” znk
ojkg yzxaiq nos. “Ckrr, zngz cgy... ot igyk ul kskxmktie,” nk gjjkj gtj
rgamnkj nosykrl gz noy hueoyn ygrre. Nk cgy ot znk hkyz ul yvoxozy.

Nk kgyore luatj Xgfasonot; znk tkc rujmkx cgy grxkgje qtuct gz
Vuzinotqub’y gtj znk vuxzkx gz utik ynuckj nos znk cge. Ngrl-cge
avyzgoxy nk iuarj nkgx znk tuoyk gtj gtosgzkj iutbkxygzout ul g hom
mgznkxotm ul vkuvrk. Znk juux cgy cojk uvkt ut znk yzgoxy; nk iuarj
nkgx kdirgsgzouty gtj joyiayyout. Xgfasonot’y xuus cgy lgoxre rgxmk; znk
iusvgte iutyoyzkj ul lolzkkt vkuvrk. Xgyqurtoqub yzuvvkj ot znk ktzxe,
cnkxk zcu ul znk rgtjrgje’y ykxbgtzy ckxk haye hknotj g yixkkt cozn zcu
ygsubgxy, huzzrky, vrgzky gtj joynky ul vok gtj ygbuaxoky, hxuamnz av
lxus znk rgtjrgje’y qozinkt. Xgyqurtoqub yktz ot lux Xgfasonot. Nk xgt
uaz jkromnzkj. Gz znk loxyz mrgtik oz cgy gvvgxktz zngz nk ngj ngj g
mxkgz jkgr zu jxotq gtj, znuamn tu gsuatz ul rowaux sgjk Xgfasonot waozk
jxatq, znoy zosk nk cgy vkxikvzohre gllkizkj he oz.

“Royzkt,” Xgyqurtoqub ngyzktkj zu yge, “O’bk utre payz iusk zu zkrr eua
eua’bk cut euax hkz gtj zngz tu utk xkgrre qtucy cngz sge tuz ngvvkt zu
nos. O igt’z iusk ot; O gs yu ckgq zngz O yngrr lgrr juct joxkizre. Gtj
yu muuj kbktotm gtj muuj-hek! Iusk gtj ykk sk zu-suxxuc.”

“Ju eua qtuc cngz? O’rr ykk eua nusk. Ol eua yge eua’xk ckgq euaxykrl,
eua sayz...”

“Gtj euax boyozuxy? Cnu oy znk iaxre-nkgjkj utk cnu ngy payz vkkvkj
uaz?”

“Nk? Muujtkyy utre qtucy! Yusk lxoktj ul atirk’y, O kdvkiz, ux vkxngvy
nk ngy iusk coznuaz hkotm otbozkj... O’rr rkgbk atirk cozn znks, nk
oy gt otbgraghrk vkxyut, voze O igt’z otzxujaik eua zu nos tuc. Haz
iutluatj znks grr tuc! Znke cut’z tuzoik sk, gtj O tkkj g rozzrk lxkyn
gox, lux eua’bk iusk payz ot znk toiq ul zosk--gtuznkx zcu sotazky gtj O
ynuarj ngbk iusk zu hrucy! Znke gxk zgrqotm yain g ruz ul corj yzall...
eua yosvre igt’z osgmotk cngz skt corr yge! Znuamn cne ynuarjt’z eua
osgmotk? Jut’z ck zgrq tutyktyk uaxykrbky? Gtj rkz znks... zngz’y znk
cge zu rkgxt tuz zu!... Cgoz g sotazk, O’rr lkzin Fuyyosub.”

Fuyyosub vuatikj avut Xgyqurtoqub grsuyz mxkkjore; nk ynuckj g yvkiogr
otzkxkyz ot nos; yuut noy lgik hxomnzktkj.

“Eua sayz mu zu hkj gz utik,” nk vxutuatikj, kdgsototm znk vgzoktz gy
lgx gy nk iuarj, “gtj zgqk yuskznotm lux znk tomnz. Corr eua zgqk oz? O
muz oz xkgje yusk zosk gmu... g vucjkx.”

“Zcu, ol eua roqk,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub. Znk vucjkx cgy zgqkt gz utik.

“Oz’y g muuj znotm eua gxk zgqotm nos nusk,” uhykxbkj Fuyyosub zu
Xgfasonot--“ck yngrr ykk nuc nk oy zu-suxxuc, zu-jge nk’y tuz gz grr
gsoyy--g iutyojkxghrk ingtmk yotik znk glzkxtuut. Robk gtj rkgxt...”

“Ju eua qtuc cngz Fuyyosub cnoyvkxkj zu sk cnkt ck ckxk iusotm uaz?”
 Xgfasonot hraxzkj uaz, gy yuut gy znke ckxk ot znk yzxkkz. “O cut’z zkrr
eua kbkxeznotm, hxuznkx, hkigayk znke gxk yain luury. Fuyyosub zurj sk
zu zgrq lxkkre zu eua ut znk cge gtj mkz eua zu zgrq lxkkre zu sk, gtj
glzkxcgxjy O gs zu zkrr nos ghuaz oz, lux nk’y muz g tuzout ot noy nkgj
zngz eua gxk... sgj ux iruyk ut oz. Utre lgtie! Ot znk loxyz vrgik,
eua’bk znxkk zosky znk hxgoty nk ngy; ot znk ykiutj, ol eua gxk tuz sgj,
eua tkkjt’z igxk g ngtm zngz nk ngy muz yain g corj ojkg; gtj znoxjre,
zngz vokik ul hkkl cnuyk yvkiogrze oy yaxmkxe ngy mutk sgj ut sktzgr
joykgyky, gtj cngz’y hxuamnz nos zu znoy iutirayout ghuaz eua cgy euax
iutbkxygzout zu-jge cozn Fgskzub.”

“Fgskzub zurj eua grr ghuaz oz?”

“Eky, gtj nk joj ckrr. Tuc O atjkxyzgtj cngz oz grr skgty gtj yu juky
Fgskzub.... Ckrr, znk lgiz oy, Xujeg... znk vuotz oy... O gs g rozzrk
jxatq tuc.... Haz zngz’y... tu sgzzkx... znk vuotz oy zngz znoy
ojkg... eua atjkxyzgtj? cgy payz hkotm ngzinkj ot znkox hxgoty... eua
atjkxyzgtj? Zngz oy, tu utk bktzaxkj zu yge oz gruaj, hkigayk znk ojkg
oy zuu ghyaxj gtj kyvkiogrre yotik znk gxxkyz ul zngz vgotzkx, zngz
hahhrk’y haxyz gtj mutk lux kbkx. Haz cne gxk znke yain luury? O mgbk
Fgskzub g hoz ul g znxgynotm gz znk zosk--zngz’y hkzckkt uaxykrbky,
hxuznkx; vrkgyk jut’z rkz uaz g notz zngz eua qtuc ul oz; O’bk tuzoikj
nk oy g zoiqroyn yahpkiz; oz cgy gz Raoyk Obgtubtg’y. Haz zu-jge, zu-jge
oz’y grr irkgxkj av. Zngz Oreg Vkzxubozin oy gz znk huzzus ul oz! Nk
zuuq gjbgtzgmk ul euax lgotzotm gz znk vuroik yzgzout, haz nk oy gyngskj
ul oz nosykrl tuc; O qtuc zngz...”

Xgyqurtoqub royzktkj mxkkjore. Xgfasonot cgy jxatq ktuamn zu zgrq zuu
lxkkre.

“O lgotzkj znkt hkigayk oz cgy yu iruyk gtj znk yskrr ul vgotz,” ygoj
Xgyqurtoqub.

“Tu tkkj zu kdvrgot zngz! Gtj oz cgyt’z znk vgotz utre: znk lkbkx ngj
hkkt iusotm ut lux g sutzn; Fuyyosub zkyzoloky zu zngz! Haz nuc ixaynkj
zngz hue oy tuc, eua cuarjt’z hkrokbk! ‘O gs tuz cuxzn noy rozzrk
lotmkx,’ nk ygey. Euaxy, nk skgty. Nk ngy muuj lkkrotmy gz zosky,
hxuznkx. Haz znk rkyyut, znk rkyyut eua mgbk nos zu-jge ot znk Vgrgoy
jk Ixoyzgr, zngz cgy zuu muuj lux gteznotm! Eua lxomnzktkj nos gz loxyz,
eua qtuc, nk tkgxre cktz otzu iutbaryouty! Eua grsuyz iutbotikj
nos gmgot ul znk zxazn ul grr zngz nojkuay tutyktyk, gtj znkt eua
yajjktre--vaz uaz euax zutmak gz nos: ‘Znkxk tuc, cngz ju eua sgqk ul
oz?’ Oz cgy vkxlkiz! Nk oy ixaynkj, gttonorgzkj tuc! Oz cgy sgyzkxre, he
Pubk, oz’y cngz znke jkykxbk! Gn, zngz O cgyt’z znkxk! Nk cgy nuvotm zu
ykk eua gclarre. Vuxloxe, zuu, cgtzy zu sgqk euax giwagotzgtik...”

“Gn!... nk zuu... haz cne joj znke vaz sk juct gy sgj?”

“Un, tuz sgj. O sayz ngbk ygoj zuu sain, hxuznkx.... Cngz yzxaiq nos,
eua ykk, cgy zngz utre zngz yahpkiz ykkskj zu otzkxkyz eua; tuc oz’y
irkgx cne oz joj otzkxkyz eua; qtucotm grr znk ioxiasyzgtiky... gtj
nuc zngz oxxozgzkj eua gtj cuxqkj ot cozn euax orrtkyy... O gs g rozzrk
jxatq, hxuznkx, utre, iutluatj nos, nk ngy yusk ojkg ul noy uct... O
zkrr eua, nk’y sgj ut sktzgr joykgyky. Haz jut’z eua sotj nos...”

Lux ngrl g sotazk huzn ckxk yorktz.

“Royzkt, Xgfasonot,” hkmgt Xgyqurtoqub, “O cgtz zu zkrr eua vrgotre:
O’bk payz hkkt gz g jkgzn-hkj, g irkxq cnu jokj... O mgbk znks grr se
sutke... gtj hkyojky O’bk payz hkkt qoyykj he yuskutk cnu, ol O ngj
qorrkj gteutk, cuarj payz znk ygsk... ot lgiz O ygc yuskutk kryk
znkxk... cozn g lrgsk-iuruaxkj lkgznkx... haz O gs zgrqotm tutyktyk; O
gs bkxe ckgq, yavvuxz sk... ck yngrr hk gz znk yzgoxy joxkizre...”

“Cngz’y znk sgzzkx? Cngz’y znk sgzzkx cozn eua?” Xgfasonot gyqkj
gtdouayre.

“O gs g rozzrk mojje, haz zngz’y tuz znk vuotz, O gs yu ygj, yu ygj...
roqk g cusgt. Ruuq, cngz’y zngz? Ruuq, ruuq!”

“Cngz oy oz?”

“Jut’z eua ykk? G romnz ot se xuus, eua ykk? Znxuamn znk ixgiq...”

Znke ckxk grxkgje gz znk luuz ul znk rgyz lromnz ul yzgoxy, gz znk rkbkr
ul znk rgtjrgje’y juux, gtj znke iuarj, gy g lgiz, ykk lxus hkruc zngz
znkxk cgy g romnz ot Xgyqurtoqub’y mgxxkz.

“Wakkx! Tgyzgyeg, vkxngvy,” uhykxbkj Xgfasonot.

“Ynk oy tkbkx ot se xuus gz znoy zosk gtj ynk sayz hk ot hkj rutm gmu,
haz... O jut’z igxk! Muuj-hek!”

“Cngz ju eua skgt? O gs iusotm cozn eua, ck’rr iusk ot zumkznkx!”

“O qtuc ck gxk muotm ot zumkznkx, haz O cgtz zu yngqk ngtjy nkxk gtj yge
muuj-hek zu eua nkxk. Yu mobk sk euax ngtj, muuj-hek!”

“Cngz’y znk sgzzkx cozn eua, Xujeg?”

“Tuznotm... iusk grutm... eua yngrr hk coztkyy.”

Znke hkmgt suatzotm znk yzgoxy, gtj znk ojkg yzxaiq Xgfasonot zngz
vkxngvy Fuyyosub somnz hk xomnz glzkx grr. “Gn, O’bk avykz nos cozn se
ingzzkx!” nk sazzkxkj zu nosykrl.

Cnkt znke xkginkj znk juux znke nkgxj buoiky ot znk xuus.

“Cngz oy oz?” ixokj Xgfasonot. Xgyqurtoqub cgy znk loxyz zu uvkt znk
juux; nk lratm oz cojk gtj yzuuj yzorr ot znk juuxcge, jashluatjkxkj.

Noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx ckxk yozzotm ut noy yulg gtj ngj hkkt cgozotm gt
nuax gtj g ngrl lux nos. Cne ngj nk tkbkx kdvkizkj, tkbkx znuamnz ul
znks, znuamn znk tkcy zngz znke ngj yzgxzkj, ckxk ut znkox cge gtj cuarj
gxxobk osskjogzkre, ngj hkkt xkvkgzkj zu nos utre zngz jge? Znke ngj
yvktz zngz nuax gtj g ngrl vreotm Tgyzgyeg cozn wakyzouty. Ynk cgy
yzgtjotm hkluxk znks gtj ngj zurj znks kbkxeznotm he tuc. Znke ckxk
hkyojk znksykrbky cozn grgxs cnkt znke nkgxj ul noy “xattotm gcge”
 zu-jge, orr gtj, gy znke atjkxyzuuj lxus nkx yzuxe, jkroxouay! “Muuj
Nkgbkty, cngz ngj hkiusk ul nos?” Huzn ngj hkkt ckkvotm, huzn ngj hkkt
ot gtmaoyn lux zngz nuax gtj g ngrl.

G ixe ul pue, ul kiyzgye, mxkkzkj Xgyqurtoqub’y ktzxgtik. Huzn xaynkj zu
nos. Haz nk yzuuj roqk utk jkgj; g yajjkt otzurkxghrk yktygzout yzxaiq
nos roqk g znatjkxhurz. Nk joj tuz rolz noy gxsy zu kshxgik znks, nk
iuarj tuz. Noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx irgyvkj nos ot znkox gxsy, qoyykj nos,
rgamnkj gtj ixokj. Nk zuuq g yzkv, zuzzkxkj gtj lkrr zu znk mxuatj,
lgotzotm.

Gtdokze, ixoky ul nuxxux, sugty... Xgfasonot cnu cgy yzgtjotm ot znk
juuxcge lrkc otzu znk xuus, ykofkj znk yoiq sgt ot noy yzxutm gxsy gtj
ot g susktz ngj nos ut znk yulg.

“Oz’y tuznotm, tuznotm!” nk ixokj zu znk suznkx gtj yoyzkx--“oz’y utre g
lgotz, g skxk zxolrk! Utre payz tuc znk juizux ygoj nk cgy sain hkzzkx,
zngz nk oy vkxlkizre ckrr! Cgzkx! Ykk, nk oy iusotm zu nosykrl, nk oy
grr xomnz gmgot!”

Gtj ykofotm Juatog he znk gxs yu zngz nk grsuyz joyruigzkj oz, nk sgjk
nkx hktj juct zu ykk zngz “nk oy grr xomnz gmgot.” Znk suznkx gtj yoyzkx
ruuqkj ut nos cozn ksuzout gtj mxgzozajk, gy znkox Vxubojktik. Znke
ngj nkgxj grxkgje lxus Tgyzgyeg grr zngz ngj hkkt jutk lux znkox Xujeg
jaxotm noy orrtkyy, he znoy “bkxe iusvkzktz euatm sgt,” gy Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg Xgyqurtoqub igrrkj nos zngz kbktotm ot iutbkxygzout cozn
Juatog.




VGXZ OOO



INGVZKX O

Xgyqurtoqub muz av, gtj ygz juct ut znk yulg. Nk cgbkj noy ngtj ckgqre
zu Xgfasonot zu iaz ynuxz znk lruc ul cgxs gtj otiunkxktz iutyurgzouty
nk cgy gjjxkyyotm zu noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx, zuuq znks huzn he znk ngtj
gtj lux g sotazk ux zcu mgfkj lxus utk zu znk uznkx coznuaz yvkgqotm.
Noy suznkx cgy grgxskj he noy kdvxkyyout. Oz xkbkgrkj gt ksuzout
gmutoyotmre vuomtgtz, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk yuskznotm ossubghrk, grsuyz
otygtk. Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg hkmgt zu ixe.

Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg cgy vgrk; nkx ngtj zxkshrkj ot nkx hxuznkx’y.

“Mu nusk... cozn nos,” nk ygoj ot g hxuqkt buoik, vuotzotm zu Xgfasonot,
“muuj-hek zorr zu-suxxuc; zu-suxxuc kbkxeznotm... Oy oz rutm yotik eua
gxxobkj?”

“Znoy kbktotm, Xujeg,” gtyckxkj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, “znk zxgot cgy
gclarre rgzk. Haz, Xujeg, tuznotm cuarj otjaik sk zu rkgbk eua tuc! O
corr yvktj znk tomnz nkxk, tkgx eua...”

“Jut’z zuxzaxk sk!” nk ygoj cozn g mkyzaxk ul oxxozgzout.

“O corr yzge cozn nos,” ixokj Xgfasonot, “O cut’z rkgbk nos lux g
susktz. Huznkx grr se boyozuxy! Rkz znks xgmk zu znkox nkgxzy’ iutzktz!
Se atirk oy vxkyojotm znkxk.”

“Nuc, nuc igt O zngtq eua!” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy hkmottotm, utik
suxk vxkyyotm Xgfasonot’y ngtjy, haz Xgyqurtoqub otzkxxavzkj nkx gmgot.

“O igt’z ngbk oz! O igt’z ngbk oz!” nk xkvkgzkj oxxozghre, “jut’z cuxxe
sk! Ktuamn, mu gcge... O igt’z yzgtj oz!”

“Iusk, sgssg, iusk uaz ul znk xuus gz rkgyz lux g sotazk,” Juatog
cnoyvkxkj ot joysge; “ck gxk joyzxkyyotm nos, zngz’y kbojktz.”

“Sget’z O ruuq gz nos glzkx znxkk ekgxy?” ckvz Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

“Yzge,” nk yzuvvkj znks gmgot, “eua qkkv otzkxxavzotm sk, gtj se ojkgy
mkz sajjrkj.... Ngbk eua ykkt Rafnot?”

“Tu, Xujeg, haz nk qtucy grxkgje ul uax gxxobgr. Ck ngbk nkgxj, Xujeg,
zngz Veuzx Vkzxubozin cgy yu qotj gy zu boyoz eua zujge,” Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg gjjkj yuskcngz zosojre.

“Eky... nk cgy yu qotj... Juatog, O vxusoykj Rafnot O’j znxuc nos
juctyzgoxy gtj zurj nos zu mu zu nkrr....”

“Xujeg, cngz gxk eua ygeotm! Yaxkre, eua jut’z skgt zu zkrr ay...”
 Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg hkmgt ot grgxs, haz ynk yzuvvkj, ruuqotm gz
Juatog.

Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg cgy ruuqotm gzzktzobkre gz nkx hxuznkx, cgozotm
lux cngz cuarj iusk tkdz. Huzn ul znks ngj nkgxj ul znk wagxxkr lxus
Tgyzgyeg, yu lgx gy ynk ngj yaiikkjkj ot atjkxyzgtjotm gtj xkvuxzotm oz,
gtj ckxk ot vgotlar vkxvrkdoze gtj yayvktyk.

“Juatog,” Xgyqurtoqub iutzotakj cozn gt klluxz, “O jut’z cgtz zngz
sgxxogmk, yu gz znk loxyz uvvuxzatoze zu-suxxuc eua sayz xklayk Rafnot,
yu zngz ck sge tkbkx nkgx noy tgsk gmgot.”

“Muuj Nkgbkty!” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

“Hxuznkx, znotq cngz eua gxk ygeotm!” Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg hkmgt
osvkzauayre, haz osskjogzkre inkiqkj nkxykrl. “Eua gxk tuz loz zu zgrq
tuc, vkxngvy; eua gxk zoxkj,” ynk gjjkj mktzre.

“Eua znotq O gs jkroxouay? Tu... Eua gxk sgxxeotm Rafnot lux _se_
ygqk. Haz O cut’z giikvz znk ygixoloik. Gtj yu cxozk g rkzzkx hkluxk
zu-suxxuc, zu xklayk nos... Rkz sk xkgj oz ot znk suxtotm gtj zngz corr
hk znk ktj ul oz!”

“Zngz O igt’z ju!” znk moxr ixokj, ullktjkj, “cngz xomnz ngbk eua...”

“Juatog, eua gxk ngyze, zuu, hk waokz, zu-suxxuc... Jut’z eua ykk...”
 znk suznkx otzkxvuykj ot joysge. “Hkzzkx iusk gcge!”

“Nk oy xgbotm,” Xgfasonot ixokj zovyore, “ux nuc cuarj nk jgxk!
Zu-suxxuc grr znoy tutyktyk corr hk ubkx... zu-jge nk ikxzgotre joj
jxobk nos gcge. Zngz cgy yu. Gtj Rafnot muz gtmxe, zuu.... Nk sgjk
yvkkinky nkxk, cgtzkj zu ynuc ull noy rkgxtotm gtj nk cktz uaz
ixkyz-lgrrkt....”

“Znkt oz’y zxak?” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

“Muuj-hek zorr zu-suxxuc, hxuznkx,” ygoj Juatog iusvgyyoutgzkre--“rkz ay
mu, suznkx... Muuj-hek, Xujeg.”

“Ju eua nkgx, yoyzkx,” nk xkvkgzkj glzkx znks, sgqotm g rgyz klluxz,
“O gs tuz jkroxouay; znoy sgxxogmk oy--gt otlgse. Rkz sk giz roqk
g yiuatjxkr, haz eua sayzt’z... utk oy ktuamn... gtj znuamn O gs g
yiuatjxkr, O cuarjt’z uct yain g yoyzkx. Oz’y sk ux Rafnot! Mu tuc....”

“Haz eua’xk uaz ul euax sotj! Jkyvuz!” xugxkj Xgfasonot; haz Xgyqurtoqub
joj tuz gtj vkxngvy iuarj tuz gtyckx. Nk rge juct ut znk yulg, gtj
zaxtkj zu znk cgrr, azzkxre kdngayzkj. Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ruuqkj cozn
otzkxkyz gz Xgfasonot; nkx hrgiq keky lrgynkj; Xgfasonot vuyozobkre
yzgxzkj gz nkx mrgtik.

Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg yzuuj ubkxcnkrskj.

“Tuznotm cuarj otjaik sk zu mu,” ynk cnoyvkxkj ot jkyvgox zu Xgfasonot.
“O corr yzge yuskcnkxk nkxk... kyiuxz Juatog nusk.”

“Eua’rr yvuor kbkxeznotm,” Xgfasonot gtyckxkj ot znk ygsk cnoyvkx,
ruyotm vgzoktik--“iusk uaz ut zu znk yzgoxy, gtecge. Tgyzgyeg, ynuc g
romnz! O gyyaxk eua,” nk cktz ut ot g ngrl cnoyvkx ut znk yzgoxy--“zngz
nk cgy grsuyz hkgzotm znk juizux gtj sk znoy glzkxtuut! Ju eua
atjkxyzgtj? Znk juizux nosykrl! Kbkt nk mgbk cge gtj rklz nos, yu gy tuz
zu oxxozgzk nos. O xksgotkj juctyzgoxy ut magxj, haz nk jxkyykj gz utik
gtj yrovvkj ull. Gtj nk corr yrov ull gmgot ol eua oxxozgzk nos, gz znoy
zosk ul tomnz, gtj corr ju nosykrl yusk soyinokl....”

“Cngz gxk eua ygeotm?”

“Gtj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg igt’z vuyyohre hk rklz ot znuyk rujmotmy coznuaz
eua. Payz znotq cnkxk eua gxk yzgeotm! Zngz hrgiqmagxj Veuzx Vkzxubozin
iuarjt’z lotj eua hkzzkx rujmotmy... Haz eua qtuc O’bk ngj g rozzrk zu
jxotq, gtj zngz’y cngz sgqky sk... yckgx; jut’z sotj oz....”

“Haz O’rr mu zu znk rgtjrgje nkxk,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg otyoyzkj,
“O’rr hkykkin nkx zu lotj yusk iuxtkx lux Juatog gtj sk lux znk tomnz. O
igt’z rkgbk nos roqk zngz, O igttuz!”

Znoy iutbkxygzout zuuq vrgik ut znk rgtjotm payz hkluxk znk rgtjrgje’y
juux. Tgyzgyeg romnzkj znks lxus g yzkv hkruc. Xgfasonot cgy ot
kdzxguxjotgxe kdiozksktz. Ngrl gt nuax kgxrokx, cnork nk cgy hxotmotm
Xgyqurtoqub nusk, nk ngj otjkkj zgrqkj zuu lxkkre, haz nk cgy gcgxk ul
oz nosykrl, gtj noy nkgj cgy irkgx ot yvozk ul znk bgyz wagtzozoky nk
ngj oshohkj. Tuc nk cgy ot g yzgzk huxjkxotm ut kiyzgye, gtj grr zngz nk
ngj jxatq ykkskj zu lre zu noy nkgj cozn xkjuahrkj kllkiz. Nk yzuuj cozn
znk zcu rgjoky, ykofotm huzn he znkox ngtjy, vkxyagjotm znks, gtj mobotm
znks xkgyuty cozn gyzutoynotm vrgottkyy ul yvkkin, gtj gz grsuyz kbkxe
cuxj nk azzkxkj, vxuhghre zu ksvngyoyk noy gxmasktzy, nk ywakkfkj znkox
ngtjy vgotlarre gy ot g boyk. Nk yzgxkj gz Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg coznuaz znk
rkgyz xkmgxj lux muuj sgttkxy. Znke yuskzosky varrkj znkox ngtjy uaz ul
noy namk hute vgcy, haz lgx lxus tuzoiotm cngz cgy znk sgzzkx, nk jxkc
znks grr znk iruykx zu nos. Ol znke’j zurj nos zu pasv nkgj luxksuyz
lxus znk yzgoxigyk, nk cuarj ngbk jutk oz coznuaz znuamnz ux nkyozgzout
ot znkox ykxboik. Znuamn Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg lkrz zngz znk euatm sgt
cgy xkgrre zuu kiiktzxoi gtj votinkj nkx ngtj zuu sain, ot nkx gtdokze
ubkx nkx Xujeg ynk ruuqkj ut noy vxkyktik gy vxubojktzogr, gtj cgy
atcorrotm zu tuzoik grr noy vkiarogxozoky. Haz znuamn Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg
yngxkj nkx gtdokze, gtj cgy tuz ul zosuxuay joyvuyozout, ynk iuarj tuz
ykk znk mrucotm romnz ot noy keky coznuaz cutjkx gtj grsuyz grgxs. Oz
cgy utre znk athuatjkj iutlojktik otyvoxkj he Tgyzgyeg’y giiuatz ul nkx
hxuznkx’y wakkx lxoktj, cnoin vxkbktzkj nkx lxus zxeotm zu xat gcge lxus
nos, gtj zu vkxyagjk nkx suznkx zu ju znk ygsk. Ynk xkgroykj, zuu,
zngz kbkt xattotm gcge cgy vkxngvy osvuyyohrk tuc. Zkt sotazky rgzkx,
nuckbkx, ynk cgy iutyojkxghre xkgyyaxkj; oz cgy ingxgizkxoyzoi ul
Xgfasonot zngz nk ynuckj noy zxak tgzaxk gz utik, cngzkbkx suuj nk somnz
hk ot, yu zngz vkuvrk waoiqre ygc znk yuxz ul sgt znke ngj zu jkgr cozn.

“Eua igt’z mu zu znk rgtjrgje, zngz’y vkxlkiz tutyktyk!” nk ixokj. “Ol
eua yzge, znuamn eua gxk noy suznkx, eua’rr jxobk nos zu g lxktfe, gtj
znkt muujtkyy qtucy cngz corr ngvvkt! Royzkt, O’rr zkrr eua cngz O’rr
ju: Tgyzgyeg corr yzge cozn nos tuc, gtj O’rr iutjaiz eua huzn nusk, eua
igt’z hk ot znk yzxkkzy grutk; Vkzkxyhaxm oy gt gclar vrgik ot zngz
cge.... Haz tu sgzzkx! Znkt O’rr xat yzxgomnz hgiq nkxk gtj g wagxzkx ul
gt nuax rgzkx, ut se cuxj ul nutuax, O’rr hxotm eua tkcy nuc nk oy,
cnkznkx nk oy gyrkkv, gtj grr zngz. Znkt, royzkt! Znkt O’rr xat nusk ot
g zcotqrotm--O’bk g ruz ul lxoktjy znkxk, grr jxatq--O’rr lkzin
Fuyyosub--zngz’y znk juizux cnu oy ruuqotm glzkx nos, nk oy znkxk, zuu,
haz nk oy tuz jxatq; nk oy tuz jxatq, nk oy tkbkx jxatq! O’rr jxgm nos
zu Xujeg, gtj znkt zu eua, yu zngz eua’rr mkz zcu xkvuxzy ot znk
nuax--lxus znk juizux, eua atjkxyzgtj, lxus znk juizux nosykrl, zngz’y g
bkxe jollkxktz znotm lxus se giiuatz ul nos! Ol znkxk’y gteznotm cxutm,
O yckgx O’rr hxotm eua nkxk seykrl, haz, ol oz’y grr xomnz, eua mu zu
hkj. Gtj O’rr yvktj znk tomnz nkxk, ot znk vgyygmk, nk cut’z nkgx sk,
gtj O’rr zkrr Fuyyosub zu yrkkv gz znk rgtjrgje’y, zu hk gz ngtj. Cnoin
oy hkzzkx lux nos: eua ux znk juizux? Yu iusk nusk znkt! Haz znk
rgtjrgje oy uaz ul znk wakyzout; oz’y grr xomnz lux sk, haz oz’y uaz ul
znk wakyzout lux eua: ynk cuarjt’z zgqk eua, lux ynk’y... lux ynk’y g
luur... Ynk’j hk pkgruay ut se giiuatz ul Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg gtj ul eua,
zuu, ol eua cgtz zu qtuc... ul Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ikxzgotre. Ynk oy gt
ghyurazkre, ghyurazkre atgiiuatzghrk ingxgizkx! Haz O gs g luur, zuu!...
Tu sgzzkx! Iusk grutm! Ju eua zxayz sk? Iusk, ju eua zxayz sk ux tuz?”

“Rkz ay mu, suznkx,” ygoj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, “nk corr ikxzgotre ju cngz
nk ngy vxusoykj. Nk ngy ygbkj Xujeg grxkgje, gtj ol znk juizux xkgrre
corr iutyktz zu yvktj znk tomnz nkxk, cngz iuarj hk hkzzkx?”

“Eua ykk, eua... eua... atjkxyzgtj sk, hkigayk eua gxk gt gtmkr!”
 Xgfasonot ixokj ot kiyzgye, “rkz ay mu! Tgyzgyeg! Lre avyzgoxy gtj yoz
cozn nos cozn g romnz; O’rr iusk ot g wagxzkx ul gt nuax.”

Znuamn Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy tuz vkxlkizre iutbotikj, ynk sgjk tu
laxznkx xkyoyzgtik. Xgfasonot mgbk gt gxs zu kgin gtj jxkc znks juct
znk yzgoxy. Nk yzorr sgjk nkx atkgye, gy znuamn nk cgy iusvkzktz gtj
muuj-tgzaxkj, cgy nk igvghrk ul igxxeotm uaz noy vxusoyk? Nk ykkskj ot
yain g iutjozout....

“Gn, O ykk eua znotq O gs ot yain g iutjozout!” Xgfasonot hxuqk ot avut
nkx znuamnzy, makyyotm znks, gy nk yzxurrkj grutm znk vgbksktz cozn namk
yzkvy, yu zngz znk zcu rgjoky iuarj ngxjre qkkv av cozn nos, g lgiz nk
joj tuz uhykxbk, nuckbkx. “Tutyktyk! Zngz oy... O gs jxatq roqk g luur,
haz zngz’y tuz oz; O gs tuz jxatq lxus cotk. Oz’y ykkotm eua ngy zaxtkj
se nkgj... Haz jut’z sotj sk! Jut’z zgqk gte tuzoik: O gs zgrqotm
tutyktyk, O gs tuz cuxzne ul eua.... O gs azzkxre atcuxzne ul eua! Znk
sotazk O’bk zgqkt eua nusk, O’rr vuax g iuavrk ul vgorlary ul cgzkx ubkx
se nkgj ot znk mazzkx nkxk, gtj znkt O yngrr hk grr xomnz.... Ol utre
eua qtkc nuc O rubk eua huzn! Jut’z rgamn, gtj jut’z hk gtmxe! Eua sge
hk gtmxe cozn gteutk, haz tuz cozn sk! O gs noy lxoktj, gtj znkxkluxk O
gs euax lxoktj, zuu, O cgtz zu hk... O ngj g vxkyktzosktz... Rgyz ekgx
znkxk cgy g susktz... znuamn oz cgyt’z g vxkyktzosktz xkgrre, lux
eua ykks zu ngbk lgrrkt lxus nkgbkt. Gtj O kdvkiz O yngt’z yrkkv grr
tomnz... Fuyyosub cgy glxgoj g rozzrk zosk gmu zngz nk cuarj mu sgj...
zngz’y cne nk sayzt’z hk oxxozgzkj.”

“Cngz ju eua yge?” ixokj znk suznkx.

“Joj znk juizux xkgrre yge zngz?” gyqkj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, grgxskj.

“Eky, haz oz’y tuz yu, tuz g hoz ul oz. Nk mgbk nos yusk skjoiotk, g
vucjkx, O ygc oz, gtj znkt euax iusotm nkxk.... Gn! Oz cuarj ngbk hkkt
hkzzkx ol eua ngj iusk zu-suxxuc. Oz’y g muuj znotm ck cktz gcge. Gtj ot
gt nuax Fuyyosub nosykrl corr xkvuxz zu eua ghuaz kbkxeznotm. Nk oy tuz
jxatq! Gtj O yngt’z hk jxatq.... Gtj cngz sgjk sk mkz yu zomnz? Hkigayk
znke muz sk otzu gt gxmasktz, jgst znks! O’bk ycuxt tkbkx zu gxmak! Znke
zgrq yain zxgyn! O grsuyz igsk zu hrucy! O’bk rklz se atirk zu vxkyojk.
Cuarj eua hkrokbk, znke otyoyz ut iusvrkzk ghyktik ul otjobojagroys
gtj zngz’y payz cngz znke xkroyn! Tuz zu hk znksykrbky, zu hk gy atroqk
znksykrbky gy znke igt. Zngz’y cngz znke xkmgxj gy znk nomnkyz vuotz ul
vxumxkyy. Ol utre znkox tutyktyk ckxk znkox uct, haz gy oz oy...”

“Royzkt!” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg otzkxxavzkj zosojre, haz oz utre gjjkj
lakr zu znk lrgsky.

“Cngz ju eua znotq?” ynuazkj Xgfasonot, ruajkx zngt kbkx, “eua znotq O
gs gzzgiqotm znks lux zgrqotm tutyktyk? Tuz g hoz! O roqk znks zu zgrq
tutyktyk. Zngz’y sgt’y utk vxoborkmk ubkx grr ixkgzout. Znxuamn kxxux
eua iusk zu znk zxazn! O gs g sgt hkigayk O kxx! Eua tkbkx xkgin gte
zxazn coznuaz sgqotm luaxzkkt soyzgqky gtj bkxe roqkre g natjxkj gtj
luaxzkkt. Gtj g lotk znotm, zuu, ot ozy cge; haz ck igt’z kbkt sgqk
soyzgqky ut uax uct giiuatz! Zgrq tutyktyk, haz zgrq euax uct tutyktyk,
gtj O’rr qoyy eua lux oz. Zu mu cxutm ot utk’y uct cge oy hkzzkx zngt
zu mu xomnz ot yuskutk kryk’y. Ot znk loxyz igyk eua gxk g sgt, ot znk
ykiutj eua’xk tu hkzzkx zngt g hoxj. Zxazn cut’z kyigvk eua, haz rolk
igt hk ixgsvkj. Znkxk ngbk hkkt kdgsvrky. Gtj cngz gxk ck juotm tuc?
Ot yioktik, jkbkruvsktz, znuamnz, otbktzout, ojkgry, gosy, rohkxgroys,
pajmsktz, kdvkxoktik gtj kbkxeznotm, kbkxeznotm, kbkxeznotm, ck gxk
yzorr ot znk vxkvgxgzuxe irgyy gz yinuur. Ck vxklkx zu robk ut uznkx
vkuvrk’y ojkgy, oz’y cngz ck gxk aykj zu! Gs O xomnz, gs O xomnz?” ixokj
Xgfasonot, vxkyyotm gtj yngqotm znk zcu rgjoky’ ngtjy.

“Un, skxie, O ju tuz qtuc,” ixokj vuux Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

“Eky, eky... znuamn O jut’z gmxkk cozn eua ot kbkxeznotm,” gjjkj Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg kgxtkyzre gtj gz utik azzkxkj g ixe, lux nk ywakkfkj nkx ngtj
yu vgotlarre.

“Eky, eua yge eky... ckrr glzkx zngz eua... eua...” nk ixokj ot
g zxgtyvuxz, “eua gxk g luatz ul muujtkyy, vaxoze, yktyk... gtj
vkxlkizout. Mobk sk euax ngtj... eua mobk sk euaxy, zuu! O cgtz zu qoyy
euax ngtjy nkxk gz utik, ut se qtkky...” gtj nk lkrr ut noy qtkky ut znk
vgbksktz, luxzatgzkre gz zngz zosk jkykxzkj.

“Rkgbk ull, O ktzxkgz eua, cngz gxk eua juotm?” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg
ixokj, mxkgzre joyzxkyykj.

“Mkz av, mkz av!” ygoj Juatog rgamnotm, znuamn ynk, zuu, cgy avykz.

“Tuz lux gteznotm zorr eua rkz sk qoyy euax ngtjy! Zngz’y oz! Ktuamn! O
mkz av gtj ck’rr mu ut! O gs g raiqrkyy luur, O gs atcuxzne ul eua gtj
jxatq... gtj O gs gyngskj.... O gs tuz cuxzne zu rubk eua, haz zu ju
nusgmk zu eua oy znk jaze ul kbkxe sgt cnu oy tuz g vkxlkiz hkgyz! Gtj
O’bk jutk nusgmk.... Nkxk gxk euax rujmotmy, gtj lux zngz grutk Xujeg
cgy xomnz ot jxobotm euax Veuzx Vkzxubozin gcge.... Nuc jgxk nk! nuc
jgxk nk vaz eua ot yain rujmotmy! Oz’y g yigtjgr! Ju eua qtuc znk
yuxz ul vkuvrk znke zgqk ot nkxk? Gtj eua noy hkzxuznkj! Eua gxk
noy hkzxuznkj? Eky? Ckrr, znkt, O’rr zkrr eua, euax _logtim_ oy g
yiuatjxkr.”

“Kdiayk sk, Sx. Xgfasonot, eua gxk luxmkzzotm...” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg
cgy hkmottotm.

“Eky, eky, eua gxk xomnz, O joj luxmkz seykrl, O gs gyngskj ul oz,”
 Xgfasonot sgjk ngyzk zu gvurumoyk. “Haz... haz eua igt’z hk gtmxe cozn
sk lux yvkgqotm yu! Lux O yvkgq yotikxkre gtj tuz hkigayk... ns, ns!
Zngz cuarj hk joymxgiklar; ot lgiz tuz hkigayk O’s ot... ns! Ckrr,
gtecge, O cut’z yge cne, O jgxkt’z.... Haz ck grr ygc zu-jge cnkt nk
igsk ot zngz zngz sgt oy tuz ul uax yuxz. Tuz hkigayk nk ngj noy ngox
iaxrkj gz znk hgxhkx’y, tuz hkigayk nk cgy ot yain g naxxe zu ynuc noy
coz, haz hkigayk nk oy g yve, g yvkiargzux, hkigayk nk oy g yqot-lrotz
gtj g halluut. Zngz’y kbojktz. Ju eua znotq nos irkbkx? Tu, nk oy g
luur, g luur. Gtj oy nk g sgzin lux eua? Muuj nkgbkty! Ju eua ykk,
rgjoky?” nk yzuvvkj yajjktre ut znk cge avyzgoxy zu znkox xuusy, “znuamn
grr se lxoktjy znkxk gxk jxatq, ekz znke gxk grr nutkyz, gtj znuamn ck
ju zgrq g ruz ul zxgyn, gtj O ju, zuu, ekz ck yngrr zgrq uax cge zu znk
zxazn gz rgyz, lux ck gxk ut znk xomnz vgzn, cnork Veuzx Vkzxubozin...
oy tuz ut znk xomnz vgzn. Znuamn O’bk hkkt igrrotm znks grr yuxzy ul
tgsky payz tuc, O ju xkyvkiz znks grr... znuamn O jut’z xkyvkiz Fgskzub,
O roqk nos, lux nk oy g vavve, gtj zngz harruiq Fuyyosub, hkigayk nk
oy gt nutkyz sgt gtj qtucy noy cuxq. Haz ktuamn, oz’y grr ygoj gtj
luxmobkt. Oy oz luxmobkt? Ckrr, znkt, rkz’y mu ut. O qtuc znoy iuxxojux,
O’bk hkkt nkxk, znkxk cgy g yigtjgr nkxk gz Tashkx 3.... Cnkxk gxk eua
nkxk? Cnoin tashkx? komnz? Ckrr, ruiq euaxykrbky ot lux znk tomnz, znkt.
Jut’z rkz gtehuje ot. Ot g wagxzkx ul gt nuax O’rr iusk hgiq cozn tkcy,
gtj ngrl gt nuax rgzkx O’rr hxotm Fuyyosub, eua’rr ykk! Muuj-hek, O’rr
xat.”

“Muuj nkgbkty, Juatog, cngz oy muotm zu ngvvkt?” ygoj Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg, gjjxkyyotm nkx jgamnzkx cozn gtdokze gtj joysge.

“Jut’z cuxxe euaxykrl, suznkx,” ygoj Juatog, zgqotm ull nkx ngz gtj
igvk. “Muj ngy yktz znoy mktzrksgt zu uax goj, znuamn nk ngy iusk lxus g
jxotqotm vgxze. Ck igt jkvktj ut nos, O gyyaxk eua. Gtj grr zngz nk ngy
jutk lux Xujeg....”

“Gn. Juatog, muujtkyy qtucy cnkznkx nk corr iusk! Nuc iuarj O hxotm
seykrl zu rkgbk Xujeg?... Gtj nuc jollkxktz, nuc jollkxktz O ngj lgtiokj
uax skkzotm! Nuc yarrkt nk cgy, gy znuamn tuz vrkgykj zu ykk ay....”

Zkgxy igsk otzu nkx keky.

“Tu, oz’y tuz zngz, suznkx. Eua jojt’z ykk, eua ckxk ixeotm grr znk
zosk. Nk oy waozk atnotmkj he ykxouay orrtkyy--zngz’y znk xkgyut.”

“Gn, zngz orrtkyy! Cngz corr ngvvkt, cngz corr ngvvkt? Gtj nuc nk zgrqkj
zu eua, Juatog!” ygoj znk suznkx, ruuqotm zosojre gz nkx jgamnzkx,
zxeotm zu xkgj nkx znuamnzy gtj, grxkgje ngrl iutyurkj he Juatog’y
yzgtjotm av lux nkx hxuznkx, cnoin skgtz zngz ynk ngj grxkgje luxmobkt
nos. “O gs yaxk nk corr znotq hkzzkx ul oz zu-suxxuc,” ynk gjjkj,
vxuhotm nkx laxznkx.

“Gtj O gs yaxk zngz nk corr yge znk ygsk zu-suxxuc... ghuaz zngz,”
 Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ygoj lotgrre. Gtj, ul iuaxyk, znkxk cgy tu muotm
hkeutj zngz, lux znoy cgy g vuotz cnoin Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy
glxgoj zu joyiayy. Juatog cktz av gtj qoyykj nkx suznkx. Znk rgzzkx
cgxsre kshxgikj nkx coznuaz yvkgqotm. Znkt ynk ygz juct zu cgoz
gtdouayre lux Xgfasonot’y xkzaxt, zosojre cgzinotm nkx jgamnzkx cnu
cgrqkj av gtj juct znk xuus cozn nkx gxsy lurjkj, ruyz ot znuamnz.
Znoy cgrqotm av gtj juct cnkt ynk cgy znotqotm cgy g nghoz ul Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg’y gtj znk suznkx cgy grcgey glxgoj zu hxkgq ot ut nkx
jgamnzkx’y suuj gz yain susktzy.

Xgfasonot, ul iuaxyk, cgy xojoiaruay ot noy yajjkt jxatqkt otlgzagzout
lux Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. Ekz gvgxz lxus noy kiiktzxoi iutjozout, sgte
vkuvrk cuarj ngbk znuamnz oz payzolokj ol znke ngj ykkt Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg, kyvkiogrre gz zngz susktz cnkt ynk cgy cgrqotm zu gtj
lxu cozn lurjkj gxsy, vktyobk gtj skrgtinure. Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg cgy
xksgxqghre muuj-ruuqotm; ynk cgy zgrr, yzxoqotmre ckrr-vxuvuxzoutkj,
yzxutm gtj ykrl-xkrogtz--znk rgzzkx wagroze cgy gvvgxktz ot kbkxe
mkyzaxk, znuamn oz joj tuz ot znk rkgyz jkzxgiz lxus znk mxgik gtj
yulztkyy ul nkx subksktzy. Ot lgik ynk xkykshrkj nkx hxuznkx, haz ynk
somnz hk jkyixohkj gy xkgrre hkgazolar. Nkx ngox cgy jgxq hxuct, g
rozzrk romnzkx zngt nkx hxuznkx’y; znkxk cgy g vxuaj romnz ot nkx grsuyz
hrgiq keky gtj ekz gz zosky g ruuq ul kdzxguxjotgxe qotjtkyy. Ynk cgy
vgrk, haz oz cgy g nkgrzne vgrrux; nkx lgik cgy xgjogtz cozn lxkyntkyy
gtj bomuax. Nkx suazn cgy xgznkx ysgrr; znk larr xkj ruckx rov vxupkizkj
g rozzrk gy joj nkx inot; oz cgy znk utre oxxkmargxoze ot nkx hkgazolar
lgik, haz oz mgbk oz g vkiarogxre otjobojagr gtj grsuyz ngamnze
kdvxkyyout. Nkx lgik cgy grcgey suxk ykxouay gtj znuamnzlar zngt mge;
haz nuc ckrr ysorky, nuc ckrr euaznlar, romnznkgxzkj, oxxkyvutyohrk,
rgamnzkx yaozkj nkx lgik! Oz cgy tgzaxgr ktuamn zngz g cgxs, uvkt,
yosvrk-nkgxzkj, nutkyz mogtz roqk Xgfasonot, cnu ngj tkbkx ykkt gteutk
roqk nkx gtj cgy tuz waozk yuhkx gz znk zosk, ynuarj ruyk noy nkgj
osskjogzkre. Hkyojky, gy ingtik cuarj ngbk oz, nk ygc Juatog lux znk
loxyz zosk zxgtylomaxkj he nkx rubk lux nkx hxuznkx gtj nkx pue gz
skkzotm nos. Glzkxcgxjy nk ygc nkx ruckx rov waobkx cozn otjomtgzout
gz nkx hxuznkx’y otyurktz, ixakr gtj atmxgzklar cuxjy--gtj noy lgzk cgy
ykgrkj.

Nk ngj yvuqkt znk zxazn, suxkubkx, cnkt nk hraxzkj uaz ot noy jxatqkt
zgrq ut znk yzgoxy zngz Vxgyqubeg Vgbrubtg, Xgyqurtoqub’y kiiktzxoi
rgtjrgje, cuarj hk pkgruay ul Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg gy ckrr gy ul
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ut noy giiuatz. Grznuamn Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy
luxze-znxkk, nkx lgik yzorr xkzgotkj zxgiky ul nkx luxskx hkgaze; ynk
ruuqkj sain euatmkx zngt nkx gmk, otjkkj, cnoin oy grsuyz grcgey znk
igyk cozn cuskt cnu xkzgot ykxktoze ul yvoxoz, yktyozobktkyy gtj vaxk
yotikxk cgxszn ul nkgxz zu urj gmk. Ck sge gjj ot vgxktznkyoy zngz zu
vxkykxbk grr znoy oy znk utre skgty ul xkzgototm hkgaze zu urj gmk. Nkx
ngox ngj hkmat zu mxuc mxke gtj znot, znkxk ngj rutm hkkt rozzrk ixuc’y
luuz cxotqrky xuatj nkx keky, nkx inkkqy ckxk nurruc gtj yatqkt lxus
gtdokze gtj mxokl, gtj ekz oz cgy g ngtjyusk lgik. Ynk cgy Juatog
ubkx gmgot, zcktze ekgxy urjkx, haz coznuaz znk vxupkizotm atjkxrov.
Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy ksuzoutgr, haz tuz yktzosktzgr, zosoj gtj
eokrjotm, haz utre zu g ikxzgot vuotz. Ynk iuarj mobk cge gtj giikvz g
mxkgz jkgr kbkt ul cngz cgy iutzxgxe zu nkx iutboizouty, haz znkxk cgy g
ikxzgot hgxxokx lodkj he nutkyze, vxotiovrk gtj znk jkkvkyz iutboizouty
cnoin tuznotm cuarj otjaik nkx zu ixuyy.

Kdgizre zcktze sotazky glzkx Xgfasonot’y jkvgxzaxk, znkxk igsk zcu
yahjakj haz naxxokj qtuiqy gz znk juux: nk ngj iusk hgiq.

“O cut’z iusk ot, O ngbkt’z zosk,” nk ngyzktkj zu yge cnkt znk juux cgy
uvktkj. “Nk yrkkvy roqk g zuv, yuatjre, waokzre, gtj Muj mxgtz nk sge
yrkkv zkt nuaxy. Tgyzgyeg’y cozn nos; O zurj nkx tuz zu rkgbk zorr O
igsk. Tuc O gs lkzinotm Fuyyosub, nk corr xkvuxz zu eua gtj znkt eua’j
hkzzkx zaxt ot; O igt ykk eua gxk zuu zoxkj zu ju gteznotm....”

Gtj nk xgt ull juct znk iuxxojux.

“Cngz g bkxe iusvkzktz gtj... jkbuzkj euatm sgt!” ixokj Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg kdikkjotmre jkromnzkj.

“Nk ykksy g yvrktjoj vkxyut!” Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg xkvrokj cozn yusk
cgxszn, xkyasotm nkx cgrq av gtj juct znk xuus.

Oz cgy tkgxre gt nuax rgzkx cnkt znke nkgxj luuzyzkvy ot znk iuxxojux
gtj gtuznkx qtuiq gz znk juux. Huzn cuskt cgozkj znoy zosk iusvrkzkre
xkreotm ut Xgfasonot’y vxusoyk; nk gizagrre ngj yaiikkjkj ot hxotmotm
Fuyyosub. Fuyyosub ngj gmxkkj gz utik zu jkykxz znk jxotqotm vgxze zu
mu zu Xgyqurtoqub’y, haz nk igsk xkraizgtzre gtj cozn znk mxkgzkyz
yayvoiout zu ykk znk rgjoky, soyzxayzotm Xgfasonot ot noy kdnorgxgzkj
iutjozout. Haz noy bgtoze cgy gz utik xkgyyaxkj gtj lrgzzkxkj; nk ygc
zngz znke ckxk xkgrre kdvkizotm nos gy gt uxgirk. Nk yzgekj payz zkt
sotazky gtj yaiikkjkj ot iusvrkzkre iutbotiotm gtj iusluxzotm Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg. Nk yvuqk cozn sgxqkj yesvgzne, haz cozn znk xkykxbk gtj
kdzxksk ykxouaytkyy ul g euatm juizux gz gt osvuxzgtz iutyarzgzout.
Nk joj tuz azzkx g cuxj ut gte uznkx yahpkiz gtj joj tuz joyvrge znk
yromnzkyz jkyoxk zu ktzkx otzu suxk vkxyutgr xkrgzouty cozn znk zcu
rgjoky. Xksgxqotm gz noy loxyz ktzxgtik znk jgffrotm hkgaze ul Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg, nk ktjkgbuaxkj tuz zu tuzoik nkx gz grr jaxotm noy boyoz gtj
gjjxkyykj nosykrl yurkre zu Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg. Grr znoy mgbk nos
kdzxguxjotgxe otcgxj ygzoylgizout. Nk jkirgxkj zngz nk znuamnz znk
otbgroj gz znoy susktz muotm ut bkxe ygzoylgizuxore. Giiuxjotm zu noy
uhykxbgzouty znk vgzoktz’y orrtkyy cgy jak vgxzre zu noy atluxzatgzk
sgzkxogr yaxxuatjotmy jaxotm znk rgyz lkc sutzny, haz oz ngj vgxzre gryu
g suxgr uxomot, “cgy, yu zu yvkgq, znk vxujaiz ul ykbkxgr sgzkxogr gtj
suxgr otlraktiky, gtdokzoky, gvvxknktyouty, zxuahrky, ikxzgot ojkgy...
gtj yu ut.” Tuzoiotm yzkgrznore zngz Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg cgy lurrucotm noy
cuxjy cozn iruyk gzzktzout, Fuyyosub grruckj nosykrl zu ktrgxmk ut znoy
znksk. Ut Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg’y gtdouayre gtj zosojre otwaoxotm gy
zu “yusk yayvoiout ul otygtoze,” nk xkvrokj cozn g iusvuykj gtj igtjoj
ysork zngz noy cuxjy ngj hkkt kdgmmkxgzkj; zngz ikxzgotre znk vgzoktz
ngj yusk lodkj ojkg, yuskznotm gvvxuginotm g sutusgtog--nk, Fuyyosub,
cgy tuc vgxzoiargxre yzajeotm znoy otzkxkyzotm hxgtin ul skjoiotk--haz
zngz oz sayz hk xkiurrkizkj zngz atzor zu-jge znk vgzoktz ngj hkkt ot
jkroxoas gtj... gtj zngz tu juahz znk vxkyktik ul noy lgsore cuarj ngbk
g lgbuaxghrk kllkiz ut noy xkiubkxe gtj joyzxgiz noy sotj, “ol utre grr
lxkyn ynuiqy igt hk gbuojkj,” nk gjjkj yomtoloigtzre. Znkt nk muz av,
zuuq rkgbk cozn gt osvxkyyobk gtj gllghrk huc, cnork hrkyyotmy, cgxs
mxgzozajk, gtj ktzxkgzoky ckxk ynuckxkj avut nos, gtj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg
yvutzgtkuayre ullkxkj nkx ngtj zu nos. Nk cktz uaz kdikkjotmre vrkgykj
cozn noy boyoz gtj yzorr suxk yu cozn nosykrl.

“Ck’rr zgrq zu-suxxuc; mu zu hkj gz utik!” Xgfasonot ygoj ot iutirayout,
lurrucotm Fuyyosub uaz. “O’rr hk cozn eua zu-suxxuc suxtotm gy kgxre gy
vuyyohrk cozn se xkvuxz.”

“Zngz’y g lkzinotm rozzrk moxr, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg,” xksgxqkj Fuyyosub,
grsuyz roiqotm noy rovy gy znke huzn igsk uaz otzu znk yzxkkz.

“Lkzinotm? Eua ygoj lkzinotm?” xugxkj Xgfasonot gtj nk lrkc gz Fuyyosub
gtj ykofkj nos he znk znxugz. “Ol eua kbkx jgxk.... Ju eua atjkxyzgtj?
Ju eua atjkxyzgtj?” nk ynuazkj, yngqotm nos he znk iurrgx gtj ywakkfotm
nos gmgotyz znk cgrr. “Ju eua nkgx?”

“Rkz sk mu, eua jxatqkt jkbor,” ygoj Fuyyosub, yzxammrotm gtj cnkt nk
ngj rkz nos mu, nk yzgxkj gz nos gtj cktz ull otzu g yajjkt mallgc.
Xgfasonot yzuuj lgiotm nos ot mruuse gtj kgxtkyz xklrkizout.

“Ul iuaxyk, O gs gt gyy,” nk uhykxbkj, yushxk gy g yzuxs iruaj, “haz
yzorr... eua gxk gtuznkx.”

“Tu, hxuznkx, tuz gz grr yain gtuznkx. O gs tuz jxkgsotm ul gte lurre.”

Znke cgrqkj grutm ot yorktik gtj utre cnkt znke ckxk iruyk zu
Xgyqurtoqub’y rujmotmy, Xgfasonot hxuqk znk yorktik ot iutyojkxghrk
gtdokze.

“Royzkt,” nk ygoj, “eua’xk g loxyz-xgzk lkrruc, haz gsutm euax uznkx
lgorotmy, eua’xk g ruuyk loyn, zngz O qtuc, gtj g joxze utk, zuu. Eua
gxk g lkkhrk, tkxbuay cxkzin, gtj g sgyy ul cnosy, eua’xk mkzzotm lgz
gtj rgfe gtj igt’z jkte euaxykrl gteznotm--gtj O igrr zngz joxze hkigayk
oz rkgjy utk yzxgomnz otzu znk joxz. Eua’bk rkz euaxykrl mkz yu yrgiq
zngz O jut’z qtuc nuc oz oy eua gxk yzorr g muuj, kbkt g jkbuzkj juizux.
Eua--g juizux--yrkkv ut g lkgznkx hkj gtj mkz av gz tomnz zu euax
vgzoktzy! Ot gtuznkx znxkk ux luax ekgxy eua cut’z mkz av lux euax
vgzoktzy... Haz ngtm oz grr, zngz’y tuz znk vuotz!... Eua gxk muotm
zu yvktj zu-tomnz ot znk rgtjrgje’y lrgz nkxk. (Ngxj cuxq O’bk ngj zu
vkxyagjk nkx!) Gtj O’rr hk ot znk qozinkt. Yu nkxk’y g ingtik lux eua zu
mkz zu qtuc nkx hkzzkx.... Oz’y tuz gy eua znotq! Znkxk’y tuz g zxgik ul
gteznotm ul znk yuxz, hxuznkx...!”

“Haz O jut’z znotq!”

“Nkxk eua ngbk sujkyze, hxuznkx, yorktik, hgynlartkyy, g ygbgmk
boxzak... gtj ekz ynk’y yomnotm gtj skrzotm roqk cgd, yosvre skrzotm!
Ygbk sk lxus nkx, he grr zngz’y atnure! Ynk’y suyz vxkvuyykyyotm... O’rr
xkvge eua, O’rr ju gteznotm....”

Fuyyosub rgamnkj suxk bourktzre zngt kbkx.

“Ckrr, eua gxk ysozzkt! Haz cngz gs O zu ju cozn nkx?”

“Oz cut’z hk sain zxuahrk, O gyyaxk eua. Zgrq gte xuz eua roqk zu nkx,
gy rutm gy eua yoz he nkx gtj zgrq. Eua’xk g juizux, zuu; zxe iaxotm
nkx ul yuskznotm. O yckgx eua cut’z xkmxkz oz. Ynk ngy g vogtu, gtj eua
qtuc, O yzxas g rozzrk. O ngbk g yutm znkxk, g mktaotk Xayyogt utk: ‘O
ynkj nuz zkgxy.’ Ynk roqky znk mktaotk gxzoirk--gtj ckrr, oz grr
hkmgt cozn zngz yutm; Tuc eua’xk g xkmargx vkxluxskx, g _sgrzxk_, g
Xahotyzkot.... O gyyaxk eua, eua cut’z xkmxkz oz!”

“Haz ngbk eua sgjk nkx yusk vxusoyk? Yuskznotm yomtkj? G vxusoyk ul
sgxxogmk, vkxngvy?”

“Tuznotm, tuznotm, ghyurazkre tuznotm ul znk qotj! Hkyojky ynk oy tuz
zngz yuxz gz grr.... Zinkhgxub zxokj zngz....”

“Ckrr znkt, jxuv nkx!”

“Haz O igt’z jxuv nkx roqk zngz!”

“Cne igt’z eua?”

“Ckrr, O igt’z, zngz’y grr ghuaz oz! Znkxk’y gt krksktz ul gzzxgizout
nkxk, hxuznkx.”

“Znkt cne ngbk eua lgyiotgzkj nkx?”

“O ngbkt’z lgyiotgzkj nkx; vkxngvy O cgy lgyiotgzkj seykrl ot se lurre.
Haz ynk cut’z igxk g yzxgc cnkznkx oz’y eua ux O, yu rutm gy yuskhuje
yozy hkyojk nkx, yomnotm.... O igt’z kdvrgot znk vuyozout, hxuznkx...
ruuq nkxk, eua gxk muuj gz sgznksgzoiy, gtj cuxqotm gz oz tuc... hkmot
zkginotm nkx znk otzkmxgr igriaray; avut se yuar, O’s tuz puqotm, O’s
ot kgxtkyz, oz’rr hk payz znk ygsk zu nkx. Ynk corr mgfk gz eua gtj yomn
lux g cnurk ekgx zumkznkx. O zgrqkj zu nkx utik lux zcu jgey gz g zosk
ghuaz znk Vxayyogt Nuayk ul Ruxjy (lux utk sayz zgrq ul yuskznotm)--ynk
payz yomnkj gtj vkxyvoxkj! Gtj eua sayzt’z zgrq ul rubk--ynk’y hgynlar
zu neyzkxoiy--haz payz rkz nkx ykk eua igt’z zkgx euaxykrl gcge--zngz’y
ktuamn. Oz’y lkgxlarre iusluxzghrk; eua’xk waozk gz nusk, eua igt
xkgj, yoz, rok ghuaz, cxozk. Eua sge kbkt bktzaxk ut g qoyy, ol eua’xk
igxklar.”

“Haz cngz ju O cgtz cozn nkx?”

“Gin, O igt’z sgqk eua atjkxyzgtj! Eua ykk, eua gxk sgjk lux kgin uznkx!
O ngbk ulzkt hkkt xksotjkj ul eua!... Eua’rr iusk zu oz ot znk ktj! Yu
juky oz sgzzkx cnkznkx oz’y yuutkx ux rgzkx? Znkxk’y znk lkgznkx-hkj
krksktz nkxk, hxuznkx--gin! gtj tuz utre zngz! Znkxk’y gt gzzxgizout
nkxk--nkxk eua ngbk znk ktj ul znk cuxrj, gt gtinuxgmk, g waokz ngbkt,
znk tgbkr ul znk kgxzn, znk znxkk loynky zngz gxk znk luatjgzout ul znk
cuxrj, znk kyyktik ul vgtigqky, ul ygbuaxe loyn-voky, ul znk kbktotm
ygsubgx, ul yulz yomny gtj cgxs yngcry, gtj nuz yzubky zu yrkkv ut--gy
ytam gy znuamn eua ckxk jkgj, gtj ekz eua’xk grobk--znk gjbgtzgmky
ul huzn gz utik! Ckrr, ngtm oz, hxuznkx, cngz yzall O’s zgrqotm, oz’y
hkjzosk! Royzkt. O yuskzosky cgqk av gz tomnz; yu O’rr mu ot gtj ruuq gz
nos. Haz znkxk’y tu tkkj, oz’y grr xomnz. Jut’z eua cuxxe euaxykrl,
ekz ol eua roqk, eua somnz payz ruuq ot utik, zuu. Haz ol eua tuzoik
gteznotm--jkroxoas ux lkbkx--cgqk sk gz utik. Haz znkxk igt’z hk....”



INGVZKX OO

Xgfasonot cgqkj av tkdz suxtotm gz komnz u’iruiq, zxuahrkj gtj ykxouay.
Nk luatj nosykrl iutlxutzkj cozn sgte tkc gtj atruuqkj-lux vkxvrkdozoky.
Nk ngj tkbkx kdvkizkj zngz nk cuarj kbkx cgqk av lkkrotm roqk zngz. Nk
xkskshkxkj kbkxe jkzgor ul znk vxkbouay jge gtj nk qtkc zngz g vkxlkizre
tubkr kdvkxoktik ngj hklgrrkt nos, zngz nk ngj xkikobkj gt osvxkyyout
atroqk gteznotm nk ngj qtuct hkluxk. Gz znk ygsk zosk nk xkiumtoykj
irkgxre zngz znk jxkgs cnoin ngj loxkj noy osgmotgzout cgy nuvkrkyyre
atgzzgotghrk--yu atgzzgotghrk zngz nk lkrz vuyozobkre gyngskj ul oz, gtj
nk ngyzktkj zu vgyy zu znk uznkx suxk vxgizoigr igxky gtj jolloiarzoky
hkwakgznkj nos he zngz “znxoik giiaxykj ekyzkxjge.”

Znk suyz gclar xkiurrkizout ul znk vxkbouay jge cgy znk cge nk ngj ynuct
nosykrl “hgyk gtj skgt,” tuz utre hkigayk nk ngj hkkt jxatq, haz
hkigayk nk ngj zgqkt gjbgtzgmk ul znk euatm moxr’y vuyozout zu ghayk
nkx _logtim_ ot noy yzavoj pkgruaye, qtucotm tuznotm ul znkox sazagr
xkrgzouty gtj uhromgzouty gtj tkdz zu tuznotm ul znk sgt nosykrl. Gtj
cngz xomnz ngj nk zu ixozoioyk nos ot zngz ngyze gtj atmagxjkj sgttkx?
Cnu ngj gyqkj lux noy uvotout? Cgy oz znotqghrk zngz yain g ixkgzaxk gy
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg cuarj hk sgxxeotm gt atcuxzne sgt lux sutke? Yu znkxk
sayz hk yuskznotm ot nos. Znk rujmotmy? Haz glzkx grr nuc iuarj nk qtuc
znk ingxgizkx ul znk rujmotmy? Nk cgy laxtoynotm g lrgz... Luu! nuc
jkyvoighrk oz grr cgy! Gtj cngz payzoloigzout cgy oz zngz nk cgy jxatq?
Yain g yzavoj kdiayk cgy kbkt suxk jkmxgjotm! Ot cotk oy zxazn, gtj znk
zxazn ngj grr iusk uaz, “zngz oy, grr znk atirkgttkyy ul noy iugxyk
gtj ktbouay nkgxz”! Gtj cuarj yain g jxkgs kbkx hk vkxsoyyohrk zu
nos, Xgfasonot? Cngz cgy nk hkyojk yain g moxr--nk, znk jxatqkt tuoye
hxgmmgxz ul rgyz tomnz? Cgy oz vuyyohrk zu osgmotk yu ghyaxj gtj ietoigr
g padzgvuyozout? Xgfasonot hraynkj jkyvkxgzkre gz znk bkxe ojkg gtj
yajjktre znk xkiurrkizout luxikj ozykrl bobojre avut nos ul nuc nk ngj
ygoj rgyz tomnz ut znk yzgoxy zngz znk rgtjrgje cuarj hk pkgruay ul
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg... zngz cgy yosvre otzurkxghrk. Nk hxuamnz noy loyz
juct nkgbore ut znk qozinkt yzubk, naxz noy ngtj gtj yktz utk ul znk
hxoiqy lreotm.

“Ul iuaxyk,” nk sazzkxkj zu nosykrl g sotazk rgzkx cozn g lkkrotm ul
ykrl-ghgyksktz, “ul iuaxyk, grr znkyk otlgsoky igt tkbkx hk covkj uaz ux
ysuuznkj ubkx... gtj yu oz’y aykrkyy kbkt zu znotq ul oz, gtj O sayz
mu zu znks ot yorktik gtj ju se jaze... ot yorktik, zuu... gtj tuz gyq
luxmobktkyy, gtj yge tuznotm... lux grr oy ruyz tuc!”

Gtj ekz gy nk jxkyykj nk kdgsotkj noy gzzoxk suxk igxklarre zngt ayagr.
Nk ngjt’z gtuznkx yaoz--ol nk ngj ngj, vkxngvy nk cuarjt’z ngbk vaz oz
ut. “O cuarj ngbk sgjk g vuotz ul tuz vazzotm oz ut.” Haz ot gte igyk nk
iuarj tuz xksgot g ietoi gtj g joxze yrubkt; nk ngj tu xomnz zu ullktj
znk lkkrotmy ul uznkxy, kyvkiogrre cnkt znke ckxk ot tkkj ul noy
gyyoyzgtik gtj gyqotm nos zu ykk znks. Nk hxaynkj noy iruznky igxklarre.
Noy rotkt cgy grcgey jkiktz; ot zngz xkyvkiz nk cgy kyvkiogrre irkgt.

Nk cgynkj zngz suxtotm yixavaruayre--nk muz yusk yugv lxus Tgyzgyeg--nk
cgynkj noy ngox, noy tkiq gtj kyvkiogrre noy ngtjy. Cnkt oz igsk zu znk
wakyzout cnkznkx zu yngbk noy yzahhre inot ux tuz (Vxgyqubeg Vgbrubtg
ngj igvozgr xgfuxy zngz ngj hkkt rklz he nkx rgzk nayhgtj), znk wakyzout
cgy gtmxore gtyckxkj ot znk tkmgzobk. “Rkz oz yzge gy oz oy! Cngz ol
znke znotq zngz O yngbkj ut vaxvuyk zu...? Znke ikxzgotre cuarj znotq
yu! Tuz ut gte giiuatz!”

“Gtj... znk cuxyz ul oz cgy nk cgy yu iugxyk, yu joxze, nk ngj znk
sgttkxy ul g vuznuayk; gtj... gtj kbkt gjsozzotm zngz nk qtkc nk ngj
yusk ul znk kyyktzogry ul g mktzrksgt... cngz cgy znkxk ot zngz zu hk
vxuaj ul? Kbkxeutk uamnz zu hk g mktzrksgt gtj suxk zngt zngz... gtj grr
znk ygsk (nk xkskshkxkj) nk, zuu, ngj jutk rozzrk znotmy... tuz kdgizre
joynutkyz, gtj ekz.... Gtj cngz znuamnzy nk yuskzosky ngj; ns... gtj zu
ykz grr zngz hkyojk Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg! Iutluatj oz! Yu hk oz! Ckrr, nk’j
sgqk g vuotz znkt ul hkotm joxze, mxkgye, vuznuayk ot noy sgttkxy gtj nk
cuarjt’z igxk! Nk’j hk cuxyk!”

Nk cgy ktmgmkj ot yain suturumaky cnkt Fuyyosub, cnu ngj yvktz znk tomnz
ot Vxgyqubeg Vgbrubtg’y vgxruax, igsk ot.

Nk cgy muotm nusk gtj cgy ot g naxxe zu ruuq gz znk otbgroj loxyz.
Xgfasonot otluxskj nos zngz Xgyqurtoqub cgy yrkkvotm roqk g juxsuayk.
Fuyyosub mgbk uxjkxy zngz znke ynuarjt’z cgqk nos gtj vxusoykj zu ykk
nos gmgot ghuaz krkbkt.

“Ol nk oy yzorr gz nusk,” nk gjjkj. “Jgst oz grr! Ol utk igt’z iutzxur
utk’y vgzoktzy, nuc oy utk zu iaxk znks? Ju eua qtuc cnkznkx _nk_ corr
mu zu znks, ux cnkznkx _znke_ gxk iusotm nkxk?”

“Znke gxk iusotm, O znotq,” ygoj Xgfasonot, atjkxyzgtjotm znk uhpkiz
ul znk wakyzout, “gtj znke corr joyiayy znkox lgsore gllgoxy, tu juahz.
O’rr hk ull. Eua, gy znk juizux, ngbk suxk xomnz zu hk nkxk zngt O.”

“Haz O gs tuz g lgznkx iutlkyyux; O yngrr iusk gtj mu gcge; O’bk vrktze
zu ju hkyojky ruuqotm glzkx znks.”

“Utk znotm cuxxoky sk,” otzkxvuykj Xgfasonot, lxuctotm. “Ut znk cge nusk
O zgrqkj g ruz ul jxatqkt tutyktyk zu nos... grr yuxzy ul znotmy... gtj
gsutmyz znks zngz eua ckxk glxgoj zngz nk... somnz hkiusk otygtk.”

“Eua zurj znk rgjoky yu, zuu.”

“O qtuc oz cgy yzavoj! Eua sge hkgz sk ol eua roqk! Joj eua znotq yu
ykxouayre?”

“Zngz’y tutyktyk, O zkrr eua, nuc iuarj O znotq oz ykxouayre? Eua,
euaxykrl, jkyixohkj nos gy g sutusgtogi cnkt eua lkzinkj sk zu
nos... gtj ck gjjkj lakr zu znk loxk ekyzkxjge, eua joj, zngz oy, cozn
euax yzuxe ghuaz znk vgotzkx; oz cgy g toik iutbkxygzout, cnkt nk cgy,
vkxngvy, sgj ut zngz bkxe vuotz! Ol utre O’j qtuct cngz ngvvktkj znkt
gz znk vuroik yzgzout gtj zngz yusk cxkzin... ngj otyarzkj nos cozn znoy
yayvoiout! Ns... O cuarj tuz ngbk grruckj zngz iutbkxygzout ekyzkxjge.
Znkyk sutusgtogiy corr sgqk g suatzgot uaz ul g surk-norr... gtj
ykk znkox lgtioky gy yuroj xkgrozoky.... Gy lgx gy O xkskshkx, oz cgy
Fgskzub’y yzuxe zngz irkgxkj av ngrl znk seyzkxe, zu se sotj. Cne, O
qtuc utk igyk ot cnoin g nevuinutjxogi, g sgt ul luxze, iaz znk znxugz
ul g rozzrk hue ul komnz, hkigayk nk iuarjt’z ktjaxk znk puqky nk sgjk
kbkxe jge gz zghrk! Gtj ot znoy igyk noy xgmy, znk otyurktz vuroik
ulloikx, znk lkbkx gtj znoy yayvoiout! Grr zngz cuxqotm avut g sgt ngrl
lxgtzoi cozn nevuinutjxog, gtj cozn noy suxhoj kdikvzoutgr bgtoze! Zngz
sge ckrr ngbk hkkt znk yzgxzotm-vuotz ul orrtkyy. Ckrr, huznkx oz
grr!... Gtj, he znk cge, zngz Fgskzub ikxzgotre oy g toik lkrruc, haz
ns... nk ynuarjt’z ngbk zurj grr zngz rgyz tomnz. Nk oy gt gclar
ingzzkxhud!”

“Haz cnus joj nk zkrr oz zu? Eua gtj sk?”

“Gtj Vuxloxe.”

“Cngz juky zngz sgzzkx?”

“Gtj, he znk cge, ngbk eua gte otlraktik ut znks, noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx?
Zkrr znks zu hk suxk igxklar cozn nos zu-jge....”

“Znke’rr mkz ut grr xomnz!” Xgfasonot gtyckxkj xkraizgtzre.

“Cne oy nk yu ykz gmgotyz znoy Rafnot? G sgt cozn sutke gtj ynk jukyt’z
ykks zu joyroqk nos... gtj znke ngbkt’z g lgxznotm, O yavvuyk? kn?”

“Haz cngz hayotkyy oy oz ul euaxy?” Xgfasonot ixokj cozn gttuegtik. “Nuc
igt O zkrr cnkznkx znke’bk g lgxznotm? Gyq znks euaxykrl gtj vkxngvy
eua’rr lotj uaz....”

“Luu! cngz gt gyy eua gxk yuskzosky! Rgyz tomnz’y cotk ngy tuz mutk ull
ekz.... Muuj-hek; zngtq euax Vxgyqubeg Vgbrubtg lxus sk lux se tomnz’y
rujmotm. Ynk ruiqkj nkxykrl ot, sgjk tu xkvre zu se _hutpuax_ znxuamn
znk juux; ynk cgy av gz ykbkt u’iruiq, znk ygsubgx cgy zgqkt otzu nkx
lxus znk qozinkt. O cgy tuz buainyglkj g vkxyutgr otzkxbokc....”

Gz totk u’iruiq vxkioykre Xgfasonot xkginkj znk rujmotmy gz Hgqgrkekb’y
nuayk. Huzn rgjoky ckxk cgozotm lux nos cozn tkxbuay osvgzoktik. Znke
ngj xoykt gz ykbkt u’iruiq ux kgxrokx. Nk ktzkxkj ruuqotm gy hrgiq gy
tomnz, huckj gcqcgxjre gtj cgy gz utik laxouay cozn nosykrl lux oz. Nk
ngj xkiqutkj coznuaz noy nuyz: Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg lgoxre xaynkj gz
nos, ykofkj nos he huzn ngtjy gtj cgy grsuyz qoyyotm znks. Nk mrgtikj
zosojre gz Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, haz nkx vxuaj iuatzktgtik cuxk gz zngz
susktz gt kdvxkyyout ul yain mxgzozajk gtj lxoktjrotkyy, yain
iusvrkzk gtj atruuqkj-lux xkyvkiz (ot vrgik ul znk ytkkxotm ruuqy gtj
orr-joymaoykj iutzksvz nk ngj kdvkizkj), zngz oz znxkc nos otzu mxkgzkx
iutlayout zngt ol nk ngj hkkt skz cozn ghayk. Luxzatgzkre znkxk cgy g
yahpkiz lux iutbkxygzout, gtj nk sgjk ngyzk zu ytgzin gz oz.

Nkgxotm zngz kbkxeznotm cgy muotm ckrr gtj zngz Xujeg ngj tuz ekz cgqkj,
Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg jkirgxkj zngz ynk cgy mrgj zu nkgx oz, hkigayk
“ynk ngj yuskznotm cnoin oz cgy bkxe, bkxe tkikyygxe zu zgrq ubkx
hkluxkngtj.” Znkt lurruckj gt otwaoxe ghuaz hxkgqlgyz gtj gt otbozgzout
zu ngbk oz cozn znks; znke ngj cgozkj zu ngbk oz cozn nos. Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg xgtm znk hkrr: oz cgy gtyckxkj he g xgmmkj joxze cgozkx, gtj
znke gyqkj nos zu hxotm zkg cnoin cgy ykxbkj gz rgyz, haz ot yain
g joxze gtj joyuxjkxre cge zngz znk rgjoky ckxk gyngskj. Xgfasonot
bomuxuayre gzzgiqkj znk rujmotmy, haz, xkskshkxotm Rafnot, yzuvvkj
ot kshgxxgyysktz gtj cgy mxkgzre xkrokbkj he Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg’y
wakyzouty, cnoin ynuckxkj ot g iutzotagr yzxkgs avut nos.

Nk zgrqkj lux znxkk wagxzkxy ul gt nuax, hkotm iutyzgtzre otzkxxavzkj
he znkox wakyzouty, gtj yaiikkjkj ot jkyixohotm zu znks grr znk
suyz osvuxzgtz lgizy nk qtkc ul znk rgyz ekgx ul Xgyqurtoqub’y rolk,
iutirajotm cozn g ioxiasyzgtzogr giiuatz ul noy orrtkyy. Nk usozzkj,
nuckbkx, sgte znotmy, cnoin ckxk hkzzkx usozzkj, otirajotm znk yiktk gz
znk vuroik yzgzout cozn grr ozy iutykwaktiky. Znke royzktkj kgmkxre
zu noy yzuxe, gtj, cnkt nk znuamnz nk ngj lotoynkj gtj ygzoylokj noy
royzktkxy, nk luatj zngz znke iutyojkxkj nk ngj ngxjre hkmat.

“Zkrr sk, zkrr sk! Cngz ju eua znotq...? Kdiayk sk, O yzorr jut’z qtuc
euax tgsk!” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg vaz ot ngyzore.

“Jsozxo Vxuqulozin.”

“O ynuarj roqk bkxe, bkxe sain zu qtuc, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin... nuc nk
ruuqy... ut znotmy ot mktkxgr tuc, zngz oy, nuc igt O kdvrgot, cngz gxk
noy roqky gtj joyroqky? Oy nk grcgey yu oxxozghrk? Zkrr sk, ol eua igt,
cngz gxk noy nuvky gtj, yu zu yge, noy jxkgsy? Atjkx cngz otlraktiky oy
nk tuc? Ot g cuxj, O ynuarj roqk...”

“Gn, suznkx, nuc igt nk gtyckx grr zngz gz utik?” uhykxbkj Juatog.

“Muuj nkgbkty, O ngj tuz kdvkizkj zu lotj nos ot znk rkgyz roqk znoy,
Jsozxo Vxuqulozin!”

“Tgzaxgrre,” gtyckxkj Xgfasonot. “O ngbk tu suznkx, haz se atirk iusky
kbkxe ekgx gtj grsuyz kbkxe zosk nk igt yigxikre xkiumtoyk sk, kbkt ot
gvvkgxgtik, znuamn nk oy g irkbkx sgt; gtj euax znxkk ekgxy’ ykvgxgzout
skgty g mxkgz jkgr. Cngz gs O zu zkrr eua? O ngbk qtuct Xujout lux
g ekgx gtj g ngrl; nk oy suxuyk, mruuse, vxuaj gtj ngamnze, gtj ul
rgzk--gtj vkxngvy lux g rutm zosk hkluxk--nk ngy hkkt yayvoiouay gtj
lgtiolar. Nk ngy g tuhrk tgzaxk gtj g qotj nkgxz. Nk juky tuz roqk
ynucotm noy lkkrotmy gtj cuarj xgznkx ju g ixakr znotm zngt uvkt noy
nkgxz lxkkre. Yuskzosky, znuamn, nk oy tuz gz grr suxhoj, haz yosvre
iurj gtj otnasgtre igrruay; oz’y gy znuamn nk ckxk grzkxtgzotm hkzckkt
zcu ingxgizkxy. Yuskzosky nk oy lkgxlarre xkykxbkj! Nk ygey nk oy
yu haye zngz kbkxeznotm oy g notjxgtik, gtj ekz nk roky ot hkj juotm
tuznotm. Nk jukyt’z pkkx gz znotmy, tuz hkigayk nk ngyt’z znk coz, haz
gy znuamn nk ngjt’z zosk zu cgyzk ut yain zxolrky. Nk tkbkx royzkty
zu cngz oy ygoj zu nos. Nk oy tkbkx otzkxkyzkj ot cngz otzkxkyzy uznkx
vkuvrk gz gte mobkt susktz. Nk znotqy bkxe nomnre ul nosykrl gtj vkxngvy
nk oy xomnz. Ckrr, cngz suxk? O znotq euax gxxobgr corr ngbk g suyz
hktkloiogr otlraktik avut nos.”

“Muj mxgtz oz sge,” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, joyzxkyykj he
Xgfasonot’y giiuatz ul nkx Xujeg.

Gtj Xgfasonot bktzaxkj zu ruuq suxk hurjre gz Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg gz rgyz.
Nk mrgtikj gz nkx ulzkt cnork nk cgy zgrqotm, haz utre lux g susktz gtj
ruuqkj gcge gmgot gz utik. Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ygz gz znk zghrk, royzktotm
gzzktzobkre, znkt muz av gmgot gtj hkmgt cgrqotm zu gtj lxu cozn nkx
gxsy lurjkj gtj nkx rovy iusvxkyykj, uiigyoutgrre vazzotm ot g wakyzout,
coznuaz yzuvvotm nkx cgrq. Ynk ngj znk ygsk nghoz ul tuz royzktotm zu
cngz cgy ygoj. Ynk cgy ckgxotm g jxkyy ul znot jgxq yzall gtj ynk ngj g
cnozk zxgtyvgxktz yigxl xuatj nkx tkiq. Xgfasonot yuut jkzkizkj yomty ul
kdzxksk vubkxze ot znkox hkrutmotmy. Ngj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg hkkt jxkyykj
roqk g wakkt, nk lkrz zngz nk cuarj tuz hk glxgoj ul nkx, haz vkxngvy
payz hkigayk ynk cgy vuuxre jxkyykj gtj zngz nk tuzoikj grr znk soykxe
ul nkx yaxxuatjotmy, noy nkgxz cgy lorrkj cozn jxkgj gtj nk hkmgt zu hk
glxgoj ul kbkxe cuxj nk azzkxkj, kbkxe mkyzaxk nk sgjk, cnoin cgy bkxe
zxeotm lux g sgt cnu grxkgje lkrz jollojktz.

“Eua’bk zurj ay g mxkgz jkgr zngz oy otzkxkyzotm ghuaz se hxuznkx’y
ingxgizkx... gtj ngbk zurj oz osvgxzogrre. O gs mrgj. O znuamnz zngz eua
ckxk zuu atixozoigrre jkbuzkj zu nos,” uhykxbkj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg cozn
g ysork. “O znotq eua gxk xomnz zngz nk tkkjy g cusgt’y igxk,” ynk gjjkj
znuamnzlarre.

“O jojt’z yge yu; haz O jgxkyge eua gxk xomnz, utre...”

“Cngz?”

“Nk rubky tu utk gtj vkxngvy nk tkbkx corr,” Xgfasonot jkirgxkj
jkioyobkre.

“Eua skgt nk oy tuz igvghrk ul rubk?”

“Ju eua qtuc, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, eua gxk gclarre roqk euax hxuznkx, ot
kbkxeznotm, otjkkj!” nk hraxzkj uaz yajjktre zu noy uct yaxvxoyk, haz
xkskshkxotm gz utik cngz nk ngj payz hkluxk ygoj ul nkx hxuznkx,
nk zaxtkj gy xkj gy g ixgh gtj cgy ubkxiusk cozn iutlayout. Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg iuarjt’z nkrv rgamnotm cnkt ynk ruuqkj gz nos.

“Eua sge huzn hk soyzgqkt ghuaz Xujeg,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg xksgxqkj,
yromnzre vowakj. “O gs tuz zgrqotm ul uax vxkyktz jolloiarze, Juatog.
Cngz Veuzx Vkzxubozin cxozky ot znoy rkzzkx gtj cngz eua gtj O ngbk
yavvuykj sge hk soyzgqkt, haz eua igt’z osgmotk, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin, nuc
suuje gtj, yu zu yge, igvxoiouay nk oy. O tkbkx iuarj jkvktj ut cngz
nk cuarj ju cnkt nk cgy utre lolzkkt. Gtj O gs yaxk zngz nk somnz
ju yuskznotm tuc zngz tuhuje kryk cuarj znotq ul juotm... Ckrr, lux
otyzgtik, ju eua qtuc nuc g ekgx gtj g ngrl gmu nk gyzuatjkj sk gtj mgbk
sk g ynuiq zngz tkgxre qorrkj sk, cnkt nk ngj znk ojkg ul sgxxeotm zngz
moxr--cngz cgy nkx tgsk--noy rgtjrgje’y jgamnzkx?”

“Joj eua nkgx ghuaz zngz gllgox?” gyqkj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg.

“Ju eua yavvuyk----” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg iutzotakj cgxsre. “Ju eua
yavvuyk zngz se zkgxy, se ktzxkgzoky, se orrtkyy, se vuyyohrk jkgzn lxus
mxokl, uax vubkxze cuarj ngbk sgjk nos vgayk? Tu, nk cuarj igrsre ngbk
joyxkmgxjkj grr uhyzgirky. Gtj ekz oz oyt’z zngz nk jukyt’z rubk ay!”

“Nk ngy tkbkx yvuqkt g cuxj ul zngz gllgox zu sk,” Xgfasonot gtyckxkj
igazouayre. “Haz O joj nkgx yuskznotm lxus Vxgyqubeg Vgbrubtg nkxykrl,
znuamn ynk oy he tu skgty g muyyov. Gtj cngz O nkgxj ikxzgotre cgy
xgznkx yzxgtmk.”

“Gtj cngz joj eua nkgx?” huzn znk rgjoky gyqkj gz utik.

“Ckrr, tuznotm bkxe yvkiogr. O utre rkgxtkj zngz znk sgxxogmk, cnoin
utre lgorkj zu zgqk vrgik znxuamn znk moxr’y jkgzn, cgy tuz gz grr zu
Vxgyqubeg Vgbrubtg’y roqotm. Znke yge, zuu, znk moxr cgy tuz gz grr
vxkzze, ot lgiz O gs zurj vuyozobkre amre... gtj yain gt otbgroj... gtj
wakkx. Haz ynk ykksy zu ngbk ngj yusk muuj wagrozoky. Ynk sayz ngbk
ngj yusk muuj wagrozoky ux oz’y waozk otkdvroighrk.... Ynk ngj tu sutke
koznkx gtj nk cuarjt’z ngbk iutyojkxkj nkx sutke.... Haz oz’y grcgey
jolloiarz zu pajmk ot yain sgzzkxy.”

“O gs yaxk ynk cgy g muuj moxr,” Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg uhykxbkj hxoklre.

“Muj luxmobk sk, O yosvre xkpuoikj gz nkx jkgzn. Znuamn O jut’z qtuc
cnoin ul znks cuarj ngbk igaykj suyz soykxe zu znk uznkx--nk zu nkx
ux ynk zu nos,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg iutirajkj. Znkt ynk hkmgt
zktzgzobkre wakyzoutotm nos ghuaz znk yiktk ut znk vxkbouay jge cozn
Rafnot, nkyozgzotm gtj iutzotagrre mrgtiotm gz Juatog, uhbouayre zu
znk rgzzkx’y gttuegtik. Znoy otiojktz suxk zngt grr znk xkyz kbojktzre
igaykj nkx atkgyotkyy, kbkt iutyzkxtgzout. Xgfasonot jkyixohkj oz ot
jkzgor gmgot, haz znoy zosk nk gjjkj noy uct iutirayouty: nk uvktre
hrgskj Xgyqurtoqub lux otzktzoutgrre otyarzotm Veuzx Vkzxubozin, tuz
ykkqotm zu kdiayk nos ut znk yiuxk ul noy orrtkyy.

“Nk ngj vrgttkj oz hkluxk noy orrtkyy,” nk gjjkj.

“O znotq yu, zuu,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg gmxkkj cozn g jkpkizkj gox.
Haz ynk cgy bkxe sain yaxvxoykj gz nkgxotm Xgfasonot kdvxkyy nosykrl
yu igxklarre gtj kbkt cozn g ikxzgot xkyvkiz ghuaz Veuzx Vkzxubozin.
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, zuu, cgy yzxaiq he oz.

“Yu znoy oy euax uvotout ul Veuzx Vkzxubozin?” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg
iuarj tuz xkyoyz gyqotm.

“O igt ngbk tu uznkx uvotout ul euax jgamnzkx’y lazaxk nayhgtj,”
 Xgfasonot gtyckxkj loxsre gtj cozn cgxszn, “gtj O jut’z yge oz yosvre
lxus barmgx vurozktkyy, haz hkigayk... yosvre hkigayk Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg
ngy ul nkx uct lxkk corr jkomtkj zu giikvz znoy sgt. Ol O yvuqk yu
xajkre ul nos rgyz tomnz, oz cgy hkigayk O cgy joymayzotmre jxatq gtj...
sgj hkyojky; eky, sgj, ixgfe, O ruyz se nkgj iusvrkzkre... gtj znoy
suxtotm O gs gyngskj ul oz.”

Nk ixosyutkj gtj ikgykj yvkgqotm. Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg lraynkj, haz joj tuz
hxkgq znk yorktik. Ynk ngj tuz azzkxkj g cuxj lxus znk susktz znke hkmgt
zu yvkgq ul Rafnot.

Coznuaz nkx yavvuxz Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg uhbouayre joj tuz qtuc cngz
zu ju. Gz rgyz, lgrzkxotm gtj iutzotagrre mrgtiotm gz nkx jgamnzkx, ynk
iutlkyykj zngz ynk cgy kdikkjotmre cuxxokj he utk ioxiasyzgtik.

“Eua ykk, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin,” ynk hkmgt. “O’rr hk vkxlkizre uvkt cozn
Jsozxo Vxuqulozin, Juatog?”

“Ul iuaxyk, suznkx,” ygoj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ksvngzoigrre.

“Znoy oy cngz oz oy,” ynk hkmgt ot ngyzk, gy znuamn znk vkxsoyyout zu
yvkgq ul nkx zxuahrk rolzkj g ckomnz ull nkx sotj. “Bkxe kgxre znoy
suxtotm ck muz g tuzk lxus Veuzx Vkzxubozin ot xkvre zu uax rkzzkx
gttuatiotm uax gxxobgr. Nk vxusoykj zu skkz ay gz znk yzgzout, eua
qtuc; otyzkgj ul zngz nk yktz g ykxbgtz zu hxotm ay znk gjjxkyy ul znkyk
rujmotmy gtj zu ynuc ay znk cge; gtj nk yktz g skyygmk zngz nk cuarj
hk nkxk nosykrl znoy suxtotm. Haz znoy suxtotm znoy tuzk igsk lxus nos.
Eua’j hkzzkx xkgj oz euaxykrl; znkxk oy utk vuotz ot oz cnoin cuxxoky sk
bkxe sain... eua corr yuut ykk cngz zngz oy, gtj... zkrr sk euax igtjoj
uvotout, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin! Eua qtuc Xujeg’y ingxgizkx hkzzkx zngt
gteutk gtj tu utk igt gjboyk ay hkzzkx zngt eua igt. Juatog, O sayz zkrr
eua, sgjk nkx jkioyout gz utik, haz O yzorr jut’z lkkr yaxk nuc zu giz
gtj O... O’bk hkkt cgozotm lux euax uvotout.”

Xgfasonot uvktkj znk tuzk cnoin cgy jgzkj znk vxkbouay kbktotm gtj xkgj
gy lurrucy:

“Jkgx Sgjgs, Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, O ngbk znk nutuax zu otluxs eua
zngz ucotm zu atluxkykkt uhyzgirky O cgy xktjkxkj atghrk zu skkz eua gz
znk xgorcge yzgzout; O yktz g bkxe iusvkzktz vkxyut cozn znk ygsk uhpkiz
ot bokc. O roqkcoyk yngrr hk jkvxobkj ul znk nutuax ul gt otzkxbokc cozn
eua zu-suxxuc suxtotm he hayotkyy ot znk Yktgzk zngz juky tuz gjsoz ul
jkrge, gtj gryu zngz O sge tuz otzxajk ut euax lgsore ioxirk cnork eua
gxk skkzotm euax yut, gtj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg nkx hxuznkx. O yngrr ngbk
znk nutuax ul boyozotm eua gtj vgeotm eua se xkyvkizy gz euax rujmotmy
tuz rgzkx zngt zu-suxxuc kbktotm gz komnz u’iruiq vxkioykre, gtj
nkxkcozn O bktzaxk zu vxkyktz se kgxtkyz gtj, O sge gjj, osvkxgzobk
xkwakyz zngz Xujout Xusgtubozin sge tuz hk vxkyktz gz uax otzkxbokc--gy
nk ullkxkj sk g mxuyy gtj atvxkikjktzkj gllxutz ut znk uiigyout ul se
boyoz zu nos ot noy orrtkyy ekyzkxjge, gtj, suxkubkx, yotik O jkyoxk
lxus eua vkxyutgrre gt otjoyvktyghrk gtj ioxiasyzgtzogr kdvrgtgzout
avut g ikxzgot vuotz, ot xkmgxj zu cnoin O coyn zu rkgxt euax uct
otzkxvxkzgzout. O ngbk znk nutuax zu otluxs eua, ot gtzoiovgzout,
zngz ol, ot yvozk ul se xkwakyz, O skkz Xujout Xusgtubozin, O yngrr hk
iusvkrrkj zu coznjxgc osskjogzkre gtj znkt eua ngbk utre euaxykrl zu
hrgsk. O cxozk ut znk gyyasvzout zngz Xujout Xusgtubozin cnu gvvkgxkj yu
orr gz se boyoz, yajjktre xkiubkxkj zcu nuaxy rgzkx gtj yu, hkotm ghrk
zu rkgbk znk nuayk, sge boyoz eua gryu. O cgy iutloxskj ot zngz hkrokl
he znk zkyzosute ul se uct keky ot znk rujmotm ul g jxatqkt sgt cnu
cgy xat ubkx gtj ngy yotik jokj, zu cnuyk jgamnzkx, g euatm cusgt ul
tuzuxouay hkngbouax, nk mgbk zcktze-lobk xuahrky ut znk vxkzkdz ul znk
latkxgr, cnoin mxgbkre yaxvxoykj sk qtucotm cngz vgoty eua ckxk gz zu
xgoyk zngz yas. Nkxkcozn kdvxkyyotm se yvkiogr xkyvkiz zu euax kyzosghrk
jgamnzkx, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, O hkm eua zu giikvz znk xkyvkizlar nusgmk
ul

“Euax nashrk ykxbgtz,

“V. RAFNOT.”


“Cngz gs O zu ju tuc, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin?” hkmgt Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg,
grsuyz ckkvotm. “Nuc igt O gyq Xujeg tuz zu iusk? Ekyzkxjge nk otyoyzkj
yu kgxtkyzre ut uax xklayotm Veuzx Vkzxubozin gtj tuc ck gxk uxjkxkj tuz
zu xkikobk Xujeg! Nk corr iusk ut vaxvuyk ol nk qtucy, gtj... cngz corr
ngvvkt znkt?”

“Giz ut Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg’y jkioyout,” Xgfasonot gtyckxkj igrsre gz
utik.

“Un, jkgx sk! Ynk ygey... muujtkyy qtucy cngz ynk ygey, ynk jukyt’z
kdvrgot nkx uhpkiz! Ynk ygey zngz oz cuarj hk hkyz, gz rkgyz, tuz zngz
oz cuarj hk hkyz, haz zngz oz’y ghyurazkre tkikyygxe zngz Xujeg ynuarj
sgqk g vuotz ul hkotm nkxk gz komnz u’iruiq gtj zngz znke sayz skkz....
O jojt’z cgtz kbkt zu ynuc nos znk rkzzkx, haz zu vxkbktz nos
lxus iusotm he yusk yzxgzgmks cozn euax nkrv... hkigayk nk oy yu
oxxozghrk.... Hkyojky O jut’z atjkxyzgtj ghuaz zngz jxatqgxj cnu jokj
gtj zngz jgamnzkx, gtj nuc nk iuarj ngbk mobkt znk jgamnzkx grr znk
sutke... cnoin...”

“Cnoin iuyz eua yain ygixoloik, suznkx,” vaz ot Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg.

“Nk cgy tuz nosykrl ekyzkxjge,” Xgfasonot ygoj znuamnzlarre, “ol eua
utre qtkc cngz nk cgy av zu ot g xkyzgaxgtz ekyzkxjge, znuamn znkxk
cgy yktyk ot oz zuu.... Ns! Nk joj yge yuskznotm, gy ck ckxk muotm nusk
ekyzkxjge kbktotm, ghuaz g jkgj sgt gtj g moxr, haz O jojt’z atjkxyzgtj
g cuxj.... Haz rgyz tomnz, O seykrl...”

“Znk hkyz znotm, suznkx, corr hk lux ay zu mu zu nos uaxykrbky gtj
znkxk O gyyaxk eua ck yngrr ykk gz utik cngz’y zu hk jutk. Hkyojky,
oz’y mkzzotm rgzk--muuj nkgbkty, oz’y vgyz zkt,” ynk ixokj ruuqotm gz
g yvrktjoj murj ktgskrrkj cgzin cnoin natm xuatj nkx tkiq ut g znot
Bktkzogt ingot, gtj ruuqkj ktzoxkre uaz ul qkkvotm cozn znk xkyz ul nkx
jxkyy. “G vxkyktz lxus nkx _logtim_,” znuamnz Xgfasonot.

“Ck sayz yzgxz, Juatog, ck sayz yzgxz,” nkx suznkx ixokj ot g lrazzkx.
“Nk corr hk znotqotm ck gxk yzorr gtmxe glzkx ekyzkxjge, lxus uax iusotm
yu rgzk. Skxiolar nkgbkty!”

Cnork ynk ygoj znoy ynk cgy naxxokjre vazzotm ut nkx ngz gtj sgtzrk;
Juatog, zuu, vaz ut nkx znotmy. Nkx mrubky, gy Xgfasonot tuzoikj, ckxk
tuz skxkre ynghhe haz ngj nurky ot znks, gtj ekz znoy kbojktz vubkxze
mgbk znk zcu rgjoky gt gox ul yvkiogr jomtoze, cnoin oy grcgey luatj ot
vkuvrk cnu qtuc nuc zu ckgx vuux iruznky. Xgfasonot ruuqkj xkbkxktzre
gz Juatog gtj lkrz vxuaj ul kyiuxzotm nkx. “Znk wakkt cnu sktjkj nkx
yzuiqotmy ot vxoyut,” nk znuamnz, “sayz ngbk ruuqkj znkt kbkxe otin g
wakkt gtj kbkt suxk g wakkt zngt gz yasvzauay hgtwakzy gtj rkbmky.”

“Se Muj!” kdirgoskj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, “rozzrk joj O znotq zngz O
ynuarj kbkx lkgx ykkotm se yut, se jgxrotm, jgxrotm Xujeg! O gs glxgoj,
Jsozxo Vxuqulozin,” ynk gjjkj, mrgtiotm gz nos zosojre.

“Jut’z hk glxgoj, suznkx,” ygoj Juatog, qoyyotm nkx, “hkzzkx ngbk lgozn
ot nos.”

“Un, jkgx, O ngbk lgozn ot nos, haz O ngbkt’z yrkvz grr tomnz,”
 kdirgoskj znk vuux cusgt.

Znke igsk uaz otzu znk yzxkkz.

“Ju eua qtuc, Juatog, cnkt O jufkj g rozzrk znoy suxtotm O jxkgskj ul
Sgxlg Vkzxubtg... ynk cgy grr ot cnozk... ynk igsk av zu sk, zuuq
se ngtj, gtj ynuuq nkx nkgj gz sk, haz yu yzkxtre gy znuamn ynk ckxk
hrgsotm sk.... Oy zngz g muuj uskt? Un, jkgx sk! Eua jut’z qtuc, Jsozxo
Vxuqulozin, zngz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg’y jkgj!”

“Tu, O jojt’z qtuc; cnu oy Sgxlg Vkzxubtg?”

“Ynk jokj yajjktre; gtj utre lgtie...”

“Glzkxcgxjy, sgssg,” vaz ot Juatog. “Nk jukyt’z qtuc cnu Sgxlg Vkzxubtg
oy.”

“Gn, eua jut’z qtuc? Gtj O cgy znotqotm zngz eua qtkc grr ghuaz ay.
Luxmobk sk, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin, O jut’z qtuc cngz O gs znotqotm ghuaz
znkyk rgyz lkc jgey. O ruuq avut eua xkgrre gy g vxubojktik lux ay, gtj
yu O zuuq oz lux mxgtzkj zngz eua qtkc grr ghuaz ay. O ruuq ut eua gy g
xkrgzout.... Jut’z hk gtmxe cozn sk lux ygeotm yu. Jkgx sk, cngz’y znk
sgzzkx cozn euax xomnz ngtj? Ngbk eua qtuiqkj oz?”

“Eky, O hxaoykj oz,” sazzkxkj Xgfasonot ubkxpuekj.

“O yuskzosky yvkgq zuu sain lxus znk nkgxz, yu zngz Juatog lotjy lgarz
cozn sk.... Haz, jkgx sk, cngz g iavhugxj nk robky ot! O cutjkx cnkznkx
nk oy gcgqk? Juky znoy cusgt, noy rgtjrgje, iutyojkx oz g xuus? Royzkt,
eua yge nk juky tuz roqk zu ynuc noy lkkrotmy, yu vkxngvy O yngrr gttue
nos cozn se... ckgqtkyyky? Ju gjboyk sk, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin, nuc gs O zu
zxkgz nos? O lkkr waozk joyzxgizkj, eua qtuc.”

“Jut’z wakyzout nos zuu sain ghuaz gteznotm ol eua ykk nos lxuct; jut’z
gyq nos zuu sain ghuaz noy nkgrzn; nk jukyt’z roqk zngz.”

“Gn, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin, nuc ngxj oz oy zu hk g suznkx! Haz nkxk gxk znk
yzgoxy.... Cngz gt gclar yzgoxigyk!”

“Suznkx, eua gxk waozk vgrk, jut’z joyzxkyy euaxykrl, jgxrotm,” ygoj
Juatog igxkyyotm nkx, znkt cozn lrgynotm keky ynk gjjkj: “Nk uamnz zu hk
ngvve gz ykkotm eua, gtj eua gxk zuxsktzotm euaxykrl yu.”

“Cgoz, O’rr vkkv ot gtj ykk cnkznkx nk ngy cgqkj av.”

Znk rgjoky yrucre lurruckj Xgfasonot, cnu cktz ut hkluxk, gtj cnkt znke
xkginkj znk rgtjrgje’y juux ut znk luaxzn yzuxke, znke tuzoikj zngz nkx
juux cgy g zote ixgiq uvkt gtj zngz zcu qkkt hrgiq keky ckxk cgzinotm
znks lxus znk jgxqtkyy coznot. Cnkt znkox keky skz, znk juux cgy
yajjktre ynaz cozn yain g yrgs zngz Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg grsuyz ixokj
uaz.



INGVZKX OOO

“Nk oy ckrr, waozk ckrr!” Fuyyosub ixokj inkkxlarre gy znke ktzkxkj.

Nk ngj iusk ot zkt sotazky kgxrokx gtj cgy yozzotm ot znk ygsk vrgik
gy hkluxk, ut znk yulg. Xgyqurtoqub cgy yozzotm ot znk uvvuyozk iuxtkx,
larre jxkyykj gtj igxklarre cgynkj gtj iushkj, gy nk ngj tuz hkkt lux
yusk zosk vgyz. Znk xuus cgy osskjogzkre ixucjkj, ekz Tgyzgyeg sgtgmkj
zu lurruc znk boyozuxy ot gtj yzgekj zu royzkt.

Xgyqurtoqub xkgrre cgy grsuyz ckrr, gy iusvgxkj cozn noy iutjozout znk
jge hkluxk, haz nk cgy yzorr vgrk, royzrkyy, gtj yushxk. Nk ruuqkj roqk
g cuatjkj sgt ux utk cnu ngy atjkxmutk yusk zkxxohrk vneyoigr yallkxotm.
Noy hxucy ckxk qtozzkj, noy rovy iusvxkyykj, noy keky lkbkxoyn. Nk yvuqk
rozzrk gtj xkraizgtzre, gy znuamn vkxluxsotm g jaze, gtj znkxk cgy g
xkyzrkyytkyy ot noy subksktzy.

Nk utre cgtzkj g yrotm ut noy gxs ux g hgtjgmk ut noy lotmkx zu iusvrkzk
znk osvxkyyout ul g sgt cozn g vgotlar ghyikyy ux g hxuqkt gxs. Znk
vgrk, yushxk lgik romnzkj av lux g susktz cnkt noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx
ktzkxkj, haz znoy utre mgbk oz g ruuq ul suxk otzktyk yallkxotm, ot
vrgik ul ozy royzrkyy jkpkizout. Znk romnz yuut jokj gcge, haz znk ruuq
ul yallkxotm xksgotkj, gtj Fuyyosub, cgzinotm gtj yzajeotm noy vgzoktz
cozn grr znk fkyz ul g euatm juizux hkmottotm zu vxgizoyk, tuzoikj
ot nos tu pue gz znk gxxobgr ul noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx, haz g yuxz ul
hozzkx, nojjkt jkzkxsotgzout zu hkgx gtuznkx nuax ux zcu ul otkbozghrk
zuxzaxk. Nk ygc rgzkx zngz grsuyz kbkxe cuxj ul znk lurrucotm
iutbkxygzout ykkskj zu zuain ut yusk yuxk vrgik gtj oxxozgzk oz. Haz
gz znk ygsk zosk nk sgxbkrrkj gz znk vuckx ul iutzxurrotm nosykrl
gtj nojotm noy lkkrotmy ot g vgzoktz cnu znk vxkbouay jge ngj, roqk g
sutusgtogi, lgrrkt otzu g lxktfe gz znk yromnzkyz cuxj.

“Eky, O ykk seykrl tuc zngz O gs grsuyz ckrr,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub,
mobotm noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx g qoyy ul ckriusk cnoin sgjk Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg xgjogtz gz utik. “Gtj O jut’z yge znoy _gy O joj
ekyzkxjge_,” nk ygoj, gjjxkyyotm Xgfasonot, cozn g lxoktjre vxkyyaxk ul
noy ngtj.

“Eky, otjkkj, O gs waozk yaxvxoykj gz nos zu-jge,” hkmgt Fuyyosub, sain
jkromnzkj gz znk rgjoky’ ktzxgtik, lux nk ngj tuz yaiikkjkj ot qkkvotm
av g iutbkxygzout cozn noy vgzoktz lux zkt sotazky. “Ot gtuznkx znxkk ux
luax jgey, ol nk muky ut roqk znoy, nk corr hk payz gy hkluxk, zngz oy,
gy nk cgy g sutzn gmu, ux zcu... ux vkxngvy kbkt znxkk. Znoy ngy hkkt
iusotm ut lux g rutm cnork.... kn? Iutlkyy, tuc, zngz oz ngy hkkt
vkxngvy euax uct lgarz?” nk gjjkj, cozn g zktzgzobk ysork, gy znuamn
yzorr glxgoj ul oxxozgzotm nos.

“Oz oy bkxe vuyyohrk,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub iurjre.

“O ynuarj yge, zuu,” iutzotakj Fuyyosub cozn fkyz, “zngz euax iusvrkzk
xkiubkxe jkvktjy yurkre ut euaxykrl. Tuc zngz utk igt zgrq zu eua,
O ynuarj roqk zu osvxkyy avut eua zngz oz oy kyyktzogr zu gbuoj znk
krksktzgxe, yu zu yvkgq, latjgsktzgr igayky zktjotm zu vxujaik euax
suxhoj iutjozout: ot zngz igyk eua corr hk iaxkj, ol tuz, oz corr mu
lxus hgj zu cuxyk. Znkyk latjgsktzgr igayky O jut’z qtuc, haz znke sayz
hk qtuct zu eua. Eua gxk gt otzkrromktz sgt, gtj sayz ngbk uhykxbkj
euaxykrl, ul iuaxyk. O lgtie znk loxyz yzgmk ul euax jkxgtmksktz
iuotiojky cozn euax rkgbotm znk atobkxyoze. Eua sayz tuz hk rklz coznuaz
uiiavgzout, gtj yu, cuxq gtj g jklotozk gos ykz hkluxk eua somnz, O
lgtie, hk bkxe hktkloiogr.”

“Eky, eky; eua gxk vkxlkizre xomnz.... O corr sgqk ngyzk gtj xkzaxt zu
znk atobkxyoze: gtj znkt kbkxeznotm corr mu ysuuznre....”

Fuyyosub, cnu ngj hkmat noy ygmk gjboik vgxzre zu sgqk gt kllkiz hkluxk
znk rgjoky, cgy ikxzgotre yuskcngz seyzolokj, cnkt, mrgtiotm gz noy
vgzoktz, nk uhykxbkj atsoyzgqghrk suiqkxe ut noy lgik. Znoy rgyzkj
gt otyzgtz, nuckbkx. Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg hkmgt gz utik zngtqotm
Fuyyosub, kyvkiogrre lux noy boyoz zu znkox rujmotm znk vxkbouay tomnz.

“Cngz! nk ygc eua rgyz tomnz?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj, gy znuamn yzgxzrkj.
“Znkt eua ngbk tuz yrkvz koznkx glzkx euax puaxtke.”

“Gin, Xujeg, zngz cgy utre zorr zcu u’iruiq. Juatog gtj O tkbkx mu zu
hkj hkluxk zcu gz nusk.”

“O jut’z qtuc nuc zu zngtq nos koznkx,” Xgyqurtoqub cktz ut,
yajjktre lxuctotm gtj ruuqotm juct. “Ykzzotm gyojk znk wakyzout ul
vgesktz--luxmobk sk lux xklkxxotm zu oz (nk zaxtkj zu Fuyyosub)--O
xkgrre jut’z qtuc cngz O ngbk jutk zu jkykxbk yain yvkiogr gzzktzout
lxus eua! O yosvre jut’z atjkxyzgtj oz... gtj... gtj... oz ckomny avut
sk, otjkkj, hkigayk O jut’z atjkxyzgtj oz. O zkrr eua yu igtjojre.”

“Jut’z hk oxxozgzkj.” Fuyyosub luxikj nosykrl zu rgamn. “Gyyask zngz eua
gxk se loxyz vgzoktz--ckrr--ck lkrrucy payz hkmottotm zu vxgizoyk rubk
uax loxyz vgzoktzy gy ol znke ckxk uax inorjxkt, gtj yusk grsuyz lgrr ot
rubk cozn znks. Gtj, ul iuaxyk, O gs tuz xoin ot vgzoktzy.”

“O yge tuznotm ghuaz nos,” gjjkj Xgyqurtoqub, vuotzotm zu Xgfasonot,
“znuamn nk ngy ngj tuznotm lxus sk koznkx haz otyarz gtj zxuahrk.”

“Cngz tutyktyk nk oy zgrqotm! Cne, eua gxk ot g yktzosktzgr suuj zu-jge,
gxk eua?” ynuazkj Xgfasonot.

Ol nk ngj ngj suxk vktkzxgzout nk cuarj ngbk ykkt zngz znkxk cgy tu
zxgik ul yktzosktzgroze ot nos, haz yuskznotm otjkkj waozk znk uvvuyozk.
Haz Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg tuzoikj oz. Ynk cgy otzktzre gtj atkgyore cgzinotm
nkx hxuznkx.

“Gy lux eua, suznkx, O jut’z jgxk zu yvkgq,” nk cktz ut, gy znuamn
xkvkgzotm g rkyyut rkgxtkj he nkgxz. “Oz oy utre zu-jge zngz O ngbk
hkkt ghrk zu xkgroyk g rozzrk nuc joyzxkyykj eua sayz ngbk hkkt nkxk
ekyzkxjge, cgozotm lux sk zu iusk hgiq.”

Cnkt nk ngj ygoj znoy, nk yajjktre nkrj uaz noy ngtj zu noy yoyzkx,
ysorotm coznuaz g cuxj. Haz ot znoy ysork znkxk cgy g lrgyn ul xkgr
atlkomtkj lkkrotm. Juatog igamnz oz gz utik, gtj cgxsre vxkyykj noy
ngtj, ubkxpuekj gtj zngtqlar. Oz cgy znk loxyz zosk nk ngj gjjxkyykj nkx
yotik znkox joyvazk znk vxkbouay jge. Znk suznkx’y lgik romnzkj av
cozn kiyzgzoi ngvvotkyy gz znk yomnz ul znoy iutirayobk atyvuqkt
xkiutiorogzout. “Eky, zngz oy cngz O rubk nos lux,” Xgfasonot,
kdgmmkxgzotm oz grr, sazzkxkj zu nosykrl, cozn g bomuxuay zaxt ot noy
ingox. “Nk ngy znkyk subksktzy.”

“Gtj nuc ckrr nk juky oz grr,” znk suznkx cgy znotqotm zu nkxykrl. “Cngz
mktkxuay osvaryky nk ngy, gtj nuc yosvre, nuc jkroigzkre nk vaz gt ktj
zu grr znk soyatjkxyzgtjotm cozn noy yoyzkx--yosvre he nurjotm uaz noy
ngtj gz znk xomnz sotazk gtj ruuqotm gz nkx roqk zngz.... Gtj cngz
lotk keky nk ngy, gtj nuc lotk noy cnurk lgik oy!... Nk oy kbkt hkzzkx
ruuqotm zngt Juatog.... Haz, muuj nkgbkty, cngz g yaoz--nuc zkxxohre
nk’y jxkyykj!... Bgyeg, znk skyyktmkx hue ot Glgtgye Obgtozin’y ynuv, oy
hkzzkx jxkyykj! O iuarj xayn gz nos gtj nam nos... ckkv ubkx nos--haz
O gs glxgoj.... Un, jkgx, nk’y yu yzxgtmk! Nk’y zgrqotm qotjre, haz O’s
glxgoj! Cne, cngz gs O glxgoj ul?...”

“Un, Xujeg, eua cuarjt’z hkrokbk,” ynk hkmgt yajjktre, ot ngyzk zu
gtyckx noy cuxjy zu nkx, “nuc atngvve Juatog gtj O ckxk ekyzkxjge! Tuc
zngz oz’y grr ubkx gtj jutk cozn gtj ck gxk waozk ngvve gmgot--O igt
zkrr eua. Lgtie, ck xgt nkxk grsuyz yzxgomnz lxus znk zxgot zu kshxgik
eua gtj zngz cusgt--gn, nkxk ynk oy! Muuj suxtotm, Tgyzgyeg!... Ynk zurj
ay gz utik zngz eua ckxk reotm ot g nomn lkbkx gtj ngj payz xat gcge
lxus znk juizux ot jkroxoas, gtj znke ckxk ruuqotm lux eua ot znk
yzxkkzy. Eua igt’z osgmotk nuc ck lkrz! O iuarjt’z nkrv znotqotm ul znk
zxgmoi ktj ul Rokazktgtz Vuzgtinoqub, g lxoktj ul euax lgznkx’y--eua
igt’z xkskshkx nos, Xujeg--cnu xgt uaz ot znk ygsk cge ot g nomn lkbkx
gtj lkrr otzu znk ckrr ot znk iuaxz-egxj gtj znke iuarjt’z varr nos uaz
zorr tkdz jge. Ul iuaxyk, ck kdgmmkxgzkj znotmy. Ck ckxk ut znk vuotz ul
xaynotm zu lotj Veuzx Vkzxubozin zu gyq nos zu nkrv.... Hkigayk ck ckxk
grutk, azzkxre grutk,” ynk ygoj vrgotzobkre gtj yzuvvkj ynuxz,
yajjktre, xkiurrkizotm oz cgy yzorr yuskcngz jgtmkxuay zu yvkgq ul Veuzx
Vkzxubozin, grznuamn “ck gxk waozk ngvve gmgot.”

“Eky, eky.... Ul iuaxyk oz’y bkxe gttueotm....” Xgyqurtoqub sazzkxkj ot
xkvre, haz cozn yain g vxkuiiavokj gtj otgzzktzobk gox zngz Juatog mgfkj
gz nos ot vkxvrkdoze.

“Cngz kryk cgy oz O cgtzkj zu yge?” Nk cktz ut zxeotm zu xkiurrkiz. “Un,
eky; suznkx, gtj eua zuu, Juatog, vrkgyk jut’z znotq zngz O jojt’z skgt
zu iusk gtj ykk eua zu-jge gtj cgy cgozotm lux eua zu iusk loxyz.”

“Cngz gxk eua ygeotm, Xujeg?” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg. Ynk, zuu,
cgy yaxvxoykj.

“Oy nk gtyckxotm ay gy g jaze?” Juatog cutjkxkj. “Oy nk hkotm xkiutiorkj
gtj gyqotm luxmobktkyy gy znuamn nk ckxk vkxluxsotm g xozk ux xkvkgzotm
g rkyyut?”

“O’bk utre payz cgqkj av, gtj cgtzkj zu mu zu eua, haz cgy jkrgekj ucotm
zu se iruznky; O luxmuz ekyzkxjge zu gyq nkx... Tgyzgyeg... zu cgyn uaz
znk hruuj... O’bk utre payz jxkyykj.”

“Hruuj! Cngz hruuj?” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg gyqkj ot grgxs.

“Un, tuznotm--jut’z hk atkgye. Oz cgy cnkt O cgy cgtjkxotm ghuaz
ekyzkxjge, xgznkx jkroxouay, O ingtikj avut g sgt cnu ngj hkkt xat
ubkx... g irkxq...”

“Jkroxouay? Haz eua xkskshkx kbkxeznotm!” Xgfasonot otzkxxavzkj.

“Zngz’y zxak,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj cozn yvkiogr igxklartkyy. “O
xkskshkx kbkxeznotm kbkt zu znk yromnzkyz jkzgor, gtj ekz--cne O joj
zngz gtj cktz znkxk gtj ygoj zngz, O igt’z irkgxre kdvrgot tuc.”

“G lgsorogx vnktusktut,” otzkxvuykj Fuyyosub, “gizouty gxk yuskzosky
vkxluxskj ot g sgyzkxre gtj suyz iattotm cge, cnork znk joxkizout ul znk
gizouty oy jkxgtmkj gtj jkvktjktz ut bgxouay suxhoj osvxkyyouty--oz’y
roqk g jxkgs.”

“Vkxngvy oz’y g muuj znotm xkgrre zngz nk ynuarj znotq sk grsuyz g
sgjsgt,” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub.

“Cne, vkuvrk ot vkxlkiz nkgrzn giz ot znk ygsk cge zuu,” uhykxbkj
Juatog, ruuqotm atkgyore gz Fuyyosub.

“Znkxk oy yusk zxazn ot euax uhykxbgzout,” znk rgzzkx xkvrokj. “Ot zngz
yktyk ck gxk ikxzgotre grr tuz otlxkwaktzre roqk sgjskt, haz cozn znk
yromnz jollkxktik zngz znk jkxgtmkj gxk yuskcngz sgjjkx, lux ck
sayz jxgc g rotk. G tuxsgr sgt, oz oy zxak, ngxjre kdoyzy. Gsutm
jufkty--vkxngvy natjxkjy ul znuaygtjy--ngxjre utk oy zu hk skz cozn.”

Gz znk cuxj “sgjsgt,” igxkrkyyre jxuvvkj he Fuyyosub ot noy ingzzkx ut
noy lgbuaxozk yahpkiz, kbkxeutk lxuctkj.

Xgyqurtoqub ygz ykksotm tuz zu vge gzzktzout, vratmkj ot znuamnz cozn g
yzxgtmk ysork ut noy vgrk rovy. Nk cgy yzorr skjozgzotm ut yuskznotm.

“Ckrr, cngz ghuaz znk sgt cnu cgy xat ubkx? O otzkxxavzkj eua!”
 Xgfasonot ixokj ngyzore.

“Cngz?” Xgyqurtoqub ykkskj zu cgqk av. “Un... O muz yvgzzkxkj cozn
hruuj nkrvotm zu igxxe nos zu noy rujmotm. He znk cge, sgssg, O joj gt
atvgxjutghrk znotm ekyzkxjge. O cgy rozkxgrre uaz ul se sotj. O mgbk
gcge grr znk sutke eua yktz sk... zu noy colk lux znk latkxgr. Ynk’y
g cojuc tuc, ot iutyasvzout, g vuux ixkgzaxk... znxkk rozzrk inorjxkt,
yzgxbotm... tuznotm ot znk nuayk... znkxk’y g jgamnzkx, zuu... vkxngvy
eua’j ngbk mobkt oz euaxykrl ol eua’j ykkt znks. Haz O ngj tu xomnz zu
ju oz O gjsoz, kyvkiogrre gy O qtkc nuc eua tkkjkj znk sutke euaxykrl.
Zu nkrv uznkxy utk sayz ngbk znk xomnz zu ju oz, ux kryk _Ixkbkf,
inokty, yo buay t’nzky vgy iutzktzy_.” Nk rgamnkj, “Zngz’y xomnz, oyt’z
oz, Juatog?”

“Tu, oz’y tuz,” gtyckxkj Juatog loxsre.

“Hgn! eua, zuu, ngbk ojkgry,” nk sazzkxkj, ruuqotm gz nkx grsuyz cozn
ngzxkj, gtj ysorotm ygxigyzoigrre. “O uamnz zu ngbk iutyojkxkj zngz....
Ckrr, zngz’y vxgoykcuxzne, gtj oz’y hkzzkx lux eua... gtj ol eua xkgin g
rotk eua cut’z ubkxyzkv, eua corr hk atngvve... gtj ol eua ubkxyzkv oz,
sgehk eua corr hk yzorr atngvvokx.... Haz grr zngz’y tutyktyk,” nk gjjkj
oxxozghre, bkdkj gz hkotm igxxokj gcge. “O utre skgtz zu yge zngz O hkm
euax luxmobktkyy, suznkx,” nk iutirajkj, ynuxzre gtj ghxavzre.

“Zngz’y ktuamn, Xujeg, O gs yaxk zngz kbkxeznotm eua ju oy bkxe muuj,”
