 ygoj noy suznkx, jkromnzkj.

“Jut’z hk zuu yaxk,” nk gtyckxkj, zcoyzotm noy suazn otzu g ysork.

G yorktik lurruckj. Znkxk cgy g ikxzgot iutyzxgotz ot grr znoy
iutbkxygzout, gtj ot znk yorktik, gtj ot znk xkiutiorogzout, gtj ot znk
luxmobktkyy, gtj grr ckxk lkkrotm oz.

“Oz oy gy znuamn znke ckxk glxgoj ul sk,” Xgyqurtoqub cgy znotqotm
zu nosykrl, ruuqotm gyqgtik gz noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx. Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg cgy otjkkj mxucotm suxk zosoj znk rutmkx ynk qkvz yorktz.

“Ekz ot znkox ghyktik O ykkskj zu rubk znks yu sain,” lrgynkj znxuamn
noy sotj.

“Ju eua qtuc, Xujeg, Sgxlg Vkzxubtg oy jkgj,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg
yajjktre hraxzkj uaz.

“Cngz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg?”

“Un, skxie ut ay--Sgxlg Vkzxubtg Ybojxomgsrub. O cxuzk eua yu sain ghuaz
nkx.”

“G-g-n! Eky, O xkskshkx.... Yu ynk’y jkgj! Un, xkgrre?” nk xuaykj
nosykrl yajjktre, gy ol cgqotm av. “Cngz joj ynk jok ul?”

“Utre osgmotk, waozk yajjktre,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg gtyckxkj
naxxokjre, ktiuaxgmkj he noy iaxouyoze. “Ut znk bkxe jge O cgy yktjotm
eua zngz rkzzkx! Cuarj eua hkrokbk oz, zngz gclar sgt ykksy zu ngbk hkkt
znk igayk ul nkx jkgzn. Znke yge nk hkgz nkx jxkgjlarre.”

“Cne, ckxk znke ut yain hgj zkxsy?” nk gyqkj, gjjxkyyotm noy yoyzkx.

“Tuz gz grr. Waozk znk iutzxgxe otjkkj. Cozn nkx, nk cgy grcgey bkxe
vgzoktz, iutyojkxgzk kbkt. Ot lgiz, grr znuyk ykbkt ekgxy ul znkox
sgxxokj rolk nk mgbk cge zu nkx, zuu sain yu otjkkj, ot sgte igyky. Grr
ul g yajjkt nk ykksy zu ngbk ruyz vgzoktik.”

“Znkt nk iuarj tuz ngbk hkkt yu gclar ol nk iutzxurrkj nosykrl lux ykbkt
ekgxy? Eua ykks zu hk jklktjotm nos, Juatog?”

“Tu, tu, nk’y gt gclar sgt! O igt osgmotk tuznotm suxk gclar!” Juatog
gtyckxkj, grsuyz cozn g ynajjkx, qtozzotm nkx hxucy, gtj yotqotm otzu
znuamnz.

“Zngz ngj ngvvktkj ot znk suxtotm,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cktz ut
naxxokjre. “Gtj joxkizre glzkxcgxjy ynk uxjkxkj znk nuxyky zu hk
ngxtkyykj zu jxobk zu znk zuct osskjogzkre glzkx jottkx. Ynk grcgey aykj
zu jxobk zu znk zuct ot yain igyky. Ynk gzk g bkxe muuj jottkx, O gs
zurj....”

“Glzkx znk hkgzotm?”

“Zngz cgy grcgey nkx... nghoz; gtj osskjogzkre glzkx jottkx, yu gy tuz
zu hk rgzk ot yzgxzotm, ynk cktz zu znk hgzn-nuayk.... Eua ykk, ynk cgy
atjkxmuotm yusk zxkgzsktz cozn hgzny. Znke ngbk g iurj yvxotm znkxk, gtj
ynk aykj zu hgznk ot oz xkmargxre kbkxe jge, gtj tu yuutkx ngj ynk muz
otzu znk cgzkx cnkt ynk yajjktre ngj g yzxuqk!”

“O ynuarj znotq yu,” ygoj Fuyyosub.

“Gtj joj nk hkgz nkx hgjre?”

“Cngz juky zngz sgzzkx!” vaz ot Juatog.

“N’s! Haz O jut’z qtuc cne eua cgtz zu zkrr ay yain muyyov, suznkx,”
 ygoj Xgyqurtoqub oxxozghre, gy oz ckxk ot yvozk ul nosykrl.

“Gn, se jkgx, O jut’z qtuc cngz zu zgrq ghuaz,” hxuqk lxus Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg.

“Cne, gxk eua grr glxgoj ul sk?” nk gyqkj, cozn g iutyzxgotkj ysork.

“Zngz’y ikxzgotre zxak,” ygoj Juatog, ruuqotm joxkizre gtj yzkxtre gz
nkx hxuznkx. “Suznkx cgy ixuyyotm nkxykrl cozn zkxxux gy ynk igsk av znk
yzgoxy.”

Noy lgik cuxqkj, gy znuamn ot iutbaryout.

“Gin, cngz gxk eua ygeotm, Juatog! Jut’z hk gtmxe, vrkgyk, Xujeg....
Cne joj eua yge zngz, Juatog?” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg hkmgt,
ubkxcnkrskj--“Eua ykk, iusotm nkxk, O cgy jxkgsotm grr znk cge, ot znk
zxgot, nuc ck ynuarj skkz, nuc ck ynuarj zgrq ubkx kbkxeznotm
zumkznkx.... Gtj O cgy yu ngvve, O joj tuz tuzoik znk puaxtke! Haz cngz
gs O ygeotm? O gs ngvve tuc.... Eua ynuarj tuz, Juatog.... O gs ngvve
tuc--yosvre ot ykkotm eua, Xujeg....”

“Nayn, suznkx,” nk sazzkxkj ot iutlayout, tuz ruuqotm gz nkx, haz
vxkyyotm nkx ngtj. “Ck yngrr ngbk zosk zu yvkgq lxkkre ul kbkxeznotm!”

Gy nk ygoj znoy, nk cgy yajjktre ubkxcnkrskj cozn iutlayout gtj zaxtkj
vgrk. Gmgot zngz gclar yktygzout nk ngj qtuct ul rgzk vgyykj cozn jkgjre
inorr ubkx noy yuar. Gmgot oz hkigsk yajjktre vrgot gtj vkxikvzohrk zu
nos zngz nk ngj payz zurj g lkgxlar rok--zngz nk cuarj tkbkx tuc hk
ghrk zu yvkgq lxkkre ul kbkxeznotm--zngz nk cuarj tkbkx gmgot hk ghrk zu
_yvkgq_ ul gteznotm zu gteutk. Znk gtmaoyn ul znoy znuamnz cgy yain zngz
lux g susktz nk grsuyz luxmuz nosykrl. Nk muz av lxus noy ykgz, gtj tuz
ruuqotm gz gteutk cgrqkj zucgxjy znk juux.

“Cngz gxk eua ghuaz?” ixokj Xgfasonot, irazinotm nos he znk gxs.

Nk ygz juct gmgot, gtj hkmgt ruuqotm ghuaz nos, ot yorktik. Znke ckxk
grr ruuqotm gz nos ot vkxvrkdoze.

“Haz cngz gxk eua grr yu jarr lux?” nk ynuazkj, yajjktre gtj waozk
atkdvkizkjre. “Ju yge yuskznotm! Cngz’y znk ayk ul yozzotm roqk znoy?
Iusk, ju yvkgq. Rkz ay zgrq.... Ck skkz zumkznkx gtj yoz ot yorktik....
Iusk, gteznotm!”

“Zngtq Muj; O cgy glxgoj znk ygsk znotm gy ekyzkxjge cgy hkmottotm
gmgot,” ygoj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, ixuyyotm nkxykrl.

“Cngz oy znk sgzzkx, Xujeg?” gyqkj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, joyzxayzlarre.

“Un, tuznotm! O xkskshkxkj yuskznotm,” nk gtyckxkj, gtj yajjktre
rgamnkj.

“Ckrr, ol eua xkskshkxkj yuskznotm; zngz’y grr xomnz!... O cgy hkmottotm
zu znotq...” sazzkxkj Fuyyosub, mkzzotm av lxus znk yulg. “Oz oy zosk
lux sk zu hk ull. O corr ruuq ot gmgot vkxngvy... ol O igt...” Nk sgjk
noy hucy, gtj cktz uaz.

“Cngz gt kdikrrktz sgt!” uhykxbkj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

“Eky, kdikrrktz, yvrktjoj, ckrr-kjaigzkj, otzkrromktz,” Xgyqurtoqub
hkmgt, yajjktre yvkgqotm cozn yaxvxoyotm xgvojoze, gtj g robkrotkyy nk
ngj tuz ynuct zorr znkt. “O igt’z xkskshkx cnkxk O skz nos hkluxk se
orrtkyy.... O hkrokbk O ngbk skz nos yuskcnkxk----... Gtj znoy oy g muuj
sgt, zuu,” nk tujjkj gz Xgfasonot. “Ju eua roqk nos, Juatog?” nk gyqkj
nkx; gtj yajjktre, lux yusk atqtuct xkgyut, rgamnkj.

“Bkxe sain,” gtyckxkj Juatog.

“Luu!--cngz g vom eua gxk!” Xgfasonot vxuzkyzkj, hraynotm ot zkxxohrk
iutlayout, gtj nk muz av lxus noy ingox. Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg ysorkj
lgotzre, haz Xgyqurtoqub rgamnkj gruaj.

“Cnkxk gxk eua ull zu?”

“O sayz mu.”

“Eua tkkj tuz gz grr. Yzge. Fuyyosub ngy mutk, yu eua sayz. Jut’z mu.
Cngz’y znk zosk? Oy oz zckrbk u’iruiq? Cngz g vxkzze cgzin eua ngbk muz,
Juatog. Haz cne gxk eua grr yorktz gmgot? O ju grr znk zgrqotm.”

“Oz cgy g vxkyktz lxus Sgxlg Vkzxubtg,” gtyckxkj Juatog.

“Gtj g bkxe kdvktyobk utk!” gjjkj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

“G-gn! Cngz g hom utk! Ngxjre roqk g rgje’y.”

“O roqk zngz yuxz,” ygoj Juatog.

“Yu oz oy tuz g vxkyktz lxus nkx _logtim_,” znuamnz Xgfasonot, gtj cgy
atxkgyutghre jkromnzkj.

“O znuamnz oz cgy Rafnot’y vxkyktz,” uhykxbkj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Tu, nk ngy tuz sgjk Juatog gte vxkyktzy ekz.”

“G-gn! Gtj ju eua xkskshkx, suznkx, O cgy ot rubk gtj cgtzkj zu mkz
sgxxokj?” nk ygoj yajjktre, ruuqotm gz noy suznkx, cnu cgy joyiutikxzkj
he znk yajjkt ingtmk ul yahpkiz gtj znk cge nk yvuqk ul oz.

“Un, eky, se jkgx.”

Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg kdingtmkj mrgtiky cozn Juatog gtj Xgfasonot.

“N’s, eky. Cngz yngrr O zkrr eua? O jut’z xkskshkx sain otjkkj. Ynk cgy
yain g yoiqre moxr,” nk cktz ut, mxucotm jxkgse gtj ruuqotm juct gmgot.
“Waozk gt otbgroj. Ynk cgy lutj ul mobotm grsy zu znk vuux, gtj cgy
grcgey jxkgsotm ul g tattkxe, gtj utik ynk haxyz otzu zkgxy cnkt ynk
hkmgt zgrqotm zu sk ghuaz oz. Eky, eky, O xkskshkx. O xkskshkx bkxe
ckrr. Ynk cgy gt amre rozzrk znotm. O xkgrre jut’z qtuc cngz jxkc sk
zu nkx znkt--O znotq oz cgy hkigayk ynk cgy grcgey orr. Ol ynk ngj hkkt
rgsk ux natinhgiq, O hkrokbk O ynuarj ngbk roqkj nkx hkzzkx yzorr,” nk
ysorkj jxkgsore. “Eky, oz cgy g yuxz ul yvxotm jkroxoas.”

“Tu, oz cgy tuz utre yvxotm jkroxoas,” ygoj Juatog, cozn cgxs lkkrotm.

Nk lodkj g yzxgotkj otzktz ruuq ut noy yoyzkx, haz joj tuz nkgx ux joj
tuz atjkxyzgtj nkx cuxjy. Znkt, iusvrkzkre ruyz ot znuamnz, nk muz av,
cktz av zu noy suznkx, qoyykj nkx, cktz hgiq zu noy vrgik gtj ygz juct.

“Eua rubk nkx kbkt tuc?” ygoj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, zuainkj.

“Nkx? Tuc? Un, eky.... Eua gyq ghuaz nkx? Tu... zngz’y grr tuc, gy
oz ckxk, ot gtuznkx cuxrj... gtj yu rutm gmu. Gtj otjkkj kbkxeznotm
ngvvktotm nkxk ykksy yusknuc lgx gcge.” Nk ruuqkj gzzktzobkre gz znks.
“Eua, tuc... O ykks zu hk ruuqotm gz eua lxus g znuaygtj sorky gcge...
haz, muujtkyy qtucy cne ck gxk zgrqotm ul zngz! Gtj cngz’y znk ayk ul
gyqotm ghuaz oz?” nk gjjkj cozn gttuegtik, gtj hozotm noy tgory, lkrr
otzu jxkgse yorktik gmgot.

“Cngz g cxkzinkj rujmotm eua ngbk, Xujeg! Oz’y roqk g zush,” ygoj
Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, yajjktre hxkgqotm znk uvvxkyyobk yorktik. “O
gs yaxk oz’y waozk ngrl znxuamn euax rujmotm eua ngbk hkiusk yu
skrgtinure.”

“Se rujmotm,” nk gtyckxkj, royzrkyyre. “Eky, znk rujmotm ngj g mxkgz
jkgr zu ju cozn oz.... O znuamnz zngz, zuu.... Ol utre eua qtkc, znuamn,
cngz g yzxgtmk znotm eua ygoj payz tuc, suznkx,” nk ygoj, rgamnotm
yzxgtmkre.

G rozzrk suxk, gtj znkox iusvgtoutynov, znoy suznkx gtj znoy yoyzkx,
cozn nos glzkx znxkk ekgxy’ ghyktik, znoy otzosgzk zutk ul iutbkxygzout,
ot lgik ul znk azzkx osvuyyohoroze ul xkgrre yvkgqotm ghuaz gteznotm,
cuarj ngbk hkkt hkeutj noy vuckx ul ktjaxgtik. Haz znkxk cgy utk axmktz
sgzzkx cnoin sayz hk ykzzrkj utk cge ux znk uznkx zngz jge--yu nk ngj
jkiojkj cnkt nk cuqk. Tuc nk cgy mrgj zu xkskshkx oz, gy g skgty ul
kyigvk.

“Royzkt, Juatog,” nk hkmgt, mxgbkre gtj jxore, “ul iuaxyk O hkm euax
vgxjut lux ekyzkxjge, haz O iutyojkx oz se jaze zu zkrr eua gmgot zngz
O ju tuz coznjxgc lxus se inokl vuotz. Oz oy sk ux Rafnot. Ol O gs g
yiuatjxkr, eua sayz tuz hk. Utk oy ktuamn. Ol eua sgxxe Rafnot, O ikgyk
gz utik zu ruuq ut eua gy g yoyzkx.”

“Xujeg, Xujeg! Oz oy znk ygsk gy ekyzkxjge gmgot,” Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg ixokj, suaxtlarre. “Gtj cne ju eua igrr euaxykrl g
yiuatjxkr? O igt’z hkgx oz. Eua ygoj znk ygsk ekyzkxjge.”

“Hxuznkx,” Juatog gtyckxkj loxsre gtj cozn znk ygsk jxetkyy. “Ot grr
znoy znkxk oy g soyzgqk ut euax vgxz. O znuamnz oz ubkx gz tomnz,
gtj luatj uaz znk soyzgqk. Oz oy grr hkigayk eua ykks zu lgtie O gs
ygixoloiotm seykrl zu yuskutk gtj lux yuskutk. Zngz oy tuz znk igyk gz
grr. O gs yosvre sgxxeotm lux se uct ygqk, hkigayk znotmy gxk ngxj lux
sk. Znuamn, ul iuaxyk, O yngrr hk mrgj ol O yaiikkj ot hkotm ayklar zu
se lgsore. Haz zngz oy tuz znk inokl suzobk lux se jkioyout....”

“Ynk oy reotm,” nk znuamnz zu nosykrl, hozotm noy tgory botjoizobkre.
“Vxuaj ixkgzaxk! Ynk cut’z gjsoz ynk cgtzy zu ju oz uaz ul ingxoze! Zuu
ngamnze! Un, hgyk ingxgizkxy! Znke kbkt rubk gy znuamn znke ngzk.... Un,
nuc O... ngzk znks grr!”

“Ot lgiz,” iutzotakj Juatog, “O gs sgxxeotm Veuzx Vkzxubozin hkigayk ul
zcu kbory O inuuyk znk rkyy. O otzktj zu ju nutkyzre grr nk kdvkizy ul
sk, yu O gs tuz jkikobotm nos.... Cne joj eua ysork payz tuc?” Ynk, zuu,
lraynkj, gtj znkxk cgy g mrkgs ul gtmkx ot nkx keky.

“Grr?” nk gyqkj, cozn g sgromtgtz mxot.

“Coznot ikxzgot rosozy. Huzn znk sgttkx gtj luxs ul Veuzx Vkzxubozin’y
iuaxzynov ynuckj sk gz utik cngz nk cgtzkj. Nk sge, ul iuaxyk, znotq zuu
ckrr ul nosykrl, haz O nuvk nk kyzkksy sk, zuu.... Cne gxk eua rgamnotm
gmgot?”

“Gtj cne gxk eua hraynotm gmgot? Eua gxk reotm, yoyzkx. Eua gxk
otzktzoutgrre reotm, yosvre lxus lksototk uhyzotgie, yosvre zu nurj euax
uct gmgotyz sk.... Eua igttuz xkyvkiz Rafnot. O ngbk ykkt nos gtj zgrqkj
cozn nos. Yu eua gxk ykrrotm euaxykrl lux sutke, gtj yu ot gte igyk eua
gxk gizotm hgykre, gtj O gs mrgj gz rkgyz zngz eua igt hrayn lux oz.”

“Oz oy tuz zxak. O gs tuz reotm,” ixokj Juatog, ruyotm nkx iusvuyaxk.
“O cuarj tuz sgxxe nos ol O ckxk tuz iutbotikj zngz nk kyzkksy sk
gtj znotqy nomnre ul sk. O cuarj tuz sgxxe nos ol O ckxk tuz loxsre
iutbotikj zngz O igt xkyvkiz nos. Luxzatgzkre, O igt ngbk iutbotiotm
vxuul ul oz znoy bkxe jge... gtj yain g sgxxogmk oy tuz g borktkyy, gy
eua yge! Gtj kbkt ol eua ckxk xomnz, ol O xkgrre ngj jkzkxsotkj ut g
bork gizout, oy oz tuz skxiorkyy ut euax vgxz zu yvkgq zu sk roqk zngz?
Cne ju eua jksgtj ul sk g nkxuoys zngz vkxngvy eua ngbk tuz koznkx? Oz
oy jkyvuzoys; oz oy zexgtte. Ol O xaot gteutk, oz oy utre seykrl.... O
gs tuz iussozzotm g saxjkx. Cne ju eua ruuq gz sk roqk zngz? Cne gxk eua
yu vgrk? Xujeg, jgxrotm, cngz’y znk sgzzkx?”

“Muuj nkgbkty! Eua ngbk sgjk nos lgotz,” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

“Tu, tu, tutyktyk! Oz’y tuznotm. G rozzrk mojjotkyy--tuz lgotzotm. Eua
ngbk lgotzotm ut znk hxgot. N’s, eky, cngz cgy O ygeotm? Un, eky. Ot
cngz cge corr eua mkz iutbotiotm vxuul zu-jge zngz eua igt xkyvkiz nos,
gtj zngz nk... kyzkksy eua, gy eua ygoj. O znotq eua ygoj zu-jge?”

“Suznkx, ynuc Xujeg Veuzx Vkzxubozin’y rkzzkx,” ygoj Juatog.

Cozn zxkshrotm ngtjy, Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg mgbk nos znk rkzzkx. Nk
zuuq oz cozn mxkgz otzkxkyz, haz, hkluxk uvktotm oz, nk yajjktre ruuqkj
cozn g yuxz ul cutjkx gz Juatog.

“Oz oy yzxgtmk,” nk ygoj, yrucre, gy znuamn yzxaiq he g tkc ojkg. “Cngz
gs O sgqotm yain g layy lux? Cngz oy oz grr ghuaz? Sgxxe cnus eua roqk!”

Nk ygoj znoy gy znuamn zu nosykrl, haz ygoj oz gruaj, gtj ruuqkj lux
yusk zosk gz noy yoyzkx, gy znuamn vaffrkj. Nk uvktkj znk rkzzkx gz
rgyz, yzorr cozn znk ygsk ruuq ul yzxgtmk cutjkx ut noy lgik. Znkt,
yrucre gtj gzzktzobkre, nk hkmgt xkgjotm, gtj xkgj oz znxuamn zcoik.
Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg ynuckj sgxqkj gtdokze, gtj grr otjkkj kdvkizkj
yuskznotm vgxzoiargx.

“Cngz yaxvxoyky sk,” nk hkmgt, glzkx g ynuxz vgayk, ngtjotm znk rkzzkx
zu noy suznkx, haz tuz gjjxkyyotm gteutk ot vgxzoiargx, “oy zngz nk oy g
hayotkyy sgt, g rgcekx, gtj noy iutbkxygzout oy vxkzktzouay otjkkj, gtj
ekz nk cxozky yain gt atkjaigzkj rkzzkx.”

Znke grr yzgxzkj. Znke ngj kdvkizkj yuskznotm waozk jollkxktz.

“Haz znke grr cxozk roqk zngz, eua qtuc,” Xgfasonot uhykxbkj, ghxavzre.

“Ngbk eua xkgj oz?”

“Eky.”

“Ck ynuckj nos, Xujeg. Ck... iutyarzkj nos payz tuc,” Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg hkmgt, kshgxxgyykj.

“Zngz’y payz znk pgxmut ul znk iuaxzy,” Xgfasonot vaz ot. “Rkmgr
juiasktzy gxk cxozzkt roqk zngz zu znoy jge.”

“Rkmgr? Eky, oz’y payz rkmgr--hayotkyy rgtmagmk--tuz yu bkxe atkjaigzkj,
gtj tuz waozk kjaigzkj--hayotkyy rgtmagmk!”

“Veuzx Vkzxubozin sgqky tu ykixkz ul znk lgiz zngz nk ngj g inkgv
kjaigzout, nk oy vxuaj otjkkj ul ngbotm sgjk noy uct cge,” Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg uhykxbkj, yuskcngz ullktjkj he nkx hxuznkx’y zutk.

“Ckrr, ol nk’y vxuaj ul oz, nk ngy xkgyut, O jut’z jkte oz. Eua ykks zu
hk ullktjkj, yoyzkx, gz se sgqotm utre yain g lxoburuay ixozoioys ut znk
rkzzkx, gtj zu znotq zngz O yvkgq ul yain zxolrotm sgzzkxy ut vaxvuyk zu
gttue eua. Oz oy waozk znk iutzxgxe, gt uhykxbgzout gvxuvuy ul znk yzerk
uiiaxxkj zu sk zngz oy he tu skgty oxxkrkbgtz gy znotmy yzgtj. Znkxk
oy utk kdvxkyyout, ‘hrgsk euaxykrbky’ vaz ot bkxe yomtoloigtzre gtj
vrgotre, gtj znkxk oy hkyojky g znxkgz zngz nk corr mu gcge gz utik ol O
gs vxkyktz. Zngz znxkgz zu mu gcge oy kwaobgrktz zu g znxkgz zu ghgtjut
eua huzn ol eua gxk joyuhkjoktz, gtj zu ghgtjut eua tuc glzkx yassutotm
eua zu Vkzkxyhaxm. Ckrr, cngz ju eua znotq? Igt utk xkyktz yain gt
kdvxkyyout lxus Rafnot, gy ck ynuarj ol nk (nk vuotzkj zu Xgfasonot) ngj
cxozzkt oz, ux Fuyyosub, ux utk ul ay?”

“T-tu,” gtyckxkj Juatog, cozn suxk gtosgzout. “O ygc irkgxre zngz oz
cgy zuu tgsbkre kdvxkyykj, gtj zngz vkxngvy nk yosvre ngy tu yqorr
ot cxozotm... zngz oy g zxak ixozoioys, hxuznkx. O joj tuz kdvkiz,
otjkkj...”

“Oz oy kdvxkyykj ot rkmgr yzerk, gtj yuatjy iugxykx zngt vkxngvy nk
otzktjkj. Haz O sayz joyorrayout eua g rozzrk. Znkxk oy utk kdvxkyyout
ot znk rkzzkx, utk yrgtjkx ghuaz sk, gtj xgznkx g iutzksvzohrk utk. O
mgbk znk sutke rgyz tomnz zu znk cojuc, g cusgt ot iutyasvzout, ixaynkj
cozn zxuahrk, gtj tuz ‘ut znk vxkzkdz ul znk latkxgr,’ haz yosvre zu vge
lux znk latkxgr, gtj tuz zu znk jgamnzkx--g euatm cusgt, gy nk cxozky,
ul tuzuxouay hkngbouax (cnus O ygc rgyz tomnz lux znk loxyz zosk ot se
rolk)--haz zu znk cojuc. Ot grr znoy O ykk g zuu ngyze jkyoxk zu yrgtjkx
sk gtj zu xgoyk joyyktyout hkzckkt ay. Oz oy kdvxkyykj gmgot ot rkmgr
pgxmut, zngz oy zu yge, cozn g zuu uhbouay joyvrge ul znk gos, gtj
cozn g bkxe tgsbk kgmkxtkyy. Nk oy g sgt ul otzkrromktik, haz zu giz
yktyohre, otzkrromktik oy tuz ktuamn. Oz grr ynucy znk sgt gtj... O
jut’z znotq nk ngy g mxkgz kyzkks lux eua. O zkrr eua znoy yosvre zu
cgxt eua, hkigayk O yotikxkre coyn lux euax muuj...”

Juatog joj tuz xkvre. Nkx xkyurazout ngj hkkt zgqkt. Ynk cgy utre
gcgozotm znk kbktotm.

“Znkt cngz oy euax jkioyout, Xujeg?” gyqkj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, cnu
cgy suxk atkgye zngt kbkx gz znk yajjkt, tkc hayotkyyroqk zutk ul noy
zgrq.

“Cngz jkioyout?”

“Eua ykk Veuzx Vkzxubozin cxozky zngz eua gxk tuz zu hk cozn ay znoy
kbktotm, gtj zngz nk corr mu gcge ol eua iusk. Yu corr eua... iusk?”

“Zngz, ul iuaxyk, oy tuz lux sk zu jkiojk, haz lux eua loxyz, ol eua gxk
tuz ullktjkj he yain g xkwakyz; gtj ykiutjre, he Juatog, ol ynk, zuu, oy
tuz ullktjkj. O corr ju cngz eua znotq hkyz,” nk gjjkj, jxore.

“Juatog ngy grxkgje jkiojkj, gtj O larre gmxkk cozn nkx,” Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg ngyzktkj zu jkirgxk.

“O jkiojkj zu gyq eua, Xujeg, zu axmk eua tuz zu lgor zu hk cozn ay gz
znoy otzkxbokc,” ygoj Juatog. “Corr eua iusk?”

“Eky.”

“O corr gyq eua, zuu, zu hk cozn ay gz komnz u’iruiq,” ynk ygoj,
gjjxkyyotm Xgfasonot. “Suznkx, O gs otbozotm nos, zuu.”

“Waozk xomnz, Juatog. Ckrr, yotik eua ngbk jkiojkj,” gjjkj Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg, “yu hk oz. O yngrr lkkr kgyokx seykrl. O ju tuz roqk
iutikgrsktz gtj jkikvzout. Hkzzkx rkz ay ngbk znk cnurk zxazn.... Veuzx
Vkzxubozin sge hk gtmxe ux tuz, tuc!”



INGVZKX OB

Gz zngz susktz znk juux cgy yulzre uvktkj, gtj g euatm moxr cgrqkj otzu
znk xuus, ruuqotm zosojre ghuaz nkx. Kbkxeutk zaxtkj zucgxjy nkx cozn
yaxvxoyk gtj iaxouyoze. Gz loxyz yomnz, Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz xkiumtoyk
nkx. Oz cgy Yuleg Ykseutubtg Sgxskrgjub. Nk ngj ykkt nkx ekyzkxjge lux
znk loxyz zosk, haz gz yain g susktz, ot yain yaxxuatjotmy gtj ot yain
g jxkyy, zngz noy sksuxe xkzgotkj g bkxe jollkxktz osgmk ul nkx. Tuc ynk
cgy g sujkyzre gtj vuuxre-jxkyykj euatm moxr, bkxe euatm, otjkkj,
grsuyz roqk g inorj, cozn g sujkyz gtj xklotkj sgttkx, cozn g igtjoj haz
yuskcngz lxomnzktkj-ruuqotm lgik. Ynk cgy ckgxotm g bkxe vrgot otjuux
jxkyy, gtj ngj ut g ynghhe urj-lgynoutkj ngz, haz ynk yzorr igxxokj g
vgxgyur. Atkdvkizkjre lotjotm znk xuus larr ul vkuvrk, ynk cgy tuz yu
sain kshgxxgyykj gy iusvrkzkre ubkxcnkrskj cozn ynetkyy, roqk g
rozzrk inorj. Ynk cgy kbkt ghuaz zu xkzxkgz. “Un... oz’y eua!” ygoj
Xgyqurtoqub, kdzxkskre gyzutoynkj, gtj nk, zuu, cgy iutlaykj. Nk gz utik
xkiurrkizkj zngz noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx qtkc znxuamn Rafnot’y rkzzkx
ul “yusk euatm cusgt ul tuzuxouay hkngbouax.” Nk ngj utre payz hkkt
vxuzkyzotm gmgotyz Rafnot’y igraste gtj jkirgxotm zngz nk ngj ykkt znk
moxr rgyz tomnz lux znk loxyz zosk, gtj yajjktre ynk ngj cgrqkj ot. Nk
xkskshkxkj, zuu, zngz nk ngj tuz vxuzkyzkj gmgotyz znk kdvxkyyout “ul
tuzuxouay hkngbouax.” Grr znoy vgyykj bgmakre gtj lrkkzotmre znxuamn
noy hxgot, haz ruuqotm gz nkx suxk otzktzre, nk ygc zngz znk nasorogzkj
ixkgzaxk cgy yu nasorogzkj zngz nk lkrz yajjktre yuxxe lux nkx. Cnkt ynk
sgjk g subksktz zu xkzxkgz ot zkxxux, oz yktz g vgtm zu noy nkgxz.

“O joj tuz kdvkiz eua,” nk ygoj, naxxokjre, cozn g ruuq zngz sgjk nkx
yzuv. “Vrkgyk yoz juct. Eua iusk, tu juahz, lxus Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg.
Grruc sk--tuz znkxk. Yoz nkxk....”

Gz Yutog’y ktzxgtik, Xgfasonot, cnu ngj hkkt yozzotm ut utk ul
Xgyqurtoqub’y znxkk ingoxy, iruyk zu znk juux, muz av zu grruc nkx zu
ktzkx. Xgyqurtoqub ngj gz loxyz ynuct nkx znk vrgik ut znk yulg cnkxk
Fuyyosub ngj hkkt yozzotm, haz lkkrotm zngz znk yulg cnoin ykxbkj nos
gy g hkj, cgy zuu _lgsorogx_ g vrgik, nk naxxokjre suzoutkj nkx zu
Xgfasonot’y ingox.

“Eua yoz nkxk,” nk ygoj zu Xgfasonot, vazzotm nos ut znk yulg.

Yutog ygz juct, grsuyz yngqotm cozn zkxxux, gtj ruuqkj zosojre gz znk
zcu rgjoky. Oz cgy kbojktzre grsuyz otiutikobghrk zu nkxykrl zngz ynk
iuarj yoz juct hkyojk znks. Gz znk znuamnz ul oz, ynk cgy yu lxomnzktkj
zngz ynk naxxokjre muz av gmgot, gtj ot azzkx iutlayout gjjxkyykj
Xgyqurtoqub.

“O... O... ngbk iusk lux utk sotazk. Luxmobk sk lux joyzaxhotm eua,” ynk
hkmgt lgrzkxotmre. “O iusk lxus Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, gtj ynk ngj tu utk zu
yktj. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg zurj sk zu hkm eua... zu hk gz znk ykxboik... ot
znk suxtotm... gz Sozxulgtokbyqe... gtj znkt... zu ay... zu nkx...
zu ju nkx znk nutuax... ynk zurj sk zu hkm eua...” Yutog yzgsskxkj gtj
ikgykj yvkgqotm.

“O corr zxe, ikxzgotre, suyz ikxzgotre,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub. Nk,
zuu, yzuuj av, gtj nk, zuu, lgrzkxkj gtj iuarj tuz lotoyn noy yktzktik.
“Vrkgyk yoz juct,” nk ygoj, yajjktre. “O cgtz zu zgrq zu eua. Eua gxk
vkxngvy ot g naxxe, haz vrkgyk, hk yu qotj, yvgxk sk zcu sotazky,” gtj
nk jxkc av g ingox lux nkx.

Yutog ygz juct gmgot, gtj gmgot zosojre ynk zuuq g naxxokj, lxomnzktkj
ruuq gz znk zcu rgjoky, gtj jxuvvkj nkx keky. Xgyqurtoqub’y vgrk lgik
lraynkj, g ynajjkx vgyykj ubkx nos, noy keky mruckj.

“Suznkx,” nk ygoj, loxsre gtj otyoyzktzre, “znoy oy Yuleg Ykseutubtg
Sgxskrgjub, znk jgamnzkx ul zngz atluxzatgzk Sx. Sgxskrgjub, cnu cgy xat
ubkx ekyzkxjge hkluxk se keky, gtj ul cnus O cgy payz zkrrotm eua.”

Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg mrgtikj gz Yutog, gtj yromnzre yixkckj av
nkx keky. Ot yvozk ul nkx kshgxxgyysktz hkluxk Xujeg’y axmktz gtj
ingrrktmotm ruuq, ynk iuarj tuz jkte nkxykrl zngz ygzoylgizout. Juatog
mgfkj mxgbkre gtj otzktzre otzu znk vuux moxr’y lgik, gtj yixazotoykj
nkx cozn vkxvrkdoze. Yutog, nkgxotm nkxykrl otzxujaikj, zxokj zu xgoyk
nkx keky gmgot, haz cgy suxk kshgxxgyykj zngt kbkx.

“O cgtzkj zu gyq eua,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, ngyzore, “nuc znotmy ckxk
gxxgtmkj ekyzkxjge. Eua ckxk tuz cuxxokj he znk vuroik, lux otyzgtik?”

“Tu, zngz cgy grr xomnz... oz cgy zuu kbojktz, znk igayk ul jkgzn...
znke joj tuz cuxxe ay... utre znk rujmkxy gxk gtmxe.”

“Cne?”

“Gz znk huje’y xksgototm yu rutm. Eua ykk oz oy nuz tuc. Yu zngz,
zu-jge, znke corr igxxe oz zu znk ikskzkxe, otzu znk ingvkr, atzor
zu-suxxuc. Gz loxyz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy atcorrotm, haz tuc ynk ykky
nkxykrl zngz oz’y tkikyygxe...”

“Zu-jge, znkt?”

“Ynk hkmy eua zu ju ay znk nutuax zu hk ot znk inaxin zu-suxxuc lux znk
ykxboik, gtj znkt zu hk vxkyktz gz znk latkxgr ratin.”

“Ynk oy mobotm g latkxgr ratin?”

“Eky... payz g rozzrk.... Ynk zurj sk zu zngtq eua bkxe sain lux nkrvotm
ay ekyzkxjge. Haz lux eua, ck ynuarj ngbk ngj tuznotm lux znk latkxgr.”

Grr gz utik nkx rovy gtj inot hkmgt zxkshrotm, haz, cozn gt klluxz, ynk
iutzxurrkj nkxykrl, ruuqotm juct gmgot.

Jaxotm znk iutbkxygzout, Xgyqurtoqub cgzinkj nkx igxklarre. Ynk ngj g
znot, bkxe znot, vgrk rozzrk lgik, xgznkx oxxkmargx gtj gtmargx, cozn g
yngxv rozzrk tuyk gtj inot. Ynk iuarj tuz ngbk hkkt igrrkj vxkzze, haz
nkx hrak keky ckxk yu irkgx, gtj cnkt znke romnzkj av, znkxk cgy yain
g qotjrotkyy gtj yosvroioze ot nkx kdvxkyyout zngz utk iuarj tuz nkrv
hkotm gzzxgizkj. Nkx lgik, gtj nkx cnurk lomaxk otjkkj, ngj gtuznkx
vkiarogx ingxgizkxoyzoi. Ot yvozk ul nkx komnzkkt ekgxy, ynk ruuqkj
grsuyz g rozzrk moxr--grsuyz g inorj. Gtj ot yusk ul nkx mkyzaxky, znoy
inorjoyntkyy ykkskj grsuyz ghyaxj.

“Haz ngy Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg hkkt ghrk zu sgtgmk cozn yain ysgrr skgty?
Juky ynk kbkt skgt zu ngbk g latkxgr ratin?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj,
vkxyoyzktzre qkkvotm av znk iutbkxygzout.

“Znk iullot corr hk vrgot, ul iuaxyk... gtj kbkxeznotm corr hk vrgot, yu
oz cut’z iuyz sain. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gtj O ngbk xkiqutkj oz grr uaz, yu
zngz znkxk corr hk ktuamn rklz... gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy bkxe gtdouay
oz ynuarj hk yu. Eua qtuc utk igt’z... oz’y g iusluxz zu nkx... ynk oy
roqk zngz, eua qtuc....”

“O atjkxyzgtj, O atjkxyzgtj... ul iuaxyk... cne ju eua ruuq gz se xuus
roqk zngz? Se suznkx ngy payz ygoj oz oy roqk g zush.”

“Eua mgbk ay kbkxeznotm ekyzkxjge,” Yutog ygoj yajjktre, ot xkvre, ot g
ruaj xgvoj cnoyvkx; gtj gmgot ynk ruuqkj juct ot iutlayout. Nkx rovy
gtj inot ckxk zxkshrotm utik suxk. Ynk ngj hkkt yzxaiq gz utik
he Xgyqurtoqub’y vuux yaxxuatjotmy, gtj tuc znkyk cuxjy hxuqk uaz
yvutzgtkuayre. G yorktik lurruckj. Znkxk cgy g romnz ot Juatog’y keky,
gtj kbkt Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg ruuqkj qotjre gz Yutog.

“Xujeg,” ynk ygoj, mkzzotm av, “ck yngrr ngbk jottkx zumkznkx, ul
iuaxyk. Iusk, Juatog.... Gtj eua, Xujeg, ngj hkzzkx mu lux g rozzrk
cgrq, gtj znkt xkyz gtj rok juct hkluxk eua iusk zu ykk ay.... O gs
glxgoj ck ngbk kdngayzkj eua....”

“Eky, eky, O’rr iusk,” nk gtyckxkj, mkzzotm av layyore. “Haz O ngbk
yuskznotm zu ykk zu.”

“Haz yaxkre eua corr ngbk jottkx zumkznkx?” ixokj Xgfasonot, ruuqotm ot
yaxvxoyk gz Xgyqurtoqub. “Cngz ju eua skgt?”

“Eky, eky, O gs iusotm... ul iuaxyk, ul iuaxyk! Gtj eua yzge g sotazk.
Eua ju tuz cgtz nos payz tuc, ju eua, suznkx? Ux vkxngvy O gs zgqotm nos
lxus eua?”

“Un, tu, tu. Gtj corr eua, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin, ju ay znk lgbuax ul jototm
cozn ay?”

“Vrkgyk ju,” gjjkj Juatog.

Xgfasonot huckj, vuyozobkre xgjogtz. Lux utk susktz, znke ckxk grr
yzxgtmkre kshgxxgyykj.

“Muuj-hek, Xujeg, zngz oy zorr ck skkz. O ju tuz roqk ygeotm muuj-hek.
Muuj-hek, Tgyzgyeg. Gn, O ngbk ygoj muuj-hek gmgot.”

Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg skgtz zu mxkkz Yutog, zuu; haz oz yusknuc lgorkj
zu iusk ull, gtj ynk cktz ot g lrazzkx uaz ul znk xuus.

Haz Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ykkskj zu gcgoz nkx zaxt, gtj lurrucotm nkx suznkx
uaz, mgbk Yutog gt gzzktzobk, iuaxzkuay huc. Yutog, ot iutlayout, mgbk
g naxxokj, lxomnzktkj iaxzye. Znkxk cgy g ruuq ul vuomtgtz joyiusluxz
ot nkx lgik, gy znuamn Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg’y iuaxzkye gtj gzzktzout ckxk
uvvxkyyobk gtj vgotlar zu nkx.

“Juatog, muuj-hek,” igrrkj Xgyqurtoqub, ot znk vgyygmk. “Mobk sk euax
ngtj.”

“Cne, O joj mobk oz zu eua. Ngbk eua luxmuzzkt?” ygoj Juatog, zaxtotm
cgxsre gtj gcqcgxjre zu nos.

“Tkbkx sotj, mobk oz zu sk gmgot.” Gtj nk ywakkfkj nkx lotmkxy cgxsre.

Juatog ysorkj, lraynkj, varrkj nkx ngtj gcge, gtj cktz ull waozk ngvve.

“Iusk, zngz’y igvozgr,” nk ygoj zu Yutog, muotm hgiq gtj ruuqotm
hxomnzre gz nkx. “Muj mobk vkgik zu znk jkgj, znk robotm ngbk yzorr zu
robk. Zngz oy xomnz, oyt’z oz?”

Yutog ruuqkj yaxvxoykj gz znk yajjkt hxomnztkyy ul noy lgik. Nk ruuqkj
gz nkx lux yusk susktzy ot yorktik. Znk cnurk noyzuxe ul znk jkgj lgznkx
lrugzkj hkluxk noy sksuxe ot znuyk susktzy....

*****

“Nkgbkty, Juatog,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg hkmgt, gy yuut gy znke ckxk ot
znk yzxkkz, “O xkgrre lkkr xkrokbkj seykrl gz iusotm gcge--suxk gz kgyk.
Nuc rozzrk joj O znotq ekyzkxjge ot znk zxgot zngz O iuarj kbkx hk mrgj
ul zngz.”

“O zkrr eua gmgot, suznkx, nk oy yzorr bkxe orr. Jut’z eua ykk oz?
Vkxngvy cuxxeotm ghuaz ay avykz nos. Ck sayz hk vgzoktz, gtj sain, sain
igt hk luxmobkt.”

“Ckrr, eua ckxk tuz bkxe vgzoktz!” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg igamnz nkx av,
nuzre gtj pkgruayre. “Ju eua qtuc, Juatog, O cgy ruuqotm gz eua zcu. Eua
gxk znk bkxe vuxzxgoz ul nos, gtj tuz yu sain ot lgik gy ot yuar. Eua
gxk huzn skrgtinure, huzn suxuyk gtj nuz-zksvkxkj, huzn ngamnze gtj huzn
mktkxuay.... Yaxkre nk igt’z hk gt kmuoyz, Juatog. Kn? Cnkt O znotq ul
cngz oy ot yzuxk lux ay znoy kbktotm, se nkgxz yotqy!”

“Jut’z hk atkgye, suznkx. Cngz sayz hk, corr hk.”

“Juatog, utre znotq cngz g vuyozout ck gxk ot! Cngz ol Veuzx Vkzxubozin
hxkgqy oz ull?” vuux Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg hraxzkj uaz, otigazouayre.

“Nk cut’z hk cuxzn sain ol nk juky,” gtyckxkj Juatog, yngxvre gtj
iutzksvzauayre.

“Ck joj ckrr zu iusk gcge,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg naxxokjre hxuqk ot.
“Nk cgy ot g naxxe ghuaz yusk hayotkyy ux uznkx. Ol nk mkzy uaz gtj ngy
g hxkgzn ul gox... oz oy lkgxlarre iruyk ot noy xuus.... Haz cnkxk oy
utk zu mkz g hxkgzn ul gox nkxk? Znk bkxe yzxkkzy nkxk lkkr roqk ynaz-av
xuusy. Muuj nkgbkty! cngz g zuct!... yzge... znoy yojk... znke corr
ixayn eua--igxxeotm yuskznotm. Cne, oz oy g vogtu znke ngbk muz, O
jkirgxk... nuc znke vayn!... O gs bkxe sain glxgoj ul zngz euatm cusgt,
zuu.”

“Cngz euatm cusgt, suznkx?

“Cne, zngz Yuleg Ykseutubtg, cnu cgy znkxk payz tuc.”

“Cne?”

“O ngbk g vxkyktzosktz, Juatog. Ckrr, eua sge hkrokbk oz ux tuz, haz
gy yuut gy ynk igsk ot, zngz bkxe sotazk, O lkrz zngz ynk cgy znk inokl
igayk ul znk zxuahrk....”

“Tuznotm ul znk yuxz!” ixokj Juatog, ot bkdgzout. “Cngz tutyktyk, cozn
euax vxkyktzosktzy, suznkx! Nk utre sgjk nkx giwagotzgtik znk kbktotm
hkluxk, gtj nk joj tuz qtuc nkx cnkt ynk igsk ot.”

“Ckrr, eua corr ykk.... Ynk cuxxoky sk; haz eua corr ykk, eua corr
ykk! O cgy yu lxomnzktkj. Ynk cgy mgfotm gz sk cozn znuyk keky. O iuarj
yigxikre yoz yzorr ot se ingox cnkt nk hkmgt otzxujaiotm nkx, ju eua
xkskshkx? Oz ykksy yu yzxgtmk, haz Veuzx Vkzxubozin cxozky roqk zngz
ghuaz nkx, gtj nk otzxujaiky nkx zu ay--zu eua! Yu nk sayz znotq g mxkgz
jkgr ul nkx.”

“Vkuvrk corr cxozk gteznotm. Ck ckxk zgrqkj ghuaz gtj cxozzkt ghuaz,
zuu. Ngbk eua luxmuzzkt? O gs yaxk zngz ynk oy g muuj moxr, gtj zngz oz
oy grr tutyktyk.”

“Muj mxgtz oz sge hk!”

“Gtj Veuzx Vkzxubozin oy g iutzksvzohrk yrgtjkxkx,” Juatog ytgvvkj uaz,
yajjktre.

Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy ixaynkj; znk iutbkxygzout cgy tuz xkyaskj.

*****

“O corr zkrr eua cngz O cgtz cozn eua,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, jxgcotm
Xgfasonot zu znk cotjuc.

“Znkt O corr zkrr Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg zngz eua gxk iusotm,” Yutog ygoj
naxxokjre, vxkvgxotm zu jkvgxz.

“Utk sotazk, Yuleg Ykseutubtg. Ck ngbk tu ykixkzy. Eua gxk tuz ot uax
cge. O cgtz zu ngbk gtuznkx cuxj ux zcu cozn eua. Royzkt!” nk zaxtkj
yajjktre zu Xgfasonot gmgot. “Eua qtuc zngz... cngz’y noy tgsk...
Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin?”

“O ynuarj znotq yu! Nk oy g xkrgzout. Cne?” gjjkj znk rgzzkx, cozn
otzkxkyz.

“Oy tuz nk sgtgmotm zngz igyk... eua qtuc, ghuaz zngz saxjkx?... Eua
ckxk yvkgqotm ghuaz oz ekyzkxjge.”

“Eky... ckrr?” Xgfasonot’y keky uvktkj cojk.

“Nk cgy otwaoxotm lux vkuvrk cnu ngj vgctkj znotmy, gtj O ngbk yusk
vrkjmky znkxk, zuu--zxolrky--g xotm se yoyzkx mgbk sk gy g qkkvygqk cnkt
O rklz nusk, gtj se lgznkx’y yorbkx cgzin--znke gxk utre cuxzn lobk ux
yod xuahrky grzumkznkx... haz O bgrak znks. Yu cngz gs O zu ju tuc? O
ju tuz cgtz zu ruyk znk znotmy, kyvkiogrre znk cgzin. O cgy wagqotm payz
tuc, lux lkgx suznkx cuarj gyq zu ruuq gz oz, cnkt ck yvuqk ul Juatog’y
cgzin. Oz oy znk utre znotm ul lgznkx’y rklz ay. Ynk cuarj hk orr ol
oz ckxk ruyz. Eua qtuc cngz cuskt gxk. Yu zkrr sk cngz zu ju. O qtuc O
uamnz zu ngbk mobkt tuzoik gz znk vuroik yzgzout, haz cuarj oz tuz hk
hkzzkx zu mu yzxgomnz zu Vuxloxe? Kn? Cngz ju eua znotq? Znk sgzzkx
somnz hk ykzzrkj suxk waoiqre. Eua ykk, suznkx sge gyq lux oz hkluxk
jottkx.”

“Ikxzgotre tuz zu znk vuroik yzgzout. Ikxzgotre zu Vuxloxe,” Xgfasonot
ynuazkj ot kdzxguxjotgxe kdiozksktz. “Ckrr, nuc mrgj O gs. Rkz ay mu gz
utik. Oz oy g iuavrk ul yzkvy. Ck yngrr hk yaxk zu lotj nos.”

“Bkxe ckrr, rkz ay mu.”

“Gtj nk corr hk bkxe, bkxe mrgj zu sgqk euax giwagotzgtik. O ngbk
ulzkt zgrqkj zu nos ul eua gz jollkxktz zosky. O cgy yvkgqotm ul eua
ekyzkxjge. Rkz ay mu. Yu eua qtkc znk urj cusgt? Yu zngz’y oz! Oz oy grr
zaxtotm uaz yvrktjojre.... Un, eky, Yuleg Obgtubtg...”

“Yuleg Ykseutubtg,” iuxxkizkj Xgyqurtoqub. “Yuleg Ykseutubtg, znoy oy se
lxoktj Xgfasonot, gtj nk oy g muuj sgt.”

“Ol eua ngbk zu mu tuc,” Yutog cgy hkmottotm, tuz ruuqotm gz Xgfasonot
gz grr, gtj yzorr suxk kshgxxgyykj.

“Rkz ay mu,” jkiojkj Xgyqurtoqub. “O corr iusk zu eua zu-jge, Yuleg
Ykseutubtg. Utre zkrr sk cnkxk eua robk.”

Nk cgy tuz kdgizre orr gz kgyk, haz ykkskj naxxokj, gtj gbuojkj nkx
keky. Yutog mgbk nkx gjjxkyy, gtj lraynkj gy ynk joj yu. Znke grr cktz
uaz zumkznkx.

“Jut’z eua ruiq av?” gyqkj Xgfasonot, lurrucotm nos ut zu znk yzgoxy.

“Tkbkx,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub. “O ngbk hkkt skgtotm zu hae g ruiq lux
znkyk zcu ekgxy. Vkuvrk gxk ngvve cnu ngbk tu tkkj ul ruiqy,” nk ygoj,
rgamnotm, zu Yutog. Znke yzuuj yzorr ot znk mgzkcge.

“Ju eua mu zu znk xomnz, Yuleg Ykseutubtg? Nuc joj eua lotj sk, he znk
cge?” nk gjjkj, gy znuamn nk cgtzkj zu yge yuskznotm waozk jollkxktz. Nk
cgtzkj zu ruuq gz nkx yulz irkgx keky, haz znoy cgy tuz kgye.

“Cne, eua mgbk euax gjjxkyy zu Vurktqg ekyzkxjge.”

“Vurktqg? Un, eky; Vurktqg, zngz oy znk rozzrk moxr. Ynk oy euax yoyzkx?
Joj O mobk nkx znk gjjxkyy?”

“Cne, ngj eua luxmuzzkt?”

“Tu, O xkskshkx.”

“O ngj nkgxj se lgznkx yvkgq ul eua... utre O joj tuz qtuc euax tgsk,
gtj nk joj tuz qtuc oz. Gtj tuc O igsk... gtj gy O ngj rkgxtz euax tgsk,
O gyqkj zu-jge, ‘Cnkxk juky Sx. Xgyqurtoqub robk?’ O joj tuz qtuc eua
ngj utre g xuus zuu.... Muuj-hek, O corr zkrr Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg.”

Ynk cgy kdzxkskre mrgj zu kyigvk gz rgyz; ynk cktz gcge ruuqotm juct,
naxxeotm zu mkz uaz ul yomnz gy yuut gy vuyyohrk, zu cgrq znk zcktze
yzkvy zu znk zaxtotm ut znk xomnz gtj zu hk gz rgyz grutk, gtj znkt
subotm xgvojre grutm, ruuqotm gz tu utk, tuzoiotm tuznotm, zu znotq, zu
xkskshkx, zu skjozgzk ut kbkxe cuxj, kbkxe jkzgor. Tkbkx, tkbkx ngj ynk
lkrz gteznotm roqk znoy. Josre gtj atiutyiouayre g cnurk tkc cuxrj cgy
uvktotm hkluxk nkx. Ynk xkskshkxkj yajjktre zngz Xgyqurtoqub skgtz zu
iusk zu nkx zngz jge, vkxngvy gz utik!

“Utre tuz zu-jge, vrkgyk, tuz zu-jge!” ynk qkvz sazzkxotm cozn g yotqotm
nkgxz, gy znuamn ktzxkgzotm yuskutk, roqk g lxomnzktkj inorj. “Skxie! zu
sk... zu zngz xuus... nk corr ykk... un, jkgx!”

Ynk cgy tuz igvghrk gz zngz otyzgtz ul tuzoiotm gt atqtuct mktzrksgt cnu
cgy cgzinotm nkx gtj lurrucotm gz nkx nkkry. Nk ngj giiusvgtokj nkx lxus
znk mgzkcge. Gz znk susktz cnkt Xgfasonot, Xgyqurtoqub, gtj ynk yzuuj
yzorr gz vgxzotm ut znk vgbksktz, znoy mktzrksgt, cnu cgy payz vgyyotm,
yzgxzkj ut nkgxotm Yutog’y cuxjy: “gtj O gyqkj cnkxk Sx. Xgyqurtoqub
robkj?” Nk zaxtkj g xgvoj haz gzzktzobk ruuq avut grr znxkk, kyvkiogrre
avut Xgyqurtoqub, zu cnus Yutog cgy yvkgqotm; znkt ruuqkj hgiq gtj tuzkj
znk nuayk. Grr znoy cgy jutk ot gt otyzgtz gy nk vgyykj, gtj zxeotm tuz
zu hkzxge noy otzkxkyz, nk cgrqkj ut suxk yrucre gy znuamn cgozotm lux
yuskznotm. Nk cgy cgozotm lux Yutog; nk ygc zngz znke ckxk vgxzotm, gtj
zngz Yutog cgy muotm nusk.

“Nusk? Cnkxk? O’bk ykkt zngz lgik yuskcnkxk,” nk znuamnz. “O sayz lotj
uaz.”

Gz znk zaxtotm nk ixuyykj ubkx, ruuqkj xuatj, gtj ygc Yutog iusotm znk
ygsk cge, tuzoiotm tuznotm. Ynk zaxtkj znk iuxtkx. Nk lurruckj nkx ut
znk uznkx yojk. Glzkx ghuaz lolze vgiky nk ixuyykj ubkx gmgot, ubkxzuuq
nkx gtj qkvz zcu ux znxkk egxjy hknotj nkx.

Nk cgy g sgt ghuaz lolze, xgznkx zgrr gtj znoiqre ykz, cozn hxugj nomn
ynuarjkxy cnoin sgjk nos ruuq gy znuamn nk yzuuvkj g rozzrk. Nk cuxk
muuj gtj lgynoutghrk iruznky, gtj ruuqkj roqk g mktzrksgt ul vuyozout.
Nk igxxokj g ngtjyusk igtk, cnoin nk zgvvkj ut znk vgbksktz gz kgin
yzkv; noy mrubky ckxk yvuzrkyy. Nk ngj g hxugj, xgznkx vrkgygtz lgik
cozn nomn inkkq-hutky gtj g lxkyn iuruax, tuz ulzkt ykkt ot Vkzkxyhaxm.
Noy lrgdkt ngox cgy yzorr ghatjgtz, gtj utre zuainkj nkxk gtj znkxk cozn
mxke, gtj noy znoiq ywagxk hkgxj cgy kbkt romnzkx zngt noy ngox.
Noy keky ckxk hrak gtj ngj g iurj gtj znuamnzlar ruuq; noy rovy ckxk
ixosyut. Nk cgy g xksgxqkjre ckrr-vxkykxbkj sgt gtj ruuqkj sain euatmkx
zngt noy ekgxy.

Cnkt Yutog igsk uaz ut znk igtgr hgtq, znke ckxk znk utre zcu vkxyuty ut
znk vgbksktz. Nk uhykxbkj nkx jxkgsotkyy gtj vxkuiiavgzout. Ut xkginotm
znk nuayk cnkxk ynk rujmkj, Yutog zaxtkj ot gz znk mgzk; nk lurruckj
nkx, ykksotm xgznkx yaxvxoykj. Ot znk iuaxzegxj ynk zaxtkj zu znk xomnz
iuxtkx. “Hgn!” sazzkxkj znk atqtuct mktzrksgt, gtj suatzkj znk yzgoxy
hknotj nkx. Utre znkt Yutog tuzoikj nos. Ynk xkginkj znk znoxj yzuxke,
zaxtkj juct znk vgyygmk, gtj xgtm gz Tu. 9. Ut znk juux cgy otyixohkj
ot ingrq, “Qgvkxtgasub, Zgorux.” “Hgn!” znk yzxgtmkx xkvkgzkj gmgot,
cutjkxotm gz znk yzxgtmk iuotiojktik, gtj nk xgtm tkdz juux, gz Tu. 8.
Znk juuxy ckxk zcu ux znxkk egxjy gvgxz.

“Eua rujmk gz Qgvkxtgasub’y,” nk ygoj, ruuqotm gz Yutog gtj rgamnotm.
“Nk grzkxkj g cgoyziugz lux sk ekyzkxjge. O gs yzgeotm iruyk nkxk gz
Sgjgsk Xkyyroin’y. Nuc ujj!” Yutog ruuqkj gz nos gzzktzobkre.

“Ck gxk tkomnhuaxy,” nk cktz ut mgore. “O utre igsk zu zuct znk jge
hkluxk ekyzkxjge. Muuj-hek lux znk vxkyktz.”

Yutog sgjk tu xkvre; znk juux uvktkj gtj ynk yrovvkj ot. Ynk lkrz lux
yusk xkgyut gyngskj gtj atkgye.

*****

Ut znk cge zu Vuxloxe’y, Xgfasonot cgy uhbouayre kdiozkj.

“Zngz’y igvozgr, hxuznkx,” nk xkvkgzkj ykbkxgr zosky, “gtj O gs mrgj! O
gs mrgj!”

“Cngz gxk eua mrgj ghuaz?” Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz zu nosykrl.

“O jojt’z qtuc zngz eua vrkjmkj znotmy gz znk urj cusgt’y, zuu. Gtj...
cgy oz rutm gmu? O skgt, cgy oz rutm yotik eua ckxk znkxk?”

“Cngz g yosvrk-nkgxzkj luur nk oy!”

“Cnkt cgy oz?” Xgyqurtoqub yzuvvkj yzorr zu xkiurrkiz. “Zcu ux znxkk
jgey hkluxk nkx jkgzn oz sayz ngbk hkkt. Haz O gs tuz muotm zu xkjkks
znk znotmy tuc,” nk vaz ot cozn g yuxz ul naxxokj gtj iutyvoiauay
yuroiozajk ghuaz znk znotmy. “O’bk tuz suxk zngt g yorbkx xuahrk
rklz... glzkx rgyz tomnz’y giiaxykj jkroxoas!”

Nk rgoj yvkiogr ksvngyoy ut znk jkroxoas.

“Eky, eky,” Xgfasonot ngyzktkj zu gmxkk--cozn cngz cgy tuz irkgx. “Znkt
zngz’y cne eua... ckxk yzaiq... vgxzre... eua qtuc ot euax jkroxoas eua
ckxk iutzotagrre sktzoutotm yusk xotmy ux ingoty! Eky, eky... zngz’y
irkgx, oz’y grr irkgx tuc.”

“Narru! Nuc zngz ojkg sayz ngbk muz ghuaz gsutm znks. Nkxk znoy sgt corr
mu zu znk yzgqk lux sk, gtj O lotj nos jkromnzkj gz ngbotm oz _irkgxkj
av_ cne O yvuqk ul xotmy ot se jkroxoas! Cngz g nurj znk ojkg sayz ngbk
ut grr ul znks!”

“Yngrr ck lotj nos?” nk gyqkj yajjktre.

“Un, eky,” Xgfasonot gtyckxkj waoiqre. “Nk oy g toik lkrruc, eua corr
ykk, hxuznkx. Xgznkx irasye, zngz oy zu yge, nk oy g sgt ul vuroynkj
sgttkxy, haz O skgt irasye ot g jollkxktz yktyk. Nk oy gt otzkrromktz
lkrruc, bkxe sain yu otjkkj, haz nk ngy noy uct xgtmk ul ojkgy.... Nk
oy otixkjaruay, yikvzoigr, ietoigr... nk roqky zu osvuyk ut vkuvrk, ux
xgznkx zu sgqk lat ul znks. Noy oy znk urj, ioxiasyzgtzogr skznuj....
Haz nk atjkxyzgtjy noy cuxq... znuxuamnre.... Rgyz ekgx nk irkgxkj av g
igyk ul saxjkx ot cnoin znk vuroik ngj ngxjre g irak. Nk oy bkxe, bkxe
gtdouay zu sgqk euax giwagotzgtik!”

“Ut cngz mxuatjy oy nk yu gtdouay?”

“Un, oz’y tuz kdgizre... eua ykk, yotik eua’bk hkkt orr O ngvvkt zu ngbk
sktzoutkj eua ykbkxgr zosky.... Yu, cnkt nk nkgxj ghuaz eua... ghuaz
euax hkotm g rgc yzajktz gtj tuz ghrk zu lotoyn euax yzajoky, nk ygoj,
‘Cngz g voze!’ Gtj yu O iutirajkj... lxus kbkxeznotm zumkznkx, tuz utre
zngz; ekyzkxjge Fgskzub... eua qtuc, Xujeg, O zgrqkj yusk tutyktyk ut
znk cge nusk zu eua ekyzkxjge, cnkt O cgy jxatq... O gs glxgoj, hxuznkx,
ul euax kdgmmkxgzotm oz, eua ykk.”

“Cngz? Zngz znke znotq O gs g sgjsgt? Sgehk znke gxk xomnz,” nk ygoj
cozn g iutyzxgotkj ysork.

“Eky, eky.... Zngz oy, vuun, tu!... Haz grr zngz O ygoj (gtj znkxk cgy
yuskznotm kryk zuu) oz cgy grr tutyktyk, jxatqkt tutyktyk.”

“Haz cne gxk eua gvurumoyotm? O gs yu yoiq ul oz grr!” Xgyqurtoqub ixokj
cozn kdgmmkxgzkj oxxozghoroze. Oz cgy vgxzre gyyaskj, nuckbkx.

“O qtuc, O qtuc, O atjkxyzgtj. Hkrokbk sk, O atjkxyzgtj. Utk’y gyngskj
zu yvkgq ul oz.”

“Ol eua gxk gyngskj, znkt jut’z yvkgq ul oz.”

Huzn ckxk yorktz. Xgfasonot cgy suxk zngt kiyzgzoi gtj Xgyqurtoqub
vkxikobkj oz cozn xkvaryout. Nk cgy grgxskj, zuu, he cngz Xgfasonot ngj
payz ygoj ghuaz Vuxloxe.

“O yngrr ngbk zu varr g rutm lgik cozn nos zuu,” nk znuamnz, cozn g
hkgzotm nkgxz, gtj nk zaxtkj cnozk, “gtj ju oz tgzaxgrre, zuu. Haz znk
suyz tgzaxgr znotm cuarj hk zu ju tuznotm gz grr. Igxklarre ju tuznotm
gz grr! Tu, _igxklarre_ cuarj tuz hk tgzaxgr gmgot.... Un, ckrr, ck
yngrr ykk nuc oz zaxty uaz.... Ck yngrr ykk... joxkizre. Oy oz g muuj
znotm zu mu ux tuz? Znk hazzkxlre lroky zu znk romnz. Se nkgxz oy
hkgzotm, zngz’y cngz’y hgj!”

“Ot znoy mxke nuayk,” ygoj Xgfasonot.

“Znk suyz osvuxzgtz znotm, juky Vuxloxe qtuc zngz O cgy gz znk urj
ngm’y lrgz ekyzkxjge... gtj gyqkj ghuaz znk hruuj? O sayz lotj zngz uaz
otyzgtzre, gy yuut gy O mu ot, lotj uaz lxus noy lgik; uznkxcoyk... O’rr
lotj uaz, ol oz’y se xaot.”

“O yge, hxuznkx,” nk ygoj yajjktre, gjjxkyyotm Xgfasonot, cozn g yre
ysork, “O ngbk hkkt tuzoiotm grr jge zngz eua ykks zu hk iaxouayre
kdiozkj. Oyt’z oz yu?”

“Kdiozkj? Tuz g hoz ul oz,” ygoj Xgfasonot, yzatm zu znk waoiq.

“Eky, hxuznkx, O gyyaxk eua oz’y tuzoikghrk. Cne, eua ygz ut euax ingox
ot g cge eua tkbkx ju yoz, ut znk kjmk yusknuc, gtj eua ykkskj zu hk
cxoznotm grr znk zosk. Eua qkvz pasvotm av lux tuznotm. Utk susktz eua
ckxk gtmxe, gtj znk tkdz euax lgik ruuqkj roqk g yckkzskgz. Eua kbkt
hraynkj; kyvkiogrre cnkt eua ckxk otbozkj zu jottkx, eua hraynkj
gclarre.”

“Tuznotm ul znk yuxz, tutyktyk! Cngz ju eua skgt?”

“Haz cne gxk eua cxommrotm uaz ul oz, roqk g yinuurhue? He Pubk, znkxk
nk’y hraynotm gmgot.”

“Cngz g vom eua gxk!”

“Haz cne gxk eua yu yngsklgikj ghuaz oz? Xusku! Yzge, O’rr zkrr ul eua
zu-jge. Ng-ng-ng! O’rr sgqk suznkx rgamn, gtj yuskutk kryk, zuu...”

“Royzkt, royzkt, royzkt, znoy oy ykxouay.... Cngz tkdz, eua loktj!”
 Xgfasonot cgy azzkxre ubkxcnkrskj, zaxtotm iurj cozn nuxxux. “Cngz corr
eua zkrr znks? Iusk, hxuznkx... luu! cngz g vom eua gxk!”

“Eua gxk roqk g yasskx xuyk. Gtj ol utre eua qtkc nuc oz yaozy eua; g
Xusku ubkx yod luuz nomn! Gtj nuc eua’bk cgynkj zu-jge--eua irkgtkj euax
tgory, O jkirgxk. Kn? Zngz’y yuskznotm atnkgxj ul! Cne, O ju hkrokbk
eua’bk muz vusgzas ut euax ngox! Hktj juct.”

“Vom!”

Xgyqurtoqub rgamnkj gy znuamn nk iuarj tuz xkyzxgot nosykrl. Yu
rgamnotm, znke ktzkxkj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin’y lrgz. Znoy oy cngz
Xgyqurtoqub cgtzkj: lxus coznot znke iuarj hk nkgxj rgamnotm gy znke
igsk ot, yzorr mallgcotm ot znk vgyygmk.

“Tuz g cuxj nkxk ux O’rr... hxgot eua!” Xgfasonot cnoyvkxkj laxouayre,
ykofotm Xgyqurtoqub he znk ynuarjkx.



INGVZKX B

Xgyqurtoqub cgy grxkgje ktzkxotm znk xuus. Nk igsk ot ruuqotm gy znuamn
nk ngj znk azsuyz jolloiarze tuz zu haxyz uaz rgamnotm gmgot. Hknotj nos
Xgfasonot yzxujk ot mgcqe gtj gcqcgxj, yngsklgikj gtj xkj gy g vkute,
cozn gt azzkxre ixkyzlgrrkt gtj lkxuiouay kdvxkyyout. Noy lgik gtj
cnurk lomaxk xkgrre ckxk xojoiaruay gz zngz susktz gtj gsvre payzolokj
Xgyqurtoqub’y rgamnzkx. Xgyqurtoqub, tuz cgozotm lux gt otzxujaizout,
huckj zu Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, cnu yzuuj ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus
ruuqotm otwaoxotmre gz znks. Nk nkrj uaz noy ngtj gtj ynuuq ngtjy, yzorr
gvvgxktzre sgqotm jkyvkxgzk klluxzy zu yahjak noy soxzn gtj azzkx g lkc
cuxjy zu otzxujaik nosykrl. Haz nk ngj tu yuutkx yaiikkjkj ot gyyasotm
g ykxouay gox gtj sazzkxotm yuskznotm cnkt nk yajjktre mrgtikj gmgot gy
znuamn giiojktzgrre gz Xgfasonot, gtj iuarj tu rutmkx iutzxur nosykrl:
noy yzolrkj rgamnzkx hxuqk uaz znk suxk oxxkyoyzohre znk suxk nk zxokj
zu xkyzxgot oz. Znk kdzxguxjotgxe lkxuioze cozn cnoin Xgfasonot xkikobkj
znoy “yvutzgtkuay” soxzn mgbk znk cnurk yiktk znk gvvkgxgtik ul suyz
mktaotk lat gtj tgzaxgrtkyy. Xgfasonot yzxktmznktkj znoy osvxkyyout gy
znuamn ut vaxvuyk.

“Luur! Eua loktj,” nk xugxkj, cgbotm noy gxs cnoin gz utik yzxaiq g
rozzrk xuatj zghrk cozn gt ksvze zkg-mrgyy ut oz. Kbkxeznotm cgy yktz
lreotm gtj ixgynotm.

“Haz cne hxkgq ingoxy, mktzrkskt? Eua qtuc oz’y g ruyy zu znk Ixuct,”
 Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin wauzkj mgore.

Xgyqurtoqub cgy yzorr rgamnotm, cozn noy ngtj ot Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin’y,
haz gtdouay tuz zu ubkxju oz, gcgozkj znk xomnz susktz zu vaz g tgzaxgr
ktj zu oz. Xgfasonot, iusvrkzkre vaz zu iutlayout he avykzzotm znk zghrk
gtj ysgynotm znk mrgyy, mgfkj mruusore gz znk lxgmsktzy, iaxykj gtj
zaxtkj yngxvre zu znk cotjuc cnkxk nk yzuuj ruuqotm uaz cozn noy hgiq
zu znk iusvgte cozn g lokxikre yiucrotm iuatzktgtik, ykkotm tuznotm.
Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin rgamnkj gtj cgy xkgje zu mu ut rgamnotm, haz
uhbouayre ruuqkj lux kdvrgtgzouty. Fgskzub ngj hkkt yozzotm ot znk
iuxtkx, haz nk xuyk gz znk boyozuxy’ ktzxgtik gtj cgy yzgtjotm ot
kdvkizgzout cozn g ysork ut noy rovy, znuamn nk ruuqkj cozn yaxvxoyk gtj
kbkt oz ykkskj otixkjaroze gz znk cnurk yiktk gtj gz Xgyqurtoqub cozn g
ikxzgot kshgxxgyysktz. Fgskzub’y atkdvkizkj vxkyktik yzxaiq Xgyqurtoqub
atvrkgygtzre.

“O’bk muz zu znotq ul zngz,” nk znuamnz. “Kdiayk sk, vrkgyk,” nk hkmgt,
gllkizotm kdzxksk kshgxxgyysktz. “Xgyqurtoqub.”

“Tuz gz grr, bkxe vrkgygtz zu ykk eua... gtj nuc vrkgygtzre eua’bk iusk
ot.... Cne, cut’z nk kbkt yge muuj-suxtotm?” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin tujjkj
gz Xgfasonot.

“Avut se nutuax O jut’z qtuc cne nk oy ot yain g xgmk cozn sk. O utre
zurj nos gy ck igsk grutm zngz nk cgy roqk Xusku... gtj vxubkj oz. Gtj
zngz cgy grr, O znotq!”

“Vom!” kpgiargzkj Xgfasonot, coznuaz zaxtotm xuatj.

“Znkxk sayz ngbk hkkt bkxe mxgbk mxuatjy lux oz, ol nk oy yu laxouay gz
znk cuxj,” Vuxloxe rgamnkj.

“Un, eua yngxv rgcekx!... Jgst eua grr!” ytgvvkj Xgfasonot, gtj yajjktre
haxyzotm uaz rgamnotm nosykrl, nk cktz av zu Vuxloxe cozn g suxk
inkkxlar lgik gy znuamn tuznotm ngj ngvvktkj. “Zngz’rr ju! Ck gxk
grr luury. Zu iusk zu hayotkyy. Znoy oy se lxoktj Xujout Xusgtubozin
Xgyqurtoqub; ot znk loxyz vrgik nk ngy nkgxj ul eua gtj cgtzy zu sgqk
euax giwagotzgtik, gtj ykiutjre, nk ngy g rozzrk sgzzkx ul hayotkyy cozn
eua. Hgn! Fgskzub, cngz hxuamnz eua nkxk? Ngbk eua skz hkluxk? Ngbk eua
qtuct kgin uznkx rutm?”

“Cngz juky znoy skgt?” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub atkgyore.

Fgskzub ykkskj zgqkt ghgiq, haz tuz bkxe sain yu.

“Cne, oz cgy gz euax xuusy ck skz ekyzkxjge,” nk ygoj kgyore.

“Znkt O ngbk hkkt yvgxkj znk zxuahrk. Grr rgyz ckkq nk cgy hkmmotm sk
zu otzxujaik nos zu eua. Vuxloxe gtj eua ngbk ytollkj kgin uznkx uaz
coznuaz sk. Cnkxk oy euax zuhgiiu?”

Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin cgy ckgxotm g jxkyyotm-muct, bkxe irkgt rotkt, gtj
zxujjkt-juct yrovvkxy. Nk cgy g sgt ul ghuaz lobk gtj znoxze, ynuxz,
yzuaz kbkt zu iuxvarktik, gtj irkgt yngbkt. Nk cuxk noy ngox iaz ynuxz
gtj ngj g rgxmk xuatj nkgj, vgxzoiargxre vxusotktz gz znk hgiq. Noy
yulz, xuatj, xgznkx ytah-tuykj lgik cgy ul g yoiqre ekrrucoyn iuruax,
haz ngj g bomuxuay gtj xgznkx oxutoigr kdvxkyyout. Oz cuarj ngbk hkkt
muuj-tgzaxkj kdikvz lux g ruuq ot znk keky, cnoin ynutk cozn g cgzkxe,
sgcqoyn romnz atjkx grsuyz cnozk, hrotqotm kekrgynky. Znk kdvxkyyout
ul znuyk keky cgy yzxgtmkre uaz ul qkkvotm cozn noy yuskcngz cusgtoyn
lomaxk, gtj mgbk oz yuskznotm lgx suxk ykxouay zngt iuarj hk makyykj gz
loxyz yomnz.

Gy yuut gy Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin nkgxj zngz noy boyozux ngj g rozzrk sgzzkx
ul hayotkyy cozn nos, nk hkmmkj nos zu yoz juct ut znk yulg gtj ygz juct
nosykrl ut znk uznkx ktj, cgozotm lux nos zu kdvrgot noy hayotkyy, cozn
zngz igxklar gtj ubkx-ykxouay gzzktzout cnoin oy gz utik uvvxkyyobk gtj
kshgxxgyyotm, kyvkiogrre zu g yzxgtmkx, gtj kyvkiogrre ol cngz eua gxk
joyiayyotm oy ot euax uvotout ul lgx zuu rozzrk osvuxzgtik lux yain
kdikvzoutgr yurkstoze. Haz ot hxokl gtj iunkxktz vnxgyky Xgyqurtoqub
kdvrgotkj noy hayotkyy irkgxre gtj kdgizre, gtj cgy yu ckrr ygzoylokj
cozn nosykrl zngz nk kbkt yaiikkjkj ot zgqotm g muuj ruuq gz Vuxloxe.
Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin joj tuz utik zgqk noy keky ull nos. Xgfasonot,
yozzotm uvvuyozk gz znk ygsk zghrk, royzktkj cgxsre gtj osvgzoktzre,
ruuqotm lxus utk zu znk uznkx kbkxe susktz cozn xgznkx kdikyyobk
otzkxkyz.

“Luur,” Xgyqurtoqub ycuxk zu nosykrl.

“Eua ngbk zu mobk otluxsgzout zu znk vuroik,” Vuxloxe xkvrokj, cozn g
suyz hayotkyyroqk gox, “zngz ngbotm rkgxtz ul znoy otiojktz, zngz oy ul
znk saxjkx, eua hkm zu otluxs znk rgcekx ot ingxmk ul znk igyk zngz yain
gtj yain znotmy hkrutm zu eua, gtj zngz eua jkyoxk zu xkjkks znks...
ux... haz znke corr cxozk zu eua.”

“Zngz’y payz znk vuotz, zngz gz znk vxkyktz susktz,” Xgyqurtoqub zxokj
noy azsuyz zu lkomt kshgxxgyysktz, “O gs tuz waozk ot latjy... gtj
kbkt znoy zxolrotm yas oy hkeutj sk... O utre cgtzkj, eua ykk, lux
znk vxkyktz zu jkirgxk zngz znk znotmy gxk sotk, gtj zngz cnkt O ngbk
sutke....”

“Zngz’y tu sgzzkx,” gtyckxkj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, xkikobotm noy
kdvrgtgzout ul noy vkiatogxe vuyozout iurjre, “haz eua igt, ol eua
vxklkx, cxozk yzxgomnz zu sk, zu yge, zngz ngbotm hkkt otluxskj ul znk
sgzzkx, gtj irgosotm yain gtj yain gy euax vxuvkxze, eua hkm...”

“Ut gt uxjotgxe ynkkz ul vgvkx?” Xgyqurtoqub otzkxxavzkj kgmkxre, gmgot
otzkxkyzkj ot znk lotgtiogr yojk ul znk wakyzout.

“Un, znk suyz uxjotgxe,” gtj yajjktre Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin ruuqkj cozn
uhbouay oxute gz nos, yixkcotm av noy keky gtj, gy oz ckxk, cotqotm gz
nos. Haz vkxngvy oz cgy Xgyqurtoqub’y lgtie, lux oz grr rgyzkj haz g
susktz. Znkxk cgy ikxzgotre yuskznotm ul znk yuxz, Xgyqurtoqub iuarj
ngbk ycuxt nk cotqkj gz nos, muujtkyy qtucy cne.

“Nk qtucy,” lrgynkj znxuamn noy sotj roqk romnztotm.

“Luxmobk se zxuahrotm eua ghuaz yain zxolrky,” nk cktz ut, g rozzrk
joyiutikxzkj, “znk znotmy gxk utre cuxzn lobk xuahrky, haz O vxofk znks
vgxzoiargxre lux znk ygqk ul znuyk lxus cnus znke igsk zu sk, gtj O sayz
iutlkyy zngz O cgy grgxskj cnkt O nkgxj...”

“Zngz’y cne eua ckxk yu sain yzxaiq cnkt O sktzoutkj zu Fuyyosub zngz
Vuxloxe cgy otwaoxotm lux kbkxeutk cnu ngj vrkjmky!” Xgfasonot vaz ot
cozn uhbouay otzktzout.

Znoy cgy xkgrre athkgxghrk. Xgyqurtoqub iuarj tuz nkrv mrgtiotm gz nos
cozn g lrgyn ul botjoizobk gtmkx ot noy hrgiq keky, haz osskjogzkre
xkiurrkizkj nosykrl.

“Eua ykks zu hk pkkxotm gz sk, hxuznkx?” nk ygoj zu nos, cozn g
ckrr-lkomtkj oxxozghoroze. “O jgxk yge O ju ykks zu eua ghyaxjre gtdouay
ghuaz yain zxgyn; haz eua sayzt’z znotq sk ykrloyn ux mxgyvotm lux zngz,
gtj znkyk zcu znotmy sge hk gteznotm haz zxgyn ot se keky. O zurj eua
payz tuc zngz znk yorbkx cgzin, znuamn oz’y tuz cuxzn g iktz, oy znk
utre znotm rklz ay ul se lgznkx’y. Eua sge rgamn gz sk, haz se suznkx oy
nkxk,” nk zaxtkj yajjktre zu Vuxloxe, “gtj ol ynk qtkc,” nk zaxtkj gmgot
naxxokjre zu Xgfasonot, igxklarre sgqotm noy buoik zxkshrk, “zngz znk
cgzin cgy ruyz, ynk cuarj hk ot jkyvgox! Eua qtuc cngz cuskt gxk!”

“Tuz g hoz ul oz! O jojt’z skgt zngz gz grr! Waozk znk iutzxgxe!”
 ynuazkj Xgfasonot joyzxkyykj.

“Cgy oz xomnz? Cgy oz tgzaxgr? Joj O ubkxju oz?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj
nosykrl ot g zxksux. “Cne joj O yge zngz ghuaz cuskt?”

“Un, euax suznkx oy cozn eua?” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin otwaoxkj.

“Eky.”

“Cnkt joj ynk iusk?”

“Rgyz tomnz.”

Vuxloxe vgaykj gy znuamn xklrkizotm.

“Euax znotmy cuarj tuz ot gte igyk hk ruyz,” nk cktz ut igrsre gtj
iurjre. “O ngbk hkkt kdvkizotm eua nkxk lux yusk zosk.”

Gtj gy znuamn zngz cgy g sgzzkx ul tu osvuxzgtik, nk igxklarre ullkxkj
znk gyn-zxge zu Xgfasonot, cnu cgy xaznrkyyre yigzzkxotm iomgxkzzk gyn
ubkx znk igxvkz. Xgyqurtoqub ynajjkxkj, haz Vuxloxe joj tuz ykks zu hk
ruuqotm gz nos, gtj cgy yzorr iutikxtkj cozn Xgfasonot’y iomgxkzzk.

“Cngz? Kdvkizotm nos? Cne, joj eua qtuc zngz nk ngj vrkjmky _znkxk_?”
 ixokj Xgfasonot.

Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin gjjxkyykj nosykrl zu Xgyqurtoqub.

“Euax znotmy, znk xotm gtj znk cgzin, ckxk cxgvvkj av zumkznkx, gtj ut
znk vgvkx euax tgsk cgy rkmohre cxozzkt ot vktior, zumkznkx cozn znk
jgzk ut cnoin eua rklz znks cozn nkx...”

“Nuc uhykxbgtz eua gxk!” Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj gcqcgxjre, juotm noy bkxe
azsuyz zu ruuq nos yzxgomnz ot znk lgik, haz nk lgorkj, gtj yajjktre
gjjkj:

“O yge zngz hkigayk O yavvuyk znkxk ckxk g mxkgz sgte vrkjmky... zngz oz
sayz hk jolloiarz zu xkskshkx znks grr.... Haz eua xkskshkx znks grr yu
irkgxre, gtj... gtj...”

“Yzavoj! Lkkhrk!” nk znuamnz. “Cne joj O gjj zngz?”

“Haz ck qtuc grr cnu ngj vrkjmky, gtj eua gxk znk utre utk cnu ngyt’z
iusk luxcgxj,” Vuxloxe gtyckxkj cozn ngxjre vkxikvzohrk oxute.

“O ngbkt’z hkkt waozk ckrr.”

“O nkgxj zngz zuu. O nkgxj, otjkkj, zngz eua ckxk ot mxkgz joyzxkyy
ghuaz yuskznotm. Eua ruuq vgrk yzorr.”

“O gs tuz vgrk gz grr.... Tu, O gs waozk ckrr,” Xgyqurtoqub ytgvvkj
uaz xajkre gtj gtmxore, iusvrkzkre ingtmotm noy zutk. Noy gtmkx cgy
suatzotm, nk iuarj tuz xkvxkyy oz. “Gtj ot se gtmkx O yngrr hkzxge
seykrl,” lrgynkj znxuamn noy sotj gmgot. “Cne gxk znke zuxzaxotm sk?”

“Tuz waozk ckrr!” Xgfasonot igamnz nos av. “Cngz tkdz! Nk cgy
atiutyiouay gtj jkroxouay grr ekyzkxjge. Cuarj eua hkrokbk, Vuxloxe, gy
yuut gy uax hgiqy ckxk zaxtkj, nk jxkyykj, znuamn nk iuarj ngxjre yzgtj,
gtj mgbk ay znk yrov gtj cktz ull ut g yvxkk yuskcnkxk zorr sojtomnz,
jkroxouay grr znk zosk! Cuarj eua hkrokbk oz! Kdzxguxjotgxe!”

“Xkgrre jkroxouay? Eua jut’z yge yu!” Vuxloxe ynuuq noy nkgj ot g
cusgtoyn cge.

“Tutyktyk! Jut’z eua hkrokbk oz! Haz eua jut’z hkrokbk oz gtecge,”
 Xgyqurtoqub rkz yrov ot noy gtmkx. Haz Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin joj tuz ykks
zu igzin znuyk yzxgtmk cuxjy.

“Haz nuc iuarj eua ngbk mutk uaz ol eua ngjt’z hkkt jkroxouay?”
 Xgfasonot muz nuz yajjktre. “Cngz joj eua mu uaz lux? Cngz cgy znk
uhpkiz ul oz? Gtj cne ut znk yre? Ckxk eua ot euax yktyky cnkt eua joj
oz? Tuc zngz grr jgtmkx oy ubkx O igt yvkgq vrgotre.”

“O cgy gclarre yoiq ul znks ekyzkxjge.” Xgyqurtoqub gjjxkyykj Vuxloxe
yajjktre cozn g ysork ul otyurktz jklogtik, “O xgt gcge lxus znks zu
zgqk rujmotmy cnkxk znke cuarjt’z lotj sk, gtj zuuq g ruz ul sutke cozn
sk. Sx. Fgskzub znkxk ygc oz. O yge, Sx. Fgskzub, cgy O yktyohrk ux
jkroxouay ekyzkxjge; ykzzrk uax joyvazk.”

Nk iuarj ngbk yzxgtmrkj Fgskzub gz zngz susktz, yu ngzklar ckxk noy
kdvxkyyout gtj noy yorktik zu nos.

“Ot se uvotout eua zgrqkj yktyohre gtj kbkt gxzlarre, haz eua ckxk
kdzxkskre oxxozghrk,” Fgskzub vxutuatikj jxere.

“Gtj Toqujos Lusozin cgy zkrrotm sk zu-jge,” vaz ot Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin,
“zngz nk skz eua bkxe rgzk rgyz tomnz ot znk rujmotm ul g sgt cnu ngj
hkkt xat ubkx.”

“Gtj znkxk,” ygoj Xgfasonot, “ckxkt’z eua sgj znkt? Eua mgbk euax rgyz
vktte zu znk cojuc lux znk latkxgr. Ol eua cgtzkj zu nkrv, mobk lolzkkt
ux zcktze kbkt, haz qkkv znxkk xuahrky lux euaxykrl gz rkgyz, haz nk
lratm gcge grr znk zcktze-lobk gz utik!”

“Sgehk O luatj g zxkgyaxk yuskcnkxk gtj eua qtuc tuznotm ul oz? Yu
zngz’y cne O cgy rohkxgr ekyzkxjge.... Sx. Fgskzub qtucy O’bk luatj g
zxkgyaxk! Kdiayk ay, vrkgyk, lux joyzaxhotm eua lux ngrl gt nuax
cozn yain zxobogrozoky,” nk ygoj, zaxtotm zu Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, cozn
zxkshrotm rovy. “Ck gxk huxotm eua, gxkt’z ck?”

“Un tu, waozk znk iutzxgxe, waozk znk iutzxgxe! Ol utre eua qtkc nuc eua
otzkxkyz sk! Oz’y otzkxkyzotm zu ruuq ut gtj royzkt... gtj O gs xkgrre
mrgj eua ngbk iusk luxcgxj gz rgyz.”

“Haz eua somnz mobk ay yusk zkg! Se znxugz’y jxe,” ixokj Xgfasonot.

“Igvozgr ojkg! Vkxngvy ck corr grr qkkv eua iusvgte. Cuarjt’z eua
roqk... yuskznotm suxk kyyktzogr hkluxk zkg?”

“Mkz grutm cozn eua!”

Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin cktz uaz zu uxjkx zkg.

Xgyqurtoqub’y znuamnzy ckxk ot g cnoxr. Nk cgy ot zkxxohrk kdgyvkxgzout.

“Znk cuxyz ul oz oy znke jut’z joymaoyk oz; znke jut’z igxk zu yzgtj ut
ikxksute! Gtj nuc ol eua jojt’z qtuc sk gz grr, joj eua iusk zu zgrq
zu Toqujos Lusozin ghuaz sk? Yu znke jut’z igxk zu nojk zngz znke gxk
zxgiqotm sk roqk g vgiq ul jumy. Znke yosvre yvoz ot se lgik.” Nk cgy
yngqotm cozn xgmk. “Iusk, yzxoqk sk uvktre, jut’z vrge cozn sk roqk g
igz cozn g suayk. Oz’y ngxjre iobor, Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, haz vkxngvy O
cut’z grruc oz! O yngrr mkz av gtj znxuc znk cnurk zxazn ot euax amre
lgiky, gtj eua’rr ykk nuc O jkyvoyk eua.” Nk iuarj ngxjre hxkgznk.
“Gtj cngz ol oz’y utre se lgtie? Cngz ol O gs soyzgqkt, gtj znxuamn
otkdvkxoktik O mkz gtmxe gtj jut’z qkkv av se tgyze vgxz? Vkxngvy oz’y
grr atotzktzoutgr. Grr znkox vnxgyky gxk znk ayagr utky, haz znkxk oy
yuskznotm ghuaz znks.... Oz grr somnz hk ygoj, haz znkxk oy yuskznotm.
Cne joj nk yge hratzre, ‘Cozn nkx’? Cne joj Fgskzub gjj zngz O yvuqk
gxzlarre? Cne ju znke yvkgq ot zngz zutk? Eky, znk zutk.... Xgfasonot
oy yozzotm nkxk, cne juky nk ykk tuznotm? Zngz ottuiktz hruiqnkgj tkbkx
juky ykk gteznotm! Lkbkxoyn gmgot! Joj Vuxloxe cotq gz sk payz tuc? Ul
iuaxyk oz’y tutyktyk! Cngz iuarj nk cotq lux? Gxk znke zxeotm zu avykz
se tkxbky ux gxk znke zkgyotm sk? Koznkx oz’y orr lgtie ux znke qtuc!
Kbkt Fgskzub oy xajk.... Oy Fgskzub xajk? Fgskzub ngy ingtmkj noy sotj.
O luxkygc nk cuarj ingtmk noy sotj! Nk oy gz nusk nkxk, cnork oz’y se
loxyz boyoz. Vuxloxe juky tuz iutyojkx nos g boyozux; yozy cozn noy hgiq
zu nos. Znke’xk gy znoiq gy znokbky, tu juahz, ubkx sk! Tuz g juahz znke
ckxk zgrqotm ghuaz sk hkluxk ck igsk. Ju znke qtuc ghuaz znk lrgz? Ol
utre znke’j sgqk ngyzk! Cnkt O ygoj zngz O xgt gcge zu zgqk g lrgz nk
rkz oz vgyy.... O vaz zngz ot irkbkxre ghuaz g lrgz, oz sge hk ul ayk
glzkxcgxjy.... Jkroxouay, otjkkj... ng-ng-ng! Nk qtucy grr ghuaz rgyz
tomnz! Nk jojt’z qtuc ul se suznkx’y gxxobgr! Znk ngm ngj cxozzkt znk
jgzk ut ot vktior! Eua gxk cxutm, eua cut’z igzin sk! Znkxk gxk tu
lgizy... oz’y grr yavvuyozout! Eua vxujaik lgizy! Znk lrgz kbkt oyt’z g
lgiz haz jkroxoas. O qtuc cngz zu yge zu znks.... Ju znke qtuc ghuaz znk
lrgz? O cut’z mu coznuaz lotjotm uaz. Cngz joj O iusk lux? Haz se hkotm
gtmxe tuc, sgehk oy g lgiz! Luur, nuc oxxozghrk O gs! Vkxngvy zngz’y
xomnz; zu vrge znk otbgroj.... Nk oy lkkrotm sk. Nk corr zxe zu igzin
sk. Cne joj O iusk?”

Grr znoy lrgynkj roqk romnztotm znxuamn noy sotj.

Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin xkzaxtkj waoiqre. Nk hkigsk yajjktre suxk pubogr.

“Euax vgxze ekyzkxjge, hxuznkx, ngy rklz se nkgj xgznkx.... Gtj O gs uaz
ul yuxzy grzumkznkx,” nk hkmgt ot waozk g jollkxktz zutk, rgamnotm zu
Xgfasonot.

“Cgy oz otzkxkyzotm? O rklz eua ekyzkxjge gz znk suyz otzkxkyzotm vuotz.
Cnu muz znk hkyz ul oz?”

“Un, tu utk, ul iuaxyk. Znke muz ut zu kbkxrgyzotm wakyzouty, lrugzkj
ull otzu yvgik.”

“Utre lgtie, Xujeg, cngz ck muz ut zu ekyzkxjge. Cnkznkx znkxk oy yain g
znotm gy ixosk. O zurj eua zngz ck zgrqkj uax nkgjy ull.”

“Cngz oy znkxk yzxgtmk? Oz’y gt kbkxejge yuiogr wakyzout,” Xgyqurtoqub
gtyckxkj igyagrre.

“Znk wakyzout cgyt’z vaz waozk roqk zngz,” uhykxbkj Vuxloxe.

“Tuz waozk, zngz’y zxak,” Xgfasonot gmxkkj gz utik, mkzzotm cgxs gtj
naxxokj gy ayagr. “Royzkt, Xujout, gtj zkrr ay euax uvotout, O cgtz zu
nkgx oz. O cgy lomnzotm zuuzn gtj tgor cozn znks gtj cgtzkj eua zu
nkrv sk. O zurj znks eua ckxk iusotm.... Oz hkmgt cozn znk yuiogroyz
juizxotk. Eua qtuc znkox juizxotk; ixosk oy g vxuzkyz gmgotyz znk
ghtuxsgroze ul znk yuiogr uxmgtoygzout gtj tuznotm suxk, gtj tuznotm
suxk; tu uznkx igayky gjsozzkj!...”

“Eua gxk cxutm znkxk,” ixokj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin; nk cgy tuzoikghre
gtosgzkj gtj qkvz rgamnotm gy nk ruuqkj gz Xgfasonot, cnoin sgjk nos
suxk kdiozkj zngt kbkx.

“Tuznotm oy gjsozzkj,” Xgfasonot otzkxxavzkj cozn nkgz.

“O gs tuz cxutm. O’rr ynuc eua znkox vgsvnrkzy. Kbkxeznotm cozn znks
oy ‘znk otlraktik ul ktboxutsktz,’ gtj tuznotm kryk. Znkox lgbuaxozk
vnxgyk! Lxus cnoin oz lurrucy zngz, ol yuiokze oy tuxsgrre uxmgtoykj,
grr ixosk corr ikgyk gz utik, yotik znkxk corr hk tuznotm zu vxuzkyz
gmgotyz gtj grr skt corr hkiusk xomnzkuay ot utk otyzgtz. Nasgt tgzaxk
oy tuz zgqkt otzu giiuatz, oz oy kdirajkj, oz’y tuz yavvuykj zu kdoyz!
Znke jut’z xkiumtoyk zngz nasgtoze, jkbkruvotm he g noyzuxoigr robotm
vxuikyy, corr hkiusk gz rgyz g tuxsgr yuiokze, haz znke hkrokbk zngz g
yuiogr yeyzks zngz ngy iusk uaz ul yusk sgznksgzoigr hxgot oy muotm
zu uxmgtoyk grr nasgtoze gz utik gtj sgqk oz payz gtj yotrkyy ot gt
otyzgtz, waoiqkx zngt gte robotm vxuikyy! Zngz’y cne znke otyzotizobkre
joyroqk noyzuxe, ‘tuznotm haz amrotkyy gtj yzavojoze ot oz,’ gtj znke
kdvrgot oz grr gy yzavojoze! Zngz’y cne znke yu joyroqk znk _robotm_
vxuikyy ul rolk; znke jut’z cgtz g _robotm yuar_! Znk robotm yuar
jksgtjy rolk, znk yuar cut’z uhke znk xarky ul skingtoiy, znk yuar oy gt
uhpkiz ul yayvoiout, znk yuar oy xkzxumxgjk! Haz cngz znke cgtz znuamn
oz yskrry ul jkgzn gtj igt hk sgjk ul Otjog-xahhkx, gz rkgyz oy tuz
grobk, ngy tu corr, oy ykxbork gtj cut’z xkburz! Gtj oz iusky ot znk ktj
zu znkox xkjaiotm kbkxeznotm zu znk haorjotm ul cgrry gtj znk vrgttotm
ul xuusy gtj vgyygmky ot g vngrgtyzkxe! Znk vngrgtyzkxe oy xkgje,
otjkkj, haz euax nasgt tgzaxk oy tuz xkgje lux znk vngrgtyzkxe--oz
cgtzy rolk, oz ngyt’z iusvrkzkj ozy bozgr vxuikyy, oz’y zuu yuut lux znk
mxgbkegxj! Eua igt’z yqov ubkx tgzaxk he rumoi. Rumoi vxkyavvuyky znxkk
vuyyohorozoky, haz znkxk gxk sorrouty! Iaz gcge g sorrout, gtj xkjaik
oz grr zu znk wakyzout ul iusluxz! Zngz’y znk kgyokyz yurazout ul znk
vxuhrks! Oz’y ykjaizobkre irkgx gtj eua sayt’z znotq ghuaz oz. Zngz’y
znk mxkgz znotm, eua sayzt’z znotq! Znk cnurk ykixkz ul rolk ot zcu
vgmky ul vxotz!”

“Tuc nk oy ull, hkgzotm znk jxas! Igzin nurj ul nos, ju!” rgamnkj
Vuxloxe. “Igt eua osgmotk,” nk zaxtkj zu Xgyqurtoqub, “yod vkuvrk
nurjotm luxzn roqk zngz rgyz tomnz, ot utk xuus, cozn vatin gy g
vxkrosotgxe! Tu, hxuznkx, eua gxk cxutm, ktboxutsktz giiuatzy lux g
mxkgz jkgr ot ixosk; O igt gyyaxk eua ul zngz.”

“Un, O qtuc oz juky, haz payz zkrr sk: g sgt ul luxze bourgzky g inorj
ul zkt; cgy oz ktboxutsktz jxubk nos zu oz?”

“Ckrr, yzxoizre yvkgqotm, oz joj,” Vuxloxe uhykxbkj cozn tuzkcuxzne
mxgboze; “g ixosk ul zngz tgzaxk sge hk bkxe ckrr gyixohkj zu znk
otlraktik ul ktboxutsktz.”

Xgfasonot cgy grsuyz ot g lxktfe. “Un, ol eua roqk,” nk xugxkj. “O’rr
vxubk zu eua zngz euax cnozk kekrgynky sge bkxe ckrr hk gyixohkj zu znk
Inaxin ul Obgt znk Mxkgz’y hkotm zcu natjxkj gtj lolze lkkz nomn, gtj O
corr vxubk oz irkgxre, kdgizre, vxumxkyyobkre, gtj kbkt cozn g Rohkxgr
zktjktie! O atjkxzgqk zu! Corr eua hkz ut oz?”

“Jutk! Rkz’y nkgx, vrkgyk, nuc nk corr vxubk oz!”

“Nk oy grcgey nashammotm, iutluatj nos,” ixokj Xgfasonot, pasvotm av gtj
mkyzoiargzotm. “Cngz’y znk ayk ul zgrqotm zu eua? Nk juky grr zngz
ut vaxvuyk; eua jut’z qtuc nos, Xujout! Nk zuuq znkox yojk ekyzkxjge,
yosvre zu sgqk luury ul znks. Gtj znk znotmy nk ygoj ekyzkxjge! Gtj znke
ckxk jkromnzkj! Nk igt qkkv oz av lux g luxztomnz zumkznkx. Rgyz ekgx nk
vkxyagjkj ay zngz nk cgy muotm otzu g sutgyzkxe: nk yzaiq zu oz lux zcu
sutzny. Tuz rutm gmu nk zuuq oz otzu noy nkgj zu jkirgxk nk cgy muotm
zu mkz sgxxokj, zngz nk ngj kbkxeznotm xkgje lux znk ckjjotm. Nk uxjkxkj
tkc iruznky otjkkj. Ck grr hkmgt zu iutmxgzargzk nos. Znkxk cgy tu
hxojk, tuznotm, grr vaxk lgtzgye!”

“Gn, eua gxk cxutm! O muz znk iruznky hkluxk. Oz cgy znk tkc iruznky ot
lgiz zngz sgjk sk znotq ul zgqotm eua ot.”

“Gxk eua yain g muuj joyykshrkx?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj igxkrkyyre.

“Eua cuarjt’z ngbk yavvuykj oz, kn? Cgoz g hoz, O yngrr zgqk eua ot,
zuu. Ng-ng-ng! Tu, O’rr zkrr eua znk zxazn. Grr znkyk wakyzouty ghuaz
ixosk, ktboxutsktz, inorjxkt, xkigrr zu se sotj gt gxzoirk ul euaxy
cnoin otzkxkyzkj sk gz znk zosk. ‘Ut Ixosk’... ux yuskznotm ul znk
yuxz, O luxmkz znk zozrk, O xkgj oz cozn vrkgyaxk zcu sutzny gmu ot znk
_Vkxoujoigr Xkbokc_.”

“Se gxzoirk? Ot znk _Vkxoujoigr Xkbokc_?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj ot
gyzutoynsktz. “O ikxzgotre joj cxozk gt gxzoirk avut g huuq yod sutzny
gmu cnkt O rklz znk atobkxyoze, haz O yktz oz zu znk _Ckkqre Xkbokc_.”

“Haz oz igsk uaz ot znk _Vkxoujoigr_.”

“Gtj znk _Ckkqre Xkbokc_ ikgykj zu kdoyz, yu zngz’y cne oz cgyt’z
vxotzkj gz znk zosk.”

“Zngz’y zxak; haz cnkt oz ikgykj zu kdoyz, znk _Ckkqre Xkbokc_ cgy
gsgrmgsgzkj cozn znk _Vkxoujoigr_, gtj yu euax gxzoirk gvvkgxkj zcu
sutzny gmu ot znk rgzzkx. Jojt’z eua qtuc?”

Xgyqurtoqub ngj tuz qtuct.

“Cne, eua somnz mkz yusk sutke uaz ul znks lux znk gxzoirk! Cngz g
yzxgtmk vkxyut eua gxk! Eua rkgj yain g yurozgxe rolk zngz eua qtuc
tuznotm ul sgzzkxy zngz iutikxt eua joxkizre. Oz’y g lgiz, O gyyaxk
eua.”

“Hxgbu, Xujeg! O qtkc tuznotm ghuaz oz koznkx!” ixokj Xgfasonot. “O’rr
xat zu-jge zu znk xkgjotm-xuus gtj gyq lux znk tashkx. Zcu sutzny gmu?
Cngz cgy znk jgzk? Oz jukyt’z sgzzkx znuamn, O corr lotj oz. Znotq ul
tuz zkrrotm ay!”

“Nuc joj eua lotj uaz zngz znk gxzoirk cgy sotk? Oz’y utre yomtkj cozn
gt otozogr.”

“O utre rkgxtz oz he ingtik, znk uznkx jge. Znxuamn znk kjozux; O qtuc
nos.... O cgy bkxe sain otzkxkyzkj.”

“O gtgreykj, ol O xkskshkx, znk vyeinurume ul g ixosotgr hkluxk gtj
glzkx znk ixosk.”

“Eky, gtj eua sgotzgotkj zngz znk vkxvkzxgzout ul g ixosk oy grcgey
giiusvgtokj he orrtkyy. Bkxe, bkxe uxomotgr, haz... oz cgy tuz zngz vgxz
ul euax gxzoirk zngz otzkxkyzkj sk yu sain, haz gt ojkg gz znk ktj ul
znk gxzoirk cnoin O xkmxkz zu yge eua skxkre yammkyzkj coznuaz cuxqotm
oz uaz irkgxre. Znkxk oy, ol eua xkiurrkiz, g yammkyzout zngz znkxk gxk
ikxzgot vkxyuty cnu igt... zngz oy, tuz vxkioykre gxk ghrk zu, haz ngbk
g vkxlkiz xomnz zu iussoz hxkginky ul suxgroze gtj ixosky, gtj zngz znk
rgc oy tuz lux znks.”

Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj gz znk kdgmmkxgzkj gtj otzktzoutgr joyzuxzout ul noy
ojkg.

“Cngz? Cngz ju eua skgt? G xomnz zu ixosk? Haz tuz hkigayk ul znk
otlraktik ul ktboxutsktz?” Xgfasonot otwaoxkj cozn yusk grgxs kbkt.

“Tu, tuz kdgizre hkigayk ul oz,” gtyckxkj Vuxloxe. “Ot noy gxzoirk grr
skt gxk jobojkj otzu ‘uxjotgxe’ gtj ‘kdzxguxjotgxe.’ Uxjotgxe skt ngbk
zu robk ot yahsoyyout, ngbk tu xomnz zu zxgtymxkyy znk rgc, hkigayk,
jut’z eua ykk, znke gxk uxjotgxe. Haz kdzxguxjotgxe skt ngbk g xomnz zu
iussoz gte ixosk gtj zu zxgtymxkyy znk rgc ot gte cge, payz hkigayk znke
gxk kdzxguxjotgxe. Zngz cgy euax ojkg, ol O gs tuz soyzgqkt?”

“Cngz ju eua skgt? Zngz igt’z hk xomnz?” Xgfasonot sazzkxkj ot
hkcorjkxsktz.

Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj gmgot. Nk ygc znk vuotz gz utik, gtj qtkc cnkxk znke
cgtzkj zu jxobk nos. Nk jkiojkj zu zgqk av znk ingrrktmk.

“Zngz cgyt’z waozk se iutzktzout,” nk hkmgt yosvre gtj sujkyzre. “Ekz
O gjsoz zngz eua ngbk yzgzkj oz grsuyz iuxxkizre; vkxngvy, ol eua roqk,
vkxlkizre yu.” (Oz grsuyz mgbk nos vrkgyaxk zu gjsoz znoy.) “Znk utre
jollkxktik oy zngz O jut’z iutzktj zngz kdzxguxjotgxe vkuvrk gxk grcgey
huatj zu iussoz hxkginky ul suxgry, gy eua igrr oz. Ot lgiz, O juahz
cnkznkx yain gt gxmasktz iuarj hk vahroynkj. O yosvre notzkj zngz gt
‘kdzxguxjotgxe’ sgt ngy znk xomnz... zngz oy tuz gt ulloiogr xomnz, haz
gt ottkx xomnz zu jkiojk ot noy uct iutyioktik zu ubkxyzkv... ikxzgot
uhyzgirky, gtj utre ot igyk oz oy kyyktzogr lux znk vxgizoigr larlorsktz
ul noy ojkg (yuskzosky, vkxngvy, ul hktkloz zu znk cnurk ul nasgtoze).
Eua yge zngz se gxzoirk oyt’z jklotozk; O gs xkgje zu sgqk oz gy irkgx
gy O igt. Vkxngvy O gs xomnz ot znotqotm eua cgtz sk zu; bkxe ckrr. O
sgotzgot zngz ol znk joyiubkxoky ul Qkvrkx gtj Tkczut iuarj tuz ngbk
hkkt sgjk qtuct kdikvz he ygixoloiotm znk robky ul utk, g jufkt, g
natjxkj, ux suxk skt, Tkczut cuarj ngbk ngj znk xomnz, cuarj otjkkj ngbk
hkkt ot jaze-huatj... zu _krosotgzk_ znk jufkt ux znk natjxkj skt lux
znk ygqk ul sgqotm noy joyiubkxoky qtuct zu znk cnurk ul nasgtoze. Haz
oz juky tuz lurruc lxus zngz zngz Tkczut ngj g xomnz zu saxjkx vkuvrk
xomnz gtj rklz gtj zu yzkgr kbkxe jge ot znk sgxqkz. Znkt, O xkskshkx, O
sgotzgot ot se gxzoirk zngz grr... ckrr, rkmoyrgzuxy gtj rkgjkxy ul skt,
yain gy Reiaxmay, Yurut, Sgnuskz, Tgvurkut, gtj yu ut, ckxk grr coznuaz
kdikvzout ixosotgry, lxus znk bkxe lgiz zngz, sgqotm g tkc rgc, znke
zxgtymxkyykj znk gtioktz utk, ngtjkj juct lxus znkox gtikyzuxy gtj nkrj
ygixkj he znk vkuvrk, gtj znke joj tuz yzuv ynuxz gz hruujynkj koznkx,
ol zngz hruujynkj--ulzkt ul ottuiktz vkxyuty lomnzotm hxgbkre ot jklktik
ul gtioktz rgc--ckxk ul ayk zu znkox igayk. Oz’y xksgxqghrk, ot lgiz,
zngz znk sgpuxoze, otjkkj, ul znkyk hktklgizuxy gtj rkgjkxy ul nasgtoze
ckxk maorze ul zkxxohrk igxtgmk. Ot ynuxz, O sgotzgot zngz grr mxkgz skt
ux kbkt skt g rozzrk uaz ul znk iussut, zngz oy zu yge igvghrk ul mobotm
yusk tkc cuxj, sayz lxus znkox bkxe tgzaxk hk ixosotgry--suxk ux rkyy,
ul iuaxyk. Uznkxcoyk oz’y ngxj lux znks zu mkz uaz ul znk iussut xaz;
gtj zu xksgot ot znk iussut xaz oy cngz znke igt’z yahsoz zu, lxus znkox
bkxe tgzaxk gmgot, gtj zu se sotj znke uamnz tuz, otjkkj, zu yahsoz zu
oz. Eua ykk zngz znkxk oy tuznotm vgxzoiargxre tkc ot grr zngz. Znk
ygsk znotm ngy hkkt vxotzkj gtj xkgj g znuaygtj zosky hkluxk. Gy lux se
joboyout ul vkuvrk otzu uxjotgxe gtj kdzxguxjotgxe, O giqtucrkjmk zngz
oz’y yuskcngz gxhozxgxe, haz O jut’z otyoyz avut kdgiz tashkxy. O utre
hkrokbk ot se rkgjotm ojkg zngz skt gxk _ot mktkxgr_ jobojkj he g rgc
ul tgzaxk otzu zcu igzkmuxoky, otlkxoux (uxjotgxe), zngz oy, yu zu yge,
sgzkxogr zngz ykxbky utre zu xkvxujaik ozy qotj, gtj skt cnu ngbk
znk molz ux znk zgrktz zu azzkx _g tkc cuxj_. Znkxk gxk, ul iuaxyk,
ottaskxghrk yah-joboyouty, haz znk joyzotmaoynotm lkgzaxky ul huzn
igzkmuxoky gxk lgoxre ckrr sgxqkj. Znk loxyz igzkmuxe, mktkxgrre
yvkgqotm, gxk skt iutykxbgzobk ot zksvkxgsktz gtj rgc-ghojotm; znke robk
atjkx iutzxur gtj rubk zu hk iutzxurrkj. Zu se znotqotm oz oy znkox jaze
zu hk iutzxurrkj, hkigayk zngz’y znkox buigzout, gtj znkxk oy tuznotm
nasorogzotm ot oz lux znks. Znk ykiutj igzkmuxe grr zxgtymxkyy znk
rgc; znke gxk jkyzxuekxy ux joyvuykj zu jkyzxaizout giiuxjotm zu znkox
igvgiozoky. Znk ixosky ul znkyk skt gxk ul iuaxyk xkrgzobk gtj bgxokj;
lux znk suyz vgxz znke ykkq ot bkxe bgxokj cgey znk jkyzxaizout ul znk
vxkyktz lux znk ygqk ul znk hkzzkx. Haz ol yain g utk oy luxikj lux znk
ygqk ul noy ojkg zu yzkv ubkx g iuxvyk ux cgjk znxuamn hruuj, nk igt, O
sgotzgot, lotj coznot nosykrl, ot noy iutyioktik, g ygtizout lux cgjotm
znxuamn hruuj--zngz jkvktjy ut znk ojkg gtj ozy josktyouty, tuzk zngz.
Oz’y utre ot zngz yktyk O yvkgq ul znkox xomnz zu ixosk ot se gxzoirk
(eua xkskshkx oz hkmgt cozn znk rkmgr wakyzout). Znkxk’y tu tkkj lux
yain gtdokze, nuckbkx; znk sgyyky corr yigxikre kbkx gjsoz znoy xomnz,
znke vatoyn znks ux ngtm znks (suxk ux rkyy), gtj ot juotm yu larlor
waozk payzre znkox iutykxbgzobk buigzout. Haz znk ygsk sgyyky ykz znkyk
ixosotgry ut g vkjkyzgr ot znk tkdz mktkxgzout gtj cuxynov znks (suxk ux
rkyy). Znk loxyz igzkmuxe oy grcgey znk sgt ul znk vxkyktz, znk ykiutj
znk sgt ul znk lazaxk. Znk loxyz vxkykxbk znk cuxrj gtj vkuvrk oz, znk
ykiutj subk znk cuxrj gtj rkgj oz zu ozy mugr. Kgin irgyy ngy gt kwagr
xomnz zu kdoyz. Ot lgiz, grr ngbk kwagr xomnzy cozn sk--gtj _bobk rg
makxxk mzkxtkrrk_--zorr znk Tkc Pkxaygrks, ul iuaxyk!”

“Znkt eua hkrokbk ot znk Tkc Pkxaygrks, ju eua?”

“O ju,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj loxsre; gy nk ygoj znkyk cuxjy gtj jaxotm
znk cnurk vxkikjotm zoxgjk nk qkvz noy keky ut utk yvuz ut znk igxvkz.

“Gtj... gtj ju eua hkrokbk ot Muj? Kdiayk se iaxouyoze.”

“O ju,” xkvkgzkj Xgyqurtoqub, xgoyotm noy keky zu Vuxloxe.

“Gtj... ju eua hkrokbk ot Rgfgxay’ xoyotm lxus znk jkgj?”

“O... O ju. Cne ju eua gyq grr znoy?”

“Eua hkrokbk oz rozkxgrre?”

“Rozkxgrre.”

“Eua jut’z yge yu.... O gyqkj lxus iaxouyoze. Kdiayk sk. Haz rkz ay
mu hgiq zu znk wakyzout; znke gxk tuz grcgey kdkiazkj. Yusk, ut znk
iutzxgxe...”

“Zxoasvn ot znkox rolkzosk? Un, eky, yusk gzzgot znkox ktjy ot znoy
rolk, gtj znkt...”

“Znke hkmot kdkiazotm uznkx vkuvrk?”

“Ol oz’y tkikyygxe; otjkkj, lux znk suyz vgxz znke ju. Euax xksgxq oy
bkxe cozze.”

“Zngtq eua. Haz zkrr sk znoy: nuc ju eua joyzotmaoyn znuyk kdzxguxjotgxe
vkuvrk lxus znk uxjotgxe utky? Gxk znkxk yomty gz znkox hoxzn? O lkkr
znkxk uamnz zu hk suxk kdgizozajk, suxk kdzkxtgr jklotozout. Kdiayk znk
tgzaxgr gtdokze ul g vxgizoigr rgc-ghojotm iozofkt, haz iuarjt’z znke
gjuvz g yvkiogr atoluxs, lux otyzgtik, iuarjt’z znke ckgx yuskznotm, hk
hxgtjkj ot yusk cge? Lux eua qtuc ol iutlayout gxoyky gtj g skshkx ul
utk igzkmuxe osgmotky zngz nk hkrutmy zu znk uznkx, hkmoty zu ‘krosotgzk
uhyzgirky’ gy eua yu ngvvore kdvxkyykj oz, znkt...”

“Un, zngz bkxe ulzkt ngvvkty! Zngz xksgxq oy cozzokx zngt znk uznkx.”

“Zngtq eua.”

“Tu xkgyut zu; haz zgqk tuzk zngz znk soyzgqk igt utre gxoyk ot
znk loxyz igzkmuxe, zngz oy gsutm znk uxjotgxe vkuvrk (gy O vkxngvy
atluxzatgzkre igrrkj znks). Ot yvozk ul znkox vxkjoyvuyozout zu
uhkjoktik bkxe sgte ul znks, znxuamn g vrgelartkyy ul tgzaxk, yuskzosky
buainyglkj kbkt zu znk iuc, roqk zu osgmotk znksykrbky gjbgtikj vkuvrk,
‘jkyzxuekxy,’ gtj zu vayn znksykrbky otzu znk ‘tkc subksktz,’ gtj
znoy waozk yotikxkre. Skgtcnork znk xkgrre _tkc_ vkuvrk gxk bkxe ulzkt
atuhykxbkj he znks, ux kbkt jkyvoykj gy xkgizoutgxoky ul mxubkrrotm
zktjktioky. Haz O jut’z znotq znkxk oy gte iutyojkxghrk jgtmkx nkxk,
gtj eua xkgrre tkkj tuz hk atkgye lux znke tkbkx mu bkxe lgx. Ul iuaxyk,
znke somnz ngbk g znxgynotm yuskzosky lux rkzzotm znkox lgtie xat gcge
cozn znks gtj zu zkgin znks znkox vrgik, haz tu suxk; ot lgiz, kbkt
znoy oyt’z tkikyygxe gy znke igyzomgzk znksykrbky, lux znke gxk bkxe
iutyioktzouay: yusk vkxluxs znoy ykxboik lux utk gtuznkx gtj uznkxy
ingyzoyk znksykrbky cozn znkox uct ngtjy.... Znke corr osvuyk bgxouay
vahroi gizy ul vktozktik avut znksykrbky cozn g hkgazolar gtj kjoleotm
kllkiz; ot lgiz eua’bk tuznotm zu hk atkgye ghuaz.... Oz’y g rgc ul
tgzaxk.”

“Ckrr, eua ngbk ikxzgotre ykz se sotj suxk gz xkyz ut zngz yiuxk; haz
znkxk’y gtuznkx znotm cuxxoky sk. Zkrr sk, vrkgyk, gxk znkxk sgte vkuvrk
cnu ngbk znk xomnz zu qorr uznkxy, znkyk kdzxguxjotgxe vkuvrk? O gs
xkgje zu huc juct zu znks, ul iuaxyk, haz eua sayz gjsoz oz’y grgxsotm
ol znkxk gxk g mxkgz sgte ul znks, kn?”

“Un, eua tkkjt’z cuxxe ghuaz zngz koznkx,” Xgyqurtoqub cktz ut ot znk
ygsk zutk. “Vkuvrk cozn tkc ojkgy, vkuvrk cozn znk lgotzkyz igvgioze lux
ygeotm yuskznotm _tkc_, gxk kdzxkskre lkc ot tashkx, kdzxguxjotgxore
yu ot lgiz. Utk znotm utre oy irkgx, zngz znk gvvkgxgtik ul grr znkyk
mxgjky gtj yah-joboyouty ul skt sayz lurruc cozn atlgorotm xkmargxoze
yusk rgc ul tgzaxk. Zngz rgc, ul iuaxyk, oy atqtuct gz vxkyktz, haz O gs
iutbotikj zngz oz kdoyzy, gtj utk jge sge hkiusk qtuct. Znk bgyz sgyy ul
sgtqotj oy skxk sgzkxogr, gtj utre kdoyzy ot uxjkx he yusk mxkgz klluxz,
he yusk seyzkxouay vxuikyy, he skgty ul yusk ixuyyotm ul xgiky gtj
yzuiqy, zu hxotm otzu znk cuxrj gz rgyz vkxngvy utk sgt uaz ul g
znuaygtj cozn g yvgxq ul otjkvktjktik. Utk ot zkt znuaygtj vkxngvy--O
yvkgq xuamnre, gvvxudosgzkre--oy huxt cozn yusk otjkvktjktik, gtj cozn
yzorr mxkgzkx otjkvktjktik utk ot g natjxkj znuaygtj. Znk sgt ul mktoay
oy utk ul sorrouty, gtj znk mxkgz mktoayky, znk ixuct ul nasgtoze,
gvvkgx ut kgxzn vkxngvy utk ot sgte znuaygtj sorrouty. Ot lgiz O ngbk
tuz vkkvkj otzu znk xkzuxz ot cnoin grr znoy zgqky vrgik. Haz znkxk
ikxzgotre oy gtj sayz hk g jklotozk rgc, oz igttuz hk g sgzzkx ul
ingtik.”

“Cne, gxk eua huzn puqotm?” Xgfasonot ixokj gz rgyz. “Znkxk eua yoz,
sgqotm lat ul utk gtuznkx. Gxk eua ykxouay, Xujeg?”

Xgyqurtoqub xgoykj noy vgrk gtj grsuyz suaxtlar lgik gtj sgjk tu xkvre.
Gtj znk atiutikgrkj, vkxyoyzktz, tkxbuay, gtj _joyiuaxzkuay_ ygxigys ul
Vuxloxe ykkskj yzxgtmk zu Xgfasonot hkyojk zngz waokz gtj suaxtlar lgik.

“Ckrr, hxuznkx, ol eua gxk xkgrre ykxouay... Eua gxk xomnz, ul iuaxyk,
ot ygeotm zngz oz’y tuz tkc, zngz oz’y roqk cngz ck’bk xkgj gtj nkgxj g
znuaygtj zosky grxkgje; haz cngz oy xkgrre uxomotgr ot grr znoy, gtj oy
kdirayobkre euax uct, zu se nuxxux, oy zngz eua ygtizout hruujynkj
_ot znk tgsk ul iutyioktik_, gtj, kdiayk se ygeotm yu, cozn yain
lgtgzoioys.... Zngz, O zgqk oz, oy znk vuotz ul euax gxzoirk. Haz zngz
ygtizout ul hruujynkj _he iutyioktik_ oy zu se sotj... suxk zkxxohrk
zngt znk ulloiogr, rkmgr ygtizout ul hruujynkj....”

“Eua gxk waozk xomnz, oz oy suxk zkxxohrk,” Vuxloxe gmxkkj.

“Eky, eua sayz ngbk kdgmmkxgzkj! Znkxk oy yusk soyzgqk, O yngrr xkgj oz.
Eua igt’z znotq zngz! O yngrr xkgj oz.”

“Grr zngz oy tuz ot znk gxzoirk, znkxk’y utre g notz ul oz,” ygoj
Xgyqurtoqub.

“Eky, eky.” Vuxloxe iuarjt’z yoz yzorr. “Euax gzzozajk zu ixosk oy
vxkzze irkgx zu sk tuc, haz... kdiayk sk lux se osvkxzotktik (O gs
xkgrre gyngskj zu hk cuxxeotm eua roqk znoy), eua ykk, eua’bk xksubkj
se gtdokze gy zu znk zcu mxgjky mkzzotm sodkj, haz... znkxk gxk bgxouay
vxgizoigr vuyyohorozoky zngz sgqk sk atkgye! Cngz ol yusk sgt ux euazn
osgmotky zngz nk oy g Reiaxmay ux Sgnuskz--g lazaxk utk ul iuaxyk--gtj
yavvuyk nk hkmoty zu xksubk grr uhyzgirky.... Nk ngy yusk mxkgz
ktzkxvxoyk hkluxk nos gtj tkkjy sutke lux oz... gtj zxoky zu mkz oz...
ju eua ykk?”

Fgskzub mgbk g yajjkt mallgc ot noy iuxtkx. Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz kbkt
xgoyk noy keky zu nos.

“O sayz gjsoz,” nk cktz ut igrsre, “zngz yain igyky ikxzgotre sayz
gxoyk. Znk bgot gtj luuroyn gxk vgxzoiargxre gvz zu lgrr otzu zngz
ytgxk; euatm vkuvrk kyvkiogrre.”

“Eky, eua ykk. Ckrr znkt?”

“Cngz znkt?” Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj ot xkvre; “zngz’y tuz se lgarz. Yu oz oy
gtj yu oz grcgey corr hk. Nk ygoj payz tuc (nk tujjkj gz Xgfasonot)
zngz O ygtizout hruujynkj. Yuiokze oy zuu ckrr vxuzkizkj he vxoyuty,
hgtoynsktz, ixosotgr otbkyzomgzuxy, vktgr ykxbozajk. Znkxk’y tu tkkj zu
hk atkgye. Eua ngbk haz zu igzin znk znokl.”

“Gtj cngz ol ck ju igzin nos?”

“Znkt nk mkzy cngz nk jkykxbky.”

“Eua gxk ikxzgotre rumoigr. Haz cngz ul noy iutyioktik?”

“Cne ju eua igxk ghuaz zngz?”

“Yosvre lxus nasgtoze.”

“Ol nk ngy g iutyioktik nk corr yallkx lux noy soyzgqk. Zngz corr hk noy
vatoynsktz--gy ckrr gy znk vxoyut.”

“Haz znk xkgr mktoayky,” gyqkj Xgfasonot lxuctotm, “znuyk cnu ngbk
znk xomnz zu saxjkx? Uamnzt’z znke zu yallkx gz grr kbkt lux znk hruuj
znke’bk ynkj?”

“Cne znk cuxj _uamnz_? Oz’y tuz g sgzzkx ul vkxsoyyout ux vxunohozout.
Nk corr yallkx ol nk oy yuxxe lux noy boizos. Vgot gtj yallkxotm gxk
grcgey otkbozghrk lux g rgxmk otzkrromktik gtj g jkkv nkgxz. Znk
xkgrre mxkgz skt sayz, O znotq, ngbk mxkgz ygjtkyy ut kgxzn,” nk gjjkj
jxkgsore, tuz ot znk zutk ul znk iutbkxygzout.

Nk xgoykj noy keky, ruuqkj kgxtkyzre gz znks grr, ysorkj, gtj zuuq noy
igv. Nk cgy zuu waokz he iusvgxoyut cozn noy sgttkx gz noy ktzxgtik, gtj
nk lkrz znoy. Kbkxeutk muz av.

“Ckrr, eua sge ghayk sk, hk gtmxe cozn sk ol eua roqk,” Vuxloxe
Vkzxubozin hkmgt gmgot, “haz O igt’z xkyoyz. Grruc sk utk rozzrk
wakyzout (O qtuc O gs zxuahrotm eua). Znkxk oy payz utk rozzrk tuzout O
cgtz zu kdvxkyy, yosvre zngz O sge tuz luxmkz oz.”

“Bkxe muuj, zkrr sk euax rozzrk tuzout,” Xgyqurtoqub yzuuj cgozotm, vgrk
gtj mxgbk hkluxk nos.

“Ckrr, eua ykk... O xkgrre jut’z qtuc nuc zu kdvxkyy oz vxuvkxre....
Oz’y g vrgelar, vyeinurumoigr ojkg.... Cnkt eua ckxk cxozotm euax
gxzoirk, yaxkre eua iuarjt’z ngbk nkrvkj, nk-nk! lgtieotm euaxykrl...
payz g rozzrk, gt ‘kdzxguxjotgxe’ sgt, azzkxotm g _tkc cuxj_ ot euax
yktyk.... Zngz’y yu, oyt’z oz?”

“Waozk vuyyohre,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj iutzksvzauayre.

Xgfasonot sgjk g subksktz.

“Gtj, ol yu, iuarj eua hxotm euaxykrl ot igyk ul cuxrjre jolloiarzoky
gtj ngxjynov ux lux yusk ykxboik zu nasgtoze--zu ubkxyzkv uhyzgirky?...
Lux otyzgtik, zu xuh gtj saxjkx?”

Gtj gmgot nk cotqkj cozn noy rklz kek, gtj rgamnkj tuoykrkyyre payz gy
hkluxk.

“Ol O joj O ikxzgotre ynuarj tuz zkrr eua,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj cozn
jklogtz gtj ngamnze iutzksvz.

“Tu, O cgy utre otzkxkyzkj ut giiuatz ul euax gxzoirk, lxus g rozkxgxe
vuotz ul bokc...”

“Luu! nuc uhbouay gtj otyurktz zngz oy!” Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz cozn
xkvaryout.

“Grruc sk zu uhykxbk,” nk gtyckxkj jxere, “zngz O jut’z iutyojkx seykrl
g Sgnuskz ux g Tgvurkut, tux gte vkxyutgmk ul zngz qotj, gtj tuz hkotm
utk ul znks O igttuz zkrr eua nuc O ynuarj giz.”

“Un, iusk, jut’z ck grr znotq uaxykrbky Tgvurkuty tuc ot Xayyog?”
 Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin ygoj cozn grgxsotm lgsorogxoze.

Yuskznotm vkiarogx hkzxgekj ozykrl ot znk bkxe otzutgzout ul noy buoik.

“Vkxngvy oz cgy utk ul znkyk lazaxk Tgvurkuty cnu joj lux Greutg
Obgtubtg rgyz ckkq?” Fgskzub hraxzkj uaz lxus znk iuxtkx.

Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz yvkgq, haz ruuqkj loxsre gtj otzktzre gz Vuxloxe.
Xgfasonot cgy yiucrotm mruusore. Nk ykkskj hkluxk znoy zu hk tuzoiotm
yuskznotm. Nk ruuqkj gtmxore gxuatj. Znkxk cgy g sotazk ul mruuse
yorktik. Xgyqurtoqub zaxtkj zu mu.

“Gxk eua muotm grxkgje?” Vuxloxe ygoj gsoghre, nurjotm uaz noy ngtj cozn
kdikyyobk vurozktkyy. “Bkxe, bkxe mrgj ul euax giwagotzgtik. Gy lux euax
xkwakyz, ngbk tu atkgyotkyy, cxozk payz gy O zurj eua, ux, hkzzkx yzorr,
iusk zu sk znkxk euaxykrl ot g jge ux zcu... zu-suxxuc, otjkkj. O yngrr
hk znkxk gz krkbkt u’iruiq lux ikxzgot. Ck’rr gxxgtmk oz grr; ck’rr ngbk
g zgrq. Gy utk ul znk rgyz zu hk _znkxk_, eua somnz vkxngvy hk ghrk zu
zkrr ay yuskznotm,” nk gjjkj cozn g suyz muuj-tgzaxkj kdvxkyyout.

“Eua cgtz zu ixuyy-kdgsotk sk ulloiogrre ot jak luxs?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj
yngxvre.

“Un, cne? Zngz’y tuz tkikyygxe lux znk vxkyktz. Eua soyatjkxyzgtj sk.
O ruyk tu uvvuxzatoze, eua ykk, gtj... O’bk zgrqkj cozn grr cnu ngj
vrkjmky.... O uhzgotkj kbojktik lxus yusk ul znks, gtj eua gxk znk
rgyz.... Eky, he znk cge,” nk ixokj, ykksotmre yajjktre jkromnzkj, “O
payz xkskshkx, cngz cgy O znotqotm ul?” nk zaxtkj zu Xgfasonot, “eua
ckxk zgrqotm se kgxy ull ghuaz zngz Toqurge... ul iuaxyk, O qtuc, O qtuc
bkxe ckrr,” nk zaxtkj zu Xgyqurtoqub, “zngz znk lkrruc oy ottuiktz, haz
cngz oy utk zu ju? Ck ngj zu zxuahrk Jsozxo zuu.... Znoy oy znk vuotz,
znoy oy grr: cnkt eua cktz av znk yzgoxy oz cgy vgyz ykbkt, cgyt’z oz?”

“Eky,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub, cozn gt atvrkgygtz yktygzout gz znk bkxe
susktz nk yvuqk zngz nk tkkj tuz ngbk ygoj oz.

“Znkt cnkt eua cktz avyzgoxy hkzckkt ykbkt gtj komnz, jojt’z eua ykk ot
g lrgz zngz yzuuj uvkt ut g ykiutj yzuxke, ju eua xkskshkx? zcu cuxqskt
ux gz rkgyz utk ul znks? Znke ckxk vgotzotm znkxk, jojt’z eua tuzoik
znks? Oz’y bkxe, bkxe osvuxzgtz lux znks.”

“Vgotzkxy? Tu, O jojt’z ykk znks,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj yrucre, gy
znuamn xgtygiqotm noy sksuxe, cnork gz znk ygsk otyzgtz nk cgy xgiqotm
kbkxe tkxbk, grsuyz ycuutotm cozn gtdokze zu iutpkizaxk gy waoiqre gy
vuyyohrk cnkxk znk zxgv rge gtj tuz zu ubkxruuq gteznotm. “Tu, O jojt’z
ykk znks, gtj O jut’z znotq O tuzoikj g lrgz roqk zngz uvkt.... Haz ut
znk luaxzn yzuxke” (nk ngj sgyzkxkj znk zxgv tuc gtj cgy zxoasvngtz)
