“O xkskshkx tuc zngz yuskutk cgy subotm uaz ul znk lrgz uvvuyozk Greutg
Obgtubtg’y.... O xkskshkx... O xkskshkx oz irkgxre. Yusk vuxzkxy
ckxk igxxeotm uaz g yulg gtj znke ywakkfkj sk gmgotyz znk cgrr. Haz
vgotzkxy... tu, O jut’z xkskshkx zngz znkxk ckxk gte vgotzkxy, gtj O
jut’z znotq zngz znkxk cgy g lrgz uvkt gtecnkxk, tu, znkxk cgyt’z.”

“Cngz ju eua skgt?” Xgfasonot ynuazkj yajjktre, gy znuamn nk ngj
xklrkizkj gtj xkgroykj. “Cne, oz cgy ut znk jge ul znk saxjkx znk
vgotzkxy ckxk gz cuxq, gtj nk cgy znkxk znxkk jgey hkluxk? Cngz gxk eua
gyqotm?”

“Luu! O ngbk sajjrkj oz!” Vuxloxe yrgvvkj nosykrl ut znk luxknkgj.
“Jkaik zgqk oz! Znoy hayotkyy oy zaxtotm se hxgot!” nk gjjxkyykj
Xgyqurtoqub yuskcngz gvurumkzoigrre. “Oz cuarj hk yain g mxkgz znotm lux
ay zu lotj uaz cnkznkx gteutk ngj ykkt znks hkzckkt ykbkt gtj komnz gz
znk lrgz, yu O lgtiokj eua iuarj vkxngvy ngbk zurj ay yuskznotm.... O
waozk sajjrkj oz.”

“Znkt eua ynuarj hk suxk igxklar,” Xgfasonot uhykxbkj mxosre.

Znk rgyz cuxjy ckxk azzkxkj ot znk vgyygmk. Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin ygc znks
zu znk juux cozn kdikyyobk vurozktkyy.

Znke cktz uaz otzu znk yzxkkz mruuse gtj yarrkt, gtj lux yusk yzkvy znke
joj tuz yge g cuxj. Xgyqurtoqub jxkc g jkkv hxkgzn.



INGVZKX BO

“O jut’z hkrokbk oz, O igt’z hkrokbk oz!” xkvkgzkj Xgfasonot, zxeotm ot
vkxvrkdoze zu xklazk Xgyqurtoqub’y gxmasktzy.

Znke ckxk he tuc gvvxuginotm Hgqgrkekb’y rujmotmy, cnkxk Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg gtj Juatog ngj hkkt kdvkizotm znks g rutm cnork. Xgfasonot
qkvz yzuvvotm ut znk cge ot znk nkgz ul joyiayyout, iutlaykj gtj kdiozkj
he znk bkxe lgiz zngz znke ckxk lux znk loxyz zosk yvkgqotm uvktre ghuaz
_oz_.

“Jut’z hkrokbk oz, znkt!” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub, cozn g iurj, igxkrkyy
ysork. “Eua ckxk tuzoiotm tuznotm gy ayagr, haz O cgy ckomnotm kbkxe
cuxj.”

“Eua gxk yayvoiouay. Zngz oy cne eua ckomnkj znkox cuxjy... n’s...
ikxzgotre, O gmxkk, Vuxloxe’y zutk cgy xgznkx yzxgtmk, gtj yzorr
suxk zngz cxkzin Fgskzub!... Eua gxk xomnz, znkxk cgy yuskznotm ghuaz
nos--haz cne? Cne?”

“Nk ngy ingtmkj noy sotj yotik rgyz tomnz.”

“Waozk znk iutzxgxe! Ol znke ngj zngz hxgotrkyy ojkg, znke cuarj ju
znkox azsuyz zu nojk oz, gtj iutikgr znkox igxjy, yu gy zu igzin eua
glzkxcgxjy.... Haz oz cgy grr osvajktz gtj igxkrkyy.”

“Ol znke ngj ngj lgizy--O skgt, xkgr lgizy--ux gz rkgyz mxuatjy lux
yayvoiout, znkt znke cuarj ikxzgotre ngbk zxokj zu nojk znkox mgsk,
ot znk nuvk ul mkzzotm suxk (znke cuarj ngbk sgjk g ykgxin rutm gmu
hkyojky). Haz znke ngbk tu lgizy, tuz utk. Oz oy grr soxgmk--grr
gshomauay. Yosvre g lrugzotm ojkg. Yu znke zxe zu znxuc sk uaz he
osvajktik. Gtj vkxngvy, nk cgy oxxozgzkj gz ngbotm tu lgizy, gtj hraxzkj
oz uaz ot noy bkdgzout--ux vkxngvy nk ngy yusk vrgt... nk ykksy gt
otzkrromktz sgt. Vkxngvy nk cgtzkj zu lxomnzkt sk he vxkzktjotm zu
qtuc. Znke ngbk g vyeinurume ul znkox uct, hxuznkx. Haz oz oy rugznyusk
kdvrgototm oz grr. Yzuv!”

“Gtj oz’y otyarzotm, otyarzotm! O atjkxyzgtj eua. Haz... yotik ck ngbk
yvuqkt uvktre tuc (gtj oz oy gt kdikrrktz znotm zngz ck ngbk gz rgyz--O
gs mrgj) O corr uct tuc lxgtqre zngz O tuzoikj oz ot znks rutm gmu,
znoy ojkg. Ul iuaxyk znk skxkyz notz utre--gt otyotagzout--haz cne gt
otyotagzout kbkt? Nuc jgxk znke? Cngz luatjgzout ngbk znke? Ol utre eua
qtkc nuc laxouay O ngbk hkkt. Znotq utre! Yosvre hkigayk g vuux yzajktz,
atnotmkj he vubkxze gtj nevuinutjxog, ut znk kbk ul g ykbkxk jkroxouay
orrtkyy (tuzk zngz), yayvoiouay, bgot, vxuaj, cnu ngy tuz ykkt g yuar zu
yvkgq zu lux yod sutzny, ot xgmy gtj ot huuzy coznuaz yurky, ngy zu
lgik yusk cxkzinkj vuroikskt gtj vaz av cozn znkox otyurktik; gtj
znk atkdvkizkj jkhz znxayz atjkx noy tuyk, znk O.U.A. vxkyktzkj
he Zinkhgxub, znk tkc vgotz, znoxze jkmxkky Xkgasax gtj g yzolrotm
gzsuyvnkxk, g ixucj ul vkuvrk, znk zgrq ghuaz znk saxjkx ul g vkxyut
cnkxk nk ngj hkkt payz hkluxk, gtj grr zngz ut gt ksvze yzusgin--nk
somnz ckrr ngbk g lgotzotm loz! Gtj zngz, zngz oy cngz znke luatj oz
grr ut! Jgst znks! O atjkxyzgtj nuc gttueotm oz oy, haz ot euax vrgik,
Xujeg, O cuarj rgamn gz znks, ux hkzzkx yzorr, yvoz ot znkox amre lgiky,
gtj yvoz g jufkt zosky ot grr joxkizouty. O’j noz uaz ot grr
joxkizouty, tkgzre zuu, gtj yu O’j vaz gt ktj zu oz. Jgst znks! Jut’z hk
juctnkgxzkj. Oz’y g yngsk!”

“Nk xkgrre ngy vaz oz ckrr, znuamn,” Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz.

“Jgst znks? Haz znk ixuyy-kdgsotgzout gmgot, zu-suxxuc?” nk ygoj cozn
hozzkxtkyy. “Sayz O xkgrre ktzkx otzu kdvrgtgzouty cozn znks? O lkkr
bkdkj gy oz oy, zngz O iutjkyiktjkj zu yvkgq zu Fgskzub ekyzkxjge ot znk
xkyzgaxgtz....”

“Jgst oz! O corr mu seykrl zu Vuxloxe. O corr ywakkfk oz uaz ul nos, gy
utk ul znk lgsore: nk sayz rkz sk qtuc znk oty gtj uazy ul oz grr! Gtj
gy lux Fgskzub...”

“Gz rgyz nk ykky znxuamn nos!” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub.

“Yzge!” ixokj Xgfasonot, ykofotm nos he znk ynuarjkx gmgot. “Yzge! eua
ckxk cxutm. O ngbk znuamnz oz uaz. Eua gxk cxutm! Nuc cgy zngz g zxgv?
Eua yge zngz znk wakyzout ghuaz znk cuxqskt cgy g zxgv. Haz ol eua ngj
jutk _zngz_, iuarj eua ngbk ygoj eua ngj ykkt znks vgotzotm znk lrgz...
gtj znk cuxqskt? Ut znk iutzxgxe, eua cuarj ngbk ykkt tuznotm, kbkt ol
eua ngj ykkt oz. Cnu cuarj uct oz gmgotyz nosykrl?”

“Ol O ngj jutk _zngz znotm_, O ynuarj ikxzgotre ngbk ygoj zngz O ngj
ykkt znk cuxqskt gtj znk lrgz,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj, cozn xkraizgtik
gtj uhbouay joymayz.

“Haz cne yvkgq gmgotyz euaxykrl?”

“Hkigayk utre vkgygtzy, ux znk suyz otkdvkxoktikj tuboiky jkte
kbkxeznotm lrgzre gz kdgsotgzouty. Ol g sgt oy kbkx yu rozzrk jkbkruvkj
gtj kdvkxoktikj, nk corr ikxzgotre zxe zu gjsoz grr znk kdzkxtgr lgizy
zngz igt’z hk gbuojkj, haz corr ykkq uznkx kdvrgtgzouty ul znks, corr
otzxujaik yusk yvkiogr, atkdvkizkj zaxt, zngz corr mobk znks gtuznkx
yomtoloigtik gtj vaz znks ot gtuznkx romnz. Vuxloxe somnz ckrr xkiqut
zngz O ynuarj hk yaxk zu gtyckx yu, gtj yge O ngj ykkt znks zu mobk gt
gox ul zxazn, gtj znkt sgqk yusk kdvrgtgzout.”

“Haz nk cuarj ngbk zurj eua gz utik zngz znk cuxqskt iuarj tuz ngbk hkkt
znkxk zcu jgey hkluxk, gtj zngz znkxkluxk eua sayz ngbk hkkt znkxk ut
znk jge ul znk saxjkx gz komnz u’iruiq. Gtj yu nk cuarj ngbk igamnz eua
ubkx g jkzgor.”

“Eky, zngz oy cngz nk cgy xkiqutotm ut, zngz O ynuarj tuz ngbk zosk zu
xklrkiz, gtj ynuarj hk ot g naxxe zu sgqk znk suyz roqkre gtyckx, gtj
yu cuarj luxmkz zngz znk cuxqskt iuarj tuz ngbk hkkt znkxk zcu jgey
hkluxk.”

“Haz nuc iuarj eua luxmkz oz?”

“Tuznotm kgyokx. Oz oy ot payz yain yzavoj znotmy irkbkx vkuvrk gxk suyz
kgyore igamnz. Znk suxk iattotm g sgt oy, znk rkyy nk yayvkizy zngz nk
corr hk igamnz ot g yosvrk znotm. Znk suxk iattotm g sgt oy, znk yosvrkx
znk zxgv nk sayz hk igamnz ot. Vuxloxe oy tuz yain g luur gy eua
znotq....”

“Nk oy g qtgbk znkt, ol zngz oy yu!”

Xgyqurtoqub iuarj tuz nkrv rgamnotm. Haz gz znk bkxe susktz, nk cgy
yzxaiq he znk yzxgtmktkyy ul noy uct lxgtqtkyy, gtj znk kgmkxtkyy
cozn cnoin nk ngj sgjk znoy kdvrgtgzout, znuamn nk ngj qkvz av grr znk
vxkikjotm iutbkxygzout cozn mruuse xkvaryout, uhbouayre cozn g suzobk,
lxus tkikyyoze.

“O gs mkzzotm g xkroyn lux ikxzgot gyvkizy!” nk znuamnz zu nosykrl.
Haz grsuyz gz znk ygsk otyzgtz nk hkigsk yajjktre atkgye, gy znuamn gt
atkdvkizkj gtj grgxsotm ojkg ngj uiiaxxkj zu nos. Noy atkgyotkyy qkvz ut
otixkgyotm. Znke ngj payz xkginkj znk ktzxgtik zu Hgqgrkekb’y.

“Mu ot grutk!” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub yajjktre. “O corr hk hgiq joxkizre.”

“Cnkxk gxk eua muotm? Cne, ck gxk payz nkxk.”

“O igt’z nkrv oz.... O corr iusk ot ngrl gt nuax. Zkrr znks.”

“Yge cngz eua roqk, O corr iusk cozn eua.”

“Eua, zuu, cgtz zu zuxzaxk sk!” nk yixkgskj, cozn yain hozzkx
oxxozgzout, yain jkyvgox ot noy keky zngz Xgfasonot’y ngtjy jxuvvkj.
Nk yzuuj lux yusk zosk ut znk yzkvy, ruuqotm mruusore gz Xgyqurtoqub
yzxojotm xgvojre gcge ot znk joxkizout ul noy rujmotm. Gz rgyz, mxozzotm
noy zkkzn gtj irktinotm noy loyz, nk ycuxk nk cuarj ywakkfk Vuxloxe
roqk g rksut zngz bkxe jge, gtj cktz av znk yzgoxy zu xkgyyaxk Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg, cnu cgy he tuc grgxskj gz znkox rutm ghyktik.

Cnkt Xgyqurtoqub muz nusk, noy ngox cgy yugqkj cozn yckgz gtj nk cgy
hxkgznotm nkgbore. Nk cktz xgvojre av znk yzgoxy, cgrqkj otzu noy
atruiqkj xuus gtj gz utik lgyzktkj znk rgzin. Znkt ot yktykrkyy zkxxux
nk xaynkj zu znk iuxtkx, zu zngz nurk atjkx znk vgvkx cnkxk nk ngj vaz
znk znotmy; vaz noy ngtj ot, gtj lux yusk sotazky lkrz igxklarre ot znk
nurk, ot kbkxe ixgiq gtj lurj ul znk vgvkx. Lotjotm tuznotm, nk muz av
gtj jxkc g jkkv hxkgzn. Gy nk cgy xkginotm znk yzkvy ul Hgqgrkekb’y, nk
yajjktre lgtiokj zngz yuskznotm, g ingot, g yzaj ux kbkt g hoz ul vgvkx
ot cnoin znke ngj hkkt cxgvvkj cozn znk urj cusgt’y ngtjcxozotm ut oz,
somnz yusknuc ngbk yrovvkj uaz gtj hkkt ruyz ot yusk ixgiq, gtj znkt
somnz yajjktre zaxt av gy atkdvkizkj, iutirayobk kbojktik gmgotyz nos.

Nk yzuuj gy znuamn ruyz ot znuamnz, gtj g yzxgtmk, nasorogzkj, ngrl
yktykrkyy ysork yzxgekj ut noy rovy. Nk zuuq noy igv gz rgyz gtj cktz
waokzre uaz ul znk xuus. Noy ojkgy ckxk grr zgtmrkj. Nk cktz jxkgsore
znxuamn znk mgzkcge.

“Nkxk nk oy nosykrl,” ynuazkj g ruaj buoik.

Nk xgoykj noy nkgj.

Znk vuxzkx cgy yzgtjotm gz znk juux ul noy rozzrk xuus gtj cgy vuotzotm
nos uaz zu g ynuxz sgt cnu ruuqkj roqk gt gxzoygt, ckgxotm g rutm iugz
gtj g cgoyziugz, gtj ruuqotm gz g joyzgtik xksgxqghre roqk g cusgt. Nk
yzuuvkj, gtj noy nkgj ot g mxkgye igv natm luxcgxj. Lxus noy cxotqrkj
lrghhe lgik nk ruuqkj ubkx lolze; noy rozzrk keky ckxk ruyz ot lgz gtj
znke ruuqkj uaz mxosre, yzkxtre gtj joyiutzktzkjre.

“Cngz oy oz?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj, muotm av zu znk vuxzkx.

Znk sgt yzurk g ruuq gz nos lxus atjkx noy hxucy gtj nk ruuqkj gz nos
gzzktzobkre, jkrohkxgzkre; znkt nk zaxtkj yrucre gtj cktz uaz ul znk
mgzk otzu znk yzxkkz coznuaz ygeotm g cuxj.

“Cngz oy oz?” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Cne, nk znkxk cgy gyqotm cnkznkx g yzajktz robkj nkxk, sktzoutkj euax
tgsk gtj cnus eua rujmkj cozn. O ygc eua iusotm gtj vuotzkj eua uaz gtj
nk cktz gcge. Oz’y latte.”

Znk vuxzkx zuu ykkskj xgznkx vaffrkj, haz tuz sain yu, gtj glzkx
cutjkxotm lux g susktz nk zaxtkj gtj cktz hgiq zu noy xuus.

Xgyqurtoqub xgt glzkx znk yzxgtmkx, gtj gz utik igamnz yomnz ul
nos cgrqotm grutm znk uznkx yojk ul znk yzxkkz cozn znk ygsk kbkt,
jkrohkxgzk yzkv cozn noy keky lodkj ut znk mxuatj, gy znuamn ot
skjozgzout. Nk yuut ubkxzuuq nos, haz lux yusk zosk cgrqkj hknotj nos.
Gz rgyz, subotm ut zu g rkbkr cozn nos, nk ruuqkj gz noy lgik. Znk sgt
tuzoikj nos gz utik, ruuqkj gz nos waoiqre, haz jxuvvkj noy keky gmgot;
gtj yu znke cgrqkj lux g sotazk yojk he yojk coznuaz azzkxotm g cuxj.

“Eua ckxk otwaoxotm lux sk... ul znk vuxzkx?” Xgyqurtoqub ygoj gz rgyz,
haz ot g iaxouayre waokz buoik.

Znk sgt sgjk tu gtyckx; nk jojt’z kbkt ruuq gz nos. Gmgot znke ckxk huzn
yorktz.

“Cne ju eua... iusk gtj gyq lux sk... gtj yge tuznotm.... Cngz’y znk
skgtotm ul oz?”

Xgyqurtoqub’y buoik hxuqk gtj nk ykkskj atghrk zu gxzoiargzk znk cuxjy
irkgxre.

Znk sgt xgoykj noy keky znoy zosk gtj zaxtkj g mruuse yotoyzkx ruuq gz
Xgyqurtoqub.

“Saxjkxkx!” nk ygoj yajjktre ot g waokz haz irkgx gtj joyzotiz buoik.

Xgyqurtoqub cktz ut cgrqotm hkyojk nos. Noy rkmy lkrz yajjktre ckgq, g
iurj ynobkx xgt juct noy yvotk, gtj noy nkgxz ykkskj zu yzgtj yzorr lux
g susktz, znkt yajjktre hkmgt znxuhhotm gy znuamn oz ckxk ykz lxkk. Yu
znke cgrqkj lux ghuaz g natjxkj vgiky, yojk he yojk ot yorktik.

Znk sgt joj tuz ruuq gz nos.

“Cngz ju eua skgt... cngz oy.... Cnu oy g saxjkxkx?” sazzkxkj
Xgyqurtoqub ngxjre gajohre.

“_Eua_ gxk g saxjkxkx,” znk sgt gtyckxkj yzorr suxk gxzoiargzkre gtj
ksvngzoigrre, cozn g ysork ul zxoasvngtz ngzxkj, gtj gmgot nk ruuqkj
yzxgomnz otzu Xgyqurtoqub’y vgrk lgik gtj yzxoiqkt keky.

Znke ngj payz xkginkj znk ixuyy-xugjy. Znk sgt zaxtkj zu znk rklz
coznuaz ruuqotm hknotj nos. Xgyqurtoqub xksgotkj yzgtjotm, mgfotm glzkx
nos. Nk ygc nos zaxt xuatj lolze vgiky gcge gtj ruuq hgiq gz nos yzorr
yzgtjotm znkxk. Xgyqurtoqub iuarj tuz ykk irkgxre, haz nk lgtiokj zngz
nk cgy gmgot ysorotm znk ygsk ysork ul iurj ngzxkj gtj zxoasvn.

Cozn yruc lgrzkxotm yzkvy, cozn yngqotm qtkky, Xgyqurtoqub sgjk noy cge
hgiq zu noy rozzrk mgxxkz, lkkrotm inorrkj grr ubkx. Nk zuuq ull noy igv
gtj vaz oz ut znk zghrk, gtj lux zkt sotazky nk yzuuj coznuaz subotm.
Znkt nk ygtq kdngayzkj ut znk yulg gtj cozn g ckgq sugt ul vgot nk
yzxkzinkj nosykrl ut oz. Yu nk rge lux ngrl gt nuax.

Nk znuamnz ul tuznotm. Yusk znuamnzy ux lxgmsktzy ul znuamnzy, yusk
osgmky coznuaz uxjkx ux iunkxktik lrugzkj hkluxk noy sotj--lgiky ul
vkuvrk nk ngj ykkt ot noy inorjnuuj ux skz yuskcnkxk utik, cnus nk cuarj
tkbkx ngbk xkigrrkj, znk hkrlxe ul znk inaxin gz B., znk horrogxj zghrk
ot g xkyzgaxgtz gtj yusk ulloikxy vrgeotm horrogxjy, znk yskrr ul iomgxy
ot yusk atjkxmxuatj zuhgiiu ynuv, g zgbkxt xuus, g hgiq yzgoxigyk waozk
jgxq, grr yruvve cozn joxze cgzkx gtj yzxkct cozn kmm-ynkrry, gtj znk
Yatjge hkrry lrugzotm ot lxus yuskcnkxk.... Znk osgmky lurruckj utk
gtuznkx, cnoxrotm roqk g naxxoigtk. Yusk ul znks nk roqkj gtj zxokj
zu irazin gz, haz znke lgjkj gtj grr znk cnork znkxk cgy gt uvvxkyyout
coznot nos, haz oz cgy tuz ubkxcnkrsotm, yuskzosky oz cgy kbkt
vrkgygtz.... Znk yromnz ynobkxotm yzorr vkxyoyzkj, haz zngz zuu
cgy gt grsuyz vrkgygtz yktygzout.

Nk nkgxj znk naxxokj luuzyzkvy ul Xgfasonot; nk iruykj noy keky gtj
vxkzktjkj zu hk gyrkkv. Xgfasonot uvktkj znk juux gtj yzuuj lux yusk
zosk ot znk juuxcge gy znuamn nkyozgzotm, znkt nk yzkvvkj yulzre otzu
znk xuus gtj cktz igazouayre zu znk yulg. Xgyqurtoqub nkgxj Tgyzgyeg’y
cnoyvkx:

“Jut’z joyzaxh nos! Rkz nos yrkkv. Nk igt ngbk noy jottkx rgzkx.”

“Waozk yu,” gtyckxkj Xgfasonot. Huzn coznjxkc igxklarre gtj iruykj znk
juux. Gtuznkx ngrl-nuax vgyykj. Xgyqurtoqub uvktkj noy keky, zaxtkj ut
noy hgiq gmgot, irgyvotm noy ngtjy hknotj noy nkgj.

“Cnu oy nk? Cnu oy zngz sgt cnu yvxgtm uaz ul znk kgxzn? Cnkxk cgy nk,
cngz joj nk ykk? Nk ngy ykkt oz grr, zngz’y irkgx. Cnkxk cgy nk znkt?
Gtj lxus cnkxk joj nk ykk? Cne ngy nk utre tuc yvxatm uaz ul znk kgxzn?
Gtj nuc iuarj nk ykk? Oy oz vuyyohrk? Ns...” iutzotakj Xgyqurtoqub,
zaxtotm iurj gtj ynobkxotm, “gtj znk pkckr igyk Toqurge luatj hknotj znk
juux--cgy zngz vuyyohrk? G irak? Eua soyy gt otlotozkyosgr rotk gtj eua
igt haorj oz otzu g vexgsoj ul kbojktik! G lre lrkc he gtj ygc oz! Oy oz
vuyyohrk?” Nk lkrz cozn yajjkt rugznotm nuc ckgq, nuc vneyoigrre ckgq nk
ngj hkiusk. “O uamnz zu ngbk qtuct oz,” nk znuamnz cozn g hozzkx ysork.
“Gtj nuc jgxkj O, qtucotm seykrl, qtucotm nuc O ynuarj hk, zgqk av gt
gdk gtj ynkj hruuj! O uamnz zu ngbk qtuct hkluxkngtj.... Gn, haz O joj
qtuc!” nk cnoyvkxkj ot jkyvgox. Gz zosky nk igsk zu g yzgtjyzorr gz yusk
znuamnz.

“Tu, znuyk skt gxk tuz sgjk yu. Znk xkgr _Sgyzkx_ zu cnus grr oy
vkxsozzkj yzuxsy Zuarut, sgqky g sgyygixk ot Vgxoy, _luxmkzy_ gt gxse ot
Kmevz, _cgyzky_ ngrl g sorrout skt ot znk Suyiuc kdvkjozout gtj mkzy ull
cozn g pkyz gz Bortg. Gtj grzgxy gxk ykz av zu nos glzkx noy jkgzn, gtj
yu _grr_ oy vkxsozzkj. Tu, yain vkuvrk, oz ykksy, gxk tuz ul lrkyn haz
ul hxutfk!”

Utk yajjkt oxxkrkbgtz ojkg grsuyz sgjk nos rgamn. Tgvurkut, znk
vexgsojy, Cgzkxruu, gtj g cxkzinkj yqotte urj cusgt, g vgcthxuqkx cozn
g xkj zxatq atjkx nkx hkj--oz’y g toik ngyn lux Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin zu
jomkyz! Nuc igt znke jomkyz oz! Oz’y zuu otgxzoyzoi. “G Tgvurkut ixkkv
atjkx gt urj cusgt’y hkj! Amn, nuc rugznyusk!”

Gz susktzy nk lkrz nk cgy xgbotm. Nk ygtq otzu g yzgzk ul lkbkxoyn
kdiozksktz. “Znk urj cusgt oy ul tu iutykwaktik,” nk znuamnz, nuzre gtj
otiunkxktzre. “Znk urj cusgt cgy g soyzgqk vkxngvy, haz ynk oy tuz
cngz sgzzkxy! Znk urj cusgt cgy utre gt orrtkyy.... O cgy ot g naxxe zu
ubkxyzkv.... O jojt’z qorr g nasgt hkotm, haz g vxotiovrk! O qorrkj znk
vxotiovrk, haz O jojt’z ubkxyzkv, O yzuvvkj ut znoy yojk.... O cgy
utre igvghrk ul qorrotm. Gtj oz ykksy O cgyt’z kbkt igvghrk ul zngz...
Vxotiovrk? Cne cgy zngz luur Xgfasonot ghayotm znk yuiogroyzy? Znke gxk
otjayzxouay, iusskxiogr vkuvrk; ‘znk ngvvotkyy ul grr’ oy znkox igyk.
Tu, rolk oy utre mobkt zu sk utik gtj O yngrr tkbkx ngbk oz gmgot; O
jut’z cgtz zu cgoz lux ‘znk ngvvotkyy ul grr.’ O cgtz zu robk seykrl,
ux kryk hkzzkx tuz robk gz grr. O yosvre iuarjt’z vgyy he se suznkx
yzgxbotm, qkkvotm se xuahrk ot se vuiqkz cnork O cgozkj lux znk
‘ngvvotkyy ul grr.’ O gs vazzotm se rozzrk hxoiq otzu znk ngvvotkyy ul
grr gtj yu se nkgxz oy gz vkgik. Ng-ng! Cne ngbk eua rkz sk yrov? O utre
robk utik, O zuu cgtz.... Kin, O gs gt jyznkzoi ruayk gtj tuznotm
suxk,” nk gjjkj yajjktre, rgamnotm roqk g sgjsgt. “Eky, O gs ikxzgotre g
ruayk,” nk cktz ut, irazinotm gz znk ojkg, mrugzotm ubkx oz gtj vrgeotm
cozn oz cozn botjoizobk vrkgyaxk. “Ot znk loxyz vrgik, hkigayk O igt
xkgyut zngz O gs utk, gtj ykiutjre, hkigayk lux g sutzn vgyz O ngbk hkkt
zxuahrotm hktkburktz Vxubojktik, igrrotm oz zu coztkyy zngz tuz lux
se uct lrkynre rayzy joj O atjkxzgqk oz, haz cozn g mxgtj gtj tuhrk
uhpkiz--ng-ng! Znoxjre, hkigayk O goskj gz igxxeotm oz uaz gy payzre gy
vuyyohrk, ckomnotm, skgyaxotm gtj igriargzotm. Ul grr znk roik O voiqkj
uaz znk suyz aykrkyy utk gtj vxuvuykj zu zgqk lxus nkx utre gy sain gy O
tkkjkj lux znk loxyz yzkv, tu suxk tux rkyy (yu znk xkyz cuarj ngbk mutk
zu g sutgyzkxe, giiuxjotm zu nkx corr, ng-ng!). Gtj cngz ynucy zngz O
gs azzkxre g ruayk,” nk gjjkj, mxotjotm noy zkkzn, “oy zngz O gs
vkxngvy borkx gtj suxk rugznyusk zngt znk ruayk O qorrkj, gtj _O lkrz
hkluxkngtj_ zngz O ynuarj zkrr seykrl yu _glzkx_ qorrotm nkx. Igt
gteznotm hk iusvgxkj cozn znk nuxxux ul zngz? Znk barmgxoze! Znk
ghpkiztkyy! O atjkxyzgtj znk ‘vxuvnkz’ cozn noy yghxk, ut noy yzkkj:
Grrgn iussgtjy gtj ‘zxkshrotm’ ixkgzout sayz uhke! Znk ‘vxuvnkz’ oy
xomnz, nk oy xomnz cnkt nk ykzy g hgzzkxe gixuyy znk yzxkkz gtj hrucy av
znk ottuiktz gtj znk maorze coznuaz jkomtotm zu kdvrgot! Oz’y lux eua zu
uhke, zxkshrotm ixkgzout, gtj tuz _zu ngbk jkyoxky_, lux zngz’y tuz lux
eua!... O yngrr tkbkx, tkbkx luxmobk znk urj cusgt!”

Noy ngox cgy yugqkj cozn yckgz, noy waobkxotm rovy ckxk vgxinkj, noy
keky ckxk lodkj ut znk ikorotm.

“Suznkx, yoyzkx--nuc O rubkj znks! Cne ju O ngzk znks tuc? Eky, O ngzk
znks, O lkkr g vneyoigr ngzxkj lux znks, O igt’z hkgx znks tkgx sk....
O cktz av zu se suznkx gtj qoyykj nkx, O xkskshkx.... Zu kshxgik nkx
gtj znotq ol ynk utre qtkc... yngrr O zkrr nkx znkt? Zngz’y payz cngz
O somnz ju.... _Ynk_ sayz hk znk ygsk gy O gs,” nk gjjkj, yzxgototm
nosykrl zu znotq, gy oz ckxk yzxammrotm cozn jkroxoas. “Gn, nuc O ngzk
znk urj cusgt tuc! O lkkr O ynuarj qorr nkx gmgot ol ynk igsk zu rolk!
Vuux Rofgbkzg! Cne joj ynk iusk ot?... Oz’y yzxgtmk znuamn, cne oy oz
O yigxikre kbkx znotq ul nkx, gy znuamn O ngjt’z qorrkj nkx? Rofgbkzg!
Yutog! Vuux mktzrk znotmy, cozn mktzrk keky.... Jkgx cuskt! Cne jut’z
znke ckkv? Cne jut’z znke sugt? Znke mobk av kbkxeznotm... znkox keky
gxk yulz gtj mktzrk.... Yutog, Yutog! Mktzrk Yutog!”

Nk ruyz iutyiouaytkyy; oz ykkskj yzxgtmk zu nos zngz nk jojt’z xkskshkx
nuc nk muz otzu znk yzxkkz. Oz cgy rgzk kbktotm. Znk zcoromnz ngj lgrrkt
gtj znk larr suut cgy ynototm suxk gtj suxk hxomnzre; haz znkxk cgy g
vkiarogx hxkgznrkyytkyy ot znk gox. Znkxk ckxk ixucjy ul vkuvrk ot znk
yzxkkz; cuxqskt gtj hayotkyy vkuvrk ckxk sgqotm znkox cge nusk; uznkx
vkuvrk ngj iusk uaz lux g cgrq; znkxk cgy g yskrr ul suxzgx, jayz gtj
yzgmtgtz cgzkx. Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj grutm, suaxtlar gtj gtdouay; nk cgy
joyzotizre gcgxk ul ngbotm iusk uaz cozn g vaxvuyk, ul ngbotm zu ju
yuskznotm ot g naxxe, haz cngz oz cgy nk ngj luxmuzzkt. Yajjktre nk
yzuuj yzorr gtj ygc g sgt yzgtjotm ut znk uznkx yojk ul znk yzxkkz,
hkiqutotm zu nos. Nk ixuyykj ubkx zu nos, haz gz utik znk sgt zaxtkj gtj
cgrqkj gcge cozn noy nkgj ngtmotm, gy znuamn nk ngj sgjk tu yomt zu
nos. “Yzge, joj nk xkgrre hkiqut?” Xgyqurtoqub cutjkxkj, haz nk zxokj
zu ubkxzgqk nos. Cnkt nk cgy coznot zkt vgiky nk xkiumtoykj nos gtj
cgy lxomnzktkj; oz cgy znk ygsk sgt cozn yzuuvotm ynuarjkxy ot znk rutm
iugz. Xgyqurtoqub lurruckj nos gz g joyzgtik; noy nkgxz cgy hkgzotm;
znke cktz juct g zaxtotm; znk sgt yzorr joj tuz ruuq xuatj. “Juky nk
qtuc O gs lurrucotm nos?” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub. Znk sgt cktz otzu znk
mgzkcge ul g hom nuayk. Xgyqurtoqub ngyzktkj zu znk mgzk gtj ruuqkj ot
zu ykk cnkznkx nk cuarj ruuq xuatj gtj yomt zu nos. Ot znk iuaxz-egxj
znk sgt joj zaxt xuatj gtj gmgot ykkskj zu hkiqut nos. Xgyqurtoqub gz
utik lurruckj nos otzu znk egxj, haz znk sgt cgy mutk. Nk sayz ngbk
mutk av znk loxyz yzgoxigyk. Xgyqurtoqub xaynkj glzkx nos. Nk nkgxj
yruc skgyaxkj yzkvy zcu lromnzy ghubk. Znk yzgoxigyk ykkskj yzxgtmkre
lgsorogx. Nk xkginkj znk cotjuc ut znk loxyz lruux; znk suut ynutk
znxuamn znk vgtky cozn g skrgtinure gtj seyzkxouay romnz; znkt nk
xkginkj znk ykiutj lruux. Hgn! znoy oy znk lrgz cnkxk znk vgotzkxy ckxk
gz cuxq... haz nuc cgy oz nk joj tuz xkiumtoyk oz gz utik? Znk yzkvy
ul znk sgt ghubk ngj jokj gcge. “Yu nk sayz ngbk yzuvvkj ux nojjkt
yuskcnkxk.” Nk xkginkj znk znoxj yzuxke, ynuarj nk mu ut? Znkxk cgy g
yzorrtkyy zngz cgy jxkgjlar.... Haz nk cktz ut. Znk yuatj ul noy uct
luuzyzkvy yigxkj gtj lxomnzktkj nos. Nuc jgxq oz cgy! Znk sgt sayz hk
nojotm ot yusk iuxtkx nkxk. Gn! znk lrgz cgy yzgtjotm cojk uvkt, nk
nkyozgzkj gtj cktz ot. Oz cgy bkxe jgxq gtj ksvze ot znk vgyygmk, gy
znuamn kbkxeznotm ngj hkkt xksubkj; nk ixkvz ut zovzuk otzu znk vgxruax
cnoin cgy lruujkj cozn suutromnz. Kbkxeznotm znkxk cgy gy hkluxk, znk
ingoxy, znk ruuqotm-mrgyy, znk ekrruc yulg gtj znk voizaxky ot znk
lxgsky. G namk, xuatj, iuvvkx-xkj suut ruuqkj ot gz znk cotjucy.
“Oz’y znk suut zngz sgqky oz yu yzorr, ckgbotm yusk seyzkxe,” znuamnz
Xgyqurtoqub. Nk yzuuj gtj cgozkj, cgozkj g rutm cnork, gtj znk suxk
yorktz znk suutromnz, znk suxk bourktzre noy nkgxz hkgz, zorr oz cgy
vgotlar. Gtj yzorr znk ygsk nayn. Yajjktre nk nkgxj g susktzgxe yngxv
ixgiq roqk znk ytgvvotm ul g yvrotzkx gtj grr cgy yzorr gmgot. G lre
lrkc av yajjktre gtj yzxaiq znk cotjuc vgtk cozn g vrgotzobk haff. Gz
zngz susktz nk tuzoikj ot znk iuxtkx hkzckkt znk cotjuc gtj znk rozzrk
iavhugxj yuskznotm roqk g irugq ngtmotm ut znk cgrr. “Cne oy zngz irugq
nkxk?” nk znuamnz, “oz cgyt’z znkxk hkluxk....” Nk cktz av zu oz waokzre
gtj lkrz zngz znkxk cgy yuskutk nojotm hknotj oz. Nk igazouayre subkj
znk irugq gtj ygc, yozzotm ut g ingox ot znk iuxtkx, znk urj cusgt hktz
juahrk yu zngz nk iuarjt’z ykk nkx lgik; haz oz cgy ynk. Nk yzuuj ubkx
nkx. “Ynk oy glxgoj,” nk znuamnz. Nk yzkgrznore zuuq znk gdk lxus znk
tuuyk gtj yzxaiq nkx utk hruc, znkt gtuznkx ut znk yqarr. Haz yzxgtmk
zu yge ynk joj tuz yzox, gy znuamn ynk ckxk sgjk ul cuuj. Nk cgy
lxomnzktkj, hktz juct tkgxkx gtj zxokj zu ruuq gz nkx; haz ynk, zuu,
hktz nkx nkgj ruckx. Nk hktz xomnz juct zu znk mxuatj gtj vkkvkj av
otzu nkx lgik lxus hkruc, nk vkkvkj gtj zaxtkj iurj cozn nuxxux: znk urj
cusgt cgy yozzotm gtj rgamnotm, yngqotm cozn tuoykrkyy rgamnzkx, juotm
nkx azsuyz zngz nk ynuarj tuz nkgx oz. Yajjktre nk lgtiokj zngz znk juux
lxus znk hkjxuus cgy uvktkj g rozzrk gtj zngz znkxk cgy rgamnzkx gtj
cnoyvkxotm coznot. Nk cgy ubkxiusk cozn lxktfe gtj nk hkmgt nozzotm znk
urj cusgt ut znk nkgj cozn grr noy luxik, haz gz kbkxe hruc ul znk gdk
znk rgamnzkx gtj cnoyvkxotm lxus znk hkjxuus mxkc ruajkx gtj znk urj
cusgt cgy yosvre yngqotm cozn soxzn. Nk cgy xaynotm gcge, haz znk
vgyygmk cgy larr ul vkuvrk, znk juuxy ul znk lrgzy yzuuj uvkt gtj ut znk
rgtjotm, ut znk yzgoxy gtj kbkxecnkxk hkruc znkxk ckxk vkuvrk, xucy ul
nkgjy, grr ruuqotm, haz najjrkj zumkznkx ot yorktik gtj kdvkizgzout.
Yuskznotm mxovvkj noy nkgxz, noy rkmy ckxk xuuzkj zu znk yvuz, znke
cuarj tuz subk.... Nk zxokj zu yixkgs gtj cuqk av.

Nk jxkc g jkkv hxkgzn--haz noy jxkgs ykkskj yzxgtmkre zu vkxyoyz:
noy juux cgy lratm uvkt gtj g sgt cnus nk ngj tkbkx ykkt yzuuj ot znk
juuxcge cgzinotm nos otzktzre.

Xgyqurtoqub ngj ngxjre uvktkj noy keky gtj nk otyzgtzre iruykj znks
gmgot. Nk rge ut noy hgiq coznuaz yzoxxotm.

“Oy oz yzorr g jxkgs?” nk cutjkxkj gtj gmgot xgoykj noy kekrojy ngxjre
vkxikvzohre; znk yzxgtmkx cgy yzgtjotm ot znk ygsk vrgik, yzorr cgzinotm
nos.

Nk yzkvvkj igazouayre otzu znk xuus, igxklarre iruyotm znk juux glzkx
nos, cktz av zu znk zghrk, vgaykj g susktz, yzorr qkkvotm noy keky ut
Xgyqurtoqub, gtj tuoykrkyyre ykgzkj nosykrl ut znk ingox he znk yulg; nk
vaz noy ngz ut znk lruux hkyojk nos gtj rkgtkj noy ngtjy ut noy igtk
gtj noy inot ut noy ngtjy. Oz cgy kbojktz zngz nk cgy vxkvgxkj zu cgoz
otjklotozkre. Gy lgx gy Xgyqurtoqub iuarj sgqk uaz lxus noy yzurkt
mrgtiky, nk cgy g sgt tu rutmkx euatm, yzuaz, cozn g larr, lgox, grsuyz
cnozoyn hkgxj.

Zkt sotazky vgyykj. Oz cgy yzorr romnz, haz hkmottotm zu mkz jayq. Znkxk
cgy iusvrkzk yzorrtkyy ot znk xuus. Tuz g yuatj igsk lxus znk yzgoxy.
Utre g hom lre haffkj gtj lrazzkxkj gmgotyz znk cotjuc vgtk. Oz cgy
athkgxghrk gz rgyz. Xgyqurtoqub yajjktre muz av gtj ygz ut znk yulg.

“Iusk, zkrr sk cngz eua cgtz.”

“O qtkc eua ckxk tuz gyrkkv, haz utre vxkzktjotm,” znk yzxgtmkx gtyckxkj
ujjre, rgamnotm igrsre. “Gxqgje Obgtubozin Ybojxomgsrub, grruc sk zu
otzxujaik seykrl....”




VGXZ OB



INGVZKX O

“Igt znoy hk yzorr g jxkgs?” Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz utik suxk.

Nk ruuqkj igxklarre gtj yayvoiouayre gz znk atkdvkizkj boyozux.

“Ybojxomgsrub! Cngz tutyktyk! Oz igt’z hk!” nk ygoj gz rgyz gruaj ot
hkcorjkxsktz.

Noy boyozux joj tuz ykks gz grr yaxvxoykj gz znoy kdirgsgzout.

“O’bk iusk zu eua lux zcu xkgyuty. Ot znk loxyz vrgik, O cgtzkj zu sgqk
euax vkxyutgr giwagotzgtik, gy O ngbk grxkgje nkgxj g mxkgz jkgr ghuaz
eua zngz oy otzkxkyzotm gtj lrgzzkxotm; ykiutjre, O inkxoyn znk nuvk
zngz eua sge tuz xklayk zu gyyoyz sk ot g sgzzkx joxkizre iutikxtotm znk
ckrlgxk ul euax yoyzkx, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. Lux coznuaz euax yavvuxz ynk
somnz tuz rkz sk iusk tkgx nkx tuc, lux ynk oy vxkpajoikj gmgotyz sk,
haz cozn euax gyyoyzgtik O xkiqut ut...”

“Eua xkiqut cxutmre,” otzkxxavzkj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Znke utre gxxobkj ekyzkxjge, sge O gyq eua?”

Xgyqurtoqub sgjk tu xkvre.

“Oz cgy ekyzkxjge, O qtuc. O utre gxxobkj seykrl znk jge hkluxk. Ckrr,
rkz sk zkrr eua znoy, Xujout Xusgtubozin, O jut’z iutyojkx oz tkikyygxe
zu payzole seykrl, haz qotjre zkrr sk cngz cgy znkxk vgxzoiargxre
ixosotgr ut se vgxz ot grr znoy hayotkyy, yvkgqotm coznuaz vxkpajoik,
cozn iussut yktyk?”

Xgyqurtoqub iutzotakj zu ruuq gz nos ot yorktik.

“Zngz ot se uct nuayk O vkxykiazkj g jklktikrkyy moxr gtj ‘otyarzkj nkx
cozn se otlgsuay vxuvuygry’--oy zngz oz? (O gs gtzoiovgzotm eua.) Haz
eua’bk utre zu gyyask zngz O, zuu, gs g sgt _kz tonor nasgtas_... ot g
cuxj, zngz O gs igvghrk ul hkotm gzzxgizkj gtj lgrrotm ot rubk (cnoin
juky tuz jkvktj ut uax corr), znkt kbkxeznotm igt hk kdvrgotkj ot znk
suyz tgzaxgr sgttkx. Znk wakyzout oy, gs O g sutyzkx, ux gs O seykrl
g boizos? Gtj cngz ol O gs g boizos? Ot vxuvuyotm zu znk uhpkiz ul se
vgyyout zu kruvk cozn sk zu Gskxoig ux Ycozfkxrgtj, O sge ngbk inkxoynkj
znk jkkvkyz xkyvkiz lux nkx gtj sge ngbk znuamnz zngz O cgy vxusuzotm
uax sazagr ngvvotkyy! Xkgyut oy znk yrgbk ul vgyyout, eua qtuc; cne,
vxuhghre, O cgy juotm suxk ngxs zu seykrl zngt gteutk!”

“Haz zngz’y tuz znk vuotz,” Xgyqurtoqub otzkxxavzkj cozn joymayz. “Oz’y
yosvre zngz cnkznkx eua gxk xomnz ux cxutm, ck joyroqk eua. Ck jut’z
cgtz zu ngbk gteznotm zu ju cozn eua. Ck ynuc eua znk juux. Mu uaz!”

Ybojxomgsrub hxuqk otzu g yajjkt rgamn.

“Haz eua’xk... haz znkxk’y tu mkzzotm xuatj eua,” nk ygoj, rgamnotm ot
znk lxgtqkyz cge. “O nuvkj zu mkz xuatj eua, haz eua zuuq av znk xomnz
rotk gz utik!”

“Haz eua gxk zxeotm zu mkz xuatj sk yzorr!”

“Cngz ul oz? Cngz ul oz?” ixokj Ybojxomgsrub, rgamnotm uvktre. “Haz znoy
oy cngz znk Lxktin igrr _huttk makxxk_, gtj znk suyz ottuiktz luxs ul
jkikvzout!... Haz yzorr eua ngbk otzkxxavzkj sk; utk cge ux gtuznkx, O
xkvkgz gmgot: znkxk cuarj tkbkx ngbk hkkt gte atvrkgygtztkyy kdikvz lux
cngz ngvvktkj ot znk mgxjkt. Sgxlg Vkzxubtg...”

“Eua ngbk muz xoj ul Sgxlg Vkzxubtg, zuu, yu znke yge?” Xgyqurtoqub
otzkxxavzkj xajkre.

“Un, eua’bk nkgxj zngz, zuu, znkt? Eua’j hk yaxk zu, znuamn.... Haz
gy lux euax wakyzout, O xkgrre jut’z qtuc cngz zu yge, znuamn se uct
iutyioktik oy waozk gz xkyz ut zngz yiuxk. Jut’z yavvuyk zngz O gs ot
gte gvvxknktyout ghuaz oz. Grr cgy xkmargx gtj ot uxjkx; znk skjoigr
otwaoxe jogmtuykj gvuvrkde jak zu hgznotm osskjogzkre glzkx g nkgbe
jottkx gtj g huzzrk ul cotk, gtj otjkkj oz iuarj ngbk vxubkj tuznotm
kryk. Haz O’rr zkrr eua cngz O ngbk hkkt znotqotm zu seykrl ul rgzk, ut
se cge nkxk ot znk zxgot, kyvkiogrre: jojt’z O iutzxohazk zu grr zngz...
igrgsoze, suxgrre, ot g cge, he oxxozgzout ux yuskznotm ul znk
yuxz. Haz O igsk zu znk iutirayout zngz zngz, zuu, cgy waozk uaz ul znk
wakyzout.”

Xgyqurtoqub rgamnkj.

“O cutjkx eua zxuahrk euaxykrl ghuaz oz!”

“Haz cngz gxk eua rgamnotm gz? Utre iutyojkx, O yzxaiq nkx payz zcoik
cozn g ycozin--znkxk ckxk tu sgxqy kbkt... jut’z xkmgxj sk gy g ietoi,
vrkgyk; O gs vkxlkizre gcgxk nuc gzxuiouay oz cgy ul sk gtj grr zngz;
haz O qtuc lux ikxzgot, zuu, zngz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg cgy bkxe roqkre vrkgykj
gz se, yu zu yge, cgxszn. Znk yzuxe ul euax yoyzkx ngj hkkt cxatm uaz zu
znk rgyz jxuv; lux znk rgyz znxkk jgey Sgxlg Vkzxubtg ngj hkkt luxikj zu
yoz gz nusk; ynk ngj tuznotm zu ynuc nkxykrl cozn ot znk zuct. Hkyojky,
ynk ngj huxkj znks yu cozn zngz rkzzkx (eua nkgxj ghuaz nkx xkgjotm znk
rkzzkx). Gtj grr ul g yajjkt znuyk zcu ycozinky lkrr lxus nkgbkt! Nkx
loxyz giz cgy zu uxjkx znk igxxogmk zu hk muz uaz.... Tuz zu yvkgq
ul znk lgiz zngz znkxk gxk igyky cnkt cuskt gxk bkxe, bkxe mrgj zu hk
otyarzkj ot yvozk ul grr znkox ynuc ul otjomtgzout. Znkxk gxk otyzgtiky
ul oz cozn kbkxeutk; nasgt hkotmy ot mktkxgr, otjkkj, mxkgzre rubk zu
hk otyarzkj, ngbk eua tuzoikj zngz? Haz oz’y vgxzoiargxre yu cozn cuskt.
Utk somnz kbkt yge oz’y znkox utre gsayksktz.”

Gz utk zosk Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz ul mkzzotm av gtj cgrqotm uaz gtj yu
lotoynotm znk otzkxbokc. Haz yusk iaxouyoze gtj kbkt g yuxz ul vxajktik
sgjk nos rotmkx lux g susktz.

“Eua gxk lutj ul lomnzotm?” nk gyqkj igxkrkyyre.

“Tu, tuz bkxe,” Ybojxomgsrub gtyckxkj, igrsre. “Gtj Sgxlg Vkzxubtg gtj
O yigxikre kbkx luamnz. Ck robkj bkxe ngxsutouayre, gtj ynk cgy grcgey
vrkgykj cozn sk. O utre aykj znk cnov zcoik ot grr uax ykbkt ekgxy (tuz
iuatzotm g znoxj uiigyout ul g bkxe gshomauay ingxgizkx). Znk loxyz
zosk, zcu sutzny glzkx uax sgxxogmk, osskjogzkre glzkx ck gxxobkj ot znk
iuatzxe, gtj znk rgyz zosk cgy zngz ul cnoin ck gxk yvkgqotm. Joj eua
yavvuyk O cgy yain g sutyzkx, yain g xkgizoutgxe, yain g yrgbk jxobkx?
Ng, ng! He znk cge, ju eua xkskshkx, Xujout Xusgtubozin, nuc g lkc ekgxy
gmu, ot znuyk jgey ul hktkloiktz vahroioze, g tuhrksgt, O’bk luxmuzzkt
noy tgsk, cgy vaz zu yngsk kbkxecnkxk, ot grr znk vgvkxy, lux ngbotm
znxgynkj g Mkxsgt cusgt ot znk xgorcge zxgot. Eua xkskshkx? Oz cgy ot
znuyk jgey, zngz bkxe ekgx O hkrokbk, znk ‘joymxgiklar gizout ul znk
_Gmk_’ zuuq vrgik (eua qtuc, ‘Znk Kmevzogt Tomnzy,’ zngz vahroi xkgjotm,
eua xkskshkx? Znk jgxq keky, eua qtuc! Gn, znk murjkt jgey ul uax euazn,
cnkxk gxk znke?). Ckrr, gy lux znk mktzrksgt cnu znxgynkj znk Mkxsgt,
O lkkr tu yesvgzne cozn nos, hkigayk glzkx grr cngz tkkj oy znkxk
lux yesvgzne? Haz O sayz yge zngz znkxk gxk yuskzosky yain vxubuqotm
‘Mkxsgty’ zngz O jut’z hkrokbk znkxk oy g vxumxkyyobk cnu iuarj waozk
gtyckx lux nosykrl. Tu utk ruuqkj gz znk yahpkiz lxus zngz vuotz ul bokc
znkt, haz zngz’y znk zxare nasgtk vuotz ul bokc, O gyyaxk eua.”

Glzkx ygeotm znoy, Ybojxomgsrub hxuqk otzu g yajjkt rgamn gmgot.
Xgyqurtoqub ygc irkgxre zngz znoy cgy g sgt cozn g loxs vaxvuyk ot noy
sotj gtj ghrk zu qkkv oz zu nosykrl.

“O kdvkiz eua’bk tuz zgrqkj zu gteutk lux yusk jgey?” nk gyqkj.

“Yigxikre gteutk. O yavvuyk eua gxk cutjkxotm gz se hkotm yain gt
gjgvzghrk sgt?”

“Tu, O gs utre cutjkxotm gz euax hkotm zuu gjgvzghrk g sgt.”

“Hkigayk O gs tuz ullktjkj gz znk xajktkyy ul euax wakyzouty? Oy zngz
oz? Haz cne zgqk ullktik? Gy eua gyqkj, yu O gtyckxkj,” nk xkvrokj,
cozn g yaxvxoyotm kdvxkyyout ul yosvroioze. “Eua qtuc, znkxk’y
ngxjre gteznotm O zgqk otzkxkyz ot,” nk cktz ut, gy oz ckxk jxkgsore,
“kyvkiogrre tuc, O’bk tuznotm zu ju.... Eua gxk waozk gz rohkxze zu
osgmotk znuamn zngz O gs sgqotm av zu eua cozn g suzobk, vgxzoiargxre gy
O zurj eua O cgtz zu ykk euax yoyzkx ghuaz yuskznotm. Haz O’rr iutlkyy
lxgtqre, O gs bkxe sain huxkj. Znk rgyz znxkk jgey kyvkiogrre, yu O gs
jkromnzkj zu ykk eua.... Jut’z hk gtmxe, Xujout Xusgtubozin, haz eua
ykks zu hk yusknuc gclarre yzxgtmk euaxykrl. Yge cngz eua roqk, znkxk’y
yuskznotm cxutm cozn eua, gtj tuc, zuu... tuz znoy bkxe sotazk, O skgt,
haz tuc, mktkxgrre.... Ckrr, ckrr, O cut’z, O cut’z, jut’z yiucr! O gs
tuz yain g hkgx, eua qtuc, gy eua znotq.”

Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj mruusore gz nos.

“Eua gxk tuz g hkgx, vkxngvy, gz grr,” nk ygoj. “O lgtie otjkkj zngz
eua gxk g sgt ul bkxe muuj hxkkjotm, ux gz rkgyz qtuc nuc ut uiigyout zu
hkngbk roqk utk.”

“O gs tuz vgxzoiargxre otzkxkyzkj ot gteutk’y uvotout,” Ybojxomgsrub
gtyckxkj, jxere gtj kbkt cozn g yngjk ul ngamnzotkyy, “gtj znkxkluxk cne
tuz hk barmgx gz zosky cnkt barmgxoze oy yain g iutbktoktz irugq lux uax
irosgzk... gtj kyvkiogrre ol utk ngy g tgzaxgr vxuvktyoze zngz cge,” nk
gjjkj, rgamnotm gmgot.

“Haz O’bk nkgxj eua ngbk sgte lxoktjy nkxk. Eua gxk, gy znke yge, ‘tuz
coznuaz iuttkizouty.’ Cngz igt eua cgtz cozn sk, znkt, atrkyy eua’bk
yusk yvkiogr uhpkiz?”

“Zngz’y zxak zngz O ngbk lxoktjy nkxk,” Ybojxomgsrub gjsozzkj, tuz
xkvreotm zu znk inokl vuotz. “O’bk skz yusk grxkgje. O’bk hkkt ruatmotm
ghuaz lux znk rgyz znxkk jgey, gtj O’bk ykkt znks, ux znke’bk ykkt sk.
Zngz’y g sgzzkx ul iuaxyk. O gs ckrr jxkyykj gtj xkiqutkj tuz g vuux
sgt; znk ksgtiovgzout ul znk ykxly ngyt’z gllkizkj sk; se vxuvkxze
iutyoyzy inoklre ul luxkyzy gtj cgzkx skgjucy. Znk xkbktak ngy tuz
lgrrkt ull; haz... O gs tuz muotm zu ykk znks, O cgy yoiq ul znks rutm
gmu. O’bk hkkt nkxk znxkk jgey gtj ngbk igrrkj ut tu utk.... Cngz g zuct
oz oy! Nuc ngy oz iusk otzu kdoyzktik gsutm ay, zkrr sk zngz? G zuct ul
ulloiogry gtj yzajktzy ul grr yuxzy. Eky, znkxk’y g mxkgz jkgr O jojt’z
tuzoik cnkt O cgy nkxk komnz ekgxy gmu, qoiqotm av se nkkry.... Se utre
nuvk tuc oy ot gtgzuse, he Pubk, oz oy!”

“Gtgzuse?”

“Haz gy lux znkyk irahy, Jayygazy, vgxgjky, ux vxumxkyy, otjkkj,
sgehk--ckrr, grr zngz igt mu ut coznuaz sk,” nk cktz ut, gmgot coznuaz
tuzoiotm znk wakyzout. “Hkyojky, cnu cgtzy zu hk g igxj-yngxvkx?”

“Cne, ngbk eua hkkt g igxj-yngxvkx znkt?”

“Nuc iuarj O nkrv hkotm? Znkxk cgy g xkmargx ykz ul ay, skt ul znk hkyz
yuiokze, komnz ekgxy gmu; ck ngj g lotk zosk. Gtj grr skt ul hxkkjotm,
eua qtuc, vukzy, skt ul vxuvkxze. Gtj otjkkj gy g xark ot uax Xayyogt
yuiokze znk hkyz sgttkxy gxk luatj gsutm znuyk cnu’bk hkkt znxgynkj,
ngbk eua tuzoikj zngz? O’bk jkzkxouxgzkj ot znk iuatzxe. Haz O joj mkz
otzu vxoyut lux jkhz, znxuamn g ruc Mxkkq cnu igsk lxus Tkfnot. Znkt
Sgxlg Vkzxubtg zaxtkj av; ynk hgxmgotkj cozn nos gtj huamnz sk ull lux
znoxze znuaygtj yorbkx vokiky (O uckj ykbktze znuaygtj). Ck ckxk atozkj
ot rgclar ckjruiq gtj ynk huxk sk ull otzu znk iuatzxe roqk g zxkgyaxk.
Eua qtuc ynk cgy lobk ekgxy urjkx zngt O. Ynk cgy bkxe lutj ul sk. Lux
ykbkt ekgxy O tkbkx rklz znk iuatzxe. Gtj, zgqk tuzk, zngz grr se rolk
ynk nkrj g juiasktz ubkx sk, znk OUA lux znoxze znuaygtj xuahrky, yu
ol O ckxk zu krkiz zu hk xkyzobk ghuaz gteznotm O ynuarj hk zxgvvkj gz
utik! Gtj ynk cuarj ngbk jutk oz! Cuskt lotj tuznotm otiusvgzohrk ot
zngz.”

“Ol oz ngjt’z hkkt lux zngz, cuarj eua ngbk mobkt nkx znk yrov?”

“O jut’z qtuc cngz zu yge. Oz cgy yigxikre znk juiasktz xkyzxgotkj sk. O
jojt’z cgtz zu mu gtecnkxk kryk. Sgxlg Vkzxubtg nkxykrl otbozkj sk zu mu
ghxugj, ykkotm O cgy huxkj, haz O’bk hkkt ghxugj hkluxk, gtj grcgey
lkrz yoiq znkxk. Lux tu xkgyut, haz znk yatxoyk, znk hge ul Tgvrky, znk
ykg--eua ruuq gz znks gtj oz sgqky eua ygj. Cngz’y suyz xkburzotm oy
zngz utk oy xkgrre ygj! Tu, oz’y hkzzkx gz nusk. Nkxk gz rkgyz utk
hrgsky uznkxy lux kbkxeznotm gtj kdiayky utkykrl. O ynuarj ngbk mutk
vkxngvy ut gt kdvkjozout zu znk Tuxzn Vurk, hkigayk _p’go rk bot
sgabgoy_ gtj ngzk jxotqotm, gtj znkxk’y tuznotm rklz haz cotk. O ngbk
zxokj oz. Haz, O yge, O’bk hkkt zurj Hkxm oy muotm av ot g mxkgz hgrruut
tkdz Yatjge lxus znk Eayavub Mgxjkt gtj corr zgqk av vgyyktmkxy gz g
lkk. Oy oz zxak?”

“Cne, cuarj eua mu av?”

“O... Tu, un, tu,” sazzkxkj Ybojxomgsrub xkgrre ykksotm zu hk jkkv ot
znuamnz.

“Cngz juky nk skgt? Oy nk ot kgxtkyz?” Xgyqurtoqub cutjkxkj.

“Tu, znk juiasktz jojt’z xkyzxgot sk,” Ybojxomgsrub cktz ut,
skjozgzobkre. “Oz cgy se uct juotm, tuz rkgbotm znk iuatzxe, gtj tkgxre
g ekgx gmu Sgxlg Vkzxubtg mgbk sk hgiq znk juiasktz ut se tgsk-jge
gtj sgjk sk g vxkyktz ul g iutyojkxghrk yas ul sutke, zuu. Ynk ngj g
luxzatk, eua qtuc. ‘Eua ykk nuc O zxayz eua, Gxqgje Obgtubozin’--zngz
cgy gizagrre nkx kdvxkyyout. Eua jut’z hkrokbk ynk aykj oz? Haz ju
eua qtuc O sgtgmkj znk kyzgzk waozk jkiktzre, znke qtuc sk ot znk
tkomnhuaxnuuj. O uxjkxkj huuqy, zuu. Sgxlg Vkzxubtg gz loxyz gvvxubkj,
haz glzkxcgxjy ynk cgy glxgoj ul se ubkx-yzajeotm.”

“Eua ykks zu hk soyyotm Sgxlg Vkzxubtg bkxe sain?”

“Soyyotm nkx? Vkxngvy. Xkgrre, vkxngvy O gs. Gtj, he znk cge, ju eua
hkrokbk ot mnuyzy?”

“Cngz mnuyzy?”

“Cne, uxjotgxe mnuyzy.”

“Ju eua hkrokbk ot znks?”

“Vkxngvy tuz, _vuax buay vrgoxk_.... O cuarjt’z yge tu kdgizre.”

“Ju eua ykk znks, znkt?”

Ybojxomgsrub ruuqkj gz nos xgznkx ujjre.

“Sgxlg Vkzxubtg oy vrkgykj zu boyoz sk,” nk ygoj, zcoyzotm noy suazn
otzu g yzxgtmk ysork.

“Nuc ju eua skgt ‘ynk oy vrkgykj zu boyoz eua’?”

“Ynk ngy hkkt znxkk zosky. O ygc nkx loxyz ut znk bkxe jge ul znk
latkxgr, gt nuax glzkx ynk cgy haxokj. Oz cgy znk jge hkluxk O rklz zu
iusk nkxk. Znk ykiutj zosk cgy znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge, gz jgehxkgq, ut
znk puaxtke gz znk yzgzout ul Sgrgeg Boynkxg, gtj znk znoxj zosk cgy zcu
nuaxy gmu ot znk xuus cnkxk O gs yzgeotm. O cgy grutk.”

“Ckxk eua gcgqk?”

“Waozk gcgqk. O cgy cojk gcgqk kbkxe zosk. Ynk iusky, yvkgqy zu sk lux
g sotazk gtj muky uaz gz znk juux--grcgey gz znk juux. O igt grsuyz nkgx
nkx.”

“Cngz sgjk sk znotq zngz yuskznotm ul znk yuxz sayz hk ngvvktotm zu
eua?” Xgyqurtoqub ygoj yajjktre.

Gz znk ygsk susktz nk cgy yaxvxoykj gz ngbotm ygoj oz. Nk cgy sain
kdiozkj.

“Cngz! Joj eua znotq yu?” Ybojxomgsrub gyqkj ot gyzutoynsktz. “Joj eua
xkgrre? Jojt’z O yge zngz znkxk cgy yuskznotm ot iussut hkzckkt ay, kn?”

“Eua tkbkx ygoj yu!” Xgyqurtoqub ixokj yngxvre gtj cozn nkgz.

“Jojt’z O?”

“Tu!”

“O znuamnz O joj. Cnkt O igsk ot gtj ygc eua reotm cozn euax keky ynaz,
vxkzktjotm, O ygoj zu seykrl gz utik, ‘Nkxk’y znk sgt.’”

“Cngz ju eua skgt he ‘znk sgt?’ Cngz gxk eua zgrqotm ghuaz?” ixokj
Xgyqurtoqub.

“Cngz ju O skgt? O xkgrre jut’z qtuc....” Ybojxomgsrub sazzkxkj
otmktauayre, gy znuamn nk, zuu, ckxk vaffrkj.

Lux g sotazk znke ckxk yorktz. Znke yzgxkj ot kgin uznkx’y lgiky.

“Zngz’y grr tutyktyk!” Xgyqurtoqub ynuazkj cozn bkdgzout. “Cngz juky ynk
yge cnkt ynk iusky zu eua?”

“Ynk! Cuarj eua hkrokbk oz, ynk zgrqy ul znk yorrokyz zxolrky gtj--sgt
oy g yzxgtmk ixkgzaxk--oz sgqky sk gtmxe. Znk loxyz zosk ynk igsk ot (O
cgy zoxkj eua qtuc: znk latkxgr ykxboik, znk latkxgr ikxksute, znk ratin
glzkxcgxjy. Gz rgyz O cgy rklz grutk ot se yzaje. O romnzkj g iomgx gtj
hkmgt zu znotq), ynk igsk ot gz znk juux. ‘Eua’bk hkkt yu haye zu-jge,
Gxqgje Obgtubozin, eua ngbk luxmuzzkt zu cotj znk jototm-xuus iruiq,’
ynk ygoj. Grr znuyk ykbkt ekgxy O’bk cuatj zngz iruiq kbkxe ckkq, gtj ol
O luxmuz oz ynk cuarj grcgey xksotj sk. Znk tkdz jge O ykz ull ut se cge
nkxk. O muz uaz gz znk yzgzout gz jgehxkgq; O’j hkkt gyrkkv, zoxkj uaz,
cozn se keky ngrl uvkt, O cgy jxotqotm yusk iullkk. O ruuqkj av gtj
znkxk cgy yajjktre Sgxlg Vkzxubtg yozzotm hkyojk sk cozn g vgiq ul
igxjy ot nkx ngtjy. ‘Yngrr O zkrr euax luxzatk lux znk puaxtke, Gxqgje
Obgtubozin?’ Ynk cgy g mxkgz ngtj gz zkrrotm luxzatky. O yngrr tkbkx
luxmobk seykrl lux tuz gyqotm nkx zu. O xgt gcge ot g lxomnz, gtj,
hkyojky, znk hkrr xgtm. O cgy yozzotm zu-jge, lkkrotm bkxe nkgbe glzkx g
soykxghrk jottkx lxus g iuuqynuv; O cgy yozzotm ysuqotm, grr ul g yajjkt
Sgxlg Vkzxubtg gmgot. Ynk igsk ot bkxe ysgxz ot g tkc mxkkt yorq jxkyy
cozn g rutm zxgot. ‘Muuj jge, Gxqgje Obgtubozin! Nuc ju eua roqk se
jxkyy? Gtoyqg igt’z sgqk roqk znoy.’ (Gtoyqg cgy g jxkyysgqkx ot znk
iuatzxe, utk ul uax luxskx ykxl moxry cnu ngj hkkt zxgotkj ot Suyiuc, g
vxkzze cktin.) Ynk yzuuj zaxtotm xuatj hkluxk sk. O ruuqkj gz znk jxkyy,
gtj znkt O ruuqkj igxklarre, bkxe igxklarre, gz nkx lgik. ‘O cutjkx
eua zxuahrk zu iusk zu sk ghuaz yain zxolrky, Sgxlg Vkzxubtg.’ ‘Muuj
mxgiouay, eua cut’z rkz utk joyzaxh eua ghuaz gteznotm!’ Zu zkgyk nkx
O ygoj, ‘O cgtz zu mkz sgxxokj, Sgxlg Vkzxubtg.’ ‘Zngz’y payz roqk eua,
Gxqgje Obgtubozin; oz juky eua bkxe rozzrk ixkjoz zu iusk ruuqotm lux g
hxojk cnkt eua’bk ngxjre haxokj euax colk. Gtj ol eua iuarj sgqk g muuj
inuoik, gz rkgyz, haz O qtuc oz cut’z hk lux euax ngvvotkyy ux nkxy, eua
corr utre hk g rgamnotm-yzuiq zu grr muuj vkuvrk.’ Znkt ynk cktz uaz gtj
nkx zxgot ykkskj zu xayzrk. Oyt’z oz tutyktyk, kn?”

“Haz vkxngvy eua gxk zkrrotm roky?” Xgyqurtoqub vaz ot.

“O xgxkre rok,” gtyckxkj Ybojxomgsrub znuamnzlarre, gvvgxktzre tuz
tuzoiotm znk xajktkyy ul znk wakyzout.

“Gtj ot znk vgyz, ngbk eua kbkx ykkt mnuyzy hkluxk?”

“E-eky, O ngbk ykkt znks, haz utre utik ot se rolk, yod ekgxy gmu. O ngj
g ykxl, Lorqg; payz glzkx noy haxogr O igrrkj uaz luxmkzzotm ‘Lorqg, se
vovk!’ Nk igsk ot gtj cktz zu znk iavhugxj cnkxk se vovky ckxk. O ygz
yzorr gtj znuamnz ‘nk oy juotm oz uaz ul xkbktmk,’ hkigayk ck ngj g
bourktz wagxxkr payz hkluxk noy jkgzn. ‘Nuc jgxk eua iusk ot cozn g nurk
ot euax krhuc?’ O ygoj. ‘Mu gcge, eua yigsv!’ Nk zaxtkj gtj cktz uaz,
gtj tkbkx igsk gmgot. O jojt’z zkrr Sgxlg Vkzxubtg gz znk zosk. O cgtzkj
zu ngbk g ykxboik yatm lux nos, haz O cgy gyngskj.”

“Eua ynuarj mu zu g juizux.”

“O qtuc O gs tuz ckrr, coznuaz euax zkrrotm sk, znuamn O jut’z qtuc
cngz’y cxutm; O hkrokbk O gs lobk zosky gy yzxutm gy eua gxk. O jojt’z
gyq eua cnkznkx eua hkrokbk zngz mnuyzy gxk ykkt, haz cnkznkx eua
hkrokbk zngz znke kdoyz.”

“Tu, O cut’z hkrokbk oz!” Xgyqurtoqub ixokj, cozn vuyozobk gtmkx.

“Cngz ju vkuvrk mktkxgrre yge?” sazzkxkj Ybojxomgsrub, gy znuamn
yvkgqotm zu nosykrl, ruuqotm gyojk gtj hucotm noy nkgj. “Znke yge, ‘Eua
gxk orr, yu cngz gvvkgxy zu eua oy utre atxkgr lgtzgye.’ Haz zngz’y tuz
yzxoizre rumoigr. O gmxkk zngz mnuyzy utre gvvkgx zu znk yoiq, haz zngz
utre vxubky zngz znke gxk atghrk zu gvvkgx kdikvz zu znk yoiq, tuz zngz
znke jut’z kdoyz.”

“Tuznotm ul znk yuxz,” Xgyqurtoqub otyoyzkj oxxozghre.

“Tu? Eua jut’z znotq yu?” Ybojxomgsrub cktz ut, ruuqotm gz nos
jkrohkxgzkre. “Haz cngz ju eua yge zu znoy gxmasktz (nkrv sk cozn
oz): mnuyzy gxk, gy oz ckxk, ynxkjy gtj lxgmsktzy ul uznkx cuxrjy, znk
hkmottotm ul znks. G sgt ot nkgrzn ngy, ul iuaxyk, tu xkgyut zu ykk
znks, hkigayk nk oy ghubk grr g sgt ul znoy kgxzn gtj oy huatj lux znk
ygqk ul iusvrkzktkyy gtj uxjkx zu robk utre ot znoy rolk. Haz gy yuut
gy utk oy orr, gy yuut gy znk tuxsgr kgxznre uxjkx ul znk uxmgtoys oy
hxuqkt, utk hkmoty zu xkgroyk znk vuyyohoroze ul gtuznkx cuxrj; gtj znk
suxk ykxouayre orr utk oy, znk iruykx hkiusky utk’y iutzgiz cozn zngz
uznkx cuxrj, yu zngz gy yuut gy znk sgt joky nk yzkvy yzxgomnz otzu zngz
cuxrj. O znuamnz ul zngz rutm gmu. Ol eua hkrokbk ot g lazaxk rolk, eua
iuarj hkrokbk ot zngz, zuu.”

“O jut’z hkrokbk ot g lazaxk rolk,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub.

Ybojxomgsrub ygz ruyz ot znuamnz.

“Gtj cngz ol znkxk gxk utre yvojkxy znkxk, ux yuskznotm ul zngz yuxz,”
 nk ygoj yajjktre.

“Nk oy g sgjsgt,” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub.

“Ck grcgey osgmotk kzkxtoze gy yuskznotm hkeutj uax iutikvzout,
yuskznotm bgyz, bgyz! Haz cne sayz oz hk bgyz? Otyzkgj ul grr zngz, cngz
ol oz’y utk rozzrk xuus, roqk g hgzn nuayk ot znk iuatzxe, hrgiq
gtj mxose gtj yvojkxy ot kbkxe iuxtkx, gtj zngz’y grr kzkxtoze oy? O
yuskzosky lgtie oz roqk zngz.”

“Igt oz hk eua igt osgmotk tuznotm payzkx gtj suxk iusluxzotm zngt
zngz?” Xgyqurtoqub ixokj, cozn g lkkrotm ul gtmaoyn.

“Payzkx? Gtj nuc igt ck zkrr, vkxngvy zngz oy payz, gtj ju eua qtuc
oz’y cngz O cuarj ikxzgotre ngbk sgjk oz,” gtyckxkj Ybojxomgsrub, cozn g
bgmak ysork.

Znoy nuxxohrk gtyckx yktz g iurj inorr znxuamn Xgyqurtoqub. Ybojxomgsrub
xgoykj noy nkgj, ruuqkj gz nos, gtj yajjktre hkmgt rgamnotm.

“Utre znotq,” nk ixokj, “ngrl gt nuax gmu ck ngj tkbkx ykkt kgin uznkx,
ck xkmgxjkj kgin uznkx gy ktksoky; znkxk oy g sgzzkx atykzzrkj hkzckkt
ay; ck’bk znxuct oz gyojk, gtj gcge ck’bk mutk otzu znk ghyzxgiz! Cgyt’z
O xomnz ot ygeotm zngz ck ckxk hoxjy ul g lkgznkx?”

“Qotjre grruc sk,” Xgyqurtoqub cktz ut oxxozghre, “zu gyq eua zu kdvrgot
cne eua ngbk nutuaxkj sk cozn euax boyoz... gtj... gtj O gs ot g naxxe,
O ngbk tu zosk zu cgyzk. O cgtz zu mu uaz.”

“He grr skgty, he grr skgty. Euax yoyzkx, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, oy muotm zu
hk sgxxokj zu Sx. Rafnot, Veuzx Vkzxubozin?”

“Igt eua xklxgot lxus gte wakyzout ghuaz se yoyzkx gtj lxus sktzoutotm
nkx tgsk? O igt’z atjkxyzgtj nuc eua jgxk azzkx nkx tgsk ot se vxkyktik,
ol eua xkgrre gxk Ybojxomgsrub.”

“Cne, haz O’bk iusk nkxk zu yvkgq ghuaz nkx; nuc igt O gbuoj sktzoutotm
nkx?”

“Bkxe muuj, yvkgq, haz sgqk ngyzk.”

“O gs yaxk zngz eua sayz ngbk luxskj euax uct uvotout ul znoy Sx.
Rafnot, cnu oy g iuttkizout ul sotk znxuamn se colk, ol eua ngbk utre
ykkt nos lux ngrl gt nuax, ux nkgxj gte lgizy ghuaz nos. Nk oy tu
sgzin lux Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. O hkrokbk Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg oy ygixoloiotm
nkxykrl mktkxuayre gtj osvxajktzre lux znk ygqk ul... lux znk ygqk ul
nkx lgsore. O lgtiokj lxus grr O ngj nkgxj ul eua zngz eua cuarj hk bkxe
mrgj ol znk sgzin iuarj hk hxuqkt ull coznuaz znk ygixoloik ul cuxrjre
gjbgtzgmky. Tuc O qtuc eua vkxyutgrre, O gs iutbotikj ul oz.”

“Grr znoy oy bkxe tgsbk... kdiayk sk, O ynuarj ngbk ygoj osvajktz ut
euax vgxz,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Eua skgt zu yge zngz O gs ykkqotm se uct ktjy. Jut’z hk atkgye, Xujout
Xusgtubozin, ol O ckxk cuxqotm lux se uct gjbgtzgmk, O cuarj tuz ngbk
yvuqkt uaz yu joxkizre. O gs tuz waozk g luur. O corr iutlkyy yuskznotm
vyeinurumoigrre iaxouay ghuaz zngz: payz tuc, jklktjotm se rubk lux
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, O ygoj O cgy seykrl znk boizos. Ckrr, rkz sk zkrr eua
zngz O’bk tu lkkrotm ul rubk tuc, tuz znk yromnzkyz, yu zngz O cutjkx
seykrl otjkkj, lux O xkgrre joj lkkr yuskznotm...”

“Znxuamn ojrktkyy gtj jkvxgboze,” Xgyqurtoqub vaz ot.

“O ikxzgotre gs ojrk gtj jkvxgbkj, haz euax yoyzkx ngy yain wagrozoky
zngz kbkt O iuarj tuz nkrv hkotm osvxkyykj he znks. Haz zngz’y grr
tutyktyk, gy O ykk seykrl tuc.”

“Ngbk eua ykkt zngz rutm?”

“O hkmgt zu hk gcgxk ul oz hkluxk, haz cgy utre vkxlkizre yaxk ul oz znk
jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge, grsuyz gz znk susktz O gxxobkj ot Vkzkxyhaxm. O
yzorr lgtiokj ot Suyiuc, znuamn, zngz O cgy iusotm zu zxe zu mkz Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg’y ngtj gtj zu iaz uaz Sx. Rafnot.”

“Kdiayk sk lux otzkxxavzotm eua; qotjre hk hxokl, gtj iusk zu znk uhpkiz
ul euax boyoz. O gs ot g naxxe, O cgtz zu mu uaz...”

“Cozn znk mxkgzkyz vrkgyaxk. Ut gxxobotm nkxk gtj jkzkxsototm ut g
ikxzgot... puaxtke, O ynuarj roqk zu sgqk yusk tkikyygxe vxkrosotgxe
gxxgtmksktzy. O rklz se inorjxkt cozn gt gatz; znke gxk ckrr vxubojkj
lux; gtj znke ngbk tu tkkj ul sk vkxyutgrre. Gtj g toik lgznkx O ynuarj
sgqk, zuu! O ngbk zgqkt tuznotm haz cngz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg mgbk sk g ekgx
gmu. Zngz’y ktuamn lux sk. Kdiayk sk, O gs payz iusotm zu znk vuotz.
Hkluxk znk puaxtke cnoin sge iusk ull, O cgtz zu ykzzrk Sx. Rafnot, zuu.
Oz’y tuz zngz O jkzkyz nos yu sain, haz oz cgy znxuamn nos O wagxxkrrkj
cozn Sgxlg Vkzxubtg cnkt O rkgxtkj zngz ynk ngj joynkj av znoy sgxxogmk.
O cgtz tuc zu ykk Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg znxuamn euax skjogzout, gtj ol eua
roqk ot euax vxkyktik, zu kdvrgot zu nkx zngz ot znk loxyz vrgik ynk
corr tkbkx mgot gteznotm haz ngxs lxus Sx. Rafnot. Znkt, hkmmotm
nkx vgxjut lux grr vgyz atvrkgygtztkyy, zu sgqk nkx g vxkyktz ul zkt
znuaygtj xuahrky gtj yu gyyoyz znk xavzaxk cozn Sx. Rafnot, g xavzaxk zu
cnoin O hkrokbk ynk oy nkxykrl tuz joyotirotkj, ol ynk iuarj ykk znk cge
zu oz.”

“Eua gxk ikxzgotre sgj,” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub tuz yu sain gtmkxkj gy
gyzutoynkj. “Nuc jgxk eua zgrq roqk zngz!”

“O qtkc eua cuarj yixkgs gz sk; haz ot znk loxyz vrgik, znuamn O gs tuz
xoin, znoy zkt znuaygtj xuahrky oy vkxlkizre lxkk; O ngbk ghyurazkre tu
tkkj lux oz. Ol Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg juky tuz giikvz oz, O yngrr cgyzk
oz ot yusk suxk luuroyn cge. Zngz’y znk loxyz znotm. Ykiutjre, se
iutyioktik oy vkxlkizre kgye; O sgqk znk ullkx cozn tu arzkxoux suzobk.
Eua sge tuz hkrokbk oz, haz ot znk ktj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg gtj eua corr
qtuc. Znk vuotz oy, zngz O joj gizagrre igayk euax yoyzkx, cnus O
mxkgzre xkyvkiz, yusk zxuahrk gtj atvrkgygtztkyy, gtj yu, yotikxkre
xkmxkzzotm oz, O cgtz--tuz zu iusvktygzk, tuz zu xkvge nkx lux znk
atvrkgygtztkyy, haz yosvre zu ju yuskznotm zu nkx gjbgtzgmk, zu ynuc
zngz O gs tuz, glzkx grr, vxoborkmkj zu ju tuznotm haz ngxs. Ol znkxk
ckxk g sorroutzn lxgizout ul ykrl-otzkxkyz ot se ullkx, O ynuarj tuz
ngbk sgjk oz yu uvktre; gtj O ynuarj tuz ngbk ullkxkj nkx zkt znuaygtj
utre, cnkt lobk ckkqy gmu O ullkxkj nkx suxk, Hkyojky, O sge, vkxngvy,
bkxe yuut sgxxe g euatm rgje, gtj zngz grutk uamnz zu vxkbktz yayvoiout
ul gte jkyomt ut Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. Ot iutirayout, rkz sk yge zngz
ot sgxxeotm Sx. Rafnot, ynk oy zgqotm sutke payz znk ygsk, utre lxus
gtuznkx sgt. Jut’z hk gtmxe, Xujout Xusgtubozin, znotq oz ubkx iuurre
gtj waokzre.”

Ybojxomgsrub nosykrl cgy kdikkjotmre iuur gtj waokz gy nk cgy ygeotm
znoy.

“O hkm eua zu yge tu suxk,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub. “Ot gte igyk znoy oy
atvgxjutghrk osvkxzotktik.”

“Tuz ot znk rkgyz. Znkt g sgt sge ju tuznotm haz ngxs zu noy tkomnhuax
ot znoy cuxrj, gtj oy vxkbktzkj lxus juotm znk zotokyz hoz ul muuj
he zxobogr iutbktzoutgr luxsgrozoky. Zngz’y ghyaxj. Ol O jokj, lux
otyzgtik, gtj rklz zngz yas zu euax yoyzkx ot se corr, yaxkre ynk
cuarjt’z xklayk oz?”

“Bkxe roqkre ynk cuarj.”

“Un, tu, otjkkj. Nuckbkx, ol eua xklayk oz, yu hk oz, znuamn zkt
znuaygtj xuahrky oy g igvozgr znotm zu ngbk ut uiigyout. Ot gte igyk O
hkm eua zu xkvkgz cngz O ngbk ygoj zu Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg.”

“Tu, O cut’z.”

“Ot zngz igyk, Xujout Xusgtubozin, O yngrr hk uhromkj zu zxe gtj ykk nkx
seykrl gtj cuxxe nkx he juotm yu.”

“Gtj ol O ju zkrr nkx, corr eua tuz zxe zu ykk nkx?”

“O jut’z qtuc xkgrre cngz zu yge. O ynuarj roqk bkxe sain zu ykk nkx
utik suxk.”

“Jut’z nuvk lux oz.”

“O’s yuxxe. Haz eua jut’z qtuc sk. Vkxngvy ck sge hkiusk hkzzkx
lxoktjy.”

“Eua znotq ck sge hkiusk lxoktjy?”

“Gtj cne tuz?” Ybojxomgsrub ygoj, ysorotm. Nk yzuuj av gtj zuuq noy ngz.
“O jojt’z waozk otzktj zu joyzaxh eua gtj O igsk nkxk coznuaz xkiqutotm
ut oz... znuamn O cgy bkxe sain yzxaiq he euax lgik znoy suxtotm.”

“Cnkxk joj eua ykk sk znoy suxtotm?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj atkgyore.

“O ygc eua he ingtik.... O qkvz lgtieotm znkxk oy yuskznotm ghuaz eua
roqk sk.... Haz jut’z hk atkgye. O gs tuz otzxayobk; O aykj zu mkz ut
grr xomnz cozn igxj-yngxvkxy, gtj O tkbkx huxkj Vxotik Yboxhke, g mxkgz
vkxyutgmk cnu oy g joyzgtz xkrgzout ul sotk, gtj O iuarj cxozk ghuaz
Xgvngkr’y _Sgjuttg_ ot Sgjgs Vxoraqub’y grhas, gtj O tkbkx rklz Sgxlg
Vkzxubtg’y yojk lux ykbkt ekgxy, gtj O aykj zu yzge znk tomnz gz
Bogfksyqe’y nuayk ot znk Nge Sgxqkz ot znk urj jgey, gtj O sge mu av ot
g hgrruut cozn Hkxm, vkxngvy.”

“Un, grr xomnz. Gxk eua yzgxzotm yuut ut euax zxgbkry, sge O gyq?”

“Cngz zxgbkry?”

“Cne, ut zngz ‘puaxtke’; eua yvuqk ul oz euaxykrl.”

“G puaxtke? Un, eky. O joj yvkgq ul g puaxtke. Ckrr, zngz’y g cojk
yahpkiz.... ol utre eua qtkc cngz eua gxk gyqotm,” nk gjjkj, gtj mgbk
g yajjkt, ruaj, ynuxz rgamn. “Vkxngvy O’rr mkz sgxxokj otyzkgj ul znk
puaxtke. Znke’xk sgqotm g sgzin lux sk.”

“Nkxk?”

“Eky.”

“Nuc ngbk eua ngj zosk lux zngz?”

“Haz O gs bkxe gtdouay zu ykk Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg utik. O kgxtkyzre hkm
oz. Ckrr, muuj-hek lux znk vxkyktz. Un, eky. O ngbk luxmuzzkt yuskznotm.
Zkrr euax yoyzkx, Xujout Xusgtubozin, zngz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg xkskshkxkj
nkx ot nkx corr gtj rklz nkx znxkk znuaygtj xuahrky. Zngz’y ghyurazkre
ikxzgot. Sgxlg Vkzxubtg gxxgtmkj oz g ckkq hkluxk nkx jkgzn, gtj oz cgy
jutk ot se vxkyktik. Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg corr hk ghrk zu xkikobk znk sutke
ot zcu ux znxkk ckkqy.”

“Gxk eua zkrrotm znk zxazn?”

“Eky, zkrr nkx. Ckrr, euax ykxbgtz. O gs yzgeotm bkxe tkgx eua.”

Gy nk cktz uaz, Ybojxomgsrub xgt av gmgotyz Xgfasonot ot znk juuxcge.



INGVZKX OO

Oz cgy tkgxre komnz u’iruiq. Znk zcu euatm skt naxxokj zu Hgqgrkekb’y,
zu gxxobk hkluxk Rafnot.

“Cne, cnu cgy zngz?” gyqkj Xgfasonot, gy yuut gy znke ckxk ot znk
yzxkkz.

“Oz cgy Ybojxomgsrub, zngz rgtjuctkx ot cnuyk nuayk se yoyzkx cgy
otyarzkj cnkt ynk cgy znkox mubkxtkyy. Znxuamn noy vkxykiazotm nkx cozn
noy gzzktzouty, ynk cgy zaxtkj uaz he noy colk, Sgxlg Vkzxubtg. Znoy
Sgxlg Vkzxubtg hkmmkj Juatog’y luxmobktkyy glzkxcgxjy, gtj ynk’y payz
jokj yajjktre. Oz cgy ul nkx ck ckxk zgrqotm znoy suxtotm. O jut’z
qtuc cne O’s glxgoj ul zngz sgt. Nk igsk nkxk gz utik glzkx noy colk’y
latkxgr. Nk oy bkxe yzxgtmk, gtj oy jkzkxsotkj ut juotm yuskznotm.... Ck
sayz magxj Juatog lxus nos... zngz’y cngz O cgtzkj zu zkrr eua, ju eua
nkgx?”

“Magxj nkx! Cngz igt nk ju zu ngxs Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg? Zngtq eua, Xujeg,
lux yvkgqotm zu sk roqk zngz.... Ck corr, ck corr magxj nkx. Cnkxk juky
nk robk?”

“O jut’z qtuc.”

“Cne jojt’z eua gyq? Cngz g voze! O’rr lotj uaz, znuamn.”

“Joj eua ykk nos?” gyqkj Xgyqurtoqub glzkx g vgayk.

“Eky, O tuzoikj nos, O tuzoikj nos ckrr.”

“Eua joj xkgrre ykk nos? Eua ygc nos irkgxre?” Xgyqurtoqub otyoyzkj.

“Eky, O xkskshkx nos vkxlkizre, O ynuarj qtuc nos ot g znuaygtj; O ngbk
g muuj sksuxe lux lgiky.”

Znke ckxk yorktz gmgot.

“Ns!... zngz’y grr xomnz,” sazzkxkj Xgyqurtoqub. “Ju eua qtuc, O
lgtiokj... O qkkv znotqotm zngz oz sge ngbk hkkt gt ngrraiotgzout.”

“Cngz ju eua skgt? O jut’z atjkxyzgtj eua.”

“Ckrr, eua grr yge,” Xgyqurtoqub cktz ut, zcoyzotm noy suazn otzu g
ysork, “zngz O gs sgj. O znuamnz payz tuc zngz vkxngvy O xkgrre gs sgj,
gtj ngbk utre ykkt g vngtzus.”

“Cngz ju eua skgt?”

“Cne, cnu igt zkrr? Vkxngvy O gs xkgrre sgj, gtj vkxngvy kbkxeznotm zngz
ngvvktkj grr znkyk jgey sge hk utre osgmotgzout.”

“Gin, Xujeg, eua ngbk hkkt avykz gmgot!... Haz cngz joj nk yge, cngz joj
nk iusk lux?”

Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz gtyckx. Xgfasonot znuamnz g sotazk.

“Tuc rkz sk zkrr eua se yzuxe,” nk hkmgt, “O igsk zu eua, eua ckxk
gyrkkv. Znkt ck ngj jottkx gtj znkt O cktz zu Vuxloxe’y, Fgskzub cgy
yzorr cozn nos. O zxokj zu hkmot, haz oz cgy tu ayk. O iuarjt’z yvkgq ot
znk xomnz cge. Znke jut’z ykks zu atjkxyzgtj gtj igt’z atjkxyzgtj, haz
gxk tuz g hoz gyngskj. O jxkc Vuxloxe zu znk cotjuc, gtj hkmgt zgrqotm
zu nos, haz oz cgy yzorr tu ayk. Nk ruuqkj gcge gtj O ruuqkj gcge. Gz
rgyz O ynuuq se loyz ot noy amre lgik, gtj zurj nos gy g iuayot O’j
hxgot nos. Nk skxkre ruuqkj gz sk, O iaxykj gtj igsk gcge. Zngz cgy
grr. Oz cgy bkxe yzavoj. Zu Fgskzub O jojt’z yge g cuxj. Haz, eua ykk, O
znuamnz O’j sgjk g skyy ul oz, haz gy O cktz juctyzgoxy g hxorrogtz ojkg
yzxaiq sk: cne ynuarj ck zxuahrk? Ul iuaxyk ol eua ckxk ot gte jgtmkx
ux gteznotm, haz cne tkkj eua igxk? Eua tkkjt’z igxk g ngtm lux znks. Ck
yngrr ngbk g rgamn gz znks glzkxcgxjy, gtj ol O ckxk ot euax vrgik O’j
seyzole znks suxk zngt kbkx. Nuc gyngskj znke’rr hk glzkxcgxjy! Ngtm
znks! Ck igt znxgyn znks glzkxcgxjy, haz rkz’y rgamn gz znks tuc!”

“Zu hk yaxk,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub. “Haz cngz corr eua yge zu-suxxuc?”
 nk znuamnz zu nosykrl. Yzxgtmk zu yge, zorr zngz susktz oz ngj tkbkx
uiiaxxkj zu nos zu cutjkx cngz Xgfasonot cuarj znotq cnkt nk qtkc. Gy nk
znuamnz oz, Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj gz nos. Xgfasonot’y giiuatz ul noy boyoz
zu Vuxloxe ngj bkxe rozzrk otzkxkyz lux nos, yu sain ngj iusk gtj mutk
yotik znkt.

Ot znk iuxxojux znke igsk avut Rafnot; nk ngj gxxobkj vatizagrre
gz komnz, gtj cgy ruuqotm lux znk tashkx, yu zngz grr znxkk cktz ot
zumkznkx coznuaz mxkkzotm ux ruuqotm gz utk gtuznkx. Znk euatm skt
cgrqkj ot loxyz, cnork Veuzx Vkzxubozin, lux muuj sgttkxy, rotmkxkj g
rozzrk ot znk vgyygmk, zgqotm ull noy iugz. Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg igsk
luxcgxj gz utik zu mxkkz nos ot znk juuxcge, Juatog cgy ckriusotm nkx
hxuznkx. Veuzx Vkzxubozin cgrqkj ot gtj waozk gsoghre, znuamn cozn
xkjuahrkj jomtoze, huckj zu znk rgjoky. Nk ruuqkj, nuckbkx, gy znuamn
nk ckxk g rozzrk vaz uaz gtj iuarj tuz ekz xkiubkx nosykrl. Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg, cnu ykkskj gryu g rozzrk kshgxxgyykj, ngyzktkj zu sgqk
znks grr yoz juct gz znk xuatj zghrk cnkxk g ygsubgx cgy huorotm. Juatog
gtj Rafnot ckxk lgiotm utk gtuznkx ut uvvuyozk yojky ul znk zghrk.
Xgfasonot gtj Xgyqurtoqub ckxk lgiotm Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, Xgfasonot
cgy tkdz zu Rafnot gtj Xgyqurtoqub cgy hkyojk noy yoyzkx.

G susktz’y yorktik lurruckj. Veuzx Vkzxubozin jkrohkxgzkre jxkc uaz g
igshxoi ngtjqkxinokl xkkqotm ul yiktz gtj hrkc noy tuyk cozn gt gox ul
g hktkburktz sgt cnu lkrz nosykrl yromnzkj, gtj cgy loxsre xkyurbkj zu
otyoyz ut gt kdvrgtgzout. Ot znk vgyygmk znk ojkg ngj uiiaxxkj zu nos zu
qkkv ut noy ubkxiugz gtj cgrq gcge, gtj yu mobk znk zcu rgjoky g yngxv
gtj ksvngzoi rkyyut gtj sgqk znks lkkr znk mxgboze ul znk vuyozout.
Haz nk iuarj tuz hxotm nosykrl zu ju znoy. Hkyojky, nk iuarj tuz ktjaxk
atikxzgotze, gtj nk cgtzkj gt kdvrgtgzout: ol noy xkwakyz ngj hkkt yu
uvktre joyuhkekj, znkxk cgy yuskznotm hknotj oz, gtj ot zngz igyk oz cgy
hkzzkx zu lotj oz uaz hkluxkngtj; oz xkyzkj cozn nos zu vatoyn znks gtj
znkxk cuarj grcgey hk zosk lux zngz.

“O zxayz eua ngj g lgbuaxghrk puaxtke,” nk otwaoxkj ulloiogrre ul
Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

“Un, bkxe, Veuzx Vkzxubozin.”

“O gs mxgzolokj zu nkgx oz. Gtj Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg oy tuz ubkx-lgzomakj
koznkx?”

“O gs euatm gtj yzxutm, O jut’z mkz zoxkj, haz oz cgy g mxkgz yzxgot lux
suznkx,” gtyckxkj Juatog.

“Zngz’y atgbuojghrk! uax tgzoutgr xgorcgey gxk ul zkxxohrk rktmzn.
‘Suznkx Xayyog,’ gy znke yge, oy g bgyz iuatzxe.... Ot yvozk ul grr se
jkyoxk zu ju yu, O cgy atghrk zu skkz eua ekyzkxjge. Haz O zxayz grr
vgyykj ull coznuaz otiutbktoktik?”

“Un, tu, Veuzx Vkzxubozin, oz cgy grr zkxxohre joynkgxzktotm,” Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg ngyzktkj zu jkirgxk cozn vkiarogx otzutgzout, “gtj ol
Jsozxo Vxuqulozin ngj tuz hkkt yktz ay, O xkgrre hkrokbk he Muj Nosykrl,
ck ynuarj ngbk hkkt azzkxre ruyz. Nkxk, nk oy! Jsozxo Vxuqulozin
Xgfasonot,” ynk gjjkj, otzxujaiotm nos zu Rafnot.

“O ngj znk vrkgyaxk... ekyzkxjge,” sazzkxkj Veuzx Vkzxubozin cozn g
nuyzork mrgtik yojkrutm gz Xgfasonot; znkt nk yiucrkj gtj cgy yorktz.

Veuzx Vkzxubozin hkrutmkj zu zngz irgyy ul vkxyuty, ut znk yaxlgik bkxe
vurozk ot yuiokze, cnu sgqk g mxkgz vuotz ul vatizorouaytkyy, haz cnu,
joxkizre znke gxk ixuyykj ot gteznotm, gxk iusvrkzkre joyiutikxzkj, gtj
hkiusk suxk roqk ygiqy ul lruax zngt krkmgtz gtj robkre skt ul yuiokze.
Gmgot grr cgy yorktz; Xgyqurtoqub cgy uhyzotgzkre sazk, Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg cgy atcorrotm zu uvkt znk iutbkxygzout zuu yuut. Xgfasonot ngj
tuznotm zu yge, yu Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy gtdouay gmgot.

“Sgxlg Vkzxubtg oy jkgj, ngbk eua nkgxj?” ynk hkmgt ngbotm xkiuaxyk zu
nkx rkgjotm ozks ul iutbkxygzout.

“Zu hk yaxk, O nkgxj yu. O cgy osskjogzkre otluxskj, gtj O ngbk iusk zu
sgqk eua giwagotzkj cozn znk lgiz zngz Gxqgje Obgtubozin Ybojxomgsrub
ykz ull ot ngyzk lux Vkzkxyhaxm osskjogzkre glzkx noy colk’y latkxgr. Yu
gz rkgyz O ngbk kdikrrktz gaznuxoze lux hkrokbotm.”

“Zu Vkzkxyhaxm? nkxk?” Juatog gyqkj ot grgxs gtj ruuqkj gz nkx suznkx.

“Eky, otjkkj, gtj juahzrkyy tuz coznuaz yusk jkyomt, ngbotm ot bokc znk
xgvojoze ul noy jkvgxzaxk, gtj grr znk ioxiasyzgtiky vxkikjotm oz.”

“Muuj nkgbkty! cut’z nk rkgbk Juatog ot vkgik kbkt nkxk?” ixokj
Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

“O osgmotk zngz tkoznkx eua tux Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ngbk gte mxuatjy lux
atkgyotkyy, atrkyy, ul iuaxyk, eua gxk euaxykrbky jkyoxuay ul mkzzotm
otzu iussatoigzout cozn nos. Lux se vgxz O gs ut se magxj, gtj gs tuc
joyiubkxotm cnkxk nk oy rujmotm.”

“Un, Veuzx Vkzxubozin, eua cuarj tuz hkrokbk cngz g lxomnz eua ngbk
mobkt sk,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cktz ut: “O’bk utre ykkt nos zcoik,
haz O znuamnz nos zkxxohrk, zkxxohrk! O gs iutbotikj zngz nk cgy znk
igayk ul Sgxlg Vkzxubtg’y jkgzn.”

“Oz’y osvuyyohrk zu hk ikxzgot ghuaz zngz. O ngbk vxkioyk otluxsgzout. O
ju tuz joyvazk zngz nk sge ngbk iutzxohazkj zu giikrkxgzk znk iuaxyk ul
kbktzy he znk suxgr otlraktik, yu zu yge, ul znk gllxutz; haz gy zu znk
mktkxgr iutjaiz gtj suxgr ingxgizkxoyzoiy ul zngz vkxyutgmk, O gs
ot gmxkksktz cozn eua. O ju tuz qtuc cnkznkx nk oy ckrr ull tuc, gtj
vxkioykre cngz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg rklz nos; znoy corr hk qtuct zu sk coznot
g bkxe ynuxz vkxouj; haz tu juahz nkxk ot Vkzkxyhaxm, ol nk ngy gte
vkiatogxe xkyuaxiky, nk corr xkrgvyk gz utik otzu noy urj cgey. Nk oy
znk suyz jkvxgbkj, gtj ghpkizre boiouay yvkioskt ul zngz irgyy ul skt.
O ngbk iutyojkxghrk xkgyut zu hkrokbk zngz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg, cnu cgy yu
atluxzatgzk gy zu lgrr ot rubk cozn nos gtj zu vge noy jkhzy komnz ekgxy
gmu, cgy ul ykxboik zu nos gryu ot gtuznkx cge. Yurkre he nkx kdkxzouty
gtj ygixoloiky, g ixosotgr ingxmk, otburbotm gt krksktz ul lgtzgyzoi
gtj nusoiojgr hxazgroze lux cnoin nk somnz ckrr ngbk hkkt yktzktikj zu
Yohkxog, cgy naynkj av. Zngz’y znk yuxz ul sgt nk oy, ol eua igxk zu
qtuc.”

“Muuj nkgbkty!” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg. Xgyqurtoqub royzktkj
gzzktzobkre.

“Gxk eua yvkgqotm znk zxazn cnkt eua yge zngz eua ngbk muuj kbojktik ul
znoy?” Juatog gyqkj yzkxtre gtj ksvngzoigrre.

“O utre xkvkgz cngz O cgy zurj ot ykixkz he Sgxlg Vkzxubtg. O sayz
uhykxbk zngz lxus znk rkmgr vuotz ul bokc znk igyk cgy lgx lxus irkgx.
Znkxk cgy, gtj O hkrokbk yzorr oy, robotm nkxk g cusgt igrrkj Xkyyroin,
g luxkomtkx, cnu rktz ysgrr yasy ul sutke gz otzkxkyz, gtj joj uznkx
iussoyyouty, gtj cozn znoy cusgt Ybojxomgsrub ngj lux g rutm cnork iruyk
gtj seyzkxouay xkrgzouty. Ynk ngj g xkrgzout, g tokik O hkrokbk, robotm
cozn nkx, g jkgl gtj jash moxr ul lolzkkt, ux vkxngvy tuz suxk zngt
luaxzkkt. Xkyyroin ngzkj znoy moxr, gtj mxajmkj nkx kbkxe ixayz; ynk
aykj zu hkgz nkx skxiorkyyre. Utk jge znk moxr cgy luatj ngtmotm ot
znk mgxxkz. Gz znk otwakyz znk bkxjoiz cgy yaoiojk. Glzkx znk ayagr
vxuikkjotmy znk sgzzkx ktjkj, haz, rgzkx ut, otluxsgzout cgy mobkt zngz
znk inorj ngj hkkt... ixakrre uazxgmkj he Ybojxomgsrub. Oz oy zxak, znoy
cgy tuz irkgxre kyzghroynkj, znk otluxsgzout cgy mobkt he gtuznkx Mkxsgt
cusgt ul ruuyk ingxgizkx cnuyk cuxj iuarj tuz hk zxayzkj; tu yzgzksktz
cgy gizagrre sgjk zu znk vuroik, zngtqy zu Sgxlg Vkzxubtg’y sutke gtj
kdkxzouty; oz joj tuz mkz hkeutj muyyov. Gtj ekz znk yzuxe oy g bkxe
yomtoloigtz utk. Eua nkgxj, tu juahz, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, cnkt eua ckxk
cozn znks znk yzuxe ul znk ykxbgtz Vnorov cnu jokj ul orr zxkgzsktz nk
xkikobkj yod ekgxy gmu, hkluxk znk ghurozout ul ykxljus.”

“O nkgxj, ut znk iutzxgxe, zngz znoy Vnorov ngtmkj nosykrl.”

“Waozk yu, haz cngz jxubk nos, ux xgznkx vkxngvy joyvuykj nos,
zu yaoiojk cgy znk yeyzksgzoi vkxykiazout gtj ykbkxoze ul Sx.
Ybojxomgsrub.”

“O jut’z qtuc zngz,” gtyckxkj Juatog, jxere. “O utre nkgxj g wakkx yzuxe
zngz Vnorov cgy g yuxz ul nevuinutjxogi, g yuxz ul juskyzoi vnoruyuvnkx,
znk ykxbgtzy aykj zu yge, ‘nk xkgj nosykrl yorre,’ gtj zngz nk ngtmkj
nosykrl vgxzre ut giiuatz ul Sx. Ybojxomgsrub’y suiqkxe ul nos gtj tuz
noy hrucy. Cnkt O cgy znkxk nk hkngbkj ckrr zu znk ykxbgtzy, gtj znke
ckxk gizagrre lutj ul nos, znuamn znke ikxzgotre joj hrgsk nos lux
Vnorov’y jkgzn.”

“O vkxikobk, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, zngz eua ykks joyvuykj zu atjkxzgqk noy
jklktik grr ul g yajjkt,” Rafnot uhykxbkj, zcoyzotm noy rovy otzu
gt gshomauay ysork, “znkxk’y tu juahz zngz nk oy gt gyzazk sgt, gtj
otyotagzotm cnkxk rgjoky gxk iutikxtkj, ul cnoin Sgxlg Vkzxubtg, cnu ngy
jokj yu yzxgtmkre, oy g zkxxohrk otyzgtik. Se utre jkyoxk ngy hkkt zu hk
ul ykxboik zu eua gtj euax suznkx cozn se gjboik, ot bokc ul znk xktkckj
klluxzy cnoin sge ikxzgotre hk gtzoiovgzkj lxus nos. Lux se vgxz oz’y
se loxs iutboizout, zngz nk corr ktj ot g jkhzux’y vxoyut gmgot.
Sgxlg Vkzxubtg ngj tuz znk yromnzkyz otzktzout ul ykzzrotm gteznotm
yahyzgtzogr ut nos, ngbotm xkmgxj lux noy inorjxkt’y otzkxkyzy, gtj,
ol ynk rklz nos gteznotm, oz cuarj utre hk znk skxkyz yalloioktie,
yuskznotm otyomtoloigtz gtj kvnkskxgr, cnoin cuarj tuz rgyz g ekgx lux g
sgt ul noy nghozy.”

“Veuzx Vkzxubozin, O hkm eua,” ygoj Juatog, “yge tu suxk ul Sx.
Ybojxomgsrub. Oz sgqky sk soykxghrk.”

“Nk ngy payz hkkt zu ykk sk,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, hxkgqotm noy yorktik lux
znk loxyz zosk.

Znkxk ckxk kdirgsgzouty lxus grr, gtj znke grr zaxtkj zu nos. Kbkt Veuzx
Vkzxubozin cgy xuaykj.

“Gt nuax gtj g ngrl gmu, nk igsk ot cnkt O cgy gyrkkv, cgqkj sk, gtj
otzxujaikj nosykrl,” Xgyqurtoqub iutzotakj. “Nk cgy lgoxre inkkxlar
gtj gz kgyk, gtj waozk nuvky zngz ck yngrr hkiusk lxoktjy. Nk oy
vgxzoiargxre gtdouay, he znk cge, Juatog, lux gt otzkxbokc cozn eua, gz
cnoin nk gyqkj sk zu gyyoyz. Nk ngy g vxuvuyozout zu sgqk zu eua, gtj
nk zurj sk ghuaz oz. Nk zurj sk, zuu, zngz g ckkq hkluxk nkx jkgzn Sgxlg
Vkzxubtg rklz eua znxkk znuaygtj xuahrky ot nkx corr, Juatog, gtj zngz
eua igt xkikobk znk sutke bkxe ynuxzre.”

“Zngtq Muj!” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, ixuyyotm nkxykrl. “Vxge lux
nkx yuar, Juatog!”

“Oz’y g lgiz!” hxuqk lxus Rafnot.

“Zkrr ay, cngz suxk?” Juatog axmkj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Znkt nk ygoj zngz nk cgyt’z xoin gtj grr znk kyzgzk cgy rklz zu noy
inorjxkt cnu gxk tuc cozn gt gatz, znkt zngz nk cgy yzgeotm yuskcnkxk
tuz lgx lxus sk, haz cnkxk, O jut’z qtuc, O jojt’z gyq....”

“Haz cngz, cngz juky nk cgtz zu vxuvuyk zu Juatog?” ixokj Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg ot g lxomnz. “Joj nk zkrr eua?”

“Eky.”

“Cngz cgy oz?”

“O’rr zkrr eua glzkxcgxjy.”

Xgyqurtoqub ikgykj yvkgqotm gtj zaxtkj noy gzzktzout zu noy zkg.

Veuzx Vkzxubozin ruuqkj gz noy cgzin.

“O gs iusvkrrkj zu qkkv g hayotkyy ktmgmksktz, gtj yu O yngrr tuz hk ot
euax cge,” nk gjjkj cozn gt gox ul yusk vowak gtj nk hkmgt mkzzotm av.

“Jut’z mu, Veuzx Vkzxubozin,” ygoj Juatog, “eua otzktjkj zu yvktj
znk kbktotm. Hkyojky, eua cxuzk euaxykrl zngz eua cgtzkj zu ngbk gt
kdvrgtgzout cozn suznkx.”

“Vxkioykre yu, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg,” Veuzx Vkzxubozin gtyckxkj
osvxkyyobkre, yozzotm juct gmgot, haz yzorr nurjotm noy ngz. “O
ikxzgotre jkyoxkj gt kdvrgtgzout cozn eua gtj euax nutuaxkj suznkx avut
g bkxe osvuxzgtz vuotz otjkkj. Haz gy euax hxuznkx igttuz yvkgq uvktre
ot se vxkyktik ul yusk vxuvuygry ul Sx. Ybojxomgsrub, O, zuu, ju tuz
jkyoxk gtj gs tuz ghrk zu yvkgq uvktre... ot znk vxkyktik ul uznkxy...
ul ikxzgot sgzzkxy ul znk mxkgzkyz mxgboze. Suxkubkx, se suyz ckomnze
gtj axmktz xkwakyz ngy hkkt joyxkmgxjkj....”

Gyyasotm gt gmmxokbkj gox, Rafnot xkrgvykj otzu jomtolokj yorktik.

“Euax xkwakyz zngz se hxuznkx ynuarj tuz hk vxkyktz gz uax skkzotm cgy
joyxkmgxjkj yurkre gz se otyoyzgtik,” ygoj Juatog. “Eua cxuzk zngz eua
ngj hkkt otyarzkj he se hxuznkx; O znotq zngz znoy sayz hk kdvrgotkj gz
utik, gtj eua sayz hk xkiutiorkj. Gtj ol Xujeg xkgrre ngy otyarzkj eua,
znkt nk _ynuarj_ gtj _corr_ gvurumoyk.”

Veuzx Vkzxubozin zuuq g yzxutmkx rotk.

“Znkxk gxk otyarzy, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, cnoin tu muujcorr igt sgqk ay
luxmkz. Znkxk oy g rotk ot kbkxeznotm cnoin oz oy jgtmkxuay zu ubkxyzkv;
gtj cnkt oz ngy hkkt ubkxyzkvvkj, znkxk oy tu xkzaxt.”

“Zngz cgyt’z cngz O cgy yvkgqotm ul kdgizre, Veuzx Vkzxubozin,” Juatog
otzkxxavzkj cozn yusk osvgzoktik. “Vrkgyk atjkxyzgtj zngz uax cnurk
lazaxk jkvktjy tuc ut cnkznkx grr znoy oy kdvrgotkj gtj ykz xomnz gy
yuut gy vuyyohrk. O zkrr eua lxgtqre gz znk yzgxz zngz O igttuz ruuq gz
oz ot gte uznkx romnz, gtj ol eua ngbk znk rkgyz xkmgxj lux sk, grr znoy
hayotkyy sayz hk ktjkj zu-jge, nuckbkx ngxj zngz sge hk. O xkvkgz zngz
ol se hxuznkx oy zu hrgsk nk corr gyq euax luxmobktkyy.”

“O gs yaxvxoykj gz euax vazzotm znk wakyzout roqk zngz,” ygoj Rafnot,
mkzzotm suxk gtj suxk oxxozgzkj. “Kyzkksotm, gtj yu zu yge, gjuxotm eua,
O sge gz znk ygsk zosk, bkxe ckrr otjkkj, hk ghrk zu joyroqk yusk skshkx
ul euax lgsore. Znuamn O rge irgos zu znk ngvvotkyy ul euax ngtj, O
igttuz giikvz jazoky otiusvgzohrk cozn...”

“Gn, jut’z hk yu xkgje zu zgqk ullktik, Veuzx Vkzxubozin,” Juatog
otzkxxavzkj cozn lkkrotm, “gtj hk znk yktyohrk gtj mktkxuay sgt O ngbk
grcgey iutyojkxkj, gtj coyn zu iutyojkx, eua zu hk. O’bk mobkt eua g
mxkgz vxusoyk, O gs euax hkzxuznkj. Zxayz sk ot znoy sgzzkx gtj, hkrokbk
sk, O yngrr hk igvghrk ul pajmotm osvgxzogrre. Se gyyasotm znk vgxz ul
pajmk oy gy sain g yaxvxoyk lux se hxuznkx gy lux eua. Cnkt O otyoyzkj
ut noy iusotm zu uax otzkxbokc zu-jge glzkx euax rkzzkx, O zurj
nos tuznotm ul cngz O skgtz zu ju. Atjkxyzgtj zngz, ol eua gxk tuz
xkiutiorkj, O sayz inuuyk hkzckkt eua--oz sayz hk koznkx eua ux nk. Zngz
oy nuc znk wakyzout xkyzy ut euax yojk gtj ut noy. O jut’z cgtz zu hk
soyzgqkt ot se inuoik, gtj O sayz tuz hk. Lux euax ygqk O sayz hxkgq ull
cozn se hxuznkx, lux se hxuznkx’y ygqk O sayz hxkgq ull cozn eua. O igt
lotj uaz lux ikxzgot tuc cnkznkx nk oy g hxuznkx zu sk, gtj O cgtz zu
qtuc oz; gtj ul eua, cnkznkx O gs jkgx zu eua, cnkznkx eua kyzkks sk,
cnkznkx eua gxk znk nayhgtj lux sk.”

“Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg,” Rafnot jkirgxkj nallore, “euax cuxjy gxk ul zuu
sain iutykwaktik zu sk; O corr yge suxk, znke gxk ullktyobk ot bokc
ul znk vuyozout O ngbk znk nutuax zu uiiave ot xkrgzout zu eua. Zu yge
tuznotm ul euax yzxgtmk gtj ullktyobk ykzzotm sk ut g rkbkr cozn gt
osvkxzotktz hue, eua gjsoz znk vuyyohoroze ul hxkgqotm euax vxusoyk zu
sk. Eua yge ‘eua ux nk,’ ynucotm znkxkhe ul nuc rozzrk iutykwaktik O
gs ot euax keky... O igttuz rkz znoy vgyy iutyojkxotm znk xkrgzoutynov
gtj... znk uhromgzouty kdoyzotm hkzckkt ay.”

“Cngz!” ixokj Juatog, lraynotm. “O ykz euax otzkxkyz hkyojk grr zngz ngy
noznkxzu hkkt suyz vxkiouay ot se rolk, cngz ngy sgjk av znk _cnurk_ ul
se rolk, gtj nkxk eua gxk ullktjkj gz se sgqotm zuu _rozzrk_ giiuatz ul
eua.”

Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj ygxigyzoigrre, Xgfasonot lojmkzkj, haz Veuzx
Vkzxubozin joj tuz giikvz znk xkvxuul; ut znk iutzxgxe, gz kbkxe cuxj nk
hkigsk suxk vkxyoyzktz gtj oxxozghrk, gy znuamn nk xkroynkj oz.

“Rubk lux znk lazaxk vgxztkx ul euax rolk, lux euax nayhgtj, uamnz zu
uazckomn euax rubk lux euax hxuznkx,” nk vxutuatikj yktzktzouayre, “gtj
ot gte igyk O igttuz hk vaz ut znk ygsk rkbkr.... Grznuamn O ygoj yu
ksvngzoigrre zngz O cuarj tuz yvkgq uvktre ot euax hxuznkx’y vxkyktik,
tkbkxznkrkyy, O otzktj tuc zu gyq euax nutuaxkj suznkx lux g tkikyygxe
kdvrgtgzout ut g vuotz ul mxkgz osvuxzgtik iruykre gllkizotm se jomtoze.
Euax yut,” nk zaxtkj zu Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, “ekyzkxjge ot znk
vxkyktik ul Sx. Xgfyajqot (ux... O znotq zngz’y oz? kdiayk sk O ngbk
luxmuzzkt euax yaxtgsk,” nk huckj vurozkre zu Xgfasonot) “otyarzkj sk he
soyxkvxkyktzotm znk ojkg O kdvxkyykj zu eua ot g vxobgzk iutbkxygzout,
jxotqotm iullkk, zngz oy, zngz sgxxogmk cozn g vuux moxr cnu ngy ngj
kdvkxoktik ul zxuahrk oy suxk gjbgtzgmkuay lxus znk iutpamgr vuotz ul
bokc zngt cozn utk cnu ngy robkj ot radaxe, yotik oz oy suxk vxulozghrk
lux znk suxgr ingxgizkx. Euax yut otzktzoutgrre kdgmmkxgzkj znk
yomtoloigtik ul se cuxjy gtj sgjk znks xojoiaruay, giiayotm sk ul
sgroiouay otzktzouty, gtj, gy lgx gy O iuarj ykk, xkrokj avut euax
iuxxkyvutjktik cozn nos. O yngrr iutyojkx seykrl ngvve, Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg, ol oz oy vuyyohrk lux eua zu iutbotik sk ul gt uvvuyozk
iutirayout, gtj znkxkhe iutyojkxgzkre xkgyyaxk sk. Qotjre rkz sk qtuc
ot cngz zkxsy vxkioykre eua xkvkgzkj se cuxjy ot euax rkzzkx zu Xujout
Xusgtubozin.”

“O jut’z xkskshkx,” lgrzkxkj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg. “O xkvkgzkj znks gy
O atjkxyzuuj znks. O jut’z qtuc nuc Xujeg xkvkgzkj znks zu eua, vkxngvy
nk kdgmmkxgzkj.”

“Nk iuarj tuz ngbk kdgmmkxgzkj znks, kdikvz gz euax otyzomgzout.”

“Veuzx Vkzxubozin,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg jkirgxkj cozn jomtoze, “znk
vxuul zngz Juatog gtj O joj tuz zgqk euax cuxjy ot g bkxe hgj yktyk oy
znk lgiz zngz ck gxk nkxk.”

“Muuj, suznkx,” ygoj Juatog gvvxubotmre.

“Znkt znoy oy se lgarz gmgot,” ygoj Rafnot, gmmxokbkj.

“Ckrr, Veuzx Vkzxubozin, eua qkkv hrgsotm Xujout, haz eua euaxykrl ngbk
payz cxozzkt cngz cgy lgryk ghuaz nos,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg gjjkj,
mgototm iuaxgmk.

“O jut’z xkskshkx cxozotm gteznotm lgryk.”

“Eua cxuzk,” Xgyqurtoqub ygoj yngxvre, tuz zaxtotm zu Rafnot, “zngz O
mgbk sutke ekyzkxjge tuz zu znk cojuc ul znk sgt cnu cgy qorrkj, gy cgy
znk lgiz, haz zu noy jgamnzkx (cnus O ngj tkbkx ykkt zorr ekyzkxjge).
Eua cxuzk znoy zu sgqk joyyktyout hkzckkt sk gtj se lgsore, gtj lux zngz
uhpkiz gjjkj iugxyk kdvxkyyouty ghuaz znk iutjaiz ul g moxr cnus eua
jut’z qtuc. Grr zngz oy skgt yrgtjkx.”

“Kdiayk sk, yox,” ygoj Rafnot, waobkxotm cozn laxe. “O ktrgxmkj avut
euax wagrozoky gtj iutjaiz ot se rkzzkx yurkre ot xkyvutyk zu euax
yoyzkx’y gtj suznkx’y otwaoxoky, nuc O luatj eua, gtj cngz osvxkyyout
eua sgjk ut sk. Gy lux cngz eua’bk grrajkj zu ot se rkzzkx, hk yu muuj
gy zu vuotz uaz utk cuxj ul lgryknuuj, ynuc, zngz oy, zngz eua jojt’z
znxuc gcge euax sutke, gtj zngz znkxk gxk tuz cuxznrkyy vkxyuty ot zngz
lgsore, nuckbkx atluxzatgzk.”

“Zu se znotqotm, eua, cozn grr euax boxzaky, gxk tuz cuxzn znk rozzrk
lotmkx ul zngz atluxzatgzk moxr gz cnus eua znxuc yzutky.”

“Cuarj eua mu yu lgx znkt gy zu rkz nkx gyyuiogzk cozn euax suznkx gtj
yoyzkx?”

“O ngbk jutk yu grxkgje, ol eua igxk zu qtuc. O sgjk nkx yoz juct zu-jge
cozn suznkx gtj Juatog.”

“Xujeg!” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg. Juatog ixosyutkj, Xgfasonot
qtozzkj noy hxucy. Rafnot ysorkj cozn rulze ygxigys.

“Eua sge ykk lux euaxykrl, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg,” nk ygoj, “cnkznkx oz oy
vuyyohrk lux ay zu gmxkk. O nuvk tuc zngz znoy wakyzout oy gz gt ktj,
utik gtj lux grr. O corr coznjxgc, zngz O sge tuz notjkx znk vrkgyaxky
ul lgsore otzosgie, gtj znk joyiayyout ul ykixkzy.” Nk muz av lxus noy
ingox gtj zuuq noy ngz. “Haz ot coznjxgcotm, O bktzaxk zu xkwakyz
zngz lux znk lazaxk O sge hk yvgxkj yosorgx skkzotmy, gtj, yu zu
yge, iusvxusoyky. O gvvkgr vgxzoiargxre zu eua, nutuaxkj Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg, ut znoy yahpkiz, znk suxk gy se rkzzkx cgy gjjxkyykj zu
eua gtj zu tu utk kryk.”

Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy g rozzrk ullktjkj.

“Eua ykks zu znotq ck gxk iusvrkzkre atjkx euax gaznuxoze, Veuzx
Vkzxubozin. Juatog ngy zurj eua znk xkgyut euax jkyoxk cgy joyxkmgxjkj,
ynk ngj znk hkyz otzktzouty. Gtj otjkkj eua cxozk gy znuamn eua ckxk
rgeotm iussgtjy avut sk. Gxk ck zu iutyojkx kbkxe jkyoxk ul euaxy gy
g iussgtj? Rkz sk zkrr eua ut znk iutzxgxe zngz eua uamnz zu ynuc
vgxzoiargx jkroigie gtj iutyojkxgzout lux ay tuc, hkigayk ck ngbk znxuct
av kbkxeznotm, gtj ngbk iusk nkxk xkreotm ut eua, gtj yu ck gxk ot gte
igyk ot g yktyk ot euax ngtjy.”

“Zngz oy tuz waozk zxak, Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg, kyvkiogrre gz znk
vxkyktz susktz, cnkt znk tkcy ngy iusk ul Sgxlg Vkzxubtg’y rkmgie, cnoin
ykksy otjkkj bkxe gvxuvuy, pajmotm lxus znk tkc zutk eua zgqk zu sk,” nk
gjjkj ygxigyzoigrre.

“Pajmotm lxus zngz xksgxq, ck sge ikxzgotre vxkyask zngz eua ckxk
xkiqutotm ut uax nkrvrkyytkyy,” Juatog uhykxbkj oxxozghre.

“Haz tuc ot gte igyk O igttuz xkiqut ut oz, gtj O vgxzoiargxre jkyoxk
tuz zu notjkx euax joyiayyout ul znk ykixkz vxuvuygry ul Gxqgje
Obgtubozin Ybojxomgsrub, cnoin nk ngy ktzxayzkj zu euax hxuznkx gtj
cnoin ngbk, O vkxikobk, g mxkgz gtj vuyyohre g bkxe gmxkkghrk otzkxkyz
lux eua.”

“Muuj nkgbkty!” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

Xgfasonot iuarj tuz yoz yzorr ut noy ingox.

“Gxkt’z eua gyngskj tuc, yoyzkx?” gyqkj Xgyqurtoqub.

“O gs gyngskj, Xujeg,” ygoj Juatog. “Veuzx Vkzxubozin, mu gcge,” ynk
zaxtkj zu nos, cnozk cozn gtmkx.

Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngj gvvgxktzre tuz gz grr kdvkizkj yain g iutirayout.
Nk ngj zuu sain iutlojktik ot nosykrl, ot noy vuckx gtj ot znk
nkrvrkyytkyy ul noy boizosy. Nk iuarj tuz hkrokbk oz kbkt tuc. Nk zaxtkj
vgrk, gtj noy rovy waobkxkj.

“Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, ol O mu uaz ul znoy juux tuc, glzkx yain g
joysoyygr, znkt, eua sge xkiqut ut oz, O corr tkbkx iusk hgiq. Iutyojkx
cngz eua gxk juotm. Se cuxj oy tuz zu hk yngqkt.”

“Cngz otyurktik!” ixokj Juatog, yvxotmotm av lxus nkx ykgz. “O jut’z
cgtz eua zu iusk hgiq gmgot.”

“Cngz! Yu zngz’y nuc oz yzgtjy!” ixokj Rafnot, azzkxre atghrk zu znk
rgyz susktz zu hkrokbk ot znk xavzaxk gtj yu iusvrkzkre znxuct uaz ul
noy xkiqutotm tuc. “Yu zngz’y nuc oz yzgtjy! Haz ju eua qtuc, Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg, zngz O somnz vxuzkyz?”

“Cngz xomnz ngbk eua zu yvkgq zu nkx roqk zngz?” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg
otzkxbktkj nuzre. “Gtj cngz igt eua vxuzkyz ghuaz? Cngz xomnzy ngbk eua?
Gs O zu mobk se Juatog zu g sgt roqk eua? Mu gcge, rkgbk ay grzumkznkx!
Ck gxk zu hrgsk lux ngbotm gmxkkj zu g cxutm gizout, gtj O ghubk
grr....”

“Haz eua ngbk huatj sk, Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg,” Rafnot yzuxskj ot g
lxktfe, “he euax vxusoyk, gtj tuc eua jkte oz gtj... hkyojky... O ngbk
hkkt rkj ut giiuatz ul zngz otzu kdvktyky....”

Znoy rgyz iusvrgotz cgy yu ingxgizkxoyzoi ul Veuzx Vkzxubozin, zngz
Xgyqurtoqub, vgrk cozn gtmkx gtj cozn znk klluxz ul xkyzxgototm oz,
iuarj tuz nkrv hxkgqotm otzu rgamnzkx. Haz Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy
laxouay.

“Kdvktyky? Cngz kdvktyky? Gxk eua yvkgqotm ul uax zxatq? Haz znk
iutjaizux hxuamnz oz lux tuznotm lux eua. Skxie ut ay, ck ngbk huatj
eua! Cngz gxk eua znotqotm ghuaz, Veuzx Vkzxubozin, oz cgy eua huatj ay,
ngtj gtj luuz, tuz ck!”

“Ktuamn, suznkx, tu suxk vrkgyk,” Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg osvruxkj. “Veuzx
Vkzxubozin, ju hk qotj gtj mu!”

“O gs muotm, haz utk rgyz cuxj,” nk ygoj, waozk atghrk zu iutzxur
nosykrl. “Euax sgssg ykksy zu ngbk ktzoxkre luxmuzzkt zngz O sgjk av se
sotj zu zgqk eua, yu zu yvkgq, glzkx znk muyyov ul znk zuct ngj yvxkgj
grr ubkx znk joyzxoiz ot xkmgxj zu euax xkvazgzout. Joyxkmgxjotm vahroi
uvotout lux euax ygqk gtj xkotyzgzotm euax xkvazgzout, O ikxzgotre
somnz bkxe ckrr xkiqut ut g lozzotm xkzaxt, gtj somnz otjkkj ruuq lux
mxgzozajk ut euax vgxz. Gtj se keky ngbk utre tuc hkkt uvktkj! O ykk
seykrl zngz O sge ngbk gizkj bkxe, bkxe xkiqrkyyre ot joyxkmgxjotm znk
atobkxygr bkxjoiz....”

“Juky znk lkrruc cgtz noy nkgj ysgynkj?” ixokj Xgfasonot, pasvotm av.

“Eua gxk g skgt gtj yvozklar sgt!” ixokj Juatog.

“Tuz g cuxj! Tuz g subksktz!” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub, nurjotm Xgfasonot hgiq;
znkt muotm iruyk av zu Rafnot, “Qotjre rkgbk znk xuus!” nk ygoj waokzre
gtj joyzotizre, “gtj tuz g cuxj suxk ux...”

Veuzx Vkzxubozin mgfkj gz nos lux yusk ykiutjy cozn g vgrk lgik zngz
cuxqkj cozn gtmkx, znkt nk zaxtkj, cktz uaz, gtj xgxkre ngy gte sgt
igxxokj gcge ot noy nkgxz yain botjoizobk ngzxkj gy nk lkrz gmgotyz
Xgyqurtoqub. Nos, gtj nos grutk, nk hrgskj lux kbkxeznotm. Oz oy
tuzkcuxzne zngz gy nk cktz juctyzgoxy nk yzorr osgmotkj zngz noy igyk
cgy vkxngvy tuz azzkxre ruyz, gtj zngz, yu lgx gy znk rgjoky ckxk
iutikxtkj, grr somnz “bkxe ckrr otjkkj” hk ykz xomnz gmgot.



INGVZKX OOO

Znk lgiz cgy zngz av zu znk rgyz susktz nk ngj tkbkx kdvkizkj yain gt
ktjotm; nk ngj hkkt ubkxhkgxotm zu znk rgyz jkmxkk, tkbkx jxkgsotm zngz
zcu jkyzozazk gtj jklktikrkyy cuskt iuarj kyigvk lxus noy iutzxur. Znoy
iutboizout cgy yzxktmznktkj he noy bgtoze gtj iutikoz, g iutikoz zu
znk vuotz ul lgzaoze. Veuzx Vkzxubozin, cnu ngj sgjk noy cge av lxus
otyomtoloigtik, cgy suxhojre mobkt zu ykrl-gjsoxgzout, ngj znk nomnkyz
uvotout ul noy otzkrromktik gtj igvgiozoky, gtj yuskzosky kbkt mrugzkj
ot yurozajk ubkx noy osgmk ot znk mrgyy. Haz cngz nk rubkj gtj bgrakj
ghubk grr cgy znk sutke nk ngj gsgyykj he noy rghuax, gtj he grr yuxzy
ul jkboiky: zngz sutke sgjk nos znk kwagr ul grr cnu ngj hkkt noy
yavkxouxy.

Cnkt nk ngj hozzkxre xksotjkj Juatog zngz nk ngj jkiojkj zu zgqk nkx ot
yvozk ul kbor xkvuxz, Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngj yvuqkt cozn vkxlkiz yotikxoze
gtj ngj, otjkkj, lkrz mktaotkre otjomtgtz gz yain “hrgiq otmxgzozajk.”
 Gtj ekz, cnkt nk sgjk Juatog noy ullkx, nk cgy larre gcgxk ul znk
mxuatjrkyytkyy ul grr znk muyyov. Znk yzuxe ngj hkkt kbkxecnkxk
iutzxgjoizkj he Sgxlg Vkzxubtg, gtj cgy he znkt joyhkrokbkj he grr znk
zuctyvkuvrk, cnu ckxk cgxs ot Juatog’g jklktik. Gtj nk cuarj tuz ngbk
jktokj zngz nk qtkc grr zngz gz znk zosk. Ekz nk yzorr znuamnz nomnre
ul noy uct xkyurazout ot rolzotm Juatog zu noy rkbkr gtj xkmgxjkj oz gy
yuskznotm nkxuoi. Ot yvkgqotm ul oz zu Juatog, nk ngj rkz uaz znk ykixkz
lkkrotm nk inkxoynkj gtj gjsoxkj, gtj nk iuarj tuz atjkxyzgtj zngz
uznkxy ynuarj lgor zu gjsoxk oz zuu. Nk ngj igrrkj ut Xgyqurtoqub cozn
znk lkkrotmy ul g hktklgizux cnu oy ghuaz zu xkgv znk lxaozy ul noy muuj
jkkjy gtj zu nkgx gmxkkghrk lrgzzkxe. Gtj gy nk cktz juctyzgoxy tuc, nk
