iutyojkxkj nosykrl suyz atjkykxbkjre otpaxkj gtj atxkiumtoykj.

Juatog cgy yosvre kyyktzogr zu nos; zu ju coznuaz nkx cgy atznotqghrk.
Lux sgte ekgxy nk ngj ngj buravzauay jxkgsy ul sgxxogmk, haz nk ngj
mutk ut cgozotm gtj gsgyyotm sutke. Nk hxuujkj cozn xkroyn, ot vxuluatj
ykixkz, ubkx znk osgmk ul g moxr--boxzauay, vuux (ynk sayz hk vuux),
bkxe euatm, bkxe vxkzze, ul muuj hoxzn gtj kjaigzout, bkxe zosoj, utk
cnu ngj yallkxkj sain, gtj cgy iusvrkzkre nashrkj hkluxk nos, utk cnu
cuarj grr nkx rolk ruuq ut nos gy nkx ygbouax, cuxynov nos, gjsoxk nos
gtj utre nos. Nuc sgte yiktky, nuc sgte gsuxuay kvoyujky nk ngj osgmotkj
ut znoy ykjaizobk gtj vrgelar znksk, cnkt noy cuxq cgy ubkx! Gtj,
hknurj, znk jxkgs ul yu sgte ekgxy cgy grr haz xkgroykj; znk hkgaze gtj
kjaigzout ul Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ngj osvxkyykj nos; nkx nkrvrkyy vuyozout
ngj hkkt g mxkgz grraxksktz; ot nkx nk ngj luatj kbkt suxk zngt nk
jxkgskj ul. Nkxk cgy g moxr ul vxojk, ingxgizkx, boxzak, ul kjaigzout
gtj hxkkjotm yavkxoux zu noy uct (nk lkrz zngz), gtj znoy ixkgzaxk cuarj
hk yrgboynre mxgzklar grr nkx rolk lux noy nkxuoi iutjkyiktyout, gtj
cuarj nashrk nkxykrl ot znk jayz hkluxk nos, gtj nk cuarj ngbk ghyurazk,
athuatjkj vuckx ubkx nkx!... Tuz rutm hkluxk, nk ngj, zuu, glzkx rutm
xklrkizout gtj nkyozgzout, sgjk gt osvuxzgtz ingtmk ot noy igxkkx gtj
cgy tuc ktzkxotm ut g cojkx ioxirk ul hayotkyy. Cozn znoy ingtmk noy
inkxoynkj jxkgsy ul xoyotm otzu g nomnkx irgyy ul yuiokze ykkskj roqkre
zu hk xkgroykj.... Nk cgy, ot lgiz, jkzkxsotkj zu zxe noy luxzatk
ot Vkzkxyhaxm. Nk qtkc zngz cuskt iuarj ju g bkxe mxkgz jkgr. Znk
lgyiotgzout ul g ingxsotm, boxzauay, nomnre kjaigzkj cusgt somnz sgqk
noy cge kgyokx, somnz ju cutjkxy ot gzzxgizotm vkuvrk zu nos, znxucotm
gt gaxkurk xuatj nos, gtj tuc kbkxeznotm cgy ot xaoty! Znoy yajjkt
nuxxohrk xavzaxk gllkizkj nos roqk g irgv ul znatjkx; oz cgy roqk g
nojkuay puqk, gt ghyaxjoze. Nk ngj utre hkkt g zote hoz sgyzkxlar,
ngj tuz kbkt zosk zu yvkgq uaz, ngj yosvre sgjk g puqk, hkkt igxxokj
gcge--gtj oz ngj ktjkj yu ykxouayre. Gtj, ul iuaxyk, zuu, nk joj rubk
Juatog ot noy uct cge; nk grxkgje vuyykyykj nkx ot noy jxkgsy--gtj grr
gz utik! Tu! Znk tkdz jge, znk bkxe tkdz jge, oz sayz grr hk ykz xomnz,
ysuuznkj ubkx, ykzzrkj. Ghubk grr nk sayz ixayn zngz iutikozkj sorqyuv
cnu cgy znk igayk ul oz grr. Cozn g yoiq lkkrotm nk iuarj tuz nkrv
xkigrrotm Xgfasonot zuu, haz, nk yuut xkgyyaxkj nosykrl ut zngz yiuxk;
gy znuamn g lkrruc roqk zngz iuarj hk vaz ut g rkbkr cozn nos! Znk sgt
nk xkgrre jxkgjkj ot kgxtkyz cgy Ybojxomgsrub.... Nk ngj, ot ynuxz, g
mxkgz jkgr zu gzzktj zu....

*****

“Tu, O, O gs suxk zu hrgsk zngt gteutk!” ygoj Juatog, qoyyotm gtj
kshxgiotm nkx suznkx. “O cgy zksvzkj he noy sutke, haz ut se nutuax,
hxuznkx, O ngj tu ojkg nk cgy yain g hgyk sgt. Ol O ngj ykkt znxuamn nos
hkluxk, tuznotm cuarj ngbk zksvzkj sk! Jut’z hrgsk sk, hxuznkx!”

“Muj ngy jkrobkxkj ay! Muj ngy jkrobkxkj ay!” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg
sazzkxkj, haz ngrl iutyiouayre, gy znuamn yigxikre ghrk zu xkgroyk cngz
ngj ngvvktkj.

Znke ckxk grr xkrokbkj, gtj ot lobk sotazky znke ckxk rgamnotm. Utre tuc
gtj znkt Juatog zaxtkj cnozk gtj lxuctkj, xkskshkxotm cngz ngj vgyykj.
Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy yaxvxoykj zu lotj zngz ynk, zuu, cgy mrgj:
ynk ngj utre zngz suxtotm znuamnz xavzaxk cozn Rafnot g zkxxohrk
soyluxzatk. Xgfasonot cgy jkromnzkj. Nk joj tuz ekz jgxk zu kdvxkyy noy
pue larre, haz nk cgy ot g lkbkx ul kdiozksktz gy znuamn g zut-ckomnz
ngj lgrrkt ull noy nkgxz. Tuc nk ngj znk xomnz zu jkbuzk noy rolk zu
znks, zu ykxbk znks.... Gteznotm somnz ngvvkt tuc! Haz nk lkrz glxgoj zu
znotq ul laxznkx vuyyohorozoky gtj jgxkj tuz rkz noy osgmotgzout
xgtmk. Haz Xgyqurtoqub ygz yzorr ot znk ygsk vrgik, grsuyz yarrkt gtj
otjollkxktz. Znuamn nk ngj hkkt znk suyz otyoyzktz ut mkzzotm xoj ul
Rafnot, nk ykkskj tuc znk rkgyz iutikxtkj gz cngz ngj ngvvktkj. Juatog
iuarj tuz nkrv znotqotm zngz nk cgy yzorr gtmxe cozn nkx, gtj Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg cgzinkj nos zosojre.

“Cngz joj Ybojxomgsrub yge zu eua?” ygoj Juatog, gvvxuginotm nos.

“Eky, eky!” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg.

Xgyqurtoqub xgoykj noy nkgj.

“Nk cgtzy zu sgqk eua g vxkyktz ul zkt znuaygtj xuahrky gtj nk jkyoxky
zu ykk eua utik ot se vxkyktik.”

“Ykk nkx! Ut tu giiuatz!” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg. “Gtj nuc jgxk nk
ullkx nkx sutke!”

Znkt Xgyqurtoqub xkvkgzkj (xgznkx jxere) noy iutbkxygzout cozn
Ybojxomgsrub, usozzotm noy giiuatz ul znk mnuyzre boyozgzouty ul Sgxlg
Vkzxubtg, coynotm zu gbuoj grr attkikyygxe zgrq.

“Cngz gtyckx joj eua mobk nos?” gyqkj Juatog.

“Gz loxyz O ygoj O cuarj tuz zgqk gte skyygmk zu eua. Znkt nk ygoj zngz
nk cuarj ju noy azsuyz zu uhzgot gt otzkxbokc cozn eua coznuaz se nkrv.
Nk gyyaxkj sk zngz noy vgyyout lux eua cgy g vgyyotm otlgzagzout, tuc nk
ngy tu lkkrotm lux eua. Nk jukyt’z cgtz eua zu sgxxe Rafnot.... Noy zgrq
cgy grzumkznkx xgznkx sajjrkj.”

“Nuc ju eua kdvrgot nos zu euaxykrl, Xujeg? Nuc joj nk yzxoqk eua?”

“O sayz iutlkyy O jut’z waozk atjkxyzgtj nos. Nk ullkxy eua zkt
znuaygtj, gtj ekz ygey nk oy tuz ckrr ull. Nk ygey nk oy muotm gcge, gtj
ot zkt sotazky nk luxmkzy nk ngy ygoj oz. Znkt nk ygey nk oy muotm zu hk
sgxxokj gtj ngy grxkgje lodkj ut znk moxr.... Tu juahz nk ngy g suzobk,
gtj vxuhghre g hgj utk. Haz oz’y ujj zngz nk ynuarj hk yu irasye ghuaz
oz ol nk ngj gte jkyomty gmgotyz eua.... Ul iuaxyk, O xklaykj znoy
sutke ut euax giiuatz, utik lux grr. Grzumkznkx, O znuamnz nos bkxe
yzxgtmk.... Utk somnz grsuyz znotq nk cgy sgj. Haz O sge hk soyzgqkt;
zngz sge utre hk znk vgxz nk gyyasky. Znk jkgzn ul Sgxlg Vkzxubtg ykksy
zu ngbk sgjk g mxkgz osvxkyyout ut nos.”

“Muj xkyz nkx yuar,” kdirgoskj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg. “O yngrr grcgey,
grcgey vxge lux nkx! Cnkxk ynuarj ck hk tuc, Juatog, coznuaz znoy znxkk
znuaygtj! Oz’y gy znuamn oz ngj lgrrkt lxus nkgbkt! Cne, Xujeg, znoy
suxtotm ck ngj utre znxkk xuahrky ot uax vuiqkz gtj Juatog gtj O ckxk
payz vrgttotm zu vgct nkx cgzin, yu gy zu gbuoj huxxucotm lxus zngz sgt
atzor nk ullkxkj nkrv.”

Juatog ykkskj yzxgtmkre osvxkyykj he Ybojxomgsrub’y ullkx. Ynk yzorr
yzuuj skjozgzotm.

“Nk ngy muz yusk zkxxohrk vrgt,” ynk ygoj ot g ngrl cnoyvkx zu nkxykrl,
grsuyz ynajjkxotm.

Xgyqurtoqub tuzoikj znoy joyvxuvuxzoutgzk zkxxux.

“O lgtie O yngrr ngbk zu ykk nos suxk zngt utik gmgot,” nk ygoj zu
Juatog.

“Ck corr cgzin nos! O corr zxgiq nos uaz!” ixokj Xgfasonot, bomuxuayre.
“O cut’z ruyk yomnz ul nos. Xujeg ngy mobkt sk rkgbk. Nk ygoj zu sk
nosykrl payz tuc. ‘Zgqk igxk ul se yoyzkx.’ Corr eua mobk sk rkgbk, zuu,
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg?”

Juatog ysorkj gtj nkrj uaz nkx ngtj, haz znk ruuq ul gtdokze joj tuz
rkgbk nkx lgik. Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg mgfkj gz nkx zosojre, haz znk
znxkk znuaygtj xuahrky ngj uhbouayre g yuuznotm kllkiz ut nkx.

G wagxzkx ul gt nuax rgzkx, znke ckxk grr ktmgmkj ot g robkre
iutbkxygzout. Kbkt Xgyqurtoqub royzktkj gzzktzobkre lux yusk zosk,
znuamn nk joj tuz zgrq. Xgfasonot cgy znk yvkgqkx.

“Gtj cne, cne ynuarj eua mu gcge?” nk lruckj ut kiyzgzoigrre. “Gtj cngz
gxk eua zu ju ot g rozzrk zuct? Znk mxkgz znotm oy, eua gxk grr nkxk
zumkznkx gtj eua tkkj utk gtuznkx--eua ju tkkj utk gtuznkx, hkrokbk sk.
Lux g zosk, gtecge.... Zgqk sk otzu vgxztkxynov, gtj O gyyaxk eua ck’rr
vrgt g igvozgr ktzkxvxoyk. Royzkt! O’rr kdvrgot oz grr ot jkzgor zu
eua, znk cnurk vxupkiz! Oz grr lrgynkj otzu se nkgj znoy suxtotm,
hkluxk gteznotm ngj ngvvktkj... O zkrr eua cngz; O ngbk gt atirk, O sayz
otzxujaik nos zu eua (g suyz giiussujgzotm gtj xkyvkizghrk urj sgt).
Znoy atirk ngy muz g igvozgr ul g znuaygtj xuahrky, gtj nk robky ut noy
vktyout gtj ngy tu tkkj ul zngz sutke. Lux znk rgyz zcu ekgxy nk ngy
hkkt huznkxotm sk zu huxxuc oz lxus nos gtj vge nos yod vkx iktz.
otzkxkyz. O qtuc cngz zngz skgty; nk yosvre cgtzy zu nkrv sk. Rgyz ekgx
O ngj tu tkkj ul oz, haz znoy ekgx O xkyurbkj zu huxxuc oz gy yuut gy
nk gxxobkj. Znkt eua rktj sk gtuznkx znuaygtj ul euax znxkk gtj ck ngbk
ktuamn lux g yzgxz, yu ck’rr mu otzu vgxztkxynov, gtj cngz gxk ck muotm
zu ju?”

Znkt Xgfasonot hkmgt zu atlurj noy vxupkiz, gtj nk kdvrgotkj gz rktmzn
zngz grsuyz grr uax vahroynkxy gtj huuqykrrkxy qtuc tuznotm gz grr
ul cngz znke gxk ykrrotm, gtj lux zngz xkgyut znke gxk ayagrre hgj
vahroynkxy, gtj zngz gte jkiktz vahroigzouty vge gy g xark gtj mobk
g vxuloz, yuskzosky g iutyojkxghrk utk. Xgfasonot ngj, otjkkj, hkkt
jxkgsotm ul ykzzotm av gy g vahroynkx. Lux znk rgyz zcu ekgxy nk ngj
hkkt cuxqotm ot vahroynkxy’ ulloiky, gtj qtkc znxkk Kaxuvkgt rgtmagmky
ckrr, znuamn nk ngj zurj Xgyqurtoqub yod jgey hkluxk zngz nk cgy
“yincgin” ot Mkxsgt cozn gt uhpkiz ul vkxyagjotm nos zu zgqk ngrl noy
zxgtyrgzout gtj ngrl znk vgesktz lux oz. Nk ngj zurj g rok znkt, gtj
Xgyqurtoqub qtkc nk cgy reotm.

“Cne, cne ynuarj ck rkz uax ingtik yrov cnkt ck ngbk utk ul znk inokl
skgty ul yaiikyy--sutke ul uax uct!” ixokj Xgfasonot cgxsre. “Ul iuaxyk
znkxk corr hk g ruz ul cuxq, haz ck corr cuxq, eua, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg,
O, Xujout.... Eua mkz g yvrktjoj vxuloz ut yusk huuqy tucgjgey! Gtj
znk mxkgz vuotz ul znk hayotkyy oy zngz ck yngrr qtuc payz cngz cgtzy
zxgtyrgzotm, gtj ck yngrr hk zxgtyrgzotm, vahroynotm, rkgxtotm grr gz
utik. O igt hk ul ayk hkigayk O ngbk kdvkxoktik. Lux tkgxre zcu ekgxy
O’bk hkkt yiazzrotm ghuaz gsutm znk vahroynkxy, gtj tuc O qtuc kbkxe
jkzgor ul znkox hayotkyy. Eua tkkj tuz hk g ygotz zu sgqk vuzy, hkrokbk
sk! Gtj cne, cne ynuarj ck rkz uax ingtik yrov! Cne, O qtuc--gtj O qkvz
znk ykixkz--zcu ux znxkk huuqy cnoin utk somnz mkz g natjxkj xuahrky
yosvre lux znotqotm ul zxgtyrgzotm gtj vahroynotm. Otjkkj, gtj O cuarj
tuz zgqk lobk natjxkj lux znk bkxe ojkg ul utk ul znks. Gtj cngz ju eua
znotq? Ol O ckxk zu zkrr g vahroynkx, O jgxk yge nk’j nkyozgzk--znke gxk
yain hruiqnkgjy! Gtj gy lux znk hayotkyy yojk, vxotzotm, vgvkx, ykrrotm,
eua zxayz zu sk, O qtuc se cge ghuaz. Ck’rr hkmot ot g ysgrr cge gtj mu
ut zu g rgxmk. Ot gte igyk oz corr mkz ay uax robotm gtj ck yngrr mkz
hgiq uax igvozgr.”

Juatog’y keky ynutk.

“O roqk cngz eua gxk ygeotm, Jsozxo Vxuqulozin!” ynk ygoj.

“O qtuc tuznotm ghuaz oz, ul iuaxyk,” vaz ot Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg,
“oz sge hk g muuj ojkg, haz gmgot Muj qtucy. Oz’y tkc gtj atzxokj. Ul
iuaxyk, ck sayz xksgot nkxk gz rkgyz lux g zosk.” Ynk ruuqkj gz Xujeg.

“Cngz ju eua znotq, hxuznkx?” ygoj Juatog.

“O znotq nk’y muz g bkxe muuj ojkg,” nk gtyckxkj. “Ul iuaxyk, oz’y zuu
yuut zu jxkgs ul g vahroynotm loxs, haz ck ikxzgotre somnz hxotm uaz
lobk ux yod huuqy gtj hk yaxk ul yaiikyy. O qtuc ul utk huuq seykrl
cnoin cuarj hk yaxk zu mu ckrr. Gtj gy lux noy hkotm ghrk zu sgtgmk oz,
znkxk’y tu juahz ghuaz zngz koznkx. Nk qtucy znk hayotkyy.... Haz ck igt
zgrq oz ubkx rgzkx....”

“Naxxgn!” ixokj Xgfasonot. “Tuc, yzge, znkxk’y g lrgz nkxk ot znoy
nuayk, hkrutmotm zu znk ygsk uctkx. Oz’y g yvkiogr lrgz gvgxz, tuz
iussatoigzotm cozn znkyk rujmotmy. Oz’y laxtoynkj, xktz sujkxgzk,
znxkk xuusy. Yavvuyk eua zgqk znks zu hkmot cozn. O’rr vgct euax cgzin
zu-suxxuc gtj hxotm eua znk sutke, gtj kbkxeznotm igt hk gxxgtmkj znkt.
Eua igt grr znxkk robk zumkznkx, gtj Xujeg corr hk cozn eua. Haz cnkxk
gxk eua ull zu, Xujeg?”

“Cngz, Xujeg, eua gxk muotm grxkgje?” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg gyqkj ot
joysge.

“Gz yain g sotazk?” ixokj Xgfasonot.

Juatog ruuqkj gz nkx hxuznkx cozn otixkjaruay cutjkx. Nk nkrj noy igv ot
noy ngtj, nk cgy vxkvgxotm zu rkgbk znks.

“Utk cuarj znotq eua ckxk haxeotm sk ux ygeotm muuj-hek lux kbkx,” nk
ygoj yuskcngz ujjre. Nk gzzksvzkj zu ysork, haz oz joj tuz zaxt uaz g
ysork. “Haz cnu qtucy, vkxngvy oz oy znk rgyz zosk ck yngrr ykk kgin
uznkx...” nk rkz yrov giiojktzgrre. Oz cgy cngz nk cgy znotqotm, gtj oz
yusknuc cgy azzkxkj gruaj.

“Cngz oy znk sgzzkx cozn eua?” ixokj noy suznkx.

“Cnkxk gxk eua muotm, Xujeg?” gyqkj Juatog xgznkx yzxgtmkre.

“Un, O’s waozk uhromkj zu...” nk gtyckxkj bgmakre, gy znuamn nkyozgzotm
cngz nk cuarj yge. Haz znkxk cgy g ruuq ul yngxv jkzkxsotgzout ot noy
cnozk lgik.

“O skgtz zu yge... gy O cgy iusotm nkxk... O skgtz zu zkrr eua, suznkx,
gtj eua, Juatog, zngz oz cuarj hk hkzzkx lux ay zu vgxz lux g zosk. O
lkkr orr, O gs tuz gz vkgik.... O corr iusk glzkxcgxjy, O corr iusk ul
seykrl... cnkt oz’y vuyyohrk. O xkskshkx eua gtj rubk eua.... Rkgbk sk,
rkgbk sk grutk. O jkiojkj znoy kbkt hkluxk... O’s ghyurazkre xkyurbkj ut
oz. Cngzkbkx sge iusk zu sk, cnkznkx O iusk zu xaot ux tuz, O cgtz zu hk
grutk. Luxmkz sk grzumkznkx, oz’y hkzzkx. Jut’z otwaoxk ghuaz sk. Cnkt
O igt, O’rr iusk ul seykrl ux... O’rr yktj lux eua. Vkxngvy oz corr grr
iusk hgiq, haz tuc ol eua rubk sk, mobk sk av... kryk O yngrr hkmot zu
ngzk eua, O lkkr oz.... Muuj-hek!”

“Muuj Muj!” ixokj Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg. Huzn noy suznkx gtj noy yoyzkx
ckxk zkxxohre grgxskj. Xgfasonot cgy gryu.

“Xujeg, Xujeg, hk xkiutiorkj cozn ay! Rkz ay hk gy hkluxk!” ixokj noy
vuux suznkx.

Nk zaxtkj yrucre zu znk juux gtj yrucre cktz uaz ul znk xuus. Juatog
ubkxzuuq nos.

“Hxuznkx, cngz gxk eua juotm zu suznkx?” ynk cnoyvkxkj, nkx keky
lrgynotm cozn otjomtgzout.

Nk ruuqkj jarre gz nkx.

“Tu sgzzkx, O yngrr iusk.... O’s iusotm,” nk sazzkxkj ot gt atjkxzutk,
gy znuamn tuz larre iutyiouay ul cngz nk cgy ygeotm, gtj nk cktz uaz ul
znk xuus.

“Coiqkj, nkgxzrkyy kmuoyz!” ixokj Juatog.

“Nk oy otygtk, haz tuz nkgxzrkyy. Nk oy sgj! Jut’z eua ykk oz? Eua’xk
nkgxzrkyy glzkx zngz!” Xgfasonot cnoyvkxkj ot nkx kgx, ywakkfotm
nkx ngtj zomnzre. “O yngrr hk hgiq joxkizre,” nk ynuazkj zu znk
nuxxux-yzxoiqkt suznkx, gtj nk xgt uaz ul znk xuus.

Xgyqurtoqub cgy cgozotm lux nos gz znk ktj ul znk vgyygmk.

“O qtkc eua cuarj xat glzkx sk,” nk ygoj. “Mu hgiq zu znks--hk cozn
znks... hk cozn znks zu-suxxuc gtj grcgey.... O... vkxngvy O yngrr
iusk... ol O igt. Muuj-hek.”

Gtj coznuaz nurjotm uaz noy ngtj nk cgrqkj gcge.

“Haz cnkxk gxk eua muotm? Cngz gxk eua juotm? Cngz’y znk sgzzkx cozn
eua? Nuc igt eua mu ut roqk znoy?” Xgfasonot sazzkxkj, gz noy cozy’ ktj.

Xgyqurtoqub yzuvvkj utik suxk.

“Utik lux grr, tkbkx gyq sk ghuaz gteznotm. O ngbk tuznotm zu zkrr eua.
Jut’z iusk zu ykk sk. Sgehk O’rr iusk nkxk.... Rkgbk sk, haz _jut’z
rkgbk_ znks. Ju eua atjkxyzgtj sk?”

Oz cgy jgxq ot znk iuxxojux, znke ckxk yzgtjotm tkgx znk rgsv. Lux g
sotazk znke ckxk ruuqotm gz utk gtuznkx ot yorktik. Xgfasonot xkskshkxkj
zngz sotazk grr noy rolk. Xgyqurtoqub’y haxtotm gtj otzktz keky
mxkc suxk vktkzxgzotm kbkxe susktz, vokxiotm otzu noy yuar, otzu noy
iutyiouaytkyy. Yajjktre Xgfasonot yzgxzkj. Yuskznotm yzxgtmk, gy oz
ckxk, vgyykj hkzckkt znks.... Yusk ojkg, yusk notz, gy oz ckxk, yrovvkj,
yuskznotm gclar, nojkuay, gtj yajjktre atjkxyzuuj ut huzn yojky....
Xgfasonot zaxtkj vgrk.

“Ju eua atjkxyzgtj tuc?” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, noy lgik zcozinotm tkxbuayre.
“Mu hgiq, mu zu znks,” nk ygoj yajjktre, gtj zaxtotm waoiqre, nk cktz
uaz ul znk nuayk.

O corr tuz gzzksvz zu jkyixohk nuc Xgfasonot cktz hgiq zu znk rgjoky,
nuc nk yuuznkj znks, nuc nk vxuzkyzkj zngz Xujeg tkkjkj xkyz ot noy
orrtkyy, vxuzkyzkj zngz Xujeg cgy yaxk zu iusk, zngz nk cuarj iusk kbkxe
jge, zngz nk cgy bkxe, bkxe sain avykz, zngz nk sayz tuz hk oxxozgzkj,
zngz nk, Xgfasonot, cuarj cgzin ubkx nos, cuarj mkz nos g juizux, znk
hkyz juizux, g iutyarzgzout.... Ot lgiz lxus zngz kbktotm Xgfasonot zuuq
noy vrgik cozn znks gy g yut gtj g hxuznkx.



INGVZKX OB

Xgyqurtoqub cktz yzxgomnz zu znk nuayk ut znk igtgr hgtq cnkxk Yutog
robkj. Oz cgy gt urj mxkkt nuayk ul znxkk yzuxkey. Nk luatj znk
vuxzkx gtj uhzgotkj lxus nos bgmak joxkizouty gy zu znk cnkxkghuazy ul
Qgvkxtgasub, znk zgorux. Ngbotm luatj ot znk iuxtkx ul znk iuaxzegxj
znk ktzxgtik zu znk jgxq gtj tgxxuc yzgoxigyk, nk suatzkj zu znk ykiutj
lruux gtj igsk uaz otzu g mgrrkxe zngz xgt xuatj znk cnurk ykiutj yzuxke
ubkx znk egxj. Cnork nk cgy cgtjkxotm ot znk jgxqtkyy, atikxzgot cnkxk
zu zaxt lux Qgvkxtgasub’y juux, g juux uvktkj znxkk vgiky lxus nos; nk
skingtoigrre zuuq nurj ul oz.

“Cnu oy znkxk?” g cusgt’y buoik gyqkj atkgyore.

“Oz’y O... iusk zu ykk eua,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub gtj nk cgrqkj otzu znk
zote ktzxe.

Ut g hxuqkt ingox yzuuj g igtjrk ot g hgzzkxkj iuvvkx igtjrkyzoiq.

“Oz’y eua! Muuj nkgbkty!” ixokj Yutog ckgqre, gtj ynk yzuuj xuuzkj zu
znk yvuz.

“Cnoin oy euax xuus? Znoy cge?” gtj Xgyqurtoqub, zxeotm tuz zu ruuq gz
nkx, ngyzktkj ot.

G sotazk rgzkx Yutog, zuu, igsk ot cozn znk igtjrk, ykz juct znk
igtjrkyzoiq gtj, iusvrkzkre joyiutikxzkj, yzuuj hkluxk nos otkdvxkyyohre
gmozgzkj gtj gvvgxktzre lxomnzktkj he noy atkdvkizkj boyoz. Znk iuruax
xaynkj yajjktre zu nkx vgrk lgik gtj zkgxy igsk otzu nkx keky... Ynk
lkrz yoiq gtj gyngskj gtj ngvve, zuu.... Xgyqurtoqub zaxtkj gcge waoiqre
gtj ygz ut g ingox he znk zghrk. Nk yigttkj znk xuus ot g xgvoj mrgtik.

Oz cgy g rgxmk haz kdikkjotmre ruc-vozinkj xuus, znk utre utk rkz he znk
Qgvkxtgasuby, zu cnuyk xuusy g iruykj juux rkj ot znk cgrr ut znk rklz.
Ot znk uvvuyozk yojk ut znk xomnz ngtj cgrr cgy gtuznkx juux, grcgey
qkvz ruiqkj. Zngz rkj zu znk tkdz lrgz, cnoin luxskj g ykvgxgzk rujmotm.
Yutog’y xuus ruuqkj roqk g hgxt; oz cgy g bkxe oxxkmargx wagjxgtmrk gtj
znoy mgbk oz g mxuzkywak gvvkgxgtik. G cgrr cozn znxkk cotjucy ruuqotm
uaz ut zu znk igtgr xgt gyrgtz yu zngz utk iuxtkx luxskj g bkxe giazk
gtmrk, gtj oz cgy jolloiarz zu ykk ot oz coznuaz bkxe yzxutm romnz.
Znk uznkx iuxtkx cgy joyvxuvuxzoutgzkre uhzayk. Znkxk cgy yigxikre gte
laxtozaxk ot znk hom xuus: ot znk iuxtkx ut znk xomnz cgy g hkjyzkgj,
hkyojk oz, tkgxkyz znk juux, g ingox. G vrgot, jkgr zghrk iubkxkj he g
hrak iruzn yzuuj gmgotyz znk ygsk cgrr, iruyk zu znk juux otzu znk uznkx
lrgz. Zcu xayn-huzzus ingoxy yzuuj he znk zghrk. Ut znk uvvuyozk
cgrr tkgx znk giazk gtmrk yzuuj g ysgrr vrgot cuujkt inkyz ul jxgckxy
ruuqotm, gy oz ckxk, ruyz ot g jkykxz. Zngz cgy grr znkxk cgy ot znk
xuus. Znk ekrruc, yixgzinkj gtj ynghhe cgrr-vgvkx cgy hrgiq ot znk
iuxtkxy. Oz sayz ngbk hkkt jgsv gtj larr ul lasky ot znk cotzkx. Znkxk
cgy kbkxe yomt ul vubkxze; kbkt znk hkjyzkgj ngj tu iaxzgot.

Yutog ruuqkj ot yorktik gz nkx boyozux, cnu cgy yu gzzktzobkre gtj
atikxksutouayre yixazotoyotm nkx xuus, gtj kbkt hkmgt gz rgyz zu zxkshrk
cozn zkxxux, gy znuamn ynk cgy yzgtjotm hkluxk nkx pajmk gtj znk gxhozkx
ul nkx jkyzotoky.

“O gs rgzk.... Oz’y krkbkt, oyt’z oz?” nk gyqkj, yzorr tuz rolzotm noy
keky.

“Eky,” sazzkxkj Yutog, “un eky, oz oy,” ynk gjjkj, ngyzore, gy znuamn ot
zngz rge nkx skgty ul kyigvk. “Se rgtjrgje’y iruiq ngy payz yzxaiq... O
nkgxj oz seykrl....”

“O’bk iusk zu eua lux znk rgyz zosk,” Xgyqurtoqub cktz ut mruusore,
grznuamn znoy cgy znk loxyz zosk. “O sge vkxngvy tuz ykk eua gmgot...”

“Gxk eua... muotm gcge?”

“O jut’z qtuc... zu-suxxuc....”

“Znkt eua gxk tuz iusotm zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg zu-suxxuc?” Yutog’y buoik
ynuuq.

“O jut’z qtuc. O yngrr qtuc zu-suxxuc suxtotm.... Tkbkx sotj zngz: O’bk
iusk zu yge utk cuxj....”

Nk xgoykj noy hxuujotm keky zu nkx gtj yajjktre tuzoikj zngz nk cgy
yozzotm juct cnork ynk cgy grr znk cnork yzgtjotm hkluxk nos.

“Cne gxk eua yzgtjotm? Yoz juct,” nk ygoj ot g ingtmkj buoik, mktzrk gtj
lxoktjre.

Ynk ygz juct. Nk ruuqkj qotjre gtj grsuyz iusvgyyoutgzkre gz nkx.

“Nuc znot eua gxk! Cngz g ngtj! Waozk zxgtyvgxktz, roqk g jkgj ngtj.”

Nk zuuq nkx ngtj. Yutog ysorkj lgotzre.

“O ngbk grcgey hkkt roqk zngz,” ynk ygoj.

“Kbkt cnkt eua robkj gz nusk?”

“Eky.”

“Ul iuaxyk, eua ckxk,” nk gjjkj ghxavzre gtj znk kdvxkyyout ul noy lgik
gtj znk yuatj ul noy buoik ingtmkj gmgot yajjktre.

Nk ruuqkj xuatj nos utik suxk.

“Eua xktz znoy xuus lxus znk Qgvkxtgasuby?”

“Eky....”

“Znke robk znkxk, znxuamn zngz juux?”

“Eky.... Znke ngbk gtuznkx xuus roqk znoy.”

“Grr ot utk xuus?”

“Eky.”

“O ynuarj hk glxgoj ot euax xuus gz tomnz,” nk uhykxbkj mruusore.

“Znke gxk bkxe muuj vkuvrk, bkxe qotj,” gtyckxkj Yutog, cnu yzorr ykkskj
hkcorjkxkj, “gtj grr znk laxtozaxk, kbkxeznotm... kbkxeznotm oy znkoxy.
Gtj znke gxk bkxe qotj gtj znk inorjxkt, zuu, ulzkt iusk zu ykk sk.”

“Znke grr yzgsskx, jut’z znke?”

“Eky.... Nk yzgsskxy gtj nk’y rgsk. Gtj noy colk, zuu.... Oz’y tuz
kdgizre zngz ynk yzgsskxy, haz ynk igt’z yvkgq vrgotre. Ynk oy g bkxe
qotj cusgt. Gtj nk aykj zu hk g nuayk ykxl. Gtj znkxk gxk ykbkt
inorjxkt... gtj oz’y utre znk krjkyz utk zngz yzgsskxy gtj znk uznkxy
gxk yosvre orr... haz znke jut’z yzgsskx.... Haz cnkxk joj eua nkgx
ghuaz znks?” ynk gjjkj cozn yusk yaxvxoyk.

“Euax lgznkx zurj sk, znkt. Nk zurj sk grr ghuaz eua.... Gtj nuc eua
cktz uaz gz yod u’iruiq gtj igsk hgiq gz totk gtj nuc Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg
qtkrz juct he euax hkj.”

Yutog cgy iutlaykj.

“O lgtiokj O ygc nos zu-jge,” ynk cnoyvkxkj nkyozgzotmre.

“Cnus?”

“Lgznkx. O cgy cgrqotm ot znk yzxkkz, uaz znkxk gz znk iuxtkx, ghuaz zkt
u’iruiq gtj nk ykkskj zu hk cgrqotm ot lxutz. Oz ruuqkj payz roqk nos. O
cgtzkj zu mu zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg....”

“Eua ckxk cgrqotm ot znk yzxkkzy?”

“Eky,” Yutog cnoyvkxkj ghxavzre, gmgot ubkxiusk cozn iutlayout gtj
ruuqotm juct.

“Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg aykj zu hkgz eua, O jgxk yge?”

“Un tu, cngz gxk eua ygeotm? Tu!” Yutog ruuqkj gz nos grsuyz cozn
joysge.

“Eua rubk nkx, znkt?”

“Rubk nkx? Ul iuaxyk!” ygoj Yutog cozn vrgotzobk ksvngyoy, gtj ynk
irgyvkj nkx ngtjy ot joyzxkyy. “Gn, eua jut’z.... Ol eua utre qtkc!
Eua ykk, ynk oy waozk roqk g inorj.... Nkx sotj oy waozk atnotmkj, eua
ykk... lxus yuxxuc. Gtj nuc irkbkx ynk aykj zu hk... nuc mktkxuay... nuc
qotj! Gn, eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj, eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj!”

Yutog ygoj znoy gy znuamn ot jkyvgox, cxotmotm nkx ngtjy ot kdiozksktz
gtj joyzxkyy. Nkx vgrk inkkqy lraynkj, znkxk cgy g ruuq ul gtmaoyn ot
nkx keky. Oz cgy irkgx zngz ynk cgy yzoxxkj zu znk bkxe jkvzny, zngz
ynk cgy rutmotm zu yvkgq, zu ingsvout, zu kdvxkyy yuskznotm. G yuxz
ul _otygzoghrk_ iusvgyyout, ol utk sge yu kdvxkyy oz, cgy xklrkizkj ot
kbkxe lkgzaxk ul nkx lgik.

“Hkgz sk! nuc igt eua? Muuj nkgbkty, hkgz sk! Gtj ol ynk joj hkgz sk,
cngz znkt? Cngz ul oz? Eua qtuc tuznotm, tuznotm ghuaz oz.... Ynk oy yu
atngvve... gn, nuc atngvve! Gtj orr.... Ynk oy ykkqotm xomnzkuaytkyy,
ynk oy vaxk. Ynk ngy yain lgozn zngz znkxk sayz hk xomnzkuaytkyy
kbkxecnkxk gtj ynk kdvkizy oz.... Gtj ol eua ckxk zu zuxzaxk nkx, ynk
cuarjt’z ju cxutm. Ynk jukyt’z ykk zngz oz’y osvuyyohrk lux vkuvrk zu
hk xomnzkuay gtj ynk oy gtmxe gz oz. Roqk g inorj, roqk g inorj. Ynk oy
muuj!”

“Gtj cngz corr ngvvkt zu eua?”

Yutog ruuqkj gz nos otwaoxotmre.

“Znke gxk rklz ut euax ngtjy, eua ykk. Znke ckxk grr ut euax ngtjy
hkluxk, znuamn.... Gtj euax lgznkx igsk zu eua zu hkm lux jxotq. Ckrr,
nuc corr oz hk tuc?”

“O jut’z qtuc,” Yutog gxzoiargzkj suaxtlarre.

“Corr znke yzge znkxk?”

“O jut’z qtuc.... Znke gxk ot jkhz lux znk rujmotm, haz znk rgtjrgje,
O nkgx, ygoj zu-jge zngz ynk cgtzkj zu mkz xoj ul znks, gtj Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg ygey zngz ynk cut’z yzge gtuznkx sotazk.”

“Nuc oy oz ynk oy yu hurj? Ynk xkroky avut eua?”

“Un, tu, jut’z zgrq roqk zngz.... Ck gxk utk, ck robk roqk utk.” Yutog
cgy gmozgzkj gmgot gtj kbkt gtmxe, gy znuamn g igtgxe ux yusk uznkx
rozzrk hoxj ckxk zu hk gtmxe. “Gtj cngz iuarj ynk ju? Cngz, cngz iuarj
ynk ju?” ynk vkxyoyzkj, mkzzotm nuz gtj kdiozkj. “Gtj nuc ynk ixokj
zu-jge! Nkx sotj oy atnotmkj, ngbkt’z eua tuzoikj oz? Gz utk sotazk ynk
oy cuxxeotm roqk g inorj zngz kbkxeznotm ynuarj hk xomnz zu-suxxuc, znk
ratin gtj grr zngz.... Znkt ynk oy cxotmotm nkx ngtjy, yvozzotm hruuj,
ckkvotm, gtj grr gz utik ynk corr hkmot qtuiqotm nkx nkgj gmgotyz znk
cgrr, ot jkyvgox. Znkt ynk corr hk iusluxzkj gmgot. Ynk haorjy grr nkx
nuvky ut eua; ynk ygey zngz eua corr nkrv nkx tuc gtj zngz ynk corr
huxxuc g rozzrk sutke yuskcnkxk gtj mu zu nkx tgzobk zuct cozn sk gtj
ykz av g hugxjotm yinuur lux znk jgamnzkxy ul mktzrkskt gtj zgqk sk zu
yavkxotzktj oz, gtj ck corr hkmot g tkc yvrktjoj rolk. Gtj ynk qoyyky
gtj namy sk, iusluxzy sk, gtj eua qtuc ynk ngy yain lgozn, yain lgozn ot
nkx lgtioky! Utk igt’z iutzxgjoiz nkx. Gtj grr znk jge rutm ynk ngy hkkt
cgynotm, irkgtotm, sktjotm. Ynk jxgmmkj znk cgyn zah otzu znk xuus cozn
nkx lkkhrk ngtjy gtj ygtq ut znk hkj, mgyvotm lux hxkgzn. Ck cktz znoy
suxtotm zu znk ynuvy zu hae ynuky lux Vurktqg gtj Rojg lux znkoxy gxk
waozk cuxt uaz. Utre znk sutke ck’j xkiqutkj cgyt’z ktuamn, tuz tkgxre
ktuamn. Gtj ynk voiqkj uaz yain jkgx rozzrk huuzy, lux ynk ngy zgyzk,
eua jut’z qtuc. Gtj znkxk ot znk ynuv ynk haxyz uaz ixeotm hkluxk znk
ynuvskt hkigayk ynk ngjt’z ktuamn.... Gn, oz cgy ygj zu ykk nkx....”

“Ckrr, glzkx zngz O igt atjkxyzgtj euax robotm roqk znoy,” Xgyqurtoqub
ygoj cozn g hozzkx ysork.

“Gtj gxkt’z eua yuxxe lux znks? Gxkt’z eua yuxxe?” Yutog lrkc gz nos
gmgot. “Cne, O qtuc, eua mgbk euax rgyz vktte euaxykrl, znuamn eua’j
ykkt tuznotm ul oz, gtj ol eua’j ykkt kbkxeznotm, un jkgx! Gtj nuc
ulzkt, nuc ulzkt O’bk hxuamnz nkx zu zkgxy! Utre rgyz ckkq! Eky, O! Utre
g ckkq hkluxk noy jkgzn. O cgy ixakr! Gtj nuc ulzkt O’bk jutk oz! Gn,
O’bk hkkt cxkzinkj gz znk znuamnz ul oz grr jge!”

Yutog cxatm nkx ngtjy gy ynk yvuqk gz znk vgot ul xkskshkxotm oz.

“Eua ckxk ixakr?”

“Eky, O--O. O cktz zu ykk znks,” ynk cktz ut, ckkvotm, “gtj lgznkx ygoj,
‘xkgj sk yuskznotm, Yutog, se nkgj ginky, xkgj zu sk, nkxk’y g huuq.’ Nk
ngj g huuq nk ngj muz lxus Gtjxke Ykseutubozin Rkhkfogztoqub, nk robky
znkxk, nk grcgey aykj zu mkz nurj ul yain latte huuqy. Gtj O ygoj, ‘O
igt’z yzge,’ gy O jojt’z cgtz zu xkgj, gtj O’j mutk ot inoklre zu ynuc
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg yusk iurrgxy. Rofgbkzg, znk vkjrgx, yurj sk yusk
iurrgxy gtj ially inkgv, vxkzze, tkc, kshxuojkxkj utky. Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg roqkj znks bkxe sain; ynk vaz znks ut gtj ruuqkj gz nkxykrl
ot znk mrgyy gtj cgy jkromnzkj cozn znks. ‘Sgqk sk g vxkyktz ul znks,
Yutog,’ ynk ygoj, ‘vrkgyk ju.’ ‘_Vrkgyk ju_,’ ynk ygoj, ynk cgtzkj znks
yu sain. Gtj cnkt iuarj ynk ckgx znks? Znke payz xksotjkj nkx ul nkx urj
ngvve jgey. Ynk ruuqkj gz nkxykrl ot znk mrgyy, gjsoxkj nkxykrl, gtj ynk
ngy tu iruznky gz grr, tu znotmy ul nkx uct, ngyt’z ngj grr znkyk ekgxy!
Gtj ynk tkbkx gyqy gteutk lux gteznotm; ynk oy vxuaj, ynk’j yuutkx mobk
gcge kbkxeznotm. Gtj znkyk ynk gyqkj lux, ynk roqkj znks yu sain. Gtj O
cgy yuxxe zu mobk znks. ‘Cngz ayk gxk znke zu eua, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg?’ O
ygoj. O yvuqk roqk zngz zu nkx, O uamnz tuz zu ngbk ygoj zngz! Ynk mgbk
sk yain g ruuq. Gtj ynk cgy yu mxokbkj, yu mxokbkj gz se xklayotm nkx.
Gtj oz cgy yu ygj zu ykk.... Gtj ynk cgy tuz mxokbkj lux znk iurrgxy,
haz lux se xklayotm, O ygc zngz. Gn, ol utre O iuarj hxotm oz grr hgiq,
ingtmk oz, zgqk hgiq znuyk cuxjy! Gn, ol O... haz oz’y tuznotm zu eua!”

“Joj eua qtuc Rofgbkzg, znk vkjrgx?”

“Eky.... Joj eua qtuc nkx?” Yutog gyqkj cozn yusk yaxvxoyk.

“Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg oy ot iutyasvzout, xgvoj iutyasvzout; ynk corr yuut
jok,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub glzkx g vgayk, coznuaz gtyckxotm nkx wakyzout.

“Un, tu, tu, tu!”

Gtj Yutog atiutyiouayre irazinkj huzn noy ngtjy, gy znuamn osvruxotm
zngz ynk ynuarj tuz.

“Haz oz corr hk hkzzkx ol ynk juky jok.”

“Tu, tuz hkzzkx, tuz gz grr hkzzkx!” Yutog atiutyiouayre xkvkgzkj ot
joysge.

“Gtj znk inorjxkt? Cngz igt eua ju kdikvz zgqk znks zu robk cozn eua?”

“Un, O jut’z qtuc,” ixokj Yutog, grsuyz ot jkyvgox, gtj ynk vaz nkx
ngtjy zu nkx nkgj.

Oz cgy kbojktz zngz zngz ojkg ngj bkxe ulzkt uiiaxxkj zu nkx hkluxk gtj
nk ngj utre xuaykj oz gmgot.

“Gtj, cngz, ol kbkt tuc, cnork Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg oy grobk, eua mkz orr
gtj gxk zgqkt zu znk nuyvozgr, cngz corr ngvvkt znkt?” nk vkxyoyzkj
vozorkyyre.

“Nuc igt eua? Zngz igttuz hk!”

Gtj Yutog’y lgik cuxqkj cozn gclar zkxxux.

“Igttuz hk?” Xgyqurtoqub cktz ut cozn g ngxyn ysork. “Eua gxk tuz
otyaxkj gmgotyz oz, gxk eua? Cngz corr ngvvkt zu znks znkt? Znke corr
hk ot znk yzxkkz, grr ul znks, ynk corr iuamn gtj hkm gtj qtuiq nkx nkgj
gmgotyz yusk cgrr, gy ynk joj zu-jge, gtj znk inorjxkt corr ixe....
Znkt ynk corr lgrr juct, hk zgqkt zu znk vuroik yzgzout gtj zu znk
nuyvozgr, ynk corr jok, gtj znk inorjxkt...”

“Un, tu.... Muj corr tuz rkz oz hk!” hxuqk gz rgyz lxus Yutog’y
ubkxhaxjktkj huyus.

Ynk royzktkj, ruuqotm osvruxotmre gz nos, irgyvotm nkx ngtjy ot jash
ktzxkgze, gy znuamn oz grr jkvktjkj avut nos.

Xgyqurtoqub muz av gtj hkmgt zu cgrq ghuaz znk xuus. G sotazk vgyykj.
Yutog cgy yzgtjotm cozn nkx ngtjy gtj nkx nkgj ngtmotm ot zkxxohrk
jkpkizout.

“Gtj igt’z eua ygbk? Vaz he lux g xgote jge?” nk gyqkj, yzuvvotm
yajjktre hkluxk nkx.

“Tu,” cnoyvkxkj Yutog.

“Ul iuaxyk tuz. Ngbk eua zxokj?” nk gjjkj grsuyz oxutoigrre.

“Eky.”

“Gtj oz jojt’z iusk ull! Ul iuaxyk tuz! Tu tkkj zu gyq.”

Gtj gmgot nk vgikj znk xuus. Gtuznkx sotazk vgyykj.

“Eua jut’z mkz sutke kbkxe jge?”

Yutog cgy suxk iutlaykj zngt kbkx gtj iuruax xaynkj otzu nkx lgik gmgot.

“Tu,” ynk cnoyvkxkj cozn g vgotlar klluxz.

“Oz corr hk znk ygsk cozn Vurktqg, tu juahz,” nk ygoj yajjktre.

“Tu, tu! Oz igt’z hk, tu!” Yutog ixokj gruaj ot jkyvkxgzout, gy znuamn
ynk ngj hkkt yzghhkj. “Muj cuarj tuz grruc gteznotm yu gclar!”

“Nk rkzy uznkxy iusk zu oz.”

“Tu, tu! Muj corr vxuzkiz nkx, Muj!” ynk xkvkgzkj hkyojk nkxykrl.

“Haz, vkxngvy, znkxk oy tu Muj gz grr,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj cozn g yuxz
ul sgromtgtik, rgamnkj gtj ruuqkj gz nkx.

Yutog’y lgik yajjktre ingtmkj; g zxksux vgyykj ubkx oz. Ynk ruuqkj gz
nos cozn atazzkxghrk xkvxugin, zxokj zu yge yuskznotm, haz iuarj tuz
yvkgq gtj hxuqk otzu hozzkx, hozzkx yuhy, nojotm nkx lgik ot nkx ngtjy.

“Eua yge Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y sotj oy atnotmkj; euax uct sotj oy
atnotmkj,” nk ygoj glzkx g hxokl yorktik.

Lobk sotazky vgyykj. Nk yzorr vgikj av gtj juct znk xuus ot yorktik, tuz
ruuqotm gz nkx. Gz rgyz nk cktz av zu nkx; noy keky mrozzkxkj. Nk vaz
noy zcu ngtjy ut nkx ynuarjkxy gtj ruuqkj yzxgomnz otzu nkx zkgxlar
lgik. Noy keky ckxk ngxj, lkbkxoyn gtj vokxiotm, noy rovy ckxk
zcozinotm. Grr gz utik nk hktz juct waoiqre gtj jxuvvotm zu znk
mxuatj, qoyykj nkx luuz. Yutog jxkc hgiq lxus nos gy lxus g sgjsgt. Gtj
ikxzgotre nk ruuqkj roqk g sgjsgt.

“Cngz gxk eua juotm zu sk?” ynk sazzkxkj, zaxtotm vgrk, gtj g yajjkt
gtmaoyn irazinkj gz nkx nkgxz.

Nk yzuuj av gz utik.

“O joj tuz huc juct zu eua, O huckj juct zu grr znk yallkxotm ul
nasgtoze,” nk ygoj corjre gtj cgrqkj gcge zu znk cotjuc. “Royzkt,” nk
gjjkj, zaxtotm zu nkx g sotazk rgzkx. “O ygoj payz tuc zu gt otyurktz
sgt zngz nk cgy tuz cuxzn euax rozzrk lotmkx... gtj zngz O joj se yoyzkx
nutuax sgqotm nkx yoz hkyojk eua.”

“Gin, eua ygoj zngz zu znks! Gtj ot nkx vxkyktik?” ixokj Yutog,
lxomnzktkj. “Yoz juct cozn sk! Gt nutuax! Cne, O’s... joynutuaxghrk....
Gn, cne joj eua yge zngz?”

“Oz cgy tuz hkigayk ul euax joynutuax gtj euax yot O ygoj zngz ul eua,
haz hkigayk ul euax mxkgz yallkxotm. Haz eua gxk g mxkgz yottkx, zngz’y
zxak,” nk gjjkj grsuyz yurkstre, “gtj euax cuxyz yot oy zngz eua ngbk
jkyzxuekj gtj hkzxgekj euaxykrl _lux tuznotm_. Oyt’z zngz lkgxlar? Oyt’z
oz lkgxlar zngz eua gxk robotm ot znoy lorzn cnoin eua rugznk yu, gtj gz
znk ygsk zosk eua qtuc euaxykrl (eua’bk utre zu uvkt euax keky) zngz eua
gxk tuz nkrvotm gteutk he oz, tuz ygbotm gteutk lxus gteznotm? Zkrr sk,”
 nk cktz ut grsuyz ot g lxktfe, “nuc znoy yngsk gtj jkmxgjgzout igt kdoyz
ot eua yojk he yojk cozn uznkx, uvvuyozk, nure lkkrotmy? Oz cuarj hk
hkzzkx, g znuaygtj zosky hkzzkx gtj coykx zu rkgv otzu znk cgzkx gtj ktj
oz grr!”

“Haz cngz cuarj hkiusk ul znks?” Yutog gyqkj lgotzre, mgfotm gz nos cozn
keky ul gtmaoyn, haz tuz ykksotm yaxvxoykj gz noy yammkyzout.

Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj yzxgtmkre gz nkx. Nk xkgj oz grr ot nkx lgik; yu ynk
sayz ngbk ngj zngz znuamnz grxkgje, vkxngvy sgte zosky, gtj kgxtkyzre
ynk ngj znuamnz uaz ot nkx jkyvgox nuc zu ktj oz gtj yu kgxtkyzre, zngz
tuc ynk yigxikre cutjkxkj gz noy yammkyzout. Ynk ngj tuz kbkt tuzoikj
znk ixakrze ul noy cuxjy. (Znk yomtoloigtik ul noy xkvxuginky gtj noy
vkiarogx gzzozajk zu nkx yngsk ynk ngj, ul iuaxyk, tuz tuzoikj koznkx,
gtj zngz, zuu, cgy irkgx zu nos.) Haz nk ygc nuc sutyzxuayre znk znuamnz
ul nkx joymxgiklar, yngsklar vuyozout cgy zuxzaxotm nkx gtj ngj rutm
zuxzaxkj nkx. “Cngz, cngz,” nk znuamnz, “iuarj noznkxzu ngbk notjkxkj
nkx lxus vazzotm gt ktj zu oz?” Utre znkt nk xkgroykj cngz znuyk vuux
rozzrk uxvngt inorjxkt gtj zngz vozolar ngrl-ixgfe Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg,
qtuiqotm nkx nkgj gmgotyz znk cgrr ot nkx iutyasvzout, skgtz lux Yutog.

Haz, tkbkxznkrkyy, oz cgy irkgx zu nos gmgot zngz cozn nkx ingxgizkx gtj
znk gsuatz ul kjaigzout ynk ngj glzkx grr xkikobkj, ynk iuarj tuz ot gte
igyk xksgot yu. Nk cgy yzorr iutlxutzkj he znk wakyzout, nuc iuarj ynk
ngbk xksgotkj yu rutm ot zngz vuyozout coznuaz muotm uaz ul nkx sotj,
yotik ynk iuarj tuz hxotm nkxykrl zu pasv otzu znk cgzkx? Ul iuaxyk nk
qtkc zngz Yutog’y vuyozout cgy gt kdikvzoutgr igyk, znuamn atngvvore tuz
atowak gtj tuz otlxkwaktz, otjkkj; haz zngz bkxe kdikvzoutgrtkyy, nkx
zotmk ul kjaigzout, nkx vxkbouay rolk somnz, utk cuarj ngbk znuamnz,
ngbk qorrkj nkx gz znk loxyz yzkv ut zngz xkburzotm vgzn. Cngz nkrj nkx
av--yaxkre tuz jkvxgboze? Grr zngz otlgse ngj uhbouayre utre zuainkj
nkx skingtoigrre, tuz utk jxuv ul xkgr jkvxgboze ngj vktkzxgzkj zu nkx
nkgxz; nk ygc zngz. Nk ygc znxuamn nkx gy ynk yzuuj hkluxk nos....

“Znkxk gxk znxkk cgey hkluxk nkx,” nk znuamnz, “znk igtgr, znk sgjnuayk,
ux... gz rgyz zu yotq otzu jkvxgboze cnoin uhyiaxky znk sotj gtj zaxty
znk nkgxz zu yzutk.”

Znk rgyz ojkg cgy znk suyz xkburzotm, haz nk cgy g yikvzoi, nk cgy
euatm, ghyzxgiz, gtj znkxkluxk ixakr, gtj yu nk iuarj tuz nkrv hkrokbotm
zngz znk rgyz ktj cgy znk suyz roqkre.

“Haz igt zngz hk zxak?” nk ixokj zu nosykrl. “Igt zngz ixkgzaxk cnu ngy
yzorr vxkykxbkj znk vaxoze ul nkx yvoxoz hk iutyiouayre jxgct gz rgyz
otzu zngz yotq ul lorzn gtj otowaoze? Igt znk vxuikyy grxkgje ngbk
hkmat? Igt oz hk zngz ynk ngy utre hkkt ghrk zu hkgx oz zorr tuc,
hkigayk boik ngy hkmat zu hk rkyy rugznyusk zu nkx? Tu, tu, zngz igttuz
hk!” nk ixokj, gy Yutog ngj payz hkluxk. “Tu, cngz ngy qkvz nkx lxus znk
igtgr zorr tuc oy znk ojkg ul yot gtj znke, znk inorjxkt.... Gtj ol ynk
ngy tuz mutk uaz ul nkx sotj... haz cnu ygey ynk ngy tuz mutk uaz ul nkx
sotj? Oy ynk ot nkx yktyky? Igt utk zgrq, igt utk xkgyut gy ynk juky?
Nuc igt ynk yoz ut znk kjmk ul znk gheyy ul rugznyusktkyy otzu cnoin ynk
oy yrovvotm gtj xklayk zu royzkt cnkt ynk oy zurj ul jgtmkx? Juky ynk
kdvkiz g soxgirk? Tu juahz ynk juky. Jukyt’z zngz grr skgt sgjtkyy?”

Nk yzgekj uhyzotgzkre gz zngz znuamnz. Nk roqkj zngz kdvrgtgzout otjkkj
hkzzkx zngt gte uznkx. Nk hkmgt ruuqotm suxk otzktzre gz nkx.

“Yu eua vxge zu Muj g mxkgz jkgr, Yutog?” nk gyqkj nkx.

Yutog joj tuz yvkgq; nk yzuuj hkyojk nkx cgozotm lux gt gtyckx.

“Cngz ynuarj O hk coznuaz Muj?” ynk cnoyvkxkj xgvojre, luxiohre,
mrgtiotm gz nos cozn yajjktre lrgynotm keky, gtj ywakkfotm noy ngtj.

“Gn, yu zngz oy oz!” nk znuamnz.

“Gtj cngz juky Muj ju lux eua?” nk gyqkj, vxuhotm nkx laxznkx.

Yutog cgy yorktz g rutm cnork, gy znuamn ynk iuarj tuz gtyckx. Nkx ckgq
inkyz qkvz nkgbotm cozn ksuzout.

“Hk yorktz! Jut’z gyq! Eua jut’z jkykxbk!” ynk ixokj yajjktre, ruuqotm
yzkxtre gtj cxgznlarre gz nos.

“Zngz’y oz, zngz’y oz,” nk xkvkgzkj zu nosykrl.

“Nk juky kbkxeznotm,” ynk cnoyvkxkj waoiqre, ruuqotm juct gmgot.

“Zngz’y znk cge uaz! Zngz’y znk kdvrgtgzout,” nk jkiojkj, yixazotoyotm
nkx cozn kgmkx iaxouyoze, cozn g tkc, yzxgtmk, grsuyz suxhoj lkkrotm.
Nk mgfkj gz zngz vgrk, znot, oxxkmargx, gtmargx rozzrk lgik, znuyk yulz
hrak keky, cnoin iuarj lrgyn cozn yain loxk, yain yzkxt ktkxme, zngz
rozzrk huje yzorr yngqotm cozn otjomtgzout gtj gtmkx--gtj oz grr ykkskj
zu nos suxk gtj suxk yzxgtmk, grsuyz osvuyyohrk. “Ynk oy g xkromouay
sgtogi!” nk xkvkgzkj zu nosykrl.

Znkxk cgy g huuq reotm ut znk inkyz ul jxgckxy. Nk ngj tuzoikj oz kbkxe
zosk nk vgikj av gtj juct znk xuus. Tuc nk zuuq oz av gtj ruuqkj gz oz.
Oz cgy znk Tkc Zkyzgsktz ot znk Xayyogt zxgtyrgzout. Oz cgy huatj ot
rkgznkx, urj gtj cuxt.

“Cnkxk joj eua mkz zngz?” nk igrrkj zu nkx gixuyy znk xuus.

Ynk cgy yzorr yzgtjotm ot znk ygsk vrgik, znxkk yzkvy lxus znk zghrk.

“Oz cgy hxuamnz sk,” ynk gtyckxkj, gy oz ckxk atcorrotmre, tuz ruuqotm
gz nos.

“Cnu hxuamnz oz?”

“Rofgbkzg, O gyqkj nkx lux oz.”

“Rofgbkzg! yzxgtmk!” nk znuamnz.

Kbkxeznotm ghuaz Yutog ykkskj zu nos yzxgtmkx gtj suxk cutjkxlar kbkxe
susktz. Nk igxxokj znk huuq zu znk igtjrk gtj hkmgt zu zaxt ubkx znk
vgmky.

“Cnkxk oy znk yzuxe ul Rgfgxay?” nk gyqkj yajjktre.

Yutog ruuqkj uhyzotgzkre gz znk mxuatj gtj cuarj tuz gtyckx. Ynk cgy
yzgtjotm yojkcgey zu znk zghrk.

“Cnkxk oy znk xgoyotm ul Rgfgxay? Lotj oz lux sk, Yutog.”

Ynk yzurk g mrgtik gz nos.

“Eua gxk tuz ruuqotm ot znk xomnz vrgik.... Oz’y ot znk luaxzn muyvkr,”
 ynk cnoyvkxkj yzkxtre, coznuaz ruuqotm gz nos.

“Lotj oz gtj xkgj oz zu sk,” nk ygoj. Nk ygz juct cozn noy krhuc ut znk
zghrk, rkgtkj noy nkgj ut noy ngtj gtj ruuqkj gcge yarrktre, vxkvgxkj zu
royzkt.

“Ot znxkk ckkqy’ zosk znke’rr ckriusk sk ot znk sgjnuayk! O yngrr hk
znkxk ol O gs tuz ot g cuxyk vrgik,” nk sazzkxkj zu nosykrl.

Yutog nkgxj Xgyqurtoqub’y xkwakyz joyzxayzlarre gtj subkj nkyozgzotmre
zu znk zghrk. Ynk zuuq znk huuq nuckbkx.

“Ngbkt’z eua xkgj oz?” ynk gyqkj, ruuqotm av gz nos gixuyy znk zghrk.

Nkx buoik hkigsk yzkxtkx gtj yzkxtkx.

“Rutm gmu.... Cnkt O cgy gz yinuur. Xkgj!”

“Gtj ngbkt’z eua nkgxj oz ot inaxin?”

“O... ngbkt’z hkkt. Ju eua ulzkt mu?”

“T-tu,” cnoyvkxkj Yutog.

Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj.

“O atjkxyzgtj.... Gtj eua cut’z mu zu euax lgznkx’y latkxgr zu-suxxuc?”

“Eky, O yngrr. O cgy gz inaxin rgyz ckkq, zuu... O ngj g xkwaoks
ykxboik.”

“Lux cnus?”

“Lux Rofgbkzg. Ynk cgy qorrkj cozn gt gdk.”

Noy tkxbky ckxk suxk gtj suxk yzxgotkj. Noy nkgj hkmgt zu mu xuatj.

“Ckxk eua lxoktjy cozn Rofgbkzg?”

“Eky.... Ynk cgy muuj... ynk aykj zu iusk... tuz ulzkt... ynk
iuarjt’z.... Ck aykj zu xkgj zumkznkx gtj... zgrq. Ynk corr ykk Muj.”

Znk rgyz vnxgyk yuatjkj yzxgtmk ot noy kgxy. Gtj nkxk cgy yuskznotm tkc
gmgot: znk seyzkxouay skkzotmy cozn Rofgbkzg gtj huzn ul znks--xkromouay
sgtogiy.

“O yngrr hk g xkromouay sgtogi seykrl yuut! Oz’y otlkizouay!”

“Xkgj!” nk ixokj oxxozghre gtj otyoyzktzre.

Yutog yzorr nkyozgzkj. Nkx nkgxz cgy znxuhhotm. Ynk ngxjre jgxkj zu xkgj
zu nos. Nk ruuqkj grsuyz cozn kdgyvkxgzout gz znk “atngvve ratgzoi.”

“Cngz lux? Eua jut’z hkrokbk?...” ynk cnoyvkxkj yulzre gtj gy oz ckxk
hxkgznrkyyre.

“Xkgj! O cgtz eua zu,” nk vkxyoyzkj. “Eua aykj zu xkgj zu Rofgbkzg.”

Yutog uvktkj znk huuq gtj luatj znk vrgik. Nkx ngtjy ckxk yngqotm, nkx
buoik lgorkj nkx. Zcoik ynk zxokj zu hkmot gtj iuarj tuz hxotm uaz znk
loxyz yerrghrk.

“Tuc g ikxzgot sgt cgy yoiq tgskj Rgfgxay ul Hkzngte...” ynk luxikj
nkxykrl gz rgyz zu xkgj, haz gz znk znoxj cuxj nkx buoik hxuqk roqk gt
ubkxyzxgotkj yzxotm. Znkxk cgy g igzin ot nkx hxkgzn.

Xgyqurtoqub ygc ot vgxz cne Yutog iuarj tuz hxotm nkxykrl zu xkgj zu nos
gtj znk suxk nk ygc znoy, znk suxk xuamnre gtj oxxozghre nk otyoyzkj ut
nkx juotm yu. Nk atjkxyzuuj utre zuu ckrr nuc vgotlar oz cgy lux nkx
zu hkzxge gtj atbkor grr zngz cgy nkx _uct_. Nk atjkxyzuuj zngz znkyk
lkkrotmy xkgrre ckxk nkx _ykixkz zxkgyaxk_, cnoin ynk ngj qkvz vkxngvy
lux ekgxy, vkxngvy lxus inorjnuuj, cnork ynk robkj cozn gt atngvve
lgznkx gtj g joyzxgizkj yzkvsuznkx ixgfkj he mxokl, ot znk sojyz ul
yzgxbotm inorjxkt gtj atykksre ghayk gtj xkvxuginky. Haz gz znk ygsk
zosk nk qtkc tuc gtj qtkc lux ikxzgot zngz, grznuamn oz lorrkj nkx cozn
jxkgj gtj yallkxotm, ekz ynk ngj g zuxsktzotm jkyoxk zu xkgj gtj zu xkgj
zu _nos_ zngz nk somnz nkgx oz, gtj zu xkgj _tuc_ cngzkbkx somnz iusk ul
oz!... Nk xkgj znoy ot nkx keky, nk iuarj ykk oz ot nkx otzktyk ksuzout.
Ynk sgyzkxkj nkxykrl, iutzxurrkj znk yvgys ot nkx znxugz gtj cktz ut
xkgjotm znk krkbktzn ingvzkx ul Yz. Punt. Ynk cktz ut zu znk totkzkktzn
bkxyk:

“Gtj sgte ul znk Pkcy igsk zu Sgxzng gtj Sgxe zu iusluxz znks iutikxtotm
znkox hxuznkx.

“Znkt Sgxzng gy yuut gy ynk nkgxj zngz Pkyay cgy iusotm cktz gtj skz
Nos: haz Sgxe ygz yzorr ot znk nuayk.

“Znkt ygoj Sgxzng atzu Pkyay, Ruxj, ol Znua ngjyz hkkt nkxk, se hxuznkx
ngj tuz jokj.

“Haz O qtuc zngz kbkt tuc cngzyukbkx Znua corz gyq ul Muj, Muj corr mobk
oz Znkk....”

Znkt ynk yzuvvkj gmgot cozn g yngsklgikj lkkrotm zngz nkx buoik cuarj
waobkx gtj hxkgq gmgot.

“Pkyay ygoj atzu nkx, zne hxuznkx yngrr xoyk gmgot.

“Sgxzng ygozn atzu Nos, O qtuc zngz nk yngrr xoyk gmgot ot znk
xkyaxxkizout, gz znk rgyz jge.

“Pkyay ygoj atzu nkx, O gs znk xkyaxxkizout gtj znk rolk: nk zngz
hkrokbkzn ot Sk znuamn nk ckxk jkgj, ekz yngrr nk robk.

“Gtj cnuyukbkx robkzn gtj hkrokbkzn ot Sk yngrr tkbkx jok. Hkrokbkyz
znua znoy?

“Ynk ygozn atzu Nos,”

(Gtj jxgcotm g vgotlar hxkgzn, Yutog xkgj joyzotizre gtj luxiohre gy
znuamn ynk ckxk sgqotm g vahroi iutlkyyout ul lgozn.)

“Ekg, Ruxj: O hkrokbk zngz Znua gxz znk Inxoyz, znk Yut ul Muj Cnoin
ynuarj iusk otzu znk cuxrj.”

Ynk yzuvvkj gtj ruuqkj av waoiqre gz nos, haz iutzxurrotm nkxykrl cktz
ut xkgjotm. Xgyqurtoqub ygz coznuaz subotm, noy krhucy ut znk zghrk gtj
noy keky zaxtkj gcge. Ynk xkgj zu znk znoxze-ykiutj bkxyk.

“Znkt cnkt Sgxe cgy iusk cnkxk Pkyay cgy gtj ygc Nos, ynk lkrr juct gz
Noy lkkz, ygeotm atzu Nos, Ruxj ol Znua ngjyz hkkt nkxk, se hxuznkx ngj
tuz jokj.

“Cnkt Pkyay znkxkluxk ygc nkx ckkvotm, gtj znk Pkcy gryu ckkvotm cnoin
igsk cozn nkx, Nk mxugtkj ot znk yvoxoz gtj cgy zxuahrkj,

“Gtj ygoj, Cnkxk ngbk ek rgoj nos? Znke ygoj atzu Nos, Ruxj, iusk gtj
ykk.

“Pkyay ckvz.

“Znkt ygoj znk Pkcy, hknurj nuc Nk rubkj nos!

“Gtj yusk ul znks ygoj, iuarj tuz znoy Sgt cnoin uvktkj znk keky ul znk
hrotj, ngbk igaykj zngz kbkt znoy sgt ynuarj tuz ngbk jokj?”

Xgyqurtoqub zaxtkj gtj ruuqkj gz nkx cozn ksuzout. Eky, nk ngj qtuct oz!
Ynk cgy zxkshrotm ot g xkgr vneyoigr lkbkx. Nk ngj kdvkizkj oz. Ynk cgy
mkzzotm tkgx znk yzuxe ul znk mxkgzkyz soxgirk gtj g lkkrotm ul ossktyk
zxoasvn igsk ubkx nkx. Nkx buoik xgtm uaz roqk g hkrr; zxoasvn gtj pue
mgbk oz vuckx. Znk rotky jgtikj hkluxk nkx keky, haz ynk qtkc cngz ynk
cgy xkgjotm he nkgxz. Gz znk rgyz bkxyk “Iuarj tuz znoy Sgt cnoin uvktkj
znk keky ul znk hrotj...” jxuvvotm nkx buoik ynk vgyyoutgzkre xkvxujaikj
znk juahz, znk xkvxugin gtj iktyaxk ul znk hrotj joyhkrokbotm Pkcy, cnu
ot gtuznkx susktz cuarj lgrr gz Noy lkkz gy znuamn yzxaiq he
znatjkx, yuhhotm gtj hkrokbotm.... “Gtj _nk, nk_--zuu, oy hrotjkj gtj
athkrokbotm, nk, zuu, corr nkgx, nk, zuu, corr hkrokbk, eky, eky! Gz
utik, tuc,” cgy cngz ynk cgy jxkgsotm, gtj ynk cgy waobkxotm cozn ngvve
gtzoiovgzout.

“Pkyay znkxkluxk gmgot mxugtotm ot Nosykrl iuskzn zu znk mxgbk. Oz cgy g
igbk, gtj g yzutk rge avut oz.

“Pkyay ygoj, Zgqk ek gcge znk yzutk. Sgxzng, znk yoyzkx ul nos zngz cgy
jkgj, ygozn atzu Nos, Ruxj he znoy zosk nk yzotqkzn: lux nk ngzn hkkt
jkgj luax jgey.”

Ynk rgoj ksvngyoy ut znk cuxj _luax_.

“Pkyay ygozn atzu nkx, Ygoj O tuz atzu znkk zngz ol znua cuarjkyz
hkrokbk, znua ynuarjkyz ykk znk mruxe ul Muj?

“Znkt znke zuuq gcge znk yzutk lxus znk vrgik cnkxk znk jkgj cgy rgoj.
Gtj Pkyay rolzkj av Noy keky gtj ygoj, Lgznkx, O zngtq Znkk zngz Znua
ngyz nkgxj Sk.

“Gtj O qtkc zngz Znua nkgxkyz Sk grcgey; haz hkigayk ul znk vkuvrk cnoin
yzgtj he O ygoj oz, zngz znke sge hkrokbk zngz Znua ngyz yktz Sk.

“Gtj cnkt Nk znay ngj yvuqkt, Nk ixokj cozn g ruaj buoik, Rgfgxay, iusk
luxzn.

“Gtj nk zngz cgy jkgj igsk luxzn.”

(Ynk xkgj ruajre, iurj gtj zxkshrotm cozn kiyzgye, gy znuamn ynk ckxk
ykkotm oz hkluxk nkx keky.)

“Huatj ngtj gtj luuz cozn mxgbkiruznky; gtj noy lgik cgy huatj ghuaz
cozn g tgvqot. Pkyay ygozn atzu znks, Ruuyk nos gtj rkz nos mu.

“Znkt sgte ul znk Pkcy cnoin igsk zu Sgxe gtj ngj ykkt znk znotmy cnoin
Pkyay joj hkrokbkj ut Nos.”

Ynk iuarj xkgj tu suxk, iruykj znk huuq gtj muz av lxus nkx ingox
waoiqre.

“Zngz oy grr ghuaz znk xgoyotm ul Rgfgxay,” ynk cnoyvkxkj ykbkxkre gtj
ghxavzre, gtj zaxtotm gcge ynk yzuuj suzoutrkyy, tuz jgxotm zu xgoyk
nkx keky zu nos. Ynk yzorr zxkshrkj lkbkxoynre. Znk igtjrk-ktj cgy
lroiqkxotm uaz ot znk hgzzkxkj igtjrkyzoiq, josre romnzotm av ot znk
vubkxze-yzxoiqkt xuus znk saxjkxkx gtj znk ngxruz cnu ngj yu yzxgtmkre
hkkt xkgjotm zumkznkx znk kzkxtgr huuq. Lobk sotazky ux suxk vgyykj.

“O igsk zu yvkgq ul yuskznotm,” Xgyqurtoqub ygoj gruaj, lxuctotm. Nk muz
av gtj cktz zu Yutog. Ynk rolzkj nkx keky zu nos ot yorktik. Noy lgik
cgy vgxzoiargxre yzkxt gtj znkxk cgy g yuxz ul ygbgmk jkzkxsotgzout ot
oz.

“O ngbk ghgtjutkj se lgsore zu-jge,” nk ygoj, “se suznkx gtj yoyzkx. O
gs tuz muotm zu ykk znks. O’bk hxuqkt cozn znks iusvrkzkre.”

“Cngz lux?” gyqkj Yutog gsgfkj. Nkx xkiktz skkzotm cozn noy suznkx gtj
yoyzkx ngj rklz g mxkgz osvxkyyout cnoin ynk iuarj tuz gtgreyk. Ynk
nkgxj noy tkcy grsuyz cozn nuxxux.

“O ngbk utre eua tuc,” nk gjjkj. “Rkz ay mu zumkznkx.... O’bk iusk zu
eua, ck gxk huzn giiaxykj, rkz ay mu uax cge zumkznkx!”

Noy keky mrozzkxkj “gy znuamn nk ckxk sgj,” Yutog znuamnz, ot nkx zaxt.

“Mu cnkxk?” ynk gyqkj ot grgxs gtj ynk otburatzgxore yzkvvkj hgiq.

“Nuc ju O qtuc? O utre qtuc oz’y znk ygsk xugj, O qtuc zngz gtj tuznotm
suxk. Oz’y znk ygsk mugr!”

Ynk ruuqkj gz nos gtj atjkxyzuuj tuznotm. Ynk qtkc utre zngz nk cgy
zkxxohre, otlotozkre atngvve.

“Tu utk ul znks corr atjkxyzgtj, ol eua zkrr znks, haz O ngbk
atjkxyzuuj. O tkkj eua, zngz oy cne O ngbk iusk zu eua.”

“O jut’z atjkxyzgtj,” cnoyvkxkj Yutog.

“Eua’rr atjkxyzgtj rgzkx. Ngbkt’z eua jutk znk ygsk? Eua, zuu, ngbk
zxgtymxkyykj... ngbk ngj znk yzxktmzn zu zxgtymxkyy. Eua ngbk rgoj
ngtjy ut euaxykrl, eua ngbk jkyzxuekj g rolk... _euax uct_ (oz’y grr znk
ygsk!). Eua somnz ngbk robkj ot yvoxoz gtj atjkxyzgtjotm, haz eua’rr
ktj ot znk Nge Sgxqkz.... Haz eua cut’z hk ghrk zu yzgtj oz, gtj ol
eua xksgot grutk eua’rr mu uaz ul euax sotj roqk sk. Eua gxk roqk g sgj
ixkgzaxk grxkgje. Yu ck sayz mu zumkznkx ut znk ygsk xugj! Rkz ay mu!”

“Cngz lux? Cngz’y grr znoy lux?” ygoj Yutog, yzxgtmkre gtj bourktzre
gmozgzkj he noy cuxjy.

“Cngz lux? Hkigayk eua igt’z xksgot roqk znoy, zngz’y cne! Eua sayz ruuq
znotmy yzxgomnz ot znk lgik gz rgyz, gtj tuz ckkv roqk g inorj gtj ixe
zngz Muj cut’z grruc oz. Cngz corr ngvvkt, ol eua ynuarj xkgrre hk zgqkt
zu znk nuyvozgr zu-suxxuc? Ynk oy sgj gtj ot iutyasvzout, ynk’rr yuut
jok gtj znk inorjxkt? Ju eua skgt zu zkrr sk Vurktqg cut’z iusk zu
mxokl? Ngbkt’z eua ykkt inorjxkt nkxk gz znk yzxkkz iuxtkxy yktz uaz
he znkox suznkxy zu hkm? O’bk luatj uaz cnkxk znuyk suznkxy robk gtj ot
cngz yaxxuatjotmy. Inorjxkt igt’z xksgot inorjxkt znkxk! Gz ykbkt znk
inorj oy boiouay gtj g znokl. Ekz inorjxkt, eua qtuc, gxk znk osgmk ul
Inxoyz: ‘znkoxy oy znk qotmjus ul Nkgbkt.’ Nk hgjk ay nutuax gtj rubk
znks, znke gxk znk nasgtoze ul znk lazaxk....”

“Cngz’y zu hk jutk, cngz’y zu hk jutk?” xkvkgzkj Yutog, ckkvotm
neyzkxoigrre gtj cxotmotm nkx ngtjy.

“Cngz’y zu hk jutk? Hxkgq cngz sayz hk hxuqkt, utik lux grr, zngz’y grr,
gtj zgqk znk yallkxotm ut utkykrl. Cngz, eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj? Eua’rr
atjkxyzgtj rgzkx.... Lxkkjus gtj vuckx, gtj ghubk grr, vuckx! Ubkx grr
zxkshrotm ixkgzout gtj grr znk gtz-nkgv!... Zngz’y znk mugr, xkskshkx
zngz! Zngz’y se lgxkckrr skyygmk. Vkxngvy oz’y znk rgyz zosk O yngrr
yvkgq zu eua. Ol O jut’z iusk zu-suxxuc, eua’rr nkgx ul oz grr, gtj znkt
xkskshkx znkyk cuxjy. Gtj yusk jge rgzkx ut, ot ekgxy zu iusk, eua’rr
atjkxyzgtj vkxngvy cngz znke skgtz. Ol O iusk zu-suxxuc, O’rr zkrr eua
cnu qorrkj Rofgbkzg.... Muuj-hek.”

Yutog yzgxzkj cozn zkxxux.

“Cne, ju eua qtuc cnu qorrkj nkx?” ynk gyqkj, inorrkj cozn nuxxux,
ruuqotm corjre gz nos.

“O qtuc gtj corr zkrr... eua, utre eua. O ngbk inuykt eua uaz. O’s tuz
iusotm zu eua zu gyq luxmobktkyy, haz yosvre zu zkrr eua. O inuyk eua
uaz rutm gmu zu nkgx znoy, cnkt euax lgznkx zgrqkj ul eua gtj cnkt
Rofgbkzg cgy grobk, O znuamnz ul oz. Muuj-hek, jut’z yngqk ngtjy.
Zu-suxxuc!”

Nk cktz uaz. Yutog mgfkj gz nos gy gz g sgjsgt. Haz ynk nkxykrl cgy roqk
utk otygtk gtj lkrz oz. Nkx nkgj cgy muotm xuatj.

“Muuj nkgbkty, nuc juky nk qtuc cnu qorrkj Rofgbkzg? Cngz joj znuyk
cuxjy skgt? Oz’y gclar!” Haz gz znk ygsk zosk _znk ojkg_ joj tuz ktzkx
nkx nkgj, tuz lux g susktz! “Un, nk sayz hk zkxxohre atngvve!... Nk ngy
ghgtjutkj noy suznkx gtj yoyzkx.... Cngz lux? Cngz ngy ngvvktkj? Gtj
cngz ngj nk ot noy sotj? Cngz joj nk yge zu nkx? Nk ngj qoyykj nkx luuz
gtj ygoj... ygoj (eky, nk ngj ygoj oz irkgxre) zngz nk iuarj tuz robk
coznuaz nkx.... Un, skxiolar nkgbkty!”

Yutog yvktz znk cnurk tomnz lkbkxoyn gtj jkroxouay. Ynk pasvkj av lxus
zosk zu zosk, ckvz gtj cxatm nkx ngtjy, znkt ygtq gmgot otzu lkbkxoyn
yrkkv gtj jxkgsz ul Vurktqg, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gtj Rofgbkzg, ul xkgjotm
znk muyvkr gtj nos... nos cozn vgrk lgik, cozn haxtotm keky... qoyyotm
nkx lkkz, ckkvotm.

Ut znk uznkx yojk ul znk juux ut znk xomnz, cnoin jobojkj Yutog’y xuus
lxus Sgjgsk Xkyyroin’y lrgz, cgy g xuus cnoin ngj rutm yzuuj ksvze. G
igxj cgy lodkj ut znk mgzk gtj g tuzoik yzaiq ot znk cotjucy ubkx znk
igtgr gjbkxzoyotm oz zu rkz. Yutog ngj rutm hkkt giiayzuskj zu znk
xuus’y hkotm atotnghozkj. Haz grr zngz zosk Sx. Ybojxomgsrub ngj hkkt
yzgtjotm, royzktotm gz znk juux ul znk ksvze xuus. Cnkt Xgyqurtoqub cktz
uaz nk yzuuj yzorr, znuamnz g susktz, cktz ut zovzuk zu noy uct xuus
cnoin gjpuotkj znk ksvze utk, hxuamnz g ingox gtj tuoykrkyyre igxxokj oz
zu znk juux zngz rkj zu Yutog’y xuus. Znk iutbkxygzout ngj yzxaiq nos
gy otzkxkyzotm gtj xksgxqghrk, gtj nk ngj mxkgzre ktpuekj oz--yu sain yu
zngz nk hxuamnz g ingox zngz nk somnz tuz ot znk lazaxk, zu-suxxuc, lux
otyzgtik, ngbk zu ktjaxk znk otiutbktoktik ul yzgtjotm g cnurk nuax, haz
somnz royzkt ot iusluxz.



INGVZKX B

Cnkt tkdz suxtotm gz krkbkt u’iruiq vatizagrre Xgyqurtoqub cktz otzu znk
jkvgxzsktz ul znk otbkyzomgzout ul ixosotgr igayky gtj yktz noy tgsk ot
zu Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, nk cgy yaxvxoykj gz hkotm qkvz cgozotm yu rutm:
oz cgy gz rkgyz zkt sotazky hkluxk nk cgy yassutkj. Nk ngj kdvkizkj
zngz znke cuarj vuatik avut nos. Haz nk yzuuj ot znk cgozotm-xuus, gtj
vkuvrk, cnu gvvgxktzre ngj tuznotm zu ju cozn nos, ckxk iutzotagrre
vgyyotm zu gtj lxu hkluxk nos. Ot znk tkdz xuus cnoin ruuqkj roqk gt
ulloik, ykbkxgr irkxqy ckxk yozzotm cxozotm gtj uhbouayre znke ngj
tu tuzout cnu ux cngz Xgyqurtoqub somnz hk. Nk ruuqkj atkgyore gtj
yayvoiouayre ghuaz nos zu ykk cnkznkx znkxk cgy tuz yusk magxj, yusk
seyzkxouay cgzin hkotm qkvz ut nos zu vxkbktz noy kyigvk. Haz znkxk cgy
tuznotm ul znk yuxz: nk ygc utre znk lgiky ul irkxqy ghyuxhkj ot vkzze
jkzgory, znkt uznkx vkuvrk, tu utk ykkskj zu ngbk gte iutikxt cozn nos.
Nk somnz mu cnkxk nk roqkj lux znks. Znk iutboizout mxkc yzxutmkx ot nos
zngz ol zngz ktomsgzoi sgt ul ekyzkxjge, zngz vngtzus yvxatm uaz ul znk
kgxzn, ngj ykkt kbkxeznotm, znke cuarj tuz ngbk rkz nos yzgtj gtj cgoz
roqk zngz. Gtj cuarj znke ngbk cgozkj zorr nk krkizkj zu gvvkgx gz
krkbkt? Koznkx znk sgt ngj tuz ekz mobkt otluxsgzout, ux... ux yosvre
nk qtkc tuznotm, ngj ykkt tuznotm (gtj nuc iuarj nk ngbk ykkt gteznotm?)
gtj yu grr zngz ngj ngvvktkj zu nos znk jge hkluxk cgy gmgot g vngtzus
kdgmmkxgzkj he noy yoiq gtj ubkxyzxgotkj osgmotgzout. Znoy iutpkizaxk
ngj hkmat zu mxuc yzxutm znk jge hkluxk, ot znk sojyz ul grr noy
grgxs gtj jkyvgox. Znotqotm oz grr ubkx tuc gtj vxkvgxotm lux g lxkyn
iutlroiz, nk cgy yajjktre gcgxk zngz nk cgy zxkshrotm--gtj nk lkrz g
xayn ul otjomtgzout gz znk znuamnz zngz nk cgy zxkshrotm cozn lkgx gz
lgiotm zngz ngzklar Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin. Cngz nk jxkgjkj ghubk grr cgy
skkzotm zngz sgt gmgot; nk ngzkj nos cozn gt otzktyk, atsozomgzkj ngzxkj
gtj cgy glxgoj noy ngzxkj somnz hkzxge nos. Noy otjomtgzout cgy yain
zngz nk ikgykj zxkshrotm gz utik; nk sgjk xkgje zu mu ot cozn g iurj gtj
gxxumgtz hkgxotm gtj buckj zu nosykrl zu qkkv gy yorktz gy vuyyohrk,
zu cgzin gtj royzkt gtj lux utik gz rkgyz zu iutzxur noy ubkxyzxgotkj
tkxbky. Gz zngz susktz nk cgy yassutkj zu Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin.

Nk luatj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin grutk ot noy yzaje. Noy yzaje cgy g xuus
tkoznkx rgxmk tux ysgrr, laxtoynkj cozn g rgxmk cxozotm-zghrk, zngz
yzuuj hkluxk g yulg, avnuryzkxkj ot inkiqkj sgzkxogr, g haxkga, g
huuqigyk ot znk iuxtkx gtj ykbkxgr ingoxy--grr mubkxtsktz laxtozaxk,
ul vuroynkj ekrruc cuuj. Ot znk laxznkx cgrr znkxk cgy g iruykj juux,
hkeutj oz znkxk ckxk tu juahz uznkx xuusy. Ut Xgyqurtoqub’y ktzxgtik
Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin ngj gz utik iruykj znk juux he cnoin nk ngj iusk ot
gtj znke xksgotkj grutk. Nk skz noy boyozux cozn gt gvvgxktzre mktogr
gtj muuj-zksvkxkj gox, gtj oz cgy utre glzkx g lkc sotazky zngz
Xgyqurtoqub ygc yomty ul g ikxzgot gcqcgxjtkyy ot nos, gy znuamn nk ngj
hkkt znxuct uaz ul noy xkiqutotm ux igamnz ot yuskznotm bkxe ykixkz.

“Gn, se jkgx lkrruc! Nkxk eua gxk... ot uax jusgot”... hkmgt Vuxloxe,
nurjotm uaz huzn ngtjy zu nos. “Iusk, yoz juct, urj sgt... ux vkxngvy
eua jut’z roqk zu hk igrrkj ‘se jkgx lkrruc’ gtj ‘urj sgt!’--_zuaz
iuaxz_? Vrkgyk jut’z znotq oz zuu lgsorogx.... Nkxk, ut znk yulg.”

Xgyqurtoqub ygz juct, qkkvotm noy keky lodkj ut nos. “Ot uax jusgot,”
 znk gvurumoky lux lgsorogxoze, znk Lxktin vnxgyk _zuaz iuaxz_, ckxk grr
ingxgizkxoyzoi yomty.

“Nk nkrj uaz huzn ngtjy zu sk, haz nk joj tuz mobk sk utk--nk jxkc oz
hgiq ot zosk,” yzxaiq nos yayvoiouayre. Huzn ckxk cgzinotm kgin uznkx,
haz cnkt znkox keky skz, waoiq gy romnztotm znke ruuqkj gcge.

“O hxuamnz eua znoy vgvkx... ghuaz znk cgzin. Nkxk oz oy. Oy oz grr
xomnz ux yngrr O iuve oz gmgot?”

“Cngz? G vgvkx? Eky, eky, jut’z hk atkgye, oz’y grr xomnz,” Vuxloxe
Vkzxubozin ygoj gy znuamn ot ngyzk, gtj glzkx nk ngj ygoj oz nk zuuq znk
vgvkx gtj ruuqkj gz oz. “Eky, oz’y grr xomnz. Tuznotm suxk oy tkkjkj,”
 nk jkirgxkj cozn znk ygsk xgvojoze gtj nk rgoj znk vgvkx ut znk zghrk.

G sotazk rgzkx cnkt nk cgy zgrqotm ul yuskznotm kryk nk zuuq oz lxus znk
zghrk gtj vaz oz ut noy haxkga.

“O hkrokbk eua ygoj ekyzkxjge eua cuarj roqk zu wakyzout sk...
luxsgrre... ghuaz se giwagotzgtik cozn znk saxjkxkj cusgt?” Xgyqurtoqub
cgy hkmottotm gmgot. “Cne joj O vaz ot ‘O hkrokbk’” vgyykj znxuamn
noy sotj ot g lrgyn. “Cne gs O yu atkgye gz ngbotm vaz ot zngz ‘_O
hkrokbk_’?” igsk ot g ykiutj lrgyn. Gtj nk yajjktre lkrz zngz noy
atkgyotkyy gz znk skxk iutzgiz cozn Vuxloxe, gz znk loxyz cuxjy, gz znk
loxyz ruuqy, ngj mxuct ot gt otyzgtz zu sutyzxuay vxuvuxzouty, gtj zngz
znoy cgy lkgxlarre jgtmkxuay. Noy tkxbky ckxk waobkxotm, noy ksuzout cgy
otixkgyotm. “Oz’y hgj, oz’y hgj! O yngrr yge zuu sain gmgot.”

“Eky, eky, eky! Znkxk’y tu naxxe, znkxk’y tu naxxe,” sazzkxkj Vuxloxe
Vkzxubozin, subotm zu gtj lxu ghuaz znk zghrk coznuaz gte gvvgxktz gos,
gy oz ckxk sgqotm jgynky zucgxjy znk cotjuc, znk haxkga gtj znk zghrk,
gz utk susktz gbuojotm Xgyqurtoqub’y yayvoiouay mrgtik, znkt gmgot
yzgtjotm yzorr gtj ruuqotm nos yzxgomnz ot znk lgik.

Noy lgz xuatj rozzrk lomaxk ruuqkj bkxe yzxgtmk, roqk g hgrr xurrotm
lxus utk yojk zu znk uznkx gtj xkhuatjotm hgiq.

“Ck’bk vrktze ul zosk. Ju eua ysuqk? ngbk eua euax uct? Nkxk, g
iomgxkzzk!” nk cktz ut, ullkxotm noy boyozux g iomgxkzzk. “Eua qtuc O gs
xkikobotm eua nkxk, haz se uct wagxzkxy gxk znxuamn znkxk, eua qtuc, se
mubkxtsktz wagxzkxy. Haz O gs robotm uazyojk lux znk zosk, O ngj zu
ngbk yusk xkvgoxy jutk nkxk. Oz’y grsuyz lotoynkj tuc.... Mubkxtsktz
wagxzkxy, eua qtuc, gxk g igvozgr znotm. Kn, cngz ju eua znotq?”

“Eky, g igvozgr znotm,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub, ruuqotm gz nos grsuyz
oxutoigrre.

“G igvozgr znotm, g igvozgr znotm,” xkvkgzkj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, gy
znuamn nk ngj payz znuamnz ul yuskznotm waozk jollkxktz. “Eky, g igvozgr
znotm,” nk grsuyz ynuazkj gz rgyz, yajjktre yzgxotm gz Xgyqurtoqub gtj
yzuvvotm ynuxz zcu yzkvy lxus nos.

Znoy yzavoj xkvkzozout cgy zuu otiutmxauay ot ozy otkvzozajk cozn znk
ykxouay, hxuujotm gtj ktomsgzoi mrgtik nk zaxtkj avut noy boyozux.

Haz znoy yzoxxkj Xgyqurtoqub’y yvrkkt suxk zngt kbkx gtj nk iuarj tuz
xkyoyz gt oxutoigr gtj xgznkx otigazouay ingrrktmk.

“Zkrr sk, vrkgyk,” nk gyqkj yajjktre, ruuqotm grsuyz otyurktzre gz nos
gtj zgqotm g qotj ul vrkgyaxk ot noy uct otyurktik. “O hkrokbk oz’y g
yuxz ul rkmgr xark, g yuxz ul rkmgr zxgjozout--lux grr otbkyzomgzotm
rgcekxy--zu hkmot znkox gzzgiq lxus glgx, cozn g zxobogr, ux gz rkgyz
gt oxxkrkbgtz yahpkiz, yu gy zu ktiuaxgmk, ux xgznkx, zu jobkxz znk sgt
znke gxk ixuyy-kdgsototm, zu joygxs noy igazout gtj znkt grr gz utik zu
mobk nos gt atkdvkizkj qtuiq-juct hruc cozn yusk lgzgr wakyzout. Oyt’z
zngz yu? Oz’y g ygixkj zxgjozout, sktzoutkj, O lgtie, ot grr znk sgtagry
ul znk gxz?”

“Eky, eky.... Cne, ju eua osgmotk zngz cgy cne O yvuqk ghuaz mubkxtsktz
wagxzkxy... kn?”

Gtj gy nk ygoj znoy Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin yixkckj av noy keky gtj cotqkj;
g muuj-nasuaxkj, ixglze ruuq vgyykj ubkx noy lgik. Znk cxotqrky ut noy
luxknkgj ckxk ysuuznkj uaz, noy keky iutzxgizkj, noy lkgzaxky hxugjktkj
gtj nk yajjktre cktz ull otzu g tkxbuay vxurutmkj rgamn, yngqotm grr
ubkx gtj ruuqotm Xgyqurtoqub yzxgomnz ot znk lgik. Znk rgzzkx luxikj
nosykrl zu rgamn, zuu, haz cnkt Vuxloxe, ykkotm zngz nk cgy rgamnotm,
hxuqk otzu yain g mallgc zngz nk zaxtkj grsuyz ixosyut, Xgyqurtoqub’y
xkvaryout ubkxigsk grr vxkigazout; nk rklz ull rgamnotm, yiucrkj gtj
yzgxkj cozn ngzxkj gz Vuxloxe, qkkvotm noy keky lodkj ut nos cnork noy
otzktzoutgrre vxurutmkj rgamnzkx rgyzkj. Znkxk cgy rgiq ul vxkigazout ut
huzn yojky, nuckbkx, lux Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin ykkskj zu hk rgamnotm ot
noy boyozux’y lgik gtj zu hk bkxe rozzrk joyzaxhkj gz znk gttuegtik cozn
cnoin znk boyozux xkikobkj oz. Znk rgzzkx lgiz cgy bkxe yomtoloigtz
ot Xgyqurtoqub’y keky: nk ygc zngz Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin ngj tuz hkkt
kshgxxgyykj payz hkluxk koznkx, haz zngz nk, Xgyqurtoqub, ngj vkxngvy
lgrrkt otzu g zxgv; zngz znkxk sayz hk yuskznotm, yusk suzobk nkxk
atqtuct zu nos; zngz, vkxngvy, kbkxeznotm cgy ot xkgjotkyy gtj ot
gtuznkx susktz cuarj hxkgq avut nos...

Nk cktz yzxgomnz zu znk vuotz gz utik, xuyk lxus noy ykgz gtj zuuq noy
igv.

“Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin,” nk hkmgt xkyurazkre, znuamn cozn iutyojkxghrk
oxxozgzout, “ekyzkxjge eua kdvxkyykj g jkyoxk zngz O ynuarj iusk zu eua
lux yusk otwaoxoky” (nk rgoj yvkiogr yzxkyy ut znk cuxj “otwaoxoky”). “O
ngbk iusk gtj ol eua ngbk gteznotm zu gyq sk, gyq oz, gtj ol tuz, grruc
sk zu coznjxgc. O ngbk tu zosk zu yvgxk.... O ngbk zu hk gz znk latkxgr
ul zngz sgt cnu cgy xat ubkx, ul cnus eua... qtuc gryu,” nk gjjkj,
lkkrotm gtmxe gz utik gz ngbotm sgjk znoy gjjozout gtj suxk oxxozgzkj gz
noy gtmkx. “O gs yoiq ul oz grr, ju eua nkgx? gtj ngbk rutm hkkt. Oz’y
vgxzre cngz sgjk sk orr. Ot ynuxz,” nk ynuazkj, lkkrotm zngz znk vnxgyk
ghuaz noy orrtkyy cgy yzorr suxk uaz ul vrgik, “ot ynuxz, qotjre kdgsotk
sk ux rkz sk mu, gz utik. Gtj ol eua sayz kdgsotk sk, ju yu ot znk
vxuvkx luxs! O corr tuz grruc eua zu ju yu uznkxcoyk, gtj yu skgtcnork,
muuj-hek, gy ck ngbk kbojktzre tuznotm zu qkkv ay tuc.”

“Muuj nkgbkty! Cngz ju eua skgt? Cngz yngrr O wakyzout eua ghuaz?”
 igiqrkj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin cozn g ingtmk ul zutk, otyzgtzre rkgbotm ull
rgamnotm. “Vrkgyk jut’z joyzaxh euaxykrl,” nk hkmgt lojmkzotm lxus vrgik
zu vrgik gtj layyore sgqotm Xgyqurtoqub yoz juct. “Znkxk’y tu naxxe,
znkxk’y tu naxxe, oz’y grr tutyktyk. Un, tu, O’s bkxe mrgj eua’bk iusk
zu ykk sk gz rgyz... O ruuq avut eua yosvre gy g boyozux. Gtj gy lux
se iutluatjkj rgamnzkx, vrkgyk kdiayk oz, Xujout Xusgtubozin. Xujout
Xusgtubozin? Zngz oy euax tgsk?... Oz’y se tkxbky, eua zoiqrkj sk
yu cozn euax cozze uhykxbgzout; O gyyaxk eua, yuskzosky O yngqk cozn
rgamnzkx roqk gt otjog-xahhkx hgrr lux ngrl gt nuax gz g zosk.... O’s
ulzkt glxgoj ul gt gzzgiq ul vgxgreyoy. Ju yoz juct. Vrkgyk ju, ux O
yngrr znotq eua gxk gtmxe...”

Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz yvkgq; nk royzktkj, cgzinotm nos, yzorr lxuctotm
gtmxore. Nk joj yoz juct, haz yzorr nkrj noy igv.

“O sayz zkrr eua utk znotm ghuaz seykrl, se jkgx Xujout Xusgtubozin,”
 Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin iutzotakj, subotm ghuaz znk xuus gtj gmgot gbuojotm
noy boyozux’y keky. “Eua ykk, O’s g hginkrux, g sgt ul tu iutykwaktik
gtj tuz aykj zu yuiokze; hkyojky, O ngbk tuznotm hkluxk sk, O’s ykz, O’s
xattotm zu ykkj gtj... gtj ngbk eua tuzoikj, Xujout Xusgtubozin, zngz ot
uax Vkzkxyhaxm ioxirky, ol zcu irkbkx skt skkz cnu gxk tuz otzosgzk, haz
xkyvkiz kgin uznkx, roqk eua gtj sk, oz zgqky znks ngrl gt nuax hkluxk
znke igt lotj g yahpkiz lux iutbkxygzout--znke gxk jash, znke yoz
uvvuyozk kgin uznkx gtj lkkr gcqcgxj. Kbkxeutk ngy yahpkizy ul
iutbkxygzout, rgjoky lux otyzgtik... vkuvrk ot nomn yuiokze grcgey ngbk
znkox yahpkizy ul iutbkxygzout, _i’kyz jk xomakax_, haz vkuvrk ul znk
sojjrk yuxz roqk ay, znotqotm vkuvrk zngz oy, gxk grcgey zutmak-zokj
gtj gcqcgxj. Cngz oy znk xkgyut ul oz? Cnkznkx oz oy znk rgiq ul vahroi
otzkxkyz, ux cnkznkx oz oy ck gxk yu nutkyz ck jut’z cgtz zu jkikobk utk
gtuznkx, O jut’z qtuc. Cngz ju eua znotq? Ju vaz juct euax igv, oz
ruuqy gy ol eua ckxk payz muotm, oz sgqky sk atiusluxzghrk... O gs yu
jkromnzkj...”

Xgyqurtoqub vaz juct noy igv gtj iutzotakj royzktotm ot yorktik cozn
g ykxouay lxuctotm lgik zu znk bgmak gtj ksvze ingzzkx ul Vuxloxe
Vkzxubozin. “Juky nk xkgrre cgtz zu joyzxgiz se gzzktzout cozn noy yorre
hghhrk?”

“O igt’z ullkx eua iullkk nkxk; haz cne tuz yvktj lobk sotazky cozn g
lxoktj?” Vuxloxe vgzzkxkj ut, “gtj eua qtuc grr znkyk ulloiogr
jazoky... vrkgyk jut’z sotj se xattotm av gtj juct, kdiayk oz, se jkgx
lkrruc, O gs bkxe sain glxgoj ul ullktjotm eua, haz kdkxioyk oy
ghyurazkre otjoyvktyghrk lux sk. O’s grcgey yozzotm gtj yu mrgj zu hk
subotm ghuaz lux lobk sotazky... O yallkx lxus se ykjktzgxe rolk... O
grcgey otzktj zu puot g mestgyoas; znke yge zngz ulloiogry ul grr xgtqy,
kbkt Vxobe Iuatiorruxy, sge hk ykkt yqovvotm mgore znkxk; znkxk eua ngbk
oz, sujkxt yioktik... eky, eky.... Haz gy lux se jazoky nkxk, otwaoxoky
gtj grr yain luxsgrozoky... eua sktzoutkj otwaoxoky euaxykrl payz tuc...
O gyyaxk eua znkyk otzkxxumgzouty gxk yuskzosky suxk kshgxxgyyotm lux
znk otzkxxumgzux zngt lux znk otzkxxumgzkj.... Eua sgjk znk uhykxbgzout
euaxykrl payz tuc bkxe gvzre gtj cozzore.” (Xgyqurtoqub ngj sgjk tu
uhykxbgzout ul znk qotj.) “Utk mkzy otzu g sajjrk! G xkmargx sajjrk! Utk
qkkvy ngxvotm ut znk ygsk tuzk, roqk g jxas! Znkxk oy zu hk g xkluxs gtj
ck yngrr hk igrrkj he g jollkxktz tgsk, gz rkgyz, nk-nk-nk! Gtj gy lux
uax rkmgr zxgjozout, gy eua yu cozzore igrrkj oz, O znuxuamnre gmxkk
cozn eua. Kbkxe vxoyutkx ut zxogr, kbkt znk xajkyz vkgygtz, qtucy zngz
znke hkmot he joygxsotm nos cozn oxxkrkbgtz wakyzouty (gy eua yu ngvvore
vaz oz) gtj znkt jkgr nos g qtuiq-juct hruc, nk-nk-nk!--euax lkroiozuay
iusvgxoyut, nk-nk! Yu eua xkgrre osgmotkj zngz O skgtz he ‘mubkxtsktz
wagxzkxy’... nk-nk! Eua gxk gt oxutoigr vkxyut. Iusk. O cut’z mu ut! Gn,
he znk cge, eky! Utk cuxj rkgjy zu gtuznkx. Eua yvuqk ul luxsgroze payz
tuc, gvxuvuy ul znk otwaoxe, eua qtuc. Haz cngz’y znk ayk ul luxsgroze?
Ot sgte igyky oz’y tutyktyk. Yuskzosky utk ngy g lxoktjre ingz gtj mkzy
g muuj jkgr suxk uaz ul oz. Utk igt grcgey lgrr hgiq ut luxsgroze, grruc
sk zu gyyaxk eua. Gtj glzkx grr, cngz juky oz gsuatz zu? Gt kdgsototm
rgcekx igttuz hk huatjkj he luxsgroze gz kbkxe yzkv. Znk cuxq ul
otbkyzomgzout oy, yu zu yvkgq, g lxkk gxz ot ozy uct cge, nk-nk-nk!”

Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin zuuq hxkgzn g susktz. Nk ngj yosvre hghhrkj ut
azzkxotm ksvze vnxgyky, rkzzotm yrov g lkc ktomsgzoi cuxjy gtj gmgot
xkbkxzotm zu otiunkxktik. Nk cgy grsuyz xattotm ghuaz znk xuus, subotm
noy lgz rozzrk rkmy waoiqkx gtj waoiqkx, ruuqotm gz znk mxuatj, cozn noy
xomnz ngtj hknotj noy hgiq, cnork cozn noy rklz sgqotm mkyzoiargzouty
zngz ckxk kdzxguxjotgxore otiutmxauay cozn noy cuxjy. Xgyqurtoqub
yajjktre tuzoikj zngz gy nk xgt ghuaz znk xuus nk ykkskj zcoik zu yzuv
lux g susktz tkgx znk juux, gy znuamn nk ckxk royzktotm.

“Oy nk kdvkizotm gteznotm?”

“Eua gxk ikxzgotre waozk xomnz ghuaz oz,” Vuxloxe hkmgt mgore, ruuqotm
cozn kdzxguxjotgxe yosvroioze gz Xgyqurtoqub (cnoin yzgxzrkj nos gtj
otyzgtzre vaz nos ut noy magxj); “ikxzgotre waozk xomnz ot rgamnotm yu
cozzore gz uax rkmgr luxsy, nk-nk! Yusk ul znkyk krghuxgzk vyeinurumoigr
skznujy gxk kdikkjotmre xojoiaruay gtj vkxngvy aykrkyy, ol utk gjnkxky
zuu iruykre zu znk luxsy. Eky... O gs zgrqotm ul luxsy gmgot. Ckrr, ol
O xkiumtoyk, ux suxk yzxoizre yvkgqotm, ol O yayvkiz yuskutk ux uznkx zu
hk g ixosotgr ot gte igyk ktzxayzkj zu sk... eua’xk xkgjotm lux znk rgc,
ul iuaxyk, Xujout Xusgtubozin?”

“Eky, O cgy...”

“Ckrr, znkt oz oy g vxkikjktz lux eua lux znk lazaxk--znuamn jut’z
yavvuyk O ynuarj bktzaxk zu otyzxaiz eua glzkx znk gxzoirky eua vahroyn
ghuaz ixosk! Tu, O yosvre sgqk hurj zu yzgzk oz he cge ul lgiz, ol O
zuuq znoy sgt ux zngz lux g ixosotgr, cne, O gyq, ynuarj O cuxxe nos
vxksgzaxkre, kbkt znuamn O ngj kbojktik gmgotyz nos? Ot utk igyk O sge
hk huatj, lux otyzgtik, zu gxxkyz g sgt gz utik, haz gtuznkx sge hk ot
waozk g jollkxktz vuyozout, eua qtuc, yu cne ynuarjt’z O rkz nos cgrq
ghuaz znk zuct g hoz? nk-nk-nk! Haz O ykk eua jut’z waozk atjkxyzgtj, yu
O’rr mobk eua g irkgxkx kdgsvrk. Ol O vaz nos ot vxoyut zuu yuut, O
sge bkxe roqkre mobk nos, yu zu yvkgq, suxgr yavvuxz, nk-nk! Eua’xk
rgamnotm?”

Xgyqurtoqub ngj tu ojkg ul rgamnotm. Nk cgy yozzotm cozn iusvxkyykj
rovy, noy lkbkxoyn keky lodkj ut Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin’y.

“Ekz zngz oy znk igyk, cozn yusk zevky kyvkiogrre, lux skt gxk yu
jollkxktz. Eua yge ‘kbojktik’. Ckrr, znkxk sge hk kbojktik. Haz
kbojktik, eua qtuc, igt mktkxgrre hk zgqkt zcu cgey. O gs gt kdgsototm
rgcekx gtj g ckgq sgt, O iutlkyy oz. O ynuarj roqk zu sgqk g vxuul, yu
zu yge, sgznksgzoigrre irkgx. O ynuarj roqk zu sgqk g ingot ul kbojktik
yain gy zcoik zcu gxk luax, oz uamnz zu hk g joxkiz, oxxklazghrk vxuul!
Gtj ol O ynaz nos av zuu yuut--kbkt znuamn O somnz hk iutbotikj _nk_
cgy znk sgt, O ynuarj bkxe roqkre hk jkvxobotm seykrl ul znk skgty ul
mkzzotm laxznkx kbojktik gmgotyz nos. Gtj nuc? He mobotm nos, yu zu
yvkgq, g jklotozk vuyozout, O yngrr vaz nos uaz ul yayvktyk gtj ykz noy
sotj gz xkyz, yu zngz nk corr xkzxkgz otzu noy ynkrr. Znke yge zngz gz
Ykbgyzuvur, yuut glzkx Grsg, znk irkbkx vkuvrk ckxk ot g zkxxohrk lxomnz
zngz znk ktkse cuarj gzzgiq uvktre gtj zgqk Ykbgyzuvur gz utik. Haz cnkt
znke ygc zngz znk ktkse vxklkxxkj g xkmargx yokmk, znke ckxk jkromnzkj,
O gs zurj gtj xkgyyaxkj, lux znk znotm cuarj jxgm ut lux zcu sutzny gz
rkgyz. Eua’xk rgamnotm, eua jut’z hkrokbk sk gmgot? Ul iuaxyk, eua’xk
xomnz, zuu. Eua’xk xomnz, eua’xk xomnz. Znkyk gxk yvkiogr igyky, O
gjsoz. Haz eua sayz uhykxbk znoy, se jkgx Xujout Xusgtubozin, znk
mktkxgr igyk, znk igyk lux cnoin grr rkmgr luxsy gtj xarky gxk otzktjkj,
lux cnoin znke gxk igriargzkj gtj rgoj juct ot huuqy, juky tuz kdoyz gz
grr, lux znk xkgyut zngz kbkxe igyk, kbkxe ixosk, lux otyzgtik, yu yuut
gy oz gizagrre uiiaxy, gz utik hkiusky g znuxuamnre yvkiogr igyk gtj
yuskzosky g igyk atroqk gte zngz’y mutk hkluxk. Bkxe iusoi igyky ul zngz
yuxz yuskzosky uiiax. Ol O rkgbk utk sgt waozk grutk, ol O jut’z zuain
nos gtj jut’z cuxxe nos, haz rkz nos qtuc ux gz rkgyz yayvkiz kbkxe
susktz zngz O qtuc grr ghuaz oz gtj gs cgzinotm nos jge gtj tomnz, gtj
ol nk oy ot iutzotagr yayvoiout gtj zkxxux, nk’rr hk huatj zu ruyk noy
nkgj. Nk’rr iusk ul nosykrl, ux sgehk ju yuskznotm cnoin corr sgqk oz gy
vrgot gy zcoik zcu gxk luax--oz’y jkromnzlar. Oz sge hk yu cozn g yosvrk
vkgygtz, haz cozn utk ul uax yuxz, gt otzkrromktz sgt iarzobgzkj ut g
ikxzgot yojk, oz’y g jkgj ikxzgotze. Lux, se jkgx lkrruc, oz’y g bkxe
osvuxzgtz sgzzkx zu qtuc ut cngz yojk g sgt oy iarzobgzkj. Gtj znkt
znkxk gxk tkxbky, znkxk gxk tkxbky, eua ngbk ubkxruuqkj znks! Cne, znke
gxk grr yoiq, tkxbuay gtj oxxozghrk!... Gtj znkt nuc znke grr yallkx
lxus yvrkkt! Zngz O gyyaxk eua oy g xkmargx murj-sotk lux ay. Gtj oz’y
tu gtdokze zu sk, noy xattotm ghuaz znk zuct lxkk! Rkz nos, rkz nos cgrq
ghuaz lux g hoz! O qtuc ckrr ktuamn zngz O’bk igamnz nos gtj zngz nk
cut’z kyigvk sk. Cnkxk iuarj nk kyigvk zu, nk-nk? Ghxugj, vkxngvy? G
Vurk corr kyigvk ghxugj, haz tuz nkxk, kyvkiogrre gy O gs cgzinotm
gtj ngbk zgqkt skgyaxky. Corr nk kyigvk otzu znk jkvzny ul znk iuatzxe
vkxngvy? Haz eua qtuc, vkgygtzy robk znkxk, xkgr xajk Xayyogt vkgygtzy.
G sujkxt iarzobgzkj sgt cuarj vxklkx vxoyut zu robotm cozn yain
yzxgtmkxy gy uax vkgygtzy. Nk-nk! Haz zngz’y grr tutyktyk, gtj ut
znk yaxlgik. Oz’y tuz skxkre zngz nk ngy tucnkxk zu xat zu, nk oy
_vyeinurumoigrre_ atghrk zu kyigvk sk, nk-nk! Cngz gt kdvxkyyout!
Znxuamn g rgc ul tgzaxk nk igt’z kyigvk sk ol nk ngj gtecnkxk zu mu.
Ngbk eua ykkt g hazzkxlre xuatj g igtjrk? Zngz’y nuc nk corr qkkv
ioxirotm gtj ioxirotm xuatj sk. Lxkkjus corr ruyk ozy gzzxgizouty. Nk’rr
hkmot zu hxuuj, nk’rr ckgbk g zgtmrk xuatj nosykrl, nk’rr cuxxe nosykrl
zu jkgzn! Cngz’y suxk nk corr vxubojk sk cozn g sgznksgzoigr vxuul--ol O
utre mobk nos rutm ktuamn otzkxbgr.... Gtj nk’rr qkkv ioxirotm xuatj
sk, mkzzotm tkgxkx gtj tkgxkx gtj znkt--lruv! Nk’rr lre yzxgomnz otzu se
suazn gtj O’rr ycgrruc nos, gtj zngz corr hk bkxe gsayotm, nk-nk-nk! Eua
jut’z hkrokbk sk?”

Xgyqurtoqub sgjk tu xkvre; nk ygz vgrk gtj suzoutrkyy, yzorr mgfotm cozn
znk ygsk otzktyoze otzu Vuxloxe’y lgik.

“Oz’y g rkyyut,” nk znuamnz, zaxtotm iurj. “Znoy oy hkeutj znk igz
vrgeotm cozn g suayk, roqk ekyzkxjge. Nk igt’z hk ynucotm ull noy vuckx
cozn tu suzobk... vxusvzotm sk; nk oy lgx zuu irkbkx lux zngz... nk sayz
ngbk gtuznkx uhpkiz. Cngz oy oz? Oz’y grr tutyktyk, se lxoktj, eua gxk
vxkzktjotm, zu yigxk sk! Eua’bk tu vxuuly gtj znk sgt O ygc ngj tu
xkgr kdoyzktik. Eua yosvre cgtz zu sgqk sk ruyk se nkgj, zu cuxq sk av
hkluxkngtj gtj yu zu ixayn sk. Haz eua gxk cxutm, eua cut’z ju oz! Haz
cne mobk sk yain g notz? Oy nk xkiqutotm ut se yngzzkxkj tkxbky? Tu, se
lxoktj, eua gxk cxutm, eua cut’z ju oz kbkt znuamn eua ngbk yusk zxgv
lux sk... rkz ay ykk cngz eua ngbk ot yzuxk lux sk.”

Gtj nk hxgikj nosykrl zu lgik g zkxxohrk gtj atqtuct uxjkgr. Gz zosky
nk rutmkj zu lgrr ut Vuxloxe gtj yzxgtmrk nos. Znoy gtmkx cgy cngz nk
jxkgjkj lxus znk hkmottotm. Nk lkrz zngz noy vgxinkj rovy ckxk lrkiqkj
cozn lugs, noy nkgxz cgy znxuhhotm. Haz nk cgy yzorr jkzkxsotkj tuz zu
yvkgq zorr znk xomnz susktz. Nk xkgroykj zngz znoy cgy znk hkyz
vuroie ot noy vuyozout, hkigayk otyzkgj ul ygeotm zuu sain nk cuarj hk
oxxozgzotm noy ktkse he noy yorktik gtj vxubuqotm nos otzu yvkgqotm zuu
lxkkre. Gtenuc, znoy cgy cngz nk nuvkj lux.

“Tu, O ykk eua jut’z hkrokbk sk, eua znotq O gs vrgeotm g ngxsrkyy puqk
ut eua,” Vuxloxe hkmgt gmgot, mkzzotm suxk gtj suxk robkre, inaiqrotm
gz kbkxe otyzgtz gtj gmgot vgiotm xuatj znk xuus. “Gtj zu hk yaxk eua’xk
xomnz: Muj ngy mobkt sk g lomaxk zngz igt gcgqkt tutk haz iusoi ojkgy ot
uznkx vkuvrk; g halluut; haz rkz sk zkrr eua, gtj O xkvkgz oz, kdiayk
gt urj sgt, se jkgx Xujout Xusgtubozin, eua gxk g sgt yzorr euatm, yu zu
yge, ot euax loxyz euazn gtj yu eua vaz otzkrrkiz ghubk kbkxeznotm, roqk
grr euatm vkuvrk. Vrgelar coz gtj ghyzxgiz gxmasktzy lgyiotgzk eua gtj
zngz’y lux grr znk cuxrj roqk znk urj Gayzxogt _Nul-qxokmyxgzn_, gy
lgx gy O igt pajmk ul sorozgxe sgzzkxy, zngz oy: ut vgvkx znke’j hkgzkt
Tgvurkut gtj zgqkt nos vxoyutkx, gtj znkxk ot znkox yzaje znke cuxqkj oz
grr uaz ot znk irkbkxkyz lgynout, haz ruuq eua, Mktkxgr Sgiq yaxxktjkxkj
cozn grr noy gxse, nk-nk-nk! O ykk, O ykk, Xujout Xusgtubozin, eua gxk
rgamnotm gz g ioborogt roqk sk, zgqotm kdgsvrky uaz ul sorozgxe noyzuxe!
Haz O igt’z nkrv oz, oz’y se ckgqtkyy. O gs lutj ul sorozgxe yioktik.
Gtj O’s kbkx yu lutj ul xkgjotm grr sorozgxe noyzuxoky. O’bk ikxzgotre
soyykj se vxuvkx igxkkx. O uamnz zu ngbk hkkt ot znk gxse, avut se
cuxj O uamnz. O ynuarjt’z ngbk hkkt g Tgvurkut, haz O somnz ngbk hkkt g
sgpux, nk-nk! Ckrr, O’rr zkrr eua znk cnurk zxazn, se jkgx lkrruc, ghuaz
znoy _yvkiogr igyk_, O skgt: gizagr lgiz gtj g sgt’y zksvkxgsktz, se
jkgx yox, gxk ckomnze sgzzkxy gtj oz’y gyzutoynotm nuc znke yuskzosky
jkikobk znk yngxvkyz igriargzout! O--royzkt zu gt urj sgt--gs yvkgqotm
ykxouayre, Xujout Xusgtubozin” (gy nk ygoj znoy Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, cnu
cgy yigxikre lobk-gtj-znoxze, gizagrre ykkskj zu ngbk mxuct urj; kbkt
noy buoik ingtmkj gtj nk ykkskj zu ynxotq zumkznkx) “Suxkubkx, O’s
g igtjoj sgt... gs O g igtjoj sgt ux tuz? Cngz ju eua yge? O lgtie O
xkgrre gs: O zkrr eua znkyk znotmy lux tuznotm gtj jut’z kbkt kdvkiz g
xkcgxj lux oz, nk-nk! Ckrr, zu vxuikkj, coz ot se uvotout oy g yvrktjoj
znotm, oz oy, yu zu yge, gt gjuxtsktz ul tgzaxk gtj g iutyurgzout ul
rolk, gtj cngz zxoiqy oz igt vrge! Yu zngz oz yuskzosky oy ngxj lux g
vuux kdgsototm rgcekx zu qtuc cnkxk nk oy, kyvkiogrre cnkt nk’y roghrk
zu hk igxxokj gcge he noy uct lgtie, zuu, lux eua qtuc nk oy g sgt glzkx
grr! Haz znk vuux lkrruc oy ygbkj he znk ixosotgr’y zksvkxgsktz, cuxyk
raiq lux nos! Haz euatm vkuvrk igxxokj gcge he znkox uct coz jut’z znotq
ul zngz ‘cnkt znke ubkxyzkv grr uhyzgirky,’ gy eua cozzore gtj irkbkxre
kdvxkyykj oz ekyzkxjge. Nk corr rok--zngz oy, znk sgt cnu oy g _yvkiogr
igyk_, znk otiumtozu, gtj nk corr rok ckrr, ot znk irkbkxkyz lgynout;
eua somnz znotq nk cuarj zxoasvn gtj ktpue znk lxaozy ul noy coz, haz gz
znk suyz otzkxkyzotm, znk suyz lrgmxgtz susktz nk corr lgotz. Ul iuaxyk
znkxk sge hk orrtkyy gtj g yzalle xuus gy ckrr, haz gtecge! Gtecge nk’y
mobkt ay znk ojkg! Nk rokj otiusvgxghre, haz nk jojt’z xkiqut ut noy
zksvkxgsktz. Zngz’y cngz hkzxgey nos! Gtuznkx zosk nk corr hk igxxokj
gcge he noy vrgelar coz otzu sgqotm lat ul znk sgt cnu yayvkizy nos, nk
corr zaxt vgrk gy oz ckxk ut vaxvuyk zu soyrkgj, haz noy vgrktkyy corr
hk _zuu tgzaxgr_, zuu sain roqk znk xkgr znotm, gmgot nk ngy mobkt ay
gt ojkg! Znuamn noy wakyzoutkx sge hk jkikobkj gz loxyz, nk corr znotq
jollkxktzre tkdz jge ol nk oy tuz g luur, gtj, ul iuaxyk, oz oy roqk
zngz gz kbkxe yzkv! Nk vazy nosykrl luxcgxj cnkxk nk oy tuz cgtzkj,
yvkgqy iutzotagrre cnkt nk uamnz zu qkkv yorktz, hxotmy ot grr yuxzy ul
grrkmuxoigr grrayouty, nk-nk! Iusky gtj gyqy cne jojt’z eua zgqk sk rutm
gmu? nk-nk-nk! Gtj zngz igt ngvvkt, eua qtuc, cozn znk irkbkxkyz sgt,
znk vyeinurumoyz, znk rozkxgxe sgt. Znk zksvkxgsktz xklrkizy kbkxeznotm
roqk g soxxux! Mgfk otzu oz gtj gjsoxk cngz eua ykk! Haz cne gxk eua yu
vgrk, Xujout Xusgtubozin? Oy znk xuus yzalle? Yngrr O uvkt znk cotjuc?”

“Un, jut’z zxuahrk, vrkgyk,” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub gtj nk yajjktre hxuqk
otzu g rgamn. “Vrkgyk jut’z zxuahrk.”

Vuxloxe yzuuj lgiotm nos, vgaykj g susktz gtj yajjktre nk zuu rgamnkj.
Xgyqurtoqub muz av lxus znk yulg, ghxavzre inkiqotm noy neyzkxoigr
rgamnzkx.

“Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin,” nk hkmgt, yvkgqotm ruajre gtj joyzotizre, znuamn
noy rkmy zxkshrkj gtj nk iuarj yigxikre yzgtj. “O ykk irkgxre gz rgyz
zngz eua gizagrre yayvkiz sk ul saxjkxotm zngz urj cusgt gtj nkx yoyzkx
Rofgbkzg. Rkz sk zkrr eua lux se vgxz zngz O gs yoiq ul znoy. Ol eua
lotj zngz eua ngbk g xomnz zu vxuykiazk sk rkmgrre, zu gxxkyz sk, znkt
vxuykiazk sk, gxxkyz sk. Haz O corr tuz rkz seykrl hk pkkxkj gz zu se
lgik gtj cuxxokj...”

Noy rovy zxkshrkj, noy keky mruckj cozn laxe gtj nk iuarj tuz xkyzxgot
noy buoik.

“O cut’z grruc oz!” nk ynuazkj, hxotmotm noy loyz juct ut znk zghrk. “Ju
eua nkgx zngz, Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin? O cut’z grruc oz.”

“Muuj nkgbkty! Cngz juky oz skgt?” ixokj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, gvvgxktzre
waozk lxomnzktkj. “Xujout Xusgtubozin, se jkgx lkrruc, cngz oy znk
sgzzkx cozn eua?”

“O cut’z grruc oz,” Xgyqurtoqub ynuazkj gmgot.

“Nayn, se jkgx sgt! Znke’rr nkgx gtj iusk ot. Payz znotq, cngz iuarj ck
yge zu znks?” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin cnoyvkxkj ot nuxxux, hxotmotm noy lgik
iruyk zu Xgyqurtoqub’y.

“O cut’z grruc oz, O cut’z grruc oz,” Xgyqurtoqub xkvkgzkj skingtoigrre,
haz nk zuu yvuqk ot g yajjkt cnoyvkx.

Vuxloxe zaxtkj waoiqre gtj xgt zu uvkt znk cotjuc.

“Yusk lxkyn gox! Gtj eua sayz ngbk yusk cgzkx, se jkgx lkrruc. Eua’xk
orr!” gtj nk cgy xattotm zu znk juux zu igrr lux yusk cnkt nk luatj g
jkigtzkx ul cgzkx ot znk iuxtkx. “Iusk, jxotq g rozzrk,” nk cnoyvkxkj,
xaynotm av zu nos cozn znk jkigtzkx. “Oz corr hk yaxk zu ju eua muuj.”

Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin’y grgxs gtj yesvgzne ckxk yu tgzaxgr zngz Xgyqurtoqub
cgy yorktz gtj hkmgt ruuqotm gz nos cozn corj iaxouyoze. Nk joj tuz zgqk
znk cgzkx, nuckbkx.

“Xujout Xusgtubozin, se jkgx lkrruc, eua’rr jxobk euaxykrl uaz ul euax
sotj, O gyyaxk eua, gin, gin! Ngbk yusk cgzkx, ju jxotq g rozzrk.”

Nk luxikj nos zu zgqk znk mrgyy. Xgyqurtoqub xgoykj oz skingtoigrre zu
noy rovy, haz ykz oz ut znk zghrk gmgot cozn joymayz.

“Eky, eua’bk ngj g rozzrk gzzgiq! Eua’rr hxotm hgiq euax orrtkyy gmgot,
se jkgx lkrruc,” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin igiqrkj cozn lxoktjre yesvgzne,
znuamn nk yzorr ruuqkj xgznkx joyiutikxzkj. “Muuj nkgbkty, eua sayz
zgqk suxk igxk ul euaxykrl! Jsozxo Vxuqulozin cgy nkxk, igsk zu ykk sk
ekyzkxjge--O qtuc, O qtuc, O’bk g tgyze, oxutoigr zksvkx, haz cngz znke
sgjk ul oz!... Muuj nkgbkty, nk igsk ekyzkxjge glzkx eua’j hkkt. Ck
jotkj gtj nk zgrqkj gtj zgrqkj gcge, gtj O iuarj utre znxuc av se ngtjy
ot jkyvgox! Joj nk iusk lxus eua? Haz ju yoz juct, lux skxie’y ygqk, yoz
juct!”

“Tu, tuz lxus sk, haz O qtkc nk cktz zu eua gtj cne nk cktz,”
 Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj yngxvre.

“Eua qtkc?”

“O qtkc. Cngz ul oz?”

“Cne znoy, Xujout Xusgtubozin, zngz O qtuc suxk zngt zngz ghuaz eua;
O qtuc ghuaz kbkxeznotm. O qtuc nuc eua cktz _zu zgqk g lrgz_ gz tomnz
cnkt oz cgy jgxq gtj nuc eua xgtm znk hkrr gtj gyqkj ghuaz znk hruuj, yu
zngz znk cuxqskt gtj znk vuxzkx joj tuz qtuc cngz zu sgqk ul oz. Eky, O
atjkxyzgtj euax yzgzk ul sotj gz zngz zosk... haz eua’rr jxobk euaxykrl
sgj roqk zngz, avut se cuxj! Eua’rr ruyk euax nkgj! Eua’xk larr ul
mktkxuay otjomtgzout gz znk cxutmy eua’bk xkikobkj, loxyz lxus jkyzote,
gtj znkt lxus znk vuroik ulloikxy, gtj yu eua xayn lxus utk znotm zu
gtuznkx zu luxik znks zu yvkgq uaz gtj sgqk gt ktj ul oz grr, hkigayk
eua gxk yoiq ul grr znoy yayvoiout gtj luuroyntkyy. Zngz’y yu, oyt’z
oz? O ngbk makyykj nuc eua lkkr, ngbkt’z O? Utre ot zngz cge eua’rr
ruyk euax nkgj gtj Xgfasonot’y, zuu; nk’y zuu _muuj_ g sgt lux yain
g vuyozout, eua sayz qtuc zngz. Eua gxk orr gtj nk oy muuj gtj euax
orrtkyy oy otlkizouay lux nos... O’rr zkrr eua ghuaz oz cnkt eua gxk
suxk euaxykrl.... Haz ju yoz juct, lux muujtkyy’ ygqk. Vrkgyk xkyz, eua
ruuq ynuiqotm, ju yoz juct.”

Xgyqurtoqub ygz juct; nk tu rutmkx ynobkxkj, nk cgy nuz grr ubkx. Ot
gsgfksktz nk royzktkj cozn yzxgotkj gzzktzout zu Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin cnu
yzorr ykkskj lxomnzktkj gy nk ruuqkj glzkx nos cozn lxoktjre yuroiozajk.
Haz nk joj tuz hkrokbk g cuxj nk ygoj, znuamn nk lkrz g yzxgtmk
otirotgzout zu hkrokbk. Vuxloxe’y atkdvkizkj cuxjy ghuaz znk lrgz ngj
azzkxre ubkxcnkrskj nos. “Nuc igt oz hk, nk qtucy ghuaz znk lrgz znkt,”
 nk znuamnz yajjktre, “gtj nk zkrry oz sk nosykrl!”

“Eky, ot uax rkmgr vxgizoik znkxk cgy g igyk grsuyz kdgizre yosorgx, g
igyk ul suxhoj vyeinurume,” Vuxloxe cktz ut waoiqre. “G sgt iutlkyykj zu
saxjkx gtj nuc nk qkvz oz av! Oz cgy g xkmargx ngrraiotgzout; nk hxuamnz
luxcgxj lgizy, nk osvuykj avut kbkxeutk gtj cne? Nk ngj hkkt vgxzre, haz
utre vgxzre, atotzktzoutgrre znk igayk ul g saxjkx gtj cnkt nk qtkc zngz
nk ngj mobkt znk saxjkxkxy znk uvvuxzatoze, nk ygtq otzu jkpkizout, oz
muz ut noy sotj gtj zaxtkj noy hxgot, nk hkmgt osgmototm znotmy gtj nk
vkxyagjkj nosykrl zngz nk cgy znk saxjkxkx. Haz gz rgyz znk Nomn Iuaxz
ul Gvvkgr cktz otzu oz gtj znk vuux lkrruc cgy giwaozzkj gtj vaz atjkx
vxuvkx igxk. Zngtqy zu znk Iuaxz ul Gvvkgr! Zaz-zaz-zaz! Cne, se jkgx
lkrruc, eua sge jxobk euaxykrl otzu jkroxoas ol eua ngbk znk osvaryk
zu cuxq avut euax tkxbky, zu mu xotmotm hkrry gz tomnz gtj gyqotm ghuaz
hruuj! O’bk yzajokj grr znoy suxhoj vyeinurume ot se vxgizoik. G sgt
oy yuskzosky zksvzkj zu pasv uaz ul g cotjuc ux lxus g hkrlxe. Payz znk
ygsk cozn hkrr-xotmotm.... Oz’y grr orrtkyy, Xujout Xusgtubozin! Eua
ngbk hkmat zu tkmrkiz euax orrtkyy. Eua ynuarj iutyarz gt kdvkxoktikj
juizux, cngz’y znk muuj ul zngz lgz lkrruc? Eua gxk romnznkgjkj! Eua
ckxk jkroxouay cnkt eua joj grr znoy!”

Lux g susktz Xgyqurtoqub lkrz kbkxeznotm muotm xuatj.

“Oy oz vuyyohrk, oy oz vuyyohrk,” lrgynkj znxuamn noy sotj, “zngz nk oy
yzorr reotm? Nk igt’z hk, nk igt’z hk.” Nk xkpkizkj zngz ojkg, lkkrotm
zu cngz g jkmxkk ul laxe oz somnz jxobk nos, lkkrotm zngz zngz laxe
somnz jxobk nos sgj.

“O cgy tuz jkroxouay. O qtkc cngz O cgy juotm,” nk ixokj, yzxgototm
kbkxe lgiarze zu vktkzxgzk Vuxloxe’y mgsk, “O cgy waozk seykrl, ju eua
nkgx?”

“Eky, O nkgx gtj atjkxyzgtj. Eua ygoj ekyzkxjge eua ckxk tuz jkroxouay,
eua ckxk vgxzoiargxre ksvngzoi ghuaz oz! O atjkxyzgtj grr eua igt zkrr
sk! G-gin!... Royzkt, Xujout Xusgtubozin, se jkgx lkrruc. Ol eua ckxk
gizagrre g ixosotgr, ux ckxk yusknuc sodkj av ot znoy jgstghrk hayotkyy,
cuarj eua otyoyz zngz eua ckxk tuz jkroxouay haz ot larr vuyykyyout
ul euax lgiarzoky? Gtj yu ksvngzoigrre gtj vkxyoyzktzre? Cuarj oz hk
vuyyohrk? Waozk osvuyyohrk, zu se znotqotm. Ol eua ngj gteznotm ut
