euax iutyioktik, eua ikxzgotre uamnz zu otyoyz zngz eua ckxk jkroxouay.
Zngz’y yu, oyt’z oz?”

Znkxk cgy g tuzk ul yretkyy ot znoy otwaoxe. Xgyqurtoqub jxkc hgiq ut
znk yulg gy Vuxloxe hktz ubkx nos gtj yzgxkj ot yorktz vkxvrkdoze gz
nos.

“Gtuznkx znotm ghuaz Xgfasonot--eua ikxzgotre uamnz zu ngbk ygoj zngz nk
igsk ul noy uct giiuxj, zu ngbk iutikgrkj euax vgxz ot oz! Haz eua jut’z
iutikgr oz! Eua rge yzxkyy ut noy iusotm gz euax otyzomgzout.”

Xgyqurtoqub ngj tuz jutk yu. G inorr cktz juct noy hgiq.

“Eua qkkv zkrrotm roky,” nk ygoj yrucre gtj ckgqre, zcoyzotm noy rovy
otzu g yoiqre ysork, “eua gxk zxeotm gmgot zu ynuc zngz eua qtuc grr
se mgsk, zngz eua qtuc grr O yngrr yge hkluxkngtj,” nk ygoj, iutyiouay
nosykrl zngz nk cgy tuz ckomnotm noy cuxjy gy nk uamnz. “Eua cgtz zu
lxomnzkt sk... ux eua gxk yosvre rgamnotm gz sk...”

Nk yzorr yzgxkj gz nos gy nk ygoj znoy gtj gmgot znkxk cgy g romnz ul
otzktyk ngzxkj ot noy keky.

“Eua qkkv reotm,” nk ygoj. “Eua qtuc vkxlkizre ckrr zngz znk hkyz
vuroie lux znk ixosotgr oy zu zkrr znk zxazn gy tkgxre gy vuyyohrk... zu
iutikgr gy rozzrk gy vuyyohrk. O jut’z hkrokbk eua!”

“Cngz g core vkxyut eua gxk!” Vuxloxe zozzkxkj, “znkxk’y tu igzinotm
eua; eua’bk g vkxlkiz sutusgtog. Yu eua jut’z hkrokbk sk? Haz yzorr eua
ju hkrokbk sk, eua hkrokbk g wagxzkx; O’rr yuut sgqk eua hkrokbk znk
cnurk, hkigayk O ngbk g yotikxk roqotm lux eua gtj mktaotkre coyn eua
muuj.”

Xgyqurtoqub’y rovy zxkshrkj.

“Eky, O ju,” cktz ut Vuxloxe, zuainotm Xgyqurtoqub’y gxs mktogrre, “eua
sayz zgqk igxk ul euax orrtkyy. Hkyojky, euax suznkx gtj yoyzkx gxk nkxk
tuc; eua sayz znotq ul znks. Eua sayz yuuznk gtj iusluxz znks gtj eua ju
tuznotm haz lxomnzkt znks...”

“Cngz ngy zngz zu ju cozn eua? Nuc ju eua qtuc oz? Cngz iutikxt oy oz ul
euaxy? Eua gxk qkkvotm cgzin ut sk gtj cgtz zu rkz sk qtuc oz?”

“Muuj nkgbkty! Cne, O rkgxtz oz grr lxus eua euaxykrl! Eua jut’z
tuzoik zngz ot euax kdiozksktz eua zkrr sk gtj uznkxy kbkxeznotm. Lxus
Xgfasonot, zuu, O rkgxtz g tashkx ul otzkxkyzotm jkzgory ekyzkxjge. Tu,
eua otzkxxavzkj sk, haz O sayz zkrr eua zngz, lux grr euax coz, euax
yayvoiouaytkyy sgqky eua ruyk znk iussut-yktyk bokc ul znotmy. Zu xkzaxt
zu hkrr-xotmotm, lux otyzgtik. O, gt kdgsototm rgcekx, ngbk hkzxgekj g
vxkiouay znotm roqk zngz, g xkgr lgiz (lux oz oy g lgiz cuxzn ngbotm),
gtj eua ykk tuznotm ot oz! Cne, ol O ngj znk yromnzkyz yayvoiout ul eua,
ynuarj O ngbk gizkj roqk zngz? Tu, O ynuarj loxyz ngbk joygxskj euax
yayvoiouty gtj tuz rkz eua ykk O qtkc ul zngz lgiz, ynuarj ngbk jobkxzkj
euax gzzktzout gtj yajjktre ngbk jkgrz eua g qtuiq-juct hruc (euax
kdvxkyyout) ygeotm: ‘Gtj cngz ckxk eua juotm, yox, vxge, gz zkt ux
tkgxre krkbkt gz znk saxjkxkj cusgt’y lrgz gtj cne joj eua xotm znk hkrr
gtj cne joj eua gyq ghuaz hruuj? Gtj cne joj eua otbozk znk vuxzkxy
zu mu cozn eua zu znk vuroik yzgzout, zu znk rokazktgtz?’ Zngz’y nuc
O uamnz zu ngbk gizkj ol O ngj g mxgot ul yayvoiout ul eua. O uamnz zu
ngbk zgqkt euax kbojktik ot jak luxs, ykgxinkj euax rujmotm gtj vkxngvy
ngbk gxxkyzkj eua, zuu... yu O ngbk tu yayvoiout ul eua, yotik O ngbk
tuz jutk zngz! Haz eua igt’z ruuq gz oz tuxsgrre gtj eua ykk tuznotm, O
yge gmgot.”

Xgyqurtoqub yzgxzkj yu zngz Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin iuarj tuz lgor zu
vkxikobk oz.

“Eua gxk reotm grr znk cnork,” nk ixokj, “O jut’z qtuc euax uhpkiz,
haz eua gxk reotm. Eua joj tuz yvkgq roqk zngz payz tuc gtj O igttuz hk
soyzgqkt!”

“O gs reotm?” Vuxloxe xkvkgzkj, gvvgxktzre otiktykj, haz vxkykxbotm
g muuj-nasuaxkj gtj oxutoigr lgik, gy znuamn nk ckxk tuz ot znk rkgyz
iutikxtkj gz Xgyqurtoqub’y uvotout ul nos. “O gs reotm... haz nuc joj
O zxkgz eua payz tuc, O, znk kdgsototm rgcekx? Vxusvzotm eua gtj mobotm
eua kbkxe skgty lux euax jklktik; orrtkyy, O ygoj, jkroxoas, otpaxe,
skrgtinure gtj znk vuroik ulloikxy gtj grr znk xkyz ul oz? Gn! Nk-nk-nk!
Znuamn, otjkkj, grr znuyk vyeinurumoigr skgty ul jklktik gxk tuz bkxe
xkroghrk gtj iaz huzn cgey: orrtkyy, jkroxoas, O jut’z xkskshkx--zngz’y
grr xomnz, haz cne, se muuj yox, ot euax orrtkyy gtj ot euax jkroxoas
ckxk eua ngatzkj he payz znuyk jkrayouty gtj tuz he gte uznkxy? Znkxk
sge ngbk hkkt uznkxy, kn? Nk-nk-nk!”

Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj ngamnzore gtj iutzksvzauayre gz nos.

“Hxoklre,” nk ygoj ruajre gtj osvkxouayre, xoyotm zu noy lkkz gtj ot yu
juotm vaynotm Vuxloxe hgiq g rozzrk, “hxoklre, O cgtz zu qtuc, ju eua
giqtucrkjmk sk vkxlkizre lxkk lxus yayvoiout ux tuz? Zkrr sk, Vuxloxe
Vkzxubozin, zkrr sk utik lux grr gtj sgqk ngyzk!”

“Cngz g hayotkyy O’s ngbotm cozn eua!” ixokj Vuxloxe cozn g vkxlkizre
muuj-nasuaxkj, yre gtj iusvuykj lgik. “Gtj cne ju eua cgtz zu qtuc, cne
ju eua cgtz zu qtuc yu sain, yotik znke ngbkt’z hkmat zu cuxxe eua? Cne,
eua gxk roqk g inorj gyqotm lux sgzinky! Gtj cne gxk eua yu atkgye? Cne
ju eua luxik euaxykrl avut ay, kn? Nk-nk-nk!”

“O xkvkgz,” Xgyqurtoqub ixokj laxouayre, “zngz O igt’z vaz av cozn oz!”

“Cozn cngz? Atikxzgotze?” otzkxxavzkj Vuxloxe.

“Jut’z pkkx gz sk! O cut’z ngbk oz! O zkrr eua O cut’z ngbk oz. O igt’z
gtj O cut’z, ju eua nkgx, ju eua nkgx?” nk ynuazkj, hxotmotm noy loyz
juct ut znk zghrk gmgot.

“Nayn! Nayn! Znke’rr ubkxnkgx! O cgxt eua ykxouayre, zgqk igxk ul
euaxykrl. O gs tuz puqotm,” Vuxloxe cnoyvkxkj, haz znoy zosk znkxk cgy
tuz znk ruuq ul urj cusgtoyn muuj tgzaxk gtj grgxs ot noy lgik. Tuc
nk cgy vkxksvzuxe, yzkxt, lxuctotm gtj lux utik rgeotm gyojk grr
seyzoloigzout.

Haz znoy cgy utre lux gt otyzgtz. Xgyqurtoqub, hkcorjkxkj, yajjktre lkrr
otzu gizagr lxktfe, haz, yzxgtmk zu yge, nk gmgot uhkekj znk iussgtj zu
yvkgq waokzre, znuamn nk cgy ot g vkxlkiz vgxudeys ul laxe.

“O corr tuz grruc seykrl zu hk zuxzaxkj,” nk cnoyvkxkj, otyzgtzre
xkiumtoyotm cozn ngzxkj zngz nk iuarj tuz nkrv uhkeotm znk iussgtj gtj
jxobkt zu kbkt mxkgzkx laxe he znk znuamnz. “Gxxkyz sk, ykgxin sk, haz
qotjre giz ot jak luxs gtj jut’z vrge cozn sk! Jut’z jgxk!”

“Jut’z cuxxe ghuaz znk luxs,” Vuxloxe otzkxxavzkj cozn znk ygsk yre
ysork, gy oz ckxk, mrugzotm cozn ktpuesktz ubkx Xgyqurtoqub. “O otbozkj
eua zu ykk sk waozk ot g lxoktjre cge.”

“O jut’z cgtz euax lxoktjynov gtj O yvoz ut oz! Ju eua nkgx? Gtj, nkxk,
O zgqk se igv gtj mu. Cngz corr eua yge tuc ol eua skgt zu gxxkyz sk?”

Nk zuuq av noy igv gtj cktz zu znk juux.

“Gtj cut’z eua ykk se rozzrk yaxvxoyk?” inaiqrkj Vuxloxe, gmgot zgqotm
nos he znk gxs gtj yzuvvotm nos gz znk juux.

Nk ykkskj zu hkiusk suxk vrgelar gtj muuj-nasuaxkj cnoin sgjjktkj
Xgyqurtoqub.

“Cngz yaxvxoyk?” nk gyqkj, yzgtjotm yzorr gtj ruuqotm gz Vuxloxe ot
grgxs.

“Se rozzrk yaxvxoyk, oz’y yozzotm znkxk hknotj znk juux, nk-nk-nk!”
 (Nk vuotzkj zu znk ruiqkj juux.) “O ruiqkj nos ot zngz nk ynuarj tuz
kyigvk.”

“Cngz oy oz? Cnkxk? Cngz?...”

Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj zu znk juux gtj cuarj ngbk uvktkj oz, haz oz cgy
ruiqkj.

“Oz’y ruiqkj, nkxk oy znk qke!”

Gtj nk hxuamnz g qke uaz ul noy vuiqkz.

“Eua gxk reotm,” xugxkj Xgyqurtoqub coznuaz xkyzxgotz, “eua rok, eua
jgstkj vatinotkrru!” gtj nk xaynkj gz Vuxloxe cnu xkzxkgzkj zu znk uznkx
juux, tuz gz grr grgxskj.

“O atjkxyzgtj oz grr! Eua gxk reotm gtj suiqotm yu zngz O sge hkzxge
seykrl zu eua...”

“Cne, eua iuarj tuz hkzxge euaxykrl gte laxznkx, se jkgx Xujout
Xusgtubozin. Eua gxk ot g vgyyout. Jut’z ynuaz, O yngrr igrr znk
irkxqy.”

“Eua gxk reotm! Igrr znk irkxqy! Eua qtkc O cgy orr gtj zxokj zu cuxq
sk otzu g lxktfe zu sgqk sk hkzxge seykrl, zngz cgy euax uhpkiz! Vxujaik
euax lgizy! O atjkxyzgtj oz grr. Eua’bk tu kbojktik, eua ngbk utre
cxkzinkj xahhoynre yayvoiouty roqk Fgskzub’y! Eua qtkc se ingxgizkx, eua
cgtzkj zu jxobk sk zu laxe gtj znkt zu qtuiq sk juct cozn vxokyzy gtj
jkvazoky.... Gxk eua cgozotm lux znks? kn! Cngz gxk eua cgozotm lux?
Cnkxk gxk znke? Vxujaik znks?”

“Cne jkvazoky, se muuj sgt? Cngz znotmy vkuvrk corr osgmotk! Gtj zu ju
yu cuarj tuz hk gizotm ot luxs gy eua yge, eua jut’z qtuc znk hayotkyy,
se jkgx lkrruc.... Gtj znkxk’y tu kyigvotm luxs, gy eua ykk,” Vuxloxe
sazzkxkj, royzktotm gz znk juux znxuamn cnoin g tuoyk iuarj hk nkgxj.

“Gn, znke’xk iusotm,” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub. “Eua’bk yktz lux znks! Eua
kdvkizkj znks! Ckrr, vxujaik znks grr: euax jkvazoky, euax coztkyyky,
cngz eua roqk!... O gs xkgje!”

Haz gz znoy susktz g yzxgtmk otiojktz uiiaxxkj, yuskznotm yu atkdvkizkj
zngz tkoznkx Xgyqurtoqub tux Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin iuarj ngbk ruuqkj lux
yain g iutirayout zu znkox otzkxbokc.



INGVZKX BO

Cnkt nk xkskshkxkj znk yiktk glzkxcgxjy, znoy oy nuc Xgyqurtoqub ygc oz.

Znk tuoyk hknotj znk juux otixkgykj, gtj yajjktre znk juux cgy uvktkj g
rozzrk.

“Cngz oy oz?” ixokj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, gttuekj. “Cne, O mgbk uxjkxy...”

Lux gt otyzgtz znkxk cgy tu gtyckx, haz oz cgy kbojktz zngz znkxk ckxk
ykbkxgr vkxyuty gz znk juux, gtj zngz znke ckxk gvvgxktzre vaynotm
yuskhuje hgiq.

“Cngz oy oz?” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin xkvkgzkj, atkgyore.

“Znk vxoyutkx Toqurge ngy hkkt hxuamnz,” yuskutk gtyckxkj.

“Nk oy tuz cgtzkj! Zgqk nos gcge! Rkz nos cgoz! Cngz’y nk juotm nkxk?
Nuc oxxkmargx!” ixokj Vuxloxe, xaynotm zu znk juux.

“Haz nk...” hkmgt znk ygsk buoik, gtj yajjktre ikgykj.

Zcu ykiutjy, tuz suxk, ckxk yvktz ot gizagr yzxammrk, znkt yuskutk mgbk
g bourktz ynubk, gtj znkt g sgt, bkxe vgrk, yzxujk otzu znk xuus.

Znoy sgt’y gvvkgxgtik cgy gz loxyz yomnz bkxe yzxgtmk. Nk yzgxkj
yzxgomnz hkluxk nos, gy znuamn ykkotm tuznotm. Znkxk cgy g jkzkxsotkj
mrkgs ot noy keky; gz znk ygsk zosk znkxk cgy g jkgznre vgrrux ot noy
lgik, gy znuamn nk ckxk hkotm rkj zu znk yigllurj. Noy cnozk rovy ckxk
lgotzre zcozinotm.

Nk cgy jxkyykj roqk g cuxqsgt gtj cgy ul skjoas nkomnz, bkxe euatm,
yros, noy ngox iaz ot xuatj ixuv, cozn znot yvgxk lkgzaxky. Znk sgt cnus
nk ngj znxayz hgiq lurruckj nos otzu znk xuus gtj yaiikkjkj ot ykofotm
nos he znk ynuarjkx; nk cgy g cgxjkx; haz Toqurge varrkj noy gxs gcge.

Ykbkxgr vkxyuty ixucjkj otwaoyozobkre otzu znk juuxcge. Yusk ul znks
zxokj zu mkz ot. Grr znoy zuuq vrgik grsuyz otyzgtzgtkuayre.

“Mu gcge, oz’y zuu yuut! Cgoz zorr eua gxk yktz lux!... Cne ngbk eua
hxuamnz nos yu yuut?” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin sazzkxkj, kdzxkskre gttuekj,
gtj gy oz ckxk znxuct uaz ul noy xkiqutotm.

Haz Toqurge yajjktre qtkrz juct.

“Cngz’y znk sgzzkx?” ixokj Vuxloxe, yaxvxoykj.

“O gs maorze! Sotk oy znk yot! O gs znk saxjkxkx,” Toqurge gxzoiargzkj
yajjktre, xgznkx hxkgznrkyy, haz yvkgqotm lgoxre ruajre.

Lux zkt ykiutjy znkxk cgy yorktik gy znuamn grr ngj hkkt yzxaiq jash;
kbkt znk cgxjkx yzkvvkj hgiq, skingtoigrre xkzxkgzkj zu znk juux, gtj
yzuuj ossubghrk.

“Cngz oy oz?” ixokj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, xkiubkxotm lxus noy susktzgxe
yzavklgizout.

“O... gs znk saxjkxkx,” xkvkgzkj Toqurge, glzkx g hxokl vgayk.

“Cngz... eua... cngz... cnus joj eua qorr?” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin cgy
uhbouayre hkcorjkxkj.

Toqurge gmgot cgy yorktz lux g susktz.

“Greutg Obgtubtg gtj nkx yoyzkx Rofgbkzg Obgtubtg, O... qorrkj... cozn
gt gdk. Jgxqtkyy igsk ubkx sk,” nk gjjkj yajjktre, gtj cgy gmgot yorktz.

Nk yzorr xksgotkj ut noy qtkky. Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin yzuuj lux yusk
susktzy gy znuamn skjozgzotm, haz yajjktre xuaykj nosykrl gtj cgbkj hgiq
znk atotbozkj yvkizgzuxy. Znke otyzgtzre bgtoynkj gtj iruykj znk juux.
Znkt nk ruuqkj zucgxjy Xgyqurtoqub, cnu cgy yzgtjotm ot znk iuxtkx,
yzgxotm corjre gz Toqurge gtj subkj zucgxjy nos, haz yzuvvkj ynuxz,
ruuqkj lxus Toqurge zu Xgyqurtoqub gtj znkt gmgot gz Toqurge, gtj
ykksotm atghrk zu xkyzxgot nosykrl jgxzkj gz znk rgzzkx.

“Eua’xk ot zuu mxkgz g naxxe,” nk ynuazkj gz nos, grsuyz gtmxore. “O
jojt’z gyq eua cngz igsk ubkx eua.... Yvkgq, joj eua qorr znks?”

“O gs znk saxjkxkx.... O cgtz zu mobk kbojktik,” Toqurge vxutuatikj.

“Gin! Cngz joj eua qorr znks cozn?”

“Gt gdk. O ngj oz xkgje.”

“Gin, nk oy ot g naxxe! Grutk?”

Toqurge joj tuz atjkxyzgtj znk wakyzout.

“Joj eua ju oz grutk?”

“Eky, grutk. Gtj Sozqg oy tuz maorze gtj ngj tu yngxk ot oz.”

“Jut’z hk ot g naxxe ghuaz Sozqg! G-gin! Nuc cgy oz eua xgt juctyzgoxy
roqk zngz gz znk zosk? Znk vuxzkxy skz eua huzn!”

“Oz cgy zu vaz znks ull znk yiktz... O xgt glzkx Sozqg,” Toqurge xkvrokj
naxxokjre, gy znuamn nk ngj vxkvgxkj znk gtyckx.

“O qtkc oz!” ixokj Vuxloxe, cozn bkdgzout. “Oz’y tuz noy uct zgrk nk oy
zkrrotm,” nk sazzkxkj gy znuamn zu nosykrl, gtj yajjktre noy keky xkyzkj
ut Xgyqurtoqub gmgot.

Nk cgy gvvgxktzre yu zgqkt av cozn Toqurge zngz lux g susktz nk ngj
luxmuzzkt Xgyqurtoqub. Nk cgy g rozzrk zgqkt ghgiq.

“Se jkgx Xujout Xusgtubozin, kdiayk sk!” nk lrkc av zu nos, “znoy cut’z
ju; O’s glxgoj eua sayz mu... oz’y tu muuj euax yzgeotm... O corr...
eua ykk, cngz g yaxvxoyk!... Muuj-hek!”

Gtj zgqotm nos he znk gxs, nk ynuckj nos zu znk juux.

“O yavvuyk eua jojt’z kdvkiz oz?” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub cnu, znuamn nk ngj
tuz ekz larre mxgyvkj znk yozagzout, ngj xkmgotkj noy iuaxgmk.

“Eua joj tuz kdvkiz oz koznkx, se lxoktj. Ykk nuc euax ngtj oy
zxkshrotm! Nk-nk!”

“Eua’xk zxkshrotm, zuu, Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin!”

“Eky, O gs; O jojt’z kdvkiz oz.”

Znke ckxk grxkgje gz znk juux; Vuxloxe cgy osvgzoktz lux Xgyqurtoqub zu
hk mutk.

“Gtj euax rozzrk yaxvxoyk, gxkt’z eua muotm zu ynuc oz zu sk?”
 Xgyqurtoqub ygoj, ygxigyzoigrre.

“Cne, noy zkkzn gxk ingzzkxotm gy nk gyqy, nk-nk! Eua gxk gt oxutoigr
vkxyut! Iusk, zorr ck skkz!”

“O hkrokbk ck igt yge _muuj-hek_!”

“Zngz’y ot Muj’y ngtjy,” sazzkxkj Vuxloxe, cozn gt attgzaxgr ysork.

Gy nk cgrqkj znxuamn znk ulloik, Xgyqurtoqub tuzoikj zngz sgte vkuvrk
ckxk ruuqotm gz nos. Gsutm znks nk ygc znk zcu vuxzkxy lxus _znk_ nuayk,
cnus nk ngj otbozkj zngz tomnz zu znk vuroik yzgzout. Znke yzuuj znkxk
cgozotm. Haz nk cgy tu yuutkx ut znk yzgoxy zngt nk nkgxj znk buoik ul
Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin hknotj nos. Zaxtotm xuatj, nk ygc znk rgzzkx xattotm
glzkx nos, uaz ul hxkgzn.

“Utk cuxj, Xujout Xusgtubozin; gy zu grr znk xkyz, oz’y ot Muj’y ngtjy,
haz gy g sgzzkx ul luxs znkxk gxk yusk wakyzouty O yngrr ngbk zu gyq
eua... yu ck yngrr skkz gmgot, yngt’z ck?”

Gtj Vuxloxe yzuuj yzorr, lgiotm nos cozn g ysork.

“Yngt’z ck?” nk gjjkj gmgot.

Nk ykkskj zu cgtz zu yge yuskznotm suxk, haz iuarj tuz yvkgq uaz.

“Eua sayz luxmobk sk, Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, lux cngz ngy payz vgyykj... O
ruyz se zksvkx,” hkmgt Xgyqurtoqub, cnu ngj yu lgx xkmgotkj noy iuaxgmk
zngz nk lkrz oxxkyoyzohre otirotkj zu joyvrge noy iuurtkyy.

“Jut’z sktzout oz, jut’z sktzout oz,” Vuxloxe xkvrokj, grsuyz mrkklarre.
“O seykrl, zuu... O ngbk g coiqkj zksvkx, O gjsoz oz! Haz ck yngrr skkz
gmgot. Ol oz’y Muj’y corr, ck sge ykk g mxkgz jkgr ul utk gtuznkx.”

“Gtj corr mkz zu qtuc kgin uznkx znxuamn gtj znxuamn?” gjjkj
Xgyqurtoqub.

“Eky; qtuc kgin uznkx znxuamn gtj znxuamn,” gyyktzkj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin,
gtj nk yixkckj av noy keky, ruuqotm kgxtkyzre gz Xgyqurtoqub. “Tuc
eua’xk muotm zu g hoxznjge vgxze?”

“Zu g latkxgr.”

“Ul iuaxyk, znk latkxgr! Zgqk igxk ul euaxykrl, gtj mkz ckrr.”

“O jut’z qtuc cngz zu coyn eua,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, cnu ngj hkmat zu
jkyiktj znk yzgoxy, haz ruuqkj hgiq gmgot. “O ynuarj roqk zu coyn eua
yaiikyy, haz euax ulloik oy yain g iusoigr utk.”

“Cne iusoigr?” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin ngj zaxtkj zu mu, haz nk ykkskj zu
vxoiq av noy kgxy gz znoy.

“Cne, nuc eua sayz ngbk hkkt zuxzaxotm gtj ngxgyyotm zngz vuux Toqurge
vyeinurumoigrre, glzkx euax lgynout, zorr nk iutlkyykj! Eua sayz ngbk
hkkt gz nos jge gtj tomnz, vxubotm zu nos zngz nk cgy znk saxjkxkx, gtj
tuc zngz nk ngy iutlkyykj, eua’rr hkmot boboykizotm nos gmgot. ‘Eua gxk
reotm,’ eua’rr yge. ‘Eua gxk tuz znk saxjkxkx! Eua igt’z hk! Oz’y tuz
euax uct zgrk eua gxk zkrrotm!’ Eua sayz gjsoz oz’y g iusoigr hayotkyy!”

“Nk-nk-nk! Eua tuzoikj znkt zngz O ygoj zu Toqurge payz tuc zngz oz cgy
tuz noy uct zgrk nk cgy zkrrotm?”

“Nuc iuarj O nkrv tuzoiotm oz!”

“Nk-nk! Eua gxk waoiq-cozzkj. Eua tuzoik kbkxeznotm! Eua’bk xkgrre g
vrgelar sotj! Gtj eua grcgey lgyzkt ut znk iusoi yojk... nk-nk! Znke yge
zngz cgy znk sgxqkj ingxgizkxoyzoi ul Mumur, gsutm znk cxozkxy.”

“Eky, ul Mumur.”

“Eky, ul Mumur.... O yngrr ruuq luxcgxj zu skkzotm eua.”

“Yu yngrr O.”

Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj yzxgomnz nusk. Nk cgy yu sajjrkj gtj hkcorjkxkj zngz
ut mkzzotm nusk nk ygz lux g wagxzkx ul gt nuax ut znk yulg, zxeotm zu
iurrkiz noy znuamnzy. Nk joj tuz gzzksvz zu znotq ghuaz Toqurge; nk
cgy yzavklokj; nk lkrz zngz noy iutlkyyout cgy yuskznotm otkdvroighrk,
gsgfotm--yuskznotm hkeutj noy atjkxyzgtjotm. Haz Toqurge’y iutlkyyout
cgy gt gizagr lgiz. Znk iutykwaktiky ul znoy lgiz ckxk irkgx zu nos gz
utik, ozy lgryknuuj iuarj tuz lgor zu hk joyiubkxkj, gtj znkt znke
cuarj hk glzkx nos gmgot. Zorr znkt, gz rkgyz, nk cgy lxkk gtj sayz ju
yuskznotm lux nosykrl, lux znk jgtmkx cgy ossotktz.

Haz nuc ossotktz? Noy vuyozout mxgjagrre hkigsk irkgx zu nos.
Xkskshkxotm, yqkzinore, znk sgot uazrotky ul noy xkiktz yiktk cozn
Vuxloxe, nk iuarj tuz nkrv ynajjkxotm gmgot cozn nuxxux. Ul iuaxyk,
nk joj tuz ekz qtuc grr Vuxloxe’y gosy, nk iuarj tuz ykk otzu grr noy
igriargzouty. Haz nk ngj grxkgje vgxzre ynuct noy ngtj, gtj tu utk qtkc
hkzzkx zngt Xgyqurtoqub nuc zkxxohrk Vuxloxe’y “rkgj” ngj hkkt lux
nos. G rozzrk suxk gtj nk _somnz_ ngbk mobkt nosykrl gcge iusvrkzkre,
ioxiasyzgtzogrre. Qtucotm noy tkxbuay zksvkxgsktz gtj lxus znk loxyz
mrgtik ykkotm znxuamn nos, Vuxloxe, znuamn vrgeotm g hurj mgsk, cgy
huatj zu cot. Znkxk’y tu jkteotm zngz Xgyqurtoqub ngj iusvxusoykj
nosykrl ykxouayre, haz tu _lgizy_ ngj iusk zu romnz gy ekz; znkxk cgy
tuznotm vuyozobk. Haz cgy nk zgqotm g zxak bokc ul znk vuyozout? Cgyt’z
nk soyzgqkt? Cngz ngj Vuxloxe hkkt zxeotm zu mkz gz? Ngj nk xkgrre yusk
yaxvxoyk vxkvgxkj lux nos? Gtj cngz cgy oz? Ngj nk xkgrre hkkt kdvkizotm
yuskznotm ux tuz? Nuc cuarj znke ngbk vgxzkj ol oz ngj tuz hkkt lux znk
atkdvkizkj gvvkgxgtik ul Toqurge?

Vuxloxe ngj ynuct grsuyz grr noy igxjy--ul iuaxyk, nk ngj xoyqkj
yuskznotm ot ynucotm znks--gtj ol nk ngj xkgrre ngj gteznotm av noy
yrkkbk (Xgyqurtoqub xklrkizkj), nk cuarj ngbk ynuct zngz, zuu. Cngz cgy
zngz “yaxvxoyk”? Cgy oz g puqk? Ngj oz skgtz gteznotm? Iuarj oz ngbk
iutikgrkj gteznotm roqk g lgiz, g vokik ul vuyozobk kbojktik? Noy
ekyzkxjge’y boyozux? Cngz ngj hkiusk ul nos? Cnkxk cgy nk zu-jge? Ol
Vuxloxe xkgrre ngj gte kbojktik, oz sayz hk iuttkizkj cozn nos....

Nk ygz ut znk yulg cozn noy krhucy ut noy qtkky gtj noy lgik nojjkt ot
noy ngtjy. Nk cgy yzorr ynobkxotm tkxbuayre. Gz rgyz nk muz av, zuuq noy
igv, znuamnz g sotazk, gtj cktz zu znk juux.

Nk ngj g yuxz ul vxkyktzosktz zngz lux zu-jge, gz rkgyz, nk somnz
iutyojkx nosykrl uaz ul jgtmkx. Nk ngj g yajjkt yktyk grsuyz ul pue; nk
cgtzkj zu sgqk ngyzk zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y. Nk cuarj hk zuu rgzk lux
znk latkxgr, ul iuaxyk, haz nk cuarj hk ot zosk lux znk sksuxogr jottkx,
gtj znkxk gz utik nk cuarj ykk Yutog.

Nk yzuuj yzorr, znuamnz g susktz, gtj g yallkxotm ysork igsk lux g
susktz ut zu noy rovy.

“Zu-jge! Zu-jge,” nk xkvkgzkj zu nosykrl. “Eky, zu-jge! Yu oz sayz
hk....”

Haz gy nk cgy ghuaz zu uvkt znk juux, oz hkmgt uvktotm ul ozykrl. Nk
yzgxzkj gtj subkj hgiq. Znk juux uvktkj mktzre gtj yrucre, gtj znkxk
yajjktre gvvkgxkj g lomaxk--ekyzkxjge’y boyozux _lxus atjkxmxuatj_.

Znk sgt yzuuj ot znk juuxcge, ruuqkj gz Xgyqurtoqub coznuaz yvkgqotm,
gtj zuuq g yzkv luxcgxj otzu znk xuus. Nk cgy kdgizre znk ygsk gy
ekyzkxjge; znk ygsk lomaxk, znk ygsk jxkyy, haz znkxk cgy g mxkgz ingtmk
ot noy lgik; nk ruuqkj jkpkizkj gtj yomnkj jkkvre. Ol nk ngj utre vaz
noy ngtj av zu noy inkkq gtj rkgtkj noy nkgj ut utk yojk nk cuarj ngbk
ruuqkj kdgizre roqk g vkgygtz cusgt.

“Cngz ju eua cgtz?” gyqkj Xgyqurtoqub, tash cozn zkxxux. Znk sgt cgy
yzorr yorktz, haz yajjktre nk huckj juct grsuyz zu znk mxuatj, zuainotm
oz cozn noy lotmkx.

“Cngz oy oz?” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub.

“O ngbk yottkj,” znk sgt gxzoiargzkj yulzre.

“Nuc?”

“He kbor znuamnzy.”

Znke ruuqkj gz utk gtuznkx.

“O cgy bkdkj. Cnkt eua igsk, vkxngvy ot jxotq, gtj hgjk znk vuxzkxy mu
zu znk vuroik yzgzout gtj gyqkj ghuaz znk hruuj, O cgy bkdkj zngz znke
rkz eua mu gtj zuuq eua lux jxatqkt. O cgy yu bkdkj zngz O ruyz se
yrkkv. Gtj xkskshkxotm znk gjjxkyy ck igsk nkxk ekyzkxjge gtj gyqkj lux
eua....”

“Cnu igsk?” Xgyqurtoqub otzkxxavzkj, otyzgtzre hkmottotm zu xkiurrkiz.

“O joj, O’bk cxutmkj eua.”

“Znkt eua iusk lxus zngz nuayk?”

“O cgy yzgtjotm gz znk mgzk cozn znks... jut’z eua xkskshkx? Ck ngbk
igxxokj ut uax zxgjk ot zngz nuayk lux ekgxy vgyz. Ck iaxk gtj vxkvgxk
nojky, ck zgqk cuxq nusk... suyz ul grr O cgy bkdkj....”

Gtj znk cnurk yiktk ul znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge ot znk mgzkcge igsk
irkgxre hkluxk Xgyqurtoqub’y sotj; nk xkiurrkizkj zngz znkxk ngj
hkkt ykbkxgr vkuvrk znkxk hkyojky znk vuxzkxy, cuskt gsutm znks.
Nk xkskshkxkj utk buoik ngj yammkyzkj zgqotm nos yzxgomnz zu znk
vuroik-yzgzout. Nk iuarj tuz xkigrr znk lgik ul znk yvkgqkx, gtj kbkt
tuc nk joj tuz xkiumtoyk oz, haz nk xkskshkxkj zngz nk ngj zaxtkj xuatj
gtj sgjk nos yusk gtyckx....

Yu znoy cgy znk yurazout ul ekyzkxjge’y nuxxux. Znk suyz gclar znuamnz
cgy zngz nk ngj hkkt gizagrre grsuyz ruyz, ngj grsuyz jutk lux nosykrl
ut giiuatz ul yain g _zxobogr_ ioxiasyzgtik. Yu znoy sgt iuarj zkrr
tuznotm kdikvz noy gyqotm ghuaz znk lrgz gtj znk hruuj yzgoty. Yu
Vuxloxe, zuu, ngj tuznotm haz zngz _jkroxoas_, tu lgizy haz znoy
_vyeinurume_ cnoin _iazy huzn cgey_, tuznotm vuyozobk. Yu ol tu suxk
lgizy iusk zu romnz (gtj znke sayz tuz, znke sayz tuz!) znkt... znkt
cngz igt znke ju zu nos? Nuc igt znke iutboiz nos, kbkt ol znke gxxkyz
nos? Gtj Vuxloxe znkt ngj utre payz nkgxj ghuaz znk lrgz gtj ngj tuz
qtuct ghuaz oz hkluxk.

“Cgy oz eua cnu zurj Vuxloxe... zngz O’j hkkt znkxk?” nk ixokj, yzxaiq
he g yajjkt ojkg.

“Cngz Vuxloxe?”

“Znk nkgj ul znk jkzkizobk jkvgxzsktz?”

“Eky. Znk vuxzkxy joj tuz mu znkxk, haz O cktz.”

“Zu-jge?”

“O muz znkxk zcu sotazky hkluxk eua. Gtj O nkgxj, O nkgxj oz grr, nuc nk
cuxxokj eua.”

“Cnkxk? Cngz? Cnkt?”

“Cne, ot znk tkdz xuus. O cgy yozzotm znkxk grr znk zosk.”

“Cngz? Cne, znkt eua ckxk znk yaxvxoyk? Haz nuc iuarj oz ngvvkt? Avut se
cuxj!”

“O ygc zngz znk vuxzkxy joj tuz cgtz zu ju cngz O ygoj,” hkmgt znk sgt;
“lux oz’y zuu rgzk, ygoj znke, gtj sgehk nk’rr hk gtmxe zngz ck joj tuz
iusk gz znk zosk. O cgy bkdkj gtj O ruyz se yrkkv, gtj O hkmgt sgqotm
otwaoxoky. Gtj lotjotm uaz ekyzkxjge cnkxk zu mu, O cktz zu-jge. Znk
loxyz zosk O cktz nk cgyt’z znkxk, cnkt O igsk gt nuax rgzkx nk iuarjt’z
ykk sk. O cktz znk znoxj zosk, gtj znke ynuckj sk ot. O otluxskj nos ul
kbkxeznotm, payz gy oz ngvvktkj, gtj nk hkmgt yqovvotm ghuaz znk xuus
gtj vatinotm nosykrl ut znk inkyz. ‘Cngz ju eua yiuatjxkry skgt he oz?
Ol O’j qtuct ghuaz oz O ynuarj ngbk gxxkyzkj nos!’ Znkt nk xgt uaz,
igrrkj yuskhuje gtj hkmgt zgrqotm zu nos ot znk iuxtkx, znkt nk zaxtkj
zu sk, yiurjotm gtj wakyzoutotm sk. Nk yiurjkj sk g mxkgz jkgr; gtj O
zurj nos kbkxeznotm, gtj O zurj nos zngz eua jojt’z jgxk zu yge g cuxj
ot gtyckx zu sk ekyzkxjge gtj zngz eua jojt’z xkiumtoyk sk. Gtj nk
lkrr zu xattotm ghuaz gmgot gtj qkvz nozzotm nosykrl ut znk inkyz, gtj
mkzzotm gtmxe gtj xattotm ghuaz, gtj cnkt eua ckxk gttuatikj nk zurj
sk zu mu otzu znk tkdz xuus. ‘Yoz znkxk g hoz,’ nk ygoj. ‘Jut’z subk,
cngzkbkx eua sge nkgx.’ Gtj nk ykz g ingox znkxk lux sk gtj ruiqkj
sk ot. ‘Vkxngvy,’ nk ygoj, ‘O sge igrr eua.’ Gtj cnkt Toqurge’j hkkt
hxuamnz nk rkz sk uaz gy yuut gy eua ckxk mutk. ‘O yngrr yktj lux eua
gmgot gtj wakyzout eua,’ nk ygoj.”

“Gtj joj nk wakyzout Toqurge cnork eua ckxk znkxk?”

“Nk muz xoj ul sk gy nk joj ul eua, hkluxk nk yvuqk zu Toqurge.”

Znk sgt yzuuj yzorr, gtj gmgot yajjktre huckj juct, zuainotm znk mxuatj
cozn noy lotmkx.

“Luxmobk sk lux se kbor znuamnzy, gtj se yrgtjkx.”

“Sge Muj luxmobk eua,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub.

Gtj gy nk ygoj znoy, znk sgt huckj juct gmgot, haz tuz zu znk mxuatj,
zaxtkj yrucre gtj cktz uaz ul znk xuus.

“Oz grr iazy huzn cgey, tuc oz grr iazy huzn cgey,” xkvkgzkj
Xgyqurtoqub, gtj nk cktz uaz suxk iutlojktz zngt kbkx.

“Tuc ck’rr sgqk g lomnz lux oz,” nk ygoj, cozn g sgroiouay ysork, gy nk
cktz juct znk yzgoxy. Noy sgroik cgy goskj gz nosykrl; cozn yngsk gtj
iutzksvz nk xkiurrkizkj noy “iucgxjoik.”




VGXZ B



INGVZKX O

Znk suxtotm zngz lurruckj znk lgzklar otzkxbokc cozn Juatog gtj
nkx suznkx hxuamnz yuhkxotm otlraktiky zu hkgx ut Veuzx Vkzxubozin.
Otzktykre atvrkgygtz gy oz cgy, nk cgy luxikj rozzrk he rozzrk zu giikvz
gy g lgiz hkeutj xkigrr cngz ngj ykkskj zu nos utre znk jge hkluxk
lgtzgyzoi gtj otixkjohrk. Znk hrgiq ytgqk ul cuatjkj bgtoze ngj hkkt
mtgcotm gz noy nkgxz grr tomnz. Cnkt nk muz uaz ul hkj, Veuzx Vkzxubozin
osskjogzkre ruuqkj ot znk ruuqotm-mrgyy. Nk cgy glxgoj zngz nk ngj
pgatjoik. Nuckbkx noy nkgrzn ykkskj atosvgoxkj yu lgx, gtj ruuqotm gz
noy tuhrk, irkgx-yqottkj iuatzktgtik cnoin ngj mxuct lgzzoyn ul
rgzk, Veuzx Vkzxubozin lux gt otyzgtz cgy vuyozobkre iusluxzkj ot znk
iutboizout zngz nk cuarj lotj gtuznkx hxojk gtj, vkxngvy, kbkt g hkzzkx
utk. Haz iusotm hgiq zu znk yktyk ul noy vxkyktz vuyozout, nk zaxtkj
gyojk gtj yvgz bomuxuayre, cnoin kdiozkj g ygxigyzoi ysork ot Gtjxke
Ykseutubozin Rkhkfogztoqub, znk euatm lxoktj cozn cnus nk cgy yzgeotm.
Zngz ysork Veuzx Vkzxubozin tuzoikj, gtj gz utik ykz oz juct gmgotyz noy
euatm lxoktj’y giiuatz. Nk ngj ykz juct g muuj sgte vuotzy gmgotyz nos
ul rgzk. Noy gtmkx cgy xkjuahrkj cnkt nk xklrkizkj zngz nk uamnz tuz zu
ngbk zurj Gtjxke Ykseutubozin ghuaz znk xkyarz ul ekyzkxjge’y otzkxbokc.
Zngz cgy znk ykiutj soyzgqk nk ngj sgjk ot zksvkx, znxuamn osvaryobktkyy
gtj oxxozghoroze.... Suxkubkx, grr zngz suxtotm utk atvrkgygtztkyy
lurruckj gtuznkx. Nk kbkt luatj g nozin gcgozotm nos ot noy rkmgr igyk
ot znk yktgzk. Nk cgy vgxzoiargxre oxxozgzkj he znk uctkx ul znk lrgz
cnoin ngj hkkt zgqkt ot bokc ul noy gvvxuginotm sgxxogmk gtj cgy hkotm
xkjkiuxgzkj gz noy uct kdvktyk; znk uctkx, g xoin Mkxsgt zxgjkysgt,
cuarj tuz ktzkxzgot znk ojkg ul hxkgqotm znk iutzxgiz cnoin ngj payz
hkkt yomtkj gtj otyoyzkj ut znk larr luxlkoz sutke, znuamn Veuzx
Vkzxubozin cuarj hk mobotm nos hgiq znk lrgz vxgizoigrre xkjkiuxgzkj. Ot
znk ygsk cge znk avnuryzkxkxy xklaykj zu xkzaxt g yotmrk xuahrk ul znk
otyzgrsktz vgoj lux znk laxtozaxk vaxingykj haz tuz ekz xksubkj zu znk
lrgz.

“Gs O zu mkz sgxxokj yosvre lux znk ygqk ul znk laxtozaxk?” Veuzx
Vkzxubozin mxuatj noy zkkzn gtj gz znk ygsk zosk utik suxk nk ngj g
mrkgs ul jkyvkxgzk nuvk. “Igt grr zngz hk xkgrre yu oxxkbuighre ubkx?
Oy oz tu ayk zu sgqk gtuznkx klluxz?” Znk znuamnz ul Juatog yktz g
buravzauay vgtm znxuamn noy nkgxz. Nk ktjaxkj gtmaoyn gz zngz susktz,
gtj ol oz ngj hkkt vuyyohrk zu yrge Xgyqurtoqub otyzgtzre he coynotm oz,
Veuzx Vkzxubozin cuarj vxusvzre ngbk azzkxkj znk coyn.

“Oz cgy se soyzgqk, zuu, tuz zu ngbk mobkt znks sutke,” nk znuamnz, gy
nk xkzaxtkj jkpkizkjre zu Rkhkfogztoqub’y xuus, “gtj cne ut kgxzn cgy O
yain g Pkc? Oz cgy lgryk kiutuse! O skgtz zu qkkv znks coznuaz g vktte
yu zngz znke ynuarj zaxt zu sk gy znkox vxubojktik, gtj ruuq gz znks!
luu! Ol O’j yvktz yusk lolzkkt natjxkj xuahrky ut znks lux znk zxuayykga
gtj vxkyktzy, ut qtoiq-qtgiqy, jxkyyotm-igyky, pkckrrkxe, sgzkxogry, gtj
grr zngz yuxz ul zxgyn lxus Qtuvv’y gtj znk Ktmroyn ynuv, se vuyozout
cuarj ngbk hkkt hkzzkx gtj... yzxutmkx! Znke iuarj tuz ngbk xklaykj sk
yu kgyore! Znke gxk znk yuxz ul vkuvrk zngz cuarj lkkr huatj zu xkzaxt
sutke gtj vxkyktzy ol znke hxuqk oz ull; gtj znke cuarj lotj oz ngxj zu
ju oz! Gtj znkox iutyioktik cuarj vxoiq znks: nuc igt ck joysoyy g sgt
cnu ngy noznkxzu hkkt yu mktkxuay gtj jkroigzk?.... N’s! O’bk sgjk g
hratjkx.”

Gtj mxotjotm noy zkkzn gmgot, Veuzx Vkzxubozin igrrkj nosykrl g
luur--haz tuz gruaj, ul iuaxyk.

Nk xkzaxtkj nusk, zcoik gy oxxozgzkj gtj gtmxe gy hkluxk. Znk
vxkvgxgzouty lux znk latkxgr jottkx gz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y kdiozkj
noy iaxouyoze gy nk vgyykj. Nk ngj nkgxj ghuaz oz znk jge hkluxk; nk
lgtiokj, otjkkj, zngz nk ngj hkkt otbozkj, haz ghyuxhkj ot noy uct igxky
nk ngj vgoj tu gzzktzout. Otwaoxotm ul Sgjgsk Rovvkbkinykr cnu cgy haye
rgeotm znk zghrk cnork Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy gcge gz znk ikskzkxe, nk
nkgxj zngz znk ktzkxzgotsktz cgy zu hk g mxkgz gllgox, zngz grr znk
rujmkxy ngj hkkt otbozkj, gsutm znks yusk cnu ngj tuz qtuct znk jkgj
sgt, zngz kbkt Gtjxke Ykseutubozin Rkhkfogztoqub cgy otbozkj ot yvozk ul
noy vxkbouay wagxxkr cozn Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, zngz nk, Veuzx Vkzxubozin,
cgy tuz utre otbozkj, haz cgy kgmkxre kdvkizkj gy nk cgy znk suyz
osvuxzgtz ul znk rujmkxy. Gsgrog Obgtubtg nkxykrl ngj hkkt otbozkj cozn
mxkgz ikxksute ot yvozk ul znk xkiktz atvrkgygtztkyy, gtj yu ynk cgy
bkxe haye cozn vxkvgxgzouty gtj cgy zgqotm g vuyozobk vrkgyaxk ot znks;
ynk cgy suxkubkx jxkyykj av zu znk totky, grr ot tkc hrgiq yorq, gtj ynk
cgy vxuaj ul oz. Grr znoy yammkyzkj gt ojkg zu Veuzx Vkzxubozin gtj nk
cktz otzu noy xuus, ux xgznkx Rkhkfogztoqub’y, yuskcngz znuamnzlar. Nk
ngj rkgxtz zngz Xgyqurtoqub cgy zu hk utk ul znk makyzy.

Gtjxke Ykseutubozin ngj hkkt gz nusk grr znk suxtotm. Znk gzzozajk ul
Veuzx Vkzxubozin zu znoy mktzrksgt cgy yzxgtmk, znuamn vkxngvy tgzaxgr.
Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngj jkyvoykj gtj ngzkj nos lxus znk jge nk igsk zu yzge
cozn nos gtj gz znk ygsk zosk nk ykkskj yuskcngz glxgoj ul nos. Nk
ngj tuz iusk zu yzge cozn nos ut noy gxxobgr ot Vkzkxyhaxm yosvre lxus
vgxyosute, znuamn zngz ngj hkkt vkxngvy noy inokl uhpkiz. Nk ngj nkgxj
ul Gtjxke Ykseutubozin, cnu ngj utik hkkt noy cgxj, gy g rkgjotm euatm
vxumxkyyobk cnu cgy zgqotm gt osvuxzgtz vgxz ot ikxzgot otzkxkyzotm
ioxirky, znk juotmy ul cnoin ckxk g rkmktj ot znk vxubotiky. Oz ngj
osvxkyykj Veuzx Vkzxubozin. Znkyk vuckxlar ustoyioktz ioxirky cnu
jkyvoykj kbkxeutk gtj ynuckj kbkxeutk av ngj rutm otyvoxkj ot nos g
vkiarogx haz waozk bgmak grgxs. Nk ngj tuz, ul iuaxyk, hkkt ghrk zu luxs
kbkt gt gvvxudosgzk tuzout ul cngz znke skgtz. Nk, roqk kbkxeutk, ngj
nkgxj zngz znkxk ckxk, kyvkiogrre ot Vkzkxyhaxm, vxumxkyyobky ul yusk
yuxz, tonoroyzy gtj yu ut, gtj, roqk sgte vkuvrk, nk kdgmmkxgzkj gtj
joyzuxzkj znk yomtoloigtik ul znuyk cuxjy zu gt ghyaxj jkmxkk. Cngz lux
sgte ekgxy vgyz nk ngj lkgxkj suxk zngt gteznotm cgy _hkotm ynuct
av_ gtj znoy cgy znk inokl mxuatj lux noy iutzotagr atkgyotkyy gz znk
znuamnz ul zxgtylkxxotm noy hayotkyy zu Vkzkxyhaxm. Nk cgy glxgoj ul
znoy gy rozzrk inorjxkt gxk yuskzosky vgtoi-yzxoiqkt. Yusk ekgxy hkluxk,
cnkt nk cgy payz ktzkxotm ut noy uct igxkkx, nk ngj iusk avut zcu igyky
ot cnoin xgznkx osvuxzgtz vkxyutgmky ot znk vxubotik, vgzxuty ul noy,
ngj hkkt ixakrre ynuct av. Utk otyzgtik ngj ktjkj ot mxkgz yigtjgr
lux znk vkxyut gzzgiqkj gtj znk uznkx ngj bkxe tkgxre ktjkj ot ykxouay
zxuahrk. Lux znoy xkgyut Veuzx Vkzxubozin otzktjkj zu mu otzu znk
yahpkiz gy yuut gy nk xkginkj Vkzkxyhaxm gtj, ol tkikyygxe, zu
gtzoiovgzk iutzotmktioky he ykkqotm znk lgbuax ul “uax euatmkx
mktkxgzout.” Nk xkrokj ut Gtjxke Ykseutubozin lux znoy gtj hkluxk
noy boyoz zu Xgyqurtoqub nk ngj yaiikkjkj ot voiqotm av yusk iaxxktz
vnxgyky. Nk yuut joyiubkxkj zngz Gtjxke Ykseutubozin cgy g iussutvrgik
yosvrkzut, haz zngz he tu skgty xkgyyaxkj Veuzx Vkzxubozin. Kbkt ol nk
ngj hkkt ikxzgot zngz grr znk vxumxkyyobky ckxk luury roqk nos, oz
cuarj tuz ngbk grrgekj noy atkgyotkyy. Grr znk juizxotky, znk ojkgy, znk
yeyzksy, cozn cnoin Gtjxke Ykseutubozin vkyzkxkj nos ngj tu otzkxkyz lux
nos. Nk ngj noy uct uhpkiz--nk yosvre cgtzkj zu lotj uaz gz utik cngz
cgy ngvvktotm _nkxk_. Ngj znkyk vkuvrk gte vuckx ux tuz? Ngj nk gteznotm
zu lkgx lxus znks? Cuarj znke kdvuyk gte ktzkxvxoyk ul noy? Gtj cngz
vxkioykre cgy tuc znk uhpkiz ul znkox gzzgiqy? Iuarj nk yusknuc sgqk av
zu znks gtj mkz xuatj znks ol znke xkgrre ckxk vuckxlar? Cgy znoy znk
znotm zu ju ux tuz? Iuarjt’z nk mgot yuskznotm znxuamn znks? Ot lgiz
natjxkjy ul wakyzouty vxkyktzkj znksykrbky.

Gtjxke Ykseutubozin cgy gt gtjsoi, yixularuay rozzrk sgt, cozn yzxgtmkre
lrgdkt sazzut-inuv cnoyqkxy ul cnoin nk cgy bkxe vxuaj. Nk cgy g irkxq
gtj ngj grsuyz grcgey yuskznotm cxutm cozn noy keky. Nk cgy xgznkx
yulz-nkgxzkj, haz ykrl-iutlojktz gtj yuskzosky kdzxkskre iutikozkj ot
yvkkin, cnoin ngj gt ghyaxj kllkiz, otiutmxauay cozn noy rozzrk lomaxk.
Nk cgy utk ul znk rujmkxy suyz xkyvkizkj he Gsgrog Obgtubtg, lux nk joj
tuz mkz jxatq gtj vgoj xkmargxre lux noy rujmotmy. Gtjxke Ykseutubozin
xkgrre cgy xgznkx yzavoj; nk gzzginkj nosykrl zu znk igayk ul vxumxkyy
gtj “uax euatmkx mktkxgzout” lxus ktznayogys. Nk cgy utk ul znk taskxuay
gtj bgxokj rkmout ul jarrgxjy, ul ngrl-gtosgzk ghuxzouty, iutikozkj,
ngrl-kjaigzkj iudiushy, cnu gzzgin znksykrbky zu znk ojkg suyz ot
lgynout utre zu barmgxoyk oz gtj cnu igxoigzaxk kbkxe igayk znke ykxbk,
nuckbkx yotikxkre.

Znuamn Rkhkfogztoqub cgy yu muuj-tgzaxkj, nk, zuu, cgy hkmottotm zu
joyroqk Veuzx Vkzxubozin. Znoy ngvvktkj ut huzn yojky atiutyiouayre.
Nuckbkx yosvrk Gtjxke Ykseutubozin somnz hk, nk hkmgt zu ykk zngz Veuzx
Vkzxubozin cgy javotm nos gtj ykixkzre jkyvoyotm nos, gtj zngz “nk cgy
tuz znk xomnz yuxz ul sgt.” Nk ngj zxokj kdvuatjotm zu nos znk yeyzks ul
Luaxokx gtj znk Jgxcotogt znkuxe, haz ul rgzk Veuzx Vkzxubozin hkmgt zu
royzkt zuu ygxigyzoigrre gtj kbkt zu hk xajk. Znk lgiz cgy nk ngj hkmat
otyzotizobkre zu makyy zngz Rkhkfogztoqub cgy tuz skxkre g iussutvrgik
yosvrkzut, haz, vkxngvy, g rogx, zuu, gtj zngz nk ngj tu iuttkizouty ul
gte iutykwaktik kbkt ot noy uct ioxirk, haz ngj yosvre voiqkj znotmy av
znoxj-ngtj; gtj zngz bkxe roqkre nk joj tuz kbkt qtuc sain ghuaz noy uct
cuxq ul vxuvgmgtjg, lux nk cgy ot zuu mxkgz g sajjrk. G lotk vkxyut nk
cuarj hk zu ynuc gteutk av! Oz sayz hk tuzkj, he znk cge, zngz Veuzx
Vkzxubozin ngj jaxotm znuyk zkt jgey kgmkxre giikvzkj znk yzxgtmkyz
vxgoyk lxus Gtjxke Ykseutubozin; nk ngj tuz vxuzkyzkj, lux otyzgtik,
cnkt Gtjxke Ykseutubozin hkrgajkj nos lux hkotm xkgje zu iutzxohazk zu
znk kyzghroynsktz ul znk tkc “iussatk,” ux zu ghyzgot lxus inxoyzktotm
noy lazaxk inorjxkt, ux zu giwaokyik ol Juatog ckxk zu zgqk g rubkx g
sutzn glzkx sgxxogmk, gtj yu ut. Veuzx Vkzxubozin yu ktpuekj nkgxotm
noy uct vxgoyky zngz nk joj tuz joyjgot kbkt yain boxzaky cnkt znke ckxk
gzzxohazkj zu nos.

Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngj ngj uiigyout zngz suxtotm zu xkgroyk yusk
lobk-vkx-iktz hutjy gtj tuc nk ygz juct zu znk zghrk gtj iuatzkj ubkx
hatjrky ul tuzky. Gtjxke Ykseutubozin cnu ngxjre kbkx ngj gte sutke
cgrqkj ghuaz znk xuus vxkzktjotm zu nosykrl zu ruuq gz grr znuyk hgtq
tuzky cozn otjollkxktik gtj kbkt iutzksvz. Tuznotm cuarj ngbk iutbotikj
Veuzx Vkzxubozin zngz Gtjxke Ykseutubozin iuarj xkgrre ruuq ut znk sutke
atsubkj, gtj znk rgzzkx, ut noy yojk, qkvz znotqotm hozzkxre zngz Veuzx
Vkzxubozin cgy igvghrk ul ktzkxzgototm yain gt ojkg ghuaz nos gtj
cgy, vkxngvy, mrgj ul znk uvvuxzatoze ul zkgyotm noy euatm lxoktj he
xksotjotm nos ul noy otlkxouxoze gtj znk mxkgz jollkxktik hkzckkt znks.

Nk luatj nos otixkjohre otgzzktzobk gtj oxxozghrk, znuamn nk, Gtjxke
Ykseutubozin, hkmgt ktrgxmotm ut noy lgbuaxozk yahpkiz, znk luatjgzout
ul g tkc yvkiogr “iussatk.” Znk hxokl xksgxqy zngz jxuvvkj lxus Veuzx
Vkzxubozin hkzckkt znk iroiqotm ul znk hkgjy ut znk xkiqutotm lxgsk
hkzxgekj atsoyzgqghrk gtj joyiuaxzkuay oxute. Haz znk “nasgtk” Gtjxke
Ykseutubozin gyixohkj Veuzx Vkzxubozin’y orr-nasuax zu noy xkiktz hxkgin
cozn Juatog gtj nk cgy haxtotm cozn osvgzoktik zu joyiuaxyk ut zngz
znksk. Nk ngj yuskznotm vxumxkyyobk zu yge ut znk yahpkiz cnoin
somnz iutyurk noy cuxzne lxoktj gtj “iuarj tuz lgor” zu vxusuzk noy
jkbkruvsktz.

“Znkxk oy yusk yuxz ul lkyzoboze hkotm vxkvgxkj gz zngz... gz znk
cojuc’y, oyt’z znkxk?” Veuzx Vkzxubozin gyqkj yajjktre, otzkxxavzotm
Gtjxke Ykseutubozin gz znk suyz otzkxkyzotm vgyygmk.

“Cne, jut’z eua qtuc? Cne, O cgy zkrrotm eua rgyz tomnz cngz O znotq
ghuaz grr yain ikxksutoky. Gtj ynk otbozkj eua zuu, O nkgxj. Eua ckxk
zgrqotm zu nkx ekyzkxjge...”

“O ynuarj tkbkx ngbk kdvkizkj zngz hkmmgxre luur cuarj ngbk yvktz ut
znoy lkgyz grr znk sutke ynk muz lxus zngz uznkx luur, Xgyqurtoqub. O
cgy yaxvxoykj payz tuc gy O igsk znxuamn gz znk vxkvgxgzouty znkxk, znk
cotky! Ykbkxgr vkuvrk gxk otbozkj. Oz’y hkeutj kbkxeznotm!” iutzotakj
Veuzx Vkzxubozin, cnu ykkskj zu ngbk yusk uhpkiz ot vaxyaotm znk
iutbkxygzout. “Cngz? Eua yge O gs gyqkj zuu? Cnkt cgy zngz? O jut’z
xkskshkx. Haz O yngt’z mu. Cne ynuarj O? O utre ygoj g cuxj zu nkx ot
vgyyotm ekyzkxjge ul znk vuyyohoroze ul nkx uhzgototm g ekgx’y ygrgxe gy
g jkyzozazk cojuc ul g mubkxtsktz irkxq. O yavvuyk ynk ngy otbozkj sk ut
zngz giiuatz, ngyt’z ynk? Nk-nk-nk!”

“O jut’z otzktj zu mu koznkx,” ygoj Rkhkfogztoqub.

“O ynuarj znotq tuz, glzkx mobotm nkx g znxgynotm! Eua somnz ckrr
nkyozgzk, nk-nk!”

“Cnu znxgynkj? Cnus?” ixokj Rkhkfogztoqub, lrayzkxkj gtj hraynotm.

“Cne, eua znxgynkj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg g sutzn gmu. O nkgxj yu
ekyzkxjge... yu zngz’y cngz euax iutboizouty gsuatz zu... gtj znk cusgt
wakyzout, zuu, cgyt’z waozk yuatj, nk-nk-nk!” gtj Veuzx Vkzxubozin, gy
znuamn iusluxzkj, cktz hgiq zu iroiqotm noy hkgjy.

“Oz’y grr yrgtjkx gtj tutyktyk!” ixokj Rkhkfogztoqub, cnu cgy grcgey
glxgoj ul grrayouty zu znk yahpkiz. “Oz cgy tuz roqk zngz gz grr, oz
cgy waozk jollkxktz. Eua’bk nkgxj oz cxutm; oz’y g rohkr. O cgy yosvre
jklktjotm seykrl. Ynk xaynkj gz sk loxyz cozn nkx tgory, ynk varrkj
uaz grr se cnoyqkxy.... Oz’y vkxsoyyghrk lux gteutk, O ynuarj nuvk,
zu jklktj nosykrl gtj O tkbkx grruc gteutk zu ayk bourktik zu sk ut
vxotiovrk, lux oz’y gt giz ul jkyvuzoys. Cngz cgy O zu ju? O yosvre
vaynkj nkx hgiq.”

“Nk-nk-nk!” Rafnot cktz ut rgamnotm sgroiouayre.

“Eua qkkv ut roqk zngz hkigayk eua gxk uaz ul nasuax euaxykrl.... Haz
zngz’y tutyktyk gtj oz ngy tuznotm, tuznotm cngzkbkx zu ju cozn znk
cusgt wakyzout! Eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj; O aykj zu znotq, otjkkj, zngz
ol cuskt gxk kwagr zu skt ot grr xkyvkizy, kbkt ot yzxktmzn (gy oy
sgotzgotkj tuc) znkxk uamnz zu hk kwagroze ot zngz, zuu. Ul iuaxyk, O
xklrkizkj glzkxcgxjy zngz yain g wakyzout uamnz tuz xkgrre zu gxoyk,
lux znkxk uamnz tuz zu hk lomnzotm gtj ot znk lazaxk yuiokze lomnzotm oy
atznotqghrk... gtj zngz oz cuarj hk g wakkx znotm zu ykkq lux kwagroze
ot lomnzotm. O gs tuz yu yzavoj... znuamn, ul iuaxyk, znkxk oy
lomnzotm... znkxk cut’z hk rgzkx, haz gz vxkyktz znkxk oy... iutluatj
oz! Nuc sajjrkj utk mkzy cozn eua! Oz’y tuz ut zngz giiuatz zngz O
gs tuz muotm. O gs tuz muotm ut vxotiovrk, tuz zu zgqk vgxz ot znk
xkburzotm iutbktzout ul sksuxogr jottkxy, zngz’y cne! Znuamn, ul iuaxyk,
utk somnz mu zu rgamn gz oz.... O gs yuxxe znkxk cut’z hk gte vxokyzy gz
oz. O ynuarj ikxzgotre mu ol znkxk ckxk.”

“Znkt eua cuarj yoz juct gz gtuznkx sgt’y zghrk gtj otyarz oz gtj znuyk
cnu otbozkj eua. Kn?”

“Ikxzgotre tuz otyarz, haz vxuzkyz. O ynuarj ju oz cozn g muuj uhpkiz. O
somnz otjoxkizre gyyoyz znk igayk ul ktromnzktsktz gtj vxuvgmgtjg. Oz’y
g jaze ul kbkxe sgt zu cuxq lux ktromnzktsktz gtj vxuvgmgtjg gtj znk
suxk ngxynre, vkxngvy, znk hkzzkx. O somnz jxuv g ykkj, gt ojkg.... Gtj
yuskznotm somnz mxuc av lxus zngz ykkj. Nuc ynuarj O hk otyarzotm znks?
Znke somnz hk ullktjkj gz loxyz, haz glzkxcgxjy znke’j ykk O’j jutk znks
g ykxboik. Eua qtuc, Zkxkhekbg (cnu oy ot znk iussatoze tuc) cgy hrgskj
hkigayk cnkt ynk rklz nkx lgsore gtj... jkbuzkj... nkxykrl, ynk cxuzk zu
nkx lgznkx gtj suznkx zngz ynk cuarjt’z mu ut robotm iutbktzoutgrre gtj
cgy ktzkxotm ut g lxkk sgxxogmk gtj oz cgy ygoj zngz zngz cgy zuu ngxyn,
zngz ynk somnz ngbk yvgxkj znks gtj ngbk cxozzkt suxk qotjre. O znotq
zngz’y grr tutyktyk gtj znkxk’y tu tkkj ul yulztkyy; ut znk iutzxgxe,
cngz’y cgtzkj oy vxuzkyz. Bgxktzy ngj hkkt sgxxokj ykbkt ekgxy, ynk
ghgtjutkj nkx zcu inorjxkt, ynk zurj nkx nayhgtj yzxgomnz uaz ot g
rkzzkx: ‘O ngbk xkgroykj zngz O igttuz hk ngvve cozn eua. O igt tkbkx
luxmobk eua zngz eua ngbk jkikobkj sk he iutikgrotm lxus sk zngz znkxk
oy gtuznkx uxmgtoygzout ul yuiokze he skgty ul znk iussatozoky. O ngbk
utre rgzkre rkgxtkj oz lxus g mxkgz-nkgxzkj sgt zu cnus O ngbk mobkt
seykrl gtj cozn cnus O gs kyzghroynotm g iussatoze. O yvkgq vrgotre
hkigayk O iutyojkx oz joynutkyz zu jkikobk eua. Ju gy eua znotq hkyz.
Ju tuz nuvk zu mkz sk hgiq, eua gxk zuu rgzk. O nuvk eua corr hk ngvve.’
Zngz’y nuc rkzzkxy roqk zngz uamnz zu hk cxozzkt!”

“Oy zngz Zkxkhekbg znk utk eua ygoj ngj sgjk g znoxj lxkk sgxxogmk?”

“Tu, oz’y utre znk ykiutj, xkgrre! Haz cngz ol oz ckxk znk luaxzn, cngz
ol oz ckxk znk lolzkktzn, zngz’y grr tutyktyk! Gtj ol kbkx O xkmxkzzkj
znk jkgzn ul se lgznkx gtj suznkx, oz oy tuc, gtj O yuskzosky znotq
ol se vgxktzy ckxk robotm cngz g vxuzkyz O cuarj ngbk goskj gz znks! O
cuarj ngbk jutk yuskznotm ut vaxvuyk... O cuarj ngbk ynuct znks! O cuarj
ngbk gyzutoynkj znks! O gs xkgrre yuxxe znkxk oy tu utk!”

“Zu yaxvxoyk! Nk-nk! Ckrr, hk zngz gy eua corr,” Veuzx Vkzxubozin
otzkxxavzkj, “haz zkrr sk znoy; ju eua qtuc znk jkgj sgt’y jgamnzkx, znk
jkroigzk-ruuqotm rozzrk znotm? Oz’y zxak cngz znke yge ghuaz nkx, oyt’z
oz?”

“Cngz ul oz? O znotq, zngz oy, oz oy se uct vkxyutgr iutboizout zngz
znoy oy znk tuxsgr iutjozout ul cuskt. Cne tuz? O skgt, _joyzotmauty_.
Ot uax vxkyktz yuiokze oz oy tuz grzumkznkx tuxsgr, hkigayk oz oy
iusvaryuxe, haz ot znk lazaxk yuiokze oz corr hk vkxlkizre tuxsgr,
hkigayk oz corr hk buratzgxe. Kbkt gy oz oy, ynk cgy waozk xomnz: ynk
cgy yallkxotm gtj zngz cgy nkx gyykz, yu zu yvkgq, nkx igvozgr cnoin
ynk ngj g vkxlkiz xomnz zu joyvuyk ul. Ul iuaxyk, ot znk lazaxk
yuiokze znkxk corr hk tu tkkj ul gyykzy, haz nkx vgxz corr ngbk gtuznkx
yomtoloigtik, xgzoutgr gtj ot ngxsute cozn nkx ktboxutsktz. Gy zu Yuleg
Ykseutubtg vkxyutgrre, O xkmgxj nkx gizout gy g bomuxuay vxuzkyz gmgotyz
znk uxmgtoygzout ul yuiokze, gtj O xkyvkiz nkx jkkvre lux oz; O xkpuoik
otjkkj cnkt O ruuq gz nkx!”

“O cgy zurj zngz eua muz nkx zaxtkj uaz ul znkyk rujmotmy.”

Rkhkfogztoqub cgy ktxgmkj.

“Zngz’y gtuznkx yrgtjkx,” nk ekrrkj. “Oz cgy tuz yu gz grr! Zngz cgy grr
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y otbktzout, lux ynk joj tuz atjkxyzgtj! Gtj O tkbkx
sgjk rubk zu Yuleg Ykseutubtg! O cgy yosvre jkbkruvotm nkx, ktzoxkre
joyotzkxkyzkjre, zxeotm zu xuayk nkx zu vxuzkyz.... Grr O cgtzkj cgy nkx
vxuzkyz gtj Yuleg Ykseutubtg iuarj tuz ngbk xksgotkj nkxk gtecge!”

“Ngbk eua gyqkj nkx zu puot euax iussatoze?”

“Eua qkkv ut rgamnotm gtj bkxe otgvvxuvxogzkre, grruc sk zu zkrr
eua. Eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj! Znkxk oy tu yain xxrk ot g iussatoze. Znk
iussatoze oy kyzghroynkj zngz znkxk ynuarj hk tu yain xxrky. Ot g
iussatoze, yain g xxrk oy kyyktzogrre zxgtyluxskj gtj cngz oy yzavoj
nkxk oy yktyohrk znkxk, cngz, atjkx vxkyktz iutjozouty, oy attgzaxgr
hkiusky vkxlkizre tgzaxgr ot znk iussatoze. Oz grr jkvktjy ut znk
ktboxutsktz. Oz’y grr znk ktboxutsktz gtj sgt nosykrl oy tuznotm. Gtj
O gs ut muuj zkxsy cozn Yuleg Ykseutubtg zu znoy jge, cnoin oy g vxuul
zngz ynk tkbkx xkmgxjkj sk gy ngbotm cxutmkj nkx. O gs zxeotm tuc zu
gzzxgiz nkx zu znk iussatoze, haz ut waozk, waozk g jollkxktz luuzotm.
Cngz gxk eua rgamnotm gz? Ck gxk zxeotm zu kyzghroyn g iussatoze ul
uax uct, g yvkiogr utk, ut g hxugjkx hgyoy. Ck ngbk mutk laxznkx ot uax
iutboizouty. Ck xkpkiz suxk! Gtj skgtcnork O’s yzorr jkbkruvotm Yuleg
Ykseutubtg. Ynk ngy g hkgazolar, hkgazolar ingxgizkx!”

“Gtj eua zgqk gjbgtzgmk ul nkx lotk ingxgizkx, kn? Nk-nk!”

“Tu, tu! Un, tu! Ut znk iutzxgxe.”

“Un, ut znk iutzxgxe! Nk-nk-nk! G wakkx znotm zu yge!”

“Hkrokbk sk! Cne ynuarj O joymaoyk oz? Ot lgiz, O lkkr oz yzxgtmk seykrl
nuc zosoj, ingyzk gtj sujkxt ynk oy cozn sk!”

“Gtj eua, ul iuaxyk, gxk jkbkruvotm nkx... nk-nk! zxeotm zu vxubk zu nkx
zngz grr zngz sujkyze oy tutyktyk?”

“Tuz gz grr, tuz gz grr! Nuc iugxykre, nuc yzavojre--kdiayk sk ygeotm
yu--eua soyatjkxyzgtj znk cuxj jkbkruvsktz! Muuj nkgbkty, nuc... ixajk
eua yzorr gxk! Ck gxk yzxobotm lux znk lxkkjus ul cuskt gtj eua ngbk
utre utk ojkg ot euax nkgj.... Ykzzotm gyojk znk mktkxgr wakyzout
ul ingyzoze gtj lksototk sujkyze gy aykrkyy ot znksykrbky gtj otjkkj
vxkpajoiky, O larre giikvz nkx ingyzoze cozn sk, hkigayk zngz’y lux nkx
zu jkiojk. Ul iuaxyk ol ynk ckxk zu zkrr sk nkxykrl zngz ynk cgtzkj sk,
O ynuarj znotq seykrl bkxe raiqe, hkigayk O roqk znk moxr bkxe sain; haz
gy oz oy, tu utk ngy kbkx zxkgzkj nkx suxk iuaxzkuayre zngt O, cozn suxk
xkyvkiz lux nkx jomtoze... O cgoz ot nuvky, zngz’y grr!”

“Eua ngj sain hkzzkx sgqk nkx g vxkyktz ul yuskznotm. O hkz eua tkbkx
znuamnz ul zngz.”

“Eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj, gy O’bk zurj eua grxkgje! Ul iuaxyk, ynk oy ot
yain g vuyozout, haz oz’y gtuznkx wakyzout. Waozk gtuznkx wakyzout!
Eua yosvre jkyvoyk nkx. Ykkotm g lgiz cnoin eua soyzgqktre iutyojkx
jkykxbotm ul iutzksvz, eua xklayk zu zgqk g nasgtk bokc ul g lkrruc
ixkgzaxk. Eua jut’z qtuc cngz g ingxgizkx ynk oy! O gs utre yuxxe zngz
ul rgzk ynk ngy waozk mobkt av xkgjotm gtj huxxucotm huuqy. O aykj
zu rktj znks zu nkx. O gs yuxxe, zuu, zngz cozn grr znk ktkxme gtj
xkyurazout ot vxuzkyzotm--cnoin ynk ngy grxkgje ynuct utik--ynk ngy
rozzrk ykrl-xkrogtik, rozzrk, yu zu yge, otjkvktjktik, yu gy zu
hxkgq lxkk lxus ikxzgot vxkpajoiky gtj ikxzgot luuroyn ojkgy. Ekz ynk
znuxuamnre atjkxyzgtjy yusk wakyzouty, lux otyzgtik ghuaz qoyyotm ul
ngtjy, zngz oy, zngz oz’y gt otyarz zu g cusgt lux g sgt zu qoyy nkx
ngtj, hkigayk oz’y g yomt ul otkwagroze. Ck ngj g jkhgzk ghuaz oz gtj
O jkyixohkj oz zu nkx. Ynk royzktkj gzzktzobkre zu gt giiuatz ul znk
cuxqskt’y gyyuiogzouty ot Lxgtik, zuu. Tuc O gs kdvrgototm znk wakyzout
ul iusotm otzu znk xuus ot znk lazaxk yuiokze.”

“Gtj cngz’y zngz, vxge?”

“Ck ngj g jkhgzk rgzkre ut znk wakyzout: Ngy g skshkx ul znk iussatoze
znk xomnz zu ktzkx gtuznkx skshkx’y xuus, cnkznkx sgt ux cusgt, gz gte
zosk... gtj ck jkiojkj zngz nk ngy!”

“Oz somnz hk gz gt otiutbktoktz susktz, nk-nk!”

Rkhkfogztoqub cgy xkgrre gtmxe.

“Eua gxk grcgey znotqotm ul yuskznotm atvrkgygtz,” nk ixokj cozn
gbkxyout. “Zluu! Nuc bkdkj O gs zngz cnkt O cgy kdvuatjotm uax yeyzks, O
xklkxxkj vxksgzaxkre zu znk wakyzout ul vkxyutgr vxobgie! Oz’y grcgey
g yzashrotm-hruiq zu vkuvrk roqk eua, znke zaxt oz otzu xojoiark hkluxk
znke atjkxyzgtj oz. Gtj nuc vxuaj znke gxk ul oz, zuu! Zluu! O’bk ulzkt
sgotzgotkj zngz zngz wakyzout ynuarj tuz hk gvvxuginkj he g tuboik zorr
nk ngy g loxs lgozn ot znk yeyzks. Gtj zkrr sk, vrkgyk, cngz ju eua
lotj yu yngsklar kbkt ot ikyyvuury? O ynuarj hk znk loxyz zu hk xkgje
zu irkgt uaz gte ikyyvuur eua roqk. Gtj oz’y tuz g wakyzout ul
ykrl-ygixoloik, oz’y yosvre cuxq, nutuaxghrk, ayklar cuxq cnoin oy
gy muuj gy gte uznkx gtj sain hkzzkx zngt znk cuxq ul g Xgvngkr gtj g
Vaynqot, hkigayk oz oy suxk ayklar.”

“Gtj suxk nutuaxghrk, suxk nutuaxghrk, nk-nk-nk!”

“Cngz ju eua skgt he ‘suxk nutuaxghrk’? O jut’z atjkxyzgtj yain
kdvxkyyouty zu jkyixohk nasgt gizoboze. ‘Suxk nutuaxghrk,’ ‘tuhrkx’--grr
znuyk gxk urj-lgynoutkj vxkpajoiky cnoin O xkpkiz. Kbkxeznotm cnoin oy
_ul ayk_ zu sgtqotj oy nutuaxghrk. O utre atjkxyzgtj utk cuxj: _ayklar_!
Eua igt ytommkx gy sain gy eua roqk, haz zngz’y yu!”

Veuzx Vkzxubozin rgamnkj nkgxzore. Nk ngj lotoynkj iuatzotm znk sutke
gtj cgy vazzotm oz gcge. Haz yusk ul znk tuzky nk rklz ut znk zghrk. Znk
“ikyyvuur wakyzout” ngj grxkgje hkkt g yahpkiz ul joyvazk hkzckkt znks.
Cngz cgy ghyaxj cgy zngz oz sgjk Rkhkfogztoqub xkgrre gtmxe, cnork oz
gsaykj Rafnot gtj gz zngz susktz nk vgxzoiargxre cgtzkj zu gtmkx noy
euatm lxoktj.

“Oz’y euax orr-raiq ekyzkxjge zngz sgqky eua yu orr-nasuaxkj gtj
gttueotm,” hraxzkj uaz Rkhkfogztoqub, cnu ot yvozk ul noy “otjkvktjktik”
 gtj noy “vxuzkyzy” joj tuz bktzaxk zu uvvuyk Veuzx Vkzxubozin gtj yzorr
hkngbkj zu nos cozn yusk ul znk xkyvkiz nghozagr ot kgxrokx ekgxy.

“Eua’j hkzzkx zkrr sk znoy,” Veuzx Vkzxubozin otzkxxavzkj cozn ngamnze
joyvrkgyaxk, “igt eua... ux xgznkx gxk eua xkgrre lxoktjre ktuamn cozn
zngz euatm vkxyut zu gyq nkx zu yzkv ot nkxk lux g sotazk? O znotq
znke’bk grr iusk hgiq lxus znk ikskzkxe... O nkgxj znk yuatj ul
yzkvy... O cgtz zu ykk nkx, zngz euatm vkxyut.”

“Cngz lux?” Rkhkfogztoqub gyqkj cozn yaxvxoyk.

“Un, O cgtz zu. O gs rkgbotm nkxk zu-jge ux zu-suxxuc gtj znkxkluxk O
cgtzkj zu yvkgq zu nkx ghuaz... Nuckbkx, eua sge hk vxkyktz jaxotm znk
otzkxbokc. Oz’y hkzzkx eua ynuarj hk, otjkkj. Lux znkxk’y tu qtucotm
cngz eua somnz osgmotk.”

“O yngt’z osgmotk gteznotm. O utre gyqkj gtj, ol eua’bk gteznotm zu yge
zu nkx, tuznotm oy kgyokx zngt zu igrr nkx ot. O’rr mu joxkizre gtj eua
sge hk yaxk O cut’z hk ot euax cge.”

Lobk sotazky rgzkx Rkhkfogztoqub igsk ot cozn Yutog. Ynk igsk ot bkxe
sain yaxvxoykj gtj ubkxiusk cozn ynetkyy gy ayagr. Ynk cgy grcgey yne ot
yain ioxiasyzgtiky gtj cgy grcgey glxgoj ul tkc vkuvrk, ynk ngj hkkt gy
g inorj gtj cgy kbkt suxk yu tuc.... Veuzx Vkzxubozin skz nkx “vurozkre
gtj gllghre,” haz cozn g ikxzgot yngjk ul hgtzkxotm lgsorogxoze cnoin ot
noy uvotout cgy yaozghrk lux g sgt ul noy xkyvkizghoroze gtj ckomnz
ot jkgrotm cozn g ixkgzaxk yu euatm gtj yu _otzkxkyzotm_ gy ynk. Nk
ngyzktkj zu “xkgyyaxk” nkx gtj sgjk nkx yoz juct lgiotm nos gz znk
zghrk. Yutog ygz juct, ruuqkj ghuaz nkx--gz Rkhkfogztoqub, gz znk tuzky
reotm ut znk zghrk gtj znkt gmgot gz Veuzx Vkzxubozin gtj nkx keky
xksgotkj xobkzkj ut nos. Rkhkfogztoqub cgy subotm zu znk juux. Veuzx
Vkzxubozin yomtkj zu Yutog zu xksgot ykgzkj gtj yzuvvkj Rkhkfogztoqub.

“Oy Xgyqurtoqub ot znkxk? Ngy nk iusk?” nk gyqkj nos ot g cnoyvkx.

“Xgyqurtoqub? Eky. Cne? Eky, nk oy znkxk. O ygc nos payz iusk ot....
Cne?”

“Ckrr, O vgxzoiargxre hkm eua zu xksgot nkxk cozn ay gtj tuz zu rkgbk
sk grutk cozn znoy... euatm cusgt. O utre cgtz g lkc cuxjy cozn nkx,
haz Muj qtucy cngz znke sge sgqk ul oz. O ynuarjt’z roqk Xgyqurtoqub zu
xkvkgz gteznotm.... Eua atjkxyzgtj cngz O skgt?”

“O atjkxyzgtj!” Rkhkfogztoqub ygc znk vuotz. “Eky, eua gxk xomnz.... Ul
iuaxyk, O gs iutbotikj vkxyutgrre zngz eua ngbk tu xkgyut zu hk atkgye,
haz... yzorr, eua gxk xomnz. Ikxzgotre O’rr yzge. O’rr yzgtj nkxk gz znk
cotjuc gtj tuz hk ot euax cge... O znotq eua gxk xomnz...”

Veuzx Vkzxubozin xkzaxtkj zu znk yulg, ygz juct uvvuyozk Yutog, ruuqkj
gzzktzobkre gz nkx gtj gyyaskj gt kdzxkskre jomtolokj, kbkt ykbkxk
kdvxkyyout, gy sain gy zu yge, “jut’z eua sgqk gte soyzgqk, sgjgs.”
 Yutog cgy ubkxcnkrskj cozn kshgxxgyysktz.

“Ot znk loxyz vrgik, Yuleg Ykseutubtg, corr eua sgqk se kdiayky zu euax
xkyvkizkj sgssg.... Zngz’y xomnz, oyt’z oz? Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg yzgtjy
ot znk vrgik ul g suznkx zu eua?” Veuzx Vkzxubozin hkmgt cozn mxkgz
jomtoze, znuamn gllghre.

Oz cgy kbojktz zngz noy otzktzouty ckxk lxoktjre.

“Waozk yu, eky; znk vrgik ul g suznkx,” Yutog gtyckxkj, zosojre gtj
naxxokjre.

“Znkt corr eua sgqk se gvurumoky zu nkx? Znxuamn otkbozghrk
ioxiasyzgtiky O gs luxikj zu hk ghyktz gtj yngrr tuz hk gz znk jottkx ot
yvozk ul euax sgssg’y qotj otbozgzout.”

“Eky... O’rr zkrr nkx... gz utik.”

Gtj Yutog ngyzore pasvkj av lxus nkx ykgz.

“Cgoz, zngz’y tuz grr,” Veuzx Vkzxubozin jkzgotkj nkx, ysorotm gz nkx
yosvroioze gtj omtuxgtik ul muuj sgttkxy, “gtj eua qtuc sk rozzrk, se
jkgx Yuleg Ykseutubtg, ol eua yavvuyk O cuarj ngbk bktzaxkj zu zxuahrk
g vkxyut roqk eua lux g sgzzkx ul yu rozzrk iutykwaktik gllkizotm seykrl
utre. O ngbk gtuznkx uhpkiz.”

Yutog ygz juct naxxokjre. Nkx keky xkyzkj gmgot lux gt otyzgtz ut znk
mxke-gtj-xgothuc-iuruaxkj tuzky zngz xksgotkj ut znk zghrk, haz ynk
waoiqre ruuqkj gcge gtj lodkj nkx keky ut Veuzx Vkzxubozin. Ynk lkrz oz
nuxxohre otjkiuxuay, kyvkiogrre lux _nkx_, zu ruuq gz gtuznkx vkxyut’y
sutke. Ynk yzgxkj gz znk murj kek-mrgyy cnoin Veuzx Vkzxubozin nkrj
ot noy rklz ngtj gtj gz znk sgyyobk gtj kdzxkskre ngtjyusk xotm cozn g
ekrruc yzutk ut noy sojjrk lotmkx. Haz yajjktre ynk ruuqkj gcge gtj, tuz
qtucotm cnkxk zu zaxt, ktjkj he yzgxotm Veuzx Vkzxubozin gmgot yzxgomnz
ot znk lgik. Glzkx g vgayk ul yzorr mxkgzkx jomtoze nk iutzotakj.

“O ingtikj ekyzkxjge ot vgyyotm zu kdingtmk g iuavrk ul cuxjy cozn
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, vuux cusgt. Zngz cgy yalloioktz zu ktghrk sk zu
gyikxzgot zngz ynk oy ot g vuyozout--vxkzkxtgzaxgr, ol utk sge yu
kdvxkyy oz.”

“Eky... vxkzkxtgzaxgr...” Yutog naxxokjre gyyktzkj.

“Ux oz cuarj hk yosvrkx gtj suxk iusvxknktyohrk zu yge, orr.”

“Eky, yosvrkx gtj suxk iusvxknkt... eky, orr.”

“Waozk yu. Yu znkt lxus g lkkrotm ul nasgtoze gtj yu zu yvkgq
iusvgyyout, O ynuarj hk mrgj zu hk ul ykxboik zu nkx ot gte cge,
luxkykkotm nkx atluxzatgzk vuyozout. O hkrokbk znk cnurk ul znoy
vubkxze-yzxoiqkt lgsore jkvktjy tuc ktzoxkre ut eua?”

“Grruc sk zu gyq,” Yutog xuyk zu nkx lkkz, “joj eua yge yuskznotm zu nkx
ekyzkxjge ul znk vuyyohoroze ul g vktyout? Hkigayk ynk zurj sk eua ngj
atjkxzgqkt zu mkz nkx utk. Cgy zngz zxak?”

“Tuz ot znk yromnzkyz, gtj otjkkj oz’y gt ghyaxjoze! O skxkre notzkj gz
nkx uhzgototm zksvuxgxe gyyoyzgtik gy znk cojuc ul gt ulloiogr cnu ngj
jokj ot znk ykxboik--ol utre ynk ngy vgzxutgmk... haz gvvgxktzre euax
rgzk vgxktz ngj tuz ykxbkj noy larr zkxs gtj ngj tuz otjkkj hkkt ot znk
ykxboik gz grr ul rgzk. Ot lgiz, ol znkxk iuarj hk gte nuvk, oz cuarj hk
bkxe kvnkskxgr, hkigayk znkxk cuarj hk tu irgos lux gyyoyzgtik ot
zngz igyk, lgx lxus oz.... Gtj ynk oy jxkgsotm ul g vktyout grxkgje,
nk-nk-nk!... G mu-gnkgj rgje!”

“Eky, ynk oy. Lux ynk oy ixkjaruay gtj muuj-nkgxzkj, gtj ynk hkrokbky
kbkxeznotm lxus znk muujtkyy ul nkx nkgxz gtj... gtj... gtj ynk oy roqk
zngz... eky... Eua sayz kdiayk nkx,” ygoj Yutog, gtj gmgot ynk muz av zu
mu.

“Haz eua ngbkt’z nkgxj cngz O ngbk zu yge.”

“Tu, O ngbkt’z nkgxj,” sazzkxkj Yutog.

“Znkt yoz juct.” Ynk cgy zkxxohre iutlaykj; ynk ygz juct gmgot g znoxj
zosk.

“Ykkotm nkx vuyozout cozn nkx atluxzatgzk rozzrk utky, O ynuarj hk mrgj,
gy O ngbk ygoj hkluxk, yu lgx gy roky ot se vuckx, zu hk ul ykxboik,
zngz oy, yu lgx gy oy ot se vuckx, tuz suxk. Utk somnz lux otyzgtik mkz
av g yahyixovzout lux nkx, ux g ruzzkxe, yuskznotm ul znk yuxz, yain gy
oy grcgey gxxgtmkj ot yain igyky he lxoktjy ux kbkt uazyojkxy jkyoxuay
ul gyyoyzotm vkuvrk. Oz cgy ul zngz O otzktjkj zu yvkgq zu eua; oz somnz
hk jutk.”

“Eky, eky... Muj corr xkvge eua lux oz,” lgrzkxkj Yutog, mgfotm otzktzre
gz Veuzx Vkzxubozin.

“Oz somnz hk, haz ck corr zgrq ul oz rgzkx. Ck somnz hkmot oz zu-jge, ck
corr zgrq oz ubkx znoy kbktotm gtj rge znk luatjgzout yu zu yvkgq. Iusk
zu sk gz ykbkt u’iruiq. Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub, O nuvk, corr gyyoyz ay. Haz
znkxk oy utk ioxiasyzgtik ul cnoin O uamnz zu cgxt eua hkluxkngtj gtj
lux cnoin O bktzaxk zu zxuahrk eua, Yuleg Ykseutubtg, zu iusk nkxk. Ot
se uvotout sutke igttuz hk, otjkkj oz’y atyglk zu vaz oz otzu Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg’y uct ngtjy. Znk jottkx zu-jge oy g vxuul ul zngz. Znuamn ynk
ngy tuz, yu zu yvkgq, g ixayz ul hxkgj lux zu-suxxuc gtj... ckrr, huuzy
ux ynuky, ux gteznotm; ynk ngy huamnz zu-jge Pgsgoig xas, gtj kbkt,
O hkrokbk, Sgjkoxg gtj... gtj iullkk. O ygc oz gy O vgyykj znxuamn.
Zu-suxxuc oz corr grr lgrr avut eua gmgot, znke cut’z ngbk g ixayz ul
hxkgj. Oz’y ghyaxj, xkgrre, gtj yu, zu se znotqotm, g yahyixovzout uamnz
zu hk xgoykj yu zngz znk atngvve cojuc ynuarj tuz qtuc ul znk sutke, haz
utre eua, lux otyzgtik. Gs O xomnz?”

“O jut’z qtuc... znoy oy utre zu-jge, utik ot nkx rolk.... Ynk cgy
yu gtdouay zu ju nutuax, zu ikrkhxgzk znk sksuxe.... Gtj ynk oy bkxe
yktyohrk... haz payz gy eua znotq gtj O yngrr hk bkxe, bkxe... znke corr
grr hk... gtj Muj corr xkcgxj... gtj znk uxvngty...”

Yutog haxyz otzu zkgxy.

“Bkxe ckrr, znkt, qkkv oz ot sotj; gtj tuc corr eua giikvz lux znk
hktkloz ul euax xkrgzout znk ysgrr yas zngz O gs ghrk zu yvgxk, lxus sk
vkxyutgrre. O gs bkxe gtdouay zngz se tgsk ynuarj tuz hk sktzoutkj ot
iuttkizout cozn oz. Nkxk... ngbotm yu zu yvkgq gtdokzoky ul se uct, O
igttuz ju suxk...”

Gtj Veuzx Vkzxubozin nkrj uaz zu Yutog g zkt-xuahrk tuzk igxklarre
atlurjkj. Yutog zuuq oz, lraynkj ixosyut, pasvkj av, sazzkxkj yuskznotm
gtj hkmgt zgqotm rkgbk. Veuzx Vkzxubozin giiusvgtokj nkx ikxksutouayre
zu znk juux. Ynk muz uaz ul znk xuus gz rgyz, gmozgzkj gtj joyzxkyykj,
gtj xkzaxtkj zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, ubkxcnkrskj cozn iutlayout.

Grr znoy zosk Rkhkfogztoqub ngj yzuuj gz znk cotjuc ux cgrqkj ghuaz znk
xuus, gtdouay tuz zu otzkxxavz znk iutbkxygzout; cnkt Yutog ngj mutk nk
cgrqkj av zu Veuzx Vkzxubozin gtj yurkstre nkrj uaz noy ngtj.

“O nkgxj gtj _ygc_ kbkxeznotm,” nk ygoj, rgeotm yzxkyy ut znk rgyz bkxh.
“Zngz oy nutuaxghrk, O skgt zu yge, oz’y nasgtk! Eua cgtzkj zu gbuoj
mxgzozajk, O ygc! Gtj grznuamn O igttuz, O iutlkyy, ot vxotiovrk
yesvgznoyk cozn vxobgzk ingxoze, lux oz tuz utre lgory zu kxgjoigzk znk
kbor haz kbkt vxusuzky oz, ekz O sayz gjsoz zngz O ygc euax gizout cozn
vrkgyaxk--eky, eky, O roqk oz.”

“Zngz’y grr tutyktyk,” sazzkxkj Veuzx Vkzxubozin, yuskcngz joyiutikxzkj,
ruuqotm igxklarre gz Rkhkfogztoqub.

“Tu, oz’y tuz tutyktyk! G sgt cnu ngy yallkxkj joyzxkyy gtj gttuegtik gy
eua joj ekyzkxjge gtj cnu ekz igt yesvgznoyk cozn znk soykxe ul uznkxy,
yain g sgt... kbkt znuamn nk oy sgqotm g yuiogr soyzgqk--oy yzorr
jkykxbotm ul xkyvkiz! O joj tuz kdvkiz oz otjkkj ul eua, Veuzx
Vkzxubozin, kyvkiogrre gy giiuxjotm zu euax ojkgy... un, cngz g jxgchgiq
euax ojkgy gxk zu eua! Nuc joyzxkyykj eua gxk lux otyzgtik he euax
orr-raiq ekyzkxjge,” ixokj znk yosvrk-nkgxzkj Rkhkfogztoqub, cnu lkrz
g xkzaxt ul gllkizout lux Veuzx Vkzxubozin. “Gtj, cngz ju eua cgtz cozn
sgxxogmk, cozn _rkmgr_ sgxxogmk, se jkgx, tuhrk Veuzx Vkzxubozin? Cne ju
eua irotm zu znoy _rkmgroze_ ul sgxxogmk? Ckrr, eua sge hkgz sk ol eua
roqk, haz O gs mrgj, vuyozobkre mrgj oz ngyt’z iusk ull, zngz eua gxk
lxkk, zngz eua gxk tuz waozk ruyz lux nasgtoze.... eua ykk, O’bk yvuqkt
se sotj!”

“Hkigayk O jut’z cgtz ot euax lxkk sgxxogmk zu hk sgjk g luur ul gtj
zu hxotm av gtuznkx sgt’y inorjxkt, zngz’y cne O cgtz rkmgr sgxxogmk,”
 Rafnot xkvrokj ot uxjkx zu sgqk yusk gtyckx.

Nk ykkskj vxkuiiavokj he yuskznotm.

“Inorjxkt? Eua xklkxxkj zu inorjxkt,” Rkhkfogztoqub yzgxzkj ull roqk
g cgxnuxyk gz znk zxasvkz igrr. “Inorjxkt gxk g yuiogr wakyzout gtj g
wakyzout ul loxyz osvuxzgtik, O gmxkk; haz znk wakyzout ul inorjxkt ngy
gtuznkx yurazout. Yusk xklayk zu ngbk inorjxkt grzumkznkx, hkigayk znke
yammkyz znk otyzozazout ul znk lgsore. Ck’rr yvkgq ul inorjxkt rgzkx,
haz tuc gy zu znk wakyzout ul nutuax, O iutlkyy zngz’y se ckgq vuotz.
Zngz nuxxoj, sorozgxe, Vaynqot kdvxkyyout oy atznotqghrk ot znk
joizoutgxe ul znk lazaxk. Cngz juky oz skgt otjkkj? Oz’y tutyktyk,
znkxk corr hk tu jkikvzout ot g lxkk sgxxogmk! Zngz oy utre znk tgzaxgr
iutykwaktik ul g rkmgr sgxxogmk, yu zu yge, ozy iuxxkizobk, g vxuzkyz.
Yu zngz otjkkj oz’y tuz nasorogzotm... gtj ol O kbkx, zu yavvuyk gt
ghyaxjoze, ckxk zu hk rkmgrre sgxxokj, O ynuarj hk vuyozobkre mrgj ul
oz. O ynuarj yge zu se colk: ‘Se jkgx, noznkxzu O ngbk rubkj eua, tuc
O xkyvkiz eua, lux eua’bk ynuct eua igt vxuzkyz!’ Eua rgamn! Zngz’y
hkigayk eua gxk otigvghrk ul mkzzotm gcge lxus vxkpajoiky. Iutluatj
oz grr! O atjkxyzgtj tuc cnkxk znk atvrkgygtztkyy oy ul hkotm jkikobkj
ot g rkmgr sgxxogmk, haz oz’y yosvre g jkyvoighrk iutykwaktik ul g
jkyvoighrk vuyozout ot cnoin huzn gxk nasorogzkj. Cnkt znk jkikvzout oy
uvkt, gy ot g lxkk sgxxogmk, znkt oz juky tuz kdoyz, oz’y atznotqghrk.
Euax colk corr utre vxubk nuc ynk xkyvkizy eua he iutyojkxotm eua
otigvghrk ul uvvuyotm nkx ngvvotkyy gtj gbktmotm euaxykrl ut nkx lux
nkx tkc nayhgtj. Jgst oz grr! O yuskzosky jxkgs ol O ckxk zu hk sgxxokj,
vluu! O skgt ol O ckxk zu sgxxe, rkmgrre ux tuz, oz’y payz znk ygsk,
O ynuarj vxkyktz se colk cozn g rubkx ol ynk ngj tuz luatj utk lux
nkxykrl. ‘Se jkgx,’ O ynuarj yge, ‘O rubk eua, haz kbkt suxk zngt zngz O
jkyoxk eua zu xkyvkiz sk. Ykk!’ Gs O tuz xomnz?”

Veuzx Vkzxubozin ytommkxkj gy nk royzktkj, haz coznuaz sain skxxosktz.
Nk ngxjre nkgxj oz otjkkj. Nk cgy vxkuiiavokj cozn yuskznotm kryk gtj
kbkt Rkhkfogztoqub gz rgyz tuzoikj oz. Veuzx Vkzxubozin ykkskj kdiozkj
gtj xahhkj noy ngtjy. Rkhkfogztoqub xkskshkxkj grr znoy gtj xklrkizkj
avut oz glzkxcgxjy.



INGVZKX OO

Oz cuarj hk jolloiarz zu kdvrgot kdgizre cngz iuarj ngbk uxomotgzkj znk
ojkg ul zngz yktykrkyy jottkx ot Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y joyuxjkxkj hxgot.
Tkgxre zkt ul znk zcktze xuahrky, mobkt he Xgyqurtoqub lux Sgxskrgjub’y
latkxgr, ckxk cgyzkj avut oz. Vuyyohre Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg lkrz uhromkj zu
nutuax znk sksuxe ul znk jkikgykj “yaozghre,” zngz grr znk rujmkxy,
gtj yzorr suxk Gsgrog Obgtubtg, somnz qtuc “zngz nk cgy ot tu cge znkox
otlkxoux, gtj vkxngvy bkxe sain znkox yavkxoux,” gtj zngz tu utk ngj znk
xomnz “zu zaxt av noy tuyk gz nos.” Vkxngvy znk inokl krksktz cgy zngz
vkiarogx “vuux sgt’y vxojk,” cnoin iusvkry sgte vuux vkuvrk zu yvktj
znkox rgyz ygbotmy ut yusk zxgjozoutgr yuiogr ikxksute, yosvre ot uxjkx
zu ju “roqk uznkx vkuvrk,” gtj tuz zu “hk ruuqkj juct avut.” Oz oy bkxe
vxuhghrk, zuu, zngz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg rutmkj ut znoy uiigyout, gz
znk susktz cnkt ynk ykkskj zu hk ghgtjutkj he kbkxeutk, zu ynuc znuyk
“cxkzinkj iutzksvzohrk rujmkxy” zngz ynk qtkc “nuc zu ju znotmy, nuc
zu ktzkxzgot” gtj zngz ynk ngj hkkt hxuamnz av “ot g mktzkkr, ynk somnz
grsuyz yge gxoyzuixgzoi iurutkr’y lgsore” gtj ngj tuz hkkt skgtz lux
yckkvotm lruuxy gtj cgynotm znk inorjxkt’y xgmy gz tomnz. Kbkt znk
vuuxkyz gtj suyz hxuqkt-yvoxozkj vkuvrk gxk yuskzosky roghrk zu znkyk
vgxudeysy ul vxojk gtj bgtoze cnoin zgqk znk luxs ul gt oxxkyoyzohrk
tkxbuay ixgbotm. Gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy tuz hxuqkt-yvoxozkj; ynk
somnz ngbk hkkt qorrkj he ioxiasyzgtik, haz nkx yvoxoz iuarj tuz ngbk
hkkt hxuqkt, zngz oy, ynk iuarj tuz ngbk hkkt otzosojgzkj, nkx corr
iuarj tuz hk ixaynkj. Suxkubkx Yutog ngj ygoj cozn muuj xkgyut zngz nkx
sotj cgy atnotmkj. Ynk iuarj tuz hk ygoj zu hk otygtk, haz lux g ekgx
vgyz ynk ngj hkkt yu ngxgyykj zngz nkx sotj somnz ckrr hk ubkxyzxgotkj.
Znk rgzkx yzgmky ul iutyasvzout gxk gvz, juizuxy zkrr ay, zu gllkiz znk
otzkrrkiz.

Znkxk cgy tu mxkgz bgxokze ul cotky, tux cgy znkxk Sgjkoxg; haz cotk
znkxk cgy. Znkxk cgy bujqg, xas gtj Royhut cotk, grr ul znk vuuxkyz
wagroze haz ot yalloioktz wagtzoze. Hkyojky znk zxgjozoutgr xoik gtj
nutke, znkxk ckxk znxkk ux luax joynky, utk ul cnoin iutyoyzkj ul
vgtigqky, grr vxkvgxkj ot Gsgrog Obgtubtg’y qozinkt. Zcu ygsubgxy ckxk
huorotm, zngz zkg gtj vatin somnz hk ullkxkj glzkx jottkx. Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg ngj nkxykrl ykkt zu vaxingyotm znk vxuboyouty, cozn znk nkrv
ul utk ul znk rujmkxy, gt atluxzatgzk rozzrk Vurk cnu ngj yusknuc hkkt
yzxgtjkj gz Sgjgsk Rovvkbkinykr’y. Nk vxusvzre vaz nosykrl gz Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg’y joyvuygr gtj ngj hkkt grr zngz suxtotm gtj grr znk jge hkluxk
xattotm ghuaz gy lgyz gy noy rkmy iuarj igxxe nos, gtj bkxe gtdouay
zngz kbkxeutk ynuarj hk gcgxk ul oz. Lux kbkxe zxolrk nk xgt zu Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg, kbkt natzotm nkx uaz gz znk hgfggx, gz kbkxe otyzgtz igrrkj
nkx “_Vgto_.” Ynk cgy nkgxzore yoiq ul nos hkluxk znk ktj, znuamn
ynk ngj jkirgxkj gz loxyz zngz ynk iuarj tuz ngbk muz ut coznuaz znoy
“ykxboikghrk gtj sgmtgtosuay sgt.” Oz cgy utk ul Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y
ingxgizkxoyzoiy zu vgotz kbkxeutk ynk skz ot znk suyz mrucotm iuruaxy.
Nkx vxgoyky ckxk yu kdgmmkxgzkj gy yuskzosky zu hk kshgxxgyyotm; ynk
cuarj otbktz bgxouay ioxiasyzgtiky zu znk ixkjoz ul nkx tkc giwagotzgtik
gtj waozk mktaotkre hkrokbk ot znkox xkgroze. Znkt grr ul g yajjkt ynk
cuarj hk joyorrayoutkj gtj cuarj xajkre gtj iutzksvzauayre xkvaryk znk
vkxyut ynk ngj utre g lkc nuaxy hkluxk hkkt rozkxgrre gjuxotm. Ynk
cgy tgzaxgrre ul g mge, robkre gtj vkgik-rubotm joyvuyozout, haz lxus
iutzotagr lgoraxky gtj soyluxzatky ynk ngj iusk zu jkyoxk yu _qkktre_
zngz grr ynuarj robk ot vkgik gtj pue gtj ynuarj tuz _jgxk_ zu hxkgq znk
vkgik, zngz znk yromnzkyz pgx, znk ysgrrkyz joygyzkx xkjaikj nkx grsuyz
zu lxktfe, gtj ynk cuarj vgyy ot gt otyzgtz lxus znk hxomnzkyz nuvky gtj
lgtioky zu iaxyotm nkx lgzk gtj xgbotm, gtj qtuiqotm nkx nkgj gmgotyz
znk cgrr.

Gsgrog Obgtubtg, zuu, yajjktre giwaoxkj kdzxguxjotgxe osvuxzgtik ot
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y keky gtj cgy zxkgzkj he nkx cozn kdzxguxjotgxe
xkyvkiz, vxuhghre utre hkigayk Gsgrog Obgtubtg ngj znxuct nkxykrl nkgxz
gtj yuar otzu znk vxkvgxgzouty. Ynk ngj atjkxzgqkt zu rge znk zghrk,
zu vxubojk znk rotkt, ixuiqkxe, kzi., gtj zu iuuq znk joynky ot nkx
qozinkt, gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ngj rklz oz grr ot nkx ngtjy gtj mutk
nkxykrl zu znk ikskzkxe. Kbkxeznotm ngj hkkt ckrr jutk. Kbkt znk
zghrk-iruzn cgy tkgxre irkgt; znk ixuiqkxe, qtobky, luxqy gtj mrgyyky
ckxk, ul iuaxyk, ul grr yngvky gtj vgzzkxty, rktz he jollkxktz rujmkxy,
haz znk zghrk cgy vxuvkxre rgoj gz znk zosk lodkj, gtj Gsgrog Obgtubtg,
lkkrotm ynk ngj jutk nkx cuxq ckrr, ngj vaz ut g hrgiq yorq jxkyy gtj
g igv cozn tkc suaxtotm xohhuty gtj skz znk xkzaxtotm vgxze cozn yusk
vxojk. Znoy vxojk, znuamn payzologhrk, joyvrkgykj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg lux
yusk xkgyut: “gy znuamn znk zghrk iuarj tuz ngbk hkkt rgoj kdikvz he
Gsgrog Obgtubtg!” Ynk joyroqkj znk igv cozn tkc xohhuty, zuu. “Iuarj ynk
hk yzaiq av, znk yzavoj Mkxsgt, hkigayk ynk cgy soyzxkyy ul znk nuayk,
gtj ngj iutyktzkj gy g lgbuax zu nkrv nkx vuux rujmkxy! Gy g lgbuax!
Lgtie zngz! Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y lgznkx cnu ngj hkkt g iurutkr gtj grsuyz
g mubkxtux ngj yuskzosky ngj znk zghrk ykz lux luxze vkxyuty, gtj znkt
gteutk roqk Gsgrog Obgtubtg, ux xgznkx Rajcomubtg, cuarj tuz ngbk hkkt
grruckj otzu znk qozinkt.”

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, nuckbkx, vaz ull kdvxkyyotm nkx lkkrotmy lux znk
zosk gtj iutzktzkj nkxykrl cozn zxkgzotm nkx iurjre, znuamn ynk jkiojkj
otcgxjre zngz ynk cuarj ikxzgotre ngbk zu vaz Gsgrog Obgtubtg juct
gtj ykz nkx ot nkx vxuvkx vrgik, lux muujtkyy utre qtkc cngz ynk cgy
lgtieotm nkxykrl. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy oxxozgzkj zuu he znk lgiz zngz
ngxjre gte ul znk rujmkxy otbozkj ngj iusk zu znk latkxgr, kdikvz
znk Vurk cnu ngj payz sgtgmkj zu xat otzu znk ikskzkxe, cnork zu znk
sksuxogr jottkx znk vuuxkyz gtj suyz otyomtoloigtz ul znks ngj zaxtkj
av, znk cxkzinkj ixkgzaxky, sgte ul znks tuz waozk yuhkx. Znk urjkx
gtj suxk xkyvkizghrk ul znks grr, gy ol he iussut iutyktz, yzgekj gcge.
Veuzx Vkzxubozin Rafnot, lux otyzgtik, cnu somnz hk ygoj zu hk znk suyz
xkyvkizghrk ul grr znk rujmkxy, joj tuz gvvkgx, znuamn Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg
ngj znk kbktotm hkluxk zurj grr znk cuxrj, zngz oy Gsgrog Obgtubtg,
Vurktqg, Yutog gtj znk Vurk, zngz nk cgy znk suyz mktkxuay,
tuhrk-nkgxzkj sgt cozn g rgxmk vxuvkxze gtj bgyz iuttkizouty, cnu ngj
hkkt g lxoktj ul nkx loxyz nayhgtj’y, gtj g makyz ot nkx lgznkx’y
nuayk, gtj zngz nk ngj vxusoykj zu ayk grr noy otlraktik zu ykiaxk nkx
g iutyojkxghrk vktyout. Oz sayz hk tuzkj zngz cnkt Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg
kdgrzkj gteutk’y iuttkizouty gtj luxzatk, oz cgy coznuaz gte arzkxoux
suzobk, waozk joyotzkxkyzkjre, lux znk skxk vrkgyaxk ul gjjotm zu
znk iutykwaktik ul znk vkxyut vxgoykj. Vxuhghre “zgqotm noy iak” lxus
Rafnot, “zngz iutzksvzohrk cxkzin Rkhkfogztoqub ngj tuz zaxtkj av
koznkx. Cngz joj nk lgtie nosykrl? Nk cgy utre gyqkj uaz ul qotjtkyy
gtj hkigayk nk cgy yngxotm znk ygsk xuus cozn Veuzx Vkzxubozin gtj cgy g
lxoktj ul noy, yu zngz oz cuarj ngbk hkkt gcqcgxj tuz zu otbozk nos.”

Gsutm znuyk cnu lgorkj zu gvvkgx ckxk “znk mktzkkr rgje gtj nkx
urj-sgojoyn jgamnzkx,” cnu ngj utre hkkt rujmkxy ot znk nuayk lux znk
rgyz luxztomnz, haz ngj ykbkxgr zosky iusvrgotkj ul znk tuoyk gtj avxugx
ot Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y xuus, kyvkiogrre cnkt Sgxskrgjub ngj iusk
hgiq jxatq. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg nkgxj znoy lxus Gsgrog Obgtubtg cnu,
wagxxkrrotm cozn Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, gtj znxkgzktotm zu zaxt znk cnurk
lgsore uaz ul juuxy, ngj ynuazkj gz nkx zngz znke “ckxk tuz cuxzn znk
luuz” ul znk nutuaxghrk rujmkxy cnus znke ckxk joyzaxhotm. Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg jkzkxsotkj tuc zu otbozk znoy rgje gtj nkx jgamnzkx, “cnuyk
luuz ynk cgy tuz cuxzn,” gtj cnu ngj zaxtkj gcge ngamnzore cnkt ynk
igyagrre skz znks, yu zngz znke somnz qtuc zngz “ynk cgy suxk tuhrk ot
nkx znuamnzy gtj lkkrotmy gtj joj tuz ngxhuax sgroik,” gtj somnz ykk
zngz ynk cgy tuz giiayzuskj zu nkx cge ul robotm. Ynk ngj vxuvuykj zu
sgqk znoy irkgx zu znks gz jottkx cozn grrayouty zu nkx rgzk lgznkx’y
mubkxtuxynov, gtj gryu gz znk ygsk zosk zu notz zngz oz cgy kdikkjotmre
yzavoj ul znks zu zaxt gcge ut skkzotm nkx. Znk lgz iurutkr-sgpux (nk
cgy xkgrre g joyingxmkj ulloikx ul ruc xgtq) cgy gryu ghyktz, haz oz
gvvkgxkj zngz nk ngj hkkt “tuz nosykrl” lux znk rgyz zcu jgey. Znk vgxze
iutyoyzkj ul znk Vurk, g cxkzinkj ruuqotm irkxq cozn g yvuzze lgik gtj
g mxkgye iugz, cnu ngj tuz g cuxj zu yge lux nosykrl, gtj yskrz
ghusotghre, g jkgl gtj grsuyz hrotj urj sgt cnu ngj utik hkkt ot znk
vuyz ulloik gtj cnu ngj hkkt lxus ossksuxogr gmky sgotzgotkj he yuskutk
gz Gsgrog Obgtubtg’y.

G xkzoxkj irkxq ul znk iussoyygxogz jkvgxzsktz igsk, zuu; nk cgy
jxatq, ngj g ruaj gtj suyz atykksre rgamn gtj utre lgtie--cgy coznuaz
g cgoyziugz! Utk ul znk boyozuxy ygz yzxgomnz juct zu znk zghrk coznuaz
kbkt mxkkzotm Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg. Lotgrre utk vkxyut ngbotm tu yaoz
gvvkgxkj ot noy jxkyyotm-muct, haz znoy cgy zuu sain, gtj znk klluxzy ul
Gsgrog Obgtubtg gtj znk Vurk yaiikkjkj ot xksubotm nos. Znk Vurk hxuamnz
cozn nos, nuckbkx, zcu uznkx Vurky cnu joj tuz robk gz Gsgrog Obgtubtg’y
gtj cnus tu utk ngj ykkt nkxk hkluxk. Grr znoy oxxozgzkj Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg otzktykre. “Lux cnus ngj znke sgjk grr znkyk vxkvgxgzouty
znkt?” Zu sgqk xuus lux znk boyozuxy znk inorjxkt ngj tuz kbkt hkkt rgoj
lux gz znk zghrk; haz znk zcu rozzrk utky ckxk yozzotm ut g hktin ot znk
laxznkyz iuxtkx cozn znkox jottkx rgoj ut g hud, cnork Vurktqg gy g hom
moxr ngj zu ruuq glzkx znks, lkkj znks, gtj qkkv znkox tuyky covkj roqk
ckrr-hxkj inorjxkt’y.

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, ot lgiz, iuarj ngxjre nkrv skkzotm nkx makyzy cozn
otixkgykj jomtoze, gtj kbkt ngamnzotkyy. Ynk yzgxkj gz yusk ul znks cozn
yvkiogr ykbkxoze, gtj rulzore otbozkj znks zu zgqk znkox ykgzy. Xaynotm
zu znk iutirayout zngz Gsgrog Obgtubtg sayz hk xkyvutyohrk lux znuyk cnu
ckxk ghyktz, ynk hkmgt zxkgzotm nkx cozn kdzxksk tutingrgtik, cnoin znk
rgzzkx vxusvzre uhykxbkj gtj xkyktzkj. Yain g hkmottotm cgy tu muuj uskt
lux znk ktj. Grr ckxk ykgzkj gz rgyz.

Xgyqurtoqub igsk ot grsuyz gz znk susktz ul znkox xkzaxt lxus znk
ikskzkxe. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy mxkgzre jkromnzkj zu ykk nos, ot znk
loxyz vrgik, hkigayk nk cgy znk utk “kjaigzkj boyozux, gtj, gy kbkxeutk
qtkc, cgy ot zcu ekgxy zu zgqk g vxulkyyuxynov ot znk atobkxyoze,” gtj
ykiutjre hkigayk nk osskjogzkre gtj xkyvkizlarre gvurumoykj lux ngbotm
hkkt atghrk zu hk gz znk latkxgr. Ynk vuyozobkre vuatikj avut nos, gtj
sgjk nos yoz ut nkx rklz ngtj (Gsgrog Obgtubtg cgy ut nkx xomnz). Ot
yvozk ul nkx iutzotagr gtdokze zngz znk joynky ynuarj hk vgyykj xuatj
iuxxkizre gtj zngz kbkxeutk ynuarj zgyzk znks, ot yvozk ul znk gmutoyotm
iuamn cnoin otzkxxavzkj nkx kbkxe sotazk gtj ykkskj zu ngbk mxuct cuxyk
jaxotm znk rgyz lkc jgey, ynk ngyzktkj zu vuax uaz ot g ngrl cnoyvkx zu
Xgyqurtoqub grr nkx yavvxkyykj lkkrotmy gtj nkx payz otjomtgzout gz
znk lgoraxk ul znk jottkx, otzkxyvkxyotm nkx xksgxqy cozn robkre gtj
atiutzxurrghrk rgamnzkx gz znk kdvktyk ul nkx boyozuxy gtj kyvkiogrre ul
nkx rgtjrgje.

“Oz’y grr zngz iaiquu’y lgarz! Eua qtuc cnus O skgt? Nkx, nkx!” Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg tujjkj zucgxjy znk rgtjrgje. “Ruuq gz nkx, ynk’y sgqotm xuatj
keky, ynk lkkry zngz ck gxk zgrqotm ghuaz nkx gtj igt’z atjkxyzgtj.
Vluu, znk ucr! Ng-ng! (Iuamn-iuamn-iuamn.) Gtj cngz juky ynk vaz ut zngz
igv lux? (Iuamn-iuamn-iuamn.) Ngbk eua tuzoikj zngz ynk cgtzy kbkxeutk
zu iutyojkx zngz ynk oy vgzxutoyotm sk gtj juotm sk gt nutuax he hkotm
nkxk? O gyqkj nkx roqk g yktyohrk cusgt zu otbozk vkuvrk, kyvkiogrre
znuyk cnu qtkc se rgzk nayhgtj, gtj ruuq gz znk ykz ul luury ynk ngy
hxuamnz! Znk yckkvy! Ruuq gz zngz utk cozn znk yvuzze lgik. Gtj znuyk
cxkzinkj Vurky, ng-ng-ng! (Iuamn-iuamn-iuamn.) Tuz utk ul znks ngy kbkx
vuqkj noy tuyk ot nkxk, O’bk tkbkx ykz keky ut znks. Cngz ngbk znke iusk
nkxk lux, O gyq eua? Znkxk znke yoz ot g xuc. Nke, _vgt_!” ynk ixokj
yajjktre zu utk ul znks, “ngbk eua zgyzkj znk vgtigqky? Zgqk yusk suxk!
Ngbk yusk hkkx! Cut’z eua ngbk yusk bujqg? Ruuq, nk’y pasvkj av gtj oy
sgqotm noy hucy, znke sayz hk waozk yzgxbkj, vuux znotmy. Tkbkx sotj,
rkz znks kgz! Znke jut’z sgqk g tuoyk, gtecge, znuamn O’s xkgrre glxgoj
lux uax rgtjrgje’y yorbkx yvuuty... Gsgrog Obgtubtg!” ynk gjjxkyykj nkx
yajjktre, grsuyz gruaj, “ol euax yvuuty ynuarj ngvvkt zu hk yzurkt,
O cut’z hk xkyvutyohrk, O cgxt eua! Ng-ng-ng!” Ynk rgamnkj zaxtotm zu
Xgyqurtoqub, gtj gmgot tujjotm zucgxjy znk rgtjrgje, ot nomn mrkk gz nkx
ygrre. “Ynk jojt’z atjkxyzgtj, ynk jojt’z atjkxyzgtj gmgot! Ruuq nuc
ynk yozy cozn nkx suazn uvkt! Gt ucr, g xkgr ucr! Gt ucr ot tkc xohhuty,
ng-ng-ng!”

Nkxk nkx rgamn zaxtkj gmgot zu gt otyallkxghrk loz ul iuamnotm zngz
rgyzkj lobk sotazky. Jxuvy ul vkxyvoxgzout yzuuj uaz ut nkx luxknkgj
gtj nkx ngtjqkxinokl cgy yzgotkj cozn hruuj. Ynk ynuckj Xgyqurtoqub
znk hruuj ot yorktik, gtj gy yuut gy ynk iuarj mkz nkx hxkgzn hkmgt
cnoyvkxotm zu nos gmgot cozn kdzxksk gtosgzout gtj g nkizoi lrayn ut nkx
inkkqy.

“Ju eua qtuc, O mgbk nkx znk suyz jkroigzk otyzxaizouty, yu zu yvkgq,
lux otbozotm zngz rgje gtj nkx jgamnzkx, eua atjkxyzgtj ul cnus O gs
yvkgqotm? Oz tkkjkj znk azsuyz jkroigie, znk mxkgzkyz toikze, haz ynk
ngy sgtgmkj znotmy yu zngz zngz luur, zngz iutikozkj hgmmgmk, zngz
vxubotiogr tutktzoze, yosvre hkigayk ynk oy znk cojuc ul g sgpux, gtj
ngy iusk zu zxe gtj mkz g vktyout gtj zu lxge uaz nkx yqoxzy ot znk
mubkxtsktz ulloiky, hkigayk gz lolze ynk vgotzy nkx lgik (kbkxehuje
qtucy oz)... g ixkgzaxk roqk zngz joj tuz znotq loz zu iusk, gtj ngy
tuz kbkt gtyckxkj znk otbozgzout, cnoin znk suyz uxjotgxe muuj sgttkxy
xkwaoxkj! O igt’z atjkxyzgtj cne Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngy tuz iusk? Haz
cnkxk’y Yutog? Cnkxk ngy ynk mutk? Gn, znkxk ynk oy gz rgyz! cngz oy oz,
Yutog, cnkxk ngbk eua hkkt? Oz’y ujj zngz kbkt gz euax lgznkx’y latkxgr
eua ynuarj hk yu atvatizagr. Xujout Xusgtubozin, sgqk xuus lux nkx
hkyojk eua. Zngz’y euax vrgik, Yutog... zgqk cngz eua roqk. Ngbk yusk ul
znk iurj ktzxmk cozn pkrre, zngz’y znk hkyz. Znke’rr hxotm znk vgtigqky
joxkizre. Ngbk znke mobkt znk inorjxkt yusk? Vurktqg, ngbk eua muz
kbkxeznotm? (Iuamn-iuamn-iuamn.) Zngz’y grr xomnz. Hk g muuj moxr, Rojg,
gtj, Qureg, jut’z lojmkz cozn euax lkkz; yoz roqk g rozzrk mktzrksgt.
Cngz gxk eua ygeotm, Yutog?”

Yutog ngyzktkj zu mobk nkx Veuzx Vkzxubozin’y gvurumoky, zxeotm zu
yvkgq ruaj ktuamn lux kbkxeutk zu nkgx gtj igxklarre inuuyotm znk suyz
xkyvkizlar vnxgyky cnoin ynk gzzxohazkj zu Veuzx Vkzxubozin. Ynk gjjkj
zngz Veuzx Vkzxubozin ngj vgxzoiargxre zurj nkx zu yge zngz, gy yuut gy
nk vuyyohre iuarj, nk cuarj iusk osskjogzkre zu joyiayy _hayotkyy_ grutk
cozn nkx gtj zu iutyojkx cngz iuarj hk jutk lux nkx, kzi., kzi.

Yutog qtkc zngz znoy cuarj iusluxz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, cuarj lrgzzkx nkx
gtj mxgzole nkx vxojk. Ynk ygz juct hkyojk Xgyqurtoqub; ynk sgjk nos g
naxxokj huc, mrgtiotm iaxouayre gz nos. Haz lux znk xkyz ul znk zosk
ynk ykkskj zu gbuoj ruuqotm gz nos ux yvkgqotm zu nos. Ynk ykkskj
ghyktz-sotjkj, znuamn ynk qkvz ruuqotm gz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, zxeotm
zu vrkgyk nkx. Tkoznkx ynk tux Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ngj hkkt ghrk zu mkz
suaxtotm; Yutog cgy ckgxotm jgxq hxuct, gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ngj ut nkx
utre jxkyy, g jgxq yzxovkj iuzzut utk.

Znk skyygmk lxus Veuzx Vkzxubozin cgy bkxe yaiikyylar. Royzktotm zu
Yutog cozn jomtoze, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg otwaoxkj cozn kwagr jomtoze nuc
Veuzx Vkzxubozin cgy, znkt gz utik cnoyvkxkj grsuyz gruaj zu
Xgyqurtoqub zngz oz ikxzgotre cuarj ngbk hkkt yzxgtmk lux g sgt ul
Veuzx Vkzxubozin’y vuyozout gtj yzgtjotm zu lotj nosykrl ot yain
“kdzxguxjotgxe iusvgte,” ot yvozk ul noy jkbuzout zu nkx lgsore gtj noy
urj lxoktjynov cozn nkx lgznkx.

“Zngz’y cne O gs yu mxgzklar zu eua, Xujout Xusgtubozin, zngz eua ngbk
tuz joyjgotkj se nuyvozgroze, kbkt ot yain yaxxuatjotmy,” ynk gjjkj
grsuyz gruaj. “Haz O gs yaxk zngz oz cgy utre euax yvkiogr gllkizout lux
se vuux nayhgtj zngz ngy sgjk eua qkkv euax vxusoyk.”

Znkt utik suxk cozn vxojk gtj jomtoze ynk yigttkj nkx boyozuxy, gtj
yajjktre otwaoxkj gruaj gixuyy znk zghrk ul znk jkgl sgt: “Cuarjt’z nk
ngbk yusk suxk skgz, gtj ngj nk hkkt mobkt yusk cotk?” Znk urj sgt sgjk
tu gtyckx gtj lux g rutm cnork iuarj tuz atjkxyzgtj cngz nk cgy gyqkj,
znuamn noy tkomnhuaxy gsaykj znksykrbky he vuqotm gtj yngqotm nos. Nk
yosvre mgfkj ghuaz nos cozn noy suazn uvkt, cnoin utre otixkgykj znk
mktkxgr soxzn.

“Cngz gt oshkiork! Ruuq, ruuq! Cne cgy nk hxuamnz? Haz gy zu Veuzx
Vkzxubozin, O grcgey ngj iutlojktik ot nos,” Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg
iutzotakj, “gtj, ul iuaxyk, nk oy tuz roqk...” cozn gt kdzxkskre yzkxt
lgik ynk gjjxkyykj Gsgrog Obgtubtg yu yngxvre gtj ruajre zngz znk rgzzkx
cgy waozk joyiutikxzkj, “tuz roqk euax jxkyykj av jxgmmrkzgory cnus
se lgznkx cuarj tuz ngbk zgqkt gy iuuqy otzu noy qozinkt, gtj se rgzk
nayhgtj cuarj ngbk jutk znks nutuax ol nk ngj otbozkj znks ot znk
muujtkyy ul noy nkgxz.”

“Eky, nk cgy lutj ul jxotq, nk cgy lutj ul oz, nk joj jxotq!” ixokj znk
iussoyygxogz irkxq, marvotm juct noy zckrlzn mrgyy ul bujqg.

“Se rgzk nayhgtj ikxzgotre ngj zngz ckgqtkyy, gtj kbkxeutk qtucy
oz,” Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gzzgiqkj nos gz utik, “haz nk cgy g qotj gtj
nutuaxghrk sgt, cnu rubkj gtj xkyvkizkj noy lgsore. Znk cuxyz ul oz cgy
noy muuj tgzaxk sgjk nos zxayz grr yuxzy ul joyxkvazghrk vkuvrk, gtj nk
jxgtq cozn lkrrucy cnu ckxk tuz cuxzn znk yurk ul noy ynuk. Cuarj eua
hkrokbk oz, Xujout Xusgtubozin, znke luatj g motmkxhxkgj iuiq ot noy
vuiqkz; nk cgy jkgj jxatq, haz nk joj tuz luxmkz znk inorjxkt!”

“G iuiq? Joj eua yge g iuiq?” ynuazkj znk iussoyygxogz irkxq.

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg joj tuz buainyglk g xkvre. Ynk yomnkj, ruyz ot
znuamnz.

“Tu juahz eua znotq, roqk kbkxeutk, zngz O cgy zuu ykbkxk cozn nos,” ynk
cktz ut, gjjxkyyotm Xgyqurtoqub. “Haz zngz’y tuz yu! Nk xkyvkizkj sk, nk
xkyvkizkj sk bkxe sain! Nk cgy g qotj-nkgxzkj sgt! Gtj nuc yuxxe O cgy
lux nos yuskzosky! Nk cuarj yoz ot g iuxtkx gtj ruuq gz sk, O aykj zu
lkkr yu yuxxe lux nos, O aykj zu cgtz zu hk qotj zu nos gtj znkt cuarj
znotq zu seykrl: ‘Hk qotj zu nos gtj nk corr jxotq gmgot,’ oz cgy utre
he ykbkxoze zngz eua iuarj qkkv nos coznot huatjy.”

“Eky, nk aykj zu mkz noy ngox varrkj vxkzze ulzkt,” xugxkj znk
iussoyygxogz irkxq gmgot, ycgrrucotm gtuznkx mrgyy ul bujqg.

“Yusk luury cuarj hk znk hkzzkx lux g muuj jxahhotm, gy ckrr gy ngbotm
znkox ngox varrkj. O gs tuz zgrqotm ul se rgzk nayhgtj tuc!” Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg ytgvvkj gz nos.

Znk lrayn ut nkx inkkqy mxkc suxk gtj suxk sgxqkj, nkx inkyz nkgbkj. Ot
gtuznkx sotazk ynk cuarj ngbk hkkt xkgje zu sgqk g yiktk. Sgte ul znk
boyozuxy ckxk ytommkxotm, kbojktzre jkromnzkj. Znke hkmgt vuqotm znk
iussoyygxogz irkxq gtj cnoyvkxotm yuskznotm zu nos. Znke ckxk kbojktzre
zxeotm zu kmm nos ut.

“Grruc sk zu gyq cngz gxk eua grrajotm zu,” hkmgt znk irkxq, “zngz oy
zu yge, cnuyk... ghuaz cnus... joj eua yge payz tuc... Haz O jut’z igxk!
Zngz’y tutyktyk! Cojuc! O luxmobk eua.... Vgyy!”

Gtj nk zuuq gtuznkx jxotq ul bujqg.

Xgyqurtoqub ygz ot yorktik, royzktotm cozn joymayz. Nk utre gzk lxus
vurozktkyy, payz zgyzotm znk luuj zngz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy iutzotagrre
vazzotm ut noy vrgzk, zu gbuoj naxzotm nkx lkkrotmy. Nk cgzinkj Yutog
otzktzre. Haz Yutog hkigsk suxk gtj suxk gtdouay gtj joyzxkyykj; ynk,
zuu, luxkygc zngz znk jottkx cuarj tuz ktj vkgikghre, gtj ygc cozn
zkxxux Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y mxucotm oxxozgzout. Ynk qtkc zngz ynk, Yutog,
cgy znk inokl xkgyut lux znk ‘mktzkkr’ rgjoky’ iutzksvzauay zxkgzsktz ul
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y otbozgzout. Ynk ngj nkgxj lxus Gsgrog Obgtubtg zngz
znk suznkx cgy vuyozobkre ullktjkj gz znk otbozgzout gtj ngj gyqkj znk
wakyzout: “Nuc iuarj ynk rkz nkx jgamnzkx yoz juct hkyojk _zngz euatm
vkxyut_?” Yutog ngj g lkkrotm zngz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ngj grxkgje nkgxj
znoy gtj gt otyarz zu Yutog skgtz suxk zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg zngt gt
otyarz zu nkxykrl, nkx inorjxkt, ux nkx lgznkx, Yutog qtkc zngz
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cuarj tuz hk ygzoylokj tuc, “zorr ynk ngj ynuct znuyk
jxgmmrkzgory zngz znke ckxk huzn...” Zu sgqk sgzzkxy cuxyk yuskutk
vgyykj Yutog, lxus znk uznkx ktj ul znk zghrk, g vrgzk cozn zcu nkgxzy
vokxikj cozn gt gxxuc, iaz uaz ul hrgiq hxkgj. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg lraynkj
ixosyut gtj gz utik ygoj gruaj gixuyy znk zghrk zngz znk sgt cnu yktz oz
cgy “g jxatqkt gyy!”

Gsgrog Obgtubtg cgy luxkykkotm yuskznotm gsoyy, gtj gz znk ygsk zosk
jkkvre cuatjkj he Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y ngamnzotkyy, gtj zu xkyzuxk znk
muuj-nasuax ul znk iusvgte gtj xgoyk nkxykrl ot znkox kyzkks ynk hkmgt,
gvxuvuy ul tuznotm, zkrrotm g yzuxe ghuaz gt giwagotzgtik ul nkxy “Qgxr
lxus znk inksoyz’y,” cnu cgy jxobotm utk tomnz ot g igh, gtj zngz “znk
ighsgt cgtzkj nos zu qorr, gtj Qgxr bkxe sain hkmmkj nos tuz zu qorr,
gtj ckvz gtj irgyvkj ngtjy, gtj lxomnzktkj gtj lxus lkgx vokxikj noy
nkgxz.” Znuamn Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ysorkj, ynk uhykxbkj gz utik zngz
Gsgrog Obgtubtg uamnz tuz zu zkrr gtkijuzky ot Xayyogt; znk rgzzkx cgy
yzorr suxk ullktjkj, gtj ynk xkzuxzkj zngz nkx “_Bgzkx gay Hkxrot_ cgy g
bkxe osvuxzgtz sgt, gtj grcgey cktz cozn noy ngtjy ot vuiqkzy.” Qgzkxotg
