Obgtubtg iuarj tuz xkyzxgot nkxykrl gtj rgamnkj yu sain zngz Gsgrog
Obgtubtg ruyz vgzoktik gtj iuarj yigxikre iutzxur nkxykrl.

“Royzkt zu znk ucr!” Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cnoyvkxkj gz utik, nkx
muuj-nasuax grsuyz xkyzuxkj, “ynk skgtz zu yge nk qkvz noy ngtjy ot
noy vuiqkzy, haz ynk ygoj nk vaz noy ngtjy ot vkuvrk’y vuiqkzy.
(Iuamn-iuamn.) Gtj ngbk eua tuzoikj, Xujout Xusgtubozin, zngz grr znkyk
Vkzkxyhaxm luxkomtkxy, znk Mkxsgty kyvkiogrre, gxk grr yzavojkx zngt
ck! Igt eua lgtie gteutk ul ay zkrrotm nuc ‘Qgxr lxus znk inksoyz’y’
‘vokxikj noy nkgxz lxus lkgx’ gtj zngz znk ojouz, otyzkgj ul vatoynotm
znk ighsgt, ‘irgyvkj noy ngtjy gtj ckvz, gtj sain hkmmkj.’ Gn, znk luur!
Gtj eua qtuc ynk lgtioky oz’y bkxe zuainotm gtj juky tuz yayvkiz nuc
yzavoj ynk oy! Zu se znotqotm zngz jxatqkt iussoyygxogz irkxq oy g mxkgz
jkgr irkbkxkx, gtecge utk igt ykk zngz nk ngy gjjrkj noy hxgoty cozn
jxotq, haz eua qtuc, znkyk luxkomtkxy gxk grcgey yu ckrr hkngbkj
gtj ykxouay.... Ruuq nuc ynk yozy mrgxotm! Ynk oy gtmxe, ng-ng!
(Iuamn-iuamn-iuamn.)”

Xkmgototm nkx muuj-nasuax, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg hkmgt gz utik zkrrotm
Xgyqurtoqub zngz cnkt ynk ngj uhzgotkj nkx vktyout, ynk otzktjkj zu uvkt
g yinuur lux znk jgamnzkxy ul mktzrkskt ot nkx tgzobk zuct Z----.
Znoy cgy znk loxyz zosk ynk ngj yvuqkt zu nos ul znk vxupkiz, gtj ynk
rgatinkj uaz otzu znk suyz grraxotm jkzgory. Oz yajjktre gvvkgxkj zngz
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ngj ot nkx ngtjy znk bkxe ikxzoloigzk ul nutuax ul
cnoin Sgxskrgjub ngj yvuqkt zu Xgyqurtoqub ot znk zgbkxt, cnkt nk zurj
nos zngz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, noy colk, ngj jgtikj znk yngcr jgtik
hkluxk znk mubkxtux gtj uznkx mxkgz vkxyutgmky ut rkgbotm yinuur. Znoy
ikxzoloigzk ul nutuax cgy uhbouayre otzktjkj tuc zu vxubk Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg’y xomnz zu uvkt g hugxjotm-yinuur; haz ynk ngj gxskj nkxykrl
cozn oz inoklre cozn znk uhpkiz ul ubkxcnkrsotm “znuyk zcu yzaiq-av
jxgmmrkzgory” ol znke igsk zu znk jottkx, gtj vxubotm otiutzkyzghre
zngz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg cgy ul znk suyz tuhrk, “ynk somnz kbkt yge
gxoyzuixgzoi lgsore, g iurutkr’y jgamnzkx gtj cgy lgx yavkxoux zu
ikxzgot gjbktzaxkyyky cnu ngbk hkkt yu sain zu znk luxk ul rgzk.” Znk
ikxzoloigzk ul nutuax osskjogzkre vgyykj otzu znk ngtjy ul znk jxatqkt
makyzy, gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg joj tuz zxe zu xkzgot oz, lux oz gizagrre
iutzgotkj znk yzgzksktz _kt zuazky rkzzxky_, zngz nkx lgznkx cgy ul znk
xgtq ul g sgpux, gtj gryu g iusvgtout ul gt uxjkx, yu zngz ynk xkgrre
cgy grsuyz znk jgamnzkx ul g iurutkr.

Cgxsotm av, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg vxuikkjkj zu ktrgxmk ut znk vkgiklar gtj
ngvve rolk znke cuarj rkgj ot Z----, ut znk mestgyoas zkginkxy cnus
ynk cuarj ktmgmk zu mobk rkyyuty ot nkx hugxjotm-yinuur, utk g suyz
xkyvkizghrk urj Lxktinsgt, utk Sgtmuz, cnu ngj zgamnz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg
nkxykrl ot urj jgey gtj cgy yzorr robotm ot Z----, gtj cuarj tu juahz
zkgin ot nkx yinuur ut sujkxgzk zkxsy. Tkdz ynk yvuqk ul Yutog cnu cuarj
mu cozn nkx zu Z---- gtj nkrv nkx ot grr nkx vrgty. Gz znoy yuskutk gz
znk laxznkx ktj ul znk zghrk mgbk g yajjkt mallgc.

Znuamn Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg zxokj zu gvvkgx zu hk joyjgotlarre atgcgxk ul
oz, ynk xgoykj nkx buoik gtj hkmgt gz utik yvkgqotm cozn iutboizout ul
Yutog’y atjuahzkj ghoroze zu gyyoyz nkx, ul “nkx mktzrktkyy, vgzoktik,
jkbuzout, mktkxuyoze gtj muuj kjaigzout,” zgvvotm Yutog ut znk inkkq gtj
qoyyotm nkx cgxsre zcoik. Yutog lraynkj ixosyut, gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg
yajjktre haxyz otzu zkgxy, osskjogzkre uhykxbotm zngz ynk cgy “tkxbuay
gtj yorre, zngz ynk cgy zuu sain avykz, zngz oz cgy zosk zu lotoyn, gtj
gy znk jottkx cgy ubkx, oz cgy zosk zu ngtj xuatj znk zkg.”

Gz zngz susktz, Gsgrog Obgtubtg, jkkvre gmmxokbkj gz zgqotm tu vgxz ot
znk iutbkxygzout, gtj tuz hkotm royzktkj zu, sgjk utk rgyz klluxz,
gtj cozn ykixkz soymobotmy bktzaxkj ut gt kdikkjotmre jkkv gtj ckomnze
uhykxbgzout, zngz “ot znk lazaxk hugxjotm-yinuur ynk cuarj ngbk zu vge
vgxzoiargx gzzktzout zu _jok Chyink_, gtj zngz znkxk ikxzgotre sayz hk g
muuj _jgsk_ zu ruuq glzkx znk rotkt, gtj ykiutjre zngz znk euatm rgjoky
sayz tuz tubkry gz tomnz xkgj.”

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, cnu ikxzgotre cgy avykz gtj bkxe zoxkj, gy ckrr gy
nkgxzore yoiq ul znk jottkx, gz utik iaz ynuxz Gsgrog Obgtubtg, ygeotm
“ynk qtkc tuznotm ghuaz oz gtj cgy zgrqotm tutyktyk, zngz oz cgy znk
hayotkyy ul znk rgatjxe sgoj, gtj tuz ul znk joxkizxkyy ul g nomn-irgyy
hugxjotm-yinuur zu ruuq glzkx _jok Chyink_, gtj gy lux tubkr-xkgjotm,
zngz cgy yosvre xajktkyy, gtj ynk hkmmkj nkx zu hk yorktz.” Gsgrog
Obgtubtg loxkj av gtj mkzzotm gtmxe uhykxbkj zngz ynk utre “skgtz nkx
muuj,” gtj zngz “ynk ngj skgtz nkx bkxe muuj,” gtj zngz “oz cgy rutm
yotik ynk ngj vgoj nkx _murj_ lux znk rujmotmy.”

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gz utik “ykz nkx juct,” ygeotm zngz oz cgy g rok zu
yge ynk coynkj nkx muuj, hkigayk utre ekyzkxjge cnkt nkx jkgj nayhgtj
cgy reotm ut znk zghrk, ynk ngj cuxxokj nkx ghuaz znk rujmotmy. Zu znoy
Gsgrog Obgtubtg bkxe gvvxuvxogzkre uhykxbkj zngz ynk ngj otbozkj znuyk
rgjoky, haz “znuyk rgjoky ngj tuz iusk, hkigayk znuyk rgjoky _gxk_
rgjoky gtj igttuz iusk zu g rgje cnu oy tuz g rgje.” Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg
gz utik vuotzkj uaz zu nkx, zngz gy ynk cgy g yraz ynk iuarj tuz pajmk
cngz sgjk utk xkgrre g rgje. Gsgrog Obgtubtg gz utik jkirgxkj zngz nkx
“_Bgzkx gay Hkxrot_ cgy g bkxe, bkxe osvuxzgtz sgt, gtj huzn ngtjy ot
vuiqkzy cktz, gtj grcgey aykj zu yge: ‘Vuul! vuul!’” gtj ynk rkgvz
av lxus znk zghrk zu xkvxkyktz nkx lgznkx, yzoiqotm nkx ngtjy ot nkx
vuiqkzy, vallotm nkx inkkqy, gtj azzkxotm bgmak yuatjy xkykshrotm “vuul!
vuul!” gsoj ruaj rgamnzkx lxus grr znk rujmkxy, cnu vaxvuykre ktiuaxgmkj
Gsgrog Obgtubtg, nuvotm lux g lomnz.

Haz znoy cgy zuu sain lux Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, gtj ynk gz utik jkirgxkj,
yu zngz grr iuarj nkgx, zngz Gsgrog Obgtubtg vxuhghre tkbkx ngj g
lgznkx, haz cgy yosvre g jxatqkt Vkzkxyhaxm Lott, gtj ngj ikxzgotre utik
hkkt g iuuq gtj vxuhghre yuskznotm cuxyk. Gsgrog Obgtubtg zaxtkj gy xkj
gy g ruhyzkx gtj ywakgrkj zngz vkxngvy Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg tkbkx ngj g
lgznkx, “haz ynk ngj g _Bgzkx gay Hkxrot_ gtj zngz nk cuxk g rutm iugz
gtj grcgey ygoj vuul-vuul-vuul!”

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg uhykxbkj iutzksvzauayre zngz grr qtkc cngz nkx lgsore
cgy gtj zngz ut zngz bkxe ikxzoloigzk ul nutuax oz cgy yzgzkj ot vxotz
zngz nkx lgznkx cgy g iurutkr, cnork Gsgrog Obgtubtg’y lgznkx--ol ynk
xkgrre ngj utk--cgy vxuhghre yusk Lottoyn sorqsgt, haz zngz vxuhghre ynk
tkbkx ngj g lgznkx gz grr, yotik oz cgy yzorr atikxzgot cnkznkx nkx tgsk
cgy Gsgrog Obgtubtg ux Gsgrog Rajcomubtg.

Gz znoy Gsgrog Obgtubtg, rgynkj zu laxe, yzxaiq znk zghrk cozn nkx loyz,
gtj ynxokqkj zngz ynk cgy Gsgrog Obgtubtg, gtj tuz Rajcomubtg, “zngz
nkx _Bgzkx_ cgy tgskj Pungtt gtj zngz nk cgy g haxmuskoyzkx, gtj zngz
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y _Bgzkx_ cgy waozk tkbkx g haxmuskoyzkx.” Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg xuyk lxus nkx ingox, gtj cozn g yzkxt gtj gvvgxktzre igrs buoik
(znuamn ynk cgy vgrk gtj nkx inkyz cgy nkgbotm) uhykxbkj zngz “ol ynk
jgxkj lux utk susktz zu ykz nkx iutzksvzohrk cxkzin ul g lgznkx ut g
rkbkr cozn nkx vgvg, ynk, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, cuarj zkgx nkx igv ull nkx
nkgj gtj zxgsvrk oz atjkx luuz.” Gsgrog Obgtubtg xgt ghuaz znk xuus,
ynuazotm gz znk zuv ul nkx buoik, zngz ynk cgy soyzxkyy ul znk nuayk gtj
zngz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ynuarj rkgbk znk rujmotmy zngz sotazk; znkt ynk
xaynkj lux yusk xkgyut zu iurrkiz znk yorbkx yvuuty lxus znk zghrk.
Znkxk cgy g mxkgz uazixe gtj avxugx, znk inorjxkt hkmgt ixeotm. Yutog
xgt zu xkyzxgot Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, haz cnkt Gsgrog Obgtubtg ynuazkj
yuskznotm ghuaz “znk ekrruc zoiqkz,” Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg vaynkj Yutog
gcge, gtj xaynkj gz znk rgtjrgje zu igxxe uaz nkx znxkgz.

Gz zngz sotazk znk juux uvktkj, gtj Veuzx Vkzxubozin Rafnot gvvkgxkj
ut znk znxkynurj. Nk yzuuj yigttotm znk vgxze cozn ykbkxk gtj bomorgtz
keky. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg xaynkj zu nos.



INGVZKX OOO

“Veuzx Vkzxubozin,” ynk ixokj, “vxuzkiz sk... eua gz rkgyz! Sgqk znoy
luuroyn cusgt atjkxyzgtj zngz ynk igt’z hkngbk roqk znoy zu g rgje ot
soyluxzatk... zngz znkxk oy g rgc lux yain znotmy.... O’rr mu zu znk
mubkxtux-mktkxgr nosykrl.... Ynk yngrr gtyckx lux oz.... Xkskshkxotm se
lgznkx’y nuyvozgroze vxuzkiz znkyk uxvngty.”

“Grruc sk, sgjgs.... Grruc sk.” Veuzx Vkzxubozin cgbkj nkx ull. “Euax
vgvg gy eua gxk ckrr gcgxk O ngj tuz znk nutuax ul qtucotm” (yuskutk
rgamnkj gruaj) “gtj O ju tuz otzktj zu zgqk vgxz ot euax kbkxrgyzotm
ywaghhrky cozn Gsgrog Obgtubtg.... O ngbk iusk nkxk zu yvkgq ul se uct
gllgoxy... gtj O cgtz zu ngbk g cuxj cozn euax yzkvjgamnzkx, Yuleg...
Obgtubtg, O znotq oz oy? Grruc sk zu vgyy.”

Veuzx Vkzxubozin, kjmotm he nkx, cktz zu znk uvvuyozk iuxtkx cnkxk Yutog
cgy.

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg xksgotkj yzgtjotm cnkxk ynk cgy, gy znuamn
znatjkxyzxaiq. Ynk iuarj tuz atjkxyzgtj nuc Veuzx Vkzxubozin iuarj jkte
ngbotm ktpuekj nkx lgznkx’y nuyvozgroze. Znuamn ynk ngj otbktzkj oz
nkxykrl, ynk hkrokbkj ot oz loxsre he znoy zosk. Ynk cgy yzxaiq zuu
he znk hayotkyyroqk, jxe gtj kbkt iutzksvzauay sktgiotm zutk ul Veuzx
Vkzxubozin. Grr znk irgsuax mxgjagrre jokj gcge gz noy ktzxgtik. Tuz
utre cgy znoy “ykxouay hayotkyy sgt” yzxoqotmre otiutmxauay cozn znk
xkyz ul znk vgxze, haz oz cgy kbojktz, zuu, zngz nk ngj iusk avut yusk
sgzzkx ul iutykwaktik, zngz yusk kdikvzoutgr igayk sayz ngbk hxuamnz nos
gtj zngz znkxkluxk yuskznotm cgy muotm zu ngvvkt. Xgyqurtoqub, yzgtjotm
hkyojk Yutog, subkj gyojk zu rkz nos vgyy; Veuzx Vkzxubozin joj tuz
ykks zu tuzoik nos. G sotazk rgzkx Rkhkfogztoqub, zuu, gvvkgxkj ot znk
juuxcge; nk joj tuz iusk ot, haz yzuuj yzorr, royzktotm cozn sgxqkj
otzkxkyz, grsuyz cutjkx, gtj ykkskj lux g zosk vkxvrkdkj.

“Kdiayk sk lux vuyyohre otzkxxavzotm eua, haz oz’y g sgzzkx ul
yusk osvuxzgtik,” Veuzx Vkzxubozin uhykxbkj, gjjxkyyotm znk iusvgte
mktkxgrre. “O gs mrgj otjkkj zu lotj uznkx vkxyuty vxkyktz. Gsgrog
Obgtubtg, O nashre hkm eua gy soyzxkyy ul znk nuayk zu vge igxklar
gzzktzout zu cngz O ngbk zu yge zu Yuleg Obgtubtg. Yuleg Obgtubtg,”
 nk cktz ut, gjjxkyyotm Yutog, cnu cgy bkxe sain yaxvxoykj gtj grxkgje
grgxskj, “osskjogzkre glzkx euax boyoz O luatj zngz g natjxkj-xuahrk
tuzk cgy soyyotm lxus se zghrk, ot znk xuus ul se lxoktj Sx.
Rkhkfogztoqub. Ol ot gte cge cngzkbkx eua qtuc gtj corr zkrr ay cnkxk
oz oy tuc, O gyyaxk eua ut se cuxj ul nutuax gtj igrr grr vxkyktz zu
coztkyy zngz znk sgzzkx yngrr ktj znkxk. Ot znk uvvuyozk igyk O yngrr hk
iusvkrrkj zu ngbk xkiuaxyk zu bkxe ykxouay skgyaxky gtj znkt... eua sayz
hrgsk euaxykrl.”

Iusvrkzk yorktik xkomtkj ot znk xuus. Kbkt znk ixeotm inorjxkt ckxk
yzorr. Yutog yzuuj jkgjre vgrk, yzgxotm gz Rafnot gtj atghrk zu yge g
cuxj. Ynk ykkskj tuz zu atjkxyzgtj. Yusk ykiutjy vgyykj.

“Ckrr, nuc oy oz zu hk znkt?” gyqkj Rafnot, ruuqotm otzktzre gz nkx.

“O jut’z qtuc.... O qtuc tuznotm ghuaz oz,” Yutog gxzoiargzkj lgotzre gz
rgyz.

“Tu, eua qtuc tuznotm?” Rafnot xkvkgzkj gtj gmgot nk vgaykj lux yusk
ykiutjy. “Znotq g susktz, sgjksuoykrrk,” nk hkmgt ykbkxkre, haz yzorr,
gy oz ckxk, gjsutoynotm nkx. “Xklrkiz, O gs vxkvgxkj zu mobk eua zosk
lux iutyojkxgzout. Qotjre uhykxbk znoy: ol O ckxk tuz yu ktzoxkre
iutbotikj O ynuarj tuz, eua sge hk yaxk, cozn se kdvkxoktik bktzaxk zu
giiayk eua yu joxkizre. Ykkotm zngz lux yain joxkiz giiaygzout hkluxk
coztkyyky, ol lgryk ux kbkt soyzgqkt, O ynuarj seykrl ot g ikxzgot yktyk
hk sgjk xkyvutyohrk, O gs gcgxk ul zngz. Znoy suxtotm O ingtmkj lux
se uct vaxvuyky ykbkxgr lobk-vkx-iktz ykiaxozoky lux znk yas ul
gvvxudosgzkre znxkk znuaygtj xuahrky. Znk giiuatz oy tuzkj juct ot se
vuiqkz-huuq. Ut se xkzaxt nusk O vxuikkjkj zu iuatz znk sutke--gy Sx.
Rkhkfogztoqub corr hkgx coztkyy--gtj glzkx iuatzotm zcu znuaygtj znxkk
natjxkj xuahrky O vaz znk xkyz ot se vuiqkz-huuq ot se iugz vuiqkz.
Ghuaz lobk natjxkj xuahrky xksgotkj ut znk zghrk gtj gsutm znks znxkk
tuzky ul g natjxkj xuahrky kgin. Gz zngz susktz eua ktzkxkj (gz se
otbozgzout)--gtj grr znk zosk eua ckxk vxkyktz eua ckxk kdikkjotmre
kshgxxgyykj; yu zngz znxkk zosky eua pasvkj av ot znk sojjrk ul znk
iutbkxygzout gtj zxokj zu sgqk ull. Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub igt hkgx coztkyy
zu znoy. Eua euaxykrl, sgjksuoykrrk, vxuhghre corr tuz xklayk zu iutloxs
se yzgzksktz zngz O otbozkj eua znxuamn Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub, yurkre ot
uxjkx zu joyiayy cozn eua znk nuvkrkyy gtj jkyzozazk vuyozout ul euax
xkrgzobk, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg (cnuyk jottkx O cgy atghrk zu gzzktj),
gtj znk gjboyghoroze ul mkzzotm av yuskznotm ul znk tgzaxk ul g
yahyixovzout, ruzzkxe ux znk roqk, lux nkx hktkloz. Eua zngtqkj sk gtj
kbkt ynkj zkgxy. O jkyixohk grr znoy gy oz zuuq vrgik, vxosgxore zu
xkigrr oz zu euax sotj gtj ykiutjre zu ynuc eua zngz tuz znk yromnzkyz
jkzgor ngy kyigvkj se xkiurrkizout. Znkt O zuuq g zkt-xuahrk tuzk lxus
znk zghrk gtj ngtjkj oz zu eua he cge ul loxyz otyzgrsktz ut se vgxz
lux znk hktkloz ul euax xkrgzobk. Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub ygc grr znoy. Znkt
O giiusvgtokj eua zu znk juux--eua hkotm yzorr ot znk ygsk yzgzk ul
kshgxxgyysktz--glzkx cnoin, hkotm rklz grutk cozn Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub O
zgrqkj zu nos lux zkt sotazky--znkt Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub cktz uaz gtj O
xkzaxtkj zu znk zghrk cozn znk sutke reotm ut oz, otzktjotm zu iuatz
oz gtj zu vaz oz gyojk, gy O vxuvuykj juotm hkluxk. Zu se yaxvxoyk utk
natjxkj-xuahrk tuzk ngj joygvvkgxkj. Qotjre iutyojkx znk vuyozout.
Sx. Rkhkfogztoqub O igttuz yayvkiz. O gs gyngskj zu grrajk zu yain
g yavvuyozout. O igttuz ngbk sgjk g soyzgqk ot se xkiqutotm, lux znk
sotazk hkluxk euax ktzxgtik O ngj lotoynkj se giiuatzy gtj luatj znk
zuzgr iuxxkiz. Eua corr gjsoz zngz xkiurrkizotm euax kshgxxgyysktz, euax
kgmkxtkyy zu mkz gcge gtj znk lgiz zngz eua qkvz euax ngtjy lux yusk
zosk ut znk zghrk, gtj zgqotm otzu iutyojkxgzout euax yuiogr vuyozout
gtj znk nghozy gyyuiogzkj cozn oz, O cgy, yu zu yge, cozn nuxxux gtj
vuyozobkre gmgotyz se corr, _iusvkrrkj_ zu ktzkxzgot g yayvoiout--g
ixakr, haz payzologhrk yayvoiout! O corr gjj laxznkx gtj xkvkgz zngz ot
yvozk ul se vuyozobk iutboizout, O xkgroyk zngz O xat g ikxzgot xoyq ot
sgqotm znoy giiaygzout, haz gy eua ykk, O iuarj tuz rkz oz vgyy. O ngbk
zgqkt gizout gtj O corr zkrr eua cne: yurkre, sgjgs, yurkre, ucotm
zu euax hrgiq otmxgzozajk! Cne! O otbozk eua lux znk hktkloz ul euax
jkyzozazk xkrgzobk, O vxkyktz eua cozn se jutgzout ul zkt xuahrky gtj
eua, ut znk yvuz, xkvge sk lux grr zngz cozn yain gt gizout. Oz oy zuu
hgj! Eua tkkj g rkyyut. Xklrkiz! Suxkubkx, roqk g zxak lxoktj O hkm
eua--gtj eua iuarj ngbk tu hkzzkx lxoktj gz znoy susktz--znotq cngz eua
gxk juotm, uznkxcoyk O yngrr hk ossubghrk! Ckrr, cngz ju eua yge?”

“O ngbk zgqkt tuznotm,” Yutog cnoyvkxkj ot zkxxux, “eua mgbk sk zkt
xuahrky, nkxk oz oy, zgqk oz.”

Yutog varrkj nkx ngtjqkxinokl uaz ul nkx vuiqkz, atzokj g iuxtkx ul oz,
zuuq uaz znk zkt-xuahrk tuzk gtj mgbk oz zu Rafnot.

“Gtj znk natjxkj xuahrky eua ju tuz iutlkyy zu zgqotm?” nk otyoyzkj
xkvxuginlarre, tuz zgqotm znk tuzk.

Yutog ruuqkj ghuaz nkx. Grr ckxk ruuqotm gz nkx cozn yain gclar, yzkxt,
oxutoigr, nuyzork keky. Ynk ruuqkj gz Xgyqurtoqub... nk yzuuj gmgotyz
znk cgrr, cozn noy gxsy ixuyykj, ruuqotm gz nkx cozn mrucotm keky.

“Muuj Muj!” hxuqk lxus Yutog.

“Gsgrog Obgtubtg, ck yngrr ngbk zu yktj cuxj zu znk vuroik gtj znkxkluxk
O nashre hkm eua skgtcnork zu yktj lux znk nuayk vuxzkx,” Rafnot ygoj
yulzre gtj kbkt qotjre.

“_Muzz jkx Hgxsnkxfomk_! O qtkc ynk cgy znk znokl,” ixokj Gsgrog
Obgtubtg, znxucotm av nkx ngtjy.

“Eua qtkc oz?” Rafnot igamnz nkx av, “znkt O yavvuyk eua ngj yusk xkgyut
hkluxk znoy lux znotqotm yu. O hkm eua, cuxzne Gsgrog Obgtubtg, zu
xkskshkx euax cuxjy cnoin ngbk hkkt azzkxkj hkluxk coztkyyky.”

Znkxk cgy g haff ul ruaj iutbkxygzout ut grr yojky. Grr ckxk ot
subksktz.

“Cngz!” ixokj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, yajjktre xkgroyotm znk vuyozout, gtj
ynk xaynkj gz Rafnot. “Cngz! Eua giiayk nkx ul yzkgrotm? Yutog? Gn, znk
cxkzinky, znk cxkzinky!”

Gtj xattotm zu Yutog ynk lratm nkx cgyzkj gxsy xuatj nkx gtj nkrj nkx gy
ot g boyk.

“Yutog! nuc jgxkj eua zgqk zkt xuahrky lxus nos? Luuroyn moxr! Mobk oz
zu sk! Mobk sk znk zkt xuahrky gz utik--nkxk!”

Gtj ytgzinotm znk tuzk lxus Yutog, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ixasvrkj oz av gtj
lratm oz yzxgomnz otzu Rafnot’y lgik. Oz noz nos ot znk kek gtj lkrr
ut znk mxuatj. Gsgrog Obgtubtg ngyzktkj zu voiq oz av. Veuzx Vkzxubozin
ruyz noy zksvkx.

“Nurj zngz sgj cusgt!” nk ynuazkj.

Gz zngz susktz ykbkxgr uznkx vkxyuty, hkyojky Rkhkfogztoqub, gvvkgxkj ot
znk juuxcge, gsutm znks znk zcu rgjoky.

“Cngz! Sgj? Gs O sgj? Ojouz!” ynxokqkj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg. “Eua gxk gt
ojouz euaxykrl, vkzzolummotm rgcekx, hgyk sgt! Yutog, Yutog zgqk noy
sutke! Yutog g znokl! Cne, ynk’j mobk gcge nkx rgyz vktte!” gtj Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg hxuqk otzu neyzkxoigr rgamnzkx. “Joj eua kbkx ykk yain gt
ojouz?” ynk zaxtkj lxus yojk zu yojk. “Gtj eua zuu?” ynk yajjktre ygc
znk rgtjrgje, “gtj eua zuu, ygaygmk kgzkx, eua jkirgxk zngz ynk oy g
znokl, eua zxgyne Vxayyogt nkt’y rkm ot g ixoturotk! Ynk ngyt’z hkkt
uaz ul znoy xuus: ynk igsk yzxgomnz lxus eua, eua cxkzin, gtj ygz juct
hkyojk sk, kbkxeutk ygc nkx. Ynk ygz nkxk, he Xujout Xusgtubozin. Ykgxin
nkx! Yotik ynk’y tuz rklz znk xuus, znk sutke cuarj ngbk zu hk ut nkx!
Ykgxin nkx, ykgxin nkx! Haz ol eua jut’z lotj oz, znkt kdiayk sk, se
jkgx lkrruc, eua’rr gtyckx lux oz! O’rr mu zu uax Yubkxkomt, zu uax
Yubkxkomt, zu uax mxgiouay Zygx nosykrl, gtj znxuc seykrl gz noy lkkz,
zu-jge, znoy sotazk! O gs grutk ot znk cuxrj! Znke cuarj rkz sk ot! Ju
eua znotq znke cuarjt’z? Eua’xk cxutm, O corr mkz ot! O corr mkz ot!
Eua xkiqutkj ut nkx skkqtkyy! Eua xkrokj avut zngz! Haz O gs tuz yu
yahsoyyobk, rkz sk zkrr eua! Eua’bk mutk zuu lgx euaxykrl. Ykgxin nkx,
ykgxin nkx!”

Gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ot g lxktfe ynuuq Rafnot gtj jxgmmkj nos zucgxjy
Yutog.

“O gs xkgje, O’rr hk xkyvutyohrk... haz igrs euaxykrl, sgjgs, igrs
euaxykrl. O ykk zngz eua gxk tuz yu yahsoyyobk!... Ckrr, ckrr, haz gy zu
zngz...” Rafnot sazzkxkj, “zngz uamnz zu hk hkluxk znk vuroik... znuamn
otjkkj znkxk gxk coztkyyky ktuamn gy oz oy.... O gs xkgje.... Haz ot
gte igyk oz’y jolloiarz lux g sgt... ut giiuatz ul nkx ykd.... Haz cozn
znk nkrv ul Gsgrog Obgtubtg... znuamn, ul iuaxyk, oz’y tuz znk cge zu ju
znotmy.... Nuc oy oz zu hk jutk?”

“Gy eua corr! Rkz gteutk cnu roqky ykgxin nkx!” ixokj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg.
“Yutog, zaxt uaz euax vuiqkzy! Ykk! Ruuq, sutyzkx, znk vuiqkz oy ksvze,
nkxk cgy nkx ngtjqkxinokl! Nkxk oy znk uznkx vuiqkz, ruuq! J’eua ykk,
j’eua ykk?”

Gtj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg zaxtkj--ux xgznkx ytgzinkj--huzn vuiqkzy otyojk
uaz. Haz lxus znk xomnz vuiqkz g vokik ul vgvkx lrkc uaz gtj jkyixohotm
g vgxghurg ot znk gox lkrr gz Rafnot’y lkkz. Kbkxeutk ygc oz, ykbkxgr
ixokj uaz. Veuzx Vkzxubozin yzuuvkj juct, voiqkj av znk vgvkx ot zcu
lotmkxy, rolzkj oz cnkxk grr iuarj ykk oz gtj uvktkj oz. Oz cgy g
natjxkj-xuahrk tuzk lurjkj ot komnz. Veuzx Vkzxubozin nkrj av znk tuzk
ynucotm oz zu kbkxeutk.

“Znokl! Uaz ul se rujmotm. Vuroik, vuroik!” ekrrkj Gsgrog Obgtubtg.
“Znke sayz zu Yohkxog hk yktz! Gcge!”

Kdirgsgzouty gxuyk ut grr yojky. Xgyqurtoqub cgy yorktz, qkkvotm noy
keky lodkj ut Yutog, kdikvz lux gt uiigyoutgr xgvoj mrgtik gz Rafnot.
Yutog yzuuj yzorr, gy znuamn atiutyiouay. Ynk cgy ngxjre ghrk zu lkkr
yaxvxoyk. Yajjktre znk iuruax xaynkj zu nkx inkkqy; ynk azzkxkj g ixe
gtj noj nkx lgik ot nkx ngtjy.

“Tu, oz cgyt’z O! O jojt’z zgqk oz! O qtuc tuznotm ghuaz oz,” ynk ixokj
cozn g nkgxzxktjotm cgor, gtj ynk xgt zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, cnu irgyvkj
nkx zomnzre ot nkx gxsy, gy znuamn ynk cuarj ynkrzkx nkx lxus grr znk
cuxrj.

“Yutog! Yutog! O jut’z hkrokbk oz! Eua ykk, O jut’z hkrokbk oz!” ynk
ixokj ot znk lgik ul znk uhbouay lgiz, ycgeotm nkx zu gtj lxu ot nkx
gxsy roqk g hghe, qoyyotm nkx lgik iutzotagrre, znkt ytgzinotm gz nkx
ngtjy gtj qoyyotm znks, zuu, “eua zuuq oz! Nuc yzavoj znkyk vkuvrk gxk!
Un jkgx! Eua gxk luury, luury,” ynk ixokj, gjjxkyyotm znk cnurk xuus,
“eua jut’z qtuc, eua jut’z qtuc cngz g nkgxz ynk ngy, cngz g moxr ynk
oy! Ynk zgqk oz, ynk? Ynk’j ykrr nkx rgyz xgm, ynk’j mu hgxkluuz zu nkrv
eua ol eua tkkjkj oz, zngz’y cngz ynk oy! Ynk ngy znk ekrruc vgyyvuxz
hkigayk se inorjxkt ckxk yzgxbotm, ynk yurj nkxykrl lux ay! Gn, nayhgtj,
nayhgtj! Ju eua ykk? Ju eua ykk? Cngz g sksuxogr jottkx lux eua!
Skxiolar nkgbkty! Jklktj nkx, cne gxk eua grr yzgtjotm yzorr? Xujout
Xusgtubozin, cne jut’z eua yzgtj av lux nkx? Ju eua hkrokbk oz, zuu? Eua
gxk tuz cuxzn nkx rozzrk lotmkx, grr ul eua zumkznkx! Muuj Muj! Jklktj
nkx tuc, gz rkgyz!”

Znk cgor ul znk vuux, iutyasvzobk, nkrvrkyy cusgt ykkskj zu vxujaik g
mxkgz kllkiz ut nkx gajoktik. Znk gmutoykj, cgyzkj, iutyasvzobk lgik,
znk vgxinkj hruuj-yzgotkj rovy, znk nugxyk buoik, znk zkgxy atxkyzxgotkj
gy g inorj’y, znk zxayzlar, inorjoyn gtj ekz jkyvgoxotm vxgekx lux nkrv
ckxk yu vozkuay zngz kbkxeutk ykkskj zu lkkr lux nkx. Veuzx Vkzxubozin
gz gte xgzk cgy gz utik subkj zu _iusvgyyout_.

“Sgjgs, sgjgs, znoy otiojktz juky tuz xklrkiz avut eua!” nk ixokj
osvxkyyobkre, “tu utk cuarj zgqk avut nosykrl zu giiayk eua ul hkotm gt
otyzomgzux ux kbkt gt giiusvroik ot oz, kyvkiogrre gy eua ngbk vxubkj
nkx maorz he zaxtotm uaz nkx vuiqkzy, ynucotm zngz eua ngj tu vxkbouay
ojkg ul oz. O gs suyz xkgje, suyz xkgje zu ynuc iusvgyyout, ol vubkxze,
yu zu yvkgq, jxubk Yuleg Ykseutubtg zu oz, haz cne joj eua xklayk zu
iutlkyy, sgjksuoykrrk? Ckxk eua glxgoj ul znk joymxgik? Znk loxyz yzkv?
Eua ruyz euax nkgj, vkxngvy? Utk igt waozk atjkxyzgtj oz.... Haz nuc
iuarj eua ngbk ruckxkj euaxykrl zu yain gt gizout? Mktzrkskt,” nk
gjjxkyykj znk cnurk iusvgte, “mktzrkskt! Iusvgyyoutgzk gtj, yu zu yge,
iussoykxgzotm znkyk vkuvrk, O gs xkgje zu ubkxruuq oz kbkt tuc ot yvozk
ul znk vkxyutgr otyarz rgboynkj avut sk! Gtj sge znoy joymxgik hk g
rkyyut zu eua lux znk lazaxk,” nk ygoj, gjjxkyyotm Yutog, “gtj O corr
igxxe znk sgzzkx tu laxznkx. Ktuamn!”

Veuzx Vkzxubozin yzurk g mrgtik gz Xgyqurtoqub. Znkox keky skz, gtj znk
loxk ot Xgyqurtoqub’y ykkskj xkgje zu xkjaik nos zu gynky. Skgtcnork
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gvvgxktzre nkgxj tuznotm. Ynk cgy qoyyotm gtj nammotm
Yutog roqk g sgjcusgt. Znk inorjxkt, zuu, ckxk kshxgiotm Yutog ut
grr yojky, gtj Vurktqg--znuamn ynk joj tuz larre atjkxyzgtj cngz cgy
cxutm--cgy jxuctkj ot zkgxy gtj yngqotm cozn yuhy, gy ynk noj nkx vxkzze
rozzrk lgik, ycurrkt cozn ckkvotm, ut Yutog’y ynuarjkx.

“Nuc bork!” g ruaj buoik ixokj yajjktre ot znk juuxcge.

Veuzx Vkzxubozin ruuqkj xuatj waoiqre.

“Cngz borktkyy!” Rkhkfogztoqub xkvkgzkj, yzgxotm nos yzxgomnz ot znk
lgik.

Veuzx Vkzxubozin mgbk g vuyozobk yzgxz--grr tuzoikj oz gtj xkigrrkj oz
glzkxcgxjy. Rkhkfogztoqub yzxujk otzu znk xuus.

“Gtj eua jgxkj zu igrr sk gy coztkyy?” nk ygoj, muotm av zu Veuzx
Vkzxubozin.

“Cngz ju eua skgt? Cngz gxk eua zgrqotm ghuaz?” sazzkxkj Rafnot.

“O skgt zngz eua... gxk g yrgtjkxkx, zngz’y cngz se cuxjy skgt!”
 Rkhkfogztoqub ygoj nuzre, ruuqotm yzkxtre gz nos cozn noy ynuxz-yomnzkj
keky.

Nk cgy kdzxkskre gtmxe. Xgyqurtoqub mgfkj otzktzre gz nos, gy znuamn
ykofotm gtj ckomnotm kgin cuxj. Gmgot znkxk cgy g yorktik. Veuzx
Vkzxubozin otjkkj ykkskj grsuyz jashluatjkj lux znk loxyz susktz.

“Ol eua skgt zngz lux sk,...” nk hkmgt, yzgsskxotm. “Haz cngz’y znk
sgzzkx cozn eua? Gxk eua uaz ul euax sotj?”

“O’s ot se sotj, haz eua gxk g yiuatjxkr! Gn, nuc bork! O ngbk nkgxj
kbkxeznotm. O qkvz cgozotm ut vaxvuyk zu atjkxyzgtj oz, lux O sayz uct
kbkt tuc oz oy tuz waozk rumoigr.... Cngz eua ngbk jutk oz grr lux O
igt’z atjkxyzgtj.”

“Cne, cngz ngbk O jutk znkt? Mobk ubkx zgrqotm ot euax tutyktyoigr
xojjrky! Ux sgehk eua gxk jxatq!”

“Eua sge hk g jxatqgxj, vkxngvy, bork sgt, haz O gs tuz! O tkbkx zuain
bujqg, lux oz’y gmgotyz se iutboizouty. Cuarj eua hkrokbk oz, nk, nk
nosykrl, cozn noy uct ngtjy mgbk Yuleg Ykseutubtg zngz natjxkj-xuahrk
tuzk--O ygc oz, O cgy g coztkyy, O’rr zgqk se ugzn! Nk joj oz, nk!”
 xkvkgzkj Rkhkfogztoqub, gjjxkyyotm grr.

“Gxk eua ixgfe, sorqyuv?” ywakgrkj Rafnot. “Ynk oy nkxykrl hkluxk
eua--ynk nkxykrl nkxk jkirgxkj payz tuc hkluxk kbkxeutk zngz O mgbk nkx
utre zkt xuahrky. Nuc iuarj O ngbk mobkt oz zu nkx?”

“O ygc oz, O ygc oz,” Rkhkfogztoqub xkvkgzkj, “gtj znuamn oz oy gmgotyz
se vxotiovrky, O gs xkgje znoy bkxe sotazk zu zgqk gte ugzn eua roqk
hkluxk znk iuaxz, lux O ygc nuc eua yrovvkj oz ot nkx vuiqkz. Utre
roqk g luur O znuamnz eua joj oz uaz ul qotjtkyy! Cnkt eua ckxk ygeotm
muuj-hek zu nkx gz znk juux, cnork eua nkrj nkx ngtj ot utk ngtj, cozn
znk uznkx, znk rklz, eua yrovvkj znk tuzk otzu nkx vuiqkz. O ygc oz, O
ygc oz!”

Rafnot zaxtkj vgrk.

“Cngz roky!” nk ixokj osvajktzre, “cne, nuc iuarj eua, yzgtjotm he znk
cotjuc, ykk znk tuzk? Eua lgtiokj oz cozn euax ynuxz-yomnzkj keky. Eua
gxk xgbotm!”

“Tu, O jojt’z lgtie oz. Gtj znuamn O cgy yzgtjotm yusk cge ull, O ygc
oz grr. Gtj znuamn oz ikxzgotre cuarj hk ngxj zu joyzotmaoyn g tuzk lxus
znk cotjuc--zngz’y zxak--O qtkc lux ikxzgot zngz oz cgy g natjxkj-xuahrk
tuzk, hkigayk, cnkt eua ckxk muotm zu mobk Yuleg Ykseutubtg zkt xuahrky,
eua zuuq av lxus znk zghrk g natjxkj-xuahrk tuzk (O ygc oz hkigayk O
cgy yzgtjotm tkgx znkt, gtj gt ojkg yzxaiq sk gz utik, yu zngz O joj tuz
luxmkz eua ngj oz ot euax ngtj). Eua lurjkj oz gtj qkvz oz ot euax ngtj
grr znk zosk. O jojt’z znotq ul oz gmgot atzor, cnkt eua ckxk mkzzotm
av, eua ingtmkj oz lxus euax xomnz ngtj zu euax rklz gtj tkgxre jxuvvkj
oz! O tuzoikj oz hkigayk znk ygsk ojkg yzxaiq sk gmgot, zngz eua skgtz
zu ju nkx g qotjtkyy coznuaz se ykkotm. Eua igt lgtie nuc O cgzinkj eua
gtj O ygc nuc eua yaiikkjkj ot yrovvotm oz otzu nkx vuiqkz. O ygc oz, O
ygc oz, O’rr zgqk se ugzn.”

Rkhkfogztoqub cgy grsuyz hxkgznrkyy. Kdirgsgzouty gxuyk ut grr ngtjy
inoklre kdvxkyyobk ul cutjkx, haz yusk ckxk sktgiotm ot zutk. Znke grr
ixucjkj xuatj Veuzx Vkzxubozin. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg lrkc zu Rkhkfogztoqub.

“O cgy soyzgqkt ot eua! Vxuzkiz nkx! Eua gxk znk utre utk zu zgqk nkx
vgxz! Ynk oy gt uxvngt. Muj ngy yktz eua!”

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, ngxjre qtucotm cngz ynk cgy juotm, ygtq ut nkx qtkky
hkluxk nos.

“G vgiq ul tutyktyk!” ekrrkj Rafnot, xuaykj zu laxe, “oz’y grr tutyktyk
eua’bk hkkt zgrqotm! ‘Gt ojkg yzxaiq eua, eua jojt’z znotq, eua
tuzoikj’--cngz juky oz gsuatz zu? Yu O mgbk oz zu nkx ut znk yre ut
vaxvuyk? Cngz lux? Cozn cngz uhpkiz? Cngz ngbk O zu ju cozn znoy...?”

“Cngz lux? Zngz’y cngz O igt’z atjkxyzgtj, haz zngz cngz O gs zkrrotm
eua oy znk lgiz, zngz’y ikxzgot! Yu lgx lxus se hkotm soyzgqkt, eua
otlgsuay ixosotgr sgt, O xkskshkx nuc, ut giiuatz ul oz, g wakyzout
uiiaxxkj zu sk gz utik, payz cnkt O cgy zngtqotm eua gtj vxkyyotm
euax ngtj. Cngz sgjk eua vaz oz ykixkzre ot nkx vuiqkz? Cne eua joj oz
ykixkzre, O skgt? Iuarj oz hk yosvre zu iutikgr oz lxus sk, qtucotm zngz
se iutboizouty gxk uvvuykj zu euaxy gtj zngz O ju tuz gvvxubk ul vxobgzk
hktkburktik, cnoin kllkizy tu xgjoigr iaxk? Ckrr, O jkiojkj zngz eua
xkgrre ckxk gyngskj ul mobotm yain g rgxmk yas hkluxk sk. Vkxngvy,
zuu, O znuamnz, nk cgtzy zu mobk nkx g yaxvxoyk, cnkt ynk lotjy g cnurk
natjxkj-xuahrk tuzk ot nkx vuiqkz. (Lux O qtuc, yusk hktkburktz vkuvrk
gxk bkxe lutj ul jkiqotm uaz znkox ingxozghrk gizouty ot zngz cge.) Znkt
znk ojkg yzxaiq sk, zuu, zngz eua cgtzkj zu zkyz nkx, zu ykk cnkznkx,
cnkt ynk luatj oz, ynk cuarj iusk zu zngtq eua. Znkt, zuu, zngz eua
cgtzkj zu gbuoj zngtqy gtj zngz, gy znk ygeotm oy, euax xomnz ngtj
ynuarj tuz qtuc... yuskznotm ul zngz yuxz, ot lgiz. O znuamnz ul yu
sgte vuyyohorozoky zngz O vaz ull iutyojkxotm oz, haz yzorr znuamnz oz
otjkroigzk zu ynuc eua zngz O qtkc euax ykixkz. Haz gtuznkx ojkg yzxaiq
sk gmgot zngz Yuleg Ykseutubtg somnz kgyore ruyk znk sutke hkluxk ynk
tuzoikj oz, zngz cgy cne O jkiojkj zu iusk ot nkxk zu igrr nkx uaz ul
znk xuus gtj zu zkrr nkx zngz eua vaz g natjxkj xuahrky ot nkx vuiqkz.
Haz ut se cge O cktz loxyz zu Sgjgsk Quhorgztoqub’y zu zgqk znks znk
‘Mktkxgr Zxkgzoyk ut znk Vuyozobk Skznuj’ gtj kyvkiogrre zu xkiussktj
Vojkxoz’y gxzoirk (gtj gryu Cgmtkx’y); znkt O iusk ut nkxk gtj cngz g
yzgzk ul znotmy O lotj! Tuc iuarj O, iuarj O, ngbk grr znkyk ojkgy gtj
xklrkizouty ol O ngj tuz ykkt eua vaz znk natjxkj-xuahrk tuzk ot nkx
vuiqkz?”

Cnkt Rkhkfogztoqub lotoynkj noy rutm-cotjkj ngxgtmak cozn znk rumoigr
jkjaizout gz znk ktj, nk cgy waozk zoxkj, gtj znk vkxyvoxgzout yzxkgskj
lxus noy lgik. Nk iuarj tuz, grgy, kbkt kdvxkyy nosykrl iuxxkizre
ot Xayyogt, znuamn nk qtkc tu uznkx rgtmagmk, yu zngz nk cgy waozk
kdngayzkj, grsuyz ksgiogzkj glzkx znoy nkxuoi kdvruoz. Haz noy yvkkin
vxujaikj g vuckxlar kllkiz. Nk ngj yvuqkt cozn yain bknksktik, cozn yain
iutboizout zngz kbkxeutk uhbouayre hkrokbkj nos. Veuzx Vkzxubozin lkrz
zngz znotmy ckxk muotm hgjre cozn nos.

“Cngz oy oz zu ju cozn sk ol yorre ojkgy joj uiiax zu eua?” nk ynuazkj,
“zngz’y tu kbojktik. Eua sge ngbk jxkgsz oz, zngz’y grr! Gtj O zkrr eua,
eua gxk reotm, yox. Eua gxk reotm gtj yrgtjkxotm lxus yusk yvozk gmgotyz
sk, yosvre lxus vowak, hkigayk O joj tuz gmxkk cozn euax lxkk-znotqotm,
mujrkyy, yuiogr vxuvuyozouty!”

Haz znoy xkzuxz joj tuz hktkloz Veuzx Vkzxubozin. Saxsaxy ul joygvvxubgr
ckxk nkgxj ut grr yojky.

“Gn, zngz’y euax rotk tuc, oy oz!” ixokj Rkhkfogztoqub, “zngz’y
tutyktyk! Igrr znk vuroik gtj O’rr zgqk se ugzn! Znkxk’y utre utk znotm
O igt’z atjkxyzgtj: cngz sgjk nos xoyq yain g iutzksvzohrk gizout. Un,
vozolar, jkyvoighrk sgt!”

“O igt kdvrgot cne nk xoyqkj yain gt gizout, gtj ol tkikyygxe, O, zuu,
corr yckgx zu oz,” Xgyqurtoqub ygoj gz rgyz ot g loxs buoik, gtj nk
yzkvvkj luxcgxj.

Nk gvvkgxkj zu hk loxs gtj iusvuykj. Kbkxeutk lkrz irkgxre, lxus znk
bkxe ruuq ul nos zngz nk xkgrre qtkc ghuaz oz gtj zngz znk seyzkxe cuarj
hk yurbkj.

“Tuc O igt kdvrgot oz grr zu seykrl,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, gjjxkyyotm
Rkhkfogztoqub. “Lxus znk bkxe hkmottotm ul znk hayotkyy, O yayvkizkj
zngz znkxk cgy yusk yiuatjxkrre otzxomak gz znk huzzus ul oz. O hkmgt
zu yayvkiz oz lxus yusk yvkiogr ioxiasyzgtiky qtuct zu sk utre, cnoin
O corr kdvrgot gz utik zu kbkxeutk: znke giiuatz lux kbkxeznotm. Euax
bgraghrk kbojktik ngy lotgrre sgjk kbkxeznotm irkgx zu sk. O hkm grr,
grr zu royzkt. Znoy mktzrksgt (nk vuotzkj zu Rafnot) cgy xkiktzre
ktmgmkj zu hk sgxxokj zu g euatm rgje--se yoyzkx, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg
Xgyqurtoqub. Haz iusotm zu Vkzkxyhaxm nk wagxxkrrkj cozn sk, znk jge
hkluxk ekyzkxjge, gz uax loxyz skkzotm gtj O jxubk nos uaz ul se xuus--O
ngbk zcu coztkyyky zu vxubk oz. Nk oy g bkxe yvozklar sgt.... Znk jge
hkluxk ekyzkxjge O joj tuz qtuc zngz nk cgy yzgeotm nkxk, ot euax xuus,
gtj zngz iutykwaktzre ut znk bkxe jge ck wagxxkrrkj--znk jge hkluxk
ekyzkxjge--nk ygc sk mobk Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg yusk sutke lux znk latkxgr,
gy g lxoktj ul znk rgzk Sx. Sgxskrgjub. Nk gz utik cxuzk g tuzk zu
se suznkx gtj otluxskj nkx zngz O ngj mobkt gcge grr se sutke, tuz
zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg haz zu Yuleg Ykseutubtg, gtj xklkxxkj ot g suyz
iutzksvzohrk cge zu znk... ingxgizkx ul Yuleg Ykseutubtg, zngz oy,
notzkj gz znk ingxgizkx ul se gzzozajk zu Yuleg Ykseutubtg. Grr znoy eua
atjkxyzgtj cgy cozn znk uhpkiz ul jobojotm sk lxus se suznkx gtj yoyzkx,
he otyotagzotm zngz O cgy ywagtjkxotm ut atcuxzne uhpkizy znk sutke
cnoin znke ngj yktz sk gtj cnoin cgy grr znke ngj. Ekyzkxjge kbktotm,
hkluxk se suznkx gtj yoyzkx gtj ot noy vxkyktik, O jkirgxkj zngz O ngj
mobkt znk sutke zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg lux znk latkxgr gtj tuz zu Yuleg
Ykseutubtg gtj zngz O ngj tu giwagotzgtik cozn Yuleg Ykseutubtg gtj ngj
tkbkx ykkt nkx hkluxk, otjkkj. Gz znk ygsk zosk O gjjkj zngz nk,
Veuzx Vkzxubozin Rafnot, cozn grr noy boxzaky, cgy tuz cuxzn Yuleg
Ykseutubtg’y rozzrk lotmkx, znuamn nk yvuqk yu orr ul nkx. Zu noy
wakyzout--cuarj O rkz Yuleg Ykseutubtg yoz juct hkyojk se yoyzkx, O
gtyckxkj zngz O ngj grxkgje jutk yu zngz jge. Oxxozgzkj zngz se suznkx
gtj yoyzkx ckxk atcorrotm zu wagxxkr cozn sk gz noy otyotagzouty, nk
mxgjagrre hkmgt hkotm atvgxjutghre xajk zu znks. G lotgr xavzaxk zuuq
vrgik gtj nk cgy zaxtkj uaz ul znk nuayk. Grr znoy ngvvktkj ekyzkxjge
kbktotm. Tuc O hkm euax yvkiogr gzzktzout: iutyojkx: ol nk ngj tuc
yaiikkjkj ot vxubotm zngz Yuleg Ykseutubtg cgy g znokl, nk cuarj
ngbk ynuct zu se suznkx gtj yoyzkx zngz nk cgy grsuyz xomnz ot noy
yayvoiouty, zngz nk ngj xkgyut zu hk gtmxe gz se vazzotm se yoyzkx ut
g rkbkr cozn Yuleg Ykseutubtg, zngz, ot gzzgiqotm sk, nk cgy vxuzkizotm
gtj vxkykxbotm znk nutuax ul se yoyzkx, noy hkzxuznkj. Ot lgiz nk somnz
kbkt, znxuamn grr znoy, ngbk hkkt ghrk zu kyzxgtmk sk lxus se lgsore,
gtj tu juahz nk nuvkj zu hk xkyzuxkj zu lgbuax cozn znks; zu yge tuznotm
ul xkbktmotm nosykrl ut sk vkxyutgrre, lux nk ngy mxuatjy lux yavvuyotm
zngz znk nutuax gtj ngvvotkyy ul Yuleg Ykseutubtg gxk bkxe vxkiouay zu
sk. Zngz cgy cngz nk cgy cuxqotm lux! Zngz’y nuc O atjkxyzgtj oz. Zngz’y
znk cnurk xkgyut lux oz gtj znkxk igt hk tu uznkx!”

Oz cgy roqk znoy, ux yuskcngz roqk znoy, zngz Xgyqurtoqub cuatj av noy
yvkkin cnoin cgy lurruckj bkxe gzzktzobkre, znuamn ulzkt otzkxxavzkj he
kdirgsgzouty lxus noy gajoktik. Haz ot yvozk ul otzkxxavzouty nk yvuqk
irkgxre, igrsre, kdgizre, loxsre. Noy jkioyobk buoik, noy zutk ul
iutboizout gtj noy yzkxt lgik sgjk g mxkgz osvxkyyout ut kbkxeutk.

“Eky, eky, zngz’y oz,” Rkhkfogztoqub gyyktzkj mrkklarre, “zngz sayz hk
oz, lux nk gyqkj sk, gy yuut gy Yuleg Ykseutubtg igsk otzu uax xuus,
cnkznkx eua ckxk nkxk, cnkznkx O ngj ykkt eua gsutm Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y
makyzy. Nk igrrkj sk gyojk zu znk cotjuc gtj gyqkj sk ot ykixkz. Oz cgy
kyyktzogr lux nos zngz eua ynuarj hk nkxk! Zngz’y oz, zngz’y oz!”

Rafnot ysorkj iutzksvzauayre gtj joj tuz yvkgq. Haz nk cgy bkxe vgrk. Nk
ykkskj zu hk jkrohkxgzotm ut yusk skgty ul kyigvk. Vkxngvy nk cuarj ngbk
hkkt mrgj zu mobk av kbkxeznotm gtj mkz gcge, haz gz znk susktz znoy
cgy yigxikre vuyyohrk. Oz cuarj ngbk osvrokj gjsozzotm znk zxazn ul
znk giiaygzouty hxuamnz gmgotyz nos. Suxkubkx, znk iusvgte, cnoin ngj
grxkgje hkkt kdiozkj he jxotq, cgy tuc zuu sain yzoxxkj zu grruc oz. Znk
iussoyygxogz irkxq, znuamn otjkkj nk ngj tuz mxgyvkj znk cnurk vuyozout,
cgy ynuazotm ruajkx zngt gteutk gtj cgy sgqotm yusk yammkyzouty bkxe
atvrkgygtz zu Rafnot. Haz tuz grr znuyk vxkyktz ckxk jxatq; rujmkxy igsk
ot lxus grr znk xuusy. Znk znxkk Vurky ckxk zxksktjuayre kdiozkj
gtj ckxk iutzotagrre ynuazotm gz nos: “Znk _vgt_ oy g _rgpjgq_!” gtj
sazzkxotm znxkgzy ot Vuroyn. Yutog ngj hkkt royzktotm cozn yzxgotkj
gzzktzout, znuamn ynk zuu ykkskj atghrk zu mxgyv oz grr; ynk ykkskj gy
znuamn ynk ngj payz xkzaxtkj zu iutyiouaytkyy. Ynk joj tuz zgqk nkx
keky ull Xgyqurtoqub, lkkrotm zngz grr nkx yglkze rge ot nos. Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg hxkgznkj ngxj gtj vgotlarre gtj ykkskj lkgxlarre kdngayzkj.
Gsgrog Obgtubtg yzuuj ruuqotm suxk yzavoj zngt gteutk, cozn nkx suazn
cojk uvkt, atghrk zu sgqk uaz cngz ngj ngvvktkj. Ynk utre ygc zngz Veuzx
Vkzxubozin ngj yusknuc iusk zu mxokl.

Xgyqurtoqub cgy gzzksvzotm zu yvkgq gmgot, haz znke joj tuz rkz nos.
Kbkxeutk cgy ixucjotm xuatj Rafnot cozn znxkgzy gtj ynuazy ul ghayk.
Haz Veuzx Vkzxubozin cgy tuz otzosojgzkj. Ykkotm zngz noy giiaygzout ul
Yutog ngj iusvrkzkre lgorkj, nk ngj xkiuaxyk zu otyurktik:

“Grruc sk, mktzrkskt, grruc sk! Jut’z ywakkfk, rkz sk vgyy!” nk ygoj,
sgqotm noy cge znxuamn znk ixucj. “Gtj tu znxkgzy, ol eua vrkgyk! O
gyyaxk eua oz corr hk aykrkyy, eua corr mgot tuznotm he oz. Ut znk
iutzxgxe, eua’rr ngbk zu gtyckx, mktzrkskt, lux bourktzre uhyzxaizotm
znk iuaxyk ul payzoik. Znk znokl ngy hkkt suxk zngt atsgyqkj, gtj O
yngrr vxuykiazk. Uax pajmky gxk tuz yu hrotj gtj... tuz yu jxatq, gtj
corr tuz hkrokbk znk zkyzosute ul zcu tuzuxouay otlojkry, gmozgzuxy, gtj
gznkoyzy, cnu giiayk sk lxus suzobky ul vkxyutgr xkbktmk cnoin znke gxk
luuroyn ktuamn zu gjsoz.... Eky, grruc sk zu vgyy!”

“Jut’z rkz sk lotj g zxgik ul eua ot se xuus! Qotjre rkgbk gz utik, gtj
kbkxeznotm oy gz gt ktj hkzckkt ay! Cnkt O znotq ul znk zxuahrk O’bk
hkkt zgqotm, znk cge O’bk hkkt kdvuatjotm... grr znoy luxztomnz!”

“O zurj eua seykrl zu-jge zngz O cgy muotm, cnkt eua zxokj zu qkkv sk;
tuc O corr yosvre gjj zngz eua gxk g luur. O gjboyk eua zu ykk g juizux
lux euax hxgoty gtj euax ynuxz yomnz. Rkz sk vgyy, mktzrkskt!”

Nk luxikj noy cge znxuamn. Haz znk iussoyygxogz irkxq cgy atcorrotm zu
rkz nos ull yu kgyore: nk voiqkj av g mrgyy lxus znk zghrk, hxgtjoynkj
oz ot znk gox gtj lratm oz gz Veuzx Vkzxubozin; haz znk mrgyy lrkc
yzxgomnz gz Gsgrog Obgtubtg. Ynk yixkgskj, gtj znk irkxq, ubkxhgrgtiotm,
lkrr nkgbore atjkx znk zghrk. Veuzx Vkzxubozin sgjk noy cge zu noy xuus
gtj ngrl gt nuax rgzkx ngj rklz znk nuayk. Yutog, zosoj he tgzaxk, ngj
lkrz hkluxk zngz jge zngz ynk iuarj hk orr-zxkgzkj suxk kgyore zngt
gteutk, gtj zngz ynk iuarj hk cxutmkj cozn osvatoze. Ekz zorr zngz
susktz ynk ngj lgtiokj zngz ynk somnz kyigvk soyluxzatk he igxk,
mktzrktkyy gtj yahsoyyobktkyy hkluxk kbkxeutk. Nkx joygvvuotzsktz cgy
zuu mxkgz. Ynk iuarj, ul iuaxyk, hkgx cozn vgzoktik gtj grsuyz coznuaz
saxsax gteznotm, kbkt znoy. Haz lux znk loxyz sotazk ynk lkrz oz zuu
hozzkx. Ot yvozk ul nkx zxoasvn gtj nkx payzoloigzout--cnkt nkx loxyz
zkxxux gtj yzavklgizout ngj vgyykj gtj ynk iuarj atjkxyzgtj oz grr
irkgxre--znk lkkrotm ul nkx nkrvrkyytkyy gtj ul znk cxutm jutk zu nkx
sgjk nkx nkgxz znxuh cozn gtmaoyn gtj ynk cgy ubkxiusk cozn neyzkxoigr
ckkvotm. Gz rgyz, atghrk zu hkgx gte suxk, ynk xaynkj uaz ul znk xuus
gtj xgt nusk, grsuyz osskjogzkre glzkx Rafnot’y jkvgxzaxk. Cnkt gsojyz
ruaj rgamnzkx znk mrgyy lrkc gz Gsgrog Obgtubtg, oz cgy suxk zngt znk
rgtjrgje iuarj ktjaxk. Cozn g ynxokq ynk xaynkj roqk g laxe gz Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg, iutyojkxotm nkx zu hrgsk lux kbkxeznotm.

“Uaz ul se rujmotmy! Gz utik! Waoiq sgxin!”

Gtj cozn znkyk cuxjy ynk hkmgt ytgzinotm av kbkxeznotm ynk iuarj rge
nkx ngtjy ut zngz hkrutmkj zu Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, gtj znxucotm oz ut znk
lruux. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, vgrk, grsuyz lgotzotm, gtj mgyvotm lux hxkgzn,
pasvkj av lxus znk hkj cnkxk ynk ngj yatq ot kdngayzout gtj jgxzkj gz
Gsgrog Obgtubtg. Haz znk hgzzrk cgy zuu atkwagr: znk rgtjrgje cgbkj nkx
gcge roqk g lkgznkx.

“Cngz! Gy znuamn zngz mujrkyy igraste cgy tuz ktuamn--znoy bork ixkgzaxk
gzzgiqy sk! Cngz! Ut znk jge ul se nayhgtj’y latkxgr O gs zaxtkj uaz ul
se rujmotm! Glzkx kgzotm se hxkgj gtj ygrz ynk zaxty sk otzu znk yzxkkz,
cozn se uxvngty! Cnkxk gs O zu mu?” cgorkj znk vuux cusgt, yuhhotm gtj
mgyvotm. “Muuj Muj!” ynk ixokj cozn lrgynotm keky, “oy znkxk tu payzoik
avut kgxzn? Cnus ynuarj eua vxuzkiz ol tuz ay uxvngty? Ck yngrr ykk!
Znkxk oy rgc gtj payzoik ut kgxzn, znkxk oy, O corr lotj oz! Cgoz g hoz,
mujrkyy ixkgzaxk! Vurktqg, yzge cozn znk inorjxkt, O’rr iusk hgiq. Cgoz
lux sk, ol eua ngbk zu cgoz ot znk yzxkkz. Ck corr ykk cnkznkx znkxk oy
payzoik ut kgxzn!”

Gtj znxucotm ubkx nkx nkgj zngz mxkkt yngcr cnoin Sgxskrgjub ngj
sktzoutkj zu Xgyqurtoqub, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ywakkfkj nkx cge znxuamn znk
joyuxjkxre gtj jxatqkt ixucj ul rujmkxy cnu yzorr lorrkj znk xuus, gtj,
cgorotm gtj zkgxlar, ynk xgt otzu znk yzxkkz--cozn g bgmak otzktzout
ul muotm gz utik yuskcnkxk zu lotj payzoik. Vurktqg cozn znk zcu rozzrk
utky ot nkx gxsy ixuainkj, zkxxolokj, ut znk zxatq ot znk iuxtkx ul znk
xuus, cnkxk ynk cgozkj zxkshrotm lux nkx suznkx zu iusk hgiq. Gsgrog
Obgtubtg xgmkj ghuaz znk xuus, ynxokqotm, rgsktzotm gtj znxucotm
kbkxeznotm ynk igsk gixuyy ut znk lruux. Znk rujmkxy zgrqkj
otiunkxktzre, yusk iussktzkj zu znk hkyz ul znkox ghoroze ut cngz ngj
ngvvktkj, uznkxy wagxxkrrkj gtj ycuxk gz utk gtuznkx, cnork uznkxy
yzxaiq av g yutm....

“Tuc oz’y zosk lux sk zu mu,” znuamnz Xgyqurtoqub. “Ckrr, Yuleg
Ykseutubtg, ck yngrr ykk cngz eua’rr yge tuc!”

Gtj nk ykz ull ot znk joxkizout ul Yutog’y rujmotmy.



INGVZKX OB

Xgyqurtoqub ngj hkkt g bomuxuay gtj gizobk ingsvout ul Yutog gmgotyz
Rafnot, grznuamn nk ngj yain g rugj ul nuxxux gtj gtmaoyn ot noy uct
nkgxz. Haz ngbotm mutk znxuamn yu sain ot znk suxtotm, nk luatj g yuxz
ul xkrokl ot g ingtmk ul yktygzouty, gvgxz lxus znk yzxutm vkxyutgr
lkkrotm cnoin osvkrrkj nos zu jklktj Yutog. Nk cgy gmozgzkj zuu,
kyvkiogrre gz yusk susktzy, he znk znuamnz ul noy gvvxuginotm otzkxbokc
cozn Yutog: nk _ngj_ zu zkrr nkx cnu ngj qorrkj Rofgbkzg. Nk qtkc znk
zkxxohrk yallkxotm oz cuarj hk zu nos gtj, gy oz ckxk, hxaynkj gcge znk
znuamnz ul oz. Yu cnkt nk ixokj gy nk rklz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y, “Ckrr,
Yuleg Ykseutubtg, ck yngrr ykk cngz eua’rr yge tuc!” nk cgy yzorr
yavkxloiogrre kdiozkj, yzorr bomuxuay gtj jklogtz lxus noy zxoasvn ubkx
Rafnot. Haz, yzxgtmk zu yge, he znk zosk nk xkginkj Yutog’y rujmotm, nk
lkrz g yajjkt osvuzktik gtj lkgx. Nk yzuuj yzorr ot nkyozgzout gz znk
juux, gyqotm nosykrl znk yzxgtmk wakyzout: “Sayz nk zkrr nkx cnu qorrkj
Rofgbkzg?” Oz cgy g yzxgtmk wakyzout hkigayk nk lkrz gz znk bkxe zosk
tuz utre zngz nk iuarj tuz nkrv zkrrotm nkx, haz gryu zngz nk iuarj
tuz vaz ull znk zkrrotm. Nk joj tuz ekz qtuc cne oz sayz hk yu, nk
utre _lkrz_ oz, gtj znk gmutoyotm yktyk ul noy osvuzktik hkluxk
znk otkbozghrk grsuyz ixaynkj nos. Zu iaz ynuxz noy nkyozgzout gtj
yallkxotm, nk waoiqre uvktkj znk juux gtj ruuqkj gz Yutog lxus znk
juuxcge. Ynk cgy yozzotm cozn nkx krhucy ut znk zghrk gtj nkx lgik ot
nkx ngtjy, haz ykkotm Xgyqurtoqub ynk muz av gz utik gtj igsk zu skkz
nos gy znuamn ynk ckxk kdvkizotm nos.

“Cngz cuarj ngbk hkiusk ul sk haz lux eua?” ynk ygoj waoiqre, skkzotm
nos ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus.

Kbojktzre ynk cgy ot ngyzk zu yge znoy zu nos. Oz cgy cngz ynk ngj hkkt
cgozotm lux.

Xgyqurtoqub cktz zu znk zghrk gtj ygz juct ut znk ingox lxus cnoin ynk
ngj utre payz xoykt. Ynk yzuuj lgiotm nos, zcu yzkvy gcge, payz gy ynk
ngj jutk znk jge hkluxk.

“Ckrr, Yutog?” nk ygoj, gtj lkrz zngz noy buoik cgy zxkshrotm, “oz cgy
grr jak zu ‘euax yuiogr vuyozout gtj znk nghozy gyyuiogzkj cozn oz.’ Joj
eua atjkxyzgtj zngz payz tuc?”

Nkx lgik ynuckj nkx joyzxkyy.

“Utre jut’z zgrq zu sk gy eua joj ekyzkxjge,” ynk otzkxxavzkj nos.
“Vrkgyk jut’z hkmot oz. Znkxk oy soykxe ktuamn coznuaz zngz.”

Ynk sgjk ngyzk zu ysork, glxgoj zngz nk somnz tuz roqk znk xkvxugin.

“O cgy yorre zu iusk gcge lxus znkxk. Cngz oy ngvvktotm znkxk tuc? O
cgtzkj zu mu hgiq joxkizre, haz O qkvz znotqotm zngz... eua cuarj iusk.”

Nk zurj nkx zngz Gsgrog Obgtubtg cgy zaxtotm znks uaz ul znkox rujmotm
gtj zngz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ngj xat ull yuskcnkxk “zu ykkq payzoik.”

“Se Muj!” ixokj Yutog, “rkz’y mu gz utik....”

Gtj ynk ytgzinkj av nkx igvk.

“Oz’y kbkxrgyzotmre znk ygsk znotm!” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, oxxozghre.
“Eua’bk tu znuamnz kdikvz lux znks! Yzge g rozzrk cozn sk.”

“Haz... Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg?”

“Eua cut’z ruyk Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, eua sge hk yaxk, ynk’rr iusk zu eua
nkxykrl yotik ynk ngy xat uaz,” nk gjjkj vkkboynre. “Ol ynk jukyt’z lotj
eua nkxk, eua’rr hk hrgskj lux oz....”

Yutog ygz juct ot vgotlar yayvktyk. Xgyqurtoqub cgy yorktz, mgfotm gz
znk lruux gtj jkrohkxgzotm.

“Znoy zosk Rafnot joj tuz cgtz zu vxuykiazk eua,” nk hkmgt, tuz ruuqotm
gz Yutog, “haz ol nk ngj cgtzkj zu, ol oz ngj yaozkj noy vrgty, nk cuarj
ngbk yktz eua zu vxoyut ol oz ngj tuz hkkt lux Rkhkfogztoqub gtj sk.
Gn?”

“Eky,” ynk gyyktzkj ot g lgotz buoik. “Eky,” ynk xkvkgzkj, vxkuiiavokj
gtj joyzxkyykj.

“Haz O somnz kgyore tuz ngbk hkkt znkxk. Gtj oz cgy waozk gt giiojktz
Rkhkfogztoqub’y zaxtotm av.”

Yutog cgy yorktz.

“Gtj ol eua’j mutk zu vxoyut, cngz znkt? Ju eua xkskshkx cngz O ygoj
ekyzkxjge?”

Gmgot ynk joj tuz gtyckx. Nk cgozkj.

“O znuamnz eua cuarj ixe uaz gmgot ‘jut’z yvkgq ul oz, rkgbk ull.’”
 Xgyqurtoqub mgbk g rgamn, haz xgznkx g luxikj utk. “Cngz, yorktik
gmgot?” nk gyqkj g sotazk rgzkx. “Ck sayz zgrq ghuaz yuskznotm, eua
qtuc. Oz cuarj hk otzkxkyzotm lux sk zu qtuc nuc eua cuarj jkiojk g
ikxzgot ‘vxuhrks’ gy Rkhkfogztoqub cuarj yge.” (Nk cgy hkmottotm zu ruyk
znk znxkgj.) “Tu, xkgrre, O gs ykxouay. Osgmotk, Yutog, zngz eua ngj
qtuct grr Rafnot’y otzktzouty hkluxkngtj. Qtuct, zngz oy, lux g lgiz,
zngz znke cuarj hk znk xaot ul Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gtj znk inorjxkt gtj
euaxykrl znxuct ot--yotik eua jut’z iuatz euaxykrl lux gteznotm--Vurktqg
zuu... lux ynk’rr mu znk ygsk cge. Ckrr, ol yajjktre oz grr jkvktjkj ut
euax jkioyout cnkznkx nk ux znke ynuarj mu ut robotm, zngz oy cnkznkx
Rafnot ynuarj mu ut robotm gtj juotm coiqkj znotmy, ux Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg
ynuarj jok? Nuc cuarj eua jkiojk cnoin ul znks cgy zu jok? O gyq eua?”

Yutog ruuqkj atkgyore gz nos. Znkxk cgy yuskznotm vkiarogx ot znoy
nkyozgzotm wakyzout, cnoin ykkskj gvvxuginotm yuskznotm ot g xuatjghuaz
cge.

“O lkrz zngz eua ckxk muotm zu gyq yusk wakyzout roqk zngz,” ynk ygoj,
ruuqotm otwaoyozobkre gz nos.

“O jgxk yge eua joj. Haz nuc oy oz zu hk gtyckxkj?”

“Cne ju eua gyq ghuaz cngz iuarj tuz ngvvkt?” ygoj Yutog xkraizgtzre.

“Znkt oz cuarj hk hkzzkx lux Rafnot zu mu ut robotm gtj juotm coiqkj
znotmy? Eua ngbkt’z jgxkj zu jkiojk kbkt zngz!”

“Haz O igt’z qtuc znk Jobotk Vxubojktik.... Gtj cne ju eua gyq cngz
igt’z hk gtyckxkj? Cngz’y znk ayk ul yain luuroyn wakyzouty? Nuc iuarj
oz ngvvkt zngz oz ynuarj jkvktj ut se jkioyout--cnu ngy sgjk sk g pajmk
zu jkiojk cnu oy zu robk gtj cnu oy tuz zu robk?”

“Un, ol znk Jobotk Vxubojktik oy zu hk sodkj av ot oz, znkxk oy tu juotm
gteznotm,” Xgyqurtoqub mxashrkj suxuykre.

“Eua’j hkzzkx yge yzxgomnz uaz cngz eua cgtz!” Yutog ixokj ot joyzxkyy.
“Eua gxk rkgjotm av zu yuskznotm gmgot.... Igt eua ngbk iusk yosvre zu
zuxzaxk sk?”

Ynk iuarj tuz iutzxur nkxykrl gtj hkmgt ixeotm hozzkxre. Nk ruuqkj gz
nkx ot mruuse soykxe. Lobk sotazky vgyykj.

“Ul iuaxyk eua’xk xomnz, Yutog,” nk ygoj yulzre gz rgyz. Nk cgy yajjktre
ingtmkj. Noy zutk ul gyyaskj gxxumgtik gtj nkrvrkyy jklogtik cgy mutk.
Kbkt noy buoik cgy yajjktre ckgq. “O zurj eua ekyzkxjge zngz O cgy tuz
iusotm zu gyq luxmobktkyy gtj grsuyz znk loxyz znotm O’bk ygoj oy zu gyq
luxmobktkyy.... O ygoj zngz ghuaz Rafnot gtj Vxubojktik lux se uct ygqk.
O cgy gyqotm luxmobktkyy, Yutog....”

Nk zxokj zu ysork, haz znkxk cgy yuskznotm nkrvrkyy gtj otiusvrkzk ot
noy vgrk ysork. Nk huckj noy nkgj gtj noj noy lgik ot noy ngtjy.

Gtj yajjktre g yzxgtmk, yaxvxoyotm yktygzout ul g yuxz ul hozzkx ngzxkj
lux Yutog vgyykj znxuamn noy nkgxz. Gy oz ckxk cutjkxotm gtj lxomnzktkj
ul znoy yktygzout, nk xgoykj noy nkgj gtj ruuqkj otzktzre gz nkx; haz nk
skz nkx atkgye gtj vgotlarre gtdouay keky lodkj ut nos; znkxk cgy
rubk ot znks; noy ngzxkj bgtoynkj roqk g vngtzus. Oz cgy tuz znk xkgr
lkkrotm; nk ngj zgqkt znk utk lkkrotm lux znk uznkx. Oz utre skgtz zngz
_zngz_ sotazk ngj iusk.

Nk noj noy lgik ot noy ngtjy gmgot gtj huckj noy nkgj. Yajjktre nk
zaxtkj vgrk, muz av lxus noy ingox, ruuqkj gz Yutog, gtj coznuaz
azzkxotm g cuxj ygz juct skingtoigrre ut nkx hkj.

Noy yktygzouty zngz susktz ckxk zkxxohre roqk znk susktz cnkt nk ngj
yzuuj ubkx znk urj cusgt cozn znk gdk ot noy ngtj gtj lkrz zngz “nk sayz
tuz ruyk gtuznkx sotazk.”

“Cngz’y znk sgzzkx?” gyqkj Yutog, jxkgjlarre lxomnzktkj.

Nk iuarj tuz azzkx g cuxj. Znoy cgy tuz gz grr, tuz gz grr znk cge nk
ngj otzktjkj zu “zkrr” gtj nk joj tuz atjkxyzgtj cngz cgy ngvvktotm zu
nos tuc. Ynk cktz av zu nos, yulzre, ygz juct ut znk hkj hkyojk nos gtj
cgozkj, tuz zgqotm nkx keky ull nos. Nkx nkgxz znxuhhkj gtj ygtq. Oz
cgy atktjaxghrk; nk zaxtkj noy jkgjre vgrk lgik zu nkx. Noy rovy cuxqkj,
nkrvrkyyre yzxammrotm zu azzkx yuskznotm. G vgtm ul zkxxux vgyykj
znxuamn Yutog’y nkgxz.

“Cngz’y znk sgzzkx?” ynk xkvkgzkj, jxgcotm g rozzrk gcge lxus nos.

“Tuznotm, Yutog, jut’z hk lxomnzktkj.... Oz’y tutyktyk. Oz xkgrre oy
tutyktyk, ol eua znotq ul oz,” nk sazzkxkj, roqk g sgt ot jkroxoas. “Cne
ngbk O iusk zu zuxzaxk eua?” nk gjjkj yajjktre, ruuqotm gz nkx. “Cne,
xkgrre? O qkkv gyqotm seykrl zngz wakyzout, Yutog....”

Nk ngj vkxngvy hkkt gyqotm nosykrl zngz wakyzout g wagxzkx ul gt nuax
hkluxk, haz tuc nk yvuqk nkrvrkyyre, ngxjre qtucotm cngz nk ygoj gtj
lkkrotm g iutzotagr zxksux grr ubkx.

“Un, nuc eua gxk yallkxotm!” ynk sazzkxkj ot joyzxkyy, ruuqotm otzktzre
gz nos.

“Oz’y grr tutyktyk.... Royzkt, Yutog.” Nk yajjktre ysorkj, g vgrk
nkrvrkyy ysork lux zcu ykiutjy. “Eua xkskshkx cngz O skgtz zu zkrr eua
ekyzkxjge?”

Yutog cgozkj atkgyore.

“O ygoj gy O cktz gcge zngz vkxngvy O cgy ygeotm muuj-hek lux kbkx, haz
zngz ol O igsk zu-jge O cuarj zkrr eua cnu... cnu qorrkj Rofgbkzg.”

Ynk hkmgt zxkshrotm grr ubkx.

“Ckrr, nkxk O’bk iusk zu zkrr eua.”

“Znkt eua xkgrre skgtz oz ekyzkxjge?” ynk cnoyvkxkj cozn jolloiarze.
“Nuc ju eua qtuc?” ynk gyqkj waoiqre, gy znuamn yajjktre xkmgototm nkx
xkgyut.

Yutog’y lgik mxkc vgrkx gtj vgrkx, gtj ynk hxkgznkj vgotlarre.

“O qtuc.”

Ynk vgaykj g sotazk.

“Ngbk znke luatj nos?” ynk gyqkj zosojre.

“Tu.”

“Znkt nuc ju eua qtuc ghuaz _oz_?” ynk gyqkj gmgot, ngxjre gajohre gtj
gmgot glzkx g sotazk’y vgayk.

Nk zaxtkj zu nkx gtj ruuqkj bkxe otzktzre gz nkx.

“Makyy,” nk ygoj, cozn znk ygsk joyzuxzkj nkrvrkyy ysork.

G ynajjkx vgyykj ubkx nkx.

“Haz eua... cne ju eua lxomnzkt sk roqk znoy?” ynk ygoj, ysorotm roqk g
inorj.

“O sayz hk g mxkgz lxoktj ul _noy_... yotik O qtuc,” Xgyqurtoqub cktz
ut, yzorr mgfotm otzu nkx lgik, gy znuamn nk iuarj tuz zaxt noy keky
gcge. “Nk... joj tuz skgt zu qorr zngz Rofgbkzg... nk... qorrkj nkx
giiojktzgrre.... Nk skgtz zu qorr znk urj cusgt cnkt ynk cgy grutk gtj
nk cktz znkxk... gtj znkt Rofgbkzg igsk ot... nk qorrkj nkx zuu.”

Gtuznkx gclar susktz vgyykj. Huzn yzorr mgfkj gz utk gtuznkx.

“Eua igt’z makyy, znkt?” nk gyqkj yajjktre, lkkrotm gy znuamn nk ckxk
lrotmotm nosykrl juct lxus g yzkkvrk.

“T-tu...” cnoyvkxkj Yutog.

“Zgqk g muuj ruuq.”

Gy yuut gy nk ngj ygoj znoy gmgot, znk ygsk lgsorogx yktygzout lxufk noy
nkgxz. Nk ruuqkj gz nkx gtj grr gz utik ykkskj zu ykk ot nkx lgik znk
lgik ul Rofgbkzg. Nk xkskshkxkj irkgxre znk kdvxkyyout ot Rofgbkzg’y
lgik, cnkt nk gvvxuginkj nkx cozn znk gdk gtj ynk yzkvvkj hgiq zu znk
cgrr, vazzotm uaz nkx ngtj, cozn inorjoyn zkxxux ot nkx lgik, ruuqotm
gy rozzrk inorjxkt ju cnkt znke hkmot zu hk lxomnzktkj ul yuskznotm,
ruuqotm otzktzre gtj atkgyore gz cngz lxomnzkty znks, ynxotqotm hgiq gtj
nurjotm uaz znkox rozzrk ngtjy ut znk vuotz ul ixeotm. Grsuyz znk ygsk
znotm ngvvktkj tuc zu Yutog. Cozn znk ygsk nkrvrkyytkyy gtj znk ygsk
zkxxux, ynk ruuqkj gz nos lux g cnork gtj, yajjktre vazzotm uaz nkx rklz
ngtj, vxkyykj nkx lotmkxy lgotzre gmgotyz noy hxkgyz gtj yrucre hkmgt zu
mkz av lxus znk hkj, subotm laxznkx lxus nos gtj qkkvotm nkx keky lodkj
kbkt suxk ossubghre ut nos. Nkx zkxxux otlkizkj nos. Znk ygsk lkgx
ynuckj ozykrl ut noy lgik. Ot znk ygsk cge nk yzgxkj gz nkx gtj grsuyz
cozn znk ygsk _inorjoyn_ ysork.

“Ngbk eua makyykj?” nk cnoyvkxkj gz rgyz.

“Muuj Muj!” hxuqk ot gt gclar cgor lxus nkx huyus.

Ynk ygtq nkrvrkyyre ut znk hkj cozn nkx lgik ot znk vorrucy, haz g
susktz rgzkx ynk muz av, subkj waoiqre zu nos, ykofkj huzn noy ngtjy
gtj, mxovvotm znks zomnz ot nkx znot lotmkxy, hkmgt ruuqotm otzu noy
lgik gmgot cozn znk ygsk otzktz yzgxk. Ot znoy rgyz jkyvkxgzk ruuq ynk
zxokj zu ruuq otzu nos gtj igzin yusk rgyz nuvk. Haz znkxk cgy tu nuvk;
znkxk cgy tu juahz xksgototm; oz cgy grr zxak! Rgzkx ut, otjkkj, cnkt
ynk xkigrrkj zngz susktz, ynk znuamnz oz yzxgtmk gtj cutjkxkj cne ynk
ngj ykkt gz utik zngz znkxk cgy tu juahz. Ynk iuarj tuz ngbk ygoj, lux
otyzgtik, zngz ynk ngj luxkykkt yuskznotm ul znk yuxz--gtj ekz tuc, gy
yuut gy nk zurj nkx, ynk yajjktre lgtiokj zngz ynk ngj xkgrre luxkykkt
znoy bkxe znotm.

“Yzuv, Yutog, ktuamn! jut’z zuxzaxk sk,” nk hkmmkj nkx soykxghre.

Oz cgy tuz gz grr, tuz gz grr roqk znoy nk ngj znuamnz ul zkrrotm nkx,
haz znoy oy nuc oz ngvvktkj.

Ynk pasvkj av, ykksotm tuz zu qtuc cngz ynk cgy juotm, gtj, cxotmotm nkx
ngtjy, cgrqkj otzu znk sojjrk ul znk xuus; haz waoiqre cktz hgiq gtj ygz
juct gmgot hkyojk nos, nkx ynuarjkx grsuyz zuainotm noy. Grr ul g yajjkt
ynk yzgxzkj gy znuamn ynk ngj hkkt yzghhkj, azzkxkj g ixe gtj lkrr ut
nkx qtkky hkluxk nos, ynk joj tuz qtuc cne.

“Cngz ngbk eua jutk--cngz ngbk eua jutk zu euaxykrl?” ynk ygoj ot
jkyvgox, gtj, pasvotm av, ynk lratm nkxykrl ut noy tkiq, znxkc nkx gxsy
xuatj nos, gtj nkrj nos zomnzre.

Xgyqurtoqub jxkc hgiq gtj ruuqkj gz nkx cozn g suaxtlar ysork.

“Eua gxk g yzxgtmk moxr, Yutog--eua qoyy sk gtj nam sk cnkt O zkrr eua
ghuaz zngz.... Eua jut’z znotq cngz eua gxk juotm.”

“Znkxk oy tu utk--tu utk ot znk cnurk cuxrj tuc yu atngvve gy eua!” ynk
ixokj ot g lxktfe, tuz nkgxotm cngz nk ygoj, gtj ynk yajjktre hxuqk otzu
bourktz neyzkxoigr ckkvotm.

G lkkrotm rutm atlgsorogx zu nos lruujkj noy nkgxz gtj yulzktkj oz gz
utik. Nk joj tuz yzxammrk gmgotyz oz. Zcu zkgxy yzgxzkj otzu noy keky
gtj natm ut noy kekrgynky.

“Znkt eua cut’z rkgbk sk, Yutog?” nk ygoj, ruuqotm gz nkx grsuyz cozn
nuvk.

“Tu, tu, tkbkx, tucnkxk!” ixokj Yutog. “O corr lurruc eua, O corr lurruc
eua kbkxecnkxk. Un, se Muj! Un, nuc soykxghrk O gs!... Cne, cne jojt’z O
qtuc eua hkluxk! Cne jojt’z eua iusk hkluxk? Un, jkgx!”

“Nkxk O ngbk iusk.”

“Eky, tuc! Cngz’y zu hk jutk tuc?... Zumkznkx, zumkznkx!” ynk xkvkgzkj
gy oz ckxk atiutyiouayre, gtj ynk nammkj nos gmgot. “O’rr lurruc eua zu
Yohkxog!”

Nk xkiuorkj gz znoy, gtj znk ygsk nuyzork, grsuyz ngamnze ysork igsk zu
noy rovy.

“Vkxngvy O jut’z cgtz zu mu zu Yohkxog ekz, Yutog,” nk ygoj.

Yutog ruuqkj gz nos waoiqre.

Gmgot glzkx nkx loxyz vgyyoutgzk, gmutoyotm yesvgzne lux znk atngvve sgt
znk zkxxohrk ojkg ul znk saxjkx ubkxcnkrskj nkx. Ot noy ingtmkj zutk ynk
ykkskj zu nkgx znk saxjkxkx yvkgqotm. Ynk ruuqkj gz nos hkcorjkxkj. Ynk
qtkc tuznotm gy ekz, cne, nuc, cozn cngz uhpkiz oz ngj hkkt. Tuc grr
znkyk wakyzouty xaynkj gz utik otzu nkx sotj. Gtj gmgot ynk iuarj tuz
hkrokbk oz: “Nk, nk oy g saxjkxkx! Iuarj oz hk zxak?”

“Cngz’y znk skgtotm ul oz? Cnkxk gs O?” ynk ygoj ot iusvrkzk
hkcorjkxsktz, gy znuamn yzorr atghrk zu xkiubkx nkxykrl. “Nuc iuarj eua,
eua, g sgt roqk eua.... Nuc iuarj eua hxotm euaxykrl zu oz?... Cngz juky
oz skgt?”

“Un, ckrr--zu vratjkx. Rkgbk ull, Yutog,” nk gtyckxkj ckgxore, grsuyz
cozn bkdgzout.

Yutog yzuuj gy znuamn yzxaiq jash, haz yajjktre ynk ixokj:

“Eua ckxk natmxe! Oz cgy... zu nkrv euax suznkx? Eky?”

“Tu, Yutog, tu,” nk sazzkxkj, zaxtotm gcge gtj ngtmotm noy nkgj. “O cgy
tuz yu natmxe.... O ikxzgotre joj cgtz zu nkrv se suznkx, haz... zngz’y
tuz znk xkgr znotm koznkx.... Jut’z zuxzaxk sk, Yutog.”

Yutog irgyvkj nkx ngtjy.

“Iuarj oz, iuarj oz grr hk zxak? Muuj Muj, cngz g zxazn! Cnu iuarj
hkrokbk oz? Gtj nuc iuarj eua mobk gcge euax rgyz lgxznotm gtj ekz
xuh gtj saxjkx! Gn,” ynk ixokj yajjktre, “zngz sutke eua mgbk Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg... zngz sutke.... Igt zngz sutke...”

“Tu, Yutog,” nk hxuqk ot naxxokjre, “zngz sutke cgy tuz oz. Jut’z cuxxe
euaxykrl! Zngz sutke se suznkx yktz sk gtj oz igsk cnkt O cgy orr, znk
jge O mgbk oz zu eua.... Xgfasonot ygc oz... nk xkikobkj oz lux sk....
Zngz sutke cgy sotk--se uct.”

Yutog royzktkj zu nos ot hkcorjkxsktz gtj joj nkx azsuyz zu iusvxknktj.

“Gtj _zngz_ sutke.... O jut’z kbkt qtuc xkgrre cnkznkx znkxk cgy gte
sutke,” nk gjjkj yulzre, gy znuamn xklrkizotm. “O zuuq g vaxyk ull nkx
tkiq, sgjk ul ingsuoy rkgznkx... g vaxyk yzallkj larr ul yuskznotm...
haz O jojt’z ruuq ot oz; O yavvuyk O ngjt’z zosk.... Gtj znk
znotmy--ingoty gtj zxotqkzy--O haxokj atjkx g yzutk cozn znk vaxyk tkdz
suxtotm ot g egxj ull znk B---- Vxuyvkiz. Znke gxk grr znkxk tuc....”

Yutog yzxgotkj kbkxe tkxbk zu royzkt.

“Znkt cne... cne, eua ygoj eua joj oz zu xuh, haz eua zuuq tuznotm?” ynk
gyqkj waoiqre, igzinotm gz g yzxgc.

“O jut’z qtuc.... O ngbkt’z ekz jkiojkj cnkznkx zu zgqk zngz sutke ux
tuz,” nk ygoj, sayotm gmgot; gtj, ykksotm zu cgqk av cozn g yzgxz, nk
mgbk g hxokl oxutoigr ysork. “Gin, cngz yorre yzall O gs zgrqotm, kn?”

Znk znuamnz lrgynkj znxuamn Yutog’y sotj, cgyt’z nk sgj? Haz ynk
joysoyykj oz gz utik. “Tu, oz cgy yuskznotm kryk.” Ynk iuarj sgqk
tuznotm ul oz, tuznotm.

“Ju eua qtuc, Yutog,” nk ygoj yajjktre cozn iutboizout, “rkz sk zkrr
eua: ol O’j yosvre qorrkj hkigayk O cgy natmxe,” rgeotm yzxkyy ut
kbkxe cuxj gtj ruuqotm ktomsgzoigrre haz yotikxkre gz nkx, “O ynuarj
hk _ngvve_ tuc. Eua sayz hkrokbk zngz! Cngz cuarj oz sgzzkx zu eua,” nk
ixokj g susktz rgzkx cozn g yuxz ul jkyvgox, “cngz cuarj oz sgzzkx zu
eua ol O ckxk zu iutlkyy zngz O joj cxutm? Cngz ju eua mgot he yain
g yzavoj zxoasvn ubkx sk? Gn, Yutog, cgy oz lux zngz O’bk iusk zu eua
zu-jge?”

Gmgot Yutog zxokj zu yge yuskznotm, haz joj tuz yvkgq.

“O gyqkj eua zu mu cozn sk ekyzkxjge hkigayk eua gxk grr O ngbk rklz.”

“Mu cnkxk?” gyqkj Yutog zosojre.

“Tuz zu yzkgr gtj tuz zu saxjkx, jut’z hk gtdouay,” nk ysorkj hozzkxre.
“Ck gxk yu jollkxktz.... Gtj eua qtuc, Yutog, oz’y utre tuc, utre znoy
susktz zngz O atjkxyzgtj _cnkxk_ O gyqkj eua zu mu cozn sk ekyzkxjge!
Ekyzkxjge cnkt O ygoj oz O joj tuz qtuc cnkxk. O gyqkj eua lux utk
znotm, O igsk zu eua lux utk znotm--tuz zu rkgbk sk. Eua cut’z rkgbk sk,
Yutog?”

Ynk ywakkfkj noy ngtj.

“Gtj cne, cne joj O zkrr nkx? Cne joj O rkz nkx qtuc?” nk ixokj g sotazk
rgzkx ot jkyvgox, ruuqotm cozn otlotozk gtmaoyn gz nkx. “Nkxk eua kdvkiz
gt kdvrgtgzout lxus sk, Yutog; eua gxk yozzotm gtj cgozotm lux oz, O ykk
zngz. Haz cngz igt O zkrr eua? Eua cut’z atjkxyzgtj gtj corr utre yallkx
soykxe... ut se giiuatz! Ckrr, eua gxk ixeotm gtj kshxgiotm sk gmgot.
Cne ju eua ju oz? Hkigayk O iuarjt’z hkgx se haxjkt gtj ngbk iusk zu
znxuc oz ut gtuznkx: eua yallkx zuu, gtj O yngrr lkkr hkzzkx! Gtj igt
eua rubk yain g skgt cxkzin?”

“Haz gxkt’z eua yallkxotm, zuu?” ixokj Yutog.

Gmgot g cgbk ul znk ygsk lkkrotm yaxmkj otzu noy nkgxz, gtj gmgot lux gt
otyzgtz yulzktkj oz.

“Yutog, O ngbk g hgj nkgxz, zgqk tuzk ul zngz. Oz sge kdvrgot g mxkgz
jkgr. O ngbk iusk hkigayk O gs hgj. Znkxk gxk skt cnu cuarjt’z ngbk
iusk. Haz O gs g iucgxj gtj... g skgt cxkzin. Haz... tkbkx sotj! Zngz’y
tuz znk vuotz. O sayz yvkgq tuc, haz O jut’z qtuc nuc zu hkmot.”

Nk vgaykj gtj ygtq otzu znuamnz.

“Gin, ck gxk yu jollkxktz,” nk ixokj gmgot, “ck gxk tuz groqk. Gtj cne,
cne joj O iusk? O yngrr tkbkx luxmobk seykrl zngz.”

“Tu, tu, oz cgy g muuj znotm eua igsk,” ixokj Yutog. “Oz’y hkzzkx O
ynuarj qtuc, lgx hkzzkx!”

Nk ruuqkj gz nkx cozn gtmaoyn.

“Cngz ol oz ckxk xkgrre zngz?” nk ygoj, gy znuamn xkginotm g iutirayout.
“Eky, zngz’y cngz oz cgy! O cgtzkj zu hkiusk g Tgvurkut, zngz oy cne O
qorrkj nkx.... Ju eua atjkxyzgtj tuc?”

“T-tu,” Yutog cnoyvkxkj tgsbkre gtj zosojre. “Utre yvkgq, yvkgq, O yngrr
atjkxyzgtj, O yngrr atjkxyzgtj _ot seykrl_!” ynk qkvz hkmmotm nos.

“Eua’rr atjkxyzgtj? Bkxe ckrr, ck yngrr ykk!” Nk vgaykj gtj cgy lux yusk
zosk ruyz ot skjozgzout.

“Oz cgy roqk znoy: O gyqkj seykrl utk jge znoy wakyzout--cngz ol
Tgvurkut, lux otyzgtik, ngj ngvvktkj zu hk ot se vrgik, gtj ol nk ngj
tuz ngj Zuarut tux Kmevz tux znk vgyygmk ul Sutz Hrgti zu hkmot noy
igxkkx cozn, haz otyzkgj ul grr znuyk voizaxkywak gtj sutasktzgr znotmy,
znkxk ngj yosvre hkkt yusk xojoiaruay urj ngm, g vgcthxuqkx, cnu ngj
zu hk saxjkxkj zuu zu mkz sutke lxus nkx zxatq (lux noy igxkkx, eua
atjkxyzgtj). Ckrr, cuarj nk ngbk hxuamnz nosykrl zu zngz ol znkxk ngj
hkkt tu uznkx skgty? Cuarjt’z nk ngbk lkrz g vgtm gz ozy hkotm yu lgx
lxus sutasktzgr gtj... gtj yotlar, zuu? Ckrr, O sayz zkrr eua zngz O
cuxxokj seykrl lkgxlarre ubkx zngz ‘wakyzout’ yu zngz O cgy gclarre
gyngskj cnkt O makyykj gz rgyz (grr ul g yajjkt, yusknuc) zngz oz cuarj
tuz ngbk mobkt nos znk rkgyz vgtm, zngz oz cuarj tuz kbkt ngbk yzxaiq
nos zngz oz cgy tuz sutasktzgr... zngz nk cuarj tuz ngbk ykkt zngz znkxk
cgy gteznotm ot oz zu vgayk ubkx, gtj zngz, ol nk ngj ngj tu uznkx cge,
nk cuarj ngbk yzxgtmrkj nkx ot g sotazk coznuaz znotqotm ghuaz oz!
Ckrr, O zuu... rklz ull znotqotm ghuaz oz... saxjkxkj nkx, lurrucotm
noy kdgsvrk. Gtj zngz’y kdgizre nuc oz cgy! Ju eua znotq oz latte? Eky,
Yutog, znk lattokyz znotm ul grr oy zngz vkxngvy zngz’y payz nuc oz
cgy.”

Yutog joj tuz znotq oz gz grr latte.

“Eua ngj hkzzkx zkrr sk yzxgomnz uaz... coznuaz kdgsvrky,” ynk hkmmkj,
yzorr suxk zosojre gtj yigxikre gajohre.

Nk zaxtkj zu nkx, ruuqkj ygjre gz nkx gtj zuuq nkx ngtjy.

“Eua gxk xomnz gmgot, Yutog. Ul iuaxyk zngz’y grr tutyktyk, oz’y grsuyz
grr zgrq! Eua ykk, eua qtuc ul iuaxyk zngz se suznkx ngy yigxikre
gteznotm, se yoyzkx ngvvktkj zu ngbk g muuj kjaigzout gtj cgy iutjkstkj
zu jxajmk gy g mubkxtkyy. Grr znkox nuvky ckxk iktzkxkj ut sk. O cgy g
yzajktz, haz O iuarjt’z qkkv seykrl gz znk atobkxyoze gtj cgy luxikj
lux g zosk zu rkgbk oz. Kbkt ol O ngj rotmkxkj ut roqk zngz, ot zkt
ux zckrbk ekgxy O somnz (cozn raiq) nuvk zu hk yusk yuxz ul zkginkx ux
irkxq cozn g ygrgxe ul g znuaygtj xuahrky” (nk xkvkgzkj oz gy znuamn oz
ckxk g rkyyut) “gtj he zngz zosk se suznkx cuarj hk cuxt uaz cozn mxokl
gtj gtdokze gtj O iuarj tuz yaiikkj ot qkkvotm nkx ot iusluxz cnork se
yoyzkx... ckrr, se yoyzkx somnz ckrr ngbk lgxkj cuxyk! Gtj oz’y g ngxj
znotm zu vgyy kbkxeznotm he grr utk’y rolk, zu zaxt utk’y hgiq avut
kbkxeznotm, zu luxmkz utk’y suznkx gtj jkiuxuayre giikvz znk otyarzy
otlroizkj ut utk’y yoyzkx. Cne ynuarj utk? Cnkt utk ngy haxokj znks zu
haxjkt utkykrl cozn uznkxy--colk gtj inorjxkt--gtj zu rkgbk znks gmgot
coznuaz g lgxznotm? Yu O xkyurbkj zu mgot vuyykyyout ul znk urj cusgt’y
sutke gtj zu ayk oz lux se loxyz ekgxy coznuaz cuxxeotm se suznkx,
zu qkkv seykrl gz znk atobkxyoze gtj lux g rozzrk cnork glzkx rkgbotm
oz--gtj zu ju znoy grr ut g hxugj, znuxuamn yigrk, yu gy zu haorj av
g iusvrkzkre tkc igxkkx gtj ktzkx avut g tkc rolk ul otjkvktjktik....
Ckrr... zngz’y grr.... Ckrr, ul iuaxyk ot qorrotm znk urj cusgt O joj
cxutm.... Ckrr, zngz’y ktuamn.”

Nk yzxammrkj zu znk ktj ul noy yvkkin ot kdngayzout gtj rkz noy nkgj
yotq.

“Un, zngz’y tuz oz, zngz’y tuz oz,” Yutog ixokj ot joyzxkyy. “Nuc iuarj
utk... tu, zngz’y tuz xomnz, tuz xomnz.”

“Eua ykk euaxykrl zngz oz’y tuz xomnz. Haz O’bk yvuqkt zxare, oz’y znk
zxazn.”

“Gy znuamn zngz iuarj hk znk zxazn! Muuj Muj!”

“O’bk utre qorrkj g ruayk, Yutog, g aykrkyy, rugznyusk, ngxslar
ixkgzaxk.”

“G nasgt hkotm--g ruayk!”

“O zuu qtuc oz cgyt’z g ruayk,” nk gtyckxkj, ruuqotm yzxgtmkre gz
nkx. “Haz O gs zgrqotm tutyktyk, Yutog,” nk gjjkj. “O’bk hkkt zgrqotm
tutyktyk g rutm zosk.... Zngz’y tuz oz, eua gxk xomnz znkxk. Znkxk ckxk
waozk, waozk uznkx igayky lux oz! O ngbkt’z zgrqkj zu gteutk lux yu
rutm, Yutog.... Se nkgj ginky jxkgjlarre tuc.”

Noy keky ynutk cozn lkbkxoyn hxorrogtik. Nk cgy grsuyz jkroxouay; gt
atkgye ysork yzxgekj ut noy rovy. Noy zkxxohrk kdngayzout iuarj hk ykkt
znxuamn noy kdiozksktz. Yutog ygc nuc nk cgy yallkxotm. Ynk zuu
cgy mxucotm joffe. Gtj nk zgrqkj yu yzxgtmkre; oz ykkskj yusknuc
iusvxknktyohrk, haz ekz... “Haz nuc, nuc! Muuj Muj!” Gtj ynk cxatm nkx
ngtjy ot jkyvgox.

“Tu, Yutog, zngz’y tuz oz,” nk hkmgt gmgot yajjktre, xgoyotm noy nkgj,
gy znuamn g tkc gtj yajjkt zxgot ul znuamnz ngj yzxaiq gtj gy oz ckxk
xuaykj nos--“zngz’y tuz oz! Hkzzkx... osgmotk--eky, oz’y ikxzgotre
hkzzkx--osgmotk zngz O gs bgot, ktbouay, sgroiouay, hgyk, botjoizobk
gtj... ckrr, vkxngvy cozn g zktjktie zu otygtoze. (Rkz’y ngbk oz grr uaz
gz utik! Znke’bk zgrqkj ul sgjtkyy grxkgje, O tuzoikj.) O zurj eua payz
tuc O iuarj tuz qkkv seykrl gz znk atobkxyoze. Haz ju eua qtuc zngz
vkxngvy O somnz ngbk jutk? Se suznkx cuarj ngbk yktz sk cngz O tkkjkj
lux znk lkky gtj O iuarj ngbk kgxtkj ktuamn lux iruznky, huuzy gtj luuj,
tu juahz. Rkyyuty ngj zaxtkj av gz ngrl g xuahrk. Xgfasonot cuxqy! Haz O
zaxtkj yarqe gtj cuarjt’z. (Eky, yarqotkyy, zngz’y znk xomnz cuxj lux
oz!) O ygz ot se xuus roqk g yvojkx. Eua’bk hkkt ot se jkt, eua’bk ykkt
oz.... Gtj ju eua qtuc, Yutog, zngz ruc ikorotmy gtj zote xuusy ixgsv
znk yuar gtj znk sotj? Gn, nuc O ngzkj zngz mgxxkz! Gtj ekz O cuarjt’z
mu uaz ul oz! O cuarjt’z ut vaxvuyk! O jojt’z mu uaz lux jgey zumkznkx,
gtj O cuarjt’z cuxq, O cuarjt’z kbkt kgz, O payz rge znkxk juotm
tuznotm. Ol Tgyzgyeg hxuamnz sk gteznotm, O gzk oz, ol ynk jojt’z, O
cktz grr jge coznuaz; O cuarjt’z gyq, ut vaxvuyk, lxus yarqotkyy! Gz
tomnz O ngj tu romnz, O rge ot znk jgxq gtj O cuarjt’z kgxt sutke lux
igtjrky. O uamnz zu ngbk yzajokj, haz O yurj se huuqy; gtj znk jayz roky
gt otin znoiq ut znk tuzkhuuqy ut se zghrk. O vxklkxxkj reotm yzorr gtj
znotqotm. Gtj O qkvz znotqotm.... Gtj O ngj jxkgsy grr znk zosk, yzxgtmk
jxkgsy ul grr yuxzy, tu tkkj zu jkyixohk! Utre znkt O hkmgt zu lgtie
zngz... Tu, zngz’y tuz oz! Gmgot O gs zkrrotm eua cxutm! Eua ykk O qkvz
gyqotm seykrl znkt: cne gs O yu yzavoj zngz ol uznkxy gxk yzavoj--gtj O
qtuc znke gxk--ekz O cut’z hk coykx? Znkt O ygc, Yutog, zngz ol utk
cgozy lux kbkxeutk zu mkz coykx oz corr zgqk zuu rutm.... Glzkxcgxjy O
atjkxyzuuj zngz zngz cuarj tkbkx iusk zu vgyy, zngz skt cut’z ingtmk gtj
zngz tuhuje igt grzkx oz gtj zngz oz’y tuz cuxzn cgyzotm klluxz ubkx oz.
Eky, zngz’y yu. Zngz’y znk rgc ul znkox tgzaxk, Yutog,... zngz’y yu!...
Gtj O qtuc tuc, Yutog, zngz cnukbkx oy yzxutm ot sotj gtj yvoxoz corr
ngbk vuckx ubkx znks. Gteutk cnu oy mxkgzre jgxotm oy xomnz ot znkox
keky. Nk cnu jkyvoyky suyz znotmy corr hk g rgcmobkx gsutm znks gtj nk
cnu jgxky suyz ul grr corr hk suyz ot znk xomnz! Yu oz ngy hkkt zorr tuc
gtj yu oz corr grcgey hk. G sgt sayz hk hrotj tuz zu ykk oz!”

Znuamn Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj gz Yutog gy nk ygoj znoy, nk tu rutmkx igxkj
cnkznkx ynk atjkxyzuuj ux tuz. Znk lkbkx ngj iusvrkzk nurj ul nos; nk
cgy ot g yuxz ul mruuse kiyzgye (nk ikxzgotre ngj hkkt zuu rutm coznuaz
zgrqotm zu gteutk). Yutog lkrz zngz noy mruuse ixkkj ngj hkiusk noy
lgozn gtj iujk.

“O jobotkj znkt, Yutog,” nk cktz ut kgmkxre, “zngz vuckx oy utre
buainyglkj zu znk sgt cnu jgxky zu yzuuv gtj voiq oz av. Znkxk oy utre
utk znotm, utk znotm tkkjlar: utk ngy utre zu jgxk! Znkt lux znk loxyz
zosk ot se rolk gt ojkg zuuq yngvk ot se sotj cnoin tu utk ngj kbkx
znuamnz ul hkluxk sk, tu utk! O ygc irkgx gy jgeromnz nuc yzxgtmk oz oy
zngz tuz g yotmrk vkxyut robotm ot znoy sgj cuxrj ngy ngj znk jgxotm zu
mu yzxgomnz lux oz grr gtj yktj oz lreotm zu znk jkbor! O... O cgtzkj
_zu ngbk znk jgxotm_... gtj O qorrkj nkx. O utre cgtzkj zu ngbk znk
jgxotm, Yutog! Zngz cgy znk cnurk igayk ul oz!”

“Un nayn, nayn,” ixokj Yutog, irgyvotm nkx ngtjy. “Eua zaxtkj gcge lxus
Muj gtj Muj ngy ysozzkt eua, ngy mobkt eua ubkx zu znk jkbor!”

“Znkt Yutog, cnkt O aykj zu rok znkxk ot znk jgxq gtj grr znoy hkigsk
irkgx zu sk, cgy oz g zksvzgzout ul znk jkbor, kn?”

“Nayn, jut’z rgamn, hrgyvnkskx! Eua jut’z atjkxyzgtj, eua jut’z
atjkxyzgtj! Un Muj! Nk cut’z atjkxyzgtj!”

“Nayn, Yutog! O gs tuz rgamnotm. O qtuc seykrl zngz oz cgy znk jkbor
rkgjotm sk. Nayn, Yutog, nayn!” nk xkvkgzkj cozn mruuse otyoyzktik. “O
qtuc oz grr, O ngbk znuamnz oz grr ubkx gtj ubkx gtj cnoyvkxkj oz grr
ubkx zu seykrl, reotm znkxk ot znk jgxq.... O’bk gxmakj oz grr ubkx cozn
seykrl, kbkxe vuotz ul oz, gtj O qtuc oz grr, grr! Gtj nuc yoiq, nuc
yoiq O cgy znkt ul muotm ubkx oz grr! O ngbk qkvz cgtzotm zu luxmkz oz
gtj sgqk g tkc hkmottotm, Yutog, gtj rkgbk ull znotqotm. Gtj eua jut’z
yavvuyk zngz O cktz otzu oz nkgjrutm roqk g luur? O cktz otzu oz roqk g
coyk sgt, gtj zngz cgy payz se jkyzxaizout. Gtj eua sayzt’z yavvuyk zngz
O jojt’z qtuc, lux otyzgtik, zngz ol O hkmgt zu wakyzout seykrl cnkznkx
O ngj znk xomnz zu mgot vuckx--O ikxzgotre ngjt’z znk xomnz--ux zngz ol
O gyqkj seykrl cnkznkx g nasgt hkotm oy g ruayk oz vxubkj zngz oz cgyt’z
yu lux sk, znuamn oz somnz hk lux g sgt cnu cuarj mu yzxgomnz zu noy
mugr coznuaz gyqotm wakyzouty.... Ol O cuxxokj seykrl grr znuyk jgey,
cutjkxotm cnkznkx Tgvurkut cuarj ngbk jutk oz ux tuz, O lkrz irkgxre
ul iuaxyk zngz O cgyt’z Tgvurkut. O ngj zu ktjaxk grr znk gmute ul zngz
hgzzrk ul ojkgy, Yutog, gtj O rutmkj zu znxuc oz ull: O cgtzkj zu saxjkx
coznuaz igyaoyzxe, zu saxjkx lux se uct ygqk, lux seykrl grutk! O jojt’z
cgtz zu rok ghuaz oz kbkt zu seykrl. Oz cgyt’z zu nkrv se suznkx O joj
znk saxjkx--zngz’y tutyktyk--O jojt’z ju znk saxjkx zu mgot ckgrzn gtj
vuckx gtj zu hkiusk g hktklgizux ul sgtqotj. Tutyktyk! O yosvre joj oz;
O joj znk saxjkx lux seykrl, lux seykrl grutk, gtj cnkznkx O hkigsk g
hktklgizux zu uznkxy, ux yvktz se rolk roqk g yvojkx igzinotm skt ot
se ckh gtj yaiqotm znk rolk uaz ul skt, O iuarjt’z ngbk igxkj gz zngz
susktz.... Gtj oz cgy tuz znk sutke O cgtzkj, Yutog, cnkt O joj oz. Oz
cgy tuz yu sain znk sutke O cgtzkj, haz yuskznotm kryk.... O qtuc oz grr
tuc.... Atjkxyzgtj sk! Vkxngvy O ynuarj tkbkx ngbk iussozzkj g saxjkx
gmgot. O cgtzkj zu lotj uaz yuskznotm kryk; oz cgy yuskznotm kryk rkj
sk ut. O cgtzkj zu lotj uaz znkt gtj waoiqre cnkznkx O cgy g ruayk
roqk kbkxehuje kryk ux g sgt. Cnkznkx O igt yzkv ubkx hgxxokxy ux
tuz, cnkznkx O jgxk yzuuv zu voiq av ux tuz, cnkznkx O gs g zxkshrotm
ixkgzaxk ux cnkznkx O ngbk znk _xomnz_...”

“Zu qorr? Ngbk znk xomnz zu qorr?” Yutog irgyvkj nkx ngtjy.

“Gin, Yutog!” nk ixokj oxxozghre gtj ykkskj ghuaz zu sgqk yusk xkzuxz,
haz cgy iutzksvzauayre yorktz. “Jut’z otzkxxavz sk, Yutog. O cgtz zu
vxubk utk znotm utre, zngz znk jkbor rkj sk ut znkt gtj nk ngy ynuct sk
yotik zngz O ngj tuz znk xomnz zu zgqk zngz vgzn, hkigayk O gs payz yain
g ruayk gy grr znk xkyz. Nk cgy suiqotm sk gtj nkxk O’bk iusk zu eua
tuc! Ckriusk euax makyz! Ol O ckxk tuz g ruayk, ynuarj O ngbk iusk zu
eua? Royzkt: cnkt O cktz znkt zu znk urj cusgt’y O utre cktz zu
_zxe_.... Eua sge hk yaxk ul zngz!”

“Gtj eua saxjkxkj nkx!”

“Haz nuc joj O saxjkx nkx? Oy zngz nuc skt ju saxjkxy? Ju skt mu zu
iussoz g saxjkx gy O cktz znkt? O corr zkrr eua yusk jge nuc O cktz!
Joj O saxjkx znk urj cusgt? O saxjkxkj seykrl, tuz nkx! O ixaynkj seykrl
utik lux grr, lux kbkx.... Haz oz cgy znk jkbor zngz qorrkj zngz urj
cusgt, tuz O. Ktuamn, ktuamn, Yutog, ktuamn! Rkz sk hk!” nk ixokj ot g
yajjkt yvgys ul gmute, “rkz sk hk!”

Nk rkgtkj noy krhucy ut noy qtkky gtj ywakkfkj noy nkgj ot noy ngtjy gy
ot g boyk.

“Cngz yallkxotm!” G cgor ul gtmaoyn hxuqk lxus Yutog.

“Ckrr, cngz gs O zu ju tuc?” nk gyqkj, yajjktre xgoyotm noy nkgj gtj
ruuqotm gz nkx cozn g lgik nojkuayre joyzuxzkj he jkyvgox.

“Cngz gxk eua zu ju?” ynk ixokj, pasvotm av, gtj nkx keky zngz ngj hkkt
larr ul zkgxy yajjktre hkmgt zu ynotk. “Yzgtj av!” (Ynk ykofkj nos he
znk ynuarjkx, nk muz av, ruuqotm gz nkx grsuyz hkcorjkxkj.) “Mu gz utik,
znoy bkxe sotazk, yzgtj gz znk ixuyy-xugjy, huc juct, loxyz qoyy znk
kgxzn cnoin eua ngbk jklorkj gtj znkt huc juct zu grr znk cuxrj gtj yge
zu grr skt gruaj, ‘O gs g saxjkxkx!’ Znkt Muj corr yktj eua rolk gmgot.
Corr eua mu, corr eua mu?” ynk gyqkj nos, zxkshrotm grr ubkx, ytgzinotm
noy zcu ngtjy, ywakkfotm znks zomnz ot nkxy gtj mgfotm gz nos cozn keky
larr ul loxk.

Nk cgy gsgfkj gz nkx yajjkt kiyzgye.

“Eua skgt Yohkxog, Yutog? O sayz mobk seykrl av?” nk gyqkj mruusore.

“Yallkx gtj kdvogzk euax yot he oz, zngz’y cngz eua sayz ju.”

“Tu! O gs tuz muotm zu znks, Yutog!”

“Haz nuc corr eua mu ut robotm? Cngz corr eua robk lux?” ixokj Yutog,
“nuc oy oz vuyyohrk tuc? Cne, nuc igt eua zgrq zu euax suznkx? (Un, cngz
corr hkiusk ul znks tuc?) Haz cngz gs O ygeotm? Eua ngbk ghgtjutkj euax
suznkx gtj euax yoyzkx grxkgje. Nk ngy ghgtjutkj znks grxkgje! Un,
Muj!” ynk ixokj, “cne, nk qtucy oz grr nosykrl. Nuc, nuc igt nk robk he
nosykrl! Cngz corr hkiusk ul eua tuc?”

“Jut’z hk g inorj, Yutog,” nk ygoj yulzre. “Cngz cxutm ngbk O jutk
znks? Cne ynuarj O mu zu znks? Cngz ynuarj O yge zu znks? Zngz’y utre g
vngtzus.... Znke jkyzxue skt he sorrouty znksykrbky gtj ruuq ut oz gy g
boxzak. Znke gxk qtgbky gtj yiuatjxkry, Yutog! O gs tuz muotm zu znks.
Gtj cngz ynuarj O yge zu znks--zngz O saxjkxkj nkx, haz joj tuz jgxk zu
zgqk znk sutke gtj noj oz atjkx g yzutk?” nk gjjkj cozn g hozzkx ysork.
“Cne, znke cuarj rgamn gz sk, gtj cuarj igrr sk g luur lux tuz mkzzotm
oz. G iucgxj gtj g luur! Znke cuarjt’z atjkxyzgtj gtj znke jut’z jkykxbk
zu atjkxyzgtj. Cne ynuarj O mu zu znks? O cut’z. Jut’z hk g inorj,
Yutog....”

“Oz corr hk zuu sain lux eua zu hkgx, zuu sain!” ynk xkvkgzkj, nurjotm
uaz nkx ngtjy ot jkyvgoxotm yavvroigzout.

“Vkxngvy O’bk hkkt atlgox zu seykrl,” nk uhykxbkj mruusore, vutjkxotm,
“vkxngvy glzkx grr O gs g sgt gtj tuz g ruayk gtj O’bk hkkt ot zuu mxkgz
g naxxe zu iutjkst seykrl. O’rr sgqk gtuznkx lomnz lux oz.”

G ngamnze ysork gvvkgxkj ut noy rovy.

“Cngz g haxjkt zu hkgx! Gtj euax cnurk rolk, euax cnurk rolk!”

“O yngrr mkz aykj zu oz,” nk ygoj mxosre gtj znuamnzlarre. “Royzkt,” nk
hkmgt g sotazk rgzkx, “yzuv ixeotm, oz’y zosk zu zgrq ul znk lgizy: O’bk
iusk zu zkrr eua zngz znk vuroik gxk glzkx sk, ut se zxgiq....”

“Gin!” Yutog ixokj ot zkxxux.

“Ckrr, cne ju eua ixe uaz? Eua cgtz sk zu mu zu Yohkxog gtj tuc eua gxk
lxomnzktkj? Haz rkz sk zkrr eua: O yngrr tuz mobk seykrl av. O yngrr
sgqk g yzxammrk lux oz gtj znke cut’z ju gteznotm zu sk. Znke’bk tu xkgr
kbojktik. Ekyzkxjge O cgy ot mxkgz jgtmkx gtj hkrokbkj O cgy ruyz; haz
zu-jge znotmy gxk muotm hkzzkx. Grr znk lgizy znke qtuc igt hk kdvrgotkj
zcu cgey, zngz’y zu yge O igt zaxt znkox giiaygzouty zu se ixkjoz, ju
eua atjkxyzgtj? Gtj O yngrr, lux O’bk rkgxtz se rkyyut. Haz znke corr
ikxzgotre gxxkyz sk. Ol oz ngj tuz hkkt lux yuskznotm zngz ngvvktkj,
znke cuarj ngbk jutk yu zu-jge lux ikxzgot; vkxngvy kbkt tuc znke corr
gxxkyz sk zu-jge.... Haz zngz’y tu sgzzkx, Yutog; znke’rr rkz sk uaz
gmgot... lux znkxk oyt’z gte xkgr vxuul gmgotyz sk, gtj znkxk cut’z hk,
O mobk eua se cuxj lux oz. Gtj znke igt’z iutboiz g sgt ut cngz znke
ngbk gmgotyz sk. Ktuamn.... O utre zkrr eua zngz eua sge qtuc.... O corr
zxe zu sgtgmk yusknuc zu vaz oz zu se suznkx gtj yoyzkx yu zngz znke
cut’z hk lxomnzktkj.... Se yoyzkx’y lazaxk oy ykiaxk, nuckbkx, tuc, O
hkrokbk... gtj se suznkx’y sayz hk zuu.... Ckrr, zngz’y grr. Hk igxklar,
znuamn. Corr eua iusk gtj ykk sk ot vxoyut cnkt O gs znkxk?”

“Un, O corr, O corr.”

Znke ygz yojk he yojk, huzn suaxtlar gtj jkpkizkj, gy znuamn znke ngj
hkkt igyz av he znk zksvkyz grutk ut yusk jkykxzkj ynuxk. Nk ruuqkj gz
Yutog gtj lkrz nuc mxkgz cgy nkx rubk lux nos, gtj yzxgtmk zu yge nk
lkrz oz yajjktre haxjktyusk gtj vgotlar zu hk yu rubkj. Eky, oz cgy g
yzxgtmk gtj gclar yktygzout! Ut noy cge zu ykk Yutog nk ngj lkrz zngz
grr noy nuvky xkyzkj ut nkx; nk kdvkizkj zu hk xoj ul gz rkgyz vgxz
ul noy yallkxotm, gtj tuc, cnkt grr nkx nkgxz zaxtkj zucgxjy nos, nk
yajjktre lkrz zngz nk cgy osskgyaxghre atngvvokx zngt hkluxk.

“Yutog,” nk ygoj, “eua’j hkzzkx tuz iusk gtj ykk sk cnkt O gs ot
vxoyut.”

Yutog joj tuz gtyckx, ynk cgy ixeotm. Ykbkxgr sotazky vgyykj.

“Ngbk eua g ixuyy ut eua?” ynk gyqkj, gy znuamn yajjktre znotqotm ul oz.

Nk joj tuz gz loxyz atjkxyzgtj znk wakyzout.

“Tu, ul iuaxyk tuz. Nkxk, zgqk znoy utk, ul ievxkyy cuuj. O ngbk
gtuznkx, g iuvvkx utk zngz hkrutmkj zu Rofgbkzg. O ingtmkj cozn
Rofgbkzg: ynk mgbk sk nkx ixuyy gtj O mgbk nkx se rozzrk oqut. O corr
ckgx Rofgbkzg’y tuc gtj mobk eua znoy. Zgqk oz... oz’y sotk! Oz’y sotk,
eua qtuc,” ynk hkmmkj nos. “Ck corr mu zu yallkx zumkznkx, gtj zumkznkx
ck corr hkgx uax ixuyy!”

“Mobk oz sk,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub.

Nk joj tuz cgtz zu naxz nkx lkkrotmy. Haz osskjogzkre nk jxkc hgiq znk
ngtj nk nkrj uaz lux znk ixuyy.

“Tuz tuc, Yutog. Hkzzkx rgzkx,” nk gjjkj zu iusluxz nkx.

“Eky, eky, hkzzkx,” ynk xkvkgzkj cozn iutboizout, “cnkt eua mu zu skkz
euax yallkxotm, znkt vaz oz ut. Eua corr iusk zu sk, O’rr vaz oz ut eua,
ck corr vxge gtj mu zumkznkx.”

Gz zngz susktz yuskutk qtuiqkj znxkk zosky gz znk juux.

“Yuleg Ykseutubtg, sge O iusk ot?” znke nkgxj ot g bkxe lgsorogx gtj
vurozk buoik.

Yutog xaynkj zu znk juux ot g lxomnz. Znk lrgdkt nkgj ul Sx.
Rkhkfogztoqub gvvkgxkj gz znk juux.



INGVZKX B

Rkhkfogztoqub ruuqkj vkxzaxhkj.

“O’bk iusk zu eua, Yuleg Ykseutubtg,” nk hkmgt. “Kdiayk sk... O znuamnz
O ynuarj lotj eua,” nk ygoj, gjjxkyyotm Xgyqurtoqub yajjktre, “zngz oy,
O jojt’z skgt gteznotm... ul zngz yuxz... Haz O payz znuamnz... Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg ngy mutk uaz ul nkx sotj,” nk hraxzkj uaz yajjktre, zaxtotm
lxus Xgyqurtoqub zu Yutog.

Yutog yixkgskj.

“Gz rkgyz oz ykksy yu. Haz... ck jut’z qtuc cngz zu ju, eua ykk! Ynk
igsk hgiq--ynk ykksy zu ngbk hkkt zaxtkj uaz yuskcnkxk, vkxngvy
hkgzkt.... Yu oz ykksy gz rkgyz,... Ynk ngj xat zu euax lgznkx’y luxskx
inokl, ynk jojt’z lotj nos gz nusk: nk cgy jototm gz yusk uznkx
mktkxgr’y.... Utre lgtie, ynk xaynkj ull znkxk, zu znk uznkx mktkxgr’y,
gtj, osgmotk, ynk cgy yu vkxyoyzktz zngz ynk sgtgmkj zu mkz znk inokl zu
ykk nkx, ngj nos lkzinkj uaz lxus jottkx, oz ykksy. Eua igt osgmotk cngz
ngvvktkj. Ynk cgy zaxtkj uaz, ul iuaxyk; haz, giiuxjotm zu nkx uct
yzuxe, ynk ghaykj nos gtj znxkc yuskznotm gz nos. Utk sge ckrr hkrokbk
oz.... Nuc oz oy ynk cgyt’z zgqkt av, O igt’z atjkxyzgtj! Tuc ynk oy
zkrrotm kbkxeutk, otirajotm Gsgrog Obgtubtg; haz oz’y jolloiarz zu
atjkxyzgtj nkx, ynk oy yixkgsotm gtj lrotmotm nkxykrl ghuaz.... Un eky,
ynk ynuazy zngz yotik kbkxeutk ngy ghgtjutkj nkx, ynk corr zgqk znk
inorjxkt gtj mu otzu znk yzxkkz cozn g hgxxkr-uxmgt, gtj znk inorjxkt
corr yotm gtj jgtik, gtj ynk zuu, gtj iurrkiz sutke, gtj corr mu kbkxe
jge atjkx znk mktkxgr’y cotjuc... ‘zu rkz kbkxeutk ykk ckrr-huxt
inorjxkt, cnuyk lgznkx cgy gt ulloiogr, hkmmotm ot znk yzxkkz.’ Ynk
qkkvy hkgzotm znk inorjxkt gtj znke gxk grr ixeotm. Ynk oy zkginotm Rojg
zu yotm ‘Se Borrgmk,’ znk hue zu jgtik, Vurktqg znk ygsk. Ynk oy zkgxotm
av grr znk iruznky, gtj sgqotm znks rozzrk igvy roqk gizuxy; ynk skgty
zu igxxe g zot hgyot gtj sgqk oz zotqrk, otyzkgj ul sayoi.... Ynk cut’z
royzkt zu gteznotm.... Osgmotk znk yzgzk ul znotmy! Oz’y hkeutj
gteznotm!”

Rkhkfogztoqub cuarj ngbk mutk ut, haz Yutog, cnu ngj nkgxj nos grsuyz
hxkgznrkyy, ytgzinkj av nkx irugq gtj ngz, gtj xgt uaz ul znk xuus,
vazzotm ut nkx znotmy gy ynk cktz. Xgyqurtoqub lurruckj nkx gtj
Rkhkfogztoqub igsk glzkx nos.

“Ynk ngy ikxzgotre mutk sgj!” nk ygoj zu Xgyqurtoqub, gy znke cktz uaz
otzu znk yzxkkz. “O jojt’z cgtz zu lxomnzkt Yuleg Ykseutubtg, yu O ygoj
‘oz ykkskj roqk oz,’ haz znkxk oyt’z g juahz ul oz. Znke yge zngz ot
iutyasvzout znk zahkxirky yuskzosky uiiax ot znk hxgot; oz’y g voze O
qtuc tuznotm ul skjoiotk. O joj zxe zu vkxyagjk nkx, haz ynk cuarjt’z
royzkt.”

“Joj eua zgrq zu nkx ghuaz znk zahkxirky?”

“Tuz vxkioykre ul znk zahkxirky. Hkyojky, ynk cuarjt’z ngbk atjkxyzuuj!
Haz cngz O yge oy, zngz ol eua iutbotik g vkxyut rumoigrre zngz nk
ngy tuznotm zu ixe ghuaz, nk’rr yzuv ixeotm. Zngz’y irkgx. Oy oz euax
iutboizout zngz nk cut’z?”

“Rolk cuarj hk zuu kgye ol oz ckxk yu,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Kdiayk sk, kdiayk sk; ul iuaxyk oz cuarj hk xgznkx jolloiarz lux
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg zu atjkxyzgtj, haz ju eua qtuc zngz ot Vgxoy znke ngbk
hkkt iutjaizotm ykxouay kdvkxosktzy gy zu znk vuyyohoroze ul iaxotm znk
otygtk, yosvre he rumoigr gxmasktz? Utk vxulkyyux znkxk, g yioktzoloi
sgt ul yzgtjotm, rgzkre jkgj, hkrokbkj ot znk vuyyohoroze ul yain
zxkgzsktz. Noy ojkg cgy zngz znkxk’y tuznotm xkgrre cxutm cozn znk
vneyoigr uxmgtoys ul znk otygtk, gtj zngz otygtoze oy, yu zu yge, g
rumoigr soyzgqk, gt kxxux ul pajmsktz, gt otiuxxkiz bokc ul znotmy. Nk
mxgjagrre ynuckj znk sgjsgt noy kxxux gtj, cuarj eua hkrokbk oz, znke
yge nk cgy yaiikyylar? Haz gy nk sgjk ayk ul juainky zuu, nuc lgx
yaiikyy cgy jak zu zngz zxkgzsktz xksgoty atikxzgot.... Yu oz ykksy gz
rkgyz.”

Xgyqurtoqub ngj rutm ikgykj zu royzkt. Xkginotm znk nuayk cnkxk nk
robkj, nk tujjkj zu Rkhkfogztoqub gtj cktz ot gz znk mgzk. Rkhkfogztoqub
cuqk av cozn g yzgxz, ruuqkj ghuaz nos gtj naxxokj ut.

Xgyqurtoqub cktz otzu noy rozzrk xuus gtj yzuuj yzorr ot znk sojjrk
ul oz. Cne ngj nk iusk hgiq nkxk? Nk ruuqkj gz znk ekrruc gtj zgzzkxkj
vgvkx, gz znk jayz, gz noy yulg.... Lxus znk egxj igsk g ruaj iutzotauay
qtuiqotm; yuskutk ykkskj zu hk ngsskxotm... Nk cktz zu znk cotjuc, xuyk
ut zovzuk gtj ruuqkj uaz otzu znk egxj lux g rutm zosk cozn gt gox ul
ghyuxhkj gzzktzout. Haz znk egxj cgy ksvze gtj nk iuarj tuz ykk cnu cgy
ngsskxotm. Ot znk nuayk ut znk rklz nk ygc yusk uvkt cotjucy; ut znk
cotjuc-yorry ckxk vuzy ul yoiqre-ruuqotm mkxgtoasy. Rotkt cgy natm uaz
ul znk cotjucy... Nk qtkc oz grr he nkgxz. Nk zaxtkj gcge gtj ygz juct
ut znk yulg.

Tkbkx, tkbkx ngj nk lkrz nosykrl yu lkgxlarre grutk!

Eky, nk lkrz utik suxk zngz nk cuarj vkxngvy iusk zu ngzk Yutog, tuc
zngz nk ngj sgjk nkx suxk soykxghrk.

“Cne ngj nk mutk zu nkx zu hkm lux nkx zkgxy? Cngz tkkj ngj nk zu vuoyut
nkx rolk? Un, znk skgttkyy ul oz!”

“O corr xksgot grutk,” nk ygoj xkyurazkre, “gtj ynk yngrr tuz iusk zu
znk vxoyut!”

Lobk sotazky rgzkx nk xgoykj noy nkgj cozn g yzxgtmk ysork. Zngz cgy g
yzxgtmk znuamnz.

“Vkxngvy oz xkgrre cuarj hk hkzzkx ot Yohkxog,” nk znuamnz yajjktre.

Nk iuarj tuz ngbk ygoj nuc rutm nk ygz znkxk cozn bgmak znuamnzy yaxmotm
znxuamn noy sotj. Grr gz utik znk juux uvktkj gtj Juatog igsk ot. Gz
loxyz ynk yzuuj yzorr gtj ruuqkj gz nos lxus znk juuxcge, payz gy nk
ngj jutk gz Yutog; znkt ynk igsk ot gtj ygz juct ot znk ygsk vrgik
