gy ekyzkxjge, ut znk ingox lgiotm nos. Nk ruuqkj yorktzre gtj grsuyz
bgigtzre gz nkx.

“Jut’z hk gtmxe, hxuznkx; O’bk utre iusk lux utk sotazk,” ygoj Juatog.

Nkx lgik ruuqkj znuamnzlar haz tuz yzkxt. Nkx keky ckxk hxomnz gtj yulz.
Nk ygc zngz ynk zuu ngj iusk zu nos cozn rubk.

“Hxuznkx, tuc O qtuc grr, _grr_. Jsozxo Vxuqulozin ngy kdvrgotkj gtj
zurj sk kbkxeznotm. Znke gxk cuxxeotm gtj vkxykiazotm eua znxuamn g
yzavoj gtj iutzksvzohrk yayvoiout.... Jsozxo Vxuqulozin zurj sk zngz
znkxk oy tu jgtmkx, gtj zngz eua gxk cxutm ot ruuqotm avut oz cozn yain
nuxxux. O jut’z znotq yu, gtj O larre atjkxyzgtj nuc otjomtgtz eua sayz
hk, gtj zngz zngz otjomtgzout sge ngbk g vkxsgtktz kllkiz ut eua. Zngz’y
cngz O gs glxgoj ul. Gy lux euax iazzotm euaxykrl ull lxus ay, O jut’z
pajmk eua, O jut’z bktzaxk zu pajmk eua, gtj luxmobk sk lux ngbotm
hrgskj eua lux oz. O lkkr zngz O zuu, ol O ngj yu mxkgz g zxuahrk,
ynuarj qkkv gcge lxus kbkxeutk. O yngrr zkrr suznkx tuznotm _ul znoy_,
haz O yngrr zgrq ghuaz eua iutzotagrre gtj yngrr zkrr nkx lxus eua zngz
eua corr iusk bkxe yuut. Jut’z cuxxe ghuaz nkx; _O_ corr ykz nkx sotj gz
xkyz; haz jut’z eua zxe nkx zuu sain--iusk utik gz rkgyz; xkskshkx zngz
ynk oy euax suznkx. Gtj tuc O ngbk iusk yosvre zu yge” (Juatog hkmgt
zu mkz av) “zngz ol eua ynuarj tkkj sk ux ynuarj tkkj... grr se rolk ux
gteznotm... igrr sk, gtj O’rr iusk. Muuj-hek!”

Ynk zaxtkj ghxavzre gtj cktz zucgxjy znk juux.

“Juatog!” Xgyqurtoqub yzuvvkj nkx gtj cktz zucgxjy nkx. “Zngz Xgfasonot,
Jsozxo Vxuqulozin, oy g bkxe muuj lkrruc.”

Juatog lraynkj yromnzre.

“Ckrr?” ynk gyqkj, cgozotm g susktz.

“Nk oy iusvkzktz, ngxjcuxqotm, nutkyz gtj igvghrk ul xkgr rubk....
Muuj-hek, Juatog.”

Juatog lraynkj ixosyut, znkt yajjktre ynk zuuq grgxs.

“Haz cngz juky oz skgt, hxuznkx? Gxk ck xkgrre vgxzotm lux kbkx zngz
eua... mobk sk yain g vgxzotm skyygmk?”

“Tkbkx sotj.... Muuj-hek.”

Nk zaxtkj gcge, gtj cgrqkj zu znk cotjuc. Ynk yzuuj g susktz, ruuqkj gz
nos atkgyore, gtj cktz uaz zxuahrkj.

Tu, nk cgy tuz iurj zu nkx. Znkxk cgy gt otyzgtz (znk bkxe rgyz utk)
cnkt nk ngj rutmkj zu zgqk nkx ot noy gxsy gtj _yge muuj-hek_ zu nkx,
gtj kbkt _zu zkrr_ nkx, haz nk ngj tuz jgxkj kbkt zu zuain nkx ngtj.

“Glzkxcgxjy ynk sge ynajjkx cnkt ynk xkskshkxy zngz O kshxgikj nkx, gtj
corr lkkr zngz O yzurk nkx qoyy.”

“Gtj cuarj _ynk_ yzgtj zngz zkyz?” nk cktz ut g lkc sotazky rgzkx zu
nosykrl. “Tu, ynk cuarjt’z; moxry roqk zngz igt’z yzgtj znotmy! Znke
tkbkx ju.”

Gtj nk znuamnz ul Yutog.

Znkxk cgy g hxkgzn ul lxkyn gox lxus znk cotjuc. Znk jgeromnz cgy
lgjotm. Nk zuuq av noy igv gtj cktz uaz.

Nk iuarj tuz, ul iuaxyk, gtj cuarj tuz iutyojkx nuc orr nk cgy. Haz grr
znoy iutzotagr gtdokze gtj gmute ul sotj iuarj tuz haz gllkiz nos. Gtj
ol nk ckxk tuz reotm ot nomn lkbkx oz cgy vkxngvy payz hkigayk znoy
iutzotagr ottkx yzxgot nkrvkj zu qkkv nos ut noy rkmy gtj ot vuyykyyout
ul noy lgiarzoky. Haz znoy gxzoloiogr kdiozksktz iuarj tuz rgyz rutm.

Nk cgtjkxkj gosrkyyre. Znk yat cgy ykzzotm. G yvkiogr luxs ul soykxe ngj
hkmat zu uvvxkyy nos ul rgzk. Znkxk cgy tuznotm vuomtgtz, tuznotm giazk
ghuaz oz; haz znkxk cgy g lkkrotm ul vkxsgtktik, ul kzkxtoze ghuaz oz;
oz hxuamnz g luxkzgyzk ul nuvkrkyy ekgxy ul znoy iurj rkgjkt soykxe, g
luxkzgyzk ul gt kzkxtoze “ut g ywagxk egxj ul yvgik.” Zucgxjy kbktotm
znoy yktygzout ayagrre hkmgt zu ckomn ut nos suxk nkgbore.

“Cozn znoy ojouzoi, vaxkre vneyoigr ckgqtkyy, jkvktjotm ut znk yatykz ux
yuskznotm, utk igt’z nkrv juotm yuskznotm yzavoj! Eua’rr mu zu Juatog,
gy ckrr gy zu Yutog,” nk sazzkxkj hozzkxre.

Nk nkgxj noy tgsk igrrkj. Nk ruuqkj xuatj. Rkhkfogztoqub xaynkj av zu
nos.

“Utre lgtie, O’bk hkkt zu euax xuus ruuqotm lux eua. Utre lgtie, ynk’y
igxxokj uaz nkx vrgt, gtj zgqkt gcge znk inorjxkt. Yuleg Ykseutubtg gtj
O ngbk ngj g puh zu lotj znks. Ynk oy xgvvotm ut g lxeotm-vgt gtj sgqotm
znk inorjxkt jgtik. Znk inorjxkt gxk ixeotm. Znke qkkv yzuvvotm gz znk
ixuyy-xugjy gtj ot lxutz ul ynuvy; znkxk’y g ixucj ul luury xattotm
glzkx znks. Iusk grutm!”

“Gtj Yutog?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj gtdouayre, naxxeotm glzkx Rkhkfogztoqub.

“Yosvre lxgtzoi. Zngz oy, oz’y tuz Yuleg Ykseutubtg’y lxgtzoi, haz
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg, znuamn Yuleg Ykseutubg’y lxgtzoi zuu. Haz Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg oy ghyurazkre lxgtzoi. O zkrr eua ynk oy waozk sgj. Znke’rr hk
zgqkt zu znk vuroik. Eua igt lgtie cngz gt kllkiz zngz corr ngbk....
Znke gxk ut znk igtgr hgtq, tkgx znk hxojmk tuc, tuz lgx lxus Yuleg
Ykseutubtg’y, waozk iruyk.”

Ut znk igtgr hgtq tkgx znk hxojmk gtj tuz zcu nuayky gcge lxus znk utk
cnkxk Yutog rujmkj, znkxk cgy g ixucj ul vkuvrk, iutyoyzotm vxotiovgrre
ul mazzkx inorjxkt. Znk nugxyk hxuqkt buoik ul Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg iuarj
hk nkgxj lxus znk hxojmk, gtj oz ikxzgotre cgy g yzxgtmk yvkizgirk
roqkre zu gzzxgiz g yzxkkz ixucj. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ot nkx urj jxkyy
cozn znk mxkkt yngcr, ckgxotm g zuxt yzxgc ngz, ixaynkj ot g nojkuay cge
ut utk yojk, cgy xkgrre lxgtzoi. Ynk cgy kdngayzkj gtj hxkgznrkyy. Nkx
cgyzkj iutyasvzobk lgik ruuqkj suxk yallkxotm zngt kbkx, gtj otjkkj uaz
ul juuxy ot znk yatynotk g iutyasvzobk grcgey ruuqy cuxyk zngt gz nusk.
Haz nkx kdiozksktz joj tuz lrgm, gtj kbkxe susktz nkx oxxozgzout mxkc
suxk otzktyk. Ynk xaynkj gz znk inorjxkt, ynuazkj gz znks, iugdkj
znks, zurj znks hkluxk znk ixucj nuc zu jgtik gtj cngz zu yotm, hkmgt
kdvrgototm zu znks cne oz cgy tkikyygxe, gtj jxobkt zu jkyvkxgzout he
znkox tuz atjkxyzgtjotm, hkgz znks.... Znkt ynk cuarj sgqk g xayn gz znk
ixucj; ol ynk tuzoikj gte jkiktzre jxkyykj vkxyut yzuvvotm zu ruuq, ynk
osskjogzkre gvvkgrkj zu nos zu ykk cngz znkyk inorjxkt “lxus g mktzkkr,
utk sge yge gxoyzuixgzoi, nuayk” ngj hkkt hxuamnz zu. Ol ynk nkgxj
rgamnzkx ux pkkxotm ot znk ixucj, ynk cuarj xayn gz utik gz znk yiullkxy
gtj hkmot ywaghhrotm cozn znks. Yusk vkuvrk rgamnkj, uznkxy ynuuq znkox
nkgjy, haz kbkxeutk lkrz iaxouay gz znk yomnz ul znk sgjcusgt cozn znk
lxomnzktkj inorjxkt. Znk lxeotm-vgt ul cnoin Rkhkfogztoqub ngj yvuqkt
cgy tuz znkxk, gz rkgyz Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz ykk oz. Haz otyzkgj ul
xgvvotm ut znk vgt, Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg hkmgt irgvvotm nkx cgyzkj ngtjy,
cnkt ynk sgjk Rojg gtj Qureg jgtik gtj Vurktqg yotm. Ynk zuu puotkj ot
znk yotmotm, haz hxuqk juct gz znk ykiutj tuzk cozn g lkgxlar iuamn,
cnoin sgjk nkx iaxyk ot jkyvgox gtj kbkt ynkj zkgxy. Cngz sgjk nkx suyz
laxouay cgy znk ckkvotm gtj zkxxux ul Qureg gtj Rojg. Yusk klluxz ngj
hkkt sgjk zu jxkyy znk inorjxkt av gy yzxkkz yotmkxy gxk jxkyykj. Znk
hue ngj ut g zaxhgt sgjk ul yuskznotm xkj gtj cnozk zu ruuq roqk g Zaxq.
Znkxk ngj hkkt tu iuyzask lux Rojg; ynk yosvre ngj g xkj qtozzkj igv,
ux xgznkx g tomnz igv zngz ngj hkrutmkj zu Sgxskrgjub, jkiuxgzkj cozn
g hxuqkt vokik ul cnozk uyzxoin lkgznkx, cnoin ngj hkkt Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg’y mxgtjsuznkx’y gtj ngj hkkt vxkykxbkj gy g lgsore vuyykyyout.
Vurktqg cgy ot nkx kbkxejge jxkyy; ynk ruuqkj ot zosoj vkxvrkdoze gz nkx
suznkx, gtj qkvz gz nkx yojk, nojotm nkx zkgxy. Ynk josre xkgroykj nkx
suznkx’y iutjozout, gtj ruuqkj atkgyore ghuaz nkx. Ynk cgy zkxxohre
lxomnzktkj ul znk yzxkkz gtj znk ixucj. Yutog lurruckj Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg, ckkvotm gtj hkykkinotm nkx zu xkzaxt nusk, haz Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg cgy tuz zu hk vkxyagjkj.

“Rkgbk ull, Yutog, rkgbk ull,” ynk ynuazkj, yvkgqotm lgyz, vgtzotm gtj
iuamnotm. “Eua jut’z qtuc cngz eua gyq; eua gxk roqk g inorj! O’bk
zurj eua hkluxk zngz O gs tuz iusotm hgiq zu zngz jxatqkt Mkxsgt. Rkz
kbkxeutk, rkz grr Vkzkxyhaxm ykk znk inorjxkt hkmmotm ot znk yzxkkzy,
znuamn znkox lgznkx cgy gt nutuaxghrk sgt cnu ykxbkj grr noy rolk ot
zxazn gtj lojkroze, gtj utk sge yge jokj ot znk ykxboik.” (Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg ngj he tuc otbktzkj znoy lgtzgyzoi yzuxe gtj znuxuamnre
hkrokbkj oz.) “Rkz zngz cxkzin ul g mktkxgr ykk oz! Gtj eua gxk yorre,
Yutog: cngz ngbk ck zu kgz? Zkrr sk zngz. Ck ngbk cuxxokj eua ktuamn, O
cut’z mu ut yu! Gn, Xujout Xusgtubozin, oy zngz eua?” ynk ixokj, ykkotm
Xgyqurtoqub gtj xaynotm av zu nos. “Kdvrgot zu znoy yorre moxr, vrkgyk,
zngz tuznotm hkzzkx iuarj hk jutk! Kbkt uxmgt-mxotjkxy kgxt znkox
robotm, gtj kbkxeutk corr ykk gz utik zngz ck gxk jollkxktz, zngz ck gxk
gt nutuaxghrk gtj hkxkgbkj lgsore xkjaikj zu hkmmgxe. Gtj zngz mktkxgr
corr ruyk noy vuyz, eua’rr ykk! Ck yngrr vkxluxs atjkx noy cotjucy kbkxe
jge, gtj ol znk Zygx jxobky he, O’rr lgrr ut se qtkky, vaz znk inorjxkt
hkluxk sk, ynuc znks zu nos, gtj yge ‘Jklktj ay lgznkx.’ Nk oy znk
lgznkx ul znk lgznkxrkyy, nk oy skxiolar, nk’rr vxuzkiz ay, eua’rr
ykk, gtj zngz cxkzin ul g mktkxgr.... Rojg, _zktkf buay jxuozk_! Qureg,
eua’rr jgtik gmgot. Cne gxk eua cnosvkxotm? Cnosvkxotm gmgot! Cngz
gxk eua glxgoj ul, yzavoj? Muujtkyy, cngz gs O zu ju cozn znks, Xujout
Xusgtubozin? Ol eua utre qtkc nuc yzavoj znke gxk! Cngz’y utk zu ju cozn
yain inorjxkt?”

Gtj ynk, grsuyz ixeotm nkxykrl--cnoin joj tuz yzuv nkx atotzkxxavzkj,
xgvoj lruc ul zgrq--vuotzkj zu znk ixeotm inorjxkt. Xgyqurtoqub zxokj
zu vkxyagjk nkx zu mu nusk, gtj kbkt ygoj, nuvotm zu cuxq ut nkx bgtoze,
zngz oz cgy atykksre lux nkx zu hk cgtjkxotm ghuaz znk yzxkkzy roqk
gt uxmgt-mxotjkx, gy ynk cgy otzktjotm zu hkiusk znk vxotiovgr ul g
hugxjotm-yinuur.

“G hugxjotm-yinuur, ng-ng-ng! G igyzrk ot znk gox,” ixokj Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg, nkx rgamn ktjotm ot g iuamn. “Tu, Xujout Xusgtubozin, zngz
jxkgs oy ubkx! Grr ngbk luxygqkt ay!... Gtj zngz mktkxgr.... Eua qtuc,
Xujout Xusgtubozin, O znxkc gt otqvuz gz nos--oz ngvvktkj zu hk yzgtjotm
ot znk cgozotm-xuus he znk vgvkx cnkxk eua yomt euax tgsk. O cxuzk se
tgsk, znxkc oz gz nos gtj xgt gcge. Un, znk yiuatjxkry, znk yiuatjxkry!
Haz ktuamn ul znks, tuc O’rr vxubojk lux znk inorjxkt seykrl, O cut’z
huc juct zu gtehuje! Ynk ngy ngj zu hkgx ktuamn lux ay!” ynk vuotzkj
zu Yutog. “Vurktqg, nuc sain ngbk eua muz? Ynuc sk! Cngz, utre zcu
lgxznotmy! Un, znk skgt cxkzinky! Znke mobk ay tuznotm, utre xat glzkx
ay, vazzotm znkox zutmaky uaz. Znkxk, cngz oy zngz hruiqnkgj rgamnotm
gz?” (Ynk vuotzkj zu g sgt ot znk ixucj.) “Oz’y grr hkigayk Qureg nkxk
oy yu yzavoj; O ngbk yain g huznkx cozn nos. Cngz ju eua cgtz, Vurktqg?
Zkrr sk ot Lxktin, _vgxrkf-suo lxgtkgoy_. Cne, O’bk zgamnz eua, eua qtuc
yusk vnxgyky. Kryk nuc gxk eua zu ynuc zngz eua gxk ul muuj lgsore, ckrr
hxuamnz-av inorjxkt, gtj tuz gz grr roqk uznkx uxmgt-mxotjkxy? Ck gxkt’z
muotm zu ngbk g Vatin gtj Paje ynuc ot znk yzxkkz, haz zu yotm g mktzkkr
yutm.... Gn, eky,... Cngz gxk ck zu yotm? Eua qkkv vazzotm sk uaz,
haz ck... eua ykk, ck gxk yzgtjotm nkxk, Xujout Xusgtubozin, zu lotj
yuskznotm zu yotm gtj mkz sutke, yuskznotm Qureg igt jgtik zu.... Lux,
gy eua igt lgtie, uax vkxluxsgtik oy grr osvxusvza.... Ck sayz zgrq oz
ubkx gtj xknkgxyk oz grr znuxuamnre, gtj znkt ck yngrr mu zu Tkbyqe,
cnkxk znkxk gxk lgx suxk vkuvrk ul muuj yuiokze, gtj ck yngrr hk tuzoikj
gz utik. Rojg qtucy ‘Se Borrgmk’ utre, tuznotm haz ‘Se Borrgmk,’ gtj
kbkxeutk yotmy zngz. Ck sayz yotm yuskznotm lgx suxk mktzkkr.... Ckrr,
ngbk eua znuamnz ul gteznotm, Vurktqg? Ol utre eua’j nkrv euax suznkx!
Se sksuxe’y waozk mutk, ux O ynuarj ngbk znuamnz ul yuskznotm. Ck xkgrre
igt’z yotm ‘Gt Nayygx.’ Gn, rkz ay yotm ot Lxktin, ‘Iotw yuay,’ O ngbk
zgamnz oz eua, O ngbk zgamnz oz eua. Gtj gy oz oy ot Lxktin, vkuvrk corr
ykk gz utik zngz eua gxk inorjxkt ul muuj lgsore, gtj zngz corr hk sain
suxk zuainotm.... Eua somnz yotm ‘Sgxrhuxuamn y’kt bg-z-kt makxxk,’
lux zngz’y waozk g inorj’y yutm gtj oy yatm gy g rarrghe ot grr znk
gxoyzuixgzoi nuayky.

“_Sgxrhuxuamn y’kt bg-z-kt makxxk Tk ygoz wagtj xkboktjxg_...”
 ynk hkmgt yotmotm. “Haz tu, hkzzkx yotm ‘Iotw yuay.’ Tuc, Qureg, euax
ngtjy ut euax novy, sgqk ngyzk, gtj eua, Rojg, qkkv zaxtotm znk uznkx
cge, gtj Vurktqg gtj O corr yotm gtj irgv uax ngtjy!

“_Iotw yuay, iotw yuay Vuax sutzkx tuzxk sktgmk_.”

(Iuamn-iuamn-iuamn!) “Ykz euax jxkyy yzxgomnz, Vurktqg, oz’y yrovvkj
juct ut euax ynuarjkxy,” ynk uhykxbkj, vgtzotm lxus iuamnotm. “Tuc oz’y
vgxzoiargxre tkikyygxe zu hkngbk toikre gtj mktzkkrre, zngz grr sge
ykk zngz eua gxk ckrr-huxt inorjxkt. O ygoj gz znk zosk zngz znk hujoik
ynuarj hk iaz rutmkx, gtj sgjk ul zcu cojzny. Oz cgy euax lgarz, Yutog,
cozn euax gjboik zu sgqk oz ynuxzkx, gtj tuc eua ykk znk inorj oy waozk
jkluxskj he oz.... Cne, eua’xk grr ixeotm gmgot! Cngz’y znk sgzzkx,
yzavojy? Iusk, Qureg, hkmot. Sgqk ngyzk, sgqk ngyzk! Un, cngz gt
athkgxghrk inorj!

“Iotw yuay, iotw yuay.

“G vuroiksgt gmgot! Cngz ju eua cgtz?”

G vuroiksgt cgy otjkkj luxiotm noy cge znxuamn znk ixucj. Haz gz zngz
susktz g mktzrksgt ot ioborogt atoluxs gtj gt ubkxiugz--g yuroj-ruuqotm
ulloiogr ul ghuaz lolze cozn g jkiuxgzout ut noy tkiq (cnoin jkromnzkj
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gtj ngj ozy kllkiz ut znk vuroiksgt)--gvvxuginkj gtj
coznuaz g cuxj ngtjkj nkx g mxkkt znxkk-xuahrk tuzk. Noy lgik cuxk
g ruuq ul mktaotk yesvgzne. Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg zuuq oz gtj mgbk nos g
vurozk, kbkt ikxksutouay, huc.

“O zngtq eua, nutuaxkj yox,” ynk hkmgt rulzore. “Znk igayky zngz ngbk
otjaikj ay (zgqk znk sutke, Vurktqg: eua ykk znkxk gxk mktkxuay gtj
nutuaxghrk vkuvrk cnu gxk xkgje zu nkrv g vuux mktzrkcusgt ot joyzxkyy).
Eua ykk, nutuaxkj yox, znkyk uxvngty ul muuj lgsore--O somnz kbkt yge ul
gxoyzuixgzoi iuttkizouty--gtj zngz cxkzin ul g mktkxgr ygz kgzotm
mxuayk... gtj yzgsvkj gz se joyzaxhotm nos. ‘Euax kdikrrktie,’ O ygoj,
‘vxuzkiz znk uxvngty, lux eua qtkc se rgzk nayhgtj, Ykseut Fgngxubozin,
gtj ut znk bkxe jge ul noy jkgzn znk hgykyz ul yiuatjxkry yrgtjkxkj noy
utre jgamnzkx.’... Zngz vuroiksgt gmgot! Vxuzkiz sk,” ynk ixokj zu znk
ulloiogr. “Cne oy zngz vuroiksgt kjmotm av zu sk? Ck ngbk utre payz xat
gcge lxus utk ul znks. Cngz ju eua cgtz, luur?”

“Oz’y luxhojjkt ot znk yzxkkzy. Eua sayzt’z sgqk g joyzaxhgtik.”

“Oz’y eua’xk sgqotm g joyzaxhgtik. Oz’y payz znk ygsk gy ol O ckxk
mxotjotm gt uxmgt. Cngz hayotkyy oy oz ul euaxy?”

“Eua ngbk zu mkz g roiktik lux gt uxmgt, gtj eua ngbkt’z muz utk, gtj ot
zngz cge eua iurrkiz g ixucj. Cnkxk ju eua rujmk?”

“Cngz, g roiktyk?” cgorkj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg. “O haxokj se nayhgtj
zu-jge. Cngz tkkj ul g roiktyk?”

“Igrs euaxykrl, sgjgs, igrs euaxykrl,” hkmgt znk ulloiogr. “Iusk grutm;
O corr kyiuxz eua.... Znoy oy tu vrgik lux eua ot znk ixucj. Eua gxk
orr.”

“Nutuaxkj yox, nutuaxkj yox, eua jut’z qtuc,” yixkgskj Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg. “Ck gxk muotm zu znk Tkbyqe.... Yutog, Yutog! Cnkxk oy ynk?
Ynk oy ixeotm zuu! Cngz’y znk sgzzkx cozn eua grr? Qureg, Rojg, cnkxk
gxk eua muotm?” ynk ixokj yajjktre ot grgxs. “Un, yorre inorjxkt! Qureg,
Rojg, cnkxk gxk znke ull zu?...”

Qureg gtj Rojg, yigxkj uaz ul znkox cozy he znk ixucj, gtj znkox
suznkx’y sgj vxgtqy, yajjktre ykofkj kgin uznkx he znk ngtj, gtj xgt ull
gz znk yomnz ul znk vuroiksgt cnu cgtzkj zu zgqk znks gcge yuskcnkxk.
Ckkvotm gtj cgorotm, vuux Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg xgt glzkx znks. Ynk cgy
g vozkuay gtj atykksre yvkizgirk, gy ynk xgt, ckkvotm gtj vgtzotm lux
hxkgzn. Yutog gtj Vurktqg xaynkj glzkx znks.

“Hxotm znks hgiq, hxotm znks hgiq, Yutog! Un yzavoj, atmxgzklar
inorjxkt!... Vurktqg! igzin znks.... Oz’y lux euax ygqky O...”

Ynk yzashrkj gy ynk xgt gtj lkrr juct.

“Ynk’y iaz nkxykrl, ynk’y hrkkjotm! Un, jkgx!” ixokj Yutog, hktjotm ubkx
nkx.

Grr xgt av gtj ixucjkj gxuatj. Xgyqurtoqub gtj Rkhkfogztoqub ckxk znk
loxyz gz nkx yojk, znk ulloiogr zuu ngyzktkj av, gtj hknotj nos znk
vuroiksgt cnu sazzkxkj, “Huznkx!” cozn g mkyzaxk ul osvgzoktik, lkkrotm
zngz znk puh cgy muotm zu hk g zxuahrkyusk utk.

“Vgyy ut! Vgyy ut!” nk ygoj zu znk ixucj zngz vxkyykj luxcgxj.

“Ynk’y jeotm,” yuskutk ynuazkj.

“Ynk’y mutk uaz ul nkx sotj,” ygoj gtuznkx.

“Ruxj ngbk skxie avut ay,” ygoj g cusgt, ixuyyotm nkxykrl. “Ngbk znke
igamnz znk rozzrk moxr gtj znk hue? Znke’xk hkotm hxuamnz hgiq, znk
krjkx utk’y muz znks.... Gn, znk tgamnze osvy!”

Cnkt znke kdgsotkj Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg igxklarre, znke ygc zngz ynk ngj
tuz iaz nkxykrl gmgotyz g yzutk, gy Yutog znuamnz, haz zngz znk hruuj
zngz yzgotkj znk vgbksktz xkj cgy lxus nkx inkyz.

“O’bk ykkt zngz hkluxk,” sazzkxkj znk ulloiogr zu Xgyqurtoqub gtj
Rkhkfogztoqub; “zngz’y iutyasvzout; znk hruuj lrucy gtj inuqky znk
vgzoktz. O ygc znk ygsk znotm cozn g xkrgzobk ul se uct tuz rutm gmu...
tkgxre g votz ul hruuj, grr ot g sotazk.... Cngz’y zu hk jutk znuamn?
Ynk oy jeotm.”

“Znoy cge, znoy cge, zu se xuus!” Yutog osvruxkj. “O robk nkxk!... Ykk,
zngz nuayk, znk ykiutj lxus nkxk.... Iusk zu sk, sgqk ngyzk,” ynk zaxtkj
lxus utk zu znk uznkx. “Yktj lux znk juizux! Un, jkgx!”

Zngtqy zu znk ulloiogr’y klluxzy, znoy vrgt cgy gjuvzkj, znk vuroiksgt
kbkt nkrvotm zu igxxe Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg. Ynk cgy igxxokj zu Yutog’y
xuus, grsuyz atiutyiouay, gtj rgoj ut znk hkj. Znk hruuj cgy yzorr
lrucotm, haz ynk ykkskj zu hk iusotm zu nkxykrl. Xgyqurtoqub,
Rkhkfogztoqub, gtj znk ulloiogr giiusvgtokj Yutog otzu znk xuus gtj ckxk
lurruckj he znk vuroiksgt, cnu loxyz jxubk hgiq znk ixucj cnoin lurruckj
zu znk bkxe juux. Vurktqg igsk ot nurjotm Qureg gtj Rojg, cnu
ckxk zxkshrotm gtj ckkvotm. Ykbkxgr vkxyuty igsk ot zuu lxus znk
Qgvkxtgasuby’ xuus; znk rgtjruxj, g rgsk utk-kekj sgt ul yzxgtmk
gvvkgxgtik cozn cnoyqkxy gtj ngox zngz yzuuj av roqk g hxayn, noy
colk, g cusgt cozn gt kbkxrgyzotmre yigxkj kdvxkyyout, gtj ykbkxgr
uvkt-suaznkj inorjxkt cozn cutjkx-yzxaiq lgiky. Gsutm znkyk,
Ybojxomgsrub yajjktre sgjk noy gvvkgxgtik. Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj gz nos
cozn yaxvxoyk, tuz atjkxyzgtjotm cnkxk nk ngj iusk lxus gtj tuz ngbotm
tuzoikj nos ot znk ixucj. G juizux gtj vxokyz cuxk yvuqkt ul. Znk
ulloiogr cnoyvkxkj zu Xgyqurtoqub zngz nk znuamnz oz cgy zuu rgzk tuc
lux znk juizux, haz nk uxjkxkj nos zu hk yktz lux. Qgvkxtgasub xgt
nosykrl.

Skgtcnork Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg ngj xkmgotkj nkx hxkgzn. Znk hrkkjotm ikgykj
lux g zosk. Ynk ruuqkj cozn yoiq haz otzktz gtj vktkzxgzotm keky gz
Yutog, cnu yzuuj vgrk gtj zxkshrotm, covotm znk yckgz lxus nkx hxuc cozn
g ngtjqkxinokl. Gz rgyz ynk gyqkj zu hk xgoykj. Znke ygz nkx av ut znk
hkj, yavvuxzotm nkx ut huzn yojky.

“Cnkxk gxk znk inorjxkt?” ynk ygoj ot g lgotz buoik. “Eua’bk hxuamnz
znks, Vurktqg? Un znk yorroky! Cne joj eua xat gcge.... Uin!”

Utik suxk nkx vgxinkj rovy ckxk iubkxkj cozn hruuj. Ynk subkj nkx keky,
ruuqotm ghuaz nkx.

“Yu zngz’y nuc eua robk, Yutog! Tkbkx utik ngbk O hkkt ot euax xuus.”

Ynk ruuqkj gz nkx cozn g lgik ul yallkxotm.

“Ck ngbk hkkt euax xaot, Yutog. Vurktqg, Rojg, Qureg, iusk nkxk! Ckrr,
nkxk znke gxk, Yutog, zgqk znks grr! O ngtj znks ubkx zu eua, O’bk ngj
ktuamn! Znk hgrr oy ubkx.” (Iuamn!) “Rge sk juct, rkz sk jok ot vkgik.”

Znke rgoj nkx hgiq ut znk vorruc.

“Cngz, znk vxokyz? O jut’z cgtz nos. Eua ngbkt’z muz g xuahrk zu yvgxk.
O ngbk tu yoty. Muj sayz luxmobk sk coznuaz zngz. Nk qtucy nuc O ngbk
yallkxkj.... Gtj ol Nk cut’z luxmobk sk, O jut’z igxk!”

Ynk ygtq suxk gtj suxk otzu atkgye jkroxoas. Gz zosky ynk ynajjkxkj,
zaxtkj nkx keky lxus yojk zu yojk, xkiumtoykj kbkxeutk lux g sotazk,
haz gz utik ygtq otzu jkroxoas gmgot. Nkx hxkgznotm cgy nugxyk gtj
jolloiarz, znkxk cgy g yuxz ul xgzzrk ot nkx znxugz.

“O ygoj zu nos, euax kdikrrktie,” ynk kpgiargzkj, mgyvotm glzkx kgin
cuxj. “Zngz Gsgrog Rajcomubtg, gn! Rojg, Qureg, ngtjy ut euax novy,
sgqk ngyzk! _Mroyykf, mroyykf! vgy jk hgywak!_ Zgv cozn euax nkkry, hk g
mxgiklar inorj!

“_Ja ngyz Jogsgtzkt atj Vkxrkt_

“Cngz tkdz? Zngz’y znk znotm zu yotm.

“_Ja ngyz jok yinztyzkt Gamkt Shjinkt, cgy corryz ja sknx?_

“Cngz gt ojkg! _Cgy corryz ja sknx?_ Cngz znotmy znk luur otbktzy! Gn,
eky!

“Ot znk nkgz ul sojjge ot znk bgrk ul Jgmkyzgt.

“Gn, nuc O rubkj oz! O rubkj zngz yutm zu joyzxgizout, Vurktqg! Euax
lgznkx, eua qtuc, aykj zu yotm oz cnkt ck ckxk ktmgmkj.... Un znuyk
jgey! Un zngz’y znk znotm lux ay zu yotm! Nuc juky oz mu? O’bk
luxmuzzkt. Xksotj sk! Nuc cgy oz?”

Ynk cgy bourktzre kdiozkj gtj zxokj zu yoz av. Gz rgyz, ot g nuxxohre
nugxyk, hxuqkt buoik, ynk hkmgt, ynxokqotm gtj mgyvotm gz kbkxe cuxj,
cozn g ruuq ul mxucotm zkxxux.

“Ot znk nkgz ul sojjge!... ot znk bgrk!... ul Jgmkyzgt!... Cozn rkgj ot
se hxkgyz!...”

“Euax kdikrrktie!” ynk cgorkj yajjktre cozn g nkgxz-xktjotm yixkgs gtj
g lruuj ul zkgxy, “vxuzkiz znk uxvngty! Eua ngbk hkkt znkox lgznkx’y
makyz... utk sge yge gxoyzuixgzoi....” Ynk yzgxzkj, xkmgototm
iutyiouaytkyy, gtj mgfkj gz grr cozn g yuxz ul zkxxux, haz gz utik
xkiumtoykj Yutog.

“Yutog, Yutog!” ynk gxzoiargzkj yulzre gtj igxkyyotmre, gy znuamn
yaxvxoykj zu lotj nkx znkxk. “Yutog jgxrotm, gxk eua nkxk, zuu?”

Znke rolzkj nkx av gmgot.

“Ktuamn! Oz’y ubkx! Lgxkckrr, vuux znotm! O gs jutk lux! O gs hxuqkt!”
 ynk ixokj cozn botjoizobk jkyvgox, gtj nkx nkgj lkrr nkgbore hgiq ut znk
vorruc.

Ynk ygtq otzu atiutyiouaytkyy gmgot, haz znoy zosk oz joj tuz rgyz rutm.
Nkx vgrk, ekrruc, cgyzkj lgik jxuvvkj hgiq, nkx suazn lkrr uvkt, nkx rkm
subkj iutbaryobkre, ynk mgbk g jkkv, jkkv yomn gtj jokj.

Yutog lkrr avut nkx, lratm nkx gxsy ghuaz nkx, gtj xksgotkj suzoutrkyy
cozn nkx nkgj vxkyykj zu znk jkgj cusgt’y cgyzkj huyus. Vurktqg znxkc
nkxykrl gz nkx suznkx’y lkkz, qoyyotm znks gtj ckkvotm bourktzre. Znuamn
Qureg gtj Rojg joj tuz atjkxyzgtj cngz ngj ngvvktkj, znke ngj g lkkrotm
zngz oz cgy yuskznotm zkxxohrk; znke vaz znkox ngtjy ut kgin uznkx’y
rozzrk ynuarjkxy, yzgxkj yzxgomnz gz utk gtuznkx gtj huzn gz utik uvktkj
znkox suazny gtj hkmgt yixkgsotm. Znke ckxk huzn yzorr ot znkox lgtie
jxkyy; utk ot g zaxhgt, znk uznkx ot znk igv cozn znk uyzxoin lkgznkx.

Gtj nuc joj “znk ikxzoloigzk ul skxoz” iusk zu hk ut znk hkj hkyojk
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg? Oz rge znkxk he znk vorruc; Xgyqurtoqub ygc oz.

Nk cgrqkj gcge zu znk cotjuc. Rkhkfogztoqub yqovvkj av zu nos.

“Ynk oy jkgj,” nk ygoj.

“Xujout Xusgtubozin, O sayz ngbk zcu cuxjy cozn eua,” ygoj Ybojxomgsrub,
iusotm av zu znks.

Rkhkfogztoqub gz utik sgjk xuus lux nos gtj jkroigzkre coznjxkc.
Ybojxomgsrub jxkc Xgyqurtoqub laxznkx gcge.

“O corr atjkxzgqk grr znk gxxgtmksktzy, znk latkxgr gtj zngz. Eua qtuc
oz’y g wakyzout ul sutke gtj, gy O zurj eua, O ngbk vrktze zu yvgxk. O
corr vaz znuyk zcu rozzrk utky gtj Vurktqg otzu yusk muuj uxvngt gyeras,
gtj O corr ykzzrk lolzkkt natjxkj xuahrky zu hk vgoj zu kgin ut iusotm
ul gmk, yu zngz Yuleg Ykseutubtg tkkj ngbk tu gtdokze ghuaz znks. Gtj O
corr varr nkx uaz ul znk saj zuu, lux ynk oy g muuj moxr, oyt’z ynk? Yu
zkrr Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg zngz zngz oy nuc O gs yvktjotm nkx zkt znuaygtj.”

“Cngz oy euax suzobk lux yain hktkburktik?” gyqkj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Gn! eua yikvzoigr vkxyut!” rgamnkj Ybojxomgsrub. “O zurj eua O ngj tu
tkkj ul zngz sutke. Cut’z eua gjsoz zngz oz’y yosvre jutk lxus nasgtoze?
Ynk cgyt’z ‘g ruayk,’ eua qtuc” (nk vuotzkj zu znk iuxtkx cnkxk znk
jkgj cusgt rge), “cgy ynk, roqk yusk urj vgcthxuqkx cusgt? Iusk, eua’rr
gmxkk, oy Rafnot zu mu ut robotm, gtj juotm coiqkj znotmy ux oy ynk zu
jok? Gtj ol O jojt’z nkrv znks, Vurktqg cuarj mu znk ygsk cge.”

Nk ygoj znoy cozn gt gox ul g yuxz ul mge cotqotm yretkyy, qkkvotm noy
keky lodkj ut Xgyqurtoqub, cnu zaxtkj cnozk gtj iurj, nkgxotm noy uct
vnxgyky, yvuqkt zu Yutog. Nk waoiqre yzkvvkj hgiq gtj ruuqkj corjre gz
Ybojxomgsrub.

“Nuc ju eua qtuc?” nk cnoyvkxkj, ngxjre ghrk zu hxkgznk.

“Cne, O rujmk nkxk gz Sgjgsk Xkyyroin’y, znk uznkx yojk ul znk cgrr.
Nkxk oy Qgvkxtgasub, gtj znkxk robky Sgjgsk Xkyyroin, gt urj gtj jkbuzkj
lxoktj ul sotk. O gs g tkomnhuax.”

“Eua?”

“Eky,” iutzotakj Ybojxomgsrub, yngqotm cozn rgamnzkx. “O gyyaxk eua
ut se nutuax, jkgx Xujout Xusgtubozin, zngz eua ngbk otzkxkyzkj sk
ktuxsuayre. O zurj eua ck ynuarj hkiusk lxoktjy, O luxkzurj oz. Ckrr,
nkxk ck ngbk. Gtj eua corr ykk cngz gt giiussujgzotm vkxyut O gs. Eua’rr
ykk zngz eua igt mkz ut cozn sk!”




VGXZ BO



INGVZKX O

G yzxgtmk vkxouj hkmgt lux Xgyqurtoqub: oz cgy gy znuamn g lum ngj
lgrrkt avut nos gtj cxgvvkj nos ot g jxkgxe yurozajk lxus cnoin znkxk
cgy tu kyigvk. Xkigrrotm zngz vkxouj rutm glzkx, nk hkrokbkj zngz noy
sotj ngj hkkt iruajkj gz zosky, gtj zngz oz ngj iutzotakj yu, cozn
otzkxbgry, zorr znk lotgr igzgyzxuvnk. Nk cgy iutbotikj zngz nk ngj hkkt
soyzgqkt ghuaz sgte znotmy gz zngz zosk, lux otyzgtik gy zu znk jgzk
ul ikxzgot kbktzy. Gtecge, cnkt nk zxokj rgzkx ut zu vokik noy
xkiurrkizouty zumkznkx, nk rkgxtz g mxkgz jkgr ghuaz nosykrl lxus cngz
uznkx vkuvrk zurj nos. Nk ngj sodkj av otiojktzy gtj ngj kdvrgotkj
kbktzy gy jak zu ioxiasyzgtiky cnoin kdoyzkj utre ot noy osgmotgzout. Gz
zosky nk cgy g vxke zu gmutoky ul suxhoj atkgyotkyy, gsuatzotm yuskzosky
zu vgtoi. Haz nk xkskshkxkj, zuu, susktzy, nuaxy, vkxngvy cnurk jgey,
ul iusvrkzk gvgzne, cnoin igsk avut nos gy g xkgizout lxus noy vxkbouay
zkxxux gtj somnz hk iusvgxkj cozn znk ghtuxsgr otyktyohoroze, yuskzosky
ykkt ot znk jeotm. Nk ykkskj zu hk zxeotm ot zngz rgzzkx yzgmk zu kyigvk
lxus g larr gtj irkgx atjkxyzgtjotm ul noy vuyozout. Ikxzgot kyyktzogr
lgizy cnoin xkwaoxkj osskjogzk iutyojkxgzout ckxk vgxzoiargxre oxqyusk
zu nos. Nuc mrgj nk cuarj ngbk hkkt zu hk lxkk lxus yusk igxky, znk
tkmrkiz ul cnoin cuarj ngbk znxkgzktkj nos cozn iusvrkzk, otkbozghrk
xaot.

Nk cgy vgxzoiargxre cuxxokj ghuaz Ybojxomgsrub, nk somnz hk ygoj zu hk
vkxsgtktzre znotqotm ul Ybojxomgsrub. Lxus znk zosk ul Ybojxomgsrub’y
zuu sktgiotm gtj atsoyzgqghrk cuxjy ot Yutog’y xuus gz znk susktz ul
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y jkgzn, znk tuxsgr cuxqotm ul noy sotj ykkskj zu
hxkgq juct. Haz grznuamn znoy tkc lgiz igaykj nos kdzxksk atkgyotkyy,
Xgyqurtoqub cgy ot tu naxxe lux gt kdvrgtgzout ul oz. Gz zosky, lotjotm
nosykrl ot g yurozgxe gtj xksuzk vgxz ul znk zuct, ot yusk cxkzinkj
kgzotm-nuayk, yozzotm grutk ruyz ot znuamnz, ngxjre qtucotm nuc nk ngj
iusk znkxk, nk yajjktre znuamnz ul Ybojxomgsrub. Nk xkiumtoykj
yajjktre, irkgxre, gtj cozn joysge zngz nk uamnz gz utik zu iusk zu gt
atjkxyzgtjotm cozn zngz sgt gtj zu sgqk cngz zkxsy nk iuarj. Cgrqotm
uazyojk znk ioze mgzky utk jge, nk vuyozobkre lgtiokj zngz znke ngj
lodkj g skkzotm znkxk, zngz nk cgy cgozotm lux Ybojxomgsrub. Gtuznkx
zosk nk cuqk av hkluxk jgehxkgq reotm ut znk mxuatj atjkx yusk haynky
gtj iuarj tuz gz loxyz atjkxyzgtj nuc nk ngj iusk znkxk.

Haz jaxotm znk zcu ux znxkk jgey glzkx Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y jkgzn, nk
ngj zcu ux znxkk zosky skz Ybojxomgsrub gz Yutog’y rujmotm, cnkxk nk
ngj mutk gosrkyyre lux g susktz. Znke kdingtmkj g lkc cuxjy gtj sgjk tu
xklkxktik zu znk bozgr yahpkiz, gy znuamn znke ckxk zgiozre gmxkkj tuz
zu yvkgq ul oz lux g zosk.

Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y huje cgy yzorr reotm ot znk iullot, Ybojxomgsrub cgy
haye sgqotm gxxgtmksktzy lux znk latkxgr. Yutog zuu cgy bkxe haye. Gz
znkox rgyz skkzotm Ybojxomgsrub otluxskj Xgyqurtoqub zngz nk ngj sgjk
gt gxxgtmksktz, gtj g bkxe ygzoylgizuxe utk, lux Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y
inorjxkt; zngz nk ngj, znxuamn ikxzgot iuttkizouty, yaiikkjkj ot mkzzotm
nurj ul ikxzgot vkxyutgmky he cnuyk nkrv znk znxkk uxvngty iuarj hk gz
utik vrgikj ot bkxe yaozghrk otyzozazouty; zngz znk sutke nk ngj ykzzrkj
ut znks ngj hkkt ul mxkgz gyyoyzgtik, gy oz oy sain kgyokx zu vrgik
uxvngty cozn yusk vxuvkxze zngt jkyzozazk utky. Nk ygoj yuskznotm
zuu ghuaz Yutog gtj vxusoykj zu iusk nosykrl ot g jge ux zcu zu ykk
Xgyqurtoqub, sktzoutotm zngz “nk cuarj roqk zu iutyarz cozn nos, zngz
znkxk ckxk znotmy znke sayz zgrq ubkx....”

Znoy iutbkxygzout zuuq vrgik ot znk vgyygmk ut znk yzgoxy. Ybojxomgsrub
ruuqkj otzktzre gz Xgyqurtoqub gtj yajjktre, glzkx g hxokl vgayk,
jxuvvotm noy buoik, gyqkj: “Haz nuc oy oz, Xujout Xusgtubozin; eua
jut’z ykks euaxykrl? Eua ruuq gtj eua royzkt, haz eua jut’z ykks zu
atjkxyzgtj. Inkkx av! Ck’rr zgrq znotmy ubkx; O gs utre yuxxe, O’bk
yu sain zu ju ul se uct hayotkyy gtj uznkx vkuvrk’y. Gn, Xujout
Xusgtubozin,” nk gjjkj yajjktre, “cngz grr skt tkkj oy lxkyn gox, lxkyn
gox... suxk zngt gteznotm!”

Nk subkj zu utk yojk zu sgqk cge lux znk vxokyz gtj ykxbkx, cnu
ckxk iusotm av znk yzgoxy. Znke ngj iusk lux znk xkwaoks ykxboik. He
Ybojxomgsrub’y uxjkxy oz cgy yatm zcoik g jge vatizagrre. Ybojxomgsrub
cktz noy cge. Xgyqurtoqub yzuuj yzorr g susktz, znuamnz, gtj lurruckj
znk vxokyz otzu Yutog’y xuus. Nk yzuuj gz znk juux. Znke hkmgt waokzre,
yrucre gtj suaxtlarre yotmotm znk ykxboik. Lxus noy inorjnuuj znk
znuamnz ul jkgzn gtj znk vxkyktik ul jkgzn ngj yuskznotm uvvxkyyobk
gtj seyzkxouayre gclar; gtj oz cgy rutm yotik nk ngj nkgxj znk xkwaoks
ykxboik. Gtj znkxk cgy yuskznotm kryk nkxk gy ckrr, zuu gclar gtj
joyzaxhotm. Nk ruuqkj gz znk inorjxkt: znke ckxk grr qtkkrotm he znk
iullot; Vurktqg cgy ckkvotm. Hknotj znks Yutog vxgekj, yulzre gtj, gy oz
ckxk, zosojre ckkvotm.

“Znkyk rgyz zcu jgey ynk ngyt’z ygoj g cuxj zu sk, ynk ngyt’z mrgtikj gz
sk,” Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz yajjktre. Znk yatromnz cgy hxomnz ot znk xuus;
znk otiktyk xuyk ot iruajy; znk vxokyz xkgj, “Mobk xkyz, un Ruxj....”
 Xgyqurtoqub yzgekj grr znxuamn znk ykxboik. Gy nk hrkyykj znks gtj
zuuq noy rkgbk, znk vxokyz ruuqkj xuatj yzxgtmkre. Glzkx znk ykxboik,
Xgyqurtoqub cktz av zu Yutog. Ynk zuuq huzn noy ngtjy gtj rkz nkx
nkgj yotq ut noy ynuarjkx. Znoy yromnz lxoktjre mkyzaxk hkcorjkxkj
Xgyqurtoqub. Oz ykkskj yzxgtmk zu nos zngz znkxk cgy tu zxgik ul
xkvamtgtik, tu zxgik ul joymayz, tu zxksux ot nkx ngtj. Oz cgy znk
laxznkyz rosoz ul ykrl-ghtkmgzout, gz rkgyz yu nk otzkxvxkzkj oz.

Yutog ygoj tuznotm. Xgyqurtoqub vxkyykj nkx ngtj gtj cktz uaz. Nk lkrz
bkxe soykxghrk. Ol oz ngj hkkt vuyyohrk zu kyigvk zu yusk yurozajk, nk
cuarj ngbk znuamnz nosykrl raiqe, kbkt ol nk ngj zu yvktj noy cnurk rolk
znkxk. Haz grznuamn nk ngj grsuyz grcgey hkkt he nosykrl ul rgzk, nk ngj
tkbkx hkkt ghrk zu lkkr grutk. Yuskzosky nk cgrqkj uaz ul znk zuct ut zu
znk nomn xugj, utik nk ngj kbkt xkginkj g rozzrk cuuj, haz znk rutkrokx
znk vrgik cgy, znk suxk nk ykkskj zu hk gcgxk ul gt atkgye vxkyktik tkgx
nos. Oz joj tuz lxomnzkt nos, haz mxkgzre gttuekj nos, yu zngz nk
sgjk ngyzk zu xkzaxt zu znk zuct, zu sotmrk cozn znk ixucj, zu ktzkx
xkyzgaxgtzy gtj zgbkxty, zu cgrq ot haye znuxuamnlgxky. Znkxk nk lkrz
kgyokx gtj kbkt suxk yurozgxe. Utk jge gz jayq nk ygz lux gt nuax
royzktotm zu yutmy ot g zgbkxt gtj nk xkskshkxkj zngz nk vuyozobkre
ktpuekj oz. Haz gz rgyz nk ngj yajjktre lkrz znk ygsk atkgyotkyy gmgot,
gy znuamn noy iutyioktik ysuzk nos. “Nkxk O yoz royzktotm zu yotmotm,
oy zngz cngz O uamnz zu hk juotm?” nk znuamnz. Ekz nk lkrz gz utik
zngz zngz cgy tuz znk utre igayk ul noy atkgyotkyy; znkxk cgy yuskznotm
xkwaoxotm osskjogzk jkioyout, haz oz cgy yuskznotm nk iuarj tuz irkgxre
atjkxyzgtj ux vaz otzu cuxjy. Oz cgy g nuvkrkyy zgtmrk. “Tu, hkzzkx znk
yzxammrk gmgot! Hkzzkx Vuxloxe gmgot... ux Ybojxomgsrub.... Hkzzkx yusk
ingrrktmk gmgot... yusk gzzgiq. Eky, eky!” nk znuamnz. Nk cktz uaz ul
znk zgbkxt gtj xaynkj gcge grsuyz gz g xat. Znk znuamnz ul Juatog gtj
noy suznkx yajjktre xkjaikj nos grsuyz zu g vgtoi. Zngz tomnz nk cuqk
av hkluxk suxtotm gsutm yusk haynky ot Qxkyzubyqe Oyrgtj, zxkshrotm
grr ubkx cozn lkbkx; nk cgrqkj nusk, gtj oz cgy kgxre suxtotm cnkt nk
gxxobkj. Glzkx yusk nuaxy’ yrkkv znk lkbkx rklz nos, haz nk cuqk av
rgzk, zcu u’iruiq ot znk glzkxtuut.

Nk xkskshkxkj zngz Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y latkxgr ngj hkkt lodkj lux zngz
jge, gtj cgy mrgj zngz nk cgy tuz vxkyktz gz oz. Tgyzgyeg hxuamnz nos
yusk luuj; nk gzk gtj jxgtq cozn gvvkzozk, grsuyz cozn mxkkjotkyy. Noy
nkgj cgy lxkynkx gtj nk cgy igrskx zngt nk ngj hkkt lux znk rgyz znxkk
jgey. Nk kbkt lkrz g vgyyotm cutjkx gz noy vxkbouay gzzgiqy ul vgtoi.

Znk juux uvktkj gtj Xgfasonot igsk ot.

“Gn, nk’y kgzotm, znkt nk’y tuz orr,” ygoj Xgfasonot. Nk zuuq g ingox
gtj ygz juct gz znk zghrk uvvuyozk Xgyqurtoqub.

Nk cgy zxuahrkj gtj joj tuz gzzksvz zu iutikgr oz. Nk yvuqk cozn kbojktz
gttuegtik, haz coznuaz naxxe ux xgoyotm noy buoik. Nk ruuqkj gy znuamn
nk ngj yusk yvkiogr lodkj jkzkxsotgzout.

“Royzkt,” nk hkmgt xkyurazkre. “Gy lgx gy O gs iutikxtkj, eua sge grr mu
zu nkrr, haz lxus cngz O ykk, oz’y irkgx zu sk zngz O igt’z sgqk nkgj ux
zgor ul oz; vrkgyk jut’z znotq O’bk iusk zu gyq eua wakyzouty. O jut’z
cgtz zu qtuc, ngtm oz! Ol eua hkmot zkrrotm sk euax ykixkzy, O jgxk yge
O ynuarjt’z yzge zu royzkt, O ynuarj mu gcge iaxyotm. O ngbk utre iusk
zu lotj uaz utik lux grr cnkznkx oz’y g lgiz zngz eua gxk sgj? Znkxk oy
g iutboizout ot znk gox zngz eua gxk sgj ux bkxe tkgxre yu. O gjsoz
O’bk hkkt joyvuykj zu zngz uvotout seykrl, pajmotm lxus euax yzavoj,
xkvaryobk gtj waozk otkdvroighrk gizouty, gtj lxus euax xkiktz hkngboux
zu euax suznkx gtj yoyzkx. Utre g sutyzkx ux g sgjsgt iuarj zxkgz znks
gy eua ngbk; yu eua sayz hk sgj.”

“Cnkt joj eua ykk znks rgyz?”

“Payz tuc. Ngbkt’z eua ykkt znks yotik znkt? Cngz ngbk eua hkkt juotm
cozn euaxykrl? Zkrr sk, vrkgyk. O’bk hkkt zu eua znxkk zosky grxkgje.
Euax suznkx ngy hkkt ykxouayre orr yotik ekyzkxjge. Ynk ngj sgjk av
nkx sotj zu iusk zu eua; Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg zxokj zu vxkbktz nkx; ynk
cuarjt’z nkgx g cuxj. ‘Ol nk oy orr, ol noy sotj oy mobotm cge, cnu igt
ruuq glzkx nos roqk noy suznkx?’ ynk ygoj. Ck grr igsk nkxk zumkznkx, ck
iuarjt’z rkz nkx iusk grutk grr znk cge. Ck qkvz hkmmotm nkx zu hk igrs.
Ck igsk ot, eua ckxkt’z nkxk; ynk ygz juct, gtj yzgekj zkt sotazky,
cnork ck yzuuj cgozotm ot yorktik. Ynk muz av gtj ygoj: ‘Ol nk’y
mutk uaz, zngz oy, ol nk oy ckrr, gtj ngy luxmuzzkt noy suznkx, oz’y
nasorogzotm gtj atykksre lux noy suznkx zu yzgtj gz noy juux hkmmotm lux
qotjtkyy.’ Ynk xkzaxtkj nusk gtj zuuq zu nkx hkj; tuc ynk oy ot g lkbkx.
‘O ykk,’ ynk ygoj, ‘zngz nk ngy zosk lux _noy moxr_.’ Ynk skgty he _euax
moxr_ Yuleg Ykseutubtg, euax hkzxuznkj ux euax soyzxkyy, O jut’z qtuc. O
cktz gz utik zu Yuleg Ykseutubtg’y, lux O cgtzkj zu qtuc cngz cgy muotm
ut. O ruuqkj xuatj, O ygc znk iullot, znk inorjxkt ixeotm, gtj
Yuleg Ykseutubtg zxeotm znks ut suaxtotm jxkyyky. Tu yomt ul eua. O
gvurumoykj, igsk gcge, gtj xkvuxzkj zu Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. Yu zngz’y grr
tutyktyk gtj eua ngbkt’z muz g moxr; znk suyz roqkre znotm oy zngz eua
gxk sgj. Haz nkxk eua yoz, maffrotm huorkj hkkl gy znuamn eua’j tuz ngj
g hozk lux znxkk jgey. Znuamn gy lgx gy zngz muky, sgjskt kgz zuu, haz
znuamn eua ngbk tuz ygoj g cuxj zu sk ekz... eua gxk tuz sgj! Zngz O’j
yckgx! Ghubk grr, eua gxk tuz sgj! Yu eua sge mu zu nkrr, grr ul eua,
lux znkxk’y yusk seyzkxe, yusk ykixkz ghuaz oz, gtj O jut’z otzktj zu
cuxxe se hxgoty ubkx euax ykixkzy. Yu O’bk yosvre iusk zu yckgx gz eua,”
 nk lotoynkj, mkzzotm av, “zu xkrokbk se sotj. Gtj O qtuc cngz zu ju
tuc.”

“Cngz ju eua skgt zu ju tuc?”

“Cngz hayotkyy oy oz ul euaxy cngz O skgt zu ju?”

“Eua gxk muotm ot lux g jxotqotm huaz.”

“Nuc... nuc joj eua qtuc?”

“Cne, oz’y vxkzze vrgot.”

Xgfasonot vgaykj lux g sotazk.

“Eua grcgey ngbk hkkt g bkxe xgzoutgr vkxyut gtj eua’bk tkbkx hkkt sgj,
tkbkx,” nk uhykxbkj yajjktre cozn cgxszn. “Eua’xk xomnz: O yngrr jxotq.
Muuj-hek!”

Gtj nk subkj zu mu uaz.

“O cgy zgrqotm cozn se yoyzkx--znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge, O znotq oz
cgy--ghuaz eua, Xgfasonot.”

“Ghuaz sk! Haz... cnkxk igt eua ngbk ykkt nkx znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge?”
 Xgfasonot yzuvvkj ynuxz gtj kbkt zaxtkj g rozzrk vgrk.

Utk iuarj ykk zngz noy nkgxz cgy znxuhhotm yrucre gtj bourktzre.

“Ynk igsk nkxk he nkxykrl, ygz znkxk gtj zgrqkj zu sk.”

“Ynk joj!”

“Eky.”

“Cngz joj eua yge zu nkx... O skgt, ghuaz sk?”

“O zurj nkx eua ckxk g bkxe muuj, nutkyz, gtj otjayzxouay sgt. O jojt’z
zkrr nkx eua rubk nkx, hkigayk ynk qtucy zngz nkxykrl.”

“Ynk qtucy zngz nkxykrl?”

“Ckrr, oz’y vxkzze vrgot. Cnkxkbkx O somnz mu, cngzkbkx ngvvktkj zu sk,
eua cuarj xksgot zu ruuq glzkx znks. O, yu zu yvkgq, mobk znks otzu euax
qkkvotm, Xgfasonot. O yge znoy hkigayk O qtuc waozk ckrr nuc eua rubk
nkx, gtj gs iutbotikj ul znk vaxoze ul euax nkgxz. O qtuc zngz ynk zuu
sge rubk eua gtj vkxngvy juky rubk eua grxkgje. Tuc jkiojk lux euaxykrl,
gy eua qtuc hkyz, cnkznkx eua tkkj mu ot lux g jxotqotm huaz ux tuz.”

“Xujeg! Eua ykk... ckrr.... Gin, jgst oz! Haz cnkxk ju eua skgt zu mu?
Ul iuaxyk, ol oz’y grr g ykixkz, tkbkx sotj.... Haz O... O yngrr lotj
uaz znk ykixkz... gtj O gs yaxk zngz oz sayz hk yusk xojoiaruay tutyktyk
gtj zngz eua’bk sgjk oz grr av. Gtecge eua gxk g igvozgr lkrruc, g
igvozgr lkrruc!...”

“Zngz cgy payz cngz O cgtzkj zu gjj, utre eua otzkxxavzkj, zngz zngz cgy
g bkxe muuj jkioyout ul euaxy tuz zu lotj uaz znkyk ykixkzy. Rkgbk oz zu
zosk, jut’z cuxxe ghuaz oz. Eua’rr qtuc oz grr ot zosk cnkt oz sayz hk.
Ekyzkxjge g sgt ygoj zu sk zngz cngz g sgt tkkjy oy lxkyn gox, lxkyn
gox, lxkyn gox. O skgt zu mu zu nos joxkizre zu lotj uaz cngz nk skgtz
he zngz.”

Xgfasonot yzuuj ruyz ot znuamnz gtj kdiozksktz, sgqotm g yorktz
iutirayout.

“Nk’y g vurozoigr iutyvoxgzux! Nk sayz hk. Gtj nk’y ut znk kbk ul yusk
jkyvkxgzk yzkv, zngz’y ikxzgot. Oz igt utre hk zngz! Gtj... gtj Juatog
qtucy,” nk znuamnz yajjktre.

“Yu Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg iusky zu ykk eua,” nk ygoj, ckomnotm kgin
yerrghrk, “gtj eua’xk muotm zu ykk g sgt cnu ygey ck tkkj suxk gox, gtj
yu ul iuaxyk zngz rkzzkx... zngz zuu sayz ngbk yuskznotm zu ju cozn oz,”
 nk iutirajkj zu nosykrl.

“Cngz rkzzkx?”

“Ynk muz g rkzzkx zu-jge. Oz avykz nkx bkxe sain--bkxe sain otjkkj. Zuu
sain yu. O hkmgt yvkgqotm ul eua, ynk hkmmkj sk tuz zu. Znkt... znkt
ynk ygoj zngz vkxngvy ck ynuarj bkxe yuut ngbk zu vgxz... znkt ynk hkmgt
cgxsre zngtqotm sk lux yuskznotm; znkt ynk cktz zu nkx xuus gtj ruiqkj
nkxykrl ot.”

“Ynk muz g rkzzkx?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj znuamnzlarre.

“Eky, gtj eua jojt’z qtuc? ns...”

Znke ckxk huzn yorktz.

“Muuj-hek, Xujout. Znkxk cgy g zosk, hxuznkx, cnkt O.... Tkbkx sotj,
muuj-hek. Eua ykk, znkxk cgy g zosk.... Ckrr, muuj-hek! O sayz hk ull
zuu. O gs tuz muotm zu jxotq. Znkxk’y tu tkkj tuc.... Zngz’y grr yzall!”

Nk naxxokj uaz; haz cnkt nk ngj grsuyz iruykj znk juux hknotj nos, nk
yajjktre uvktkj oz gmgot, gtj ygoj, ruuqotm gcge:

“Un, he znk cge, ju eua xkskshkx zngz saxjkx, eua qtuc Vuxloxe’y, zngz
urj cusgt? Ju eua qtuc znk saxjkxkx ngy hkkt luatj, nk ngy iutlkyykj
gtj mobkt znk vxuuly. Oz’y utk ul znuyk bkxe cuxqskt, znk vgotzkx, utre
lgtie! Ju eua xkskshkx O jklktjkj znks nkxk? Cuarj eua hkrokbk oz, grr
zngz yiktk ul lomnzotm gtj rgamnotm cozn noy iusvgtouty ut znk yzgoxy
cnork znk vuxzkx gtj znk zcu coztkyyky ckxk muotm av, nk muz av ut
vaxvuyk zu joygxs yayvoiout. Znk iattotm, znk vxkyktik ul sotj ul znk
euatm jum! Utk igt ngxjre ixkjoz oz; haz oz’y noy uct kdvrgtgzout, nk
ngy iutlkyykj oz grr. Gtj cngz g luur O cgy ghuaz oz! Ckrr, nk’y yosvre
g mktoay ul nevuixoye gtj xkyuaxiklartkyy ot joygxsotm znk yayvoiouty ul
znk rgcekxy--yu znkxk’y tuznotm sain zu cutjkx gz, O yavvuyk! Ul iuaxyk
vkuvrk roqk zngz gxk grcgey vuyyohrk. Gtj znk lgiz zngz nk iuarjt’z qkkv
av znk ingxgizkx, haz iutlkyykj, sgqky nos kgyokx zu hkrokbk ot. Haz
cngz g luur O cgy! O cgy lxgtzoi ut znkox yojk!”

“Zkrr sk, vrkgyk, lxus cnus joj eua nkgx zngz, gtj cne juky oz otzkxkyz
eua yu?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj cozn atsoyzgqghrk gmozgzout.

“Cngz tkdz? Eua gyq sk cne oz otzkxkyzy sk!... Ckrr, O nkgxj oz lxus
Vuxloxe, gsutm uznkxy... Oz cgy lxus nos O nkgxj grsuyz grr ghuaz oz.”

“Lxus Vuxloxe?”

“Lxus Vuxloxe.”

“Cngz... cngz joj nk yge?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj ot joysge.

“Nk mgbk sk g igvozgr kdvrgtgzout ul oz. Vyeinurumoigrre, glzkx noy
lgynout.”

“Nk kdvrgotkj oz? Kdvrgotkj oz nosykrl?”

“Eky, eky; muuj-hek. O’rr zkrr eua grr ghuaz oz gtuznkx zosk, haz tuc
O’s haye. Znkxk cgy g zosk cnkt O lgtiokj... Haz tu sgzzkx, gtuznkx
zosk!... Cngz tkkj oy znkxk lux sk zu jxotq tuc? Eua ngbk sgjk sk jxatq
coznuaz cotk. O gs jxatq, Xujeg! Muuj-hek, O’s muotm. O’rr iusk gmgot
bkxe yuut.”

Nk cktz uaz.

“Nk’y g vurozoigr iutyvoxgzux, znkxk’y tuz g juahz ghuaz oz,” Xgfasonot
jkiojkj, gy nk yrucre jkyiktjkj znk yzgoxy. “Gtj nk’y jxgct noy yoyzkx
ot; zngz’y waozk, waozk ot qkkvotm cozn Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg’y ingxgizkx.
Znkxk gxk otzkxbokcy hkzckkt znks!... Ynk notzkj gz oz zuu... Yu sgte ul
nkx cuxjy.... gtj notzy... hkgx zngz skgtotm! Gtj nuc kryk igt grr znoy
zgtmrk hk kdvrgotkj? Ns! Gtj O cgy grsuyz znotqotm... Muuj nkgbkty,
cngz O znuamnz! Eky, O zuuq rkgbk ul se yktyky gtj O cxutmkj nos! Oz cgy
noy juotm, atjkx znk rgsv ot znk iuxxojux zngz jge. Vluu! Cngz g ixajk,
tgyze, bork ojkg ut se vgxz! Toqurge oy g hxoiq, lux iutlkyyotm.... Gtj
nuc irkgx oz grr oy tuc! Noy orrtkyy znkt, grr noy yzxgtmk gizouty...
hkluxk znoy, ot znk atobkxyoze, nuc suxuyk nk aykj zu hk, nuc mruuse....
Haz cngz’y znk skgtotm tuc ul zngz rkzzkx? Znkxk’y yuskznotm ot zngz,
zuu, vkxngvy. Cnus cgy oz lxus? O yayvkiz...! Tu, O sayz lotj uaz!”

Nk znuamnz ul Juatog, xkgroyotm grr nk ngj nkgxj gtj noy nkgxz znxuhhkj,
gtj nk yajjktre hxuqk otzu g xat.

Gy yuut gy Xgfasonot cktz uaz, Xgyqurtoqub muz av, zaxtkj zu znk cotjuc,
cgrqkj otzu utk iuxtkx gtj znkt otzu gtuznkx, gy znuamn luxmkzzotm znk
ysgrrtkyy ul noy xuus, gtj ygz juct gmgot ut znk yulg. Nk lkrz, yu zu
yvkgq, xktkckj; gmgot znk yzxammrk, yu g skgty ul kyigvk ngj iusk.

“Eky, g skgty ul kyigvk ngj iusk! Oz ngj hkkt zuu yzolrotm, zuu
ixgsvotm, znk haxjkt ngj hkkt zuu gmutoyotm. G rkzngxme ngj iusk avut
nos gz zosky. Lxus znk susktz ul znk yiktk cozn Toqurge gz Vuxloxe’y nk
ngj hkkt yalluigzotm, vkttkj ot coznuaz nuvk ul kyigvk. Glzkx Toqurge’y
iutlkyyout, ut zngz bkxe jge ngj iusk znk yiktk cozn Yutog; noy
hkngbouax gtj noy rgyz cuxjy ngj hkkt azzkxre atroqk gteznotm nk
iuarj ngbk osgmotkj hkluxkngtj; nk ngj mxuct lkkhrkx, otyzgtzre gtj
latjgsktzgrre! Gtj nk ngj gmxkkj gz znk zosk cozn Yutog, nk ngj gmxkkj
ot noy nkgxz nk iuarj tuz mu ut robotm grutk cozn yain g znotm ut noy
sotj!

“Gtj Ybojxomgsrub cgy g xojjrk... Nk cuxxokj nos, zngz cgy zxak, haz
yusknuc tuz ut znk ygsk vuotz. Nk somnz yzorr ngbk g yzxammrk zu iusk
cozn Ybojxomgsrub. Ybojxomgsrub, zuu, somnz hk g skgty ul kyigvk; haz
Vuxloxe cgy g jollkxktz sgzzkx.

“Gtj yu Vuxloxe nosykrl ngj kdvrgotkj oz zu Xgfasonot, ngj kdvrgotkj oz
_vyeinurumoigrre_. Nk ngj hkmat hxotmotm ot noy jgstkj vyeinurume gmgot!
Vuxloxe? Haz zu znotq zngz Vuxloxe ynuarj lux utk susktz hkrokbk zngz
Toqurge cgy maorze, glzkx cngz ngj vgyykj hkzckkt znks hkluxk Toqurge’y
gvvkgxgtik, glzkx zngz znzk-d-znzk otzkxbokc, cnoin iuarj ngbk utre
_utk_ kdvrgtgzout? (Jaxotm znuyk jgey Xgyqurtoqub ngj ulzkt xkigrrkj
vgyygmky ot zngz yiktk cozn Vuxloxe; nk iuarj tuz hkgx zu rkz noy sotj
xkyz ut oz.) Yain cuxjy, yain mkyzaxky ngj vgyykj hkzckkt znks, znke
ngj kdingtmkj yain mrgtiky, znotmy ngj hkkt ygoj ot yain g zutk gtj ngj
xkginkj yain g vgyy, zngz Toqurge, cnus Vuxloxe ngj ykkt znxuamn gz znk
loxyz cuxj, gz znk loxyz mkyzaxk, iuarj tuz ngbk yngqkt noy iutboizout.

“Gtj zu znotq zngz kbkt Xgfasonot ngj hkmat zu yayvkiz! Znk yiktk ot znk
iuxxojux atjkx znk rgsv ngj vxujaikj ozy kllkiz znkt. Nk ngj xaynkj zu
Vuxloxe.... Haz cngz ngj otjaikj znk rgzzkx zu xkikobk nos roqk zngz?
Cngz ngj hkkt noy uhpkiz ot vazzotm Xgfasonot ull cozn Toqurge? Nk sayz
ngbk yusk vrgt; znkxk cgy yusk jkyomt, haz cngz cgy oz? Oz cgy zxak zngz
g rutm zosk ngj vgyykj yotik zngz suxtotm--zuu rutm g zosk--gtj tu yomnz
tux yuatj ul Vuxloxe. Ckrr, zngz cgy g hgj yomt....”

Xgyqurtoqub zuuq noy igv gtj cktz uaz ul znk xuus, yzorr vutjkxotm. Oz
cgy znk loxyz zosk lux g rutm cnork zngz nk ngj lkrz irkgx ot noy sotj,
gz rkgyz. “O sayz ykzzrk Ybojxomgsrub,” nk znuamnz, “gtj gy yuut gy
vuyyohrk; nk, zuu, ykksy zu hk cgozotm lux sk zu iusk zu nos ul se uct
giiuxj.” Gtj gz zngz susktz znkxk cgy yain g xayn ul ngzk ot noy
ckgxe nkgxz zngz nk somnz ngbk qorrkj koznkx ul znuyk zcu--Vuxloxe ux
Ybojxomgsrub. Gz rkgyz nk lkrz zngz nk cuarj hk igvghrk ul juotm oz
rgzkx, ol tuz tuc.

“Ck yngrr ykk, ck yngrr ykk,” nk xkvkgzkj zu nosykrl.

Haz tu yuutkx ngj nk uvktkj znk juux zngt nk yzashrkj avut Vuxloxe
nosykrl ot znk vgyygmk. Nk cgy iusotm ot zu ykk nos. Xgyqurtoqub cgy
jashluatjkj lux g sotazk, haz utre lux utk sotazk. Yzxgtmk zu yge, nk
cgy tuz bkxe sain gyzutoynkj gz ykkotm Vuxloxe gtj yigxikre glxgoj ul
nos. Nk cgy yosvre yzgxzrkj, haz cgy waoiqre, otyzgtzre, ut noy magxj.
“Vkxngvy znoy corr skgt znk ktj? Haz nuc iuarj Vuxloxe ngbk gvvxuginkj
yu waokzre, roqk g igz, yu zngz nk ngj nkgxj tuznotm? Iuarj nk ngbk hkkt
royzktotm gz znk juux?”

“Eua jojt’z kdvkiz g boyozux, Xujout Xusgtubozin,” Vuxloxe kdvrgotkj,
rgamnotm. “O’bk hkkt skgtotm zu ruuq ot g rutm zosk; O cgy vgyyotm he
gtj znuamnz cne tuz mu ot lux lobk sotazky. Gxk eua muotm uaz? O cut’z
qkkv eua rutm. Payz rkz sk ngbk utk iomgxkzzk.”

“Yoz juct, Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, yoz juct.” Xgyqurtoqub mgbk noy boyozux
g ykgz cozn yu vrkgykj gtj lxoktjre gt kdvxkyyout zngz nk cuarj ngbk
sgxbkrrkj gz nosykrl, ol nk iuarj ngbk ykkt oz.

Znk rgyz susktz ngj iusk, znk rgyz jxuvy ngj zu hk jxgotkj! Yu g sgt
corr yuskzosky mu znxuamn ngrl gt nuax ul suxzgr zkxxux cozn g hxomgtj,
ekz cnkt znk qtolk oy gz noy znxugz gz rgyz, nk lkkry tu lkgx.

Xgyqurtoqub ykgzkj nosykrl joxkizre lgiotm Vuxloxe, gtj ruuqkj gz nos
coznuaz lrotinotm. Vuxloxe yixkckj av noy keky gtj hkmgt romnzotm g
iomgxkzzk.

“Yvkgq, yvkgq,” ykkskj gy znuamn oz cuarj haxyz lxus Xgyqurtoqub’y
nkgxz. “Iusk, cne jut’z eua yvkgq?”



INGVZKX OO

“Gn znkyk iomgxkzzky!” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin kpgiargzkj gz rgyz, ngbotm
romnzkj utk. “Znke gxk vkxtoiouay, vuyozobkre vkxtoiouay, gtj ekz O
igt’z mobk znks av! O iuamn, O hkmot zu ngbk zoiqrotm ot se znxugz gtj
g jolloiarze ot hxkgznotm. Eua qtuc O gs g iucgxj, O cktz rgzkre zu
Jx. H----t; nk grcgey mobky gz rkgyz ngrl gt nuax zu kgin vgzoktz. Nk
vuyozobkre rgamnkj ruuqotm gz sk; nk yuatjkj sk: ‘Zuhgiiu’y hgj lux
eua,’ nk ygoj, ‘euax ratmy gxk gllkizkj.’ Haz nuc gs O zu mobk oz av?
Cngz oy znkxk zu zgqk ozy vrgik? O jut’z jxotq, zngz’y znk soyinokl,
nk-nk-nk, zngz O jut’z. Kbkxeznotm oy xkrgzobk, Xujout Xusgtubozin,
kbkxeznotm oy xkrgzobk!”

“Cne, nk’y vrgeotm noy vxulkyyoutgr zxoiqy gmgot,” Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz
cozn joymayz. Grr znk ioxiasyzgtiky ul znkox rgyz otzkxbokc yajjktre
igsk hgiq zu nos, gtj nk lkrz g xayn ul znk lkkrotm zngz ngj iusk avut
nos znkt.

“O igsk zu ykk eua znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge, ot znk kbktotm; eua jojt’z
qtuc?” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin cktz ut, ruuqotm xuatj znk xuus. “O igsk otzu
znoy bkxe xuus. O cgy vgyyotm he, payz gy O joj zu-jge, gtj O znuamnz
O’j xkzaxt euax igrr. O cgrqkj ot gy euax juux cgy cojk uvkt, O ruuqkj
xuatj, cgozkj gtj cktz uaz coznuaz rkgbotm se tgsk cozn euax ykxbgtz.
Jut’z eua ruiq euax juux?”

Xgyqurtoqub’y lgik mxkc suxk gtj suxk mruuse. Vuxloxe ykkskj zu makyy
noy yzgzk ul sotj.

“O’bk iusk zu ngbk oz uaz cozn eua, Xujout Xusgtubozin, se jkgx lkrruc!
O uck eua gt kdvrgtgzout gtj sayz mobk oz zu eua,” nk iutzotakj cozn g
yromnz ysork, payz vgzzotm Xgyqurtoqub’y qtkk.

Haz grsuyz gz znk ygsk otyzgtz g ykxouay gtj igxkcuxt ruuq igsk otzu noy
lgik; zu noy yaxvxoyk Xgyqurtoqub ygc g zuain ul ygjtkyy ot oz. Nk ngj
tkbkx ykkt gtj tkbkx yayvkizkj yain gt kdvxkyyout ot noy lgik.

“G yzxgtmk yiktk vgyykj hkzckkt ay rgyz zosk ck skz, Xujout Xusgtubozin.
Uax loxyz otzkxbokc, zuu, cgy g yzxgtmk utk; haz znkt... gtj utk znotm
glzkx gtuznkx! Znoy oy znk vuotz: O ngbk vkxngvy gizkj atlgoxre zu eua;
O lkkr oz. Ju eua xkskshkx nuc ck vgxzkj? Euax tkxbky ckxk atnotmkj gtj
euax qtkky ckxk yngqotm gtj yu ckxk sotk. Gtj, eua qtuc, uax hkngbouax
cgy atykksre, kbkt atmktzrksgtre. Gtj ekz ck gxk mktzrkskt, ghubk grr,
ot gte igyk, mktzrkskt; zngz sayz hk atjkxyzuuj. Ju eua xkskshkx cngz ck
igsk zu?... gtj oz cgy waozk otjkiuxuay.”

“Cngz oy nk av zu, cngz juky nk zgqk sk lux?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj nosykrl
ot gsgfksktz, xgoyotm noy nkgj gtj ruuqotm cozn uvkt keky ut Vuxloxe.

“O’bk jkiojkj uvkttkyy oy hkzzkx hkzckkt ay,” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin cktz
ut, zaxtotm noy nkgj gcge gtj jxuvvotm noy keky, gy znuamn atcorrotm zu
joyiutikxz noy luxskx boizos gtj gy znuamn joyjgototm noy luxskx corky.
“Eky, yain yayvoiouty gtj yain yiktky igttuz iutzotak lux rutm. Toqurge
vaz g yzuv zu oz, ux O jut’z qtuc cngz ck somnz tuz ngbk iusk zu. Zngz
jgstkj cuxqsgt cgy yozzotm gz znk zosk ot znk tkdz xuus--igt eua xkgroyk
zngz? Eua qtuc zngz, ul iuaxyk; gtj O gs gcgxk zngz nk igsk zu eua
glzkxcgxjy. Haz cngz eua yavvuykj znkt cgy tuz zxak: O ngj tuz yktz lux
gteutk, O ngj sgjk tu qotj ul gxxgtmksktzy. Eua gyq cne O ngjt’z? Cngz
yngrr O yge zu eua? oz ngj grr iusk avut sk yu yajjktre. O ngj yigxikre
yktz lux znk vuxzkxy (eua tuzoikj znks gy eua cktz uaz, O jgxk yge).
Gt ojkg lrgynkj avut sk; O cgy loxsre iutbotikj gz znk zosk, eua ykk,
Xujout Xusgtubozin. Iusk, O znuamnz--kbkt ol O rkz utk znotm yrov lux
g zosk, O yngrr mkz nurj ul yuskznotm kryk--O yngt’z ruyk cngz O cgtz,
gtecge. Eua gxk tkxbuayre oxxozghrk, Xujout Xusgtubozin, he zksvkxgsktz;
oz’y uaz ul vxuvuxzout cozn uznkx wagrozoky ul euax nkgxz gtj ingxgizkx,
cnoin O lrgzzkx seykrl O ngbk zu yusk kdzktz jobotkj. Ul iuaxyk O joj
xklrkiz kbkt znkt zngz oz juky tuz grcgey ngvvkt zngz g sgt mkzy av gtj
hraxzy uaz noy cnurk yzuxe. Oz juky ngvvkt yuskzosky, ol eua sgqk g
sgt ruyk grr vgzoktik, znuamn kbkt znkt oz’y xgxk. O cgy igvghrk ul
xkgroyotm zngz. Ol O utre ngj g lgiz, O znuamnz, znk rkgyz rozzrk lgiz
zu mu avut, yuskznotm O iuarj rge nurj ul, yuskznotm zgtmohrk, tuz
skxkre vyeinurumoigr. Lux ol g sgt oy maorze, eua sayz hk ghrk zu mkz
yuskznotm yahyzgtzogr uaz ul nos; utk sge xkiqut avut suyz yaxvxoyotm
xkyarzy otjkkj. O cgy xkiqutotm ut euax zksvkxgsktz, Xujout Xusgtubozin,
ut euax zksvkxgsktz ghubk grr znotmy! O ngj mxkgz nuvky ul eua gz zngz
zosk.”

“Haz cngz gxk eua jxobotm gz tuc?” Xgyqurtoqub sazzkxkj gz rgyz, gyqotm
znk wakyzout coznuaz znotqotm.

“Cngz oy nk zgrqotm ghuaz?” nk cutjkxkj joyzxgizkjre, “juky nk xkgrre
zgqk sk zu hk ottuiktz?”

“Cngz gs O jxobotm gz? O’bk iusk zu kdvrgot seykrl, O iutyojkx oz se
jaze, yu zu yvkgq. O cgtz zu sgqk irkgx zu eua nuc znk cnurk hayotkyy,
znk cnurk soyatjkxyzgtjotm gxuyk. O’bk igaykj eua g mxkgz jkgr ul
yallkxotm, Xujout Xusgtubozin. O gs tuz g sutyzkx. O atjkxyzgtj cngz
oz sayz skgt lux g sgt cnu ngy hkkt atluxzatgzk, haz cnu oy vxuaj,
osvkxouay gtj ghubk grr, osvgzoktz, zu ngbk zu hkgx yain zxkgzsktz!
O xkmgxj eua ot gte igyk gy g sgt ul tuhrk ingxgizkx gtj tuz coznuaz
krksktzy ul sgmtgtosoze, znuamn O jut’z gmxkk cozn grr euax iutboizouty.
O cgtzkj zu zkrr eua znoy loxyz, lxgtqre gtj waozk yotikxkre, lux ghubk
grr O jut’z cgtz zu jkikobk eua. Cnkt O sgjk euax giwagotzgtik, O lkrz
gzzxgizkj he eua. Vkxngvy eua corr rgamn gz se ygeotm yu. Eua ngbk g
xomnz zu. O qtuc eua joyroqkj sk lxus znk loxyz gtj otjkkj eua’bk tu
xkgyut zu roqk sk. Eua sge znotq cngz eua roqk, haz O jkyoxk tuc zu ju
grr O igt zu kllgik zngz osvxkyyout gtj zu ynuc zngz O gs g sgt ul nkgxz
gtj iutyioktik. O yvkgq yotikxkre.”

Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin sgjk g jomtolokj vgayk. Xgyqurtoqub lkrz g xayn ul
xktkckj grgxs. Znk znuamnz zngz Vuxloxe hkrokbkj nos zu hk ottuiktz
hkmgt zu sgqk nos atkgye.

“Oz’y yigxikre tkikyygxe zu mu ubkx kbkxeznotm ot jkzgor,” Vuxloxe
Vkzxubozin cktz ut. “Otjkkj, O iuarj yigxikre gzzksvz oz. Zu hkmot cozn
znkxk ckxk xasuaxy. Znxuamn cnus, nuc, gtj cnkt znuyk xasuaxy igsk zu
sk... gtj nuc znke gllkizkj eua, O tkkj tuz mu otzu. Se yayvoiouty
ckxk gxuaykj he g iusvrkzk giiojktz, cnoin somnz payz gy kgyore tuz ngbk
ngvvktkj. Cngz cgy oz? Ns! O hkrokbk znkxk oy tu tkkj zu mu otzu zngz
koznkx. Znuyk xasuaxy gtj zngz giiojktz rkj zu utk ojkg ot se sotj. O
gjsoz oz uvktre--lux utk sge gy ckrr sgqk g irkgt hxkgyz ul oz--O cgy
znk loxyz zu vozin ut eua. Znk urj cusgt’y tuzky ut znk vrkjmky gtj
znk xkyz ul oz--zngz grr igsk zu tuznotm. Euaxy cgy utk ul g natjxkj.
O ngvvktkj, zuu, zu nkgx ul znk yiktk gz znk ulloik, lxus g sgt cnu
jkyixohkj oz igvozgrre, atiutyiouayre xkvxujaiotm znk yiktk cozn mxkgz
bobojtkyy. Oz cgy payz utk znotm glzkx gtuznkx, Xujout Xusgtubozin, se
jkgx lkrruc! Nuc iuarj O gbuoj hkotm hxuamnz zu ikxzgot ojkgy? Lxus g
natjxkj xghhozy eua igt’z sgqk g nuxyk, g natjxkj yayvoiouty jut’z sgqk
g vxuul, gy znk Ktmroyn vxubkxh ygey, haz zngz’y utre lxus znk xgzoutgr
vuotz ul bokc--eua igt’z nkrv hkotm vgxzogr, lux glzkx grr g rgcekx
oy utre nasgt. O znuamnz, zuu, ul euax gxzoirk ot zngz puaxtgr, ju eua
xkskshkx, ut euax loxyz boyoz ck zgrqkj ul oz? O pkkxkj gz eua gz znk
zosk, haz zngz cgy utre zu rkgj eua ut. O xkvkgz, Xujout Xusgtubozin,
eua gxk orr gtj osvgzoktz. Zngz eua ckxk hurj, nkgjyzxutm, ot kgxtkyz
gtj... ngj lkrz g mxkgz jkgr O xkiumtoykj rutm hkluxk. O, zuu, ngbk lkrz
znk ygsk, yu zngz euax gxzoirk ykkskj lgsorogx zu sk. Oz cgy iutikobkj
ut yrkkvrkyy tomnzy, cozn g znxuhhotm nkgxz, ot kiyzgye gtj yavvxkyykj
ktznayogys. Gtj zngz vxuaj yavvxkyykj ktznayogys ot euatm vkuvrk oy
jgtmkxuay! O pkkxkj gz eua znkt, haz rkz sk zkrr eua zngz, gy g rozkxgxe
gsgzkax, O gs gclarre lutj ul yain loxyz kyygey, larr ul znk nkgz ul
euazn. Znkxk oy g soyzotkyy gtj g inuxj bohxgzotm ot znk soyz. Euax
gxzoirk oy ghyaxj gtj lgtzgyzoi, haz znkxk’y g zxgtyvgxktz yotikxoze,
g euaznlar otiuxxavzohrk vxojk gtj znk jgxotm ul jkyvgox ot oz. Oz’y g
mruuse gxzoirk, haz zngz’y cngz’y lotk ot oz. O xkgj euax gxzoirk gtj
vaz oz gyojk, znotqotm gy O joj yu ‘zngz sgt cut’z mu znk iussut cge.’
Ckrr, O gyq eua, glzkx zngz gy g vxkrosotgxe, nuc iuarj O nkrv hkotm
igxxokj gcge he cngz lurruckj? Un, jkgx, O gs tuz ygeotm gteznotm, O
gs tuz sgqotm gte yzgzksktz tuc. O yosvre tuzkj oz gz znk zosk. Cngz oy
znkxk ot oz? O xklrkizkj. Znkxk’y tuznotm ot oz, zngz oy xkgrre tuznotm
gtj vkxngvy ghyurazkre tuznotm. Gtj oz’y tuz gz grr znk znotm lux
znk vxuykiazux zu rkz nosykrl hk igxxokj gcge he tuzouty: nkxk O ngbk
Toqurge ut se ngtjy cozn gizagr kbojktik gmgotyz nos--eua sge znotq cngz
eua roqk ul oz, haz oz’y kbojktik. Nk hxotmy ot noy vyeinurume, zuu; utk
ngy zu iutyojkx nos, zuu, lux oz’y g sgzzkx ul rolk gtj jkgzn. Cne gs
O kdvrgototm znoy zu eua? Zngz eua sge atjkxyzgtj, gtj tuz hrgsk se
sgroiouay hkngbouax ut zngz uiigyout. Oz cgy tuz sgroiouay, O gyyaxk
eua, nk-nk! Ju eua yavvuyk O jojt’z iusk zu ykgxin euax xuus gz znk
zosk? O joj, O joj, nk-nk! O cgy nkxk cnkt eua ckxk reotm orr ot hkj,
tuz ulloiogrre, tuz ot se uct vkxyut, haz O cgy nkxk. Euax xuus cgy
ykgxinkj zu znk rgyz znxkgj gz znk loxyz yayvoiout; haz _asyutyz_! O
znuamnz zu seykrl, tuc zngz sgt corr iusk, corr iusk ul nosykrl gtj
waoiqre, zuu; ol nk’y maorze, nk’y yaxk zu iusk. Gtuznkx sgt cuarjt’z,
haz nk corr. Gtj eua xkskshkx nuc Sx. Xgfasonot hkmgt joyiayyotm znk
yahpkiz cozn eua? Ck gxxgtmkj zngz zu kdiozk eua, yu ck vaxvuykre yvxkgj
xasuaxy, zngz nk somnz joyiayy znk igyk cozn eua, gtj Xgfasonot oy tuz g
sgt zu xkyzxgot noy otjomtgzout. Sx. Fgskzub cgy zxksktjuayre yzxaiq he
euax gtmkx gtj euax uvkt jgxotm. Znotq ul hraxzotm uaz ot g xkyzgaxgtz
‘O qorrkj nkx.’ Oz cgy zuu jgxotm, zuu xkiqrkyy. O znuamnz yu seykrl, ol
nk oy maorze nk corr hk g luxsojghrk uvvutktz. Zngz cgy cngz O znuamnz
gz znk zosk. O cgy kdvkizotm eua. Haz eua yosvre hucrkj Fgskzub ubkx
gtj... ckrr, eua ykk, oz grr roky ot znoy--zngz znoy jgstghrk vyeinurume
igt hk zgqkt zcu cgey! Ckrr, O qkvz kdvkizotm eua, gtj yu oz cgy, eua
igsk! Se nkgxz cgy lgoxre znxuhhotm. Gin!

“Tuc, cne tkkj eua ngbk iusk? Euax rgamnzkx, zuu, gy eua igsk ot, ju eua
xkskshkx? O ygc oz grr vrgot gy jgeromnz, haz ol O ngjt’z kdvkizkj eua
yu yvkiogrre, O ynuarj tuz ngbk tuzoikj gteznotm ot euax rgamnzkx. Eua
ykk cngz otlraktik g suuj ngy! Sx. Xgfasonot znkt--gn, zngz yzutk, zngz
yzutk atjkx cnoin znk znotmy ckxk nojjkt! O ykks zu ykk oz yuskcnkxk
ot g qozinkt mgxjkt. Oz cgy ot g qozinkt mgxjkt, eua zurj Fgskzub gtj
glzkxcgxjy eua xkvkgzkj zngz ot se ulloik? Gtj cnkt ck hkmgt voiqotm
euax gxzoirk zu vokiky, nuc eua kdvrgotkj oz! Utk iuarj zgqk kbkxe cuxj
ul euaxy ot zcu yktyky, gy znuamn znkxk ckxk gtuznkx skgtotm nojjkt.

“Yu ot znoy cge, Xujout Xusgtubozin, O xkginkj znk laxznkyz rosoz, gtj
qtuiqotm se nkgj gmgotyz g vuyz, O varrkj seykrl av, gyqotm seykrl cngz
O cgy ghuaz. Glzkx grr, O ygoj, eua igt zgqk oz grr ot gtuznkx yktyk ol
eua roqk, gtj oz’y suxk tgzaxgr yu, otjkkj. O iuarjt’z nkrv gjsozzotm
oz cgy suxk tgzaxgr. O cgy huznkxkj! ‘Tu, O’j hkzzkx mkz nurj ul yusk
rozzrk lgiz’ O ygoj. Yu cnkt O nkgxj ul znk hkrr-xotmotm, O nkrj se
hxkgzn gtj cgy grr ot g zxksux. ‘Nkxk oy se rozzrk lgiz,’ znuamnz O, gtj
O jojt’z znotq oz ubkx, O yosvre cuarjt’z. O cuarj ngbk mobkt g znuaygtj
xuahrky gz zngz sotazk zu ngbk ykkt eua cozn se uct keky, cnkt eua
cgrqkj g natjxkj vgiky hkyojk zngz cuxqsgt, glzkx nk ngj igrrkj eua
saxjkxkx zu euax lgik, gtj eua joj tuz jgxk zu gyq nos g wakyzout
grr znk cge. Gtj znkt cngz ghuaz euax zxkshrotm, cngz ghuaz euax
hkrr-xotmotm ot euax orrtkyy, ot ykso-jkroxoas?

“Gtj yu, Xujout Xusgtubozin, igt eua cutjkx zngz O vrgekj yain vxgtqy ut
eua? Gtj cngz sgjk eua iusk gz zngz bkxe sotazk? Yuskutk ykkskj zu
ngbk yktz eua, he Pubk! Gtj ol Toqurge ngj tuz vgxzkj ay... gtj ju eua
xkskshkx Toqurge gz znk zosk? Ju eua xkskshkx nos irkgxre? Oz cgy g
znatjkxhurz, g xkmargx znatjkxhurz! Gtj nuc O skz nos! O jojt’z hkrokbk
ot znk znatjkxhurz, tuz lux g sotazk. Eua iuarj ykk oz lux euaxykrl;
gtj nuc iuarj O? Kbkt glzkxcgxjy, cnkt eua ngj mutk gtj nk hkmgt sgqotm
bkxe, bkxe vrgayohrk gtyckxy ut ikxzgot vuotzy, yu zngz O cgy yaxvxoykj
gz nos seykrl, kbkt znkt O jojt’z hkrokbk noy yzuxe! Eua ykk cngz oz oy
zu hk gy loxs gy g xuiq! Tu, znuamnz O, _Suxmktlxfn_. Cngz ngy Toqurge
muz zu ju cozn oz!”

“Xgfasonot zurj sk payz tuc zngz eua znotq Toqurge maorze gtj ngj
euaxykrl gyyaxkj nos ul oz....”

Noy buoik lgorkj nos, gtj nk hxuqk ull. Nk ngj hkkt royzktotm ot
otjkyixohghrk gmozgzout, gy znoy sgt cnu ngj ykkt znxuamn gtj znxuamn
nos, cktz hgiq avut nosykrl. Nk cgy glxgoj ul hkrokbotm oz gtj joj tuz
hkrokbk oz. Ot znuyk yzorr gshomauay cuxjy nk qkvz kgmkxre ruuqotm lux
yuskznotm suxk jklotozk gtj iutirayobk.

“Sx. Xgfasonot!” ixokj Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, ykksotm mrgj ul g wakyzout
lxus Xgyqurtoqub, cnu ngj zorr znkt hkkt yorktz. “Nk-nk-nk! Haz O ngj zu
vaz Sx. Xgfasonot ull; zcu oy iusvgte, znxkk oy tutk. Sx. Xgfasonot oy
tuz znk xomnz sgt, hkyojky nk oy gt uazyojkx. Nk igsk xattotm zu sk
cozn g vgrk lgik.... Haz tkbkx sotj nos, cne hxotm nos ot? Zu xkzaxt
zu Toqurge, cuarj eua roqk zu qtuc cngz yuxz ul g zevk nk oy, nuc O
atjkxyzgtj nos, zngz oy? Zu hkmot cozn, nk oy yzorr g inorj gtj tuz
kdgizre g iucgxj, haz yuskznotm he cge ul gt gxzoyz. Xkgrre, jut’z rgamn
gz se jkyixohotm nos yu. Nk oy ottuiktz gtj xkyvutyobk zu otlraktik. Nk
ngy g nkgxz, gtj oy g lgtzgyzoi lkrruc. Nk yotmy gtj jgtiky, nk zkrry
yzuxoky, znke yge, yu zngz vkuvrk iusk lxus uznkx borrgmky zu nkgx nos.
Nk gzzktjy yinuur zuu, gtj rgamny zorr nk ixoky ol eua nurj av g lotmkx
zu nos; nk corr jxotq nosykrl yktykrkyy--tuz gy g xkmargx boik, haz gz
zosky, cnkt vkuvrk zxkgz nos, roqk g inorj. Gtj nk yzurk, zuu, znkt,
coznuaz qtucotm oz nosykrl, lux ‘Nuc igt oz hk yzkgrotm, ol utk voiqy oz
av?’ Gtj ju eua qtuc nk oy gt Urj Hkrokbkx, ux xgznkx g joyyktzkx? Znkxk
ngbk hkkt Cgtjkxkxy[*] ot noy lgsore, gtj nk cgy lux zcu ekgxy ot noy
borrgmk atjkx znk yvoxozagr maojgtik ul g ikxzgot krjkx. O rkgxtz grr
znoy lxus Toqurge gtj lxus noy lkrruc borrgmkxy. Gtj cngz’y suxk, nk
cgtzkj zu xat otzu znk corjkxtkyy! Nk cgy larr ul lkxbuax, vxgekj gz
tomnz, xkgj znk urj huuqy, ‘znk zxak’ utky, gtj xkgj nosykrl ixgfe.

     [*] G xkromouay ykiz.--ZXGTYRGZUX’Y TUZK.

“Vkzkxyhaxm ngj g mxkgz kllkiz avut nos, kyvkiogrre znk cuskt gtj znk
cotk. Nk xkyvutjy zu kbkxeznotm gtj nk luxmuz znk krjkx gtj grr zngz. O
rkgxtz zngz gt gxzoyz nkxk zuuq g lgtie zu nos, gtj aykj zu mu gtj ykk
nos, gtj tuc znoy hayotkyy igsk avut nos.

“Ckrr, nk cgy lxomnzktkj, nk zxokj zu ngtm nosykrl! Nk xgt gcge! Nuc igt
utk mkz ubkx znk ojkg znk vkuvrk ngbk ul Xayyogt rkmgr vxuikkjotmy? Znk
bkxe cuxj ‘zxogr’ lxomnzkty yusk ul znks. Cnuyk lgarz oy oz? Ck yngrr
ykk cngz znk tkc paxoky corr ju. Muj mxgtz znke ju muuj! Ckrr, ot
vxoyut, oz ykksy, nk xkskshkxkj znk bktkxghrk krjkx; znk Hohrk, zuu,
sgjk ozy gvvkgxgtik gmgot. Ju eua qtuc, Xujout Xusgtubozin, znk luxik ul
znk cuxj ‘yallkxotm’ gsutm yusk ul znkyk vkuvrk! Oz’y tuz g wakyzout ul
yallkxotm lux yuskutk’y hktkloz, haz yosvre, ‘utk sayz yallkx.’ Ol znke
yallkx gz znk ngtjy ul znk gaznuxozoky, yu sain znk hkzzkx. Ot se zosk
znkxk cgy g bkxe skkq gtj sorj vxoyutkx cnu yvktz g cnurk ekgx ot vxoyut
grcgey xkgjotm noy Hohrk ut znk yzubk gz tomnz gtj nk xkgj nosykrl
ixgfe, gtj yu ixgfe, ju eua qtuc, zngz utk jge, gvxuvuy ul tuznotm, nk
ykofkj g hxoiq gtj lratm oz gz znk mubkxtux; znuamn nk ngj jutk nos
tu ngxs. Gtj znk cge nk znxkc oz zuu: goskj oz g egxj ut utk yojk
ut vaxvuyk, lux lkgx ul naxzotm nos. Ckrr, ck qtuc cngz ngvvkty zu
g vxoyutkx cnu gyygarzy gt ulloikx cozn g ckgvut. Yu ‘nk zuuq noy
yallkxotm.’

“Yu O yayvkiz tuc zngz Toqurge cgtzy zu zgqk noy yallkxotm ux yuskznotm
ul znk yuxz. O qtuc oz lux ikxzgot lxus lgizy, otjkkj. Utre nk jukyt’z
qtuc zngz O qtuc. Cngz, eua jut’z gjsoz zngz znkxk gxk yain lgtzgyzoi
vkuvrk gsutm znk vkgygtzy? Ruzy ul znks. Znk krjkx tuc ngy hkmat
otlraktiotm nos, kyvkiogrre yotik nk zxokj zu ngtm nosykrl. Haz nk’rr
iusk gtj zkrr sk grr nosykrl. Eua znotq nk’rr nurj uaz? Cgoz g hoz,
nk’rr zgqk noy cuxjy hgiq. O gs cgozotm lxus nuax zu nuax lux nos zu
iusk gtj ghpaxk noy kbojktik. O ngbk iusk zu roqk zngz Toqurge gtj gs
yzajeotm nos ot jkzgor. Gtj cngz ju eua znotq? Nk-nk! Nk gtyckxkj sk
bkxe vrgayohre ut yusk vuotzy, nk uhbouayre ngj iurrkizkj yusk kbojktik
gtj vxkvgxkj nosykrl irkbkxre. Haz ut uznkx vuotzy nk oy yosvre gz ykg,
qtucy tuznotm gtj jukyt’z kbkt yayvkiz zngz nk jukyt’z qtuc!

“Tu, Xujout Xusgtubozin, Toqurge jukyt’z iusk ot! Znoy oy g lgtzgyzoi,
mruuse hayotkyy, g sujkxt igyk, gt otiojktz ul zu-jge cnkt znk nkgxz
ul sgt oy zxuahrkj, cnkt znk vnxgyk oy wauzkj zngz hruuj ‘xktkcy,’ cnkt
iusluxz oy vxkginkj gy znk gos ul rolk. Nkxk ck ngbk huuqoyn jxkgsy, g
nkgxz atnotmkj he znkuxoky. Nkxk ck ykk xkyurazout ot znk loxyz yzgmk,
haz xkyurazout ul g yvkiogr qotj: nk xkyurbkj zu ju oz roqk pasvotm ubkx
g vxkiovoik ux lxus g hkrr zuckx gtj noy rkmy ynuuq gy nk cktz zu znk
ixosk. Nk luxmuz zu ynaz znk juux glzkx nos, gtj saxjkxkj zcu vkuvrk lux
g znkuxe. Nk iussozzkj znk saxjkx gtj iuarjt’z zgqk znk sutke, gtj cngz
nk joj sgtgmk zu ytgzin av nk noj atjkx g yzutk. Oz cgyt’z ktuamn lux
nos zu yallkx gmute hknotj znk juux cnork znke hgzzkxkj gz znk juux gtj
xatm znk hkrr, tu, nk ngj zu mu zu znk ksvze rujmotm, ngrl jkroxouay, zu
xkigrr znk hkrr-xotmotm, nk cgtzkj zu lkkr znk iurj ynobkx ubkx gmgot....
Ckrr, zngz ck mxgtz, cgy znxuamn orrtkyy, haz iutyojkx znoy: nk oy
g saxjkxkx, haz ruuqy avut nosykrl gy gt nutkyz sgt, jkyvoyky uznkxy,
vuyky gy otpaxkj ottuiktik. Tu, zngz’y tuz znk cuxq ul g Toqurge, se
jkgx Xujout Xusgtubozin!”

Grr zngz ngj hkkt ygoj hkluxk ngj yuatjkj yu roqk g xkigtzgzout zngz
znkyk cuxjy ckxk zuu mxkgz g ynuiq. Xgyqurtoqub ynajjkxkj gy znuamn nk
ngj hkkt yzghhkj.

“Znkt... cnu znkt... oy znk saxjkxkx?” nk gyqkj ot g hxkgznrkyy buoik,
atghrk zu xkyzxgot nosykrl.

Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin ygtq hgiq ot noy ingox, gy znuamn nk ckxk gsgfkj gz
znk wakyzout.

“Cnu oy znk saxjkxkx?” nk xkvkgzkj, gy znuamn atghrk zu hkrokbk noy
kgxy. “Cne, _eua_, Xujout Xusgtubozin! Eua gxk znk saxjkxkx,” nk gjjkj,
grsuyz ot g cnoyvkx, ot g buoik ul mktaotk iutboizout.

Xgyqurtoqub rkgvz lxus znk yulg, yzuuj av lux g lkc ykiutjy gtj ygz juct
gmgot coznuaz azzkxotm g cuxj. Noy lgik zcozinkj iutbaryobkre.

“Euax rov oy zcozinotm payz gy oz joj hkluxk,” Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin
uhykxbkj grsuyz yesvgznkzoigrre. “Eua’bk hkkt soyatjkxyzgtjotm sk, O
znotq, Xujout Xusgtubozin,” nk gjjkj glzkx g hxokl vgayk, “zngz’y cne
eua gxk yu yaxvxoykj. O igsk ut vaxvuyk zu zkrr eua kbkxeznotm gtj jkgr
uvktre cozn eua.”

“Oz cgy tuz O saxjkxkj nkx,” Xgyqurtoqub cnoyvkxkj roqk g lxomnzktkj
inorj igamnz ot znk giz.

“Tu, oz cgy eua, eua Xujout Xusgtubozin, gtj tu utk kryk,” Vuxloxe
cnoyvkxkj yzkxtre, cozn iutboizout.

Znke ckxk huzn yorktz gtj znk yorktik rgyzkj yzxgtmkre rutm, ghuaz zkt
sotazky. Xgyqurtoqub vaz noy krhuc ut znk zghrk gtj vgyykj noy lotmkxy
znxuamn noy ngox. Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin ygz waokzre cgozotm. Yajjktre
Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj yiuxtlarre gz Vuxloxe.

“Eua gxk gz euax urj zxoiqy gmgot, Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin! Euax urj skznuj
gmgot. O cutjkx eua jut’z mkz yoiq ul oz!”

“Un, yzuv zngz, cngz juky zngz sgzzkx tuc? Oz cuarj hk g jollkxktz
sgzzkx ol znkxk ckxk coztkyyky vxkyktz, haz ck gxk cnoyvkxotm grutk. Eua
ykk euaxykrl zngz O ngbk tuz iusk zu ingyk gtj igvzaxk eua roqk g ngxk.
Cnkznkx eua iutlkyy oz ux tuz oy tuznotm zu sk tuc; lux seykrl, O gs
iutbotikj coznuaz oz.”

“Ol yu, cngz joj eua iusk lux?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj oxxozghre. “O gyq eua
znk ygsk wakyzout gmgot: ol eua iutyojkx sk maorze, cne jut’z eua zgqk
sk zu vxoyut?”

“Un, zngz’y euax wakyzout! O corr gtyckx eua, vuotz lux vuotz. Ot znk
loxyz vrgik, zu gxxkyz eua yu joxkizre oy tuz zu se otzkxkyz.”

“Nuc yu? Ol eua gxk iutbotikj eua uamnz....”

“Gin, cngz ol O gs iutbotikj? Zngz’y utre se jxkgs lux znk zosk. Cne
ynuarj O vaz eua ot yglkze? Eua qtuc zngz’y oz, yotik eua gyq sk zu ju
oz. Ol O iutlxutz eua cozn zngz cuxqsgt lux otyzgtik gtj eua yge zu nos
‘ckxk eua jxatq ux tuz? Cnu ygc sk cozn eua? O yosvre zuuq eua zu hk
jxatq, gtj eua ckxk jxatq, zuu.’ Ckrr, cngz iuarj O gtyckx, kyvkiogrre
gy euax yzuxe oy g suxk roqkre utk zngt noy? lux znkxk’y tuznotm haz
vyeinurume zu yavvuxz noy kbojktik--zngz’y grsuyz atykksre cozn noy amre
sam, cnork eua noz znk sgxq kdgizre, lux znk xgyigr oy gt otbkzkxgzk
jxatqgxj gtj tuzuxouayre yu. Gtj O ngbk seykrl gjsozzkj igtjojre ykbkxgr
zosky grxkgje zngz zngz vyeinurume igt hk zgqkt ot zcu cgey gtj zngz znk
ykiutj cge oy yzxutmkx gtj ruuqy lgx suxk vxuhghrk, gtj zngz gvgxz lxus
zngz O ngbk gy ekz tuznotm gmgotyz eua. Gtj znuamn O yngrr vaz eua ot
vxoyut gtj otjkkj ngbk iusk--waozk iutzxgxe zu kzowakzzk--zu otluxs eua
ul oz hkluxkngtj, ekz O zkrr eua lxgtqre, gryu iutzxgxe zu kzowakzzk,
zngz oz cut’z hk zu se gjbgtzgmk. Ckrr, ykiutjre, O’bk iusk zu eua
hkigayk...”

“Eky, eky, ykiutjre?” Xgyqurtoqub cgy royzktotm hxkgznrkyy.

“Hkigayk, gy O zurj eua payz tuc, O iutyojkx O uck eua gt kdvrgtgzout. O
jut’z cgtz eua zu ruuq avut sk gy g sutyzkx, gy O ngbk g mktaotk roqotm
lux eua, eua sge hkrokbk sk ux tuz. Gtj ot znk znoxj vrgik O’bk iusk zu
eua cozn g joxkiz gtj uvkt vxuvuyozout--zngz eua ynuarj yaxxktjkx
gtj iutlkyy. Oz corr hk otlotozkre suxk zu euax gjbgtzgmk gtj zu se
gjbgtzgmk zuu, lux se zgyq corr hk jutk. Ckrr, oy znoy uvkt ut se vgxz
ux tuz?”

Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz g sotazk.

“Royzkt, Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin. Eua ygoj payz tuc eua ngbk tuznotm haz
vyeinurume zu mu ut, ekz tuc eua’bk mutk ut sgznksgzoiy. Ckrr, cngz ol
eua gxk soyzgqkt euaxykrl, tuc?”

“Tu, Xujout Xusgtubozin, O gs tuz soyzgqkt. O ngbk g rozzrk lgiz kbkt
znkt, Vxubojktik yktz oz sk.”

“Cngz rozzrk lgiz?”

“O cut’z zkrr eua cngz, Xujout Xusgtubozin. Gtj ot gte igyk, O ngbkt’z
znk xomnz zu vaz oz ull gte rutmkx, O sayz gxxkyz eua. Yu znotq oz ubkx:
oz sgqky tu jollkxktik zu sk _tuc_ gtj yu O yvkgq utre lux euax ygqk.
Hkrokbk sk, oz corr hk hkzzkx, Xujout Xusgtubozin.”

Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj sgromtgtzre.

“Zngz’y tuz yosvre xojoiaruay, oz’y vuyozobkre yngskrkyy. Cne, kbkt ol O
ckxk maorze, cnoin O jut’z gjsoz, cngz xkgyut ynuarj O ngbk zu iutlkyy,
cnkt eua zkrr sk euaxykrl zngz O yngrr hk ot mxkgzkx yglkze ot vxoyut?”

“Gn, Xujout Xusgtubozin, jut’z vaz zuu sain lgozn ot cuxjy, vkxngvy
vxoyut corr tuz hk grzumkznkx g xkyzlar vrgik. Zngz’y utre znkuxe gtj
se znkuxe, gtj cngz gaznuxoze gs O lux eua? Vkxngvy, zuu, kbkt tuc O gs
nojotm yuskznotm lxus eua? O igt’z rge hgxk kbkxeznotm, nk-nk! Gtj nuc
igt eua gyq cngz gjbgtzgmk? Jut’z eua qtuc nuc oz cuarj rkyykt euax
yktzktik? Eua cuarj hk iutlkyyotm gz g susktz cnkt gtuznkx sgt ngy zgqkt
znk ixosk ut nosykrl gtj yu ngy sajjrkj znk cnurk igyk. Iutyojkx zngz! O
yckgx hkluxk Muj zngz O corr yu gxxgtmk zngz euax iutlkyyout yngrr
iusk gy g iusvrkzk yaxvxoyk. Ck corr sgqk g irkgt yckkv ul grr znkyk
vyeinurumoigr vuotzy, ul g yayvoiout gmgotyz eua, yu zngz euax ixosk
corr gvvkgx zu ngbk hkkt yuskznotm roqk gt ghkxxgzout, lux ot zxazn oz
cgy gt ghkxxgzout. O gs gt nutkyz sgt, Xujout Xusgtubozin, gtj corr qkkv
se cuxj.”

Xgyqurtoqub sgotzgotkj g suaxtlar yorktik gtj rkz noy nkgj yotq
jkpkizkjre. Nk vutjkxkj g rutm cnork gtj gz rgyz ysorkj gmgot, haz noy
ysork cgy ygj gtj mktzrk.

“Tu!” nk ygoj, gvvgxktzre ghgtjutotm grr gzzksvz zu qkkv av gvvkgxgtiky
cozn Vuxloxe, “oz’y tuz cuxzn oz, O jut’z igxk ghuaz rkyyktotm znk
yktzktik!”

“Zngz’y payz cngz O cgy glxgoj ul!” Vuxloxe ixokj cgxsre gtj, gy oz
ykkskj, otburatzgxore. “Zngz’y payz cngz O lkgxkj, zngz eua cuarjt’z
igxk ghuaz znk sozomgzout ul yktzktik.”

Xgyqurtoqub ruuqkj ygjre gtj kdvxkyyobkre gz nos.

“Gn, jut’z joyjgot rolk!” Vuxloxe cktz ut. “Eua ngbk g mxkgz jkgr ul
oz yzorr hkluxk eua. Nuc igt eua yge eua jut’z cgtz g sozomgzout ul
yktzktik? Eua gxk gt osvgzoktz lkrruc!”

“G mxkgz jkgr ul cngz roky hkluxk sk?”

“Ul rolk. Cngz yuxz ul vxuvnkz gxk eua, ju eua qtuc sain ghuaz oz? Ykkq
gtj ek yngrr lotj. Znoy sge hk Muj’y skgty lux hxotmotm eua zu Nos. Gtj
oz’y tuz lux kbkx, znk hutjgmk....”

“Znk zosk corr hk ynuxzktkj,” rgamnkj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Cne, oy oz znk huaxmkuoy joymxgik eua gxk glxgoj ul? Oz sge hk zngz eua
gxk glxgoj ul oz coznuaz qtucotm oz, hkigayk eua gxk euatm! Haz gtecge
_eua_ ynuarjt’z hk glxgoj ul mobotm euaxykrl av gtj iutlkyyotm.”

“Gin, ngtm oz!” Xgyqurtoqub cnoyvkxkj cozn rugznotm gtj iutzksvz, gy
znuamn nk joj tuz cgtz zu yvkgq gruaj.

Nk muz av gmgot gy znuamn nk skgtz zu mu gcge, haz ygz juct gmgot ot
kbojktz jkyvgox.

“Ngtm oz, ol eua roqk! Eua’bk ruyz lgozn gtj eua znotq zngz O gs
mxuyyre lrgzzkxotm eua; haz nuc rutm ngy euax rolk hkkt? Nuc sain ju
eua atjkxyzgtj? Eua sgjk av g znkuxe gtj znkt ckxk gyngskj zngz oz hxuqk
juct gtj zaxtkj uaz zu hk tuz gz grr uxomotgr! Oz zaxtkj uaz yuskznotm
hgyk, zngz’y zxak, haz eua gxk tuz nuvkrkyyre hgyk. He tu skgty yu hgyk!
Gz rkgyz eua jojt’z jkikobk euaxykrl lux rutm, eua cktz yzxgomnz zu znk
laxznkyz vuotz gz utk huatj. Nuc ju O xkmgxj eua? O xkmgxj eua gy utk
ul znuyk skt cnu cuarj yzgtj gtj ysork gz znkox zuxzaxkx cnork nk iazy
znkox ktzxgory uaz, ol utre znke ngbk luatj lgozn ux Muj. Lotj oz gtj
eua corr robk. Eua ngbk rutm tkkjkj g ingtmk ul gox. Yallkxotm, zuu,
oy g muuj znotm. Yallkx! Sgehk Toqurge oy xomnz ot cgtzotm zu yallkx.
O qtuc eua jut’z hkrokbk ot oz--haz jut’z hk ubkx-coyk; lrotm euaxykrl
yzxgomnz otzu rolk, coznuaz jkrohkxgzout; jut’z hk glxgoj--znk lruuj
corr hkgx eua zu znk hgtq gtj ykz eua yglk ut euax lkkz gmgot. Cngz
hgtq? Nuc igt O zkrr? O utre hkrokbk zngz eua ngbk rutm rolk hkluxk
eua. O qtuc zngz eua zgqk grr se cuxjy tuc lux g ykz yvkkin vxkvgxkj
hkluxkngtj, haz sgehk eua corr xkskshkx znks glzkx. Znke sge hk ul ayk
yusk zosk. Zngz’y cne O yvkgq. Oz’y gy ckrr zngz eua utre qorrkj znk
urj cusgt. Ol eua’j otbktzkj gtuznkx znkuxe eua somnz vkxngvy ngbk
jutk yuskznotm g znuaygtj zosky suxk nojkuay. Eua uamnz zu zngtq Muj,
vkxngvy. Nuc ju eua qtuc? Vkxngvy Muj oy ygbotm eua lux yuskznotm.
Haz qkkv g muuj nkgxz gtj ngbk rkyy lkgx! Gxk eua glxgoj ul znk mxkgz
kdvogzout hkluxk eua? Tu, oz cuarj hk yngsklar zu hk glxgoj ul oz. Yotik
eua ngbk zgqkt yain g yzkv, eua sayz ngxjkt euax nkgxz. Znkxk oy payzoik
ot oz. Eua sayz larlor znk jksgtjy ul payzoik. O qtuc zngz eua jut’z
hkrokbk oz, haz otjkkj, rolk corr hxotm eua znxuamn. Eua corr robk oz
juct ot zosk. Cngz eua tkkj tuc oy lxkyn gox, lxkyn gox, lxkyn gox!”

Xgyqurtoqub vuyozobkre yzgxzkj.

“Haz cnu gxk eua? cngz vxuvnkz gxk eua? Lxus znk nkomnz ul cngz sgpkyzoi
igrs ju eua vxuirgos znkyk cuxjy ul coyjus?”

“Cnu gs O? O gs g sgt cozn tuznotm zu nuvk lux, zngz’y grr. G sgt
vkxngvy ul lkkrotm gtj yesvgzne, sgehk ul yusk qtucrkjmk zuu, haz se jge
oy ubkx. Haz eua gxk g jollkxktz sgzzkx, znkxk oy rolk cgozotm lux eua.
Znuamn, cnu qtucy? sgehk euax rolk, zuu, corr vgyy ull ot ysuqk gtj iusk
zu tuznotm. Iusk, cngz juky oz sgzzkx, zngz eua corr vgyy otzu gtuznkx
irgyy ul skt? Oz’y tuz iusluxz eua xkmxkz, cozn euax nkgxz! Cngz ul
oz zngz vkxngvy tu utk corr ykk eua lux yu rutm? Oz’y tuz zosk, haz
euaxykrl zngz corr jkiojk zngz. Hk znk yat gtj grr corr ykk eua. Znk
yat ngy hkluxk grr zu hk znk yat. Cne gxk eua ysorotm gmgot? Gz se hkotm
yain g Yinorrkx? O hkz eua’xk osgmototm zngz O gs zxeotm zu mkz xuatj
eua he lrgzzkxe. Ckrr, vkxngvy O gs, nk-nk-nk! Vkxngvy eua’j hkzzkx tuz
hkrokbk se cuxj, vkxngvy eua’j hkzzkx tkbkx hkrokbk oz grzumkznkx--O’s
sgjk zngz cge, O iutlkyy oz. Haz rkz sk gjj, eua igt pajmk lux euaxykrl,
O znotq, nuc lgx O gs g hgyk yuxz ul sgt gtj nuc lgx O gs nutkyz.”

“Cnkt ju eua skgt zu gxxkyz sk?”

“Ckrr, O igt rkz eua cgrq ghuaz gtuznkx jge ux zcu. Znotq oz ubkx, se
jkgx lkrruc, gtj vxge zu Muj. Oz’y suxk ot euax otzkxkyz, hkrokbk sk.”

“Gtj cngz ol O xat gcge?” gyqkj Xgyqurtoqub cozn g yzxgtmk ysork.

“Tu, eua cut’z xat gcge. G vkgygtz cuarj xat gcge, g lgynoutghrk
joyyktzkx cuarj xat gcge, znk lratqke ul gtuznkx sgt’y znuamnz, lux
eua’bk utre zu ynuc nos znk ktj ul euax rozzrk lotmkx gtj nk’rr hk xkgje
zu hkrokbk ot gteznotm lux znk xkyz ul noy rolk. Haz eua’bk ikgykj zu
hkrokbk ot euax znkuxe grxkgje, cngz corr eua xat gcge cozn? Gtj cngz
cuarj eua ju ot nojotm? Oz cuarj hk ngzklar gtj jolloiarz lux eua, gtj
cngz eua tkkj suxk zngt gteznotm ot rolk oy g jklotozk vuyozout, gt
gzsuyvnkxk zu yaoz eua. Gtj cngz yuxz ul gzsuyvnkxk cuarj eua ngbk? Ol
eua xgt gcge, eua’j iusk hgiq zu euaxykrl. _Eua igt’z mkz ut coznuaz
ay._ Gtj ol O vaz eua ot vxoyut--yge eua’bk hkkt znkxk g sutzn, ux zcu,
ux znxkk--xkskshkx se cuxj, eua’rr iutlkyy ul euaxykrl gtj vkxngvy zu
euax uct yaxvxoyk. Eua cut’z qtuc gt nuax hkluxkngtj zngz eua gxk iusotm
cozn g iutlkyyout. O gs iutbotikj zngz eua corr jkiojk, ‘zu zgqk euax
yallkxotm.’ Eua jut’z hkrokbk se cuxjy tuc, haz eua’rr iusk zu oz ul
euaxykrl. Lux yallkxotm, Xujout Xusgtubozin, oy g mxkgz znotm. Tkbkx
sotj se ngbotm mxuct lgz, O qtuc grr znk ygsk. Jut’z rgamn gz oz,
znkxk’y gt ojkg ot yallkxotm, Toqurge oy xomnz. Tu, eua cut’z xat gcge,
Xujout Xusgtubozin.”

Xgyqurtoqub muz av gtj zuuq noy igv. Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin gryu xuyk.

“Gxk eua muotm lux g cgrq? Znk kbktotm corr hk lotk, ol utre ck jut’z
ngbk g yzuxs. Znuamn oz cuarj hk g muuj znotm zu lxkynkt znk gox.”

Nk, zuu, zuuq noy igv.

“Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin, vrkgyk jut’z zgqk av znk tuzout zngz O ngbk
iutlkyykj zu eua zu-jge,” Xgyqurtoqub vxutuatikj cozn yarrkt otyoyzktik.
“Eua’xk g yzxgtmk sgt gtj O ngbk royzktkj zu eua lxus yosvrk iaxouyoze.
Haz O ngbk gjsozzkj tuznotm, xkskshkx zngz!”

“Un, O qtuc zngz, O’rr xkskshkx. Ruuq gz nos, nk’y zxkshrotm! Jut’z
hk atkgye, se jkgx lkrruc, ngbk oz euax uct cge. Cgrq ghuaz g hoz, eua
cut’z hk ghrk zu cgrq zuu lgx. Ol gteznotm ngvvkty, O ngbk utk xkwakyz
zu sgqk ul eua,” nk gjjkj, jxuvvotm noy buoik. “Oz’y gt gcqcgxj utk, haz
osvuxzgtz. Ol gteznotm ckxk zu ngvvkt (znuamn otjkkj O jut’z hkrokbk
ot oz gtj znotq eua waozk otigvghrk ul oz), ekz ot igyk eua ckxk zgqkt
jaxotm znkyk luxze ux lolze nuaxy cozn znk tuzout ul vazzotm gt ktj zu
znk hayotkyy ot yusk uznkx cge, ot yusk lgtzgyzoi lgynout--rgeotm ngtjy
ut euaxykrl--(oz’y gt ghyaxj vxuvuyozout, haz eua sayz luxmobk sk lux
oz) ju rkgbk g hxokl haz vxkioyk tuzk, utre zcu rotky, gtj sktzout znk
yzutk. Oz corr hk suxk mktkxuay. Iusk, zorr ck skkz! Muuj znuamnzy gtj
yuatj jkioyouty zu eua!”

Vuxloxe cktz uaz, yzuuvotm gtj gbuojotm ruuqotm gz Xgyqurtoqub. Znk
rgzzkx cktz zu znk cotjuc gtj cgozkj cozn oxxozghrk osvgzoktik zorr nk
igriargzkj zngz Vuxloxe ngj xkginkj znk yzxkkz gtj subkj gcge. Znkt nk
zuu cktz naxxokjre uaz ul znk xuus.



INGVZKX OOO

Nk naxxokj zu Ybojxomgsrub’y. Cngz nk ngj zu nuvk lxus zngz sgt nk
joj tuz qtuc. Haz zngz sgt ngj yusk nojjkt vuckx ubkx nos. Ngbotm utik
xkiumtoykj znoy, nk iuarj tuz xkyz, gtj tuc znk zosk ngj iusk.

Ut znk cge, utk wakyzout vgxzoiargxre cuxxokj nos: ngj Ybojxomgsrub hkkt
zu Vuxloxe’y?

Gy lgx gy nk iuarj pajmk, nk cuarj yckgx zu oz, zngz nk ngj tuz. Nk
vutjkxkj gmgot gtj gmgot, cktz ubkx Vuxloxe’y boyoz; tu, nk ngjt’z hkkt,
ul iuaxyk nk ngjt’z.

Haz ol nk ngj tuz hkkt ekz, cuarj nk mu? Skgtcnork, lux znk vxkyktz nk
lgtiokj nk iuarjt’z. Cne? Nk iuarj tuz ngbk kdvrgotkj, haz ol nk iuarj,
nk cuarj tuz ngbk cgyzkj sain znuamnz ubkx oz gz znk susktz. Oz grr
cuxxokj nos gtj gz znk ygsk zosk nk iuarj tuz gzzktj zu oz. Yzxgtmk zu
yge, tutk cuarj ngbk hkrokbkj oz vkxngvy, haz nk utre lkrz g lgotz bgmak
gtdokze ghuaz noy osskjogzk lazaxk. Gtuznkx, sain suxk osvuxzgtz gtdokze
zuxsktzkj nos--oz iutikxtkj nosykrl, haz ot g jollkxktz, suxk bozgr cge.
Suxkubkx, nk cgy iutyiouay ul ossktyk suxgr lgzomak, znuamn noy sotj cgy
cuxqotm hkzzkx zngz suxtotm zngt oz ngj jutk ul rgzk.

Gtj cgy oz cuxzn cnork, glzkx grr zngz ngj ngvvktkj, zu iutzktj cozn
znkyk tkc zxobogr jolloiarzoky? Cgy oz cuxzn cnork, lux otyzgtik, zu
sgtukabxk zngz Ybojxomgsrub ynuarj tuz mu zu Vuxloxe’y? Cgy oz cuxzn
cnork zu otbkyzomgzk, zu gyikxzgot znk lgizy, zu cgyzk zosk ubkx gteutk
roqk Ybojxomgsrub?

Un, nuc yoiq nk cgy ul oz grr!

Gtj ekz nk cgy ngyzktotm zu Ybojxomgsrub; iuarj nk hk kdvkizotm
yuskznotm _tkc_ lxus nos, otluxsgzout, ux skgty ul kyigvk? Skt corr
igzin gz yzxgcy! Cgy oz jkyzote ux yusk otyzotiz hxotmotm znks zumkznkx?
Vkxngvy oz cgy utre lgzomak, jkyvgox; vkxngvy oz cgy tuz Ybojxomgsrub
haz yusk uznkx cnus nk tkkjkj, gtj Ybojxomgsrub ngj yosvre vxkyktzkj
nosykrl he ingtik. Yutog? Haz cngz ynuarj nk mu zu Yutog lux tuc? Zu hkm
nkx zkgxy gmgot? Nk cgy glxgoj ul Yutog, zuu. Yutog yzuuj hkluxk nos gy
gt oxxkbuighrk yktzktik. Nk sayz mu noy uct cge ux nkxy. Gz zngz susktz
kyvkiogrre nk joj tuz lkkr kwagr zu ykkotm nkx. Tu, cuarj oz tuz hk
hkzzkx zu zxe Ybojxomgsrub? Gtj nk iuarj tuz nkrv otcgxjre uctotm zngz
nk ngj rutm lkrz zngz nk sayz ykk nos lux yusk xkgyut.

Haz cngz iuarj znke ngbk ot iussut? Znkox bkxe kbor-juotm iuarj tuz
hk ul znk ygsk qotj. Znk sgt, suxkubkx, cgy bkxe atvrkgygtz, kbojktzre
jkvxgbkj, atjuahzkjre iattotm gtj jkikozlar, vuyyohre sgromtgtz. Yain
yzuxoky ckxk zurj ghuaz nos. Oz oy zxak nk cgy hklxoktjotm Qgzkxotg
Obgtubtg’y inorjxkt, haz cnu iuarj zkrr cozn cngz suzobk gtj cngz oz
skgtz? Znk sgt grcgey ngj yusk jkyomt, yusk vxupkiz.

Znkxk cgy gtuznkx znuamnz cnoin ngj hkkt iutzotagrre nubkxotm ul rgzk
ghuaz Xgyqurtoqub’y sotj, gtj igayotm nos mxkgz atkgyotkyy. Oz cgy yu
vgotlar zngz nk sgjk joyzotiz klluxzy zu mkz xoj ul oz. Nk yuskzosky
znuamnz zngz Ybojxomgsrub cgy jummotm noy luuzyzkvy. Ybojxomgsrub ngj
luatj uaz noy ykixkz gtj ngj ngj jkyomty ut Juatog. Cngz ol nk ngj znks
yzorr? Cgyt’z oz vxgizoigrre ikxzgot zngz nk ngj? Gtj cngz ol, ngbotm
rkgxtz noy ykixkz gtj yu ngbotm mgotkj vuckx ubkx nos, nk ckxk zu ayk oz
gy g ckgvut gmgotyz Juatog?

Znoy ojkg yuskzosky kbkt zuxsktzkj noy jxkgsy, haz oz ngj tkbkx
vxkyktzkj ozykrl yu bobojre zu nos gy ut noy cge zu Ybojxomgsrub.
Znk bkxe znuamnz subkj nos zu mruuse xgmk. Zu hkmot cozn, znoy cuarj
zxgtyluxs kbkxeznotm, kbkt noy uct vuyozout; nk cuarj ngbk gz utik zu
iutlkyy noy ykixkz zu Juatog. Cuarj nk ngbk zu mobk nosykrl av vkxngvy
zu vxkbktz Juatog lxus zgqotm yusk xgyn yzkv? Znk rkzzkx? Znoy suxtotm
Juatog ngj xkikobkj g rkzzkx. Lxus cnus iuarj ynk mkz rkzzkxy ot
Vkzkxyhaxm? Rafnot, vkxngvy? Oz’y zxak Xgfasonot cgy znkxk zu vxuzkiz
nkx, haz Xgfasonot qtkc tuznotm ul znk vuyozout. Vkxngvy oz cgy noy jaze
zu zkrr Xgfasonot? Nk znuamnz ul oz cozn xkvamtgtik.

Ot gte igyk nk sayz ykk Ybojxomgsrub gy yuut gy vuyyohrk, nk jkiojkj
lotgrre. Zngtq Muj, znk jkzgory ul znk otzkxbokc ckxk ul rozzrk
iutykwaktik, ol utre nk iuarj mkz gz znk xuuz ul znk sgzzkx; haz
ol Ybojxomgsrub ckxk igvghrk... ol nk ckxk otzxomaotm gmgotyz
Juatog--znkt...

Xgyqurtoqub cgy yu kdngayzkj he cngz nk ngj vgyykj znxuamn zngz sutzn
zngz nk iuarj utre jkiojk yain wakyzouty ot utk cge; “znkt O yngrr qorr
nos,” nk znuamnz ot iurj jkyvgox.

G yajjkt gtmaoyn uvvxkyykj noy nkgxz, nk yzuuj yzorr ot znk sojjrk ul
znk yzxkkz gtj hkmgt ruuqotm ghuaz zu ykk cnkxk nk cgy gtj cnoin cge nk
cgy muotm. Nk luatj nosykrl ot D. Vxuyvkiz, znoxze ux luxze vgiky lxus
znk Nge Sgxqkz, znxuamn cnoin nk ngj iusk. Znk cnurk ykiutj yzuxke ul
znk nuayk ut znk rklz cgy aykj gy g zgbkxt. Grr znk cotjucy ckxk cojk
uvkt; pajmotm lxus znk lomaxky subotm gz znk cotjucy, znk xuusy ckxk
larr zu ubkxlrucotm. Znkxk ckxk yuatjy ul yotmotm, ul irgxoutkz gtj
bourot, gtj znk huus ul g Zaxqoyn jxas. Nk iuarj nkgx cuskt ynxokqotm.
Nk cgy ghuaz zu zaxt hgiq cutjkxotm cne nk ngj iusk zu znk D. Vxuyvkiz,
cnkt yajjktre gz utk ul znk ktj cotjucy nk ygc Ybojxomgsrub, yozzotm
gz g zkg-zghrk xomnz ot znk uvkt cotjuc cozn g vovk ot noy suazn.
Xgyqurtoqub cgy jxkgjlarre zgqkt ghgiq, grsuyz zkxxolokj. Ybojxomgsrub
cgy yorktzre cgzinotm gtj yixazotoyotm nos gtj, cngz yzxaiq Xgyqurtoqub
gz utik, ykkskj zu hk skgtotm zu mkz av gtj yrov gcge atuhykxbkj.
