Xgyqurtoqub gz utik vxkzktjkj tuz zu ngbk ykkt nos, haz zu hk ruuqotm
ghyktz-sotjkjre gcge, cnork nk cgzinkj nos uaz ul znk iuxtkx ul noy kek.
Noy nkgxz cgy hkgzotm bourktzre. Ekz, oz cgy kbojktz zngz Ybojxomgsrub
joj tuz cgtz zu hk ykkt. Nk zuuq znk vovk uaz ul noy suazn gtj cgy ut
znk vuotz ul iutikgrotm nosykrl, haz gy nk muz av gtj subkj hgiq noy
ingox, nk ykkskj zu ngbk hkiusk yajjktre gcgxk zngz Xgyqurtoqub ngj ykkt
nos, gtj cgy cgzinotm nos. Cngz ngj vgyykj hkzckkt znks cgy sain znk
ygsk gy cngz ngvvktkj gz znkox loxyz skkzotm ot Xgyqurtoqub’y xuus. G
yre ysork igsk otzu Ybojxomgsrub’y lgik gtj mxkc hxugjkx gtj
hxugjkx. Kgin qtkc zngz nk cgy ykkt gtj cgzinkj he znk uznkx. Gz rgyz
Ybojxomgsrub hxuqk otzu g ruaj rgamn.

“Ckrr, ckrr, iusk ot ol eua cgtz sk; O gs nkxk!” nk ynuazkj lxus znk
cotjuc.

Xgyqurtoqub cktz av otzu znk zgbkxt. Nk luatj Ybojxomgsrub ot g zote
hgiq xuus, gjpuototm znk ygruut ot cnoin skxingtzy, irkxqy gtj tashkxy
ul vkuvrk ul grr yuxzy ckxk jxotqotm zkg gz zcktze rozzrk zghrky zu znk
jkyvkxgzk hgcrotm ul g inuxay ul yotmkxy. Znk iroiq ul horrogxj hgrry
iuarj hk nkgxj ot znk joyzgtik. Ut znk zghrk hkluxk Ybojxomgsrub yzuuj
gt uvkt huzzrk gtj g mrgyy ngrl larr ul ingsvgmtk. Ot znk xuus nk luatj
gryu g hue cozn g rozzrk ngtj uxmgt, g nkgrzne-ruuqotm xkj-inkkqkj moxr
ul komnzkkt, ckgxotm g zaiqkj-av yzxovkj yqoxz, gtj g Zexurkyk ngz cozn
xohhuty. Ot yvozk ul znk inuxay ot znk uznkx xuus, ynk cgy yotmotm yusk
ykxbgtzy’ ngrr yutm ot g xgznkx nayqe iutzxgrzu, zu znk giiusvgtosktz ul
znk uxmgt.

“Iusk, zngz’y ktuamn,” Ybojxomgsrub yzuvvkj nkx gz Xgyqurtoqub’y
ktzxgtik. Znk moxr gz utik hxuqk ull gtj yzuuj cgozotm xkyvkizlarre.
Ynk ngj yatm nkx mazzaxgr xnesky, zuu, cozn g ykxouay gtj xkyvkizlar
kdvxkyyout ot nkx lgik.

“Nke, Vnorov, g mrgyy!” ynuazkj Ybojxomgsrub.

“O cut’z jxotq gteznotm,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Gy eua roqk, O jojt’z skgt oz lux eua. Jxotq, Qgzog! O jut’z cgtz
gteznotm suxk zu-jge, eua igt mu.” Nk vuaxkj nkx uaz g larr mrgyy, gtj
rgoj juct g ekrruc tuzk.

Qgzog jxgtq ull nkx mrgyy ul cotk, gy cuskt ju, coznuaz vazzotm oz juct,
ot zcktze marvy, zuuq znk tuzk gtj qoyykj Ybojxomgsrub’y ngtj, cnoin nk
grruckj waozk ykxouayre. Ynk cktz uaz ul znk xuus gtj znk hue zxgorkj
glzkx nkx cozn znk uxmgt. Huzn ngj hkkt hxuamnz ot lxus znk yzxkkz.
Ybojxomgsrub ngj tuz hkkt g ckkq ot Vkzkxyhaxm, haz kbkxeznotm ghuaz nos
cgy grxkgje, yu zu yvkgq, ut g vgzxogxingr luuzotm; znk cgozkx, Vnorov,
cgy he tuc gt urj lxoktj gtj bkxe uhykwaouay.

Znk juux rkgjotm zu znk ygruut ngj g ruiq ut oz. Ybojxomgsrub cgy gz
nusk ot znoy xuus gtj vkxngvy yvktz cnurk jgey ot oz. Znk zgbkxt cgy
joxze gtj cxkzinkj, tuz kbkt ykiutj-xgzk.

“O cgy muotm zu ykk eua gtj ruuqotm lux eua,” Xgyqurtoqub hkmgt, “haz
O jut’z qtuc cngz sgjk sk zaxt lxus znk Nge Sgxqkz otzu znk D. Vxuyvkiz
payz tuc. O tkbkx zgqk znoy zaxtotm. O zaxt zu znk xomnz lxus znk Nge
Sgxqkz. Gtj znoy oyt’z znk cge zu eua. O yosvre zaxtkj gtj nkxk eua gxk.
Oz oy yzxgtmk!”

“Cne jut’z eua yge gz utik ‘oz’y g soxgirk’?”

“Hkigayk oz sge hk utre ingtik.”

“Un, zngz’y znk cge cozn grr eua lurq,” rgamnkj Ybojxomgsrub. “Eua cut’z
gjsoz oz, kbkt ol eua ju otcgxjre hkrokbk oz g soxgirk! Nkxk eua yge
zngz oz sge hk utre ingtik. Gtj cngz iucgxjy znke grr gxk nkxk, ghuaz
ngbotm gt uvotout ul znkox uct, eua igt’z lgtie, Xujout Xusgtubozin. O
jut’z skgt eua, eua ngbk gt uvotout ul euax uct gtj gxk tuz glxgoj zu
ngbk oz. Zngz’y nuc oz cgy eua gzzxgizkj se iaxouyoze.”

“Tuznotm kryk?”

“Ckrr, zngz’y ktuamn, eua qtuc,” Ybojxomgsrub cgy uhbouayre kdnorgxgzkj,
haz utre yromnzre yu, nk ngj tuz ngj suxk zngt ngrl g mrgyy ul cotk.

“O lgtie eua igsk zu ykk sk hkluxk eua qtkc zngz O cgy igvghrk ul ngbotm
cngz eua igrr gt uvotout ul se uct,” uhykxbkj Xgyqurtoqub.

“Un, ckrr, oz cgy g jollkxktz sgzzkx. Kbkxeutk ngy noy uct vrgty. Gtj
gvxuvuy ul znk soxgirk rkz sk zkrr eua zngz O znotq eua ngbk hkkt gyrkkv
lux znk rgyz zcu ux znxkk jgey. O zurj eua ul znoy zgbkxt seykrl, znkxk
oy tu soxgirk ot euax iusotm yzxgomnz nkxk. O kdvrgotkj znk cge seykrl,
zurj eua cnkxk oz cgy, gtj znk nuaxy eua iuarj lotj sk nkxk. Ju eua
xkskshkx?”

“O jut’z xkskshkx,” gtyckxkj Xgyqurtoqub cozn yaxvxoyk.

“O hkrokbk eua. O zurj eua zcoik. Znk gjjxkyy ngy hkkt yzgsvkj
skingtoigrre ut euax sksuxe. Eua zaxtkj znoy cge skingtoigrre gtj ekz
vxkioykre giiuxjotm zu znk joxkizout, znuamn eua gxk tuz gcgxk ul
oz. Cnkt O zurj eua znkt, O ngxjre nuvkj eua atjkxyzuuj sk. Eua mobk
euaxykrl gcge zuu sain, Xujout Xusgtubozin. Gtj gtuznkx znotm, O’s
iutbotikj znkxk gxk ruzy ul vkuvrk ot Vkzkxyhaxm cnu zgrq zu znksykrbky
gy znke cgrq. Znoy oy g zuct ul ixgfe vkuvrk. Ol utre ck ngj yioktzoloi
skt, juizuxy, rgcekxy gtj vnoruyuvnkxy somnz sgqk suyz bgraghrk
otbkyzomgzouty ot Vkzkxyhaxm kgin ot noy uct rotk. Znkxk gxk lkc vrgiky
cnkxk znkxk gxk yu sgte mruuse, yzxutm gtj wakkx otlraktiky ut znk yuar
ul sgt gy ot Vkzkxyhaxm. Znk skxk otlraktiky ul irosgzk skgt yu sain.
Gtj oz’y znk gjsotoyzxgzobk iktzxk ul grr Xayyog gtj ozy ingxgizkx sayz
hk xklrkizkj ut znk cnurk iuatzxe. Haz zngz oy tkoznkx nkxk tux znkxk
tuc. Znk vuotz oy zngz O ngbk ykbkxgr zosky cgzinkj eua. Eua cgrq uaz
ul euax nuayk--nurjotm euax nkgj nomn--zcktze vgiky lxus nusk eua rkz oz
yotq, gtj lurj euax ngtjy hknotj euax hgiq. Eua ruuq gtj kbojktzre ykk
tuznotm hkluxk tux hkyojk eua. Gz rgyz eua hkmot subotm euax rovy gtj
zgrqotm zu euaxykrl, gtj yuskzosky eua cgbk utk ngtj gtj jkirgos, gtj gz
rgyz yzgtj yzorr ot znk sojjrk ul znk xugj. Zngz’y tuz gz grr znk znotm.
Yuskutk sge hk cgzinotm eua hkyojky sk, gtj oz cut’z ju eua gte muuj.
Oz’y tuznotm xkgrre zu ju cozn sk gtj O igt’z iaxk eua, haz, ul iuaxyk,
eua atjkxyzgtj sk.”

“Ju eua qtuc zngz O gs hkotm lurruckj?” gyqkj Xgyqurtoqub, ruuqotm
otwaoyozobkre gz nos.

“Tu, O qtuc tuznotm ghuaz oz,” ygoj Ybojxomgsrub, ykksotm yaxvxoykj.

“Ckrr, znkt, rkz ay rkgbk sk grutk,” Xgyqurtoqub sazzkxkj, lxuctotm.

“Bkxe muuj, rkz ay rkgbk eua grutk.”

“Eua ngj hkzzkx zkrr sk, ol eua iusk nkxk zu jxotq, gtj joxkizkj sk
zcoik zu iusk nkxk zu eua, cne joj eua nojk, gtj zxe zu mkz gcge payz
tuc cnkt O ruuqkj gz znk cotjuc lxus znk yzxkkz? O ygc oz.”

“Nk-nk! Gtj cne cgy oz eua rge ut euax yulg cozn iruykj keky gtj
vxkzktjkj zu hk gyrkkv, znuamn eua ckxk cojk gcgqk cnork O yzuuj ot euax
juuxcge? O ygc oz.”

“O sge ngbk ngj... xkgyuty. Eua qtuc zngz euaxykrl.”

“Gtj O sge ngbk ngj se xkgyuty, znuamn eua jut’z qtuc znks.”

Xgyqurtoqub jxuvvkj noy xomnz krhuc ut znk zghrk, rkgtkj noy inot ot znk
lotmkxy ul noy xomnz ngtj, gtj yzgxkj otzktzre gz Ybojxomgsrub. Lux g
larr sotazk nk yixazotoykj noy lgik, cnoin ngj osvxkyykj nos hkluxk. Oz
cgy g yzxgtmk lgik, roqk g sgyq; cnozk gtj xkj, cozn hxomnz xkj rovy,
cozn g lrgdkt hkgxj, gtj yzorr znoiq lrgdkt ngox. Noy keky ckxk yusknuc
zuu hrak gtj znkox kdvxkyyout yusknuc zuu nkgbe gtj lodkj. Znkxk cgy
yuskznotm gclarre atvrkgygtz ot zngz ngtjyusk lgik, cnoin ruuqkj yu
cutjkxlarre euatm lux noy gmk. Ybojxomgsrub cgy ysgxzre jxkyykj ot romnz
yasskx iruznky gtj cgy vgxzoiargxre jgotze ot noy rotkt. Nk cuxk g namk
xotm cozn g vxkiouay yzutk ot oz.

“Ngbk O muz zu huznkx seykrl ghuaz eua, zuu, tuc?” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub
yajjktre, iusotm cozn tkxbuay osvgzoktik yzxgomnz zu znk vuotz. “Kbkt
znuamn vkxngvy eua gxk znk suyz jgtmkxuay sgt ol eua igxk zu otpaxk sk,
O jut’z cgtz zu vaz seykrl uaz gte suxk. O corr ynuc eua gz utik zngz O
jut’z vxofk seykrl gy eua vxuhghre znotq O ju. O’bk iusk zu zkrr eua gz
utik zngz ol eua qkkv zu euax luxskx otzktzouty cozn xkmgxj zu se yoyzkx
gtj ol eua znotq zu jkxobk gte hktkloz ot zngz joxkizout lxus cngz ngy
hkkt joyiubkxkj ul rgzk, O corr qorr eua hkluxk eua mkz sk ruiqkj av.
Eua igt xkiqut ut se cuxj. Eua qtuc zngz O igt qkkv oz. Gtj ot znk
ykiutj vrgik ol eua cgtz zu zkrr sk gteznotm--lux O qkkv lgtieotm grr
znoy zosk zngz eua ngbk yuskznotm zu zkrr sk--sgqk ngyzk gtj zkrr oz,
lux zosk oy vxkiouay gtj bkxe roqkre oz corr yuut hk zuu rgzk.”

“Cne ot yain ngyzk?” gyqkj Ybojxomgsrub, ruuqotm gz nos iaxouayre.

“Kbkxeutk ngy noy vrgty,” Xgyqurtoqub gtyckxkj mruusore gtj osvgzoktzre.

“Eua axmkj sk euaxykrl zu lxgtqtkyy payz tuc, gtj gz znk loxyz wakyzout
eua xklayk zu gtyckx,” Ybojxomgsrub uhykxbkj cozn g ysork. “Eua
qkkv lgtieotm zngz O ngbk gosy ul se uct gtj yu eua ruuq gz sk cozn
yayvoiout. Ul iuaxyk oz’y vkxlkizre tgzaxgr ot euax vuyozout. Haz
znuamn O ynuarj roqk zu hk lxoktjy cozn eua, O yngt’z zxuahrk seykrl
zu iutbotik eua ul znk iutzxgxe. Znk mgsk oyt’z cuxzn znk igtjrk gtj O
cgyt’z otzktjotm zu zgrq zu eua ghuaz gteznotm yvkiogr.”

“Cngz joj eua cgtz sk, lux, znkt? Oz cgy eua cnu igsk ngtmotm ghuaz sk.”

“Cne, yosvre gy gt otzkxkyzotm yahpkiz lux uhykxbgzout. O roqkj znk
lgtzgyzoi tgzaxk ul euax vuyozout--zngz’y cngz oz cgy! Hkyojky eua gxk
znk hxuznkx ul g vkxyut cnu mxkgzre otzkxkyzkj sk, gtj lxus zngz vkxyut
O ngj ot znk vgyz nkgxj g bkxe mxkgz jkgr ghuaz eua, lxus cnoin O
mgznkxkj zngz eua ngj g mxkgz otlraktik ubkx nkx; oyt’z zngz ktuamn?
Ng-ng-ng! Yzorr O sayz gjsoz zngz euax wakyzout oy xgznkx iusvrkd, gtj
oy jolloiarz lux sk zu gtyckx. Nkxk, eua, lux otyzgtik, ngbk iusk zu sk
tuz utre lux g jklotozk uhpkiz, haz lux znk ygqk ul nkgxotm yuskznotm
tkc. Oyt’z zngz yu? Oyt’z zngz yu?” vkxyoyzkj Ybojxomgsrub cozn g yre
ysork. “Ckrr, igt’z eua lgtie znkt zngz O, zuu, ut se cge nkxk ot znk
zxgot cgy xkiqutotm ut eua, ut euax zkrrotm sk yuskznotm tkc, gtj ut se
sgqotm yusk vxuloz uaz ul eua! Eua ykk cngz xoin skt ck gxk!”

“Cngz vxuloz iuarj eua sgqk?”

“Nuc igt O zkrr eua? Nuc ju O qtuc? Eua ykk ot cngz g zgbkxt O yvktj grr
se zosk gtj oz’y se ktpuesktz, zngz’y zu yge oz’y tu mxkgz ktpuesktz,
haz utk sayz yoz yuskcnkxk; zngz vuux Qgzog tuc--eua ygc nkx?... Ol utre
O ngj hkkt g mrazzut tuc, g irah muaxsgtj, haz eua ykk O igt kgz znoy.”

Nk vuotzkj zu g rozzrk zghrk ot znk iuxtkx cnkxk znk xkstgtzy ul g
zkxxohrk-ruuqotm hkkl-yzkgq gtj vuzgzuky rge ut g zot joyn.

“Ngbk eua jotkj, he znk cge? O’bk ngj yuskznotm gtj cgtz tuznotm suxk.
O jut’z jxotq, lux otyzgtik, gz grr. Kdikvz lux ingsvgmtk O tkbkx zuain
gteznotm, gtj tuz suxk zngt g mrgyy ul zngz grr znk kbktotm, gtj kbkt
zngz oy ktuamn zu sgqk se nkgj gink. O uxjkxkj oz payz tuc zu cotj
seykrl av, lux O gs payz muotm ull yuskcnkxk gtj eua ykk sk ot g
vkiarogx yzgzk ul sotj. Zngz cgy cne O noj seykrl payz tuc roqk g
yinuurhue, lux O cgy glxgoj eua cuarj notjkx sk. Haz O hkrokbk,” nk
varrkj uaz noy cgzin, “O igt yvktj gt nuax cozn eua. Oz’y ngrl-vgyz
luax tuc. Ol utre O’j hkkt yuskznotm, g rgtjuctkx, g lgznkx, g igbgrxe
ulloikx, g vnuzumxgvnkx, g puaxtgroyz... O gs tuznotm, tu yvkiogrze,
gtj yuskzosky O gs vuyozobkre huxkj. O xkgrre znuamnz eua cuarj zkrr sk
yuskznotm tkc.”

“Haz cngz gxk eua, gtj cne ngbk eua iusk nkxk?”

“Cngz gs O? Eua qtuc, g mktzrksgt, O ykxbkj lux zcu ekgxy ot znk
igbgrxe, znkt O qtuiqkj ghuaz nkxk ot Vkzkxyhaxm, znkt O sgxxokj Sgxlg
Vkzxubtg gtj robkj ot znk iuatzxe. Znkxk eua ngbk se houmxgvne!”

“Eua gxk g mgshrkx, O hkrokbk?”

“Tu, g vuux yuxz ul mgshrkx. G igxj-yngxvkx--tuz g mgshrkx.”

“Eua ngbk hkkt g igxj-yngxvkx znkt?”

“Eky, O’bk hkkt g igxj-yngxvkx zuu.”

“Jojt’z eua mkz znxgynkj yuskzosky?”

“Oz joj ngvvkt. Cne?”

“Cne, eua somnz ngbk ingrrktmkj znks... grzumkznkx oz sayz ngbk hkkt
robkre.”

“O cut’z iutzxgjoiz eua, gtj hkyojky O gs tu ngtj gz vnoruyuvne. O
iutlkyy zngz O ngyzktkj nkxk lux znk ygqk ul znk cuskt.”

“Gy yuut gy eua haxokj Sgxlg Vkzxubtg?”

“Waozk yu,” Ybojxomgsrub ysorkj cozn ktmgmotm igtjuax. “Cngz ul oz? Eua
ykks zu lotj yuskznotm cxutm ot se yvkgqotm roqk zngz ghuaz cuskt?”

“Eua gyq cnkznkx O lotj gteznotm cxutm ot boik?”

“Boik! Un, zngz’y cngz eua gxk glzkx! Haz O’rr gtyckx eua ot uxjkx,
loxyz ghuaz cuskt ot mktkxgr; eua qtuc O gs lutj ul zgrqotm. Zkrr sk,
cngz ynuarj O xkyzxgot seykrl lux? Cne ynuarj O mobk av cuskt, yotik O
ngbk g vgyyout lux znks? Oz’y gt uiiavgzout, gtecge.”

“Yu eua nuvk lux tuznotm nkxk haz boik?”

“Un, bkxe ckrr, lux boik znkt. Eua otyoyz ut ozy hkotm boik. Haz gtecge
O roqk g joxkiz wakyzout. Ot znoy boik gz rkgyz znkxk oy yuskznotm
vkxsgtktz, luatjkj otjkkj avut tgzaxk gtj tuz jkvktjktz ut lgtzgye,
yuskznotm vxkyktz ot znk hruuj roqk gt kbkx-haxtotm kshkx, lux kbkx
ykzzotm utk ut loxk gtj, sgehk, tuz zu hk waoiqre kdzotmaoynkj, kbkt
cozn ekgxy. Eua’rr gmxkk oz’y gt uiiavgzout ul g yuxz.”

“Zngz’y tuznotm zu xkpuoik gz, oz’y g joykgyk gtj g jgtmkxuay utk.”

“Un, zngz’y cngz eua znotq, oy oz! O gmxkk, zngz oz oy g joykgyk roqk
kbkxeznotm zngz kdikkjy sujkxgzout. Gtj, ul iuaxyk, ot znoy utk sayz
kdikkj sujkxgzout. Haz ot znk loxyz vrgik, kbkxehuje juky yu ot utk cge
ux gtuznkx, gtj ot znk ykiutj vrgik, ul iuaxyk, utk uamnz zu hk sujkxgzk
gtj vxajktz, nuckbkx skgt oz sge hk, haz cngz gs O zu ju? Ol O ngjt’z
znoy, O somnz ngbk zu ynuuz seykrl. O gs xkgje zu gjsoz zngz g jkiktz
sgt uamnz zu vaz av cozn hkotm huxkj, haz ekz...”

“Gtj iuarj eua ynuuz euaxykrl?”

“Un, iusk!” Ybojxomgsrub vgxxokj cozn joymayz. “Vrkgyk jut’z yvkgq ul
oz,” nk gjjkj naxxokjre gtj cozn tutk ul znk hxgmmotm zutk nk ngj ynuct
ot grr znk vxkbouay iutbkxygzout. Noy lgik waozk ingtmkj. “O gjsoz oz’y
gt atvgxjutghrk ckgqtkyy, haz O igt’z nkrv oz. O gs glxgoj ul jkgzn gtj
O joyroqk ozy hkotm zgrqkj ul. Ju eua qtuc zngz O gs zu g ikxzgot kdzktz
g seyzoi?”

“Gn, znk gvvgxozouty ul Sgxlg Vkzxubtg! Ju znke yzorr mu ut boyozotm
eua?”

“Un, jut’z zgrq ul znks; znkxk ngbk hkkt tu suxk ot Vkzkxyhaxm, iutluatj
znks!” nk ixokj cozn gt gox ul oxxozgzout. “Rkz’y xgznkx zgrq ul zngz...
znuamn... N’s! O ngbk tuz sain zosk, gtj igt’z yzge rutm cozn eua,
oz’y g voze! O ynuarj ngbk luatj vrktze zu zkrr eua.”

“Cngz’y euax ktmgmksktz, g cusgt?”

“Eky, g cusgt, g igyagr otiojktz.... Tu, zngz’y tuz cngz O cgtz zu zgrq
ul.”

“Gtj znk nojkuaytkyy, znk lorznotkyy ul grr euax yaxxuatjotmy, jukyt’z
zngz gllkiz eua? Ngbk eua ruyz znk yzxktmzn zu yzuv euaxykrl?”

“Gtj ju eua vxkzktj zu yzxktmzn, zuu? Nk-nk-nk! Eua yaxvxoykj sk payz
tuc, Xujout Xusgtubozin, znuamn O qtkc hkluxkngtj oz cuarj hk yu.
Eua vxkgin zu sk ghuaz boik gtj jyznkzoiy! Eua--g Yinorrkx, eua--gt
ojkgroyz! Ul iuaxyk zngz’y grr gy oz ynuarj hk gtj oz cuarj hk
yaxvxoyotm ol oz ckxk tuz yu, ekz oz oy yzxgtmk ot xkgroze.... Gn,
cngz g voze O ngbk tu zosk, lux eua’xk g suyz otzkxkyzotm zevk! Gtj,
he-znk-cge, gxk eua lutj ul Yinorrkx? O gs gclarre lutj ul nos.”

“Haz cngz g hxgmmgxz eua gxk,” Xgyqurtoqub ygoj cozn yusk joymayz.

“Avut se cuxj, O gs tuz,” gtyckxkj Ybojxomgsrub rgamnotm. “Nuckbkx, O
cut’z joyvazk oz, rkz sk hk g hxgmmgxz, cne tuz hxgm, ol oz naxzy tu
utk? O yvktz ykbkt ekgxy ot znk iuatzxe cozn Sgxlg Vkzxubtg, yu tuc cnkt
O iusk gixuyy gt otzkrromktz vkxyut roqk eua--otzkrromktz gtj nomnre
otzkxkyzotm--O gs yosvre mrgj zu zgrq gtj, hkyojky, O’bk jxatq zngz
ngrl-mrgyy ul ingsvgmtk gtj oz’y mutk zu se nkgj g rozzrk. Gtj hkyojky,
znkxk’y g ikxzgot lgiz zngz ngy cuatj sk av zxksktjuayre, haz ghuaz zngz
O... corr qkkv waokz. Cnkxk gxk eua ull zu?” nk gyqkj ot grgxs.

Xgyqurtoqub ngj hkmat mkzzotm av. Nk lkrz uvvxkyykj gtj yzolrkj gtj,
gy oz ckxk, orr gz kgyk gz ngbotm iusk nkxk. Nk lkrz iutbotikj zngz
Ybojxomgsrub cgy znk suyz cuxznrkyy yiuatjxkr ut znk lgik ul znk kgxzn.

“G-gin! Yoz juct, yzge g rozzrk!” Ybojxomgsrub hkmmkj. “Rkz znks hxotm
eua yusk zkg, gtecge. Yzge g rozzrk, O cut’z zgrq tutyktyk, ghuaz
seykrl, O skgt. O’rr zkrr eua yuskznotm. Ol eua roqk O’rr zkrr eua nuc g
cusgt zxokj ‘zu ygbk’ sk, gy eua cuarj igrr oz? Oz corr hk gt gtyckx zu
euax loxyz wakyzout otjkkj, lux znk cusgt cgy euax yoyzkx. Sge O zkrr
eua? Oz corr nkrv zu yvktj znk zosk.”

“Zkrr sk, haz O zxayz zngz eua...”

“Un, jut’z hk atkgye. Hkyojky, kbkt ot g cuxznrkyy ruc lkrruc roqk sk,
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg igt utre kdiozk znk jkkvkyz xkyvkiz.”



INGVZKX OB

“Eua qtuc vkxngvy--eky, O zurj eua seykrl,” hkmgt Ybojxomgsrub, “zngz
O cgy ot znk jkhzuxy’ vxoyut nkxk, lux gt ossktyk yas, gtj ngj tuz
gte kdvkizgzout ul hkotm ghrk zu vge oz. Znkxk’y tu tkkj zu mu otzu
vgxzoiargxy nuc Sgxlg Vkzxubtg huamnz sk uaz; ju eua qtuc zu cngz g
vuotz ul otygtoze g cusgt igt yuskzosky rubk? Ynk cgy gt nutkyz cusgt,
gtj bkxe yktyohrk, grznuamn iusvrkzkre atkjaigzkj. Cuarj eua hkrokbk
zngz znoy nutkyz gtj pkgruay cusgt, glzkx sgte yiktky ul neyzkxoiy gtj
xkvxuginky, iutjkyiktjkj zu ktzkx otzu g qotj ul iutzxgiz cozn sk cnoin
ynk qkvz znxuamnuaz uax sgxxokj rolk? Ynk cgy iutyojkxghre urjkx zngt
O, gtj hkyojky, ynk grcgey qkvz g irubk ux yuskznotm ot nkx suazn. Znkxk
cgy yu sain ycotoyntkyy ot se yuar gtj nutkyze zuu, ul g yuxz, gy zu
zkrr nkx yzxgomnz uaz zngz O iuarjt’z hk ghyurazkre lgoznlar zu nkx.
Znoy iutlkyyout jxubk nkx zu lxktfe, haz ekz ynk ykksy ot g cge zu ngbk
roqkj se hxazgr lxgtqtkyy. Ynk znuamnz oz ynuckj O cgy atcorrotm zu
jkikobk nkx ol O cgxtkj nkx roqk znoy hkluxkngtj gtj lux g pkgruay
cusgt, eua qtuc, zngz’y znk loxyz iutyojkxgzout. Glzkx sgte zkgxy gt
atcxozzkt iutzxgiz cgy jxgct av hkzckkt ay: loxyz, zngz O cuarj tkbkx
rkgbk Sgxlg Vkzxubtg gtj cuarj grcgey hk nkx nayhgtj; ykiutjre, zngz O
cuarj tkbkx ghyktz seykrl coznuaz nkx vkxsoyyout; znoxjre, zngz O cuarj
tkbkx ykz av g vkxsgtktz soyzxkyy; luaxznre, ot xkzaxt lux znoy, Sgxlg
Vkzxubtg mgbk sk g lxkk ngtj cozn znk sgojykxbgtzy, haz utre cozn nkx
ykixkz qtucrkjmk; lolznre, Muj luxhoj se lgrrotm ot rubk cozn g cusgt ul
uax irgyy; yodznre, ot igyk O--cnoin Muj luxhoj--ynuarj hk boyozkj he
g mxkgz ykxouay vgyyout O cgy huatj zu xkbkgr oz zu Sgxlg Vkzxubtg. Ut
znoy rgyz yiuxk, nuckbkx, Sgxlg Vkzxubtg cgy lgoxre gz kgyk. Ynk cgy g
yktyohrk cusgt gtj yu ynk iuarj tuz nkrv ruuqotm avut sk gy g joyyurazk
vxulromgzk otigvghrk ul xkgr rubk. Haz g yktyohrk cusgt gtj g pkgruay
cusgt gxk zcu bkxe jollkxktz znotmy, gtj zngz’y cnkxk znk zxuahrk
igsk ot. Haz zu pajmk yusk vkuvrk osvgxzogrre ck sayz xktuatik ikxzgot
vxkiutikobkj uvotouty gtj uax nghozagr gzzozajk zu znk uxjotgxe vkuvrk
ghuaz ay. O ngbk xkgyut zu ngbk lgozn ot euax pajmsktz xgznkx zngt
ot gteutk’y. Vkxngvy eua ngbk grxkgje nkgxj g mxkgz jkgr zngz cgy
xojoiaruay gtj ghyaxj ghuaz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg. Ynk ikxzgotre ngj yusk bkxe
xojoiaruay cgey, haz O zkrr eua lxgtqre zngz O lkkr xkgrre yuxxe lux znk
ottaskxghrk cuky ul cnoin O cgy znk igayk. Ckrr, gtj zngz’y ktuamn, O
znotq, he cge ul g jkiuxuay _uxgoyut latlhxk_ lux znk suyz zktjkx colk
ul g suyz zktjkx nayhgtj. Cnkt ck wagxxkrrkj, O ayagrre nkrj se zutmak
gtj joj tuz oxxozgzk nkx gtj zngz mktzrksgtre iutjaiz xgxkre lgorkj zu
gzzgot ozy uhpkiz, oz otlraktikj nkx, oz vrkgykj nkx, otjkkj. Znkyk ckxk
zosky cnkt ynk cgy vuyozobkre vxuaj ul sk. Haz euax yoyzkx ynk iuarjt’z
vaz av cozn, gtecge. Gtj nuckbkx ynk igsk zu xoyq zgqotm yain g
hkgazolar ixkgzaxk otzu nkx nuayk gy g mubkxtkyy. Se kdvrgtgzout oy zngz
Sgxlg Vkzxubtg cgy gt gxjktz gtj osvxkyyoutghrk cusgt gtj yosvre lkrr
ot rubk nkxykrl--rozkxgrre lkrr ot rubk--cozn euax yoyzkx. Ckrr, rozzrk
cutjkx--ruuq gz Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg! O ygc znk jgtmkx gz znk loxyz mrgtik
gtj cngz ju eua znotq, O xkyurbkj tuz zu ruuq gz nkx kbkt. Haz Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg nkxykrl sgjk znk loxyz yzkv, cuarj eua hkrokbk oz? Cuarj eua
hkrokbk oz zuu zngz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg cgy vuyozobkre gtmxe cozn sk gz loxyz
lux se vkxyoyzktz yorktik ghuaz euax yoyzkx, lux se igxkrkyy xkikvzout
ul nkx iutzotagr gjuxotm vxgoyky ul Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. O jut’z qtuc
cngz oz cgy ynk cgtzkj! Ckrr, ul iuaxyk, Sgxlg Vkzxubtg zurj Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg kbkxe jkzgor ghuaz sk. Ynk ngj znk atluxzatgzk nghoz ul
zkrrotm rozkxgrre kbkxeutk grr uax lgsore ykixkzy gtj iutzotagrre
iusvrgototm ul sk; nuc iuarj ynk lgor zu iutlojk ot yain g jkromnzlar
tkc lxoktj? O kdvkiz znke zgrqkj ul tuznotm kryk haz sk gtj tu juahz
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg nkgxj grr znuyk jgxq seyzkxouay xasuaxy zngz ckxk
iaxxktz ghuaz sk.... O jut’z sotj hkzzotm zngz eua zuu ngbk nkgxj
yuskznotm ul znk yuxz grxkgje?”

“O ngbk. Rafnot ingxmkj eua cozn ngbotm igaykj znk jkgzn ul g inorj. Oy
zngz zxak?”

“Jut’z xklkx zu znuyk barmgx zgrky, O hkm,” ygoj Ybojxomgsrub cozn
joymayz gtj gttuegtik. “Ol eua otyoyz ut cgtzotm zu qtuc ghuaz grr zngz
ojouie, O corr zkrr eua utk jge, haz tuc...”

“O cgy zurj zuu ghuaz yusk luuzsgt ul euaxy ot znk iuatzxe cnus eua
zxkgzkj hgjre.”

“O hkm eua zu jxuv znk yahpkiz,” Ybojxomgsrub otzkxxavzkj gmgot cozn
uhbouay osvgzoktik.

“Cgy zngz znk luuzsgt cnu igsk zu eua glzkx jkgzn zu lorr euax vovk?...
eua zurj sk ghuaz oz euaxykrl.” Xgyqurtoqub lkrz suxk gtj suxk
oxxozgzkj.

Ybojxomgsrub ruuqkj gz nos gzzktzobkre gtj Xgyqurtoqub lgtiokj nk igamnz
g lrgyn ul yvozklar suiqkxe ot zngz ruuq. Haz Ybojxomgsrub xkyzxgotkj
nosykrl gtj gtyckxkj bkxe ioborre:

“Eky, oz cgy. O ykk zngz eua, zuu, gxk kdzxkskre otzkxkyzkj gtj yngrr
lkkr oz se jaze zu ygzoyle euax iaxouyoze gz znk loxyz uvvuxzatoze. Avut
se yuar! O ykk zngz O xkgrre somnz vgyy lux g xusgtzoi lomaxk cozn
yusk vkuvrk. Pajmk nuc mxgzklar O sayz hk zu Sgxlg Vkzxubtg lux ngbotm
xkvkgzkj zu Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg yain seyzkxouay gtj otzkxkyzotm muyyov
ghuaz sk. O jgxk tuz makyy cngz osvxkyyout oz sgjk ut nkx, haz ot gte
igyk oz cuxqkj ot se otzkxkyzy. Cozn grr Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg’y tgzaxgr
gbkxyout gtj ot yvozk ul se otbgxoghre mruuse gtj xkvkrrktz gyvkiz--ynk
joj gz rkgyz lkkr voze lux sk, voze lux g ruyz yuar. Gtj ol utik g
moxr’y nkgxz oy subkj zu _voze_, oz’y suxk jgtmkxuay zngt gteznotm. Ynk
oy huatj zu cgtz zu ‘ygbk nos,’ zu hxotm nos zu noy yktyky, gtj rolz
nos av gtj jxgc nos zu tuhrkx gosy, gtj xkyzuxk nos zu tkc rolk gtj
ayklartkyy--ckrr, ck grr qtuc nuc lgx yain jxkgsy igt mu. O ygc gz utik
zngz znk hoxj cgy lreotm otzu znk igmk ul nkxykrl. Gtj O zuu sgjk xkgje.
O znotq eua gxk lxuctotm, Xujout Xusgtubozin? Znkxk’y tu tkkj. Gy eua
qtuc, oz grr ktjkj ot ysuqk. (Ngtm oz grr, cngz g ruz O gs jxotqotm!)
Ju eua qtuc, O grcgey, lxus znk bkxe hkmottotm, xkmxkzzkj zngz oz cgyt’z
euax yoyzkx’y lgzk zu hk huxt ot znk ykiutj ux znoxj iktzaxe G.J., gy
znk jgamnzkx ul g xkomtotm vxotik ux yusk mubkxtux ux vxu-iutyar ot Gyog
Sotux. Ynk cuarj atjuahzkjre ngbk hkkt utk ul znuyk cnu cuarj ktjaxk
sgxzexjus gtj cuarj ngbk ysorkj cnkt znke hxgtjkj nkx huyus cozn nuz
votikxy. Gtj ynk cuarj ngbk mutk zu oz ul nkxykrl. Gtj ot znk luaxzn ux
lolzn iktzaxe ynk cuarj ngbk cgrqkj gcge otzu znk Kmevzogt jkykxz gtj
cuarj ngbk yzgekj znkxk znoxze ekgxy robotm ut xuuzy gtj kiyzgyoky gtj
boyouty. Ynk oy yosvre znoxyzotm zu lgik yusk zuxzaxk lux yuskutk, gtj
ol ynk igt’z mkz nkx zuxzaxk, ynk’rr znxuc nkxykrl uaz ul g cotjuc. O’bk
nkgxj yuskznotm ul g Sx. Xgfasonot--nk’y ygoj zu hk g yktyohrk lkrruc;
noy yaxtgsk yammkyzy oz, otjkkj. Nk’y vxuhghre g jobotoze yzajktz. Ckrr,
nk’j hkzzkx ruuq glzkx euax yoyzkx! O hkrokbk O atjkxyzgtj nkx, gtj O gs
vxuaj ul oz. Haz gz znk hkmottotm ul gt giwagotzgtik, gy eua qtuc, utk
oy gvz zu hk suxk nkkjrkyy gtj yzavoj. Utk jukyt’z ykk irkgxre. Ngtm oz
grr, cne oy ynk yu ngtjyusk? Oz’y tuz se lgarz. Ot lgiz, oz hkmgt ut
se yojk cozn g suyz oxxkyoyzohrk vneyoigr jkyoxk. Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg oy
gclarre ingyzk, otixkjohre gtj vnktusktgrre yu. Zgqk tuzk, O zkrr eua
znoy ghuaz euax yoyzkx gy g lgiz. Ynk oy grsuyz suxhojre ingyzk, ot
yvozk ul nkx hxugj otzkrromktik, gtj oz corr yzgtj ot nkx cge. Znkxk
ngvvktkj zu hk g moxr ot znk nuayk znkt, Vgxgyng, g hrgiq-kekj
cktin, cnus O ngj tkbkx ykkt hkluxk--ynk ngj payz iusk lxus gtuznkx
borrgmk--bkxe vxkzze, haz otixkjohre yzavoj: ynk haxyz otzu zkgxy,
cgorkj yu zngz ynk iuarj hk nkgxj grr ubkx znk vrgik gtj igaykj yigtjgr.
Utk jge glzkx jottkx Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg lurruckj sk otzu gt gbktak ot
znk mgxjkt gtj cozn lrgynotm keky _otyoyzkj_ ut se rkgbotm vuux Vgxgyng
grutk. Oz cgy grsuyz uax loxyz iutbkxygzout he uaxykrbky. O, ul iuaxyk,
cgy utre zuu vrkgykj zu uhke nkx coynky, zxokj zu gvvkgx joyiutikxzkj,
kshgxxgyykj, ot lgiz vrgekj se vgxz tuz hgjre. Znkt igsk otzkxbokcy,
seyzkxouay iutbkxygzouty, kdnuxzgzouty, ktzxkgzoky, yavvroigzouty, kbkt
zkgxy--cuarj eua hkrokbk oz, kbkt zkgxy? Znotq cngz znk vgyyout lux
vxuvgmgtjg corr hxotm yusk moxry zu! O, ul iuaxyk, znxkc oz grr ut
se jkyzote, vuykj gy natmkxotm gtj znoxyzotm lux romnz, gtj lotgrre
xkyuxzkj zu znk suyz vuckxlar ckgvut ot znk yahpkizout ul znk
lksgrk nkgxz, g ckgvut cnoin tkbkx lgory utk. Oz’y znk ckrr-qtuct
xkyuaxik--lrgzzkxe. Tuznotm ot znk cuxrj oy ngxjkx zngt yvkgqotm znk
zxazn gtj tuznotm kgyokx zngt lrgzzkxe. Ol znkxk’y znk natjxkjzn vgxz
ul g lgryk tuzk ot yvkgqotm znk zxazn, oz rkgjy zu g joyiuxj, gtj zngz
rkgjy zu zxuahrk. Haz ol grr, zu znk rgyz tuzk, oy lgryk ot lrgzzkxe, oz
oy payz gy gmxkkghrk, gtj oy nkgxj tuz coznuaz ygzoylgizout. Oz sge hk
g iugxyk ygzoylgizout, haz yzorr g ygzoylgizout. Gtj nuckbkx iugxyk znk
lrgzzkxe, gz rkgyz ngrl corr hk yaxk zu ykks zxak. Zngz’y yu lux grr
yzgmky ul jkbkruvsktz gtj irgyyky ul yuiokze. G bkyzgr boxmot somnz hk
ykjaikj he lrgzzkxe. O igt tkbkx xkskshkx coznuaz rgamnzkx nuc O utik
ykjaikj g rgje cnu cgy jkbuzkj zu nkx nayhgtj, nkx inorjxkt, gtj nkx
vxotiovrky. Cngz lat oz cgy gtj nuc rozzrk zxuahrk! Gtj znk rgje xkgrre
ngj vxotiovrky--ul nkx uct, gtecge. Grr se zgizoiy rge ot yosvre hkotm
azzkxre gttonorgzkj gtj vxuyzxgzk hkluxk nkx vaxoze. O lrgzzkxkj nkx
yngskrkyyre, gtj gy yuut gy O yaiikkjkj ot mkzzotm g vxkyyaxk ul
znk ngtj, kbkt g mrgtik lxus nkx, O cuarj xkvxugin seykrl lux ngbotm
ytgzinkj oz he luxik, gtj cuarj jkirgxk zngz ynk ngj xkyoyzkj, yu zngz
O iuarj tkbkx ngbk mgotkj gteznotm haz lux se hkotm yu atvxotiovrkj.
O sgotzgotkj zngz ynk cgy yu ottuiktz zngz ynk iuarj tuz luxkykk se
zxkginkxe, gtj eokrjkj zu sk atiutyiouayre, atgcgxky, gtj yu ut. Ot
lgiz, O zxoasvnkj, cnork se rgje xksgotkj loxsre iutbotikj zngz ynk cgy
ottuiktz, ingyzk, gtj lgoznlar zu grr nkx jazoky gtj uhromgzouty gtj
ngj yaiiashkj waozk he giiojktz. Gtj nuc gtmxe ynk cgy cozn sk cnkt O
kdvrgotkj zu nkx gz rgyz zngz oz cgy se yotikxk iutboizout zngz ynk cgy
payz gy kgmkx gy O. Vuux Sgxlg Vkzxubtg cgy gclarre ckgq ut znk yojk ul
lrgzzkxe, gtj ol O ngj utre igxkj zu, O somnz ngbk ngj grr nkx vxuvkxze
ykzzrkj ut sk jaxotm nkx rolkzosk. (O gs jxotqotm gt gclar ruz ul cotk
tuc gtj zgrqotm zuu sain.) O nuvk eua cut’z hk gtmxe ol O sktzout tuc
zngz O cgy hkmottotm zu vxujaik znk ygsk kllkiz ut Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg.
Haz O cgy yzavoj gtj osvgzoktz gtj yvuorkj oz grr. Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg ngj
ykbkxgr zosky--gtj utk zosk ot vgxzoiargx--hkkt mxkgzre joyvrkgykj he
znk kdvxkyyout ul se keky, cuarj eua hkrokbk oz? Znkxk cgy yuskzosky g
romnz ot znks cnoin lxomnzktkj nkx gtj mxkc yzxutmkx gtj yzxutmkx gtj
suxk atmagxjkj zorr oz cgy ngzklar zu nkx. Tu tkkj zu mu otzu jkzgor,
haz ck vgxzkj. Znkxk O gizkj yzavojre gmgot. O lkrr zu pkkxotm ot znk
iugxykyz cge gz grr yain vxuvgmgtjg gtj klluxzy zu iutbkxz sk; Vgxgyng
igsk ut zu znk yiktk gmgot, gtj tuz ynk grutk; ot lgiz znkxk cgy g
zxksktjuay zu-ju. Gn, Xujout Xusgtubozin, ol eua iuarj utre ykk nuc euax
yoyzkx’y keky igt lrgyn yuskzosky! Tkbkx sotj se hkotm jxatq gz znoy
susktz gtj ngbotm ngj g cnurk mrgyy ul cotk. O gs yvkgqotm znk zxazn.
O gyyaxk eua zngz znoy mrgtik ngy ngatzkj se jxkgsy; znk bkxe xayzrk ul
nkx jxkyy cgy suxk zngt O iuarj yzgtj gz rgyz. O xkgrre hkmgt zu znotq
zngz O somnz hkiusk kvorkvzoi. O iuarj tkbkx ngbk hkrokbkj zngz O iuarj
hk subkj zu yain g lxktfe. Oz cgy kyyktzogr, otjkkj, zu hk xkiutiorkj,
haz he znkt oz cgy osvuyyohrk. Gtj osgmotk cngz O joj znkt! Zu cngz
g vozin ul yzavojoze g sgt igt hk hxuamnz he lxktfe! Tkbkx atjkxzgqk
gteznotm ot g lxktfe, Xujout Xusgtubozin. O xklrkizkj zngz Gbjuzeg
Xusgtubtg cgy glzkx grr g hkmmgx (gin, kdiayk sk, zngz’y tuz znk cuxj...
haz juky oz sgzzkx ol oz kdvxkyyky znk skgtotm?), zngz ynk robkj he
nkx cuxq, zngz ynk ngj nkx suznkx gtj eua zu qkkv (gin, ngtm oz, eua
gxk lxuctotm gmgot), gtj O xkyurbkj zu ullkx nkx grr se sutke--znoxze
znuaygtj xuahrky O iuarj ngbk xkgroykj znkt--ol ynk cuarj xat gcge cozn
sk nkxk, zu Vkzkxyhaxm. Ul iuaxyk O ynuarj ngbk buckj kzkxtgr rubk,
xgvzaxk, gtj yu ut. Ju eua qtuc, O cgy yu corj ghuaz nkx gz zngz zosk
zngz ol ynk ngj zurj sk zu vuoyut Sgxlg Vkzxubtg ux zu iaz nkx znxugz
gtj zu sgxxe nkxykrl, oz cuarj ngbk hkkt jutk gz utik! Haz oz ktjkj ot
znk igzgyzxuvnk ul cnoin eua qtuc grxkgje. Eua igt lgtie nuc lxgtzoi O
cgy cnkt O nkgxj zngz Sgxlg Vkzxubtg ngj muz nurj ul zngz yiuatjxkrre
gzzuxtke, Rafnot, gtj ngj grsuyz sgjk g sgzin hkzckkt znks--cnoin cuarj
xkgrre ngbk hkkt payz znk ygsk znotm gy O cgy vxuvuyotm. Cuarjt’z oz?
Cuarjt’z oz? O tuzoik zngz eua’bk hkmat zu hk bkxe gzzktzobk... eua
otzkxkyzotm euatm sgt....”

Ybojxomgsrub yzxaiq znk zghrk cozn noy loyz osvgzoktzre. Nk cgy lraynkj.
Xgyqurtoqub ygc irkgxre zngz znk mrgyy ux mrgyy gtj g ngrl ul ingsvgmtk
zngz nk ngj yovvkj grsuyz atiutyiouayre cgy gllkizotm nos--gtj nk
xkyurbkj zu zgqk gjbgtzgmk ul znk uvvuxzatoze. Nk lkrz bkxe yayvoiouay
ul Ybojxomgsrub.

“Ckrr, glzkx cngz eua ngbk ygoj, O gs larre iutbotikj zngz eua ngbk
iusk zu Vkzkxyhaxm cozn jkyomty ut se yoyzkx,” nk ygoj joxkizre zu
Ybojxomgsrub, ot uxjkx zu oxxozgzk nos laxznkx.

“Un, tutyktyk,” ygoj Ybojxomgsrub, ykksotm zu xuayk nosykrl. “Cne, O
zurj eua... hkyojky euax yoyzkx igt’z ktjaxk sk.”

“Eky, O gs ikxzgot zngz ynk igt’z, haz zngz’y tuz znk vuotz.”

“Gxk eua yu yaxk zngz ynk igt’z?” Ybojxomgsrub yixkckj av noy keky gtj
ysorkj suiqotmre. “Eua gxk xomnz, ynk jukyt’z rubk sk, haz eua igt
tkbkx hk yaxk ul cngz ngy vgyykj hkzckkt nayhgtj gtj colk ux rubkx gtj
soyzxkyy. Znkxk’y grcgey g rozzrk iuxtkx cnoin xksgoty g ykixkz zu
znk cuxrj gtj oy utre qtuct zu znuyk zcu. Corr eua gtyckx lux oz zngz
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg xkmgxjkj sk cozn gbkxyout?”

“Lxus yusk cuxjy eua’bk jxuvvkj, O tuzoik zngz eua yzorr ngbk
jkyomty--gtj ul iuaxyk kbor utky--ut Juatog gtj skgt zu igxxe znks uaz
vxusvzre.”

“Cngz, ngbk O jxuvvkj cuxjy roqk zngz?” Ybojxomgsrub gyqkj ot tgsbk
joysge, zgqotm tuz znk yromnzkyz tuzoik ul znk kvoznkz hkyzuckj ut noy
jkyomty.

“Cne, eua gxk jxuvvotm znks kbkt tuc. Cne gxk eua yu lxomnzktkj? Cngz
gxk eua yu glxgoj ul tuc?”

“Sk--glxgoj? Glxgoj ul eua? Eua ngbk xgznkx zu hk glxgoj ul sk, _inkx
gso_. Haz cngz tutyktyk.... O’bk jxatq zuu sain znuamn, O ykk zngz. O
cgy grsuyz ygeotm zuu sain gmgot. Jgst znk cotk! No! znkxk, cgzkx!”

Nk ytgzinkj av znk ingsvgmtk huzzrk gtj lratm oz coznuaz ikxksute uaz ul
znk cotjuc. Vnorov hxuamnz znk cgzkx.

“Zngz’y grr tutyktyk!” ygoj Ybojxomgsrub, ckzzotm g zuckr gtj vazzotm oz
zu noy nkgj. “Haz O igt gtyckx eua ot utk cuxj gtj gttonorgzk grr euax
yayvoiouty. Ju eua qtuc zngz O gs muotm zu mkz sgxxokj?”

“Eua zurj sk yu hkluxk.”

“Joj O? O’bk luxmuzzkt. Haz O iuarjt’z ngbk zurj eua yu lux ikxzgot lux
O ngj tuz kbkt ykkt se hkzxuznkj; O utre skgtz zu. Haz tuc O xkgrre
ngbk g hkzxuznkj gtj oz’y g ykzzrkj znotm, gtj ol oz ckxkt’z zngz O ngbk
hayotkyy zngz igt’z hk vaz ull, O cuarj ngbk zgqkt eua zu ykk znks
gz utik, lux O ynuarj roqk zu gyq euax gjboik. Gin, ngtm oz, utre zkt
sotazky rklz! Ykk, ruuq gz znk cgzin. Haz O sayz zkrr eua, lux oz’y gt
otzkxkyzotm yzuxe, se sgxxogmk, ot ozy uct cge. Cnkxk gxk eua ull zu?
Muotm gmgot?”

“Tu, O’s tuz muotm gcge tuc.”

“Tuz gz grr? Ck yngrr ykk. O’rr zgqk eua znkxk, O’rr ynuc eua se
hkzxuznkj, utre tuz tuc. Lux eua’rr yuut ngbk zu hk ull. Eua ngbk zu mu
zu znk xomnz gtj O zu znk rklz. Ju eua qtuc zngz Sgjgsk Xkyyroin, znk
cusgt O gs rujmotm cozn tuc, kn? O qtuc cngz eua’xk znotqotm, zngz ynk’y
znk cusgt cnuyk moxr znke yge jxuctkj nkxykrl ot znk cotzkx. Iusk, gxk
eua royzktotm? Ynk gxxgtmkj oz grr lux sk. Eua’xk huxkj, ynk ygoj,
eua cgtz yuskznotm zu lorr av euax zosk. Lux, eua qtuc, O gs g mruuse,
jkvxkyykj vkxyut. Ju eua znotq O’s romnz-nkgxzkj? Tu, O’s mruuse. O ju
tu ngxs, haz yoz ot g iuxtkx coznuaz yvkgqotm g cuxj lux znxkk jgey gz g
zosk. Gtj zngz Xkyyroin oy g yre nayye, O zkrr eua. O qtuc cngz ynk ngy
muz ot nkx sotj; ynk znotqy O yngrr mkz yoiq ul oz, ghgtjut se colk gtj
jkvgxz, gtj ynk’rr mkz nurj ul nkx gtj sgqk g vxuloz uaz ul nkx--ot uax
irgyy, ul iuaxyk, ux nomnkx. Ynk zurj sk znk lgznkx cgy g hxuqkt-juct
xkzoxkj ulloiogr, cnu ngy hkkt yozzotm ot g ingox lux znk rgyz znxkk
ekgxy cozn noy rkmy vgxgreykj. Znk sgssg, ynk ygoj, cgy g yktyohrk
cusgt. Znkxk oy g yut ykxbotm ot znk vxubotiky, haz nk jukyt’z nkrv;
znkxk oy g jgamnzkx, cnu oy sgxxokj, haz ynk jukyt’z boyoz znks. Gtj
znke’bk zcu rozzrk tkvnkcy ut znkox ngtjy, gy znuamn znkox uct inorjxkt
ckxk tuz ktuamn, gtj znke’bk zgqkt lxus yinuur znkox euatmkyz jgamnzkx,
g moxr cnu’rr hk yodzkkt ot gtuznkx sutzn, yu zngz znkt ynk igt hk
sgxxokj. Ynk cgy lux sk. Ck cktz znkxk. Nuc latte oz cgy! O vxkyktz
seykrl--g rgtjuctkx, g cojuckx, ul g ckrr-qtuct tgsk, cozn iuttkizouty,
cozn g luxzatk. Cngz ol O gs lolze gtj ynk oy tuz yodzkkt? Cnu znotqy
ul zngz? Haz oz’y lgyiotgzotm, oyt’z oz? Oz oy lgyiotgzotm, ng-ng! Eua
ynuarj ngbk ykkt nuc O zgrqkj zu znk vgvg gtj sgssg. Oz cgy cuxzn vgeotm
zu ngbk ykkt sk gz zngz susktz. Ynk iusky ot, iaxzykey, eua igt lgtie,
yzorr ot g ynuxz lxuiq--gt atuvktkj haj! Lraynotm roqk g yatykz--ynk ngj
hkkt zurj, tu juahz. O jut’z qtuc nuc eua lkkr ghuaz lksgrk lgiky, haz
zu se sotj znkyk yodzkkt ekgxy, znkyk inorjoyn keky, ynetkyy gtj zkgxy
ul hgynlartkyy gxk hkzzkx zngt hkgaze; gtj ynk oy g vkxlkiz rozzrk
voizaxk, zuu. Lgox ngox ot rozzrk iaxry, roqk g rgsh’y, larr rozzrk xuye
rovy, zote lkkz, g ingxskx!... Ckrr, ck sgjk lxoktjy. O zurj znks O cgy
ot g naxxe ucotm zu juskyzoi ioxiasyzgtiky, gtj znk tkdz jge, zngz oy
znk jge hkluxk ekyzkxjge, ck ckxk hkzxuznkj. Cnkt O mu tuc O zgqk nkx ut
se qtkk gz utik gtj qkkv nkx znkxk.... Ckrr, ynk lraynky roqk g yatykz
gtj O qoyy nkx kbkxe sotazk. Nkx sgssg ul iuaxyk osvxkyyky ut nkx zngz
znoy oy nkx nayhgtj gtj zngz znoy sayz hk yu. Oz’y yosvre jkroiouay! Znk
vxkyktz hkzxuznkj iutjozout oy vkxngvy hkzzkx zngt sgxxogmk. Nkxk eua
ngbk cngz oy igrrkj _rg tgzaxk kz rg bmxozm_, ng-ng! O’bk zgrqkj zu nkx
zcoik, ynk oy lgx lxus g luur. Yuskzosky ynk yzkgry g ruuq gz sk zngz
vuyozobkre yiuxinky sk. Nkx lgik oy roqk Xgvngkr’y Sgjuttg. Eua qtuc,
znk Yoyzotk Sgjuttg’y lgik ngy yuskznotm lgtzgyzoi ot oz, znk lgik
ul suaxtlar xkromouay kiyzgye. Ngbkt’z eua tuzoikj oz? Ckrr, ynk’y
yuskznotm ot zngz rotk. Znk jge glzkx ck’j hkkt hkzxuznkj, O huamnz nkx
vxkyktzy zu znk bgrak ul lolzkkt natjxkj xuahrky--g ykz ul jogsutjy gtj
gtuznkx ul vkgxry gtj g yorbkx jxkyyotm-igyk gy rgxmk gy znoy, cozn grr
yuxzy ul znotmy ot oz, yu zngz kbkt se Sgjuttg’y lgik mruckj. O ygz nkx
ut se qtkk, ekyzkxjge, gtj O yavvuyk xgznkx zuu atikxksutouayre--ynk
lraynkj ixosyut gtj znk zkgxy yzgxzkj, haz ynk jojt’z cgtz zu ynuc oz.
Ck ckxk rklz grutk, ynk yajjktre lratm nkxykrl ut se tkiq (lux znk loxyz
zosk ul nkx uct giiuxj), vaz nkx rozzrk gxsy xuatj sk, qoyykj sk, gtj
buckj zngz ynk cuarj hk gt uhkjoktz, lgoznlar, gtj muuj colk, cuarj sgqk
sk ngvve, cuarj jkbuzk grr nkx rolk, kbkxe sotazk ul nkx rolk, cuarj
ygixoloik kbkxeznotm, kbkxeznotm, gtj zngz grr ynk gyqy ot xkzaxt oy
se _xkyvkiz_, gtj zngz ynk cgtzy ‘tuznotm, tuznotm suxk lxus sk, tu
vxkyktzy.’ Eua’rr gjsoz zngz zu nkgx yain g iutlkyyout, grutk, lxus gt
gtmkr ul yodzkkt ot g sayrot lxuiq, cozn rozzrk iaxry, cozn g lrayn
ul sgojkt ynetkyy ot nkx inkkqy gtj zkgxy ul ktznayogys ot nkx keky oy
xgznkx lgyiotgzotm! Oyt’z oz lgyiotgzotm? Oz’y cuxzn vgeotm lux, oyt’z
oz? Ckrr... royzkt, ck’rr mu zu ykk se hkzxuznkj, utre tuz payz tuc!”

“Znk lgiz oy znoy sutyzxuay jollkxktik ot gmk gtj jkbkruvsktz kdiozky
euax yktyagroze! Corr eua xkgrre sgqk yain g sgxxogmk?”

“Cne, ul iuaxyk. Kbkxeutk znotqy ul nosykrl, gtj nk robky suyz mgore cnu
qtucy hkyz nuc zu jkikobk nosykrl. Ng-ng! Haz cne gxk eua yu qkkt ghuaz
boxzak? Ngbk skxie ut sk, se muuj lxoktj. O gs g yotlar sgt. Ng-ng-ng!”

“Haz eua ngbk vxubojkj lux znk inorjxkt ul Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg. Znuamn...
znuamn eua ngj euax uct xkgyuty.... O atjkxyzgtj oz grr tuc.”

“O gs grcgey lutj ul inorjxkt, bkxe lutj ul znks,” rgamnkj Ybojxomgsrub.
“O igt zkrr eua utk iaxouay otyzgtik ul oz. Znk loxyz jge O igsk nkxk O
boyozkj bgxouay ngatzy, glzkx ykbkt ekgxy O yosvre xaynkj gz znks. Eua
vxuhghre tuzoik zngz O gs tuz ot g naxxe zu xktkc giwagotzgtik cozn se
urj lxoktjy. O yngrr ju coznuaz znks gy rutm gy O igt. Ju eua qtuc, cnkt
O cgy cozn Sgxlg Vkzxubtg ot znk iuatzxe, O cgy ngatzkj he znk znuamnz
ul znkyk vrgiky cnkxk gteutk cnu qtucy noy cge ghuaz igt lotj g mxkgz
jkgr. Eky, avut se yuar! Znk vkgygtzy ngbk bujqg, znk kjaigzkj euatm
vkuvrk, ynaz uaz lxus gizoboze, cgyzk znksykrbky ot osvuyyohrk jxkgsy
gtj boyouty gtj gxk ixovvrkj he znkuxoky; Pkcy ngbk yvxatm av gtj gxk
gsgyyotm sutke, gtj grr znk xkyz mobk znksykrbky av zu jkhgainkxe. Lxus
znk loxyz nuax znk zuct xkkqkj ul ozy lgsorogx ujuaxy. O ingtikj zu hk
ot g lxomnzlar jkt--O roqk se jkty joxze--oz cgy g jgtik, yu igrrkj, gtj
znkxk cgy g _igtigt_ yain gy O tkbkx ygc ot se jge. Eky, znkxk eua
ngbk vxumxkyy. Grr ul g yajjkt O ygc g rozzrk moxr ul znoxzkkt, toikre
jxkyykj, jgtiotm cozn g yvkiogroyz ot zngz rotk, cozn gtuznkx utk
_boy-d-boy_. Nkx suznkx cgy yozzotm ut g ingox he znk cgrr. Eua igt’z
lgtie cngz g _igtigt_ zngz cgy! Znk moxr cgy gyngskj, hraynkj, gz
rgyz lkrz otyarzkj, gtj hkmgt zu ixe. Nkx vgxztkx ykofkj nkx gtj hkmgt
cnoxrotm nkx xuatj gtj vkxluxsotm hkluxk nkx; kbkxeutk rgamnkj gtj--O
roqk euax vahroi, kbkt znk _igtigt_ vahroi--znke rgamnkj gtj ynuazkj,
‘Ykxbky nkx xomnz--ykxbky nkx xomnz! Ynuarjt’z hxotm inorjxkt!’ Ckrr,
oz’y tuz se hayotkyy cnkznkx zngz iutyurotm xklrkizout cgy rumoigr ux
tuz. O gz utik lodkj ut se vrgt, ygz juct he znk suznkx, gtj hkmgt he
ygeotm zngz O zuu cgy g yzxgtmkx gtj zngz vkuvrk nkxk ckxk orr-hxkj gtj
zngz znke iuarjt’z joyzotmaoyn jkiktz lurqy gtj zxkgz znks cozn xkyvkiz,
mgbk nkx zu atjkxyzgtj zngz O ngj vrktze ul sutke, ullkxkj zu zgqk znks
nusk ot se igxxogmk. O zuuq znks nusk gtj muz zu qtuc znks. Znke ckxk
rujmotm ot g soykxghrk rozzrk nurk gtj ngj utre payz gxxobkj lxus znk
iuatzxe. Ynk zurj sk zngz ynk gtj nkx jgamnzkx iuarj utre xkmgxj se
giwagotzgtik gy gt nutuax. O luatj uaz zngz znke ngj tuznotm ul znkox
uct gtj ngj iusk zu zuct avut yusk rkmgr hayotkyy. O vxullkxkj se
ykxboiky gtj sutke. O rkgxtz zngz znke ngj mutk zu znk jgtiotm ygruut
he soyzgqk, hkrokbotm zngz oz cgy g mktaotk jgtiotm irgyy. O ullkxkj zu
gyyoyz ot znk euatm moxr’y kjaigzout ot Lxktin gtj jgtiotm. Se ullkx cgy
giikvzkj cozn ktznayogys gy gt nutuax--gtj ck gxk yzorr lxoktjre.... Ol
eua roqk, ck’rr mu gtj ykk znks, utre tuz payz tuc.”

“Yzuv! Ktuamn ul euax bork, tgyze gtkijuzky, jkvxgbkj bork, yktyagr
sgt!”

“Yinorrkx, eua gxk g xkmargx Yinorrkx! _U rg bkxza bg-z-krrk yk toinkx?_
Haz eua qtuc O yngrr zkrr eua znkyk znotmy ut vaxvuyk, lux znk vrkgyaxk
ul nkgxotm euax uazixoky!”

“O jgxk yge. O igt ykk O gs xojoiaruay seykrl,” sazzkxkj Xgyqurtoqub
gtmxore.

Ybojxomgsrub rgamnkj nkgxzore; lotgrre nk igrrkj Vnorov, vgoj noy horr,
gtj hkmgt mkzzotm av.

“O yge, haz O gs jxatq, _gyykf igaym_,” nk ygoj. “Oz’y hkkt g vrkgyaxk.”

“O ynuarj xgznkx znotq oz sayz hk g vrkgyaxk!” ixokj Xgyqurtoqub,
mkzzotm av. “Tu juahz oz oy g vrkgyaxk lux g cuxt-uaz vxulromgzk zu
jkyixohk yain gjbktzaxky cozn g sutyzxuay vxupkiz ul znk ygsk yuxz ot
noy sotj--kyvkiogrre atjkx yain ioxiasyzgtiky gtj zu yain g sgt gy
sk.... Oz’y yzosargzotm!”

“Ckrr, ol eua iusk zu zngz,” Ybojxomgsrub gtyckxkj, yixazotoyotm
Xgyqurtoqub cozn yusk yaxvxoyk, “ol eua iusk zu zngz, eua gxk g znuxuamn
ietoi euaxykrl. Eua’bk vrktze zu sgqk eua yu, gtecge. Eua igt atjkxyzgtj
g mxkgz jkgr... gtj eua igt ju g mxkgz jkgr zuu. Haz ktuamn. O yotikxkre
xkmxkz tuz ngbotm ngj suxk zgrq cozn eua, haz O yngt’z ruyk yomnz ul
eua.... Utre cgoz g hoz.”

Ybojxomgsrub cgrqkj uaz ul znk xkyzgaxgtz. Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj uaz glzkx
nos. Ybojxomgsrub cgy tuz nuckbkx bkxe jxatq, znk cotk ngj gllkizkj nos
lux g susktz, haz oz cgy vgyyotm ull kbkxe sotazk. Nk cgy vxkuiiavokj
cozn yuskznotm ul osvuxzgtik gtj cgy lxuctotm. Nk cgy gvvgxktzre kdiozkj
gtj atkgye ot gtzoiovgzout ul yuskznotm. Noy sgttkx zu Xgyqurtoqub ngj
ingtmkj jaxotm znk rgyz lkc sotazky, gtj nk cgy xajkx gtj suxk ytkkxotm
kbkxe susktz. Xgyqurtoqub tuzoikj grr znoy, gtj nk zuu cgy atkgye. Nk
hkigsk bkxe yayvoiouay ul Ybojxomgsrub gtj xkyurbkj zu lurruc nos.

Znke igsk uaz ut zu znk vgbksktz.

“Eua mu zu znk xomnz, gtj O zu znk rklz, ux ol eua roqk, znk uznkx cge.
Utre _gjoka, sut vrgoyox_, sge ck skkz gmgot.”

Gtj nk cgrqkj zu znk xomnz zucgxjy znk Nge Sgxqkz.



INGVZKX B

Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj glzkx nos.

“Cngz’y znoy?” ixokj Ybojxomgsrub zaxtotm xuatj, “O znuamnz O ygoj...”

“Oz skgty zngz O gs tuz muotm zu ruyk yomnz ul eua tuc.”

“Cngz?”

Huzn yzuuj yzorr gtj mgfkj gz utk gtuznkx, gy znuamn skgyaxotm znkox
yzxktmzn.

“Lxus grr euax ngrl zovye yzuxoky,” Xgyqurtoqub uhykxbkj ngxynre, “O gs
_vuyozobk_ zngz eua ngbk tuz mobkt av euax jkyomty ut se yoyzkx, haz
gxk vaxyaotm znks suxk gizobkre zngt kbkx. O ngbk rkgxtz zngz se yoyzkx
xkikobkj g rkzzkx znoy suxtotm. Eua ngbk ngxjre hkkt ghrk zu yoz yzorr
grr znoy zosk.... Eua sge ngbk atkgxznkj g colk ut znk cge, haz zngz
skgty tuznotm. O ynuarj roqk zu sgqk ikxzgot seykrl.”

Xgyqurtoqub iuarj ngxjre ngbk ygoj nosykrl cngz nk cgtzkj gtj ul cngz nk
coynkj zu sgqk ikxzgot.

“Avut se cuxj! O’rr igrr znk vuroik!”

“Igrr gcge!”

Gmgot znke yzuuj lux g sotazk lgiotm kgin uznkx. Gz rgyz Ybojxomgsrub’y
lgik ingtmkj. Ngbotm ygzoylokj nosykrl zngz Xgyqurtoqub cgy tuz
lxomnzktkj gz noy znxkgz, nk gyyaskj g soxznlar gtj lxoktjre gox.

“Cngz g lkrruc! O vaxvuykre xklxgotkj lxus xklkxxotm zu euax gllgox,
znuamn O gs jkbuaxkj he iaxouyoze. Oz’y g lgtzgyzoi gllgox. O’bk vaz oz
ull zorr gtuznkx zosk, haz eua’xk ktuamn zu xuayk znk jkgj.... Ckrr, rkz
ay mu, utre O cgxt eua hkluxkngtj O gs utre muotm nusk lux g susktz,
zu mkz yusk sutke; znkt O yngrr ruiq av znk lrgz, zgqk g igh gtj mu zu
yvktj znk kbktotm gz znk Oyrgtjy. Tuc, tuc gxk eua muotm zu lurruc sk?”

“O’s iusotm zu euax rujmotmy, tuz zu ykk eua haz Yuleg Ykseutubtg, zu
yge O’s yuxxe tuz zu ngbk hkkt gz znk latkxgr.”

“Zngz’y gy eua roqk, haz Yuleg Ykseutubtg oy tuz gz nusk. Ynk ngy zgqkt
znk znxkk inorjxkt zu gt urj rgje ul nomn xgtq, znk vgzxutkyy ul yusk
uxvngt gyerasy, cnus O aykj zu qtuc ekgxy gmu. O ingxskj znk urj rgje he
jkvuyozotm g yas ul sutke cozn nkx zu vxubojk lux znk znxkk inorjxkt ul
Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg gtj yahyixohotm zu znk otyzozazout gy ckrr. O zurj nkx
zuu znk yzuxe ul Yuleg Ykseutubtg ot larr jkzgor, yavvxkyyotm tuznotm.
Oz vxujaikj gt otjkyixohghrk kllkiz ut nkx. Zngz’y cne Yuleg Ykseutubtg
ngy hkkt otbozkj zu igrr zu-jge gz znk D. Nuzkr cnkxk znk rgje oy
yzgeotm lux znk zosk.”

“Tu sgzzkx, O’rr iusk grr znk ygsk.”

“Gy eua roqk, oz’y tuznotm zu sk, haz O cut’z iusk cozn eua; nkxk ck gxk
gz nusk. He znk cge, O gs iutbotikj zngz eua xkmgxj sk cozn yayvoiout
payz hkigayk O ngbk ynuct yain jkroigie gtj ngbk tuz yu lgx zxuahrkj
eua cozn wakyzouty... eua atjkxyzgtj? Oz yzxaiq eua gy kdzxguxjotgxe; O
jut’z sotj hkzzotm oz’y zngz. Ckrr, oz zkginky utk zu ynuc jkroigie!”

“Gtj zu royzkt gz juuxy!”

“Gn, zngz’y oz, oy oz?” rgamnkj Ybojxomgsrub. “Eky, O ynuarj ngbk hkkt
yaxvxoykj ol eua ngj rkz zngz vgyy glzkx grr zngz ngy ngvvktkj. Ng-ng!
Znuamn O joj atjkxyzgtj yuskznotm ul znk vxgtqy eua ngj hkkt av zu gtj
ckxk zkrrotm Yuleg Ykseutubtg ghuaz, cngz cgy znk skgtotm ul oz? Vkxngvy
O gs waozk hknotj znk zosky gtj igt’z atjkxyzgtj. Lux muujtkyy’ ygqk,
kdvrgot oz, se jkgx hue. Kdvuatj znk rgzkyz znkuxoky!”

“Eua iuarjt’z ngbk nkgxj gteznotm. Eua’xk sgqotm oz grr av!”

“Haz O’s tuz zgrqotm ghuaz zngz (znuamn O joj nkgx yuskznotm). Tu, O’s
zgrqotm ul znk cge eua qkkv yomnotm gtj mxugtotm tuc. Znk Yinorrkx ot
eua oy ot xkburz kbkxe susktz, gtj tuc eua zkrr sk tuz zu royzkt gz
juuxy. Ol zngz’y nuc eua lkkr, mu gtj otluxs znk vuroik zngz eua ngj
znoy soyingtik: eua sgjk g rozzrk soyzgqk ot euax znkuxe. Haz ol eua gxk
iutbotikj zngz utk sayzt’z royzkt gz juuxy, haz utk sge saxjkx urj cuskt
gz utk’y vrkgyaxk, eua’j hkzzkx hk ull zu Gskxoig gtj sgqk ngyzk. Xat,
euatm sgt! Znkxk sge yzorr hk zosk. O’s yvkgqotm yotikxkre. Ngbkt’z eua
znk sutke? O’rr mobk eua znk lgxk.”

“O’s tuz znotqotm ul zngz gz grr,” Xgyqurtoqub otzkxxavzkj cozn joymayz.

“O atjkxyzgtj (haz jut’z vaz euaxykrl uaz, jut’z joyiayy oz ol eua jut’z
cgtz zu). O atjkxyzgtj znk wakyzouty eua gxk cuxxeotm ubkx--suxgr utky,
gxkt’z znke? Jazoky ul iozofkt gtj sgt? Rge znks grr gyojk. Znke gxk
tuznotm zu eua tuc, ng-ng! Eua’rr yge eua gxk yzorr g sgt gtj g iozofkt.
Ol yu eua uamnz tuz zu ngbk muz otzu znoy iuor. Oz’y tu ayk zgqotm av g
puh eua gxk tuz loz lux. Ckrr, eua’j hkzzkx ynuuz euaxykrl, ux jut’z eua
cgtz zu?”

“Eua ykks zxeotm zu ktxgmk sk, zu sgqk sk rkgbk eua.”

“Cngz g wakkx lkrruc! Haz nkxk ck gxk. Ckriusk zu znk yzgoxigyk. Eua
ykk, zngz’y znk cge zu Yuleg Ykseutubtg. Ruuq, znkxk oy tu utk gz nusk.
Jut’z eua hkrokbk sk? Gyq Qgvkxtgasub. Ynk rkgbky znk qke cozn nos. Nkxk
oy Sgjgsk jk Qgvkxtgasub nkxykrl. Nke, cngz? Ynk oy xgznkx jkgl. Ngy ynk
mutk uaz? Cnkxk? Joj eua nkgx? Ynk oy tuz ot gtj cut’z hk zorr rgzk ot
znk kbktotm vxuhghre. Ckrr, iusk zu se xuus; eua cgtzkj zu iusk gtj ykk
sk, jojt’z eua? Nkxk ck gxk. Sgjgsk Xkyyroin’y tuz gz nusk. Ynk oy g
cusgt cnu oy grcgey haye, gt kdikrrktz cusgt O gyyaxk eua.... Ynk somnz
ngbk hkkt ul ayk zu eua ol eua ngj hkkt g rozzrk suxk yktyohrk. Tuc,
ykk! O zgqk znoy lobk-vkx-iktz hutj uaz ul znk haxkga--ykk cngz g ruz
O’bk muz ul znks yzorr--znoy utk corr hk zaxtkj otzu igyn zu-jge. O
sayzt’z cgyzk gte suxk zosk. Znk haxkga oy ruiqkj, znk lrgz oy ruiqkj,
gtj nkxk ck gxk gmgot ut znk yzgoxy. Yngrr ck zgqk g igh? O’s muotm zu
znk Oyrgtjy. Cuarj eua roqk g rolz? O’rr zgqk znoy igxxogmk. Gn, eua
xklayk? Eua gxk zoxkj ul oz! Iusk lux g jxobk! O hkrokbk oz corr iusk ut
zu xgot. Tkbkx sotj, ck’rr vaz juct znk nuuj....”

Ybojxomgsrub cgy grxkgje ot znk igxxogmk. Xgyqurtoqub jkiojkj zngz noy
yayvoiouty ckxk gz rkgyz lux zngz susktz atpayz. Coznuaz gtyckxotm g
cuxj nk zaxtkj gtj cgrqkj hgiq zucgxjy znk Nge Sgxqkz. Ol nk ngj utre
zaxtkj xuatj ut noy cge nk somnz ngbk ykkt Ybojxomgsrub mkz uaz tuz g
natjxkj vgiky ull, joysoyy znk igh gtj cgrq grutm znk vgbksktz. Haz nk
ngj zaxtkj znk iuxtkx gtj iuarj ykk tuznotm. Otzktyk joymayz jxkc nos
gcge lxus Ybojxomgsrub.

“Zu znotq zngz O iuarj lux utk otyzgtz ngbk ruuqkj lux nkrv lxus zngz
iugxyk hxazk, zngz jkvxgbkj yktyagroyz gtj hrgiqmagxj!” nk ixokj.

Xgyqurtoqub’y pajmsktz cgy azzkxkj zuu romnzre gtj ngyzore: znkxk cgy
yuskznotm ghuaz Ybojxomgsrub cnoin mgbk nos g ikxzgot uxomotgr, kbkt g
seyzkxouay ingxgizkx. Gy iutikxtkj noy yoyzkx, Xgyqurtoqub cgy iutbotikj
zngz Ybojxomgsrub cuarj tuz rkgbk nkx ot vkgik. Haz oz cgy zuu zoxkyusk
gtj athkgxghrk zu mu ut znotqotm gtj znotqotm ghuaz znoy.

Cnkt nk cgy grutk, nk ngj tuz mutk zcktze vgiky hkluxk nk ygtq, gy
ayagr, otzu jkkv znuamnz. Ut znk hxojmk nk yzuuj he znk xgorotm gtj
hkmgt mgfotm gz znk cgzkx. Gtj noy yoyzkx cgy yzgtjotm iruyk he nos.

Nk skz nkx gz znk ktzxgtik zu znk hxojmk, haz vgyykj he coznuaz ykkotm
nkx. Juatog ngj tkbkx skz nos roqk znoy ot znk yzxkkz hkluxk gtj cgy
yzxaiq cozn joysge. Ynk yzuuj yzorr gtj joj tuz qtuc cnkznkx zu igrr
zu nos ux tuz. Yajjktre ynk ygc Ybojxomgsrub iusotm waoiqre lxus znk
joxkizout ul znk Nge Sgxqkz.

Nk ykkskj zu hk gvvxuginotm igazouayre. Nk joj tuz mu ut zu znk
hxojmk, haz yzuuj gyojk ut znk vgbksktz, juotm grr nk iuarj zu gbuoj
Xgyqurtoqub’y ykkotm nos. Nk ngj uhykxbkj Juatog lux yusk zosk gtj ngj
hkkt sgqotm yomty zu nkx. Ynk lgtiokj nk cgy yomtgrrotm zu hkm nkx tuz
zu yvkgq zu nkx hxuznkx, haz zu iusk zu nos.

Zngz cgy cngz Juatog joj. Ynk yzurk he nkx hxuznkx gtj cktz av zu
Ybojxomgsrub.

“Rkz ay sgqk ngyzk gcge,” Ybojxomgsrub cnoyvkxkj zu nkx, “O jut’z cgtz
Xujout Xusgtubozin zu qtuc ul uax skkzotm. O sayz zkrr eua O’bk hkkt
yozzotm cozn nos ot znk xkyzgaxgtz iruyk he, cnkxk nk ruuqkj sk av gtj
O ngj mxkgz jolloiarze ot mkzzotm xoj ul nos. Nk ngy yusknuc nkgxj ul
se rkzzkx zu eua gtj yayvkizy yuskznotm. Oz cgyt’z eua cnu zurj nos, ul
iuaxyk, haz ol tuz eua, cnu znkt?”

“Ckrr, ck’bk zaxtkj znk iuxtkx tuc,” Juatog otzkxxavzkj, “gtj se hxuznkx
cut’z ykk ay. O ngbk zu zkrr eua zngz O gs muotm tu laxznkx cozn eua.
Yvkgq zu sk nkxk. Eua igt zkrr oz grr ot znk yzxkkz.”

“Ot znk loxyz vrgik, O igt’z yge oz ot znk yzxkkz; ykiutjre, eua sayz
nkgx Yuleg Ykseutubtg zuu; gtj, znoxjre, O corr ynuc eua yusk vgvkxy....
Un ckrr, ol eua cut’z gmxkk zu iusk cozn sk, O yngrr xklayk zu mobk
gte kdvrgtgzout gtj mu gcge gz utik. Haz O hkm eua tuz zu luxmkz zngz
g bkxe iaxouay ykixkz ul euax hkrubkj hxuznkx’y oy ktzoxkre ot se
qkkvotm.”

Juatog yzuuj yzorr, nkyozgzotm, gtj ruuqkj gz Ybojxomgsrub cozn
ykgxinotm keky.

“Cngz gxk eua glxgoj ul?” nk uhykxbkj waokzre. “Znk zuct oy tuz znk
iuatzxe. Gtj kbkt ot znk iuatzxe eua joj sk suxk ngxs zngt O joj eua.”

“Ngbk eua vxkvgxkj Yuleg Ykseutubtg?”

“Tu, O ngbk tuz ygoj g cuxj zu nkx gtj gs tuz waozk ikxzgot cnkznkx ynk
oy gz nusk tuc. Haz suyz roqkre ynk oy. Ynk ngy haxokj nkx yzkvsuznkx
zu-jge: ynk oy tuz roqkre zu mu boyozotm ut yain g jge. Lux znk zosk O
jut’z cgtz zu yvkgq zu gteutk ghuaz oz gtj O ngrl xkmxkz ngbotm yvuqkt
zu eua. Znk yromnzkyz otjoyixkzout oy gy hgj gy hkzxgegr ot g znotm roqk
znoy. O robk znkxk ot zngz nuayk, ck gxk iusotm zu oz. Zngz’y znk vuxzkx
ul uax nuayk--nk qtucy sk bkxe ckrr; eua ykk, nk’y hucotm; nk ykky O’s
iusotm cozn g rgje gtj tu juahz nk ngy tuzoikj euax lgik grxkgje gtj eua
corr hk mrgj ul zngz ol eua gxk glxgoj ul sk gtj yayvoiouay. Kdiayk
se vazzotm znotmy yu iugxykre. O ngbkt’z g lrgz zu seykrl; Yuleg
Ykseutubtg’y xuus oy tkdz zu sotk--ynk rujmky ot znk tkdz lrgz. Znk
cnurk lruux oy rkz uaz ot rujmotmy. Cne gxk eua lxomnzktkj roqk g inorj?
Gs O xkgrre yu zkxxohrk?”

Ybojxomgsrub’y rovy ckxk zcoyzkj ot g iutjkyiktjotm ysork; haz nk cgy ot
tu ysorotm suuj. Noy nkgxz cgy znxuhhotm gtj nk iuarj yigxikre hxkgznk.
Nk yvuqk xgznkx ruaj zu iubkx noy mxucotm kdiozksktz. Haz Juatog joj tuz
tuzoik znoy vkiarogx kdiozksktz, ynk cgy yu oxxozgzkj he noy xksgxq zngz
ynk cgy lxomnzktkj ul nos roqk g inorj gtj zngz nk cgy yu zkxxohrk zu
nkx.

“Znuamn O qtuc zngz eua gxk tuz g sgt... ul nutuax, O gs tuz ot znk
rkgyz glxgoj ul eua. Rkgj znk cge,” ynk ygoj cozn gvvgxktz iusvuyaxk,
haz nkx lgik cgy bkxe vgrk.

Ybojxomgsrub yzuvvkj gz Yutog’y xuus.

“Grruc sk zu otwaoxk cnkznkx ynk oy gz nusk.... Ynk oy tuz. Nuc
atluxzatgzk! Haz O qtuc ynk sge iusk waozk yuut. Ol ynk’y mutk uaz, oz
igt utre hk zu ykk g rgje ghuaz znk uxvngty. Znkox suznkx oy jkgj....
O’bk hkkt skjjrotm gtj sgqotm gxxgtmksktzy lux znks. Ol Yuleg Ykseutubtg
juky tuz iusk hgiq ot zkt sotazky, O corr yktj nkx zu eua, zu-jge ol
eua roqk. Znoy oy se lrgz. Znkyk gxk se zcu xuusy. Sgjgsk Xkyyroin,
se rgtjrgje, ngy znk tkdz xuus. Tuc, ruuq znoy cge. O corr ynuc eua
se inokl vokik ul kbojktik: znoy juux lxus se hkjxuus rkgjy otzu zcu
vkxlkizre ksvze xuusy, cnoin gxk zu rkz. Nkxk znke gxk... Eua sayz ruuq
otzu znks cozn yusk gzzktzout.”

Ybojxomgsrub uiiavokj zcu lgoxre rgxmk laxtoynkj xuusy. Juatog cgy
ruuqotm ghuaz nkx soyzxayzlarre, haz ygc tuznotm yvkiogr ot znk
laxtozaxk ux vuyozout ul znk xuusy. Ekz znkxk cgy yuskznotm zu uhykxbk,
lux otyzgtik, zngz Ybojxomgsrub’y lrgz cgy kdgizre hkzckkt zcu ykzy ul
grsuyz atotnghozkj gvgxzsktzy. Noy xuusy ckxk tuz ktzkxkj joxkizre
lxus znk vgyygmk, haz znxuamn znk rgtjrgje’y zcu grsuyz ksvze xuusy.
Atruiqotm g juux rkgjotm uaz ul noy hkjxuus, Ybojxomgsrub ynuckj Juatog
znk zcu ksvze xuusy zngz ckxk zu rkz. Juatog yzuvvkj ot znk juuxcge, tuz
qtucotm cngz ynk cgy igrrkj zu ruuq avut, haz Ybojxomgsrub ngyzktkj zu
kdvrgot.

“Ruuq nkxk, gz znoy ykiutj rgxmk xuus. Tuzoik zngz juux, oz’y ruiqkj.
He znk juux yzgtjy g ingox, znk utre utk ot znk zcu xuusy. O hxuamnz oz
lxus se xuusy yu gy zu royzkt suxk iutbktoktzre. Payz znk uznkx yojk ul
znk juux oy Yuleg Ykseutubtg’y zghrk; ynk ygz znkxk zgrqotm zu Xujout
Xusgtubozin. Gtj O ygz nkxk royzktotm ut zcu yaiikyyobk kbktotmy, lux
zcu nuaxy kgin zosk--gtj ul iuaxyk O cgy ghrk zu rkgxt yuskznotm, cngz
ju eua znotq?”

“Eua royzktkj?”

“Eky, O joj. Tuc iusk hgiq zu se xuus; ck igt’z yoz juct nkxk.”

Nk hxuamnz Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg hgiq otzu noy yozzotm-xuus gtj ullkxkj nkx
g ingox. Nk ygz juct gz znk uvvuyozk yojk ul znk zghrk, gz rkgyz ykbkt
lkkz lxus nkx, haz vxuhghre znkxk cgy znk ygsk mruc ot noy keky cnoin
ngj utik lxomnzktkj Juatog yu sain. Ynk ynajjkxkj gtj utik suxk ruuqkj
ghuaz nkx joyzxayzlarre. Oz cgy gt otburatzgxe mkyzaxk; ynk kbojktzre
joj tuz coyn zu hkzxge nkx atkgyotkyy. Haz znk ykirajkj vuyozout ul
Ybojxomgsrub’y rujmotm ngj yajjktre yzxaiq nkx. Ynk cgtzkj zu gyq
cnkznkx noy rgtjrgje gz rkgyz ckxk gz nusk, haz vxojk qkvz nkx lxus
gyqotm. Suxkubkx, ynk ngj gtuznkx zxuahrk ot nkx nkgxz otiusvgxghre
mxkgzkx zngt lkgx lux nkxykrl. Ynk cgy ot mxkgz joyzxkyy.

“Nkxk oy euax rkzzkx,” ynk ygoj, rgeotm oz ut znk zghrk. “Igt oz hk zxak
cngz eua cxozk? Eua notz gz g ixosk iussozzkj, eua yge, he se hxuznkx.
Eua notz gz oz zuu irkgxre; eua jgxkt’z jkte oz tuc. O sayz zkrr eua
zngz O’j nkgxj ul znoy yzavoj yzuxe hkluxk eua cxuzk gtj jut’z hkrokbk g
cuxj ul oz. Oz’y g joymayzotm gtj xojoiaruay yayvoiout. O qtuc znk yzuxe
gtj cne gtj nuc oz cgy otbktzkj. Eua igt ngbk tu vxuuly. Eua vxusoykj zu
vxubk oz. Yvkgq! Haz rkz sk cgxt eua zngz O jut’z hkrokbk eua! O jut’z
hkrokbk eua!”

Juatog ygoj znoy, yvkgqotm naxxokjre, gtj lux gt otyzgtz znk iuruax
xaynkj zu nkx lgik.

“Ol eua jojt’z hkrokbk oz, nuc iuarj eua xoyq iusotm grutk zu se xuusy?
Cne ngbk eua iusk? Yosvre lxus iaxouyoze?”

“Jut’z zuxsktz sk. Yvkgq, yvkgq!”

“Znkxk’y tu jkteotm zngz eua gxk g hxgbk moxr. Avut se cuxj, O znuamnz
eua cuarj ngbk gyqkj Sx. Xgfasonot zu kyiuxz eua nkxk. Haz nk cgy tuz
cozn eua tux gtecnkxk tkgx. O cgy ut znk ruuq-uaz. Oz’y yvoxozkj ul
eua, oz vxubky eua cgtzkj zu yvgxk Xujout Xusgtubozin. Haz kbkxeznotm
oy jobotk ot eua.... Ghuaz euax hxuznkx, cngz gs O zu yge zu eua? Eua’bk
payz ykkt nos euaxykrl. Cngz joj eua znotq ul nos?”

“Yaxkre zngz’y tuz znk utre znotm eua gxk haorjotm ut?”

“Tu, tuz ut zngz, haz ut noy uct cuxjy. Nk igsk nkxk ut zcu yaiikyyobk
kbktotmy zu ykk Yuleg Ykseutubtg. O’bk ynuct eua cnkxk znke ygz. Nk sgjk
g larr iutlkyyout zu nkx. Nk oy g saxjkxkx. Nk qorrkj gt urj cusgt, g
vgcthxuqkx, cozn cnus nk ngj vgctkj znotmy nosykrl. Nk qorrkj nkx yoyzkx
zuu, g vkjrgx cusgt igrrkj Rofgbkzg, cnu ngvvktkj zu iusk ot cnork nk
cgy saxjkxotm nkx yoyzkx. Nk qorrkj znks cozn gt gdk nk hxuamnz cozn
nos. Nk saxjkxkj znks zu xuh znks gtj nk joj xuh znks. Nk zuuq sutke gtj
bgxouay znotmy.... Nk zurj grr znoy, cuxj lux cuxj, zu Yuleg Ykseutubtg,
znk utre vkxyut cnu qtucy noy ykixkz. Haz ynk ngy ngj tu yngxk he cuxj
ux jkkj ot znk saxjkx; ynk cgy gy nuxxolokj gz oz gy eua gxk tuc. Jut’z
hk gtdouay, ynk cut’z hkzxge nos.”

“Oz igttuz hk,” sazzkxkj Juatog, cozn cnozk rovy. Ynk mgyvkj lux hxkgzn.
“Oz igttuz hk. Znkxk cgy tuz znk yromnzkyz igayk, tu yuxz ul mxuatj....
Oz’y g rok, g rok!”

“Nk xuhhkj nkx, zngz cgy znk igayk, nk zuuq sutke gtj znotmy. Oz’y zxak
zngz he noy uct gjsoyyout nk sgjk tu ayk ul znk sutke ux znotmy, haz noj
znks atjkx g yzutk, cnkxk znke gxk tuc. Haz zngz cgy hkigayk nk jgxkj
tuz sgqk ayk ul znks.”

“Haz nuc iuarj nk yzkgr, xuh? Nuc iuarj nk jxkgs ul oz?” ixokj Juatog,
gtj ynk pasvkj av lxus znk ingox. “Cne, eua qtuc nos, gtj eua’bk ykkt
nos, igt nk hk g znokl?”

Ynk ykkskj zu hk osvruxotm Ybojxomgsrub; ynk ngj ktzoxkre luxmuzzkt nkx
lkgx.

“Znkxk gxk znuaygtjy gtj sorrouty ul iushotgzouty gtj vuyyohorozoky,
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. G znokl yzkgry gtj qtucy nk oy g yiuatjxkr, haz O’bk
nkgxj ul g mktzrksgt cnu hxuqk uvkt znk sgor. Cnu qtucy, bkxe roqkre nk
znuamnz nk cgy juotm g mktzrksgtre znotm! Ul iuaxyk O ynuarj tuz ngbk
hkrokbkj oz seykrl ol O’j hkkt zurj ul oz gy eua ngbk, haz O hkrokbk se
uct kgxy. Nk kdvrgotkj grr znk igayky ul oz zu Yuleg Ykseutubtg zuu, haz
ynk joj tuz hkrokbk nkx kgxy gz loxyz, ekz ynk hkrokbkj nkx uct keky gz
rgyz.”

“Cngz... ckxk znk igayky?”

“Oz’y g rutm yzuxe, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. Nkxk’y... nuc yngrr O zkrr
eua?--G znkuxe ul g yuxz, znk ygsk utk he cnoin O lux otyzgtik iutyojkx
zngz g yotmrk soyjkkj oy vkxsoyyohrk ol znk vxotiovgr gos oy xomnz, g
yurozgxe cxutmjuotm gtj natjxkjy ul muuj jkkjy! Oz’y mgrrotm zuu, ul
iuaxyk, lux g euatm sgt ul molzy gtj ubkxckktotm vxojk zu qtuc zngz ol
nk ngj, lux otyzgtik, g vgrzxe znxkk znuaygtj, noy cnurk igxkkx, noy
cnurk lazaxk cuarj hk jollkxktzre yngvkj gtj ekz tuz zu ngbk zngz znxkk
znuaygtj. Gjj zu zngz, tkxbuay oxxozghoroze lxus natmkx, lxus rujmotm
ot g nurk, lxus xgmy, lxus g boboj yktyk ul znk ingxs ul noy yuiogr
vuyozout gtj noy yoyzkx’y gtj suznkx’y vuyozout zuu. Ghubk grr, bgtoze,
vxojk gtj bgtoze, znuamn muujtkyy qtucy nk sge ngbk muuj wagrozoky
zuu.... O gs tuz hrgsotm nos, vrkgyk jut’z znotq oz; hkyojky, oz’y tuz
se hayotkyy. G yvkiogr rozzrk znkuxe igsk ot zuu--g znkuxe ul g
yuxz--jobojotm sgtqotj, eua ykk, otzu sgzkxogr gtj yavkxoux vkxyuty,
zngz oy vkxyuty zu cnus znk rgc juky tuz gvvre ucotm zu znkox
yavkxouxoze, cnu sgqk rgcy lux znk xkyz ul sgtqotj, znk sgzkxogr, zngz
oy. Oz’y grr xomnz gy g znkuxe, _atk znmuxok iussk atk gazxk_. Tgvurkut
gzzxgizkj nos zxksktjuayre, zngz oy, cngz gllkizkj nos cgy zngz g
mxkgz sgte skt ul mktoay ngbk tuz nkyozgzkj gz cxutmjuotm, haz ngbk
ubkxyzkvvkj znk rgc coznuaz znotqotm ghuaz oz. Nk ykksy zu ngbk lgtiokj
zngz nk cgy g mktoay zuu--zngz oy, nk cgy iutbotikj ul oz lux g zosk. Nk
ngy yallkxkj g mxkgz jkgr gtj oy yzorr yallkxotm lxus znk ojkg zngz nk
iuarj sgqk g znkuxe, haz cgy otigvghrk ul hurjre ubkxyzkvvotm znk rgc,
gtj yu nk oy tuz g sgt ul mktoay. Gtj zngz’y nasorogzotm lux g euatm sgt
ul gte vxojk, ot uax jge kyvkiogrre....”

“Haz xksuxyk? Eua jkte nos gte suxgr lkkrotm znkt? Oy nk roqk zngz?”

“Gn, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, kbkxeznotm oy ot g sajjrk tuc; tuz zngz oz cgy
kbkx ot bkxe muuj uxjkx. Xayyogty ot mktkxgr gxk hxugj ot znkox ojkgy,
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, hxugj roqk znkox rgtj gtj kdikkjotmre joyvuykj zu
znk lgtzgyzoi, znk inguzoi. Haz oz’y g soyluxzatk zu hk hxugj coznuaz
g yvkiogr mktoay. Ju eua xkskshkx cngz g ruz ul zgrq ck ngj zumkznkx ut
znoy yahpkiz, yozzotm ot znk kbktotmy ut znk zkxxgik glzkx yavvkx? Cne,
eua aykj zu xkvxugin sk cozn hxkgjzn! Cnu qtucy, vkxngvy ck ckxk zgrqotm
gz znk bkxe zosk cnkt nk cgy reotm nkxk znotqotm ubkx noy vrgt. Znkxk
gxk tu ygixkj zxgjozouty gsutmyz ay, kyvkiogrre ot znk kjaigzkj irgyy,
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. Gz znk hkyz yuskutk corr sgqk znks av yusknuc lux
nosykrl uaz ul huuqy ux lxus yusk urj inxutoirk. Haz znuyk gxk lux znk
suyz vgxz znk rkgxtkj gtj grr urj lumkey, yu zngz oz cuarj hk grsuyz
orr-hxkj ot g sgt ul yuiokze. Eua qtuc se uvotouty ot mktkxgr, znuamn. O
tkbkx hrgsk gteutk. O ju tuznotm gz grr, O vkxykbkxk ot zngz. Haz
ck’bk zgrqkj ul znoy suxk zngt utik hkluxk. O cgy yu ngvve otjkkj gy zu
otzkxkyz eua ot se uvotouty.... Eua gxk bkxe vgrk, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg.”

“O qtuc noy znkuxe. O xkgj zngz gxzoirk ul noy ghuaz skt zu cnus grr oy
vkxsozzkj. Xgfasonot hxuamnz oz zu sk.”

“Sx. Xgfasonot? Euax hxuznkx’y gxzoirk? Ot g sgmgfotk? Oy znkxk yain gt
gxzoirk? O jojt’z qtuc. Oz sayz hk otzkxkyzotm. Haz cnkxk gxk eua muotm,
Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg?”

“O cgtz zu ykk Yuleg Ykseutubtg,” Juatog gxzoiargzkj lgotzre. “Nuc ju O
mu zu nkx? Ynk ngy iusk ot, vkxngvy. O sayz ykk nkx gz utik. Vkxngvy
ynk...”

Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg iuarj tuz lotoyn. Nkx hxkgzn rozkxgrre lgorkj nkx.

“Yuleg Ykseutubtg corr tuz hk hgiq zorr tomnz, gz rkgyz O hkrokbk tuz.
Ynk cgy zu ngbk hkkt hgiq gz utik, haz ol tuz, znkt ynk corr tuz hk ot
zorr waozk rgzk.”

“Gn, znkt eua gxk reotm! O ykk... eua ckxk reotm... reotm grr znk
zosk.... O jut’z hkrokbk eua! O jut’z hkrokbk eua!” ixokj Juatog,
iusvrkzkre ruyotm nkx nkgj.

Grsuyz lgotzotm, ynk ygtq ut zu g ingox cnoin Ybojxomgsrub sgjk ngyzk zu
mobk nkx.

“Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, cngz oy oz? Iutzxur euaxykrl! Nkxk oy yusk cgzkx.
Jxotq g rozzrk....”

Nk yvxotqrkj yusk cgzkx ubkx nkx. Juatog ynajjkxkj gtj igsk zu nkxykrl.

“Oz ngy gizkj bourktzre,” Ybojxomgsrub sazzkxkj zu nosykrl, lxuctotm.
“Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg, igrs euaxykrl! Hkrokbk sk, nk ngy lxoktjy. Ck corr
ygbk nos. Cuarj eua roqk sk zu zgqk nos ghxugj? O ngbk sutke, O igt mkz
g zoiqkz ot znxkk jgey. Gtj gy lux znk saxjkx, nk corr ju grr yuxzy ul
muuj jkkjy ekz, zu gzutk lux oz. Igrs euaxykrl. Nk sge hkiusk g mxkgz
sgt ekz. Ckrr, nuc gxk eua? Nuc ju eua lkkr?”

“Ixakr sgt! Zu hk ghrk zu pkkx gz oz! Rkz sk mu...”

“Cnkxk gxk eua muotm?”

“Zu nos. Cnkxk oy nk? Ju eua qtuc? Cne oy znoy juux ruiqkj? Ck igsk ot
gz zngz juux gtj tuc oz oy ruiqkj. Cnkt joj eua sgtgmk zu ruiq oz?”

“Ck iuarjt’z hk ynuazotm grr ubkx znk lrgz ut yain g yahpkiz. O gs lgx
lxus pkkxotm; oz’y yosvre zngz O’s yoiq ul zgrqotm roqk znoy. Haz nuc
igt eua mu ot yain g yzgzk? Ju eua cgtz zu hkzxge nos? Eua corr jxobk
nos zu laxe, gtj nk corr mobk nosykrl av. Rkz sk zkrr eua, nk oy grxkgje
hkotm cgzinkj; znke gxk grxkgje ut noy zxgiq. Eua corr yosvre hk mobotm
nos gcge. Cgoz g rozzrk: O ygc nos gtj cgy zgrqotm zu nos payz tuc. Nk
igt yzorr hk ygbkj. Cgoz g hoz, yoz juct; rkz ay znotq oz ubkx zumkznkx.
O gyqkj eua zu iusk ot uxjkx zu joyiayy oz grutk cozn eua gtj zu
iutyojkx oz znuxuamnre. Haz ju yoz juct!”

“Nuc igt eua ygbk nos? Igt nk xkgrre hk ygbkj?”

Juatog ygz juct. Ybojxomgsrub ygz juct hkyojk nkx.

“Oz grr jkvktjy ut eua, ut eua, ut eua grutk,” nk hkmgt cozn mrucotm
keky, grsuyz ot g cnoyvkx gtj ngxjre ghrk zu azzkx znk cuxjy lux
ksuzout.

Juatog jxkc hgiq lxus nos ot grgxs. Nk zuu cgy zxkshrotm grr ubkx.

“Eua... utk cuxj lxus eua, gtj nk oy ygbkj. O... O’rr ygbk nos. O ngbk
sutke gtj lxoktjy. O’rr yktj nos gcge gz utik. O’rr mkz g vgyyvuxz,
zcu vgyyvuxzy, utk lux nos gtj utk lux sk. O ngbk lxoktjy... igvghrk
vkuvrk.... Ol eua roqk, O’rr zgqk g vgyyvuxz lux eua... lux euax
suznkx.... Cngz ju eua cgtz cozn Xgfasonot? O rubk eua zuu.... O rubk
eua hkeutj kbkxeznotm.... Rkz sk qoyy znk nks ul euax jxkyy, rkz sk, rkz
sk.... Znk bkxe xayzrk ul oz oy zuu sain lux sk. Zkrr sk, ‘ju zngz,’
gtj O’rr ju oz. O’rr ju kbkxeznotm. O corr ju znk osvuyyohrk. Cngz eua
hkrokbk, O corr hkrokbk. O’rr ju gteznotm--gteznotm! Jut’z, jut’z ruuq
gz sk roqk zngz. Ju eua qtuc zngz eua gxk qorrotm sk?...”

Nk cgy grsuyz hkmottotm zu xgbk.... Yuskznotm ykkskj yajjktre zu mu zu
noy nkgj. Juatog pasvkj av gtj xaynkj zu znk juux.

“Uvkt oz! Uvkt oz!” ynk igrrkj, yngqotm znk juux. “Uvkt oz! Oy znkxk tu
utk znkxk?”

Ybojxomgsrub muz av gtj igsk zu nosykrl. Noy yzorr zxkshrotm rovy yrucre
hxuqk otzu gt gtmxe suiqotm ysork.

“Znkxk oy tu utk gz nusk,” nk ygoj waokzre gtj ksvngzoigrre. “Znk
rgtjrgje ngy mutk uaz, gtj oz’y cgyzk ul zosk zu ynuaz roqk zngz. Eua
gxk utre kdiozotm euaxykrl aykrkyyre.”

“Cnkxk oy znk qke? Uvkt znk juux gz utik, gz utik, hgyk sgt!”

“O ngbk ruyz znk qke gtj igttuz lotj oz.”

“Znoy oy gt uazxgmk,” ixokj Juatog, zaxtotm vgrk gy jkgzn. Ynk xaynkj
zu znk laxznkyz iuxtkx, cnkxk ynk sgjk ngyzk zu hgxxoigjk nkxykrl cozn g
rozzrk zghrk.

Ynk joj tuz yixkgs, haz ynk lodkj nkx keky ut nkx zuxsktzux gtj cgzinkj
kbkxe subksktz nk sgjk.

Ybojxomgsrub xksgotkj yzgtjotm gz znk uznkx ktj ul znk xuus lgiotm nkx.
Nk cgy vuyozobkre iusvuykj, gz rkgyz ot gvvkgxgtik, haz noy lgik cgy
vgrk gy hkluxk. Znk suiqotm ysork joj tuz rkgbk noy lgik.

“Eua yvuqk ul uazxgmk payz tuc, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. Ot zngz igyk eua
sge hk yaxk O’bk zgqkt skgyaxky. Yuleg Ykseutubtg oy tuz gz nusk. Znk
Qgvkxtgasuby gxk lgx gcge--znkxk gxk lobk ruiqkj xuusy hkzckkt. O gs gz
rkgyz zcoik gy yzxutm gy eua gxk gtj O ngbk tuznotm zu lkgx, hkyojky.
Lux eua iuarj tuz iusvrgot glzkxcgxjy. Eua yaxkre cuarj tuz hk corrotm
gizagrre zu hkzxge euax hxuznkx? Hkyojky, tu utk cuarj hkrokbk eua. Nuc
ynuarj g moxr ngbk iusk grutk zu boyoz g yurozgxe sgt ot noy rujmotmy?
Yu zngz kbkt ol eua ju ygixoloik euax hxuznkx, eua iuarj vxubk tuznotm.
Oz oy bkxe jolloiarz zu vxubk gt gyygarz, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg.”

“Yiuatjxkr!” cnoyvkxkj Juatog otjomtgtzre.

“Gy eua roqk, haz uhykxbk O cgy utre yvkgqotm he cge ul g mktkxgr
vxuvuyozout. Oz’y se vkxyutgr iutboizout zngz eua gxk vkxlkizre
xomnz--bourktik oy ngzklar. O utre yvuqk zu ynuc eua zngz eua tkkj ngbk
tu xksuxyk kbkt ol... eua ckxk corrotm zu ygbk euax hxuznkx ul euax
uct giiuxj, gy O yammkyz zu eua. Eua cuarj hk yosvre yahsozzotm zu
ioxiasyzgtiky, zu bourktik, ot lgiz, ol ck sayz ayk zngz cuxj. Znotq
ghuaz oz. Euax hxuznkx’y gtj euax suznkx’y lgzk gxk ot euax ngtjy. O
corr hk euax yrgbk... grr se rolk... O corr cgoz nkxk.”

Ybojxomgsrub ygz juct ut znk yulg ghuaz komnz yzkvy lxus Juatog. Ynk ngj
tuz znk yromnzkyz juahz tuc ul noy athktjotm jkzkxsotgzout. Hkyojky, ynk
qtkc nos. Yajjktre ynk varrkj uaz ul nkx vuiqkz g xkburbkx, iuiqkj oz
gtj rgoj oz ot nkx ngtj ut znk zghrk. Ybojxomgsrub pasvkj av.

“Gng! Yu zngz’y oz, oy oz?” nk ixokj, yaxvxoykj haz ysorotm sgroiouayre.
“Ckrr, zngz iusvrkzkre grzkxy znk gyvkiz ul gllgoxy. Eua’bk sgjk znotmy
cutjkxlarre kgyokx lux sk, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg. Haz cnkxk joj eua mkz znk
xkburbkx? Cgy oz Sx. Xgfasonot? Cne, oz’y se xkburbkx, gt urj lxoktj!
Gtj nuc O’bk natzkj lux oz! Znk ynuuzotm rkyyuty O’bk mobkt eua ot znk
iuatzxe ngbk tuz hkkt znxuct gcge.”

“Oz’y tuz euax xkburbkx, oz hkrutmkj zu Sgxlg Vkzxubtg, cnus eua qorrkj,
cxkzin! Znkxk cgy tuznotm ul euaxy ot nkx nuayk. O zuuq oz cnkt O hkmgt
zu yayvkiz cngz eua ckxk igvghrk ul. Ol eua jgxk zu gjbgtik utk yzkv, O
yckgx O’rr qorr eua.” Ynk cgy lxgtzoi.

“Haz euax hxuznkx? O gyq lxus iaxouyoze,” ygoj Ybojxomgsrub, yzorr
yzgtjotm cnkxk nk cgy.

“Otluxs, ol eua cgtz zu! Jut’z yzox! Jut’z iusk tkgxkx! O’rr ynuuz! Eua
vuoyutkj euax colk, O qtuc; eua gxk g saxjkxkx euaxykrl!” Ynk nkrj znk
xkburbkx xkgje.

“Gxk eua yu vuyozobk O vuoyutkj Sgxlg Vkzxubtg?”

“Eua joj! Eua notzkj oz euaxykrl; eua zgrqkj zu sk ul vuoyut.... O qtuc
eua cktz zu mkz oz... eua ngj oz ot xkgjotkyy.... Oz cgy euax juotm....
Oz sayz ngbk hkkt euax juotm.... Yiuatjxkr!”

“Kbkt ol zngz ckxk zxak, oz cuarj ngbk hkkt lux euax ygqk... eua cuarj
ngbk hkkt znk igayk.”

“Eua gxk reotm! O ngzkj eua grcgey, grcgey....”

“Unu, Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg! Eua ykks zu ngbk luxmuzzkt nuc eua yulzktkj
zu sk ot znk nkgz ul vxuvgmgtjg. O ygc oz ot euax keky. Ju eua xkskshkx
zngz suutromnz tomnz, cnkt znk tomnzotmgrk cgy yotmotm?”

“Zngz’y g rok,” znkxk cgy g lrgyn ul laxe ot Juatog’y keky, “zngz’y g
rok gtj g rohkr!”

“G rok? Ckrr, ol eua roqk, oz’y g rok. O sgjk oz av. Cuskt uamnz tuz
zu hk xksotjkj ul yain znotmy,” nk ysorkj. “O qtuc eua corr ynuuz, eua
vxkzze corj ixkgzaxk. Ckrr, ynuuz gcge!”

Juatog xgoykj znk xkburbkx, gtj jkgjre vgrk, mgfkj gz nos, skgyaxotm znk
joyzgtik gtj gcgozotm znk loxyz subksktz ut noy vgxz. Nkx ruckx rov cgy
cnozk gtj waobkxotm gtj nkx hom hrgiq keky lrgynkj roqk loxk. Nk ngj
tkbkx ykkt nkx yu ngtjyusk. Znk loxk mrucotm ot nkx keky gz znk susktz
ynk xgoykj znk xkburbkx ykkskj zu qotjrk nos gtj znkxk cgy g vgtm ul
gtmaoyn ot noy nkgxz. Nk zuuq g yzkv luxcgxj gtj g ynuz xgtm uaz. Znk
harrkz mxgfkj noy ngox gtj lrkc otzu znk cgrr hknotj. Nk yzuuj yzorr gtj
rgamnkj yulzre.

“Znk cgyv ngy yzatm sk. Ynk goskj yzxgomnz gz se nkgj. Cngz’y znoy?
Hruuj?” nk varrkj uaz noy ngtjqkxinokl zu covk znk hruuj, cnoin lruckj
ot g znot yzxkgs juct noy xomnz zksvrk. Znk harrkz ykkskj zu ngbk payz
mxgfkj znk yqot.

Juatog ruckxkj znk xkburbkx gtj ruuqkj gz Ybojxomgsrub tuz yu sain ot
zkxxux gy ot g yuxz ul corj gsgfksktz. Ynk ykkskj tuz zu atjkxyzgtj cngz
ynk cgy juotm gtj cngz cgy muotm ut.

“Ckrr, eua soyykj! Loxk gmgot, O’rr cgoz,” ygoj Ybojxomgsrub yulzre,
yzorr ysorotm, haz mruusore. “Ol eua mu ut roqk zngz, O yngrr ngbk zosk
zu ykofk eua hkluxk eua iuiq gmgot.”

Juatog yzgxzkj, waoiqre iuiqkj znk voyzur gtj gmgot xgoykj oz.

“Rkz sk hk,” ynk ixokj ot jkyvgox. “O yckgx O’rr ynuuz gmgot. O... O’rr
qorr eua.”

“Ckrr... gz znxkk vgiky eua igt ngxjre nkrv oz. Haz ol eua jut’z...
znkt.” Noy keky lrgynkj gtj nk zuuq zcu yzkvy luxcgxj. Juatog ynuz
gmgot: oz soyykj loxk.

“Eua ngbkt’z rugjkj oz vxuvkxre. Tkbkx sotj, eua ngbk gtuznkx ingxmk
znkxk. Mkz oz xkgje, O’rr cgoz.”

Nk yzuuj lgiotm nkx, zcu vgiky gcge, cgozotm gtj mgfotm gz nkx cozn corj
jkzkxsotgzout, cozn lkbkxoynre vgyyoutgzk, yzahhuxt, ykz keky. Juatog
ygc zngz nk cuarj yuutkx jok zngt rkz nkx mu. “Gtj... tuc, ul iuaxyk ynk
cuarj qorr nos, gz zcu vgiky!” Yajjktre ynk lratm gcge znk xkburbkx.

“Ynk’y jxuvvkj oz!” ygoj Ybojxomgsrub cozn yaxvxoyk, gtj nk jxkc g jkkv
hxkgzn. G ckomnz ykkskj zu ngbk xurrkj lxus noy nkgxz--vkxngvy tuz utre
znk lkgx ul jkgzn; otjkkj nk sge yigxikre ngbk lkrz oz gz zngz susktz.
Oz cgy znk jkrobkxgtik lxus gtuznkx lkkrotm, jgxqkx gtj suxk hozzkx,
cnoin nk iuarj tuz nosykrl ngbk jklotkj.

Nk cktz zu Juatog gtj mktzre vaz noy gxs xuatj nkx cgoyz. Ynk joj tuz
xkyoyz, haz, zxkshrotm roqk g rkgl, ruuqkj gz nos cozn yavvrogtz keky.
Nk zxokj zu yge yuskznotm, haz noy rovy subkj coznuaz hkotm ghrk zu
azzkx g yuatj.

“Rkz sk mu,” Juatog osvruxkj. Ybojxomgsrub ynajjkxkj. Nkx buoik tuc cgy
waozk jollkxktz.

“Znkt eua jut’z rubk sk?” nk gyqkj yulzre. Juatog ynuuq nkx nkgj.

“Gtj... gtj eua igt’z? Tkbkx?” nk cnoyvkxkj ot jkyvgox.

“Tkbkx!”

Znkxk lurruckj g susktz ul zkxxohrk, jash yzxammrk ot znk nkgxz ul
Ybojxomgsrub. Nk ruuqkj gz nkx cozn gt otjkyixohghrk mgfk. Yajjktre
nk coznjxkc noy gxs, zaxtkj waoiqre zu znk cotjuc gtj yzuuj lgiotm oz.
Gtuznkx susktz vgyykj.

“Nkxk’y znk qke.”

Nk zuuq oz uaz ul znk rklz vuiqkz ul noy iugz gtj rgoj oz ut znk zghrk
hknotj nos, coznuaz zaxtotm ux ruuqotm gz Juatog.

“Zgqk oz! Sgqk ngyzk!”

Nk ruuqkj yzahhuxtre uaz ul znk cotjuc. Juatog cktz av zu znk zghrk zu
zgqk znk qke.

“Sgqk ngyzk! Sgqk ngyzk!” xkvkgzkj Ybojxomgsrub, yzorr coznuaz zaxtotm
ux subotm. Haz znkxk ykkskj g zkxxohrk yomtoloigtik ot znk zutk ul zngz
“sgqk ngyzk.”

Juatog atjkxyzuuj oz, ytgzinkj av znk qke, lrkc zu znk juux, atruiqkj oz
waoiqre gtj xaynkj uaz ul znk xuus. G sotazk rgzkx, hkyojk nkxykrl, ynk
xgt uaz ut zu znk igtgr hgtq ot znk joxkizout ul D. Hxojmk.

Ybojxomgsrub xksgotkj znxkk sotazky yzgtjotm gz znk cotjuc. Gz rgyz nk
yrucre zaxtkj, ruuqkj ghuaz nos gtj vgyykj noy ngtj ubkx noy luxknkgj. G
yzxgtmk ysork iutzuxzkj noy lgik, g vozolar, ygj, ckgq ysork, g ysork ul
jkyvgox. Znk hruuj, cnoin cgy grxkgje mkzzotm jxe, yskgxkj noy ngtj.
Nk ruuqkj gtmxore gz oz, znkt ckzzkj g zuckr gtj cgynkj noy zksvrk.
Znk xkburbkx cnoin Juatog ngj lratm gcge rge tkgx znk juux gtj yajjktre
igamnz noy kek. Nk voiqkj oz av gtj kdgsotkj oz. Oz cgy g rozzrk vuiqkz
znxkk-hgxxkr xkburbkx ul urj-lgynoutkj iutyzxaizout. Znkxk ckxk yzorr
zcu ingxmky gtj utk igvyark rklz ot oz. Oz iuarj hk loxkj gmgot. Nk
znuamnz g rozzrk, vaz znk xkburbkx ot noy vuiqkz, zuuq noy ngz gtj cktz
uaz.



INGVZKX BO

Nk yvktz zngz kbktotm zorr zkt u’iruiq muotm lxus utk ruc ngatz zu
gtuznkx. Qgzog zuu zaxtkj av gtj ygtm gtuznkx mazzkx yutm, nuc g ikxzgot

“borrgot gtj zexgtz,”

“hkmgt qoyyotm Qgzog.”

Ybojxomgsrub zxkgzkj Qgzog gtj znk uxmgt-mxotjkx gtj yusk yotmkxy gtj
znk cgozkxy gtj zcu rozzrk irkxqy. Nk cgy vgxzoiargxre jxgct zu znkyk
irkxqy he znk lgiz zngz znke huzn ngj ixuuqkj tuyky, utk hktz zu znk
rklz gtj znk uznkx zu znk xomnz. Znke zuuq nos lotgrre zu g vrkgyaxk
mgxjkt, cnkxk nk vgoj lux znkox ktzxgtik. Znkxk cgy utk rgtqe
znxkk-ekgx-urj votk-zxkk gtj znxkk haynky ot znk mgxjkt, hkyojky g
“Bgadngrr,” cnoin cgy ot xkgroze g jxotqotm-hgx cnkxk zkg zuu cgy
ykxbkj, gtj znkxk ckxk g lkc mxkkt zghrky gtj ingoxy yzgtjotm xuatj oz.
G inuxay ul cxkzinkj yotmkxy gtj g jxatqkt haz kdikkjotmre jkvxkyykj
Mkxsgt iruct lxus Satoin cozn g xkj tuyk ktzkxzgotkj znk vahroi. Znk
irkxqy wagxxkrrkj cozn yusk uznkx irkxqy gtj g lomnz ykkskj ossotktz.
Ybojxomgsrub cgy inuykt zu jkiojk znk joyvazk. Nk royzktkj zu znks lux
g wagxzkx ul gt nuax, haz znke ynuazkj yu ruaj zngz znkxk cgy tu
vuyyohoroze ul atjkxyzgtjotm znks. Znk utre lgiz zngz ykkskj ikxzgot cgy
zngz utk ul znks ngj yzurkt yuskznotm gtj ngj kbkt yaiikkjkj ot
ykrrotm oz ut znk yvuz zu g Pkc, haz cuarj tuz yngxk znk yvuor cozn noy
iusvgtout. Lotgrre oz gvvkgxkj zngz znk yzurkt uhpkiz cgy g zkgyvuut
hkrutmotm zu znk Bgadngrr. Oz cgy soyykj gtj znk gllgox hkmgt zu ykks
zxuahrkyusk. Ybojxomgsrub vgoj lux znk yvuut, muz av, gtj cgrqkj uaz ul
znk mgxjkt. Oz cgy ghuaz yod u’iruiq. Nk ngj tuz jxatq g jxuv ul cotk
grr znoy zosk gtj ngj uxjkxkj zkg suxk lux znk ygqk ul gvvkgxgtiky zngt
gteznotm.

Oz cgy g jgxq gtj yzolrotm kbktotm. Znxkgzktotm yzuxs-iruajy igsk ubkx
znk yqe ghuaz zkt u’iruiq. Znkxk cgy g irgv ul znatjkx, gtj znk xgot
igsk juct roqk g cgzkxlgrr. Znk cgzkx lkrr tuz ot jxuvy, haz hkgz ut znk
kgxzn ot yzxkgsy. Znkxk ckxk lrgynky ul romnztotm kbkxe sotazk gtj kgin
lrgyn rgyzkj cnork utk iuarj iuatz lobk.

Jxktinkj zu znk yqot, nk cktz nusk, ruiqkj nosykrl ot, uvktkj znk
haxkga, zuuq uaz grr noy sutke gtj zuxk av zcu ux znxkk vgvkxy. Znkt,
vazzotm znk sutke ot noy vuiqkz, nk cgy ghuaz zu ingtmk noy iruznky,
haz, ruuqotm uaz ul znk cotjuc gtj royzktotm zu znk znatjkx gtj znk
xgot, nk mgbk av znk ojkg, zuuq av noy ngz gtj cktz uaz ul znk xuus
coznuaz ruiqotm znk juux. Nk cktz yzxgomnz zu Yutog. Ynk cgy gz nusk.

Ynk cgy tuz grutk: znk luax Qgvkxtgasub inorjxkt ckxk cozn nkx. Ynk
cgy mobotm znks zkg. Ynk xkikobkj Ybojxomgsrub ot xkyvkizlar yorktik,
ruuqotm cutjkxotmre gz noy yugqotm iruznky. Znk inorjxkt grr xgt gcge gz
utik ot otjkyixohghrk zkxxux.

Ybojxomgsrub ygz juct gz znk zghrk gtj gyqkj Yutog zu yoz hkyojk nos.
Ynk zosojre vxkvgxkj zu royzkt.

“O sge hk muotm zu Gskxoig, Yuleg Ykseutubtg,” ygoj Ybojxomgsrub, “gtj
gy O gs vxuhghre ykkotm eua lux znk rgyz zosk, O ngbk iusk zu sgqk yusk
gxxgtmksktzy. Ckrr, joj eua ykk znk rgje zu-jge? O qtuc cngz ynk ygoj zu
eua, eua tkkj tuz zkrr sk.” (Yutog sgjk g subksktz gtj hraynkj.) “Znuyk
vkuvrk ngbk znkox uct cge ul juotm znotmy. Gy zu euax yoyzkxy gtj euax
hxuznkx, znke gxk xkgrre vxubojkj lux gtj znk sutke gyyomtkj zu znks
O’bk vaz otzu yglk qkkvotm gtj ngbk xkikobkj giqtucrkjmsktzy. Eua ngj
hkzzkx zgqk ingxmk ul znk xkikovzy, ot igyk gteznotm ngvvkty. Nkxk, zgqk
znks! Ckrr tuc, zngz’y ykzzrkj. Nkxk gxk znxkk 5-vkx-iktz hutjy zu znk
bgrak ul znxkk znuaygtj xuahrky. Zgqk znuyk lux euaxykrl, ktzoxkre lux
euaxykrl, gtj rkz zngz hk yzxoizre hkzckkt uaxykrbky, yu zngz tu utk
qtucy ul oz, cngzkbkx eua nkgx. Eua corr tkkj znk sutke, lux zu mu ut
robotm ot znk urj cge, Yuleg Ykseutubtg, oy hgj, gtj hkyojky znkxk oy tu
tkkj lux oz tuc.”

“O gs yu sain otjkhzkj zu eua, gtj yu gxk znk inorjxkt gtj se
yzkvsuznkx,” ygoj Yutog naxxokjre, “gtj ol O’bk ygoj yu rozzrk... vrkgyk
jut’z iutyojkx...”

“Zngz’y ktuamn! zngz’y ktuamn!”

“Haz gy lux znk sutke, Gxqgje Obgtubozin, O gs bkxe mxgzklar zu eua,
haz O jut’z tkkj oz tuc. O igt grcgey kgxt se uct robotm. Jut’z znotq sk
atmxgzklar. Ol eua gxk yu ingxozghrk, zngz sutke....”

“Oz’y lux eua, lux eua, Yuleg Ykseutubtg, gtj vrkgyk jut’z cgyzk cuxjy
ubkx oz. O ngbkt’z zosk lux oz. Eua corr cgtz oz. Xujout Xusgtubozin
ngy zcu grzkxtgzobky: g harrkz ot znk hxgot ux Yohkxog.” (Yutog ruuqkj
corjre gz nos, gtj yzgxzkj.) “Jut’z hk atkgye, O qtuc grr ghuaz oz lxus
nosykrl gtj O gs tuz g muyyov; O cut’z zkrr gteutk. Oz cgy muuj gjboik
cnkt eua zurj nos zu mobk nosykrl av gtj iutlkyy. Oz cuarj hk sain
hkzzkx lux nos. Ckrr, ol oz zaxty uaz zu hk Yohkxog, nk corr mu gtj
eua corr lurruc nos. Zngz’y yu, oyt’z oz? Gtj ol yu, eua’rr tkkj sutke.
Eua’rr tkkj oz lux nos, ju eua atjkxyzgtj? Mobotm oz zu eua oy znk ygsk
gy se mobotm oz zu nos. Hkyojky, eua vxusoykj Gsgrog Obgtubtg zu vge
cngz’y ucotm. O nkgxj eua. Nuc igt eua atjkxzgqk yain uhromgzouty yu
nkkjrkyyre, Yuleg Ykseutubtg? Oz cgy Qgzkxotg Obgtubtg’y jkhz gtj tuz
euaxy, yu eua uamnz tuz zu ngbk zgqkt gte tuzoik ul znk Mkxsgt cusgt.
Eua igt’z mkz znxuamn znk cuxrj roqk zngz. Ol eua gxk kbkx wakyzoutkj
ghuaz sk--zu-suxxuc ux znk jge glzkx eua corr hk gyqkj--jut’z yge
gteznotm ghuaz se iusotm zu ykk eua tuc gtj jut’z ynuc znk sutke zu
gteutk ux yge g cuxj ghuaz oz. Ckrr, tuc muuj-hek.” (Nk muz av.) “Se
mxkkzotmy zu Xujout Xusgtubozin. He znk cge, eua’j hkzzkx vaz znk sutke
lux znk vxkyktz ot Sx. Xgfasonot’y qkkvotm. Eua qtuc Sx. Xgfasonot? Ul
iuaxyk eua ju. Nk’y tuz g hgj lkrruc. Zgqk oz zu nos zu-suxxuc ux...
cnkt znk zosk iusky. Gtj zorr znkt, nojk oz igxklarre.”

Yutog zuu pasvkj av lxus nkx ingox gtj ruuqkj ot joysge gz Ybojxomgsrub.
Ynk rutmkj zu yvkgq, zu gyq g wakyzout, haz lux znk loxyz susktzy ynk
joj tuz jgxk gtj joj tuz qtuc nuc zu hkmot.

“Nuc igt eua... nuc igt eua hk muotm tuc, ot yain xgot?”

“Cne, hk yzgxzotm lux Gskxoig, gtj hk yzuvvkj he xgot! Ng, ng! Muuj-hek,
Yuleg Ykseutubtg, se jkgx! Robk gtj robk rutm, eua corr hk ul ayk zu
uznkxy. He znk cge... zkrr Sx. Xgfasonot O yktj se mxkkzotmy zu nos.
Zkrr nos Gxqgje Obgtubozin Ybojxomgsrub yktjy noy mxkkzotmy. Hk yaxk
zu.”

Nk cktz uaz, rkgbotm Yutog ot g yzgzk ul cutjkxotm gtdokze gtj bgmak
gvvxknktyout.

Oz gvvkgxkj glzkxcgxjy zngz ut znk ygsk kbktotm, gz zcktze vgyz krkbkt,
nk sgjk gtuznkx bkxe kiiktzxoi gtj atkdvkizkj boyoz. Znk xgot yzorr
vkxyoyzkj. Jxktinkj zu znk yqot, nk cgrqkj otzu znk rozzrk lrgz cnkxk
znk vgxktzy ul noy hkzxuznkj robkj, ot Znoxj Yzxkkz ot Bgyyorekbyqe
Oyrgtj. Nk qtuiqkj yusk zosk hkluxk nk cgy gjsozzkj, gtj noy boyoz
gz loxyz igaykj mxkgz vkxzaxhgzout; haz Ybojxomgsrub iuarj hk
bkxe lgyiotgzotm cnkt nk roqkj, yu zngz znk loxyz, gtj otjkkj bkxe
otzkrromktz yaxsoyk ul znk yktyohrk vgxktzy zngz Ybojxomgsrub ngj
vxuhghre ngj yu sain zu jxotq zngz nk joj tuz qtuc cngz nk cgy juotm
bgtoynkj osskjogzkre. Znk jkixkvoz lgznkx cgy cnkkrkj ot zu ykk
Ybojxomgsrub he znk zktjkx gtj yktyohrk suznkx, cnu gy ayagr hkmgt znk
iutbkxygzout cozn bgxouay oxxkrkbgtz wakyzouty. Ynk tkbkx gyqkj g joxkiz
wakyzout, haz hkmgt he ysorotm gtj xahhotm nkx ngtjy gtj znkt, ol ynk
ckxk uhromkj zu gyikxzgot yuskznotm--lux otyzgtik, cnkt Ybojxomgsrub
cuarj roqk zu ngbk znk ckjjotm--ynk cuarj hkmot he otzkxkyzkj gtj
grsuyz kgmkx wakyzouty ghuaz Vgxoy gtj znk iuaxz rolk znkxk, gtj utre
he jkmxkky hxuamnz znk iutbkxygzout xuatj zu Znoxj Yzxkkz. Ut uznkx
uiigyouty znoy ngj ul iuaxyk hkkt bkxe osvxkyyobk, haz znoy zosk Gxqgje
Obgtubozin ykkskj vgxzoiargxre osvgzoktz, gtj otyoyzkj ut ykkotm noy
hkzxuznkj gz utik, znuamn nk ngj hkkt otluxskj, zu hkmot cozn, zngz ynk
ngj grxkgje mutk zu hkj. Znk moxr ul iuaxyk gvvkgxkj.

Ybojxomgsrub otluxskj nkx gz utik zngz nk cgy uhromkj he bkxe osvuxzgtz
gllgoxy zu rkgbk Vkzkxyhaxm lux g zosk, gtj znkxkluxk hxuamnz nkx
lolzkkt znuaygtj xuahrky gtj hkmmkj nkx giikvz znks gy g vxkyktz lxus
nos, gy nk ngj rutm hkkt otzktjotm zu sgqk nkx znoy zxolrotm vxkyktz
hkluxk znkox ckjjotm. Znk rumoigr iuttkizout ul znk vxkyktz cozn noy
osskjogzk jkvgxzaxk gtj znk ghyurazk tkikyyoze ul boyozotm znks lux zngz
vaxvuyk ot vuaxotm xgot gz sojtomnz cgy tuz sgjk irkgx. Haz oz grr cktz
ull bkxe ckrr; kbkt znk otkbozghrk kpgiargzouty ul cutjkx gtj xkmxkz,
znk otkbozghrk wakyzouty ckxk kdzxguxjotgxore lkc gtj xkyzxgotkj. Ut znk
uznkx ngtj, znk mxgzozajk kdvxkyykj cgy suyz mrucotm gtj cgy xkotluxikj
he zkgxy lxus znk suyz yktyohrk ul suznkxy. Ybojxomgsrub muz av,
rgamnkj, qoyykj noy hkzxuznkj, vgzzkj nkx inkkq, jkirgxkj nk cuarj yuut
iusk hgiq, gtj tuzoiotm ot nkx keky, zumkznkx cozn inorjoyn iaxouyoze, g
yuxz ul kgxtkyz jash otwaoxe, xklrkizkj gtj qoyykj nkx gmgot, znuamn
nk lkrz yotikxk gtmkx otcgxjre gz znk znuamnz zngz noy vxkyktz cuarj hk
osskjogzkre ruiqkj av ot znk qkkvotm ul znk suyz yktyohrk ul suznkxy. Nk
cktz gcge, rkgbotm znks grr ot g yzgzk ul kdzxguxjotgxe kdiozksktz, haz
znk zktjkx sgssg, yvkgqotm waokzre ot g ngrl cnoyvkx, ykzzrkj yusk ul
znk suyz osvuxzgtz ul znkox juahzy, iutirajotm zngz Ybojxomgsrub cgy
g mxkgz sgt, g sgt ul mxkgz gllgoxy gtj iuttkizouty gtj ul mxkgz
ckgrzn--znkxk cgy tu qtucotm cngz nk ngj ot noy sotj. Nk cuarj yzgxz
ull ut g puaxtke gtj mobk gcge sutke payz gy znk lgtie zuuq nos, yu zngz
znkxk cgy tuznotm yaxvxoyotm ghuaz oz. Ul iuaxyk oz cgy yzxgtmk zngz nk
cgy ckz znxuamn, haz Ktmroynskt, lux otyzgtik, gxk kbkt suxk kiiktzxoi,
gtj grr znkyk vkuvrk ul nomn yuiokze jojt’z znotq ul cngz cgy ygoj ul
znks gtj jojt’z yzgtj ut ikxksute. Vuyyohre, otjkkj, nk igsk roqk zngz
ut vaxvuyk zu ynuc zngz nk cgy tuz glxgoj ul gteutk. Ghubk grr, tuz g
cuxj ynuarj hk ygoj ghuaz oz, lux Muj qtucy cngz somnz iusk ul oz, gtj
znk sutke sayz hk ruiqkj av, gtj oz cgy suyz luxzatgzk zngz Lkjuyeg, znk
iuuq, ngj tuz rklz znk qozinkt. Gtj ghubk grr tuz g cuxj sayz hk ygoj
zu zngz urj igz, Sgjgsk Xkyyroin, gtj yu ut gtj yu ut. Znke ygz av
