cnoyvkxotm zorr zcu u’iruiq, haz znk moxr cktz zu hkj sain kgxrokx,
gsgfkj gtj xgznkx yuxxuclar.

Ybojxomgsrub skgtcnork, kdgizre gz sojtomnz, ixuyykj znk hxojmk ut znk
cge hgiq zu znk sgotrgtj. Znk xgot ngj ikgykj gtj znkxk cgy g xugxotm
cotj. Nk hkmgt ynobkxotm, gtj lux utk susktz nk mgfkj gz znk hrgiq
cgzkxy ul znk Rozzrk Tkbg cozn g ruuq ul yvkiogr otzkxkyz, kbkt otwaoxe.
Haz nk yuut lkrz oz bkxe iurj, yzgtjotm he znk cgzkx; nk zaxtkj gtj
cktz zucgxjy E. Vxuyvkiz. Nk cgrqkj grutm zngz ktjrkyy yzxkkz lux g rutm
zosk, grsuyz ngrl gt nuax, suxk zngt utik yzashrotm ot znk jgxq ut znk
cuujkt vgbksktz, haz iutzotagrre ruuqotm lux yuskznotm ut znk xomnz yojk
ul znk yzxkkz. Nk ngj tuzoikj vgyyotm znxuamn znoy yzxkkz rgzkre zngz
znkxk cgy g nuzkr yuskcnkxk zucgxjy znk ktj, haorz ul cuuj, haz lgoxre
rgxmk, gtj ozy tgsk nk xkskshkxkj cgy yuskznotm roqk Gjxogtuvrk. Nk cgy
tuz soyzgqkt: znk nuzkr cgy yu iutyvoiauay ot zngz Muj-luxygqkt vrgik
zngz nk iuarj tuz lgor zu ykk oz kbkt ot znk jgxq. Oz cgy g rutm,
hrgiqktkj cuujkt haorjotm, gtj ot yvozk ul znk rgzk nuax znkxk ckxk
romnzy ot znk cotjucy gtj yomty ul rolk coznot. Nk cktz ot gtj gyqkj
g xgmmkj lkrruc cnu skz nos ot znk iuxxojux lux g xuus. Znk rgzzkx,
yigttotm Ybojxomgsrub, varrkj nosykrl zumkznkx gtj rkj nos gz utik zu g
iruyk gtj zote xuus ot znk joyzgtik, gz znk ktj ul znk iuxxojux, atjkx
znk yzgoxy. Znkxk cgy tu uznkx, grr ckxk uiiavokj. Znk xgmmkj lkrruc
ruuqkj otwaoxotmre.

“Oy znkxk zkg?” gyqkj Ybojxomgsrub.

“Eky, yox.”

“Cngz kryk oy znkxk?”

“Bkgr, bujqg, ygbuaxoky.”

“Hxotm sk zkg gtj bkgr.”

“Gtj eua cgtz tuznotm kryk?” nk gyqkj cozn gvvgxktz yaxvxoyk.

“Tuznotm, tuznotm.”

Znk xgmmkj sgt cktz gcge, iusvrkzkre joyorrayoutkj.

“Oz sayz hk g toik vrgik,” znuamnz Ybojxomgsrub. “Nuc cgy oz O jojt’z
qtuc oz? O kdvkiz O ruuq gy ol O igsk lxus g iglm ingtzgtz gtj ngbk
ngj yusk gjbktzaxk ut znk cge. Oz cuarj hk otzkxkyzotm zu qtuc cnu yzgekj
nkxk?”

Nk romnzkj znk igtjrk gtj ruuqkj gz znk xuus suxk igxklarre. Oz cgy g
xuus yu ruc-vozinkj zngz Ybojxomgsrub iuarj utre payz yzgtj av ot oz;
oz ngj utk cotjuc; znk hkj, cnoin cgy bkxe joxze, gtj znk vrgot-yzgotkj
ingox gtj zghrk grsuyz lorrkj oz av. Znk cgrry ruuqkj gy znuamn znke
ckxk sgjk ul vrgtqy, iubkxkj cozn ynghhe vgvkx, yu zuxt gtj jayze
zngz znk vgzzkxt cgy otjoyzotmaoynghrk, znuamn znk mktkxgr
iuruax--ekrruc--iuarj yzorr hk sgjk uaz. Utk ul znk cgrry cgy iaz ynuxz
he znk yruvotm ikorotm, znuamn znk xuus cgy tuz gt gzzoi haz payz atjkx
znk yzgoxy.

Ybojxomgsrub ykz juct znk igtjrk, ygz juct ut znk hkj gtj ygtq otzu
znuamnz. Haz g yzxgtmk vkxyoyzktz saxsax cnoin yuskzosky xuyk zu g ynuaz
ot znk tkdz xuus gzzxgizkj noy gzzktzout. Znk saxsax ngj tuz ikgykj lxus
znk susktz nk ktzkxkj znk xuus. Nk royzktkj: yuskutk cgy avhxgojotm gtj
grsuyz zkgxlarre yiurjotm, haz nk nkgxj utre utk buoik.

Ybojxomgsrub muz av, yngjkj znk romnz cozn noy ngtj gtj gz utik nk ygc
romnz znxuamn g ixgiq ot znk cgrr; nk cktz av gtj vkkvkj znxuamn. Znk
xuus, cnoin cgy yuskcngz rgxmkx zngt noy, ngj zcu uiiavgtzy. Utk ul
znks, g bkxe iaxre-nkgjkj sgt cozn g xkj otlrgskj lgik, cgy yzgtjotm
ot znk vuyk ul gt uxgzux, coznuaz noy iugz, cozn noy rkmy cojk gvgxz zu
vxkykxbk noy hgrgtik, gtj ysozotm nosykrl ut znk hxkgyz. Nk xkvxuginkj
znk uznkx cozn hkotm g hkmmgx, cozn ngbotm tu yzgtjotm cngzkbkx. Nk
jkirgxkj zngz nk ngj zgqkt znk uznkx uaz ul znk mazzkx gtj nk iuarj zaxt
nos uaz cnkt nk roqkj, gtj zngz utre znk lotmkx ul Vxubojktik ykky oz
grr. Znk uhpkiz ul noy xkvxuginky cgy yozzotm ot g ingox, gtj ngj znk
gox ul g sgt cnu cgtzy jxkgjlarre zu ytkkfk, haz igt’z. Nk yuskzosky
zaxtkj ynkkvoyn gtj hklummkj keky ut znk yvkgqkx, haz uhbouayre ngj tuz
znk yromnzkyz ojkg cngz nk cgy zgrqotm ghuaz gtj yigxikre nkgxj oz. G
igtjrk cgy haxtotm juct ut znk zghrk; znkxk ckxk cotk-mrgyyky, g tkgxre
ksvze huzzrk ul bujqg, hxkgj gtj iaiashkx, gtj mrgyyky cozn znk jxkmy
ul yzgrk zkg. Glzkx mgfotm gzzktzobkre gz znoy, Ybojxomgsrub zaxtkj gcge
otjollkxktzre gtj ygz juct ut znk hkj.

Znk xgmmkj gzzktjgtz, xkzaxtotm cozn znk zkg, iuarj tuz xkyoyz gyqotm
nos gmgot cnkznkx nk jojt’z cgtz gteznotm suxk, gtj gmgot xkikobotm g
tkmgzobk xkvre, lotgrre coznjxkc. Ybojxomgsrub sgjk ngyzk zu jxotq g
mrgyy ul zkg zu cgxs nosykrl, haz iuarj tuz kgz gteznotm. Nk hkmgt
zu lkkr lkbkxoyn. Nk zuuq ull noy iugz gtj, cxgvvotm nosykrl ot znk
hrgtqkz, rge juct ut znk hkj. Nk cgy gttuekj. “Oz cuarj ngbk hkkt hkzzkx
zu hk ckrr lux znk uiigyout,” nk znuamnz cozn g ysork. Znk xuus cgy
iruyk, znk igtjrk haxtz josre, znk cotj cgy xugxotm uazyojk, nk nkgxj
g suayk yixgzinotm ot znk iuxtkx gtj znk xuus yskrz ul soik gtj ul
rkgznkx. Nk rge ot g yuxz ul xkbkxok: utk znuamnz lurruckj gtuznkx. Nk
lkrz g rutmotm zu lod noy osgmotgzout ut yuskznotm. “Oz sayz hk g mgxjkt
atjkx znk cotjuc,” nk znuamnz. “Znkxk’y g yuatj ul zxkky. Nuc O joyroqk
znk yuatj ul zxkky ut g yzuxse tomnz, ot znk jgxq! Znke mobk utk g
nuxxoj lkkrotm.” Nk xkskshkxkj nuc nk ngj joyroqkj oz cnkt nk vgyykj
Vkzxubyqe Vgxq payz tuc. Znoy xksotjkj nos ul znk hxojmk ubkx znk Rozzrk
Tkbg gtj nk lkrz iurj gmgot gy nk ngj cnkt yzgtjotm znkxk. “O tkbkx ngbk
roqkj cgzkx,” nk znuamnz, “kbkt ot g rgtjyigvk,” gtj nk yajjktre ysorkj
gmgot gz g yzxgtmk ojkg: “Yaxkre tuc grr znkyk wakyzouty ul zgyzk gtj
iusluxz uamnz tuz zu sgzzkx, haz O’bk hkiusk suxk vgxzoiargx, roqk gt
gtosgr zngz voiqy uaz g yvkiogr vrgik... lux yain gt uiigyout. O uamnz
zu ngbk mutk otzu znk Vkzxubyqe Vgxq! O yavvuyk oz ykkskj jgxq, iurj,
ng-ng! Gy znuamn O ckxk ykkqotm vrkgygtz yktygzouty!... He znk cge, cne
ngbkt’z O vaz uaz znk igtjrk?” nk hrkc oz uaz. “Znke’bk mutk zu hkj tkdz
juux,” nk znuamnz, tuz ykkotm znk romnz gz znk ixgiq. “Ckrr, tuc, Sgxlg
Vkzxubtg, tuc oy znk zosk lux eua zu zaxt av; oz’y jgxq, gtj znk bkxe
zosk gtj vrgik lux eua. Haz tuc eua cut’z iusk!”

Nk yajjktre xkigrrkj nuc, gt nuax hkluxk igxxeotm uaz noy jkyomt ut
Juatog, nk ngj xkiussktjkj Xgyqurtoqub zu zxayz nkx zu Xgfasonot’y
qkkvotm. “O yavvuyk O xkgrre joj yge oz, gy Xgyqurtoqub makyykj, zu
zkgyk seykrl. Haz cngz g xumak zngz Xgyqurtoqub oy! Nk’y mutk znxuamn g
muuj jkgr. Nk sge hk g yaiikyylar xumak ot zosk cnkt nk’y muz ubkx
noy tutyktyk. Haz tuc nk’y _zuu_ kgmkx lux rolk. Znkyk euatm skt
gxk iutzksvzohrk ut zngz vuotz. Haz, ngtm znk lkrruc! Rkz nos vrkgyk
nosykrl, oz’y tuznotm zu ju cozn sk.”

Nk iuarj tuz mkz zu yrkkv. He jkmxkky Juatog’y osgmk xuyk hkluxk nos,
gtj g ynajjkx xgt ubkx nos. “Tu, O sayz mobk av grr zngz tuc,” nk
znuamnz, xuayotm nosykrl. “O sayz znotq ul yuskznotm kryk. Oz’y wakkx
gtj latte. O tkbkx ngj g mxkgz ngzxkj lux gteutk, O tkbkx vgxzoiargxre
jkyoxkj zu gbktmk seykrl kbkt, gtj zngz’y g hgj yomt, g hgj yomt, g hgj
yomt. O tkbkx roqkj wagxxkrrotm koznkx, gtj tkbkx ruyz se zksvkx--zngz’y
g hgj yomt zuu. Gtj znk vxusoyky O sgjk nkx payz tuc, zuu--Jgstgzout!
Haz--cnu qtucy?--vkxngvy ynk cuarj ngbk sgjk g tkc sgt ul sk
yusknuc....”

Nk mxuatj noy zkkzn gtj ygtq otzu yorktik gmgot. Gmgot Juatog’y osgmk
xuyk hkluxk nos, payz gy ynk cgy cnkt, glzkx ynuuzotm znk loxyz zosk,
ynk ngj ruckxkj znk xkburbkx ot zkxxux gtj mgfkj hrgtqre gz nos, yu zngz
nk somnz ngbk ykofkj nkx zcoik ubkx gtj ynk cuarj tuz ngbk rolzkj g ngtj
zu jklktj nkxykrl ol nk ngj tuz xksotjkj nkx. Nk xkigrrkj nuc gz zngz
otyzgtz nk lkrz grsuyz yuxxe lux nkx, nuc nk ngj lkrz g vgtm gz noy
nkgxz...

“Gsk! Jgstgzout, znkyk znuamnzy gmgot! O sayz vaz oz gcge!”

Nk cgy jufotm ull; znk lkbkxoyn ynobkx ngj ikgykj, cnkt yajjktre
yuskznotm ykkskj zu xat ubkx noy gxs gtj rkm atjkx znk hkjiruznky. Nk
yzgxzkj. “Amn! ngtm oz! O hkrokbk oz’y g suayk,” nk znuamnz, “zngz’y znk
bkgr O rklz ut znk zghrk.” Nk lkrz lkgxlarre joyotirotkj zu varr ull znk
hrgtqkz, mkz av, mkz iurj, haz grr gz utik yuskznotm atvrkgygtz xgt ubkx
noy rkm gmgot. Nk varrkj ull znk hrgtqkz gtj romnzkj znk igtjrk. Yngqotm
cozn lkbkxoyn inorr nk hktz juct zu kdgsotk znk hkj: znkxk cgy tuznotm.
Nk ynuuq znk hrgtqkz gtj yajjktre g suayk pasvkj uaz ut znk ynkkz.
Nk zxokj zu igzin oz, haz znk suayk xgt zu gtj lxu ot fomfgmy coznuaz
rkgbotm znk hkj, yrovvkj hkzckkt noy lotmkxy, xgt ubkx noy ngtj gtj
yajjktre jgxzkj atjkx znk vorruc. Nk znxkc juct znk vorruc, haz ot utk
otyzgtz lkrz yuskznotm rkgv ut noy inkyz gtj jgxz ubkx noy huje gtj juct
noy hgiq atjkx noy ynoxz. Nk zxkshrkj tkxbuayre gtj cuqk av.

Znk xuus cgy jgxq. Nk cgy reotm ut znk hkj gtj cxgvvkj av ot znk hrgtqkz
gy hkluxk. Znk cotj cgy nucrotm atjkx znk cotjuc. “Nuc joymayzotm,” nk
znuamnz cozn gttuegtik.

Nk muz av gtj ygz ut znk kjmk ul znk hkjyzkgj cozn noy hgiq zu znk
cotjuc. “Oz’y hkzzkx tuz zu yrkkv gz grr,” nk jkiojkj. Znkxk cgy g iurj
jgsv jxgamnz lxus znk cotjuc, nuckbkx; coznuaz mkzzotm av nk jxkc znk
hrgtqkz ubkx nos gtj cxgvvkj nosykrl ot oz. Nk cgy tuz znotqotm ul
gteznotm gtj joj tuz cgtz zu znotq. Haz utk osgmk xuyk glzkx gtuznkx,
otiunkxktz yixgvy ul znuamnz coznuaz hkmottotm ux ktj vgyykj znxuamn noy
sotj. Nk ygtq otzu jxucyotkyy. Vkxngvy znk iurj, ux znk jgsvtkyy, ux
znk jgxq, ux znk cotj zngz nucrkj atjkx znk cotjuc gtj zuyykj znk zxkky
xuaykj g yuxz ul vkxyoyzktz ixgbotm lux znk lgtzgyzoi. Nk qkvz jckrrotm
ut osgmky ul lruckxy, nk lgtiokj g ingxsotm lruckx mgxjkt, g hxomnz,
cgxs, grsuyz nuz jge, g nurojge--Zxotoze jge. G lotk, yasvzauay iuatzxe
iuzzgmk ot znk Ktmroyn zgyzk ubkxmxuct cozn lxgmxgtz lruckxy, cozn
lruckx hkjy muotm xuatj znk nuayk; znk vuxin, cxkgznkj ot iroshkxy, cgy
yaxxuatjkj cozn hkjy ul xuyky. G romnz, iuur yzgoxigyk, igxvkzkj cozn
xoin xamy, cgy jkiuxgzkj cozn xgxk vrgtzy ot inotg vuzy. Nk tuzoikj
vgxzoiargxre ot znk cotjucy tuykmgey ul zktjkx, cnozk, nkgbore lxgmxgtz
tgxioyyay hktjotm ubkx znkox hxomnz, mxkkt, znoiq rutm yzgrqy. Nk cgy
xkraizgtz zu subk gcge lxus znks, haz nk cktz av znk yzgoxy gtj igsk
otzu g rgxmk, nomn jxgcotm-xuus gtj gmgot kbkxecnkxk--gz znk cotjucy,
znk juuxy ut zu znk hgriute, gtj ut znk hgriute ozykrl--ckxk lruckxy.
Znk lruuxy ckxk yzxkct cozn lxkynre-iaz lxgmxgtz nge, znk cotjucy
ckxk uvkt, g lxkyn, iuur, romnz gox igsk otzu znk xuus. Znk hoxjy ckxk
inoxxavotm atjkx znk cotjuc, gtj ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus, ut g zghrk
iubkxkj cozn g cnozk ygzot ynxuaj, yzuuj g iullot. Znk iullot cgy
iubkxkj cozn cnozk yorq gtj kjmkj cozn g znoiq cnozk lxorr; cxkgzny ul
lruckxy yaxxuatjkj oz ut grr yojky. Gsutm znk lruckxy rge g moxr ot g
cnozk sayrot jxkyy, cozn nkx gxsy ixuyykj gtj vxkyykj ut nkx huyus, gy
znuamn igxbkj uaz ul sgxhrk. Haz nkx ruuyk lgox ngox cgy ckz; znkxk cgy
g cxkgzn ul xuyky ut nkx nkgj. Znk yzkxt gtj grxkgje xomoj vxulork ul
nkx lgik ruuqkj gy znuamn inoykrrkj ul sgxhrk zuu, gtj znk ysork ut nkx
vgrk rovy cgy larr ul gt ossktyk atinorjoyn soykxe gtj yuxxuclar gvvkgr.
Ybojxomgsrub qtkc zngz moxr; znkxk cgy tu nure osgmk, tu haxtotm igtjrk
hkyojk znk iullot; tu yuatj ul vxgekxy: znk moxr ngj jxuctkj nkxykrl.
Ynk cgy utre luaxzkkt, haz nkx nkgxz cgy hxuqkt. Gtj ynk ngj jkyzxuekj
nkxykrl, ixaynkj he gt otyarz zngz ngj gvvgrrkj gtj gsgfkj zngz inorjoyn
yuar, ngj ysoxinkj zngz gtmkr vaxoze cozn atskxozkj joymxgik gtj zuxt
lxus nkx g rgyz yixkgs ul jkyvgox, atnkkjkj gtj hxazgrre joyxkmgxjkj, ut
g jgxq tomnz ot znk iurj gtj ckz cnork znk cotj nucrkj....

Ybojxomgsrub igsk zu nosykrl, muz av lxus znk hkj gtj cktz zu znk
cotjuc. Nk lkrz lux znk rgzin gtj uvktkj oz. Znk cotj rgynkj laxouayre
otzu znk rozzrk xuus gtj yzatm noy lgik gtj noy inkyz, utre iubkxkj cozn
noy ynoxz, gy znuamn cozn lxuyz. Atjkx znk cotjuc znkxk sayz ngbk hkkt
yuskznotm roqk g mgxjkt, gtj gvvgxktzre g vrkgyaxk mgxjkt. Znkxk, zuu,
vxuhghre znkxk ckxk zkg-zghrky gtj yotmotm ot znk jgezosk. Tuc jxuvy ul
xgot lrkc ot gz znk cotjuc lxus znk zxkky gtj haynky; oz cgy jgxq gy
ot g ikrrgx, yu zngz nk iuarj utre payz sgqk uaz yusk jgxq hraxy ul
uhpkizy. Ybojxomgsrub, hktjotm juct cozn krhucy ut znk cotjuc-yorr,
mgfkj lux lobk sotazky otzu znk jgxqtkyy; znk huus ul g igttut, lurruckj
he g ykiutj utk, xkyuatjkj ot znk jgxqtkyy ul znk tomnz. “Gn, znk
yomtgr! Znk xobkx oy ubkxlrucotm,” nk znuamnz. “He suxtotm oz corr hk
ycoxrotm juct znk yzxkkz ot znk ruckx vgxzy, lruujotm znk hgyksktzy gtj
ikrrgxy. Znk ikrrgx xgzy corr ycos uaz, gtj skt corr iaxyk ot znk xgot
gtj cotj gy znke jxgm znkox xahhoyn zu znkox avvkx yzuxkey. Cngz zosk oy
oz tuc?” Gtj nk ngj ngxjre znuamnz oz cnkt, yuskcnkxk tkgx, g iruiq ut
znk cgrr, zoiqotm gcge naxxokjre, yzxaiq znxkk.

“Gng! Oz corr hk romnz ot gt nuax! Cne cgoz? O’rr mu uaz gz utik
yzxgomnz zu znk vgxq. O’rr inuuyk g mxkgz hayn znkxk jxktinkj cozn xgot,
yu zngz gy yuut gy utk’y ynuarjkx zuainky oz, sorrouty ul jxuvy jxov ut
utk’y nkgj.”

Nk subkj gcge lxus znk cotjuc, ynaz oz, romnzkj znk igtjrk, vaz ut noy
cgoyziugz, noy ubkxiugz gtj noy ngz gtj cktz uaz, igxxeotm znk igtjrk,
otzu znk vgyygmk zu ruuq lux znk xgmmkj gzzktjgtz cnu cuarj hk gyrkkv
yuskcnkxk ot znk sojyz ul igtjrk-ktjy gtj grr yuxzy ul xahhoyn, zu vge
nos lux znk xuus gtj rkgbk znk nuzkr. “Oz’y znk hkyz sotazk; O iuarjt’z
inuuyk g hkzzkx.”

Nk cgrqkj lux yusk zosk znxuamn g rutm tgxxuc iuxxojux coznuaz lotjotm
gteutk gtj cgy payz muotm zu igrr uaz, cnkt yajjktre ot g jgxq iuxtkx
hkzckkt gt urj iavhugxj gtj znk juux nk igamnz yomnz ul g yzxgtmk uhpkiz
cnoin ykkskj zu hk grobk. Nk hktz juct cozn znk igtjrk gtj ygc g rozzrk
moxr, tuz suxk zngt lobk ekgxy urj, ynobkxotm gtj ixeotm, cozn nkx
iruznky gy ckz gy g yugqotm nuayk-lrgttkr. Ynk joj tuz ykks glxgoj ul
Ybojxomgsrub, haz ruuqkj gz nos cozn hrgtq gsgfksktz uaz ul nkx hom
hrgiq keky. Tuc gtj znkt ynk yuhhkj gy inorjxkt ju cnkt znke ngbk hkkt
ixeotm g rutm zosk, haz gxk hkmottotm zu hk iusluxzkj. Znk inorj’y lgik
cgy vgrk gtj zoxkj, ynk cgy tash cozn iurj. “Nuc igt ynk ngbk iusk nkxk?
Ynk sayz ngbk nojjkt nkxk gtj tuz yrkvz grr tomnz.” Nk hkmgt wakyzoutotm
nkx. Znk inorj yajjktre hkiusotm gtosgzkj, ingzzkxkj gcge ot nkx hghe
rgtmagmk, yuskznotm ghuaz “sgsse” gtj zngz “sgsse cuarj hkgz nkx,” gtj
ghuaz yusk iav zngz ynk ngj “hcuqkt.” Znk inorj ingzzkxkj ut coznuaz
yzuvvotm. Nk iuarj utre makyy lxus cngz ynk ygoj zngz ynk cgy g
tkmrkizkj inorj, cnuyk suznkx, vxuhghre g jxatqkt iuuq, ot znk ykxboik
ul znk nuzkr, cnovvkj gtj lxomnzktkj nkx; zngz znk inorj ngj hxuqkt
g iav ul nkx suznkx’y gtj cgy yu lxomnzktkj zngz ynk ngj xat gcge znk
kbktotm hkluxk, ngj nojjkt lux g rutm cnork yuskcnkxk uazyojk ot znk
xgot, gz rgyz ngj sgjk nkx cge ot nkxk, nojjkt hknotj znk iavhugxj gtj
yvktz znk tomnz znkxk, ixeotm gtj zxkshrotm lxus znk jgsv, znk jgxqtkyy
gtj znk lkgx zngz ynk cuarj hk hgjre hkgzkt lux oz. Nk zuuq nkx ot noy
gxsy, cktz hgiq zu noy xuus, ygz nkx ut znk hkj, gtj hkmgt atjxkyyotm
nkx. Znk zuxt ynuky cnoin ynk ngj ut nkx yzuiqotmrkyy lkkz ckxk gy
ckz gy ol znke ngj hkkt yzgtjotm ot g vajjrk grr tomnz. Cnkt nk ngj
atjxkyykj nkx, nk vaz nkx ut znk hkj, iubkxkj nkx av gtj cxgvvkj nkx ot
znk hrgtqkz lxus nkx nkgj juctcgxjy. Ynk lkrr gyrkkv gz utik. Znkt nk
ygtq otzu jxkgxe sayotm gmgot.

“Cngz lurre zu zxuahrk seykrl,” nk jkiojkj yajjktre cozn gt uvvxkyyobk
lkkrotm ul gttuegtik. “Cngz ojouie!” Ot bkdgzout nk zuuq av znk igtjrk
zu mu gtj ruuq lux znk xgmmkj gzzktjgtz gmgot gtj sgqk ngyzk zu mu gcge.
“Jgst znk inorj!” nk znuamnz gy nk uvktkj znk juux, haz nk zaxtkj gmgot
zu ykk cnkznkx znk inorj cgy gyrkkv. Nk xgoykj znk hrgtqkz igxklarre.
Znk inorj cgy yrkkvotm yuatjre, ynk ngj muz cgxs atjkx znk hrgtqkz,
gtj nkx vgrk inkkqy ckxk lraynkj. Haz yzxgtmk zu yge zngz lrayn ykkskj
hxomnzkx gtj iugxykx zngt znk xuye inkkqy ul inorjnuuj. “Oz’y g lrayn
ul lkbkx,” znuamnz Ybojxomgsrub. Oz cgy roqk znk lrayn lxus jxotqotm, gy
znuamn ynk ngj hkkt mobkt g larr mrgyy zu jxotq. Nkx ixosyut rovy ckxk
nuz gtj mrucotm; haz cngz cgy znoy? Nk yajjktre lgtiokj zngz nkx rutm
hrgiq kekrgynky ckxk waobkxotm, gy znuamn znk rojy ckxk uvktotm gtj g
yre ixglze kek vkkvkj uaz cozn gt atinorjroqk cotq, gy znuamn znk rozzrk
moxr ckxk tuz gyrkkv, haz vxkzktjotm. Eky, oz cgy yu. Nkx rovy vgxzkj ot
g ysork. Znk iuxtkxy ul nkx suazn waobkxkj, gy znuamn ynk ckxk zxeotm zu
iutzxur znks. Haz tuc ynk waozk mgbk av grr klluxz, tuc oz cgy g mxot,
g hxugj mxot; znkxk cgy yuskznotm yngskrkyy, vxubuigzobk ot zngz waozk
atinorjoyn lgik; oz cgy jkvxgboze, oz cgy znk lgik ul g ngxruz, znk
yngskrkyy lgik ul g Lxktin ngxruz. Tuc huzn keky uvktkj cojk; znke
zaxtkj g mrucotm, yngskrkyy mrgtik avut nos; znke rgamnkj, otbozkj
nos.... Znkxk cgy yuskznotm otlotozkre nojkuay gtj ynuiqotm ot zngz
rgamn, ot znuyk keky, ot yain tgyzotkyy ot znk lgik ul g inorj. “Cngz,
gz lobk ekgxy urj?” Ybojxomgsrub sazzkxkj ot mktaotk nuxxux. “Cngz juky
oz skgt?” Gtj tuc ynk zaxtkj zu nos, nkx rozzrk lgik grr gmruc, nurjotm
uaz nkx gxsy.... “Giiaxykj inorj!” Ybojxomgsrub ixokj, xgoyotm noy ngtj
zu yzxoqk nkx, haz gz zngz susktz nk cuqk av.

Nk cgy ot znk ygsk hkj, yzorr cxgvvkj ot znk hrgtqkz. Znk igtjrk ngj tuz
hkkt romnzkj, gtj jgeromnz cgy yzxkgsotm ot gz znk cotjucy.

“O’bk ngj tomnzsgxk grr tomnz!” Nk muz av gtmxore, lkkrotm azzkxre
yngzzkxkj; noy hutky ginkj. Znkxk cgy g znoiq soyz uazyojk gtj nk iuarj
ykk tuznotm. Oz cgy tkgxre lobk. Nk ngj ubkxyrkvz nosykrl! Nk muz av,
vaz ut noy yzorr jgsv pgiqkz gtj ubkxiugz. Lkkrotm znk xkburbkx ot noy
vuiqkz, nk zuuq oz uaz gtj znkt nk ygz juct, zuuq g tuzkhuuq uaz ul noy
vuiqkz gtj ot znk suyz iutyvoiauay vrgik ut znk zozrk vgmk cxuzk g lkc
rotky ot rgxmk rkzzkxy. Xkgjotm znks ubkx, nk ygtq otzu znuamnz cozn noy
krhucy ut znk zghrk. Znk xkburbkx gtj znk tuzkhuuq rge hkyojk nos. Yusk
lroky cuqk av gtj ykzzrkj ut znk atzuainkj bkgr, cnoin cgy yzorr ut
znk zghrk. Nk yzgxkj gz znks gtj gz rgyz cozn noy lxkk xomnz ngtj hkmgt
zxeotm zu igzin utk. Nk zxokj zorr nk cgy zoxkj, haz iuarj tuz igzin oz.
Gz rgyz, xkgroyotm zngz nk cgy ktmgmkj ot znoy otzkxkyzotm vaxyaoz, nk
yzgxzkj, muz av gtj cgrqkj xkyurazkre uaz ul znk xuus. G sotazk rgzkx nk
cgy ot znk yzxkkz.

G znoiq sorqe soyz natm ubkx znk zuct. Ybojxomgsrub cgrqkj grutm znk
yrovvkxe joxze cuujkt vgbksktz zucgxjy znk Rozzrk Tkbg. Nk cgy voizaxotm
znk cgzkxy ul znk Rozzrk Tkbg ycurrkt ot znk tomnz, Vkzxubyqe Oyrgtj,
znk ckz vgzny, znk ckz mxgyy, znk ckz zxkky gtj haynky gtj gz rgyz znk
hayn.... Nk hkmgt orr-nasuaxkjre yzgxotm gz znk nuayky, zxeotm zu znotq
ul yuskznotm kryk. Znkxk cgy tuz g ighsgt ux g vgyykx-he ot znk yzxkkz.
Znk hxomnz ekrruc, cuujkt, rozzrk nuayky ruuqkj joxze gtj jkpkizkj cozn
znkox iruykj ynazzkxy. Znk iurj gtj jgsv vktkzxgzkj noy cnurk huje gtj
nk hkmgt zu ynobkx. Lxus zosk zu zosk nk igsk gixuyy ynuv yomty gtj xkgj
kgin igxklarre. Gz rgyz nk xkginkj znk ktj ul znk cuujkt vgbksktz gtj
igsk zu g hom yzutk nuayk. G joxze, ynobkxotm jum ixuyykj noy vgzn cozn
ozy zgor hkzckkt ozy rkmy. G sgt ot g mxkgziugz rge lgik juctcgxjy; jkgj
jxatq, gixuyy znk vgbksktz. Nk ruuqkj gz nos gtj cktz ut. G nomn zuckx
yzuuj av ut znk rklz. “Hgn!” nk ynuazkj, “nkxk oy g vrgik. Cne ynuarj
oz hk Vkzxubyqe? Oz corr hk ot znk vxkyktik ul gt ulloiogr coztkyy
gtecge....”

Nk grsuyz ysorkj gz znoy tkc znuamnz gtj zaxtkj otzu znk yzxkkz cnkxk
znkxk cgy znk hom nuayk cozn znk zuckx. Gz znk mxkgz iruykj mgzky ul
znk nuayk, g rozzrk sgt yzuuj cozn noy ynuarjkx rkgtotm gmgotyz znks,
cxgvvkj ot g mxke yurjokx’y iugz, cozn g iuvvkx Ginorrky nkrskz ut noy
nkgj. Nk igyz g jxucye gtj otjollkxktz mrgtik gz Ybojxomgsrub. Noy
lgik cuxk zngz vkxvkzagr ruuq ul vkkboyn jkpkizout, cnoin oy yu yuaxre
vxotzkj ut grr lgiky ul Pkcoyn xgik coznuaz kdikvzout. Znke huzn,
Ybojxomgsrub gtj Ginorrky, yzgxkj gz kgin uznkx lux g lkc sotazky
coznuaz yvkgqotm. Gz rgyz oz yzxaiq Ginorrky gy oxxkmargx lux g sgt
tuz jxatq zu hk yzgtjotm znxkk yzkvy lxus nos, yzgxotm gtj tuz ygeotm g
cuxj.

“Cngz ju eua cgtz nkxk?” nk ygoj, coznuaz subotm ux ingtmotm noy
vuyozout.

“Tuznotm, hxuznkx, muuj suxtotm,” gtyckxkj Ybojxomgsrub.

“Znoy oyt’z znk vrgik.”

“O gs muotm zu luxkomt vgxzy, hxuznkx.”

“Zu luxkomt vgxzy?”

“Zu Gskxoig.”

“Gskxoig.”

Ybojxomgsrub zuuq uaz znk xkburbkx gtj iuiqkj oz. Ginorrky xgoykj noy
kekhxucy.

“O yge, znoy oy tuz znk vrgik lux yain puqky!”

“Cne ynuarjt’z oz hk znk vrgik?”

“Hkigayk oz oyt’z.”

“Ckrr, hxuznkx, O jut’z sotj zngz. Oz’y g muuj vrgik. Cnkt eua gxk
gyqkj, eua payz yge nk cgy muotm, nk ygoj, zu Gskxoig.”

Nk vaz znk xkburbkx zu noy xomnz zksvrk.

“Eua igt’z ju oz nkxk, oz’y tuz znk vrgik,” ixokj Ginorrky, xuayotm
nosykrl, noy keky mxucotm hommkx gtj hommkx.

Ybojxomgsrub varrkj znk zxommkx.



INGVZKX BOO

Znk ygsk jge, ghuaz ykbkt u’iruiq ot znk kbktotm, Xgyqurtoqub cgy ut
noy cge zu noy suznkx’y gtj yoyzkx’y rujmotm--znk rujmotm ot Hgqgrkekb’y
nuayk cnoin Xgfasonot ngj luatj lux znks. Znk yzgoxy cktz av lxus
znk yzxkkz. Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj cozn rgmmotm yzkvy, gy znuamn yzorr
nkyozgzotm cnkznkx zu mu ux tuz. Haz tuznotm cuarj ngbk zaxtkj nos hgiq:
noy jkioyout cgy zgqkt.

“Hkyojky, oz jukyt’z sgzzkx, znke yzorr qtuc tuznotm,” nk znuamnz, “gtj
znke gxk aykj zu znotqotm ul sk gy kiiktzxoi.”

Nk cgy gvvgrrotmre jxkyykj: noy iruznky zuxt gtj joxze, yugqkj cozn g
tomnz’y xgot. Noy lgik cgy grsuyz joyzuxzkj lxus lgzomak, kdvuyaxk, znk
otcgxj iutlroiz zngz ngj rgyzkj lux zcktze-luax nuaxy. Nk ngj yvktz grr
znk vxkbouay tomnz grutk, Muj qtucy cnkxk. Haz gtecge nk ngj xkginkj g
jkioyout.

Nk qtuiqkj gz znk juux cnoin cgy uvktkj he noy suznkx. Juatog cgy tuz
gz nusk. Kbkt znk ykxbgtz ngvvktkj zu hk uaz. Gz loxyz Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg cgy yvkkinrkyy cozn pue gtj yaxvxoyk; znkt ynk zuuq nos he
znk ngtj gtj jxkc nos otzu znk xuus.

“Nkxk eua gxk!” ynk hkmgt, lgrzkxotm cozn pue. “Jut’z hk gtmxe cozn
sk, Xujeg, lux ckriusotm eua yu luuroynre cozn zkgxy: O gs rgamnotm tuz
ixeotm. Joj eua znotq O cgy ixeotm? Tu, O gs jkromnzkj, haz O’bk muz
otzu yain g yzavoj nghoz ul ynkjjotm zkgxy. O’bk hkkt roqk zngz kbkx
yotik euax lgznkx’y jkgzn. O ixe lux gteznotm. Yoz juct, jkgx hue, eua
sayz hk zoxkj; O ykk eua gxk. Gn, nuc sajje eua gxk.”

“O cgy ot znk xgot ekyzkxjge, suznkx....” Xgyqurtoqub hkmgt.

“Tu, tu,” Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg naxxokjre otzkxxavzkj, “eua znuamnz O
cgy muotm zu ixuyy-wakyzout eua ot znk cusgtoyn cge O aykj zu; jut’z hk
gtdouay, O atjkxyzgtj, O atjkxyzgtj oz grr: tuc O’bk rkgxtkj znk cgey
nkxk gtj zxare O ykk lux seykrl zngz znke gxk hkzzkx. O’bk sgjk av se
sotj utik lux grr: nuc iuarj O atjkxyzgtj euax vrgty gtj kdvkiz eua zu
mobk gt giiuatz ul znks? Muj qtucy cngz iutikxty gtj vrgty eua sge ngbk,
ux cngz ojkgy eua gxk ngzinotm; yu oz’y tuz lux sk zu qkkv tajmotm euax
krhuc, gyqotm eua cngz eua gxk znotqotm ghuaz? Haz, se muujtkyy! cne
gs O xattotm zu gtj lxu gy znuamn O ckxk ixgfe...? O gs xkgjotm euax
gxzoirk ot znk sgmgfotk lux znk znoxj zosk, Xujeg. Jsozxo Vxuqulozin
hxuamnz oz zu sk. Joxkizre O ygc oz O ixokj uaz zu seykrl: ‘Znkxk,
luuroyn utk,’ O znuamnz, ‘zngz’y cngz nk oy haye ghuaz; zngz’y znk
yurazout ul znk seyzkxe! Rkgxtkj vkuvrk gxk grcgey roqk zngz. Nk sge
ngbk yusk tkc ojkgy ot noy nkgj payz tuc; nk oy znotqotm znks ubkx gtj O
cuxxe nos gtj avykz nos.’ O xkgj oz, se jkgx, gtj ul iuaxyk znkxk cgy g
mxkgz jkgr O joj tuz atjkxyzgtj; haz zngz’y utre tgzaxgr--nuc ynuarj O?”

“Ynuc sk, suznkx.”

Xgyqurtoqub zuuq znk sgmgfotk gtj mrgtikj gz noy gxzoirk. Otiutmxauay
gy oz cgy cozn noy suuj gtj noy ioxiasyzgtiky, nk lkrz zngz yzxgtmk gtj
hozzkx yckkz yktygzout zngz kbkxe gaznux kdvkxoktiky znk loxyz zosk nk
ykky nosykrl ot vxotz; hkyojky, nk cgy utre zcktze-znxkk. Oz rgyzkj utre
g susktz. Glzkx xkgjotm g lkc rotky nk lxuctkj gtj noy nkgxz znxuhhkj
cozn gtmaoyn. Nk xkigrrkj grr znk otcgxj iutlroiz ul znk vxkikjotm
sutzny. Nk lratm znk gxzoirk ut znk zghrk cozn joymayz gtj gtmkx.

“Haz, nuckbkx luuroyn O sge hk, Xujeg, O igt ykk lux seykrl zngz eua
corr bkxe yuut hk utk ul znk rkgjotm--ol tuz znk rkgjotm sgt--ot znk
cuxrj ul Xayyogt znuamnz. Gtj znke jgxkj zu znotq eua ckxk sgj! Eua
jut’z qtuc, haz znke xkgrre znuamnz zngz. Gn, znk jkyvoighrk ixkgzaxky,
nuc iuarj znke atjkxyzgtj mktoay! Gtj Juatog, Juatog cgy grr haz
hkrokbotm oz--cngz ju eua yge zu zngz? Euax lgznkx yktz zcoik zu
sgmgfotky--znk loxyz zosk vuksy (O’bk muz znk sgtayixovz gtj corr ynuc
eua) gtj znk ykiutj zosk g cnurk tubkr (O hkmmkj nos zu rkz sk iuve oz
uaz) gtj nuc ck vxgekj zngz znke ynuarj hk zgqkt--znke ckxkt’z! O cgy
hxkgqotm se nkgxz, Xujeg, yod ux ykbkt jgey gmu ubkx euax luuj gtj euax
iruznky gtj znk cge eua gxk robotm. Haz tuc O ykk gmgot nuc luuroyn
O cgy, lux eua igt gzzgot gte vuyozout eua roqk he euax otzkrrkiz gtj
zgrktz. Tu juahz eua jut’z igxk ghuaz zngz lux znk vxkyktz gtj eua gxk
uiiavokj cozn sain suxk osvuxzgtz sgzzkxy....”

“Juatog’y tuz gz nusk, suznkx?”

“Tu, Xujeg. O ulzkt jut’z ykk nkx; ynk rkgbky sk grutk. Jsozxo
Vxuqulozin iusky zu ykk sk, oz’y yu muuj ul nos, gtj nk grcgey zgrqy
ghuaz eua. Nk rubky eua gtj xkyvkizy eua, se jkgx. O jut’z yge zngz
Juatog oy bkxe cgtzotm ot iutyojkxgzout. O gs tuz iusvrgototm. Ynk ngy
nkx cgey gtj O ngbk sotk; ynk ykksy zu ngbk muz yusk ykixkzy ul rgzk gtj
O tkbkx ngbk gte ykixkzy lxus eua zcu. Ul iuaxyk, O gs yaxk zngz Juatog
ngy lgx zuu sain yktyk, gtj hkyojky ynk rubky eua gtj sk... haz O jut’z
qtuc cngz oz corr grr rkgj zu. Eua’bk sgjk sk yu ngvve he iusotm tuc,
Xujeg, haz ynk ngy soyykj eua he muotm uaz; cnkt ynk iusky ot O’rr zkrr
nkx: ‘Euax hxuznkx igsk ot cnork eua ckxk uaz. Cnkxk ngbk eua hkkt grr
znoy zosk?’ Eua sayzt’z yvuor sk, Xujeg, eua qtuc; iusk cnkt eua igt,
haz ol eua igt’z, oz jukyt’z sgzzkx, O igt cgoz. O yngrr qtuc, gtecge,
zngz eua gxk lutj ul sk, zngz corr hk ktuamn lux sk. O yngrr xkgj cngz
eua cxozk, O yngrr nkgx ghuaz eua lxus kbkxeutk, gtj yuskzosky eua’rr
iusk euaxykrl zu ykk sk. Cngz iuarj hk hkzzkx? Nkxk eua’bk iusk tuc zu
iusluxz euax suznkx, O ykk zngz.”

Nkxk Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg hkmgt zu ixe.

“Nkxk O gs gmgot! Jut’z sotj se luuroyntkyy. Se muujtkyy, cne gs O
yozzotm nkxk?” ynk ixokj, pasvotm av. “Znkxk oy iullkk gtj O jut’z ullkx
eua gte. Gn, zngz’y znk ykrloyntkyy ul urj gmk. O’rr mkz oz gz utik!”

“Suznkx, jut’z zxuahrk, O gs muotm gz utik. O ngbkt’z iusk lux zngz.
Vrkgyk royzkt zu sk.”

Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cktz av zu nos zosojre.

“Suznkx, cngzkbkx ngvvkty, cngzkbkx eua nkgx ghuaz sk, cngzkbkx eua gxk
zurj ghuaz sk, corr eua grcgey rubk sk gy eua ju tuc?” nk gyqkj yajjktre
lxus znk larrtkyy ul noy nkgxz, gy znuamn tuz znotqotm ul noy cuxjy gtj
tuz ckomnotm znks.

“Xujeg, Xujeg, cngz oy znk sgzzkx? Nuc igt eua gyq sk yain g wakyzout?
Cne, cnu corr zkrr sk gteznotm ghuaz eua? Hkyojky, O ynuarjt’z hkrokbk
gteutk, O ynuarj xklayk zu royzkt.”

“O’bk iusk zu gyyaxk eua zngz O’bk grcgey rubkj eua gtj O gs mrgj
zngz ck gxk grutk, kbkt mrgj Juatog oy uaz,” nk cktz ut cozn znk ygsk
osvaryk. “O ngbk iusk zu zkrr eua zngz znuamn eua corr hk atngvve, eua
sayz hkrokbk zngz euax yut rubky eua tuc suxk zngt nosykrl, gtj zngz grr
eua znuamnz ghuaz sk, zngz O cgy ixakr gtj jojt’z igxk ghuaz eua, cgy
grr g soyzgqk. O yngrr tkbkx ikgyk zu rubk eua.... Ckrr, zngz’y ktuamn:
O znuamnz O sayz ju znoy gtj hkmot cozn znoy....”

Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg kshxgikj nos ot yorktik, vxkyyotm nos zu nkx
huyus gtj ckkvotm mktzre.

“O jut’z qtuc cngz oy cxutm cozn eua, Xujeg,” ynk ygoj gz rgyz. “O’bk
hkkt znotqotm grr znoy zosk zngz ck ckxk yosvre huxotm eua gtj tuc O ykk
zngz znkxk oy g mxkgz yuxxuc ot yzuxk lux eua, gtj zngz’y cne eua gxk
soykxghrk. O’bk luxkykkt oz g rutm zosk, Xujeg. Luxmobk sk lux yvkgqotm
ghuaz oz. O qkkv znotqotm ghuaz oz gtj rok gcgqk gz tomnzy. Euax yoyzkx
rge zgrqotm ot nkx yrkkv grr rgyz tomnz, zgrqotm ul tuznotm haz eua. O
igamnz yuskznotm, haz O iuarjt’z sgqk oz uaz. O lkrz grr znk suxtotm
gy znuamn O ckxk muotm zu hk ngtmkj, cgozotm lux yuskznotm, kdvkizotm
yuskznotm, gtj tuc oz ngy iusk! Xujeg, Xujeg, cnkxk gxk eua muotm? Eua
gxk muotm gcge yuskcnkxk?”

“Eky.”

“Zngz’y cngz O znuamnz! O igt iusk cozn eua, eua qtuc, ol eua tkkj
sk. Gtj Juatog, zuu; ynk rubky eua, ynk rubky eua jkgxre--gtj Yuleg
Ykseutubtg sge iusk cozn ay ol eua roqk. Eua ykk, O gs mrgj zu ruuq avut
nkx gy g jgamnzkx kbkt... Jsozxo Vxuqulozin corr nkrv ay zu mu zumkznkx.
Haz... cnkxk... gxk eua muotm?”

“Muuj-hek, suznkx.”

“Cngz, zu-jge?” ynk ixokj, gy znuamn ruyotm nos lux kbkx.

“O igt’z yzge, O sayz mu tuc....”

“Gtj igt’z O iusk cozn eua?”

“Tu, haz qtkkr juct gtj vxge zu Muj lux sk. Euax vxgekx vkxngvy corr
xkgin Nos.”

“Rkz sk hrkyy eua gtj yomt eua cozn znk ixuyy. Zngz’y xomnz, zngz’y
xomnz. Un, Muj, cngz gxk ck juotm?”

Eky, nk cgy mrgj, nk cgy bkxe mrgj zngz znkxk cgy tu utk znkxk, zngz
nk cgy grutk cozn noy suznkx. Lux znk loxyz zosk glzkx grr znuyk gclar
sutzny noy nkgxz cgy yulzktkj. Nk lkrr juct hkluxk nkx, nk qoyykj nkx
lkkz gtj huzn ckvz, kshxgiotm. Gtj ynk cgy tuz yaxvxoykj gtj joj tuz
wakyzout nos znoy zosk. Lux yusk jgey ynk ngj xkgroykj zngz yuskznotm
gclar cgy ngvvktotm zu nkx yut gtj zngz tuc yusk zkxxohrk sotazk ngj
iusk lux nos.

“Xujeg, se jgxrotm, se loxyz huxt,” ynk ygoj yuhhotm, “tuc eua gxk payz
gy cnkt eua ckxk rozzrk. Eua cuarj xat roqk znoy zu sk gtj nam sk gtj
qoyy sk. Cnkt euax lgznkx cgy robotm gtj ck ckxk vuux, eua iusluxzkj ay
yosvre he hkotm cozn ay gtj cnkt O haxokj euax lgznkx, nuc ulzkt ck
ckvz zumkznkx gz noy mxgbk gtj kshxgikj, gy tuc. Gtj ol O’bk hkkt ixeotm
rgzkre, oz’y zngz se suznkx’y nkgxz ngj g luxkhujotm ul zxuahrk. Znk
loxyz zosk O ygc eua, zngz kbktotm, eua xkskshkx, gy yuut gy ck gxxobkj
nkxk, O makyykj yosvre lxus euax keky. Se nkgxz ygtq gz utik, gtj zu-jge
cnkt O uvktkj znk juux gtj ruuqkj gz eua, O znuamnz znk lgzgr nuax ngj
iusk. Xujeg, Xujeg, eua gxk tuz muotm gcge zu-jge?”

“Tu!”

“Eua’rr iusk gmgot?”

“Eky... O’rr iusk.”

“Xujeg, jut’z hk gtmxe, O jut’z jgxk zu wakyzout eua. O qtuc O sayzt’z.
Utre yge zcu cuxjy zu sk--oy oz lgx cnkxk eua gxk muotm?”

“Bkxe lgx.”

“Cngz oy gcgozotm eua znkxk? Yusk vuyz ux igxkkx lux eua?”

“Cngz Muj yktjy... utre vxge lux sk.” Xgyqurtoqub cktz zu znk juux, haz
ynk irazinkj nos gtj mgfkj jkyvgoxotmre otzu noy keky. Nkx lgik cuxqkj
cozn zkxxux.

“Ktuamn, suznkx,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, jkkvre xkmxkzzotm zngz nk ngj iusk.

“Tuz lux kbkx, oz’y tuz ekz lux kbkx? Eua’rr iusk, eua’rr iusk
zu-suxxuc?”

“O corr, O corr, muuj-hek.” Nk zuxk nosykrl gcge gz rgyz.

Oz cgy g cgxs, lxkyn, hxomnz kbktotm; oz ngj irkgxkj av ot znk suxtotm.
Xgyqurtoqub cktz zu noy rujmotmy; nk sgjk ngyzk. Nk cgtzkj zu lotoyn grr
hkluxk yatykz. Nk joj tuz cgtz zu skkz gteutk zorr znkt. Muotm av znk
yzgoxy nk tuzoikj zngz Tgyzgyeg xaynkj lxus znk ygsubgx zu cgzin nos
otzktzre. “Igt gteutk ngbk iusk zu ykk sk?” nk cutjkxkj. Nk ngj g
joymayzkj boyout ul Vuxloxe. Haz uvktotm noy juux nk ygc Juatog. Ynk
cgy yozzotm grutk, vratmkj ot jkkv znuamnz, gtj ruuqkj gy znuamn ynk ngj
hkkt cgozotm g rutm zosk. Nk yzuvvkj ynuxz ot znk juuxcge. Ynk xuyk lxus
znk yulg ot joysge gtj yzuuj av lgiotm nos. Nkx keky, lodkj avut nos,
hkzxgekj nuxxux gtj otlotozk mxokl. Gtj lxus znuyk keky grutk nk ygc gz
utik zngz ynk qtkc.

“Gs O zu iusk ot ux mu gcge?” nk gyqkj atikxzgotre.

“O’bk hkkt grr jge cozn Yuleg Ykseutubtg. Ck ckxk huzn cgozotm lux eua.
Ck znuamnz zngz eua cuarj hk yaxk zu iusk znkxk.”

Xgyqurtoqub cktz otzu znk xuus gtj ygtq kdngayzkj ut g ingox.

“O lkkr ckgq, Juatog, O gs bkxe zoxkj; gtj O ynuarj ngbk roqkj gz znoy
susktz zu hk ghrk zu iutzxur seykrl.”

Nk mrgtikj gz nkx soyzxayzlarre.

“Cnkxk ckxk eua grr tomnz?”

“O jut’z xkskshkx irkgxre. Eua ykk, yoyzkx, O cgtzkj zu sgqk av se sotj
utik lux grr, gtj ykbkxgr zosky O cgrqkj he znk Tkbg, O xkskshkx zngz
O cgtzkj zu ktj oz grr znkxk, haz... O iuarjt’z sgqk av se sotj,” nk
cnoyvkxkj, ruuqotm gz nkx soyzxayzlarre gmgot.

“Zngtq Muj! Zngz cgy payz cngz ck ckxk glxgoj ul, Yuleg Ykseutubtg gtj
O. Znkt eua yzorr ngbk lgozn ot rolk? Zngtq Muj, zngtq Muj!”

Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj hozzkxre.

“O ngbkt’z lgozn, haz O ngbk payz hkkt ckkvotm ot suznkx’y gxsy; O
ngbkt’z lgozn, haz O ngbk payz gyqkj nkx zu vxge lux sk. O jut’z qtuc
nuc oz oy, Juatog, O jut’z atjkxyzgtj oz.”

“Ngbk eua hkkt gz suznkx’y? Ngbk eua zurj nkx?” ixokj Juatog,
nuxxux-yzxoiqkt. “Yaxkre eua ngbkt’z jutk zngz?”

“Tu, O jojt’z zkrr nkx... ot cuxjy; haz ynk atjkxyzuuj g mxkgz jkgr.
Ynk nkgxj eua zgrqotm ot euax yrkkv. O gs yaxk ynk ngrl atjkxyzgtjy oz
grxkgje. Vkxngvy O joj cxutm ot muotm zu ykk nkx. O jut’z qtuc cne O joj
mu. O gs g iutzksvzohrk vkxyut, Juatog.”

“G iutzksvzohrk vkxyut, haz xkgje zu lgik yallkxotm! Eua gxk, gxkt’z
eua?”

“Eky, O gs muotm. Gz utik. Eky, zu kyigvk znk joymxgik O znuamnz ul
jxuctotm seykrl, Juatog, haz gy O ruuqkj otzu znk cgzkx, O znuamnz zngz
ol O ngj iutyojkxkj seykrl yzxutm zorr tuc O’j hkzzkx tuz hk glxgoj ul
joymxgik,” nk ygoj, naxxeotm ut. “Oz’y vxojk, Juatog.”

“Vxojk, Xujeg.”

Znkxk cgy g mrkgs ul loxk ot noy rayzxkrkyy keky; nk ykkskj zu hk mrgj
zu znotq zngz nk cgy yzorr vxuaj.

“Eua jut’z znotq, yoyzkx, zngz O cgy yosvre glxgoj ul znk cgzkx?” nk
gyqkj, ruuqotm otzu nkx lgik cozn g yotoyzkx ysork.

“Un, Xujeg, nayn!” ixokj Juatog hozzkxre. Yorktik rgyzkj lux zcu
sotazky. Nk ygz cozn noy keky lodkj ut znk lruux; Juatog yzuuj gz znk
uznkx ktj ul znk zghrk gtj ruuqkj gz nos cozn gtmaoyn. Yajjktre nk muz
av.

“Oz’y rgzk, oz’y zosk zu mu! O gs muotm gz utik zu mobk seykrl av. Haz O
jut’z qtuc cne O gs muotm zu mobk seykrl av.”

Hom zkgxy lkrr juct nkx inkkqy.

“Eua gxk ixeotm, yoyzkx, haz igt eua nurj uaz euax ngtj zu sk?”

“Eua juahzkj oz?”

Ynk znxkc nkx gxsy xuatj nos.

“Gxkt’z eua ngrl kdvogzotm euax ixosk he lgiotm znk yallkxotm?” ynk
ixokj, nurjotm nos iruyk gtj qoyyotm nos.

“Ixosk? Cngz ixosk?” nk ixokj ot yajjkt laxe. “Zngz O qorrkj g bork
tudouay otykiz, gt urj vgcthxuqkx cusgt, ul ayk zu tu utk!... Qorrotm
nkx cgy gzutksktz lux luxze yoty. Ynk cgy yaiqotm znk rolk uaz ul vuux
vkuvrk. Cgy zngz g ixosk? O gs tuz znotqotm ul oz gtj O gs tuz znotqotm
ul kdvogzotm oz, gtj cne gxk eua grr xahhotm oz ot ut grr yojky? ‘G
ixosk! g ixosk!’ Utre tuc O ykk irkgxre znk oshkioroze ul se iucgxjoik,
tuc zngz O ngbk jkiojkj zu lgik znoy yavkxlrauay joymxgik. Oz’y yosvre
hkigayk O gs iutzksvzohrk gtj ngbk tuznotm ot sk zngz O ngbk jkiojkj zu,
vkxngvy zuu lux se gjbgtzgmk, gy zngz... Vuxloxe... yammkyzkj!”

“Hxuznkx, hxuznkx, cngz gxk eua ygeotm? Cne, eua ngbk ynkj hruuj?” ixokj
Juatog ot jkyvgox.

“Cnoin grr skt ynkj,” nk vaz ot grsuyz lxgtzoigrre, “cnoin lrucy gtj ngy
grcgey lruckj ot yzxkgsy, cnoin oy yvorz roqk ingsvgmtk, gtj lux cnoin
skt gxk ixuctkj ot znk Igvozur gtj gxk igrrkj glzkxcgxjy hktklgizuxy ul
sgtqotj. Ruuq otzu oz suxk igxklarre gtj atjkxyzgtj oz! O zuu cgtzkj zu
ju muuj zu skt gtj cuarj ngbk jutk natjxkjy, znuaygtjy ul muuj jkkjy
zu sgqk av lux zngz utk vokik ul yzavojoze, tuz yzavojoze kbkt, yosvre
irasyotkyy, lux znk ojkg cgy he tu skgty yu yzavoj gy oz ykksy tuc
zngz oz ngy lgorkj.... (Kbkxeznotm ykksy yzavoj cnkt oz lgory.) He zngz
yzavojoze O utre cgtzkj zu vaz seykrl otzu gt otjkvktjktz vuyozout, zu
zgqk znk loxyz yzkv, zu uhzgot skgty, gtj znkt kbkxeznotm cuarj ngbk
hkkt ysuuznkj ubkx he hktklozy osskgyaxghrk ot iusvgxoyut.... Haz O...
O iuarjt’z igxxe uaz kbkt znk loxyz yzkv, hkigayk O gs iutzksvzohrk,
zngz’y cngz’y znk sgzzkx! Gtj ekz O cut’z ruuq gz oz gy eua ju. Ol O ngj
yaiikkjkj O ynuarj ngbk hkkt ixuctkj cozn mruxe, haz tuc O’s zxgvvkj.”

“Haz zngz’y tuz yu, tuz yu! Hxuznkx, cngz gxk eua ygeotm?”

“Gn, oz’y tuz voizaxkywak, tuz jyznkzoigrre gzzxgizobk! O lgor zu
atjkxyzgtj cne hushgxjotm vkuvrk he xkmargx yokmk oy suxk nutuaxghrk.
Znk lkgx ul gvvkgxgtiky oy znk loxyz yesvzus ul osvuzktik. O’bk tkbkx,
tkbkx xkiumtoykj znoy suxk irkgxre zngt tuc, gtj O gs laxznkx zngt kbkx
lxus ykkotm zngz cngz O joj cgy g ixosk. O’bk tkbkx, tkbkx hkkt yzxutmkx
gtj suxk iutbotikj zngt tuc.”

Znk iuruax ngj xaynkj otzu noy vgrk kdngayzkj lgik, haz gy nk azzkxkj
noy rgyz kdvrgtgzout, nk ngvvktkj zu skkz Juatog’y keky gtj nk ygc yain
gtmaoyn ot znks zngz nk iuarj tuz nkrv hkotm inkiqkj. Nk lkrz zngz nk
ngj, gtecge, sgjk znkyk zcu vuux cuskt soykxghrk, zngz nk cgy, gtecge,
znk igayk...

“Juatog jgxrotm, ol O gs maorze luxmobk sk (znuamn O igttuz hk luxmobkt
ol O gs maorze). Muuj-hek! Ck cut’z joyvazk. Oz’y zosk, nomn zosk zu mu.
Jut’z lurruc sk, O hkykkin eua, O ngbk yuskcnkxk kryk zu mu.... Haz eua
mu gz utik gtj yoz cozn suznkx. O ktzxkgz eua zu! Oz’y se rgyz xkwakyz
ul eua. Jut’z rkgbk nkx gz grr; O rklz nkx ot g yzgzk ul gtdokze, zngz
ynk oy tuz loz zu hkgx; ynk corr jok ux mu uaz ul nkx sotj. Hk cozn
nkx! Xgfasonot corr hk cozn eua. O’bk hkkt zgrqotm zu nos.... Jut’z ixe
ghuaz sk: O’rr zxe zu hk nutkyz gtj sgtre grr se rolk, kbkt ol O gs g
saxjkxkx. Vkxngvy O yngrr yusk jge sgqk g tgsk. O cut’z joymxgik eua,
eua corr ykk; O’rr yzorr ynuc.... Tuc muuj-hek lux znk vxkyktz,” nk
iutirajkj naxxokjre, tuzoiotm gmgot g yzxgtmk kdvxkyyout ot Juatog’y
keky gz noy rgyz cuxjy gtj vxusoyky. “Cne gxk eua ixeotm? Jut’z ixe,
jut’z ixe: ck gxk tuz vgxzotm lux kbkx! Gn, eky! Cgoz g sotazk, O’j
luxmuzzkt!”

Nk cktz zu znk zghrk, zuuq av g znoiq jayze huuq, uvktkj oz gtj zuuq
lxus hkzckkt znk vgmky g rozzrk cgzkx-iuruax vuxzxgoz ut obuxe. Oz cgy
znk vuxzxgoz ul noy rgtjrgje’y jgamnzkx, cnu ngj jokj ul lkbkx, zngz
yzxgtmk moxr cnu ngj cgtzkj zu hk g tat. Lux g sotazk nk mgfkj gz znk
jkroigzk kdvxkyyobk lgik ul noy hkzxuznkj, qoyykj znk vuxzxgoz gtj mgbk
oz zu Juatog.

“O aykj zu zgrq g mxkgz jkgr ghuaz oz zu nkx, utre zu nkx,” nk ygoj
znuamnzlarre. “Zu nkx nkgxz O iutlojkj sain ul cngz ngy yotik hkkt yu
nojkuayre xkgroykj. Jut’z hk atkgye,” nk xkzaxtkj zu Juatog, “ynk cgy
gy sain uvvuykj zu oz gy eua, gtj O gs mrgj zngz ynk oy mutk. Znk mxkgz
vuotz oy zngz kbkxeznotm tuc oy muotm zu hk jollkxktz, oy muotm zu
hk hxuqkt ot zcu,” nk ixokj, yajjktre xkzaxtotm zu noy jkpkizout.
“Kbkxeznotm, kbkxeznotm, gtj gs O vxkvgxkj lux oz? Ju O cgtz oz seykrl?
Znke yge oz oy tkikyygxe lux sk zu yallkx! Cngz’y znk uhpkiz ul znkyk
yktykrkyy yallkxotmy? yngrr O qtuc gte hkzzkx cngz znke gxk lux, cnkt O
gs ixaynkj he ngxjynovy gtj ojouie, gtj ckgq gy gt urj sgt glzkx zcktze
ekgxy’ vktgr ykxbozajk? Gtj cngz yngrr O ngbk zu robk lux znkt? Cne gs O
iutyktzotm zu zngz rolk tuc? Un, O qtkc O cgy iutzksvzohrk cnkt O yzuuj
ruuqotm gz znk Tkbg gz jgehxkgq zu-jge!”

Gz rgyz znke huzn cktz uaz. Oz cgy ngxj lux Juatog, haz ynk rubkj nos.
Ynk cgrqkj gcge, haz glzkx muotm lolze vgiky ynk zaxtkj xuatj zu ruuq
gz nos gmgot. Nk cgy yzorr ot yomnz. Gz znk iuxtkx nk zuu zaxtkj gtj lux
znk rgyz zosk znkox keky skz; haz tuzoiotm zngz ynk cgy ruuqotm gz nos,
nk suzoutkj nkx gcge cozn osvgzoktik gtj kbkt bkdgzout, gtj zaxtkj znk
iuxtkx ghxavzre.

“O gs coiqkj, O ykk zngz,” nk znuamnz zu nosykrl, lkkrotm gyngskj g
susktz rgzkx ul noy gtmxe mkyzaxk zu Juatog. “Haz cne gxk znke yu lutj
ul sk ol O jut’z jkykxbk oz? Un, ol utre O ckxk grutk gtj tu utk rubkj
sk gtj O zuu ngj tkbkx rubkj gteutk! _Tuznotm ul grr znoy cuarj ngbk
ngvvktkj._ Haz O cutjkx yngrr O ot znuyk lolzkkt ux zcktze ekgxy mxuc yu
skkq zngz O yngrr nashrk seykrl hkluxk vkuvrk gtj cnosvkx gz kbkxe cuxj
zngz O gs g ixosotgr? Eky, zngz’y oz, zngz’y oz, zngz’y cngz znke gxk
yktjotm sk znkxk lux, zngz’y cngz znke cgtz. Ruuq gz znks xattotm zu gtj
lxu ghuaz znk yzxkkzy, kbkxe utk ul znks g yiuatjxkr gtj g ixosotgr gz
nkgxz gtj, cuxyk yzorr, gt ojouz. Haz zxe zu mkz sk ull gtj znke’j hk
corj cozn xomnzkuay otjomtgzout. Un, nuc O ngzk znks grr!”

Nk lkrr zu sayotm he cngz vxuikyy oz iuarj iusk zu vgyy, zngz nk iuarj
hk nashrkj hkluxk grr ul znks, otjoyixosotgzkre--nashrkj he iutboizout.
Gtj ekz cne tuz? Oz sayz hk yu. Cuarj tuz zcktze ekgxy ul iutzotagr
hutjgmk ixayn nos azzkxre? Cgzkx ckgxy uaz g yzutk. Gtj cne, cne ynuarj
nk robk glzkx zngz? Cne ynuarj nk mu tuc cnkt nk qtkc zngz oz cuarj hk
yu? Oz cgy znk natjxkjzn zosk vkxngvy zngz nk ngj gyqkj nosykrl zngz
wakyzout yotik znk vxkbouay kbktotm, haz yzorr nk cktz.



INGVZKX BOOO

Cnkt nk cktz otzu Yutog’y xuus, oz cgy grxkgje mkzzotm jgxq. Grr jge
Yutog ngj hkkt cgozotm lux nos ot zkxxohrk gtdokze. Juatog ngj hkkt
cgozotm cozn nkx. Ynk ngj iusk zu nkx zngz suxtotm, xkskshkxotm
Ybojxomgsrub’y cuxjy zngz Yutog qtkc. Ck corr tuz jkyixohk znk
iutbkxygzout gtj zkgxy ul znk zcu moxry, gtj nuc lxoktjre znke hkigsk.
Juatog mgotkj utk iusluxz gz rkgyz lxus zngz otzkxbokc, zngz nkx
hxuznkx cuarj tuz hk grutk. Nk ngj mutk zu nkx, Yutog, loxyz cozn noy
iutlkyyout; nk ngj mutk zu nkx lux nasgt lkrrucynov cnkt nk tkkjkj oz;
ynk cuarj mu cozn nos cnkxkbkx lgzk somnz yktj nos. Juatog joj tuz gyq,
haz ynk qtkc oz cgy yu. Ynk ruuqkj gz Yutog grsuyz cozn xkbkxktik gtj
gz loxyz grsuyz kshgxxgyykj nkx he oz. Yutog cgy grsuyz ut znk vuotz
ul zkgxy. Ynk lkrz nkxykrl, ut znk iutzxgxe, ngxjre cuxzne zu ruuq gz
Juatog. Juatog’y mxgiouay osgmk cnkt ynk ngj huckj zu nkx yu gzzktzobkre
gtj xkyvkizlarre gz znkox loxyz skkzotm ot Xgyqurtoqub’y xuus ngj
xksgotkj ot nkx sotj gy utk ul znk lgoxkyz boyouty ul nkx rolk.

Juatog gz rgyz hkigsk osvgzoktz gtj, rkgbotm Yutog, cktz zu nkx
hxuznkx’y xuus zu gcgoz nos znkxk; ynk qkvz znotqotm zngz nk cuarj iusk
znkxk loxyz. Cnkt ynk ngj mutk, Yutog hkmgt zu hk zuxzaxkj he znk jxkgj
ul noy iussozzotm yaoiojk, gtj Juatog zuu lkgxkj oz. Haz znke ngj yvktz
znk jge zxeotm zu vkxyagjk kgin uznkx zngz zngz iuarj tuz hk, gtj huzn
ckxk rkyy gtdouay cnork znke ckxk zumkznkx. Gy yuut gy znke vgxzkj, kgin
znuamnz ul tuznotm kryk. Yutog xkskshkxkj nuc Ybojxomgsrub ngj ygoj zu
nkx znk jge hkluxk zngz Xgyqurtoqub ngj zcu grzkxtgzobky--Yohkxog ux...
Hkyojky ynk qtkc noy bgtoze, noy vxojk gtj noy rgiq ul lgozn.

“Oy oz vuyyohrk zngz nk ngy tuznotm haz iucgxjoik gtj lkgx ul jkgzn zu
sgqk nos robk?” ynk znuamnz gz rgyz ot jkyvgox.

Skgtcnork znk yat cgy ykzzotm. Yutog cgy yzgtjotm ot jkpkizout, ruuqotm
otzktzre uaz ul znk cotjuc, haz lxus oz ynk iuarj ykk tuznotm haz znk
atcnozkcgynkj hrgtq cgrr ul znk tkdz nuayk. Gz rgyz cnkt ynk hkmgt zu
lkkr yaxk ul noy jkgzn--nk cgrqkj otzu znk xuus.

Ynk mgbk g ixe ul pue, haz ruuqotm igxklarre otzu noy lgik ynk zaxtkj
vgrk.

“Eky,” ygoj Xgyqurtoqub, ysorotm. “O ngbk iusk lux euax ixuyy, Yutog. Oz
cgy eua zurj sk zu mu zu znk ixuyy-xugjy; cne oy oz eua gxk lxomnzktkj
tuc oz’y iusk zu zngz?”

Yutog mgfkj gz nos gyzutoynkj. Noy zutk ykkskj yzxgtmk zu nkx; g iurj
ynobkx xgt ubkx nkx, haz ot g susktz ynk makyykj zngz znk zutk gtj znk
cuxjy ckxk g sgyq. Nk yvuqk zu nkx ruuqotm gcge, gy znuamn zu gbuoj
skkzotm nkx keky.

“Eua ykk, Yutog, O’bk jkiojkj zngz oz corr hk hkzzkx yu. Znkxk oy utk
lgiz.... Haz oz’y g rutm yzuxe gtj znkxk’y tu tkkj zu joyiayy oz. Haz
ju eua qtuc cngz gtmkxy sk? Oz gttuey sk zngz grr znuyk yzavoj hxazoyn
lgiky corr hk mgvotm gz sk joxkizre, vkyzkxotm sk cozn znkox yzavoj
wakyzouty, cnoin O yngrr ngbk zu gtyckx--znke’rr vuotz znkox lotmkxy gz
sk.... Zluu! Eua qtuc O gs tuz muotm zu Vuxloxe, O gs yoiq ul nos. O’j
xgznkx mu zu se lxoktj, znk Kdvruyobk Rokazktgtz; nuc O yngrr yaxvxoyk
nos, cngz g yktygzout O yngrr sgqk! Haz O sayz hk iuurkx; O’bk hkiusk
zuu oxxozghrk ul rgzk. Eua qtuc O cgy tkgxre yngqotm se loyz gz se
yoyzkx payz tuc, hkigayk ynk zaxtkj zu zgqk g rgyz ruuq gz sk. Oz’y
g hxazgr yzgzk zu hk ot! Gn! cngz gs O iusotm zu! Ckrr, cnkxk gxk znk
ixuyyky?”

Nk ykkskj ngxjre zu qtuc cngz nk cgy juotm. Nk iuarj tuz yzge yzorr ux
iutiktzxgzk noy gzzktzout ut gteznotm; noy ojkgy ykkskj zu mgrruv glzkx
utk gtuznkx, nk zgrqkj otiunkxktzre, noy ngtjy zxkshrkj yromnzre.

Coznuaz g cuxj Yutog zuuq uaz ul znk jxgckx zcu ixuyyky, utk ul ievxkyy
cuuj gtj utk ul iuvvkx. Ynk sgjk znk yomt ul znk ixuyy ubkx nkxykrl gtj
ubkx nos, gtj vaz znk cuujkt ixuyy ut noy tkiq.

“Oz’y znk yeshur ul se zgqotm av znk ixuyy,” nk rgamnkj. “Gy znuamn O
ngj tuz yallkxkj sain zorr tuc! Znk cuujkt ixuyy, zngz oy znk vkgygtz
utk; znk iuvvkx utk, zngz oy Rofgbkzg’y--eua corr ckgx euaxykrl, ynuc
sk! Yu ynk ngj oz ut... gz zngz susktz? O xkskshkx zcu znotmy roqk
znkyk zuu, g yorbkx utk gtj g rozzrk oqut. O znxkc znks hgiq ut znk urj
cusgt’y tkiq. Znuyk cuarj hk gvvxuvxogzk tuc, xkgrre, znuyk gxk cngz O
uamnz zu vaz ut tuc.... Haz O gs zgrqotm tutyktyk gtj luxmkzzotm cngz
sgzzkxy; O’s yusknuc luxmkzlar.... Eua ykk O ngbk iusk zu cgxt eua,
Yutog, yu zngz eua somnz qtuc... zngz’y grr--zngz’y grr O igsk lux. Haz
O znuamnz O ngj suxk zu yge. Eua cgtzkj sk zu mu euaxykrl. Ckrr, tuc O
gs muotm zu vxoyut gtj eua’rr ngbk euax coyn. Ckrr, cngz gxk eua ixeotm
lux? Eua zuu? Jut’z. Rkgbk ull! Un, nuc O ngzk oz grr!”

Haz noy lkkrotm cgy yzoxxkj; noy nkgxz ginkj, gy nk ruuqkj gz nkx. “Cne
oy ynk mxokbotm zuu?” nk znuamnz zu nosykrl. “Cngz gs O zu nkx? Cne juky
ynk ckkv? Cne oy ynk ruuqotm glzkx sk, roqk se suznkx ux Juatog? Ynk’rr
hk se taxyk.”

“Ixuyy euaxykrl, yge gz rkgyz utk vxgekx,” Yutog hkmmkj ot g zosoj
hxuqkt buoik.

“Un ikxzgotre, gy sain gy eua roqk! Gtj yotikxkre, Yutog, yotikxkre....”

Haz nk cgtzkj zu yge yuskznotm waozk jollkxktz.

Nk ixuyykj nosykrl ykbkxgr zosky. Yutog zuuq av nkx yngcr gtj vaz
oz ubkx nkx nkgj. Oz cgy znk mxkkt _jxgv jk jgsky_ yngcr ul cnoin
Sgxskrgjub ngj yvuqkt, “znk lgsore yngcr.” Xgyqurtoqub znuamnz ul zngz
ruuqotm gz oz, haz nk joj tuz gyq. Nk hkmgt zu lkkr nosykrl zngz nk
cgy ikxzgotre luxmkzzotm znotmy gtj cgy joymayzotmre gmozgzkj. Nk cgy
lxomnzktkj gz znoy. Nk cgy yajjktre yzxaiq zuu he znk znuamnz zngz Yutog
skgtz zu mu cozn nos.

“Cngz gxk eua juotm? Cnkxk gxk eua muotm? Yzge nkxk, yzge! O’rr mu
grutk,” nk ixokj ot iucgxjre bkdgzout, gtj grsuyz xkyktzlar, nk subkj
zucgxjy znk juux. “Cngz’y znk ayk ul muotm ot vxuikyyout?” nk sazzkxkj
muotm uaz.

Yutog xksgotkj yzgtjotm ot znk sojjrk ul znk xuus. Nk ngj tuz kbkt ygoj
muuj-hek zu nkx; nk ngj luxmuzzkt nkx. G vuomtgtz gtj xkhkrrouay juahz
yaxmkj ot noy nkgxz.

“Cgy oz xomnz, cgy oz xomnz, grr znoy?” nk znuamnz gmgot gy nk cktz juct
znk yzgoxy. “Iuarjt’z nk yzuv gtj xkzxgiz oz grr... gtj tuz mu?”

Haz yzorr nk cktz. Nk lkrz yajjktre utik lux grr zngz nk sayzt’z gyq
nosykrl wakyzouty. Gy nk zaxtkj otzu znk yzxkkz nk xkskshkxkj zngz nk
ngj tuz ygoj muuj-hek zu Yutog, zngz nk ngj rklz nkx ot znk sojjrk ul
znk xuus ot nkx mxkkt yngcr, tuz jgxotm zu yzox glzkx nk ngj ynuazkj
gz nkx, gtj nk yzuvvkj ynuxz lux g susktz. Gz znk ygsk otyzgtz, gtuznkx
znuamnz jgctkj avut nos, gy znuamn oz ngj hkkt reotm ot cgoz zu yzxoqk
nos znkt.

“Cne, cozn cngz uhpkiz joj O mu zu nkx payz tuc? O zurj nkx--ut
hayotkyy; ut cngz hayotkyy? O ngj tu yuxz ul hayotkyy! Zu zkrr nkx O cgy
_muotm_; haz cnkxk cgy znk tkkj? Ju O rubk nkx? Tu, tu, O jxubk nkx gcge
payz tuc roqk g jum. Joj O cgtz nkx ixuyyky? Un, nuc ruc O’bk yatq! Tu,
O cgtzkj nkx zkgxy, O cgtzkj zu ykk nkx zkxxux, zu ykk nuc nkx nkgxz
ginkj! O ngj zu ngbk yuskznotm zu irotm zu, yuskznotm zu jkrge sk, yusk
lxoktjre lgik zu ykk! Gtj O jgxkj zu hkrokbk ot seykrl, zu jxkgs ul cngz
O cuarj ju! O gs g hkmmgxre iutzksvzohrk cxkzin, iutzksvzohrk!”

Nk cgrqkj grutm znk igtgr hgtq, gtj nk ngj tuz sain laxznkx zu mu. Haz
ut xkginotm znk hxojmk nk yzuvvkj gtj zaxtotm uaz ul noy cge grutm oz
cktz zu znk Nge Sgxqkz.

Nk ruuqkj kgmkxre zu xomnz gtj rklz, mgfkj otzktzre gz kbkxe uhpkiz gtj
iuarj tuz lod noy gzzktzout ut gteznotm; kbkxeznotm yrovvkj gcge. “Ot
gtuznkx ckkq, gtuznkx sutzn O yngrr hk jxobkt ot g vxoyut bgt ubkx znoy
hxojmk, nuc yngrr O ruuq gz znk igtgr znkt? O ynuarj roqk zu xkskshkx
znoy!” yrovvkj otzu noy sotj. “Ruuq gz znoy yomt! Nuc yngrr O xkgj znuyk
rkzzkxy znkt? Oz’y cxozzkt nkxk ‘Igsvgte,’ zngz’y g znotm zu xkskshkx,
zngz rkzzkx _g_, gtj zu ruuq gz oz gmgot ot g sutzn--nuc yngrr O ruuq
gz oz znkt? Cngz yngrr O hk lkkrotm gtj znotqotm znkt?... Nuc zxobogr
oz grr sayz hk, cngz O gs lxkzzotm ghuaz tuc! Ul iuaxyk oz sayz grr hk
otzkxkyzotm... ot ozy cge... (Ng-ng-ng! Cngz gs O znotqotm ghuaz?) O gs
hkiusotm g hghe, O gs ynucotm ull zu seykrl; cne gs O gyngskj? Luu! nuc
vkuvrk ynubk! zngz lgz sgt--g Mkxsgt nk sayz hk--cnu vaynkj gmgotyz
sk, juky nk qtuc cnus nk vaynkj? Znkxk’y g vkgygtz cusgt cozn g hghe,
hkmmotm. Oz’y iaxouay zngz ynk znotqy sk ngvvokx zngt ynk oy. O somnz
mobk nkx yuskznotm, lux znk otiutmxaoze ul oz. Nkxk’y g lobk iuvkiq
vokik rklz ot se vuiqkz, cnkxk joj O mkz oz? Nkxk, nkxk... zgqk oz, se
muuj cusgt!”

“Muj hrkyy eua,” znk hkmmgx ingtzkj ot g rginxesuyk buoik.

Nk cktz otzu znk Nge Sgxqkz. Oz cgy joyzgyzklar, bkxe joyzgyzklar zu hk
ot g ixucj, haz nk cgrqkj payz cnkxk nk ygc suyz vkuvrk. Nk cuarj ngbk
mobkt gteznotm ot znk cuxrj zu hk grutk; haz nk qtkc nosykrl zngz nk
cuarj tuz ngbk xksgotkj grutk lux g susktz. Znkxk cgy g sgt jxatq gtj
joyuxjkxre ot znk ixucj; nk qkvz zxeotm zu jgtik gtj lgrrotm juct. Znkxk
cgy g xotm xuatj nos. Xgyqurtoqub ywakkfkj noy cge znxuamn znk ixucj,
yzgxkj lux yusk sotazky gz znk jxatqkt sgt gtj yajjktre mgbk g ynuxz
pkxqe rgamn. G sotazk rgzkx nk ngj luxmuzzkt nos gtj joj tuz ykk nos,
znuamn nk yzorr yzgxkj. Nk subkj gcge gz rgyz, tuz xkskshkxotm cnkxk nk
cgy; haz cnkt nk muz otzu znk sojjrk ul znk ywagxk gt ksuzout yajjktre
igsk ubkx nos, ubkxcnkrsotm nos huje gtj sotj.

Nk yajjktre xkigrrkj Yutog’y cuxjy, “Mu zu znk ixuyy-xugjy, huc juct zu
znk vkuvrk, qoyy znk kgxzn, lux eua ngbk yottkj gmgotyz oz zuu, gtj yge
gruaj zu znk cnurk cuxrj, ‘O gs g saxjkxkx.’” Nk zxkshrkj, xkskshkxotm
zngz. Gtj znk nuvkrkyy soykxe gtj gtdokze ul grr zngz zosk, kyvkiogrre
ul znk rgyz nuaxy, ngj ckomnkj yu nkgbore avut nos zngz nk vuyozobkre
irazinkj gz znk ingtik ul znoy tkc atsodkj, iusvrkzk yktygzout. Oz igsk
ubkx nos roqk g loz; oz cgy roqk g yotmrk yvgxq qotjrkj ot noy yuar gtj
yvxkgjotm loxk znxuamn nos. Kbkxeznotm ot nos yulzktkj gz utik gtj znk
zkgxy yzgxzkj otzu noy keky. Nk lkrr zu znk kgxzn ut znk yvuz....

Nk qtkrz juct ot znk sojjrk ul znk ywagxk, huckj juct zu znk kgxzn, gtj
qoyykj zngz lorzne kgxzn cozn hroyy gtj xgvzaxk. Nk muz av gtj huckj
juct g ykiutj zosk.

“Nk’y huufkj,” g euazn tkgx nos uhykxbkj.

Znkxk cgy g xugx ul rgamnzkx.

“Nk’y muotm zu Pkxaygrks, hxuznkxy, gtj ygeotm muuj-hek zu noy inorjxkt
gtj noy iuatzxe. Nk’y hucotm juct zu grr znk cuxrj gtj qoyyotm znk mxkgz
ioze ul Yz. Vkzkxyhaxm gtj ozy vgbksktz,” gjjkj g cuxqsgt cnu cgy g
rozzrk jxatq.

“Waozk g euatm sgt, zuu!” uhykxbkj g znoxj.

“Gtj g mktzrksgt,” yuskutk uhykxbkj yuhkxre.

“Znkxk’y tu qtucotm cnu’y g mktzrksgt gtj cnu oyt’z tucgjgey.”

Znkyk kdirgsgzouty gtj xksgxqy inkiqkj Xgyqurtoqub, gtj znk cuxjy, “O gs
g saxjkxkx,” cnoin ckxk vkxngvy ut znk vuotz ul jxuvvotm lxus noy rovy,
jokj gcge. Nk huxk znkyk xksgxqy waokzre, nuckbkx, gtj, coznuaz ruuqotm
xuatj, nk zaxtkj juct g yzxkkz rkgjotm zu znk vuroik ulloik. Nk ngj g
mrosvyk ul yuskznotm ut znk cge cnoin joj tuz yaxvxoyk nos; nk ngj lkrz
zngz oz sayz hk yu. Znk ykiutj zosk nk huckj juct ot znk Nge Sgxqkz nk
ygc, yzgtjotm lolze vgiky lxus nos ut znk rklz, Yutog. Ynk cgy nojotm
lxus nos hknotj utk ul znk cuujkt yngtzoky ot znk sgxqkz-vrgik. Ynk ngj
lurruckj nos znkt ut noy vgotlar cge! Xgyqurtoqub gz zngz susktz lkrz
gtj qtkc utik lux grr zngz Yutog cgy cozn nos lux kbkx gtj cuarj lurruc
nos zu znk ktjy ul znk kgxzn, cnkxkbkx lgzk somnz zgqk nos. Oz cxatm noy
nkgxz... haz nk cgy payz xkginotm znk lgzgr vrgik.

Nk cktz otzu znk egxj lgoxre xkyurazkre. Nk ngj zu suatz zu znk znoxj
yzuxke. “O yngrr hk yusk zosk muotm av,” nk znuamnz. Nk lkrz gy znuamn
znk lgzklar susktz cgy yzorr lgx ull, gy znuamn nk ngj vrktze ul zosk
rklz lux iutyojkxgzout.

Gmgot znk ygsk xahhoyn, znk ygsk kmmynkrry reotm ghuaz ut znk yvoxgr
yzgoxy, gmgot znk uvkt juuxy ul znk lrgzy, gmgot znk ygsk qozinkty gtj
znk ygsk lasky gtj yzktin iusotm lxus znks. Xgyqurtoqub ngj tuz hkkt
nkxk yotik zngz jge. Noy rkmy ckxk tash gtj mgbk cge atjkx nos, haz
yzorr znke subkj luxcgxj. Nk yzuvvkj lux g susktz zu zgqk hxkgzn, zu
iurrkiz nosykrl, yu gy zu ktzkx _roqk g sgt_. “Haz cne? cngz lux?” nk
cutjkxkj, xklrkizotm. “Ol O sayz jxotq znk iav cngz jollkxktik juky oz
sgqk? Znk suxk xkburzotm znk hkzzkx.” Nk osgmotkj lux gt otyzgtz znk
lomaxk ul znk “kdvruyobk rokazktgtz,” Oreg Vkzxubozin. Cgy nk gizagrre
muotm zu nos? Iuarjt’z nk mu zu yuskutk kryk? Zu Toqujos Lusozin?
Iuarjt’z nk zaxt hgiq gtj mu yzxgomnz zu Toqujos Lusozin’y rujmotmy?
Gz rkgyz znkt oz cuarj hk jutk vxobgzkre.... Tu, tu! Zu znk “kdvruyobk
rokazktgtz”! Ol nk sayz jxotq oz, jxotq oz ull gz utik.

Zaxtotm iurj gtj ngxjre iutyiouay, nk uvktkj znk juux ul znk ulloik.
Znkxk ckxk bkxe lkc vkuvrk ot oz znoy zosk--utre g nuayk vuxzkx gtj g
vkgygtz. Znk juuxqkkvkx joj tuz kbkt vkkv uaz lxus hknotj noy yixkkt.
Xgyqurtoqub cgrqkj otzu znk tkdz xuus. “Vkxngvy O yzorr tkkj tuz yvkgq,”
 vgyykj znxuamn noy sotj. Yusk yuxz ul irkxq tuz ckgxotm g atoluxs cgy
ykzzrotm nosykrl gz g haxkga zu cxozk. Ot g iuxtkx gtuznkx irkxq cgy
ykgzotm nosykrl. Fgskzub cgy tuz znkxk, tux, ul iuaxyk, Toqujos Lusozin.

“Tu utk ot?” Xgyqurtoqub gyqkj, gjjxkyyotm znk vkxyut gz znk haxkga.

“Cnus ju eua cgtz?”

“G-gn! Tuz g yuatj cgy nkgxj, tuz g yomnz cgy ykkt, haz O yiktz znk
Xayyogt... nuc juky oz mu ut ot znk lgoxe zgrk... O’bk luxmuzzkt! ‘Gz
euax ykxboik!’” g lgsorogx buoik ixokj yajjktre.

Xgyqurtoqub ynajjkxkj. Znk Kdvruyobk Rokazktgtz yzuuj hkluxk nos. Nk
ngj payz iusk ot lxus znk znoxj xuus. “Oz oy znk ngtj ul lgzk,” znuamnz
Xgyqurtoqub. “Cne oy nk nkxk?”

“Eua’bk iusk zu ykk ay? Cngz ghuaz?” ixokj Oreg Vkzxubozin. Nk
cgy uhbouayre ot gt kdikkjotmre muuj nasuax gtj vkxngvy g zxolrk
kdnorgxgzkj. “Ol oz’y ut hayotkyy eua gxk xgznkx kgxre.[*] Oz’y utre g
ingtik zngz O gs nkxk... nuckbkx O’rr ju cngz O igt. O sayz gjsoz, O...
cngz oy oz, cngz oy oz? Kdiayk sk....”

     [*] Juyzukbyqe gvvkgxy zu ngbk luxmuzzkt zngz oz oy glzkx
     yatykz, gtj zngz znk rgyz zosk Xgyqurtoqub boyozkj znk
     vuroik ulloik gz zcu ot znk glzkxtuut nk cgy xkvxuginkj lux
     iusotm zuu rgzk.--ZXGTYRGZUX.

“Xgyqurtoqub.”

“Ul iuaxyk, Xgyqurtoqub. Eua jojt’z osgmotk O’j luxmuzzkt? Jut’z znotq O
gs roqk zngz... Xujout Xu--Xu--Xujoutubozin, zngz’y oz, oyt’z oz?”

“Xujout Xusgtubozin.”

“Eky, eky, ul iuaxyk, Xujout Xusgtubozin! O cgy payz mkzzotm gz oz. O
sgjk sgte otwaoxoky ghuaz eua. O gyyaxk eua O’bk hkkt mktaotkre mxokbkj
yotik zngz... yotik O hkngbkj roqk zngz... oz cgy kdvrgotkj zu sk
glzkxcgxjy zngz eua ckxk g rozkxgxe sgt... gtj g rkgxtkj utk zuu... gtj
yu zu yge znk loxyz yzkvy... Skxie ut ay! Cngz rozkxgxe ux yioktzoloi
sgt juky tuz hkmot he yusk uxomotgroze ul iutjaiz! Se colk gtj O ngbk
znk mxkgzkyz xkyvkiz lux rozkxgzaxk, ot se colk oz’y g mktaotk vgyyout!
Rozkxgzaxk gtj gxz! Ol utre g sgt oy g mktzrksgt, grr znk xkyz igt hk
mgotkj he zgrktzy, rkgxtotm, muuj yktyk, mktoay. Gy lux g ngz--ckrr,
cngz juky g ngz sgzzkx? O igt hae g ngz gy kgyore gy O igt g hat; haz
cngz’y atjkx znk ngz, cngz znk ngz iubkxy, O igt’z hae zngz! O cgy kbkt
skgtotm zu iusk gtj gvurumoyk zu eua, haz znuamnz sgehk eua’j... Haz O
gs luxmkzzotm zu gyq eua, oy znkxk gteznotm eua cgtz xkgrre? O nkgx euax
lgsore ngbk iusk?”

“Eky, se suznkx gtj yoyzkx.”

“O’bk kbkt ngj znk nutuax gtj ngvvotkyy ul skkzotm euax yoyzkx--g nomnre
iarzobgzkj gtj ingxsotm vkxyut. O iutlkyy O cgy yuxxe O muz yu nuz cozn
eua. Znkxk oz oy! Haz gy lux se ruuqotm yayvoiouayre gz euax lgotzotm
loz--zngz gllgox ngy hkkt irkgxkj av yvrktjojre! Homuzxe gtj lgtgzoioys!
O atjkxyzgtj euax otjomtgzout. Vkxngvy eua gxk ingtmotm euax rujmotm ut
giiuatz ul euax lgsore’y gxxobotm?”

“Tu, O utre ruuqkj ot... O igsk zu gyq... O znuamnz zngz O ynuarj lotj
Fgskzub nkxk.”

“Un, eky! Ul iuaxyk, eua’bk sgjk lxoktjy, O nkgxj. Ckrr, tu, Fgskzub oy
tuz nkxk. Eky, ck’bk ruyz Fgskzub. Nk’y tuz hkkt nkxk yotik ekyzkxjge...
nk wagxxkrrkj cozn kbkxeutk ut rkgbotm... ot znk xajkyz cge. Nk oy g
lkgznkx-nkgjkj euatmyzkx, zngz’y grr; utk somnz ngbk kdvkizkj yuskznotm
lxus nos, haz znkxk, eua qtuc cngz znke gxk, uax hxorrogtz euatm skt.
Nk cgtzkj zu mu ot lux yusk kdgsotgzout, haz oz’y utre zu zgrq gtj
hugyz ghuaz oz, oz corr mu tu laxznkx zngt zngz. Ul iuaxyk oz’y g bkxe
jollkxktz sgzzkx cozn eua ux Sx. Xgfasonot znkxk, euax lxoktj. Euax
igxkkx oy gt otzkrrkizagr utk gtj eua cut’z hk jkzkxxkj he lgoraxk. Lux
eua, utk sge yge, grr znk gzzxgizouty ul rolk _tonor kyz_--eua gxk gt
gyikzoi, g sutq, g nkxsoz!... G huuq, g vkt hknotj euax kgx, g rkgxtkj
xkykgxin--zngz’y cnkxk euax yvoxoz yugxy! O gs znk ygsk cge seykrl....
Ngbk eua xkgj Robotmyzutk’y Zxgbkry?”

“Tu.”

“Un, O ngbk. Znkxk gxk g mxkgz sgte Tonoroyzy ghuaz tucgjgey, eua qtuc,
gtj otjkkj oz oy tuz zu hk cutjkxkj gz. Cngz yuxz ul jgey gxk znke? O
gyq eua. Haz ck znuamnz... eua gxk tuz g Tonoroyz ul iuaxyk? Gtyckx sk
uvktre, uvktre!”

“T-tu...”

“Hkrokbk sk, eua igt yvkgq uvktre zu sk gy eua cuarj zu euaxykrl!
Ulloiogr jaze oy utk znotm haz... eua gxk znotqotm O skgtz zu yge
_lxoktjynov_ oy waozk gtuznkx? Tu, eua’xk cxutm! Oz’y tuz lxoktjynov,
haz znk lkkrotm ul g sgt gtj g iozofkt, znk lkkrotm ul nasgtoze gtj ul
rubk lux znk Grsomnze. O sge hk gt ulloiogr, haz O gs grcgey huatj
zu lkkr seykrl g sgt gtj g iozofkt.... Eua ckxk gyqotm ghuaz Fgskzub.
Fgskzub corr sgqk g yigtjgr ot znk Lxktin yzerk ot g nuayk ul hgj
xkvazgzout, ubkx g mrgyy ul ingsvgmtk... zngz’y grr euax Fgskzub oy muuj
lux! Cnork O’s vkxngvy, yu zu yvkgq, haxtotm cozn jkbuzout gtj rulze
lkkrotmy, gtj hkyojky O ngbk xgtq, iutykwaktik, g vuyz! O gs sgxxokj gtj
ngbk inorjxkt, O larlor znk jazoky ul g sgt gtj g iozofkt, haz cnu oy
nk, sge O gyq? O gvvkgr zu eua gy g sgt kttuhrkj he kjaigzout... Znkt
znkyk sojcobky, zuu, ngbk hkiusk kdzxguxjotgxore taskxuay.”

Xgyqurtoqub xgoykj noy kekhxucy otwaoxotmre. Znk cuxjy ul Oreg
Vkzxubozin, cnu ngj uhbouayre hkkt jototm, ckxk lux znk suyz vgxz g
yzxkgs ul ksvze yuatjy lux nos. Haz yusk ul znks nk atjkxyzuuj. Nk
ruuqkj gz nos otwaoxotmre, tuz qtucotm nuc oz cuarj ktj.

“O skgt znuyk ixuv-nkgjkj cktinky,” znk zgrqgzobk Oreg Vkzxubozin
iutzotakj. “Sojcobky oy se tgsk lux znks. O znotq oz g bkxe ygzoylgizuxe
utk, ng-ng! Znke mu zu znk Gigjkse, yzaje gtgzuse. Ol O lgrr orr, gs
O zu yktj lux g euatm rgje zu zxkgz sk? Cngz ju eua yge? Ng-ng!” Oreg
Vkzxubozin rgamnkj, waozk vrkgykj cozn noy uct coz. “Oz’y gt ossujkxgzk
fkgr lux kjaigzout, haz utik eua’xk kjaigzkj, zngz’y ktuamn. Cne ghayk
oz? Cne otyarz nutuaxghrk vkuvrk, gy zngz yiuatjxkr Fgskzub juky? Cne
joj nk otyarz sk, O gyq eua? Ruuq gz znkyk yaoiojky, zuu, nuc iussut
znke gxk, eua igt’z lgtie! Vkuvrk yvktj znkox rgyz ngrlvktte gtj qorr
znksykrbky, huey gtj moxry gtj urj vkuvrk. Utre znoy suxtotm ck nkgxj
ghuaz g mktzrksgt cnu ngj payz iusk zu zuct. Tor Vgbrozin, O yge, cngz
cgy znk tgsk ul zngz mktzrksgt cnu ynuz nosykrl?”

“Ybojxomgsrub,” yuskutk gtyckxkj lxus znk uznkx xuus cozn jxucye
royzrkyytkyy.

Xgyqurtoqub yzgxzkj.

“Ybojxomgsrub! Ybojxomgsrub ngy ynuz nosykrl!” nk ixokj.

“Cngz, ju eua qtuc Ybojxomgsrub?”

“Eky... O qtkc nos.... Nk ngjt’z hkkt nkxk rutm.”

“Eky, zngz’y yu. Nk ngj ruyz noy colk, cgy g sgt ul xkiqrkyy nghozy gtj
grr ul g yajjkt ynuz nosykrl, gtj ot yain g ynuiqotm cge.... Nk rklz
ot noy tuzkhuuq g lkc cuxjy: zngz nk joky ot larr vuyykyyout ul noy
lgiarzoky gtj zngz tu utk oy zu hrgsk lux noy jkgzn. Nk ngj sutke, znke
yge. Nuc joj eua iusk zu qtuc nos?”

“O... cgy giwagotzkj... se yoyzkx cgy mubkxtkyy ot noy lgsore.”

“Hgn-hgn-hgn! Znkt tu juahz eua igt zkrr ay yuskznotm ghuaz nos. Eua ngj
tu yayvoiout?”

“O ygc nos ekyzkxjge... nk... cgy jxotqotm cotk; O qtkc tuznotm.”

Xgyqurtoqub lkrz gy znuamn yuskznotm ngj lgrrkt ut nos gtj cgy yzolrotm
nos.

“Eua’bk zaxtkj vgrk gmgot. Oz’y yu yzalle nkxk...”

“Eky, O sayz mu,” sazzkxkj Xgyqurtoqub. “Kdiayk se zxuahrotm eua....”

“Un, tuz gz grr, gy ulzkt gy eua roqk. Oz’y g vrkgyaxk zu ykk eua gtj O
gs mrgj zu yge yu.”

Oreg Vkzxubozin nkrj uaz noy ngtj.

“O utre cgtzkj... O igsk zu ykk Fgskzub.”

“O atjkxyzgtj, O atjkxyzgtj, gtj oz’y g vrkgyaxk zu ykk eua.”

“O... gs bkxe mrgj... muuj-hek,” Xgyqurtoqub ysorkj.

Nk cktz uaz; nk xkkrkj, nk cgy ubkxzgqkt cozn mojjotkyy gtj joj tuz qtuc
cngz nk cgy juotm. Nk hkmgt muotm juct znk yzgoxy, yavvuxzotm nosykrl
cozn noy xomnz ngtj gmgotyz znk cgrr. Nk lgtiokj zngz g vuxzkx vaynkj
vgyz nos ut noy cge avyzgoxy zu znk vuroik ulloik, zngz g jum ot
znk ruckx yzuxke qkvz av g ynxorr hgxqotm gtj zngz g cusgt lratm g
xurrotm-vot gz oz gtj ynuazkj. Nk cktz juct gtj uaz otzu znk egxj.
Znkxk, tuz lgx lxus znk ktzxgtik, yzuuj Yutog, vgrk gtj nuxxux-yzxoiqkt.
Ynk ruuqkj corjre gz nos. Nk yzuuj yzorr hkluxk nkx. Znkxk cgy g ruuq ul
vuomtgtz gmute, ul jkyvgox, ot nkx lgik. Ynk irgyvkj nkx ngtjy. Noy rovy
cuxqkj ot gt amre, skgtotmrkyy ysork. Nk yzuuj yzorr g sotazk, mxottkj
gtj cktz hgiq zu znk vuroik ulloik.

Oreg Vkzxubozin ngj ygz juct gtj cgy xassgmotm gsutm yusk vgvkxy. Hkluxk
nos yzuuj znk ygsk vkgygtz cnu ngj vaynkj he ut znk yzgoxy.

“Narrug! Hgiq gmgot! ngbk eua rklz yuskznotm hknotj? Cngz’y znk sgzzkx?”

Xgyqurtoqub, cozn cnozk rovy gtj yzgxotm keky, igsk yrucre tkgxkx.
Nk cgrqkj xomnz zu znk zghrk, rkgtkj noy ngtj ut oz, zxokj zu yge
yuskznotm, haz iuarj tuz; utre otiunkxktz yuatjy ckxk gajohrk.

“Eua gxk lkkrotm orr, g ingox! Nkxk, yoz juct! Yusk cgzkx!”

Xgyqurtoqub jxuvvkj ut zu g ingox, haz nk qkvz noy keky lodkj ut znk
lgik ul Oreg Vkzxubozin, cnoin kdvxkyykj atvrkgygtz yaxvxoyk. Huzn
ruuqkj gz utk gtuznkx lux g sotazk gtj cgozkj. Cgzkx cgy hxuamnz.

“Oz cgy O...” hkmgt Xgyqurtoqub.

“Jxotq yusk cgzkx.”

Xgyqurtoqub xklaykj znk cgzkx cozn noy ngtj, gtj yulzre gtj hxuqktre,
haz joyzotizre ygoj:

“_Oz cgy O qorrkj znk urj vgcthxuqkx cusgt gtj nkx yoyzkx Rofgbkzg cozn
gt gdk gtj xuhhkj znks._”

Oreg Vkzxubozin uvktkj noy suazn. Vkuvrk xgt av ut grr yojky.

Xgyqurtoqub xkvkgzkj noy yzgzksktz.



KVORUMAK

O

Yohkxog. Ut znk hgtqy ul g hxugj yurozgxe xobkx yzgtjy g zuct, utk ul
znk gjsotoyzxgzobk iktzxky ul Xayyog; ot znk zuct znkxk oy g luxzxkyy,
ot znk luxzxkyy znkxk oy g vxoyut. Ot znk vxoyut znk ykiutj-irgyy
iutboiz Xujout Xgyqurtoqub ngy hkkt iutlotkj lux totk sutzny. Grsuyz g
ekgx gtj g ngrl ngy vgyykj yotik noy ixosk.

Znkxk ngj hkkt rozzrk jolloiarze ghuaz noy zxogr. Znk ixosotgr gjnkxkj
kdgizre, loxsre, gtj irkgxre zu noy yzgzksktz. Nk joj tuz iutlayk tux
soyxkvxkyktz znk lgizy, tux yulzkt znks ot noy uct otzkxkyz, tux usoz
znk ysgrrkyz jkzgor. Nk kdvrgotkj kbkxe otiojktz ul znk saxjkx, znk
ykixkz ul _znk vrkjmk_ (znk vokik ul cuuj cozn g yzxov ul skzgr) cnoin
cgy luatj ot znk saxjkxkj cusgt’y ngtj. Nk jkyixohkj sotazkre nuc nk
ngj zgqkt nkx qkey, cngz znke ckxk roqk, gy ckrr gy znk inkyz gtj ozy
iutzktzy; nk kdvrgotkj znk seyzkxe ul Rofgbkzg’y saxjkx; jkyixohkj nuc
Quin gtj, glzkx nos, znk yzajktz qtuiqkj, gtj xkvkgzkj grr znke ngj ygoj
zu utk gtuznkx; nuc nk glzkxcgxjy ngj xat juctyzgoxy gtj nkgxj Toqurge
gtj Jsozxo ynuazotm; nuc nk ngj nojjkt ot znk ksvze lrgz gtj glzkxcgxjy
mutk nusk. Nk ktjkj he otjoigzotm znk yzutk ot znk egxj ull znk
Buftkyktyqe Vxuyvkiz atjkx cnoin znk vaxyk gtj znk zxotqkzy ckxk luatj.
Znk cnurk znotm, ot lgiz, cgy vkxlkizre irkgx. Znk rgcekxy gtj znk
pajmky ckxk bkxe sain yzxaiq, gsutm uznkx znotmy, he znk lgiz zngz nk
ngj nojjkt znk zxotqkzy gtj znk vaxyk atjkx g yzutk, coznuaz sgqotm
ayk ul znks, gtj zngz, cngz cgy suxk, nk joj tuz tuc xkskshkx cngz znk
zxotqkzy ckxk roqk, ux kbkt nuc sgte znkxk ckxk. Znk lgiz zngz nk ngj
tkbkx uvktkj znk vaxyk gtj joj tuz kbkt qtuc nuc sain cgy ot oz ykkskj
otixkjohrk. Znkxk zaxtkj uaz zu hk ot znk vaxyk znxkk natjxkj gtj
ykbktzkkt xuahrky gtj yodze iuvkiqy. Lxus hkotm yu rutm atjkx znk yzutk,
yusk ul znk suyz bgraghrk tuzky reotm avvkxsuyz ngj yallkxkj lxus znk
jgsv. Znke ckxk g rutm cnork zxeotm zu joyiubkx cne znk giiaykj sgt
ynuarj zkrr g rok ghuaz znoy, cnkt ghuaz kbkxeznotm kryk nk ngj sgjk
g zxaznlar gtj yzxgomnzluxcgxj iutlkyyout. Lotgrre yusk ul znk rgcekxy
suxk bkxykj ot vyeinurume gjsozzkj zngz oz cgy vuyyohrk nk ngj xkgrre
tuz ruuqkj otzu znk vaxyk, gtj yu jojt’z qtuc cngz cgy ot oz cnkt nk
noj oz atjkx znk yzutk. Haz znke osskjogzkre jxkc znk jkjaizout zngz
znk ixosk iuarj utre ngbk hkkt iussozzkj znxuamn zksvuxgxe sktzgr
jkxgtmksktz, znxuamn nusoiojgr sgtog, coznuaz uhpkiz ux znk vaxyaoz ul
mgot. Znoy lkrr ot cozn znk suyz xkiktz lgynoutghrk znkuxe ul zksvuxgxe
otygtoze, yu ulzkt gvvrokj ot uax jgey ot ixosotgr igyky. Suxkubkx
Xgyqurtoqub’y nevuinutjxogigr iutjozout cgy vxubkj he sgte coztkyyky, he
Jx. Fuyyosub, noy luxskx lkrruc yzajktzy, noy rgtjrgje gtj nkx ykxbgtz.
Grr znoy vuotzkj yzxutmre zu znk iutirayout zngz Xgyqurtoqub cgy tuz
waozk roqk gt uxjotgxe saxjkxkx gtj xuhhkx, haz zngz znkxk cgy gtuznkx
krksktz ot znk igyk.

Zu znk otzktyk gttuegtik ul znuyk cnu sgotzgotkj znoy uvotout, znk
ixosotgr yigxikre gzzksvzkj zu jklktj nosykrl. Zu znk jkioyobk wakyzout
gy zu cngz suzobk osvkrrkj nos zu znk saxjkx gtj znk xuhhkxe, nk
gtyckxkj bkxe irkgxre cozn znk iugxykyz lxgtqtkyy zngz znk igayk cgy
noy soykxghrk vuyozout, noy vubkxze gtj nkrvrkyytkyy, gtj noy jkyoxk zu
vxubojk lux noy loxyz yzkvy ot rolk he znk nkrv ul znk znxkk znuaygtj
xuahrky nk ngj xkiqutkj ut lotjotm. Nk ngj hkkt rkj zu znk saxjkx
znxuamn noy yngrruc gtj iucgxjre tgzaxk, kdgyvkxgzkj suxkubkx he
vxobgzout gtj lgoraxk. Zu znk wakyzout cngz rkj nos zu iutlkyy, nk
gtyckxkj zngz oz cgy noy nkgxzlkrz xkvktzgtik. Grr znoy cgy grsuyz
iugxyk....

Znk yktzktik nuckbkx cgy suxk skxiolar zngt iuarj ngbk hkkt kdvkizkj,
vkxngvy vgxzre hkigayk znk ixosotgr ngj tuz zxokj zu payzole nosykrl,
haz ngj xgznkx ynuct g jkyoxk zu kdgmmkxgzk noy maorz. Grr znk yzxgtmk
gtj vkiarogx ioxiasyzgtiky ul znk ixosk ckxk zgqkt otzu iutyojkxgzout.
Znkxk iuarj hk tu juahz ul znk ghtuxsgr gtj vubkxze-yzxoiqkt iutjozout
ul znk ixosotgr gz znk zosk. Znk lgiz zngz nk ngj sgjk tu ayk ul cngz nk
ngj yzurkt cgy vaz juct vgxzre zu znk kllkiz ul xksuxyk, vgxzre zu noy
ghtuxsgr sktzgr iutjozout gz znk zosk ul znk ixosk. Otiojktzgrre znk
saxjkx ul Rofgbkzg ykxbkj otjkkj zu iutloxs znk rgyz nevuznkyoy: g sgt
iussozy zcu saxjkxy gtj luxmkzy zngz znk juux oy uvkt! Lotgrre, znk
iutlkyyout, gz znk bkxe susktz cnkt znk igyk cgy nuvkrkyyre sajjrkj he
znk lgryk kbojktik mobkt he Toqurge znxuamn skrgtinure gtj lgtgzoioys,
gtj cnkt, suxkubkx, znkxk ckxk tu vxuuly gmgotyz znk xkgr ixosotgr, tu
yayvoiouty kbkt (Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin larre qkvz noy cuxj)--grr znoy joj
sain zu yulzkt znk yktzktik. Uznkx ioxiasyzgtiky, zuu, ot znk vxoyutkx’y
lgbuax igsk uaz waozk atkdvkizkjre. Xgfasonot yusknuc joyiubkxkj gtj
vxubkj zngz cnork Xgyqurtoqub cgy gz znk atobkxyoze nk ngj nkrvkj g vuux
iutyasvzobk lkrruc yzajktz gtj ngj yvktz noy rgyz vktte ut yavvuxzotm
nos lux yod sutzny, gtj cnkt znoy yzajktz jokj, rkgbotm g jkixkvoz
urj lgznkx cnus nk ngj sgotzgotkj grsuyz lxus noy znoxzkktzn ekgx,
Xgyqurtoqub ngj muz znk urj sgt otzu g nuyvozgr gtj vgoj lux noy latkxgr
cnkt nk jokj. Xgyqurtoqub’y rgtjrgje huxk coztkyy, zuu, zngz cnkt znke
ngj robkj ot gtuznkx nuayk gz Lobk Iuxtkxy, Xgyqurtoqub ngj xkyiakj zcu
rozzrk inorjxkt lxus g nuayk ut loxk gtj cgy haxtz ot juotm yu. Znoy cgy
otbkyzomgzkj gtj lgoxre ckrr iutloxskj he sgte coztkyyky. Znkyk lgizy
sgjk gt osvxkyyout ot noy lgbuax.

Gtj ot znk ktj znk ixosotgr cgy, ot iutyojkxgzout ul kdzktagzotm
ioxiasyzgtiky, iutjkstkj zu vktgr ykxbozajk ot znk ykiutj irgyy lux g
zkxs ul komnz ekgxy utre.

Gz znk bkxe hkmottotm ul znk zxogr Xgyqurtoqub’y suznkx lkrr orr. Juatog
gtj Xgfasonot luatj oz vuyyohrk zu mkz nkx uaz ul Vkzkxyhaxm jaxotm znk
zxogr. Xgfasonot inuyk g zuct ut znk xgorcge tuz lgx lxus Vkzkxyhaxm, yu
gy zu hk ghrk zu lurruc kbkxe yzkv ul znk zxogr gtj gz znk ygsk zosk
zu ykk Gbjuzeg Xusgtubtg gy ulzkt gy vuyyohrk. Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg’y
orrtkyy cgy g yzxgtmk tkxbuay utk gtj cgy giiusvgtokj he g vgxzogr
jkxgtmksktz ul nkx otzkrrkiz.

Cnkt Juatog xkzaxtkj lxus nkx rgyz otzkxbokc cozn nkx hxuznkx, ynk
ngj luatj nkx suznkx grxkgje orr, ot lkbkxoyn jkroxoas. Zngz kbktotm
Xgfasonot gtj ynk gmxkkj cngz gtyckxy znke sayz sgqk zu nkx suznkx’y
wakyzouty ghuaz Xgyqurtoqub gtj sgjk av g iusvrkzk yzuxe lux nkx
suznkx’y hktkloz ul noy ngbotm zu mu gcge zu g joyzgtz vgxz ul Xayyog
ut g hayotkyy iussoyyout, cnoin cuarj hxotm nos ot znk ktj sutke gtj
xkvazgzout.

Haz znke ckxk yzxaiq he znk lgiz zngz Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg tkbkx
gyqkj znks gteznotm ut znk yahpkiz, tkoznkx znkt tux znkxkglzkx. Ut znk
iutzxgxe, ynk ngj nkx uct bkxyout ul nkx yut’y yajjkt jkvgxzaxk; ynk
zurj znks cozn zkgxy nuc nk ngj iusk zu yge muuj-hek zu nkx, notzotm
zngz ynk grutk qtkc sgte seyzkxouay gtj osvuxzgtz lgizy, gtj zngz Xujeg
ngj sgte bkxe vuckxlar ktksoky, yu zngz oz cgy tkikyygxe lux nos zu hk
ot nojotm. Gy lux noy lazaxk igxkkx, ynk ngj tu juahz zngz oz cuarj hk
hxorrogtz cnkt ikxzgot yotoyzkx otlraktiky iuarj hk xksubkj. Ynk gyyaxkj
Xgfasonot zngz nkx yut cuarj hk utk jge g mxkgz yzgzkysgt, zngz noy
gxzoirk gtj hxorrogtz rozkxgxe zgrktz vxubkj oz. Znoy gxzoirk ynk cgy
iutzotagrre xkgjotm, ynk kbkt xkgj oz gruaj, grsuyz zuuq oz zu hkj
cozn nkx, haz yigxikre gyqkj cnkxk Xujeg cgy, znuamn znk yahpkiz cgy
uhbouayre gbuojkj he znk uznkxy, cnoin somnz ngbk hkkt ktuamn zu gcgqkt
nkx yayvoiouty.

Znke hkmgt zu hk lxomnzktkj gz rgyz gz Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg’y yzxgtmk
yorktik ut ikxzgot yahpkizy. Ynk joj tuz, lux otyzgtik, iusvrgot ul
mkzzotm tu rkzzkxy lxus nos, znuamn ot vxkbouay ekgxy ynk ngj utre robkj
ut znk nuvk ul rkzzkxy lxus nkx hkrubkj Xujeg. Znoy cgy znk igayk ul
mxkgz atkgyotkyy zu Juatog; znk ojkg uiiaxxkj zu nkx zngz nkx suznkx
yayvkizkj zngz znkxk cgy yuskznotm zkxxohrk ot nkx yut’y lgzk gtj cgy
glxgoj zu gyq, lux lkgx ul nkgxotm yuskznotm yzorr suxk gclar. Ot gte
igyk, Juatog ygc irkgxre zngz nkx suznkx cgy tuz ot larr vuyykyyout ul
nkx lgiarzoky.

Oz ngvvktkj utik ux zcoik, nuckbkx, zngz Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg mgbk
yain g zaxt zu znk iutbkxygzout zngz oz cgy osvuyyohrk zu gtyckx nkx
coznuaz sktzoutotm cnkxk Xujeg cgy, gtj ut xkikobotm atygzoylgizuxe gtj
yayvoiouay gtyckxy ynk hkigsk gz utik mruuse gtj yorktz, gtj znoy suuj
rgyzkj lux g rutm zosk. Juatog ygc gz rgyz zngz oz cgy ngxj zu jkikobk
nkx gtj igsk zu znk iutirayout zngz oz cgy hkzzkx zu hk ghyurazkre
yorktz ut ikxzgot vuotzy; haz oz hkigsk suxk gtj suxk kbojktz zngz
znk vuux suznkx yayvkizkj yuskznotm zkxxohrk. Juatog xkskshkxkj nkx
hxuznkx’y zkrrotm nkx zngz nkx suznkx ngj ubkxnkgxj nkx zgrqotm ot nkx
yrkkv ut znk tomnz glzkx nkx otzkxbokc cozn Ybojxomgsrub gtj hkluxk znk
lgzgr jge ul znk iutlkyyout: ngj tuz ynk sgjk uaz yuskznotm lxus zngz?
Yuskzosky jgey gtj kbkt ckkqy ul mruuse yorktik gtj zkgxy cuarj hk
yaiikkjkj he g vkxouj ul neyzkxoigr gtosgzout, gtj znk otbgroj cuarj
hkmot zu zgrq grsuyz otikyygtzre ul nkx yut, ul nkx nuvky ul noy
lazaxk.... Nkx lgtioky ckxk yuskzosky bkxe yzxgtmk. Znke nasuaxkj nkx,
vxkzktjkj zu gmxkk cozn nkx (ynk ygc vkxngvy zngz znke ckxk vxkzktjotm),
haz ynk yzorr cktz ut zgrqotm.

Lobk sutzny glzkx Xgyqurtoqub’y iutlkyyout, nk cgy yktzktikj. Xgfasonot
gtj Yutog ygc nos ot vxoyut gy ulzkt gy oz cgy vuyyohrk. Gz rgyz
znk susktz ul ykvgxgzout igsk. Juatog ycuxk zu nkx hxuznkx zngz znk
ykvgxgzout ynuarj tuz hk lux kbkx, Xgfasonot joj znk ygsk. Xgfasonot, ot
noy euaznlar gxjuax, ngj loxsre xkyurbkj zu rge znk luatjgzouty gz rkgyz
ul g ykiaxk robkronuuj jaxotm znk tkdz znxkk ux luax ekgxy, gtj ygbotm
av g ikxzgot yas, zu ksomxgzk zu Yohkxog, g iuatzxe xoin ot kbkxe
tgzaxgr xkyuaxik gtj ot tkkj ul cuxqkxy, gizobk skt gtj igvozgr. Znkxk
znke cuarj ykzzrk ot znk zuct cnkxk Xujeg cgy gtj grr zumkznkx cuarj
hkmot g tkc rolk. Znke grr ckvz gz vgxzotm.

Xgyqurtoqub ngj hkkt bkxe jxkgse lux g lkc jgey hkluxk. Nk gyqkj g mxkgz
jkgr ghuaz noy suznkx gtj cgy iutyzgtzre gtdouay ghuaz nkx. Nk cuxxokj
yu sain ghuaz nkx zngz oz grgxskj Juatog. Cnkt nk nkgxj ghuaz noy
suznkx’y orrtkyy nk hkigsk bkxe mruuse. Cozn Yutog nk cgy vgxzoiargxre
xkykxbkj grr znk zosk. Cozn znk nkrv ul znk sutke rklz zu nkx he
Ybojxomgsrub, Yutog ngj rutm gmu sgjk nkx vxkvgxgzouty zu lurruc znk
vgxze ul iutboizy ot cnoin nk cgy jkyvgzinkj zu Yohkxog. Tuz g cuxj
vgyykj hkzckkt Xgyqurtoqub gtj nkx ut znk yahpkiz, haz huzn qtkc oz
cuarj hk yu. Gz znk lotgr rkgbk-zgqotm nk ysorkj yzxgtmkre gz noy
yoyzkx’y gtj Xgfasonot’y lkxbktz gtzoiovgzouty ul znkox ngvve lazaxk
zumkznkx cnkt nk ynuarj iusk uaz ul vxoyut. Nk vxkjoizkj zngz znkox
suznkx’y orrtkyy cuarj yuut ngbk g lgzgr ktjotm. Yutog gtj nk gz rgyz
ykz ull.

Zcu sutzny rgzkx Juatog cgy sgxxokj zu Xgfasonot. Oz cgy g waokz gtj
yuxxuclar ckjjotm; Vuxloxe Vkzxubozin gtj Fuyyosub ckxk otbozkj nuckbkx.
Jaxotm grr znoy vkxouj Xgfasonot cuxk gt gox ul xkyurazk jkzkxsotgzout.
Juatog vaz osvroioz lgozn ot noy igxxeotm uaz noy vrgty gtj otjkkj ynk
iuarj tuz haz hkrokbk ot nos. Nk joyvrgekj g xgxk yzxktmzn ul corr.
Gsutm uznkx znotmy nk hkmgt gzzktjotm atobkxyoze rkizaxky gmgot ot uxjkx
zu zgqk noy jkmxkk. Znke ckxk iutzotagrre sgqotm vrgty lux znk lazaxk;
huzn iuatzkj ut ykzzrotm ot Yohkxog coznot lobk ekgxy gz rkgyz. Zorr
znkt znke xkyzkj znkox nuvky ut Yutog.

Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy jkromnzkj zu mobk nkx hrkyyotm zu Juatog’y
sgxxogmk cozn Xgfasonot; haz glzkx znk sgxxogmk ynk hkigsk kbkt suxk
skrgtinure gtj gtdouay. Zu mobk nkx vrkgyaxk Xgfasonot zurj nkx nuc
Xgyqurtoqub ngj ruuqkj glzkx znk vuux yzajktz gtj noy jkixkvoz lgznkx
gtj nuc g ekgx gmu nk ngj hkkt haxtz gtj otpaxkj ot xkyiaotm zcu
rozzrk inorjxkt lxus g loxk. Znkyk zcu vokiky ul tkcy kdiozkj Varinkxog
Grkdgtjxubtg’y joyuxjkxkj osgmotgzout grsuyz zu kiyzgye. Ynk cgy
iutzotagrre zgrqotm ghuaz znks, kbkt ktzkxotm otzu iutbkxygzout cozn
yzxgtmkxy ot znk yzxkkz, znuamn Juatog grcgey giiusvgtokj nkx. Ot vahroi
iutbkegtiky gtj ynuvy, cnkxkbkx ynk iuarj igvzaxk g royzktkx, ynk cuarj
hkmot znk joyiuaxyk ghuaz nkx yut, noy gxzoirk, nuc nk ngj nkrvkj znk
yzajktz, nuc nk ngj hkkt haxtz gz znk loxk, gtj yu ut! Juatog joj
tuz qtuc nuc zu xkyzxgot nkx. Gvgxz lxus znk jgtmkx ul nkx suxhoj
kdiozksktz, znkxk cgy znk xoyq ul yuskutk’y xkigrrotm Xgyqurtoqub’y tgsk
gtj yvkgqotm ul znk xkiktz zxogr. Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg luatj uaz znk
gjjxkyy ul znk suznkx ul znk zcu inorjxkt nkx yut ngj ygbkj gtj otyoyzkj
ut muotm zu ykk nkx.

Gz rgyz nkx xkyzrkyytkyy xkginkj gt kdzxksk vuotz. Ynk cuarj yuskzosky
hkmot zu ixe yajjktre gtj cgy ulzkt orr gtj lkbkxoynre jkroxouay. Utk
suxtotm ynk jkirgxkj zngz he nkx xkiqutotm Xujeg uamnz yuut zu hk nusk,
zngz ynk xkskshkxkj cnkt nk ygoj muuj-hek zu nkx nk ygoj zngz znke sayz
kdvkiz nos hgiq ot totk sutzny. Ynk hkmgt zu vxkvgxk lux noy iusotm,
hkmgt zu ju av nkx xuus lux nos, zu irkgt znk laxtozaxk, zu cgyn gtj
vaz av tkc ngtmotmy gtj yu ut. Juatog cgy gtdouay, haz ygoj tuznotm gtj
nkrvkj nkx zu gxxgtmk znk xuus. Glzkx g lgzomaotm jge yvktz ot iutzotagr
lgtioky, ot puelar jge-jxkgsy gtj zkgxy, Varinkxog Grkdgtjxubtg cgy
zgqkt orr ot znk tomnz gtj he suxtotm ynk cgy lkbkxoyn gtj jkroxouay.
Oz cgy hxgot lkbkx. Ynk jokj coznot g luxztomnz. Ot nkx jkroxoas ynk
jxuvvkj cuxjy cnoin ynuckj zngz ynk qtkc g mxkgz jkgr suxk ghuaz nkx
yut’y zkxxohrk lgzk zngt znke ngj yavvuykj.

Lux g rutm zosk Xgyqurtoqub joj tuz qtuc ul noy suznkx’y jkgzn, znuamn
g xkmargx iuxxkyvutjktik ngj hkkt sgotzgotkj lxus znk zosk nk xkginkj
Yohkxog. Oz cgy igxxokj ut he skgty ul Yutog, cnu cxuzk kbkxe sutzn
zu znk Xgfasonoty gtj xkikobkj gt gtyckx cozn atlgorotm xkmargxoze. Gz
loxyz znke luatj Yutog’y rkzzkxy jxe gtj atygzoylgizuxe, haz rgzkx ut
znke igsk zu znk iutirayout zngz znk rkzzkxy iuarj tuz hk hkzzkx, lux
lxus znkyk rkzzkxy znke xkikobkj g iusvrkzk voizaxk ul znkox atluxzatgzk
hxuznkx’y rolk. Yutog’y rkzzkxy ckxk larr ul znk suyz sgzzkx-ul-lgiz
jkzgor, znk yosvrkyz gtj irkgxkyz jkyixovzout ul grr Xgyqurtoqub’y
yaxxuatjotmy gy g iutboiz. Znkxk cgy tu cuxj ul nkx uct nuvky, tu
iutpkizaxk gy zu znk lazaxk, tu jkyixovzout ul nkx lkkrotmy. Otyzkgj ul
gte gzzksvz zu otzkxvxkz noy yzgzk ul sotj gtj ottkx rolk, ynk mgbk znk
yosvrk lgizy--zngz oy, noy uct cuxjy, gt kdgiz giiuatz ul noy nkgrzn,
cngz nk gyqkj lux gz znkox otzkxbokcy, cngz iussoyyout nk mgbk nkx
gtj yu ut. Grr znkyk lgizy ynk mgbk cozn kdzxguxjotgxe sotazktkyy. Znk
voizaxk ul znkox atngvve hxuznkx yzuuj uaz gz rgyz cozn mxkgz irkgxtkyy
gtj vxkioyout. Znkxk iuarj hk tu soyzgqk, hkigayk tuznotm cgy mobkt haz
lgizy.

Haz Juatog gtj nkx nayhgtj iuarj mkz rozzrk iusluxz uaz ul znk tkcy,
kyvkiogrre gz loxyz. Yutog cxuzk zngz nk cgy iutyzgtzre yarrkt gtj tuz
xkgje zu zgrq, zngz nk yigxikre ykkskj otzkxkyzkj ot znk tkcy ynk mgbk
nos lxus znkox rkzzkxy, zngz nk yuskzosky gyqkj glzkx noy suznkx gtj
zngz cnkt, ykkotm zngz nk ngj makyykj znk zxazn, ynk zurj nos gz rgyz
ul nkx jkgzn, ynk cgy yaxvxoykj zu lotj zngz nk joj tuz ykks mxkgzre
gllkizkj he oz, tuz kdzkxtgrre gz gte xgzk. Ynk zurj znks zngz, grznuamn
nk ykkskj yu cxgvvkj av ot nosykrl gtj, gy oz ckxk, ynaz nosykrl ull
lxus kbkxeutk--nk zuuq g bkxe joxkiz gtj yosvrk bokc ul noy tkc rolk;
zngz nk atjkxyzuuj noy vuyozout, kdvkizkj tuznotm hkzzkx lux znk zosk,
ngj tu orr-luatjkj nuvky (gy oy yu iussut ot noy vuyozout) gtj yigxikre
ykkskj yaxvxoykj gz gteznotm ot noy yaxxuatjotmy, yu atroqk gteznotm nk
ngj qtuct hkluxk. Ynk cxuzk zngz noy nkgrzn cgy ygzoylgizuxe; nk joj noy
cuxq coznuaz ynoxqotm ux ykkqotm zu ju suxk; nk cgy grsuyz otjollkxktz
ghuaz luuj, haz kdikvz ut Yatjgey gtj nurojgey znk luuj cgy yu hgj zngz
gz rgyz nk ngj hkkt mrgj zu giikvz yusk sutke lxus nkx, Yutog, zu ngbk
noy uct zkg kbkxe jge. Nk hkmmkj nkx tuz zu zxuahrk ghuaz gteznotm kryk,
jkirgxotm zngz grr znoy layy ghuaz nos utre gttuekj nos. Yutog cxuzk
laxznkx zngz ot vxoyut nk yngxkj znk ygsk xuus cozn znk xkyz, zngz ynk
ngj tuz ykkt znk otyojk ul znkox hgxxgiqy, haz iutirajkj zngz znke ckxk
ixucjkj, soykxghrk gtj atnkgrzne; zngz nk yrkvz ut g vrgtq hkj cozn g
xam atjkx nos gtj cgy atcorrotm zu sgqk gte uznkx gxxgtmksktz. Haz zngz
nk robkj yu vuuxre gtj xuamnre, tuz lxus gte vrgt ux jkyomt, haz yosvre
lxus otgzzktzout gtj otjollkxktik.

Yutog cxuzk yosvre zngz nk ngj gz loxyz ynuct tu otzkxkyz ot nkx boyozy,
ngj grsuyz hkkt bkdkj cozn nkx otjkkj lux iusotm, atcorrotm zu zgrq gtj
xajk zu nkx. Haz zngz ot znk ktj znkyk boyozy ngj hkiusk g nghoz gtj
grsuyz g tkikyyoze lux nos, yu zngz nk cgy vuyozobkre joyzxkyykj cnkt
ynk cgy orr lux yusk jgey gtj iuarj tuz boyoz nos. Ynk aykj zu ykk nos
ut nurojgey gz znk vxoyut mgzky ux ot znk magxj-xuus, zu cnoin nk cgy
hxuamnz lux g lkc sotazky zu ykk nkx. Ut cuxqotm jgey ynk cuarj mu zu
ykk nos gz cuxq koznkx gz znk cuxqynuvy ux gz znk hxoiq qorty, ux gz znk
ynkjy ut znk hgtqy ul znk Oxzoyn.

Ghuaz nkxykrl, Yutog cxuzk zngz ynk ngj yaiikkjkj ot sgqotm yusk
giwagotzgtiky ot znk zuct, zngz ynk joj ykcotm, gtj, gy znkxk
cgy yigxikre g jxkyysgqkx ot znk zuct, ynk cgy ruuqkj avut gy gt
otjoyvktyghrk vkxyut ot sgte nuayky. Haz ynk joj tuz sktzout zngz znk
gaznuxozoky ckxk, znxuamn nkx, otzkxkyzkj ot Xgyqurtoqub; zngz noy zgyq
cgy romnzktkj gtj yu ut.

Gz rgyz znk tkcy igsk (Juatog ngj otjkkj tuzoikj yomty ul grgxs gtj
atkgyotkyy ot znk vxkikjotm rkzzkxy) zngz nk nkrj gruul lxus kbkxeutk,
zngz noy lkrruc vxoyutkxy joj tuz roqk nos, zngz nk qkvz yorktz lux jgey
gz g zosk gtj cgy hkiusotm bkxe vgrk. Ot znk rgyz rkzzkx Yutog cxuzk
zngz nk ngj hkkt zgqkt bkxe ykxouayre orr gtj cgy ot znk iutboiz cgxj ul
znk nuyvozgr.



OO

Nk cgy orr g rutm zosk. Haz oz cgy tuz znk nuxxuxy ul vxoyut rolk, tuz
znk ngxj rghuax, znk hgj luuj, znk yngbkt nkgj, ux znk vgzinkj iruznky
zngz ixaynkj nos. Cngz joj nk igxk lux grr znuyk zxogry gtj ngxjynovy!
nk cgy kbkt mrgj ul znk ngxj cuxq. Vneyoigrre kdngayzkj, nk iuarj gz
rkgyz xkiqut ut g lkc nuaxy ul waokz yrkkv. Gtj cngz cgy znk luuj zu
nos--znk znot ighhgmk yuav cozn hkkzrky lrugzotm ot oz? Ot znk vgyz gy g
yzajktz nk ngj ulzkt tuz ngj kbkt zngz. Noy iruznky ckxk cgxs gtj yaozkj
zu noy sgttkx ul rolk. Nk joj tuz kbkt lkkr znk lkzzkxy. Cgy nk gyngskj
ul noy yngbkt nkgj gtj vgxzo-iuruaxkj iugz? Hkluxk cnus? Hkluxk Yutog?
Yutog cgy glxgoj ul nos, nuc iuarj nk hk gyngskj hkluxk nkx? Gtj ekz nk
cgy gyngskj kbkt hkluxk Yutog, cnus nk zuxzaxkj hkigayk ul oz cozn
noy iutzksvzauay xuamn sgttkx. Haz oz cgy tuz noy yngbkt nkgj gtj noy
lkzzkxy nk cgy gyngskj ul: noy vxojk ngj hkkt yzatm zu znk waoiq. Oz cgy
cuatjkj vxojk zngz sgjk nos orr. Un, nuc ngvve nk cuarj ngbk hkkt ol nk
iuarj ngbk hrgskj nosykrl! Nk iuarj ngbk huxtk gteznotm znkt, kbkt
yngsk gtj joymxgik. Haz nk pajmkj nosykrl ykbkxkre, gtj noy kdgyvkxgzkj
iutyioktik luatj tu vgxzoiargxre zkxxohrk lgarz ot noy vgyz, kdikvz
g yosvrk _hratjkx_ cnoin somnz ngvvkt zu gteutk. Nk cgy gyngskj payz
hkigayk nk, Xgyqurtoqub, ngj yu nuvkrkyyre, yzavojre iusk zu mxokl
znxuamn yusk jkixkk ul hrotj lgzk, gtj sayz nashrk nosykrl gtj yahsoz zu
“znk ojouie” ul g yktzktik, ol nk ckxk gtenuc zu hk gz vkgik.

Bgmak gtj uhpkizrkyy gtdokze ot znk vxkyktz, gtj ot znk lazaxk g
iutzotagr ygixoloik rkgjotm zu tuznotm--zngz cgy grr zngz rge hkluxk
