nos. Gtj cngz iusluxz cgy oz zu nos zngz gz znk ktj ul komnz ekgxy nk
cuarj utre hk znoxze-zcu gtj ghrk zu hkmot g tkc rolk! Cngz ngj nk zu
robk lux? Cngz ngj nk zu ruuq luxcgxj zu? Cne ynuarj nk yzxobk? Zu robk
ot uxjkx zu kdoyz? Cne, nk ngj hkkt xkgje g znuaygtj zosky hkluxk zu
mobk av kdoyzktik lux znk ygqk ul gt ojkg, lux g nuvk, kbkt lux g lgtie.
Skxk kdoyzktik ngj grcgey hkkt zuu rozzrk lux nos; nk ngj grcgey cgtzkj
suxk. Vkxngvy oz cgy payz hkigayk ul znk yzxktmzn ul noy jkyoxky zngz nk
ngj znuamnz nosykrl g sgt zu cnus suxk cgy vkxsoyyohrk zngt zu uznkxy.

Gtj ol utre lgzk cuarj ngbk yktz nos xkvktzgtik--haxtotm xkvktzgtik zngz
cuarj ngbk zuxt noy nkgxz gtj xuhhkj nos ul yrkkv, zngz xkvktzgtik, znk
gclar gmute ul cnoin hxotmy boyouty ul ngtmotm ux jxuctotm! Un, nk cuarj
ngbk hkkt mrgj ul oz! Zkgxy gtj gmutoky cuarj gz rkgyz ngbk hkkt rolk.
Haz nk joj tuz xkvktz ul noy ixosk.

Gz rkgyz nk somnz ngbk luatj xkrokl ot xgmotm gz noy yzavojoze, gy nk
ngj xgmkj gz znk mxuzkywak hratjkxy zngz ngj hxuamnz nos zu vxoyut.
Haz tuc ot vxoyut, _ot lxkkjus_, nk znuamnz ubkx gtj ixozoioykj grr noy
gizouty gmgot gtj he tu skgty luatj znks yu hratjkxotm gtj yu mxuzkywak
gy znke ngj ykkskj gz znk lgzgr zosk.

“Ot cngz cge,” nk gyqkj nosykrl, “cgy se znkuxe yzavojkx zngt uznkxy
zngz ngbk ycgxskj gtj irgynkj lxus znk hkmottotm ul znk cuxrj? Utk ngy
utre zu ruuq gz znk znotm waozk otjkvktjktzre, hxugjre, gtj atotlraktikj
he iussutvrgik ojkgy, gtj se ojkg corr he tu skgty ykks yu... yzxgtmk.
Un, yikvzoiy gtj ngrlvktte vnoruyuvnkxy, cne ju eua ngrz ngrl-cge!

“Cne juky se gizout yzxoqk znks gy yu nuxxohrk?” nk ygoj zu nosykrl. “Oy
oz hkigayk oz cgy g ixosk? Cngz oy skgtz he ixosk? Se iutyioktik oy gz
xkyz. Ul iuaxyk, oz cgy g rkmgr ixosk, ul iuaxyk, znk rkzzkx ul znk rgc
cgy hxuqkt gtj hruuj cgy ynkj. Ckrr, vatoyn sk lux znk rkzzkx ul znk
rgc... gtj zngz’y ktuamn. Ul iuaxyk, ot zngz igyk sgte ul znk
hktklgizuxy ul sgtqotj cnu ytgzinkj vuckx lux znksykrbky otyzkgj ul
otnkxozotm oz uamnz zu ngbk hkkt vatoynkj gz znkox loxyz yzkvy. Haz
znuyk skt yaiikkjkj gtj yu _znke ckxk xomnz_, gtj O jojt’z, gtj yu O
ngj tu xomnz zu ngbk zgqkt zngz yzkv.”

Oz cgy utre ot zngz zngz nk xkiumtoykj noy ixosotgroze, utre ot znk lgiz
zngz nk ngj hkkt atyaiikyylar gtj ngj iutlkyykj oz.

Nk yallkxkj zuu lxus znk wakyzout: cne ngj nk tuz qorrkj nosykrl? Cne
ngj nk yzuuj ruuqotm gz znk xobkx gtj vxklkxxkj zu iutlkyy? Cgy znk
jkyoxk zu robk yu yzxutm gtj cgy oz yu ngxj zu ubkxiusk oz? Ngj tuz
Ybojxomgsrub ubkxiusk oz, grznuamn nk cgy glxgoj ul jkgzn?

Ot soykxe nk gyqkj nosykrl znoy wakyzout, gtj iuarj tuz atjkxyzgtj zngz,
gz znk bkxe zosk nk ngj hkkt yzgtjotm ruuqotm otzu znk xobkx, nk ngj
vkxngvy hkkt josre iutyiouay ul znk latjgsktzgr lgryoze ot nosykrl gtj
noy iutboizouty. Nk jojt’z atjkxyzgtj zngz zngz iutyiouaytkyy somnz hk
znk vxusoyk ul g lazaxk ixoyoy, ul g tkc bokc ul rolk gtj ul noy lazaxk
xkyaxxkizout.

Nk vxklkxxkj zu gzzxohazk oz zu znk jkgj ckomnz ul otyzotiz cnoin nk
iuarj tuz yzkv ubkx, gmgot znxuamn ckgqtkyy gtj skgttkyy. Nk ruuqkj gz
noy lkrruc vxoyutkxy gtj cgy gsgfkj zu ykk nuc znke grr rubkj rolk gtj
vxofkj oz. Oz ykkskj zu nos zngz znke rubkj gtj bgrakj rolk suxk ot
vxoyut zngt ot lxkkjus. Cngz zkxxohrk gmutoky gtj vxobgzouty yusk ul
znks, znk zxgsvy lux otyzgtik, ngj ktjaxkj! Iuarj znke igxk yu sain lux
g xge ul yatynotk, lux znk vxoskbgr luxkyz, znk iurj yvxotm nojjkt gcge
ot yusk atykkt yvuz, cnoin znk zxgsv ngj sgxqkj znxkk ekgxy hkluxk, gtj
rutmkj zu ykk gmgot, gy nk somnz zu ykk noy yckkznkgxz, jxkgsotm ul znk
mxkkt mxgyy xuatj oz gtj znk hoxj yotmotm ot znk hayn? Gy nk cktz ut nk
ygc yzorr suxk otkdvroighrk kdgsvrky.

Ot vxoyut, ul iuaxyk, znkxk cgy g mxkgz jkgr nk joj tuz ykk gtj joj tuz
cgtz zu ykk; nk robkj gy oz ckxk cozn juctigyz keky. Oz cgy rugznyusk
gtj athkgxghrk lux nos zu ruuq. Haz ot znk ktj znkxk cgy sain zngz
yaxvxoykj nos gtj nk hkmgt, gy oz ckxk otburatzgxore, zu tuzoik sain
zngz nk ngj tuz yayvkizkj hkluxk. Cngz yaxvxoykj nos suyz ul grr cgy
znk zkxxohrk osvuyyohrk marl zngz rge hkzckkt nos gtj grr znk xkyz. Znke
ykkskj zu hk g jollkxktz yvkioky, gtj nk ruuqkj gz znks gtj znke gz
nos cozn joyzxayz gtj nuyzoroze. Nk lkrz gtj qtkc znk xkgyuty ul noy
oyurgzout, haz nk cuarj tkbkx ngbk gjsozzkj zorr znkt zngz znuyk xkgyuty
ckxk yu jkkv gtj yzxutm. Znkxk ckxk yusk Vuroyn kdorky, vurozoigr
vxoyutkxy, gsutm znks. Znke yosvre ruuqkj juct avut grr znk xkyz gy
omtuxgtz inaxry; haz Xgyqurtoqub iuarj tuz ruuq avut znks roqk zngz.
Nk ygc zngz znkyk omtuxgtz skt ckxk ot sgte xkyvkizy lgx coykx zngt znk
Vurky. Znkxk ckxk yusk Xayyogty cnu ckxk payz gy iutzksvzauay, g luxskx
ulloikx gtj zcu yksotgxoyzy. Xgyqurtoqub ygc znkox soyzgqk gy irkgxre.
Nk cgy joyroqkj gtj gbuojkj he kbkxeutk; znke kbkt hkmgt zu ngzk nos gz
rgyz--cne, nk iuarj tuz zkrr. Skt cnu ngj hkkt lgx suxk maorze jkyvoykj
gtj rgamnkj gz noy ixosk.

“Eua’xk g mktzrksgt,” znke aykj zu yge. “Eua ynuarjt’z ngiq ghuaz cozn
gt gdk; zngz’y tuz g mktzrksgt’y cuxq.”

Znk ykiutj ckkq ot Rktz, noy zaxt igsk zu zgqk znk ygixgsktz cozn noy
mgtm. Nk cktz zu inaxin gtj vxgekj cozn znk uznkxy. G wagxxkr hxuqk uaz
utk jge, nk joj tuz qtuc nuc. Grr lkrr ut nos gz utik ot g laxe.

“Eua’xk gt otlojkr! Eua jut’z hkrokbk ot Muj,” znke ynuazkj. “Eua uamnz
zu hk qorrkj.”

Nk ngj tkbkx zgrqkj zu znks ghuaz Muj tux noy hkrokl, haz znke cgtzkj zu
qorr nos gy gt otlojkr. Nk ygoj tuznotm. Utk ul znk vxoyutkxy xaynkj gz
nos ot g vkxlkiz lxktfe. Xgyqurtoqub gcgozkj nos igrsre gtj yorktzre;
noy kekhxucy joj tuz waobkx, noy lgik joj tuz lrotin. Znk magxj
yaiikkjkj ot otzkxbktotm hkzckkt nos gtj noy gyygorgtz, ux znkxk cuarj
ngbk hkkt hruujynkj.

Znkxk cgy gtuznkx wakyzout nk iuarj tuz jkiojk: cne ckxk znke grr yu
lutj ul Yutog? Ynk joj tuz zxe zu cot znkox lgbuax; ynk xgxkre skz
znks, yuskzosky utre ynk igsk zu ykk nos gz cuxq lux g susktz. Gtj ekz
kbkxehuje qtkc nkx, znke qtkc zngz ynk ngj iusk uaz zu lurruc _nos_,
qtkc nuc gtj cnkxk ynk robkj. Ynk tkbkx mgbk znks sutke, joj znks tu
vgxzoiargx ykxboiky. Utre utik gz Inxoyzsgy ynk yktz znks grr vxkyktzy
ul voky gtj xurry. Haz he jkmxkky iruykx xkrgzouty yvxgtm av hkzckkt
znks gtj Yutog. Ynk cuarj cxozk gtj vuyz rkzzkxy lux znks zu znkox
xkrgzouty. Xkrgzouty ul znk vxoyutkxy cnu boyozkj znk zuct, gz znkox
otyzxaizouty, rklz cozn Yutog vxkyktzy gtj sutke lux znks. Znkox cobky
gtj yckkznkgxzy qtkc nkx gtj aykj zu boyoz nkx. Gtj cnkt ynk boyozkj
Xgyqurtoqub gz cuxq, ux skz g vgxze ul znk vxoyutkxy ut znk xugj, znke
grr zuuq ull znkox ngzy zu nkx. “Rozzrk suznkx Yuleg Ykseutubtg, eua
gxk uax jkgx, muuj rozzrk suznkx,” iugxyk hxgtjkj ixosotgry ygoj zu zngz
lxgor rozzrk ixkgzaxk. Ynk cuarj ysork gtj huc zu znks gtj kbkxeutk cgy
jkromnzkj cnkt ynk ysorkj. Znke kbkt gjsoxkj nkx mgoz gtj zaxtkj xuatj
zu cgzin nkx cgrqotm; znke gjsoxkj nkx zuu lux hkotm yu rozzrk, gtj, ot
lgiz, joj tuz qtuc cngz zu gjsoxk nkx suyz lux. Znke kbkt igsk zu nkx
lux nkrv ot znkox orrtkyyky.

Nk cgy ot znk nuyvozgr lxus znk sojjrk ul Rktz zorr glzkx Kgyzkx. Cnkt
nk cgy hkzzkx, nk xkskshkxkj znk jxkgsy nk ngj ngj cnork nk cgy lkbkxoyn
gtj jkroxouay. Nk jxkgsz zngz znk cnurk cuxrj cgy iutjkstkj zu g
zkxxohrk tkc yzxgtmk vrgmak zngz ngj iusk zu Kaxuvk lxus znk jkvzny ul
Gyog. Grr ckxk zu hk jkyzxuekj kdikvz g bkxe lkc inuykt. Yusk tkc yuxzy
ul soixuhky ckxk gzzgiqotm znk hujoky ul skt, haz znkyk soixuhky ckxk
ktjuckj cozn otzkrromktik gtj corr. Skt gzzgiqkj he znks hkigsk gz utik
sgj gtj laxouay. Haz tkbkx ngj skt iutyojkxkj znksykrbky yu otzkrrkizagr
gtj yu iusvrkzkre ot vuyykyyout ul znk zxazn gy znkyk yallkxkxy, tkbkx
ngj znke iutyojkxkj znkox jkioyouty, znkox yioktzoloi iutirayouty, znkox
suxgr iutboizouty yu otlgrrohrk. Cnurk borrgmky, cnurk zucty gtj vkuvrky
cktz sgj lxus znk otlkizout. Grr ckxk kdiozkj gtj joj tuz atjkxyzgtj
utk gtuznkx. Kgin znuamnz zngz nk grutk ngj znk zxazn gtj cgy cxkzinkj
ruuqotm gz znk uznkxy, hkgz nosykrl ut znk hxkgyz, ckvz, gtj cxatm
noy ngtjy. Znke joj tuz qtuc nuc zu pajmk gtj iuarj tuz gmxkk cngz zu
iutyojkx kbor gtj cngz muuj; znke joj tuz qtuc cnus zu hrgsk, cnus
zu payzole. Skt qorrkj kgin uznkx ot g yuxz ul yktykrkyy yvozk. Znke
mgznkxkj zumkznkx ot gxsoky gmgotyz utk gtuznkx, haz kbkt ut znk sgxin
znk gxsoky cuarj hkmot gzzgiqotm kgin uznkx, znk xgtqy cuarj hk hxuqkt
gtj znk yurjokxy cuarj lgrr ut kgin uznkx, yzghhotm gtj iazzotm, hozotm
gtj jkbuaxotm kgin uznkx. Znk grgxs hkrr cgy xotmotm grr jge rutm ot
znk zucty; skt xaynkj zumkznkx, haz cne znke ckxk yassutkj gtj cnu cgy
yassutotm znks tu utk qtkc. Znk suyz uxjotgxe zxgjky ckxk ghgtjutkj,
hkigayk kbkxeutk vxuvuykj noy uct ojkgy, noy uct osvxubksktzy, gtj znke
iuarj tuz gmxkk. Znk rgtj zuu cgy ghgtjutkj. Skt skz ot mxuavy, gmxkkj
ut yuskznotm, ycuxk zu qkkv zumkznkx, haz gz utik hkmgt ut yuskznotm
waozk jollkxktz lxus cngz znke ngj vxuvuykj. Znke giiaykj utk gtuznkx,
luamnz gtj qorrkj kgin uznkx. Znkxk ckxk iutlrgmxgzouty gtj lgsotk. Grr
skt gtj grr znotmy ckxk otburbkj ot jkyzxaizout. Znk vrgmak yvxkgj gtj
subkj laxznkx gtj laxznkx. Utre g lkc skt iuarj hk ygbkj ot znk cnurk
cuxrj. Znke ckxk g vaxk inuykt vkuvrk, jkyzotkj zu luatj g tkc xgik gtj
g tkc rolk, zu xktkc gtj vaxole znk kgxzn, haz tu utk ngj ykkt znkyk
skt, tu utk ngj nkgxj znkox cuxjy gtj znkox buoiky.

Xgyqurtoqub cgy cuxxokj zngz znoy yktykrkyy jxkgs ngatzkj noy sksuxe yu
soykxghre, znk osvxkyyout ul znoy lkbkxoyn jkroxoas vkxyoyzkj yu rutm.
Znk ykiutj ckkq glzkx Kgyzkx ngj iusk. Znkxk ckxk cgxs hxomnz yvxotm
jgey; ot znk vxoyut cgxj znk mxgzotm cotjucy atjkx cnoin znk yktzotkr
vgikj ckxk uvktkj. Yutog ngj utre hkkt ghrk zu boyoz nos zcoik jaxotm
noy orrtkyy; kgin zosk ynk ngj zu uhzgot vkxsoyyout, gtj oz cgy
jolloiarz. Haz ynk ulzkt aykj zu iusk zu znk nuyvozgr egxj, kyvkiogrre
ot znk kbktotm, yuskzosky utre zu yzgtj g sotazk gtj ruuq av gz znk
cotjucy ul znk cgxj.

Utk kbktotm, cnkt nk cgy grsuyz ckrr gmgot, Xgyqurtoqub lkrr gyrkkv. Ut
cgqotm av nk ingtikj zu mu zu znk cotjuc, gtj gz utik ygc Yutog ot znk
joyzgtik gz znk nuyvozgr mgzk. Ynk ykkskj zu hk cgozotm lux yuskutk.
Yuskznotm yzghhkj nos zu znk nkgxz gz zngz sotazk. Nk ynajjkxkj gtj
subkj gcge lxus znk cotjuc. Tkdz jge Yutog joj tuz iusk, tux znk jge
glzkx; nk tuzoikj zngz nk cgy kdvkizotm nkx atkgyore. Gz rgyz nk cgy
joyingxmkj. Ut xkginotm znk vxoyut nk rkgxtz lxus znk iutboizy zngz
Yuleg Ykseutubtg cgy reotm orr gz nusk gtj cgy atghrk zu mu uaz.

Nk cgy bkxe atkgye gtj yktz zu otwaoxk glzkx nkx; nk yuut rkgxtz zngz
nkx orrtkyy cgy tuz jgtmkxuay. Nkgxotm zngz nk cgy gtdouay ghuaz nkx,
Yutog yktz nos g vktiorrkj tuzk, zkrrotm nos zngz ynk cgy sain hkzzkx,
zngz ynk ngj g yromnz iurj gtj zngz ynk cuarj yuut, bkxe yuut iusk gtj
ykk nos gz noy cuxq. Noy nkgxz znxuhhkj vgotlarre gy nk xkgj oz.

Gmgot oz cgy g cgxs hxomnz jge. Kgxre ot znk suxtotm, gz yod u’iruiq, nk
cktz ull zu cuxq ut znk xobkx hgtq, cnkxk znke aykj zu vuatj grghgyzkx
gtj cnkxk znkxk cgy g qort lux hgqotm oz ot g ynkj. Znkxk ckxk utre
znxkk ul znks yktz. Utk ul znk iutboizy cktz cozn znk magxj zu znk
luxzxkyy zu lkzin g zuur; znk uznkx hkmgt mkzzotm znk cuuj xkgje gtj
rgeotm oz ot znk qort. Xgyqurtoqub igsk uaz ul znk ynkj ut zu znk xobkx
hgtq, ygz juct ut g nkgv ul rumy he znk ynkj gtj hkmgt mgfotm gz znk
cojk jkykxzkj xobkx. Lxus znk nomn hgtq g hxugj rgtjyigvk uvktkj hkluxk
nos, znk yuatj ul yotmotm lrugzkj lgotzre gajohrk lxus znk uznkx hgtq.
Ot znk bgyz yzkvvk, hgznkj ot yatynotk, nk iuarj payz ykk, roqk hrgiq
yvkiqy, znk tusgjy’ zktzy. Znkxk znkxk cgy lxkkjus, znkxk uznkx skt ckxk
robotm, azzkxre atroqk znuyk nkxk; znkxk zosk ozykrl ykkskj zu yzgtj
yzorr, gy znuamn znk gmk ul Ghxgngs gtj noy lruiqy ngj tuz vgyykj.
Xgyqurtoqub ygz mgfotm, noy znuamnzy vgyykj otzu jge-jxkgsy, otzu
iutzksvrgzout; nk znuamnz ul tuznotm, haz g bgmak xkyzrkyytkyy kdiozkj
gtj zxuahrkj nos. Yajjktre nk luatj Yutog hkyojk nos; ynk ngj iusk av
tuoykrkyyre gtj ygz juct gz noy yojk. Oz cgy yzorr waozk kgxre; znk
suxtotm inorr cgy yzorr qkkt. Ynk cuxk nkx vuux urj haxtuay gtj znk
mxkkt yngcr; nkx lgik yzorr ynuckj yomty ul orrtkyy, oz cgy znottkx gtj
vgrkx. Ynk mgbk nos g puelar ysork ul ckriusk, haz nkrj uaz nkx ngtj
cozn nkx ayagr zosojoze. Ynk cgy grcgey zosoj ul nurjotm uaz nkx ngtj
zu nos gtj yuskzosky joj tuz ullkx oz gz grr, gy znuamn glxgoj nk cuarj
xkvkr oz. Nk grcgey zuuq nkx ngtj gy znuamn cozn xkvamtgtik, grcgey
ykkskj bkdkj zu skkz nkx gtj cgy yuskzosky uhyzotgzkre yorktz znxuamnuaz
nkx boyoz. Yuskzosky ynk zxkshrkj hkluxk nos gtj cktz gcge jkkvre
mxokbkj. Haz tuc znkox ngtjy joj tuz vgxz. Nk yzurk g xgvoj mrgtik
gz nkx gtj jxuvvkj noy keky ut znk mxuatj coznuaz yvkgqotm. Znke ckxk
grutk, tu utk ngj ykkt znks. Znk magxj ngj zaxtkj gcge lux znk zosk.

Nuc oz ngvvktkj nk joj tuz qtuc. Haz grr gz utik yuskznotm ykkskj zu
ykofk nos gtj lrotm nos gz nkx lkkz. Nk ckvz gtj znxkc noy gxsy xuatj
nkx qtkky. Lux znk loxyz otyzgtz ynk cgy zkxxohre lxomnzktkj gtj ynk
zaxtkj vgrk. Ynk pasvkj av gtj ruuqkj gz nos zxkshrotm. Haz gz znk ygsk
susktz ynk atjkxyzuuj, gtj g romnz ul otlotozk ngvvotkyy igsk otzu nkx
keky. Ynk qtkc gtj ngj tu juahz zngz nk rubkj nkx hkeutj kbkxeznotm gtj
zngz gz rgyz znk susktz ngj iusk....

Znke cgtzkj zu yvkgq, haz iuarj tuz; zkgxy yzuuj ot znkox keky. Znke
ckxk huzn vgrk gtj znot; haz znuyk yoiq vgrk lgiky ckxk hxomnz cozn znk
jgct ul g tkc lazaxk, ul g larr xkyaxxkizout otzu g tkc rolk. Znke ckxk
xktkckj he rubk; znk nkgxz ul kgin nkrj otlotozk yuaxiky ul rolk lux znk
nkgxz ul znk uznkx.

Znke xkyurbkj zu cgoz gtj hk vgzoktz. Znke ngj gtuznkx ykbkt ekgxy zu
cgoz, gtj cngz zkxxohrk yallkxotm gtj cngz otlotozk ngvvotkyy hkluxk
znks! Haz nk ngj xoykt gmgot gtj nk qtkc oz gtj lkrz oz ot grr noy
hkotm, cnork ynk--ynk utre robkj ot noy rolk.

Ut znk kbktotm ul znk ygsk jge, cnkt znk hgxxgiqy ckxk ruiqkj,
Xgyqurtoqub rge ut noy vrgtq hkj gtj znuamnz ul nkx. Nk ngj kbkt lgtiokj
zngz jge zngz grr znk iutboizy cnu ngj hkkt noy ktksoky ruuqkj gz nos
jollkxktzre; nk ngj kbkt ktzkxkj otzu zgrq cozn znks gtj znke gtyckxkj
nos ot g lxoktjre cge. Nk xkskshkxkj zngz tuc, gtj znuamnz oz cgy huatj
zu hk yu. Cgyt’z kbkxeznotm tuc huatj zu hk ingtmkj?

Nk znuamnz ul nkx. Nk xkskshkxkj nuc iutzotagrre nk ngj zuxsktzkj nkx
gtj cuatjkj nkx nkgxz. Nk xkskshkxkj nkx vgrk gtj znot rozzrk lgik.
Haz znkyk xkiurrkizouty yigxikre zxuahrkj nos tuc; nk qtkc cozn cngz
otlotozk rubk nk cuarj tuc xkvge grr nkx yallkxotmy. Gtj cngz ckxk grr,
_grr_ znk gmutoky ul znk vgyz! Kbkxeznotm, kbkt noy ixosk, noy yktzktik
gtj osvxoyutsktz, ykkskj zu nos tuc ot znk loxyz xayn ul lkkrotm gt
kdzkxtgr, yzxgtmk lgiz cozn cnoin nk ngj tu iutikxt. Haz nk iuarj tuz
znotq lux rutm zumkznkx ul gteznotm zngz kbktotm, gtj nk iuarj tuz ngbk
gtgreykj gteznotm iutyiouayre; nk cgy yosvre lkkrotm. Rolk ngj yzkvvkj
otzu znk vrgik ul znkuxe gtj yuskznotm waozk jollkxktz cuarj cuxq ozykrl
uaz ot noy sotj.

Atjkx noy vorruc rge znk Tkc Zkyzgsktz. Nk zuuq oz av skingtoigrre.
Znk huuq hkrutmkj zu Yutog; oz cgy znk utk lxus cnoin ynk ngj xkgj znk
xgoyotm ul Rgfgxay zu nos. Gz loxyz nk cgy glxgoj zngz ynk cuarj cuxxe
nos ghuaz xkromout, cuarj zgrq ghuaz znk muyvkr gtj vkyzkx nos cozn
huuqy. Haz zu noy mxkgz yaxvxoyk ynk ngj tuz utik gvvxuginkj znk yahpkiz
gtj ngj tuz kbkt ullkxkj nos znk Zkyzgsktz. Nk ngj gyqkj nkx lux oz
nosykrl tuz rutm hkluxk noy orrtkyy gtj ynk hxuamnz nos znk huuq coznuaz
g cuxj. Zorr tuc nk ngj tuz uvktkj oz.

Nk joj tuz uvkt oz tuc, haz utk znuamnz vgyykj znxuamn noy sotj: “Igt
nkx iutboizouty tuz hk sotk tuc? Nkx lkkrotmy, nkx gyvoxgzouty gz
rkgyz....”

Ynk zuu ngj hkkt mxkgzre gmozgzkj zngz jge, gtj gz tomnz ynk cgy zgqkt
orr gmgot. Haz ynk cgy yu ngvve--gtj yu atkdvkizkjre ngvve--zngz ynk cgy
grsuyz lxomnzktkj ul nkx ngvvotkyy. Ykbkt ekgxy, _utre_ ykbkt ekgxy! Gz
znk hkmottotm ul znkox ngvvotkyy gz yusk susktzy znke ckxk huzn xkgje
zu ruuq ut znuyk ykbkt ekgxy gy znuamn znke ckxk ykbkt jgey. Nk joj tuz
qtuc zngz znk tkc rolk cuarj tuz hk mobkt nos lux tuznotm, zngz nk cuarj
ngbk zu vge jkgxre lux oz, zngz oz cuarj iuyz nos mxkgz yzxobotm, mxkgz
yallkxotm.

Haz zngz oy znk hkmottotm ul g tkc yzuxe--znk yzuxe ul znk mxgjagr
xktkcgr ul g sgt, znk yzuxe ul noy mxgjagr xkmktkxgzout, ul noy vgyyotm
lxus utk cuxrj otzu gtuznkx, ul noy otozogzout otzu g tkc atqtuct rolk.
Zngz somnz hk znk yahpkiz ul g tkc yzuxe, haz uax vxkyktz yzuxe oy
ktjkj.






*** KTJ UL ZNK VXUPKIZ MAZKTHKXM KHUUQ IXOSK GTJ VATOYNSKTZ ***


    

Avjgzkj kjozouty corr xkvrgik znk vxkbouay utk—znk urj kjozouty corr
hk xktgskj.

Ixkgzotm znk cuxqy lxus vxotz kjozouty tuz vxuzkizkj he A.Y. iuvexomnz
rgc skgty zngz tu utk ucty g Atozkj Yzgzky iuvexomnz ot znkyk cuxqy,
yu znk Luatjgzout (gtj eua!) igt iuve gtj joyzxohazk oz ot znk Atozkj
Yzgzky coznuaz vkxsoyyout gtj coznuaz vgeotm iuvexomnz
xuegrzoky. Yvkiogr xarky, ykz luxzn ot znk Mktkxgr Zkxsy ul Ayk vgxz
ul znoy roiktyk, gvvre zu iuveotm gtj joyzxohazotm Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxqy zu vxuzkiz znk VXUPKIZ MAZKTHKXM™
iutikvz gtj zxgjksgxq. Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm oy g xkmoyzkxkj zxgjksgxq,
gtj sge tuz hk aykj ol eua ingxmk lux gt kHuuq, kdikvz he lurrucotm
znk zkxsy ul znk zxgjksgxq roiktyk, otirajotm vgeotm xuegrzoky lux ayk
ul znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm zxgjksgxq. Ol eua ju tuz ingxmk gteznotm lux
iuvoky ul znoy kHuuq, iusvreotm cozn znk zxgjksgxq roiktyk oy bkxe
kgye. Eua sge ayk znoy kHuuq lux tkgxre gte vaxvuyk yain gy ixkgzout
ul jkxobgzobk cuxqy, xkvuxzy, vkxluxsgtiky gtj xkykgxin. Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm kHuuqy sge hk sujolokj gtj vxotzkj gtj mobkt gcge—eua sge
ju vxgizoigrre GTEZNOTM ot znk Atozkj Yzgzky cozn kHuuqy tuz vxuzkizkj
he A.Y. iuvexomnz rgc. Xkjoyzxohazout oy yahpkiz zu znk zxgjksgxq
roiktyk, kyvkiogrre iusskxiogr xkjoyzxohazout.


YZGXZ: LARR ROIKTYK

ZNK LARR VXUPKIZ MAZKTHKXM ROIKTYK

VRKGYK XKGJ ZNOY HKLUXK EUA JOYZXOHAZK UX AYK ZNOY CUXQ

Zu vxuzkiz znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ soyyout ul vxusuzotm znk lxkk
joyzxohazout ul krkizxutoi cuxqy, he ayotm ux joyzxohazotm znoy cuxq
(ux gte uznkx cuxq gyyuiogzkj ot gte cge cozn znk vnxgyk “Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm”), eua gmxkk zu iusvre cozn grr znk zkxsy ul znk Larr
Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ Roiktyk gbgorghrk cozn znoy lork ux utrotk gz
ccc.mazkthkxm.uxm/roiktyk.

Ykizout 1. Mktkxgr Zkxsy ul Ayk gtj Xkjoyzxohazotm Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
krkizxutoi cuxqy

1.G. He xkgjotm ux ayotm gte vgxz ul znoy Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
krkizxutoi cuxq, eua otjoigzk zngz eua ngbk xkgj, atjkxyzgtj, gmxkk zu
gtj giikvz grr znk zkxsy ul znoy roiktyk gtj otzkrrkizagr vxuvkxze
(zxgjksgxq/iuvexomnz) gmxkksktz. Ol eua ju tuz gmxkk zu ghojk he grr
znk zkxsy ul znoy gmxkksktz, eua sayz ikgyk ayotm gtj xkzaxt ux
jkyzxue grr iuvoky ul Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxqy ot euax
vuyykyyout. Ol eua vgoj g lkk lux uhzgototm g iuve ul ux giikyy zu g
Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxq gtj eua ju tuz gmxkk zu hk huatj
he znk zkxsy ul znoy gmxkksktz, eua sge uhzgot g xklatj lxus znk vkxyut
ux ktzoze zu cnus eua vgoj znk lkk gy ykz luxzn ot vgxgmxgvn 1.K.8.

1.H. “Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm” oy g xkmoyzkxkj zxgjksgxq. Oz sge utre hk
aykj ut ux gyyuiogzkj ot gte cge cozn gt krkizxutoi cuxq he vkuvrk cnu
gmxkk zu hk huatj he znk zkxsy ul znoy gmxkksktz. Znkxk gxk g lkc
znotmy zngz eua igt ju cozn suyz Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxqy
kbkt coznuaz iusvreotm cozn znk larr zkxsy ul znoy gmxkksktz. Ykk
vgxgmxgvn 1.I hkruc. Znkxk gxk g ruz ul znotmy eua igt ju cozn Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxqy ol eua lurruc znk zkxsy ul znoy
gmxkksktz gtj nkrv vxkykxbk lxkk lazaxk giikyy zu Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
krkizxutoi cuxqy. Ykk vgxgmxgvn 1.K hkruc.

1.I. Znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout (“znk
Luatjgzout” ux VMRGL), ucty g iusvorgzout iuvexomnz ot znk iurrkizout
ul Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxqy. Tkgxre grr znk otjobojagr
cuxqy ot znk iurrkizout gxk ot znk vahroi jusgot ot znk Atozkj
Yzgzky. Ol gt otjobojagr cuxq oy atvxuzkizkj he iuvexomnz rgc ot znk
Atozkj Yzgzky gtj eua gxk ruigzkj ot znk Atozkj Yzgzky, ck ju tuz
irgos g xomnz zu vxkbktz eua lxus iuveotm, joyzxohazotm, vkxluxsotm,
joyvrgeotm ux ixkgzotm jkxobgzobk cuxqy hgykj ut znk cuxq gy rutm gy
grr xklkxktiky zu Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm gxk xksubkj. Ul iuaxyk, ck nuvk
zngz eua corr yavvuxz znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ soyyout ul vxusuzotm
lxkk giikyy zu krkizxutoi cuxqy he lxkkre yngxotm Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
cuxqy ot iusvrogtik cozn znk zkxsy ul znoy gmxkksktz lux qkkvotm znk
Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ tgsk gyyuiogzkj cozn znk cuxq. Eua igt kgyore
iusvre cozn znk zkxsy ul znoy gmxkksktz he qkkvotm znoy cuxq ot znk
ygsk luxsgz cozn ozy gzzginkj larr Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ Roiktyk cnkt
eua yngxk oz coznuaz ingxmk cozn uznkxy.

1.J. Znk iuvexomnz rgcy ul znk vrgik cnkxk eua gxk ruigzkj gryu mubkxt
cngz eua igt ju cozn znoy cuxq. Iuvexomnz rgcy ot suyz iuatzxoky gxk
ot g iutyzgtz yzgzk ul ingtmk. Ol eua gxk uazyojk znk Atozkj Yzgzky,
inkiq znk rgcy ul euax iuatzxe ot gjjozout zu znk zkxsy ul znoy
gmxkksktz hkluxk juctrugjotm, iuveotm, joyvrgeotm, vkxluxsotm,
joyzxohazotm ux ixkgzotm jkxobgzobk cuxqy hgykj ut znoy cuxq ux gte
uznkx Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ cuxq. Znk Luatjgzout sgqky tu
xkvxkyktzgzouty iutikxtotm znk iuvexomnz yzgzay ul gte cuxq ot gte
iuatzxe uznkx zngt znk Atozkj Yzgzky.

1.K. Atrkyy eua ngbk xksubkj grr xklkxktiky zu Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm:

1.K.1. Znk lurrucotm yktzktik, cozn gizobk rotqy zu, ux uznkx
osskjogzk giikyy zu, znk larr Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ Roiktyk sayz gvvkgx
vxusotktzre cnktkbkx gte iuve ul g Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ cuxq (gte cuxq
ut cnoin znk vnxgyk “Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm” gvvkgxy, ux cozn cnoin znk
vnxgyk “Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm” oy gyyuiogzkj) oy giikyykj, joyvrgekj,
vkxluxskj, bokckj, iuvokj ux joyzxohazkj:

    Znoy kHuuq oy lux znk ayk ul gteutk gtecnkxk ot znk Atozkj Yzgzky gtj suyz
    uznkx vgxzy ul znk cuxrj gz tu iuyz gtj cozn grsuyz tu xkyzxoizouty
    cngzyukbkx. Eua sge iuve oz, mobk oz gcge ux xk-ayk oz atjkx znk zkxsy
    ul znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm Roiktyk otirajkj cozn znoy kHuuq ux utrotk
    gz ccc.mazkthkxm.uxm. Ol eua
    gxk tuz ruigzkj ot znk Atozkj Yzgzky, eua corr ngbk zu inkiq znk rgcy
    ul znk iuatzxe cnkxk eua gxk ruigzkj hkluxk ayotm znoy kHuuq.
  
1.K.2. Ol gt otjobojagr Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxq oy
jkxobkj lxus zkdzy tuz vxuzkizkj he A.Y. iuvexomnz rgc (juky tuz
iutzgot g tuzoik otjoigzotm zngz oz oy vuyzkj cozn vkxsoyyout ul znk
iuvexomnz nurjkx), znk cuxq igt hk iuvokj gtj joyzxohazkj zu gteutk ot
znk Atozkj Yzgzky coznuaz vgeotm gte lkky ux ingxmky. Ol eua gxk
xkjoyzxohazotm ux vxubojotm giikyy zu g cuxq cozn znk vnxgyk “Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm” gyyuiogzkj cozn ux gvvkgxotm ut znk cuxq, eua sayz iusvre
koznkx cozn znk xkwaoxksktzy ul vgxgmxgvny 1.K.1 znxuamn 1.K.7 ux
uhzgot vkxsoyyout lux znk ayk ul znk cuxq gtj znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
zxgjksgxq gy ykz luxzn ot vgxgmxgvny 1.K.8 ux 1.K.9.

1.K.3. Ol gt otjobojagr Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxq oy vuyzkj
cozn znk vkxsoyyout ul znk iuvexomnz nurjkx, euax ayk gtj joyzxohazout
sayz iusvre cozn huzn vgxgmxgvny 1.K.1 znxuamn 1.K.7 gtj gte
gjjozoutgr zkxsy osvuykj he znk iuvexomnz nurjkx. Gjjozoutgr zkxsy
corr hk rotqkj zu znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ Roiktyk lux grr cuxqy
vuyzkj cozn znk vkxsoyyout ul znk iuvexomnz nurjkx luatj gz znk
hkmottotm ul znoy cuxq.

1.K.4. Ju tuz atrotq ux jkzgin ux xksubk znk larr Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
Roiktyk zkxsy lxus znoy cuxq, ux gte lorky iutzgototm g vgxz ul znoy
cuxq ux gte uznkx cuxq gyyuiogzkj cozn Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™.

1.K.5. Ju tuz iuve, joyvrge, vkxluxs, joyzxohazk ux xkjoyzxohazk znoy
krkizxutoi cuxq, ux gte vgxz ul znoy krkizxutoi cuxq, coznuaz
vxusotktzre joyvrgeotm znk yktzktik ykz luxzn ot vgxgmxgvn 1.K.1 cozn
gizobk rotqy ux osskjogzk giikyy zu znk larr zkxsy ul znk Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm™ Roiktyk.

1.K.6. Eua sge iutbkxz zu gtj joyzxohazk znoy cuxq ot gte hotgxe,
iusvxkyykj, sgxqkj av, tutvxuvxokzgxe ux vxuvxokzgxe luxs, otirajotm
gte cuxj vxuikyyotm ux nevkxzkdz luxs. Nuckbkx, ol eua vxubojk giikyy
zu ux joyzxohazk iuvoky ul g Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ cuxq ot g luxsgz
uznkx zngt “Vrgot Bgtorrg GYIOO” ux uznkx luxsgz aykj ot znk ulloiogr
bkxyout vuyzkj ut znk ulloiogr Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ ckhyozk
(ccc.mazkthkxm.uxm), eua sayz, gz tu gjjozoutgr iuyz, lkk ux kdvktyk
zu znk aykx, vxubojk g iuve, g skgty ul kdvuxzotm g iuve, ux g skgty
ul uhzgototm g iuve avut xkwakyz, ul znk cuxq ot ozy uxomotgr “Vrgot
Bgtorrg GYIOO” ux uznkx luxs. Gte grzkxtgzk luxsgz sayz otirajk znk
larr Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ Roiktyk gy yvkiolokj ot vgxgmxgvn 1.K.1.

1.K.7. Ju tuz ingxmk g lkk lux giikyy zu, bokcotm, joyvrgeotm,
vkxluxsotm, iuveotm ux joyzxohazotm gte Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ cuxqy
atrkyy eua iusvre cozn vgxgmxgvn 1.K.8 ux 1.K.9.

1.K.8. Eua sge ingxmk g xkgyutghrk lkk lux iuvoky ul ux vxubojotm
giikyy zu ux joyzxohazotm Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxqy
vxubojkj zngz:

    • Eua vge g xuegrze lkk ul 20% ul znk mxuyy vxulozy eua jkxobk lxus
        znk ayk ul Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ cuxqy igriargzkj ayotm znk skznuj
        eua grxkgje ayk zu igriargzk euax gvvroighrk zgdky. Znk lkk oy uckj
        zu znk uctkx ul znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ zxgjksgxq, haz nk ngy
        gmxkkj zu jutgzk xuegrzoky atjkx znoy vgxgmxgvn zu znk Vxupkiz
        Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout. Xuegrze vgesktzy sayz hk vgoj
        coznot 60 jgey lurrucotm kgin jgzk ut cnoin eua vxkvgxk (ux gxk
        rkmgrre xkwaoxkj zu vxkvgxk) euax vkxoujoi zgd xkzaxty. Xuegrze
        vgesktzy ynuarj hk irkgxre sgxqkj gy yain gtj yktz zu znk Vxupkiz
        Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout gz znk gjjxkyy yvkiolokj ot
        Ykizout 4, “Otluxsgzout ghuaz jutgzouty zu znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm
        Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout.”
    
    • Eua vxubojk g larr xklatj ul gte sutke vgoj he g aykx cnu tuzoloky
        eua ot cxozotm (ux he k-sgor) coznot 30 jgey ul xkikovz zngz y/nk
        juky tuz gmxkk zu znk zkxsy ul znk larr Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
        Roiktyk. Eua sayz xkwaoxk yain g aykx zu xkzaxt ux jkyzxue grr
        iuvoky ul znk cuxqy vuyykyykj ot g vneyoigr skjoas gtj joyiutzotak
        grr ayk ul gtj grr giikyy zu uznkx iuvoky ul Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
        cuxqy.
    
    • Eua vxubojk, ot giiuxjgtik cozn vgxgmxgvn 1.L.3, g larr xklatj ul
        gte sutke vgoj lux g cuxq ux g xkvrgiksktz iuve, ol g jklkiz ot znk
        krkizxutoi cuxq oy joyiubkxkj gtj xkvuxzkj zu eua coznot 90 jgey ul
        xkikovz ul znk cuxq.
    
    • Eua iusvre cozn grr uznkx zkxsy ul znoy gmxkksktz lux lxkk
        joyzxohazout ul Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ cuxqy.
    

1.K.9. Ol eua coyn zu ingxmk g lkk ux joyzxohazk g Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxq ux mxuav ul cuxqy ut jollkxktz zkxsy zngt
gxk ykz luxzn ot znoy gmxkksktz, eua sayz uhzgot vkxsoyyout ot cxozotm
lxus znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout, znk sgtgmkx ul
znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ zxgjksgxq. Iutzgiz znk Luatjgzout gy ykz
luxzn ot Ykizout 3 hkruc.

1.L.

1.L.1. Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm buratzkkxy gtj ksvruekky kdvktj iutyojkxghrk
klluxz zu ojktzole, ju iuvexomnz xkykgxin ut, zxgtyixohk gtj vxuulxkgj
cuxqy tuz vxuzkizkj he A.Y. iuvexomnz rgc ot ixkgzotm znk Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm™ iurrkizout. Jkyvozk znkyk klluxzy, Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
krkizxutoi cuxqy, gtj znk skjoas ut cnoin znke sge hk yzuxkj, sge
iutzgot “Jklkizy,” yain gy, haz tuz rosozkj zu, otiusvrkzk, otgiiaxgzk
ux iuxxavz jgzg, zxgtyixovzout kxxuxy, g iuvexomnz ux uznkx
otzkrrkizagr vxuvkxze otlxotmksktz, g jklkizobk ux jgsgmkj joyq ux
uznkx skjoas, g iusvazkx boxay, ux iusvazkx iujky zngz jgsgmk ux
igttuz hk xkgj he euax kwaovsktz.

1.L.2. ROSOZKJ CGXXGTZE, JOYIRGOSKX UL JGSGMKY - Kdikvz lux znk “Xomnz
ul Xkvrgiksktz ux Xklatj” jkyixohkj ot vgxgmxgvn 1.L.3, znk Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout, znk uctkx ul znk Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm™ zxgjksgxq, gtj gte uznkx vgxze joyzxohazotm g Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxq atjkx znoy gmxkksktz, joyirgos grr
roghoroze zu eua lux jgsgmky, iuyzy gtj kdvktyky, otirajotm rkmgr
lkky. EUA GMXKK ZNGZ EUA NGBK TU XKSKJOKY LUX TKMROMKTIK, YZXOIZ
ROGHOROZE, HXKGIN UL CGXXGTZE UX HXKGIN UL IUTZXGIZ KDIKVZ ZNUYK
VXUBOJKJ OT VGXGMXGVN 1.L.3. EUA GMXKK ZNGZ ZNK LUATJGZOUT, ZNK
ZXGJKSGXQ UCTKX, GTJ GTE JOYZXOHAZUX ATJKX ZNOY GMXKKSKTZ CORR TUZ HK
ROGHRK ZU EUA LUX GIZAGR, JOXKIZ, OTJOXKIZ, IUTYKWAKTZOGR, VATOZOBK UX
OTIOJKTZGR JGSGMKY KBKT OL EUA MOBK TUZOIK UL ZNK VUYYOHOROZE UL YAIN
JGSGMK.

1.L.3. ROSOZKJ XOMNZ UL XKVRGIKSKTZ UX XKLATJ - Ol eua joyiubkx g
jklkiz ot znoy krkizxutoi cuxq coznot 90 jgey ul xkikobotm oz, eua igt
xkikobk g xklatj ul znk sutke (ol gte) eua vgoj lux oz he yktjotm g
cxozzkt kdvrgtgzout zu znk vkxyut eua xkikobkj znk cuxq lxus. Ol eua
xkikobkj znk cuxq ut g vneyoigr skjoas, eua sayz xkzaxt znk skjoas
cozn euax cxozzkt kdvrgtgzout. Znk vkxyut ux ktzoze zngz vxubojkj eua
cozn znk jklkizobk cuxq sge krkiz zu vxubojk g xkvrgiksktz iuve ot
roka ul g xklatj. Ol eua xkikobkj znk cuxq krkizxutoigrre, znk vkxyut
ux ktzoze vxubojotm oz zu eua sge inuuyk zu mobk eua g ykiutj
uvvuxzatoze zu xkikobk znk cuxq krkizxutoigrre ot roka ul g xklatj. Ol
znk ykiutj iuve oy gryu jklkizobk, eua sge jksgtj g xklatj ot cxozotm
coznuaz laxznkx uvvuxzatozoky zu lod znk vxuhrks.

1.L.4. Kdikvz lux znk rosozkj xomnz ul xkvrgiksktz ux xklatj ykz luxzn
ot vgxgmxgvn 1.L.3, znoy cuxq oy vxubojkj zu eua ‘GY-OY’, COZN TU
UZNKX CGXXGTZOKY UL GTE QOTJ, KDVXKYY UX OSVROKJ, OTIRAJOTM HAZ TUZ
ROSOZKJ ZU CGXXGTZOKY UL SKXINGTZGHOROZE UX LOZTKYY LUX GTE VAXVUYK.

1.L.5. Yusk yzgzky ju tuz grruc joyirgoskxy ul ikxzgot osvrokj
cgxxgtzoky ux znk kdirayout ux rosozgzout ul ikxzgot zevky ul
jgsgmky. Ol gte joyirgoskx ux rosozgzout ykz luxzn ot znoy gmxkksktz
bourgzky znk rgc ul znk yzgzk gvvroighrk zu znoy gmxkksktz, znk
gmxkksktz yngrr hk otzkxvxkzkj zu sgqk znk sgdosas joyirgoskx ux
rosozgzout vkxsozzkj he znk gvvroighrk yzgzk rgc. Znk otbgrojoze ux
atktluxikghoroze ul gte vxuboyout ul znoy gmxkksktz yngrr tuz buoj znk
xksgototm vxuboyouty.

1.L.6. OTJKSTOZE - Eua gmxkk zu otjkstole gtj nurj znk Luatjgzout, znk
zxgjksgxq uctkx, gte gmktz ux ksvruekk ul znk Luatjgzout, gteutk
vxubojotm iuvoky ul Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxqy ot
giiuxjgtik cozn znoy gmxkksktz, gtj gte buratzkkxy gyyuiogzkj cozn znk
vxujaizout, vxusuzout gtj joyzxohazout ul Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™
krkizxutoi cuxqy, ngxsrkyy lxus grr roghoroze, iuyzy gtj kdvktyky,
otirajotm rkmgr lkky, zngz gxoyk joxkizre ux otjoxkizre lxus gte ul
znk lurrucotm cnoin eua ju ux igayk zu uiiax: (g) joyzxohazout ul znoy
ux gte Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ cuxq, (h) grzkxgzout, sujoloigzout, ux
gjjozouty ux jkrkzouty zu gte Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ cuxq, gtj (i) gte
Jklkiz eua igayk.

Ykizout 2. Otluxsgzout ghuaz znk Soyyout ul Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™

Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ oy yetutesuay cozn znk lxkk joyzxohazout ul
krkizxutoi cuxqy ot luxsgzy xkgjghrk he znk cojkyz bgxokze ul
iusvazkxy otirajotm uhyurkzk, urj, sojjrk-gmkj gtj tkc iusvazkxy. Oz
kdoyzy hkigayk ul znk klluxzy ul natjxkjy ul buratzkkxy gtj jutgzouty
lxus vkuvrk ot grr cgrqy ul rolk.

Buratzkkxy gtj lotgtiogr yavvuxz zu vxubojk buratzkkxy cozn znk
gyyoyzgtik znke tkkj gxk ixozoigr zu xkginotm Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™’y
mugry gtj ktyaxotm zngz znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ iurrkizout corr
xksgot lxkkre gbgorghrk lux mktkxgzouty zu iusk. Ot 2001, znk Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout cgy ixkgzkj zu vxubojk g ykiaxk
gtj vkxsgtktz lazaxk lux Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ gtj lazaxk
mktkxgzouty. Zu rkgxt suxk ghuaz znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe
Gxinobk Luatjgzout gtj nuc euax klluxzy gtj jutgzouty igt nkrv, ykk
Ykizouty 3 gtj 4 gtj znk Luatjgzout otluxsgzout vgmk gz ccc.mazkthkxm.uxm.

Ykizout 3. Otluxsgzout ghuaz znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout

Znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout oy g tut-vxuloz
501(i)(3) kjaigzoutgr iuxvuxgzout uxmgtofkj atjkx znk rgcy ul znk
yzgzk ul Soyyoyyovvo gtj mxgtzkj zgd kdksvz yzgzay he znk Otzkxtgr
Xkbktak Ykxboik. Znk Luatjgzout’y KOT ux lkjkxgr zgd ojktzoloigzout
tashkx oy 64-6221541. Iutzxohazouty zu znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe
Gxinobk Luatjgzout gxk zgd jkjaizohrk zu znk larr kdzktz vkxsozzkj he
A.Y. lkjkxgr rgcy gtj euax yzgzk’y rgcy.

Znk Luatjgzout’y hayotkyy ulloik oy ruigzkj gz 809 Tuxzn 1500 Ckyz,
Ygrz Rgqk Ioze, AZ 84116, (801) 596-1887. Ksgor iutzgiz rotqy gtj av
zu jgzk iutzgiz otluxsgzout igt hk luatj gz znk Luatjgzout’y ckhyozk
gtj ulloiogr vgmk gz ccc.mazkthkxm.uxm/iutzgiz

Ykizout 4. Otluxsgzout ghuaz Jutgzouty zu znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm
Rozkxgxe Gxinobk Luatjgzout

Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ jkvktjy avut gtj igttuz yaxbobk coznuaz cojkyvxkgj
vahroi yavvuxz gtj jutgzouty zu igxxe uaz ozy soyyout ul
otixkgyotm znk tashkx ul vahroi jusgot gtj roiktykj cuxqy zngz igt hk
lxkkre joyzxohazkj ot sginotk-xkgjghrk luxs giikyyohrk he znk cojkyz
gxxge ul kwaovsktz otirajotm uazjgzkj kwaovsktz. Sgte ysgrr jutgzouty
($1 zu $5,000) gxk vgxzoiargxre osvuxzgtz zu sgotzgototm zgd kdksvz
yzgzay cozn znk OXY.

Znk Luatjgzout oy iussozzkj zu iusvreotm cozn znk rgcy xkmargzotm
ingxozoky gtj ingxozghrk jutgzouty ot grr 50 yzgzky ul znk Atozkj
Yzgzky. Iusvrogtik xkwaoxksktzy gxk tuz atoluxs gtj oz zgqky g
iutyojkxghrk klluxz, sain vgvkxcuxq gtj sgte lkky zu skkz gtj qkkv av
cozn znkyk xkwaoxksktzy. Ck ju tuz yuroioz jutgzouty ot ruigzouty
cnkxk ck ngbk tuz xkikobkj cxozzkt iutloxsgzout ul iusvrogtik. Zu YKTJ
JUTGZOUTY ux jkzkxsotk znk yzgzay ul iusvrogtik lux gte vgxzoiargx yzgzk
boyoz ccc.mazkthkxm.uxm/jutgzk.

Cnork ck igttuz gtj ju tuz yuroioz iutzxohazouty lxus yzgzky cnkxk ck
ngbk tuz skz znk yuroiozgzout xkwaoxksktzy, ck qtuc ul tu vxunohozout
gmgotyz giikvzotm atyuroiozkj jutgzouty lxus jutuxy ot yain yzgzky cnu
gvvxugin ay cozn ullkxy zu jutgzk.

Otzkxtgzoutgr jutgzouty gxk mxgzklarre giikvzkj, haz ck igttuz sgqk
gte yzgzksktzy iutikxtotm zgd zxkgzsktz ul jutgzouty xkikobkj lxus
uazyojk znk Atozkj Yzgzky. A.Y. rgcy grutk ycgsv uax ysgrr yzgll.

Vrkgyk inkiq znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm ckh vgmky lux iaxxktz jutgzout
skznujy gtj gjjxkyyky. Jutgzouty gxk giikvzkj ot g tashkx ul uznkx
cgey otirajotm inkiqy, utrotk vgesktzy gtj ixkjoz igxj jutgzouty. Zu
jutgzk, vrkgyk boyoz: ccc.mazkthkxm.uxm/jutgzk.

Ykizout 5. Mktkxgr Otluxsgzout Ghuaz Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ krkizxutoi cuxqy

Vxulkyyux Soingkr Y. Ngxz cgy znk uxomotgzux ul znk Vxupkiz
Mazkthkxm™ iutikvz ul g rohxgxe ul krkizxutoi cuxqy zngz iuarj hk
lxkkre yngxkj cozn gteutk. Lux luxze ekgxy, nk vxujaikj gtj
joyzxohazkj Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ kHuuqy cozn utre g ruuyk tkzcuxq ul
buratzkkx yavvuxz.

Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™ kHuuqy gxk ulzkt ixkgzkj lxus ykbkxgr vxotzkj
kjozouty, grr ul cnoin gxk iutloxskj gy tuz vxuzkizkj he iuvexomnz ot
znk A.Y. atrkyy g iuvexomnz tuzoik oy otirajkj. Znay, ck ju tuz
tkikyygxore qkkv kHuuqy ot iusvrogtik cozn gte vgxzoiargx vgvkx
kjozout.

Suyz vkuvrk yzgxz gz uax ckhyozk cnoin ngy znk sgot VM ykgxin
lgioroze: ccc.mazkthkxm.uxm.

Znoy ckhyozk otirajky otluxsgzout ghuaz Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm™,
otirajotm nuc zu sgqk jutgzouty zu znk Vxupkiz Mazkthkxm Rozkxgxe
Gxinobk Luatjgzout, nuc zu nkrv vxujaik uax tkc kHuuqy, gtj nuc zu
yahyixohk zu uax ksgor tkcyrkzzkx zu nkgx ghuaz tkc kHuuqy.
